Review: My stay in the comfy private double room was indeed comfortable! It's not just conveniently located in the middle of a great neighborhood, within walking distance from Mount Royal and a bunch of nice cafes and bars, but the hosts were very easygoing, helpful, and fun. I would totally do it again!
An amazing and enormous room at a total bargain price. Nice backyard. Great neighborhood. Friendly and accommodating host. I have nothing bad to say about it!

I had a FABULOUS stay! The room was enormous and just as pictured. You really cannot beat the neighborhood - walking distance to a ton of great local bars/restaurants/parks and easy access to the bus and the subway. The hosts were so gracious and helpful. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.
We had a wonderful stay! The host was very friendly and helpful, the room was exactly as pictured, and the location was perfect.
Lilou was a lovely host - communication was super smooth and she made me nice herbal tea before bed. The room was spacious, and you couldn't ask for a better location in Montreal!
The reservation was cancelled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

The welcome offered by Laura and Lulu is warm and very pleasant. The neighborhood is one of the best in Montreal and the apartment is ideally located. The room is very large and quiet. 
Laura is an outstanding host, and very accommodating! Thank you again for this first stay in Montreal!

I spent 5 days at Laura's place, the apartment is large and looks just like what we can see in the photos. The bedroom is also very spacious, and the bed very comfortable. 
As for Laura and Anne, they are both very nice and make us feel right at home immediately. In short, we feel like we're at home. 
In the end, a great start to our stay in Montreal, thank you again to Laura and Anne.

If I had to describe my stay at Laura's in one word it would be 'AMAZING'! Luckily, I have more space. 

The room is just as the pictures display: huge, clean, and comfy! There's a 2-person bed, a built-in closet, another closet with drawers, a bookcase, a big desk, and a comfy sofa to relax on. Although the room offers more space than you probably need, you can also just hang out in the cozy living room. But the best place has to be the backyard, which Laura turned into a little green oasis. It's the ideal spot to relax after a long day, enjoy the sun, or have a home dinner. And no need to feel lonely as Lulu - a.k.a. the most adorable cat ever - and his buddies from the block are always around somewhere (especially if you give them some of your ham sandwich or sushi). 

I've stayed at Laura's for several months and I've never felt so at home in another person's house. Laura went above and beyond to make my stay as pleasant as possible. I was new to Montreal (actually, I was new to Canada) and didn't know any people other than a few colleagues. Laura embraced me as a friend and made sure I never had to feel alone or get bored, while also giving me all the privacy I wanted. 

The neighborhood has everything you need. The house is near shops, supermarkets, cafes, restaurants, parks (including Mont Royal), several bus stops, two metro stations (Laurier & Mont Royal; both a 10-minute walk away), and there's always some fun - often free - festivals around the corner in the summer. Despite all this, the street is actually really quiet and very safe!

Laura was a brilliant host. The key pick-up was well-organized and I felt immediately welcomed into the home. Essentials/amenities were provided, which made it much easier. 

She also gave us great advice on where to go and eat. Overall, Laura was just an awesome host.

I stayed there for a week during one of the many festivals in Montreal. Communication before arrival was great, and when I checked in there was a lovely handwritten welcome letter with instructions as the host was at work.

The room was as pictured in the listing, clean and bright, and the double bed was super comfy (I slept really well). The location was also great, right next to St. Laurent with cafes and restaurants nearby, and a large supermarket. 

Laura and her housemates made me feel super welcome in their home and would stay there again.
Super cute apartment with a great room! Laura was super welcoming and made my stay very enjoyable. I would definitely recommend this place! I had a great time!

Our stay with Laura was wonderful! The room was clean and homey, and the location was very central and interesting. Lilou was great at communicating with us about arrival and departure, and very friendly - providing us with some tips about what to do in the city. She really went above and beyond to accommodate us... I'd definitely recommend staying here!

Laura was awesome to stay with! Her place is in the BEST location, in the artistic area of Montreal, very close to a bus station, grocery store, coffee shops, music bars and very good restaurants. The bedroom was so beautiful, clean, cozy and comfortable! I went to Montreal on my own and I couldn't choose a better flat/area in the city. As a woman you can walk wherever you want feeling so confident and safe!!! 

The whole apartment is so clean and beautiful! I got there just in time for good weather, and Laura was so nice to me, ready to answer any question of mine, every time I needed, by phone and in person. We also had a lovely chat together in her fantastic courtyard and she invited me to her tasty birthday party introducing me all her friends. She has been great to me!

If you want to go to Montreal, you absolutely have to stay at her place!
The situation is great, the host very welcoming and nice. Absolute recommendation! :)

The room was spacious and clean. Lucy was very welcoming and great to chat with! We only stayed for three days, so Lucy suggested some great places to eat and things to do.  Close to some great places to eat and shops.

Laura is a very warm, welcoming and communicative host.
The accommodation is in a very pleasant neighborhood, the room is spacious and matches the photos. 
Her cat Lulu is adorable and very calm. 
We highly recommend it after two beautiful days spent in Montreal.

Such a lovely space and host! Arrival was very easy, and the apartment and room I was staying in (the front room) were clean and well decorated. The backyard was a great place to chill out - very relaxing and private. 

The host, Laura, was very friendly and laid-back. The resident kitty was possibly even more friendly than Laura, and would monopolize your whole stay with her adorableness if you let her. 

The area is very close to bus routes, as well as some small coffee shops and restaurants, and of course the beautiful Mont Royale. The Mile-End neighborhood is eclectic and cute, with lots to see even if you're just wandering. 

I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it to friends headed to Montreal.

Fantastic experience. Laura was incredibly friendly and accommodating. The room was comfortable and everything we needed for our week in Montreal. It was perfectly located to easily get anywhere we wanted to go within the city. Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again next time I come to Montreal.

I loved the neighborhood - pretty houses and cool cafes, and lots of young people on bikes. I really appreciate Laura's simple but tasteful way of furnishing her house. 

Laura is super warm and lovely, helpful, kind, and also gives you the space you need. 

The bed is very comfortable with lovely fluffy pillows. The room is really big and lovely.

I can't fault this accommodation at all. It's a fabulous inexpensive option.

The accommodation perfectly matched the description, with a spacious bedroom. The location is ideal with restaurants, shops and grocery stores within 5 minutes walk. Laura is very friendly and cheerful; however, unfortunately she was not able to be very present during my stay. Just a few gusts of wind 4 or 5 times. Lulu the cat is an adorable old rascal. For my first Airbnb experience it has been very positive, in addition to having had an adorable French roommate during my stay.
My stay was great! Laura was so nice and everything was as described! Lovely location!
Lovely room, great area, fantastic host!

After living in Montreal for 3 years, I spent my last 4 months at Laura's place and I could not have hoped for a better way to enjoy this ending experience in Quebec. Laura made me feel home since day one. Living with her made my days happier and funnier, she's caring, full of energy, curious and interesting. She's very open-minded and used to meeting different people all the time. There's no way you could be bored having her around. 

If you're only visiting for a few days, she will definitely be a good advisor, she knows her city by heart. If you're staying longer like I did, the only risk is that you might have a heavy heart when it will be time to leave.

The place was amazing and was located in a nice neighborhood full of cool vintage stores, restaurants, and bars. Laura was super nice and friendly. She made me feel so welcome and my room was clean, also the bed was comfy. Everything was just so great! I would definitely stay at Laura's again for my next trip to Montreal! :)

Charming and helpful host, large comfortable room well located. 
A real nest of comfort!

I stayed at Laura's place for 3 weeks and wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to anyone visiting Montréal! Laura was a fantastic host, so lovely and helpful, making sure my arrival was easy even though she was at work. The room was as pictured and very spacious, with plenty of space for luggage and a super comfy bed. The entire apartment is clean and spacious, and it was great having access to a washer and dryer. The apartment is in a safe neighborhood, located within a couple of minutes walking distance of the bustling Blvd St-Laurent. There are so many great restaurants, cafés and shops nearby (including a large supermarket a few minutes away) you are spoiled for choice. Mont-Royal metro station is only a 10 minute walk away to so you can be downtown in 25 minutes!

First of all, the room is consistent with the photos and the apartment is very well located in the heart of Plateau. It's situated between Mont-Royal metro station and Laurier without mentioning the numerous buses nearby that will take you directly to downtown. 

Laura is a truly wonderful host, you can book with confidence!

I felt very welcomed by Lilou and her adorable cats and kittens. Lilou treated me with a lot of respect and sociability, preserving my privacy which I needed at that time. 

Furthermore, I greatly appreciated her apartment which is clean, very quiet and well-located. The room was large and nicely furnished. I highly recommend this place :-)
Great location, very comfortable room, very friendly hosts.

Laura was absolutely the best. Check-in instructions were clear and the place was absolutely fantastic. The place was exactly the right spot for shopping and cool cafes to check out in the morning, as well as lunch and supper locales in the evenings. Literally one block from a bus that took me straight downtown if I didn't want to walk, which, when I wanted to, was straight down Boul. St. Laurent! The room was big and clean and quiet. I would have loved to stay longer!

My stay at Laura's place was amazing! The house is spacious, clean, and cozy, and nestled in the heart of the lively, funky, and beautiful Plateau-Mont-Royal. Laura has an amazing way of making her place feel relaxed and friendly, and her guests feel welcome! Merci Laura, this was one of my best Airbnb experiences yet :)

The room, the host and the location are magnificent!
And the cats too!
Thank you
Top :) Excellent location and hospitality!
A lovely spacious room with the convenience of cooking facilities and close to excellent restaurants and a Bixi bike stop.
My stay was wonderful, it was a great start and place to explore Montreal. I was made to feel right at home!

I loved staying at Laura's apartment! Her place is spacious and clean, and she is super friendly and easy to coordinate with. I was arriving earlier than the check-in time and Laura made arrangements so that I could come in earlier and leave my bags in the room. The location of her place is ideal, surrounded by stores, cafes, and restaurants, and within walking distance of other cool neighborhoods. There is convenient access to public transportation (metro and bus), and I was able to get to all the areas I wanted to visit very easily. The room is huge with a comfy bed, closet space, a big desk, and a corner sofa. The rest of the apartment was clean and orderly, and I felt really comfortable throughout my stay. I would definitely recommend staying at Laura's, and I will certainly do so whenever I visit Montreal again!

Airbnb at the top! Laura is super cool, the room is big, practical, there's everything you need. The location is great on a street of Saint Laurent, 5 minutes from public transport... Go for it without hesitation

Lilou's place is located in a very lively neighborhood and not far from downtown (a 10-minute bus ride and a 30-minute walk). She is a very hospitable host and I felt at home during my two-week stay. Milton (the cat) is super friendly but not annoying. Try to visit some of her local restaurant recommendations; there are some great tips. Overall, this is one of the best Airbnb accommodations in Montreal.

1. Location
- Designer shops (souvenirs, clothing). Vintage shops are nearby and easy to visit.
- There are many coffee shops with a good atmosphere.
- Famous restaurants are close by (bagels, sandwiches, ramen, etc.).
- Mont Royal and Jean Talon Market are nearby.
- Easy access to public transportation everywhere.
- Quiet and clean neighborhood.

2. Accommodation
- The rooms are incredibly spacious and clean.
- Modern and beautiful interior design. 
- Three adorable cats live there.
- There is a small backyard.

3. Amenities
- Towels provided.
- Washing machine available.
- Kitchen with refrigerator.

4. Conclusion
The host was very friendly, which made it easy to relax. The house is so pretty that just looking at it makes you feel good. 
It would be even better in summer and fall because Mont Royal is close by, and the backyard is there too. 
Although not as close to downtown, Montreal is small and has a well-developed public transportation system, so it's not inconvenient to move around.  In fact, the neighborhood was quiet and had many cafes nearby, which made it easy to relax. 
Highly recommend!
It's been a long time since I traveled alone as a single woman in a new city, and Laura was really wonderful and accommodating! It's a great stay, great location, and wonderful city.
A very quiet and relaxing place to stay. Laura is very helpful with any issue that may arise. The location is perfect for all activities in the city center.
A very nice dwelling, a good atmosphere and the neighborhood is very pleasant.

The room is spacious, comfortable and clean. Lilou is a responsive and welcoming host, she doesn't hesitate to exchange ideas, give good advice. We feel very at ease quickly, the apartment is well located near transportation, shops, and restaurants. The location is ideal!
A warm and generous welcome, there's life and good cheer, you quickly feel at home, thank you Laura!

Translation: I stayed at Lilou's house for three weeks and immediately felt at home. The house is very welcoming, beautiful and functional. Lilou has undeniable style. The house is located between my two favorite neighborhoods in the city: Plateau and Mile End and it takes only a few days to feel fully integrated into the neighborhood like a true Montrealese!! Less than 10 minutes walking gets you to the Laurier metro station and less than 15 minutes to the Mont-Royal station. Moreover, bus number 55 passes by in under one minute from the house and takes you downtown - old port in 20 minutes and Little Italy in 15. The neighborhood is full of cafes, art galleries, vintage shops and bistros where you can have dinner or brunch! It's truly a genuine place. Lilou is an amazing host... and her cat Milton is very sweet and friendly. The house has everything you need (website hidden by Airbnb) kitchen is well-equipped and in the living room there is a washing machine and dryer that can be used freely.

The location of Lilou's place in the heart of the Plateau couldn't be better: really good restaurants just a block away (try Robin Du Bois!), a superb massage and bodywork business just around the corner (Place Nomade), a few blocks to the supermarket in one direction, a few more blocks to the natural food store in another direction, great ethnic restaurants in every direction, even an excellent hardware store in walking distance, not to mention big public parks (especially Mont Royal), about a 15-minute walk to the Laurier metro stop, Portuguese, Greek and Hassidic communities nearby, trendy bars, vintage bagel shops...etc., etc. A very fun area to be in. To stay in this Airbnb, you definitely need to be OK with cats, since the very friendly black cat who lives there considers herself the true owner. The bed was excellent, the kitchen very practical, the laundry machines in the basement easy to use, and Lilou herself is very friendly and welcoming and helpful.

I spent seven perfect nights at Laura's. The location was awesome, as it was one street off of St. Laurent (a street with many neat shops and restaurants) and a ten-minute walk to the metro. It was also a short walk to Mile End where delicious bagels are. Although it was crazy hot outside, the apartment and bedroom were still very cool. The bedroom was large and the bed was super comfy. 10/10 would recommend and stay again!
This was a great neighborhood and a beautiful, big, quiet space. I highly recommend it for anyone who wants to enjoy Le Plateau and have a place to rest and relax at night.

I absolutely loved staying here. Laura is super friendly and helpful, her apartment is somewhere you'd want to hang out in your real life, and the neighborhood is very walkable and has lots of interesting restaurants, parks, and shops.

One of the most wonderful hosts I've had the chance to meet through Airbnb. I wasn't there for very many days, but the room was very spacious and I was very thankful for the laundry facilities! I even lost my purse with the house key and the host was super nice about it. The location is fantastic and I would highly recommend this place for anyone visiting Montreal!

Laura is a kind hostess. We were both busy during my time in Montreal, but whenever I saw her, she was generous and caring. The house is beautiful and in a great location. The guidebook suggestions were very helpful.
Laura is very welcoming, the house is very pleasant with a large bedroom and a pretty little courtyard. I had a wonderful stay there.

What a gem. Although I'm not highly familiar with Montreal and its various neighborhoods, this wonderful home is close to everything I wanted/needed. Super hip neighborhood, a beautiful park not too far away, and so many lovely shops/cafes, if that's what you're into. There was a grocery store across the street and lots of bus stops nearby. The metro was only a 7-10 minute walk away. It's ground level, so it makes traveling with large luggage bags pretty easy. Milton, the cat, was friendly and gentle. Laura made excellent company as well. About as close to a perfect host you could get; never too overbearing and yet great to make conversation with. The room was bigger than I thought it would be! Even though Montreal is hot and humid, it was never uncomfortable, the fan provided in the room did the trick for me. There were a couple instances where the door was locked from the inside, but it was never a huge problem. Laura was easy to get in contact with and surprisingly quick to reply, no matter what time of day it was. It didn't make my stay any less incredible. The price is right and I cannot recommend this place enough!

Thank you, Lilou!
I spent super nice days at Lilou's place. The room is big, bright and super comfortable. The house is big, has a super nice backyard and is very well located! 
It was a happy stay :) I recommend <3 


Thanks Lilou! I had some really great days there. The room is spacious and comfy. The house is large with a lovely backyard and is in a fantastic location! It was a wonderful stay :) I highly recommend it! <3

I found the room very comfortable and affordable, with good access to a wide variety of restaurants and shops. Check-in and check-out were flexible and easy. The host was responsive and helpful. Great space for cat lovers! :)

This wonderful place is located in a very nice neighborhood and is very close to a beautiful park, lovely restaurants and shops. The Metro is only a 10-minute walk away, and there are lots of bus stops nearby. If you like, you can easily walk to the city center or visit sights like Mount Royal. Laura is a very great host: super friendly and caring. She made it really easy for me to settle in Montreal and very quickly it felt like home! The room is very nice and bigger than I expected! The decoration of her place is very lovely as well! I cannot recommend this place enough!
Great host and great place. I recommend!

Thank you, Laura, for this pleasant week! The accommodation was as pictured, comfortable and very well located. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, we feel right at home immediately. I recommend it!
One of the friendliest and most considerate hosts I've ever had. The room was huge, the cats were lovely and I had an all-round great stay. Would highly recommend.
A comfortable room, fun and lively neighborhood, friendly cats, and a top-notch host to boot! Thank you, Laura, for the wonderful stay!

A perfect little corner for a stay in Montreal, located right in the heart of the Plateau and near the best restaurants, bakeries, and cafes. Laura is a charming host and we feel warmly welcomed. I would definitely go back without hesitation.

Best regards, Marie
Room faithful to the photos and good location. Cristina is very available for any information and very pleasant.

We had an excellent stay at Kim's place! Her apartment is great, clean and very close to the city center. The street is still quiet in the evening for a good rest! Thank you again Kim, you are such a sweet person! 

Don't hesitate to do business with Kim, you won't be disappointed.:)

The apartment was just as she described it and we really liked it. 
The neighborhood was safe and convenient for restaurants and transportation. Kim was very kind and communicative. Kim has a collection of records and listens to The Strokes a lot. We recommend this apartment if you are staying in Montreal.

Teodora was an excellent host! She contacted me before our arrival to prepare us for the check-in process. She was very accommodating of our rushed arrival (we had dinner reservations!) and had a great printout with any questions we might have about her home. 

We really enjoyed her cat Tsitsou. I have a cat allergy but she was so friendly and hospitable that I even managed to give her a few good pats. Teodora's place is very clean, so my allergic reaction was minimal. 

The location is great. It's less than a 10-minute walk to the Metro and very easy to find street parking. We enjoyed the garden space very much. We sat out there one late afternoon and felt as though we were truly Montreal residents!

One suggestion I make (which is NOT a deal breaker) is perhaps a small fan in the guest room. The windows are not very big, and we kept the door closed to keep Tsitsou out, and it got stuffy pretty quickly. 

I will be giving Teodora a 10/10 and we hope to come back to visit soon!
On had an excellent stay at the lovely and welcoming Airbnb house. It was everything we needed, and it is also very close to everything!

Teodora was very friendly and showed us around her home and garden. Her home was in the perfect spot and it was very easy to get around in her neighborhood. Her home was very clean and exceeded our expectations. It was the perfect place to stay for a few nights!
The host cancelled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Fantastic place and host, Teodora was very helpful in listing some great places for us to check out.  Would certainly come back again! Tsi-Tsu was also adorable and a great companion

Everything was very smooth, as accurate as the pictures. Antoine was available to answer questions before we arrived in Montreal. The apartment was comfortable, a great location (full of restaurants, shops, etc.), and had all the items to make you feel at home, with the free coffee being an extra touch

Very easy to get to, and in a great location. Antoine was a great host who made sure we had everything we needed even though he wasn't in town. When the air conditioner stopped working, a replacement was promptly brought in. The apartment itself was very clean when we arrived.

The apartment is very well situated. Close to many restaurants, bars, Mont Royal, cafes and pharmacies. Antoine was a lovely and accommodating host, I would certainly recommend him. He responded to messages quickly, was very flexible with check-out times and the place is very accurately described in the listing. Thank you Antoine!
Everything was good and matched the description! Antoine was super accommodating.

Wonderful spot in a great location. There's plenty to do. Antoine was very accommodating and always there to answer questions. The place is clean, and he stored our luggage for us until we had to leave for the airport.

It was great staying at Antoine's place for the week we were there. The location is good -- a bit far from the metro system, but we happened to stay during the week of Mural making it a really busy and exciting street to stay on. The space itself was decent with three rooms, one bath, and a kitchen. There is no sofa and the air conditioning was limited to the heat pump in the kitchen, but overall a great bang for your buck and a pleasant stay. Antoine was very pleasant, responsive, helpful, and accommodating.

Spent 4 days at Antoine's place and it was great! Close to some really good restaurants such as Schwartz, Romados, and patati patata. Antoine was great with keeping the lines of communication open. The only thing that's really missing is a couch in the common area.

Great location! Right in the heart of the action and close to everything else. The apt was a good size, nice and clean, with everything we needed. Antoine was very fast to reply to any questions I had about the booking. Very happy with this spot and would definitely recommend staying here.

Our stay was fantastic. The location was absolutely perfect, with everything within easy walking distance. The apartment was clean and quite spacious for our group of five. The neighborhood is simply wonderful, and we would definitely come back again.

Good stay at Antoine's place. The apartment is very well located close to many of the best restaurants and bars in Montreal and within walking distance to many sights. Perfect place and well priced for those who need 3 bedrooms and plan to mostly use the apartment for sleeping. As stated in the description, there isn't a living room but there is a large TV and table with chairs in the kitchen area. Air conditioning only in the kitchen, but will partially cool bedrooms if you leave all doors open (there are fans in each room, two rooms have windows that open, one just a skylight). Antoine is very helpful; we needed a parking spot for the weekend and he let us take the one he was in (free Friday-Sunday).

The place was exactly like the photos. The location was very convenient. The most important thing for my family and me was that the apartment was clean. I didn't meet Antoine, but he left a detailed message on how to get into the apartment. A very good first experience with Airbnb.

Bonus: Netflix was available

Perfect neighborhood with easy access via subway/taxis. Also, it had a lockbox for keys, which made it super convenient to enter and exit when we weren't together. Tons of restaurants and shops nearby; you can't really go wrong. Prompt communication and he was usually in the area if we had urgent issues.

Excellent location and a cozy apartment. In the surprisingly hot Montreal days, the air conditioning in the kitchen wasn't sufficient to cool the whole apartment. Antoine was a very good host who quickly helped with any issues. I would definitely recommend it. Don't miss the all-you-can-eat No1 Sushi nearby...

It's not exactly luxurious, but that's okay. The beds were fine, the WiFi was good, and the location is perfect. The front door opens right out onto St. Laurent, and you can walk to Schwartz's and all kinds of bars in minutes. The only strange thing to note is that the toilet is oddly close to an angled wall, so you can't really sit with your legs straight. All in all, if you're just looking for somewhere to come back and crash after a night of drinking, this place fits the bill.

Antoine is a good communicator and will answer your questions. The location is convenient and has two decent-sized rooms; the third is cramped and lacks natural light. The air conditioner in the kitchen works well, and if you leave the bedroom doors open it helps a lot for hot nights. It's fine for a short stay if you are only there to tour the town, but there is no sofa or anything to relax on.

Great location in the bustling heart of the Plateau. Three bedroom set-up very convenient. Boulevard Saint-Laurent vibrant and full of bars and restaurants that are especially lively on weekends. Perfect communication with Antoine
Great location. The lockbox with the keys was very helpful for our large group. The apartment was clean and tidy, basic but exactly what we needed.

This apartment is very conveniently located - a five-minute walk to the base of Mont-Royal, a thirty-five-minute stroll to the river, you'll be surrounded by shops and cafes of every sort, and the residents of Montreal struck me as pleasant, patient, and engaging.

Our host immediately responded to any question or request and could not have been more helpful.

The stairway is a bit of a chore to negotiate and there is a bar below that caters to enthusiastic sports fans so if the game goes late you can hear their responses to great plays and bad calls.

The kitchen area functions well, there is a good shower, and having a washer and dryer unit is great!

I personally find the gray paint in the stairway and the white walls of all the rooms drab and boring, but that seems to be the norm for rental real estate. All in all, the apartment served me well and our host was charming.

Antoine's place was lovely, very clean and cozy. A 10-minute walk to the Plateau, so close to shops and restaurants. We got comfortable quite quickly, perfect for a small group of friends or multiple family members. My friends and I had a wonderful stay!
Great location, Pereira was very flexible and accommodated us well upon arrival, great spot for a group

Cozy three-room apartment, with three people traveling for work, so we chose this apartment as the workplace is close to home. It's also conveniently located near the supermarket and various restaurants. The location is excellent. All kitchenware, washing machine, and dryer are fully equipped, WiFi is also fast, from a travel perspective, it offers good value for money. However, there might be some slight floor tilt due to being an old building, so if you're particularly sensitive to this, I wouldn't recommend booking. Otherwise, everything else is great, especially the key box which makes it convenient for multiple travelers to move around independently.
Great place, great location, great space, this place is a must recommend if you want to explore the nightlife
He was very helpful! Easy to contact.
Absolutely PERFECT... cannot say enough good things about it... we will be back!!!

From booking to check-in to check-out, this Airbnb experience was seamless. The host is friendly and accommodating, thoughtfully and proactively kept in touch prior to check-in. The place itself is amazing...we couldn't believe how close it was to everything. Clean, bright, and spacious. Will definitely stay here again!
The location can't be beaten. Easy access to downtown, and the host is very easygoing and easy to get in touch with. There are lots of restaurants right outside the apartment.
Location couldn't be better. The place is simple, but functional and clean, and the price is very reasonable. I would definitely book again next time.
The apartment was very clean and had a great location!
Nice location. A bit noisy. The place was not as clean as I expected.

Antoine's apartment is the perfect place to stay if you are traveling in a larger group and looking to explore Montreal. It is very centrally located in the Plateau neighborhood and also very close to Parc du Mont Royal. I would 100% stay here again if traveling to Montreal.  It was exactly as advertised.
Very clean and great location - wonderful overall experience!
Great space

This is located right in the heart of Saint Laurent. Amazing location, better than expected. Easy access to everything you need. Antoine was a great host. Only downfall would be that the building and floor in the unit are not level and very uneven. Be careful walking up the stairs! Overall it was great. I would definitely recommend and stay here again!

Great 3-bedroom property in a fantastic location. The host was incredibly responsive and addressed all of our requests promptly. 

I highly recommend this apartment and would definitely return without hesitation!
Just as described! Clean and great location.

The location is great and within walking distance of shops and restaurants. The apartment is large enough for 6 adults. The kitchen could use a little upgrade, and some comfortable seating in the living area would also help. It's a functional base for people who plan to be out exploring a lot, but not ideal for spending a night in.

A terrific place to see a lot of Montreal. Really close and accessible to Mont Royal for walks, close to tons of cool restaurants both on St. Laurent and surrounding neighborhoods. Walkable to downtown or Vieux Montreal if you're up for it, or there's a Bixi bike rental right behind. 

We stayed there with 3 kids and 2 adults and there was plenty of space and the amenities were just what we needed. 

Just a heads-up if you have mobility limitations, it's two flights of stairs up and no elevator. Wasn't an issue for us but could be for others.

This is a great value and it's accurate based on the description. The location is convenient and we received two sets of keys, which made a huge difference. The appliances were a bonus as well as the balcony. Definitely enough space for six of us. Highly recommended!
Amazing location! Has everything you need for a fun getaway with friends.
Nice little apartment. Approximately a 30-minute walk from Montreal center. Lovely bars and restaurants nearby.
Perfect for a little weekend trip with some friends. Centrally located. Good value. Couldn't ask for anything more.
Almost everything
Translation:  Good

Excellent accommodations with a great and very responsive host. Very clean and spacious accommodations, everything you could ask for at a wonderful price! 

Will definitely stay here again.
Nice flat in a trendy neighborhood.

Great bang for your buck. Very close to great food spots. Easy check-in and check-out. Everything we needed in terms of essentials (shampoo, plates, forks, spoons, cups) all ready to be used. Great place, would be more than happy to come again.

There is a good location, but if you're traveling with children or elderly individuals, consider sitting on the second floor with very narrow stairs. This will make it more challenging to carry heavy luggage up and down.
Perfect as a base to explore Montreal. Washer and dryer in the room was a huge bonus.
Great place for a weekend in Montreal.
Excellent location close to downtown Montreal!
Nice and convenient location! There are some restaurants and stores nearby.
Awesome location! I would highly recommend it!
Very good location. However, the kitchen was not very clean. An sponge was missing. Additionally, the neighbors next door were very noisy.
This apartment is correct, it's well-located in Montreal.

What a fantastic spot! Bright and clean..... and close to everything. The kitchen was nicely stocked with everything you need to cook a meal. The beds were comfortable and even though the windows face the street, you don't hear any sound! Right in the middle of everything - great neighborhood. Lots of options for a late night Sunday dinner.... and great coffee shops too. Check-in and check-out was very easy!

This place at Le Plateau is perfect. Close to the bus and metro. Near a supermarket, liquor store, and so many other amenities. So walkable. Sparkling clean and a really good space for 4 people.  I would definitely book again! And I hope to do so soon because I've really loved Montreal.
Great place in an awesome location!

Amazing location!!! Comfortable beds!!! Fully stocked kitchen!!! It was a very nice place. The only issue we faced was the floor was slanted, which really wasn't much of a problem but it caught us off guard. Otherwise, everything was perfect and exactly as described.

Antoine's unit on St. Laurent Boulevard is perfect if you're traveling with a friend, with two bedrooms and a nice little room with a sofa, as well as an Apple TV and a kitchen with a washer and dryer included. It also has a small balcony around back that faces adjacent units' balconies.

Antoine ensured a clean apartment, and allowed us to check in very early and stay a little later than checkout. His responses were prompt and courteous. A great room for exploring Montreal or just spending a week. Restaurants and bars are within minutes of walking, and the famous Schwartz smoked meat is just a block or so away. 

Overall, a great location, a great host, and a great price! What more could you ask for?
The place was perfect, and the location was a great surprise since we paid so little; I didn't expect to be on such a bustling road! Thank you so much to Antoine for everything.

Very nice apartment with a lot of light and a little terrace. Great location but a lot of noise during the night. Antoine was answering very quickly and handled a problem with the back door very quickly too! There are no condiments, it is something to note before coming  We had a very nice stay!

The apartment is very well located and close to everything. We did everything on foot all weekend. However, I recommend bringing earplugs for sleeping because the rooms are facing the street and the proximity of bars leads to a lot of noise at night. 

Otherwise, everything was perfect, I recommend this apartment.
Great place, clean and comfortable. Quick responses from the host. And the location is unbeatable! Perfect :)
It is inadmissible that this housing be on the Airbnb site!!!!
Great location! Host was very helpful with check-in! Amazing trip!
Translation: It was really good
Great, spacious apartment on the top floor with lots of natural light and two good-sized bedrooms. Lively location, perfect for exploring the mountains and plateau on foot.

The apartment is simple and okay. But we don't like the location. Maybe it's good for young people, but not suitable for a family. There's a busy street in front of the apartment, and many bars on the street that stay open all night long. You can hear a lot of noise from cars, people hanging out late at the bars. It's hard to sleep all night. The neighbors are most likely young people who keep making noise and partying until late at night...

Fantastic location right next to great restaurants and vintage shops. Easy walking distance to everything. The host was very responsive, and check-in/check-out was a breeze. The apartment itself is minimally furnished but has all the essentials, which were more than adequate for us. The main living room area is well air-conditioned, unfortunately the bedrooms were not, leaving them feeling stuffy, especially when the doors are closed. Each of the rooms had a fan inside, but barely felt cool directly pointing it at us. One particular note that people should be aware of is having to walk up two flights of narrow stairs to get to the apartment. Overall though, great value for the location.
Great location, near many restaurants and bars. Host was very helpful and responded quickly. Great job.
Great location.
Great location with plenty of things to do nearby. Very easy check-in, and the place was spacious and very clean.

The apartment matches the photos and description exactly. It was spotless. I love the location right on St. Laurent Blvd.: Convenient to restaurants, small grocery stores, and the bus (#55) that runs downtown.  Also, a taxi stand is less than half a block away, so getting back to the airport is no problem at all. The host was incredibly responsible and helpful.

**Note:** Any traveler with mobility issues: The staircase to this third-floor apartment is steep with very narrow steps, manageable for the healthy and agile among us... However, if you are unsteady on your feet for any reason, consider one of Gestion88’s other offerings in the neighborhood.
The apartment was clean and well-equipped. The location is awesome, with tons of bars and restaurants nearby. It's quite noisy at night because the windows face the very busy St-Laurent Street.
Clean space on lovely Saint Laurent Street. Wonderful location! Thanks for hosting us.

Clean, easy to reach. For very tall people, bed feet can be a problem. The air conditioning doesn't really reach the rooms but at least ours had a fan. Intense and cold lighting. Super location of the accommodation. Consider bringing an eye mask to sleep if the light bothers you because one of the windows faces the stairs which are constantly illuminated.
Great location. Tons of great shops and restaurants. The street was pedestrian-only during our stay! Awesome vibe. Plus, there's a hidden speakeasy nearby...
Nice spot, good location, super clean.

The Airbnb was clean, comfortable, affordable, and located in a great spot. It was within walking distance of Old Montreal and close to restaurants, shops, bars, etc. I would definitely stay here again.
The apartment is so comfortable and clean with a good location, the bus stop is nearby. We've had a good time in Montreal.
The location couldn't be better. The place is larger than expected. Antoine is a very responsive host.
Stay here, I did and I loved it!
Great location and check-in was very easy. Apartment was a little rundown but no major issues. Would stay there again.

Great location, the apartment needs a few things like lamps in the bedrooms, curtains, and a TV in a room where it can be watched comfortably. Please add a draft stopper to the door so there is no gap for cold air and mice to get in.
That's good and proper! The location is ideal for doing activities.
Nice place, has everything you need, good location - all very good

Amazing place at a great price for the location. Super cute setup with lots of room (kitchen, dining, living area). It came with all the amenities you need. The host was very generous with letting us check in early and late as needed.

The location is amazing. Close to many great restaurants, bars, and a 25-minute walk to the art's place. The apartment is clean and as pictured. The host is very responsive too. I would recommend it to others!

Very good location
Thanks
Clean apartment in a very convenient location!
The place was very clean and larger than it appeared in the photos. It's in an excellent location if you're into nightlife, with all the bars located on the block. I enjoyed my stay in Montreal.
The place is bigger than it looks. It was very clean. We had more amenities than I expected. Check-in was very simple. The location is perfect. Amazing Airbnb, I would definitely stay here again!
Very nice place in a great location! Thanks!

Perfect location for our research on the Blue Line Metro, with an apartment nearby.  It's very conveniently located near the metro, making it highly practical. The neighbors are very nice and helpful.  The wifi is useful and functional.

I was enchanted to reside for a few days in this pleasant property with an excellent value for money ratio.

Ideally located 2 minutes from the Iberville metro station and not far from the Jean Talon market.

This apartment boasts a beautiful and spacious kitchen well-equipped, and everything necessary for a pleasant stay.

I recommend!

I had a lovely stay in Montreal. Titi's studio is cute, clean, cozy and warm. It is right by Place des Arts' tube station and it is close to a supermarket, shops, cafes, etc. The bus going to and from the airport stops just down the road, it is a 10 minute straight walk. Titi was prompt to reply to my queries when booking the place and also remained available throughout my stay. Titi had left some space in the drawers so I could unpack and I had the fridge to put my week's supplies. It felt very homely. Wifi also worked very well. I will happily book Titi's place again should I go back to Montreal.

Our host was excellent and very accommodating. She and a friend met us to let us in and give us the keys fairly late which was very much appreciated. The location is awesome, the decor super cute. Everything you need is here! Towels, wifi password, everything was easily accessible. Thanks so much! We will stay here again for sure.

I had an amazing time in Montreal and it was made even better by this awesome corner unit apartment that was conveniently close to many of Montreal's main hubs. It's only 2 blocks away from the Metro and less than a mile walking distance from most places as well. The apartment overall was very cozy, well heated during my winter stay and neighbors are very quiet. I would definitely recommend it.

Excellent reception, Titi is very accommodating. I truly felt at home. I highly recommend! And the location is excellent, with many good restaurants nearby, everything is within walking distance, very close to the city center. In love!!!

Our experience was great. The apartment is small but very cozy and located in a great area. There were so many great places to grab a drink, eat, and even shop. Without a doubt, we would stay here again.
Titi was very welcoming and incredibly helpful during my stay. I loved the place and location, and I would definitely stay there again.

Titi's apartment was just perfect for our weekend trip to Montreal! The location was fabulous, with amazing restaurants and two natural food stores within blocks, and downtown right there. Titi was so helpful! We needed to switch places, and with less than 24 hours notice she made it work for us to stay there. She was friendly and welcoming, and was timely with responses to our questions. Her place was inviting, bright and cozy. Everything was clean, parking tended to be pretty easy (although confusing in Montreal!), and the kitchen was stocked enough for us to cook up quick meals. The bed was a full-sized futon-like bed, which was comfy yet pretty firm. Overall, a great place to stay! We will definitely be back. Thank you Titi!

The location is just perfect - in the center of EVERYTHING! The apartment is very cozy, charmingly decorated, and has a little balcony overlooking a beautiful street. Titi is very nice, responsive, and helpful. Thank you so much Titi, I had a wonderful stay and would love to go back :)
Titi's apartment provides a very authentic Airbnb experience. It was great to spend a few days in her space. :)
Friendly and beautiful apartment, very well located.

Titi was extremely nice, her apartment is beautiful! It is small, but perfect for a city trip, we walked to all major city attractions (about a 30-minute walk to Old Montreal) and it's a nice neighborhood. Titi was very approachable to us!

We loved staying at Titi's. She was very understanding about us arriving later than expected, and when we did arrive she even came out to help us find a parking spot. Her apartment is clean, beautifully decorated, and has everything you need for an enjoyable stay. The location of the neighborhood is perfect. It is quaint and residential but very close to everything you need. Just a few short blocks to the metro gives you access to the whole city. Also within walking distance is the park and shopping streets like Saint Laurent. Titi was available for anything that we needed, and always responded promptly. Thank you, Titi, for the wonderful hospitality! We would love to stay again in the future.
Wonderful location and a comfortable place for our visit to Montreal! It's so easy to walk everywhere you need to go from here.  Great balcony and relaxing apartment. Highly recommend!

The experience was very comfortable and Titi's little apartment is cozy with bright, welcoming colors. The place is basically a 5-minute walk from downtown, and parking was not too difficult to find either. We had access to wifi and the TV monitor which I easily connected to my computer with an HDMI. Titi was always there, a call away, if we had any questions. Although we weren't able to see her during check-in because we arrived quite late in the evening, she had turned on the AC and a fan so that we would have a cool room in the heat of summer. Also, there's a lovely balcony which is a nice addition if you're visiting during the spring or summer.
Had a great visit in Montreal. Titi's place was clean, comfortable, and was in a great location. Meeting up to get the key was easy. I'd recommend her place for sure.

Had no problems checking in or out, Titi was around and responsive to any questions. The apartment was in a great location within walking distance to most of the places we wanted to go. The room was comfortable and clean/neat. Wifi was fast.

Thanks again!
Nice location, good apartment.

Titi was an amazing host! She was kind, helpful, and very friendly. We loved the decor of this apartment, and especially enjoyed the little balcony. The location however was UNBEATABLE. Very close to Mount Royal Park, Parc avenue, St. Laurent Street, and a short Bixi bike ride to Old Montreal and Jean Talon Market. We had a fantastic stay and would absolutely come back and stay at Titi's place again, 5-stars!

My girlfriend and I had a fantastic stay at Titi's apartment. It was in a perfect location, close walking distance to almost all the wonderful parts of Montreal. She was extremely hospitable when it came to us bringing along our dog too which made the trip so much easier for us. The apartment itself was very clean and comfortable. I would highly recommend it to anyone heading to Montreal!

Great location. Within walking distance to many of Montreal's attractions.  Also just a short walk from a subway station. Restaurants, cafes, and grocery stores are all nearby. Overall, I enjoyed my stay in the apartment.
My friend and I stayed there for New Year's Eve. We had a great time and were able to walk to the old port. Titi was very nice and helpful, and the place was really clean and cozy :)

Titi's place is a wonderful option for anyone looking to stay in the heart of Montréal at an affordable price. Her place is small, but quaint and clean and has everything you need as a solo traveler (would be good for couples too). Her apartment is only about 5 minutes walk to Place des Arts metro, which makes getting around the city super easy. Also, the fact that her place has an air conditioning unit is a nice plus during the hot summer months. Beyond that, communication with Titi was very timely and she was even nice enough to invite me to go out downtown with her and her friends on my first night there (though I ultimately wasn't able to due to other plans). Would definitely recommend this place and stay again in the future!
Titi's place is located in a very convenient and safe location.
Titi was a very sympathetic, friendly, and helpful host. Her apartment is in a perfect location and the balcony with a great view is wonderful.
The place was clean and close to everything. Great location!

Tina was incredibly flexible and helpful throughout our planning and check-in. We arrived very late and Tina made sure to communicate and arrange everything for us. The location is unbeatable, and the balcony was wonderful to relax on after a long day. 

We were close to the metro, lots of restaurants, a grocery store, and everything you might need. 

The one thing we were not accustomed to, and this may be normal in Montreal, is the extreme firmness of the mattress. For those who are used to sleeping on softer mattresses, be aware that this will not be your experience. 

We had a lovely time and were happy to stay at Tina's!
Great location and cute apartment. Would have loved to stay longer, actually!

Superb location! Walking distance to a 24-hour coffee shop, grocery store, and numerous late-night restaurants. Not to mention, it's near a metro station.

Cozy and honestly felt like home—cute and colorful home.

Titi's place is very centrally located, we could walk or bike to anywhere. Titi responded quickly to all of my questions. The full kitchen was available, but the bathroom needed a little more maintenance.

This space was exactly what I was looking for. Great for two people! The balcony was a great addition to a stylish space. The host made everything a breeze and was very quick to respond. Wish we could have stayed longer!

Titi's cute little space was perfect for me - walking distance to the Jazz Festival and super easy to get around in a lovely neighborhood. She was very calm, quick, and responsive to my texts when I got lost and confused upon arrival! I would definitely stay here again on my next visit to Montreal.
Great apartment and great location. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
Great communication, cozy place, and perfect location. The bed could use improvement, but overall it was a great experience. I recommend this place, Titi is great.

Very beautiful apartment, comfortable living room and well-decorated. 
Well located and well served
The apartment is very functional and close to many places to visit!
While the location of this accommodation was ideal, the shortcomings with the Wi-Fi and kitchen resulted in it being a very poor value.
Great location!
Great location and wonderful balcony.

Titi's apartment is ideally located two steps from Place des Arts, allowing easy access to Montreal by foot or via the metro. 
The studio is pleasant for living with two people, and the welcome was excellent thanks to exchanges with Titi.
We highly recommend this accommodation!
Thank you, Titi, for welcoming us!

It's a simple space with furniture, very bad pillows, few utensils. However, it's in an excellent location, so if you're not too demanding, you can accept the old building, the apartment with the owner's clothes and some furniture. The host was nice.

Our stay was just GREAT! Titi is a perfect host, she answered quickly to any questions we had, gave us great suggestions and made us feel at home! The house is in a very quiet neighborhood, 2 minutes from a supermarket and 20 minutes on foot from the city center!
Central location with proximity to excellent restaurants (I highly recommend Areperas and Kantapia). Smooth communication. Kitchen equipment is quite minimal, but adequate for a short stay.

Great price and location! I was in contact with Libby (Toby's sister). She was very attentive and replied quickly to any questions I had. My friend slept in the bed and I asked to use the queen size air mattress (took less than 5 minutes to inflate with the provided electric device), but I ended up sleeping on the couch - it was super comfy (at least for my 5'4 height). Great experience here.

The apartment is exactly as described. It really has nothing missing. Libby, in Toby's absence, made sure we felt at home, even down to a toothbrush in case we forgot it. Perfectly located for easy access to everything (shops, restaurants, transportation) in my favorite neighborhood. I haven't had the chance to meet Libby and Toby yet, but the documentation was extremely detailed and Libby was particularly responsive during our exchanges. I will definitely go back there with my eyes closed and maybe I'll even meet some girls?

Comfortable apartment in a fabulous neighborhood! My husband and I loved staying here, walking and riding bikes in the neighborhood, and the convenient location. The apt. is close to shops, cafes and restaurants, Bixi bike stands, the park, main streets, and metro station.  

We did not get to meet the host but she communicated via email and text, arranged for a smooth arrival, and left lots of information about Montreal. There were maps, brochures, etc. for us to peruse. 

She even left some fruit and treats in the freezer for us to make us feel welcome and we enjoyed pretending we were locals by "living" in her apt.  

Good space, comfortable bed and couch, and outside balcony to sit on made the apt. perfect. 

We plan to return to Montreal as it is probably our favorite city and we would definitely choose to stay here again.

I had great communication with Libby. Good, clear information and smooth check-in arrangements. The apartment was cozy and comfortable and felt very homey. It's in a great area of Montreal and even though there are many wonderful restaurants, the kitchen is well equipped for making a family dinner. Thanks Libby, we had a great time.
11/10! Perfectly located (try Lili.co for brunch, Guillame for croissants and Green Panther if you're veggie!!) and super cute and cozy. Libby is a super host, absolutely recommend!!

Libby was excellent at communicating with us before and during the reservation. While she wasn't present in the apartment, she made herself available via phone and text, and left plenty of information in the apartment itself, including lots of tourist info, which was very helpful!

The colorful apartment is located in a really great neighborhood with lots of restaurants, bars, and activities happening nearby, all within walking distance to the building. It was also easily accessible by public transportation, making getting around the city effortless. 

The apartment itself is charming, just like the listing describes, with vibrant colors and decorations from all over the world! Overall, it's a great place to stay and you won't be disappointed!

I dealt with Libby who was great. Very nice and welcoming. Their cleaner Rose waited an hour to welcome me as I was delayed in a nasty ice storm. Thank her again for me, Libby. The apartment is very nice, clean, and comfortable. The Plateau neighborhood is great with all the eateries, cafes, shops, and bars. Had a great time!

Cozy and bright apartment in the best neighborhood of Montreal!

Bigger than expected with lots of light and nice well-equipped kitchen.

The apartment feels very much like home.

Absolutely recommend, Libby is a great host!

She has everything that guests might need in the apartment including tourist guides, washer/dryer and coffee.

10/10

Toby was an amazing host. Very kind and thoughtful. 
His place is perfectly located, clean, and has many little details to make your stay perfect. Definitely recommend +++

My husband, my 11-year-old son, and I had a wonderful stay at Toby and her sister Libby's place. The apartment is as advertised—very sweet with two small balconies, a full-service kitchen (including spices), and an air conditioner, which was a standout feature (and the latter was very helpful in July).  The thing is that you won't want to spend too much time there because the neighborhood is amazing—which was also accurately advertised. We walked or took the metro everywhere and never used our car (we were lucky and found a parking spot right after the street had been cleaned, and all the other cars had to move). There are so many great restaurants, cafes, and boutiques nearby, and also a sweet park right at the top of the street. We walked to Mont Royal (and then walked to the top for an amazing view), and walked to the Metro stop to get downtown (for free concerts at the Jazz Festival), the old port, and the Jean Talon market.  Libby was very helpful and available via email (and if my phone worked, I assume text as well); she has lots of maps and brochures in the apartment for you to look at and use; and her house cleaner, who met us and gave us the keys, was lovely and full of tips about the city. We can't wait to come back and explore more!
Best location and most gracious host I have ever had!

We love Mile End, so this was a perfect location for us. The apartment was bright, charming, and completely comfortable. Nice bed, cute kitchen with everything you need. Toby and her sister Libby were very responsive and communicative. Great place to stay.

Libby was very available and helpful throughout our entire stay. Her apartment is very cozy and perfectly located in the best neighborhood of Montreal; the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you might need, and the bed is comfortable. 

I would definitely recommend it! 

Thanks again, Libby.

Toby and Libby's place was perfect for our long weekend in Montreal. They were extremely kind, thoughtful, and accommodating. When we got delayed at the border and arrived much later than expected, they were very helpful to find a way to check us in. The place is very comfortable, has everything you need (well-equipped kitchen, washer, coffee machine, etc.), is well-located, and definitely makes you feel like home. I absolutely recommend it!!

The perfect place to visit Montreal! Lovely, fully equipped, amazingly located apartment with a great and supportive host that leaves nothing to be desired! The place lies in the heart of the "Le Plateau / Mile End" neighborhood(s); A great vibe, access to a supreme number of cute cafés and unique bars, really great food, supermarkets, bakeries and anything you could possibly need…in a short walking distance. It’s minutes away from the Mont-Royal Metro station which in turn gets you to Old Town and Downtown in 5-10 minutes. Libby (Toby's sister) and Hannah (who basically runs the place in Toby’s absence) went above and beyond what should be expected from an Airbnb host. Very nice and helpful…thank you so much!
We had a great stay here. Toby, Libby, and Hannah were helpful, clear, and responsive throughout. The apartment was very comfortable and well-located.
Great apartment and location with easy and smooth communication.
Great place to stay if you want to explore Montreal!

This is a great spot to stay and feel like you're living in the city. The location is convenient even for a longer-term stay (nearby groceries, etc.), and the host is very kind and communicative – would recommend!

This is the first time we're using Airbnb and Libby was super helpful. She gave us great tips! 

The apartment is perfectly equipped for a family of four, with two adults and one child.  Libby has made it very well-equipped for both adults and children! Her canopy bed was a lifesaver! 

The apartment really had everything we needed! It's located in the perfect spot, close to all the action! Two bus stops are right outside her door. You have to check this place out! The apartment was spotless.

Libby was very responsive to every question and answered quickly even though she wasn't in the country. She was very serious!

Cozy apartment well-equipped, close to amenities (shops, bars, restaurants) and quiet. 

We appreciated the availability of Toby and Libby.
Very good value for the price, ideal location to visit Montreal! I highly recommend it.
Well-located apartment in a quiet neighborhood, close to the metro and numerous shops. Excellent welcome. Ideal for two people.

Absolutely great location, couldn't have worked out better for us. The space is great and Libby was a wonderful host. Whenever we had issues she was quick to respond and resolve them. I would highly recommend!
Lovely apartment well-located on the Mont Royal Plateau and near the metro, perfect for a family with a 2-year-old child.

My sister and I just got home from an amazing weekend away in Montreal! This was the first time we used Airbnb and Manon was a wonderful host. She was prompt to answer any questions we had. The condo was spotless and beautiful, and looked exactly as the pictures described. The neighborhood was lovely. It was only about a 7-minute drive to downtown, and we used Uber! It was a locked and secure building. We have only amazing things to say about our stay and the host. Thank you again, Manon!

What you see is what you get. The place was very clean and there were no parking problems. It's fully furnished, especially the kitchen. The neighborhood is peaceful. Zoe was very prompt in answering my questions and very accommodating. Check-in and check-out was a breeze with no hassles. I have marked this place as one of my favorites and would rent it again.

Really nice place to stay, very modern and clean. We stayed with 4 adults and it was perfect. It is a bit further out of town, yet the metro is nearby (10 min walk) and the area has a few nice restaurants and cafes. Highly recommended.

Great apartment in a very good location. Zoé's home is well equipped with lots of amenities and very comfortable. It is close to good restaurants and cafés, grocery stores and convenience stores. Parking was easy and the metro is a 10-15 minute walk.  Zoé is a great host and very quick to respond to any questions. Check-in and check-out is very convenient. A great place to stay in Montreal.

Zoe was very nice and very responsive to any questions I had. The place was very modern, comfortable, and clean. As a big clean freak, this place made me very comfortable with the cleanliness aspect. The only thing that was just a little frustrating at times was the lack of AC. Some rooms (at the front) were very hot if the doors were closed come morning time. However, seeing as most of us were out (not home) doing activities during the hot days, the nights were cool enough to open the windows, and Zoe provided a few fans, so it was manageable. Other than that, I highly recommend this place. Clean, comfortable, modernized, close to bus stops and subways, bike rental access across the street, not too far from downtown, and lots of restaurants and cafes in the area.
Simply perfect! Cleanliness, location and communication were spot on!
Bel apartment in a beautiful neighborhood. We are well received.
Zoe was very reactive and welcoming. The apartment was very beautiful and well-located. I would definitely recommend renewing the experience!
Lovely place with a large living/dining/kitchen area. Easy street parking is a bonus.
Fantastic host, great apartment.

Very well-located accommodations in a pleasant neighborhood. The metro is however a bit far away.
Friendly and discreet host.

Zoe was very nice and was pretty quick at fixing the unfortunate leak that was caused from the neighbors upstairs. However, be aware there is NO WORKING AC, there are only a few fans. My friend was bitten by bed bugs in the smallest room. Also expect to not have any cups available. Don't even bother with finding parking. The location was not bad.
I highly recommend it!!! Very comfortable and super well-placed!!!
Very nice apartment, like home, you feel good there. Zoé is very welcoming and attentive. Apartment well located. (Buses, metro, convenience stores...)
Awesome design. Transportation is easy almost everywhere. The neighborhood is very quiet and beautiful. It's a lovely place.

Jen was very accommodating. The room was fine, though being an old building, you could hear conversations or people in the area. Great location, close to the metro, plateau, and Mile End. Lots of great restaurants nearby.

Plateau Montreal Artisanal offers good value for money. The location is ideal, with an excellent selection of cafes, restaurants, and bars nearby. Public transportation is also close by. The accommodation was satisfactory and breakfast was great. This accommodation falls more in line with a guest house than a B&B. 

Peter and Jenny
We really enjoyed our stay. Great location - close to BIXI stand, metro, shops, restaurants and cafes. Jen is super easy to get along with.

We had a great stay at Jen's place, It was an old building but full of characteristics, close to the METRO and shops. The rooms were colorful with comfortable beds. Breakfast was excellent. Jen is very accommodating; I highly recommend Jen's place.

I do not recommend this place. I arrived on a hot day, there was no air conditioning, the bed was much too small for a couple, the room is dark and not appealing at all. 

The room description is definitely misleading.

Not worth even staying for free!

Check out other places

Best of luck - H.
I stayed in Montreal for one night so my friends and I enjoyed Jen's hospitality! The breakfast was really good, thank you for everything

This was a cute apartment in a very great location in Montreal. Jen was a very helpful and generous host. Breakfast was simple, but very delicious. My only complaint was that the room was on a fairly busy street and when you have the window open in the morning (which is needed in the summer), it can be very loud very early (~6am). Other than that, it was a great place.

Jen's B&B is a fantastic place to stay. She is incredibly sweet, prepares breakfast with lots of love, the rooms and bathroom are super clean, great location and very independent, it is easy to feel at home. 

Also, you should try Jen's massage, she is amazing!
Great location. Nice breakfast. Jen was a pleasant and informative host. I am very glad I chose this for my first trip to Montreal and I would definitely do this again.

Jen is an excellent host—very accommodating, makes a lovely breakfast with endless cups of coffee, and her rooms are always neat and clean. The location is perfect and within walking distance of many great restaurants and Montreal sights. Our room had a fan, but others might find the lack of air conditioning challenging in the summer. We had a really nice stay.

It was perfect! The house is charming, and you feel like you are at home. Jen is very welcoming, and her breakfast is delicious. A wonderful host! 

I have already decided to come back... Thank you, Jen!

We booked with Jen last minute and found her to be very cooperative and accommodating. The location is centrally located, right next to a subway stop and near everything Montreal has to offer. Jen made us a delicious bagel breakfast in the morning, and was very flexible with our check-in/check-out time.
The place was great. Jen was very hospitable and we had a really comfortable and fun visit to Montreal

Great place, in a really convenient location, easy to see the city. On a lovely street full of restaurants and shops. Very nice building with old-school charm, very artistic feel. The beds were comfortable; the room was large and airy with a huge window. There was no air conditioning but the fan in the room worked great. Wifi and free parking were an extra bonus. Breakfast every morning was lovely. If I return to Montreal, I will stay there again.
We were in town just for one night, and Jen's place worked out great! Very easy to get to, and everyone was very friendly.

Jen was very welcoming and responsive. She and her friend provided a delicious and substantial breakfast in the morning. Nice neighborhood right on St. Denis. Large sunny room with a comfy queen mattress. Fun and funky decor, nice little terrace and kitchen. A couple of things: 1) There are two bathrooms - one with a toilet, the other with a sink and bathtub. The sink drained very slowly so was a little discouraging. The shower was fine, but the water pressure was a little low. 2) Our room, the Green Room, is right on St. Denis - trucks ROARING woke us early in the morning. 3) Be sure to take your room key with you when you go to the bathroom, etc., otherwise your door will lock! Maybe I'm fussier than my younger reviewers, but these are important to note. Otherwise, a very nice stay with friendly and knowledgeable hosts.
Jen was a gracious host and very friendly. The accommodations were more than adequate, and breakfasts were delicious. We even got a free concert as a bonus.

We strongly recommend this location. We would surely stay here again in the future.

NOTE: There are 3 rooms at this location. 2 of them face St Denis, and this is a busy street with traffic noise. The 1 room in the back, away from St Denis, is much quieter. This is our favorite room.

The location, one block from Metro/Laurier, is excellent. The building is from 1890, and has a lot of character. There are 2 flights of stairs to get up to the rooms.

Jen is a very welcoming and conscientious host. She went beyond our expectations and helped us with some issues with our room and the Airbnb website. We are most appreciative.

Breakfast was very good.

We stayed here for one week in 2 of the 3 rooms. (BTW: The beds in these 2 rooms are fold-out, and are a bit harder than we like.)
This is a fine place to stay. Jen is calm, welcoming, and has a nice sense of humor.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Jen's B&B. Rooms were airy and clean with an artistic feel that I fell immediately in love with. The B&B is in a great central location, surrounded by many great shops, restaurants, and bars, and near the Metro station. Jen is welcoming, enthusiastic, and warm. Yummy, filling breakfast was a great start to each morning!

I really enjoyed my stay at Plateau Montreal Artisanal B&B. The room was just right, the bed was very comfortable and the location was excellent with metro and bike options just around the corner. There are some nice little restaurants across the street as well. I slept in each day and Jen and Theresa were very kind about leaving out my breakfast for me. I felt quite at home.

Very well located, one of the best restaurants in town across the street, within walking distance to Montreal's vibrant life. 

The building is old but comfortable, with large rooms (ask for the one at the back side, it's very quiet).

Jen has been very accommodating, considering my impossible schedule! Great host!
Loved the funky charm of this place...the colors, artwork, and ideal neighborhood made for a comfortable stay. Jen was a good host and made me feel welcome.

Jen was very accommodating and helpful! We were delayed by 2 hours and arrived close to midnight and she waited for us to arrive and was very nice in assisting us in settling in. The place is located in a fun neighborhood, and right near the Metro. Highly recommend!
Jen is very friendly and helpful, and the place is very relaxed, comfortable, and well-located.
Awesome location! Eclectic house that made us feel like we were living in the heart of Montreal. Great base for explorations. Jen provided great service.

Jen's place is private, clean and very central to everything. 
I enjoyed staying there. Jen would come and visit every day (as she lives a few blocks away) and would have breakfast and fresh fruits for you in the morning. She was also great company and would have a little chat with you. 
I highly recommend your stay here if you're visiting Montreal.

What an awesome place to stay in Montreal! So close to Laurier metro station, this Airbnb is the perfect way to simulate how locals live in this beautiful city. Jen was a great host; she pops in every day to make sure everything is okay in the house and you'll hopefully get to meet some fantastic guests as I did. If I ever go back to Montreal, I will definitely stay here because it feels like you're living in someone's home and the owner isn't home: )

If you are a light sleeper, I would strongly recommend asking for the back bedroom or the one in the middle (it doesn't have any windows so if you're a fresh air freak that might be something to consider).  I had the large room at the front and it was massive; I sleep with earplugs and a couple of nights the traffic kept me awake, but overall I loved staying here 100%.

Directions from the metro - when you get off the tube (if heading north on Montmorency direction), go towards the exit that doesn't have stairs visible. There will be an escalator and then a flight of stairs and exit at the Gilford doors. As you look right, this is the bus stop; I think they terminate here and it looks like a dead end street. There's a street that veers off to the left and at the end there are some traffic lights (you'll walk past some restaurants on the left, a pizza place on the corner on the right), when you're standing next to the pizza place, cross over the road (across the 4 lanes, not the crossing that flows with the traffic) and the door is basically right there in front of the lights. There's no sign indicating the name of the Airbnb, just keep an eye out for the door as it's a bit hard to see at first. It's between the shops and I walked past it the first time.

This is a nice place to stay. Jen was helpful in telling us about places to go for food, music, etc. It's right on Saint-Denis, a good spot for restaurants and beer. Accommodations were basic but comfortable.

I had a great stay! The location is excellent, near the metro, and it's in a really nice area. It was so easy to get around. I loved having so much common space to hang out in, and I really like the style of the B&B. There are a lot of neat instruments and art. I also like the make-your-own breakfast style (she makes sure the kitchen is stocked with nice fruit, bagels, eggs, etc) and having a place to cook if needed. Jen is very welcoming and checks in to make sure everything is okay. My stay was short, but staying here made my Montreal experience awesome.

Jen went out of her way to ship some things we had left behind. She's a kind and gracious host, and her place is in a great location. 
I'd recommend this place to anyone.

Jen is a very lovely and friendly host. She was easily contacted for questions and recommendations throughout my stay. Her B&B is in a traditional Montreal home and was very charming. The fruits and bagels were a nice and welcome touch! The only minor issue would be the fact that some of the rooms are right on St.Denis—so if you are sensitive to noise (e.g., traffic) you may want to ask for a room at the back or bring ear plugs.

Great place, very cozy and relaxing at a great price.  Also, it's in a really cool area that was great to explore and very easy to get downtown. Jen is really accommodating and very sweet. Highly recommended!

Jen was a lovely host. She has a very welcoming and easygoing personality and provided helpful information about the area and points of interest. The apartment is conveniently located; it's close to restaurants & nightlife, and also has a nearby metro line. 

There is a shared bathroom, but other house guests staying at the same time as us were very considerate.

Jen has a really cool place that's super easy to find. It has fantastic old-style charm and the other people staying there were very friendly :) I recommend this place for sure if you want to take the metro, use Laurier station, but for the best restaurants nearby, walk in the other direction towards Mont Royal station :) :)

We had a great stay! The location was perfect for us - a few minutes from the metro, and within 15 mins of our favorite cafes and pubs. I had anticipated that the house may be cold given its age (and the time of year), but it was nice and toasty.
