The free parking a few blocks away was also a huge bonus! Thanks for a great stay!
According to the description. Clean.

Pros: I have some pretty strict cleanliness standards and I can say this place was nice and clean! It was a great space to stay as a couple and I loved the preservation of original architectural details like the crown molding and exposed brick. The shower was nice, the bed comfortable, and the TV with Netflix was great. It was conveniently located downtown and we easily used the metro to get around. The parking spot and AC were also great to have. It had nice amenities and great touches. I'd love to stay again! We felt right at home.

Tyler's place is really great - looks a little sketchy from the street view but don't let that deter you. Inside it is really clean, stylishly furnished and has all the amenities needed for your stay. Check-in and check-out was really simple with Tyler's directions and the lockbox by the door. The parking space offered is a 5 minute walk away but not a problem to get to with Tyler's directions. The parking space is in very tight quarters and we were a little uncertain as to whether we were in the right spot at first but we were thankful for the option because there was nowhere else close that we could have parked our car. Tyler is a very accommodating host, giving great suggestions for things to do in Montreal while we were there as well as checking in to make sure we were doing well during our stay. He is quick to respond to messages and we appreciated his friendliness. His place is just off of busy Rue St. Catherine where there are lots of places to eat and shop. It is also close proximity to the art galleries, Mont Royal, a grocery store and pharmacy. If you want to head downtown to Old Montreal it is also pretty close (we opted to walk because it was a nice day and it took us about 40 minutes). Thanks for a great place to stay Tyler - we will definitely stay again if we get back to Montreal any time soon!

Tyler's accommodation was very good. The location was also excellent. Restaurants, pubs and supermarkets are located right nearby. Unfortunately, there is a larger construction site in front of the house. Work began at 7 am. However, sleep will be ensured.
Apartment very well located in Montreal, decor very nice and host very warm and available.
Lovely apartment near a lot of good restaurants and close to the city center.
A spacious but unfinished apartment. Location is good.
A spotless, spacious studio apartment with parking in the heart of Montreal. Tyler was very easy to communicate with and helpful. We would definitely return if we come back to Montreal

Tyler was a phenomenal host; very quick to reply and ensure we had everything we needed. The parking spot was very close to the apartment, and there was a handy bike rental station one block over. We will definitely be staying again next time we are in Montreal!
This is a very trendy studio. The location, right off St. Catherine's, is ideal for someone looking to be blocks away from some of the best food in Montreal.

Wonderful stay, great location! The food in the surrounding area was delicious with lots of options. Beautiful architecture. Parking is about a 3-minute walk away. Close to the subway. Modern bathroom amenities including soap, shampoo, conditioner, laundry detergent, washer and dryer are all provided.
Excellent location in the city center. Very practical. I recommend it! It's very clean and well organized, plus with parking!

The apartment is super clean and ideally located next to Sainte Catherine street (the main street for shopping). Everything you need is in the apartment, and we had a free parking spot two streets away (2-3 minutes walk). We couldn't see Tyler working but he was very responsive to our messages and we were able to pick up the keys in a key box next to the apartment. Go for it!
We had a great stay!

Tyler's place was great for a weekend getaway. Perfect location. Close to downtown core, close to Mont-Royal, and close to Atwater market. Cozy bed and a nice little kitchen to cook in. Neighbors are quiet, though there is major construction in front of the apartment; not ideal if you are visiting during the week but perfect for a weekend! Can't wait to stay again!
I recommend Tyler! Very nice apartment

Taylor is an excellent host; all communication with him was smooth and perfect. The apartment is also excellent: clean, spacious, fully furnished with everything you need, and in a perfect location. Highly recommended!

We had a fantastic time at Tyler's apartment. The location is just crazy good, and that makes it completely worth it. There was some construction happening in and around the building that wasn't great, but inside was just fine.

We just loved our time in Montreal and Tyler's apartment was the perfect little home for us during our visit. It's truly in the center of downtown with easy access to everything we wanted to see. The apartment was beautiful and extremely clean. Tyler was really accommodating and willing to offer suggestions and tips for things to do while we were in town. There is quite a lot of construction going on across the street which could be a little jarring at times but it's really beyond the control of the host, just something to be aware of. Other than that, we loved our time in this gorgeous space!

The truth is, I want to live in this studio. It is very cute and comfortable. Perfect for solo travel or a couple. Plus, it was incredibly clean, which I do appreciate. Tyler was really good at communicating and happy to answer any questions I had both before and during my stay. The apartment is located near two metro stations and a few bus stops which made it easy to get around and explore the city. I had the best time in Montreal and I would highly recommend Tyler's place.

Tyler's place is in a fantastic location, right in the heart of the city. The apartment was clean and far enough off the main street so that it was quiet despite being downtown. Tyler was quick to respond and was accommodating when it came to checking me in. Great value for a great place.
The place was as mentioned. Though communication with Tyler wasn't the best, he was very attentive.

Maelle was easy to reach. The apartment was clean, the room spacious and the bed very comfortable. Despite being located near the Latin Quarter, we did not have any difficulty finding parking nearby. We will definitely return! We highly recommend it.
Cute flat, nice housemates and close to a major subway hub for getting around Montreal. Thanks guys!

Even though we haven't had the opportunity to meet Maëlle, she did everything possible to make our stay as pleasant as possible. She was very attentive (at the end of our stay, she sent us a last email to see if everything went well and if we were well settled). As promised, we were very kindly welcomed by one of her roommates, Gautier, who didn't hesitate to answer our questions during the stay. The other roommates are also very nice. In short, it's a good address filled with kind and welcoming people.

It was a pleasant stay, we adored the proximity of the places, the room is well comfortable and the terrace is magnificent. 

Thank you very much, Maëlle, and see you soon.

This studio is really really well located, comfortable and well equipped. I needed to spend a night away from home running around Montreal, and being on the cusp of downtown and the plateau made it easy for me to reach most places I needed to go on foot. Saint Laurent is right around the corner too. Tarek is a friendly and funny guy, and was easy to coordinate with (he actually checked me in personally at 11pm). Oh, and the bed has been replaced by a full one! Definitely would recommend this place to tourists who want a cosy space and central location.

My husband and I had a great time staying at this studio during our daughters' graduation. The location is one block away from McGill Downtown campus. The host was very kind to help us find free parking right next to the house upon arrival. The facade of the house looks like a heritage site, very beautiful. The studio has all new facilities, the bathroom is large for a studio and fully renovated. The kitchen is nice, it also had some breakfast items. This place is great for a couple. The only downside is the mattress, not the most comfortable. Otherwise an A+ place and host. Would highly recommend.

We absolutely loved staying at Tarek's charming place, which is exactly how he described it—a cozy ground floor studio condo perfectly situated. We were just steps from scenic McGill University, a short walk to the vibrant bars and restaurants on St-Laurent Street, and were conveniently able to walk to many other places during our stay. The exterior of the building is beautiful and historically looking while the interior is updated, comfortable, and super clean... all while being very peaceful and serene when we needed a break from sightseeing. 

Tarek was an excellent host—he was kind and communicative with us from the start and was flexible to some logistical issues we had. He even gave us "must-see" and "must-eat" tips and overall made us feel very welcome on our first visit to Montreal. We would definitely stay here again in the future. Highly recommend!

We had a great experience staying at Tarek's apartment. It was very clean and spacious for a studio, and the location was fantastic. We hit quite a bit of unexpected traffic and were about an hour and a half late arriving, and he was extremely accommodating for us. He helped us find parking, and was available for questions throughout our stay. Check out was a bit cumbersome because of an unforeseen conflict, but Tarek was very accommodating to make it as easy as possible for us.

We had a really nice stay at Tarek's place. The room was very clean and cozy. The location was perfect too. It was close to McGill University and a short walk from Rue St Laurent. There was also a bus stop just around the corner. Tarek is an amazing host and very accommodating. I would highly recommend!

My fiancé and I arrived on a Thursday afternoon. Tarek met us and welcomed us kindly. He showed us the apartment and even gave us some local restaurants and areas we should visit during our week-long stay. He was an excellent host. When I reached out with a couple of questions, he responded even though he was away on vacation. The apartment is perfect for a couple looking to spend quality time together. It's cozy, clean, and more than I expected for a studio apartment. I would return here without a doubt. Thank you, Tarek!
I enjoyed my stay at this place. It is clean, tidy, and well-furnished. The host is very helpful and responsive. It is close to downtown and very quiet.

Tarek was very helpful and flexible regarding our check-in and check-out. We arrived an hour later than we had expected (as our train was delayed) and he was very understanding. We were three adults staying for three nights, and although the place is set up for one or two adults, Tarek provided us with an inflatable mattress, and things worked out fine. The place is nice, fully renovated, and very well located in the heart of McGill Ghetto. It's very lively with all the students setting up for the school year. There are a lot of amenities close by and the location is quite central. Overall, a very nice stay.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Tarek's place for a weekend trip to Montreal. Tarek was an extremely gracious, communicative, and accommodating host. His place is clean, cozy, and very comfortable (the bed is a dream). The apartment is in a superb location: convenient to public parking garages, close to more delicious restaurants and cafes and bars than I can count, only a 20-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts, and just a little longer to the Old Port and Notre-Dame Basilica. Our only regret is that we didn't stay longer!

Everything about Tarek's place was great. Perfect location for exploring Montreal. He was informative about what to eat/visit/check out and I would absolutely recommend this place to others. A nice quiet apartment, very close to St/Laurent!

Tarek was extremely accommodating. When we arrived in Montreal, it was about to rain really hard for hours upon hours -- so Tarek arranged to meet us earlier to give us the keys. He also left us some breakfast items. 

The apartment was very clean. Great location. Couldn't have been happier.

My girlfriend and I stayed in this condo for a few nights on a holiday to Montreal, and it was exactly what we needed. The condo itself is fully self-contained and in a fantastic location to explore every corner of the city. Tarek was a great host, being very accommodating for late check-ins and early check-outs, while also recommending some delicious restaurants. The bathroom and kitchen were both very clean in good condition. I'd definitely recommend this condo to anyone, and we will definitely look to stay here again when we next come to Montreal!
Tarek's place is great! Great location, super clean, and Tarek was easy to reach and very accommodating. Would definitely stay again!
Very close to McGill. A wonderful stay!
This place is very close to McGill University and also very convenient for visiting the city. It's a great place to stay, with everything you need to feel at home!

You'll find this place just as expected - charming, clean and in a great location. Separate side door entry is very convenient and the place itself is pretty well maintained. Tarek was easy to communicate with and a gracious host. We were very happy with our short stay here as we explored Montreal!

Great spot. Small and cozy - perfect for one person. The host is friendly and welcoming. I had to leave early and she was very accommodating despite having arranged to only come back to the city after I had left.

We felt very welcome and Marie-Amelie was very available if needed. The apartment matched the description perfectly and the location is perfect (a quiet residential street just a few steps from Ste-Catherine). We would definitely go back!

This is a ground-level apartment (actually a few steps up from the street) on Rue St. Urbain. It's very spacious and newly renovated. Beds are comfortable and brand-new. Contrary to the description, there is actually a full-size washer and dryer in the apartment.

Two bedrooms are near the street and can be noisy when the windows are open. The other two bedrooms are in the back and are quieter. You will hear the neighbors upstairs when they walk around, but this was not a problem at night.

The neighborhood is lively and has lots of restaurants. There is a supermarket 2 blocks away. Metro stops are a 10-15 minute walk. Parc Jeanne-Mance is a block away and great for an evening picnic.

Flatbook was very responsive via phone and email (though email sometimes took several hours to be answered).

Great location. Clean. Comfy beds. On street level, so be ready to close and lock windows when not at home. One room right on a noisy street. Two are tucked away quietly in the back. Great kitchen, though bring everything you need for cooking. There are no knives for cutting other than basic perforated bread knives (i.e., no chef's knife or paring knife). The space feels somewhat cold (more like a staged house than a warm home).

The host was very responsive and provided keys for all of us (4 guests). They installed AC during the first night that helped a lot with the hot Montreal summer. The apartment was very clean, and the furniture, bathroom, and kitchen were new. It was a great value, and it has a fantastic location opposite a church and a block away from a beautiful park.

I visited Montreal and spent 3 nights here with my husband and his parents. The flat was as pictured, set up and perfectly decorated. It was spotless and had everything we needed for our stay. The kitchen had all of the utensils and dishes necessary to prepare meals if wanted. The appliances were all new and the apartment in general was in great condition. There are 4 separate bedrooms each with a desk, closet and drawers. The apartment is in a great neighborhood with easy access to anything you want to do. We LOVED the area and I enjoyed running in the nearby park daily. The neighborhood is very safe and we all felt immediately "at home." I cannot say enough about the customer service provided by Flatbook. Upon check-in we had an issue with the lockbox. Erika was over within 5 minutes to assist us. She was kind, personable and professional. We had a small issue with one of the beds that had not been properly assembled. We sent a message and within hours someone came and delivered a new bed. There was a minor issue with the front door of the building as it appeared someone had broken a hinge. This didn't really compromise security but I let them know as I thought it would be polite. It was fixed before I saw it again. I have stayed at hotels with maintenance teams on site that could not provide this level of customer service. They truly deliver on their promise of 5-star 24-hour service. I would be thrilled to have future bookings accompanied by Flatbook service and can't wait to use them again!!!!
Great stay in Montreal! Would recommend to others.
Sonder was a great host, and this place is in a great location in the Le Plateau. We ended up walking to a lot of places. The check-in process was very easy. I would recommend this place.

Our stay was great. The space was true to pictures, very modern and simple in a way that felt like a hotel! I stayed with 5 other friends, each of us was left a towel, shampoo soap etc. The kitchen was fully stocked with anything you might need! Everything was extremely clean, organized, and the size was great for 6 or even 8 guests. All in all an amazing experience.
A great affordable place to stay.
Very clean, comfortable place in a new building. The location was fantastic. It was a short walk to the main drag in the plateau.
Beautiful place!
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.

The place is just as beautiful as you can see in the pictures. The house is equipped with everything you need, such as extra towels, soap, conditioner, shampoo, plates, cups, silverware, cooking utensils and coffee! The house is located in a great neighborhood very close to restaurants and stores. The house was very clean and you can tell the host is on top of their game in making sure you walk out of their place with a wonderful experience. I will definitely book again in the future.
beautiful apartment

Amazing place in a great part of town. Large, modern, and well laid out. Quick response, self-check-in was easy. It's a managed property, so not a personal touch, but professional and pleasant. Only complaint is that the place is a bit loud: you can hear walking (stomping?) from upstairs, and the front room lets in all the noise from the traffic. Otherwise super great!

Amazing location and value in Plateau, great for groups. Due to the building's age, floors/walls are quite thin, so light sleepers should bring earplugs. The host was excellent and easy to communicate with.

We had a great stay at this lovely apartment in Le Plateau! Very nice and spacious, very comfy couch and a great location. Communication went well and all necessary amenities were provided. The only thing we struggled with was finding a spot for the car, but apart from that everything was great.
We were very happy with this apartment: it's very spacious and located in the heart of Le Plateau.

Where were 4 guests, and pleasantly surprised that there were also four sets of keys available! The flat has a dishwasher and a laundry machine, detergents were supplied.

It's about a 30-minute walk to downtown (conference center), or a 10-minute bus ride (bus stop just outside the house). We didn't use the kitchen much, but there is a coffee maker, a big fridge, microwave and stove.

Sonder was extremely supportive and available throughout my stay. I reached out to ask some questions about the area and was helped out in just minutes. Everything was as described and super clean. 

I will be booking with Sonder again, next time I come to Montreal.

Great location, easy access to Old Montreal via bus stop right outside the door (a quick 5-minute ride). Nice days offer a pleasant walk for under $8 Uber fare.  

Host responded promptly and was very helpful. The parking suggestion worked perfectly, with someone arriving on holiday to open up when all other garages were closed. 

The place was clean and had all the amenities needed. Highly recommend this place.

This was an amazing find. Centrally located, this apartment was perfect for our 6 person group's doors and drink tour of Montreal. Plenty of supplies and sparkling clean, would definitely stay here again. (Parking details were provided by the host and cost about $25 a day)
Wonderful area, great place to

I strongly recommend Maya's suite for anyone, whether you are traveling solo, with friends, or as a family. It is very clean, with ample supplies, and the WiFi is strong. The only suggestion I have for Maya is to try to get in touch with clients upon request. I even emailed her, but unsuccessfully. 

I had a great time. I felt like home.
Maya was very welcoming from the beginning of our stay to check-out. She was very willing to help us and even called us an Uber for our travels. She was very kind and made our stay very enjoyable.
The host cancelled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Yannick was on a trip so we met his roommates. They are very friendly. Towels and napkins were provided. The apartment is clean, quiet and well-located. We even got a slice of cake for the housewarming! I recommend it.

The time at Yannick's place was really nice. His roommates welcomed us perfectly and his room had lots of space for all our luggage. The area has a lot to offer, shops, bars, and restaurants, and the park is close by. We can only recommend the place.

Yannick's roommates were perfect hosts! The area was great as it was walking distance to Mont Royal with tons of coffee shops and everything you can imagine. It was also only a 5-minute walk to the Mont Royal subway station, so it was very easy to get around anywhere. The apartment was exactly as described in the photos.

My accommodation is perfectly located, just a 5-10 minute walk from the Mont Royal metro station in the heart of the Plateau! Audrey and Johanna were incredibly welcoming and made me feel right at home.
We have stayed at three Airbnbs in Montreal before arriving at Yannick's place, and we can say for sure that it is definitely the best!

Yannick is a helpful host for local events, eateries, and getting around. The apartment is a classic third-floor walk-up in the "Plateau," on the rise near Mount Royal. Great location. Easy access to metro subways, buses, and very walkable. Close to restaurants and shopping. He is on a one-way, quiet street. If you're driving, parking can be limited or unavailable, so scope the neighborhood and watch the signs! There's a Montreal parking app and Metro Transit app that are very helpful, and Yannick can help you strategize for a spot.

Yannick is a helpful, warm host who responds to queries quickly. The location is excellent – you can walk to cafes, restaurants, and shops, and there's lots of character in this part of Montreal. The bed is comfortable, and the apartment is tasteful and interesting. Highly recommend.

Shane welcomed us with open arms, he was very friendly and helpful. He stayed up late to chat with us, suggested some places for us, and worked very hard to make sure we were having a good stay. The first thing he did when we walked in the door was offer us food. Cozy, affordable, and pretty close to a lot of cool stuff.
The guy is brilliant, and the house is too.  Feel immediately at home. "Highly recommended," if you want to not only sleep somewhere but also meet someone.

Shane was an excellent host. When my father and I arrived, there was a lack of sleeping space for the two of us, and Shane voluntarily gave up his bed so that we could be comfortable. He went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay. I felt safe and secure and was able to live according to my unusual schedule and hours without any problems!

Nice, Nice, Nice. European and artistic but well organized and convenient house. Perfect location. A block away from a great street filled with international restaurants and grocery stores. While you're enjoying the scene, you will get to the Metro or Bixi bikes. I wrote this because of Shane. He is a kind and good guy. He will give you full support while you are staying at his place. So have a nice time!!

Shane was an excellent host. He is very accommodating, communicative, and fluent in both French and English. I never felt like I was intruding on his space and I felt at ease sharing his kitchen and bathroom. His place is located in a quiet neighborhood that is safe, charming, and has a short commute to downtown. It's a short walk from his place to restaurants, bars, and shops (produce and clothing). I highly recommend this listing.

Shane was very helpful and accommodating with the check-in process. The apartment was very clean, spacious, and centrally located to food and drinks. We loved our time in Montreal and Shane was very helpful!

Shane was an AWESOME host! I couldn't have asked for anything better; the place was cozy, close enough to everything I needed (I did have a Bixi membership for the month though which was also great), and I felt perfectly comfortable and safe. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone :)
A big thank you to Shane for his availability and reliability! The accommodation is very well located and pleasant.
Great location! Unit was just as described.

The host was very responsive from check-in through checkout. He waited for us to give him the keys and show us around even though our train was two hours late. The place is as described, new, modern, and extremely clean. The building itself is small and quiet despite being in an extremely well-situated location. Would love to stay here again.

Andy was very accommodating. He took the time to walk us around the neighborhood and help us get acclimated. The loft was perfect, and the location was extremely convenient. Everything we needed and expected.
Wonderful, clean and modern apartment in a perfect location. Really appreciated the communication and flexibility with A when our plane was delayed and then rescheduled multiple times.

You can go without hesitation, it's as described in the presentation and the neighborhood is ideal for visiting Montreal. 

Of course, the apartment isn't very bright, but it's rare to be in the city center with an unobstructed view of the countryside! And then we're mostly there at night...

The loft was immaculate! The decor was lovely too. It felt "good" - comfortable and safe the moment I walked in. I appreciated the security lock at the entrance to the building and the elevator. The location was awesome, just meters from the Basilica as promised. Also only a few short blocks to a metro stop to get to the 747 Bus to the airport.

I loved my stay in Montreal!! The Airbnb was perfect for my short 3-night stay and I felt very comfortable there, it was definitely clean and tidy and had everything that I needed for my stay. I would most certainly use this Airbnb again if I visited again. Many Thanks

Great place, great location, and Andrew was very helpful and easy to communicate with.  It's steps from Notre Dame cathedral, and was a convenient place to be: in Old Montreal/Ville-Marie, but also right by the Place d'Armes metro station, Chinatown, and the bus to Mile End/Quartier des Spectacles. We found it very peaceful and relaxing, and great for an afternoon nap after a long walk!

The apartment was clean, quiet, open, and airy, there was free wifi and Netflix, and basic kitchen amenities, including a coffee maker. We enjoyed getting some bread, fruit, and veggies from Marché Jean-Talon and having them for breakfast. 

I would gladly stay here again, so I guess that's the best recommendation!
The host was fantastic. Friendly and easy to communicate with. Great location
The host cancelled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

I did not have a firm arrival time and Andrew worked with me to ensure the key exchange went smoothly. I wanted a downtown location and it was seconds away from the Basilica Notre Dame. The loft was spacious, clean, modern, comfortable, and attractive decor, with a well-equipped kitchen, plenty of closet space, and a large bathroom area with a combined shower/bath and a working air conditioner that I appreciated because there were some very warm days.  I did not meet Andrew but all my questions were answered promptly.
The description was accurate and met our requirements.

Great little studio in the heart of Old Town - super convenient and steps from Notre-Dame Basilica. The apartment has everything you need and is impeccably clean.

Only slight downside for us was the communication style - not quite as welcoming and flexible as we've become accustomed to with AirBnB hosts. More of a serviced apartment experience rather than a true AirBnB but comfortable and positive overall none the less. Thank you!
Great place in an excellent location. Highly recommended.
Great location in the heart of Old Montreal.
The host cancelled this reservation 112 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Andy's place is located in the most amazing spot in Montreal. It's within walking distance of everything and offers so many options for shopping, dining, patios, etc. The space is so cute and trendy, just as described. They offer so many amenities in the kitchenette and bathroom that you don't have to run out for the little things you might need. Very quiet inside the space. Check-in involved walking to a nearby location to get the key from a lockbox, but it was manageable. Thanks again!

Nice apartment in a great location. However, this apartment is in a building that does not allow short-term rentals. We were not told beforehand. There is a warning on the front door that you do so at your own risk. Also, the owners were not very responsive to our concerns regarding the smoke alarm beeping regularly while we were there (it was never fixed for the full week we were there), and that there were no pillowcases for the extra pillows.

Perfect location for St Catherine's and the Plateau. The apartment was in a great location and felt very safe with a security door to the main entrance. My wife and I loved our stay. We would highly recommend this apartment.

Olga and Andrei's place was very stylish, in a great neighborhood, and easily accessible. Contrary to what people are saying about the key location, it was very easy to find and a 3-minute walk from the condo.

Cons: There is a sign on the front door prohibiting short-term rentals (Airbnbs), the pillows were flat as a pancake (there were extras in the closet but no pillowcases to go with them), a dishcloth and/or a hand towel would have been appreciated. 

Pros: The place was super quiet, in a lovely area, the bed was comfy, and we very much enjoyed our stay.
The hosts were very kind and I had no complications. The apartment was also clean and didn't lack anything.

The location of this apartment was so perfect. We loved being right in the heart of Old Montreal with easy access to so much. The apartment itself was also just what we wanted and needed—clean, cozy, quiet, modern and with most everything we needed. Keep in mind when booking that parking is not included and will run you about $20 a day. Andy made self check-in very straightforward. We gave it four instead of five stars because there were signs in the lobby saying that Airbnb was forbidden, and we worried about being kicked out. We never had a problem though. If they had been granted an exception, it would have been helpful to know that.

Yves was an amazingly helpful, organized, and very welcoming host. He had left some food and refreshments for us and made sure we felt free to use his kitchen appliances and TV to make our stay comfortable. The central location made it easy to move around and enjoy the city. Yves' condo was exactly as shown in the pictures.

I enjoyed my stay at Yves's house. This cozy place is very close to downtown, so it's very convenient to get anywhere by Metro or bike if you want to visit this beautiful city. The host is very sweet and nice, he is always accommodating to your needs. The bedrooms and bathroom are very clean; shampoo, body wash, towels, etc. were all provided! Overall, a great experience and I would highly recommend staying here.
Yves was a wonderful host, very welcoming, his place was great and accurately described as seen online.

Yves' place was exactly like the pictures, beautiful, perfect location and we felt right at home. Although we didn't meet Yves, Michel, Yves' friend was really nice and welcoming, communication was very easy

Yves is a very accommodating host. We arrived later than we had expected due to some unforeseen bus troubles and Yves was very understanding about the whole ordeal.  

He was also extremely helpful, he provided recommendations for the best ways to get around the city, and informed us about free Bixi bike day. 

His condo was very clean, and he provided all of the accommodations we would ever need. 

He was also great at getting back to me right away - my messages were always answered within a few hours, and he answered all of my questions! 

I would highly recommend Yves' condo if you're planning to stay in this part of Montreal. It's a great location - it's so easy to get around the city with this condo as your home base!

Highly recommend this listing for a perfect place to stay in Montreal. The place is even better in reality than the pictures if you can believe it. Stayed with two other friends for a long weekend and had plenty of space to feel comfortable - honestly it was hard to leave sometimes, the place was so beautiful. Convenient location to get around Montreal and great neighborhood.

Unfortunately we didn't get to meet Yves, but he was the perfect host regardless. We had everything we could possibly need but he was still very communicative and friendly about making ourselves at home in his place. 

Overall would definitely stay here again - and probably will since I visit Montreal often!

I just returned from five nights in Yves' apartment, and I can't say enough great things about my experience. The space is spectacular: bright, beautifully decorated, modern yet comfortable, and spotless. The sunken living room is an awesome place to hang out, the bedrooms are spacious, the outdoor area is a great place to relax with a cup of coffee in the morning under the trees. The apartment is in a fantastic neighborhood that has a real French flavor. It's within walking distance to many of Montreal's attractions, and a short metro ride to others. And Yves himself is the consummate host. He was friendly and gracious, was very flexible with our schedule, and checked in on us several times to make sure that we had everything we needed. This is a true Airbnb winner and I can't wait to return!

We had a five-star experience during our two nights at Yves' condo. The apartment is bright, beautiful, and spacious. There are plenty of restaurants nearby, and the metro is a short walk away, making it very convenient. Yves was out of town when we arrived, but he had someone meet us at the apartment to show us around. He was flexible in accommodating our late arrival. We came for the Montreal marathon, but I would like to come back, stay in Yves' apartment again, and explore this beautiful city.
If the ad description is accurate, the house is very well located, very clean and very comfortable.
It was an awesome stay!! The room was tidy and clean, I loved the neighborhood, perfect location and the price was very reasonable. Highly recommend
Great place located in central Montreal! It's within walking distance to all the sights and sounds of Montreal and extremely convenient for travelers.

I had a very nice and relaxing time staying at Stephanie's place. The room was bright and tidy, and the apartment was as well. I felt very welcome and all the house information was printed out for easy access. Fantastic neighborhood as well.

Stephanie's very welcoming, making it easy to enter the apartment. The room is lovely and well-located, with nice towels provided.  Just be aware that the bed (quite soft, springs showing) and the bathroom (shared with the other 5 people in the flat) require a bit of aiming to get to! But considering the very low price, we're not complaining! :)
Very good neighborhood, and very good welcome!

The was exactly how I imagined it. Stephanie was really accommodating and respectful of my quietness. Can't beat the price and location combo, everything is within 2min in every direction. Also a good coffee shop right underneath the apartment is so convenient. Only wish I had access to the balcony but that's just me. Overall perfect!

It was a very nice and warm stay. Alexia gave me detailed instructions before my arrival. Denis welcomed me with a lot of information about the region. The location is very convenient, close to the River with a quiet park and beautiful views. The room is cozy, clean with a lovely bookcase and quite a few French books to choose from. Overall, it was a great stay. Alexia was so nice to arrange a pick-up as I left my phone charger in the room. Really lovely hosts, highly recommend!

Alexia and Denis were very helpful from the beginning. Their house is located close to Verdun Metro and Wellington street, so eateries and shops are very close by. The waterfront is about 4 blocks away and you can have a relaxing walk every evening. I wish I could have socialized more with Alexia and Denis. The stay was wonderful and I would recommend their place to my friends.

Alexia & Denis are awesome! They made our Montreal trip very enjoyable. Denis gave us all the travel information we needed when we arrived. This location is very close to the subway station and BIXI, so we did not have to drive the car and had no trouble getting around the city. Highly recommended!
Great hosts who were very accommodating and kept in touch. Nice apartment with on-street parking and great local shops.

Very nice hosts. Denis gave us plenty of recommendations not only for our stay at his place but also for our trip. The two rooms are spacious and the beds are quite comfortable. Thanks for hosting us!

Dennis met us outside when we arrived. He and his wife were very helpful in telling us the best places to eat, check out, and visit, as well as helping us find our way around. They even got us a metro map to help us navigate the city.  They provided toiletries and also allowed us to do a load of laundry even though that wasn't in the description. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. The apartment is about half a mile from the nearest subway station, but the walk is very beautiful and filled with delicious restaurants and cafes. A must-stay.
Very nice host! Thank you! We had a great time at your place.

Denis was very kind and helpful with everything! He made us feel right at home, and helped make us an itinerary for our stay in Montreal. The neighborhood was nice and quiet, and the house was about 10 blocks away from the metro station.
Alexia and Denis welcomed us very warmly. The room matched the photos perfectly, and the neighborhood is nice. Denis gave us good advice for our continued stay. An address I recommend.

Alexia and Denis are very welcoming, we had a wonderful evening! Thank you!  
I recommend it!
The host cancelled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
A spotless apartment, and you barely know the hosts are there. There's only one bathroom, which we all shared, but there were never any issues.

It was my third time staying at Alexia & Denis' place, and they are not only hosts but truly good friends that you want to make. They're friendly and you'll never get bored when you have a conversation with them. They provide lots of suggestions and advice if you don't know where to go. The bedroom is nice and clean, and the backyard is awesome. We had a great supper time in their backyard with A&D, and we made BBQ! The apartment is located near the water and the park is beautiful. The area is quiet and the neighborhood is pretty nice. It's a 10-minute walk to the Metro (subway) and we didn't have any trouble traveling around downtown by taking the train. I can't wait to see them again next time!

The apartment is in a verdant and very peaceful neighborhood. The two bedrooms are large and the beds are comfortable. Alexia welcomed us and made us feel very at ease at her place. She was very accommodating with our arrival and departure times and even helped us find a place to print our tickets. I recommend!

Alexia and Denis were very accommodating and easygoing hosts - I really could not have asked for better representatives of Montreal! We had gone into the city not really knowing what to do, and Denis sat with us for a good 15 minutes describing in detail some of his favorite places and the best times to go. Both Alexia and Denis were fluent in English and French, and we would engage in lively discussions on anything from politics to vegetarian recipes to Mario Kart (be warned: Alexia is prepared to defend her championship title on the last one!). On the flip side, they are also perfectly fine giving you space whenever you wish to rest or simply avoid social interaction.

As for the listing itself, parking was readily available on the street and the location was an easy 10-minute walk to the nearest subway station. The bathroom and bedrooms were clean, and the wifi connection was good. The apartment is in a quiet residential neighborhood with no traffic noise, and there are no pets in case any guests might have allergies. I will definitely be recommending this listing to any friends or family visiting Montreal!
Loved the stay! Definitely recommending this place. The hosts were extremely friendly and guided us to local favorites. Will definitely visit them again!
Great value; Denis was a very helpful host! Exactly what you need for a short getaway.

Nice location. Good cafe nearby called St. Lo Bagels. Keep in mind check-in for the first day around 6pm. Stay the next day then out by 9am the next day. That's two days of accommodation which I thought was a bit inconvenient. Beds are fairly hard futon style. My travel buddy got very little sleep in the other room. The host is helpful with places of interest. Has recently installed a new shower. Woken up by noisy traffic both days as it's close to a busy road. Honest review. Nice hosts but probably look for something more comfortable next time. If you're looking for something on a budget, this would be a good option.
Nice and quiet place! Alexia and Denis are very friendly. We stayed for one night.
Great place to stay

Very pleasant stay at Alexia and Denis' place. The rooms are spacious and clean, as is the apartment which is also well-equipped.

Our hosts were available to give us advice even though we didn't see them much as they worked a lot.  As a result, we had the apartment mostly to ourselves.

The apartment is located 10-15 minutes from the Verdun metro station but there is a bus stop practically at the foot of the building for getting there.

The neighborhood is quiet and offers everything you need for dining or shopping.

Thank you again for your hospitality! We look forward to seeing you again!
Denis and Alexia were very hospitable while I, my wife, and our two children stayed with them. Nice location, close to the metro station. Recommended!

Alexia and Denis were fantastic hosts. The experience of finding the place, parking right outside, and settling in was seamless. They were very friendly and happy to help suggest things to do during our vacation. We would definitely stay here again next time!
Very nice and friendly couple! Their place is very welcoming.
Alexia and Denis were gracious hosts and we'd definitely stay with them again!

Alexia and Denis were wonderful hosts and extremely helpful with the metro, things to do, and general information. Their home was very clean, neat, and a great choice for our stay. We would definitely book with them again, highly recommend!

We had a wonderful welcome and good advice and suggestions for our stay. Alexia & Denis were very nice and not at all complicated. We felt very comfortable! Quiet neighborhood and very well located. Thank you!

Alexia and Denis were fantastic hosts. Excellent communication beforehand. They were incredibly helpful with lots of information. The house was spotless and tidy. Highly recommended and definitely worth staying there again.

Alexia and Denis were very welcoming and accommodating, we had traveled a long way by car and were running late.  Only one small detail, the bed in which we slept was a bit hard for us, I would recommend to adults to sleep in the room with the Greek landscape view where, according to our son, the bed was comfortable. Children would adjust more easily to a harder bed. Otherwise, the apartment is very nice and well-located, very close to the river and pretty parks. We highly recommend these hosts.

Our stay with Alexia and Denis was very good and we felt comfortable. Both are very friendly, open-minded and helpful. The apartment is about 10 minutes walk from the metro station, which takes you to the city center in 10-15 minutes. It's very quiet, you can easily park on the street in front of the house. We would definitely stay again!

It was my 4th time being accommodated by Alexia and Denis (*2nd time visiting with my boyfriend). Amazing couple who you really want to get to know about and have a deep conversation with. They provided useful information about what’s going on in the city. Check-in and check-out are flexible. Their apartment is close to the Metro station and neighborhood is quiet. We had a fun, relaxing, and enjoyable long weekend. Looking forward to my visit again next time! Congratulations on your wedding~ Bon voyage ❤️

Super stay at Denis and Alexia! Very welcoming and friendly, they know how to make you feel at ease and are available whenever we need help or advice. We felt a little like home. The apartment and bedrooms are spacious and very clean, there's everything you need for a good stay. The green metro is 10 minutes walk away (journey of about 10 minutes to the Montreal Metro Center), and Bixi stations are nearby the apartment. The Verdun neighborhood is very cute, and don't miss Wellington Street and swimming in the Saint Lawrence River nearby;).

Denis was very nice. We found the place easily under Denis's instructions. During our stay, I enjoyed several free talks with Denis. It is surprising to find that he is an engineer and has the same background as us.

Great hosts, fantastic communication. Only thing missing was AC or a fan so the room got very hot with no air flow when it was over 90 during the day. No fault of the host, but perhaps a fan would be good. Very friendly and kind hosts who helped when we had a flat tire and offered to help find a shop to fix it. Would recommend if you need a close place to everything and kind people to chat with!

My first time using Airbnb and also my first time in Montreal; Alexia and Denis made it a great experience. They have a very clean apartment and are close to the metro. The recommendations and map were appreciated! Thank you so much :)
Great hosts!

Nice quiet neighborhood, parking available on street (better practice your parallel parking skills!), nice big rooms, clean and incredibly accommodating hosts. Me and two teammates stayed over a weekend and barely saw the hosts until the last day we were packing, but they were always a quick message away. Loved staying here.

Our stay with Alexia and Denis was better than expected. We interacted most with Denis, who was super friendly and always ready to give any advice on what to visit and where to go (the breakfast advice was awesome). Also, our group of four was super impressed with how clean the house was. Five stars
It was a good stay. We liked how quiet the neighborhood was, and its good location to everything.

Excellent location, with downtown center within walking distance. 

The room is amazing, brand new and modern decor, but there's a slight odor of decoration.
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.

Beautiful apartment right in the heart of downtown Montreal! Very easy check-in process, responsive host service, and everything you need for a short stay! I would definitely want to stay here again for my next visit.
The place is very clean and things are accurately described.
Awesome apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything. Would definitely stay again!
Very nice apartment, very well located. Only problem: building ventilation is very noisy. However, the host provided earplugs and was very quick to respond. Excellent customer service!
They were very helpful!
Good place. Clean. Good value for quality price.
No keys required. Great location.
Great stay, host was easy to communicate with via [hidden by Airbnb] messenger. They fixed a problem with the smoke detector in a timely manner. Would stay again.

The place is in a prime location downtown Montreal. You can walk right up Mount Royal and be close to many bars and restaurants in the heart of the city. The place was exactly as it appeared in the pictures.
Great apartment, great location
Great spot!

I stayed at this listing with a colleague on a business trip. It was perfect and the area is really nice too. Communication with Sonder is so incredibly fast and easy. Entry was via keypad, so check-in was super easy.
Superb apartment in the city center!
I really recommend this rental which exceeded expectations, being in a great location and very clean and tidy.
Nice place!

We can't say enough great things about this host. Any question or concern we had, he responded within minutes. The unit was clean and looked like the photos posted & all the details about the location were accurate. We would highly recommend this unit and host to anyone considering visiting downtown Montreal.

This apartment was very nice and we really enjoyed our stay. It looks like the pictures and was very quiet, though nearby to restaurants and shopping in the downtown area as well as Mont Royal. The kitchen had all the standard amenities. They provided shampoo/soap/conditioner and towels as well. I would stay in this apartment again. There were only 2 of us but it is large enough to hold a couple more people (though only has 1 bathroom).

Two things to note: as stated in the description, the building is currently under construction. It was very loud for two days of the trip but we didn't hear it at all on the third day. Keep that in mind if you choose to book while the construction continues. Second, Sonder requires you to register on their website (with name, email address, and phone number) in order to rent an apartment from them.

The highlight of this place is its location. Easy access to shops, the metro, restaurants, etc. The amenities are good. The kitchen, dining area, and living room have basic furniture that will work for most travelers. The beds are a little stiff but there are worse places to lay your head. The bedroom with the ball lamps on the side table is very bright while the other bedroom is wonderfully dark. Temperature control is challenging since the only AC unit is in the dining area. Water temp fluctuates without adjusting the nozzle/valve, but that's probably building-wide. During our stay there was construction on our balcony so we woke up each morning to those sounds. We were instructed not to open the windows to avoid dust coming in. On the morning of checkout the next client came in at 7 AM. That was awkward. In summary, it's a nice place but this wouldn't be my first choice for the next visit to MTL.
Beautiful apartment, super clean, easy instructions. I really recommend this apartment!

This is a great spot in downtown Montreal! Close to all the downtown attractions, including nightlife and restaurants, etc. Issues included being a little dusty when we got there, as well as being a bit too far from the closest supermarket. What you see is what you get. Communication between guests and hosts was fantastic. Another problem was that while we were there, one of the neighbors had construction, which resulted in a lot of noise early in the morning, which disrupted our sleep. Overall, we had a great stay.
They were awesome! The place was amazing, the Sonder team were always super accessible and helpful :)
Clean, modern, central, convenient, quiet, safe.
Can't beat the location. Easy working with Sonder.
Great place! Clean, close to everything. Highly recommended!
Had an amazing stay! The space was spotless and had so many nice touches/features that made it feel like home
Un unbeatable location! Super easy access and a great atmosphere. I would definitely recommend the place. I'd definitely stay in the same apartment on my next visit.
The host cancelled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Nice place to stay! So comfortable!
Great location, clean, very beautiful, walkable to all locations. No AC in the bedrooms, but there are plug-in fans. One AC unit is available in the common area.
Great location and great price. Issues stem from check-in instructions not arriving promptly. Additionally, there were many flies in the apartment.
Overall, a good place, but parking is not free on weekends as mentioned.  Great space, clean overall, though we found some stains on the bedsheets. Overall, great space.

Tessa and her boyfriend were wonderful hosts. They helped us find our way around, provided us with some much needed coffee in the morning and were friendly and accommodating. The location was great, one stop from Le Plateau and four from Berri-UQAM. Would definitely stay here again! :) Thanks guys!

Tessa and her companion are very nice, despite the small misfortune due to a misunderstanding about the little ad,
They have a nice and perfectly clean apartment and if you are single their room is ideal.
Thank you for accepting to reimburse us for the second night.

I had a great stay here. Trevor and Tessa are a lovely couple and were a great help when finding my feet in the city. The apartment is in a fantastic location, close to restaurants and shops. I would definitely recommend this place to bagel lovers! :)

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay (3 nights) with Tessa and Trevor. Although we didn't get to see them too much, when we did they were both extremely friendly and always ready to help with directions or recommendations for places to eat at or stores to visit. Their apartment was clean and cute, and the neighborhood they live in is quiet and felt really safe to walk around late at night. Mile End is a great neighborhood - lots of interesting cafes, bakeries, two renowned bagel shops, vintage stores, bars, lots of bike rental stations and bike lanes. We would both definitely return in a heartbeat.
Tessa and Trevor were very friendly hosts. The bedroom was clean and comfortable. They would definitely stay there again!

Tessa and Trevor were both really nice hosts. They were friendly and happy to help whenever I had questions. The place has so much character and is in a great spot! It's so close to everything and Mile End is such a cool area. I would recommend staying here while you're in Montreal.

Tessa was an excellent host. The room and apartment were tastefully decorated and located in a perfect spot to explore Mile End and Plateau area. Everything was super easy and hassle-free. Thank you again, Tessa and Matt.
The reservation was cancelled the day before arrival. This is an automated message.
The reservation was cancelled the day before arrival. This is an automated message.

Tessa was patient when we came ill-prepared to find her pad. She and her boyfriend made us feel welcome and offered help navigating the city's hottest spots from the first day. The house was comfortable, quiet, clean, and in a great neighborhood. We hope to come back.
Tessa and Trevor were fantastic hosts. They were helpful, made us feel welcome, and provided us with linens and towels. I highly recommend them!

This room with its perfect location in lovely Mile End is highly recommendable. Both Tessa and her boyfriend are both friendly, helpful, and easygoing. I felt both welcome and at the same time like I had my own private space within the house. 

I really enjoyed my stay, and hope to come back again someday.
/Silas

I had a nice stay at Tessa's place! Tessa and Trevor are kind people who gave good recommendations.

The location is great, with lots of awesome restaurants and music venues in the neighborhood. It's also quite close to the park and easy access to other parts of Montreal.

The room has a comfortable chair and desk that's great for when you want to get some work done at home. And there's a laundry room with washer and dryer, which proved to be convenient.

The only issue was that it was quite cold (especially at night), and we weren't able to get heating. Tessa did provide extra blankets, but sadly didn't do much to keep me warm. I'm sure they'll get the heating fixed (as Montreal can get super cold), so shouldn't be an issue for others.

Great room in a great neighborhood, plus a cute cat. Tessa and Trevor were kind and accommodating. They helped us figure out the best places to go in Mile End, which was very appreciated. We have already recommended their apartment to our friends, and you should stay there too!

Tessa was an excellent host—her place is wonderfully decorated, comfortable enough for two, and in the best neighborhood I could ask for when visiting Montreal. Checking in was as smooth as could be. She left a super-helpful list of places to visit that perfectly suited my interests. Plus, her cat is adorable.

I stayed with Tessa and Trevor for three nights. They were very welcoming and easy going. They helped me plan my visit, giving me heaps of advice and directions. Mile End was great! The flat is in an awesome location and was very comfortable. Plus, the cat was very cute!
I would highly recommend the room.

We stayed at Tessas and Trevors apartment for 6 nights. The room was comfortable and the apartment was beautiful, nicely decorated. She/he definitely has an eye for visual details!! We mostly used the room for sleeping and it was more than sufficient for us. The location was perfect; the bus stop is right next to the apartment and it was easy to travel around Montreal. There were also some nice restaurants and shops, and Tessa gave us a helpful list of things nearby. Tessa gave us 100% of her help if we had any questions.

Tessa and her boyfriend were great hosts; the room was just what we needed for a getaway. It was private and in an amazing location! Thanks again Tessa and Trevor for your kindness - I would highly recommend them to friends!

Tessa and Trevor were welcoming and friendly. Their place was warm, clean, and inviting. They provided great recommendations on things to do in the Mile End area, which was left for us in the room so we could easily take it with us and explore the area. Their home was close to the bus stop and close to many great restaurants and small shops. The bed was comfy, and the room had a nice steady breeze, making our summer nights comfortable. We would definitely stay again and recommend!
Tessa was a nice host, she was kind and gave us a paper with some places of interest around the area. I don't have any objections, nice house, nice area, and nice city.

Tessa was an excellent host! Communication was incredibly easy so we didn't have to worry about anything upon arrival. Tessa was extremely understanding when my dog, in all her clumsiness, broke a lampshade, waving it off like it was no big deal (much appreciated!). 

Parking was a little annoying; there are a lot of restrictions, so if you have a car, make sure to read all the posted signs carefully! The area was super cute, Tessa's place was very centrally located and walkable to just about anywhere we wanted to go in Mile End.

Excellent stay in the trendy Montreal-style neighborhood.  Bus stop for downtown just outside, direct route. Bike paths throughout the neighborhood. Many sports facilities too. 
The apartment has 5 rooms and a nice balcony at the back.
In short: good experience and ideal for a stay in MTL!
The host cancelled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

This was my first time using Airbnb and it was a great first experience. Tessa and Trevor were excellent hosts! Communication was super easy and they even stayed up late to wait for us. They were welcoming and friendly from the moment we arrived; they even provided us with a list of all their recommendations in the area. The room and apartment were also exactly as pictured, Tessa really has a great eye for decorating. If you love animals, I would also recommend this place because they have an adorable and super friendly cat named Navy. As for the neighborhood, the Mile End area is really cool− it has a bunch of great restaurants and bars. Transportation was very convenient, as well. There is a bus that leaves from the corner and the Rosemont metro station is also super convenient and easy to get to. I will definitely be recommending this place to all of my friends! :)

My partner and I had a wonderful stay at Tessa's place! We were given a warm welcome upon our arrival and Navy the kitty was very lovely. It was a delightful space and awesome location! The area was very cool and Tessa had given us superb suggestions. Definitely a great experience.

We enjoyed our stay at Tessa and Trevor's flat! They are very welcoming. The flat is really charming, calm, and well-located. I recommend it for your trip to Montreal!

Ps. Tessa shared the best locations and good tips in Mile End, a great spot!

Great, friendly hosts with a well-maintained apartment and room. I arrived to a warm welcome, a clean and tidy room, and even a printed list of local recommendations. I would definitely stay here again!

Tessa and Trevor were great, always present if needed! The room was exactly as described, super clean and the house was amazing. Sadly my stay was just one night, but I warmly recommend this stay. Navy, the cat, was also super cute!!
My husband Randy had a wonderful stay in Montreal with Tessa.

I spent a weekend at Tessa's home with my girlfriend. We were within walking distance of everything that we wanted to see and she gave us great suggestions for restaurants and bars nearby. The room is exactly like the pictures and we enjoyed the company of her extremely friendly cat Navy. Parking in Montreal is confusing so make sure you read the signs to figure out where you are allowed to park.  We would definitely recommend staying here; we loved it!

Excellent Airbnb experience! The room was cozy and very pleasant. Tessa welcomed us and provided toiletries, towels, and a very helpful list of restaurants in the area. Mile End is a great location, and is convenient (15 min walk) to the metro. And the cat is very friendly!

Tessa was a fantastic host - very welcoming and accommodating. We appreciated the thoughtful touches in the room as well: a list of nearby restaurants, travel toiletries, etc. We'd be happy to stay with her again!
Tessa made me feel incredibly welcome. I would highly recommend this place to everyone; the neighborhood is amazing, with lots of great cafes and shops.

I LOVED staying with Tessa and Trevor in Montreal! Their place is in a great location, it's beautifully decorated, and completely clean, quiet, welcoming, and pleasant. The bed is super comfortable: an easy place to crash after a day in the city. Tessa also has lots of great neighborhood recommendations (thank you SO much for that!) and their cat is adorable. This was the perfect place for me to stay during my trip to Montreal!

They were also super accommodating when I was running late getting to their place when I first got to town--I was having navigation issues and some traffic holding me up, but they were really understanding about it. 

I would love to stay with them again! Thanks, Tessa!!!
Great value stay, amazing location and very kind and friendly hosts. A great first stay in Montreal.

I really enjoyed staying in Montreal. Tessa was a great host!

Thank you so much!
This was the perfect location! Exactly what we were looking for. Tessa was very accommodating! Thanks for everything!!

Tessa and Trev's place was lovely! They were very welcoming and made me feel at home right away. The location was beautiful and near so many nice places to eat, grocery stores, etc. There was a bus stop practically right outside. The room is beautifully decorated, but if you have a lot of luggage it might be a bit small (there is no closet). Tessa and Trev were great hosts, and were happy to chat or leave me to my own devices if I needed space. Would highly recommend!

It was a fantastic experience at Karen's house in Montreal. We felt right at home. Communication with Karen went very smoothly and effortlessly. She checked in before and during our stay via email to see if everything was okay and provided additional tips for our trip. Even beforehand, she asked what we would like to do and gave us suggestions on where to shop and go out, and prepared a list of how things worked and where everything could be found. The description of the house is absolutely realistic, and the surrounding area, Plateau Mont Royal, is the new trendy neighborhood for living and enjoying life in Montreal. We spent a very nice week there as a family with 4 adult children, walking a lot, buying croissants from the best baker in the city around the corner, and celebrating with the adult children at one of the most popular bars around the corner with Montreal friends. Although so centrally located, the house is absolutely quiet and no street noise can be heard. Upon arrival, there was beer and milk for coffee in the fridge and a bag of coffee for the espresso machine. We can only recommend Karen and her house wholeheartedly.

Our group of 3 adults and 3 children (aged 8-15) stayed for 5 nights. With the eclectic decor and fully equipped kitchen, we felt like we were staying at our friends' home. Karine offered helpful suggestions for the neighborhood and was quick to respond with more information when asked.

The grocery store is right around the corner. Some of the city's best coffee shops, restaurants, and shopping are all within walking distance. The metro was also close enough that we had no problem making multiple trips to and from each day, as we opted not to have a car for our trip. 

The home worked great for our family. Two rooms with single beds accommodated my children perfectly, and the master bedroom was spacious. All bedrooms had fans which we put to good use as the home does not have AC and we were staying through a heat wave. The backyard oasis was perfect for winding down after our day's activities, and our daughter loved her private backyard balcony and hammock. The home also had plenty of other fun diversions for the kids to play with. We very much enjoyed our stay. 

Thank you, Karine and family!

You will experience the true Airbnb life! Karine shares her family home, and it feels like you are warmly welcomed into her family! We especially enjoyed spending our evenings in the garden, and enjoying the temperatures that were hotter than usual this summer! The spaces are spacious and there is no feeling of being cramped.  The garden and house being very shaded, despite the heatwave, the temperature remained livable! The many fans available did their job! 
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking for six people, and the dishwasher is greatly appreciated :)
Thank you to Karine and her family for sharing their home with us!
What a great spot! Really welcoming and accommodating! Went above and beyond for us!
Great host, great space, great location.
Sebastian handled my friends and me very smoothly. Check-in and check-out were flexible. The place was great and even better than described. I would recommend booking this place to anyone.

Incredible experience. We had an amazing weekend with family. The location of the place is unbeatable. Sébastien welcomed us like we were at home and provided constant support throughout our stay. The places were clean and very comfortable. A big thank you to Sébastien for his hospitality.
Excellent experience. The host was very friendly and always responded to my emails promptly. They were very helpful.
5 stars. Perfect location. Clean, comfortable apartment. Very accommodating host. One of the best Montreal stays I've had

Super apartment fully equipped! Very well located in a lively and varied neighborhood. We appreciated the parking (paid) very close by, just next to the metro station. Sébastien is a very friendly host who was able to answer any question! We traveled as a family with two children aged 7 and 4, and we each had our own space. In all points recommended! Thank you again, Sébastien.
We had a very nice weekend at Sébastien's apartment. He made sure we had everything we needed. The apartment was exactly as described, and it is highly recommended!

Sébastien is available and flexible to optimize our stay as much as possible. His apartment, well-located for discovering Montreal, is spacious, new, and equipped with all the amenities for a pleasant stay. Our next trip will be at his place, that's for sure!

This was the best stay I've had so far on Airbnb. The apartment is located on one of the cutest and most accessible streets of Montreal, and the pictures are very accurate. The apartment is spacious, clean, and a great value! Sebastian was helpful and accommodating to my early arrival, and was very easy to get in touch with regarding our check-out. I will definitely book this Airbnb again and I highly recommend it to others!

We had an excellent week. Sebastian's apartment is ideally located for visiting Montreal. The subway and buses are nearby. The street and neighborhoods are very lively, and there's everything you need. The apartment is very well-equipped and we didn't miss anything. Sebastian was extremely available to answer our questions and incredibly responsive.

We spent a great night at the girls' apartment. The owner was very helpful and concerned about our comfort. He gave us a "small tour" of the apartment and provided us with clean sheets, linens, everything we needed. The place was well located, close to everything. It cost us $10 to take a cab from the old port. We would definitely go back. Thank you!

Very nice apartment well located. Sebastian was very available to answer our questions. The apartment is well equipped for cooking and nothing to say about cleanliness: top! 

In summary, excellent value for money for a Montreal property.

The apartment was great. We couldn't have asked for a better place at this price.  The location was perfect as it was walking distance from many iconic places.  Bars, parks, clubs, places to eat, and the metro were all easy to walk to.  Sebastién made check in and check out very easy for us. His hospitality was amazing and the apartment was very accommodating for our group. Montreal was beautiful and if we were to come back, our hope would be to stay at this apartment again. The place was comfortable, clean, and overall a relaxing place to stay for a visit to Montreal.

Sébastien's apartment is very well located, on a very nice street with all amenities nearby. 
It is also very well located to visit the center of Montreal.
The apartment is very spacious and comes with all the necessary comfort, including air conditioning, a very well-equipped kitchen with all the necessary utensils.
The apartment is very clean and tidy.
Sébastien has been very available and there was no need to ask him any questions as he thought of everything. 
I highly recommend Sébastien's apartment.
Thank you again for your hospitality.
This apartment was perfect! The location was great and the apartment itself was so beautiful. It easily fits 6 people. Sebastien was quick to answer. I would most definitely stay here again.

Sebastian started off strong. Throughout the booking and arrival phase, he communicated clearly and effectively. He was very helpful when we needed suggestions for parking. The unit was spotless and better than the photos. He even had a handy tour guide booklet printed out for guests. The location was prime for exploring downtown Montreal. It was just a 3-4 minute walk from the Metro.

Unfortunately, our visit was marred by a burglary. The back door appears to have been unlocked. We didn't use the door and were unaware of its existence until departing the residence. Sebastian is sure that it was left locked. We had left around 3 pm and returned around 3 am after attending Kanye West at the Bell Center and going out on the town. During the break-in, my personal laptop was stolen, and a closet door was destroyed. The police came and there was little they could do without the tracking software installed on my laptop. I believe Sebastian is a great host and has a great spot, but I was very unimpressed with his handling of the event. He had little to no concern about the loss of my possessions and even tried to charge us $400 for the damages to his closet. Airbnb customer service throughout this process was useless and made settling back home quite stressful. This experience has caused me to consider traditional lodging methods for future trips. Although, I think this was an unfortunate coincidence, it certainly dampened our trip.
The host cancelled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

My guest and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Herve's condo. Herve communicated well before our stay and was very accommodating with scheduling our arrival and departure times. He was also very responsive to any questions we sent him via text. Upon arrival, Herve provided a tour of the building, its amenities (gym, spa) and the condo itself. The condo is exactly as seen in the photos, new and clean, and felt welcoming. The location was also great - directly across from a large park, while close to the metro, which made it easy for us to explore Montreal.

I had a great stay at Herve's condo. I traveled with my 4-year-old. Herve's son (Jean) met us with the keys and gave us a tour. The location is perfect with Jarry Park just across the street. The condo is quite modern and extremely clean. There was even shampoo, conditioner, and soap laid out in the bathroom - just like in hotels. The shower stall was so lovely. Everything was beautiful; I can't emphasize it enough. Communication was easy. Herve was available by phone at all times if I needed anything. Thank you, Herve and Jean!

Everything was perfect, we loved our stay at Herve's condo. Herve was punctual for the meetings and he answered our questions quickly before our stay. The condo itself was amazing, brand new and spotless. I strongly recommend it to everyone.
Very nice apartment as per the photos. Very well located, near Parc Jary, close to metro stations and the iconic Marché Jean Talon. We will definitely return and Hervé is very friendly.

Herve's condo is beautiful. It's well decorated and very comfortable for anyone looking for a clean, private, and comfortable place to stay in Montreal. We absolutely loved the location; walking from Jean Talon Market back to the condo was so convenient. There are some great cafes nearby and good transit access. Herve was a great host, very accommodating to our schedule, providing us with maps of the area and helpful suggestions. Herve and his son Anthony were very friendly. I would definitely recommend staying at this spot!

Great, brand-new apartment in a fantastic location near Little Italy and Parc Jean Drapeau. The place was clean, modern, quiet, and pleasant. 

I would definitely return.

Anthony made my husband and I feel very welcome in his lovely home. It is well located and in a quiet neighborhood. The apartment was clean, nicely decorated, and stocked with everything we needed for our stay. Highly recommended!
Very pleasant place to stay and excellent and rapid communication with Anthony. Super clean and new apartment, very well-equipped and in a great location close to Jean Talon/Little Italy.
The host cancelled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Spacious, welcoming apartment that feels like home. Very comfortable bed, and a great place to relax in and/or make your home base while visiting Montreal. Clean, with anything you might need to cook - laundry, wifi, close to the metro and shops and very quiet.  

Natalie was a very accommodating host, easy to communicate with and available to answer questions and make sure everything we needed was there. Will definitely book again!
The host cancelled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

We stayed here for a month, and the place was great, just like in the pictures and even better. 

Nathalie is a great host, responsive and ready to help. 

5-star review with no doubts.

This was a great listing and an amazing place to stay. Sofia's place is clean, well decorated and just the right amount of space for 2-4 people. The space felt cozy and we loved it. We were only a bit disappointed that we found out at the last minute that there was no AC (as listed) but Sofia was very understanding and compensated us based on our experience. 

Sofia herself is a great host who is very attentive right from the first moment we wanted the place. She kept in touch by email and text and even checked in with us daily. The instructions she left were clear and she was available to help when we needed anything. The neighborhood was nice and quiet as well. 

I would definitely stay at this listing again!

Sofia's place was exactly as advertised. It was really clean and her directions were very clear. Sofia kept in contact with us to make sure everything was ok. Her restaurant recommendations were good too. I would definitely stay at Sofia's place again. I really liked her condo and the neighborhood. The building was very quiet and we enjoyed staying there. 

Thanks again for everything, Sofia!
The apartment is great, clean, modern, easy to find, and has all the amenities we needed.

We had a beautiful stay. The pictures accurately represented the apartment. Sofia was a delight to work with and made everything easy. The apartment is conveniently located near the highway and the metro. We will definitely try to stay here again when we are in town!
A perfect home. Extremely clean and very tranquil. We feel like we're at home. We will return if the dates are available. The contact with Sofia was easy.

The place was exactly as advertised. Just outside downtown Montreal and a quick drive into the heart of it. The owner was more than helpful, available to answer any questions we had throughout our entire trip. Would highly recommend staying here if you are looking for somewhere close to downtown without paying downtown prices.
Good
