Only minor drawbacks: the sofa was in poor condition and did not allow for another sleeping arrangement, the lack of decoration and investment in the apartment and the lack of dishes, barely enough for 4.
Very spacious and modern. Easy to access and close to everything. Highly recommend!
Jason was super nice to work with
Three good places and good communication with Mr. Jason
The host cancelled this reservation 46 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Staying at Sabrina's place in the Plateau neighborhood was the best experience I've ever had as my second time visiting Montreal because she was resourceful and helpful in suggesting to my mother and me trendy restaurants and places to see in Montreal, but most of all her apartment was clean and had everything I needed. I would strongly recommend others to stay at her place. Thank you Sabrina for everything.

Sabrina was a very nice woman who was extremely helpful. Her apartment was in a very safe neighborhood and was close to shops, restaurants. I was told I could choose a room. When we arrived, she had placed us in the least appealing room, which was the guest room.  I was more than happy to be there as we were right next to the bathroom and I would have felt very odd taking over her bedroom. She let us use her condiments, which was greatly appreciated. We cooked a lot and she was very respectful of giving us space that we were seeking. Overall, the price was awesome, the area was great, Sabrina was very cool, and so is her decor in her home! Ten times better than a hotel. Home away from home!

This is a tidy and nice place in downtown Montreal. The apartment is on a calm and quiet street. However, within 5 minutes of walking you can experience the French essence of Montreal, cafes, bistros, restaurants, and bars, etc. Sabrina is a great host, very friendly with a nice personality. I recommend staying at her place.

Sabrina is an AMAZING host! The apartment is clean and located in a great neighborhood (it's very close to downtown, Old Montreal, etc.). She was very helpful in providing us with information about the city, places we can go, etc. Overall, staying with Sabrina was hassle-free and super easy which allowed us to enjoy the beautiful city of Montreal!

Sabrina was such an excellent and warm host! She was very helpful in giving us details about places to go, to eat, etc., and she even left a map for us to use. Her place is really clean and beautiful. It's near Parc La Fontaine and the colorful and interesting stretch of Mont Royal. We really enjoyed our stay at her place and more than that, we really enjoyed meeting her! Thank you so much Sabrina! : )

The apartment is very comfortable. I have everything I need, even the condiments. Sabrina is a passionate and inspiring host. With an art history degree and human system invention degree, she has extensive knowledge of cultural differences which is very helpful for a new immigrant to Quebec. Thank you so much, Sabrina.

My stay at Sabrina's apartment was excellent. She is very welcoming and kind, she introduced me to the city and neighborhood a bit. I didn't know Montreal and Sabrina helped me a lot by walking with me on some streets and giving me important information! 

I recommend everyone to stay in her apartment, which is very clean and located on a quiet street.


Isabel Lima - BRAZIL

Sabrina is an incredible hostess! Her apartment is so lovely, really comfortable, super clean, and perfectly located in the best part of Montreal. Sabrina was incredibly friendly and helpful with suggesting wonderful things to do and places to go during our stay. She gave us a map with lots of highlighted spots of places to visit. We really enjoyed visiting with her and would love to come stay with her again! Thank you Sabrina for a wonderful Montreal experience!

Sabrina has a very pretty apartment. She takes good care of it, and the apartment was clean. She was very accommodating to us, giving us a big well-thought out list of everything we need to know and do. She sent out emails and reminders on how to get to the apartment, and gave us some helpful tips on places to eat and other things. She even provided us with a second clean pair of bed sheets and allowed us to use pans and spices to cook (as eating out can get quite expensive!). Everything was excellent, and I would definitely recommend anyone who stays in Montreal to stay with Sabrina!
The reservation was cancelled 36 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Sabrina's place is a super nice and friendly host. The apartment is very quiet and well-located.
Stylish apartment in a great location!  Perhaps the only downside was the smell of cigarette smoke that filtered into the apartment. Sabrina was friendly and made check-in/check-out easy.
Welcome super nice! Very beautiful apartment!

Hello,

During those four nights at Sabrina's, we truly felt like home. When she was there, we had the opportunity to chat and learn about a lot of things in Montreal. 
She helped us prepare for our year here and even invited us to go exercise with her!

Thank you, Sabrina,

Lauriane and Julien

Sabrina and her roommate are really nice.
The room is super comfortable, and the apartment has everything we need.
Great stay for us.

Super stay at Sabrina's!

The apartment is fantastic, the room is quite large and comfortable.
Sabrina was a very attentive host and thanks to her instructions I found the apartment really easily.
It is very well located and very accessible, a 15-minute walk from the metro and 5 minutes with bus 97 which passes every 10 minutes.
All shops nearby.

I recommend it!
This place is great! Perfect place to stay in Montreal. Thank you Sabrina!
Wonderful apartment - even better host!! Absolutely recommend!
My experience with Sabrina McFadden was awesome, I really enjoyed it. She is a great host.

I spent an entire week at Sabrina's home. It was a wonderful time in Montreal for me. The flat looks exactly like the photos, it is well connected to the city center. The neighborhood is amazing with all the beautiful staircases that you find almost everywhere. 

Sabrina was very kind and helpful, she answered all my important questions when she returned home in the evening, gave me some very valuable tips. On a rainy day, she even left me an umbrella! :) I am sure if I have the opportunity to return to Montreal, I will choose this apartment again :-) Thank you very much again, Sabrina! Cheers ;)

Sabrina's place in Montreal was cozy, comfortable, and in a great location. Sabrina is a warm and accommodating host, which was perfect for our 11pm arrival in Montreal! She provided us with clean linens, a lovely calm room to stay in, and plenty of space in her kitchen for our own food. The apartment was beautifully decorated, and there were no problems sharing the bathroom! Location-wise, it was just outside the main attractions of Montreal and very easy to get a Bixi or bus to wherever we needed to go. Lovely neighborhood, lovely stay, and lovely host!

Sabrina was an awesome host - accommodating, quick to respond, and very friendly. The apartment is lovely, the room is cozy, and the bed super comfy. The neighborhood is in a great location and fun - lots of breakfast places, cafes, parks, and close to Metro. Thanks for a relaxing weekend!!

The location of the apartment is very nice and the district is beautiful with small cafes. You can reach almost everywhere by metro which is a 15-minute walk away. The apartment is very cozy and the host is very friendly, we enjoyed our stay in Montreal.

Perfect stay! The room is clean and comfortable, the welcome is warm, Sabrina is adorable and available to answer your questions and give advice. 
Highly recommend! :)
Beautiful apartment with a nice host in a trendy neighborhood: close to perfect :) Sabrina was very welcoming, the room spacious and the bed comfortable even for a longer stay.

Sabrina was very helpful and she handled the check-in and check-out times very flexibly. Her apartment is a real treasure, we felt very cozy there. The area of the apartment is also very good and safe, and public transportation is good with buses and metros you can easily get to the main attractions. We really enjoyed our stay in Montreal and Sabrina's place contributed to that feeling.

The apartment was awesome! Great location with lots of restaurants, bars, supermarkets, and shopping stores, just a 5-minute walk from the metro station. Sabrina was very nice to us, I really recommend this place!

We had a great time at Sabrina's place! She welcomed us very warmly and made it easy for us to feel at home. Because Sabrina went on vacation, we had the whole apartment to ourselves. That was just so nice! =) Anyway, having Sabrina stay with us would have been fun too, that's for sure. 

We also liked: the great neighborhood (many cute cafes, restaurants, boutiques), the quiet building, the big comfy bed, easy access to bus/metro, being able to cook in the evening, the easy communication with Sabrina and Montreal in general! =)

Thanks for the great stay, Sabrina!

Cozy apartment, quiet and in a nice neighborhood, 10 minutes from the Mont Royal metro! Warm welcome, however it would be wise to invest in a duvet or good blanket for the guest room, as the bed's top is not enough, especially starting in October!!!

My stay in Montreal with Sabri couldn't have been better. His apartment is just as beautiful as the photos, if not more so. The Plateau neighborhood is one of the most charming and preferred in Montreal, with lots of trees and cute houses with staircases. I truly felt at home. Not only because the apartment had everything I needed, but also because Sabrina is a wonderful person and an excellent host. She helped me with some personal matters, always with so much joy and affection. Plus, she speaks Spanish perfectly. I would have liked to stay longer, honestly.

The apartment was awesome! Great location with lots of restaurants, bars, supermarkets, and shopping stores, just a 5-minute walk from the metro station. Sabrina was very nice to me, I really recommend this place!

Sabrina's home is just lovely and the perfect place to stay in Montreal. As she had to leave for the first two weeks of my stay, I did not get to see her the whole time, however when she was there she was really nice and made me feel very welcome. Her place became nearly a second home. The pictures are true, it is just so nice as they show it. Her place is in the Plateau, the best place to be when you like being close to restaurants, coffee shops, and alternative stores. Sabrina explained me where to buy organic food and where to go out! I absolutely enjoyed my stay in Montreal. My highlight was definitely when she showed me how to make homemade granola and a delicious lentil soup. I am looking forward to seeing her again and to share a Swiss meal. I can only recommend staying with her, and I will certainly go back. 

Thank you Sabrina!

Sabrina was very accommodating upon our late arrival. The apartment and room were very comfortable and clean. She greeted us upon arrival, and then was not in the apartment for the remainder of our stay. Location was excellent.

Sabrina is a super nice and sweet person! I absolutely enjoyed staying at her house. The house is well decorated and clean and I felt very comfortable every time I came home. :) When I come back to Montreal, I would love to stay here again ;)

About the location of the house, I found it very convenient to go anywhere. It's quite close to the center of the city or anywhere. However, it's probably a good idea to have the bus schedule with you all the time so that you wouldn't need to walk for 20 mins to the metro (especially in the winter :P) Besides that, there are lots of stores around to get anything so you wouldn't have any problems! Overall, I absolutely loved it! Thank you Sabrina <3
Everything was perfect! Thank you, Sabrina! :)
Sabrina is very welcoming and generous to me. There was space for me already ready in the pantry and the fridge, and she offered to take what I needed to cook. She's a real storm host!

Our stay with Sabrina was very pleasant. She is always helpful, welcoming and attentive. 
The apartment is true to the photos and close to all amenities. The neighborhood is quiet and residential. Mount Royal Avenue offers a variety of activities (bars, restaurants). 
We recommend it.

Sabrina's apartment was even better than we'd expected - so sunny, so comfortable, and so beautiful and quirky at the same time! We loved spending the weekend in Montreal having Sabrina's apt as our home base. The location was great, near many fun bars, restaurants, and the bus that takes you straight to the top of Mount Royal. She was also very friendly and accommodating. I'd recommend her place to anybody!

Sabrina was a wonderful host! The flat was nice and cozy. When I arrived, she showed me the way to my room and explained where everything was. Sabrina advised me on where to go and what to do in the city. We didn't have much time to spend together, but whenever we had an opportunity, we had a little chat - she was happy to speak with me in French, which I really enjoyed!
Sabrina was really friendly and even gave us a list of her favorite restaurants, cafes, and bars, etc.

Great location in The Plateau... convenient bus and metro station right off the main street, just a minute away. 

The exterior of the building is rundown, but the surroundings are charming, and the interior of the unit had a nice style.

Sabrina is an excellent host, so friendly and respectful! The apartment has a great location in The Plateau and there are very good connections by bus and Metro. There are many stores, bars, and parks around. I absolutely enjoyed staying at this place and I'd recommend it without a doubt!

Do you want to spend some good time in Montreal? Sabrina's apartment is the place you need! Spacious, sunny, well-located in the Plateau neighborhood, this accommodation is a gem where I had a lot of pleasure enjoying my stay in this beautiful city. 

Sabrina was an amazing host (: . You will feel like home!
Sabrina is a wonderful host who ensures your stay is pleasant in every way. The apartment is even better than the photos; I highly recommend it.

Our first experience with Airbnb was a complete success. The apartment, well-located, is pleasant, clean, well-arranged and indeed sunny. As for our host, we greatly appreciated their hospitality, discretion and dynamism. Highly recommended address.

Visited Montreal for the first time, and my friends and I spent the weekend at Sabrina's quaint and cozy apartment. The space was very neatly organized and kept, and located in a lovely part of the neighborhood. The location was very accessible to the city's core. The apartment is as exactly displayed through the posted pictures. Although Sabrina was not around during my stay, she made sure to leave instructions, and kept in contact with me throughout my time there. I also appreciated the list of places Sabrina suggested to visit, and activities that could be done throughout the weekend. Thank you again for your hospitality!

Sabrina was on vacation when we visited and was still able to make us feel comfortable and welcome. Little notes were left for us with info on Montreal and the different places she recommended us to go and see. We loved the location too; it was close to main bus routes, parks, and in an older neighborhood in Montreal (the architecture was beautiful!).  We had a chance to meet Sabrina as we were leaving and she was friendly, kind, and down-to-earth. We loved our stay and already miss Montreal!

Sabrina was an excellent host. We stayed with her for three days. Her place is in a nice location in the Plateau. Sabrina showed us where to go and what to see. I would recommend staying at her place if you are visiting Montreal.

My wife and I stayed with Sanrina for two nights. It was an excellent stay with nice accommodations that are close to several fun areas. The apartment itself is very nice and clean. Sabrina is a really nice host who will make you feel comfortable

Sabrina was very friendly and easy to talk to. She offered some good ideas and materials for sightseeing. The apartment is conveniently located near bus and metro stations, as well as a nearby supermarket.
Very warm welcome, pleasant stay and interesting exchanges with our host. Apartment located in a quiet neighborhood well served by public transportation.

Sabrina's place was exactly as it is pictured, and what I expected. She was very accommodating for my check-in and check-out time, making it so easy for me as a traveler. The neighborhood is great, with lots of green space, coffee shops, and restaurants recommended by Anthony Bourdain himself. The only thing that could make Sabrina's place better were if it were closer to the subway, but there is a bus that goes by often enough to take you there.

My friends and I stayed at Sabrina's place when we were in Montreal for Osheaga, and it was great!!! She was so helpful leading up to our trip. Her place was exactly like the pictures and we all had a great time!

The welcome was warm and friendly. Sabrina was charming.
The apartment matched the photos. However, the neighborhood and building are a bit different from what we might have imagined. It is quiet and close to daily necessities. Everything went very well.
Thank you again, Sabrina, for your kindness.

Sabrina contacted me beforehand to ensure she would be there upon our arrival. Upon our arrival, she had everything ready for us and didn't leave until she was satisfied we had everything we needed. She had maps, sticky notes, tour guides, a key, tea, granola, spices, a laundry machine, you name it, she had it covered.  She even contacted me on day two to make sure we were all set. The location is two blocks from Mount Royal. Wonderful boutiques, groceries, cafes, and restaurants. Our only issue was the walk to the metro. We tried the bus, but there wasn't always one. For avid walkers, the 20-minute walk to and fro would not be an issue. I resorted to parking on the street near the metro then walked. Not a big deal.

Sabrina provided excellent hospitality. 

The apartment was comfortable for 4 people. 

The neighborhood was quiet, a bit removed from the city center, accessible by bus and further away from the metro (20 minutes). The building and street did not match our expectations (3rd floor of an apartment building) as we imagined a typical entrance on Mont-Royal plateau with direct access via stairs from the street.

Sabrina was a very nice host.

We had a few contacts before my arrival in Montreal. She contacted me to inform me where to find the keys for the apartment in case she wasn't there at the time of my arrival. As it turned out, she was there to meet me and thank God for that, because on my own I would not have been able to carry my 23 kg bag up three floors. The place was neat and tidy, the neighborhood was okay, and Sabrina was a very warm and friendly person.

The location of the apartment was a few metro stops from the city of Montreal.

My five-day stay there was comfortable and pleasant. Thank you, Sabrina, for all your help. 

Stephanie - Sydney, Australia

Sabrina was a very laid-back and friendly host and it was a pleasure to stay at her place. She was flexible about check-in and check-out times and made our stay even better by providing recommendations of places to eat and visit in her area. The neighborhood was very vibrant, with shops, restaurants, cafes, a big park, and a fabulous bakery all within a 10-minute walk. Her place is close to bus routes and we found it to be a great home base for our stay in Montreal. The photos and description on her Airbnb post are accurate, and her place is very clean, stylish, and welcoming. Thanks for a nice experience, Sabrina!

When we arrived, Sabrina gave us a tour of her apartment and then sat down to map out all the metro, bus stations, recommended restaurants, etc. After that, she went on her way and we didn't see her the rest of our trip. The apartment itself was in a quiet neighborhood in the Plateau and we were two blocks from small shops and food places. Overall, her place was nice. Note: there is no A/C so it was nice that she had plug-in fans in each room. The only downside was the guest bedroom bed was not very comfortable (but if you like firm mattresses, you will be okay) and the kitchen had ants (which is due to the time of year).

Sabrina is an excellent host! She contacted me a couple of days before my arrival to make sure I could get in. She and her boyfriend even helped me carry my bags up the stairs. She was very friendly and immediately gave me a map and some tips for Montreal. The apartment is bright, clean, and charming. The room is large with lots of storage space.  Also, there's a nice bathroom. The apartment was in a quiet neighborhood but close to the city center. There are many bars and restaurants on Mont Royal Street nearby. Highly recommended!
She is friendly and warm. Her house is very nice, and I like it there! It's easy to get a meal around here too!

Excellent hostess... It is very easy to reach the apartment which is located in a very interesting neighborhood with many market options, restaurants and few stations of downtown Montreal. Sabrina and her boyfriend gave us lots of tips about the city that we were able to fully utilize. Regards

Sabrina's place is really nice. It is located around the Plateau area, making it very convenient to get around. 
Sabrina is super friendly and very helpful in making me feel at home.
The host cancelled this reservation 148 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

The apartment was just about as advertised, save for a few things. Free parking was listed, but there was no parking to be found. We ended up getting a ticket the first day. We eventually found a lot in the city (15 minutes away by Uber) to leave the car for the week, but that was a hassle checking on it all the time. Also, while there is a washer and dryer, it's located in the basement of the apartment for use by all tenants, which costs money, so timing is key. We ended up walking to a laundromat a few blocks away and using that instead. Apart from that, the stay was pleasant and the apartment was comfortable. Several easy restaurant options were nearby.
We felt very welcome during our stay with Sabrina. The apartment is in a beautiful neighborhood and the location made it easy to explore Montreal.

Sabrina was an amazing host. The apartment is beautiful, and just around the corner of Rue du Mont-Royal, which is home to a plethora of shops and restaurants - meaning if you choose to stay here, you have plenty of options for food and shopping. Each morning I went for a walk down the beautiful street and stopped at some coffee shops on the way. It's also just a few minutes walk to the Metro, which is great if you'd like to explore the rest of Montreal. Or you can hop on a Bixi bike close to the apartment and ride downtown. But the best part of the apartment is how close it is to (what I believe to be) the best poutine spot in Montreal - La Banquise. The location is perfect for both young people looking to have an exciting night out and families alike. Sabrina's apartment was clean, fresh, and easy to access. Overall very pleased with my experience. Thank you, Sabrina!

Sabrina provided a welcoming stay in Montreal. Her apartment is cozy and she made sure that I felt at home, although I only saw her a couple of times. The neighborhood has great access to public transportation, but is also walkable. Great restaurants and pubs are a short distance away. A great place to stay and you can't beat the price!

Best place to stay when you're in Montreal! Very nice neighborhood, you're really fast in downtown, good restaurants around. And the most important thing: Sabrina is very helpful and such a nice person! When you have time: just join her and visit Montreal!
Beautiful apartment, great location and great value! Highly recommended!
Great host, location, and value! Highly recommended!
To recommend

It was a really good experience at Sabrina's place, she was so kind and open to my comments and to talk with me about anything, she was always looking after me if I needed something else. 
Great communication in English and if you know Spanish she will be glad to practice with you.
There are several bus routes that can take you wherever you want, and they all connect with the metro system using the same boarding card.

Sabrina was so great. She had these little maps and cool places to go check out in the city. I stayed here while looking for a more permanent place to live and she was incredibly helpful! She even translated my resume for me as my French is a little weak. Anyway, I would definitely recommend it!

Sabrina was great! The check-in process was super easy, she was very accommodating with my check-in time. The room was very nice and spacious. Her place is close to a lot of major bus routes which made transportation very easy. She also had lots of suggestions for places to go and experience. Overall, it was a great stay.

Sabrina is beyond lovely and her home is too! She was very flexible for my late check-in/late check-out. The home was clean, quiet and beautiful with lots of natural light (the apartment building does not have an elevator). It's located in a very nice area close to bus routes a block or two away in every direction, a convenience store on the corner, a handful of restaurants very nearby, as well as Mont-Royal Ave a block away which has tons of shops, cafes, restaurants, grocery stores, bars, pharmacies, a metro station and access to the top of Mont-Royal Park further down. She provides the essentials, water/towels, space in the hallway closet, space in the cupboard/fridge in the kitchen, wifi access, ability to adjust the temperature of the room and a washing machine for laundry if needed (hang dry only though). Communication was easy and I appreciated the help/suggestions when I had questions but also the privacy I was given at other times. I would 150% stay here again and highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to stay in a nice neighborhood outside of the city but still with access to many things to do! Thank you again Sabrina!
Really nice place!
The host cancelled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 71 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Very nice place, charming and comfortable. I had a very good stay. The place is also stocked with everything you might need.

Sabrina's place is very clean and comfy, the location is very close to downtown and within walking distance of public transportation. There are many shops and restaurants around the corner that I recommend exploring. I stayed during wintertime and enjoyed very much the comfortable environment that both the host and the city offered. I would definitely be coming back during summer time!

Laurence was away during my stay. Before leaving, she reached out to me and left me very detailed instructions on how everything worked. I did not need to reach out to her at all during my stay. The apartment was clean and welcoming. It felt homey. I could feel the personality of the host in the space she had created. The neighborhood is safe and beautiful. Coffee shops, restaurants, and grocery stores are all within walking distance. There is a frequent bus that brings you directly to the metro. All in all, great experience. Thank you Laurence.
Laurence's place was so cozy! A great sushi place right around the corner, and very convenient to the bus/metro.

The apartment is very well located and communication with Laurence went very smoothly. 

However, a minor drawback regarding cleanliness: it was dusty (I was very allergic) and the bedding hadn't been changed before our arrival.
Clean, well-situated, overall very good.
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.

The place was clean, spacious, comfy bed, Netflix, Wifi. Quiet area. I totally loved my stay at Laurence's place and recommend it to anyone single or a couple that wants to visit Montreal, don't want to sleep downtown but is still close by with bus and Metro
Laurence's place was very cozy and welcoming.  Great living space and a big, comfortable bed. The kitchen is very cute and unique. A great way to spend our getaway
Translation: Truly well!
Translation: Truly surprised on the whole line. I recommend it to everyone. Exceptional quality for an exceptional price.
Great place to stay, the AC was amazing.
Good space. Close to the bus station. Stylish.
Pleasant neighborhood. Impeccable apartment.

Laurence's apartment is just gorgeous and in an incredibly convenient and central spot in Montreal! The street is beautifully ivy covered and quiet (with balconies on the front and back!) but an easy walk or bus ride away from so many amazing neighborhoods! Loved the cozy vintage style of the apartment, super comfy bed and massive kitchen! Would love to stay again thanks Laurence!!
Wonderful space and very clean!

This place is great! There are several good places to eat nearby, a Tunisian place a block away and the best vegan pastries ever (and I'm not vegan) at Cafe dei campi on Rosemont. The metro/bus system is very easy to get around even though the place is a little far from most of the touristy stuff. The bathroom was clean and towels/toilet paper/etc were provided. Washer/dryer in unit, which was nice when we spent all of the first day outside in the rain.
Great place for a couple to stay - Montreal is a lovely city, would come back again
The host cancelled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Raed's flat is perfect for a stay in Montreal (I spent 1 week there). Very clean, all the equipment required, big bath + shower, very central location. There's also a nice shared terrace on the roof. I also rented a bicycle and it was safe to park it there. 

When I didn't meet Raed during my trip as he was abroad, he was very welcoming and ready to provide help and tips when needed. I can then strongly recommend Raed's place.

The apartment is located in a fantastic area, two seconds from the Metro station, walkable to the plateau and downtown. A Bixi bike stop is right beside the Metro as well.

I was extended for work and there were literally no hotel rooms that met my work cost guidelines. Raed's apartment was cheaper and infinitely better than the room I was staying in and was closer to the metro too.

Raed made check-in a breeze and worked with me when my plans changed for checkout. He was available via text and phone and helped me all the way through.

Next time I'm in Montreal, this will be my first choice of accommodation.
Fantastic accommodation! It is located in the heart of the Spectacles district, very secure and bright. The host Raed was very easy to contact, helpful and attentive. A gem.
The apartment is in a fantastic location and Raed was a very accommodating host. Fantastic place to stay.

This is a great apartment and Raed is a very nice and accommodating host. However, I had a couple of issues with this trip. This is nothing against Raed or his place. Both the apartment and the host are great. Just a few logistical, subjective-comfort, and communication related things. 

When asking Raed about potential noise in the apartment, before I booked, he said "this is all very subjective... it should be fine." When I got to the apartment, there was major construction (which begins around (8-9AM) surrounding the apartment (the apartment is on a right angle on a major intersection near Place de Arts) and the music from nearby festivals (very loud) begins in the afternoon and ends late at night around 11PM-12AM. 

I was aware of how close the festivals were, but based on Raed's comment, I figured it would be relatively quiet and didn't anticipate such loud music and construction. I was a bit annoyed when I got to the apartment and for the first few days, I was bombarded with construction early in the morning and then blaring music for most of the day. This may have been miscommunication, or maybe it is a new issue, but I felt somewhat misled. Now this might not bother anyone else, which is fine. But I did ask about the noise level before I booked. And yet, the experience I had wound up contradicting what I had been told by the host. So make sure you ask specific questions if you have specific concerns. And if you are looking for quiet during the day — good luck!

There was also some initial confusion when trying to book the apartment because the dates that were listed as available were not actually all available. In fact, I had to change my reservation from June 12-26 to June 12-20 because Raed had his own plans with the apartment from the 20th onward but this was not reflected on AirBnB and it wasn’t until after I booked my dates that I found out the the apartment wouldn’t be available after the 20th. This lack of clarity in communication was pretty inconvenient for me. Plus, I had to wait to hear back from and constantly inquire with Raed when trying to find out the actual available dates to see if the apartment was going to be available or not. Even after I booked, the dates listed as available remained inaccurate. If I didn't keep contacting him, I'm not sure how things would have turned out. This put a some stress on my travel plans, which were admittedly very last minute. I realize Raed was probably very busy, but it's always the little, logistical things that matter.

Despite these relatively minor issues, I must state that Raed was very accommodating and responsive during my actual trip, very friendly, and in the end - he was very considerate by allowing me to check out a few days early.

Great apartment. Great host.

The location is ideal, right on Place des Arts, and the apartment itself is very enjoyable to live in.  Above all, Raed is an extremely kind and attentive host. Overall, I highly recommend both the apartment and its host. Definitely my go-to place for future trips to Montreal.
Great place. Amazing location, very close to everything. The common area is large and comfortable. There is a lot of natural light which I liked. Raed was nice and responsive in communication.
Raed is helpful, friendly, and patient. Although my stay was somewhat brief, the house was super clean and ready for me.

The apartment is as appears in the pictures. Clean, cozy, and with a pleasant ambience and all basic facilities such as towels, kettle, toaster, iron, etc. There's a coffee place downstairs, the metro right opposite, a grocery store 5 minutes away, and within easy walking distance to the heart of downtown Montreal and McGill University. The hosting service was awesome. We were granted early check-in and easy access into the building which was great after our 17 hour journey. I would definitely recommend it to friends and will look for it on my next visit.

It is a wonderful apartment. I really enjoyed it a lot. It is very well-located and everything you need is nearby. I would choose it again if I return to Montreal someday. 
 
 Eric

This was a beautiful stay, much appreciated. Raed and Hidaya were accommodating in every way, kind, generous, and flexible. The home was immaculate, better than a 5-Star Hilton. Its proximity to the Hyatt and downtown area, transit, restaurants, everything was ideal. There wasn't a single thing that could be improved upon. Special thanks to Raed and Hidaya for being such great people.
I love this place. Perfect spot downtown Montreal, close to everything and I'd love to stay here again in August when I go. Love it.
I would recommend this for travelers who like to be in the heart of the action in town. Easy access to major tourist attractions.

The location is phenomenal. You could honestly park your car and toss your transportation passes. This place is close to everything. The host was mostly responsive. 

Only issue I had was not having access to the rooftop for the entire 7 days I stayed. The nice rooftop is included in the description for this place, so that was a major selling point for me to book the space, making it simply disappointing that I didn’t have access. The host was not able to provide an answer on how to get access to the rooftop. Finally, I booked the entire apartment, and it was listed as full apartment access. The room you actually get is the smaller room with the bed that looks more slim and less comfortable. I had a good rest in the room I slept in, but I assumed that having the apartment to myself would allow me to sleep in the nicer room that is actually pictured on the website. Not sure why it is pictured if it is not available to potential guests. 

Outside of those things, Raed was very quick to respond and good to work with.  

I would return to this Airbnb, unless a place with proper rooftop access is available. 

Cheers
Great setup, nice place.
Well-located apartment ideal for a first stay in Montreal.

I very much enjoyed my return to Montreal. Hidaya and Raed's place is very lovely, with great lighting in a great location as you're close to downtown, the Plateau, Old Montreal or wherever else you want to go on the island. I would definitely stay again. Thank you!
Very clean and comfortable.
Very comfortable, and professional, very clean and homey. Thank you for your hospitality.
We had an excellent stay at William's place. He did everything to make us welcome and his apartment was the nicest we have ever stayed in.

Very well located apartment, well equipped and very convivial. The owner is very available and attentive to the needs of tenants. We particularly appreciated the owner's attention to everyday things such as milk and cream for coffee, K-cups for the Keurig, orange juice, and muffins.
Everything was perfect for us. William was very accommodating and we really appreciated it.

Perfect place to stay - very clean, spacious, and modern. It's also newly renovated so everything is very new. Right near the metro station and a free private parking spot is available if you need it. It was very relaxing. Communication with William and Susan was great. I would receive a reply within minutes whenever I needed to know something. When I arrived, William came out to help me find his parking spot and offered to help me with my things. I would definitely stay here again.
A wonderful place to stay. Very clean and a fairly convenient location.

Clean, comfortable, quiet and very easy to access. Our hosts ensure our comfort and satisfaction. 
Highly recommend!
Don't hesitate, it's hard to find something better! 😊

This place is awesome! It's very clean and spacious. The parking spot was very helpful. William is an excellent host, very easy to communicate with and message. I will definitely be back! Highly recommend.

Sue and Williams' place is extremely clean and everything is new. They have a lot of appliances for everyone's needs. They welcomed us with muffins, water, juice boxes and coffee (Keurig machine) and just doing little things like putting up our wiper blades so they don't freeze overnight. You will not be disappointed if you book with them :)

Anyone staying in Montreal would be lucky to have Sue & Will as their hosts. It is obvious that Susan takes this seriously and wants to make sure that you have the best trip possible. This was my first Airbnb and it was 10x better than any hotel and at a great rate. The apt was immaculate; she had it decorated for the holidays and had snacks I love, (toaster strudels) in the freezer. The metro is so close.  Can't say enough of what good hosts they were,(Will even brushed our car off for us) thanks guys!
The accommodation meets the descriptions. Superb location, comfortable and very secure. I highly recommend it without hesitation!
William and Sue are exceptional hosts. The accommodation is completely renovated with the utmost care. Fantastic within a 2-minute walk of the metro station.
It's my second visit to William and it certainly won't be the last! Highly recommend.

If you stay at William and Susan's place, you'll be extremely satisfied! The apartment was super clean, beautiful, welcoming, and safe. They pay attention to all the details, provide everything needed for a comfortable stay, and go far beyond what could be expected as hosts. I highly recommend this apartment!

Williams and Sue's place was fantastic! It's clean, modern, quiet and central. We were able to park our car at the apartment so we used Uber and the Metro which was a two-minute walk from the apartment. We were able to walk to the Olympic Park and biodome and took the Metro to the Montreal Canadiens game which saved us on car parking. Sue was very responsive to our message and made us feel very welcome! We would definitely recommend their apartment and would love to stay again! Thank you for making our stay so pleasant, Hannah and Dan.
Excellent apartment!

We had excellent communication from William and Susan right from the start! Even before we booked with them, they responded to our messages very promptly. They offered us a lot of extra help when we first arrived, they let us park our car earlier on the day we arrived as well, and we received a warm goodbye when we left the next day. The apartment is beautiful, homey, very clean, and we walked into a lot of extras that we were not expecting… Food and drinks in the fridge, food in the freezer, complementary goodies on the dining room table with a welcoming note from William and Susan... and more. All-in-all, we had a wonderful stay and are looking forward to staying in this apartment again!

Two minutes from the Pie-IX metro station and ten minutes from the magnificent Botanical Garden, with the biodome and insectarium... It's perfect! Several restaurants are nearby, and if you want to enjoy the calm and comfort of the apartment, delivery is possible! We really enjoyed the Indian restaurant right next door. A huge thank you to our hosts who were attentive. William wrote to me to check that our stay was going well and was available, although we didn't cross paths. If we have to return to the area, L'Idéal will be on our list!

Clean and comfortable apartment. 

Small touches are greatly appreciated.

Owners are very available.

Easy and free parking.

The ideal was super during my short stay in Montreal! The environment is very calm, just a few minutes from everything necessary and about ten minutes from downtown. Communication with William is excellent if there are any questions. 

I recommend this accommodation to everyone visiting Montreal!

The space and location are perfect. It was nice to have the biodome, stadium, and Metro all within a quick walking distance from us when my group stayed over. The place itself is clean and nicely decorated. The hosts are always quick to respond, and very friendly. They provide complimentary treats as well! All in all we had a positive stay, and I would definitely recommend this place to others!

Pleasant apartment to live in and well equipped. William and Susan are super attentive to ensure everything goes smoothly and always have nice little attentions. The apartment is very clean and it's a good time to live there during a stay. The neighborhood is nice and the proximity of the metro makes Montreal center easily accessible. For shopping, there's Super C and especially Maisonneuve market where you can find everything of good quality.
In short: 5-star recommendation without hesitation.
Excellent location! Friendly owners!
Excellent Airbnb host, everything is adequate!! Highly recommended...
Couldn't have been better. Great location, communication was fast, the place is very nice, and parking spot is an excellent bonus. I'd definitely stay here again.

The place is very clean, well-equipped, and organized. The host is very friendly and responsive in communication; ensuring we feel comfortable and welcome. We like the electronic key lock so we don't have to carry a key. Also, it has on-site parking which is very convenient. It is about a 15-minute drive to downtown which is easy and quick. We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend this place to others!

Excellent welcome! William was very accommodating regarding our arrival time. The refrigerator was well stocked with small treats that were greatly appreciated. The bed is comfortable. The kitchen is well equipped. Everything is clean and tidy. The Wi-Fi connection is effective. The couch is clean and comfortable. The entry code instead of the traditional key is really functional. Access to the subway in five minutes. Very beautiful flower-lined streets to walk down to reach Ontario Street.
Excellent place. Very clean. Well kept. Close to transportation. Excellent hosts.

The place was nice and clean. The setup was comfy and made me feel like home (and much better). Sue wrote many tips and notes to help us get familiar with the utilities, and she also left treats (cookies and muffins) for us. They replied to our messages very promptly and accommodated our last-minute change generously. The location is away from downtown area, but only a 5-minute walk to the metro (subway), which makes transportation convenient. Highly recommended.
This is a wonderful location and a really nice apartment! I am really excited to return to Montreal again soon. Everything you need is in the apartment and it looks amazing!

My wife and 13-year-old son drove from Connecticut to Montreal for the busiest weekend of the year: the Grand Prix du Montreal (F1). Sue and William were absolutely phenomenal hosts and made us feel at home. Blueberry muffins on the counter, a fully stocked refrigerator, air conditioning, and very attentive to all of our many questions. The Metro was an easy walk from the condo and there was parking for our car in the driveway. I travel frequently, but will stay with Sue again when next back in Montreal. What a pleasure!

We stayed for four nights in William and Susan's upstairs apartment. Their place is a delightful little gem! Plenty of space and privacy for three of us. The entire apartment was spotless, nicely furnished and everything in it was very good quality, which we appreciated because it felt like home. 

Susan greeted us when we arrived and was accessible by text if we needed anything. There were muffins, cookies and a homemade baguette waiting for us when we arrived and the kitchen was fully stocked. The neighborhood was quiet and very close to the Jardin Botanique where we were working. 

We wouldn't hesitate to book again and highly recommend this perfect apartment to anyone staying in Montreal.
We received excellent hospitality, with a great deal of attention from our hotel staff. I highly recommend it.
Very clean and well maintained. They were quick to respond to any questions we had. Would definitely recommend this place.

This is an exceptional property. It offers excellent value and is just so inviting! This was our first Airbnb experience, and I would not hesitate to do this again! We received a friendly greeting from Sue when we arrived. There was a designated parking space which is a huge deal if you are at all familiar with Montreal. We were so excited noticing all the special touches when we arrived. Everything is very neat and professional. There are little typed notices for how to work things, the wifi code, and the lovely homemade snacks on the table (which were awesome). The unit is immaculate. I cannot stress that enough. It is truly immaculate. Everything has been recently upgraded. The linens are wonderful and soft. William and Sue have thought of everything! There are condiments, coffee and emergency food supplies, a hair dryer, a sewing kit, a first aid kit - I mean, really, they have thought of everything. I would not hesitate to return to L'Ideal, and I would not hesitate to recommend it. My only disappointment was that we were only able to stay for two nights. I easily could have lived there!
Our stay was great. The apartment was well-stocked and the hosts were very gracious and hospitable. We would not hesitate to stay with them again or recommend them to a friend.

We stayed at this apartment during Comic Con and while driving into Downtown Montreal, it was only a 2-minute walk to the subway. The apartment was incredibly clean and well-stocked with everything we could have needed. The area was quiet and within walking distance of the Biodome/Botanical Gardens. We appreciated all the little touches. Sue and William were available to answer any questions we might have had, but were not intrusive. We would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone.

A great apartment for a stay in Montreal, it's just a few minutes walk from the metro station. The house is well equipped with everything you need to enjoy your stay. The hosts were very nice and friendly and even left us sweet homemade treats and a freezer with breakfast food. The house is super clean and comfortable, modernly decorated. We will definitely stay there in the future. 

Thanks for everything! 
We loved our stay!
Beautiful apartment very close to the metro station. Clean, bright, quiet. William and Sue are very friendly and helpful, rating 10+

Safe, cute, clean place close to the metro and botanical gardens. William and Sue obviously care about the apartment -- it was well-decorated and meticulously clean. Great communication. Full size fridge in nice kitchenette. Homemade cookies and muffins as well. Quality linens. I felt quite spoiled.

Well-equipped apartment, very clean, very comfortable, located approximately 200 meters from the metro station with a parking space for your car. We were very well received by Suzanne and small muffins and cookies had been prepared for our breakfast. Tea, coffee and other food items available in the fridge and freezer. The accommodation has air conditioning and a small balcony. William is adorable, very considerate. In short, a very good experience for us (couple + 14-year-old teenager). Thank you William! Corinne M.
The apartment looks even better in person! It was very clean and our host was very accommodating to our needs. I will surely come back here if I return to the city.
The ideal Airbnb experience was provided by William and Susan, who gave us everything we needed to feel comfortable and at home.

What a fantastic apartment! Beautifully set out and perfect for a family of four. It was a short metro ride from the center/tourist areas and in a quiet residential area near the Olympic Park. The boys loved the freshly baked muffins and cookies, and they didn't last long. Would definitely recommend this as a place to stay in Montreal.
I recommend the location near the subway or bus stop. It is modern, faithful to the photos, and very clean. The owners are warm and welcoming.

A superb apartment, close to the botanical garden, the metro, we discovered Montreal as a family with great pleasure. William is attentive to ensure that we don't miss anything. We highly recommend this place without hesitation!
Excellent location, a 2-minute walk from the metro and Olympic Stadium. Friendly and personalized welcome, everything is well thought out and provided. Clean, quiet and cozy. I highly recommend it.

Best Airbnb experience ever! William and Sue clearly put a lot of thought into preparing the apartment for their guests - everything that one could possibly need while traveling was provided, including shower essentials, some basic food staples (milk, cream, eggs, coffee, even some frozen snacks), and an abundance of towels. They had even provided very delicious homemade treats! The neighborhood was quiet and the apartment was clean and spacious (even for four people -- the sofa bed is quite comfortable). I strongly recommend staying at William's and Sue's and I will definitely book this apartment again the next time I'm in Montreal.
Great!

The apartment is as described. Very clean. Bedding is very comfortable. 
It's a 2-minute walk from the metro, then a 15-minute ride to the city center (no transfers).
The kitchen is well equipped, and the apartment is quiet.
The toilets are in the bathroom, which makes it a little small.
We had a very good stay.

My wife and I stayed here for only one night and it's truly one of the best Airbnb stays we've ever experienced! The hosts were there on arrival and so pleasant and helpful with directions and ideas of things to do. The apartment is a five-minute walk to the Olympic stadium and underground metro system. Also, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk (Le Blind Pig and Tannerie were very good!). It's such a nice place to stay with absolutely everything you could need AND more! Basic provisions in the fridge which were most welcomed after a long drive. Comfy bed. Excellent wifi. Small balcony to sit outside. We will definitely be coming back next time we're in Montreal and staying for longer, thank you both for your kindness and hospitality!

My daughter and I had an amazing time staying at William's place. He prepared many things for us: snacks, basic ingredients for cooking, some juice, and even homemade cookies! The house was extremely clean and everything was very well organized. We received immediate responses to our requests. The house was a 2-minute walk from the subway, which was a great convenience. We hope we can stay at William's place again when we have the chance to go back to Canada.

We absolutely loved our stay at William and Sue's place! It was spacious, bright, very clean, and in a lovely neighborhood. They went above and beyond to make us feel welcome! It is close to the Botanical Gardens and the Metro - very easy to get around! We will definitely be back!

Pleasant stay at a very friendly host in a comfortable and very clean apartment with all amenities. 

Everything was perfect to ensure our stay went smoothly. 

I highly recommend!

Very pleasant experience with the host. William and Sue were very courteous and friendly, as well as providing us with helpful guidance and recommendations during our stay. The apartment is extremely clean and has all the amenities that you need readily available. They also provided some homemade baked goods which were truly delightful. Highly recommended.

Attractive, comfortable and very clean apartment located near attractions (Jardin Botanique, Insectarium, Biodôme, Planétarium and Stade Olympique). It is a few minutes walk from the subway station. The apartment is located on the second floor of a house at the corner of Bourbonnière and Pierre-de-Coubertin. 

Communications with William and Sue were prompt and informative.  The check-in and check-out were very easy. I appreciated the welcoming muffins and cookies, in addition to the basic foods left in the fridge and kitchen cupboards. 

Both William and Sue were welcoming and hospitable, making the stay most comfortable and enjoyable.

Thanks to William and Susan for being so helpful and thoughtful. The survival kit was fantastic and unexpected, but they gave us a great breakfast treat! The place is marvelous. Super clean and super comfortable. Definitely a place worth staying at when you are in Montreal. Our stay was short but definitely was worth it!
The place is very nice and clean. William and Sue are great. I would stay here again next time in Montreal.

I've stayed in many Airbnbs and this one deserves a prize. Expectations were high with all of the great reviews and everything was just as good, or better, than what the other reviews claim. The area is quiet and residential, not bustling like downtown Montreal and you need to walk a few blocks for anything, including the subway which is very convenient. Very close to the botanical garden (+great restaurant) and the impressive Olympic sports center where you can get a day pass for $6. Will be back!

Fantastic location! I am a very regular Airbnb user, and this accommodation completely won me over! 

Cozy, well-furnished, affordable and comfortable, it is in a very good location, in a quiet neighborhood and very close to public transportation. The fully autonomous entrance, extremely simple, is a big plus.

William and Susan are discreet, charming but extremely attentive and professional hosts. Nothing is left to chance and the little touches inside are divine. 

My new must-have!

Located 2 minutes from the metro station, it was easy to get downtown. The apartment was very clean and access was easy! We felt safe. Even in the middle of a heatwave, the air-conditioned apartment had good airflow and we slept very well.

Thank you again!

Had an amazing stay. As others indicated, super nice extra touches were abundant throughout the place, such as a fridge stocked with eggs, milk, a Keurig machine with a selection of hot drinks, cereals in the cupboard, and generally the place was very nicely decorated and clean. We received a personal greeting from Sue despite having encountered issues on the way and making us late. The Subway was also just a 5-minute walk away, in a nice neighborhood. Highly recommended.

This apartment is perfect. So well-equipped and well-located, near the Metro and the Olympic Stadium area. Loved it, and was sad to leave. A real home from home and William and Sue are lovely people who made us feel very welcome xxx

What a wonderful place! I highly recommend it. The space was clean, organized, and well prepared for our visit. The 2-minute walk to the Metro was ideal for getting around Montreal. William and Susan were excellent hosts. When in Montreal, I would not hesitate to book again.

This was my first time using Airbnb so I was not sure what to expect. Susan and William absolutely blew me away with their hospitality and kindness. We drove in a bit late into Montreal but Susan came out to greet and welcome us. The apartment was extremely clean and organized. There was coffee available, cupboards and fridge had food for our disposal and the nicest touch was the homemade bakery items and crepes. There was also a private parking spot available for our car, which was appreciated. If we had any questions or concerns, Susan would respond within minutes and would ensure the problem is taken care of on the spot. When we come to Montreal in the future, we will most definitely book this apartment again instead of going to a hotel!

This is an extremely clean and well-kept accommodation. You will find all the usual amenities plus more, such as a refrigerator stocked with eggs, homemade jam, milk, margerine, and condiments, etc. You are greeted by an array of home baked muffins and cookies. Communication was easy and excellent when we had a problem with the cable service. William and Susan were there in a flash to help us out. This one-bedroom apartment is in an ideal location for walking to the Botanical Gardens, Olympic stadium, and Biodome, and has easy access to the metro and bus service. Very quiet...like a little oasis in the city of Montreal.

We recommend William and Susan’s Place to anyone traveling to Montreal!!

The hosts are delightful, the place is immaculate, beautiful, comfortable, and VERY well-equipped. They obviously take great pride in offering an exceptional experience  to their guests. 

In addition, the location is excellent - situated in a quiet tree lined neighborhood, very close to the metro which is very clean and efficient. In addition, the wonderful Olympic Park is close by with its gorgeous botanical gardens and much more. We felt very comfortable strolling around the area. 

A good grocery store and casual dining spots are nearby; very convenient!

Truly an A-Plus choice!!

For proof of our satisfaction, this is the second time we've stayed at the Ideal. 

The apartment has seen its equipment improved (air conditioning, Dyson vacuum cleaner, etc.). And there are always welcome cookies (homemade) and a couple/few odds and ends in the fridge for surviving the first few moments (being able to make a good coffee without having to go shopping right away, for example).

In short, a great condo, with great people. Go for it with confidence. But not when we return there ourselves;-)
This condo was immaculately kept, with many nice amenities and touches, and in a great location. Highly recommended! I look forward to returning for a longer stay sometime soon. Miles

Probably the best Airbnb I have been to, and I've been to quite a few entire apartment Airbnbs. William and Sue were great hosts. We arrived late at night and Sue walked out in the rain and freezing weather to make sure we were able to get in safely. They also left homemade treats and some food in the fridge! 

As for the apartment, it's located very close to the metro station so we had no trouble accessing the city at all. The apartment was pretty much spotless. The sheets smelled clean, every room was very clean. I was very happy with my stay here and would absolutely recommend it. You won't regret it!
Fantastic stay, and the hosts thought of everything! Honestly couldn't ask for a better experience :)

I enjoyed a comfortable and restful stay at William and Susan's cozy, immaculate apartment. The cleanliness, amenities, and warm personal touches made me feel immediately at home. The thought and care that they put into creating a welcoming space were evident throughout. As hosts, they showed the perfect blend of attentiveness, warmth, and professionalism that made our communications and interactions pleasant and easy.

I appreciated having a fully equipped kitchen and staple pantry items such as pasta for complimentary use. (Groceries at Marche Maisonneuve were a quick ride away on the 139 bus from Pie-IX station.) The sparkling new appliances and furnishings and modern heating system made for a comfortable, problem-free stay in late-November temperatures.  Entering and exiting the apartment was safe and easy, with the keyless lock system in place.

Thoughtful touches included plentiful linens, spare umbrellas in the closet, and various toiletry/personal care items available for use. Susan checked in regularly to make sure our stay was going well.

The location was convenient: easy access to the center of the city, but removed enough for a quiet retreat from the bustle. I enjoyed catching a glimpse of everyday life in the residential Hochelaga-Maisonneuve neighborhood. (College de Maisonneuve, literally across the street, serves post-high school/pre-college students, coming and going throughout the day.)

Staying at L’Ideal on our first trip to Montreal and as our first use of Airbnb was a choice I was glad to have made. I look forward to returning to Montreal (am now very much a fan) and staying here again.

Wow! I am a very picky person and not easily impressed, but staying at this Airbnb exceeded all my expectations! Everything was exactly as promised. Communication and information was precise, great location, off-street parking, private entrance and the apartment was exceptionally clean and updated. William and Sue even provided homemade treats and stocked many basics such as coffee, milk and more. They were friendly and attentive while still respecting one's privacy. Great hosts and a great service - I would definitely stay again! Thanks William and Sue.

Second time at Will & Sue's was just as wonderful as the first. The little snacks she leaves are a real nice touch for a true bed and breakfast experience. The place is perfect and the hosts are there for you when you need them late on New Year's Eve and can't find any food. But they give you plenty of space. Really feels like home away from home. Can't thank you guys enough!
This place is a must...

William and Susan were amazing! The location was perfectly suited to our needs and we couldn't have asked for anything more. They were attentive, caring, and professional. They answered every question quickly, they were always available for communication, and the place was beautiful, full of thoughtful details. We can't say enough good things! We would absolutely recommend them!

William's apartment is charming and it's the cleanest house I ever rented. 

They have a special touch and are incredibly kind and available.

A real gem. The best place to rent in Montreal. 

Thank you so much
Translation: I will only say one thing, tempt yourself with this housing, you won't be disappointed.
Beautiful and comfortable accommodations! We were welcomed with tasty treats, communication was clear; check-in and check-out was a breeze. Highly recommend to any couple visiting the area.

We loved our time at William and Susan's place; it was hard to even leave to explore Montreal because it was so welcoming and relaxing—so tempting to stay in and nap! It was very very clean, stylish, and had lots of thoughtful touches, including some baked goods. The location was great, a short walk to the metro and just a described, downtown within minutes by the metro! When we come back to Montreal, we will definitely stay here again! There's nothing bad to say and nothing to improve on; everything was wonderful! Great at communicating and giving us recommendations!

What a wonderful experience! A warm welcome, a place equipped with everything you could need for a truly enjoyable stay.  Let's not forget to mention that the place is immaculately clean. We even got some homemade treats (muffins, cookies). The fact that their guesthouse is just two blocks from a subway station makes our stay even more pleasant. I wouldn't hesitate to go back there or recommend it to anyone who will listen.

It will definitely be my first recommendation to all my friends planning a trip to Montreal. It has everything you're looking for: great hospitality, super cleanliness, and super easy public transportation!

This place was great. Cozy, clean, minutes from the metro, short walk from lively Ontario street. 

We stayed in and cooked, and the kitchen had everything we needed and more (flour, milk, coffee...). We felt like home. Really appreciated it! Thanks again William!
Everything is impeccable, well-located and the hosts are attentive
Very beautiful apartment, perfect for activities near the stadium.

Brilliant apartment. Brilliant hosts. Very convenient for travel. Highly recommend. Did not have much contact with William and Sue as we were out every day, but were very aware that they were there if we needed them. Cannot praise the apartment and our welcome enough.
Very close to the metro and botanical gardens! So cute!

Guests who truly deserve their "Super host" status. A sure value, a fantastic neighborhood with easy access to the city, small touches that make all the difference and impeccable cleanliness of the places: I only have good things to say.  I would definitely go back anytime. Thank you!

This apartment is comparable to the suites offered in hotels but at a lower price. Moreover, this apartment allows us to live an extraordinary tourist experience by "getting immersed" in the local population. Furthermore, with the metro station located within walking distance of less than 5 minutes, we are right in the heart of the city center within less than 15 minutes. Honestly, WOW.  It's a must-live and relive.
Perfect location, the arrival is very well organized and everything is done to welcome you well, a place to go with your eyes closed

Susan and William were great hosts. Everything we needed was available. The place was clean and close to public transportation, the Biodome, and the Botanical Garden. Highly recommended if you're looking for a place to stay while visiting Montreal.

Simple apartment but very warm, just like the hosts!! Very nice welcome from William and Suzan who came to pick me up at my arrival and left some little treats in the apartment even though my stay was only one day. The apartment was spotless and the bed very comfortable. I recommend it without any hesitation!

We had an amazing stay at William and Susan's place! They have everything you need, and more, and were such amazing hosts! The location was great right next to the metro, and the apartment was very cute and nicely done.

At the top of the street, just a block away from the Botanical Garden, Olympic Park, and the Biodome. A short walk to the nearest metro station and fantastic Poutine Centrale. Susan and William gave us the warmest welcome and helped us find parking so we could leave our car for a whole day. The room was tidy, clean, and spacious with everything you need and cute decorations. Just a small tip that you may want to bring your own toiletries as they only have basic ones.
The apartment is beautiful and very clean. The welcome is very friendly. It's just a little difficult to carry heavy luggage up the stairs.

Wonderful stay at the ideal place, William & Susan are wonderful hosts, very accommodating, with multiple small attentions upon arrival at the property. I highly recommend it and if I am ever back in Montreal, I will definitely return to this accommodation.

I will definitely return to Montreal for my next trip. The proximity to the metro station makes travel easy. Then it is very close to many important attractions in this city. The apartment is super comfortable, very clean and well-equipped. Parking included avoids any hassle.

Ideal apartment for a perfect stay! Everything is there: impeccable cleanliness, super comfortable bed, air conditioning, USB cables to charge our devices, homemade muffins, warm welcome, private parking, metro right across the street. What else could you ask for? I highly recommend this accommodation.

This apartment is the perfect space to getaway to and explore Montreal! William and Susan put a lot of love and thought into their space! All you need to bring is your luggage of clothing as they have everything you can think of in the comfort of your own home. It’s convenient to the city, right by Olympic Park, close to the Metro, and provides great amenities like parking and a touchless keypad. We felt very secure. William and Susan are very sweet, making sure we were comfortable and easily reachable for any questions. They welcomed us with desserts! We would definitely come back again!!
Warm welcome, cozy apartment; it's our third stay at the Ideal.

The apartment was really nice (better than expected), we arrived late at night and there were homemade cookies and muffins waiting for us, which was really nice after a long trip.  Also, the cleaning was perfect. 

The apartment is very close to the Botanic Garden and the Olympic Stadium, as well as 2 or 3 blocks from the subway/metro.

The hosts' care and hospitality were great, probably one of the best hosts I have had on Airbnb.
Susan and William were wonderful hosts and were very responsive and helpful. A great charming place to stay!

Warm welcome, the attention to detail, the decor and cleanliness made all the difference and we give 5/5 stars. Even though the accommodation is located in a quiet corner of the street, it's relatively peaceful and the metro station is within walking distance. We would have liked the bathroom to be slightly larger but nevertheless it remains clean and functional.
Impeccable accommodation located two steps from the Olympic Park. Private parking space. Host available for any information requests. Excellent value for money.

What a wonderful place! Susan was so kind and made sure we were comfortable. The apartment had great amenities and such thoughtful touches to it. The apartment was easy to locate with the directions Susan and William provided. We will definitely stay here again when we come back!

We had a wonderful stay at William and Susan's place! It's bright, spacious, clean and has everything you need and more. The Metro is less than 5 minutes away walking, the kitchen is stocked and our stay was quiet and comfortable. We will definitely stay again! Thank you!

I would 100% recommend this place to anybody traveling to Montreal, it's within walking distance to the Saputo Stadium and some bars/pubs located on Ontario Street. William and Sue were very friendly and you'll notice within minutes of walking in why they're super hosts.
My stay was perfect, the apartment was very clean, quiet, air-conditioned, and very well equipped for a wonderful stay. The metro is 2 minutes away on foot and William is super welcoming.

We had a fantastic stay with the family at William's place! The apartment is ideally located (right next to the metro) very clean and very comfortable! We received the warmest and most welcoming hospitality. 
We highly recommend this for families visiting Montreal, especially with children!

As advertised... this was our first-ever stay at an Airbnb and our expectations were significantly surpassed! The space is very clean, offers parking, all amenities, and is very conveniently located. Even better, William and Susan are quick to respond and super friendly and helpful. We loved our stay at their location and will not hesitate to return or recommend to friends and family.

We couldn't have asked for a better, more relaxing experience visiting Montreal for the first time. The apartment was very comfortable, beautifully appointed, and exceptionally clean. The beds and linens were super soft and Susan furnished us with milk, cream, tea & coffee as well as water and some lovely baked goods. We were also conveniently located a short walk to the metro and the Olympic Center. Additionally, we really appreciated the free parking and the extra time Susan and William took to greet and welcome us and to help us navigate the city. We are very grateful and lucky to have stayed here!
Perfect place in an amazing location. Highly recommend for any stay in Montreal.
We absolutely loved our stay and we highly recommend it!

The apartment was amazing, much better than the photo and what we expected. It had everything we needed. William and Suzanne were great hosts, quick to respond, and provided great tips. The area surrounding the apartment was full of good restaurants. If we stayed in Montreal for a few more days, we would choose this apartment again.
We had a wonderful time. This room is clean and comfortable. The host is very kind.

Excellent stay at William and Suzanne's place. Ideal for visiting Montreal while being in a quiet neighborhood. The metro is a 2-minute walk away and takes you to the center in 15 minutes. The apartment is very clean and we were welcomed with homemade cookies and muffins which were excellent.  The ideal name lives up to its promise. We highly recommend it without hesitation.

We had a great stay at William and Susan's place. Our hosts greeted us upon arrival and answered any questions we had (such as location to the nearest metro). We were able to park our large Honda Odyssey van in the space in the back alley. The code access to the building and apartment is very convenient (no need to carry any keys). Access is a walk around to the front, take 5-6 steps to the front door and inside are additional steps to your apartment. We enjoyed the very spacious interior which has a separate living room (with TV), one queen-size bed in the bedroom, a bathroom, and a kitchen (with full-size fridge and stove) and dining room. The place is cute and immaculately clean! We enjoyed the special touches such as the cookies, muffins and beverages. I highly recommend anyone to stay here.
Lovely flat, beautifully clean. Communication was fast and helpful, and the pastries and supplies they left for us were a lovely touch. We would definitely stay again
Great place, very clean and welcoming! 2 minutes from the subway station. Check-in is very easy and flexible. I will definitely check if the place is available next time I'm traveling to Montreal.

Excellent place to stay! Sparkling clean and cozy. This Airbnb also provides amenities beyond normal supplies such as bottled water, milk, cream, eggs, and muffins, etc., which saved me a trip on the first day to do grocery shopping. Susan is very hospitable and easy to communicate with. I would highly recommend her place.

Over the last several years, I have stayed at Airbnb places in Toronto and Montreal, and this was my mom's first Airbnb experience. We greatly valued the cleanliness and spacious apartment, as well as the many thoughtful touches (e.g., hair dryer, cleaning supplies, keypad lock, appliance instructions, glasses cleaner, homemade baked goods, stocked fridge). I also enjoyed getting a local experience being close to the Olympic Park and exploring Hochelaga-Maisonneuve. The hosts greeted us upon arrival in person and were very responsive to questions. The neighborhood was peaceful, and a convenience store and metro station were easy to access. I had previously stayed in Old Montreal 5 years ago, and I liked this experience better. I would happily return to your place!

This is a charming apartment, exactly as described and more. Clean, close to the metro, comfortable bed and many extra touches, including some homemade baking, and lots of basic food amenities. Also we arrived in Montreal during a "Heat Warning" and it was wonderful to walk into a lovely cool apartment.

William's place is clean, tidy, and cozy, especially after a long day's drive. The hosts were very hospitable in ensuring we checked in alright and had provided some snacks and drinks for us in the fridge and kitchen table when we arrived. I recommend staying here if you want to stay in a quiet neighborhood and want a good night's rest.

My accommodation is very pleasant, the location perfectly matches the listing near the metro station and the hosts are very attentive, responsive yet discreet. The apartment is very clean, well-equipped and we spent three weeks there as if at home.

This apartment exceeds the description and we were very pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness, level of equipment and decor. In addition, it is very well located just 2 minutes from the metro. But what we appreciated most was the hospitality, kindness and availability of the hosts, all discreetly. We highly recommend this address.

William's place was extra comfortable and exceeded our expectations on all levels. The three of us (all adults) were very comfortable. Everything we needed was provided. They are kind and helpful hosts, most welcoming. We only stayed two nights but this would be an excellent location for a longer stay. We heartily recommend this place.
Super clean, great location, includes parking, definitely recommend
Comfortable, well-laid out space with lots of light and everything you need to cook a meal and relax. For us, it was a home away from home.

This place far exceeded our expectations. The pictures don't do this place justice. Everything we could have needed was available in the space. Everything was so professional and thought out it was like staying at a 5-star hotel but with the feel of home. The neighborhood felt peaceful and safe. The provided parking space was great and we had plenty of room! There was not a single thing lacking here. We only wish we had more time to stay. Thank you, Susan, for being so prompt in meeting us and suggesting where to go for breakfast. Your passion for hospitality was so felt by my husband and I.

An apartment and exceptional welcome! Everything is there: cleanliness, beautiful decor, amenities, little touches, super bedding! I recommend this accommodation without hesitation! It's the ideal, neither more nor less ;)

This is my best Airbnb experience to date. The hosts are attentive and communicative. There are many thoughtful touches in the apartment.
