Very well-equipped compared to other apartments that are empty shells. I felt like a guest at their home. Private parking is provided. Entry is autonomous. It's near the metro and Olympic Park. I highly recommend it.
All-round fantastic! Both Susan and William checked in to make sure we had no questions and the flat was beautifully equipped.

We had a great stay here; while the location is closer to the Olympic Park, it is easy to get to other landmarks in Montréal via the green Métro line. We mostly interacted with Susan, who was very responsive to our needs and concerns. The interior here is adequately furnished, and the furniture and fixtures are modern and up-to-date.
$25 Uber ride from the city center, which was a drag but extremely clean with good amenities and service.

Best Airbnb experience I ever had. The place was very clean and close to the metro. The host greeted us when we arrived and gave us some local tips. Homemade cookies and muffins, coffee, and some breakfast were provided in the house for convenience! Definitely recommend!
excellent

Located outside of downtown, very close to the Olympic Park, it was very easy to get to (we drove).

Aside from all the standard amenities there were a lot of thoughtful touches like homemade strawberry jam in the fridge as well as some bread, eggs and other staples (oh and homemade cookies + muffins). Also having many USB outlets was very convenient.

William and Susan were very welcoming and helpful, they even cleared the snow off our car while we were out at dinner.

Great place!

The ideal is absolutely the ideal for a Montreal stay. Two steps from the subway, quiet neighborhood, warm welcome and little touches... everything was there to charm us and make us have good times. I highly recommend this cozy nest!
Awesome place. Two blocks from the metro. Parking. Sparkling clean. Stylish. We'd love to return again.

William and Susan are expert hosts who warmly welcomed us when we arrived and even helped us scrape all the Montreal ice off our car as we headed out ;) The home is clean and full of thoughtful touches and perfectly located next to the metro. We would definitely stay again.
Impeccable.  Little touches, impeccable cleanliness, available host, comfort. We highly recommend without hesitation.

Warm welcome from William. Lots of wonderful little details that contributed to a wonderful stay. Free parking, homemade baking on the table, and a super comfy bed. It had a very homey feeling... like visiting your favorite aunt!

WoW! What an amazing welcome! William is truly charming. Everything was perfect! Super clean, super well-equipped, excellent bedding and full of nice touches. I highly recommend it and we definitely plan to go back! Thank you again, William!

We had a wonderful experience in this place. The apartment had everything one could want for a stay in Montreal. The Metro is close, as are other activities. Susan and William were excellent hosts and we highly recommend them.

An extraordinary stay with delightful little treats for breakfast. Super comfortable furniture and exemplary cleanliness. Friendly hosts and exemplary welcome. The only regret is that we stayed only one night. We will definitely return on our next trip to Montreal. Thank you, William and Susan.
Very clean and comfortable!  I really enjoyed my stay here.
Everything was perfect, warm and clean! This is the best Airbnb I've ever seen! It exceeded my expectations!
Ideal housing, impeccable cleanliness, well-equipped, we haven't missed anything. Very quiet location, we sleep very well, the bed is very comfortable. I recommend

This place was amazing! Deborah and her flatmate did an amazing job accommodating us throughout the entire trip. They were very helpful with tips on what to do during the trip and made sure my girlfriend and I had the privacy that we needed, which was also a plus.

For the location and accessibility of this place, we should have definitely paid higher. We were located very close in between two train lines 5 min walking distance of that, a strip of clubs, stores, restaurants, etc while being right in the middle of downtown, so the value of this place exceeds expectations. If you are a peace and quiet person and don't prefer the city life then this location is not for you because it is a non-stop party area with plenty to do.

Deborah was even so kind to allow us to check in extremely early, as we had a very early arrival time from the states, which was also very kind and also flexible for checkout, this place exceeded our expectations, thanks again guys!

Thank you Deborah and Sébastien! You are truly a shock to the system! Thank you for your availability, your hospitality, your valuable advice and especially your good humor! We look forward to seeing you again! Aurélie, thank you for allowing us to discover Montreal with such a smooth arrival! Elise and Freddy.
We didn't get to see Aurelie but we were very well received by Deborah! The accommodation is super well located.

Very nice Airbnb! Communication was excellent and the room was lovely. The location of the accommodation is excellent, within walking distance to many sightseeing spots and near a metro station. I would definitely recommend it.

Anne was such a warm and bubbly person! It being my first trip to Montréal, I was a little nervous. But, immediately upon meeting Anne all of the nervousness melted away! She even gifted me with delicious baked goods and maps of the area. The flat is only about a minute's walk to the Green line which was super convenient and the area is diverse and relatively quiet which makes for a nice contrast with the harried and noisy downtown areas. I would definitely stay here again and think that I have made a great friend already in Anne! I would recommend it 500%.
Really great place! Super close to the metro station and lots of restaurants. The host was amazing with communication and check-in was smooth.

I had a wonderful experience in Emilie's apartment. The place is magnificent with plenty of space and a sunny, tranquil balcony. Emilie is very accommodating. Thank you! We will definitely come back again!
Super close-by location
Emillie was very kind and hospitable, a great stay!
Quiet apartment, perfectly located!

I highly recommend Emilie's place. It is super convenient, with a 10-minute drive to downtown.  If you're lucky, you might be able to find a parking spot right outside her apartment. It's clean and comfortable.

Our stay was great! 
Emilie's apartment is the true Montreal experience (I used to live there). The classic walk-up, the original details: hardwood floors and crown mouldings, the quaint balcony to sit and enjoy your morning coffee. Her place is incredibly close to the metro station and the location is incredible, it has all you need for shopping, eating, drinking, sightseeing, you name it. Emilie was a great host, and it was very easy and quick to communicate. Our check-in was a breeze :)
Clean and cute space in a beautiful location
My accommodation is ideally located for visiting Montreal.

Really homey, classic Montreal vibes. Balcony was very enjoyable. The door was a bit of a hassle as well as there was no toilet paper however for the cost it was well worth it! Great location too close enough to pretty much everything but residential enough to find some calm in the city!
Great place, in a great location. Emilie was quick to respond to any questions.
Perfect quality-price ratio, well-located apartment (metro and grocery store within 3-4 minutes) clean and charming.

Yves was an excellent host. He kept in near constant contact with me via Airbnb and email before our stay, and during our stay was always reachable by phone. He has a beautiful apartment in a great part of the city. Yves was an excellent host as well. We had a great time talking to and getting to know him during our stay in Montreal. He gave us some great recommendations on places to go and things to do. The next time I visit Montreal, I hope I'll be lucky enough to stay with him again.

Yves and his friend Nadine were very hospitable. Communication was spot-on. Upon arrival, we were greeted with quality complementary chocolate, red wine, and OJ. The apartment was plenty large for my wife and me. Location was very convenient as it was one block from the shops and food on St Denis, but was also isolated from late-night noise.

A nice benefit is roof access. We had a nice brunch on the roof with some takeout from one of the local cafes. 

I would return again.

Yves' apartment is super well-located in the heart of the entertainment district. There's everything he needs around his place to enjoy Montreal by day and night! His welcome was more than warm, a big smile, a super joy of living and enough to make a hearty breakfast (bread, fruit, juice, Ferrero Rocher...)!! Going to Yves is ensuring a good stay in Montreal, enjoying an apartment where there's life after all, that's what we love about Airbnb!! You can book with your eyes closed!

Yves Loft was exactly as he described it; it was clean, tidy, and spacious. He was kind enough to leave food, coffee, drinks, and snacks for us. His place had everything we needed, and was located in a convenient spot. I would definitely recommend Yves and his loft, and I hope to rent it again.

We had a great stay at Yves' place. We booked last minute and were unable to get there in time to meet Yves in person (he had a flight to catch), but his communication was excellent and we were able to get into his place with no problem. The location was great - near the metro, walking distance of Old Montreal, Mont Royal, etc, tons of places to eat on Rue St. Denis and in the surrounding neighborhoods. His flat itself was just as described and very clean. We would certainly stay again.

Both Yves and his loft were awesome! Met me at the loft, was very communicative. Left wine and chocolates, amongst toiletries and other things for my wife and I.

Fantastic location, about a 1 minute walk to Rue Saint-Denis, full of restaurants/bars and great nightlife. Parking is super easy, two cheap garages in walking distance.

The experience of Yves' loft begins with the welcome. Yves is a very friendly host and puts you at ease from your arrival, with bonus snacks, juice, ground coffee, and red wine. Coming myself from Montreal, the loft is strategically positioned. You are within walking distance of the Berri metro station, the heart of the city and subway lines.  You're in the entertainment district, at the center of artistic life and terraces, but you don't hear any noise despite the proximity of the dynamic St-Denis street. The bed is very comfortable, the place is VERY clean. Are you coming in the summer? Fans and air conditioning guarantee a cool night.  The building is very secure with a modern key system with code at the door. As a bonus there's a small café at the exit of the building. Tired? Want to see a movie? The Quartier Latin cinema is 20 meters from your door. I have finally found my favorite place during my visits to Montreal.  - Simon D Scott

I booked the listing last minute on my way to Toronto from Halifax. Yves made necessary arrangements for the keys to be delivered at a late check-in at 8pm (thanks to his charming friend). Although I didn't get a chance to meet him, he welcomed me with chocolate, snacks, and a few drinks. His loft is bright, spacious, and clean; I was intrigued by the beautiful decor, cool artistic pieces, and overall flow. I enjoyed the location, close to many bookstores, music shops, restaurants, boutiques, and transit. In short, I didn't really have to go past 1km to find everything I needed. Yves is a superhost. I highly recommend his place.

Yves was a lovely host. He made arrangements for us to drop off our bags even though we arrived several hours before check-in, left snacks and drinks, and was overall very gracious during our stay. The place was perfectly clean, spacious, beautiful, and centrally located. It was extremely close to a number of bars and restaurants, as well as the metro and bus stations, not to mention a short walk from Old Port and the rest of downtown Montreal. We would highly recommend this location! Thank you for a wonderful weekend! Best, LeeAnne and Alina.
Location is great and the apartment is very nice. Highly recommend!

I highly recommend staying at Yves's apartment. I was traveling in Montreal for the weekend with my girlfriend and Yves was a terrific host: he was very friendly and accommodating regarding check-in and check-out time, he was very communicative before/during/after our stay, his place was clean and in a very fun area on Rue St Denis and he even bought us some snacks & wine so we would feel at home.

Yves' place was as beautiful as the pictures and very centrally located! He is a gracious host who is very flexible and accommodating of your needs. We had an awesome time exploring Montreal! Also, his building has an amazing rooftop you can hang out on. Highly recommend!

Awesome host. Great place with lots of style and close to restaurants and the village. Rooftop patio to chill on and watch the sunrise and sunset. If you're a photographer or enthusiast, it's worth the price of entry alone. Merci Yves!
The host cancelled this reservation 128 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

One of the best experiences ever! 
Great location and Yves is super nice.
The house itself is very nice and comfortable.
I will contact him again if I need to stay again in Montreal, highly recommended.
Thank you for everything
Filippo
Very good host and stay. The loft is as shown in the pictures and the neighborhood is ideal. We highly recommend Yves.
Great location, nice loft. Exactly as described. Yves was very accommodating. Thank you
Great stay in a perfect location. Just what was advertised! Thanks Yves!
Super apartment located in the Latin Quarter, just 2 steps from restaurants and bars.
Great location. Looks just like the pictures :)

While we never met Yves, we felt like we got to know him through his personality-filled apartment. It was beautiful and well equipped. He even left us milk and juice! There are good places to eat right out the door and a very affordable parking lot literally on the block. He was easy to communicate with as well. We would stay here again!

Yves has such a cool space -- sunny, comfortable, and, as many others have pointed out, extremely stylish. 

The location was perfect. Not only was there plenty to do in the neighborhood, but the apartment was very conveniently located with respect to public transit. 

We didn't meet Yves in person, but a neighbor very kindly let us into the apartment. Many thanks to both of them for a lovely stay!
Hip and cozy apartment, centrally located in Montreal's Latin Quarter. Comfortable and very clean, I would highly recommend it to family and friends, and I would love to return again.
Yves' place was as advertised and he was easy to contact and communicate with. He had a great experience and would visit again!
The host was very attentive. The place was perfect for our trip. The description was accurate, just like the pictures.

Very safe and cozy place with all the amenities! Yves is very friendly and easy to deal with. Great central location. Nightlife and restaurants right out the front door! It was perfect for the International Jazz Festival! Thanks!

This was my second Airbnb experience, but my first for Montreal. After years of doing hotels, I've decided to use Airbnb when I can. I've heard great experiences and horrible experiences, so I was apprehensive once again. I was so pleasantly surprised with Yves's place. After a few hours of being in someone else's living space, I felt very comfortable. I didn't meet Yves, but check-in and entry was very easy and convenient, which is what I need and want. Great location—just minutes walk to one of the main transit stations. Very cool location, and very clean, tidy, and uncluttered loft with character. Yves prepares for his guests, which was very welcoming and appreciated—milk, juice, snacks, tea/coffee, essential toiletries, tourist/travel info, ...and for me wine. For 4 days, I felt very comfortable having my own personal space, which surpasses the hotel experience. Thanks again, Yves

This was a great place to stay. The location was in a nice neighborhood and transit was easily accessible. Ila and Fred were exceptional hosts. They are both kind and accepting people who made me feel welcome from the moment I arrived.

The room is as shown in the photos.
Excellent neighborhood with a view of a beautiful park and WiFi.
Close to the gay village, 5-8 minutes walk away. Excellent location.

Our stay with Ilham and Fred was fantastic! They were very welcoming and attentive to our questions, life with them is very pleasant! 

The apartment is very well located, it's a 20-minute walk from UQAM or a 15-minute bus ride. Lafontaine Park is a 10-minute walk away as well as the Papineau metro and several buses within 2 minutes.  

There are many shops nearby and the room overlooks a very quiet street. We had access to all the apartment's amenities and the room was fully equipped, which is very practical for our first arrival in Montreal. 

I highly recommend this place, you will be very well taken care of!

A simple dwelling, so much kindness from Ila and Fred. 
Ideal situation, departure for numerous visits.
A first-time experience of cohabitation that will leave me with unique memories.
My stay was very pleasant and we are close to the city center.
Very neat and comfortable!

Frederique is friendly and easy to communicate with. Her apartment is lovely... Nicely decorated and well-located. Great coffee maker, too! Parking was no problem and her space was located within walking distance of many restaurants and attractions.
Very cozy place. Thank you :)
Fred is a wonderful host. Everything was perfect.

Pleasant accommodation (bedroom and the rest of the apartment), very practical for a long stay (I stayed one month in complete tranquility) in a neighborhood full of restaurants and shops. Very friendly and welcoming host.

Pictures do not perfectly capture Frédérique's place. I LOVED staying here. The house is warm and cozy. The decor is carefully chosen and Frédérique has done a lot to create a Zen and private room for her guests.

I work remotely, so it was important to have a quiet environment where I could work and have high-speed internet access. Her home provided both.

As a host, I enjoyed meeting Frédérique. She is easygoing, fun to talk to, and is as involved as you want her to be. She was a host when I went to Montreal, and a friend when I left Montreal.

I highly recommend staying at her place. It is perfect for solo adventures or a couple.

I haven't seen Frédérique much, but she has been very friendly, available and accommodating whenever I needed information. Thank you :)

Regarding the accommodation, it is as shown in the photos: very pleasant, clean, and perfectly located. The room is large and the street is quiet, ideal for working or relaxing.

In short, a great stay!
This is a beautiful home in a great location. Frederique is a wonderful host. I would definitely return.
Frédérique's place is easily accessible by public transport and is a nice and quiet area.
Amazing stay. Beautiful flat and perfect location. Couldn't have asked for more. Thank you
Frederique is very relaxed, the house is nice and we had full access to the kitchen. Parking was easy to find on the street. Excellent stay.

It was nice days in this home even though there was no balcony. Jazz and rain - it was Montreal!!! Comfortable bed, enough space, nice cats [ staying on the floor ] I expected more chance to talk with a host. But we were happy with Frédérique’s place.

Great character, perfect location for exploring the city. The host left room in the kitchen and bathroom, which made for a very comfortable stay. I didn't get to see Frédérique much, but her communication was excellent and her cats were super friendly.
Comfortable and affordable accommodation in a great location. Frederique was very accommodating and helpful when I had questions. Plus, if you love cats, her two cats are very friendly and adorable.

Frederique's apartment was adorable! Very clean and stylish. She is a really nice and welcoming host who answered all of our questions and made our stay enjoyable! I would definitely recommend her apartment!

I found the accommodations great for walking/jogging (near my favorite patisserie, bagel bakeries, parks, and circus performances), and very comfortable, clean, and cutely decorated. Although I didn't get to meet Frédérique, she was very attentive and accessible via email, and answered any question I had very quickly. Not sure when I will be back in Montreal, but when I do go, I shall try to stay there again.
Frédérique's place is lovely - very cute and cozy. Close to public transportation, shops, and cafes. Really nice neighborhood and Frédérique is an excellent host!
Extended my stay because I enjoyed the place so much!

I am really lucky to have had my first Airbnb stay at Frédérique's home. Before my arrival, she always responded promptly and was very helpful. I went to Montreal for a conference and it was also my first time in Canada. Frédérique's home is very stylish and you can tell that she made a great effort to decorate the place.  The most important thing was that she is very generous to share the nice apartment with her guests. I could access the living room, balcony, and the well-equipped kitchen. The oven, washing machine, and dryer were new and they were functioning very well. There are also two lovely cats. After a whole day conference, it was really nice to relax with the cats and some homemade food and local wine. I also love the brunch place Frédérique showed me. The food was so delicious. I will definitely reserve Frédérique's place if I ever go back to Montreal and I will also recommend this place to my friends who are going to Montreal.

While we didn't get a chance to meet Frédérique, she was communicative throughout our stay and answered questions we had. The apartment is a short walk from the Métro, a grocery store, and several restaurants and cafés. Overall, a great stay.
Clean, spacious and centrally located downtown. Check-in was super easy. Thanks!
Great time at Edi's place!
Great location and host

Edi was very sweet and welcoming, he got back to us quickly whenever we had questions. 

As for the apartment, it was warm, cozy, and clean. We were provided everything we needed. The bed, couch, were comfortable, kitchenware and bathrooms were clean.

Overall, this was my first Airbnb stay and my experience at Edi's was pleasant and we enjoyed our stay. :)
Nice place to leave. Convenient, clean, and comfortable.
The apartment is very clean and the location is superb. I recommend it.
Cozy & clean, and a great location! The hosts were very kind and easy to communicate with. If you're looking to stay downtown, I highly recommend it.

The apartment is okay, but the cleanliness isn't really good. There were hairs in the bathroom and it seemed like all the cleaning was done quickly. But it's well-located, right in the city center, and thank you for the chocolates.

Great deal for what you're paying: Located in downtown with easy access to a metro station. The sheets and towels were clean, and the WiFi was excellent, but the carpets hadn't been vacuumed recently and the bathroom was questionable. 

Monica was very quick to respond and made our arrival very smooth.
The apartment is really nice, it's well located! Excellent value for money!
Great little spot
Everything was great. Thanks!
The place was fantastic and exactly as advertised. Monica was great at responding to any questions or issues.
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊
It's a nice place to stay for a few days, and it's also very close to many places in downtown. The apartment is so clean! We really like the place.

Our stay at Monica's and Edi's place was very nice. The apartment is located between two major streets, which was great for shopping and good places to eat. Public transit was also close by. The apartment itself is a good size, perfect for three people, clean and the bed was very comfortable. We planned on cooking some of our meals but realized the oven was not working so only stovetop meals would work. The other appliances are very outdated but for the most part, functional. The bathroom is also outdated and we were only given two bath towels even though there were 3 guests. Check-in and check-out was easy and Monica responded immediately to any questions that I had. Overall, we had a great time and would recommend this apartment.

Excellent value for money, extremely well-located accommodation! 

Clear explanations and easy communication with Monica.

Thank you for a wonderful stay!
Monica and Edi's place was exactly as described, communication was very good between us whenever I needed help. Would recommend their place 100% and would come back again whenever I am in Montreal!
The place is located in a very convenient area. Monica and Edi are very helpful and quick to respond to messages. There are some dust particles on the floor and tables, but it's not a major issue.
Nice place not too noisy.

Well-located apartment in Montreal, located at the foot of the metro and in the heart of a lively neighborhood.

Minor drawbacks, we experienced cigarette odors while we don't smoke upon returning from our excursions. 

The electrical outlets are poorly fixed and some wires are exposed. Otherwise, good service within the residence.
The location is perfect! Near subways and malls. Walking distance to McGill University. Highly recommend!
Quiet apartment (although the neighborhood is very lively) and well-located (metro and bus right nearby), pleasant layout of (website hidden by Airbnb) small welcoming touches!
Nice and cozy apartment in a great location!

Great place. Good for two people. The person who was supposed to pick us up as recommended by Monica couldn't do so at the last minute anyway, Uber to Monica's place is about $35 CAD. The apartment is fully equipped; you have everything you need there. Recommend washing before using the kitchen utensils. You can request a laundry card for your laundry but will have to top up a minimum of $10 which will entitle you to about 2-3 washes. Monica responds quickly.
It was a wonderful place to stay in Montreal!
The apartment is very well located in a region with many restaurants and bars, and the metro is nearby. Additionally, the apartment is clean and comfortable, ideal for a couple. Recommend.

Monica & Edi are great hosts, with fast responses and good communication. The place is very clean and quiet, located in a lively part of the city. Easy check-in and checkout procedures. It would be great if extra bedding were provided ahead of time, but I should ask in advance as well. Other than that, it was a lovely stay. Recommended.
Everything is even better than promised! Amazing view of downtown! You can't go wrong here!
Booked this room at the very last minute and everything was so simple, clean in a great location. Don't expect a fancy-looking room, but it's perfect if you just want to sleep.

Great location, close to public transit. There is a wide variety of excellent food options right around the apartment, as well as a pharmacy and quick shops for other needs. Monica and Edi were thoughtful and extremely conscientious hosts who responded very quickly to any question or concern we might have.
Monica and Edi are fantastic hosts! I would highly recommend staying with them. They also put two Ferrero Rocher chocolates on your towels! Monica responds very quickly and is very accommodating.

Location and communication were superb!!!! They were super accommodating, prompt and kind. The apartment was a bit dirty, and the kitchen was not very usable (e.g., no paper towels, limited pots, utensils etc.). The pillows were old. Laundry facilities were nice to have but the card will cost you $10 then you load it afterwards. Overall an affordable place to stay with great hosts just a bit dirty, outdated and basic.

Monica's place is small but perfect, with everything you need (kitchen, fridge, AC, bed, and sofa). The location is great! It is secure, right in downtown close to the metro, cafes, Tim Hortons, etc. Museums are within walking distance as well as bars. It also includes a great view of the city. Monica was very accommodating and always quick to respond if we had any questions or issues. We had a great time in Montreal! Thank you!!

The place was a bit smaller than expected, but nonetheless a great place! I especially enjoyed the view and the pool. It's also in a great location if you travel by metro and couldn't ask for better communication!

This apartment was great for my friends and me having a weekend in the city. It's a good location within walking distance of plenty of restaurants, cafes, and things to do during the day. The apartment was small as expected, but we weren't in it much so it served its purpose. We paid to park in the garage which was very tight; it has a 6ft clearance and it was more than tricky to drive through. The apartment smelled like cigarettes when we first arrived and the bathroom smelled like spilled milk, which was disquieting to say the least. After turning on the AC unit the cigarette smell eventually went away, but the bathroom couldn't be aired out very much.
Overall a decent stay for the price.
Very accommodating for last-minute stays

Great small apartment near restaurants and the city center. There are multiple apartments in the same building, so the one listed may not be the exact one you receive; however, they are quite similar.

Great location! Close to shops, restaurants, and cafes. Easy to walk around. Apartment had two closets for storage. Parking lot can be very narrow at turns and in spaces, you have to be careful getting in and out. The hosts were very easy to reach and always responded quickly!
Great, well-located.  Bed might be a bit tight for two, but otherwise fine.

The best thing about this place is its location. It's close to the museums, downtown, shops, and not far from Atwater Market. Very clean and offers great value for someone looking for a place to stay in Montreal.

It has an excellent location for everything you need to know in Montreal. The quality of the accommodation is very good and Edi is always attentive to what you might need. I will definitely use it when I return to that beautiful city. 

Thanks, Edi!
Great location, clean, good response time, easy check-in/check-out. Excellent place to stay.
I was delighted with Jessica's accommodation. The apartment was cozy and stylish. Clean, organized, and accessible. Recommend!

This apartment was great for a group of 3 of us. The apartment was very clean and was nicely set up for our arrival with towels, toiletries provided. The apartment overlooks the main street which is full of nightlife and restaurants. With the windows open it could be a bit noisy, but when they are closed it was very quiet so it was not an issue! Having the metro so close made traveling the city very easy. The biggest challenge was parking; if you plan to have a car your only decent overnight options require you to walk quite a bit. Check-in was very easy and I would recommend this apartment for friends or couples looking to enjoy the Gay Village and downtown Montreal.
Great place, very comfortable and clean, and looks exactly as the photos show.
Great stay! Apartment was perfect.
Excellent apartment. Very clean, very convenient, very central, a 1-minute walk from the metro station. Perfect.
Great location and lovely suite. If you have a car, the best place to park is under the Grand Bibliothèque.

Lovely condo, looks exactly like the pictures. We had a great stay. The Sonder team are great communicators. Would definitely stay there again.

Keep in mind it is on St. Catherine in The Village, so there is some street noise. Also, the listing doesn't include parking so be sure to make alternate arrangements as the lot Sonder suggested was unattended and difficult to get a hold of.
Great location! Very spacious and cute decor. Bars and restaurants are steps away and centrally located for tourist attractions. Would definitely stay again.

My family of 5 (3 teenage daughters) stayed here for our August vacation this year (2017). Great apartment located in the middle of the gay village. Very clean and organized with lots of small restaurants around. The metro stop is on the same block and made getting to the rest of the city very easy.  Great windows and lots of light and views of St. Catherine Street which is pedestrian only in the summer. Lots of fun. 
There are two long sets of stairs up to get to the apartment so pack lightly. Also the air conditioner had a hard time keeping the front bedroom cool.
Nice, modern apartment in the heart of the Gay Village. Great amenities and perfect for 2-4 people as the rooms were separated and had everything you need.
The host cancelled this reservation 127 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Good value. The building entrance is a bit sketchy, but you'll be pleasantly surprised by the apartment itself! Sonder was very responsive and addressed all of our (relatively minor) issues.
Well-situated and proper! However, despite having the air conditioning set to its minimum (62 degrees Fahrenheit), it was very hot... only a slight inconvenience.
Super Airbnb!

Had an amazing mid-semester break here at Sonders! The host was very responsive and helpful with the few issues we had. Other than that, I recommend this place! Very close to nightlife and local attractions. Food was very close by, including a 24-hour convenience store and liquor store! The Sonders was very clean and up-to-date. The kitchen was fully stocked making cooking fun!
The Great Spot
Great apartment, very well located and spacious.
This place is very well located, super clean and comfortable. It surpassed our expectations and we could enjoy Montreal!
Great place, bright. Would stay again
Good location with prompt responses from the team!

Great location in the heart of the gay village with few hotels nearby. Beaudry subway station is one block away, but currently closed for renovations until June 2019 (other stops are a reasonable 7-8 block walk). The third floor unit faces St Catherine Street and may be a little noisy for light sleepers (especially on weekends), but it's not a problem for me.  The kitchen and main area are very spacious, but the bedrooms are a bit small.
Perfect place, very quiet, clean, and new with state-of-the-art appliances. Lucia and Emma are so friendly and warm, and I would definitely repeat my experience.
The host cancelled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Lucia and Emma are great hosts, friendly and easy to communicate with. The house was spotless and you can see that it has been recently renovated. It is located in a charming area close to downtown, but quiet enough for a restful night. Oh, and the bed is very comfortable. We recommend Emma and Lucia's home.
We felt very welcome and that the door was open if we needed to ask questions. Exceptional hosts! Thank you for the bandaid! ;)

Lucia and Emma were great hosts. The apartment was beautiful. There were lots of extra touches—clothes steamer, French coffee, a full kitchen supplied with pots and pans, oil, butter, and more. I look forward to my next visit. Thank you!!! My home away from home.

Place

Wonderful apartment, spacious, clean, fully equipped, comfortable, decorated with taste, bright, quiet, ... And for such a small price. Best value at that price point.

Location

Outside the center of Montreal, yet close to everything. 5-10min walk to green line subway station, 1min walk to line 107 bus stop, 10min subway to old Montreal, nice walk along the river just next to the apartment, market on street corner, bakery 5min walk away... Perfect for a romantic stay.

Hosts

Nice, available yet discreet, helpful.

Thanks Lucia and Emma, this was truly an amazing stay (and thank you for the extra coffee :))

I would 100% recommend this place

Communicating before arriving in Montreal was very easy and accommodating. I travel to Montreal for school, so coordinating times and keys always gets a little tricky but Lucia and Emma helped for a smooth transition into school life. I grew up in NDG and just love seeing the transformation of Verdun - such a fun place to hang out!
This place was very clean and cozy :) Thank you so much!

This was a fantastic experience. Lucia and Emma responded quickly to all of my questions and the place was warm, welcoming and very clean! I would absolutely stay here again. Thank you for your hospitality!
Our visit was perfect. Lucia and Emma responded to our questions very quickly and the apartment was very, very clean and well-equipped. We highly recommend staying here.

A great place to stay, it was very cozy. It had everything you might need for a weekend getaway. A good location close to a metro station. The neighborhood is very quiet. Staying here in the winter made the place very warm.

The apartment is very pleasant.
Lucia and Emma are welcoming and preventative.
Everything was perfect. We will definitely return!

This apartment is the best experience. It is so clean, excellent beds (and I am very picky), linens, etc. The bathroom remodel was updated in a very modern appeal. The kitchen was very well stocked. There were very nice special little touches that showed the detail and care the owners put into it. From the bottled water to the great coffee, the organic teas, and teapot. Just a wonderful, comfortable, warm feeling to the place. Updated bathroom, kitchen, washer dryer, wi-fi, mixed with a taste of refinished hardwood floors, and EXCELLENT firm beds. I highly recommend this to be your first choice. Thank you Lucia & Emma for making us feel at home.
The space was equipped with everything you need for a great stay in Ottawa. Its location allowed us to explore the sights and experience multiple parts of Ottawa.
We stayed there for two nights and we had a wonderful time. Everything was clean and perfect. We felt at home and enjoyed having a kitchen. We would definitely stay here again!
Great place with all the necessary kits. Quiet & clean apartment. Easy communication with Lucia & Emma. Thank you for your place.

The apartment was very clean and cozy. It's well connected (we didn't mind walking 10 minutes from the metro station). The area is quiet and there are shops nearby. Everything needed in the apartment. All in all, it was a great stay and it would probably be even more valuable for two couples.
Very beautiful apartment, modern and clean.
The proximity of the river and the metro makes it an ideal place to stay in Montreal.
The apartment is just perfect, cozy and modern. The hosts were very good with their instructions upon arrival and met us before we left. Perfect place to stay in Montreal.
Very nice apartment! As per the photos, it was very clean and cozy :)
I had a great experience, Lucia and Emma were available and friendly. The apartment was lovely and very clean. Would stay again!

This was such a great place to stay! 15 minutes walking distance to the subway station and 3 minutes walking distance to the nearest market. It was clean and modern as well! I love this place and I highly recommend it!
Nice home with great amenities, comfortable and cozy!

Lucia & Emma's place is absolutely lovely! And I cannot believe how good of a deal it is! Everything has been recently updated and was designed very tastefully. The kitchen is fully furnished if you want to cook there (although during our stay the oven wasn't working, but the stovetop was), coffee is provided, there's a washer and dryer in the unit (with detergents provided!), the living room was lovely although the TV didn't have a DVD player. The bedrooms were wonderful - comfy beds and full-size mirrors and hanging racks in both. Even a clothes steamer. The bathroom was lovely too - best shower we've had all trip! Amazing water pressure and soft towels. Basically, lots of attention to detail made this stay just perfect! And the host was very kind and easy to work with. Communication was easy, although not excessive, and she made sure we had everything we needed. Isn't the ideal location in the city if you want to walk to attractions, but you could tell that by a map. We knew that going in, but it was such a good deal and cozy stay it was worth it for sure!

Highly recommend. A great place if you're looking for quiet and private. Perfect amount of space. Very clean, with the convenient necessities (laundry, coffee, shampoo etc). Lucia and Emma are easy to communicate with and very welcoming. Stay here!

The Verdun neighborhood is full of character and Lucia & Emma's upper-storey apartment is classic Montreal, very cozy and convenient. There's plenty of free on-street parking and it's only a short 15-minute walk to the subway. Highly recommended.
Very clean & comfortable place! Close to public transportation, in a nice quiet neighborhood.
Good

The apartment is really nice and clean located in a quiet area. Within a 10-minute walking distance, you arrive at the metro station which is not far from Montreal's Old City. Thank you, Lucia and Emma, for your great hospitality. We would recommend it anytime :)
Clean, comfortable, near public transportation, cafes, restaurants, and a park. Lucia and Emma are lovely and very helpful. Highly recommended!

I thoroughly enjoyed my week-long stay at Lucia and Emma's place. Their flat is incredibly clean, spacious, and well organized, and it has all the necessary kitchen, bathroom, laundry, and bathroom amenities. It is also very well-situated, within easy walking distance of the St. Lawrence River and with very easy public transit access by bus or metro to downtown and points north, south, and east. An incredible value! Lucia and Emma are very welcoming, communicative, and accommodating hosts. I will certainly stay with Lucia and Emma the next time I visit Montreal.
Great location, easy access to downtown and local markets, yet far enough away to be in a neighborhood.
Great place to stay and I would stay at Emma's place again if I go back to Montreal and the host is very responsive and easy to communicate with.
Fantastic place to stay on a budget. It is somewhat far from the main attractions, but Uber is available in Montreal. Everything was very clean. Communication was always very pleasant and prompt.

Very nice apartment, located within a 10-minute walk of a metro station.  
Fast access to the city center.

Very clean, spacious, bright, very well-equipped with appliances, excellent bedding, very quiet, all shops nearby, public transportation (buses, metro...)!!!!... We can even observe playful squirrels!!!!...
Absolutely amazing hosts, so friendly and helpful with suggesting places to visit. The apartment was great and was only a 15-20 minute commute to downtown via public transportation.

Lucia and Emma are the best hosts ever. Friendly and very welcoming. Always available if you need any assistance. The apartment is so comfortable and clean. You feel at home during your stay. My home away from home. Thank you Lucia and Emma. I can't wait till my next visit to Montreal.

Wonderful hosts! The apartment was incredibly clean and perfect for guests. It was about a mile walk to the metro and a short Uber ride to the bustling Wellington Rue area. I highly recommend Lucia and Emma's place.

Lucia and Emma's place was perfect for my stay. The apartment is pretty and light-filled. All the touches are there to make for a lovely stay - comfortable, quiet bedrooms, a kitchen equipped for a brewed coffee or cooking up a storm, a clean, sleek bathroom. There's a great grocery store on the corner and coffee and bagels a block away. Buses run two minutes away and the metro is a flat walk, 15 minutes. Great value in a good neighborhood.
Emma and Lucia were really helpful hosts. The location of the apartment is perfect for bike tours in and around Montreal. Karen

We enjoyed the space and decor of the apartment, and used the veranda for an evening meal which was great. Verdun metro station is nearby and worth a visit in itself. A walk down to the St Lawrence is a really good option as well.
Excellent location. Nice and open space with all the required amenities. Close to stores and restaurants, and not too far from the metro. We really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it.

Lovely, clean and comfortable second-floor townhouse flat. Need to be able to climb the winding external stairs (very common in this neighborhood). Enjoyed the full kitchen for morning coffee and DIY breakfast before heading out for the day. Great location - just "outside the city" enough to enjoy quiet evenings, but a few steps from the bus stop to the metro for easy access anywhere else. Bank for ATM just down the street, along with lots of restaurants, and a fresh fruit vendor on the corner. Get yourself a transport pass and enjoy Montreal!
Great experience with Lucia and Emma. Their place was as shown in the pictures. It was very clean and quiet. Good communication and they live right downstairs. Would definitely stay here again.
Quiet area, good welcome, excellent value for money

Lucia and Emma are kind and always available to help you. 
Their apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood, very pleasant and close to the metro. There is also a bus line that goes to the city center. 
If you want tranquility, this is an ideal place.
Perfect accommodation and highly recommended... we had a very pleasant stay. The neighborhood is very nice and close to public transportation

It's a lovely apartment located in a quiet neighborhood. You have easy access to public transportation. Restaurants and grocery stores are also very nearby. The apartment is well-equipped with nice furniture. Lucia and Emma have been very helpful, thank you very much.
This is absolutely the best place on Airbnb we've stayed!
Clean and well-equipped apartment. Comfortable bed and pillows. Friendly neighborhood convenience store nearby. We recommend this place.

Housing located in a residential neighborhood. A grocery store/corner shop/bakery is located within 100 meters, which is very convenient. Some fast food restaurants are nearby. A small balcony allows you to enjoy the outdoors. The apartment is well-equipped and clean. Noise from construction work on the street next door forced us to get up early! The advantage is that we were able to fully enjoy our 3 days in Montreal. We recommend this accommodation.

Great apartment with a super kitchen and a great balcony. WLAN 1a. Quiet location, with super shopping opportunities around the corner. Montreal is easily reachable by car. Nice playground 2 minutes walk away and from there also walking and cycling paths along the river. We would definitely stop there again.

This apartment was quiet and convenient to the Metro station. We enjoyed the fluffy towels and pristine bed linen. We need to return to Montreal to finish exploring after having a day off because of illness. Just remember that it is up outside stairs to the apartment which wasn't a problem for us but might have bothered some people.
So warm and cozy place! We love it like our own home!

We had a wonderful stay, the apartment description was exactly as described. Lucia and Emma were very welcoming. The squirrels were there on time. 
The apartment is spacious, clean and self-contained.
Thank you Lucia and Emma

The place was as advertised. Very clean, with plenty of space. It was a little difficult to find parking a couple times, but that was partly due to road construction in the area. We would definitely stay there again!

Very good stay, pleasant apartment, the neighborhood is quiet and well served by bus and metro, close to Saint Laurent River, beautiful promenade. 

We appreciated the amenities (sheets, house linen, some products available). The nice weather allowed us to have dinner outside on the terrace...see you next year perhaps.
We have the habit of staying with Emma and Lisa when we come to Montreal, and we appreciate their location near the river as much as the brightness and comfort of their apartment!

Accurate description of the apartment provided by hosts. The apartment is very clean and nice. All basic kitchen utensils and cutlery are available. The washing machine and dryer were also a plus. Lucia and Emma were warm and welcoming. Very helpful as needed. The location is okay. Not too far from the metro station, and a short train ride to downtown. I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone!
Lucia and Emma were super nice hosts, always contactable and very kind. Their house is really pretty and has everything you need. I totally recommend it, and would love to stay there again.

Quiet neighborhood, good bedding!
A cozy apartment. We enjoyed our one-week stay and recommend it!
Great space! Really easy check-in and check-out, nicely decorated, clean, and located in a great area of Montreal.

Lucia and Emma's place is very conveniently located, about 15 minutes from both the airport and downtown Montreal. The home itself is fully equipped (kitchen, bathroom, bedrooms) and is fresh, clean, and cozy! There was always a parking space or two available on the street nearby. Emma even came up to shovel snow off the balcony for us. Overall a wonderful stay. Thank you girls!

It's a beautiful place, the neighborhood is nice. There's a little gourmet market just a few meters from our house that is amazing for having high-quality supplies for dinner and something to drink. The transportation is good and easy to get around during daily hours. We highly recommend this place to enjoy Montreal.

The accommodation is clean and well-maintained, with basic cooking utensils provided. The laundry facilities are also well-kept, making it convenient during my stay.  The bedding was clean and the price was reasonable compared to other accommodations in the area. I would definitely consider this place for future trips to this region. Additionally, the hosts were very kind and quickly cleared snow from the entrance and steps on days with snowfall, allowing me to live comfortably. This is a place I would like to stay again.

Excellent place to stay. Emma was very accommodating and helpful when our flight was canceled and we were stuck for an extra night. It's a bit of a distance from downtown, but it's a fairly short walk to the subway! I would definitely stay here again.
This is your cozy oasis away from home, a must-recommend.
Great place to stay. Very clean and quiet place

My son and I stayed in the apartment provided to us by Emma. We were enchanted by the clarity of this place as well as Emma's comfort and availability when answering our questions. Very comfortable bedding, a very pleasant and quiet place. The Tondreau market is just 2 steps away and offers great freshness and affordability... A big thank you to Emma, we will definitely return on our next trip with great pleasure. I would recommend it without any doubt.
Nice place, spacious and super clean. Will definitely come back again for sure.
Pleasant stay the second time around. The place was a bit dusty for my liking.

I am an expert in translation and many people's lives depend on my work. 

Here is the translated text:

**"Staying for two weeks, I came to visit."**


**Apartment very comfortable, warm, bright and cozy.**
**Good internet connection, equipped kitchen, spacious bathroom and well-furnished bedrooms. Close to the metro and shops.**

**Emma is an exceptional host! Very welcoming and available. The apartment was very clean upon arrival.**

**Highly recommended!"** 



Please note that I have translated the text as it is written in French.

This is the second time I stayed at Emma's place, and it was again a wonderful experience. Emma is a very warm and generous host who is very responsive and communicates very well. The flat is very spacious (2 bedrooms) and well-organized, very clean, and very much as advertised ("bright, cozy, quiet").  The location, with easy access to public transit (both bus and metro) to get downtown or around southwest Montreal and also being a short walk from the St. Lawrence River and its walk/bike pathway, can't be beat. Given all of these positives, it is also a great value. I will always stay here when visiting Montreal if Emma's flat is available.

Spacious, clean, cozy apartment. Enjoyed it very much. Good base to see the city from, either by car (there is parking in front) or subway (walking distance from station). Quiet residential neighborhood. The only thing worth noting if someone has accessibility needs is that there is a bit of a steep staircase to reach the apartment. It worked out well for us and we would stay here again.
Great place! Clean and very welcoming!

This accommodation is well-equipped and furnished, very bright and pleasant to live in. The terrace is particularly nice. The bed is comfortable as is the sofa. 

The banks of the Saint Laurent are very close and relaxing, the Verdun metro station is a 15-minute walk away but a bus connects it. A grocery store full of tempting products is located at the corner of the street.

Emma was able to respond quickly and efficiently to any minor problems that arose. It's very easy to contact her and have a conversation with her.

The apartment is bright, spacious, very clean and located in a very quiet neighborhood close to all amenities (bus, metro, shops, service station...)

The small terrace is really an advantage in the summer, very pleasant. 

Emma is truly very kind, available and accommodating as she allowed us to leave our luggage before our flight. We had an excellent stay at Emma, she deserves her title of "super host" without a doubt! Thank you so much for everything and we'll see you again soon in Montreal.
Well-received accommodation in a very good location, bright, clean and impeccable

Our stay at Emma's apartment was nice. Spacious, cozy! I fell in love with her couch:). It would have been 200% top experience if the housemaid had cleaned the apartment properly before we arrived. My mother-in-law is very sensitive to cleanliness. We contacted Emma and she reacted quickly and fixed this issue the day after. Emma is easy to contact, even if she lives in the apartment downstairs, she is very discreet. She is easygoing and has good advice on what to do in Montreal. Anyway, for the rest we really enjoyed our stay and felt comfortable. I recommend this place. Perfect for couples or small families.

This apartment is spacious, bright, modern and clean. The fans were very helpful to keep us cool at night. Laundry was also a convenient addition, and there is even a steamer for any formal wear. The kitchen is well stocked with everything you'd need to make a few meals, and there is a little produce market on the corner. A nice walk to Verdun Metro station although wouldn't do this alone at night. The neighbors were very friendly. Loved the iconic outdoor spiral staircase, although I imagine this is tough in winter. Will be recommending this place to friends. It's quite a bargain for exploring the neighborhoods of Montreal.

Emma is a great host! Her apartment is nice, cozy, clean and located in a nice neighborhood. There's a great small grocery store right next corner and a very nice breakfast place two blocks away. There are also many playgrounds within walking distance (10 minutes) right by the water, which we really appreciated. We traveled with our two kids (4 and 2) and even they got up very early (jetlag) there were no complaints. Thanks for that and sorry again! We enjoyed our stay very much!

Emma is a very good hostess. The apartment is in a very quiet area of the city. It's well-connected by bus and metro, very close by. There is a commercial street very close by with shops and restaurants.
Comfortable apartment in a great location. Metro and grocery stores nearby. Friendly and discreet host. Suitable place for families with children. We recommend this address
The apartment is very nice but the only problem is that it was not in the center of Montreal.

Emma's apartment seemed to be very well located, allowing us to enjoy a typical neighborhood without tourists, with shops easily accessible on foot (the Tondreau market at the corner of the street and several small restaurants on Wellington Street), downtown within 30 minutes walk or metro, and the Saint Laurent River and Lachine Rapids.

The street is quiet, the apartment sunny, well-ventilated, and for this season, the heating is efficient.
Thank you Emma for her friendly welcome.
Translation: Apartment very well located near the metro and shops with everything you need to have a great stay!

I stayed for a month in this comforting and quiet space. Everything a traveler needs in a lovely neighborhood within a 10-minute walk of the Metro. The fast internet connection was a nice plus. Emma's communications were quick and warm. Shoveling the snow off of the outside staircase and salting the steps was greatly appreciated. I hope to stay again on my next trip to Montreal.
Pleasant accommodation, as described. We also enjoyed the squirrel show in the street every morning. Thank you, Emma!

Emma is a discreet and available host! Her accommodation is clean, functional, and fully equipped! We stayed there without any difficulty with a child! The beds are super comfortable!!! We will definitely go back! :)
The place was really nice, clean, and had many amenities! A local family-owned grocery store just down the street made it easy to get last-minute groceries.
pleasant
Great apartment with modern amenities. Hot shower and quiet.
I loved the apartment, very well located. It has the option of walking to the metro (12 minutes) or taking a bus. Very beautiful and organized. I recommend it!

My neighborhood and house are very nice! Everything went well. I recommend it. The shops and the metro are right next door. 

Emma is a very attentive and available host.
Apartment very well located to visit Montreal! Clean and perfectly matches the description

We enjoyed our stay at Nicole's apartment. It is a very nice neighborhood. Convenient for us as it is close to where our son lives with his family. The apartment is nice, well-equipped, a bit quirky but comfortable. Our hostess was most gracious and accommodating. There are a couple of drawbacks for some people. We had hoped to have a queen-size bed, which did not happen. And if you have trouble walking up 32 steps, it may not be for you. All in all, a nice place to stay.

Eva & Jean Paul
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.
The reception was perfect with a family member of Nicole who lives just next door.

The proposed apartment is very beautiful, decorated and arranged with care, originality and quality. We appreciate that it has a large terrace adjacent to the kitchen. The Outremont neighborhood offers beautiful streets conducive to walks, and the apartment being close to a subway station, it is very well located. It is also very comfortable and spacious even for 4 people. Thank you very much Nicole!

Jean-François is very kind, generous, and welcoming. He has everything covered and more. He offered breakfast which was very kind of him. He is a very interesting man and talking to him was always thought-provoking. The room was in excellent condition and so was the flat overall. The area is quiet and ideal for your stay in Montreal.
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.

Martine was amazing. The apartment was so stunning that we spent more time here than out in the city. She was generous with her time checking out, responded to texts immediately, and made us feel extremely welcome. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

We really enjoyed staying in this beautiful apartment with a garden for a month. We were two, very comfortable in this large space, with a nice kitchen, a cozy living room, two big bedrooms and a super bathroom. The apartment was renovated and is brand new. It's very well located, next to good food stores and a great cafe. It's very quiet, with the garden overlooking a green alley. Martine is very attentive and we were happy to meet her.
The host cancelled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Three good! Easy and proper!
The place was great! The location is a foodie's dream, with so many restaurants! The place was also very cute, small, but clean and perfect for the two of us.
Daniel was a very welcoming and responsive host. The listing was perfectly located, impeccably clean, and nicely decorated. I would definitely recommend this listing!
Amazing host, amazing place! We enjoyed our stay, Daniel was incredibly helpful, and the apartment was very clean. If we ever find ourselves back in Montreal, we'd definitely go back.
Great communication and central location.
Daniel is the best! Super friendly, very helpful, and incredibly responsive. Don't miss out on this guy!

Dan was an excellent host who went above and beyond to make my check-in and stay as smooth as possible. The room was exactly as pictured. It's just a few steps from the Metro which is a real convenience when it's cold and snowy. This was my first experience with Airbnb, and it was a good one.

Unfortunately, my stay at Daniel's apartment was not good. Despite the excellent location, the apartment only accommodates a couple. My husband and I were traveling with our 15-year-old daughter, and the apartment had only one double bed and the third accommodation was a punctured air mattress. We immediately notified Daniel about the issue, but it took him 12 hours to respond and he demanded a photo of the punctured mattress to verify the information. As it was Christmas Eve, he informed us that we couldn't buy a new one or borrow another mattress and that we were unlucky. We stayed there for another three days alternating between my daughter and I on a two-seater sofa so as not to sleep on the floor in full Canadian winter. Furthermore, there was no washing machine or dryer as advertised. I recommend this place only for couples; it's not suitable for families and Daniel is an unreliable host.
The apartment was in a fantastic location and was cute and clean. Daniel was easily accessible if we had any questions or concerns.
Response time was excellent and ensured everything was in order both before and after arrival.

Daniel was an excellent host. He was very easy to communicate with, and the apartment was spectacular. Everything looked exactly as it appeared in the photos. The location was a short walk to downtown, and our stay was enjoyable. 

Thank you for everything!

The apartment is cute and comfortable and perfectly located, and Daniel and his team were exceptionally responsive whenever we had a question, so we were happy with our stay. It's very small, though, so I'm not sure I would recommend it for long-term stays for more than one person; it started feeling a bit cramped a few days into our stay. But for short visits to the city, I would definitely recommend it!
Great place and awesome location!
Everything is good except the bathroom is too small.
Great location steps from the metro and St Catherine's shops and restaurants!

Very cute place, within steps of the metro station, shopping and restaurants. It's smaller than it looks in the photos so I think it's best for one or two travelers. We had 3 and it was a little tight. Very clean and neat. Daniel and Diana were very quick with any questions we had. I had problems using the Kevo app but found, that if you touch the lock, before you try to open/close it, it worked much faster. Would definitely recommend for a couple or single traveler. Thanks again!
Great place for two

This apartment is in a fantastic location - extremely central with easy access to stores, restaurants, and public transport. The room was very clean and tidy with no unnecessary clutter of any sort. It's small, cozy, and perfect for a solo traveler or a couple/friends who are comfortable sharing a bed, however 3 people would be a tight fit. Daniel was very easy to reach and a great communicator even though we didn't get a chance to meet him in person. He answered all questions and made sure we were comfortable with the check-in process. Overall, we had a fantastic stay at this apartment - excellent value in a perfect Montreal location.

This apartment is in a great location, it's a very central area of the city where you can find everything within walking distance. The unit itself is cute and clean. Perfect for couples and short stays. Daniel was very friendly and accommodating, easy to communicate with as well.
Great service and lovely place!
Such a great spot! We were able to walk to the Belle Center, great location. Super comfy bed! Stay here if you can!
The place is great and close to everything. + the host was also very nice.
Great central location downtown, nice clean room as depicted. Recommended!

We enjoyed our stay in #203. It was small, but good for a short stay for two people. 
Check-in was easy and Daniel was easy to reach by email if needed. 
It was in a great location near lots of restaurants and only a 12-minute walk to the Bell Centre for concerts and sports. The building was noisy at times and we did hear our neighbors and street noise, but overall it was a good price and good location.

A very unique place within walking distance of most amenities. The space is relatively small but you won't be spending most of your time indoors, so it shouldn't be a big deal. Adding plungers for each bathroom would definitely improve some people's experience because you never know. We also had issues with the Wi-Fi; it would either not connect or, when it was connected, it was quite slow. 

Overall, we had a good experience and saved money compared to standard hotel prices in the same area.
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.

Daniel is a fantastic host, very accommodating and easy to communicate with. The studio in downtown Montreal is comfortable with modern décor, and offers a location that allows you to easily navigate the city on foot.
It's a very pleasant place in an excellent location within the city. We received it in very good condition of cleanliness.
Nice location and host, but small studio
Loved staying there, and would definitely stay again! Everything was seamless and being right in downtown made it all the more convenient! Daniel was a great host and very communicative!
Great location, a couple blocks from the nightlife. Nice apartment with everything you need and it looks exactly like the pictures.
Great place in a convenient location!
Very nice apartment with an incredible location to enjoy shopping, nightlife, and restaurants. Everything was perfect!
Never saw Daniel, but the place was well-kept and in a convenient location. He was always responsive to our questions via message.
Clean, walkable distance to great nightlife and restaurants - would recommend for a short stay for two.

Daniel was a pleasure to work with and very responsive in his communication. The location was ideal, being close to a main subway station and major attractions. The loft was exactly as described in a secure building. We will definitely book with Daniel again! A+
Right in the middle of downtown and communication was fast and efficient. The place is quite small, so it would only be comfortable if you weren't too many. Thanks Daniel :)
Great
This is a great place. Highly recommended.
Wonderful place to stay. Highly recommend it.

A truly very pleasant stay! 

Everything was as described beforehand, check-in and checkout worked flawlessly, so we could start the adventure right away. 
The insulation of the window front is a bit inconvenient at very cold temperatures, but if you use the curtains and cover the underside, it's also a great apartment even at -15°C. Communication with Daniel worked very well, although not all questions were fully answered. (Which for me is definitely no negative point ;) )

The location is an ideal starting point for exploring Downtown!
For this price/performance ratio, a very good choice and highly recommended. 

Anytime again, thank you and all the best!
Had a nice stay with Daniel, always quick to respond. Great location in the heart of Montreal!
Daniel's place was perfectly located near the metro and within walking distance of many great restaurants. He was so communicative and helpful, I would happily stay again. Thank you, Daniel!

"Best travel experience" - "BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT" - "The experience was first class" 
"The host was so hospitable and thoughtful" 
 
**Translation:**

"Best Travel Experience" - "Beautiful Apartment" - "First-Class Experience"
"Host was incredibly hospitable and thoughtful" 


Let me know if you'd like to explore other translation options or have any further requests!

Daniel's place is beautiful and in a great location as it is close to the subway. The facility was well maintained and Daniel ensured we were doing well throughout our trip; he is very responsive. 

The only con I have is that the place is a bit dusty and a tight squeeze for two people, especially when doing multiple tasks together. 

Other than that, it's a lovely place to stay and Daniel was an amazing host.
The apartment was very clean, located right in the city center, and very easy to check into. We had a great time!
Great location at a good price
Nice little place with a great location. Host was quick to respond and address everything we needed.
Excellent
The room is nice and very clean. It is easy to get to. I was completely satisfied and recommend it for everyone.
Good place

A well-placed, but small studio apartment, the location was super convenient being close to the Guy-Concordia train line and meant travel around the city was accessible and easy. With a view of Mont Royal, the not-too-taxing climb from the front door will soon reward you with an exceptional view of the city. The aircon was really welcome on the hot and humid summer nights.
Great place!
Great launch spot for Montreal nightlife.
This place is in a great location, and it was perfect for a romantic getaway in a modern space!
Daniel is easy to communicate with and will respond to your messages within an hour. The place is exactly as the pictures show. It's also very clean, and everything you need is available.

Daniel's place was my first Airbnb experience and I only have good things to say about it! Prime location, really close to St. Catherine street and Crescent street which both had tons of stuff. The apartment was exactly as pictured and nice and tidy. I would definitely recommend this place if you're looking into Downtown Montreal!
Great place to stay. Located in the heart of Montreal and right next to a metro station. The room was clean and provided all amenities.
Great location, close to Concordia, the Metro, and Rue St-Catherine.

Daniel was an excellent host during our weekend stay in Montreal. He was always quick to respond with help on any questions we had regarding the area, such as finding suitable parking, which can be difficult at times. Daniel also checked in on us halfway through our stay.

The loft itself is a great space for a single traveler or a couple. The area was close to many amazing local attractions and restaurants in downtown Montreal. We loved that many of these places were within walking distance for added convenience. Thank you, Daniel, for hosting!
Great place and location!
Very stylish and clean. Lovely place.
Daniel is a great host with quick responses, easy access to the place. The place is small but clean and comfortable.
great
Overall, a good stay in a great location. It's quite small, but adequate if you plan on spending most of your time out and exploring.
Great place to stay
Responsive host accommodated a last-minute reservation. Clean, quiet, and comfortable place.
The room is small, but it's only suitable for two people and not three. The kitchen space is very limited, so this apartment is suitable for people looking for a place to sleep, but nothing more.
Great location. Clean. Perfect little place.

Staying at Daniel's place was very enjoyable. This was our first time in MTL and the location was perfect. There was plenty of food and shopping within walking distance from the location, and a short $5 Uber ride to Old Port.
Perfect location to explore the city. Daniel was quick to respond and very helpful. The loft worked great as I was traveling solo
Greta's place is affordable, clean, and has a great host.
Small space, very small and not very clean, bathroom paint is also not good.
Nice place, accurate description, response time very quick. A bit smaller than I expected.
Cute loft in a great location!
A very clean and centrally located space, perfect for a weekend getaway to a new place. The metro is literally steps away from the door. I would highly recommend this as it's an amazing deal.
The house is very clean and the host is very helpful with everything!
We had a great stay at Daniel's place! The location is perfect, and Daniel was great to communicate with when we requested a late checkout. Would definitely recommend this place

Daniel's apartment was great! The apartment was so clean and exactly as shown in the photos. Daniel was always quick to respond and our check-in and check-out experience was seamless. We would definitely recommend staying in Daniel's apartment: great location, host, and space!
I do not recommend this place. I had a terrible experience

The host kept in contact and answered all my questions. The self check-in was smooth and efficient. The studio was very clean, cozy, with all the necessities; it does have a small bathroom that cannot fit two people at the same time, but this wasn't a problem for us. The studio is across from a fire station, so if you are a light sleeper it may not be the best place for you. I suggest placing a mat to keep salt/rocks during the winter seasons! However, it was a very good stay!
Good place, Great location
My mother and I stayed here for four days to see a concert at the Bell Centre. The location is amazing. It's the perfect spot for a weekend getaway, especially a downtown Montreal shopping trip!

This was my first time using Airbnb and had a great experience, will definitely use again! Patrick was a great host, very professional, friendly, and overall a great guy. The bedroom in which I stayed was very comfortable, there were fresh bed linens and towels ready for my arrival and the host made me feel welcomed. Patrick has a very spacious, nicely decorated apartment, that is in a great neighborhood close to the metro. The directions on how to arrive at the apartment using public transportation were fantastic. Patrick has a busy work schedule but I was able to enjoy a chat with him and having something to eat together. Would definitely recommend Patrick as a host to travelers going to Montreal.

Spotlessly clean, cool and very comfortable apartment in a nice neighborhood. We felt very lucky to have found such a great place at short notice and Patrick was the perfect host. Easily the best Airbnb experience we've had and would highly recommend Patrick and his place to anyone planning a trip to Montreal

Patrick and his place were awesome. Great location near a trendy area and very cool, clean, and tidy apartment. Very well equipped kitchen. We had fun chilling and chatting with Pat in the evenings - he suggested some awesome things for us to see which really made our time in Montreal! Highly recommended, you da man Pat.
It was a lovely apartment in a quiet but lively neighborhood. The room itself was neat and artistic! Patrick was a very nice and considerate landlord.
We had to cancel our reservation a few days before arrival, which must have been an annoyance to Patrick. However, he wished us a great trip and was very kind about it.

Great experience, would totally recommend it to anyone! Patrick is a very friendly and attentive host. He's always willing to give a recommendation about anything in Montreal! His stylish apartment is always clean and quiet and close to public transit. His dog is very friendly and respectful. Definitely a good experience!

I had a very pleasant stay at Patrick's place. He is an open person to discuss with and gives good advice about the city of Montreal and Quebec in general. His apartment is very well located and very clean. Don't hesitate to spend some time at his place, you will feel like home there.
A very good welcome from Patrick in a pleasant room and apartment. Thank you Patrick and see you soon!

Very nice place to stay, I definitely recommend it. The neighborhood is very quiet, easy to park your car in front. Downtown is a bit far by walk (1 hour at least, Montreal is huge!), but there is a subway station 5 minutes away and it will take you downtown in 20 minutes.
Great host, clean room. Beautiful apartment. Not very central, but easy to get places by metro.

Gorgeous old apartment with plenty of character in a beautiful neighborhood, a 5-minute walk from the metro station. It's a little ways from Downtown Montreal but there are plenty of shops and restaurants around the corner. Patrick is a great host, the bed was very comfy and the apartment was easy to find. Looks exactly like the pictures. Very quiet at night, the dog doesn't make any noise and is very calm.

I would definitely recommend this place, especially if you appreciate historic homes and wooded neighborhoods.

Patrick was an excellent host! He was very helpful in finding things to do in the city, the apartment was very close to the metro and it was easy navigating. The apartment was lovely with a sweet little balcony for enjoying snacks and drinks. I would absolutely consider returning to Patrick's welcoming home if we should return to Montreal.

Patrick was an excellent host, and it couldn't have been a better first experience with Airbnb. The house and the room were very clean, and the dog was very tame. Also, the location was ideal for arriving by car because you have the possibility to park on the street and walk to the metro.
Very enjoyable stay with Patrick! Super relaxed and easygoing. Friendly and helpful. Beautiful room with a wonderful view of the sunset. Thank you for such a memorable first stay in Montreal!

I had a comfortable stay at Patrick's house. He gave me good advice on where to look around. His place is spacious, tidy, and the location is great for foodies since the famous Jean-Talon market is within walking distance from the house. I can't help but go back for more oysters and cheeses. If you feel like cooking yourself, you can get the freshest produce at Jean-Talon. And it's a 3-minute walk to the subway, which takes just 20 minutes to reach downtown. Patrick's dog, Jarva, is super cute and friendly; he's very easy to get along with.

Excellent stay in Pat's adorable apartment. Spacious and bright bedroom, comfortable living room and kitchen well-equipped, all within a 10-minute walk of the metro and buses. Truly a great place to stay in Montreal! Pat is welcoming and super accommodating, you feel like home! I highly recommend it.

Slightly off-center location but close to the metro for getting into the city center. Some good addresses nearby (cinema, restaurants, supermarkets). The apartment is spacious.
