The bed is a bit small for 2 people. Overall, it's good for a few days if you want to discover the city. And don't hesitate to ask Patrick, he will be able to advise you.

Pat's place was great. I was a long-term guest and found it very comfortable and convenient. The animals were both sweet and it was a very nice place to stay. The metro was very convenient and parking was easy to find. I would highly recommend staying here!

Patrick was a welcoming and accommodating host. His place had a very relaxed, comfortable atmosphere. Everything was as I expected; all facilities were very adequate and efficient. The bed was super comfortable, I slept well. I agree it's the best spot in town!

Patrick was great, the room was great, and the location was great. His dog was friendly and never barked when we snuck in late. We would have hung out more but our schedules didn't align. All of his suggestions were spot-on; if we return to Montreal, we will definitely try to stay with him again.

I had booked another room but since there was a problem with that listing, I went to Patrick’s place. So it was a very last minute booking but he kindly accommodated me. He was very fast in answering the messages. Patrick and his girlfriend recommended some interesting restaurants, so ask them for that! ;)
The room was very clean with a comfortable bed. Also Patrick provided me some towels. The dog was very friendly, quiet, and respectful. The place was close to the metro (5 mins) so you can reach downtown in 25 mins.

This was our first time using Airbnb and it was a pleasant experience! We had a nice stay at Patrick's apartment and he is a very friendly and welcoming host. Thank you very much for letting us stay in your home!
Convenient location, comfortable bed, friendly welcome. Thank you so much, Patrick!

I had a good stay at Patrick's apartment. He was very responsive to messages and he was friendly and helpful in providing directions. His dog is quite sweet and quiet. The apartment is within walking distance of the subway and bus lines.  The room was as pictured in the listing.

Upon my first visit to Montreal, I was pleasantly surprised by the warm welcome and kindness of Patrick and his partner Edith. They are also very attentive to ensuring their guests feel comfortable and they are not hesitant to offer valuable advice for visiting Montreal.

Their apartment, decorated with a lot of taste, is spacious, clean, and well-maintained. The neighborhood is quiet and friendly, with the metro and all sorts of shops nearby. In short, another good reason for me to return to Montreal is to pay a little visit to Patrick and Edith.

We had a terrific stay at Patrick's place. The neighborhood was quiet and very lovely. The subway is just a five-minute walk, making the Jean Talon Market among many other sites and attractions easily accessible. The apartment itself was just as advertised, but with even more charm and was very clean. Patrick himself is very kind and responsive. I highly recommend staying with Pat and his cute dog (who is totally gentle and calm).
Thank you again, Patrick and Edith, for your warm welcome! We look forward to seeing you in Montreal!

I chose this apartment because it looked really chic and it absolutely didn't disappoint me. All the rooms are well-furnished (a sofa and several very comfortable chairs). The kitchen is fully equipped. The animals in the apartment were too adorable and extremely calm. Just a 5-minute walk from the Métro. Patrick and his girlfriend were very accommodating and respectful. I felt like home. A really excellent choice for a stay in Montreal.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay with Patrick and his lovely girlfriend. Their apartment was beautiful and conveniently located for public transportation. There is also a street just two blocks south with plenty of delicious restaurants and a lush park as well; the neighborhood is perfect and gave us a real sense of authentic Montreal while avoiding the overrun tourist areas. Their dog Java was a sweet heart and always the first to welcome us in. The hosts were a great resource and gave us many recommendations of things to do and places to visit during our stay. Overall, we had a terrific stay in Montreal and would love to return soon!

This place is exactly as pictured and is also very close to the metro. The Jean-Talon market is nearby, walkable, and there are a couple of great parks nearby. I would recommend both the space and the host.

I arrived in a well-maintained apartment by the owners who was adorable! The neighborhood was super nice with a metro station two steps from the accommodation! 
A must-repeat experience!
Dream home, period. Pat is a super nice host, and his place is super clean and cozy. Five minutes walk to the metro. Definitely will stay again. Highly recommended.
The place is a 5-minute walk to the metro and a nearby bus stop. Pat and his girlfriend Edith were friendly hosts. Edith recommended places to eat around as I was new to Montreal. Great stay

What a lovely and kind couple! I felt comfortable and at ease with them and they were both so good at recommending local spots and good places to go in town. I really appreciated that. The flat is lovely and light, only about 5 minutes walk from a metro station, as well as a park and the many cafes and shops on Beaubien. Highly recommend.
A very polite and friendly couple, close to the subway station with a market on the side. Very cozy and beautiful house besides being very clean.

Patrick's place was perfect and its great location made it super convenient to get around! The apartment is just as amazing as it looks in the photos and everything is kept in great condition. Being five minutes away from the Iberville metro station made it super easy for us to get from place to place and really make the most out of our stay! I would 100% recommend staying here to anybody and would gladly come back the next time I'm in the city.

This is by far my best Airbnb experience! 
Patrick and Edith are not just a lovely couple but wonderful human beings.  They were very amicable and were always available for any help or guidance.  About the place, it is designed and decorated with artsy touches, minimal yet deep, and very clean too. It has a pretty tranquil vibe to it and their dog and cat would be very nice company. For me, the balcony was the cherry on top.  The metro is 5 mins walk away and the grocery store is steps away - which is awesome.  And yeah, they have some pretty amazing recommendations so don't forget to ask them. :)

Will definitely visit again, highly recommended!
The host cancelled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Sophia was a wonderful host. She met us on time when we arrived and showed us the apartment and the facilities. She was reachable 24/7. The location was great for me as it was in the heart of downtown surrounded by shops and restaurants. Inside the apartment, it was clean and quiet. I would definitely stay there again.

Sophia is an amazing host. We felt very welcomed and at home. Her place is in a central location, minutes away from all the main attractions and restaurants! We absolutely loved our stay and would definitely come back!

My stay in Sophia's apartment was amazing; not only was it aesthetically pleasing but the location was perfect (Downtown). Everything was within walking distance. Sophia was a great host... she was always willing to answer any questions and provide suggestions on what to do and places to visit. Her hospitality was incredible. She was also very helpful, understanding, and accommodating. I would definitely recommend her to anyone wanting to visit Montreal. I will definitely come again!!!

I did not love this place, though the pictures on the profile looked super nice! It was dirty and hardly anything in the kitchen. A few plates and glasses, a small pot and pan - not for making any dinners at home. I even had to get my own coffee cup! Also, the bed was very hard for me, but others might like that. 
I will not visit here again.

First time visiting Montreal and we couldn't have picked a better place. The condo was within walking distance of everything. Restaurants, shopping, transit - it's near everything. The place was spotless when we arrived. Sophia communicated everything in a timely manner. We can't wait to come back here to stay at her place again.
It was downtown. Everything was close by. The spot was clean. Loved it.

Thank you Sophia for being such a great host! The apartment was exactly as pictured and her hospitality was amazing. She responded to all of our questions and even offered to purchase movies from her TV for us to watch. The place was also extremely clean and private. Not to mention the location is close to shops, restaurants, and anything you might need. I enjoyed my stay there!
Three beautiful apartments, recently renovated, have everything you need to live there.  Just missing some hair products and the TV. Otherwise, it's very good, thank you!

Sophia was an excellent host. She was always readily available for help or advice whenever we needed it. The apartment was outstanding and exactly as pictured in the photos. I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Montreal!

Sophia's place is really beautiful and has everything you would want and need to have a great time in Montreal. It's within walking distance of everything, so there's no shortage of options after you check in. She was also an excellent host who checked in with us to make sure everything was alright and if we were enjoying ourselves, and was open to communicate whenever, and gave quick, helpful responses when contacted. I highly recommend this place for anyone wanting to stay in Montreal, and it's at a reasonable price which is always great!
Sophia was a lovely host and the condo was perfect for a few days in downtown Montreal. Ultra modern, totally renovated, very clean and great downtown central location. Would definitely come back.

Sophia was an excellent host! Easy check-in (even though we were late, she easily accommodated our arrival time), incredibly clean, and a great location. The apartment is within walking distance of pretty much everywhere we went and is easy to access. I would definitely stay here again.
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great location right on St Catherine's Street, clean, quiet, modern and Sophia was a wonderful host.
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.
Very central, entrance is on a street with lots of restaurants and stores.
Sophia was an excellent host! I had a wonderful stay.
Modern clean apartment in a lively location.
We loved staying at Sophia's clean, modern apartment in downtown Montreal!
Good location, close to the subway and convenience stores. The apartment is clean and nice.
Very clean listing; host was timely with communication; check-in was easy
Great location, lovely place, but unsuitable for children or pregnant individuals.
Good location, the apartment was the perfect size and just enough for a weekend.

Here is the translated text:

Will list a few key things to help other travelers out:

- The loft is wonderful and perfect for a couple or family of 3-4. The bed is a double, which makes it a tight fit for two adults but it gets the job done.
- The location is definitely A+ and you will be extremely happy. It's within walking distance to a plethora of restaurants, shopping, as well as miscellaneous stores (Shoppers Drugmart, Convenience Store, etc.).
- Bixi bikes are located within 20 feet of the entrance/exit, making it even more enjoyable to ride a bike throughout Montreal.
- Uber is extremely accessible to and from this space, and I didn't spend more than $20 to get from the Airbnb to the casino, Schwartz Deli, Old Montreal, etc.
- The host provided us with towels, cleaning supplies, soap, etc., for our stay although we did use our own.
- Pictures in the listing are 100% accurate and you won't see any surprises.
- Wifi is also available at this location as well for those who rack up data usage.

Overall, I give this space a 5/5. This was my first Airbnb stay as well as my first time in Montreal, and I thoroughly enjoyed it. I will be booking this space again if I do come back to Montreal soon.

THANK YOU!
Excellent location with access to restaurants and the metro.
Great communication! The condo was beautiful!!  Will definitely stay again next summer!
The host cancelled this reservation 106 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Cancelled my booking a few hours before check-in.  To make matters worse, I booked three months in advance. Would not recommend it to anyone, and the entire experience has made me turn away from Airbnb.
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Unal was very easy to reach and extremely helpful. He was very responsive and had an answer to every question we asked. The apartment was very nice, newly renovated, and looked exactly like the pictures. I recommend staying there!

I stayed here for 9 weeks. The apartment was clean and well-stocked when I arrived. The internet and TV (which has Netflix) were all very nice. The apartment is modern and well-designed. I never had any issues with noisy neighbors or problems. A great spot for a longer-term stay.
We like this clean and very functional apartment. It's basically but fully furnished, so we can relax here.

Unal's place was perfect for our six-week stay in Montreal. The apartment was newly refurbished so everything was very clean and in great condition. Unal has created a very welcoming living space for guests, and the fast internet connection and Netflix were a big bonus. The location was also great for exploring the city both on foot and by public transport. Communication with Unal was very clear and easy. He's a very friendly and welcoming guy so we felt at home right away, and if we had questions or needed anything he responded very quickly. We would definitely stay again and recommend Unal's place to anyone visiting Montreal.

Elise and Bernard's apartment is in a very good location, on a quiet and pleasant street. There is the Jean Talon market not far away as well as a metro station within minutes. 

The apartment is bright, clean and very well equipped. The bedding is fabulous. 

Elise and Bernard welcomed us very warmly and they have always been very available. I highly recommend this accommodation without hesitation.
We absolutely adored our stay at Elise's place. The apartment was extremely clean and the location was ideal.
The host cancelled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Excellent location in a very pleasant neighborhood. Spacious apartment perfectly equipped. Very warm welcome. Private parking, a big plus in the area. 

A recommendation!

The value of this booking was incredible. It was a lovely large one-bedroom (by NYC standards!) within walking distance of the subway and bike share. Bernard, the neighbor, was extremely thoughtful and helpful as Elise was out of town and we couldn't have asked for more!

I was their first guest and I had a great time. Collin and Sandy are very welcoming and happy to help you get around the city. 

The room is more than what you need. The bed is big enough for two people, and you have space in the room to put all your luggage. Even though they say the room is under construction, I think it's more than what you need for a few days.

The apartment is very clean, and they allow you to use the kitchen to cook. 

They both speak English and French; Collin is German, and Sandy is really good at Spanish, so language shouldn't be a problem.

The location is great, so overall it's a great place to spend a few days getting around Montreal

Hello!

Our stay with Collin and Sandy was very good. They are a really nice, interesting, respectful couple who give great advice! The apartment is super clean, cozy, pleasant, and they have done a great job decorating it! Plus, the apartment is truly in an amazing location!!! 

Thank you again to them! See you soon.

A big thank you to Sandy and Collin for their warm welcome. The room was very comfortable, the apartment superbly well-placed, right on the plateau, just two steps from Mount Royal Park and a short walk from downtown. We were able to explore all of Montreal on foot. 

Collin and Sandy were very attentive hosts and full of helpful advice.

My daughter and I had two great nights with Collin and Sandy. Their apartment is immaculate, bright, and perfectly located. So close to the subway and plenty of shops and parks right in the neighborhood. The best part, though, was the delicious morning food at Kouing Amman. Sandy and Collin were very good hosts. Welcome to Canada!

My brother and I went to Montreal for three nights and stayed with Sandy and Collin, and we really enjoyed our stay a lot! Their apartment is perfectly located, clean, beautiful, bright, and cozy. Also, they are very nice hosts, easy to be around, friendly and helpful, and even offered to take us on their Sunday trip. Thanks to our hosts!

I highly recommend it!

My friend and I had a wonderful stay with Colin and Sandy. They were extremely nice and welcoming, and we felt very comfortable. The bedroom was bright and quite spacious, and the bed was comfortable too. The location was amazing! The metro was maybe a 5-minute walk, and the main street was just around the corner from the apartment. We would definitely stay here again! Thanks again, Colin and Sandy!

Collin and Sandy are the perfect hosts! I can't stress enough how perfect the location really is. The place is clean, tidy, and comfortable. Above all — it's refreshing meeting smart, like-minded folks :) would love to stay at Collin & Sandy's next time I visit Montreal.

A pleasure to discover Montreal in those conditions.

Welcoming hosts, very pleasant apartment, very well maintained/clean and great location. 

The disposition of the room is top, allowing us to keep our privacy.

Easy to communicate with Sandy and Collin. 
They reply quickly to any emails/questions, they make you feel comfortable. 

An enjoyable experience in their apartment, even in a cold winter!

Thank you.

Collin and Sandy's place was lovely. The location is very accessible from Mont Royal Station. Most of the good and cheap eateries were around the corner. They were very hospitable and the room we stayed in was clean and cozy.

I had a great first experience in Montreal thanks to Collin and Sandy. I booked the room last minute and they were very understanding. Their apartment is really cute, big, cozy, and the room is super comfortable. They live in a great lively neighborhood, close to a convenient train station and tons of cool bars, restaurants, shops, and cafes. They provide plenty of good advice and make you feel at home right away. If you're looking for an easy, affordable, and comfortable stay, look no further. This is the spot.
Collin and Sandy were great hosts, I would definitely recommend their place for anyone visiting Montreal. Their place is very comfortable and well-kept, and the location is superb.

Colin and Sandy's apartment was an absolutely perfect place for my boyfriend and I to spend a week in Montreal. The location could not be better - we were able to easily access everywhere we wanted to go. Most things were within walking distance. Colin and Sandy were great hosts as well, making us feel comfortable and welcome in their home, and giving us great advice on places to go in the city. Thanks Colin and Sandy!
Everything is the same as the pictures.

We felt like "at home" in this apartment run by a super kind and delicate couple. The apartment and bedroom are beautifully decorated with large volumes and parquet floors. We fell in love with the neighborhood. We're two steps away from the metro, cafes, restaurants... basically an address you can't miss!

A warm welcome and a young couple, open and welcoming, are the characteristics of our hosts Sandy and Colin.  

A pleasant and quiet room located in a lively and vibrant neighborhood just two steps from a metro station are the advantages we particularly appreciated during our stay. 

We highly recommend this excellent address for a stay in MONTREAL at the PLATEAU, close to an excellent patisserie and Parc du Mont Royal. 

Thank you, Colin and Sandy, for contributing to this pleasant stay in the Quebec metropolis. 

Isa and Philippe P

Really enjoyed my weekend in Montreal. The apartment was in a fantastic location - right on the doorstep of several good restaurants and Mont Royal. Colin & Sandy were very friendly and gave some great restaurant/brunch recommendations. Would definitely recommend it to others.
The apartment is comfortable, just like the bedroom. The host is pleasant and available.

We stayed with Colin and Sandy in late April and had a fantastic time. We only got to meet Colin as Sandy was traveling.  Colin is an open, welcoming, kind (and handy ;) ) person and it's very pleasant to chat and spend time with him. The apartment is very well located, beautifully decorated, and the room very nice. Metro, Montroyal Park, small restaurants, shops, and a bakery are all nearby. We highly recommend a stay with them and we will definitely return without hesitation.

We had a great stay in Montreal and at Colin & Sandy's place. The flat is well located, close to Subway and Bixi stations, and also to market places. 
We were also given a good welcome by Colin, and we felt like home for the five days we spent at his place.

We stayed three nights at Colin and Sandy's place, they are very friendly hosts who gave us many tips for visiting Montreal. 

Our stay was perfect, we thank them again for their hospitality.

The apartment is very conveniently located, just steps from the metro station and right in the center of the Plateau district. The place is very cute and clean. Sandy & Colin are very helpful and friendly but also great about respecting their guests' personal space.

Colin and Sandy's place was clean and had everything we needed. The location was incredibly convenient. There are many great places to eat within steps of the apartment, and they are about a 15-minute walk from two great parks. The metro station was also very close.
The place matched the description perfectly. Excellent location.  Excellent communication. Helpful restaurant recommendations. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Even though Colin & Sandy had different schedules than mine, they were super nice! The bedroom was really great and the neighborhood was the best. I couldn't think of a better place to stay, a couple of blocks from the Mont-Royal Metro station, a block away from Bixi stations, with really good restaurants and amazing croissants at Au Kouign-Amann.

Sandy and Collin's flat is located in central Montreal, a few hundred meters from Mont Royal station. The block is nice, with a park not far away as well as a supermarket. 

The flat description matches the pictures on Airbnb; it is just bright, clean, and cool. 

Collin will advise on great places to get a beer or eat, having maybe thousands of good addresses for food (thanks again for Trip de Bouffe!).

We travelled with our little 14-month-old boy who faced jetlag and woke up every day at 5 AM. Nevertheless, Sandy and Collin remained very patient and we are very grateful for that.

In summary: a good place to stay to visit Montreal.

A perfect spot to launch our Montreal exploration! We parked the car at the neighboring pay lot and didn't drive during our entire stay. Colin is a very nice, quiet & accommodating host. The room was lovely, a little warm on a couple of the hot nights, but otherwise very comfortable. The neighborhood is very active, but the apartment is nicely located down a quiet side street. 

Note that the apartment is on the second floor, which might be an issue for those with disabilities.

We look forward to returning!

Colin was an excellent host: he greeted us upon our arrival, showed us around the apartment and prepared guides for our stay in Montreal. Colin's apartment is located in a top-notch neighborhood, Plateau. It's within walking distance of Mount Royal and the Mont Royal metro station. A trendy and dynamic neighborhood with restaurants, bars, and boutiques...
This place is in an absolutely fantastic location, and it's a bright, airy room. Colin was great, though we had different schedules and rarely saw each other. The room was clean and simple.

Colin was very accommodating and responsive to our last-minute request (we were on a long road trip, had a last-minute change of plans, and ended up in Montreal). After driving 13 hours we got in way late and arrived finding the room exactly as pictured, and everything fresh, tidy, and clean. We awoke to find ourselves in the heart of Montreal, half a block from Mont Royal and a short walk to this lovely park.  We just stayed the day and another night, and didn't even really get a chance to meet Colin, but it was a perfect place for our short stay. The brochures and maps of Montreal in our bedroom were a nice touch!

The Collin Experience…. That’s how I describe my trip to Montreal. Collin made my friend and I feel like we were visiting a friend rather than staying with a stranger. He was very warm, welcoming and accommodating. The listing was more than described the view from the terrace made for a perfect place to just relax with a couple of the local IPAs from the area. The backyard has a quant little seating area where you can enjoy a private conversation in the morning with a cup of Espresso. Collin directed us in all the right directions for AMAZING food and places off the touristy path. Best trip to Montreal I’ve had and I think it will be returning once a year around the same time :) Thanks Collin for making me and my friend feel right at home in a new place.

It was my first experience with Airbnb and it was great.

Sandy (whom I met briefly) and Collin were very welcoming, and I felt like at a friend's place. Their apartment is no more nor less than what was displayed in the pictures. 

While the flat is very close to a lively avenue, I can confirm what I had read in a previous comment (I think ?) : it's very livable. You don't hear much noise, so the location is great too, in addition to being convenient for public transportation.

You can really have confidence in Collin's recommendations for places to eat: He knows! 
The French bakery he would recommend you has delicious croissants (and the compliment comes from a Frenchman). Also I had my best dinner in Canada (meal and wines from Québec) at a bistro he suggested to me, at the corner, 100m from their place.

To conclude, I was very satisfied with my four-day stay at their place.
Colin's place is awesome and the neighborhood fantastic. He's a cool guy and we had fun staying at his place. I can definitely recommend him as a perfect host.

The location is AMAZING! Not only because there's the best boulangerie in town, but also because you are right in the heart of the Plateau, smack dab between Mile End and Center/Vieux Montreal neighborhoods. Colin was so nice, wanting to connect with us and get our feedback about the city and giving us some good tips. We felt like we were staying at a friend's house. He really makes you feel comfortable during your stay at his home.

I stayed at Collin's place for over two weeks during Quebec's glorious fall season while on a sabbatical visit at Concordia University, and I greatly enjoyed it - it's spacious and functional and located in a very vibrant area full of quirky eateries, cafes, and shops, and within walking distance of Mont Royal where I did some wonderful hikes amidst the changing foliage. Considering the nightlife in the neighborhood, it's not a completely tranquil place - the bedroom faces a small residential street near the corner of one of the main drags (Avenue Mont-Royal), but you can still get a good night's rest if you're not hypersensitive to occasional outdoor acoustics. Both Collin and I had busy schedules, so we didn't coincide on a daily basis, but one night we shared a fantastic meal whose ingredients had been grown organically on urban rooftops in Montreal. Highly delicious + recommended!

Our host was very helpful and answered my queries promptly. We only met once and he was very friendly and made us feel welcome.  The room we had was as described and very clean as was the bathroom. The apartment was a bit smaller than we had hoped, but we made do as we weren't there very much ourselves. The location is the most attractive feature, being only 1 block from several main streets with loads of restaurants, bars, and entertainment.

Colin is a strong and friendly host, his advice was helpful for visiting MONTREAL in 3 days and enjoying the good restaurants. The street is quiet, yet close to an animated neighborhood with restaurants, bars, shops (including the best bakery in the country) and near the Mont Royal metro station. 
We feel at home, the equipment is complete, coffee is provided for breakfast. The room is pleasant, the floor creaks, it's a bit awkward for nighttime movements within the apartment but it seems to be customary in Montreal. 
Our stay was perfect, we thank him again for his hospitality.

Didier, Françoise, Valentin, Camille

The apartment is ideally located in the heart of Mount Royal Plateau and close to the metro station. It is spacious, bright, and well-equipped. Colin and Mélissandre are warm and welcoming hosts. I had an excellent stay and will definitely return!

We had a problem during the reservation and Collin was very understanding and gave us solutions that satisfied us. The apartment is very well located, just a few steps from Av mont-royal! Parking for $10 per night at 2 minutes from the apartment. We loved our stay in MTL. Thank you for everything.
Louis

My stay with Collin was very pleasant - he was home to greet me upon my arrival to the flat (which is beautiful) and was very accommodating when a third joined our party on short notice. The room was clean, comfortable, and warm - I would definitely stay here again in the future!

If you want to be hosted by a laid-back single who is successful at being available without being overly present, then go stay with Colin! 

Conveniently located near Mont Royal station - I think there might be an error in the geolocation - 

Comfortable assured, despite the -40°C of February
Great stay for us.

Colin is a very pleasant and available host, 
the apartment is ideally located close to the metro and all shops and restaurants, it is as described in the listing. 
Thank you again for this wonderful experience.

Colin was an amazing, friendly host! He really went above and beyond to make me feel welcome in Montreal, and truly embodies what Airbnb is about—meeting cool, friendly people from all around the world. :) Be sure to check out the recommendations for food and drink in his guidebook as well, all of which were delicious and very reasonably priced. 

The room was just as pictured, and very bright and nice during the day. The location is also wonderful. The apartment is right in the center of Le Plateau, and only a couple of minutes away from the nearest subway station.

Colin was a great host and we really felt welcomed to stay at his place. The apartment and the neighborhood are lovely. There are plenty of small cafes and reasonably priced restaurants near Colin's place. We stayed only a couple of days during a weekend but a good location made it easy to see all the places we had planned to see.

Colin is a very attentive host. He took care to ensure that my stay was pleasant. He also enjoys exchanging with his guests around a meal. The bedding was clean and the common areas were also clean. The location is perfect, a 3-minute walk from the Mont-Royal metro station.

The apartment was clean and Collin provided towels, guide books/maps, and our own shelf in the refrigerator. We hardly used the fridge space because we were out and about the whole trip. For that same reason, we didn't talk to Collin much although he seemed like a great guy and gentleman. Reach for the stars! Thanks Collin, our experience was excellent!

Collin and his girlfriend were very welcoming and pleasant. The apartment is very nice with a pleasant decor and amenities planned for visitors, very practical. Ideally located, just next to a major avenue with many shops and a 3-minute walk from the metro. We didn't stay long in Montreal but we greatly enjoyed our stay.
Terrific guy, great host and a beautiful apartment. Highly recommend Collins Place and the cool neighborhood it's located in.

Colin was a wonderful host; he really knows what he's doing! Everything in his house is guest-proof! We didn't see each other much, but he made sure we had everything we needed. 

The area is really great, very lively in the evening but not noisy at all. 

Great place to go!

The apartment is very well located. It is right in the heart of the vibrant Plateau Mont-Royal. It is well kept and clean. Although we didn't see much Colin during our two-night stay, he was always responsive to our questions and our arrival went very smoothly.

The location is just perfect. Take a couple steps out of Colin's apartment and you will find yourself in the best, happening, fun neighborhood of Montreal. Endless brunch spots, bars, used book stores, people watching. But... that's not everything. You've got to chat with this guy! He's awesome, easy going, and he will make you feel at home. I wish I was staying longer so we could hang out more. I will definitely visit again!!

We had an amazing time staying at Collin's apartment. The location is unbeatable, it's a clean, spacious place and he was very hospitable. His neighborhood guide was also amazing, making our few days so easy, everything he suggested was fantastic.

Colin is a really nice and welcoming host. His apartment is very well located, just two steps from Mount Royal and the metro, everything corresponds to the description, and I will definitely go back there with pleasure!

Colin's apartment was great, and the location was fantastic too! The beds were incredibly comfortable! Colin was an excellent host who was always available to answer questions and really made my first Airbnb experience enjoyable. I would definitely stay here again next time I am in MTL! 

Cheers
We had a truly wonderful stay in this superb apartment ideally located in the heart of the plateau. Thank you, Colin, for your warm welcome and valuable advice!
Colin made us feel very welcome and comfortable in his home. The listing was accurate - close proximity to the metro, restaurants, and Mont Royal & Saint Laurent.

We had 6 enjoyable days in the company of Colin and Melissandre, who were very welcoming. The apartment is very well located, right in the heart of Plateau. We must listen to the "Rest of the neighborhood" tips from our hosts. For our first Airbnb experience, we are very happy!

We visited Montreal for the Jazz festival and stayed at Collin's apartment for three nights. Collin's apartment was in a perfect location! We walked almost everywhere. There is a Bixi bike station very close to his apartment and you can find these stations every two blocks. We felt very comfortable in his apartment, and spent great time in the neighborhood!

Collin is an excellent host! Staying with him is a lot of fun, he can show you many interesting places, he takes care of you and is always trying to make you feel as comfortable as possible. Last but not least, his flat is in the best location to explore the city. There's nothing bad to say here!
A very pleasant apartment perfectly located to enjoy Montreal and an attentive and accommodating host who allowed us to check in and out at our convenience. I highly recommend it!
A welcoming location ideally situated in the heart of the city and its vibrant atmosphere. A host who is both discreet and readily available. In short, a perfect base for discovering Montreal

Collin is an amazing host, full of good advice and recommendations, he has made us feel like home while being at his place.  He organized small dinners among us to explain his journey and get to know each other, invited to his friends' places, an unforgettable experience. 

The room is as described, and the apartment is typical of Montreal in one of the most trendy neighborhoods!

Thank you for everything!!

We had a great stay at Collin's place (which is really perfect in the trendy and nightlife district of Montreal) and he gave us lots of good tips for shopping and restaurants in Montreal. Thank you so much!

The place was great, and it was close to some really sweet bars and restaurants. Colin was really helpful in providing us with excellent places to eat and go out. We didn't have much of a plan coming to Montreal and he was quick to fill us with ideas! His place is cozy so it can feel a little cramped with more than 3 people. The only area to hangout is the kitchen or the bedroom, but if you plan on just using the apartment as a place to crash then it's great! Overall Colin made the experience very nice and I recommend others booking their stay here as long as they are cat friendly!

Thanks to Collin's advice, the trip to Montreal was amazing.

His apartment is right next to some bars and restaurants, so you can get anywhere on foot.

I would definitely go there again!

Thank you again for hosting!
Great experience! The restaurants recommended by the landlord were all great, a nice experience~ The room felt bright~ I was especially reluctant to leave their cat Chipie~

I've had a great time at Colin's apartment. The place is close to so many restaurants, bars, and 24-hour quick markets, so you can basically do everything by foot, and there's also a subway station a few blocks away, making it easy to get around town. The bedroom is exactly as pictured. Also, Colin's girlfriend was very friendly and welcoming and she gave me precious tips on where to eat and have some fun in Montreal! I recommend staying there! :)

Colin and Melissandre were very kind guests. The arrival process was extremely easy, even though I got there when they weren't home. They were both super welcoming and able to chat about restaurant recommendations as well as tour guide tips. They are fun if you like video games, Netflix or comic books and I feel anyone would feel at home in their place.

My friends and I visited Montreal for a weekend and stayed at Colin's apartment. We arrived slightly early and he was very accommodating and kind to us. Though there may be a larger age gap between us, Colin is young at heart and knows how to have a good time. He made some nice recommendations for bars that my friends and I visited. 

He also has a cat and we would have played with her all day! If you're privileged to have the room pictured on the listing, you will have the pleasure of being able to play with her every time you open your door :). The apartment was as beautiful as expected, and I couldn't have enjoyed it any more.

It was a very good and pleasant experience. The apartment is exactly as pictured, very cozy and comfortable. Colín and Melissandre were excellent hosts, they gave us great recommendations for good places to eat, guided us on the metro system, and above all, the best places to shop for winter clothes! The apartment is very well located, the neighborhood is quiet and safe, the metro is a few blocks away from the apartment as well as the bus, its location is very accessible. Highly recommended the guide Colín gave us to explore the best places!

I really appreciate Mel and Colin's openness with me. The food and kitchen were lovely and delicious. Their apartment's location was awesome, surrounded by the best bakery, cheesecakes, and other cuisine. They are truly open-minded and brilliant people who know how to enjoy life. Definitely recommended! You will gain more than just one tour. I thought I disliked Montreal but then I'm loving it:D
Super accommodation in a great location in the heart of Mount Royal Plateau. Colin and Mélissandre are very welcoming. The room is spacious, quiet and comfortable.

A big thank you to Colin and Melissandre. They are perfect hosts!

The apartment is super well located, very near from Mont Royal and the Mile End district. 

The room is also very nice: super light, lovely decorated, calm.

Bref, I feel very good at their place :-D

Totally recommended :-)
Awesome location. Hosts were ready and willing to help with any advice.  As is typical in Canada, there's no AC but hosts were ready with a fan. I would stay here again.

If you are welcomed by Colin, you will have the chance to meet a very friendly and open couple eager to exchange. The room is such as the photograph suggests, pleasant and comfortable. The location is ideal for experiencing the dynamism of a city like Montreal where it's good to live. Located within walking distance of the "Mont-Royal" station, which in turn is located at a station on "Berri-UQAM", a synergetic center of the city, you will be able to move around quickly. In the end, the accommodation as well as the city should delight you.

Collin and Mel were such friendly and attentive hosts!

Before my arrival, he texted me to explain how to get the keys, but when I arrived, Mel was there and gave me some nice tips about the area. 

Despite the short time I had in Montreal, I had a great time in their room! It was clean as well as the bathroom and it has the best location!! I highly recommend their room!

Thank you guys for receiving me!
I hope to see you soon!
Best wishes,
Isis.

I had an excellent stay in this flat: a cozy room, clean, fast WiFi and everything else I needed when traveling. Lastly, the neighborhood offers cool coffee shops, restaurants, a metro station, and a beautiful area for running (Mont Royal is nearby).

Colin's place was fantastic, he and Mel were great hosts, super polite and fun to talk to, had great tips on where to go and how to navigate. The place was accessible and clean, the apartment is in a great location, lots of cool places within walking distance, and only 15 minutes by tube to Montreal's downtown. 100% would recommend.

Excellent stay at Colin and Mélissandre's!  Beautiful apartment and very clean! Close to all amenities in Montreal, excellent location. 

Thank you for everything!!

This place was amazing. The hosts were friends and full of advice and information.

The guidebook Colin provided was absolutely perfect, it helped us decide on all our meals.

The location was prime, walking distance to the metro and right in the heart of downtown. A person really doesn't need a car.

As a "virgin" Airbnb-er this trip and experience has made me a believer in the whole process! Colin and Mel were beyond amazing and accommodating. I felt like I was staying with friends rather than strangers. They are both beyond friendly and helpful in making your way around the city :) The flat is in a beautiful area of the city, surrounded by cafes and boutiques. All the rest of the hustle and bustle is within walking distance or biking distance, as I opted for. There is a bixi bike stand just around the corner from Colin's place and this made it super convenient to come and go. The room and bathroom were clean!! This was a huge test for me...and I was grateful for the cleanliness factor. The apartment was hot while I was there (outside temp of +37 with the humidity) but there is a fan in the room which allowed me to sleep well at night.  I suggest ear plugs if you are a light sleeper, I go everywhere with mine, but I know I would have struggled with the outdoor traffic and creeky floors if I didn't have them :)

I couldn't have asked for a better experience, thanks you guys!

It was a great experience staying with Colin and Mel. Everything went smoothly and everything was very relaxed. Colin and Mel were always very friendly and helpful, though unfortunately I didn't get the chance to really get to know them properly since I was always busy myself and spent most of my time outside the apartment. Furthermore, I have to point out that the location of the apartment is very nice. The next Metro station is less than 5 minutes walking distance and you can reach virtually any place in the city within less than 30 minutes.  I would recommend this place to anyone who wants to stay in Montreal.

Colin and Mel were excellent hosts and this place was a really great value! The location is perfect and close to many shops and eateries as well as centrally located for many Montreal attractions. The flat is exactly how it is described in the post and their cat, Chipie, is adorable and very friendly. When we arrived, Colin drew us a map of some great local spots to check out in the area and made us feel very welcome. I would definitely recommend staying here.

The stay at Colon's apartment was wonderful. He was always very quick to answer my questions and provided all the info that we need for our arrival. We stayed there for 3 nights and felt very comfortable there. The place itself is beautiful, lots of light and very nicely decorated. The bed was very comfy and the room more than big enough for two. The bathroom was very big and with a window. The apartment's location is great. Just off Mont Royal with lots of places to eat and shop and the metro is just a few blocks down. 

Colin and his girlfriend were extremely welcoming and helpful throughout our stay. They provided us with an extra duvet on very short notice and even though we didn't see them a lot due to their busy schedule they were always open to a little chat and asked how our day was and if there was anything we needed.

This place is really awesome and I highly recommend it to anyone who visits Montreal.
Overall, everything is good. Very friendly people, always ready to give advice or help. They gave us excellent recommendations for places to eat.

Colin and Mel were fantastic hosts, very friendly, welcoming, and helpful. The place was great and the location was awesome. Restaurants, shops, clubs, bars, pubs, cafes, and a metro station... everything is within walking distance. If I had to live in Montreal, I would definitely find a place in this area!

I was so lucky that as a foreigner moving to Montreal I came to Collin and Mel's home. Not only is it a beautiful place, located in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in Montreal, but really, both of them were like angels to me. They helped me with everything I needed and even introduced their friends to me. You can trust them 100%, I definitely recommend this Airbnb place. Thanks Mel and Collin.

Colin was an excellent host! He was easy to get in touch with and gave us helpful parking tips and dining recommendations. The apartment was very clean, quiet, and perfect for couples.  The location was also great – we were just steps away from bars and restaurants. Highly recommend!
Amazing location, friendly hosts, cute kitty :)

Colin and Mel were very nice. They were great at offering suggestions for things to do and places to eat/drink, and really friendly people! The apartment was clean, comfortable and in a great neighborhood that Colin accurately described as the "Brooklyn of Montreal." Lots of great food and drinks and close to the Metro for a quick trip to other neighborhoods. I would definitely stay here again!

Colin, Mel and their sweet cat Chipie (probably didn't spell that right) were great hosts, very friendly and hospitable. The flat is exactly as described "The Heart of Le Plateau". It is within steps of cafes and restaurants and a few blocks from the Metro, making it extremely easy to get around Montreal. The neighborhood is awesome and I felt safe at all times. I would definitely recommend staying with this awesome couple.

My dad and I had a great stay at Colin and Mel's place. The apartment is bright and welcoming, and the room is more than big enough! The apartment itself is ideally located in a lively neighborhood and only a couple blocks from the subway. Getting to and from the Grand Prix couldn't have been easier. Communication with Colin and Mel was great, though we only saw Colin briefly on our first night. They also created a really helpful guide of the area on Airbnb, which you should definitely consult. Would recommend!
Colin's place was very walkable and cozy. Colin was an incredibly nice host, and I would recommend his place to anyone looking for a nice weekend in Montreal.

A perfect location! Very close to the metro and many great cafes and shops in the neighborhood. Mel and Collin are very nice. If you want to look at something or go out for dinner, they always have a tip. The cat is just so sweet :)

We stayed here for 4 nights and we really enjoyed it! Cozy, bright room. Great fan in the room. Very homey. 2 blocks from a metro stop that takes you directly to old Montreal. 15 minute walk to Mt. Royal and Le Plateau. PERFECT location. Tons of yummy restaurants and coffee within blocks. Very kind and friendly hosts, extremely gracious. And Chipie is the best cat ever! So fluffy and friendly and loved to be pet :)

We had a wonderful time in Montreal. The apartment is very well located in an energetic neighborhood, perfect for discovering the city! 

The room is as pictured, comfortable. Collin was very welcoming and gave us plenty of good tips for exploring the city! I highly recommend this accommodation!!

Excellent welcome and very comfortable! Very well located in a quiet street that is close to Mount Royal Street where there are many things to do.

Thank you so much!
Collin is a great host. He is very friendly and makes you feel like home. The location of Collin's place is one of the best in town.
Very beautiful location, central with metro, restaurants and bars, the neighborhood very welcoming for walking... the place matches the photos, Colin and Mel are good people.

My stay at Collin and Mels apartment was more than great. They were always very nice to me and were always there to help or just have a pleasant conversation. I felt very comfortable living there and it is perfectly located, especially to get the real plateau vibe but also to move quickly to other places in the city. 
I will definitely come back and I can only recommend this place to others.
Very nice place. Highly recommend for those visiting Montreal!

Collin and Mel's place is located close to many great food spots and cute stores in the Mont-Royal neighborhood. They were very quick to respond to my questions and they are very friendly! Their space is a short walk from the Mont-Royal metro station, making it easy to get around Montreal. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay (wish it was longer)!

This was our first time using Airbnb - and Collin and Mel ensured that it will be the first of many! Collin was very prompt with messages even before we booked. When we got in, both him and lovely Mel were there to check us in. They are such warm and wonderful people - they helped us with our bags (even though they didn't have to!), gave us so many incredible local tips (Collin is a chef, both he and Mel love cooking, so these guys know the real deal when it comes to food) and let us use their kitchen to make chai and generously told us we could use their Nespresso coffees and teas. The photos of the room and space on Airbnb are accurate - it's nice and cozy, faces a relatively quiet street so you have peace at night, but best of all, it's in a fantastic neighborhood. We loved that it's close to the metro, steps away from one of the best bakeries and excellent restaurants...just a fabulous way to soak Montreal in.

This being our first time, my husband was super nervous about "staying in someone's home." But it really felt so much more personal than being in a hotel, especially with their gorgeous "cloud-like" cat Chippie! We walked away making friends, these are people we'd love to spend time with over drinks (and we did!). Couldn't have asked for more. Thank you Mel and Collin, you guys made our stay in Montreal super special.

Really great location close to lots of shops and restaurants, but the apartment is still quiet so you can get a good rest. Mel was a wonderful host who offered helpful tips for getting around. I recommend staying here if you're looking to experience the best of Montreal's hip side!

The space is very close to everything, the neighborhood is fantastic with an incredible bakery just minutes away. The metro is only 5 minutes away so definitely a great location. Collin and Mel were very nice. The only downside is probably just the fact that the walls are very thin. My friend ended up feeling really sick from something she had, so the walls were thin that the whole apartment could hear that she was unwell. But other than that, the space was incredible and the location was great. A really solid choice for discovering real Montreal.

This accommodation is perfect for visiting Montreal! The welcome was adorable, the apartment and bedroom are clean and pretty in addition to being very well located. I loved my stay, I felt like home there!

We stayed two days with Mélissandre and Colin, it was perfect, the accommodation is super well-located near Mont Royal metro, the neighborhood is perfect and the room is super, they are very welcoming, communication before entering the accommodation was top notch, we really recommend it again, thank you.

Supers Hostels!!  Of amazing deals given. The apartment is in the hyper center of Mont Royal. The metro and St Denis street are 2 minutes away on foot. The room is large and bright. A big comfortable bed. I highly recommend it, eyes closed! The good of Collin and Melissandre!
Excellent housing situation. Excellent reception and good conviviality. Good general comfort.

I had a wonderful stay at Collin and Mélissandre's! They are very welcoming hosts, always ready to make you feel comfortable and share their knowledge of Montreal, especially through recommendations that are very useful when arriving in Montreal without knowing the city! 

The room is very pleasant and faithful to the description. The location of the apartment is really ideal: two steps from St Laurent Blvd and St Denis street and the Mont Royal metro station. There are plenty of small shops nearby: supermarket, bakery, pharmacy... 

In conclusion, I would recommend staying with them, you will be very well received!

Collin's place is in an amazing location! The neighborhood is fantastic with plenty of amazing bars and restaurants. They are just a few blocks away from the Metro station which allowed us to get everywhere we wanted to go in the city easily. Collin and Melisandre were great hosts, very responsive when we had questions and even more flexible when we needed options. Overall, we had a great stay and would definitely recommend it.

Collin and Mel were awesome hosts. Their place is in a great location and we had a great time hanging out with them. They offered all kinds of recommendations for food and drink in the area. We would definitely stay with them again.
Excellent location, host extremely nice, good communication, safe, with a cute cat, fair price

Super stay at Barbara's place, charming apartment perfectly equipped and very well located
Our home away from home in Montreal!
The reservation was cancelled 21 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
You deserve nothing less than the highest rating. Great location, very nice host. Barbara ensured our stay was fantastic.

Comfortable apartment with 2 real bedrooms and large closets. Very well equipped, particularly with a washing machine and dryer. The modern decor is very nice.

The apartment is located on a quiet street near the Berri metro station, a hub for Montreal's subway network, the bus terminal where flights arrive, shops and restaurants.

No problems in the apartment. 
An excellent address.
Apartment very well located; pleasant to live in; owner very friendly and full of good advice... +++
Beautiful renovated apartment located near the Berri Uqam metro station. It offers a peaceful living environment perfect for visitors to Montreal. The apartment's owner is very friendly.

After 7 hours of flight, we had time to collect our luggage, pick up the rental car and were greeted by Barbara. 
The apartment was very nice, very well-equipped, in a dynamic neighborhood easily accessible. 
We found parking for our car, finally!  Nothing to complain about... Only perfect.
We felt like home!

This apartment was perfect for our vacation in Montreal. Minutes away from food and entertainment, we were able to walk everywhere from here. The apartment was flawless, exactly what the pictures showed. Barbara was an excellent host; she left all the information we needed on the table and was available to help us by phone and email when we had questions. I would definitely recommend this to anyone visiting the area!

Barbara's apartment is just perfect! The location is ideal, a short walk from Saint Catherine and Parc Lafontaine. It is very well equipped, the decor is fantastic, very clean and modern. Barbara is a very pleasant host! We are delighted and we will definitely come back!

My parents really loved the apartment. It's just like in the pictures.... close to metro stations, a grocery store, pharmacy, plenty of restaurants... super comfortable and pleasant! Barbara is also great! Thank you for everything, Barbara! And we'll see you next time!

Four-month stay in the apartment was wonderful. It's ideally located and surrounded by friendly neighbors. A small downside is the dark and windowless kitchen, especially since I love spending time cooking. Otherwise, I was pleasantly surprised to see two balconies, even if the second one is small, we spent a lot of time there. The living room is bright and the shower is perfect! Thank you again Barbara :)
Our stay at Barbara's apartment was excellent. I would really recommend this place. It is close to all the tourist attractions in Montreal. Just a perfect getaway place to discover Montreal.

This place is very clean, nicely equipped, and well located and seems nicer than the photos! The directions for access were very clear. I would definitely recommend this accommodation for anyone visiting Montreal.

Very nice apartment, furnished tastefully, very functional and well located in the village center. Access to metro within 5 minutes.

Barbara was very kind to us and very responsive to our questions and this contributed to the quality of our stay. We highly recommend this rental.
Clean, functional apartment in a great location!  Just missing a TV with cable.

We highly recommend this very charming apartment! We spent ten days there and everything was perfect. Located near metro stations, close to the bus station, spacious, very clean and fully equipped! Our host's recommendations for activities and restaurants were also great! An ideal place for your stay with two or four people!
The apartment is super, well-located, well-equipped. Communication with Barbara is very simple and easy.

The apartment is very pleasant, it is perfectly equipped, well distributed and located in a pleasant neighborhood, well-populated and central.

Barbara arranged it so that one feels "at home" and it's very enjoyable. Furthermore, it is a very quiet apartment, which is appreciated in the city center.

We recommend it for a short or long stay for 4 people.

She remains very available for any information or troubleshooting needs.

Everything went very well. The apartment is perfectly located in a quiet neighborhood, and within walking distance of the city center and all amenities. 

Thank you!

The apartment is truly very good in all aspects! Ideal location, very central, we can do a lot of things on foot, and 5 minutes from the metro. And in a very quiet street, it's quite pleasant! Very well equipped in the kitchen, as well as for bedding and household linen, small accessories! We appreciated the air conditioning when it was hot! Nice-sized bedrooms.
Superb the large terrace at the back!
Thanks Barbara!

Great ease of retrieving the keys, very warm welcome from Barbara in person. Apartment located within a few minutes walk of Sainte Catherine street but in a quiet street. Superb kitchen with plenty of cleaning supplies and food. Very beautiful bathroom with lots of toiletries. Good quality bedding. Barbara kindly agreed to let us be 5 for the last two days of our stay. We had a wonderful week as a family. I highly recommend this apartment.

We were very well received by Barbara. The apartment is ideally located, a 5-minute walk from the Berri Métro station, which allows you to take all lines in Montreal. It's situated on a small, rarely busy street. Barbara is easily available to guide us to good addresses in the area. We had a pleasant stay in this apartment.

Pleasant apartment in a great location. We enjoyed our first experience here! 

The neighborhood is fantastic with lots of activities and friendly people.

The description of the property is perfect, very suitable and comfortable in a lively and well-located neighborhood. 

The kitchen is very well equipped with good quality equipment. 

The beds are very comfortable.

We enjoyed the beautiful terrace, which we took advantage of thanks to the favorable weather.
Second time I have the opportunity to stay in this apartment, it is very well equipped and very pleasant; and on top of that, it's not far from the village and the Uqàm...

We stayed at Barbara's apartment for nearly 2 months. It was everything we could have needed and more. Really clean, comfortable, well-equipped and Barbara was always on hand if we needed anything. We had a great time staying here and would recommend it to anybody.
Well-equipped, functional housing in a very good location suitable for a family (a couple and two children).

Barbara's place was fantastic. Great value for sure. The place is quite big, and has everything one could need, including two beds! The neighborhood is quiet, and close to interesting shops, groceries, and public transit. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Barbara's listing to others who are interested.

Barbara is a super host, she had plenty of nice tips about the city. Her apartment was great, with a fantastic terrace for evening drinks ;) We were with a little baby and Barbara even provided a high chair for us. Highly recommended!

The accommodation has a super location, you are within minutes of every metro line. Barbara is super friendly and gave us every possibility for arrival because she had deposited the key with us. The apartment is beautifully furnished and even has its own parking space. We felt very comfortable, would definitely come back anytime and recommend the apartment without any restrictions! Thank you Barbara!
Super approachable, super host, super communication, everything is simple with Barbara! Thank you!

Amazing apartment! 
It has everything you need. 
I highly recommend it, it's modern with 2 beautiful bedrooms. Fully equipped kitchen and a huge bathroom.
It is close to public transportation within 5 minutes walking distance and especially close to the city center.
Very good stay indeed.

Barbara's place was the perfect place to stay. Convenient and clean and felt like home! Barbara was always super helpful and quick to reply. I stayed here for five months and loved everything about it, especially the location. Walking distance from everywhere and steps from the subway.  Would recommend anybody to stay at Barbara’s anytime! Thank you for making me feel at home in Montreal.

The apartment situation is exceptional. It offers all the necessary amenities for a long stay. We have also enjoyed the terrace at any time of day. It was a pleasure to be received by Barbara. Thank you again
The apartment is very pleasant, well-equipped and well-located. We appreciated Barbara's kindness. We will be happy to return.

Excellent location for staying in Montreal. Very close to downtown and directly connected to the Bell Centre. 

Fantastic host, quick responses and a lovely apartment. Highly recommend it to everyone and will definitely be returning!
Noussa and her boyfriend are very nice people. They are very kind to us and show us anything that we need. We were having a very good time! Thanks!
Information is accurate. Everything feels like home. Furniture is clean. Definitely recommend this place!
Great location in the heart of Montreal with unbeatable indoor parking garage
Great location
The geographical location is perfect for a Canadiens game.  Medhi's hospitality was excellent and the accommodation adequate.
Great spot, would recommend to anyone!
Beautiful condo in a great building. Host was very helpful. Will definitely stay here again next year!
This apartment is nicely decorated and the space is quite large. Everything in the apartment is good, but the owner charges $25/day for the parking space. It's quite expensive.

Noussa's spot is very convenient as a base to explore Montreal. Very easy to get to from the airport, and close to public transportation if you want to explore other areas.

The apartment is also very clean and nice, although a bit smaller than pictured. No complaints though on size. I would highly recommend it to anyone.
Great stay at this apartment! Noussa and her boyfriend were very friendly and accommodating. Would definitely go back!
Perfect location for events in the heart of Bell. Modern and functional accommodation. Excellent host!

The condo had amazing views and the host was very professional, making the entire check-in/check-out process quick and easy. 

We were also given complimentary drinks, which were unexpected but greatly appreciated.

Thank you.
Great place with a spectacular view of Montreal! Definitely recommend!

I cannot review the property because this host cancelled my reservation just before my visit. She magically had another property available at twice the price. This was during the F1 race, so I was essentially stuck as the city had no vacancy given the 10-day notice. This is my first host failure with Airbnb. I was also disappointed that Airbnb provided no resolution for this issue. So I am not sure what to expect from other renters of this host. Possibly there was a real issue with the apartment that was identified 10 days before my visit but could not be fixed by my arrival or they realized they rented it to me at too cheap a price and cancelled the reservation knowing I would be stuck.

Stay perfectly on the 26th floor in Montreal!

The condo is directly downtown, perfectly located. The condo is brand new and equipped with everything you need for your stay. Check-in was easy and perfectly organized. 5+ Star Rating!

Enjoy your stay. 
Thanks Noussa
Great place, great host, amazing view
Nice place, good location, and great view
We had an excellent stay at the apartment. It is a lovely building that is conveniently located, including having a metro stop. Thank you for the hospitality.
Great place

This was my first Airbnb experience and Noussa was very helpful. Not only was checking in easy, she was willing to work with our schedule as we were driving in and had unexpected delays. When we checked in, she gave us a thorough walkthrough of everything from parking to checking out at the end of our stay. Additionally, she gave us suggestions on things to check out in Montreal. She was also very easy to contact, and was always willing to help out, as the case when we came back one day to find out someone had mistakenly taken our parking spot. She was very quick in finding a solution and we didn't have to worry about parking anywhere else since parking downtown can be expensive. 

Overall, a very good experience.

Great location. Everything is within walking distance. We parked the car for all four days and walked or used the Metro. Communication was excellent with Noussa. We had 4 adults in the condo, a little tight with only one bathroom. The condo was great, the gym was excellent and the outdoor common space was nice.
SUPERBE APARTMENT!! The host is really nice. The apartment is luxurious and fully equipped. I recommend it to everyone. The building is beautiful.

Had a fantastic time in Montreal! The location is perfect, right in the center of everything. We just parked our car and walked everywhere. It was great to have access to the pool and relax after so much walking. Noussa was an amazing host, easy to communicate with and really accommodating! The place was incredibly clean, which is saying a lot coming from me since I'm a clean freak. I highly recommend this place. I will definitely go back next time I'm in Montreal.

Great location, close to shops, restaurants, and the metro. The apartment was clean, spacious, and having a 26th-floor view provided good city views. The second bed was a pull-down bed that was curtained off rather than being in a separate room but worked out OK for us. The building had great amenities, although the spa was closed during our visit; however, we enjoyed the outdoor pool and would have used the BBQ if we had stayed longer!
Great location within walking distance of popular tourist attractions. Noussa was very helpful with the check-in. The unit is nice and clean, featuring all the modern amenities in the condo building.

The apartment is very centrally located and convenient. The host was very friendly and easy to communicate with. However, the unit is smaller than the photos depicted and not exactly a 2-bedroom as advertised. Also, the master bedroom only had sheer curtains to block any daylight after 6 am.

Never felt so welcome before, this Airbnb was amazing. I stayed for 3 days, it was very spacious and the location was really awesome. I had a great time! I ever lost one of the house keys in the elevator and panicked but Noussa saved me with a spare at the right time! Communication was great; she would reply instantly and make sure I had everything I needed! She went above and beyond! Cleanliness 100% dust-free, it looks like it was never lived in before and also HUGE balcony and awesome view! Thanks Noussa! Looking forward to coming back soon.
Great place at a great price. Noussa answered us right away when we had a question or two. We've been traveling the Airbnb way for four years. This is one of the best places
Wonderful experience! Great amenities!
Check-in and check-out were quick and efficient. Very professional. Thank you!
Excellent location! Grocery store right across the street and shops a few blocks away.
Central apartment with a good terrace and small swimming pool on the 10th floor. Noussa is very efficient and easy to reach for any help. Parking available

Very nice contact - the location is extraordinary - we were right in the middle of things - the teenagers enjoyed the gym and we had Chilean steak and wonderful views. Who can cook their steak on the 10th floor with a view over the city?

The Old Town is easily accessible by metro, station under the house. We will definitely come back.

The location of the condo was amazing! The condo itself was also beautiful. However, we were a bit disappointed when it said it came with three beds and only two were available on arrival. Thankfully, she kindly brought the other one but we spent some time looking for it! Also, there was unfortunately not enough toilet paper to last out a three-day stay! There was also some confusion with the parking; there is no free parking available which was disappointing. Despite all this, I would still recommend staying here.

Our hosts welcomed us effectively, proving to be accommodating (particularly regarding our departure time, parking...). They remain discreet. 

We appreciated the apartment, which is new, even though one of the two bedrooms is only closed by a curtain. The building with its communal facilities (we enjoyed the pool, barbecues on the terrace, gym...), its location near the city center, shops, restaurants, and the art museum...

We had an excellent stay and we are much more than satisfied. 
Nadine

Great place, great view, great stay. 
I totally recommend it.
Really great find at such short notice! Our host was extremely helpful with everything! The place was beautiful.

Superb apartment, clean, and very well located to visit Montreal! 
Noussa responds quickly and is very good advice!

Our stay here was perfect! AMAZING location with a great view of downtown! Loved the condo, very bright and modern (all new appliances). The amenities were awesome too, we loved the rooftop pool it was very chic and a fun spot to hang out! Noussa was also very helpful and easy to reach if we had any questions! Would definitely recommend :)
Great location, close to everything. Lots of nice restaurants, bars, and entertainment nearby. Noussa was flexible and made us feel really welcome. We would definitely stay here again.

This was a very cool and convenient location, close to everything. The view is great and the condo was laid out very comfortably. Parking was $25 per day, but you are in a climate-controlled, secure building attached to the complex. If you want to be close to everything within a mile or so, this is it.

We were visiting Montreal for a couple of days and decided to try Airbnb for the first time. We lucked out with such a great apartment and host. The apartment is just as pictured and described, it's very clean and modern. The view is incredible. It is centrally located and easy to get to restaurants, shops, and the subway. The building is very luxurious, modern and has a lot of amenities. The parking lot is clean and well spaced, we left our car there and were able to explore the city by foot and public transit. Noussa met us to show us to our parking space, guided us in and then showed us around the apartment. She was very responsive and texted us all the info as well. We really enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back!
Super place, super well-located, better than the hotel!
Clean, modern, and convenient. Located in the heart of downtown with shops, groceries, and restaurants within a couple of blocks.
Great place to stay. Excellent location. Great apartment
We are very satisfied with everything, especially accessibility, cleanliness, comfort, views, and so on.
Noussa was great at communicating and very nice. Everything was exactly as expected and even better! Perfect location!

I absolutely loved my stay here. It's right in the heart of downtown Montreal and everything is a short walk away. Noussa was very helpful and answered all of our questions. I will definitely be returning to this unit on my next visit!
Sublime apartment in the center of Montreal, excellent cleanliness, very good welcome, brand new apartment, very nice, incredible view ;)

The apartment is wonderful, an incredible value for quality.

The building offers many advantages such as billiards, swimming pool etc.
I highly recommend this apartment due to its location, cleanliness and decoration.

The host is very responsive and friendly.

NOTE: 5/5
The place is amazing and clean, just as the pictures show. Convenient location. I had a great time. Thank you!
This place is very central and the view is amazing
Had a great stay!
The location is excellent, the room is very clean, and the balcony has a fantastic view. The landlord responds to messages quickly and is very friendly.
I had a magnificent stay in complete tranquility within the building while being right in the heart of the city.

Extraordinary and impeccable location, everything was perfect! Cleanliness, communication, grocery store right in front and even at the Bell Center... not to mention access to the Metro just seconds away, definitely a must-visit if you have an event at the Bell Centre or nearby! We even added a night during our stay because we were so well taken care of, and Noussa responded to our request within minutes, thank you!!
Beautiful place, although the photos posted do not reflect the actual appearance of the suite, it's different. Parking cost $25 per day, which was misleading in the advertisement.
Great place, great area

Our stay here was great. The location was perfect, and we loved the condo, it was spotless and very modern. This is a beautiful quiet building; we loved the gym and hope to come back in summer to enjoy the pool. Noussa was very helpful and always responded within a few minutes.
Noussa was a great host and very attentive to customer service

Literally right next to the Bell Centre with some nice views. The space was nice and clean. It has climate-controlled parking garage which is nice. The building is pretty neat. The game room (11th floor) was also pretty nice. Overall, it's a nice apartment in a great building that lives up to expectations.
Nice view
Noussa's place has a really nice spot in central downtown Montreal, she was an amazing host. The condo was so clean and had everything any visitor would need. We enjoyed our stay!

We have rented apartments for over 10 years - Noussa is the BEST agent we have had - her personality and experience really show - An excellent communicator. - We will be back next year  for the Habs 2 games on Super Bowl weekend . Handing over the keys is very easy and the SS1 entrance is great - Nobody gets left standing out in the cold - you are allowed to wait in the SS! lobby on rue de la Montagne - Great communication from start to finish - Thank you 

Tom Gawrylash, Ancaster, Ontario

Great location next to the Bell Centre. Excellent gym. One master bedroom and another bedroom sectioned off by a curtain. Very modern kitchen and bathroom. Very convenient for parking in this area. Owner is very responsive. Would definitely stay again.
Great location. Amazing hospitality.

You can literally walk downstairs and see a Canadiens hockey game. The location is central to everything. Restaurants, malls, supermarkets, boutiques, museums, shows, cinema and the metro...etc. Perfect!
Niceeee
Translation: I'll be back for sure
Good location, quiet building. Had a great time
Great location with great view.
Central location, lovely view, and very clean. Amenities are also good.
Extremely clean. Very comfortable sofa and bed. BUT the owner does not provide laundry detergent, which causes inconvenience in daily life.

Noussa is a great hostess! She was very accommodating and responsive. The unit was clean and in a very convenient location. Two blocks from amazing shopping and restaurants. A nice supermarket is located across the street. Highly recommended!!!

This apartment is really convenient and nice. I was attending a conference at Concordia and was able to walk. I also had my baby and mother-in-law, and we all had space and a good experience. The beds are very comfortable and our travel crib fit in the main bedroom. It was also convenient to have the parking (which Noussa is very clear about in the ad that it's $25 per day), because parking downtown overnight for five days is not easy. The building is very modern and new, and there is a grocery store right next door. Noussa is a great host!
Easy check-in. Superb location and facilities. Kids loved the view and the outdoor pool. Would absolutely recommend to anyone visiting Montreal.
Noussa responded very quickly. It was a really nice stay.
Overall it's great

Noussa's place is clean and tidy. The location is great (close to downtown and metro). Although the apartment is small (like 1 BR), it’s very well designed to host three of us without a feeling of crowding.
