Noussa is very responsive and considerate. She welcomed us in person and answered our questions immediately. She offered us another parking space because of the size of our car.
Great location and a modern apartment with stylish amenities

Good for groups of 4 or less. 
If you're on a tight budget, 5 or more people can work, but it will be more challenging.

Great place to stay in Montreal. Features air conditioning (a big plus for the summer), modern furniture, balcony with a view, pool, BBQ, and game room. Beautiful views from the high-rise. Easy access to everything downtown.

A great location. Very communicative host. The bathroom is small with limited space for toiletries and towels. Space is adequate for 2 bedroom users but cramped for 3. Cute, small pool with 4 poster sun beds. Felt uncomfortable given it’s not an official Airbnb site.
Thank you for the warm welcome. Perfect
Wouldn't recommend this space due to inaccurate listing description.

Their descriptions and photos don't do them justice! What they don't say in the description is that this isn't just a place to stay, but by far an amazing overall experience! Thomas (Nicky's assistant) was available at all times and gave us a lot of recommendations for places to go. But, that's not all... They are the managers at Thursday's and suggested we should go there for dinner, drinks, and dancing. Little did we know that free shots were included (and really good ones, actually)! And Thomas is so energetic and nice that he made us feel super comfortable with our stay and definitely made an impression of how awesome Montreal and its people are. The apartment was spotless and gorgeous, although we didn't spend much time in the apartment because we were too busy exploring Montreal because of the apartment's fantastic location. It is about 15 minutes walking distance to all the restaurants, bars and shops, and the subway is about 5 minutes walking distance as well. When I go back to Montreal, I am definitely staying here again. I definitely recommend this place.
Nicky is an excellent host. Communication is spot-on. The location is ideal.
Great place. Very cozy. Perfectly located, quiet yet near everything. Nicky was a great host. And the parking was a major plus.

Nicky's place is a fantastic place to stay in Montreal. It is clean, spacious and makes you feel like you are at home. 

The location is fantastic with restaurants, bars and clubs minutes away but secluded from the downtown area. 

Nicky is a great host and had open communication throughout the weekend and provided information on local entertainment in the neighborhood.

I will recommend this place to my friends if they are going to Montreal.

Nicky is a friendly and helpful host. Everything was excellent. The location is easily accessible to many different neighborhoods, all of which are very walkable. We had no issues, and we would definitely stay there again.
Spacious and well-equipped accommodation. Quiet neighborhood. Parking is a plus. Well located. Nicky is a considerate host

Wow!!! Definitely a place to stay downtown Montreal if you need to! Clean, spacious, cozy. I loved it there! Will definitely go again! Friendly host and easy to contact. Made sure to let us know to contact him if we needed anything. Easy parking as well. Friendly neighbors and very quiet place :)
The host cancelled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Nick's condo is spacious, clean, and very quiet. It's a great deal for the size of the space in a convenient location. Nick is a nice guy and easy to work with. I would definitely stay there again.

Great, spacious 2-bedroom apartment with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Clean bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, and a lovely living room for enjoying time with friends/family. Parking is right by the entrance. Communication with Nicky is excellent.
Clean, comfortable, quiet, helpful host, good design. All good at Nicky's.
Great location and a very comfortable, clean place. Nicky is easy to reach and very helpful with suggestions about enjoying the neighborhood.
Great place, close to Old Montreal, easy to get to, everything we needed for a comfortable visit.
Comfortable, good-sized condo. About a 12-minute walk to downtown. Very close to bars and restaurants. The place was clean and tidy. Nicky is a laid-back guy and made for a great host.

Amazing spot!! Close to everything you would imagine. Absolute best bang for your buck, the place was very neat and tidy and had everything you would need and more. Nicky was great, super accommodating and very reachable with lots of helpful tips and suggestions for things to do in the area. I highly highly recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in the area. Don't look any further! 10 out of 10
Great place, convenient walk to the train station, well-equipped, and with some nice neighborhood restaurants and a gourmet market nearby.
As advertised. Great location, close to everything but far enough away to escape the crowds. Nicky's place was clean and had everything you could need. Highly recommend staying there.

Beautiful apartment in a central location near the metro, grocery stores, bars, and restaurants.  Large comfortable king bed and a double-size futon in the second room. Large, well-equipped kitchen. Thank you for a great stay!

This home has everything you need for your stay. We made breakfast every day, including coffee with fresh-ground beans. The beds were comfortable and the desk in the smaller bedroom was great for my computer and the work I needed to do after each day out. There is a bus stop right outside the front door. A parking space is included. It is about a 15 minute walk to the Sheraton Centre (less to the Bell Centre) and less than 30 minutes to most of the sites in Montreal's downtown.

Nicky is a great host and responded quickly to any questions we had. I would happily stay there again.
Great location! Walking distance to stores and restaurants and very short drive to downtown. The place was exactly as advertised and did not disappoint!
Nicky was a fantastic host! The place was even prettier than the pictures showed. I would definitely stay here again.
Nicky was very friendly and welcoming; had an amazing stay!

The apartment is very well located and spacious. The bedroom is on the quiet side with double glazing, making it very quiet. The very large bed is very comfortable. We slept very well in it. Everything is easily accessible on foot. There are some restaurants nearby. Communication with Nicky was absolutely seamless. A very good host. We would recommend the apartment anytime.

The condo was really nice and matched the pictures. Nicky was an amazing host, especially during check-in (sorry I was late!) and very helpful with local bars and restaurants. The location was a bit of a walk to downtown and Port areas but it was summer and made for a nice walk around the city. Overall, it was a great stay in Montreal and would come back if ever in town again.
Nicky is a great host, and the condo is so close to everything. We visited Montreal for a conference and the location was so convenient that we even managed to do some sightseeing during our stay.
Big place, close to everything.

What I loved: 

- Nicky and his friend Mike are trustworthy, helpful, and reliable
- The size was fantastic as well as the layout. 
- The kitchen amenities and cooking utensils available were more than expected. 
- The Metro (grocery store) was only 5 minutes away (by walking) and had so many great food items for cooking or ready-made meals, and the prices were reasonable. 
- The shower had great water pressure. 
- Tap water was safe to drink and use for anything 
- The neighbors were quiet and polite, and the neighborhood was safe with plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby. 
- Netflix was a huge bonus!

Good to know: 

- The bedrooms have everything you need, but don't have clocks, so use your cellphone or whatever as an alarm clock 
- The air-conditioning unit is hooked up in the living room. So, if you want your bedroom cool, use the 2 fans that Nicky provides. 
- It's better to park your car and leave it at Nicky's to roam the city by foot or transit. The traffic is pretty heavy and it's hard to find parking in Montreal. You'll actually be faster and less stressed on foot or transit.

Great location. Easy parking. Check-in was simple, as was check-out. As a single female, I felt totally safe. The bed was comfortable, and it was nice having toiletries provided in the bathroom. I would stay at Nicky's place again.

Nicky's condo is terrific. Having a dedicated parking space is a big deal even though we didn't move the car for the three days we stayed. The Montreal Metro is a short walk away, getting you to anywhere. There's a good supermarket and a gourmet grocery store within a five-minute walk. After each busy day touring in Montreal with our grandson, the apartment was a great place to settle down. We cooked a couple of nights and the kitchen is really well equipped. Highly recommended. 
Dennis and Kate

My mother and I had a wonderful month! 
The apartment is fully equipped, comfortable, clean, and the building is very quiet. 
The neighborhood is very pleasant with many restaurants and bars on Notre Dame Street. 
The city center is just around the corner, easily walkable. 
Nicky is a very nice person. 
We felt like home there, and we will definitely go back without hesitation!

This is a great place to stay while you're in Montreal. The host, Nicky, was very responsive, very helpful and has set up a beautiful apartment. 

Having a parking space is a huge plus. Being four blocks from Saint Catherine Street, and three blocks from Grey Nuns, which is where my son has his dorm while he's at Concordia was perfect. The kitchen is really quite handsome and everything was sparkling clean. 

The master bed was much more comfortable than I was expecting. We didn’t use the second room so I can’t say how that bed is but if it’s anything like the first one, you’ll be happy. The bathroom is spacious and refined. 

We will definitely be staying here the next time we come up to visit our son, so you better book early :-)
Good location with easy access to most things in all directions. The host was easy to reach and very accommodating.
The apartment was exactly as described. Close to St. Catherine, the Old Port, and Notre Dame.

Nicky was an excellent host. He was very helpful and readily available to us. He provided us with tips on places to travel, clubs, and popular activities, and he was an outstanding host! He was a super host! Thank you, Nicky!

Nicky's place was great! I rented it out for a weekend for my dad and brother who were visiting from the states, and they loved it. Said it was like being home away from home — which is accurate! Decent location too and close to the metro in any case.

Great location. Walking distance to just about everything you want to see and do in Montreal. Nicky's place is clean and comfortable with all the amenities you need for your stay. I would highly recommend Nicky's place in Griffintown for your next stay in Montreal.

Terrific location and the added bonus of off-street parking. Plenty of room, a comfortable bed, and a full-sized kitchen with everything you'd need if you wanted to cook or just make eggs for breakfast. Nicky was easy to reach, friendly and helpful.
Everything was great, close to downtown, very clean, and easy to communicate with.
Beautiful apartment within walking distance of a ton of restaurants and the Bell Centre. Nicky responded quickly and was incredibly accommodating.

Nicky's place was great. There was plenty of space, nice amenities, and it was within walking distance of a metro station, even during the Montreal winter. He was easy to communicate with and he always responded quickly.
No higher compliment than it is like my sweet home in Montreal!

Nicky is probably one of the most responsive hosts I've ever had. The kitchen is by far the best equipped I've ever seen (and clean!). The location is perfect. Steps away from the Bell Centre, and Griffontown. We ended up extending our stay here twice we were so comfortable. Truly a home away from home!
Amazing place, great location, highly recommend.
Exactly as advertised. Great place for a weekend in Montreal! Thanks, Nicky!

Nicky's place was incredible! It was a perfect location and Nicky was always around if we needed anything. The kitchen was super nice and had everything we needed to enjoy our stay. We would definitely come back and stay here in the future.
Easy flexible check-in, everything as described. Ideal location to explore Montreal. There was no cable TV but the TV was connected to Netflix. Thanks.
The place was perfect. Close to everything downtown Montreal. Thanks, Nicky!
Spacious and clean.

Nicky was accommodating and responsive; the apartment was spacious for two people and in a great location. It was walkable to many of Montreal's attractions, yet quiet and calm neighborhood. Restaurants and a grocery store were just a few blocks away. Parking spot was very helpful.
Nicki was very helpful and accommodating. Lots of space, clean, and a great location.
Great location at a good price, especially with the added benefit of parking, just a few blocks from downtown's heart. Nicky made check-in very easy and convenient.

Good place! Very convenient, clean. It's close to Old Montreal. There's a big supermarket nearby. Parking is easy.

Nicky is very kind, he gives me lots of travel suggestions, and he always replies quickly.
Great place, great host, and great location.

This is a very cost-effective house. The location is not far from Downtown.  The main reason is free parking. The landlord is very nice and will give you some practical suggestions, there's also Tim's coffee ☕️ inside the house... It's great. Next time I go to Montreal, I will choose this place again.
Nicky was very nice and helpful, and his place was in a great location!
Thank you Nicky for your warm welcome. Efficient. Timely. Good location for us (near the location of a conference we attended).
great location
Great host. Prompt responses. Good communication. Nice touch with a cold beer in the fridge!  Cutlery, dishes, glasses etc were all sparkling clean. Short walk to downtown. Highly recommend.
Lovely apartment and location. Great kitchen! Parking was a huge plus! Nicky was very accommodating!
A spacious home very close to downtown transportation! The kitchen was fully equipped and we enjoyed our stay there!
Nicky has a very nice, spacious apartment. It is located in a walkable neighborhood, close to good restaurants and grocery stores. The kitchen is also well-equipped with dishes and pots for cooking.

I wish I lived here! 

Perfectly located and a great place.
Nice, comfortable, spacious, close to downtown. Good sheets and shower. Nicky answered all my questions, highly recommended.

My family loved staying at Nicky's place. Can't wait to return as we just barely got to know Montréal. What a welcoming community! 

The people, location, neighborhood, accommodations, sites, food... I could go on and on. 

Nicky is a wonderful host and a true gentleman.

Thank you for hosting my family.
Good deal for accommodations near downtown Montreal.
Nice location. Walkable to many places.
Very nice place, just like a home and Nicky was very friendly and helpful. I will come again

Excellent location close to downtown, whether you're there for work or play. 
A nice and quiet place with everything you need for a comfortable
home away from home.
Fantastic host, space and location - with private parking to boot! We couldn't have been more thrilled with our stay, thanks Nicky!
The place is spacious and clean. Great location and host. Nicky was very accommodating and welcoming.

Had a great stay, no surprises! The apartment was as described. The host was very accommodating to requests for early check-in, etc. Location is extremely important to us when in Montreal and Nicky's place is perfectly situated. Close to the metro so that you can leave your car and go anywhere in Montreal. Walking distance to nice restaurants on Notre Dame too!! Thanks again Nicky.

The best house I stayed at during my trip to Canada, with enough space for everything, and the neighborhood was safe and quiet. The house had an air conditioner. Nicky was very nice and recommended many delicious restaurants to us.

Nicky's place was ideal for the back-end of our week-long stay in wonderful Montreal. It was the perfect location -- a nice stroll to Old Montreal, to the heart of the downtown area and to the Bell Centre where we took in a concert. The walk to the Bell Centre is no more than 10 minutes -- perfectly convenient for our needs. Nicky's place is great. Communication and check-in was an excellent experience -- easy and fast. The apartment was spotless and the kitchen well-appointed with everything one requires to prepare meals. The air conditioning was a blessing, particularly the one in the bedroom, which made for comfortable sleeping. The patio was also a nice feature. Overall, we very much enjoyed our stay at Nicky's place and would certainly stay there again! Thanks, Nicky!

Great location but needs updating, better organization and more effort from the host! The second bedroom is inadequate as a double room but would suffice for a child. Positives include a washing machine, dryer, and off-street parking.
Nicky is super friendly and was very helpful with my arrival and checkout. The place is spacious, clean, and very comfortable. Highly recommend!
We recommend Nicky's place. Great location. Quick responses and very helpful
Great location, huge apartment, very well equipped, very comfortable, co-host Michael was really helpful during our stay, would definitely stay there again and recommend it to others

Great place near the heart of Montreal. Many destinations are within walking distance or accessible by public transit. Very modern bathroom and kitchen - hot, clean shower with good water pressure. The host responded quickly to questions.
A lot of space, parking spot highly appreciated, close to downtown
Great location. The apartment is a bit dark, but very convenient and comfortable, with excellent location. Nicky has been very responsive. Excellent value for money. Will definitely return.
Great location, great Airbnb, and a great host. It's hard to find a more complete place to stay in Montreal.

Nicky is excellent at communication, and his place is conveniently located within walking distance of several key attractions in Montreal. The condo is spacious with all amenities as pictured. The king-sized bed was so comfortable after a long day sightseeing. I would definitely stay here again.

This apartment is spacious and offers great value. The only issue is that there is no information provided to help guests navigate their stay and the surrounding area/city. It's not the most well-appointed apartment, but for the price it is acceptable
Great, spacious and clean condo perfectly located in downtown Montreal. Would recommend to anyone!
The condo was very nice. It was clean, the location was perfect, and the parking space was very helpful.

This is a large, modern apartment in Griffintown with many excellent restaurants nearby. Old Montreal, the Underground and the Golden Mile of Rue Saint-Catherine (shopping) are within easy walking distance. Otherwise, bus and metro service are steps away. The master bedroom is comfortable. There is a washer and dryer. A full kitchen and dishwasher for those who cook. Internet speed is great (40mb down, 15 mb up). Apple TV attached to a larger screen has Netflix. Two comfortable couches. The neighborhood feels safe even at night. Note that you are downtown so expect traffic noise. Highly recommended.

The condo was perfect for our weekend stay in Montreal. It was spacious and clean, and having an off-street parking spot was great. The metro is only a 6 or 7 minute walk, but we barely used it since Montreal is a very walkable city.
Location was great and having parking was a huge plus.

Excellent location! Nicky was also very responsive and his place was nice and clean. It was exactly what we were looking for in terms of cleanliness, location, and parking. If I'm back in Montreal, I will definitely rent again! :)
The accommodation perfectly matches the descriptions and photos. Communication was excellent, with very fast responses and exceptional helpfulness. Very clean. Overall, highly recommended.
Nicky's place is clean and comfortable. Great location - easy to walk to attractions and avoid traffic/parking. Nice neighborhood. Would definitely stay again.
The house is really tidy and the host is really warm-hearted.

We had a great stay at Nicky's place. We've visited Montreal many times and this was our favorite. The location was great - in a quieter area but still within walking distance to both subway lines as well as many amazing restaurants (for both budget-friendly options and fine dining experiences). We got some much-needed R&R on our vacation, too, from both the large, comfy bed and the great living room setup (large TV, great sound system, lots of couch space). The place was also very, very clean! Thanks Nicky!
Great location with excellent nearby restaurants. Clean and spacious apartment with many useful items in the kitchen. The photos and descriptions are accurate.

Very spacious and cozy condo. The bed is huge and comfortable. The kitchen is awesome with everything you need. 
Nicky is easy to communicate with and responds quickly. 
Close to the grocery store and many restaurants.
Nicky's place is large and warm. It has good amenities and is a 5-minute walk from the subway. I would recommend it.

Nicky was the best host! This is a great space and a fabulous location with super value. Very clean, with lots of amenities. It's an easy walk to many attractions. We will definitely stay here again if we return to Montreal!

Large, clean condo with two bedrooms (one king-size!), a big kitchen, and a big living room. It has all the kitchen supplies you'd need if you wanted to cook in. A large TV with an Apple TV remote. Parking spot and close to the subway.

Nicky's place is spacious and very clean. The location is perfect for going to Bell Centre events. Everything you need is within walking distance, I found. 

Nicky is quick and clear in his communications. I was very pleased with my stay.

Nicky is an exceptional host who answers all questions promptly and politely. His place is spotless and conveniently located near everything. All the necessities are available, with numerous restaurants and grocery stores nearby. You will not regret booking this place!

Great location, parking is quite easy, there are tons of cute things to do in Little Burgundy, or you can take one of two buses downtown from right outside. The kitchen is exceptionally well-equipped with all the necessary equipment, and the space is very comfortable!
As advertised!
Nicky went out of his way to ensure a great experience, and his place was spacious and clean. Two thumbs up!
Stylish and nice location! Good response!
Amazing host, beautiful place - definitely would recommend

Nicky's place was great! It is within walking distance of a station, has a bus stop in front. The apartment was easily accessible from a small spiral staircase. It is very spacious and clean. It was easy to set the temperature and the water pressure was fine. There is a small restaurant and a European market very close by. Nicky is also very responsive and I appreciated his promptness!
Very big place in the heart of Montreal. Close to the water and three blocks from food!

Nicky's apartment was perfect for our stay in Montreal. Close to downtown shopping, Griffintown restaurants and cafes, and the Atwater market. The metro station is also just a short walk away. The free parking space was a big bonus in this area of the city. The apartment is super clean and HUGE! Felt like a home away from home. Nicky's replies were prompt and checking in and out was a breeze.

Very beautiful home in a great location! With parking it's perfect! There was a slight smell of cannabis in the apartment, but nothing too bothersome! It's normal in a co-op. Nicky's welcome was impeccable, we loved our stay! This apartment is particularly well equipped!
Great location at a great price
Exactly as listed. Would stay again in a heartbeat.

I could not have asked for a better place to stay in Montreal. Nicky's place was located near everything we wanted to see and was less than a 10 minute walk to the Bell Center. The condo was sparkling clean and had everything you would need during a weekend stay. If I had the opportunity to stay here again, I would absolutely take that chance again.
Exactly as described. Nicky was always there if we needed anything and the place was squeaky clean.
Wonderful stay! Nicky has quick communication and the place was perfect! Would definitely stay here again :)

A really nice apartment in a fantastic up-and-coming area of the city, Griffintown. Big bedrooms, a great kitchen and living room for hanging out and enjoying yourself. Nicky was great at communicating and very accommodating of our later flight on the departure date. Plus, the place is only a few minutes walk from lots of great restaurants, cafes, shops, etc., both in Griffintown and downtown. Would be happy to stay there again.
Nicky's place was large, comfortable, and clean. We thoroughly enjoyed using it as our home base during our long weekend in Montreal
A warm and cozy place with everything you need and a great location.
Simple and effective. The photos represent the places very well.
Great place in a wonderful location. My dad and I stayed here for a hockey game and it was so close to the Bell Center!

This was a great apartment and very close to restaurants, the main shopping strip in downtown Montreal, and the subway. The apartment was nicely renovated, and it had everything you would need for a weekend stay.

Nice clean apartment in an older building. Located near the subway and restaurants for convenience.  

Parking near the apartment is pricey if you plan on leaving your car there the whole time, so plan ahead. 

Yj was very helpful and responsive, it was a good stay!
We never met YJ. His place is clean and quiet but a bit sterile.
Yj's place was very clean and had everything we needed to make our stay great. The host was very responsive and met all of our needs throughout our stay.
Fantastic location. Clean. Spacious. Parking was a huge plus. Host was amazing. Would definitely recommend.

The apartment was very clean, the room and living room were cozy. The bed was really comfortable with very soft sheets. We did not use the kitchenette. Don't be in a hurry in the morning for a hot shower as it takes about 5 minutes to heat up. Central location and great stay overall.

Amazing location and a very well-appointed apartment. YJ was very approachable via message and he was extremely helpful. I stayed for just under a month and would recommend this flat for both short and long-term rentals!

Walking to the distance to Saint Catherine's. Where most of the restaurants and points of interest are. No balcony, so if you are a smoker you will have to take the elevator down to the front door a couple of times a night.
Great place, one of the best places I've stayed at!
No matter where you're trying to go in Montreal, this is as close to the Green Line as possible and has tons of things within walking distance from the residence. We had a great time :)
Would stay here again! Great place.

My friends and I (3 total) stayed here for 3 nights and 4 days. The location is really great - a block away from the metro and near some really great restaurants, pharmacies, coffee shops, and shopping districts. We arrived about 10 minutes early while the place was still being cleaned out, but we were able to meet YJ who is really very sweet. There was some confusion about parking and I would ask for clearer directions to the garage. YJ did have to return to show us the exact garage, but I am so grateful for her willingness to help her guests. The apartment itself was small, cozy, and clean. It's identical to what you see in the photos. Free Netflix, internet access, toiletries, all the amenities you'd really need on a short vacation. Overall, I would love to stay at YJ's place if we are to visit Montreal again.
Very clean and comfortable place, with many restaurants to choose from.
Great place. Close to metro!
The flat is in a fantastic location, close to the metro station. It's clean and looks great for being in an older apartment complex. Basic supplies (iron and hairdryer) are provided.
Good location and apartment

It is a simple, no-frills accommodation in a good location. Free easy parking is a plus, very close to public transportation. Fast wifi. The bathroom needs renovation and a few hooks to hang towels on. The kitchen is well equipped, did not find the cutting board though. I would say it is a decent accommodation for those who travel on budget by car. Do not expect a local, home-like experience: it's a rent-only apartment and we never met the host. However, all our requests were met and the response was fast and informative. Thank you Yj and Sebastien!
Great location with parking.
Nice place to stay, especially if you're planning on attending an art gallery show or enjoying the downtown area.

Excellent location to discover Montreal, very close to Sainte-Catherine Street, Crescent with its restaurants... a good French bakery, Plougastel, on Sherbrooke... and don't forget the underground parking that allows you to leave your car without worrying... the reception and organization are perfect. 

The apartment is very spacious and well arranged. Good value for money.
Great place to stay. Very close to lots of shops and dining. Hosts were fabulous. Definitely recommend.
Great place, great location, great price. No complaints at all. A+

Clean accommodation is available with the minimum requirements for staying. I had trouble finding parking, but my host helped me immediately!

Don't forget that there is no air conditioning and it's on the 5th floor so it was hot in the summer!

Excellent communication and impressive interior space. Having parking was a huge help. There are plenty of Ubers around and the location is well situated. Especially close to Crescent Street restaurants/bars, museums, etc.

Would definitely stay again. If you're considering booking this place, do it!

Awesome apartment! It's incredibly close to everything. Literally, steps away from the green line, restaurants, entertainment, and grocery stores. We loved our stay and would definitely return. Yj was super responsive and check-in and check-out were easy.
The apartment matched the photos and was extremely clean. The location was optimal. Check-in and check-out could be made a bit easier, but overall it was a great stay
Lovely clean apartment in a great location for exploring Montreal, with quick and helpful responses to any questions.
Great location for exploring the city, clean and nice place.

A very nice and clean apartment exactly like in the pictures. We received the email with all the information on how to check in, and we got help with wifi very quickly. We enjoyed our stay a lot, so I would definitely recommend this apartment to everyone. 

Oh, and it was in a perfect location, not in the city center but within walking distance :)

Great place to stay if you're looking to be right in the downtown Concordia/McGill/Ste. Catherine/Crescent st area. Was just like the pictures and super clean. The hosts were great with check-in instructions and super responsive. It was perfect for our trip!
WE HAD A GOOD STAY AT YJ'S PLACE
Great apartment. Would stay here again.

I really liked staying in the apartment. It was very clean and had all the necessary kitchen utensils. The bed and bedding were of good quality. The only thing that could be improved was the bathroom, which could use some renovation and also have a face towel and bath mat. I've already left my suggestion with them.
Thank you

- Super location near the metro
- Free parking is a major perk 
- Not fancy, but extremely clean with all the necessary amenities
Good location, parking is available, reservations and check-in went smoothly, exactly as advertised, consistent with the reviews' expectations.

The location is good and close to restaurants, shops, and amenities. There's a college nearby, making it a lively area, but we didn't have any issues sleeping at night or anything. The garage parking is a plus (with in-and-out privileges) if you drive or have a rental car. Check-in and check-out was easy and straightforward. We had a little trouble opening the master lock, but eventually got it open. Sebastian was very responsive, friendly, and helpful with any issues or questions. He responded quickly to all of our inquiries. If anything, the bathroom could have been a bit cleaner, but overall, the place is just as described in the listing and photos. I would recommend staying here.

We stayed at Sebastian/Yj's place for 3 nights and it was great. He was very responsive and had some great suggestions for things to do in town. We ate at Kampai (shrimp tacos to die for) and spent most of our time in the Old Towne and at the Just For Laughs festival.

Location is great; Bixi bikes abound, and everything is in walking distance. CRV DOES fit in the garage, but I wouldn't go any bigger than that! :)

The flat is nice and clean and well equipped. Bathroom a little dated, but who cares when you are out and about!!  I would stay again if we head back that way.
Great location, a short walk from the Bell Centre. Parking is a bit cramped but manageable.
Clean. Parking and WiFi are a plus. Located in a financial district, it's a 25-minute walk to the nearest historical sites and a 10-minute Uber ride away.

It was really convenient being able to park our car in the garage. We were like that the apartment had a lot of light and was simple. It was situated close enough to downtown that we could walk everywhere.  The Superette was right downstairs for getting milk and coffee, etc. 

For our part, we didn't mind not having any contact with Sebastian during our stay. We came and went as we pleased. We didn't need to call him for anything. We found most of what we needed in the apartment except for a bathmat and a cutting board. 

The only thing I wouldn't really make note of is the state of the bathroom. While it was impeccably clean and painted white, it was very much dated. The grout was moldy and the wall was peeling from humidity. There was no working vent in the bathroom. The sink drain stopped up systematically, several minutes to drain after brushing teeth.  The water pressure in the shower was OK, but again I only used the hot water. I thought that it was warm, comfortable. 

The mattress was extremely firm. The pillows were very high. That's all personal taste. The couch, however, I was very uncomfortable even for tonight to sit on. 

Still, we are very happy we stayed there and would go back again because it was very clean and well located with a parking garage. 

Not Sebastian's mom died soon as you get off the elevator on the fifth floor, you are overcome by the smell of cigarettes. A neighbor no doubt.
Very clean place and the host was very helpful. Had a great experience!

Great location! Right by the subway and near all the restaurants. The building is an older building and so it had a bit of a stench throughout the halls and into the room. Thankfully there was an air purifier/AC in the bedroom that cleared it up. The bathroom was decent but definitely rough around the edges. Was pleased that Sebastien had very clear and easy instructions on how to check in and check out. The wifi wasn't working during our trip but we weren't home enough to really be concerned. Underground parking is a great addition to this place. Just be aware that the parking lot is a bit dirty. Overall, great place for a great price!

This was my first Airbnb experience and I can say with confidence that this is the best place to stay at when visiting Montreal. The place was very clean, as shown in pictures. It actually looks even more beautiful and clean in reality than the pictures. Check-in was very easy, just had to follow the instructions. Since I drove to this place so the best part was the place had parking too, which is otherwise very difficult to find in Montreal's downtown area. The place is only a few steps away from the Metro station and from Saint Catherine Street (very lively at night, especially on weekends). Mont Royal Park is also very close by, so no need for driving to it. The Fine Arts Museum is nearby too.

Overall, we had an ultimate experience and our stay was very smooth and relaxing. 

We would definitely stay at this place only whenever we plan to revisit the city in the future. 

Also, our host Sebastian was very helpful in promptly replying to our queries and helping us with suggestions for places to see in the city.
Great location close to restaurants. The property is clean and exactly as pictured. Instructions were clear and concise, and the host was attentive and responsive.
Great location, within walking distance of downtown core, with quick Uber service to the address.

This place is very convenient for staying. The host provided very good, thorough instructions on how to check in and out. Additionally, it is located downtown. The garage was very useful, although it was small and an SUV larger than a CR-V wouldn't fit. Overall, a pretty good stay, and the host was helpful.

Everything you'll need! It's clean, the WiFi was fast, towels were provided, and parking was a plus! The bathroom could use an update, but I've stayed in worse places. Sebastian is quick to respond and very thorough with his instructions!
Lovely clean place. Great location. Check-in was as easy as checking into a hotel, very professional.
Clean place, good price, and downtown. Would stay here again if I were visiting Montreal.

Sebastian was an excellent host and we had a lovely time during our stay in Montreal. He was very clear with his check-in and check-out instructions before our trip. The apartment also came with Netflix, which was great on a rainy day. Overall, the place was clean, and the bedroom was especially neat. The bathroom could use some renovations and upkeep as it was a bit old/well worn. The building itself is older and near a lot of universities, so it could get loud/rowdy at night. Thank you again for hosting us! We hope to be back in Montreal again.

Beautiful apartment in an excellent location for exploring Montreal. Obviously recently renovated, very clean and modern. The only real downside is the bathroom which is quite dated in decor (plus the shower isn't the best). Considering value for money, however, the apartment was excellent and we would happily stay again.

We had a great stay in this apartment. It's in a good location close to the metro, supermarket, pharmacy, and many restaurants, and check-in and out was easy. We ended up with a large car rental which was a squeeze to get into the garage but we managed with patience!

Sebastian and YJ's home is great! Central location and very convenient to have a designated parking space. Check-in was very easy, the apartment is clean, and the bed is comfy. All our basic necessities were covered. Our first trip to Montreal and we are in love! ❤️

This place is the perfect spot for those looking to have a nice, comfortable place to call home while in Montreal. It's right in the heart of the action while still being quiet for a restful night's sleep. The hosts make the check-in/check-out process seamless.

The host was a very nice person, but you can't really see in the pictures that the bathroom is pretty old and the walls are feeling off. The window in the bedroom cannot be closed until the end so you can hear noises or feel the cold. The bed was broken too. But the host was very helpful and brought us an air mattress. Netflix was amazing

The host was quick to respond, helpful, and patient. 

The place looked exactly like the photos and was exceptionally clean. Parking in the building was very convenient.

Amenities were minimal and only air conditioning was available in the bedroom.

The neighborhood wasn't ideal (loud partygoers walking home at 3 am, etc.).

Overall, a positive experience.

Overall, it was a great stay. When we first arrived, we were greeted by a homeless man sleeping under the phone box, which didn't make for the best first impression. However, the apartment was nice and close to downtown, and you can't beat the price given that parking is included. Sebastian was super helpful during check-in, allowing us to check in after 11pm. The apartment was clean and had all the amenities we needed. At night, the bedroom was a little noisy (neighbors, outside noises, etc.), but with its proximity to downtown, some of that is to be expected. Definitely worth the stay if you're visiting Montreal.
Great place! :)
Clean apartment, mostly renovated but the bathroom needs a major overhaul.  Be patient if you want hot water, as it takes 10 minutes to heat up.

The place was clean and perfect for two people. It is right next to many restaurants as well as public transportation. 

I would definitely recommend it to anyone!

Very good place, centrally located.

My next trip to Montreal will be spent at Sébastien's place.
Great place! Check-in was super fast, and the unit was true to the description.  Avoid bringing a large car if you plan on using the parking garage.
Awesome location and a super cute space to stay. Very homey feeling.
Good location and mostly clean place.
Clean, convenient, nice and cozy place! Located in central downtown and very near to subway too. Great stay!

This apartment was very lovely and close to many places you'd want to visit in downtown Montreal and Old Montreal. The building felt safe and the apartment was very spacious. Sebastien was very easy to communicate with and very responsive! The only thing I would suggest is an improvement on updating the bathroom. I especially appreciated how clean the apartment was and the included parking!
Super easy check-in and check-out and Sebastian was prompt when I had an issue with the WiFi password.

The space was amazing and looked just like the photos ☺️

They were super helpful when we needed their help. The location was really nice and it was easy to get where we needed to go from our place!
Everything was good

The parking garage was perfect, especially during the snowstorm, as it kept my car safe and off the streets. The location was amazing; less than a 10-minute walk to everything, and the subway is right around the corner for anything further. I would definitely stay there again.
It was a nice place, right in the heart of town, easy access to bars and the subway.
Yj's place was the perfect location for exploring Montreal. Great eats all around, conveniently located near the Metro.
Very nice and clean! Very thorough instructions on how to check in. Parking included!!! (my favorite part)
Everything matched the listing perfectly. Such a cute place right in downtown with indoor parking, which was a major bonus! I would definitely stay here again.
Great place! Lots of restaurants nearby. Close to downtown.
This place is okay but has a great location and parking.
All good. Thanks.
Clean and functional housing located in the heart of Montreal, close to transportation hubs. The parking is a plus, I recommend it!
Yj's place is very close to great cocktail bars and restaurants. We enjoyed our stay.

Great location near the university. We were attending a conference nearby, so this was perfect for us. Just a short walk from lively neighborhoods and a quick Uber or drive down to interesting restaurants and nightlife. It's super easy check-in, and not having to worry about parking overnight was ideal.
Ideal apartment for those with a car and who want to stay in the city center.
Great stay at the apartment. Easy check-in process. Comfortable bed. Close to everything and indoor parking was a major plus! Would definitely stay again.
Nice host, very responsive and easy to communicate with. The place is spacious and in a great location. Fantastic stay!
The instructions were perfectly clear and the place was great :)
Everything was exactly as described. Communication was quick and the space was clean. Location was perfect.
Extremely helpful and quick response time! Will visit again if I'm in Montreal.
Awesome apartment in a fantastic location! It was right near most of the main attractions and the parking was an added bonus! Yj was very responsive when I had questions.

Sebastian was an excellent host to us. Everything was exactly as he instructed and could not have been a better host. He answered our questions promptly and helped us greatly with parking. I would definitely recommend staying again!
Great for short stays.
Simple, clean and great location. Would definitely stay there again.
We had a wonderful stay here! Great location, walking distance to many many shops, restaurants, and nightlife.

This is a very convenient and great place in downtown Montreal near Concordia University. I had to help my daughter move out of her university residence, which was just a few blocks away. The underground parking and the elevator made it very easy to carry things to the apartment. The location is perfect. Pharmacie Jean Coutu, PA Supermarket, banks, restaurants, Dollarama and shops are one or two blocks away. The metro is just one block down the street. The apartment is very welcoming, cozy and has everything that you need. The TV has access to Netflix. I would definitely stay there again.

The apartment was nicer than I expected. It is close to tons of great restaurants and milk tea shops. You can walk to downtown shopping malls. However, the bathroom was kind of outdated. Some plugs did not work, as did air circulation. The garage looks sketchy but worked. Overall, I would say it's a very good place to stay, especially if you don't drive.
Amazing place to stay! Very close to restaurants and shops! Highly recommend.

Sunny, quiet, spacious, clean and nicely decorated, great location, good deal compared to a hotel. However, the bathroom walls were in poor condition, the plumbing functioned but requires maintenance, and the sofa was quite worn out and uncomfortable. Sorry.

Amazing, homey flat. Very European style, spacious living room and spacious closet space. The apartment was everything I hoped it would be. Highly recommend staying at this flat. Location is perfect and full of city vibes. Thank you for the hospitality, very much appreciated!

Yj's place is clean, spacious, and located in a fantastic spot in downtown Montreal, near Concordia and McGill Universities, several museums, great restaurants and bars, etc. The check-in/check-out process was easy to follow and very convenient, and the host's responses came within minutes! Would definitely stay again!
Highly recommended! YJ's apartment is very clean and nice, and has a great location. It's a really good experience!!

A great location a block from Guy-Concordia Metro station, two blocks from a bazillion restaurants on Rue Ste-Catherine, four blocks from the Musée des Beaux Arts. This is an otherwise unoccupied apartment, so you won't be climbing around someone else's stuff. Nice comfortable bed. Two demerits: the living room couch we found to be uncomfortable, and the bathroom needs some serious cosmetic attention.
A clean and well-kept apartment.
Excellent location. Communication is quick. Check-in process is smooth and easy to understand.
Solid spot, well maintained, would recommend.
good place

Great location downtown. It's a block away from many great restaurants, shops, and bars. However, I wasn't impressed that there was a $50 fee for "cleaning" added a few days before the trip (after the point where I could cancel in favor of other options). I expect the listed price to be the final price paid.
amazing

Good location, it was really nice having an included parking space so we didn't have to worry about the car during our stay. The apartment was clean and the neighborhood was safe, we really appreciated access to Netflix on the TV and the AC in the bedroom! Thanks!

This is a fantastic spot, with an excellent location, clearly showing someone put a lot of thought into it. It also feels great to be in a place surrounded by real locals. Fantastic place to rest your head for a night or two in Montreal!

The place is very clean and spacious. Only the bathroom needed renovation (to match the rest of the apartment) but everything worked well, no problems. Everything essential was provided. It's a nice comfortable space. I only had problems with parking at the beginning (check-in). A key fob is needed to enter the parking garage. So you need to find temporary street parking to go upstairs to get the key, so that you can go back downstairs to enter the parking garage. When leaving (checking-out), you also need to use the same key to exit the parking garage. Once you're out, you need to find temporary street parking once again so that you can enter the apartment and place all the keys where you first got them.

Good location, super close to train and bike share stations, lots of Asian restaurant options around the corner, parking is very helpful. Check-in directions were detailed and had no problems. Wifi was fast and had no problems. Consistent with other reviews, the bathroom needs a lot of care and repair, the futon in the living room is uncomfortable. We came during the major heat wave so the AC unit in the bedroom (only) was helpful but only so much you can do with 100F heat. Lighter and cotton bedding would be helpful in summer time, otherwise the bed is comfortable.  It has the basics, we enjoy making breakfast in so having use of the kitchen was great.

The place is quite clean, comfortable as shown in the photos and centrally located in downtown. 
The check-in process is a bit complicated with lengthy instructions for first retrieving keys and then finding parking. Be prepared to dedicate extra 15-20 minutes for check-in.

The location was perfect as we come to Montreal annually and enjoy walking throughout the city. Even though we walk, it's located very close to the Metro. The loft was very clean and we really appreciated the A/C. I know it rarely gets hot and humid, but it was when we were there so that was a lifesaver! Everything you need if you decide to eat in and cook. We eat out a lot, however, loved that we could make coffee in the morning which was provided. Overall, great experience. Easy check-in and parking. As with most Montreal lofts, parking is very tight, but my Toyota Rav4 had no issues getting in and out.
Small but well-located place in Montreal that included [website hidden by Airbnb] was perfect for our short visit to Montreal.

The living space at Yj's place is very modern, with tons of natural light coming through the windows! The bathroom/kitchen are a bit less polished, but if you will be eating out more anyway this shouldn't be a concern. The location is undeniably great, being in the heart of downtown Montreal, minutes away by walking from McGill/Concorde, shopping, eating, and across the street from a Metro Station. Very convenient stay for us to explore downtown Montreal.
Great location, but with many issues: inadequate air conditioning, subpar bedding, a dangerous garage door nearly destroyed our car, and outdated bathrooms and kitchens.

Overall, we had a good stay at this apartment. It was well-equipped with everything we needed, even an A/C unit in the bedroom (very necessary in the summer!) and Netflix on the TV. The host was great with communicating with us, especially giving us a heads up that the parking garage ceilings are quite low (we double-checked the height of our car before leaving to be on the safe side!). The apartment was very clean, although the bathroom is quite old and slightly run-down.
Do not be misled by the advertisements for this location; you will lose your money and ruin your vacation!

We loved this apartment as a young couple, it was the perfect location close to bars and restaurants! The only issue we had was parking our truck, but if you have a regular car, you will have no problem! Overall everything was perfect, the host was very helpful and kind! We’d definitely stay here again.

Good value, nice balcony, great location! 
Missing some window blinds, with another high-rise apartment building across the street, it makes for a less than private stay. No A/C probably not a problem most of the time, but another story on a hot day.

The website would say their place is just okay. You're basically paying for the location near the train station. The area was a bit seedy and there were multiple directions to get the keys and where to park. I thought I was on a treasure hunt which sounds fun, but after 5 hours of driving, it's not.  The website is as described. The apartment is very small and stuffy. The portable air conditioner was basically a fan since it was over 80 degrees in the city and the bathroom was from the 1980s. Lastly, the garage was one-way so there was a lot of maneuvering to get in and out.  The main issue we had was they forgot to give us a key to the building so we had to buzz in every time. When we were leaving my partner got stuck in the lobby and had to wait for someone to let him in. When the company that owns these Airbnb's sent me their automated texts reminding me to check out. I messaged back about the key and they "politely reminded me that they had already mentioned that I could just buzz in until 2 am." They gave us a list of directions to have us check ourselves in without being greeted, the least they could do is provide us with keys.
nice place :)

Great location. Appreciated having parking. 

Very good communication 

A few issues that need to be addressed and once taken care of, I would consider returning.
Good value and nice furnishings. Great location.

The building isn't great, but the apartment itself is okay. Good location and free parking. Very communicative host. Smelly like smoke in the apartment, but I think that's because of the neighboring apartments. Not a great deal, but it worked out okay.

The accommodation is well-located and complete. However, it is quite low on the floor, so you will have to endure noise from bins for over 30 minutes in the morning. 
The accommodation is dirty with broken equipment; we had to throw our socks away at the end of our stay...

I can't speak more highly of this place. First and foremost, the host is wonderful! He always checked in to see how we were doing and was so quick to respond to any questions we might have had throughout our stay. The place is prime in terms of (Website hidden by Airbnb) really can’t be beat! Lastly, the place itself was very cute, comfortable and clean. We had everything we needed. Would definitely stay here again in the future.
It's a nice apartment. The location is super convenient, and the private parking is great. The host's response time is fantastic, and they are very easy to deal with.
Clean and great location! Would recommend it.
A lovely apartment, well set up and near the metro. The host was responsive when we asked questions and very helpful.
Excellent location - two blocks away from St Catherine's Street for shopping and dining. The metro is very close, making for easy travel throughout the city.
The gentility of Dwellforce and the harmonious white decor from IKEA does not suffice to mask the great age of the places.

The place is very cozy. It's so great to find a place that has parking in downtown Montreal. Also, it takes only 5 minutes to walk to the subway station. Everything in the apartment is clean and tidy. The check-in instructions are very clear. I would definitely book this place again if I am visiting Montreal next time.
Nice spot downtown! Really cozy! Cool chill spot on the roof!!

Check-in is simple with a lock box. The place was as expected, clean, comfortable, and great location. Parking garage was easy to find, a bit of a tight fit if you have a larger vehicle, but extremely convenient to have parking available in this area. We would stay here again!
Nice location! Comfy bed!
The location is very convenient and everything I need is included.
Very nice, liked not having to worry about parking

Great place. Fantastic space. Good location, within walking distance of interesting places to visit. Just a note: make sure your car isn't too big as the parking is tight.  Check with them if you're unsure. They are super quick at responding.

Wonderful place to stay. Great location. The hosts were super responsive and so helpful.  I cannot stress enough how nice it was to have an actual parking spot available. I will definitely try to stay here again when I return.
Had a great stay. Awesome location. Great to have parking available.
Great location and cozy spot.
Don't skip this listing if you're looking for a great apartment with easy parking at a great location in one of Montreal's busiest downtown areas!

Staying here was very convenient as getting in touch with the host was very easy. They also checked in to make sure my stay went well. The apartment was very clean and comfortable for relaxing after a long day out in Montreal. Would stay here again!
Amazing place and was very quick with responses. Would definitely come back!

This apartment has a fantastic location and offers parking which was key for us driving into town but not wanting to deal with downtown parking. It's super close to the Metro and many restaurants. The host is very responsive to messages and gave great instructions for check-in. Very basic amenities, but all we needed for our couple nights stay in Montreal!
Great place to stay. Good location, within walking distance to the port and some of the party streets. Would definitely recommend it. The place was clean and check-in and check-out were easy.
Great place and awesome location!

Had an amazing stay. The location is extremely central and Yj ensured that we were happy with everything. Communication between us and the host was wonderful and made for an even better experience. The place had everything and anything we needed plus it was extremely clean :)

I had a wonderful time staying there. The flat was exactly as described, the location is excellent with everything nearby (metro, supermarket, restaurants), and the indoor garage was a major bonus during the winter months.
Affordable, very close to subway, well-equipped Netflix for the winter
Great location with a very convenient parking spot that was very helpful. Very comfortable space with everything we needed for a two-night stay in Montreal.
I recommend this apartment, which is very comfortable and well-arranged! Fanny has left us information about the surroundings that allowed us to fully enjoy Montreal!

Fanny's house is great, it's very close to the subway station and there's a 747 bus that goes directly to the airport nearby. The room is very comfortable, with enough heating and hot water, and there's also a living room and kitchen where you can cook your three meals!
The apartment is very well-located, in a very nice neighborhood, next to a street with many shops, bars. Lucie is really responsive, she answers my messages very quickly. I recommend it.
Lucie was an excellent host! Her place was spotless, very well-located, and we even had coffee in the morning! It is very well-located, close to great bars and restaurants in the heart of Montreal

Lucie is very available, organized, and very nice, the apartment is clean and welcoming, and perfectly located. 
I recommend without hesitation!
Great location, easy to get anywhere by foot, bike, or public transport. Nice outdoor patio space with ambient lighting. Quiet and clean.
Lovely little apartment in a nice location close to the Mont-Royal metro station.

The apartment is well-situated on the plateau. 
The bedroom does not face the street and is therefore relatively quiet.
Amazing host. Great apartment. Thank you again.

This is a great listing for semi-long tourism and working travelers. Filomena's place is very clean and well equipped. The metro stations for the orange and green line are 5 to 7 minutes walking distance. Filomena was easy to reach and she was very helpful when we had to change our accommodation dates unexpectedly.

Amazing apartment that's spotless! Laundry is a breeze, and the shower is super relaxing. A short walk to some great casual dining options, and Old Town is right next door. Responses are incredibly fast and helpful. Highly recommend!
The localization is very good and the apartment is very beautiful
No Wi-Fi. Clean apartment in a nice location. Had trouble checking in, but the staff was responsive and available at night.
This apartment was exactly as advertised. Very neat and clean. Comfortable beds - I slept well. Great communication. Would recommend to others visiting Montreal
Very beautiful location, very well-situated, well-equipped.
Great place!
Montreal is a great city with a good location.

Good location, for sure!
Could use a few more cooking utensils like a coffee maker, but overall it's a very nice suite for the price and the AC works really well. 

Would definitely stay again...
Beautiful apartment, very well-furnished and clean. We had a lovely visit.

Two-bedroom apartment in a central neighborhood. Shops, restaurants, cafes - everything you need. Excellent communication and fantastic check-in/check-out experience. Well done! 

Great for families.
As described!

Superb apartment in a very beautiful neighborhood. 
Immaculate cleanliness and exceptional bedding!
You feel like "at home"

Nice place. Lots of light. Old charm also means squeaky floors both in the unit and with the upstairs neighbors. This woke me up quite a bit. 

Also could not access the TV with my Netflix account. It seems it is not connected to the internet, and we did not have a laptop, and there are no other options.

Nice touches like tea and coffee and chargers. Amazing location!

This flat was VERY clean, newish bathroom and the bed were comfortable. A great location on one of the poshest high-streets in Montreal. Being in an older building the insulation between flats was not great. Overall one of the best value Airbnbs I visited.
Three good locations!
Simple, clean apartment in a great location in Mile End.
The apartment was very clean and Sonder responded to our messages quickly. The location is excellent.

Sonder was a wonderful host. Check-in/check-out was smooth, the place was clean, spacious, and had everything we could ask for. There's air conditioning in the living room that is very powerful. The apartment is close to restaurants and bars.

Let me start by saying the pictures do not do this loft justice!! The loft is huge and was so comfortable for my family and me. The hosts provided my family with THE BEST recommendations, which gave us a local perspective that my family really enjoyed!! The apartment is stunning and was extremely clean. The beds were super comfy and had enough privacy for all of us. The location was simply out of this world - you are legitimately in the heart of Old Montreal and yet the metro stop was steps away which made it super easy to get to the BELL Center for a hockey game! Everything was perfect from start to finish. It has been the best Airbnb experience I've ever had! My family and I thank you Explore MTL!
Very pleasant stay, we'll see each other again soon

The location is perfect. It's a short walk to many things, especially Old Montreal, and the train station is just around the corner if you want to go further. The hosts were also very helpful and responded quickly to any messages. The apartment itself looked exactly like the pictures and was perfect for relaxing and playing some pool before going out. However, our only flaw was finding parking. There are several lots nearby, but the attendants were never there, so you can only pay for so long in the machine, which required us to wake up at 5am more than once to refill the meter.

We really loved the character of this beautiful big loft, somewhat of a hidden treasure considering the unassuming exterior. Perfect location close to everything, plenty of parking and a metro stop 5 minutes away! Pros: It has everything needed to cook yourself dinner, an awesome pool table, wifi was fast and reliable, bedding and towels were clean, there was coffee and a blowdryer. Cons: no chalk for said awesome pool table, can't control the heat (it was really hot!), some utensils/dishes were dirty in drawers when we arrived, hanging your coat requires going to the bathroom, and I swear the upstairs neighbor operates a bowling alley!

Visited for one night with two older teens. We loved our hip digs!

The place was spacious and clean. The kids enjoyed shooting some pool during our downtime and making coffee with the Bialetti.

Beds and bedding were comfy and cozy. Great water pressure in the shower. We had everything we needed.

Our hosts were very responsive to our feedback and questions and accommodating to our requests.

I would recommend!

The place is larger than it appears in the photos, communication was excellent, and the host was incredibly helpful and willing to assist with anything we needed. The location is ideal and conveniently located near everything.

Great experience !!! I totally recommend this place. This big loft has a perfect location in Old Montreal. Very clean, very stylish and makes you feel like you're part of the jet set of Montreal. EXPLORE MTL gives excellent service: clear instructions and very fast answers. You will find everything you need inside this loft!
Very clean, very spacious, good communication, and overall excellent stay!
Great place! Stayed with 4 and it was comfortable. Very large space and comfortable beds :) close walking to anywhere in Old Montreal
Great location, great (huge) space and easy in & out.
Great place and super spacious!
The place looks great, literally identical to the pictures! The kitchen is fully equipped and the location is extremely convenient.
Amazing place! Very clean and exactly as pictured. We loved the location and how close it was to everything. Playing pool as much as we wanted was definitely a big plus!

Excellent spot for exploring the old port on foot. Beautiful loft with bright and large windows, Netflix if you want to stay in and relax, and a very cool space! We really enjoyed it for our business trip!
Fantastic space, quiet neighborhood close to many good Montreal spots!
I absolutely loved this apartment. Excellent value for money. It is spacious, beautifully decorated, comfortable and clean. I highly recommend this accommodation.
The place was gorgeous with all the amenities you need to feel comfortable. The host was easy to reach and very quick to our messages. Perfect trendy and affordable loft for a Montreal getaway!

The apartment was great for a guys' trip to Montreal. It is close to everything. Particularly, the Bell Centre is an easy 15-minute walk one way, the old town is an easy 10-minute walk the other way. Very close to the metro and large streets for transit to Rue St Catherine and other areas of the city. Note, however, that it is essentially a 2-bedroom apartment. The couches are not the best for sleeping. The nice modern shapes don't lend themselves to a comfortable sleeping position.

We had an amazing stay in this incredible loft for a Parisian accustomed to small spaces. Very comfortable, well-equipped, we didn't miss anything! Communication with Matt was easy whether it was our arrival or departure. Thank you very much. Highly recommended without hesitation!
This place is as good as the pictures. All the important places are within walking distance. Great find.
Very responsive and helpful hosts. The location is central to many destinations in Montreal. Many great restaurants, cafes, and other amenities are all within walking distance.
Great location, great apartment, and great organization on the part of the hosts.
The loft was amazing, much bigger than expected and in a great location downtown. The hosts were very accommodating and easy to communicate with. Highly recommend.

Good location. At first, it seems a bit outside of the bustling area. But, the location is a short walk from Old Montreal, Downtown, St. Catherine, and St. Laurent. The studio apartment was spacious and clean... would surely stay there again.

The loft was in a great location, right near so many good places to eat and sights to see in Old Montreal. The hosts recommended eating at Olive and Gourmando for breakfast which was a highlight for us. Checking in was very easy, there are parking lots all around the apartment, and it's above a bar if you're looking for that. The loft was clean, decorated nicely, smelled really good, and was comfortable. Thanks Matt and Kaileigh!

Spacious, warm loft in a great location. We had a wonderful stay. As it is located right in the heart of Montreal, you can expect to hear all sorts of noise at night! Nothing too dramatic though. A place I would definitely go back to!

Beautiful loft space!! Looks exactly as pictured, was close to all the old Montreal sights. Hosts provided great communication and checked in to ensure we had everything we needed. Was also located right next to a great little restaurant/pub that we were able to enjoy. Would definitely stay here again.

Overall, a fantastic experience. No complaints at all. The apartment was beautiful and located in a great part of town. It looked exactly like the photos showed. The location was perfect. I will definitely consider staying here again when I am in town next time.

Great unit, great location. Host was willing to help in any way they could. 
Would recommend this unit.
Great choice for a weekend in the old port!

Everything was comfortable, clean, and convenient, as expected from the house information. It was a perfectly easy place to stay for a couple's night trip to Montreal! Thank you for the good communication and a smooth stay.

Great space, close to everything and the unit was as described. 

Easy communication with host.

Everything about this cozy loft was fantastic! The high ceilings and large windows allowed for a sunny space. This apartment was clean, quiet, and comfortable. I felt right at home! I would definitely book again for our next visit.
Highly recommend!
Perfect location. Very clean, and looks exactly as the photos show!
A very nice interior decoration creates a real sense of space, you feel immediately good, in an unusual universe ;-) well placed to shine throughout Montreal, a very good choice!
A great place in Old Montreal. Stay nowhere else but here. Great communication and service. Beds super comfortable.
Very nice apartment well located. Everything was clear and well described.

I must say we really loved the space, it was clean and looked exactly like the picture. The kitchen functioned well, we managed to cook three great meals there. I would definitely stay here again. It is located in a great location close to everything we wanted to go. Thanks for being our host.
Excellent location. Very spacious studio. Much more fun than a characterless hotel. My kids loved it!

We were amazed by how great and beautiful this place was. We felt like it was our home the moment we entered the apartment. Everything was clean, well located... everything was on point! I have nothing else to say and I would definitely recommend this place. The instructions were clear and it was easy to communicate with the host. We were happy about our stay there.

We had a fantastic time staying here! The place was exactly as pictured and what we expected. Great location for checking out the old port, walking up to Crescent street pubs/clubs and hopping on the subway line to explore more of the city. Decor made for a really cool experience to stay in with a beer and shoot some pool (not a high-end table but lots of fun). The double bed was a dream to sleep on, and the queen was towards the firm side (if that's your cup of tea). Fantastic place to make a base for exploring all of Montreal has to offer! I would recommend.
We had a really great time here!

This was our very first family vacation with a 13-week-old baby and our stay was absolutely amazing!!! The loft was exactly what we needed and had everything plus more than we expected!!!  The location was great, parking super easy to find and restaurants galore!! Would stay here every single time when traveling to Montreal, both with and without kids!
The place was exactly what I expected. Great location! Love the windows! Great communication with the host, and I recommend it for an active person/group who wants to walk right into the action...
Such a cool loft! Celebrated a bachelorette downtown, and this was the perfect hangout spot before going out! Way better than any hotel!
I really enjoyed my stay! I am often in Montreal for work and I will definitely rent this apartment again.
Fast responding, nice, and great people. The place is very nice and as expected.
This was close to Old Montreal as described. It was convenient to take a long walk across the canal and enjoy the old part of the city

We had a great stay at Explore MTL. The space was gorgeous and the location was perfect. The host checked in to make sure everything was covered. We highly recommend and would certainly stay here again next time we are in Montreal.
100% Recommended

Great location and value. Excellent list provided of local restaurants and area attractions, although my favorite restaurant in the area, Holder, was mysteriously not on the list. I would definitely go back.

Place is central and parking is really close.

It might be a bit noisy at night as expected due to its central location.

The only thing that wasn't 100% during our stay was cleanliness. It could have been better, but nothing that would stop us from going back again.

The space is perfectly situated for exploring all of Montreal, particularly Old Montreal. Everything was clean and very comfortable for a relaxing stay. 

I hope to do it again soon.
Beautiful loft in a beautiful part of the city! Open space designed for a very fun stay. I recommend this space to everyone.
The place was beautiful and clean as advertised. Perfect location for exploring old Montreal! I would recommend this place to anyone if you can manage to snag it.
The Explore MTL was great as was the flat!
This apartment was great! The interior is exactly as pictured and there are nice amenities. It's in a good location and the hosts were easy to communicate with and helpful.

The place was absolutely adorable! Exactly as pictured. A short walk to beautiful restaurants and amazing architecture. The hosts were great too. The apartment was very hot and we had some trouble sleeping despite the extra fans provided. I don't think it was exceptionally warm for Montreal that night, in the 80s, so this is probably not a normal problem. Still good to consider if you're traveling here on hot days. Overall, absolutely wonderful and would definitely stay again.

Explore MTL was quick to communicate and confirm things with, as well as being super helpful. The loft itself was a perfect space for me and my best friend to stay and I would definitely stay here again. It is within walking distance to Old Montreal and is in a great central location. We enjoyed our stay very much!

Awesome unique spot, clean, walking distance to great restaurants. Hosts were great with information and even made a list of all the spots close by to check out. I would highly recommend this place to stay in your every time you're in the Montreal area!

The loft was spacious, clean, and very walkable to all of the main attractions in Old Montreal. Made full use of the included Roku and mini portable speaker. Would definitely recommend to future guests!
I only want to stay at this apartment now when I go to Montreal. I've been to many Airbnbs and this was by far the best one.
We had a great stay at this location! Thanks again.
My son loved the pool table. The place was nice. Keep the curtains down to keep out the sun during the day.
Fun place and excellent location. The host was very responsive and I was able to check-in an hour after booking. Thanks again.

This place was perfect for me and my two young daughters. Location was great. We parked our car in a lot directly across from the loft and didn't touch it for the length of the trip. We walked everywhere, which was the best way to explore. The loft was open, airy, immaculate, and had everything we needed. Checking in and out was a breeze. We will definitely stay here again.

This place was perfect for me. I was here on business and didn't spend much time at the property but it was very clean, had a clean bathroom with plenty of toiletries. The host was very responsive and the listing is centrally located in the city, a short walk to Old Montreal and shopping. I'll stay here again on my next visit for sure!

The hosts were very helpful and had great communication. Unfortunately, the weather was extremely hot during our stay so having no AC was an issue. There was one fan for the whole space that was very noisy. The hosts were very accommodating and brought us two new quiet fans the next day. The wi-fi did not work either, so they let us use the wi-fi from the bar below. It was really noisy during the night with people yelling and arguing from the bar downstairs. The place has a unique personality and we loved the decor!
It's such a cool place with a great location. We enjoyed our stay.
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊

The place is as good as it looks! I thought it might be a little too good to be true based on previous Airbnb experiences, but the pictures properly represent it. It's a wonderful space. Explore MTL are fast and helpful. We had a great time walking Montreal! We will definitely have this place at the top of our list when we come back.
The house was clean, the beds were comfortable, the host was easy to deal with and very responsive. The location was awesome for walking to Old Montreal.

The place is basically one giant room with some dividers. The location is great but the house rules are strict. 
A high cleaning fee and then they order you to do most of the cleaning work/prep.
The beds are by the windows so the morning sun will wake you up unless you're used to sleeping through that. Street noise is moderate. 
The place was clean and close to the metro.
Good place. Accurate with the description

This is a terrific location from which to explore Montreal! The apartment is really spacious and comfortable, and is just as pictured. We felt very safe in this neighborhood. And we were very close to everything in Old Montreal. The hosts were super about communicating - they provided plenty of clear instructions up front and were very responsive when we had questions. Their advance instructions also included a lot of area recommendations, and the one recommended restaurant we tried (Olive & Gourmando) was superb. There were minor issues (dishwasher went on the fritz) that did not affect the enjoyment of our stay...stuff like this can happen anywhere.
