One caveat: if you arrive late (after 11) and park in the lot across the street, you will only be allowed to purchase parking until 5 AM and then will have to return to the lot, at which point you can purchase for a longer stretch (up to 60 hours, as far as I can tell...and we were able to extend after that as well). Everything is very close...you won't need your car.
Close to all Old Montreal sights and close to Metro
Great location, spacious, well-decorated loft, and outstanding responsiveness to a minor issue that arose during our stay. We would definitely stay here again!

Explore MTL made our visit to Montreal a memorable one. We felt comfortable and at home in their space and totally spoiled by their personalized customer service and unique insight of their city (so much better than staying in a hotel!). They went above and beyond for us and we only stayed a night! 

This "Vieux-Montreal" loft is spacious, trendy and bright. It's even better than the photos! Creative design, unique decor and eclectic modern furniture - the ideal space for my work vacation with the hubbie. Their home was spotless and well presented when we arrived. The kitchen was fully stocked with everything we needed including complimentary coffee for the mornings and the lovely scented bathroom toiletries were a nice touch. The queen bed was uber comfy (seriously, where did you buy those sheets?!?). The wifi was fast and reliable (which is always important!), they also provided their Netflix account and a portable speaker for us to use. 

The location was prime, located on one of the major streets in the Old Port. Surprisingly no noise from the street carried into the apartment. The loft was a quiet and cool escape from the bustling city outside.

Transportation: soo easy! We parked our car in the lot next to the apartment and opted for bixi bikes and the metro.

The lovely hosts provided amazing recommendations for the entire city (wow) - they're clearly experienced foodies!!! They were always available to answer our (unending stream of) questions, offer helpful suggestions and were just incredible throughout the entire process! The check-in process was made painless with their detailed instruction manual - which was much appreciated after a long day of travel!

Check-out: Easy but hard to leave!

Thanks again for an amazing stay. We will definitely be back!!!
Great apartment in a central location!
This location is a gem! Love the spaciousness of the loft and its coziness. Will stay here again!
I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at the New York Style Loft in Montreal - thanks for the great amenities, location, and atmosphere. I even put the pool table to good use! I'll be back!
Comfortable, clean and cool!

I recommend staying with this host if ever in Montreal. The location was perfect, quiet while a 10-minute walk to the Old Port where there are tons of restaurants and shops. The decor of the apartment was fantastic and the amenities (high-speed internet, bathtub, coffee press, etc.) made our stay very comfortable. Best of all, our hosts communicated with us throughout our stay and promptly responded to our requests. My husband and I enjoyed our stay very much and highly recommend this B&B.
Great place, exactly as advertised.
Perfect location. Great communication. Book it.
Centrally located for shopping and nightlife, the loft exceeded all my expectations and the host's hospitality was outstanding. I will definitely stay there again.
I'd come back anytime. Great location, cool spot, and had no issues whatsoever.
Super close to everything you'll need to see if you're planning on exploring Old Montreal. And a truly beautiful loft
I highly recommend this loft, great value for the price, super beautiful and well located in the city, close to the Vieux Port and several good restaurants.
This place is gorgeous! Close to the old port and great for walking around and checking it out

The location was great, right in Old Montreal. Unfortunately, we experienced some issues with our apartment that negatively impacted the experience. We rented the apartment primarily because it was advertised as having a complete kitchen. Upon arrival, we found old food from the previous guest had been left in the fridge by the cleaning staff. The dishwasher was also out of service, which was not mentioned in the listing. We purchased food on our first day of travel and stored it in the refrigerator. The next day, we noticed the refrigerator wasn't cooling properly and were forced to throw out our food. The stove was also not heating properly. Communication with the hosts was good but they were unable to offer any solutions for the appliance problems as they were not present in the country at the time. Overall, while the location was nice, we were disappointed because we chose this property due to the fact it had a kitchen.
A very clean, spacious loft. Perfect location in Old Montreal. Just a short walk to restaurants, bars, and all the attractions that Old Montreal has to offer. Definitely will be staying here again!

We had a lovely stay, the place looks just like the pictures and the beds are comfortable. This flat is all about location! We walked everywhere! Aaron and Kaileigh were fantastic at being in touch throughout the experience and really made us feel at home. Just a heads up, if you're a light sleeper, bring some ear plugs as you can hear the light murmur of the city at night, something I quite enjoyed, but also the flats above can emit some noise from time to time. Staying in the loft was a lot of fun and perfect for a Montreal getaway. Thanks again Matt, Aaron and Kaileigh!!
You would be hard pressed to find anything better in terms of space, location, comfort, and safety.
Clean. Well-furnished. Felt like home. Would definitely recommend.

The host was very communicative and provided all the information and amenities for a comfortable stay. They very kindly allowed us to leave our luggage behind to pick up later even after we checked out.

What a gem! Kaileigh, Aaron, and Matt are terrific hosts, well organized and readily available. We even received a message part way through our stay to see if there was anything we needed. The loft is gorgeous and well appointed. Exactly as pictured. We were met by Kaileigh when there was an issue with the internet. She offered interim alternatives and solutions and it was fixed the next day.

The neighborhood is great! Old Montreal and its sights are within walking distance, as are restaurants and coffee shops. A short drive to many historic sites, grocery stores, and drugstores. Everything you need is a short distance away. Parking is easily available right in front of or next to the building. Overnight parking is free on the street. 

Thanks for a great stay!
Great place to stay!

Space is amazing. The location is walkable to the metro and there are places to eat. And the hosts are stingy with recommendations on what to do and where to get good food! 

I have to admit parking is tough everywhere. There's street parking at night, but since we didn't use the car, we parked it in one of the suggested lots. 

We were only two, but we agreed the space is perfect for a group! We definitely would use this amazing space again!

P.S. The pub downstairs is great for a late-night bite!
This place was amazing! I would love to stay here again! It exceeded my expectations and I will definitely try to book here again.

Great location and cozy space. We were bummed that the pool table was broken (tilts down on one side so the balls roll all over the place and onto the ground because the baskets are broken). That was one reason for booking the place. The floor up on the loft was dirty, and when I put my pants on, they had been on the ground, covered in dust. It made me question the high cleaning fee. But aside from a couple of downsides, the place was just what we needed for a couple-night stay in Montreal. Easy parking across the street (you can track down the parking attendant and he'll tell you what to do) and easy access into the apartment. Cool layout and nicely decorated. Thanks!
Beautiful place. Very beautiful evening in the city. We enjoyed the little touches of the hosts. Thank you

This is the second time we have booked an Airbnb with Matt, Aaron, and Kaileigh, and we were even more pleased this time around than the first.

This place was absolutely amazing. Great location, great amenities, super clean, everything about it was fantastic. Matt, Aaron, and Kaileigh are always great to deal with. They were in constant communication to make sure that we had all the information we needed. They even went as far as messaging me in the morning to let me know that we would be able to access the place earlier than we originally expected.

I highly recommend booking their place and will definitely do so again in the future.
Great house. Great location. The homeowners were available if needed, but not intrusive.
Perfect place to stay for one night. Beautiful decor and furniture.

Just like the photo. Studio type apartment but since space is huge (a lot of space!), the beds were segregated well via leveled floor. It has a bachelor's pad vibe. It’s a walk-up but wasn’t a problem since our stroller was compact. 

It’s close to St Paul street where the shops and restaurants/cafes are located. We also walked going to nearby neighborhoods like Chinatown. 

We enjoyed using the pool table. My 3 year old daughter loved the place.

This is the perfect space to experience Montreal loft life. The vibe in the loft was very happy and peaceful. I loved the art on the walls and welcoming notes. A perfect sanctuary after walking around the great city of Montreal.  The sheets on the bed were super soft and there were nice touches of the delicious homemade granola, natural shampoo, conditioner, and soap.   I recommend this place.
Absolutely amazing place to spend a few days. Amazing location with some of the best-rated restaurants in all of Canada within walking distance. Highly recommend
Everything about this space was lovely. It is exactly as it appears on the site and I would definitely return there.
thanks
I would recommend this place. Very cool vibe and fun location. It's close to the train station. A perfect way to enjoy Montreal.
Excellent in all aspects.
Clean, stylish loft! Any issues that arose were quickly addressed.
Very good stay

Amazing loft, even bigger than in the pictures, beautiful decor! The hosts were extremely accommodating letting us check-in early. Kaileigh was super friendly and helpful, great communication all around. We loved the place because of its convenience and we would recommend it to anyone, it is very well located and a 3 minute walk to the metro station.
This was a fantastic place to stay! My boyfriend and I noticed the extra effort that these three put into their Airbnb listing. And they were all superb with communication. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
Great apartment and location.

The location is fantastic. Right next to one of the best vegetarian/vegan restaurants, and when it was -5 degrees outside, being close to the Montreal underground was wonderful! I didn't have any trouble finding parking, and the bed was incredibly comfy! I loved it here.
Allways enjoy staying here
Prime spot!
Beautiful well-located and picturesque loft. Active and effective communication! I will definitely go back there without any problem. Thank you

The loft is amazing and the location is great too. The guys are very kind and always ready to help! I would recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to spend some time in beautiful Montreal! Francesco

The lift was very spacious and very stylish! Communication with the hosts was extraordinary as they answered very rapidly and always ensured throughout our stay that everything was fine with us.  Also, the beds were really comfortable! I would highly recommend this loft without hesitation!

Go to Airbnb in Montreal. Stayed at M, A & K's lofts in the past and each time my expectations were exceeded. They're constantly updating + upgrading their customer service, design + amenities which were already top quality. Since my last visit: they've moved to local + organic bath products (which smell divine), offer homemade granola (which is delicious) & provide aromatherapy lamps (lovely scents add to the relaxing atmosphere). It's obvious they have real pride of ownership, are focused on their guests needs + perfecting their craft. Their customer service + hospitality are unrivaled.

I'll be back!

Matt Aaron and Kaileigh were great, very responsive and even ordered new pool cues on my complaint about the state of the current ones! The loft is huge and well located for business or pleasure in downtown Montreal. 10/10 would stay there again.

It is a beautiful space in a convenient location! Matt, Aaron, and Kaleigh were gracious hosts with excellent communication regarding any questions or issues that arose. We did have a problem with excessive noise one night in an apartment above us but that is not to blame on the hosts. They helped us handle the situation and we were able to resolve it. We really enjoyed our stay and would absolutely recommend this loft!
Another excellent stay + note that each time there is an addition thought
This is a good spot that I recommend for relaxing or going on a date. The spot is easy to find, the directions are clear and precise, and the service is impeccable.
Translation: Simply perfect!!!

Matt, Aaron, and Kaleigh are fantastic hosts who are attentive and available from before the booking to after the stay. The loft is absolutely gorgeous and nostalgic. The space is much larger than what you would expect from the photos; guaranteed to make your mouth drop the second you walk in. A beautiful open concept, great location, and quite accessible for parking (street parking at $8/day). Cozy and stylish, perfect for entertaining a small group. Highly recommended for your next stay; it will make your visit to Montreal exceptional.
I would gladly return to this apartment. Very comfortable, well-equipped and charming. Excellent location. The hosts are fantastic!
Will will be back soon! Had a great time!
Great place, great location
Really beautiful and open space, with very comfortable beds. Everything you could possibly need was there and I really wish I could have stayed longer than one night.
The space is really fun and in a great location in the city. Everything was very neat, clean, and well decorated. The hosts were very kind and helpful. I would definitely stay again in a heartbeat.

Beautiful loft, clean, and exactly as advertised. The loft is close to some really cool restaurants and Montreal shops. Matt, Aaron, and Kaileigh were super quick to respond if I had any questions! Highly recommend!
What you see and read is what you get... actually it is even bigger when you see it! Hosts were amazing and extra helpful. Super modern and well decorated. Very nice overall
Great stay
What a spot! If you're looking for a loft-style place in Montreal, it's hard to imagine anything better. Loved it.

I highly recommend this place to everyone, the hosts always responded very quickly and all the instructions were extremely precise. The loft was very clean and everything was perfect. We will definitely do business with the hosts again for our future trips without a doubt 5/5 for this magnificent loft :)
What you see is what you get. Beautiful loft!

Gorgeous place with large windows. Had a great time playing pool and relaxing for the weekend. I'm a frequent Airbnb user and this was one of my best experiences. Photos are very accurate and, if anything, don't do justice to the spaciousness of the loft. Will definitely stay here again when I return to Montreal!

We spent 48 hours with our children at Matt, Aaron and Kaileigh's place, and we absolutely loved our stay! The apartment is clean, super cool, and well-located.

Matt, Aaron and Kaileigh also shared their good addresses, which was awesome when discovering Montreal. Thanks!
Great location downtown in Old Montreal near the port.

I highly recommend this apartment as a nice place to get away if you still want to be in the city. The apartment was absolutely beautiful, and the hosts were incredibly responsive and kind. I would definitely stay here again.

Great place, nice location in a quiet neighborhood perfect for a peaceful and relaxing weekend. It's within walking distance to many great restaurants, close to the metro, we enjoyed our time here and will stay here again on our next visit to the area. Very quick response to any questions, plus the hosts are very pleasant!

Great space, great location. Spent a few days in Montreal for a couples getaway and the loft was big, bright, warm (it was cold outside) and well appointed. We walked to a Habs game (10 mins) and old Montreal is just blocks away. An outdoor parking lot across the street was convenient and let us pay for all 4 days up front. - $80. McGill street (steps away) had restaurants and a micro-brewery that are great and less touristy than the spots in the heart of the old town. Communication with M-A-K was great.
Great location to stay and explore Montreal!
A really amazing loft. So clean and located right in the heart of Montreal. Perfect place to stay if ever you're in town

The NYC loft exceeded our expectations. It's larger than what you can imagine from the photos. All the little details made our stay even more special. The decor is stunning. We will definitely return in the future!
This place exceeded our expectations and offered my group a wonderful environment to rest and recharge on our travels. Everything was clear and smooth from reservation to check-out. Would stay again.
Great spot, I highly recommend this apartment if you ever travel to Montreal.
Awesome place. Great hosting. Would love to come back next time I'm in town!
Best place in Montreal, hands down
This is the third time I've stayed at their place, and as usual, the space and hospitality were outstanding. I would definitely recommend this place!
Perfect place to stay in Montreal! The place was 100% what we expected and even better!
Very elegant and classic loft. Full of very nice touches. Pictures do not do justice to the property.

The place was better than the pictures. The hosts were extremely responsive, from the day we booked until check-out. The apartment couldn't be located in a more convenient spot. Highly, highly recommend this spot. (It's also a really cool space!)
I will definitely stay again! 5 stars!

A very beautiful loft, I love the decoration! Very well located in the city (near of activities, restaurants... ;) 

Thank you for your hospitality and see you soon!
Perfect place for stays in MTL, just a 10-minute walk from everything! In the heart of downtown!

Matt, Aaron, and Kaleigh's place was exactly as described and their hospitality matched the reviews. I booked this Airbnb based solely on the reviews and was not disappointed. 

My husband and I had a mini honeymoon in Quebec and on our way home from Mandeville we wanted to see if we could extend our trip by a day and spend a night in Montreal (this is how our trip began). Matt, Aaron, and Kaleigh were so quick to respond and so kind to accommodate us the same day as our request! 

The location was good with plenty of parking options nearby and it's a short walk to the excitement of downtown Old Montreal! The apartment is beautiful and very spacious in a secure building. The bed was comfortable, but be prepared to hear street noises - which is obviously not the fault of the hosts. 

The place is clean and well-equipped for a great stay in Montreal! We recommend staying at Matt, Aaron, and Kaleigh's place! The hosts are so friendly and sweet you won't want to leave.
Perfect loft for a stay in Montreal. Very clean and well decorated! A place to remember.
Apartment building

Totally cute and unique apartment, awesome location close to Notre Dame and Square Victoria OACI metro with a Starbucks around the corner, easy parking directly behind the building and super simple check-in process. Matt, Aaron and Kaileigh were extremely responsive to every question prior to and during our stay. We weren’t bothered by the noise from the lively Irish pub directly beneath the apartment since we were exploring most of the day anyhow and the neighborhood/building is super quiet once it closes (11pm weeknights, all day Saturday and Sunday). If I wasn’t traveling with a child, I would have been down there myself!
Great stay, the location is perfectly spot on! A+
Lovely apartment! We enjoyed our time here! Super comfortable beds and a safe location! I would definitely stay here again! :)

Loved this stylish loft. Old Montreal is the best location to be while in Montreal - shopping, restaurants and cafes. The extra details for guests are lovely and the hosts are very organized & respond quickly. Perfect stay.

Beautiful loft located in the area of the old port close to restaurants and nightlife. The loft was stylish and fully equipped. The sofa bed was a bit tricky to unfold and the additional taxes on top of the rental fee made the loft an expensive stay. However, if you have the money, you can treat yourself because it was worth it :)
What a beautiful Airbnb! It made going home difficult. The great location also makes it a perfect place to stay.
A lovely place, very clean, well-equipped. I recommend without hesitation!
Very stylish and spacious loft. Super soft and cozy bed and pillows. Nice location, easy to get around. Highly recommended hosts!
Very nice loft. Well-situated. Excellent communication with host.
We had a nice time at Matt, Aaron, and Kaileigh's place. The apartments are spacious, well-equipped, and very clean. Communication with the hosts was excellent.
Amazing place! Very clean and well-decorated, great location. Enjoyed our stay!
The house looks exactly like the photos and is actually larger than it appears. The location is also excellent for travelers, being in the heart of great restaurants and attractions.

Great location! Walking distance to everything you'd like to visit in Old Montreal, but just far enough from the center of things to offer quiet, restful nights.

Hosts are very responsive and helpful with local tips and suggestions.
Great space!
Nice, clean and quiet. Great place!
The department is well located in general, but I found the rules of the department and building to be excessive. The hallways are very dirty.
Funky space... right next to an outdoor patio for a cold drink... clean and modern. Loved the all-natural soaps and shampoo/conditioner. Great location and great price. Loved it and will return
The place is spacious and communication is A1!
Excellent!
Wonderful space! Very cute little touches!
Very helpful and considerate, we loved our time there and would definitely go again!
Very beautiful decor, clean and very well located!
Lovely space! Hosts are organized and thoughtful and easy to get in touch with.
This clean, comfortable, stylish loft is conveniently located near tourist attractions. Communication is excellent and we especially enjoyed the great restaurant recommendations.

The most responsive hosts I've ever had with Airbnb. If you're looking for a place to stay where you know you'll have someone to reach out to with any questions, this is the place. Great food nearby, and walkable to so much more.

You can expect a lovely, charming space that is close to many very cool spots in Old Montreal! We highly recommend the Bixi Bikes for getting around. They were super convenient and very affordable. McGill Street is awesome for all kinds of food and coffee and only a couple blocks away.
Beautiful loft style space in Old Montreal.

I have stayed in quite a few Airbnbs over the years, and I feel I really hit the jackpot with this one:

- Hosts: From the welcome pamphlet to the quick communication, it is clear the hosts are really intent on making your stay as pleasant as possible.
- Location: Situated in the Old Port, we were within walking distance of everything we wanted to go.
- Unit: The photos don't quite do justice to the space; it really is quite impressive. It's clear the space was maintained as if it were someone's home. There is a "wow" factor when you walk inside.
- Extras: The unit is stacked full of small extras that make you feel right at home (or better), such as environmentally and ethically sourced bath products.
Thank you for your efficiency and prompt response when we had a little hiccup
This space is clean and close to the old town. Our hosts were very helpful.
Second time staying here and I just love it. So easy. Stylish. Comfortable. Cozy beds. Great location. I'll definitely be back.

I had a very comfortable and amazing experience in this very welcoming place.  The prompt communication with Matt, Aaron & Kaileigh was very helpful. The loft is as appealing on the pictures as it is in person. I’m looking forward to coming back and would highly recommend this place! Thanks again.

When you first book, they provide you with this immaculate PDF showcasing some of the top places to eat around Montréal, as well as one for getting into the Airbnb/parking. Those were beyond helpful, and I'm sure you'll love them just as much as we did. Definitely a place to spend two nights if you can afford it; one was just not enough time.
Try to prioritize convenience over fashion. There was no communication from the host's side.
Super loft for a romantic getaway!

What a great spot and location! Loved the decor and the open concept. The pool table was a great addition.  The kids enjoyed playing while the parents took time to relax after taking all the great local activities. The loft includes everything you need, plus personal touches to make it feel very inviting. Great location on the border of downtown Montreal and Old Montreal. I loved walking out the door onto the street and being in the heart of town. The Pub Victoria is a great little local pub that is hopping which is next door. It has a good, little outdoor patio for a pint. Location is perfect (although we did not use the bikes there is a convenient bike rental location (bixi) right out front). The hosts were very quick to respond to inquiries. They offered all kinds of support including a professionally prepared introduction booklet (outlining house rules and need-to-know info) and a separate local activities/dinner suggestion booklet. They are very professional hosts who help to reassure you (as this was one of our first Airbnb experiences). They preempt your needs and provide all the required communications upfront opposed to us asking them for info; they already know what info most travelers are looking for. The only thing to note is upon arrival, the common area which includes hallway and stairs are very dated and not inline with the quality of the loft (yet functional) being a very "Old Montreal" building. But once you open the door to the loft, you are relieved. Great experience.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this loft. It was exactly as pictured and very comfortable and spacious. It was just what we needed traveling with our two children. All of the required amenities were provided - and then some. We didn’t want for anything.  It was perfect. While we were out sightseeing, the kids would ask when we were going back to the loft. 

The location was great. We were able to walk to all of the areas we wanted to see - Old Montreal, Rue St Catherine, Chinatown, the Port, etc.  This was with no complaints from the kids - a true sign that it was a comfortable walk. When we wanted to venture further out, the Metro was a quick couple of blocks away. 

Aside from place and location, the best part about this rental was our hosts. They were very helpful from the initial booking, responded quickly to any and all questions and were very detailed in their communication. Everything was as they described. Most importantly, they were very gracious. Even when we had a small mishap, they made us feel very much at ease. We have used many vacation home rentals and found our hosts for this unit to be one of the best. 
We highly recommend!

We had a great stay at this loft. The place is amazing, spacious and clean. Full of thoughtful touches that made our stay comfortable. The location itself is perfect, close to all attractions in the heart of old Montreal. The experience was better than we expected. Our hosts were quick to respond to all our requests and kindly accommodated all our needs. 

I would highly recommend this loft. It is a bit on the pricier side but well worth the money. 

A big thank you to our hosts who made this amazing experience possible. We look forward to staying here again!

Very unique listing in a great location. The building is a bit rundown, but the unit itself is nice. The check-in experience was poor due to an incorrect address on Airbnb, but I'm sure this will be fixed for future guests.

This space truly delivers...hands down one of the best Airbnb experiences I have had to date! 

Matt, Aaron and Kaileigh have included so many unique little touches that will truly warm your heart.

The apartment provides the perfect base when spending time in this lovely and vibrant neighborhood; if you are lucky enough to snag this space for your stay in Montreal, you are in for a treat!

You will not be disappointed...
The New York style apartment I stayed in was very clean and in a prime location.

Arriving at this place, we didn't expect it to look so nice. Although we ran into a little situation, it was resolved right away with the help of Kayleigh. She responded very quickly and resolved the situation very professionally and efficiently. Parking was a bit tricky since the one next to the Airbnb only accepted cash and was difficult to operate. We found parking that was a 4-minute walk and was super cheap for 24 hours; we paid about $10.

I would definitely stay here again!

This is the first time using Airbnb. I was not sure what to expect but my husband and I were pleasantly surprised. Matt, Aaron and Kayleigh made the whole process seamless. They were in constant communication with us prior to the trip and even during the trip if there was a need. The loft itself was impressive, stylish and comfortable. So much better than a hotel.  Location was wonderful. Old Montreal was more than we expected! Walking distance everywhere! Don’t be intimidated by the immediate surroundings. The loft itself is located above a pub but we never hear anything at all! There is plenty of construction going on nearby but nothing too disturbing . When you enter the loft for the first time it's like entering a new world! Hosts prepared a great food guide. We purchased an MTL passport and saved so much regarding local activities. Can’t say enough! Thank you amazing hosts!
Great location and good hosts. Figure out parking before you arrive as that's a challenge. Entry is not as great as the loft!
Awesome place, Highly recommend!
Great location and good value.

Matt, Aaron, and Kaleigh are very thoughtful, communicate thoroughly, and provide a lot of helpful information about the area, including excellent tips for local restaurants. The loft apartment is very clean, spacious, nicely decorated, and includes a pool table. The location is perfect for visiting Montreal's Old Town, and you can easily access public transportation for other areas. Parking may be a bit difficult because the apartment is in a business area, but we found a good parking lot about two blocks away that is reasonably priced ($11.95 CN per day).
The communication was excellent - anytime I reached out I had a response almost instantly. The location is excellent if you want to be in Old Montreal.
Really great room and their services. Strongly recommended.
My husband and I, along with our two children (one toddler and eight-month-old), enjoyed a very comfortable and pleasant stay here.
This was a wonderfully appointed and stylish apartment. Communication was excellent and the pre-arrival information was excellent! Would definitely stay again!

The location is great, with everything within walking distance, including Notre Dame Basilica Church, Downtown, Chinatown, and Old Montreal.

The apartment was just as I expected, similar to the photos we saw.

The hosts were easy to communicate with and responded quickly.
Great spot! Check-in/check-out was easy. Cool loft apartment with a unique layout.

Please note that the unit is located on top of a bar. We were not expecting this at all. Although our hosts had requested via an extremely detailed message not to make noise past 11:00 pm, the band played until midnight and it was extremely loud in the unit. The bar also had music going until about 2:00 am in the morning.

The unit lacked some basic amenities such as wine glasses and a coffee machine (only having a press). There were five of us and as a result, we did not have enough dishes for everyone. 

However, the loft is nice and cozy. It is well located in Old Montreal with many restaurants nearby. We enjoyed the pool table.

Great hospitality. Amazing recommendations for food and drink. The kitchen is well-stocked with necessary cooking utensils for a night in. Having an ensuite laundry room is a bonus! We would definitely return.

Awesome place! Recommendations were super helpful. Else's on the plateau was our personal favorite. Our hosts invited us to a party while we were there, too! Great experience. Strongly recommend this place!
Very well-located loft.
good! I'll be back for sure!

We absolutely loved our stay. The super loft was very comfortable and well equipped. The check-in/check-out instructions were clear and simple. We also appreciated the promptness in answering our questions.
Great spot, ideally located in Old Montreal. Very large space with a lot of charm.
Great location in Old Montreal.
Clean spot, beautiful location
Super friendly hosts, beautiful place, very cozy. Couldn't be better located in the city! I recommend it to anyone!

These hosts were incredible. Very available, welcoming and thoughtful. Their home is absolutely beautiful with many thoughtful touches including homemade organic body gel and shampoo! More than enough towels and pillows. Huge space and such a cute modern space. We loved it!
Very nice place, a pleasure to be back
A stylish and very professionally managed place. Met all my expectations. Would recommend.

Great place as described in the photos, although the main door, lobby, and hallway are pretty unappealing, the actual loft is great. Instructions and communication were stellar. Had an issue with the unit being really hot and I was told it's because heating is central to the whole building, which is really odd. The solution was to crack open a window. It actually worked but not really environmentally friendly. Would have been great to have some way of playing music. There's a Roku hooked up to the small TV but no Spotify unfortunately. Overall, we had a great time. The loft and its location are amazing!

Fantastic place, great location, super soft pillowcases and all the amenities needed. I would recommend this place to anyone; I had a wonderful stay. The hosts put a lot of thought into this apartment and all of their recommendations, hope to be back one day!
A great spot - highly recommend!
The place was beautiful, grammatically correct location and I'd definitely stay there again
Amazing stay! Cozy and well-located :)
Great loft!
Great place! We will be back!
An amazing place as listed on Airbnb. You won't regret taking this place!
Fantastic!

Great location near Old Montreal with convenient (paid) parking nearby. The apartment is spacious and clean, and the hosts were very responsive. The kitchen is large and relatively well-equipped; there's a nice TV with Netflix available. The interior renovation is somewhat lacking, and the heat could not be moderated except through opening windows and fans; it was uncomfortably warm. The beds are on a raised platform without a railing, which may not be ideal for some guests. We did love Montreal and the neighborhood.

Best hosts in Montreal! We have been renting this loft for 2 years now, always such a pleasant experience with Matt, Aaron and Kaileigh being very responsive, flexible and accommodating. It is in prime location, the layout is well thought out, the decor is modern. 10/10 and highly recommend!
Great place and location. It was super relaxing to hang out at the Airbnb and you're close to lots of great spots in Old Town, but also downtown for even more options and shopping! Highly recommend
Great place! Will be back!
Wouldn't recommend these hosts to anyone, never seen such horrible people
Stylish, modern, with nice touches and a comfortable bed! Communication was good, and the location is great. Some minor issues related to the lock box were resolved quickly.
Great hosts and great loft!

Prime location and good communication from Matt, Aaron, and Kaileigh. 
Comfortable beds, Wi-Fi, a pool table, and Alexa were nice amenities. 
Cute personal touches with chalkboard messages and locally made bath products. Great information and recommendation package provided.
Beautiful
This is a really beautiful place located right in the city center for those who love bars, restaurants, museums, etc... it will be your ideal choice!
Prime location, nice loft. Kaileigh answered all of my questions and addressed my concerns to ensure a great stay. I would definitely book with her again! Highly recommended.
Very spacious, open layout as photos suggest. Great location. Matt, Aaron and Kaileigh were highly communicative. Would recommend.
I had a great experience at this place. Well located in the old port, spacious and has everything you need for a relaxing stay. Also, their communication is really outstanding!
Very interesting and stylish loft apartment right in the heart of Old Montreal. Clean, spacious and fully equipped. Thanks!
Great location. Clean and comfortable. I plan to stay again on my next trip to Montreal.

Second time staying in one of their places and we love our experience every time. I 100% trust that their homes will be a home away from home as they never disappoint. This apartment was as perfect as the photos. Great location, walking distance to everything in Old Port. Parking was a little difficult as we got there just around midnight and the garages were full. There are a few lots around - parked in one and walked back - no biggie. The hosts are amazing too - great communication every time! Thanks Kaileigh, Matt & Aaron!

This loft has a great open concept and the pool table was a bonus. These hosts are amazing! They have gone above and beyond to provide a booklet of recommendations in the city to explore & have added a lot of nice little touches in the loft! Would Highly recommend :) Great location as well!

Kaileigh, Matt, and Aaron were great hosts - extremely responsive and proactive communicators. They provided great local tips, and the apartment was extremely spacious. The pool table was a nice bonus!
Perfect for a stay in Vieux Montréal. Close to everything.
great place
Very kind girls, beautiful apartment, close to everything I really liked, thank you
good

Adelyna is a wonderful host who answered all of our questions and has a lovely home. She was able to give us directions to some great places. If you're planning to stay in Montreal, this is a great place to stay.

Our stay at Adelyna's was remarkable. The apartment is clean, furnished with good taste and very warm: 2 leather sofas, a large TV with internet connection and Netflix server, washing machine and dryer, etc... everything you need! We highly recommend this rental. If you want to visit Montreal, there's no hesitation as the apartment is close to all amenities and particularly the Fabre metro station. I would like to emphasize once again the kindness of Adelyna and her family that we had the opportunity to meet. Thank you.
The apartment is well-located, it is clean and well-equipped to allow for a stay.

We stayed one night at Adelyna's place. The apartment is pretty and rather warm. It was clean and we felt like it had all the necessary amenities. We booked less than 24 hours in advance but everything was well-organized in the apartment. We didn't meet Adelyna in person, but she left us the key at the entrance with a password system that worked perfectly.  A point to note negatively, however, the apartment block as such is dirty and dilapidated. There were cigarette butts on the floor in the stairwell, and we weren't reassured upon arrival. But once inside the apartment, it was okay. Thank you Adelyna for your hospitality!
The host cancelled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Adelyna was a fantastic host. She was quick to respond and made checking in and out very convenient. The apartment was accommodating, clean, and very spacious. Having access to Apple TV was a great finishing touch to staying in Adelyna's place. Exceeded expectations for the value. 

The apartment is located very close to the highway with ample street parking. It will be very convenient for guests who drive! Keep in mind to respect some of the parking restrictions though. We didn't think much of it and paid the consequences. Overall our trip was great, we will definitely stay at Adelyna's again!

Housing located near all public transportation (bus, metro), quiet and close to shops (traditional and fast food restaurants).
And next door to the apartment, you'll find the best poutine restaurant in town (prized at the Montreal Poutine Festival)! 
Adelyna is very friendly, hyper available and not stingy with information about the city.
The only downside is the smells of the FPK located right next door.
The housing was clean and well-maintained... we recommend it for a family stay of up to 4 people and it meets all the necessary family needs.

We stayed with Adelyna for almost a month. The description and photos are consistent with the accommodation, with Adelyna's kindness in addition :-)

From our arrival to our departure, Adelyna has been an excellent host: available, responsive, always helpful and with good advice. Accommodation close to public transport, supermarkets... I highly recommend staying with Adelyna!

Adelyna was very easy and quick to communicate with. The neighborhood and location were as described. Very quiet and seemed safe.  The apartment was cozy and as described as well. Bedrooms, bathroom and 
Did not spend a lot of time at the apartment but it was a good stay overall.

Our stay with Adelyna was exceptional; we adored the four months spent in this accommodation. The apartment was fully equipped, and access to public transport was easy!

Adelyna is an outstanding host, available at all times and always so helpful! 

I highly recommend this apartment!
Friendly and attentive host, beautiful apartment!
Everything was very good to stay in

Adelyna is a very responsive host who meets our needs. We encountered an issue with adapters, and in less than two days, Adelyna had resolved the problem. The apartment is very well-located and very clean, we feel very comfortable there. I recommend this apartment entirely! Thank you again, Adelyna

Adelyna's place was such a lovely home to stay in for a first-time trip to Montreal! It was located on a Main Street about 30-45 minutes outside of the main downtown/city area. Easy access to bus routes! The apartment was prepared with all the necessities (and more!) for bathroom and kitchen supplies, and the living room and bedrooms were stylish and homey. Adelyna was attentive and quick-to-respond to our needs and questions. Overall a great stay!

A modest apartment, but well-situated.

Though absent, Ramzi was available at all times to answer my questions. 

Ideal for work.

Functional accommodation - clean and close to everything (metro 5 minutes away, supermarket right across the street very convenient, laundry in the building). I haven't met Ramzi but he is a very responsive and accommodating host! Good stay (1 month) spent in this studio.

Located right next to a very chic area of Montreal with a fun nightlife.

The owners of the apartment are super friendly and are very accommodating.

The apartment was big and very cozy.
A very pleasant week, a good stay in Montreal. A warm welcome. We were welcomed and we felt like home. A housing in a well-located neighborhood. We recommend it.

We've spent a month at Marc's house and it was amazing. Great location. All his roommates were super friendly and kind and helped us with everything we needed. Highly recommend! 

Merci Marc, Alicia, Sandra et Adrian! C'était un plaisir de vous connaître! À la prochaine
The place was very clean and comfortable. Excellent communication with the host.

Barbara was an amazing host! She communicated quickly and very clearly. Her place looked absolutely amazing, even better than in the pictures! And it was so clean! We will definitely come back to her place the next time we are in Montreal. Highly recommended! Thanks Barbara! :)

The pictures accurately depict the place; for a small apartment, it is surprisingly spacious. The apartment boasts excellent interior design. It doesn't look like it, but the bedroom is an open concept without a wall to close it off, and the door is mostly see-through, so if privacy is important, this might be an issue. 

At night, it can get quite chilly as there isn't central heating; therefore, prepare for cold weather. Another issue I encountered was noise late at night because street parking outside the apartment (which was difficult to secure a spot) led to tow trucks coming around and towing illegally parked vehicles. They usually alert you with loud sirens before actually towing. Then snow plows would follow to clear out large snow banks. This was annoying as it made sleeping difficult. The neighborhood also has many interesting characters.

Apart from that, everything else was good; the keys were easy to access, the apartment had amenities and was clean. Barbara was also very quick to respond to messages. I recommend staying here with friends because of its large space!
Great stay. Clean, quiet, and very well-furnished. Pictures were accurate. It gets cold at night in winter. Definitely coming back when in Montreal.

It was super!!! Barbara is ultra available to help us and answer questions. The apartment is super clean and has a serene atmosphere. We feel at home. Thank you 1000 times and for our first Airbnb experience, it sets the bar high! :)

Barbara's place was great and she was easy to communicate with. Her apartment was easy to find, and the check-in process was seamless. Her apartment is beautifully decorated and comfortable; the photos and listing are very accurate. It was nice and clean, which is important to me. It's an up-and-coming area on the island but away from the hustle and bustle of downtown. I had a great stay and would definitely recommend it to others.
A beautiful apartment with everything you need for a weekend getaway to Montreal. Barbara was a great host and available for any questions we had. We would definitely stay here again!
Had a great time at Barbara's place! Quiet and cozy place with a beautiful layout and great location! Definitely coming back sometime in the summer!

Barbara's place was conveniently located 3 blocks from the metro and 1 block from restaurants & shops. Her apartment was beautifully decorated and she was very easy to communicate with. Would definitely return :)
The host cancelled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Everything was perfect. A 10-minute drive to Old Montreal, which is my favorite part. The apartment is beautiful with an open concept that's lovely. I definitely would stay again.

Thank you, Barbara

Barbara is very nice and helpful for everything you ask. The apartment is so clean and comfortable. It's very close to the ontorio, you can find many restaurants, markets, and cafes. And also, the metro is very close by for walking or biking. Thanks for everything, Barbara.
Barbara was an excellent host - she answered our questions promptly and made us feel comfortable! Her place provided a lovely stay :) It's a 10-minute walk to the metro.
Barbara's place is lovely -- sparkling clean, comfortable and stylish.

Barbara was very easy to communicate with and quick with her responses. Upon check-in we had difficulty with the key, as it was getting stuck and wouldn’t open the lock to the front door. (We also got confused as to which door was for her apartment - it's the middle one.) Barbara had already left for her own trip, but she came back, got us in and settled and provided a different key that worked better with the lock. 

My friend and I visited Montreal on a weekend where they were experiencing a heat wave, so not having air conditioning was a bit of a bummer. But the place has two balconies, one in the front and one in the back, so we opened the doors and had fresh air coming in through the apartment which was nice. 

Barbara has done a great job decorating the place. She's an artist, so it makes sense. It's definitely a cute and stylish spot and my friend left with inspiration as to how we may want to decorate our own places! :) 

Thank you again Barbara for letting us stay at your apartment. We loved the pace and would definitely come back. 

Ps. Love your artwork!

Barbara's place is stylish, spacious, and very lovely to stay at; we had the whole place to ourselves and check-in/check-out was very easy. Parking was easy to find on the street, and it had everything you need. Barbara was very responsive, and even though it wasn't her fault that there was a power outage during one of the nights, she helped us find out about the duration of the outage in the middle of the night. Very helpful and friendly host!

Barbara's place was fantastic! Beautifully and thoughtfully decorated, clean, and bright! The bed was so comfortable and I really enjoyed starting my day relaxing on the back terrace. Barbara is very quick with her responses and kind. :)

Barbara's home was absolutely amazing! The location couldn't have been any better. The nightlife was amazing! Barbara was very quick to respond and checked up on us daily. Her home was very cute and relaxing. I will definitely be visiting again!
A typical Montreal apartment, warm and comfortable.
Clean and welcoming place, better than I expected, close to all amenities on foot, restaurant and metro station... etc. Highly recommend!

We really enjoyed our stay at Richard's place. His apartment was super cozy and had everything you need (good internet, heating, a comfortable bed, clean towels etc.).

We particularly liked how green the apartment was, with a wide array of plants in the living room and kitchen.

It was in a very nice quiet area which was close to nice places to eat and drink. It is also super near a park, which we would have enjoyed in warmer months :)

It was a snowy, rainy and gray few days in Montreal but Richard's home was a peaceful respite to the foul weather outside. It was a great place to unwind and relax after my busy days at a wine conference. There was a very homey feel and a lot of charm, sort of the antithesis of slick and modern (which can be a bit soulless). I didn't get a chance to meet Richard but he was very responsive to any questions I had and gave me a warm welcome.

Richard's place is really cozy and sweet. The environment is quiet and provides convenient access to supermarkets and public transportation. I love the vintage style of this house and all the greenery inside. It was a wonderful stay here, Merry Christmas to the hosts!
A very nice place, well located to get around in Montreal. Richard is nice and very responsive. I would highly recommend it.

Antoine was a wonderful host, always responding in a timely manner and his place was great. The location, cleanliness, size, etc. were all amazing and made our stay very easy and enjoyable. When asked, the host even recommended good bars/restaurants within walking distance from the place. I would definitely recommend this place to a friend!
Great place, beautiful space

I enjoyed my stay. The place is huge and clean. It's close to most nightclubs and bars, which was exactly what I was looking for. There are lots of restaurants.  Pereira provides respect and privacy. I highly recommend the place

I recommend this apartment without hesitation. We had a great stay! The place was clean and so spacious! The location is unrivaled! And what can I say about the host's responsiveness - simply EXCELLENT! Can't wait for our summer visit - I hope we can stay here again! Thank you to our wonderful hosts!
Great place! Clean, spacious, and close to all the best streets for shopping, dining, and nightlife! Only complaint was the beds were incredibly uncomfortable.
A very large, clean apartment located right in the middle of the Plateau. Antoine was prompt and helpful.
What a wonderful host! I left my computer mouse behind and Antonio sent it to me via mail. Exceeding expectations in customer service.

Excellent housing. Well-located and clean. 
Nothing to report

We had a great stay at Antoine's place. It is a very spacious and clean apartment that is perfectly located for everything you could think of. 
Antoine was super fast in answering any questions we had.
Totally recommended!
Do not be wary of the exterior of this place. Very safe area.

Excellent location in Montreal close to the historic center, with easy access to public transportation (subway and bus), restaurants, grocery stores... The neighborhood is very nice and cool on Mount Royal. The apartment is quite spacious, very clean, though a bit dark due to being on the first floor of the courtyard (not bothersome when you're out walking all day), good bedding. A pleasant terrace in summer for enjoying fresh air.  A wonderful host, Antoine, always prompt to answer any questions.
Excellent location. Within walking distance of many great bars and restaurants.
Location is great, finding a parking spot might take some time (busy weekend) ...
A great apartment in the heart of town, very nicely set up and Pereira was very easy to communicate with.

The apartment has a very good location. It is around the block from one of the famous poutine places in the city.

Antoine was very communicative and responsive. The apartment is spacious and clean. The covered balcony and large bathroom are great and were much appreciated. 

We were a total of four people and the sofa bed was appropriate. We would highly recommend staying here!

We really enjoyed being there. The apartment is just like the photos and the location was perfect. Close to restaurants, public transportation... 

Antoine was very kind to us.
We certainly recommend the place.
We would definitely stay there again.

My mom and I headed to Montreal for her first visit to the city, and we couldn't have stayed in a more central, well-placed, nicely appointed condo. The location was absolute perfection! The condo itself was so clean and quite spacious. I will say, if you plan to make meals, please bring your own condiments since this condo does not provide them. It does have a fully equipped kitchen though. We came prepared (minus salt and pepper!) but others may not, so just something to keep in mind. I certainly hope to come back again soon, with the husband this time!!

Convenient location to visit Montreal. It takes 40 minutes to walk to Old Montreal.  Access to Mount Royal hill is very close (10 minutes walking).  Correct apartment, very good bedding.  Limited kitchen equipment in the kitchen area. No basic supplies provided in the kitchen. The rental is near St Laurent Blvd, a very commercial street where you can find (Website hidden by Airbnb) other types of shops.
Great clean place. Close to many restaurants, clubs, and stores. Only issue we had was parking. Would definitely recommend!

Clean apartment, spacious, pleasant and comfortable. Super lively neighborhood, just 2 steps from Mont Royal Park, a 15-minute walk to the metro station and 40 minutes from Ste Catherine Street if you're not afraid of walking! I haven't met our host yet, but he is available by email. Parking in the street is subject to a $53 fee, which starts at 5 am. I recommend this apartment

Spacious housing in a pleasant neighborhood. 
A bit shady though.
Great location on the Plateau and very clean. We needed an iron and one was brought to the apartment immediately! A great host!

My family of four had a great time in Montreal using this apartment as our base.  The neighborhood has lots of great restaurants, good shopping and convenient access to the metro, Parc du Mont-Royal and McGill. No issue with street parking the week we were there but you do need to read the signs carefully and find spots that don't require resident permits. The apartment itself is as you see in the photos with no surprises. Pereira and Antoine were professional, friendly and helpful.
Great location and fun place to stay. Thanks again!

This place was great, with no AC but plenty of fans to cool it down. I was always hot, and I was fine. The place was very clean and ideally located. A minor detail that parking was not easy, but that is something you would expect.

Great place in a perfect location, the Plateau is definitely the place you want to be. The house is very nice inside and was very clean upon arrival. I would recommend this place to anyone wishing to stay in Montreal.
This was pretty much as advertised. The host was responsive. The area is up and coming
The location is great! As mentioned in another review, there is no air conditioning, but there are fans and cross ventilation.
Great and spacious place! Excellent location!!!

The location is perfect if you want to be downtown, near all amenities and close to bus lines and the metro. I would like to add however that the apartment's comfort level was low. We never wanted to spend any downtime in the apartment. If you are looking for a place solely for sleeping - great option. But if you are looking for a place where you can feel comfortable in the space if you have an hour to relax, I would look elsewhere (the couch was uncomfortable and smelled slightly, the beds were extremely stiff, and the kitchen chairs were also bad enough to require a pillow from the bedroom to aid in comfort). During the evening, outside noise traveled into the bedrooms as if the windows were open, but that was minor considering we were downtown. The place is presented as in the photos, but our main issue was comfort.
Good location
Great street location, parking was very easy, the neighborhood is wonderful. They were very responsive to messages. I would definitely stay again! Thank you for your hospitality!
Had a fantastic time in Montreal and that was largely due to staying in this wonderful apartment!  I would definitely stay here again when I return to Montreal.

We had a great stay at this place, it was large and centrally located. It just looked a little less cozy in person than in the photos. However, if you spend all your time in the city, the apartment is perfectly adequate.
Apartment very well located in the Plateau. The terms for taking possession and leaving are very simple. Apartment super clean. We loved our stay. Excellent value for money.
A pleasant stay. Everything was perfect.
Super spacious, very impressive. Excellent location. The rooms are quite comfortable. Only downside: poorly insulated, you can hear your neighbors and the cars like they were in the room.
Great location. Really spacious.
Surprisingly cozy despite the minimalist style; very easy to live in. Secure building in a central location, I absolutely recommend this spot!

The apartment is very well located - just off St Laurent in the Plateau. The space is much bigger than it looks in pictures! There is also a charming, leafy balcony. Beds were a bit small, and the blinds didn't make bedrooms very dark, but it was quite enjoyable nonetheless.
Awesome

Such an amazing, clean and spacious place to relax in! The rooms are light and airy.

It's an amazing basecamp for exploring the Plateau, such a wonderful part of Montreal.

I recommend this place and will be back.

Thank you.
Great location! Easy check-in and check-out.

We have enjoyed our stay at this apartment very much. The location is perfect, and the apt. is spacious and comfortable.  The only thing we missed is air conditioning, which the apt. doesn't have (the listing mentions it, but we missed this information and it was so hot!!). Besides that, a perfect experience!
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great place to stay. Clean and awesome location. Would stay again.

The space was just as listed! Great communication & when I asked for a later check out Antoine was more than gracious enough to allow it! 

The couch and beds are super comfy! The patio was also a big plus. 

Downside is if you are a person who gets really hot & heat bugs you there is no AC but fans were provided so our stay was nice & cool! 

Will stay here again no problem!!

Ideal location in the heart of Mount Royal Plateau, close to all amenities. The apartment is spacious. However, the cleaning fees are a bit excessive. There is a terrace that could be pleasant but is left neglected and was not cleaned upon our arrival. 

I nevertheless recommend this apartment.

As we are not from Montreal, a few things came as a surprise due to my assumptions, such as the lack of air conditioning which made for a very warm stay at 30 degrees, and there's no parking available. Do not park out front or you will get a $62 ticket. The host was very quick to respond to questions, the place is immaculately clean and spacious, and it is reasonably close to two lots of tourist attractions and great restaurants.

The host was very responsive and helpful. Check-in and check-out were a breeze. The spacious area was nice, and the back porch was a nice bonus to have, especially when the evenings got cooler after a hot day.
Great location, decent amenities. The space is enormous and feels somewhat empty. It was great to have access to a private patio.
Spacious and comfortable apartment in one of the best neighborhoods - great for walking around. Check-in and communication was very easy. It was ideal for my business trip, definitely recommend

The apartment was clean, comfortable and spacious. A bit more decor would help as it was a bit empty and stark but fine for a brief stay and conveniently located. The only issue for us was parking, which is a nightmare like everywhere else in Montreal. We wound up getting a $63 ticket because we didn't check enough of the signs on the street. Even the police seemed confused about the parking regulations. Be forewarned.
Great location! Good value for money.
We had a wonderful stay here! We have visited Montreal many times, but we have never explored this neighborhood and it is so centrally located. The huge apartment was also incredibly clean.
Nice clean place in an excellent location.
Super effective, great and proper! I'm going to go back and forth for sure!
The location is very convenient. Photos do not accurately represent the space in person. There is limited natural light, and the house was quite dark. Overall, it was a good stay.
The apartment was very clean and spacious, and centrally located in some great areas of Montreal. I would definitely return anytime!
We had a great stay. The apartment is larger than it appears on the website. Everything was really clean. Nice neighborhood. The only thing is that the apartment is a little bit sterile.

The apartment is super, however the host only responds by phone and hasn't answered any of my three emails... this isn't very convenient when you are a foreigner and calls to Canada cost a lot... otherwise everything was perfect and very well located!
Good place in the heart of Le Plateau. Note there is a staircase.

My daughter and I stayed for four nights at Antoine's Airbnb. We loved the location, the keypad check-in was brilliant; it eliminated the need for keys. We could walk everywhere from this location. The space was exceptionally clean and tidy. The only downside for us was the people who live above this space. While Antoine cannot control this, if you are a light sleeper I would recommend taking earplugs. I slept in the bedroom closest to the front door and didn't notice it as much at night time as my daughter did who was in the other bedroom. Other than that, our stay was perfect. The Netflix was a nice added bonus. Thank you.
Glacial!
Really big space, lots of room! Very clean. Great location.
Just as expected. Lovely place to stay

This is a spacious apartment for up to 4 people in an interesting part of Montreal. There are lots of restaurants and bars, but located on a quiet side street. A 15-minute walk from the Metro and a short ride into downtown. It's well-equipped for cooking if you need a quiet evening in. We made good use of the washing machine and dryer.

Spacious but sparsely furnished, particularly in the kitchen.  It's okay if you plan on eating out. You will also be able to hear your neighbors above, and the insulation isn't great. However, Antoine is a wonderful person to deal with; he is very responsive when you ask for extra blankets, for example.

Spacious flat. Very clean and Antoine is very friendly and responsive. 
The flat could be better equipped in the kitchen especially where you can find the minimum. No baking dishes for instance making the use of the oven impossible. But if you ask Antoine, he will bring you what you need.
The flat lacks natural light. You need the lights on all the time in the living room.
Beautiful place with a lot of space. Excellent for four people
House is good

An uninspiring apartment with mattresses so old and hard that sleeping on the hardwood floors became a tempting option. One bed slanted precariously and threatened to send you there anyway. The post-apocalyptic alleyway where this was situated was very noisy on Friday night. Not a great option.
Dangerous exterior staircase access. Noise from neighboring Airbnb units very loud all night... footsteps from people walking in adjacent apartments (without shoes) at 2 AM / 4:30 AM / 7:30 AM

This is a great place in an ideal location. It's close to Mont Royal Park and St. Laurent Boulevard, which are great spots. The place was clean and several key amenities were available. I would highly recommend staying here!
A bit chilly but overall a very nice stay. Convenient location!
The place was awesome - super clean, spacious and the location topped it off.
Wonderful location, lots of space, and a clean apartment. So close to so many things!
Enjoyed our stay in Montreal very much. Due to extreme cold and a snowstorm, we were stuck inside for a day, and found the apartment nice and comfortable.

This apartment matched the photos exactly. There was plenty of common/open space, which was great for spending time at the apartment. It was a bit noisy (you could clearly hear outside traffic and other building occupants), but that's to be expected in a busy part of Montreal. Clean and a great location, I would definitely stay here again.

This was the perfect place to stay to celebrate my birthday in Montreal for the weekend! The location is PERFECT, everything was just as expected and we were really satisfied with our stay - it’s very simple, and you can definitely hear everything in the building hahah but no major problems - it has all the basics you would need and the location is totally worth it! :)
Great Stay. Nice Place. Would stay again.

We had a great stay. Nice, spacious apartment in a great location. It was easy to get around the city from here. The host was very kind and easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend staying here.
Drew's place is the perfect place to stay if you're looking to explore downtown Montreal!
If you're seeking a spacious, quiet, and clean apartment for the whole family, Glen Place is the perfect choice. I guarantee you'll love it to the fullest.
Check-in was flexible, Glen and Mario were always there to answer any questions we had and gave us some tips about Montreal, an amazing experience!
The host cancelled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

As I mentioned in another section, it seems the apartment was just put up for rental. All of the furniture and items in the apartment were brand new. There are two bathrooms - one in the common area and one in the master bedroom, which was convenient. Given that the rental was brand new, there was remodeling dust on the floor both in the apartment and on the stairs, which I assume will be cleaned up for renters in the very near future. The wifi is shared with the next-door apartment through a wifi extender, and there were some instances in which it was less than reliable. However, when we reported any issues to Andre he was there immediately to fix them. I've not had a remote Airbnb property manager ever be as attentive and quick to fix issues, so everything that I listed above pales in comparison to Andre's attention to the property.
The location was perfect for walking around the city, being super close to bars and restaurants. The house was clean, modern, and very affordable for the location.

The location is perfect if you want to be near the restaurants, bars, and stores. It's not very recommended for kids at night; it's better for adults. The apartment is big and comfortable for 5 people. The price is fair relative to what you pay.

Excellent accommodation just two steps from the metro station. Located in a lively neighborhood with bars on the same street. There are also restaurants of all types in the adjacent streets (my favorite being the all-you-can-eat sushi "Sushi Crescent"). The wifi is a bit weak, but it's great to have access to Netflix through the TV. We had trouble finding the keys, so be sure to look for a box with a code attached to the ramp.

The location was perfect, being right next to a ton of bars, restaurants, and shops. The main issue we had was with the wifi. It wasn't working the first day, but after mentioning this to Andre, he got it fixed. However, the signal is still very weak as it comes from an extension and wasn't strong enough to use the TV/Roku because these rely on apps and internet. Andre was very responsive, and although we were low on soap/shampoo/conditioner, he did note to get more.

The apartment's location is excellent, right in the city center, making it easy to reach attractions. The room is clean and spacious, with all amenities fully equipped as shown in the pictures, thank you Andre! We will definitely come back again. Awesome!

Overall, Andre's place was a good experience. He was very attentive and responded within minutes with answers to any questions I had. The location is within walking distance to many restaurants and nightlife.

This place is nothing like the pictures. The floors are so dirty you can't walk around without socks or shoes otherwise your feet will turn black. The single bed frame is pretty much broken and barely holding the bed up. The sheets had stains on them and also the master bedroom bed is just on the floor. The smell is disgusting. I would not stay at this place again. I would rather be in a one-room hotel than this place. Andre was good at first. Always replied back on time but this place is just a mess. Trust me when I say book elsewhere
This apartment is in a great central location, walking distance to shopping and restaurants. Andre was a very helpful host.

This is a huge apartment located in the center of Montreal. I rented it for a week because it looked nice in pictures. While the location is perfect (everything is indeed close-by), the apartment needs significant updates.

1) Wifi works from 8 AM to 6 PM. Despite reporting the issue to Andre and his attempts to repair it, nothing was done on either the same day or the following day. Honestly, I had better internet when I was in a poor neighborhood of Mexican suburbs. Absolutely ridiculous for downtown Montreal.
2) Bathrooms are just not appealing. Yes, they work - but I felt disgusting taking a shower there. No soap even to wash my hands!
3) Cleaning was barely done. The floors are dirty (you can see it on your feet when walking - they become dark in 10 steps!). Dishes were not washed. Cups are dirty.
4) The entrance to the apartment is actually really sketchy. The cafe on the first floor is so bizarre, my fiancé was literally afraid to walk into the building! Plus there's a lot of garbage on the street in front. Moreover, once on the stairs, the light barely works - it's really dangerous to go down. Forget it if you have mobility issues.
5) Everything in the apartment is from the cheapest section of IKEA. Literally everything. In one room there is not even a bed, just a mattress on the floor. Not that the furniture/towels are bad, they can hardly be reused for long periods of time.
6) As the windows go to garbage bins and a hotel, one morning I was woken up at 6 AM by a trash-collector's cars - it was really loud and long (approximately 30 minutes).

In short, 3 stars are basically given for the apartment's location. I would never consider staying there again, and I definitely do not recommend it to anyone unless you don't mind sleeping in a sketchy place with dirty showers and kitchen.

Andre's apartment was just what we needed for a guys trip to Montreal, the location was perfect, right beside a couple pubs and 3 breweries. If travel needed, you can rent bikes right across the street. The kitchen and living room were big and spacious. There is a small balcony in the master bedroom, which also has a bathroom with a shower, the other two rooms consist of a double bed and a single. Other than that, this place is right downtown Montreal.

Great location and great value, the host Andre attended to our needs promptly. It's an older building that could use some upgrades and he seems to be working on them. The beds were new and quite comfortable, and so are the washer and dryer.
Fantastic location and a wonderful host. The place lacks air conditioning and has questionable construction throughout. However, it offers great value and I highly recommend it to most people.

This is a good location for all of the downtown area, and it will accommodate quite a few people at a modest price.

However, it has an undesirable dark entrance and spartan (if effective) furnishings, no-character Ikea basics. I've left laundry detergent because there was none.

Andre's place is literally in the heart of downtown Montreal. It's very close to the shopping street & bunch of restaurants and bars. It's pretty clean and spacious too. My only complaint is that the apartment doesn't have AC, so if they are coming during the hottest days of the year in Montreal like us (35+ Celsius), the apartment would feel a bit hot to stay during the daytime. But, the host does provide a small fan for each bedroom. Overall, combining the location and price, it's still very recommended for groups of people to experience MTL!
The place was not very clean, the location was good. The furnishings were poor.

Apartment suitable for young adults (18-25 years old) with perfect location for nightlife and enjoying the center of Montreal.  The apartment is very spacious but the lack of maintenance and cleaning is obvious.
Great location, right next to all the nightlife. This place is above a hookah lounge. If you're looking for fancy, this isn't it, but otherwise it's okay.
The apartment is large and centrally located. We came for a conference and it was very practical, accommodating four people at a modest price. The place is not fancy but very practical.
The apartment's location is excellent. However, the apartment was not as clean as I would have liked.

It's a noisy area with many bars nearby and on weekends you can hear people talking loudly into the early morning. In the mornings we encounter people drunk outside their apartments. 

The location is good because it's in the city center, spacious, and the host responds quickly to messages.
The location is fantastic and the apartment is enormous, with everything you'll need for a wonderful time in the city. We had an amazing time staying here.
You can easily go downtown and the house is great for staying! It's very nice and beautiful~!
Central location and ample space.

We booked the apartment for one week during Formula1 week in Montreal. I did not stay/see the place; the comments of my team (people in total) 

Location:
Was good, central & convenient, area was cool (outside it was a bit dilapidated)
Cleaning = Cleaning and general, is not that it was dirty but sloppy; the fact of not having any cleaning service or new towels during the week should be taken into consideration for future apartment stays.
Easy to access with the codes - no key needed.
WiFi good 
Dave was very kind & quick with answers, we do wish him all the best and thank you for everything.

The house is spacious and clean.
Downtown is just nearby, with a number of restaurants and shopping places.
You can even go to Old Montreal in 15 ~ 20 minutes by walk.
The host is very kind and is prompt to respond to inquiries.
Everything is smooth with this place. Thanks!
We enjoyed our stay. The place has an excellent location.
Dave's place is located in a prime location that makes it convenient for visiting anywhere in the city.
Translation: Not crazy, but in a fantastic location.
Nice place near of everything!!!
This is a very nice place. It will be a great experience to live there like a local. The host is also kind, clean and I like it.
The host was readily available and answered any and all questions promptly. The loft was beautiful and well-lit.

This apartment is very clean, stylish and up-to-date. I highly recommend it. The neighborhood is a lot of fun too - Rue Wellington, two blocks away, is a bustling, gentrifying (but not yet ruined) street with lots of funky small businesses, restaurants etc. Catherine responded to my communications immediately. A wonderful base from which to check out a great city.
Clean apartment close to a metro station!

A perfect location for an escape to Montreal. Close to public transport and easy to drive to with plenty of street parking. Very friendly and safe neighborhood. The apartment is better than the photos; large and bright throughout. Shower is like a spa! Bed is really comfy and kitchen is very spacious and easy to cook in. We will definitely return to Catherine's when we come back to fabulous Montreal!
Newly renovated and very bright, clean space. Central to everything happening in Verdun and a peaceful quiet neighborhood.
A very clean place.
A great place close to public transportation. Was able to reach Catherine very easily,

This place was absolutely perfect! We were here for the May Long Weekend and it was such a great experience. The place is well equipped with everything you need! The bed is comfy and the place is very modern and beautiful! Transit is close by which makes it easy to get to downtown Montreal. The area it is located in is very friendly and has many places for you to dine or check out! 
It was such a great time and we will definitely try to book Catherine's place again the next time we are booking a trip to Montreal!

Thank you so much! Our stay in Montreal was fantastic.
