Public transportation is nearby; the Metro is within walking distance (about a 12-minute walk), and the bus is right outside the house. Also, a bakery, supermarket, and pharmacy are close by. We felt at home living in a typical Montreal apartment situated in a nice environment.
Apartment in a quiet and friendly neighborhood. The landlord is efficient and accommodating.

Philippe's place is super clean, quiet and exactly as described. It's easy to get to and in a perfect location close to shops and great restaurants, and also for getting downtown. Would definitely stay here again!
Nothing to say, excellent stay and superb apartment, it's the second time I go there.
Had a great stay at Philippe. Would stay again!
Very good value for the price! A beautiful location to discover Montreal
Very good value for the price! A beautiful location to discover Montreal
Charming hosts, comfortable apartment and very clean. In a beautiful neighborhood close to a commercial street.
This apartment is very cute and comfortable. It's centrally located and convenient to shops and the metro. I highly recommend this place! It feels cozy and homey right away.
Good apartment in a trendy neighborhood. Noisy street when windows are open.
nan

Philippe's apartment is located in the picturesque Plateau Mont-Royal neighborhood, where all the houses with their exterior staircases are typical of Montreal. It is well equipped and pleasant, easy to access from the Laurier metro station (a 15-minute walk) or by bus (an stop directly in front of the house). Access to downtown and Mount Royal is also very easy and quick. It's also close to a commercial street and a convenient Metro supermarket. Philippe and his wife are charming and very welcoming. Our stay was very pleasant.

Safe place next to a beautiful park, the house is very clean and everything works perfectly. The bus stop is just a few meters from the house, and the subway is a 10-minute walk away.  

Very good experience and comfortable house, simply perfect!
In a great location with many small restaurants and coffee shops nearby. Close to the metro and bus stops. Philippe was very quick at responding to texts or emails. Good value.
A fabulous neighborhood and tremendous value. Communicative, kind, and accessible hosts. I would definitely stay at this property again without hesitation. A+
Very nice for three people. We'll be back!
Very accommodating host and great location - Rue Laurier has lots of lovely independent boutiques, cafes and restaurants.
The location is the best thing about this rental!

OMG!!! The place is lovely. My partner and I were visiting Montreal, a very romantic city. Philippe's place is everything you see in the pics. Amazing place. Everything is near to the apartment. If you use public transportation, the bus passes in front of the apt. Amazing! Clean and nice. 

We want to go back to Montreal soon, definitely want to stay in Philippe's place again. Thanks Philippe.
Very nice apartment in a great location. Philippe is responsive to answer your questions!
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊

Great place, lots of light and a cool top-floor apartment. Very close to everything you'd need, but you'll need to drive or take the metro to downtown or wherever the clubs are. Very cozy feeling and I'm glad we stayed there!
Very beautiful apartment, very well located and very quiet in the Plateau. Very well equipped. Excellent stay.
Clean place to stay. Free street parking available.

Perfect little spot on the edge of the plateau. Great location, close to everything, with a quick metro ride or cheap Uber to anywhere. Had a fantastic stay in this charming, comfortable, and cozy spot. Thanks Philippe and Sandra!
Great location! Many restaurants within walking distance! Parking was a little tricky, but we got lucky!

Our long weekend stay was great! There were good places to eat right down the street, and plenty of other good things to do within a short Uber ride away. My only issue was that the wifi was really slow and inconsistent. I kept just using my phone data to access maps and plan our outings. If I had work to do and was relying on the wifi to send emails with attachments, it would have been very frustrating. Also, the bathroom is very small - there's almost no leg room in front of the toilet. Aside from those two things though, everything else was great. I was nervous about finding street parking, but we always managed to find a decent spot.
Perfect apartment conforming to the description, very well located near shops and the metro, and a great park!
A real bargain: good location, comfortable, great hosts.

Great location, 2 bedrooms, great value. Phillippe offered suggestions for dining in the area and was quick to respond to my parking questions. Never had an issue with parking. Would definitely stay again.
Philippe had a lovely place. There was a very helpful map that showed all the necessary local stores and eating spots. The place was tidy and offered everything we needed. Definitely recommend!

Prepare your swimsuit, the pool at Parc Laurier is very pleasant (free) if you are passing through in summer. Otherwise, the neighborhood is very friendly with many shops nearby. The apartment is clean and conforms to the listing.
Welcome, well-located apartment in a pleasant neighborhood.
Ideal location

Philippe was a good host, the apartment is well located and was clean. It has two good-sized rooms, a large kitchen, and air conditioning. Just keep in mind that there are no dish soap or body wash/shampoo. Overall, a good experience.
According to the description, the accommodation is nice and practical
Clean, well-located, bigger than expected :)
Well-located apartment. Ideal for visiting Montreal. Some minor improvements could be made, but overall very good value for money.

A charming apartment that retains its old-world charm, with beautiful parquet floors, moldings, small rooms, and a cozy atmosphere...  Located in a typical house in the Plateau neighborhood.

The owners are friendly and a good address book for nearby shopping is provided. The TV box program also offers radio channels.
Good location. Easy check-in. Great base for exploring Montreal.

WELCOME, RE-ACTIVATE, SPACIOUS AND COMFORTABLE APARTMENT IN A GREAT LOCATION! 
WE RECOMMEND IT!

Thank you, Philippe and Sandra, for this wonderful stay, our parents had a very pleasant time. The apartment was very functional and clean for adults. You were always available and attentive. We will recommend you without hesitation. Thank you again!

Overall good stay at Philippe's place.

The keypad was problematic to the point of getting locked out, but apparently that was due to a battery issue.

The apartment is nice but not very comfortable for relaxing and socializing for more than one hour.
Apartment as described, well-located near Mont Royal Street and restaurants. Perfect for a stay in Montreal!

Apartment as shown in the photos. Super sunny apartment. 

The owners live just below. They are friendly!
Great location, very spacious, bright kitchen - had everything we needed for a comfortable 5 nights in Montreal.
Nice and clean place with all basic amenities.

We had a good stay at Philippe's apartment. It's basic, but it has everything you need and is great value for the price. We really appreciated the self-check-in and key code lock, which made our arrival and departure really easy and we didn’t have to worry about trying to coordinate around specific times. It was also great not to have to carry around keys! The apartment is within walking distance (right down the block) to a grocery store, liquor store, pharmacy as well as some restaurants and coffee shops and is also not a far walk to more options on Avenue du Mont-Royal. There is a bus stop right at the corner beside the apartment, but it is a bit longer of a walk to the metro (around 15 minutes). Just a note that the bed is a little firmer than usual, but that might just be personal preference. The apartment comes with all the basics you’ll need. Philippe was easy to communicate with and very responsive. Great spot for a home base in Montreal!

The apartment is silent and very well located for the bus and metro. Many restaurants nearby. 
Quick communication with Philippe!

I will definitely go back to it on my next visit to Montreal!

The place was as expected in the pictures, you could say it was a little better even in real life. The host was really nice and flexible with the arrival time since I got late. He lives on the floor downstairs of the Airbnb so he was really helpful and caring during my stay. Thank you for your hospitality.
This is a clean, well-appointed property in a lovely location. Communication was excellent, and everything was cozy and comfortable.
Translation: "Very good, I can't ask for anything better. I had some questions that Steven answered very quickly, and I just have good feedback."

Everything is equipped, kitchen and TV. However, we came because, according to the description, there is a bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room. However, there is no bedroom and it is impossible to sleep on the sofa bed.

It's a shame about the false description because otherwise, it's a nice place to live.
This is a very nice apartment, clean and fully equipped. My friend and I really enjoyed our stay in this accommodation. I recommend it to you.

The room is clean and independent. 
Steven is very kind and I stayed very comfortably.

Steven's apartment was perfect! 
There were plenty of free parking spots around and it was a quiet place. My colleague and I were on business trip and the location was perfect for our needs. The bed was very comfortable too. We won't hesitate to book again if we need accommodation during our next visit to Montreal.
It was a very clean and nice, cozy apartment. Everything was there, so there was nothing uncomfortable. You could reach downtown via the subway. Highly recommend!
Steven's place is as pictured...Clean, cozy, convenient and very comfortable! It was definitely a great place to stay and if I come back to Montreal again I would love to stay there!
A quiet and clean place
Clean housing near the metro and for impact! Perfect housing for 2! I recommend it.

Very nice experience at Steven's! Very good value for money. The apartment was well-located, clean, convenient, warm and well-equipped! Steven was very friendly. He took the time to welcome us and explain everything to us. I would stay again in this apartment without hesitation! Thanks Steven!
Wonderful place to stay! Clean, well-equipped, within walking distance of many amenities and public transportation. Would definitely recommend. The host is very accommodating and friendly!

We were extremely satisfied with the location and recommend it without hesitation. Beautiful, clean, very clean!, quiet, nice welcome, free parking on the street. The apartment has been completely renovated tastefully. Have a good stay!
Great Studio. Well-equipped kitchen and bathroom... very cozy and very clean. Excellent location close to a park and shopping centers. I can't wait to go back. Thank you, Steven.
The place was clean and very close to public transportation. It is nice for two people. The host was helpful and responsive in their communication.

Steven's place was wonderful, better than we expected. The location was great, within a four-block walk to the metro. The accommodation was very clean and modern, and the bed was very comfortable. The price was really fair, especially for the quality of the furnishings. Steven was very accommodating and was a great help at check-in. Thanks again, Steven.

This was the first time we booked on Airbnb and it was a wonderful experience. Steven was very prompt in answering our questions and was also very welcoming.  We had no difficulty finding this apartment as it was near the Cadillac metro station. It was very clean and everything inside had been remodeled so it had a feeling of luxury.  It had everything we needed from towels to kitchenware and refrigerator and microwave and toaster.  The TV was right in front of the bed and was filled with Netflix and other apps, so you could choose movies or TV shows from a large variety of choices. The apartment was about 2 blocks from the metro so it was very convenient to get to downtown, maybe in about 8 minutes. 

I would recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay in Montreal!
Great place, close to downtown Montreal. Thanks Steven! Would definitely recommend!

Our place was tidy and cozy. There was everything a traveler would need, including all the utilities needed to cook and clean with, as well as extra towels and bathroom amenities. Our neighbors upstairs were a little noisy (you can hear their footsteps), as they had a small child or perhaps several who would run around in the mornings as well as late at night. When their doorbell rings, the lights inside the apartment will flash, and an alarm will sound. It is in a basement, but the location is fantastic. There was a nice park across the street, and it was only a few hundred meters from the subway, which will take you into the city in less than half an hour. Unfortunately, we did lose our key, and had to pay the most expensive option to regulate the situation. If this happens to you, purchase a Weiser SmartKey Relocking set at Walmart or Home Depot, a few kilometers away from the apartment for $15 to re-key it yourself, as the lock is a Weiser Smartkey lock, which does not need to be replaced to be re-keyed. With that said, be advised that since there is no security deposit, any potential damages will have to be discussed between you and your host. Other than losing our key and having to replace an entire lock rather than getting a new set of keys, we had a great time in Montreal and enjoyed our stay in Steven's lodging.
Prime location for your camera!

A great experience! This was our first time visiting Montreal and the location of this apartment worked out very well. What a great value! It took us about 7 minutes or so to walk to the Metro in the morning which was incredibly easy to use. The area where the apartment is located is quiet and residential. The apartment was clean and felt brand new. Steven was very helpful and easy to communicate with. Easy and straightforward check-in and check-out. If (when) we're back in Montreal, we'll certainly book again!

Pleasant accommodation, clean you would say entirely renovated with possibility of parking nearby.

Around 300m walk from the metro station, 20m walk from a park, 2km from the Olympic Park.

Friendly and clear owner.

Thank you so much!

We recommend it.
This place was exactly as advertised. We had a great time in Montreal and a pleasant stay here.

Super clean, though small, apartment with easy parking (except Monday afternoons!) and easy access to rentable bikes (a 10-minute ride to the botanical gardens, 5 minutes to the biodome. Attention: when you rent the bikes, you'll be charged extra for trips over 30 minutes).  

About a 20-minute drive to downtown Montreal. Not a great food scene nearby, so expect to drive or bike your way to something. 

The apartment itself is fine—a bit warm in the summer—the bed isn't super comfortable, but that was our only complaint. Super clean, newly renovated, quiet area. Great value!

Excellent experience! Apartment as per photos, well-equipped and very clean, close to the Cadillac metro station. Close to supermarkets and some restaurants too. 

Steven was unable to receive us upon our arrival, but his neighbor took care of it and we were very well received. 

Excellent value for money.

If we return to Montreal, we will definitely go back to Steven's.

Stevens' place was great! It was so clean and new, and it had everything we needed right there available for us. He was very accommodating, friendly, and easy to deal with. Great price, great value. Highly recommend!

Fidele to the photos, the bachelor apartment is partially renovated, clean and the bed is comfortable. Steven is very welcoming and professional, and gives good advice. The apartment is a bit secluded compared to the metro (800 meters), but is well-served by the bus (200 meters) so quite convenient (Website hidden by Airbnb). Recommend

Studio with meticulous decoration and very clean. We highly recommend it. Steven is readily available to assist us and always willing to be accommodating. Quiet and residential neighborhood within less than 10 minutes of the metro. Very good stay, even though it was short, in this accommodation.
I haven't been disappointed by the proximity to all amenities: metro, shops, greenery and tranquility.

Phenomenal spot if you're traveling solo! Close to the metro, but in a nice residential area so you're not surrounded by the hustle and bustle of the city. This apartment is very clean and well-maintained. I would highly recommend it to anyone!
Perfect for couples I love this place

Photos are accurate; the place is very nice and clean. The metro station is about a 10-minute walk away, which isn't bad. He didn't meet us but he was very good at communicating with me through messages so everything was clear. I could ask questions if I had any and they were answered very quickly. Overall, it was a perfect stay for me!
Great place! Would definitely recommend to friends and family visiting Montreal.
Apartment as per the photos. Communication with Steven was very good.
Nice place. We arrived very late and Steven still welcomed us and showed us around.

At Steven's house is very comfortable. It is close to a train station, from where we can get around the city. Steven was waiting for us to check in and explained everything about the property and gave us tips on the city. The neighborhood is very quiet and safe.
Great host, nice place. Will definitely stay again.

Steven was very welcoming! The place was small but very cozy for a 2-night stay. Parking near the place was pretty easy even during the weekend since it's close to a park. It was a very comfortable stay and we will definitely be back if we decide to visit Montreal again!
Steven is very welcoming, a very comfortable and very practical apartment!!! We will definitely come back to him when we return to Montreal! I highly recommend him.
Steven was welcoming and communicative. The place is clean and has everything you would need for travel.
Steven is very welcoming, the accommodation is close to public transport, clean and well decorated.
Clean apartment matching the photos. Easy parking nearby. I highly recommend it without hesitation.
Home away from home. Perfect stay from check-in to check-out.
Very clean and cozy, it was a real pleasure spending a few days in Montreal at Steven's apartment.

Super apartment near public transportation connecting the whole city! Steven is super nice and very flexible. His bachelor is neat, clean, and well-furnished! 

We highly recommend staying in this property, it was a truly great stay!
The apartment was very clean and included everything we needed. The fold-out bed was comfortable. It is located near the metro, stores, and laundry. We enjoyed our stay and highly recommend it.

I couldn't get a chance to meet Steven face-to-face, but he was always in touch and very helpful. 
The place is small but very nice and cozy. 
The location is good because it's near a metro station.

This was a fantastic place to stay!
Clean, modern and easy to find.
Great communication and lots of parking on the street. Thanks Steven!

The photo shows the house is 6211, but it's actually a garage. If you enter from the right side, you will see the house that belongs to Steven!  Although I mentioned "down the driveway" on Airbnb, the photos showed me the place as 6211. So I went there and made a mistake. It would have been better if I had taken a photo of the exact house location and how to get there. I'm so sorry for the inconvenience! The room was spacious and comfortable, perfect for hanging out with friends!
Everything was perfect!! Thank you Steven, I'm going back there for sure!
Very nice apartment and very clean, lots of comfort, quiet location not far from the city center.
Great location, great deal, great host.

The best thing about Steven's place is: it's exactly what is shown in the pictures. There is no mistake! It is close to the subway station, it's easy to find the place and it is spotless. Also, he is so gentle. We definitely would like to stay at his place in a future opportunity to visit Montreal.
Quiet neighborhood. Excellent communication with Steven. An additional address for my references.
Nice place, great price.
Three bees like people, I forgot something in the apartment at a visible place and I came back 10 meters after being separated and it had hidden my bag in a dirty clothes hamper. Beware!

Steven is an excellent host and very accommodating. This property is close to a metro station, which means you have easy access to all the key places in Montreal. I would highly recommend this clean and cozy place.

Steven takes care of his apartment. It is very clean, well-equipped and close to everything. I thank Steven for his punctuality, availability and especially the quality of his welcome. I have no hesitation in returning.
I would stay here again! Very cozy and cute apartment!

Excellent place for a great price. The inside is well-furnished and newly renovated. Everything is clean. The bathroom was a good size, the kitchen included the necessities, and the bed space/living area was comfortable, as a bonus the host includes free Netflix and wifi. I would return to this location in the future.
Great stay! Very clean and spacious.
Steven was an awesome host. He was very dedicated to ensuring everything ran smoothly for me. His space was pretty clean and sparkling. I highly recommend this place.
Super clean. Excellent communication. Ample parking. Will definitely return.

Such a cute bachelor apartment, loved the Murphy bed! Great location, lots of parking around in the neighborhood if you're going to be driving. TV, wifi, kitchen and all the amenities you can think of. Most importantly, it's sparkling clean! Steven is very nice, hospitable and communicative.

The place is super clean and really looks like the pictures. Steven answered fast. It looks like a big and comfortable hotel room. The shower cabin is small though. I will definitely stay here next time and I highly recommend it.

Steven was a great host, very responsive through text when our flight came in late. He waited an additional hour to greet us and show us around the apartment upon arrival. While not close to downtown Montreal, it was very close to transit which made commuting very easy. Space was clean and as advertised.

Steven's place is clean, has all the basic necessities, and is semi-close to a subway station (a 10-minute walk followed by a 30-minute subway ride to the city center). I would definitely recommend this if you are looking for a cheap place in a quiet neighborhood.

Steven's place is so cute and cozy. It is just as described, or even better. It has absolutely everything you need for a comfortable stay. Plus he was very nice taking his time to check us in and show us how everything worked in the apartment. Thank you Steven!
Nice place at a good price.
Cute apartment for staying in while in Montreal, short walk to the metro. Very clean and Steven was a great host!

Great value. Conveniently located between 2 metro stations and a Bixi bike station around the corner. About 30 minutes from Old Montreal. 

Steven was a welcoming host and very accommodating - we had a late check-in but he was flexible. The place is clean and comfortable. Definitely recommend if you don't mind not being walking distance to everything and looking for a bargain.
Great place for a great price

Unbeatable for the price! Extremely clean space equipped with everything you would need for your stay. Just a few minutes walk from the metro which takes you right downtown. Nice and quiet neighborhood. Check-in and check-out were both super easy. All in all, I would definitely stay at Steven’s place again!

A big thank you to Steven for his hospitality and his accommodation. It is very well located in a residential neighborhood and close to the metro. The apartment is really great for a weekend in Montreal

Great location, so easy to get around via subway and nearby supermarkets. Steven was more than obliging when we were running a bit late, which we were very grateful for after our long drive. He came to meet us in person and showed us everything in the studio. It's a downstairs basement unit with a great kitchen. The bed was comfortable, parking is on the street which was sometimes busy but still managed to get one close by. We would definitely book again.
Overall very good. Would consider using again
Translation: Perfectly as advertised, very clean and warm, ideal for a couple!
Steven's place is a nice and small apartment located a short drive from downtown Montreal. He was incredibly responsive to queries and very accommodating overall!
This apartment is just perfect at all levels! It exceeded my expectations! I often rent Airbnbs and this one is ideal for Montreal! Steven is always available!
Steven is a great host and the place is very clean and comfortable. It's a pretty nice place!

Steven was great. Although my check-in time didn't fit his schedule, he ensured the process was seamless for me. He was also very quick to respond and handle any kind of questions or concerns.

Thank you, Steven!
Perfectly clean. Perfect for minimalist travelers. The host was very accommodating.
A beautiful space for a cozy getaway to Montreal :)
Everything was perfect. 15-20 minutes from downtown. The place was sparkling clean and everything exceeded my expectations. Overall, it was a great stay.
Well maintained & cozy apartment!
Small apartment in a great location! Steven is very responsive to messages :) I recommend
Steven is a great host. His place was very clean, organized, and tidy. The place was also near the subway station, making transportation easier.
Very accessible bachelor, very clean and well-kept, I recommend it without hesitation, the host is very responsive to our requests.
The host cancelled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Great location. The apartment was a little messy and dusty. The walls are very thin so we had problems sleeping because of the noise from the neighbors, besides the apartment being very hot (the fan wasn't enough). However, there weren't enough towels for the four of us (the ones we had were dirty and smelled bad).

Apartment very well located within walking distance of the Old Port, Vieux Montreal and all amenities (restaurants, grocery stores, gas station, automatic laundromat...). Mount Royal Park is also accessible on foot for those who enjoy walking (we did it with our 5 and 8 year old children without any problems), as is Île Ste-Hélène by metro (10 minutes from the apartment).

Easy parking in the neighborhood, just be careful of the different parking signs because there are specific days and hours of parking for each zone.

The building is however a bit old with an exterior staircase that is slightly dangerous if you have children.
Great location. Lovely house. Larger than it appears in the photos. Pet-friendly. Highly recommend!

Gorgeous home even better in person. The private parking spot is tight; we rented a van. Street parking is annoying as there are restrictions. We got two parking tickets! 

Great city with lots of parks, bakeries, markets and restaurants. Short walk to the subway. Can't wait to visit again
This house has a lot of charm. Ideally located, it allows you to enjoy the attractions of the plateau while being very quiet.

While Jean-Francois was out of the country during our stay, he went above and beyond to make our experience enjoyable. This included lots of information and personal suggestions for dining and sightseeing, as well as excellent customer service including his friend who welcomed us upon our arrival. 

The apartment was very beautiful, comfortable, and welcoming! We were on a business trip and this apartment, with a terrace and a charming small garden, made us feel like we were on vacation after long days of work. We would definitely recommend staying here!

Extraordinary apartments. Well located. (Restaurant, bar, bike path) 
On-site parking.

We loved Jean-François's place. It was comfortable and close to everything. However, there was construction that started really early in the morning, around 7am in the morning! The construction noise woke us up and unfortunately was disruptive. Apart from the construction noise, the house was great and felt like home.

Jean-François' place was delightful. It is a beautiful, two-story home in a charming neighborhood of Montreal. The home is clean, comfortable, and well-furnished. 

The off-street parking is tight. We were renting a Nissan Rouge, and it fit, but I don't think a larger vehicle would fit. This was fine because once we parked, we walked everywhere and the vehicle didn't move. 

We had a great stay and are already talking about coming back.
It's a beautiful house. It's been lovingly decorated. Jean-Francois was easy to reach and stayed in touch with us. Excellent location with easy walking distance to bars, restaurants, and shops.

Loved everything about this place, from the high ceilings, great kitchen, backyard patio, abundance of rooms to relax and recharge, this place was everything I hoped for. Central to most of Montreal, there is no trouble finding what you need from markets, coffee, parks, nightlife, and everything in between. I truly enjoyed my stay here.

Jean-Francois was out of town during our stay, but he provided tons of information and recommendations for our weekend in advance, and we had no problem checking in late on our first night. This house is incredibly beautiful and spacious! There's so much to love - the art, the library upstairs, the kitchen, patio, and garden which we got to take advantage of with the fantastic weather during our stay. There was tons of room for our group of 3 couples to enjoy and recharge after wedding festivities for our friends downtown. Anything you need is within walking distance. I would highly recommend this place and would consider staying here again with my friends!

Great location in Mont Royal neighborhood, 5 minutes walk to the Metro which we used every day. Lots of restaurants nearby and a coffee shop directly across the street. The house has excellent air conditioning and the TV is large and new.  The beds were comfortable. There's a lovely patio out back where we ate a couple of times. There's a pretty park a short walk away.

Cool place. Close to the mountains and great food. Not too far from the laundromat. Ubers and traffic were definitely an issue from this location (one-way), but it was a minor inconvenience in what was otherwise a pretty good stay.

My friends and I booked Mano's place for a bachelor party getaway. It was fantastic! Perfect for a group of 6-8 guys looking to hang out in one area. Considering the building was old, I was very surprised at how well insulated the sound was. We rarely heard neighbors, if at all.  I'd say the only tiny issue is that the place is a little dated. It's not fancy, but it's a great place to stay for a group of friends.

The apartment is in an incredibly awesome location, within walking distance to all the cool bars, restaurants, and shops in trendy Mile End. The rooms and beds are spacious, and it's great value for money if you need a place for a group of people to stay.

Our group of five rented Mano's place in Montreal for a long weekend bachelor party. The house had six separate bedrooms and was in a convenient location, so it worked great for our purposes.

The location is great, with many bars/restaurants close by. There is also a bike share station down the block and a 10-minute walk from the nearest metro. Overall, it was a great centralized location to see a lot of the city.

Our stay at Mano's place was very good, easy and comfortable. Mano answered very quickly and was very nice to accommodate our needs. The apartment is a bit old, so you can hear the wooden floor squeak, but everything else is set up for guests to enjoy their stay. The apartment is huge! We are a family of six and we had space to spare! The furniture was different from that shown in the pictures, but other than that it was just as described. The neighborhood seemed safe. We had a few walks at night to a 24-hour grocery store just two blocks away and that was very convenient. Overall, we had a great time. We would definitely stay there again! Thanks Mano!
Thank you very much for the positive stay! =D
Awesome experience! Highly recommended!
Janie was very helpful with check-in and answering any questions we had. The place was clean and well-kept.
It's a quiet, clean and comfortable place, the studio is well-equipped with everything we need, thank you!
What a pleasure it was to stay at her place!
Comfortable, cozy and exactly as described. 5 minutes to the subway in a quiet but interesting neighborhood with typical Haitian and Thai restaurants. Janie is on top of things. Totally recommend!
Space is very cozy, comfortable, and super clean. Public transportation is very close by, making travel easy. Janie was also very attentive and helpful. I would definitely return!

If you're looking for a clean and private place to stay in a beautiful neighborhood, this is definitely the place to go. We found Janie to be very kind and personable, and we highly recommend booking with her.
My accommodation was very clean and functional. The neighborhood was quiet, and the metro station was nearby. Janie was easily contactable to answer all our questions.

Everything is perfect!

Our stay at Janie's studio was very pleasant.
The apartment was consistent with the description. Communication was perfect with the owner. I have nothing to complain about. I recommend it!

Super studio, well-equipped and clean. 
Janie responds very quickly and is very friendly.

I loved that the keys were in a numbered locked box because it gave me no pressure about when I could check in. The studio, bedding, and bathroom were very clean, it was quiet and peaceful. I did not meet Janie personally and it was fine as I was looking for rest. However, Janie was very quick to respond to any message and overall I'm giving a 10/10 to Janie and her studio because my expectations were met 100% based on what I read and viewed on the application. I recommend this studio and will definitely go there again if it is available. Thank you, Janie.

Great stay at Janie's apartment. Janie was an excellent host, easy to communicate with and checked to make sure we got settled in ok etc. The apartment is cozy and clean, has everything you need for a short stay. A bit farther from some of the busier areas in Montreal but very close to a Bixi bike station and 10 mins to the metro station which is handy. Overall a good stay, would recommend and great value!

Accommodation met our expectations in terms of description and comfort. The accommodation was very comfortable with excellent equipment in good condition. Excellent communication with Janie. A 10-minute walk to the metro station is not unpleasant on the street with large trees. Perfect for our weekend in Montreal.

This was our first time checking out Montreal, which is a beautiful city! Janie helped us out a lot. She responded quickly to my questions and made check-in pretty easy. She was nice enough to have us check-out later than 10 a.m., which gave us more time to have a latte at Crew Collective & Cafe in Old Montreal. 

Janie's place is beautiful, clean, and cozy. The neighborhood is quiet and everyone is welcoming. Her place is a little far from everything else but she is 10 minutes away from the Metro which made it easier for us to get to downtown Montreal. On the bright side you get to explore the beautiful scenery!!!!

Thank you for everything, Janie! Highly recommended!!!
Small, well-equipped studio with impeccable cleanliness. Recommended for anyone seeking a reliable option in Montreal.
Nice apartment! You can hear the neighbors upstairs, but otherwise it was nice and cozy. Perfect for a short stay!

Janie's place was exactly how it looked in the pictures. It was a perfect space, not too big or too small, just right. She was very quick to answer any questions I had. I will definitely book at her place again. Loved the fact that I booked a night before and everything was up to par. I recommend staying here for anyone looking for a very cozy and quiet place to stay.
Clean, quiet and close to the city. Enjoyable stay.
This is a small studio that's really very clean, easy parking.

My apartment is in the semi-basement and therefore has a very cozy side, which is highly appreciated during winter, even during the cold wave of Christmas 2017!! Excellent value for money - Easy access from the Jean Talon metro station and downtown is also well accessible. Convenience stores are nearby. Don't hesitate!

I loved the location. Everything in Montreal is very spread out so even though it's 15 minutes from downtown by car, it takes a long time to walk anywhere. We went during January so the heating was awesome and we kept warm with the blankets provided for us on the bed. Some things to expect: there are some plumbing issues, so one water line shoots off in another direction when using the sinks and the shower. Also, the space is much smaller than I expected but it felt good for two people. Other than that, it was a very clean, convenient, and open space.
Well-equipped and efficient studio, conveniently located with ample parking for your vehicle at the quiet Cartier location. We greatly enjoyed our stay.

Great host, perfect location - the neighborhood is quiet with nearly everything you need within walking distance and access to public transportation. 10/10 would recommend and would stay again when in Montreal.
Quiet neighborhood
Loved Janie's place! Her apartment was very clean and well-stocked. Check-in was easy and the location was great. Would definitely recommend to others!

We had a lovely stay at Janie's place. The apartment is well located, with easy access to public transport. Check-in was simple and flexible—which we really appreciated. The apartment is exactly as described, and is a really nice space to spend the weekend. Communication with Janie was great. We really enjoyed our stay.

A charming little home that gives us the feeling of being at home. The neighborhood is quiet and even though public transportation isn't super convenient, the route to get there is very good. Everything about the stay was natural. Thank you to the host for the clear instructions. I highly recommend it without hesitation!
Excellent location, easy and effective communication. All necessary items are available. I recommend it!
Recommendation!

Janie was a friendly and communicative host and I had an easy, comfortable stay. Good space for one person or a couple. If you're used to set-up-for-purpose Airbnbs, keep in mind that someone lives here when it's not rented out. Villeray is a nice quiet neighborhood and apart from upstairs neighbors walking around, you don't get any noise, it's peaceful and quiet. Close to Metro stops, although I walked into town a couple of times... Montreal isn't that big anyway!

We love the stay and the environment, the apartment is near the metro and bike sharing system, close to shops and parks. Janie is very responsive in her answers and very solicitous. 

Thank you for everything.
This was my second time staying at Janie's place. Amazing as always! Great host, and amazing place! Definitely recommend.
Studio stylish, clean and functional; check-in very easy even arriving after 10pm. Thank you!

Perfect studio for visiting Montreal and resting after a day of walking in the heat. 

In fact, the apartment is quite cool.

It is a cozy basement apartment that has almost everything you might need, but it could be cleaner regarding towels and dust. It was sad to mention that I didn't feel very welcome there as during my 3-night stay I was reminded twice to check out before 10 am as there were other visitors arriving right after us. For the wifi connection, you would have to use a little bit of logic as the details provided are not quite right. Overall, it is a nice place for this price.
We enjoyed staying at Janie's place. It's a small basement apartment. The metro is within walking distance, and parking was easy. We recommend it.
It was a pleasure.
Very quiet, safe, and friendly neighborhood. Apartment was well-equipped and clean. Would definitely recommend to friends.

Janie's place is wonderful. It's clean and independent, and check-in is easy. This place will always be my choice when I plan to travel to Montreal. I highly recommend Janie's place because it's close to everything and located in a safe area.
Clean and quiet apartment. Janie is very responsive to our requests. Metro nearby.

Thank you very much! It was very convenient for my parents who were able to stay just a few meters from our apartment on Avenue des Érables. They were satisfied with the experience and everything went well. We will definitely rent it again during their next visit.
Very nice place close to bus/metro station. Highly recommend, thank you so much for your hospitality!

Janie's place was great for my girlfriend and me. We brought bikes with us to Montreal so it was super easy for us to get around the city and see all the sights! Janie's place was in a great location for us since we could bike right into the city without any hassle. The place was perfect to come home to and relax in bed while watching some television after a long day of sightseeing and biking. Janie was easy to reach and always responded quickly!
Thank you very much

The place is super clean and cozy. I totally recommend it for couples or students who need a quiet place after classes. A bit far from the center if you don't have a car (12-15 minutes). By metro, it takes 30-40 minutes to get there. It was worth it for me. The neighborhood is very quiet.
Good place. Good value. Small but nice. Great for our short stay. Thank you
Highly recommend it! It's a little outside of downtown, but it's worth it!
The apartment is clean, close to public transportation, easy to reach. We enjoyed the place to the fullest. No noise and excellent hospitality!

Janie was an excellent host. She was quick to respond and friendly. The studio apartment was clean, cozy, and just like it looked in the pictures. The location was a 20-minute drive / 40-minute bus/metro ride to downtown. Looking forward to many more stays.

Janie's place is five out of five! It's very clean and cozy. Easy access to public transit as well. No need to say Janie has been super helpful, she offers very clear instructions about how to check in and check out. Thank you for hosting.

Gabriel's place was perfect for the few days my husband and I spent in Montreal -- it's a great size and in a perfect location! He was great at communicating with me before we arrived so that check-in was a breeze -- he also made sure we had two lattes waiting for us at the nearby coffee shop! We would definitely stay there again.
It was a pleasant stay and the apartment was spacious and comfortable. There are many shops and good restaurants in the surrounding neighborhood! Gabriel is a great host.

Gabriel's apartment was fantastic! We were pleasantly surprised by the front and back terrace both with seating! The queen bed was very comfortable! The apartment was clean and easy to access. It is steps from Saint Laurent and a 5-minute walk to Mont Royal station. So much good food and amazing coffee around the corner. Had an almond milk flat white every morning at Paquebot!!! There is a park around the corner and a grocery store at the end of the street. Even though there wasn't air conditioning, the apartment was quiet cool being on the bottom level. Although it was still very bright with the sliding doors! Gabriel was quick to respond and check-in and checkout was very smooth and easy!! I highly recommend staying at Gabriel's!!

This is indeed a magnificent place, especially (for me) the balcony - which is the size of three or four normal balconies in other cities. You can enjoy the full sun on it in the morning and have shade by afternoon. Luc and Constance clearly love their place and keep it well. If you are the type who wants every last technological comfort, this may not be for you, but if you don't mind living without, say, a microwave or can deal with a bit of difficulty getting in and out of an older bathtub, and you love lovely spaces - this is for you! (that said there is still a large TV screen and cable which you don't get everywhere). Downstairs, Jean, the owner, is also very welcoming and accommodating should you need anything.
Great place, great host, great location - highly recommend!

Great place; it really makes you wish you could just take over Luc's lease and stay here permanently. The main feature of this apartment is the great balcony in the back. We stayed here for three weeks. Living in his neighborhood and this apartment in the summer, you are truly living the best Montreal life possible.

Good location, wonderful balcony with many flowers. We were with two kids and the balcony was a very good option for all of us while we were there since our kids like to be outside. The place has almost everything you might need at your own home except air conditioning. You need to climb stairs, but it's only for one floor. We didn't have any problems using it. The floor is wooden so it's a little bit creaky. Overall, very good place to stay. Thank you Luc for being a great host.

A very nice place to reserve
I have no doubt on recommending this wonderful private room
The host really made me feel at home!

Very spacious room with balcony 
Everything is well organized and tidy and super clean 

And dealing with the host, she is a kind person, well-organized and helpful, she provides you with a very nice & healthy breakfast in the morning. You can share some area with her and get a chance to see one of her great movies. Her house is near to a lot of places and to the metro station and also to the bus stop
Excellent hosting. The room is spacious, clean, and comfortable. This was my best experience.
Ioni is an excellent host. She was extremely kind and very accommodating. The apartment is very clean and the bedroom very large and comfortable. I highly recommend her place.
Good location, easy access, and smooth check-in process. She was readily available by phone when needed. The room and apartment were clean, and the host was caring.

I had to come back again to Ioni's private room after staying in 2 other houses, what makes it special is the spacious room with a desk and chair for studying or finishing work. And again, everything in Ioni's house is tidy and clean. A lovely stay in her private room while I was in Montreal.

Highly recommended!

Ideally located near the metro and many amenities. Very convenient when you arrive in Montreal. Really pleasant stay, large comfortable room and a great host! Excellent value for money, I recommend without hesitation :)

Excellent reception, Ioni is very friendly and discreet while being attentive. I had a wonderful stay and highly recommend this choice, offering great value for money. The apartment is spacious and well-maintained with simple elegance.

Ioni was such a wonderful host!
She was so friendly, her apartment was cozy, and the room too.
She left me something for breakfast every morning before she left for work! So nice of her.
I highly recommend her place.
If you want to go downtown on foot it will take you about 1 hour and a half which is great because the neighborhood is very nice but don't worry if you don't want to, you have a metro station very close to her apartment!

Ioni was an excellent host. We arrived late and she was totally fine about it. She was so kind!! During our stay she woke up before us just to make us coffee and to leave some nice muffins and bread for our breakfast. All this on a weekend... She could be sleeping, but no, she took really good care of us!

Also, the house and room were spotless!  We would love to stay again when we return to Montreal!
Great host, thanks.
The place is very clean, Ioni is a very nice host although she is rarely at home, but knows how to take care of her guests.

Ioni was a wonderful host! We felt very comfortable there, the Wi-Fi worked well and it was easy to communicate with her when we needed to. Great access to the metro and city buses. The place was clean and safe, and she left us some breakfast in the mornings, which was super helpful to get our day started. Would definitely go back again next time.

Ioni is an amazing host. The apartment is really pretty and close to public transportation, the neighborhood is also very quiet and lovely. She is a very kind person and she's also super fun. The place is charming and comfortable, and Ioni provides you with everything you need. Definitely I would stay with her again!
Beautiful clean accommodation with a friendly and quiet host in a peaceful location with nothing negative to say.

The place is in a fantastic location (i.e., for grocery shopping and the metro) and Ioni was a fantastic and understanding host. She made my stay very enjoyable, and she was always happy to help or offer ways to make my stay even better!
I had a great stay at Ioni's place! She is so kind, helpful and easy to talk to. Went above and beyond helping me settle into the city of Montreal. Love the proximity to the metro station!
Ioni is a pleasant and welcoming person. I enjoyed my stay there and recommend this place.
Perfect first week in this room as described, for a smooth Pvt arrival!
The place matched the listing perfectly. It was in a very safe neighborhood, close to the Metro, and parking was not an issue. Highly recommend if you're looking to explore Montreal.

Fantastic location, just minutes from the metro, making it easy to reach downtown and explore Montreal. The room is very spacious, exactly as advertised and exactly what I was looking for! Thank you, Ioni.

This is my second time staying with Ioni, so I obviously had a great first-time experience with her! I had a fantastic time staying with her for the second time as well. The room is spacious, the place is clean, and Ioni was proactive in making sure I was comfortable. The location is also terrific, with two metros and a grocery store nearby!

Ioni is an amazing host, I strongly recommend her and her apartment to everyone looking for a beautiful, safe, conveniently located, and private room in Montreal. Ioni was always fast on replying to my questions, she accommodated to my arrival and departure, left treats in the morning for me, and was always available with useful tips about getting settled in Montreal. Her apartment is very nice, beautifully decorated, the kitchen is fully equipped, and the room is really cute, big, and private. The location is a real plus, about 1 block or so from a metro station and walking distance to Cote-des-Neiges where you can find everything. The biggest plus is Ioni's personality, she is really easy going, very respectful of giving her guests their own private space, so responsive to the guest's needs and questions, great positive energy to have in a host!
Ioni is very kind and offered breakfast. The location is also good. However, the floor is creaky, so you will hear clearly when someone walks upstairs.

This was my first stop in the city of Montreal, and Ioni's hospitality really made me feel at home. Her place was clean and had everything you'd need for a great stay. Ioni was also very thoughtful and left snacks and little notes on the table in the mornings. She also gave me advice on navigating through Montréal, finding a good mobile network plan, etc. She was really easy going and it was a pleasure sharing the house with her.
My stay was perfect! There's nothing to complain about, I highly recommend it without hesitation :)

Great host!
Everything is very clean
Very good 
Thank you so much
Great value, awesome location and an amazing host

Ioni is a lovely host who makes an effort to ensure her guests feel at ease. The room is large and kept clean, and has all the amenities needed to make a stay comfortable. The apartment is only 5 minutes to the nearest Metro station and then approximately 20 minutes into the center of Montreal. I felt safe in the neighborhood at all times.

A great stay! Ioni is respectful and very kind. One of those people who are chill in the best possible way. They let you enjoy your visit, but at the same time she's always open to questions. Easy to get in touch with, so there was no problem checking in. 

So, thank you for allowing me to stay in your home and for letting me drink all that green tea. ^.^
Value for money, great communication, clean. Ioni is a great host and I can only recommend her.
Loved staying at Ioni's!! The place was nice and super clean! She is so friendly and an awesome host!
Nice host!

Arrived in the framework of a PVT, very comfortable and quiet for a first show in Montreal. 
I had a very good stay.

Ioni is a very beautiful, kind and super attentive girl, she would leave us breakfast details, she's a very very beautiful girl always willing to solve your doubts and help you with what you need, she respects your space and makes you feel at home! 

The place is a very clean and warm apartment, you really feel at home, it has everything you might need to cook; she always provides you with clean towels and sheets when needed, the location is very good, it's a 5-minute walk from the metro, the supermarket, and you reach the center in 15 minutes!

Really recommended! :)
A very nice place with a very nice host
Friendly and helpful host. The proximity to the Orange Line metro is a significant advantage for a first-time visit to Montreal.

Apartment at the top, spacious, fully equipped, beautifully decorated. Ioni is a fantastic host with exceptional welcome despite my late arrival. In addition, the accommodation is a 5-minute walk from the metro which itself is close to the city center. Truly a recommended accommodation!

Ioni's place is great; a lovely character building with high ceilings and lots of space. Ioni is a very welcoming host, and it was great to have use of the kitchen to cook! The place is close to the metro and buses, and I found it relatively easy to park in the surrounding area. Also close to a lovely little park and a theatre!
I had a very good week at Ioni. The apartment was warm (even with the -20°C outside), perfect for a first week to settle in Montreal, close to the metro, etc. I recommend it!

A warm and very well-equipped apartment, extremely clean, in a quiet environment is two steps away from a small shopping center, extremely practical.  It's a 5-minute walk to the metro and a station of Jean Talon market. Catherine and Sébastien welcomed me very warmly and were always available to help me. Three weeks in Montreal, which unfolded in good humor and discovery of a great city and its inhabitants. I recommend a stop at Catherine for all future visitors to Montreal.

We had a very good Christmas week at Catherine and Sébastien's apartment. Very warm and welcoming, they went above and beyond to make our stay the best possible, regularly checking in on our well-being and meeting our expectations. With a supermarket two minutes away by foot and the metro 400 meters away, this accommodation is very well located (a very charming neighborhood with brick houses and stairs on the facade, lots of charm!), pleasant to live in and decorated tastefully. It had everything we needed, and we were touched by our hosts' kind gestures. I highly recommend this rental to future visitors to Montreal, pure happiness!!

Fantastic stay in Montreal with Catherine and her husband. 
The apartment was lovely, and the neighborhood suited us perfectly. Jean-Talon market within walking distance, filled with fresh foods. A great wine store nearby. All kinds of good restaurants including some of the best El Salvadoran food I've ever eaten.
Hosts were fantastic, invited us down for a lovely evening of wine and cheese, but otherwise left us alone...except when we needed something or had a question. 
It is well located, with two metro lines and buses nearby. As we are mostly walking people, we loved the location in the very heart of the island. Very nice neighborhood.
My wife and I would happily stay there again and look forward to our next visit.

My experience was gratifying, the accommodation was exactly as in the photos, clean and entirely equipped. Catherine is an excellent host. I recommend the accommodation for those who intend to spend a season in Montreal.

The flat is very clean and beautifully/simply organized, with all the basic accessories you need for an extended stay, including the kitchen and bathroom. The neighborhood is quiet, but close to a lot of great restaurants, and walking distance to many wonderful parts of the city. The hosts were very kind and accommodating, I would highly recommend staying here.

Thank you to Catherine & Sebastian for this wonderful stay. The apartment is superb and very clean in a friendly neighborhood, but on a very quiet street. Close to the metro & shops. We can walk to the Jean Talon market in about 20 minutes of pleasant walking. We really appreciated the little details & small attentions. We recommend this apartment for a short or long stay in Montreal.
Catherine and her husband are charming hosts, the apartment is very well-arranged and beautifully decorated, nothing is missing. I highly recommend these hosts.

Catherine and Sébastien were very welcoming. The apartment was warm, very well-located, close to everything. The studio was charmingly furnished, efficient and decorated with care... Nothing superfluous and everything is there, bedding, soap, shampoo, etc.

"Always come over at Catherine and Seb's, don't come if you want to! There will be room for me!!!!

Seriously, it's a great place and perfect hosts."

Catherine and Sebastian were absolutely wonderful. Catherine kept in close touch with me and was patient enough to answer all my pre-travel questions. They greeted us at the door on the day of our arrival and gave us some very valuable information about getting around town and where we could find the best gelato :). We were so relaxed here that I was able to read 5 books during our 9-day stay!  My parents are considering coming up next June for the F1 race also and I will certainly be hooking them up with Catherine and Sebastian.
The host cancelled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Beautiful calm and pleasant stay! Thank you, Catherine.

Dear Catherine;

We had a wonderful time on vacation, your hospitality was very warm and it gave us the impression that we knew you for a long time. We felt like we were at home and we were able to admire an extraordinary country that deserves to be visited several times in order to discover a good portion of its great wealth. 

Thank you again for your hospitality, the apartment is a real nest!
We'll see you next time and stay as you are, don't change anything.

Claude and his wife

Everything was perfect. The apartment had everything I needed, was close to public transportation and grocery stores, and was located in a nice neighborhood. Communication was excellent and the hosts were very kind.

We were incredibly well-received at the apartment by our exceptional hosts!

The apartment is very comfortable, warm, and well-located for a neighborhood life with easy and simple access to all amenities.

I highly recommend staying here!

Excellent stay at Catherine's place. We greatly enjoyed the location: close to shops, Jean Talon market, and transportation. The apartment is pleasant and in every way conforms to the photos: bright, clean, and quiet. The welcome is warm, Catherine is an extremely friendly host. We would have loved to stay longer!
Don't waste your time, this is by far the perfect accommodation.

Catherine and her husband were awesome hosts. They kindly provided us with nice recommendations about Montreal and were able to accommodate our request for a late check-in when we arrived. We enjoyed our stay at Catherine's place and everything was according to what is described. Also, the place is near public transport and is within the car2go zone in Montreal.

Good location, near a grocery store and the metro station. Clean studio, well-furnished and comfortable. Catherine and Sébastien are welcoming and friendly. Everything is in place for a pleasant stay.

We had a wonderful stay! Great apartment, clean and stylish, with all the amenities we needed for a long-term visit in Montreal. Located in a quiet area, but still very close to the Metro as well as awesome restaurants and stores. Our hosts were very friendly and accommodating. Their recommendations for dining and shopping were very helpful. We would definitely stay here again! Thank you :)
Very nice apartment. Fany helped us in so many ways :) I recommend staying there

Pleasant stay in a spacious and clean apartment. The welcome and communication with Fanny went very well. The location is the biggest plus of this accommodation, the neighborhood is very picturesque and close to public transport. 

Only downside for the bed which is not very comfortable.

Staying at Fanny's place made our trip to Montréal even more enjoyable. Her apartment is perfectly located in one of the most exciting parts of the city which makes it great for a short weekend visit. The place is very nice and clean, and we could count on Fanny's advice on local restaurants and bars. Highly recommended!
Fanny was very helpful and kind. The apartment's location is great, the room is lovely with lots of light.

Beautiful room, very comfortable bed, cozy apartment, and great location to explore Mile End and the Plateau. The terrace is amazing but unfortunately we didn't have the time or weather to enjoy it. Fanny was very helpful and everything went absolutely smoothly. Highly recommendable!

Fanny's apartment had a great location in Mile End close to Mont Royal and tons of good restaurants/bars. She was a wonderful host and person to get to know, and provided great recommendations for things to do. I would definitely come back to Montreal and stay with her again in the future
Fanny is a thoughtful and friendly host who anticipates our needs and makes our stay comfortable. Her place has a nice terrace and the location is very beautiful and central.
Great place, great location. Fanny is very accommodating and easy going.

Fanny is a great Airbnb host. A friend and I stayed with her for several nights and couldn't have been happier with the accommodations. Fanny is super kind and really fun. She definitely helped take our trip to the next level. The room was excellent, and Fanny's attention to keeping things clean is noticeable. Wonderful stay.

Very clean, cute apartment in Mile End. The host was super helpful in giving us information about what was happening in the neighborhood during the weekend, and the apartment is close enough to walk to all the sights we wanted to see. 5 stars!
Very nice and price-worthy stay. Very clean. Fanny was a great host!

I had a very pleasant stay at Fanny's place. She responded quickly, was there to greet me upon arrival and provided a spotless room in her flat.

The area is packed with interesting places and everything is walkable. 

There is a steep flight of stairs out front - need to exercise caution. In summertime, look for a brand new deck in the back that is very peaceful and quiet for relaxing moments. And Fanny is a good host. 

I would not hesitate recommending Fanny's place to anyone looking for a pleasant Airbnb experience!
Location, amazing house and host. Best Airbnb experience!
Fanny was a gracious and kind host. She provided us with tips on enjoying Montreal. Her place is very welcoming, and the room is spacious. We would definitely return to Fanny's place.
Functional apartment, well-located, very well maintained and quiet. I highly recommend it.
Parfait! The terrace is extra. Everything is in front of the door.

Fanny's apartment was great—lots of light, very clean and bright, with a really gorgeous deck. Located in a very cool part of town, filled with lots of great bars and restaurants, with easy access to buses and trains going to other parts of the city. Fanny was a lovely host, giving us tips for what to do nearby and over our weekend stay, and even helping us very promptly when we stupidly got ourselves locked out of the apartment.

Staying with Fanny was one of the best Airbnb experiences we've had in a long time. We stayed with her for 5 nights and wished that we could stay even longer! The whole apartment was very authentic, cozy, and clean with a nice big patio. We loved the neighborhood Mile End, it's close to Park Mont-Royal and Metro Laurier, nice cafes, restaurants, and bagel shops :) Fanny was a very nice and helpful and friendly host. She gave us very good recommendations and we felt very welcomed from the first minute! We definitely recommend staying with her! Thank you so much! :) Sara & Max
The apartment is super clean and beautiful, and it's in a very good location. Fanny is a very friendly, kind, and nice person! I wish I could stay there longer. Thank you so much, Fanny!
Very calm, Fanny is a very kind host!
Fanny's apartment was lovely and located in the best spot in Montreal.
Super cute apartment in a fantastic location! Although I didn't get to meet Fanny, she was very friendly, left behind great recommendations, and responded quickly to all my questions/concerns.

Fanny was a really friendly, open person and it was great having her as a host. I felt comfortable immediately in her place. The location is perfect; very close to everything without being noisy. The bed was comfy, and everything was very clean. I had a great time and would definitely stay again.

Fanny is great with communication and very helpful with everything - she goes the extra mile. Her place is awesome (the backyard was really nice for a drink too!) And it's in a cool, hipster part of Montreal. Only thing I found tricky was the key and getting into the apartment but fortunately her friend let us in so there were no issues. I'd stay here again!
Fanny's apartment was wonderful! The place is clean and bright, and it has everything you need. The location is ideal, and Fanny is a lovely host.

Fanny is terrific. Her place is in a great location. She had terrific knowledge about places to go and things to do. We enjoyed spending time sharing travel experiences. She's great and an awesome host. Couldn't ask for more.

Fanny's Place was excellent. It was in a very walkable and fun part of town and I had everything I needed for my stay. More importantly, Fanny is a wonderful person; she had a list of recommendations waiting for me when I got to her place, and she was an engaging conversationalist. I highly recommend Fanny's Place for your visit to Montreal!
Wonderful place to stay, very nice host.

Fanny's apartment was just as she had described it - quiet, clean and in a very good location. She was very friendly and accommodating, and it was nice to spend a few minutes chatting with her. The bedroom was cozy and comfortable, just what we needed after a long day driving and exploring the city. We would love to go back sometime :)
Great and quite room, very good facilities, lovely host very attentive. The place is clean, and nearby bus, bike shops, mountains. So perfect.
Fanny's place is ideal and a great value!  A fantastic location in a wonderful neighborhood, it's very clean, minimalist, and stylishly decorated, with great amenities and easy communication.

Fanny is such a friendly and helpful host. We had some good conversation and she gave us great recommendations for food. Her place is very clean and is very close to several bus stops that will take you close to all the major spots. Many cafes and restaurants are nearby. The neighborhood and her flat are very cute! A great experience ☺

Excellent address for staying in Montreal. Fanny is welcoming, friendly and discreet. She has a list of good addresses in the neighborhood, and does everything to make your stay pleasant. The little terrace for a coffee is an added bonus, even in winter!

I came to Montreal for a conference at Université de Montréal in November 2017. Fanny is the consummate host and her place is very comfortable, clean, and in the best location in Montreal! Definitely stay here if you are looking for a quiet, clean place close to the best bars and restaurants in Montreal (Dieu du Ciel!, Aux Vivres, Gus, among others). The neighborhood is fantastic, full of nice restaurants and little boutiques, and when I was there (late Fall) the streets were lit at night with fairy lights in the trees—quite magical! Transit is also easily accessible (buses and subways are close by), and downtown Montreal is not far. Fanny is extremely welcoming and immediately made me feel comfortable in her home, which is beautiful (with a STUNNING back deck). I loved staying here and would come back!

Fanny is the sweetest. She communicates promptly, is friendly, and provided lots of tips on what to see and do. Her place is great - very clean, quiet, and located in a trendy neighborhood full of restaurants and vintage shops (my favorite). I would definitely stay here again in a heartbeat!
I really enjoyed my stay at Fanny's apartment. Conveniently located, spacious and clean, as well as the great hospitality and kindness of Fanny. Thank you

Fanny was a wonderful host and made me feel very welcome. Communication and check-in could not have been smoother. The room was quiet and nice with a comfortable bed. The apartment is just a short walk from all the good spots in Mile End, and the nearby subway and bus stops make it easy to reach the rest of Montreal.

My stay at Fanny's place couldn't have been better, not only is she an excellent host but she is also an amazingly inspiring human being. Her hospitality is a joy and her local recommendations are amazing. Her flat is super well located in one of the coolest neighborhoods in Montreal. I would DEFINITELY love to come back!

It was a lovely stay! I chose "much better than I expected" not because I didn't expect much, but because I want to express how much I loved it. Fanny is a wonderful hostess who goes with the flow while at the same time being super reliable and accurate in terms of description of the place. The room is sweet and quiet, and the entire apartment has a very warm feel and ambiance. Despite it being arctic cold in the city, the place was well heated and I wasn't cold at all. The neighborhood offers great cafes, restaurants and easy access to other parts of Montreal. I can highly recommend!

Fanny's place was great! We were there on a very cold weekend, but there were still lots of great bars and restaurants within walking distance to enjoy. I'm sure it would be even more amazing in the summer, especially with her cute back porch. The room was excellent, exactly as pictured. It also felt like we had a lot of privacy, even though we just rented the room.

Fanny's place was just fantastic. Spacious room, great flat, great kitchen with everything you could ever need and an amazing host. I stayed there for one week, and couldn't have asked for a better place. It's located in the heart of the hippest place in Montreal and perhaps one of the hippest places on earth, still the surroundings were very quiet. I had a lot of good conversations with Fanny and felt really like home. Thank you for amazing hosting.

I had an excellent stay at Fanny's apartment. Everything is perfect, the location, the quiet, the room, the cleanliness. Fanny was a very welcoming host who made us feel right at home very quickly. 

We also had some super interesting and diverse discussions. I highly recommend this place :-)
Three beautiful apartment in the heart of Mile End. Everything is very clean and well-maintained. I recommend!

Fanny was a wonderful host and made me feel welcome in her space! The place itself was fantastic—spacious and exactly as pictured. It was conveniently located near a bus stop and metro station, making Fanny's place the perfect spot in Montreal!
Our stay at Fanny's place was exceptional! Fanny is a welcoming and open host, the place was spotless, the room was very cozy, and the rooftop terrace was perfect on a warm Montreal spring day!
Fanny is a charming, friendly girl with good energy and her place is comfortable and very well located! Highly recommend.
Great place, great location, and a great host! Highly recommend.
Fanny is one of the kindest hosts I've ever met. She gave me a warm welcome, great local tips, and made me feel at home. I will definitely recommend her and would definitely go back.

It was a perfect stay at Funnys apartment! The room was cozy, light and quiet, the location was awesome! Many cafes, bars and restaurants were close by and everything was walkable even Mont Royal. Downtown or Old Montreal was walkable but it took around 30-40 minutes, but for me it was good to see as much as I could from Montreal through walking instead of taking public transportation! So I would definitely recommend Funnys place to discover the city, even for a short trip which I did (2 days)! Funny is also a very nice, friendly and open person, we had a nice chat!

A lovely room in a peaceful and bright apartment with a wonderful host. I slept so well here and loved my time sitting on the deck eating croissants and bagels. Fanny is a great host: kind, interesting and welcoming.
Wonderful host, great location and awesome room/patio! 100% would stay again.

Awesome Airbnb experience! Fanny is a very welcoming, open and friendly host. She also gave me great local tips. The room was indeed very cozy and quiet, I slept well and felt like home. The location is just perfect! The next metro is within 10 minutes walking distance and the next bus to the old port is even in 1 minute walking distance. There are plenty of unique restaurants and bars nearby, the well-known Mont Royal is also not far away. 

I would definitely stay at Fanny's place again if I come back to Montréal!
Merci beaucoup!

I stayed at Fanny's place for a week. It looks exactly as described. Very clean and quiet. It is located in a very nice area with fresh air, a 10-minute walk to Laurier metro station, and a bus stop right near the house. There are numerous cafes and restaurants around, along with two small parks. Fanny was very helpful and friendly. I really enjoyed my visit.
Good location and nice spot!

Fanny's place was awesome and the location was perfect. The apartment was right in Mile's End, and was walkable to Saint Lawrence St, St Viateur and Fairmont bagels, and much more. Her apartment was clean and the outdoor deck was the cutest. Fanny was amazing, making check-in super easy and would let us know whenever there was an event going on in town. I would definitely stay here again!

Fanny's hospitality was perfect; the room and apartment were very pleasant, and the terrace a real joy.

Thank you to Fanny for her helpful advice during our stay.

Fanny's place is right in the middle of a really cool neighborhood. Bars, cafes, and restaurants are all around her. I wasn't sure if it might be off the beaten path, but it was very close to nightlife. The Plateau/Mile End neighborhoods are the cool neighborhoods to check out if you want fine dining and a hip scene. 

My wife and I spent a weekend at Fanny's apartment and she gave us some great local tips on our arrival. The two-bedroom apartment is stylish and clean, and her large back porch is nice for a quiet break from the busy neighborhood. She even let us borrow her clothes steamer when my shirt was too wrinkled from the suitcase!

Fanny is a lovely, welcoming and easygoing host. Staying at her place gave us enough privacy as a couple, even though it was a shared one. It is located in the heart of Mile-end, with lots of nice places within walkable distance. Overall, we had a wonderful stay at Fanny's; definitely recommend hers!

This is the second time I stayed at Fanny's, and I was very happy to come back. Her place location is fantastic, in a very exciting neighborhood and easy to reach downtown. She is very welcoming and fun to be around. I greatly recommend asking her for her list of nearby restaurants and bars, she has the best selection!

Fanny was an excellent host and very responsive. She was very helpful with public transportation/getting around since I didn't have a car. Her place is in a perfect location that is walking distance to many cool restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. There is one particular coffee shop literally across the street that was amazing. I would definitely stay there again.
Great location and good communication, would definitely stay here again.

I am sure the hostess is a kind and generous person with many insights into Montreal. Because of omissions in the listing and events that occurred after my arrival, I chose not to stay.

Fanny offered to email a list of places to eat. I left the US on the 19th. The email was received on the 20th. Due to limited internet access and data roaming charges, I was not checking my email after I left home.

I left my bag at the room while I was searching for parking. The room is off the kitchen. It was 83 degrees outside that evening and the room was even warmer. The bed and a fan were next to the window. I could see the patio table and chairs from my pillow. Fanny apologized, saying the comforter was in the dryer. We laughed thinking it was not needed. 

As I have done many times before, I prefer to park my car and walk a city. Parking here is limited to parking meters or resident permit parking. There are no parking garages. There is no off-street parking. Construction on side streets further reduced available parking. While walking, I was bumped by a motorist coming out of an alley and hit a second time by a bicyclist traveling in the wrong direction. I spent 20 minutes circling the neighborhood looking for parking. Meanwhile, the police, a tow truck, and an ambulance were collecting a motorcyclist at the corner of Av Laurier and Saint Urbain in front of Lio Fratelli. 

I invested a considerable amount of time planning my trip to Montreal. It was not my plan to spend a beautiful summer evening driving in traffic translating "No Parking" signs. Had I known in advance that there was no parking, I would have spent the $200 for air conditioning, room service, and parking elsewhere. It was not worth the risk to stay. I was looking forward to seeing this great city. After driving seventeen hours, I drove another five and arrived home in the US at 12:30 AM

Fanny's place is very cute, clean, and homey. I didn't stay for long, so I wasn't able to take full advantage, but the terrace is great. Overall it is well maintained and comfortable, and Fanny is very sweet. The area is very cool, just about 10 minutes from the Subway and with lots of restaurants and shops. I look forward to staying here again.

Fanny's place is great. The place is located in a great neighborhood with walking distance to the metro (about 10-12 mins) and there are many great breakfast/restaurants/bars around.
