The place is stylish and comfortable as described. The patio is particularly great.  Even though I need to share bathroom with Fanny, but she is very accommodating to the guests, I feel like I have the bathroom to myself throughout my stay. 

Fanny is a great host who is communicative and easy to talk to. And she keeps a low profile to give the guests enough privacy which I really appreciate. I also got a lot of local tips for good places to eat and visit from her.

Overall, great experience, highly recommend

Very nice, clean, peaceful and well-located apartment. Close to everything, park, coffee shop, bakery, metro, pub, restaurant... We enjoyed the breakfast and the nice terrace too! Fanny was also very nice. I will definitely recommend it and will come back if I need to stay again in Montreal!
Felt at home right away! Very clean and tidy! Beautiful space and friendly host! Highly recommended!!

Stop searching. This is the place you want to be in Montreal. Logistically, the neighborhood is amazing. Cafes on every corner it seems. The best food I've had in my life. Incredibly friendly people, despite my awful attempts at their beautiful language. Then there's the space... relaxing, comforting, beautiful! And then there's the super host... this is why Airbnb is amazing... people like Fanny. This is what traveling to a new city should be like... if you want a true experience of the city and its incredible culture!

Perfect apartment in a great Mile End location! Fanny was an awesome host and provided helpful information on the best local restaurants and sights to see. The location is very walkable and also close to bus lines and metro. The space is just as described, spacious, comfortable, and clean. Highly recommended!!

Fanny's apartment is the perfect place to call home while you explore Montreal. Located in a trendy neighborhood with amazing bars, restaurants, and cafes within just a few blocks, the rest of the city's sights are either a manageable walk or a quick Uber or bus ride away. The room is clean and relaxing, the back terrace is beautiful, and even though you're in the heart of the city, the apartment is quiet and peaceful. Fanny is so sweet, friendly, and helpful. You'll love staying with Fanny; I can't recommend it enough!

Fanny is a great host, good communication and very friendly. The apartment is a nice little place with a beautiful patio. It is well situated and very quiet even though it's in the heart of the Plateau/Mile-End. Definitely recommend.

Dear Fanny, being at your place was like being at home - I really enjoyed my stay in your charming and well-located apartment. It had everything I needed and I would definitely recommend your accommodation 100%!

Perfect location in Montreal. Fanny is an excellent host who will provide you with lots of advice on discovering the Mile End and the city. The room is huge and very bright, and you'll feel both welcome and independent.

Fanny's place was perfect - amazing location in a great neighborhood, easily accessible to and from other parts of Montreal, but still a peaceful place to rest while you're traveling. The space was immaculate, bright, and well-appointed, and Fanny was an excellent host. I can't recommend highly enough!

We really enjoyed staying with Fanny. Her apartment is very well located, the neighborhood is great, with lots of charm and good places to eat or have a drink. The room is large, very clean, very cozy, and very quiet (the window overlooks the back). The bedding is very comfortable. We felt truly very well! And we really enjoyed Fanny! She is really very friendly, very welcoming and open to conversation. We highly recommend this accommodation. Book without hesitation!

Fanny hosted my mother during her stay in Montreal. The accommodation was very nice and well located just two blocks from Mile End! 

We recommend it!

I loved my stay at Fanny's place, it was just perfect. The location is great, right in the middle of Mile End and yet the apartment is very quiet. The room itself is lovely and bright. And Fanny is a super host, very kind and helpful! Thanks again for everything! I'll definitely come back.
Fanny's place is the ideal choice for experiencing one of the best neighborhoods in MTL - great bars and restaurants all within walking distance.
Excellent location, great host! I was able to relax and enjoy Montreal's great neighborhood feel. Highly recommended

The space was very clean, comfortable, and stylish. The accommodations were exceptional and you can't beat both the location and the price. Fanny is a wonderful host with great knowledge regarding local events, restaurants, and attractions. She made check-in very simple, responded to messages rapidly, and made me feel welcome in the environment. I would certainly stay here again.
Great location, clean and an amazing hostess!
Fanny is a fabulous host and her home is very clean, beautiful, and comfortable!

Fanny's place is fantastic, extremely well situated on Laurier West in the Mile End area. The room is very quiet, large and comfortable, the space is very clean. Fanny is very nice, we shared some great conversations, she will make you feel right at home. Highly recommended, the location is unbeatable.

Fanny and her Airbnb are absolutely perfect. I couldn't have asked for a better experience. It was my first time visiting Montreal and Fanny's place isn't only sparkling clean and cozy but also located in the best neighborhood. Fanny was incredibly friendly and I felt very comfortable, safe, and welcomed. I could go on and on...but most importantly if you’re looking for a place to stay in Montreal book Fanny’s place because it’s 5 stars all around!
Very comfortable room and excellent hospitality. The area is super nice, well-connected and has lots of shops and restaurants nearby. I would definitely book this place again!
A charming and comfortable room, an immaculate apartment in a very good location, and above all, a very pleasant host! Highly recommended!
The place is great, and Fanny is an extremely gracious host.
Great host. Convenient location. Clean.

Fanny's place is exceptional. It was as described and more. I mean you can tell how much she cares about the place and her guests in all the little details. I found the bed very comfortable, the space clean (trust), and the location unmatched. It made my Montreal experience for work/fun really smooth. I would definitely recommend her place.
Fantastic hostess, very lovely space, excellent location.
This is an ideal spot! - Fanny is a super gracious host, it's comfortable and clean, and in an awesome location. Will definitely stay again on my next trip to Montreal.
A wonderful host, a wonderful room in a wonderful apartment. Will stay there again!

Fanny's apartment is in an ideal location, close to all amenities, very clean and fully equipped with everything necessary. 

Fanny has been a very pleasant and welcoming host, I thank her for her kindness. I would recommend the room in her apartment for any traveler wishing to stay in a lively neighborhood at a reasonable price.

Laurence's apartment was perfect! Exactly as in the photos! It's right next to the metro, a 1-minute walk from the center, and it's really super convenient for going into town. Everything was super clean!! Laurence even left me a little gift and some good coffee for my stay! The apartment is spacious, the bed is comfortable, I slept very well there. Laurence is an excellent guide. She knows her neighborhood very well, where to eat, or get the best coffee. There's fast internet at the apartment, but there are also very nice cafes nearby if you feel like going out. Laurence was available to answer my questions. I will definitely come back to her apartment soon.

Excellent stay at Laurence's apartment! 
Very nice apartment, exactly as pictured. Bright, well decorated, large entry closet very practical. The apartment is very well located, right next to the metro so it was very easy to get around.
Laurence responds quickly to requests and left us maps of the city and metro as well as a small welcome gift. 
Excellent stay!
We will definitely return on our next trip to Montreal. Thank you Laurence, Martin and Anne-Marie

We received a very warm welcome from Laurence upon our arrival! :) The apartment is clean and comfortable. Laurence was available in case of any problems and communication was simple and easy. I highly recommend this rental if you are looking to visit the Montreal area!

Welcoming atmosphere,
Clean apartment as described. Located just two steps from the metro and all amenities. Liquor store, grocery store, pharmacy, convenience store, restaurants. Highly recommended for 1 to 2 people for a wonderful stay.

See you soon,

Laurence Place was a dream home and is located in a perfect location. There are dozens of gem restaurants within walking distance, and the subway was less than 5 minutes away. A Shoppers (drug store) is right at the doorstep if any miscellaneous items were needed. Laurence Place was amazingly comfortable; I would look forward to coming back home after a long day of exploring. There was a comfortable bed, supplied towels and hairdryer, TV with an HDMI cable, a variety of dishes and utensils. If we were to return to Montreal, Laurence Place would be the place to stay!

Laurence is everything you could ask for in a host. My plane was delayed fairly late into the evening but she was at the flat to welcome me and get me oriented. She had prepared a super map of the area marking all the special places for shopping, cafes, and so on AND she left a bunch of goodies for breakfast which was so appreciated. The flat is fabulous. Super clean, bright, and very well equipped. There is even a little balcony. It is kitty corner to the De L'eglise metro so you have easy access to public transit. I loved the neighborhood which is an up-and-coming area with tons of cafes, quirky shops, grocery stores, fruit stands, and more. A super bonus is that the river is just a couple of blocks away. I had a great time and highly recommend it.
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

This is a stunning apartment in the heart of Verdun. A great space for a solo traveler or a couple, you'll have everything you need to make your stay amazing! The place is modern, comfortable, and beautifully decorated. It's also very close to the metro and all the conveniences, making it super easy to get around Montreal! Fabulous with a kind and personable owner, ready to help with anything. Merci, Laurence!

Our host Laurence was wonderful! She gave us a tour of the condo unit and even created a little guide to Verdun. My boyfriend and I ended up eating at most of the restaurants she recommended in the neighborhood! The home is sleek, clean, and a great space to spend a city vacation in. Its location is perfect sliver of a local Montreal lifestyle. Laurence was so kind and thoughtful and kept in contact with us when we had any questions. I would definitely spend time here again. :)

Laurence's home was beautiful, extremely clean, and located in a great neighborhood. Not only was this newly-built condo one block from a metro station that would bring you downtown within 10 minutes, pretty much all amenities were within walking distance. Laurence was a lovely host who greeted us for our evening arrival and made sure we had everything we could need during our stay. I would recommend this home to anyone who wants to stay in Montreal!

Laurence's home was exceptionally kept and exactly as described. Verdun was a very quiet area with free parking. The apartment was exceptionally clean, very cozy, and close to all amenities and the Metro. Laurence is an extremely seasoned Airbnb host who took care of all the necessities and even provided a list of recommended places to eat around the area and greeted us when we got in. Highly recommend this place.

My partner and I agree that this was our favorite Airbnb experience. Laurence's apartment is absolutely perfect. Laurence made our check-in experience hassle-free and her attention to detail in this place is amazing. Couldn't fault this place in any way.

Laurence welcomed me with a smile, offering her help to carry my thousand and one bags, and was very flexible regarding the schedule and her availability when planning my stay, which I appreciated immensely. The apartment was magnificent, incredibly clean, bright, well-equipped (with everything for cooking!), exactly as in the photos and even better in person! The welcome gift was greatly appreciated and the map with restaurant suggestions proved to be very helpful. A real moment of relaxation in an absolutely ideal space for nature lovers!

We had a great stay at Laurence's place, perfect location and the place is beautiful! We had an easy time finding the place and there is plenty of parking nearby, even though you can get downtown in no time.

We highly recommend a stay with Laurence if you're in Montreal!

I would live here if I could! Laurence's home is fantastic. It was very clean, well kept and had a lot of amenities. It has been my favorite Airbnb experience to date. Laurence is very kind and left me wonderful breakfast foods to dine on.  The neighborhood is nice with good parking. If you haven't been yet, you should definitely try it out.

We greatly enjoyed staying at Laurence's condo. The place was amazing and we had everything we needed for a great stay. It felt very much like home. Laurence also left us some food for breakfast and was very patient with us regarding our arrival. Metro is very close to the condo and is a very quick drive away from the city center. We recommend this place without hesitation.
Beautiful condo. Extremely clean. Laurence gave us some great recommendations that made our stay extremely memorable. We will definitely be back. Thank you so much, Laurence.

Laurence's listing and photos were very accurate, portraying the apartment well. The neighborhood is residential and quiet, though there are a handful of nice restaurants and cafes nearby. The subway/metro is very close by to the apartment (perhaps a three-minute walk) and allows for convenient travel to pretty much every aspect of Montreal.

Though I was unable to meet Laurence personally due to an emergency, she made me feel welcomed by leaving fruit and bread in the apartment as a little snack for the next morning. In addition, there was a cute welcome note scrawled on a small chalkboard near the front door and a list of her favorite nearby hangout spots.

Overall, it was a great experience and I would stay here again the next time I travel to Montreal!

Very nice apartment in a great location, close to most of the services you need. The host was very welcoming and provided excellent information about everything related to the apartment and the Verdun area. 

Thank you, Laurence, we enjoyed our stay.
Laurence has a great place. We had an excellent stay, she made us feel very welcome and it's a great location.

Laurence was an excellent host! She generously provided us with various treats, as well as detailed recommendations. The apartment was clean and quiet in a wonderful and charming location with easy access to shops and the subway. We would love to stay there again.

Super séjour chez Laurence. The apartment is as described and located nearby the metro (2 minutes walk distance). We did not get the oppprtunity to meet Laurence in person. Despite our late arrival in the evening, she made it possible for us to get the keys. Moreover, we appreciated the bread and jam provided for our first breakfast and the maps of the city. We will book with Laurence again should we have the opportunity to come to Montréal again.

This apartment was really amazing. My boyfriend and I stayed there for 2 nights and immediately felt at home.
The apartment was very new, clean and beautifully furnished. It's only a 2-minute walk to the subway station and parking was possible in front of the house. The key exchange was easy and Laurence was very helpful. She even left us some fruit and bread for breakfast in her kitchen and made us a list/map with the best places around (supermarket, restaurants, bakeries etc.). I really would recommend this apartment to everyone who wants to visit Montreal.

We loved staying at Laurence's condo! It's exactly as pictured. The place is very clean and organized. Perfect location - the metro station is right around the corner. We didn't get to meet Laurence on our trip but she was very helpful and kind! She left us breakfast for the first morning, maps and recommendations for our trip. Check in and check out was smooth and convenient. If we come back to Montreal we will definitely stay here again! 

We had a great time - thanks for everything, Laurence!

My friend and I traveled to Montreal and stayed at Laurence's place. I was shocked when we got there. This place was so fabulous and cozy beyond our expectations. It was super clean and well decorated. Laurence also left us some food and drinks. We loved this place because it was like home.

We were very satisfied with our stay in Montreal in September 2015. The apartment located in Verdun was exactly what we were looking for. 
(situation, comfort, metro...) 
We hope to be able to return there the following year.

Laurence's place was absolutely lovely and perfect for our little family. It was very tastefully decorated and cozy, and we felt right at home immediately. Laurence was always readily available and easy to contact for any questions. We had issues with the WiFi the first day, but she had it fixed the next day for us. I highly recommend staying here, it's beautiful with great access to the subway.
She left us some fresh French bread and jelly for breakfast, along with a welcoming message on the blackboard. Everything was immaculately clean and the apartment was quite trendy and new.
We had a wonderful time. The condo was very cozy and the photos were accurate. We hope to stay here again in the future.

Laurence was extremely helpful, making my stay in Montreal absolutely wonderful. Check-in was smooth and Laurence's condo was exactly as described; it was easy to feel at home there. Overall, I rate Laurence a warm and accommodating host.

Laurence's apartment was one of the highlights of our trip. The apartment is exactly like the pictures on the listing, with beautiful decor and very clean. It's located right off the main street where all the restaurants and stores are. The neighborhood is very quiet and lovely. She left a lovely sign, fresh bread, orange juice, recommendations, and was quick to respond. I definitely recommend staying here!

We had an excellent stay at Laurence's apartment. We felt like we were home. Everything was prepared, and we didn't miss anything. Very well located as it is right in front of the metro for easy access to downtown Montreal in a few stations. And everything is nearby for grocery shopping. We highly recommend this place.
The apartment was well-appointed and very clean. Great location in Verdun

Fantastic condo! Fantastic location! Fantastic host!!! Everything was as described and super clean! Not only will I stay here again but I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a beautiful place minutes from downtown Montreal. Thanks Laurence!
Fantastic!  Super apartment, impeccable welcome.  Truly a beautiful stay. Thank you to Laurence.

This stay couldn't have been better. The apartment was exactly as described—bright, clean, comfortable, and quiet. It's a very attractive space with large windows, big closets, and perfect couches and chairs to watch TV or curl up and read. We've long been fans of Verdun, and this is perfectly located near the metro, several cafes, a couple of blocks to the IGA, organic produce around the corner, the fromagerie further down Wellington, and the beautiful park (even in the snow and cold of April) that stretches for miles along the St. Lawrence.

5 stars!!!!! I cannot imagine how our stay could have been any better.

Laurence was an absolutely wonderful hostess. She left a few breakfast foods for us to enjoy on our first morning (bananas, a loaf of bread, yogurt, juice). Very thoughtful! She left guidebooks of Montreal for both of us and even printed a map of Verdun with personal suggestions of her favorite cafes, shops, and attractions. A local's input is invaluable. We did visit a few of her favorite spots and were very pleased. Thank you, Laurence! 

As for the apartment itself, it was modern, bright, spacious, and very clean. The photos posted do in fact reflect the reality. I loved waking up to this calming space and coming home there after a day of sightseeing. It was truly a place where we could relax. 

The neighborhood was great, with many cafes and shops to explore on the main street (Wellington). For non-Quebec residents who are GoodLife members, you can use your membership to work out at Energie Cardio, which is a 10-min walk down the street. That was a nice bonus for me, since I was away from my regular gym for a whole week. The subway stop (A l'Eglise) was indeed just a minute's walk away. Sometimes, I traveled by myself, and I can assure you that I felt safe coming home at night all alone. 

One word of warning for those whose parallel parking is not up to snuff: parking can get tight on the street. I noticed this is typical of Montreal in general, not just this neighborhood. Start practicing now, folks!

Spectacular!! I can summarize it in one word... We loved it from the moment we arrived. Laurence (who speaks French, English and Spanish) had already made arrangements to make us feel at home, he had some things ready in the fridge, fruits, and a welcome sign, as well as a small crib for our 2-year-old son. He was very attentive to our concerns and advised us on good places to visit. He gave us some metro maps, the sector is excellent for newcomers (it has very economical stores and excellent multicultural restaurants), plus the metro is just one minute walk away. The house had absolutely everything we needed to prepare any meal, its appliances are in great condition as well as the whole interior. It was really difficult saying goodbye to Laurence's apartment, thank you again for everything...
We loved our visit to Verdun. It is a great neighborhood, with great bike trails. Laurence's condo is very pretty and cozy too.

We had a wonderful month in Laurence's apartment, which is as beautiful in person as it is on the photos. The apartment is modern, well-equipped and very bright. In addition to the private terrace, it also features a beautiful communal terrace on the roof. The location is very pleasant because the neighborhood is lively and it feels good to live there, but especially within walking distance of Saint Laurent. 

Laurence welcomed us very warmly and is very available.

We highly recommend this accommodation.

Samuel & Alexandra

The apartment was absolutely perfect for our month-long stay in Montreal. It had everything we could need and is steps away from the metro, connecting us to the rest of Montreal. Verdun is a charming neighborhood and was great for running in the morning right on the St. Lawrence. 

Laurence went above and beyond during our stay. She was incredibly communicative and very helpful, even with the littlest things.
Comfortable stay!

This is great, relatively modern one-bedroom unit, very clean and fully equipped in the Verdun neighborhood of Montreal. A couple minutes walk from the "de L'Eglise" metro stop and a Bixy bike share station. This is not a touristy neighborhood but more of a regular neighborhood for the Montrealais - and that is what I was looking for. Easy bike ride to a wonderful park and bike path along the St. Laurent river. The unit has everything you need for a nice stay in Montreal and the owner, Laurence, is very "sympathetic".

100% recommended, Laurence's department is exactly as the photos show and even better, fully equipped, functional, clean and modern. The welcome we received from Laurence was a pleasant surprise! Laurence has everything prepared to make you feel very comfortable. The apartment is located in a beautiful neighborhood full of cafes, restaurants, bars, and much more, just two blocks away from the metro and a couple of steps from the San Lorenzo River. Don't hesitate for a second, this place deserves an AAA rating.

This is a translation of the provided text into English, aiming to maintain the original meaning:

For those traveling to Montreal, I highly recommend this accommodation. While it's located slightly away from the city center in terms of Old Montreal, it offers a quiet residential feel with easy access to public transportation. The location is within walking distance to subway stations and most attractions are accessible within 30 minutes by subway, making it incredibly convenient. In fact, I found the neighborhood peaceful and comfortable.  The proximity to upscale stores and grocery stores adds to its convenience. The accommodation itself has no hidden features; there's a washing machine and dryer for easy laundry throughout your stay. The food options are diverse and plentiful. The house is spotless and the interior design is excellent. This was truly an exceptional accommodation, and I would definitely book it again if I ever return to Montreal!

Laurence's place is lovely! Nice and clean, big windows allow space to feel open and bright. All the amenities you need in the apartment. The location is close to the train into the city, about 30 minutes away. She responded promptly to any inquiries and was pleasant to work with. We enjoyed our stay!

This was my second time staying at Laurence's place. My 5-week-long stay was outstanding! The condo is very clean and modern, and had many amenities to make my stay very comfortable. Laurence is a very gracious host and she checked up on me periodically to make sure everything was in order. The location is great...Wellington Street has everything you require including grocery stores, restaurants and shops which are all a short walk away. Bus stops and a metro station are also nearby for easy access to explore everything Montreal has to offer. I highly recommend Laurence's condo to anyone looking for a beautiful place minutes from downtown Montreal. Thanks Laurence!
The host cancelled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Laurence's condo is absolutely amazing! Very spacious and stocked with everything you could possibly need. It's perfectly located by rue Wellington, which has bakeries, cafés, bookstores, pharmacies, and grocery stores. You don't even have to leave the area to have an authentic Montreal experience, but if you want to the de l’église and Verdun metro stations on the green line are within walking distance, and so are local bus routes. Cannot recommend this gem of a place enough!
The host cancelled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

My husband and I really enjoyed staying at Laurence’s condo. It feels very homey with all the personal touches – it's almost like staying in our own apartment! It is very clean and well-maintained. The facilities are complete, it has everything we need. She even stocked the fridge for us! Location-wise it’s perfect, just 2 minutes from the nearest metro station where we can go anywhere across Montreal. It has a nice balcony where we had a quiet dinner with a good bottle of wine. All in all it was a very enjoyable stay.

Laurence's condo is perfectly located close to public transit, shops, and restaurants. It is very clean and very well kept. Laurence was a prompt and helpful host. I would highly recommend her condo to anyone looking to head to Montreal. Thank you!

Laurence's apartment was great! She was super accommodating and responsive to inquiries. She checked in on us after the first day and left thoughtful touches like recommendations and food. The apartment is very convenient to the metro and everything you would need. She let us store our luggage when our flight was leaving after check-out time. The AC was a lifesaver during Montreal's heatwave! Highly recommend.

We loved our five-night stay in this clean and quiet little condo. The location was perfect, just steps to the metro in a cool neighborhood. 

Laurence was great! She was super organized and very thoughtful. She even provided a few things for breakfast or first morning which was really appreciated. 

After long days of sightseeing (during a heatwave), it was such a relief to walk in the doors of our air-conditioned home away from home. We’d definitely stay here again.  Merci beaucoup!

A wonderful stay!! If you're looking for somewhere outside the city but with easy access to everything, this is perfect! Just a short walk from the train station, markets, and so much more! Laurence has the best hospitality and was easy to contact, she even gave wonderful suggestions on places to eat and much more!
We had an incredible time in Verdun. The apartment was everything we hoped for. Thank you!

We booked through Airbnb for the first time this summer with Laurence's apartment and were pleasantly surprised beyond our expectations. 

Everything is described on the site (location, welcome, advice, cleanliness, hospitality, trustworthiness...) we give 5 stars without hesitation!!!

Philippe and Sylvia

We appreciated Laurence's thoughtfulness of providing breakfast for the first day. Her home was very comfortable and clean. Her condo was in a convenient location near a metro station, and the neighborhood had many stores and restaurants. Overall, we had a great stay and would definitely recommend and return in the future.

Great place! Laurence was a very informative host, we loved her space and the location. It was very bright and clean - great natural light and a lovely quiet balcony where we enjoyed lots of coffee.  The apartment comes with everything you need, is one block from the metro and just back less than half a block from Wellington St. which is full of life and shops. There was even a puppet festival and sidewalk sale while we were there. There are also great cycling and walking paths along the St. Laurence, just a block or so away. The only thing we'd note is we found the bed quite firm but we absolutely loved everything else.

Thanks Laurence for a great stay. We highly recommend staying here.
Very friendly host, charming place
So much better than I expected. Definitely one of the best Airbnb experiences in my life. Highly recommended!

Perfect stay at Laurence's! 
Ideal location, close to restaurants and the metro...
We highly recommend it!

Very well-located apartment. Close to the metro. Close to shops.  5 minutes from a park on the river bank. Very personal and cozy decoration. Sometimes even the organ music from the small church nearby. I would go back there with pleasure.
The host cancelled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great apartment in a luxurious downtown area.

This unit was everything as advertised. The location was spectacular - literally less than 5 minutes walk from Place d'Arms Metro station (orange line) and less than 10 minutes walk from Place d'Arts Metro station (green line). This made it so so easy to see different parts of the city via the Metro and our trip experience was definitely heightened by this. From midway up the building you have an amazing view of both Old Montreal and the Musée des Arts. The balcony is the perfect size for two people to sit and have their morning coffee. The unit was clean, the linens crisp and it was equipped with air conditioning, which was a welcome relief from the 32 degree Celsius weather outside. You have access to a gym, pool and terrace that also has a beautiful view. Mike's assistant Vincent was extremely patient with us after we arrived later than anticipated due to road construction. He gave us great tips about the city and the immediate vicinity which helped us plan our week. Overall, the location, stunning view and well laid-out unit made this trip a 10/10. We would definitely recommend Mike's Superior Condo to family and friends traveling to Montreal!

Beautiful place in the heart of downtown Montreal. It was our first time visiting and the location was perfect. We could walk to pretty much anything. The apartment was immaculate, the building was super nice, and the doormen were very friendly. The apartment was exactly as pictured, nothing more.

Great apartment. Central location, well-equipped, very comfortable. Would definitely recommend if you want something central in Montreal. The only downside was the lack of toilet paper, but it's easily fixable with a supermarket two blocks away!

The place was in a fabulous location, was extremely clean and well-kept. Overall, we had a very comfortable stay. However, we paid approximately $150 extra to add a third person to our reservation, but we did not receive an additional key nor did we get additional rolls of toilet paper when we asked Mike for more after we used our two provided rolls. It would have been nice to receive an extra key and a third roll of toilet paper for the extra $150 it cost to have a third person.
Mike's place is incredible. It is the perfect walking distance to really great shops and restaurants. Mike was very helpful and great with communication! We would definitely stay again!!

We really loved staying here. Everything was well-prepared and communicated by Mike. The apartment is as shown in the pictures, and points of interest in Montreal are nearby. The view of Old Town and the St. Lawrence River is fantastic. We would definitely go back there.

Location, location, location! 
Cozy condo in the heart of downtown Montreal! Great gym, pool! Super clean apartment, perfect for a couple and the pull-out couch is super comfy! I would definitely stay there on my next trip to Montreal! Perfection!

Amazing location and beautiful condo. We had everything we needed and were just a walk away from everything Montreal had to offer. The condo was super clean and the building offered some great amenities!
Great place to stay, with large windows and a nice view to the right. Very clean and spacious. It has a full set of utensils, pots, and pans for the kitchen. I would definitely stay here again.
Mike's place was great. We had some difficulties with check-in, but it was smooth sailing after. Good location, nice building, nice place.
Great location and everything! I love that apartment.
Amazing flat, best location and I really enjoyed the jacuzzi!
This place was amazing. We were able to see the Jazz Festival stage from our balcony. Right in the center of the city and everything around. Clean and welcoming.

Apartment enjoying a very beautiful view. 2 steps from the Place des Arts. Very central. The apartment is very comfortable and clean. Very precise instructions for arrival and departure. 

We will be back

Perfect location to enjoy the great city of Montreal.  But ask Mike if the apartment has been fixed and is ready to welcome guests. There are too many basic things that weren't in order when we stayed for 10 days in January 2019.
The apartment is really perfect, cozy, and well-situated at the same time! Pamela and her husband were fantastic hosts, really nice and accommodating, thank you again!
The reservation was cancelled 31 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

The apartment is very well located, close to everything and easily accessible by metro. This lovely place was ideal for our two weeks in Montreal. I highly recommend it! Thank you Pamela for your hospitality and it was a pleasure meeting you :)

First successful AirBnB experience!! Pamela is a very welcoming and patient host (she waited for me until my arrival at 10:30 PM). The apartment is in accordance with the description and it's very close to the Beaubien metro station and all amenities. Downtown is accessible in 15 minutes. Thank you again for this wonderful stay.
Pamela is a charming and very available host. The apartment as well as the neighborhood are pleasant, well-located, full of life. Pleasant stay, we will return.
Pamela is welcoming and available, with a charming presence.

We had an amazing time at Pamela's place, she welcomed us warmly and explained everything to us about the apartment and neighborhood. Super friendly and helpful, she made herself available to us by email or phone for any questions we had about anything. 

The apartment is big, very clean and super sunny :) Very comfortable bed. A grocery store and liquor store are at the corner, very close to Beaubien metro station, 2 blocks away from St Hubert shops, tons of restaurants and bars - the location is great - about 15 mins from downtown. We would definitely stay here again! Thank you Pamela and Fernando for your hospitality!

The apartment was just like in the pictures. The location was very good, close to the metro and downtown. We stayed 11 days. During that time, we experienced a lot of noise coming from the other apartments; we could hear everything happening downstairs in the owner's house. The oven was also so dirty it even started the fire alarm when we tried to preheat it. The bathroom also had visible mold on the ceiling. Pamela and her husband refused to give us the wifi password, forcing us to wait for them for every electronic device we had. The bed kept breaking. We had a lot of trouble reaching Pamela or her husband on the first day; however, when we did they were very nice and kind to us.

I stayed in the apartment for one night. It was a nice apartment. Everything was well-furnished and complete. Pamela welcomed me warmly and explained everything to me even though I was there only for one night. She was very flexible with the departure time. So, I recommend this apartment.

Pamela was an excellent host. She contacted us in advance to ensure we would either meet or have the entrance code for the door. That was so helpful because we were driving and couldn't say exactly when we'd arrive. The listing was accurate, and we were very pleased with the sweet little apartment. The neighborhood is residential and quiet, but has convenient shopping right around the corner. It was also convenient to be around the corner from a Metro stop. The mattress was fabulous! We had a wonderful time there.

I really enjoyed my space. The apartment was exactly as described and very clean. The bed is very comfortable. I was warmly welcomed by Pamela. The apartment is truly well-located and close to everything. I know the neighborhood well and highly recommend it. Thank you again!

Pamela and Fernando have been super with me and my family. They are very welcoming and understanding hosts. 

Thank you a thousand times.

Léa
Thanks Pamela for making our stay exceptionally comfortable. Your apartment had everything we needed and you guys were very helpful. We had a great time, and hope to return again someday!

Pamela was an excellent host, very friendly and always offered prompt and thorough responses. The place was clean and had great lighting. It is only rented out, not lived in, so it feels more like a hotel than someone's apartment. It's really close to the metro, the neighborhood is charming, and the best coffee in town is 10 minutes away at Odessa.
This place was clean, the hosts were friendly and reliable, the pictures were accurate, and overall it was a great experience.
Pamela and Fernando were excellent hosts. My girlfriend and I enjoyed their apartment and loved the neighborhood. We look forward to staying with them again.

Pamela and Fernando were wonderful hosts! They left us a binder full of maps and ideas to explore the city. They were there if we needed anything and made sure everything was perfect. The apartment was very cozy and perfect for us. We loved Montreal and staying at their place made the trip even more fabulous! We look forward to staying with them again in the future! Thank you guys! =)

We found our hosts Pamela & Fernando to be communicative, friendly and helpful- thank you! The apartment was as pictured and described, in a good location just a short walk from the metro with some nice cafes and a grocery store nearby. We had a very busy itinerary and only needed basic accommodations for sleeping and bathing and this apartment was a nice fit for us - a good price, a comfortable mattress and fairly close to where we needed to be. Thanks again!

I enjoyed a night at Pamela & Fernando's studio, a much-needed break for our family. It was truly wonderful! The space is perfect for individuals or couples and the apartment is bathed in natural light, which is very pleasant.  Additionally, the hosts are discreet and very welcoming. While not completely soundproof like most Montreal apartments, this is just a minor detail that Pamela & Fernando unfortunately can't control, so how could we hold it against them? The noisy neighbors should simply go to a hotel, after all! I would have loved to stay in the small apartment for a few more days!

Pamela and Fernando were amazing hosts, and were lovely enough to welcome my boyfriend and me into their home for an evening chat! They were very communicative, the apartment was delightful, just as shown in the pictures. The apartment was close to all amenities, and I will definitely be staying with them the next time I am back in Montreal. Thank you!

The apartment was excellent and even better than it looks in the photos! It was very private and pretty quiet. It was very easy to get to the metro and everything you need is within walking distance. Checking in was easy and straightforward, and Pamela made sure that we were enjoying ourselves and made herself available if we needed anything. If I ever get back to Montreal, I will definitely stay with Pamela and Fernando again!

We were very well received by Pamela herself. The apartment was perfect for two people, clean and well-equipped. Two blocks from the Beaubien metro station and near some excellent restaurants (Pâtes Bol!). We highly recommend it!

I had a short but wonderful stay here. The place is huge, clean, well-lit, and very conveniently located. Pamela sent me great instructions on getting there from the airport ($10 bus ride, and you can use the same ticket to transfer to the underground that takes you 3 blocks from the apartment). I especially enjoyed having Vietnamese pho a few blocks south of their apartment. Overall, an awesome experience.

I felt at home in this lovely apartment located near the metro station. The description on Airbnb matched what I found in the apartment which was very clean and very quiet. 

I promise to return as soon as possible for a longer stay because, I truly felt like I was home.

Thank you to Pamela and Fernando

The apartment was clean and spacious, as well as being closely located to two metro stations and in a nice neighborhood. 

Pamela and Fernando were really easy to communicate with. They checked in with us before and during our stay to make sure everything was going alright. 

I would definitely return for another stay in Montreal!

We greatly enjoyed our stay with Pamela and Fernando; the apartment matched the description perfectly. It was very clean, quiet, and had plenty of space to leave our belongings. Pamela answered our questions promptly and we were able to access it easily despite not having met our host.

Their residence with Pamela and Fernando was excellent and very pleasant. The apartment is in top condition. The location of the apartment is very convenient, being close to a supermarket and metro station. Pamela and Fernando are very welcoming hosts who made me feel welcome! I felt very comfortable there! Thank you so much, Pamela and Fernando, I hope to stay with you again!

Superb apartment, bright and airy. Very well equipped and very pleasant to live in. The neighborhood is very nice and there are plenty of shops nearby. A bit of a hassle finding parking but the adorable Pamela helped us find a spot to avoid getting fined ;) Very available and friendly hosts. Highly recommended!

My partner and I had a lovely stay here in early May 2015. Great apartment and neighborhood. Pamela and Fernando were so accommodating and made arriving at the apartment after a long haul flight so easy. Communication was excellent and we really couldn't fault this place.
The apartment is very bright and pleasant. It is well-located and Pamela is very kind. Thank you again for welcoming us into your home
Super apartment in peace. My parents were thrilled! Thanks Pamela;)
Apartment as described. Spacious and well-located near a metro station. Pamela is really nice. Recommend the apartment

Pamela and Fernando were very welcoming and friendly throughout our stay. The apartment is both cozy and in an excellent location. They provide appliances if you wish to cook in the apartment during your stay. Wonderful experience!

A memorable address for an excellent welcome in a neighborhood that may be a bit far from Berri-UQAM, but well served by public transportation. I had a fantastic stay at Dominic's who is warm, attentive and helpful. The room is super nice and the bed of very good quality. Honestly, I recommend this address! Thank you again, Dominic!
Super weekend spent with Dom and Phil, two very welcoming and warm friends who are ready to give you the best tips in Montreal. Thanks to you both!

It's my first trip to Montreal and I'm glad that Dominic and his roommate Philip hosted me! I have to thank Philip in particular for helping me check into their apartment when Dominic was away.  Having taken a Greyhound bus departing quite late from NYC and arrived just too early in Montreal, I was just dying for an early check-in to lay my head down. Philip made my bed and gave me many suggestions about the city as he could, sorry Philip, I know I let you get tongue-tied many times;) Dominic was also very nice and responsive. He handed me complementary blankets just in case I might catch a cold at night. As to public transportation, it was only 2 minutes walk to bus station 94/197, the former takes you to Station Frontenac on Green Line and the latter to Station Rosement on Orange (Website hidden by Airbnb) could always rely on STM to go to all the tourist sites, like the old port and Mont-Royal etc. There were also several grocery stores like IGA and restaurants and bars nearly. My room was spacious with a comfy bed! I should never forget to mention their lovely patio at the back, a nice spot to chill in summer! I highly recommend Dominic's place to you all!

The room is spacious and the apartment well-equipped, I felt like home! 
Dominic and Philippe are adorable and welcomed me and integrated me right away as their roommate. This will be a beautiful memory for me, thank you both!
Good place. Friendly host, willing to explain, the place is quiet despite having a few rooms for guests.

My husband and I spent three nights at Dominic's apartment, and it worked out beautifully. The apartment is well laid out, and the room is both clean and comfortable. There is a good amount of space and a desk for your belongings. The bed is of very high quality.  There are bus stops near the apartment, but we prefer to walk a lot and see the city and people, so we spent almost all our time on foot. Dominic and his roommate Philip are warm and gracious hosts who are most helpful. I would not hesitate in the least to return to this apartment on another trip back to Montreal. You will be pleased with this choice. Thank you!

Perfect Airbnb!
Dom is super cool, very sociable, in 5 minutes you will feel at home.
The neighborhood is easily accessible (metro 10 min walk, or the bus just downstairs), a supermarket is located right across the building.

If you're a hockey fan, this is the place for you!

We had a wonderful stay with Dominic. We found him warm and engaging, and very helpful regarding information about getting around the city. His space was clean and comfortable. The area has cute restaurants, lots of greenery. We rented the bixi bikes which were a short walk from Dominic's and had a great time getting to know the city that way. Highly recommend and hope to return.

Dominic was very welcoming. The apartment is spacious and pleasant (with a beautiful terrace for lunch in the sun!). Everything has been done to make my stay enjoyable. It also allowed me to discover a neighborhood I didn't know!
Best of the best!

Totally recommended, super market and bus station that takes you directly to the metro all within a block radius. The place is safe, the apartment clean and pleasant. Dom and Phil are super nice and friendly, relaxed, and willing to answer any questions you have.

Staying at Dominic's place was great! The place is super clean and the room awesome. There's enough space for everything and it's really cozy. Especially the big window is a big plus! Sometimes the apartment can be very busy as Dominic and Phil like to invite friends over. But if you're looking for a nice chat or want to get to know new people, then you shouldn't have a problem. However, if you need to go to bed early or want to work, it might be a bit too busy sometimes. Dominic is a great communicator and a lot of fun. You will feel welcome in the apartment as it's cozy and everything is there (big kitchen, shampoo etc.). The best access to public transit is the 197 to Station Rosemont or the 94 to Station Frontenac. I would definitely stay again at the place!
Dominic is a really nice host! I had a great time there. The location is perfect. I would definitely book this room again next time!

This place is very convenient for getting anywhere, and Dominic is very kind and friendly. My English is poor but he spoke to me. The room I stayed in was big and cozy. I spent time comfortably:) 

Dominic and his roommate live here, and he has more than two rooms for guests. So you might meet new people in the morning.
Excellent stay.

A month and a half of perfect stay! The apartment is cozy, the terrace is very pleasant. The neighborhood is cute, residential, 2 buses lead to the metro. I was very well received by Dominic and Phil. I highly recommend them, they are attentive, friendly and very funny. It's thanks to them that I felt at home in Montreal as soon as I arrived! Thank you!

I had such a nice stay! Everyone was so lovely, Dominic had great hospitality and really helped me out with a few things. The room was a really good size and the bed was comfy. Couldn't recommend it enough - loved every second of staying here... didn't want to leave!

Dominic's place is a very nice, clean, and affordable space to stay in Montreal. The apartment is located in a very nice, tree-lined neighborhood with supermarkets, restaurants, a park, and other amenities nearby. The bus stop to connect you to the metro is only half a block away and the metro station is only about a ten-minute bus ride away. Once you hop onto the metro, the center of the city of Montreal is only about five stops away.

The apartment is very clean and simply decorated (if you are the "Bells and Whistles" type of person, you won't like it as much as I did). The room is a very nice sizable room with a big window. The only drawback is that the window opens to a Boulevard and there is no escaping the outside noise whether from street traffic passing through or otherwise (if you are a light sleeper, beware of that fact and be prepared to get awakened by noise in the early hours of the morning). 

The host Dominic is very nice, very welcoming, easy going, hospitable beyond delight, and, above all, super accommodating. He gave me access to everything in the kitchen, the living room, the back patio, and the bathroom. I really enjoyed my stay at Dominic's apartment and I highly recommend it to any travelers passing through Montreal (whether it's for a short stay or a long haul) DOMINIC WAS A FANTASTIC HOST..........!!!
Dominicains welcomed us very warmly, we felt very quickly at ease as if at home. An address I recommend. A nice encounter even if a bit brief... (we only stayed for two nights)
Dominic was very friendly. We felt like we were at home. Thank you for your stay with us!

Dominic and his staff are very welcoming and readily available, whether in person or by phone. 
The apartment is spacious and the terrace is super nice.
The neighborhood is admittedly a bit secluded but very pleasant with everything nearby and quiet.
My stay at Dom's was very good, Dom and Phil were very welcoming and helped me with my various administrative tasks upon my arrival in Montreal, I recommend this accommodation!
Very welcoming to newcomers, spending a month in their home was better than I expected having just moved to the city. Right next to multiple bus stops and grocery stores/restaurants

I stayed with Dominic and Phil for 3 months and 15 days. Dominic and Phil, along with Phil's girlfriend, were very easygoing and easy to get along with. As a bartender, I would sleep at awkward times of the day, and everyone respected my sleep hours and kept quiet. The place was always kept clean. The room was a comfortable size, and I spent a lot of time there but always felt welcome to sit and watch TV as a group or alone. They gave me my own dry space and fridge space to keep my food, and they had all the necessary utensils and pots for cooking. Also, you don't hear any neighbors upstairs or downstairs, so I always slept comfortably and well.
The host cancelled this reservation 48 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

It has been a very pleasant stay. In an apartment with all the services and in a very interesting neighborhood. Perfect hostess. If I go back to Montreal, I will go back to Faustine's house. Thank you for everything.

Our stay was very pleasant, the apartment was clean and in perfect condition. Bedding and furniture were brand new! 
Brigitte was always present if we needed her, with great kindness.
A big thank you to you Brigitte for making sure our stay went as well as possible.

We had a pleasant stay. 
The apartment is very nice, spacious, convenient and beautifully decorated.
Brigitte's welcome was very warm and she was very attentive.
We were able to park our rental car easily (and for free) in Saint Clement street.
We will definitely return without hesitation.
David and his family
Very nice flat and very clean. A few bars and restaurants nearby, though a bit far from the city center.
The apartment is very warm, practical and spacious! The host is very welcoming and available, we had a wonderful vacation with our children!

This place is a gem! The apartment is bright and clean, with two good-sized bedrooms. We loved sitting on the balcony in the mornings and enjoyed the quiet neighborhood. Brigitte made us feel welcome and even provided snacks and coffee. Public transportation is close as well as a grocery store. I highly recommend this place.

Brigitte's accommodation exactly matches the photos, it is a clean and spacious place. Brigitte is an excellent host who is always present in case of problems, very friendly and attentive. We stayed for 3 weeks with 4 people and we loved our trip, we recommend this apartment 100%!

This is a great place to stay. I stayed with my girlfriend and her 3-year-old daughter. There was plenty of space and it was secure. The whole apartment was very clean, and Brigitte had bought us food for breakfast upon our arrival. Communication was excellent at every stage. There's a Smart TV which is amazing if you want to relax! There are plenty of parks, grocery stores, and some fantastic local cafes. On-street parking is available near the apartment. Overall, this is a great place to stay and can be booked with confidence! Thank you!

A beautiful apartment in a great location in Montreal! Communication with Brigitte was already very good and intense beforehand - so we were well prepared for the days in Montreal and staying at Brigitte's apartment. The apartment itself was incredibly beautifully furnished, clean, and it lacked nothing - right down to coffee, tea, fruit, pastries, and croissants. A tip: We rented bikes through (Website hidden by Airbnb) and found a good alternative and complement to the metro and buses. There are several bike stations in direct proximity to Brigitte's apartment. 

Thank you to Brigitte - a great apartment: 10 out of 10 stars! :-)
Very pleasant accommodation, very clean, bright, with a nice decoration. Brigitte is a caring and attentive host who takes care of the well-being of her guests.
This place is beautiful! Conveniently located near the old port of Montreal and highways. Brigitte was an outstanding host and I highly recommend staying here.

The apartment is as beautiful as the photos and functional. Brigitte is an exceptional host: available and attentive. She took great care of us. The accommodation is a bit out of the city center, but this doesn't pose any problems since bus number 34 passes regularly.

Very nice apartment, spacious rooms, comfortable kitchen and living room. Brigitte spoiled us upon our arrival: everything we needed for breakfast and dinner. Really very appreciable. There is a good restaurant nearby as well as convenience stores. It takes about 10 minutes by car to reach the city center, and 30 minutes by bus. Parking is easy near the apartment.
Very good accommodation, not far from the city center, metro and bus are available in the neighborhood.  Excellent reception by Brigitte, always attentive to our needs.
My stay was quite pleasant and with a very good attitude from the host.
Very comfortable accommodation with everything you need for a wonderful stay.
Great place, very clean and roomy. Couldn't have asked for anything better
The apartment was beautiful, we had a great stay!
An excellent place! Clean and with all the comforts of a home. The host is incredibly kind and always attentive.
Clean and nice, close to grocery stores and restaurants.

Translation:  "Brigitte's place was excellent! The apartment is very spacious and comfortable. We are located a 10-minute bus ride from the botanical garden, which is an exceptional site due to its size and beauty. We haven't met Brigitte yet, but she has been very responsive and accommodating. The apartment is spotless and decorated with great taste. The Hochelaga neighborhood is a disadvantaged area, but we still feel good there. We highly recommend this place."
The host cancelled this reservation 123 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Beautiful clean bright apartment, as advertised.

Marie's place was perfect.
We visited there with our friends and had a great time. Transportation was convenient, and we could easily go to many bars or restaurants nearby. 
The place was so beautiful and clean; I really liked it.
nan
Super apartment and very accommodating host! I recommend

Superb refuge where you can put your luggage for a short trip to Montreal. Everything was easy, including parking. Very well located. Thanks to Marie who suggested several interesting places to go out!

Wonderful apartment as advertised. Marie is a great host. Thanks Marie!

Our stay took place during a particularly cold winter week, but we were plenty warm. 

We were comfortable and appreciated the proximity to a number of good restaurants, cafés, and bars. Check out nearby Dispatch for coffee and Fieldstone for brunch.
I loved living with Marie! The super beautiful condo was clean and well-located. Marie was really accommodating :)
Marie's place was exactly as described, a cute apartment with plenty of space in a nice neighborhood. I would recommend her place to anyone! Thanks Marie!

The place matched the description on the listing. It's within walking distance of a metro station, and the market (Marché) is nearby as well, perfect for getting fresh groceries. I highly recommend staying here.

Excellent location and apartment! It was well decorated and the photos truly displayed what it looked like. It was beautifully renovated and the bathroom was great. We really appreciated the quick communication from Marie. Since it is located on a busy street, it can be quite loud. There are great little coffee shops and restaurants all around. Overall good experience, would recommend.
Excellent

Marie's place is unbeatable when it comes to location! Right smack dab in the middle of amazing dining, shopping, and grocery stores. Her apartment has great energy, is adorable, and has a deck perfect for you to ease into your day. Check-in and check-out was a breeze, and Marie was very responsive to our few texts.

Super nice place. We spent four nights there as a family (couple with two 7 and 10 year old kids). The apartment is a 30 minute drive from the old port and its museums by bus (same thing by subway but honestly, people are more cheerful on the bus). It's located above a superb Italian grocery store, and within less than 10 minutes of Jean-Talon market and Jarry Park (pool, sports field). There are also several small parks with water playgrounds and outdoor cinema. And there is plenty of good food! We really enjoyed it!
Marie is one of the best hosts, easy to communicate with and friendly. Her apartment is in the best location, very clean and cozy. I wish to return soon!
This space is exactly as described. Great location and neighborhood, close to the metro, it was an excellent place to stay. Well-deserved 5 star reviews.
Great place. Excellent location.
Marie's place was very cute and stylish. She gave us awesome tips and was very quick to respond to our requests.
Nice. Spacious, excellent location above a lovely supermarket: a little noisy due to construction

So where should I start...

First of all, Tanguy & Uriel really took good care of us. From the booking date to the day trip, they were making sure we got all the information needed (my wife and I) to get to their place with minimal trouble. 

Secondly, during the time we spent there (it was only one night, but I would stay longer if I could), they were also really pleasant, welcoming, and easygoing hosts. 

I highly recommend their places and thank them for making our stay so great. 

Lastly, the location of the house, in my opinion is pretty good. Near both downtown and the highway (we were coming from Quebec), so easy to get in from Highway 20 and to leave too, avoiding all the traffic jams. 

Big up dudes!

Tanguy and Uriel are a lovely welcoming family. They knew what time we were arriving and were waiting on the front steps to show us the beautiful newly renovated full apartment. You open the door and it just smells clean. Uriel has a special touch in design and he has done a great job with this apartment. The place has one bedroom and two convertible sofas in the living room, cable TV and Netflix are bonuses. There was coffee, tea, and cold drinks in the fridge. From preparing for the trip to the post-departure, they have been very attentive and responded quickly. We highly recommend this accommodation. You will find yourself well taken care of with plenty of space to enjoy your travels; unfortunately we didn't have the opportunity to enjoy the lovely backyard as we spent all day long visiting the city. 

Enjoy your stay with Tanguy and Uriel!

I had a wonderful stay at Tanguy & Uriel's place. It was a short distance to bus stops and the Metro station. And as a young woman, I felt very safe in the neighborhood at night. 

They were great hosts and let me check in almost six hours early to accommodate my schedule and flight time. 

I cooked in the kitchen and it had everything I needed. Everything was as pictured and the bed was comfortable. There are two couches in the living room that fold out and make comfortable beds as well.

Had a great stay!! Thanks again.

We really enjoyed our stay!!! Tanguy and Uriel are very kind and friendly hosts. They took care of all of our needs and were easy to contact at any time.  The apartment is in the basement and although not air conditioned, we were very comfortable at the end of June.  There is a tower fan available which we did not need to use.  The place is stylishly decorated.  The bed was very comfortable. The kitchen is well equipped.  Everything worked well. There are also two modern design couches which could become beds.  Very clean apartment.  High-end rain shower with plenty of hot water.   A lovely little patio where we enjoyed a couple of our meals. Subway and grocery store just a few minutes away.   All in all, a delight.

This place is beautiful - and in such a charming classic neighborhood. It is fully renovated tastefully and what a great place to call home away from home in Montreal! It is centrally located, very close to the Vieux-Port and the historic neighborhoods along the St Lawrence River and all the other action the city has to offer. It's the best of both worlds, getting to experience a quiet neighborhood while being so close to the city! Definitely recommend this spot! Tanguy and Uriel are wonderful hosts.
The place was great and clean. The restroom was very nice, affordable for the great area of Montreal, 10 minutes away from downtown. I would definitely stay again, thank you for everything!

Oh my goodness. If you're going to Montreal, stay here! My boyfriend and I stopped by for a fabulous respite mid a month long road trip. The apartment itself is beautiful, and Tanguy and Uriel were the best hosts! They were so flexible and helpful. We loved staying with them and will be back again in the future!

Perfect location for anyone wanting easy access to everything the city has to offer. It's no more than a 5-minute walk to the grocery store and no more than 10 minutes to the nearest metro line, perfect for a weekend getaway in Montreal!

Tanguy and Uriel are nothing but gracious hosts who want to make sure you have the best experience on your trip, one of the best trips I've had in a while.
Great communication, nice apartment!

Fantastic location and great hosts. Everything was as advertised, would not hesitate to come back again in the future!

The apartment itself is fantastic and has everything you would need during your stay. Very clean and modern.
This place is the best. Clean, well-equipped, and with beautiful decor. It's about a 10-minute walk to two Metro stations. Perfect for a couple with a young child, like us. Can't recommend enough!
Very nice apartment. Nice little terrace. Very comfortable. Easy contact with the owners

The apartment and the services offered are consistent with what you see in the photos.

Uriel is available and always happy to give advice to ensure your stay is perfect! 
The neighborhood is quiet, with parks, gardens, and water features located nearby the apartment. Shops are a 5-minute walk away. 
We had an excellent family stay (4 people with a baby).
We already know our address when we return to Montreal.
We were unable to meet with Tanguy & Uriel, however they were available by email and phone to advise us on what to see and do, as well as events. The apartment is nice and functional.

Very friendly and available host, impeccable spacious accommodation with a very nice bathroom (Italian shower) and well-equipped (iron and ironing board...), conveniently located 5/10 minutes from a metro station. Quiet neighborhood with relatively easy parking (which is quite complicated in Montreal), pleasant little terrace if the weather permits. 
We wouldn't hesitate to recommend Uriel and we will definitely return there with pleasure.
Absolutely lovely place. Tanguy and Uriel were considerate and very helpful. The location was great, and the apartment had everything we needed and more! Highly recommended.
We had a wonderful time! Communication with Uriel and Tanguy was excellent throughout our entire stay. The apartment is beautiful; well-equipped, clean, spacious, and has access to the garden.

Very warm and welcoming host recommends this address highly. 
Spacious and functional apartment.
Very well-located in relation to downtown Montreal.

The first thing that led us to choose the place was not having to worry about unexpected cancellations of our stay, as the hosts have the location exclusively for rental.

We really enjoyed the accommodation, a pleasant, clean and well-located place with a market, pharmacy and metro/bus stops very close by. 

The hosts were very polite and friendly and always (Website hidden by Airbnb)  we will definitely be back!!!
Tanguy and Uriel, thank you so much for your attention!

Very good welcome from Uriel! The places are recent, modern and fully equipped which is fantastic! Moreover, everything is nearby, weather, supermarket, city center etc... Uriel will advise you on possible outings!  It's worth noting that the street is free for parking all week except from 12pm to 1pm on Monday, which is great for Montreal! I highly recommend it!
They were wonderful hosts who gave us lots of helpful tips. I would definitely choose this clean apartment again. Thanks for the great time!

Tanguy and Uriel are truly very welcoming, they are always available to give good advice, good plans... the housing is super, we really feel like home. The metro is 10 minutes away on foot and is really practical, I highly recommend this housing for a stay in Montreal! Thanks to you both!

This is a great ground floor apartment with convenient access to buses and two metro stops, with many cool places within walking distance. They live right above if you need anything and offered really good dining options when we first arrived. Tanguy and Uriel were super communicative. The bathroom and kitchen are very pretty and the shower was amazing after a long day of trekking around the city. We loved it! Thank you!

A very clean and accessible place to stay. Perfect for up to four people. About a 10-minute walk to the STM train, and a 5-minute walk to the STM bus. $7-9 CAD Uber to La Banquise (best poutine in town!) which is on a main street with several shops. Lots of street parking. Had the privilege of running into Tanguy, Uriel, and their adorable kiddos. Awesome hosts and family, would definitely stay here again!

Tanguy and Uriel were lovely hosts. They accommodated our large group and provided extra items such as blankets and pillows even though we didn't request them. The place was clean, modern, and bigger than we expected. The area was quiet and a quick drive to all of the places we wanted to visit for my guests. 10 star rating! Merci Beaucoup!
Very cool apartment!!! Very nice hospitable hosts!! Easy walk to the train.
We were very well received by Tanguy and Uriel. Their apartment, pleasant, quiet, spacious and well-equipped, is easy to access and close to public transportation. A highly recommended address.
We loved it!

Uriel and Tanguy's place was wonderful, exceeding all expectations! Everything was clean, linens and kitchen were well stocked, and there was plenty of room for three friends. The only minor negative was that it is not downtown, but is about a seven-minute walk to an easy-to-navigate metro. However, it is very close to the biodome and Olympic stadium, and driving (another pro: not having to pay to park downtown, as street parking is easy at their place) is only about six minutes. What really pushed the experience over the top was the great communication skills of the host: they were super responsive before and during our stay, and it was made clear they were there if we needed anything while still respecting everyone's privacy. They were also very accommodating that one of our guests was arriving early, and even let us know when the room was ready! A great level of kindness, and a great host. Would definitely stay at their apartment again next time I'm in Montreal
Very good reception. Very beautiful apartment, beautiful decoration and very clean! I recommend it for a stay in Montreal.

The place was perfect, super roomy and complete with various extra amenities. Tanguy & Uriel stocked this apartment so well, I️ was in disbelief we paid so little for it. They were extremely kind, even helping a member of my group print out his bus ticket. We ended up using Uber to go downtown a lot, which was a quick 10-15 minute car ride. The price for this place caught our eyes but the apartment exceeded our expectations greatly. Best Airbnb I’ve stayed at so far! Thanks Tanguy&Uriel

Clean, spacious with temperature control in the bedroom, kitchen, living room, bathroom, and kitchen. 

We were always able to find street parking.

Cannot comment on location as we had a car.

This was the perfect choice for our family to visit Montreal! The hosts were very helpful and available. We had just enough space and everything we needed - especially with young children. Thank you again!

Overall, a good value for the price! Things were clean and the house is really close to a subway station. Because there are parking spaces nearby, it's a great place for any travelers. The only thing that was somewhat of a challenge was that we heard a lot of noise coming from the neighborhood, but aside from that, it was a good stay!

"Top accommodation. The description accurately reflects reality. It was very clean and had everything we needed (shower gel, dish soap, tea, salt, pepper...).  The location is excellent, close to the city center without the downsides of the city center (noise and traffic). We also had no trouble communicating with our guests. A big thank you to them."
Beautiful clean apartment well-equipped in a great location close to the metro, quiet. Thank you to Guy and Uriel for their hospitality. You won't be disappointed, don't hesitate!
Thanks for everything. Loved staying at Uriel's & Tanguy's. We had nice conversations and a very warm welcome. I would definitely recommend anyone to stay there.

Tanguy and Uriel were so helpful, they responded to our questions super fast and gave us a lot of tips. The place is located 6 minutes away from the subway and it took us around 15 minutes to get to Old Montreal. Their place was very cozy and clean. I highly recommend staying here.

Tanguy and Uriel are really very nice people. The apartment is furnished with a lot of taste.  The decor is ultra modern and functional. We enjoyed Netflix during our cozy evenings. We were within 5 minutes walking distance to a supermarket and grocery store. 

Go for it, you won't be disappointed.
Excellent host! The accommodation is well-equipped and in a very convenient location (close to shops and the metro). Highly recommendable.

Great location and cute apartment! Parking was a little challenging due to the snow, but overall our stay was great! They were quick to offer suggestions on things to do and places to go! Definitely would come back!
Pleasant stay at Tanguy and Uriel's place, very friendly and responsive. The apartment is pleasant, well-equipped, close to all amenities. Ideally located. I highly recommend!
They were very nice and sociable people. Very nice place to stay!

The location is beautiful and is in a perfect location—within walking distance from several restaurants, and quite close to hot spots like the Underground City and St. Catherine. The apartment was perfectly clean and Tanguy & Uriel left a very nice and helpful guide to the area. The hosts were very accommodating and recommended some wonderful restaurants, including Régine Café, which was the best brunch I have ever had. The kitchen was stocked with some essentials as well, which was wonderful! Quiet, beautiful location with wonderful hosts. Can't wait to stay again!
Not the place for a quiet, restful retreat.

Tanguay and Uriel were very welcome and happy to have us stay for the weekend. They were both very eager to let us know what to do around the great city of Montreal. The home was very clean and smelled good when we arrived. Overall, it was a great experience for the price.

Clean and well-located apartment
Tanguy and Uriel are very warm.
Value for money, nothing to complain about
If you're passing through Montreal, stay with Tanguy and Uriel

Tanguy and Uriel's apartment was so lovely. Easy to get to via the metro and/or buses, cozy and accommodating for cold, stay-in nights. 

They were very understanding with the varying times that our group arrived and departed and had countless suggestions on all the places we could enjoy in Montreal. 

Great hosts!
Comfortable and pleasant living

The apartment is spacious, well-arranged and very well equipped (the shower is particularly top). It's also very well located, close to 2 metro stations (5 minutes walk) and we were able to park in the street in front of the apartment without any fees during our stay. Tanguy and Uriel's welcome was also very warm and they were available and responsive whenever we needed them, providing us with valuable advice and information. Finally, the quality/price/location ratio is simply unbeatable in Montreal. We recommend it and will definitely return!
Tanguy and Uriel were model hosts - so kind and helpful! Their place is close to the metro, and easy to get around. Free street parking is an added perk! We look forward to future stays with them!

As a college student on spring break, my friends and I had such an amazing time and we absolutely loved the apartment. Tanguy and Uriel are very responsive and helpful with things to do and questions we asked, thoughtful of the space we stayed in and providing amenities we didn’t think of for our trip, and very sweet overall checking in and making sure everything is okay. Highly suggest staying with them if you’re thinking about Montréal!
The house was in a fantastic location, and the hosts were incredibly hospitable and met all of our needs. It was also extremely clean and stylish. I couldn't have asked for a better stay

If you want an inexpensive place to stay outside of the city, this is an ideal Airbnb. We decided to Uber most days, but there is a train station nearby, as well as a grocery store and a Domino's. The space is comfortable and private, plus the host took the time to check in with us and recommend some great places. Would definitely recommend this Airbnb for small groups (ideally between 1-3 people: 1 bed and 2 sofa beds).

Tanguy and Uriel's space is so livable - everything from the location to the bathroom with the waterfall showerhead was great! Tanguy and Uriel themselves are also such warm people, always happy to offer recommendations and very quick to respond to messages. I’d highly recommend staying here!

We had a wonderful stay at Tanguy&Uriel's place in Montreal. The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood just a few minutes walk from Frontenac metro station (the green line takes you straight downtown). There is also a decent supermarket and a great Polish bakery nearby - perfect for stopping by on your way home from the city. The apartment was really clean, with a fully equipped kitchen, comfy bed, and nice bathroom. We also appreciated the great sightseeing suggestions from the hosts - they are friendly, welcoming, and very responsive to messages. I would totally recommend this place to everyone! Thank you for having us!

The apartment is incredible. Spacious, clean, modern, complete, and welcoming. Excellent. The neighborhood is quiet and has free parking nearby. Very well connected by metro and bus to downtown Montreal. But the most important thing is the host, she was simply amazing. I recommend it, she helped us, was attentive to the weather and left umbrellas at the door. And most importantly, when my daughter got sick, she helped us solve the problem. I wouldn't hesitate a minute to return to Tanguy's house. 100% recommended. Thank you for your hospitality!
Very nice apartment of very welcoming people who give good advice and recommendations.
