For a stay in Montreal, we recommend this address where Tanguy and Uriel will be at your disposal to answer your requests for information, orientation, and above all, you'll appreciate the good addresses of the restaurants. 

Family Gaudin

The apartment is kept in excellent condition, finished with care, clean and perfectly equipped. Tanguy and Uriel are kind and attentive. If you go to Montreal, this apartment is something you have to try!!!

Beautiful little apartment for working individuals or couples seeking a getaway. 

Cleanliness and attention to detail are readily apparent. Would definitely stay again
Clean and comfortable accommodation. Well-located, less than 10 minutes from the metro. Tanguy is very friendly. I highly recommend it without hesitation
The stay was to our full satisfaction. The host is very helpful!

The space looked exactly like the photos on Airbnb. The space easily accommodated 4 people with 2 on the bed, and 2 pull-out futon couches. The hosts were very friendly, approachable, and knowledgeable of the area. I was pleasantly surprised when I checked in and saw bottles of water, snacks, and candy on the table. Easy street parking and very close to many restaurants.
We really love the apartment! The location is great! It's close to the city center and metro, with a supermarket nearby. For a couple, it's an excellent place!

Wow! What a joy to return to a clean, beautifully decorated apartment that smells amazing!

The apartment is located 650m from the nearest metro station. If you have a car, you can park on the street in front of the apartment for free. The apartment is located on the ground floor, beautifully decorated, cozy and extremely well-equipped! Washing machine, fully equipped kitchen, BBQ in the garden, excellent bedding, Netflix, wifi and more...

Tanguy and Uriel are very friendly hosts and will not hesitate to give you good addresses. 

Several supermarkets and fast food restaurants are nearby. 

If we have to return to Montreal, you'll come back to them!

Tanguy and Uriel are wonderful hosts. They are always attentive and provide great support. We can count on them! The accommodation is very beautiful and spotless, the bed is more than comfortable, and everything you need is in the closets; at worst, you just have to go to the nearby shops. You will be really happy staying here!!

The place was so nice! We had such a lovely time! Great for our first time ever using Airbnb and our first time in Montreal! Our host helped us out so much with tips and such and responded so quickly! We had such a great experience!

What lovely people and what a great place to stay! Montreal is a beautiful city, but can be hectic so it was great to walk into Tanguy and Uriel's place at the end of the day and feel comfortable. It had everything we needed and Netflix was a bonus! We were able to park our car, but also were close enough to walk to public transport and a grocery store. We had a wonderful chat with them on the front lawn on the night of our arrival and it was actually a highlight of our stay. Would definitely recommend and would stay again :)
Very well-located cozy house. Very close to public transportation and highly practical for traveling with infants as well.
Amazing apartment with everything you need for your trip - friendly hosts and close to the shops. Great place to stay when visiting such a nice city.
Tanguy and Uriel are very pleasant people and the Airbnb was lovely and clean. Highly recommend.

We had a fantastic time in Montreal at Tanguy and Uriel's place. They are very welcoming, available and good advice. The accommodation is modern, very clean and well-equipped and the little terrace at the back is also very nice. Highly recommend without hesitation!

A very good welcome, a super host, very Francophone, which is pleasant and interesting in his explanations about the good life of Montreal.  Everything is present in the apartment, the location is very correct, not far from the metro, at a reasonable budget.

The apartment had all the amenities we needed for a pleasant stay. The apartment is in a quiet neighborhood with tons of character and charm! Easy street parking and proximity to the green line metro were a plus. Tanguy and Uriel were very responsive and super helpful. They gave us great local recommendations and were around to answer any questions. We definitely will be back to visit Montréal soon!

Tanguy and Uriel's place was perfect for our 4-day stay in Montreal. They were so easy to get in touch with and offered suggestions for local activities as well as set up thoughtful extras like a pack and play and booster seat for our 1-year-old. Metro, park, and grocery store are an easy walk, and the neighborhood is quiet with easy street parking. We very much enjoyed our stay.

Super stay in Montreal, Tanguy was very welcoming and helpful.
We only regret the quality of the sofa beds for sleeping but this did not change our enthusiasm and the quality of the apartment and the welcome.

We greatly enjoyed our stay in Tanguy and Uriel's apartment.
The apartment is well-located with a supermarket and a playground nearby. 
The decor is very nice, the bathroom too, and the bedding comfortable.
Everything is very clean and matches the photos.
Tanguy and his family are very friendly and full of good advice. 
I particularly recommend this apartment if you're traveling with children! We would definitely go back without hesitation!
Aline, Philipp, Marion and Tiphaine
Very friendly and available hosts. We particularly appreciated the simplicity of communication and the quality of the welcome.
Perfect accommodation to start exploring the city. The hosts are kind and helpful, the apartment is clean and well-equipped. Plus, parking is available on the quiet street with no issues.
Go ahead and close your eyes!

A real Airbnb experience!!

Staying at Uriel's house was excellent. Firstly, we were greeted by the host who is always smiling and available. Tanguy and Uriel are wonderful people, thanks for everything! As for the apartment, I just got compliments. It was all very comfortable, easy to park and the garden is an extra plus!!! The kids loved playing in the garden of the house. I can not forget to mention that the location is also very good. Anyway, it is really a five-star Airbnb experience.

The neighborhood is very nice and well-connected to public transportation.  Close to the apartment are several restaurants, bars, and grocery stores. The host provided very useful information about the city and public transportation for reaching downtown. The apartment was clean and pretty.
Good place to live
Very welcoming hosts, perfectly clean accommodation. We had a good stay in Montreal.

Tanguy and Uriel's place was amazing, we had towels, extra linens and all the necessities. They were very quick to respond when we had questions, we definitely recommend and will stay again if/when in Montreal!

We had a pleasant stay in a wonderful location. The accommodation was close to the metro, making it easy to access the city center. The accommodation itself was comfortable and the hosts were present and available to answer any questions.

Pleasant and comfortable accommodation! We were greeted with some sweet and savory treats upon arrival, which was always appreciated. The apartment is spacious and very well-arranged. Check-in and check-out were very simple. We had to cancel a night of our stay due to organizational reasons and they immediately accepted. We are still grateful for their understanding; it's the definition of good hospitality. Very well equipped, quiet. It may be a bit far from city centers but transportation is easily accessible. We highly recommend!

Super welcome and apartment tour! Tanguy is available if you have any questions! The apartment is nice, as per the photos, only minor drawbacks: the bathroom wasn't very clean and the apartment isn't insulated so we were disturbed by noise from above. Otherwise, we had a good stay in Montreal!

We loved staying at Tanguy and Uriel's place. We felt very welcome and appreciated the extra treats such as bottled water, crackers and lollies. The folder of suggestions and brochures was also very useful. We were traveling with our adult daughter and found the cottage to be very spacious. We were traveling without a car, but found we could either catch the metro or walk to where we needed to go. I would not hesitate to recommend this place.
Super recommended and absolutely reliable. I can highly recommend it!
Tanguy and Uriel are fantastic hosts! The place is beautiful and super spacious. If anyone is looking for a place to stay, this is definitely one of the best!

Tanguy and Uriel are amazing hosts! Whenever we had a question or needed something they responded immediately. They reached out to us well in advance of the trip, so we were sure that everything would work out perfectly once we arrived. The place is clean and comfortable with lots of space. Public transport is close and easy to figure out, thanks for your hospitality!
Functional and well-located housing in a quiet, but dark and somewhat poorly soundproofed street.

This is in a good location close to grocery stores and less than 10 minutes from two Metro stations. On-street parking is available and it was easy to find a spot nearby. Tanguy and Uriel are very quick to respond and helpful in giving suggestions for things to do while visiting the city.

The mattress is quite firm, so if you're used to a soft mattress, you may have an uncomfortable sleep.

I was warmly welcomed by Tanguy and Uriel upon my arrival. They are very friendly and offered me suggestions for places to visit in Montreal. The apartment is spacious, beautifully decorated, and very clean. I fell in love with the bathroom which is top-notch!!! 

I highly recommend it without any hesitation.
I had a really great stay, the hosts were incredibly welcoming. The apartment is fantastic and comfortable. I highly recommend it.

Very helpful and responsive hosts. They went out of their way to get us a taxi to take us to the airport. Only downside was the quality of the sofa bed. Otherwise, everything else was perfect and as advertised.

An amazing stay!! Tanguy & Uriel were amazing hosts and answered very quickly if/when we had questions/needed anything. The place is SO cute (I would live there)! 

It has all the amenities (dishes, pots, pans, utensils, towels, linens, extra pillows, everything). They suggest using the mattress in the closet for sleeping on the couches, and I agree! There are two futons + a bed. Futons you always feel the pipe in the middle, w the mattresses’ you don't!

I would recommend this place to anyone!!!!

Modern apartment, clean and functional with all necessary amenities. The property is immaculately clean and close to public transportation and supermarkets. 

Tanguy and Uriel are attentive, readily available, quick to respond, and have a sense of sharing; they were incredibly helpful from the booking to the end of our stay.  Little touches upon arrival that bring joy and show us the hosts love and know how to receive guests with a warm, friendly welcome (which makes check-in easy and pleasant). It's an ideal and quiet place I would definitely book again if I return to Montreal. So don't hesitate to book your stay here!

Tanguy and Uriel were very nice people and great hosts. They made sure we were comfortable and offered many suggestions of things to do, but also gave us our space. The apartment was as described and comfortable. Parking is very easy, you should have no trouble finding on the block. Highly recommend!
It's a nice place to stay, close to many points of interest, the hosts are very friendly and always willing to help.

It's an excellent place, ideal for moving around different parts of the city due to its location. It has all the services we need and, above all, with the willingness and support of these excellent hosts. I would stay there again and highly recommend it.
Nice place to stay, about 20 minutes from the center! Thanks!

Uriel was an extremely welcoming host who gave us good addresses for visiting and eating. The accommodation matched the photos and for our family stay of 3 days in Montreal it was very good. The accommodation is close to public transport. We had a problem with the microwave. Uriel responded immediately and within 5 minutes the problem was solved. Thank you for your hospitality, we highly recommend.
Great place, great location, great hosts!

Amazing place to stay with everything you need right inside! They left soap, towels, condiments, feminine products, and much more inside in case you might have forgotten something. Very thoughtful touches and a cozy place to stay. In a great area if you want to enjoy the city, close to everything and Uber was readily available! Thank you so much Tanguy and Uriel
Very prompt replies, and the space was clean and welcoming :)
Great place to stay. Clean and cozy. Lovely thoughtful extras. Extremely pleasant hosts to deal with.
Clean space, very kind hosts, and a great first Airbnb experience for anyone unsure of the service!
Great!

Our stay in Montreal was very fun and friendly thanks to Noemie and her roommate. The guest area is very spacious and the whole apartment is very open and clean. There are a few restaurants close by and the transit system is easy to adapt to. Would recommend!
Excellent place, my relatives had a wonderful time. Noemi really took care of the details and provided recommendations to them. Montreal is a beautiful city, especially with experiences like this.
Noémie welcomed us very warmly. The apartment was clean upon our arrival. We felt right at home immediately. She had prepared toiletries for us and all the necessary bedding. We highly recommend!
Very kind and polite person. The apartment is very clean and according to description. I highly recommend it.

This Airbnb is everything that is described and more. The host(s) are very wonderful, friendly, and informative and accommodating. It is very close to the subway, grocery store, and even downtown. I would definitely recommend staying here if you are going to stay overnight in Montreal.
Noémie was a wonderful hostess and her home is absolutely delightful, with a very classic and comfortable atmosphere. I would definitely return!

Friendly, welcoming, nothing to complain about.  
Charming, smiling, helpful and available. 
I recommend it a thousand times.

A great place, would definitely recommend. 
Conveniently close to transit and a grocery store, but far enough away from the city to be peaceful and relaxing. 
Noémie is a wonderful host, and is eager to share information on what to do in Montréal. 

A prodigious amount of pillows were also supplied.
Be aware: the room is cuter in real life than the photo. Such a pretty place. Couldn't ask for more. Thank you for everything!

The host was very welcoming and friendly. The place was very accessible and very clean. Also, the bedroom was unexpectedly large! The host also provided a lot of information and guidance. Overall, the experience was very positive. I also had excellent sleep at their place!!

Noémie is an exceptionally dedicated host. She made us feel at home right away and asked several times if there was anything we needed. I told her it would be nice if we could sleep on separate beds, and when we arrived she had prepared an extra bed for us! We had access to all common spaces and amenities, and I have to say this apartment is SO charming and welcoming! The kitchen was my big favorite. The apartment is not in the center of town but very conveniently located: in a quiet residential area just 5 min away from a subway station and a supermarket. And also from that subway station is at the beginning of the gay village, on St Catherine street (the one with the rainbow), where there are many bars and restaurants. Noémie provided us with lots of tips about the surrounding areas. I just wish we had more time to hang out with her! Bottom line is: don't hesitate, this listing is what all Airbnb rentals should be like.
Very nice place with a friendly host, close to downtown, tidy, clean and quiet

Noemie's place was great. 
Very clean and comfortable. 
I recommend Noemie's place without hesitation.
Noémie is wonderful! A great hostess and so helpful. It felt like we were staying with friends.
Noémie was a wonderful host, very helpful with everything. Thank you for the warm hospitality!

Coming from NYC, I loved the laid-back atmosphere of Montreal. The people were absolutely amazing on all levels. Starting with Alfredo. At first meeting, he was nice enough to come meet me at the subway station and walk with me to the apartment and tell me about the neighborhood. Alfredo was such a gracious host - from meeting me at the subway and giving me a tour of the neighborhood on the way to the apartment to making sure I felt welcomed and at home in his place - one of the best I've had. He had beautiful fresh flowers from the market around the house, some amazing yogurt in the fridge to start the day (have to find this back home) and even had a personalized map to welcome me to the neighborhood. 

The location is absolutely perfect. The apartment itself is nestled between some of the city's top-rated restaurants and shops. The canal is situated right at the end of the block for the perfect after-super stroll. There is a market about two blocks away that was just about perfect in every way. 

The neighborhood shops and their keepers really made it feel like a neighborhood - one that I wish I had had more time to spend in.
I would highly recommend this place and I'm hoping I can visit again soon.

Great location and value. This condo exceeded our expectations. Alfredo was a great host, communication was nothing but smooth. I would highly recommend this place to anyone, the location is fantastic, Atwater Market, great restaurants and bars all within a short walk.

At Alfredo's is an excellent apartment where to stay during a visit to Montreal! Alfredo welcomed us warmly and maintained excellent contact before and during our stay. The apartment is clean and very well located in a young, dynamic neighborhood close to everything. The kitchen is very well equipped with all the small appliances like a toaster, blender, coffee maker, sandwich grill etc. Clean living room with cable TV. On top, there's a clean bathroom with washer/dryer and the bedroom bed is very comfortable! As for the neighborhood, it's great. Lots of bars, bistros, and charming cafes, a young and vibrant area with many patios in the summer. A short walk from Atwater Market and Canal Lachine, two excellent spots for a stroll or to be amongst people. In short, I will definitely stay there again on future visits to Montreal!

One of the best Airbnb experiences we've ever had! Alfredo is an amazing host who embodies what Airbnb is all about. He greeted us at the place, insisted on helping us carry our big suitcases, left us wine and macaroons (!!) at the place and was so gracious and responsive throughout our stay. The place was a complete delight. Clean, comfortable, centrally located right by AtWater and just 5 minutes from the Metro station. Lots of cool bars and restaurants right down stairs, even a natural store and pharmacy. The bed and shower were comfortable, enjoyed everything about this place! When we checked out Alfredo came to see us out, once again insisted on helping with the luggage and was fun to chat with for a few minutes until our Uber got there. We are Airbnb super hosts and feel like Alfredo inspired us to be even better by adding his own personal touch and lots of thought into his hosting. We recommend staying with him highly!!! Your Montreal experience will be amazing, you will feel just like a local with the comfort of home!! Thank you Alfredo! We will be back!

Alfredo's space was a great home base for us during our week in Montreal. It's a fantastic location - we loved being near Atwater Market, and we ate at several of the restaurants in the area. It's also a fantastic spot if you want to get around by metro, since the Lionel Groulx station is on both the orange and green lines, which was perfect for us (we used the metro a lot). Alfredo was a great host who was happy to answer our questions and I'd definitely recommend his place!

Alfredo is an exceptional and gracious host. He pays meticulous attention to detail and ensures your stay exceeds your expectations!! We will definitely return to stay there again thanks to Alfredo, the apartment, and the location. You couldn't ask for anything better.  Why stay anywhere else!

I was in the city for a conference downtown and the place was perfect. I could hop on the metro around the corner and quickly get downtown, and then retreat into this sweet little neighborhood with great restaurants and cafes, the Atwater market just across the street, and take long runs up and down the canal or to the river.  Also a great public pool just down the street. Such a laid-back vibe in the area! The apartment is just as nice as in the photos and the stuff in the place is nice - crisp sheets, nice towels, good kitchenware, etc. Alfredo is a superhost who greeted me with an overview of the place and area, and made himself available if anything came up (which nothing did). I will definitely stay in this area if I return and @ Alfredo's if it's available.

My favorite Airbnb to date. Alfredo was a fantastic host and very accommodating. He was there on arrival with everything we needed (including some macaroons and beer in the fridge!). Gorgeous apartment, very spacious and clean. The neighborhood was fantastic with countless bars and restaurants and close to the canal, market, and the metro. We walked into the city some days and took the metro others but either way, fabulous location without having to be too far from the city to not have the pleasure of seeing the canal etc. Our flight time was changed last minute and Alfredo was very accommodating in allowing us to leave our luggage at the apartment. He was super quick in responding and catered to every need. I can't recommend this listing enough. BOOK!

Absolutely brilliant flat, super clean, Alfredo is incredibly friendly and easygoing, happy to answer all questions with a big genuine smile. The flat is very well-equipped, with TV, washing machine, a great big shower room, and a very comfortable bed. 

I will definitely stay there again.

Alfredo is a great host and his apartment is in a great location. It's located on a lively street with several restaurants and Irish pubs, and 5 minutes walking from the supermarket, farmers market, and the canal. We will definitely look for its availability next time we visit Montreal.

I had a wonderful stay at the unit hosted by Alfredo. When I arrived at the unit, I let myself in with a key from a lock box and Alfredo arrived 30 minutes later to introduce himself and provide information about the unit. He graciously supplied a case of water and a much appreciated bottle of craft Quebec beer.  

The unit itself is in a safe and thriving neighborhood about a 5-minute walk from the Atwater Market. The entrance to the unit is through a locked door at street level and up a flight of stairs to the front door. Inside, the unit is very spacious and bright, with windows that face the street.  The living room and kitchen are on the first level and the bedroom, washroom, and laundry facilities are on the second level. 

The unit is stylishly decorated and furnished, with a strong wifi signal throughout. There is a long sofa facing a top-class entertainment system which I didn't have time to use. The kitchen area is roomy and has a dining table. Although I just made coffee in the mornings with the cream and ground coffee supplied by Alfredo, there are plates, cutlery, and utensils for those planning to cook their own meals.

I had a comfortable sleep on the king-sized bed and the blackout shades kept the room completely dark when I slept in. The bathroom is well stocked with toiletries and the shower has excellent pressure with lots of hot water. 

All in all, the apartment completely met my expectations and I would certainly consider renting it again the next time I'm in Montreal.
We were very happy with our stay, the house was comfortable and conveniently located near all services. Highly recommended

Well located, very clean.
On two floors very well decorated and comfortable.
Internet is too slow.
Overall very good.

Our stay at Alfredo’s place was amazing. 

The place is spacious, very clean, comfortable, decorated with good taste, and has everything one may need. I really liked his apartment. 

It is very well located, the restaurants and bars around are great and in an easy 30 minute walk you are downtown or in old Montreal. Very pleasant area to be outside and felt very safe. 

Alfredo always answered my messages within 5 minutes and was incredibly helpful and generous. 

I highly recommend this place. Thank you Alfredo!
Couldn't ask for a nicer place. Everything is great, from the space to the area and the host. Clean, comfortable, well-equipped... Just wonderful. Highly recommend

Excellent reception by Alfredo (really!) and a very nice apartment in an animated neighborhood, close to the Lionel-Groulx metro station. 

The kitchen is well equipped, which allows you to take advantage of the Atwater market located right next door... 

I recommend!
It's a great place, located near so many restaurants, a metro station, and Atwater Market. The apartment has everything you'd need to be comfortable.

Very nice duplex near the Atwater Market. The apartment is very clean and well-maintained (website hidden by Airbnb). The bedroom is on the second floor but in a mezzanine. It's more suitable for a (website hidden by Airbnb)  and I will rent it again.
Alfredo went above and beyond the usual needs of our stay. He even found us parking at the last minute. I hope I get to stay here again.

Superb flat, beautifully decorated, super clean. Alfredo is very friendly and it was our second stay there and we will come back. Located so close to Lionel Groulx, very close to the canal that we can follow to town center (25 minute walk). 

A perfect flat for a comfortable and affordable stay. Alfredo had put coffee, a jar of jam, and a beer in the fridge for us...
My third stay at Alfredo's feels like home sweet home! Lovely apartment, charming host... Highly recommended for a nice stay in Montreal.

Great location for restaurants, Atwater Market, and Lachine Canal. The apartment on two levels is well set up for a couple but may not be comfortable for all parents with young children due to the steep stairs. We liked it despite construction outside during our stay. Only criticism of the kitchen was the lack of microwave and lighting that could be better. Same for the shower (lighting). We would come back, I think.

It's the second time I've stayed here, I guess that speaks for itself! 

Thank you, Alfredo, for making this possible.

Alfredo's wonderful space and convenient location is perfect for anyone staying in Little Burgundy. It is closely situated near the Atwater market and a great many shops and restaurants. The space itself is second only to Alfredo's superb hospitality. In my case, he was tremendously accommodating in extending my stay. 

Thank you again, Alfredo.
Alfredo was a wonderful host. The location was perfect, with street parking available and plenty of restaurants and shops nearby. We loved our stay!

We appreciated the opportunity to stay at this stylish and spacious one-bedroom apartment. The apartment is well appointed, with an attractive large window on the upper level. The location, beside many bars and restaurants and close to the Metro, is excellent. Alfredo was an attentive host and a flawless communicator. We hope to stay again.

This was the third time staying at Alfredo's. Always wonderful. It was really cold out and the heating worked really well. All very clean and comfortable. Alfredo's communication is swift, detailed and polite. He is friendly and welcoming. The area is nice, central but with a neighborhood feeling. I explored Atwater market this time and had a great time. Highly recommended. Overall everything was as expected, perfect. Would stay again? Yes! Thank you Alfredo

Highly recommended! Alfredo's place is beautiful, comfortable & homey. We were able to walk or take the Metro everywhere. The location was perfect as we were in town for a show at the Theatre Corona - a 3 minute walk away. I appreciated Alfredo's hospitality. He greeted us in person, arranged parking for us, and even had some local treats sitting out for us. The bed was so comfy! Great place to stay.

As always, Alfredo is a wonderfully accommodating host who truly has earned the moniker Superhost. 
When faced with a potential canceled flight, Alfredo did not hesitate to suggest for me to stay an extra night. A tremendously accommodating offer!
Thank you, Alfredo.

This was my fourth time at Alfredo's. That says it all! Alfredo is a fantastic host. The space is amazing, so close to some of the best restaurants in Montreal and to Atwater market where you can get anything from great cheese, bread, produce and fish. Being so close to the 747 bus to the airport is perfect, 25 minutes to the airport for $10 couldn't be better. All in all, I truly enjoyed staying there and I feel "at home" at Alfredo's! He always leaves a little present, this time it was a great bottle of wine. Thank you!

This is a great place to stay in Montreal. We were in town for a show at the Theatre Corona and Alfredo's apartment was less than two blocks away. The neighborhood has many great dining options within steps from the apartment, but also extending out a few blocks. There are also some cute boutiques to check out. The Old Poet, Botanical Gardens, and Mile End are a 15-20 minute drive, so getting around is easy.  

The apartment itself was fantastic. Sparkling clean, comfortable, lots of light, nice towels, and a very comfortable bed. Alfredo was great to deal with before, during, and after our stay. He was responsive, excellent at communicating, offered tips and recommendations, and even left us some welcoming treats. We will definitely stay at Alfredo's again. It was perfect for our needs!

Amazing
Generous
Kind
Comfortable 
Easy
Great! Great host!

Alfredo is a wonderful host. He is very accommodating and the space is beautiful in a great location. This was my second stay here, and I highly recommend it to any couple or individual. Thank you again, Alfredo
Great location. Great space. Great host. Would stay again 100%.
Good home base for our trip.
Wonderful apartment in an interesting location - close to downtown. Alfredo was a thoughtful and helpful host and the apartment was perfect. Definitely recommend!

Awesome apartment in a great location, with great restaurants right at your doorstep (check out Le Bon Vivant!). Atwater Market was just around the corner and the supermarket was also a very short walk away.

Great apartment with everything you would need - the fresh flowers in all the rooms were a beautiful touch! Highly recommend for couples looking for a getaway in Montreal. Thank you Alfredo for a wonderful stay!

Sixth time here. It was fantastic. This time I loved the spring light coming in through the windows. The place is clean, comfortable, easy, functional and practical. I love the area. Alfredo is thoughtful, kind and generous.

Highly recommended.

The best kind of Airbnb experience. 

The apartment is lovely, spotless and a really homely place to stay. Alfredo has thought of all the little touches, and the location is perfect, with easy transport to/from airport and loads of great cafes, restaurants, markets and bars nearby. The Lachine Canal nearby is also great for running.

Alfredo makes everything simple. Check in and check out is easy and his communication throughout was great. 

Thank you Alfredo - you played a big part in our amazing holiday!

There are two key components to my review. The first is Location, Location and Location. You could not want for a better place to stay in Montreal. Firstly, you're barely five minutes from the Atwater Market to get all those amazing goodies for your meals (which we did!) and five minutes from one of the Metro stations that will get you to most of the key sightseeing places in Montreal. We didn’t use our rental car during our three-day stay there. On top of that, walk out the apartment door and whether you went left or right, there was an amazing selection of cafes to choose from. 

Secondly, and most importantly, is the apartment itself. The apartment had everything you could want for your stay, a comfortable bed, a great living area, and so on. Then add in the personal touches left by the host like fresh flowers, coffee, etc., and you can see why I can't recommend Alfredo’s apartment highly enough. I'll certainly not hesitate to stay there again should I return to Montreal in the future.

This flat is WAY better than the pictures show. It really felt like home away from home from the moment I walked in. First of all, Alfredo is a wonderful host. He was waiting for me at the flat even though I was running late due to traffic from the airport. A great welcome from him from the moment I walked in. The flat is actually quite large for a single traveller but would be perfect for a couple. Alfredo thought of everything: from a well-stocked kitchen to tons of towels in the bathroom, to cable TV, and even fresh cut flowers! The flat is located minutes away from TONS of bakeries, cafes and restaurants, not to mention the amazing Atwater market. AC definitely helpful during hot summer days. The flat is on two levels located above a pop-up shop; so no noise issues from neighbours. However, it is located right on a busy street; so if you're a light sleeper, highly advisable to bring earplugs. Otherwise, a truly wonderful stay. Thank you Alfredo!
We had a wonderful time at this apartment. Alfredo exceeded our expectations. The location was perfect. We highly recommend staying here!

Alfredo was a wonderful host who responded quickly. He added many thoughtful touches to make us feel welcome. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed. His apartment was exactly as advertised and even exceeded our expectations. Thank you again, Alfredo

Alfredo's location in Montreal is convenient for accessing excellent restaurants and markets. Alfredo was incredibly responsive and his thoughtful extras, such as complimentary wine and water, made our stay even more special. We highly recommend it to anyone visiting Montreal!

Alfredo's place is in a perfect location, very easy to get around with public transportation and walking distance to awesome bars and restaurants. His place is great, clean and has everything you need. He is a nice guy who was helpful from the beginning, available at all times whenever I had any questions. Totally recommend it.
Five-star accommodations, seven-star hospitality.

Alfredo & his apartment far exceeded all expectations for our trip to Montreal. My husband and I initially booked with another host but after unforeseen circumstances arose, I was left to look for another place to stay while on our way up to Montreal. I reached out to Alfredo and he dropped what he was doing to take us in and make sure that everything was perfect for us! We walked in and were greeted with a cute sign welcoming us and with some Canadian wine. He showed us around and made us feel welcomed right from the start. He even gave us some fresh fruit that he had picked up at the market before we arrived. 

The location of his apartment is perfect! There are so many amazing restaurants and bars within walking distance. My favorite was the ice cream shop - La Diperie. The subway is also just five minutes away, which was so convenient for getting into the city! The apartment itself was super clean and has everything you could need. The bed was very comfortable and the sheets were so soft. Stop searching now and book with Alfredo! I definitely will the next time we are in Montreal.

Alfredo is a Superhost. His unit is my home away from home. He is very hospitable and pays great attention to detail. The unit is well maintained and has complete amenities. I would say that it exceeded my expectations. Thank you Alfredo for making my stay in Montreal a very relaxing and memorable visit. It was great meeting you.
As I have become accustomed to, Alfredo's superior hospitality and convenient space have exceeded my expectations. Thank you again for accommodating my reservation (on such short notice).
A very nice private apartment with many restaurants and cafes right outside and a subway station within a 5-minute walk.
Alfredo's place was great! Perfect location right down the street from a market and great restaurants. The check-in and check-out process was super easy and the apartment was very nice.
"Awesome. I'll definitely go back if I get the chance!"

Great spot in an exciting neighborhood. Clean, comfortable, and larger than expected. Alfredo's place is situated in a perfect area with a pharmacy, supermarket, lots of restaurants, bars, Atwood market, the canal, and the metro nearby. Don't miss out on this spot!
Alfredo's place was great! It was convenient, comfortable, and clean. Alfredo was quick to respond to messages and incredibly helpful. I highly recommend staying at Alfredo's place!
Terrific location, thoughtful host, lovely space, close to metro.

Alfredo was truly a fantastic host! The location is trendy, the apartment is immaculate and stylish, and Alfredo's attention to detail and communication were outstanding! We would definitely love to stay here again!

Great as always
Can't wait to be back
Wonderful place
Wonderful host!
Excellent apartment and Alfredo is a very helpful and considerate host.

The place is very comfortable and spacious; not fancy but the decor and layout really work and are very comfortable, with many thoughtful touches.  The stairs were no problem for us and most people, but could be a challenge for someone with limited mobility. 

We loved the location. Within a few blocks we went to the Atwater Market, which is great. The bakery across the street is fantastic. We liked brunch at the place next door and dinner at both restaurants within a block or two.

The metro is only a few blocks away and the 35 bus going to the old town right in front.

We didn't meet Alfredo in person, but he was very prompt in communications and accommodating to our needs.

In Montreal, we really enjoyed Bota Bota and the light show at the Botanical Gardens.
Great location. Awesome host! Clean and a great place to stay
Amazing location and a great, clean, and stylish place. Great communication with the host. Recommend!

Far and away my new favorite Airbnb in Montreal. If you're coming for the food, like me, note this place is a 4-minute walk from Joe Beef and Liverpool House. If you enjoy a drink, some of Montreal's best are at Atwater Cocktail Club half a block away. In short, very centrally located.

The place itself exceeded all expectations with a great bedroom, a nice living room, and even a patio out back. Lots of fresh towels and the place was sparkling clean. 

I would definitely stay again in a heartbeat!

This is a lovely, comfortable, and spotlessly clean apartment in a great neighborhood. The location couldn't be better...right near Atwater Market, close to the Metro with lots of great restaurants within walking distance. Alfredo is a very responsive host who will go out of his way to make your stay enjoyable.
As I have come to expect, Alfredo is a wonderful host and his place makes for a lovely and convenient stay in Little Burgundy

Great location with ample space. Conveniently located within walking distance of less than 5 minutes to Theatre Corona and the metro station. Numerous restaurants, cafes, a pharmacy, liquor store, and grocery stores are nearby. I would highly recommend this place for travelers visiting Montreal.
Alfredo was an amazing and very accommodating host and the place was fantastic. Super clean, very nicely decorated, warm and great location. Highly recommended.

I spent 5 days at Alfredo's place, a little longer than other times and had an amazing stay. It was clean and well prepared. His new bed cover is very pretty! I actually prepared a full meal this time and found everything I needed in the kitchen. It is so well located, the restaurants nearby are excellent. I was even able to take a 20 minute walk to go to the cinema. The apartment is cozy and welcoming. As always, I recommend it and would go back anytime to stay there.
Cozy apartment in a fantastic location! Easy check-in and check-out, with excellent communication and thoughtful amenities.

Modern, bright space for staying. Cook in the fully equipped kitchen or dine out at one of the many nearby restaurants. The amazing Atwater Market is just a block away, next to a massive liquor store—you've never seen so much variety!

Alfredo is an amazing host. His place was spotless. The location was outstanding. Couldn't ask for more from an Airbnb. Allowed for an early check-in and was very quick to respond to our questions. We will definitely be returning. Thank you, Alfredo!
I love this place. Cozy and well-located. It was very cold, and I was very happy with the heating system. Alfredo is an outstanding host.

Alfredo is consistently an attentive and warm host. His place is conveniently located in Montreal's Little Burgundy, very close to shopping, Aesop, dining, the Atwater Market, etc. It's a lovely spot to stay with a super host!
Great host, great location close to the metro and everything you could need. Clean, stylish apartment. Makes you want to come back.
A fabulous location and a very nice unit. Host Alfredo is a great guy.
Cool place to spend a weekend!

Doris was extremely attentive and responded to our questions and needs quickly. Doris' home is extremely comfortable and beautifully decorated. It is located in the lively Rue St. Hubert area with its great local restaurants and bars, and is near the metro. We felt like we were living in Montreal style!

I would highly recommend a stay here if you are visiting Montreal.
Really nice loft. Exactly as the photos, plus Doris was quick to reply.
Ideal for family stays and Doris Mel's provide quick responses to any needs.

Had a great time in this apartment, everything was clean and beautiful. The hosts have great taste! It's very close to the Beaubien station, making it very convenient to get around town. 

I definitely recommend it!

We really enjoyed Doris's place! The space is clean and bright. The location is near shops and restaurants. It was easy to get around here. Doris was helpful and responsive. We needed a few extra supplies and she was very quick to get them for us. Parking was easy. Checking in and out was no problem. The space worked well for us. We will look to stay here again.

The loft is perfect for a couple or two couples to spend a night or a week, or even longer. The kitchen is equipped well enough to cook if necessary, and the washer/dryer in the unit was the perfect thing for us halfway through our trip to do a couple loads of laundry.  The bathroom is large and has a pleasant rain shower stall with a skylight in it. Beds were comfy and clean, although it is a loft so be aware that there are no doors to the bedrooms, but they are large enough and located so that there is privacy. The neighborhood is a mix of shops and some restaurants and bars, but was never loud at night.  The subway is a short two-block covered walk away and gives you access to downtown in 10-15 minutes. Overall, it's a great place for a couple to explore Montreal.
Very nice experience in this beautiful 2 bedroom apartment. :)
good location, good facilities, good parking
Overall, the loft lived up to its description and photos. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely book again next time we visit Montreal.
This is my dream house! I love it so much ~~ near the metro ~ I hope I can stay one week next time.

Lovely spacious loft, nice location - walking distance to Little Italy. To get downtown or Old Montreal you need to take a metro though or drive. It is listed as having parking, however, parking is in the back alley on the parking lot of a store above which the loft is located. To get to the car you have to go around the block. Upon our arrival we were greeted by the maid who was unsure about the parking situation. It did get sorted out quickly enough. The loft has a nice rooftop patio but we weren't able to use it since there is a constant noise from the store's big AC units located right next to the patio. Also, in the bathroom we had 4 little bottles of body lotion and 5 little bottles of conditioner, but no shampoo or body wash - we had to get our own. The host was slow to respond, I was using SMS so maybe it's a problem with the app. Overall, we had a pleasant stay (3 nights).
The apartment was clean, accurate pictures and a cute neighborhood. Close to Little Italy and near great restaurants and bars. Doris Mel was easy to communicate with and responded promptly.

Great location with a cool rooftop area. There are lots of bars and restaurants nearby for you to enjoy! Just around the corner from the metro, which is very easy to use - a 10-minute trip to downtown Montreal.

Doris was very efficient and kind. She was very communicative, willing to help and answer any questions. The place was well-equipped, from kitchen utensils to laundry detergent. There are restaurants and shops right below the apartment. Most importantly, her furniture shop (which is very nice) is right underneath it. I recommend this place; it was a great stay.
Nice, very modern place, with very nice decoration, located in the heart of Little Italy.
Bright, spacious, easy to access, pleasant apartment.
The stairs to the apartment may pose a problem for elderly people

First time going to Montreal and glad we found Doris's Airbnb. It was clean and comfortable to stay in. Also, it came with free overnight parking too! I would definitely stay at Doris's again if I go back to Montreal. Thanks!
Great place to stay. The ladders to get into the apartment are long. Be prepared if you bring overweight baggage. Everything else is lovely
Everything was very good! The apartment is consistent with the photos and well-equipped. It was very clean. The parking spot is convenient! I highly recommend this Airbnb :)
A great place to stay, very clean and in perfect condition. Lovely apartment

This is a very nice apartment in a fantastic location. The photos are accurate. It is quite clean and well appointed. There are not doors on bedrooms as it is a more modern layout, but this was no problem for us. It is maybe a minute walk to the subway. Petite Patrie might be the best neighborhood in all of Montreal.

Exactly as pictured with lots of natural light. The rain shower was really nice. The metro stop is right around the corner, but it's also walkable to Mile End and the Plateau. There are some nice restaurants and stores in Plaza St. Hubert too. We loved staying here.

The apartment was charming with easy access to food, Bixi bikes, and shopping. Bonus parking spot at the back of the building, but be cautious on the steep stairs at the front entrance. Doris Mel was super helpful especially when we had some hiccups during check-in. Overall, I would recommend this spot if you're looking to stay in Little Italy.

This was a great spot! True to the pictures with a nice, private deck off the back. Very close to the metro, but could also be walkable for those up for a bigger city trek (Mont Royal, old town, Olympic stadium - It takes some time, but it was a great way to see the city).
Lots of great restaurants in the neighborhood as well.
FYI - there aren't currently curtains on the back windows, taking away from complete privacy, but there are spaces that provide that if needed (ex bathroom).
Doris was quick to respond and was flexible and understanding with arrival time - a great host!
Accommodation in the suite was very luxurious and comfortable
We had a wonderful time. Check-in was simple. Perfect for two couples. Fantastic neighborhood with plenty of restaurants and a short walk to the metro. We would definitely stay again!

We had an excellent stay in this ideally located, bright and spacious accommodation. 

A small suggestion: blackout curtains would be welcome in front of each window.  Similarly, to separate the bedroom from the rest of the hallway leading to the living room.

Noteworthy is the very warm welcome we received upon arrival as well as upon departure.

My friend and I really enjoyed staying at this Airbnb. We rented the 2-bed unit.

This was a very nice area to walk around, close to a fair amount of restaurants and public transportation. Spacious unit itself, and nicely decorated. Would recommend! A note that those with mobility issues or heavy baggage may have problems with the stairs, as they are quite steep. Otherwise, great spot!
The apartment has everything you need! It's in a great location (with nice surroundings, close to the metro, lots of dining options and bars) and is well-equipped. Definitely a good choice!
Very realistic images of the loft. Clean, host very attentive before and during the stay!
We loved our stay in Montreal. Great property in a convenient location!

The apartment is beautiful and exactly as pictured. The parking spot in the back is very convenient. The street is full of restaurants and a great coffee shop. I would definitely book this place again for my next trip to Montreal!
Lovely, clean and modern apartment. Nice patio in the back. People should know there are no doors on the two bedrooms...
Clean and comfortable. Host very responsive.

The apartment was located in a nice, lively spot with many good bars and restaurants within walking distance. It was also very clean and well-maintained. I would recommend that she install cover plates around all electrical outlets, both on the walls and ceilings (for obvious safety concerns).  It would have been nice to have doors on both of the bedrooms for privacy. The location is by far the best part about this place. Doris was slow to communicate and disorganized regarding the pickup of the keys and parking location. It would have been nice to receive an email or text a couple days before our stay with instructions on where to pick up the keys and free parking locations, along with any relevant suggestions about the area. If she addresses my concerns, I highly recommend this apartment/condo.

Doris's flat is cute, comfortable, with an amazing wooden terrace!
2 minutes from the Orange subway to downtown!
Air conditioned in the flat: great!
The street of the flat is well known with lots of shops and cafes.
Doris was not there but answers very fast to emails.
We highly recommend it for a family stay.
The place is great, it's clean, just as pictured, and the location is close to everything.

We loved Doris's apartment: spacious, clean, very comfortable and well-lit. Perfectly located in Montreal and close to public transportation. We had no trouble getting there by car. 

Without a doubt we will be back!

Awesome place! Really clean and full of wonderful furniture and decor. 

The street is also pretty quiet. Slept really comfortably and well! Really neat furniture store downstairs. Just our style. 

Easy to check in and out, no hassle.

The apartment is elegantly decorated and comfortable. It absolutely lives up to the pictures and description. A pleasant surprise for me was the surrounding neighborhood--plenty of charming shops and restaurants (some not so charming ones too, of course) are steps away. It's a 5-minute walk to the subway stop which was so convenient for everything we wanted to do. Highly recommend.
This place is worth it. It has all the amenities as described. Additionally, it is close to downtown and most restaurants. The host should clarify where clean towels are located.

Great condo and we enjoyed our stay. Check-in/check-out was easy as we picked up and dropped off keys at the store below. The condo looked like the pictures but not exactly as luxurious and spacious as pictured. Also, be aware that there are no blackout blinds (for people who like to sleep in complete darkness like me :( and the stairs are pretty steep and difficult to maneuver. We rented the condo for a girls' getaway weekend and had a pretty rough time trying to get the luggage up and down the stairs! There is a TV, but no cable, so if you want to watch TV at all or play music, you will need to use your own Netflix account (as we did). Overall, a pretty good value.

True to the pictures, the loft was spacious and clean with beautiful comfortable modern decor. The outside area was a welcome bonus. Check-in and check-out was very simple via the staff at the furniture store below. There is parking in the back of the store which was free, convenient, and safe. The neighborhood was active yet quiet, with many shops and restaurants lining the street. The host was friendly and responsive to any questions we had. There are a few maintenance issues that need to be addressed (various outlet covers & electrical covers & a broken handle on the freezer) however, none of them interfered with our visit. I would highly recommend this loft for your visit to Montreal.

The area is amazing, you are steps from everything you need. We ended up staying local on each of the nights there. Great Thai place across the street and lots of South American, French and Italian places around to choose from. A cool beer store down the street and a micro brewery you should definitely check out. The apartment is clean, well stocked and really nicely decorated. There is a cool terrace out the back and a really nice shower with a skylight. It is a bring your own bedroom door duration so just remember that if you want privacy. All in all a fantastic place, we would move there!

Nice place in a centrally located location. Be mindful if you have heavy bags or a stroller that the apartment has a steep staircase. Otherwise, a good place to stay when you're in Montreal and a 10-15 minute walk from Mile End.

Great location with many good restaurants and cafes within walking distance, plus the Jean Talon Market. The apartment is clean and comfortable...and surprisingly quiet, considering the street below. I slept incredibly well!
Wow, this housing is impeccable!
Great location

We had a wonderful stay at Doris Mel's apartment! The location was on a very cute street with lots of stores and restaurants nearby, and the metro (orange line) was right around the corner, leading straight downtown to Old Montreal! The apartment was clean with plenty of natural light. It was a great fit for a girls' weekend getaway!

The location of the house is good, on a commercial street with restaurants, bakeries, and small supermarkets nearby. It took some time to find the door and keys, as I had been unable to locate the password box located on the side wall of the building. The house's decor is quite tasteful, but there are leftover electrical connectors that haven't been properly dealt with. Overall, it's relatively clean, but we found garbage in the bathroom trash can that hadn't been emptied. There is a washing machine, and you need to bring your own laundry detergent. The stairs are very steep and narrow, making it difficult to carry heavy luggage. You can park your car for free at the back. In short, it has its pros and cons.

Doris Mel's place is amazing, very clean, beautiful decor, and a large space as well. We enjoyed the back terrace, and it was surprisingly quiet inside even though the bedrooms are located adjacent to the main street. The location was perfect, with lots of shops and restaurants nearby, including a grocery store and pharmacy. The stairs are a bit tight, but it's okay with small luggage; however, it might be difficult with large suitcases. Otherwise, the place was great, we enjoyed our stay and would definitely go back! Thanks!!

Let me first of all say that we would definitely stay here again. It was clean, great location, FREE parking in the back (though the back is not easily accessible), the owner was very responsive, and the location was great. A few things to mention would be that the bedrooms do not have doors so if you are needing privacy, you would have to be mindful of this. Also, the listing doesn't show the stairs leading from the main entrance. What you see in the photos are the stairs in the rear that lead to the roof down below. If you have difficulty climbing very steep stairs as we did (grandmother) then it's quite an inconvenience. Though it would be fine otherwise. 

I did like the fact that it's close to a "Jean Cotou" store so you can get all your toiletries there. It's 1 min walking distance along with other little stores and restaurants. If you're a coffee drinker, "Caffelinni" is 3 mins away walking which we enjoyed. Free parking (in the back) was a huge plus since parking in Montreal can get pricy. That alone adds a lot of value to the overall cost of the place. We were able to Uber when needed and drive to other places if we wanted without having to worry about garage fees. 

So overall, we were more than satisfied with the place and thankful to the owners for letting us stay there.

This was my first Airbnb experience and it was great. Doris Mel responded quickly and made our experience smooth and easy. Although the stairs were a bit steep... her space is beautiful, spacious, and decorated as pictured... the washer/dryer and parking area were a plus! She’s a great host!
Super easy to communicate with the host, good location - very walkable and close to the subway, and nice, functional space.

Spacious apartment in a very good location. Everything is within walking distance, including restaurants, bars, liquor stores and shops. Parking is also available. I will be back for my next trip to Montreal.
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊
Great place to stay!

Initially, I was very pleased with Doris Mel's responsiveness when we booked the flat. She was very pleasant and said she would get in touch closer to check-in. I didn't hear from her so I followed up two days before and she told me she would share the key code with me the day before. I didn't receive the code. I sent her a message early in the morning of check-in, but didn't get a response. Then, I continued to message as we got closer, but still nothing. I read in reviews that she had a furniture shop shown in the pictures, so when we arrived, I went into the store, but she wasn't there. Someone at the store knew the code for the key, so we were able to self-check in. I sent Doris Mel another message asking where to park and she replied apologizing for a problem with the Airbnb app. I never received any information from her about the apartment, the key code, wifi password, check-out, so we guessed our way through. The apartment is very spacious and nice but it had some quirks. The street the flat is located on is a mixed bag of shops and feels more urban than the rest of the area. I love Jean Talon and Little Italy, so I was happy to be so close and parking was a bonus, but that was a little awkward too.

This is a modern luxurious flat just like the review claims. The location is on a vibrant and fun retail street (although the apartment is high up and completely quiet). There is a steep walk up to the apartment so if you have a disability this would be difficult.  The host was pleasant, patient, and nice, I think like all Canadians.

We had a fantastic time at the loft and truly wish we had another night there!! The space is modern, open, clean, with an exposed wooden wall on the back side. Very neat. There are no doors so it's a great place to hang out and float around with friends. It was close to good dinner options and also 5 minutes to the Beaubien stop on the orange line of the metro. The neighborhood is quirky and cute and definitely worth staying here! Thanks for the great stay!!

I liked the housing and its location near all services. However, it is clear that no one lives in this housing and we have the impression of being in a hotel apartment. It's not very serious, but personally, I am less enthusiastic. The kitchen accessories are not of good quality and there is only the essentials. Otherwise, the housing is well decorated and parking behind is really very convenient.

The place is really pretty and looks exactly like the picture. The only problem is communication with the host. It's best to talk to the host before you arrive. The stairs to the top condo are a little hard for heavy cases. The location is good and the rooms are clean and comfortable to stay in. In summary, it was a pretty good experience for me and my friends, and we would recommend this place to other friends.

Very nice place as described in the pictures. Could use a bit more kitchen utensils and basics like salt, pepper, sugar etc and some bedside lamps. 
We did miss having a little guide as we used to have in our previous rentals for best places to go in the area for food, visits etc to get more of a local feel. 
Nonetheless we’ve had a lovely stay and although we didn't meet Doris, she was very responsive at all times. We definitely recommend this place for its central location

What an amazing place and location!

Photos are totally accurate, the place is just awesome for the price. very spacious and my girlfriend and I had a wonderful time here while we stayed in Montreal for New Years.

Totally walking distance to everything and right in the middle of the two best neighborhoods in Montreal!

Thank you guys!

-Mark
Very nice apartment and super clean! Nothing negative to say!
Doris is super responsive, and her place was very nice and in a great location.

Exactly as shown. Very clean. Spectacular neighborhood, the strip was like Christmas again. It was a bit difficult to find because the number wasn't visible on the front. Free parking but it was really hard to find. The parking is located on the street before the actual address. We drove around at least 3 times before we figured it out. At least 15-20 minutes from downtown. If you have a heavy suitcase or luggage, the stairs won't be your best friend. You cannot, I repeat cannot enter from the back, so you have to park and walk around to the front. I would only suggest a mat at the front door for our shoes, especially because it was winter, hand soap and hand towel to dry our hands would be nice. Overall, my friends and I had a great stay and would revisit Montreal. It was great, I will return in warmer weather because there's so much I didn't get to do.
Well located, decorated. Everything is open air, though. Doris was a very good host! :)

It looks exactly like the pictures, very artistic and rustic with a hint of industrial decorations. The aesthetics of this place are just perfect. Doris was very nice and patient with me since it was my first time renting an apartment and I had lots of questions lol. I'm glad with my experience with her.

Thanks for hosting us! We had such a beautiful visit to Montreal!! The apartment was safe, clean, and quiet. It was easy to pick up & drop off keys. The area was cute. Lots of little shops around. It's above a storefront and very close to grocery stores, restaurants, and the metro. We bought a 3-day metro pass and found it very easy to jump on the subway to get downtown, to Old Montreal, and to Mont Royal. Our host was extremely quick at responding to any questions. The bedrooms have no doors. This wasn't a big issue for us in the end, but was a bit surprising. Can't wait to come back and visit again!!
Modern loft, well-equipped and well-located, exactly as described.
Had a great time! Mel was very responsive and helpful.

The apartment is very clean - I've stayed in 20+ Airbnbs and this was probably the cleanest. It is spacious without clutter. Although it would sleep and provide plenty of space for two couples, I found the single couch to be a limiting factor for comfort seating. We visited in March with temps in the 30's with our two-year-old - the apartment was plenty warm and very quiet. It's a short walk to the metro and bus - there is a great little grocery store a couple doors down and an excellent bodega selling regional craft beer. Plenty of restaurants are within walking distance or a short metro ride away. It was a great "neighborhood" experience in Montreal.
Beautiful condo located on a busy shopping street, with many great food options nearby and the metro station just 3 minutes away.

Good place. Looks exactly like the pictures... just be advised, there aren't any doors on the rooms except the bathroom. So, if you want to be romantic with your spouse and you have company in the other room it's a bit risky. Haha

Aside from that, the touch of wood made it feel like home. Shops are just down the street and there is decent nightlife. A few bars with good drinks and surprisingly not overpriced. Overall experience was good. She responds fast like she's attached to the phone and is very helpful. Couldn't ask for a better host.

Doris Mel's place was perfect for our stay! It was clean, stylish, and comfortable. Doris Mel was quick to respond to questions about check-in and check-out which made the process super easy! The location was also ideal and there was so much to do right in the neighborhood. Would definitely recommend and stay again!
Exactly as in the pictures
Really enjoyed our stay at this bright and cheerful place. The beds were so comfortable and there were lovely, small restaurants nearby. There were so many to choose from!

Nothing negative! The host responds very quickly to messages, the place is exactly as in the photos. Lack of nothing, draps and pillows in extra in the condo even. Comfortable beds and a few minutes from the metro and city center. Really great!

Doris' place is very clean, nicely appointed, has air conditioning (very important in the summer months) and a free parking spot. Unfortunately when I was looking at the map, I didn’t notice how far away the condo is from downtown so we spent a lot more time on the metro than we’re used to. We like to walk everywhere, but it wasn’t possible to walk to where we were spending our days (Old Port and downtown). If you’re planning to spend more time by Jean Talon Marketplace and in Old Italy, this is a great place to stay. Overall, we loved the condo and the fact that we didn’t have to worry about our car the whole time we were there, but the location was just too far away for us.

Overall, this is a good place and we had a nice stay. The space looks exactly like the photos, and it’s a perfectly sized apartment in my opinion. There are a few great bars and restaurants within blocks. The bed was comfortable. 

The main thing lacking was communication. The hosts never responded to my messages on Airbnb asking about check-in, all the way till the morning of our arrival. I texted both numbers listed in the House Manual and one of them finally answered hours before we got there. Doris was helpful and friendly over text but I wish there would’ve been better communication from the beginning and throughout our stay. On our last day, I asked about the details of checking out (wanting to know if we had to do anything specific before we left), but I never got an answer, so we just kind of guessed.

Other things to note: This is definitely more of a businesslike Airbnb, rather than someone’s actual home. I think they could use a fan in the bedroom. We weren’t sure if the towels or linens were 100% clean. The TV doesn’t have cable and you’d need to bring your own HDMI cord if you want to connect your computer to it. WiFi was good. Neighborhood is kind of a funny mish-mash of shops, but it has its charms. Parking spot was ideal.

If host communication improves, I would recommend this place!
Nice location, and easy access to downtown with the Metro nearby. Nice home.

The apartment is stylish and clean. The staff at the furniture store, which belongs to the same owner as the apartment, was very helpful in guiding us through check-in. 

We greatly enjoyed our stay in the apartment.

Doris Mel's place was great, just as in the pictures. Very stylish and clean. I can't say enough good things about the neighborhood, we had so much fun exploring the area. It's also a quick walk to the metro station to get access to the other parts of the city. The parking behind the unit was a huge plus. We just parked the car and left it there for the duration of our stay (we were on a road trip). Also, the in-unit washer and dryer were huge for us because they allowed us to pack light. There's a full-sized supermarket a couple of blocks away where you can stock up on supplies. Thanks Doris Mel!
Beautiful loft, great location. Easy access to shopping, close parking space. Mel responded quickly to any questions I had. My family really enjoyed staying here.
Doris' place is in a wonderful neighborhood. It is a spacious loft and it is steps away from some great restaurants and a few blocks away from the Metro.
Doris's place was extremely clean, nice, and looked exactly as the photos showed. It was in a great location and helped make our visit even more special. Thank you!
Fine place. The location is fun and you can walk to a bunch of other cool neighborhoods. The layout of the bedrooms without doors is very strange when staying with four people.
Clean and comfortable living space, very well located!

Mel's place was fabulous! Super nicely decorated and comfortable. It's on a vibrant street with lots of bars and dining options. Our family of four enjoyed it to the fullest. The parking spot was a plus for us!
Perfect location and truly beautiful home
Great place to stay!

The space is beautiful and comfortable, located in the most fantastic neighborhood.  Would definitely stay again! 

The space lacks some kitchen basics (salt, pepper, oil etc.), but all can be accessed at nearby shops.

The A/C and parking were so appreciated for our August stay.
Nice place, not so easy to find the entrance

You can't go wrong with Doris' place. The neighborhood is fantastic, you're a short walk to the metro, and the apartment is very comfortable. The air conditioning was a lifesaver, and since there are no doors on the bedrooms the air circulates well to cool the entire apartment. For coffee drinkers, there's a Keurig coffeemaker but the closest stores don't carry the pods. We found the pods at Marché Station 54 near the Rosemont metro.

Perfect location, nice apartment well-equipped and easy to live in with an outdoor patio. 

No doors inside make intimacy a little difficult.

Host very responsive even though not present.

Steep steps to access the condo.

Definitely recommendable
Doris's place is as advertised. It is very clean and within walking distance to many shops and restaurants within a couple of blocks. Highly recommended!

The apartment was very nice and clean. The unit itself was surprisingly quiet given how lively the area was. The location was great, and would definitely recommend this place for other travelers.

However, communication could have been better. We were not made aware that there were two lockboxes (one for us, the other for the unit next door also rented out by the same host). We spent a lot of time trying to open up the wrong lockbox, as the other one was on a side wall which wasn't very noticeable (especially at night). Our calls/texts/messages to the host were not getting a response. The neighbors also came out to try and help us, and it took all five of us another 10 minutes of trying to reach the host before the neighbors noticed another lockbox on the side wall. This was the only time I've ever been frustrated with an Airbnb check-in process.

I'd still recommend this place, as it was very nice and reasonably priced. However, I would suggest that you get all of the detailed instructions from the host before the check-in date to avoid any issues.

Beautiful apartment in a very nice part of the city; great vibes from the neighborhood! Tons of food places right in the market area, hard to beat the location. The place was nice and clean and well stocked with extra pillows and blankets and towels. The shower was very nice and modern with a skylight which was nice. There is a very nice seating area out back that didn’t sound too great in the reviews but it's actually a great space my friends and I enjoyed relaxing out back there
Great place. Highly recommended.
Fantastic place. Beautiful apartment. Just outside the city center (taxi to downtown). Spacious. We really enjoyed our stay.
Beautiful apartment in a fantastic location near everything. I would definitely recommend this place to my friends and family.

Had a great stay at Doris's place
Not too far from the tourist area
Would definitely come back!
Doris was a great host and was very responsive, very cool area of Montreal!
Great location and space
Very good house
great location!
The loft is bright and airy. The furnishings are stylish and comfortable. Recommended.

This is a pretty cool place to stay, but there are a few things that could be improved upon, and a few things that should be mentioned. 

Some of the windows don't have curtains, which can make it awkward after dark. There was no hand soap or hand towel in the bathroom, and there were only three towels for the four of us. There are also 35 narrow steps to haul your suitcases up; not a problem if you're young and strong. This rental is very open concept, with no doors on the bedrooms, and one open to the living room.

On the plus side, it was super clean, the bed linens were crisp and clean, and the furniture was in excellent condition. Very stylish place!
Cute place!
Excellent value for money. Quiet accommodation.

The apartment is very clean, the explanations are very clear, the neighborhood is very quiet, and it's only a 5-minute walk from Papineau station! The decoration is magnificent! There's nothing to say.  

Excellent addresses are just a few streets away from pizzerias or brunch (at Régine's). 

Thank you to Doris Mel for making these few days perfect.

Stylish and accurately described. Our family stayed here for one night. Great trendy neighborhood with plenty of great restaurants and coffee shops. 

Thanks!

A cute and very clean little apartment within walking distance of the Beaubien metro station. Very clean and a great base for walks to Jean-Talon, Mile End, Plateau, Little Italy and other great areas. Would recommend! It may not be suitable for those with accessibility requirements as access is up a narrow staircase. Also, if you are planning to cook for yourself (we didn't) you should bring some basic supplies with you. Overall, a lovely place for a short trip to Montreal!
In the heart of Saint-Hubert Square, a beautiful and well-decorated property. Good value for money, I recommend it.
You will not regret staying at her place! It's well-located and beautiful!
Doris' place was beautifully furnished, close to the metro station and grocery store. Highly recommend Z Biztro (across the street) for great food and live music.
"Wow, this place is amazing! So well-located and so stylish, I absolutely loved my stay!"
Doris' home is conveniently located near public transportation. Her beautiful kitchen made us feel like we were at home, allowing us to enjoy breakfast together.

Great location. We were able to Uber everywhere. Also the metro station is very close. Everything was as described. The apartment is open, very nicely decorated. The bathroom is big, and the convenience of having a washer and dryer. Parking is a plus.

Very clean and up-to-date. It was a pretty good stay because of that, but it was difficult to find the place and parking in the back alley. It was also difficult to decipher what the host expected the place to look like or anything. There was no reassurance from the host whether or not everything was going okay. If you're looking for the least amount of communication and just a clean place to stay for the night, this is it for you. Unfortunately, it made our experience less of an experience because it was a trip for a group of us and we didn't get any recommendations or anything from the host.
One of the best places to stay in Montreal, as everything is close by. All kinds of shops and restaurants are close to the location. My recommendation is to go for it.

The apartment is extremely clean, well-designed, warm, and well-maintained. Additionally, communication with Doris was flawless, and I had no problems checking in or out. I didn't give it five stars because basic items like soap or coffee that I generally expect in many Airbnbs were missing for me. Furthermore, the extremely steep and narrow staircase was a little concerning, especially when walking in the dark. Otherwise, highly recommended.
Lovely location and a stylish, roomy, sleek apartment. Terrific host!
Very clean and very pretty, well-located I loved it

Located decently (not necessarily within walking distance) near Mile End and other great parts of Montreal. It's super close to the metro, which is very easy to navigate and convenient for exploring the city. The apartment is really cool and well decorated, with two queen-size beds that are really comfortable. There was no soap in the entire apartment, and also no hand towels, which was a minor inconvenience. 

But otherwise, it's a great spot, and I would recommend!

Had a wonderful stay in this conveniently located and well-decorated unit. The host was very quick to respond to all of our questions and needs, and the ability to have parking and being very close to key attractions (walking distance to the market and cute stores, as well as a quick Uber ride to downtown) made the stay extra enjoyable.

This place was great for our family of four as it was cozy, comfortable, and clean! The entire suite is spacious and there are two separate rooms with two large beds (although there are no doors separating the spaces, so if you have snorers, you'll still hear it) and a nice living room area with a TV. Doris was very responsive to my texts whenever I had any questions and was wonderful to speak with! Just note that parking is just street parking, so you will have to pay out of pocket.
Great space and location.

Clean and stylish open concept space. Great for groups of friends traveling. There's a nice coffee and dessert place across the street, a costume store (Dracolite) on the street, and all the general amenities you would need. The subway station is around the corner. The beds were comfortable! I enjoyed staying there!
Great location! Stylish and cozy place with basic amenities.

Overall, I enjoyed my stay; the only problem I had was with the front glass door being broken (you can reach the lock from outside because the glass is all broken, which also means anyone can come in) and glass was all over the front entrance. A big piece of glass was leaning against the lock, which led to me cutting my finger... besides that, it was a nice place to stay.
The apartment was clean and pleasant.

Great stay. Overall a great value. Only reasons for 4 stars instead of 5: parking was very far from the entrance, we had to walk down a back alley at night with the road completely iced over with our luggage and there were no doors on the two rooms so don't expect great privacy. But a great launching pad in Montreal and beautiful decor!
all good
