When we arrived at the apartment, we discovered there was no key in the lock box. Multiple calls, texts, and messages to the host were not answered. After an hour of attempting to contact the host, who had left the key in the wrong lock box, we finally left and got a hotel. If the host had answered the phone and given us the code to the lock box containing the key everything would have been fine. When I attempted to call the host the next morning she hung up on me and all subsequent calls went directly to voice mail. RENT AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!
Beautiful home and everything was absolutely perfect! Thanks for the great hospitality! :)
My accommodation is magnificent, very warmly furnished, and we feel like we're on the lively Saint Hubert street. It's well-located and highly recommended.

Carole's central location is something you can't miss. It's really clean, spacious, close to downtown, St Catherine Street, and a 5-minute drive to the Old Port. She herself is very helpful and accommodating. I would highly recommend staying at her place.
Perfect for spending a few days in Montreal
Carole's apartment is a very nice place with a great location. It's quite clean and beautiful. My mom and I have had a really good time here.
The apartment is beautiful and the location is great! Carole was very nice and she responded very quickly to my questions.
Carole's place was great! I would recommend it to anyone!
The host cancelled this reservation 82 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great place, very clean

I selected this apartment for its location and value, and I was quite pleased. From this location, we didn't even use our car. We just rode our bicycles everywhere. The bike trail is not far, and it took us to Old Montreal and beyond. The second bed in the apartment is a pull-out couch, which was comfortable enough for our short stay. We were there during a heat wave, and we noticed with the bedroom door closed the bedroom was stuffy, but that was solved the next night by leaving the door open. I opted to park curbside and received a parking fine, not realizing it was illegal there. Next time I would pay to park in the garage. Overall, we were quite happy with the apartment, and Carole was very responsive and helpful.
Clean and ideally located apartment. We have all walked but you have the option to take the metro, which is 5 minutes away on foot.
Spacious and comfortable apartment in a great location. We had a good time!

The apartment was located near an airport shuttle stop and close to many restaurants and coffee shops. 

The apartment itself offered only basic amenities. It appeared no one lived there when it wasn't being rented out by short-term Airbnb guests, meaning some things were missing that someone living in the place might have had (e.g., a hairdryer).  Getting into the apartment was easy with the keyless entry. Carole was nice although I didn't meet her in person. She was available via text for the most part. We had a pleasant one-night stay in Montreal at Carole's place. :)
Fantastic room located in a great area. Close to public transportation and downtown Montreal. Very clean and spacious. Would recommend!
Carole's place was great - so close to downtown and Old Montreal with tons of shops and restaurants. Her place is well-equipped and very comfortable.

Carole's place is clean, simple, and tucked away quietly from the main hustle and bustle of Montreal—exactly what we were looking for in our short stay. Carole is easy and efficient to communicate with. We appreciated her quick responses to adapt to our changing circumstances prior to arrival.

Carole was easy to reach and very accommodating, letting us check in early! The space was well cleaned and accurate to the posting. The only downside being that the laundry service costs $4 to use and the wifi was spotty. Overall a good stay and would recommend to my friends.

A big thank you to Carole for her hospitality and availability. The apartment is very pleasant, clean, and quiet, perfectly located near the city center and public transportation so we can enjoy Montreal, it makes us want to come back.
Easy to communicate with. Very flexible check-in process. Great location. Highly recommend

Carole's place was really conveniently located in the downtown area, close to bus and metro stops. We enjoyed using the pool a few times. Check-in and check-out were very straightforward. Thanks, Carole.

The location of this place is perfect!!! One block from Rue Saint Catherine, where you can find all sorts of places to eat. A quick walk to downtown. One block from the subway. Quiet street. Full kitchen for cooking meals. Brand new dishwasher. Carole was awesome to communicate with us.
Great place. Walkable! Quick communication with host!

Carole's place had everything we needed! It was very spacious, clean, and comfortable. The location was amazing, as it was a very short walk to both Saint Catherine St. and downtown while also being tucked away from busy traffic. It's the perfect place to make you feel safe and at home!
The apartment was perfect. It had everything we needed. Very clean and smelled nice. Close to public transportation and the central station. I recommend renting it.

Great location, clean, comfortable, and well-equipped. A lovely place with almost everything you need, including a little balcony if you like getting some fresh air. The WiFi signal was kinda weak in the bedroom and there was no TV in the living room, but overall, it was a very pleasant stay. 10/10 would recommend.
Great host, quick response and very helpful. Excellent location if you're going to the Bell Centre!! Would definitely book again!
Carole's apartment is very comfortable and well-equipped, plus it's in a great location. We found it to be very clean. One of the best places I have stayed at on Airbnb.

Great location

Close to food, pharmacy, and metro.

Avoid walking alone at night as a woman, as there have been some local incidents of catcalling. 

Otherwise, we would definitely stay again.

Sarah's place is a nice little apartment in a great downtown location. It is very close to the Metro station, which was very convenient. It was very hot when we traveled, and the air conditioner wasn't able to compete with the heat, so the apartment was quite warm. The WiFi also doesn't work very well. Other than that, we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend it.

Parking is available on site, with a fee required due to the city's high density. It's located below the high-rise apartment building and can be a little confusing at first. You must exit the drive ramp when you arrive as you won't have the code card yet to scan. Once you do, it's easy in and out. Little extras in the apartment make it comfortable and clean. This was our first Airbnb experience and we had a good one. We walked everywhere but public transportation would also get us there.

Sarah's place is amazing! It's super close to everything we needed and we were able to find parking nearby. Communication with Sarah was super easy, and once we arrived at the apartment, it surprised me how clean and nice it was. She provided us with everything we need (or may need) for our stay. I totally recommend it and I would love to stay there next time I go back to Montreal.
Sarah is super available. Spacious and clean apartment.

Sarah's apartment is larger than it appears in the photos. Easy access to the metro, you can walk to 3 different stations. Very clean and tidy. A supermarket and several restaurants nearby. Sarah is an excellent host, easy to communicate with and attentive to any questions. An added bonus is that there are toiletries in the bathroom and bottled water available, plus enough towels for your stay.

Sarah's place was excellent. She communicated with me to ensure our stay was pleasant and we had everything we needed. 

Very clean, walkable to downtown Montreal, and a stone's throw from lots of restaurants and city life. Highly recommended to anyone looking for reasonably priced accommodation in Montreal.
Clean, spacious area. Walking to the small burgundy area is far and requires navigating under a highway.
Shoutout Sarah!
Very comfortable room! There are many great restaurants nearby and you can walk to the city center. I recommend this house to everyone, especially for those with families.

Sarah's location is ideal, very central to everything, including the train station. We had a very pleasant and excellent stay, thanks to the cleanliness of the apartment and the super easy check-in/check-out process. Five stars!

Sarah's place was perfect for our quick trip to Montreal. The location was amazing, parking in the building was a huge plus, the apartment was super clean and we felt right at home. We would definitely love to stay here again :)

Sarah's place was great for our stay in Montreal! The location was awesome, and we were able to walk almost everywhere we wanted to go. We had a couple of issues come up, and Sarah was quick to resolve them.
Everything was great, Sarah was a very responsive host. The apartment was very clean and modern; we would definitely return again.
Our stay in Montreal was amazing! We were so close to everything and the apartment was huge!
Very nice location near downtown Montreal. Clean and spacious, we really enjoyed our stay!

My sister and I stayed at Sarah's place during an incredibly cold three days in Montreal. It's a beautiful one-bedroom apartment with a pullout couch located very close to downtown and the subway. Definitely would stay here again as it is a great spot and was at a great price.

Sarah was an excellent host with great hospitality. Her place was spacious and comfortable, making my stay in Montreal even more enjoyable. She was also a very good host and was very helpful. I would highly recommend her place to anyone staying in the downtown Montreal area. Thank you again, Sarah!
The stay here was absolutely lovely. So close to all amenities - shops, restaurants, hockey arena, but very quiet with it. The place is spacious and very comfortable. I would definitely recommend
Better than the post. Great location. Host is very responsive and helpful. Definitely recommend
Great clean apartment. Heart of Montreal for sure. 5 minutes away from Sainte-Catherine. Cheap and secure underground parking. I would definitely stay there again

Had a wonderful stay at Sarah's apartment. 

The location was central, the apartment had everything we needed, and Sarah responded to any questions I had very quickly.

I would highly recommend staying here in Montreal.

Thank you for having us, Sarah! 😊
Convenient location of the flat, great response time, very attentive to details.

I recommend this place without hesitation. Everything I needed was available. It's a very cozy place, clean, and it felt like home. The location is perfect as I lived in Montreal for 13 years and went to Concordia University. It's close to all kinds of fun entertainment places, close to the metro, and it's a safe area.

This apartment provided everything we needed. It was a short walk to all the downtown stores, restaurants, and bars.  It was great to have a full kitchen and a balcony to catch some sun and fresh air. We felt very safe with our car in the parking garage and the secure entrance. We would stay here again on our next trip to Montreal!

Great place to stay in Montreal. Very convenient location, close to Ste-Catherine Street. Easy check-in and quick responses from Sarah. Clean, nice, and comfortable apartment. Would definitely recommend and stay there again!
Very good stay at Sarah's.

Sarah's place was great. She kept in touch before and during our stay and check-in was super easy. The apartment was really clean and had everything you could need. There was plenty of space and a very good shower!

It was in a great location close to Lucien L’Allier and Guy Concordia Métro stations and just around the corner from the 747 airport bus stop. Despite being next to a busy highway and a fairly busy railway line, there were no issues with noise at all (thanks to the good windows). Only a 5-minute walk to St Catherine Street and a maximum of 20-minute walk to downtown.

If I'm back in Montréal, I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again!
Translation: Excellent stay at Sarah's place, who is very available to answer any questions. The apartment is clean, well-equipped and in a great location for exploring Montreal. I recommend
Amazing stay. Will definitely go back

Awesome location! Walking distance to St. Catherine's and Crescent Street. Quiet apartment, great bed and I can't say enough about the location and value. We will definitely look to book again for our next visit to Montreal.
Sarah's place was clean, comfortable, and the perfect space for two! We were so happy here and highly recommend it.
Exceeded my expectations.
Very clean and well-furnished!
Great location and value! We truly enjoyed our stay. It would be wonderful to have a couple of outdoor chairs to enjoy coffee or wine on the balcony. Thank you!

Great place! Comfortable and close to everything I wanted to do and see. Would recommend it to others. Communication was great too. Would stay here again in the future. Hope I can return soon!

Stayed at Sarah's for a brief 2-day trip to see a concert at the Bell Center. Fantastic location, just a 10-minute walk away. Also within walking distance of great restaurants and pubs. The space was clean, bright, and airy. Everything worked, including the AC. Beds were comfortable and linens were clean and fresh. Great shower. Lots of space, including a balcony. Quiet building too. Would recommend this place and host in a heartbeat. Hopefully I will get to stay here again. Thanks Sarah.

I rented this place for my son to take his 13-year-old daughter to Montreal for her birthday. He sent me a text to say the place was excellent - the location couldn't be better, the availability of parking within the building helped a great deal and was not expensive - the food in the breakfast buffet worked well and he just found it overall excellent - and very clean. Thanks to the hosts.

Sarah was a lifesaver. Our original booking got canceled very close to our travel date. Sarah was very responsive and helpful in coming to our rescue. We then experienced another uproar with Airbnb themselves, and Sarah had our back the entire time. I am very thankful for what she did and provided us with during our stay. We walked to Old Montreal, all through St Catherine. And everything was close if you didn't mind the walk. Being 10 minutes from the Bell Centre, which was our main reason for our trip, was amazing. We felt very safe during our stay, and would highly recommend this space. And we will definitely check for availability on our next trip.
Nice modern place, but cleaning and customer service need improvement
Sarah is an excellent host! She responds quickly and is extremely helpful. We had a wonderful stay while traveling with our child.
Very cool location in a great location. Simple and autonomous. But very noisy surroundings.

Excellent value for money, comfortable bedding, clean and fully equipped apartment!

Sarah's place was really nice and it is conveniently located, making access to downtown Montreal very easy. The place was also very clean, I would recommend this place to any travelers staying in Montreal.

Sarah's house is in a perfect location; the bus from the airport drops you off 3 minutes walking from the house, you have 2 different subway stations within 7 minutes walking from the house and it’s a nice, short walk to get downtown!

Although we never met Sarah, she answered right away to all of our questions, both house-related and not, such as where we could find supermarkets late at night!

The flat is very spacious and provided with everything you might need both for short-term and long-term stays: plenty of towels, soap, shampoos and conditioners, pans and pots, coffee maker, hair dryer...

We absolutely loved the house and it helped us enjoy our 5-day stay in Montreal even more!
Apartment quite pleasant to live in with everything necessary to be well from the moment of arrival.
Very clean and cozy place to stay! I would definitely stay here again someday.

Fantastic apartment in a very central location. Spacious and comfortable. We didn't see Sarah because she gave us a code to enter the apartment, but she is constantly attentive to your arrival and any doubts you may have. Respond immediately. Better than expected.

Nice, clean and cozy, very good location, very close to the commercial area of Quebec.

Excellent and fast communication with Sarah, always very attentive to our needs.

Of course I would go back here and highly recommend it.

Super stay at Sarah's! The apartment is easy to access from the airport and within fifteen minutes walking distance of the city center. Thanks again
Great stay, super helpful host and parking was super useful! Apartment bigger than expected!!!
Ideal location a few hundred meters from the metro. Easy access with the pass and codes. Pleasant accommodation with all amenities. Excellent stay.
The host was very accommodating and made us feel right at home. The apartment had a nice balcony and everything was very clean. We would definitely stay here again if we ever return to Montreal.

We had a pleasant stay at Sarah's place! It is well-equipped, well-located and well-served by public transport. Sarah was attentive to her guests (with cool air and fresh bottles upon our arrival). We totally recommend it, thank you Sarah!

Sarah's apartment is great, located in a very safe part of town. The rooms are all very clean and fully stocked with everything we needed! Sarah was great at responding quickly and was very accommodating with all requests
Great location, great apartment, and would recommend it anytime.
Great place, location and host. Sarah made our stay in Montreal as pleasant as it could be, thank you!

Pleasant stay at Sarah's place, apartment located close to the city center, small welcome touches appreciated upon arrival, very clean and well-equipped. I recommend!

Sarah's place was in a fabulous location, close to transportation and shops, and safe with security on the front doors of the building. 

All instructions for finding it and accessing it were clear and easy. The bed was very comfortable, and the space was great in size. The extra touches, such as bottled water, were fabulous. Having wifi was also great as an international traveler.

Sarah's place is lovely. Check-in was a breeze. The location is right downtown. I walked everywhere, and it's near bus stops and conference centers. Comfy bed, safe neighborhood. Her place was perfect!

We stayed at Sarah's place for 3 days during our visit to Montreal. Sarah was very easy to communicate with and responded promptly. The Airbnb was very clean (and smelled amazing!) cozy, spacious and centrally located to all sightseeing spots/attractions. Everything was provided such as soap, linens, pots, pans, silverware etc. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone and stay here again!!

**Advantages:** Spacious apartment well-equipped, reasonably located, comfortably heated in winter, quiet.

**Disadvantages:** Proximity to noisy railway line in the morning, convertible sofa only suitable as a temporary bed for children.
Excellent value for money. We will return on our next visit. Thank you, Sarah!
Amazing location, amazing host, let us in to retrieve a lost item after check-out.

This is the second trip to Sarah's place and it was just as great as the last time I was there. Sarah is always a great host and was clear with her communication. This place is cozy and you will feel right at home. Thank you again Sarah and I of course will be back for the summer! Merci!

Everything she has described is accurate. It was a great stay with everything so close to explore downtown Montreal!

Marc-Antoine was an accommodating and arranging host. However, the price-quality ratio seemed elevated compared to the services provided and neighbors were very noisy.

My boyfriend and I had a delightful stay at Jade's cozy apartment.  Jade met us at her apartment and provided us with a helpful itinerary and advice on what to do and where to go.  She generously gave us a quick walk through of where to find things and even provided us with complimentary coffee, teas, and chocolate. The apartment itself had so much natural light and had a cute patio where we enjoyed breakfast in the mornings.  It was situated in a great location close to cute bars and restaurants.  Thank you for the stay, Jade, hope to be back in the future!
Jade was an amazing host who helped me out in every way. She kept in close contact with speedy responses and her apartment was great! I would definitely stay there again in a heartbeat.

We would be delighted to return to Jade's beautiful and bright apartment! It looks just as pictured in the photos. There were lots of stairs to get up to it, but it's a great space with nice views, perfectly located near the plateau, McGill University, and Place des Arts. The apartment was well equipped. The bed was comfortable, and the WIFI was fast and efficient. It is a great find in a super location!

Jade's apartment is just as charming as it seems in the photos, and she is so communicative and helpful. She even left us a two-page, handwritten guide of things to do, see, and eat in Montreal. 

Her kitchen has everything you'd need to cook (go to Jean Talon Market for the freshest produce imaginable, and excellent cheese). Her street is lovely and convenient. Just a few blocks from Juliette et Chocolat on St Laurent, where you can get the very best dark hot chocolate ever. A short walk to several buses and a metro, and a slightly longer walk to Mont Royal Park, the Quartier Des Spectacles, and to the McCord and Beaux Arts museums. 

The bed is comfortable. The balcony is perfect for morning coffee (though we never ended up sitting out there because we had breakfast out every day). The neighborhood seemed really quiet while the students were gone, though got louder the last night we were there as the school year seemed to have started again.

I would absolutely stay here again.

A big thank you for your warm welcome! The apartment is perfect in terms of its quietness and ease of access to all of Montreal. It's a 5-10 minute bus or metro ride away from everything, allowing you to explore all the vibrant facets of this city. Highly recommended for romantic or cultural weekends! A grand loft where light reigns supreme with breathtaking views of Mount Royal throughout every season. Simply THANK YOU.
The host cancelled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Laurel's loft is indeed magical. I loved every minute of my stay there. The loft had a comfy sleeping area; a comfy desk and chair for working; a beautiful view of the backyard garden through a big window; a skylight to gently wake you in the morning; a nice, clean bathroom; a kitchen with two stove tops (no oven) where one can do decent cooking—it was all that I was looking for. The loft is quite compact but very functional and beautiful, it worked perfectly for me. PLUS the location - Duluth Avenue, St. Denis Street, La Fontaine Park, Mont Royal Park, etc., are all steps away or within easy reach. PLUS the host - Laurel was so thoughtful, responsive, helpful, and kind. I recommend this place with no hesitation.

I loved staying here. It's super cozy and the location is fantastic, just one street away from a bunch of bars and restaurants! 

Laurel, even though I didn't get to meet her face-to-face, was highly available, accommodating, and very friendly.

Keep in mind this place is tiny!! I do not recommend it for people who like to hang out in the apartment too much. I would highly recommend it for people like me who spend most of their time out and about and just need a nice cozy place to lay their head down for the night. 

If I go back to Montreal, I hope to stay there again.

Cozy and quiet little place! Laurel was flexible with the check-in time and responsive when I had questions. The location is fantastic, close to cafes, restaurants, and shops, a 10-minute walk to the Metro Mt. Royal.
Very cozy and perfectly located. Laurel was available to answer all my questions.

We absolutely loved Laurel's space! It is homey, clean, well-decorated, and had everything we needed and more for our stay. The location is great and Laurel was a very communicative and accommodating host. We would love to stay here again. She also recommended some wonderful spots to check out during our stay - so make sure to check those out! This was definitely one of our best vacation accommodations ever.
The Hobbit loft is excellently located and close to all amenities.
Tiny place as advertised, but cozy and well-setup

Laurel's place is great! She's very responsive, and the place is convenient, located near restaurants/bars/supermarkets/metro and in a cool area. 

I highly recommend this place!

This was a great spot! I arrived late, so the lockbox made check-in really easy. The location was ideal; I walked everywhere and only took the Metro/bus to and from the airport, plus the neighborhood is adorable with lots of cute houses and fun murals nearby, as well as tons of restaurants and bars.
Very nice place, everything was perfect
A very sweet little spot, well located and private. Check-in is very flexible and Laurel always responded promptly to communications. A great spot for a weekend getaway.

Lovely paradise close to everything!!! 
Laurel will welcome you in this hidden tiny loft, in a quiet street next to everything around.

Wonderful location right in the Plateau filled with nice bars and restaurants. Yet the B&B is super quiet, convenient for exploring Montreal on foot, with a tube station nearby. Highly recommended for solo travelers or couples!
The Hobbit Loft is a cute, quirky place and finds itself in a fantastic location for everything on the Plateau. You won't find better self-contained value anywhere.

Location!! Great for walking and close to the Metro.
Close to many great restaurants for evening dining and morning walks for pâtisserie and café.
Laurel is an excellent host and responds quickly to messages.
There was a small issue that Laurel addressed immediately and resolved very generously. 
I would recommend this accommodation ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Laura was incredibly nice and helpful. She went out of her way to make delayed baggage arrive at the flat late at night (~1 am) since I didn't have a local phone number. This was incredibly helpful. The only drawback was the loud fridge, which got better once I placed some paper towels on top. Otherwise, I slept like a baby. The place is cute and nicely located with everything you need. I would definitely come back again. Thanks!
Great location on the Plateau, cozy and peaceful space. Good place to stay in Montreal!
Excellent location. Easy and flexible check-in and check-out process and times.

I had a nice time at Laurels place! It is indeed a small hobbit loft, cozy and well-equipped, just the fridge was a bit noisy and in summertime it can get really hot upstairs. I recommend this apartment for a short trip! Laurel was really easy with check-in and check-out and welcoming! Thanks!

Laurel's apartment is identical to the photos. It is immaculately clean. Laurel has been very responsive to my questions. The apartment is well-located, a few stops from downtown. I really enjoyed this stay in Montreal! Thank you, Laurel

The best choice I could have made for my first days in Montreal! Laurel was the best hostess and Hobbit's place the best Airbnb ever! The location is perfect, the apartment is magical, inspiring, full of loving details. Many trees around and a ceiling where you can sleep looking at the moon and talking to the stars. Laurel was really nice and helped me a lot. Everything was clean and a lovely welcome message with some coffee were waiting for my arrival. Thank you for opening your home for me! It was really special.
A cute spot in an amazing location! Laurel was a lovely lovely host. I was fortunate to stay here for a month and thoroughly enjoyed all my moments.
Pleasant accommodation well-located and well-arranged. Discover it!
Great stay in Montreal! Davide was great at communicating details and answering any questions I had. The place was exactly as described and was perfect for our group's stay.

We had a wonderful stay at Davide's house. The house is located in a beautiful area of Montreal, and within walking distance to a bunch of trendy shops and restaurants. The house was very clean and we were offered everything we needed (laundry, kitchen supplies, coffee, towels, etc). Our favorite part was sitting outside to eat breakfast in the private backyard. Athena, the cat, was sweet, quiet and easy to take care of. 

Davide had great recommendations, was very communicative and accommodated an early check-in for us. I would highly recommend this Airbnb for anyone looking to stay in a fun, non-touristy part of Montreal.
The host cancelled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Davide and Pierre's home offers great style, location, and value! It looks even better than the photos, because the kitchen and downstairs have been recently renovated. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone who wants to experience living in a neighborhood setting. However, please keep in mind that the home is not air-conditioned, and it's located next door to a charming BYOB restaurant. The latter has outdoor seating in the back during warm months, so there is some outside noise until about 11 or so on weeknights and until about midnight on Saturday.
Davide went above and beyond. He left information about local spots and how to access them. Amazing, and we hope we can stay again. Thank you again, Davide.
Very pleasant stay at Davide's. Everything was clean and matched the descriptions. Excellent location, a short bike ride or walk from lively neighborhoods. Thank you.

Davide's house is lovely and located in a beautiful and lively area. It has a cozy backyard where you can spend special evenings in the summer. The house has a cool decoration, and everything is handy in the kitchen. 

The only thing we were not satisfied with about the house, although we knew the owners lived there, was that we felt like we didn't have enough space to store our personal belongings in the kitchen and bedroom. And the owners didn't go the extra mile to make us feel welcomed like the other houses we stayed in during this trip. 

Overall, a good stay.

Davide is a very responsive person who has answered all of our questions. Upon arrival, we were not disappointed; the accommodation was impeccable, spacious and well-equipped, and it's ideally located (bakery, bus stop, convenience store are nearby).  The neighborhood is also very lively. 

We will definitely be back in the summer...
Wonderful condo in an excellent location. Carlos was incredibly hospitable and friendly! Thanks for the lovely stay!

My girlfriend and I stayed here for Memorial weekend and the place was very convenient to the center of town, the metro, restaurants, and shopping. The apartment was modern and quiet, and the underground parking was a huge plus! Carlos was pleasant and responsive to any questions we had, and we would highly recommend his place to anyone traveling to Montreal.
Everything was great! Carlos is very nice. The place was well-stocked, in a good location, and of a good size!

Superb place! Very clean and easy access. Carlos was fantastic in accommodating us with 2 parking spots. Although we were two couples, it was good thing we brought a throw blanket and pillows for the pull-out because there were none other than that fantastic. We would definitely rebook with Carlos.

Carlos and this apartment really checked all the boxes for what an Airbnb should be. The location is great, the price is great, and Carlos is so helpful and flexible. I will be staying here again on my next trip back to Montreal.

Amazing place to stay located downtown, Carlos was a very helpful host who took care of our needs. 

I enjoyed my stay here and definitely look forward to staying again in the future.

Thank you, Carlos, for the excellent hospitality you extended to us.

Carlos' apartment is located within walking distance of Downtown Montréal and makes it an ideal starting point for exploring the city. It is newly renovated and features all the amenities a tourist needs. Despite its central location, the night is quiet thanks to modern construction. Washing our clothes was also easy.
Highly recommended. An apartment with everything you could need, all amenities. A quiet neighborhood and very well-connected, both from the city center and the airport.

Carlos was a fantastic host who was very flexible and incredibly easy to communicate with. We had a great time and would recommend the spot to anyone looking for a few days in a great part of the city!

I especially enjoyed the cleanliness and the excellent quality of the entire décor, the functionality of the items, the studio apartment was really cozy and cheap compared to the offer of hotels and residences in Montreal. If you have special space requirements, it is best to point to a two-room apartment, here the bed, although separate from the living room/kitchenette, is visible. My review is great, I would recommend it even for a stay longer than two weeks that my husband and I spent there.

Perfect place.

The unit is new, clean and everything works perfectly. The location is excellent, downtown (close to Guy Concordia subway station on the green line and to Lucien L'Allier on the orange line) and at less than 5 minutes on foot to St-Catherine Street. 

I loved my time there and I would recommend it to anyone.
Very clean apartment. Carlos met me to hand over the keys and explain everything. It is very difficult to find a better location.
Very nice location and very clean. Carlos responds promptly to requests. We recommend him.

My husband and I really enjoyed ourselves in Montreal. The location was perfect for us and it was easy to walk to many restaurants and shops. The condo is beautiful and very clean. We really appreciated all the nice homey touches and that the kitchen had pots and pans and even olive oil. Would highly recommend

It was a brand new condo, very clean and in a good location.

The apartment is clean, ideal location for people who love the city center, responsive host, there is just that at the moment the building is under construction and it starts early before 8:00 AM.

Carlos' place was great, conveniently located, super clean, stylish, and offered great value. Carlos was responsive, check-in was super easy, and overall, despite the frigid temperatures, it was a great stay!

Very caring host, always willing to help.

Recommended for a budget stay.

Caroline is a friendly and welcoming host. Communication was easy and the organization of the stay went very well.

The apartment was pleasant. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Good for tight budgets.

Caroline is a very welcoming and hospitable host. The room without openings is clean and located in a quiet neighborhood, an hour's drive from the city center, but well-served. Very good for tight budgets.

This was my first experience with rbnb and it was 100% successful. Caroline and Mustapha welcomed me very warmly, I felt like home. The owners were not hesitant to give help when needed. I spent a wonderful time with them and it was an excellent stay. The apartment is clean, access to the kitchen without any problems, entering the apartment at a flexible time is very practical. The price is equivalent to the quality given. I highly recommend you rent a room with Caroline, you will not regret it! :)
Very solid, affordable. Adhered to the advertisement. Good communication and responsiveness.

Caroline is an excellent host, quick to respond to requests. The place is well-organized upon entry; there's information to guide us with any questions we may have, which is very convenient. 

The bed was incredibly comfortable, and there's a kitchen where we can cook as well. I would definitely go back to sleep at Caroline's place.
Caroline is a good host with nice communication and willingness to support visitors. The place is fairly cheap to stay.
Great host. Nice place, thank you.
For a small budget
Very nice host, quick response

The host was argumentative when I told her there were no drinking glasses in the kitchen. She expected me to use one of the tiny little espresso cups. There was a sink full of dirty dishes from the time I got there until the time I left. We found a dead mouse on the kitchen counter one day. The bathroom sink was disgusting when I got there but cleaned, but not well, a couple days later. The outside door was not just unlocked but open when I got there because it was broken. It was fixed a couple days later. There were new windows being put in the week I was there. She failed to tell me that until after I was there. The workmen were there too early in the morning for me and made a lot of noise which affected my sleep. You needed to take a long bus ride to get to the grocery store. Luckily, there was a well-stocked variety store just minutes away.

Although I did not meet her on my first day, Caroline was very helpful and provided very clear and straightforward instructions for check-in. She was also very quick to answer any questions I had via text. The room is simple, warm, and looks just like the photo. The location is convenient as the bus towards downtown Montreal runs on the same street. I would not hesitate to book again.
Landlord is excellent, enthusiastic, attentive, and convenient for shopping trips.

My son lived in this room for a month, he never met the host, however very easy to reach, he answered quickly. The room is functional and clean, however the common areas would need a little tidying up.

Great deal for travelers looking for a place to rest.

It is in the suburbs. Accessible by public transit via Metro and then the 189-E Bus from the Honoré-Beaugrand station. Which drops you 1 block from Apt. also take the 189-O bus to the metro from George V road. 
Convenience store within 1 block of apartment for essentials. 
Subway, Indian and Vietnamese restaurants about 1 mile walk.
I had cool roommates during my stay so hopefully you will too.

What you should know:
How to use Master Lock 5401D Key Box

Conclusion: I would stay here again


Places in Montreal I recommend to eat in Montreal
Coffee shop: Café Castel (near Mount Royal and McGill) latte was so good I had 3 
Place to eat: Little Sheep Mongolian Hot Pot (great food, great service)
Clean living space, room without a window, roommate of 17 years old who is supposed to do the cleaning... questionable
For a minimum budget, therefore... , a quality-price ratio that goes with it

Positioned approximately thirty meters from the wonderful Bellerive park, this apartment remains an ideal space for those who don't like noise. The tranquility is striking. The comfort of the bed is noticeable, rather remarkable. The kitchen is available at your service... 

A small caveat nonetheless, the cleanliness of communal spaces depends on the different roommates (kitchen, bathroom).

Not living in this apartment herself, Caroline is very responsive to any message or call... And how can you ignore her kindness and especially her concern for ensuring your well-being? Impossible.

I highly recommend it to everyone 
Liria
Great location, great cozy room for the price... best value for money place in Montreal. Caroline is quick to respond and was a wonderful host

Caroline is an exceptional host, with excellent welcome, very accessible and reachable in case of any issues.  In terms of quality-price ratio, it's really correct. The neighborhood isn't the prettiest in the city, but Bellerive Park is really nice, and the bus stop is incredibly close, and we are 20 minutes by metro to downtown! I recommend it!!! :p
Nice place but the beds are small
good host

Rafael was very nice and easy to communicate with! He also gave very good advice on what to see and do! 

The apartment was absolutely perfect!! The location was great, close to everything and a 10-minute walk to the Mont Royal metro station.  5 minutes away from Mont Royal Avenue and 10 minutes away from Berri UQAM. 

It's across from Parc Lafontaine which is one of the nicest parks, especially on a sunny day! We had a great stay and we will definitely come back and stay at his apartment if possible! Thank you, Rafael!

Everything was absolutely perfect! Rafa is an exceptional person, very easy to get in touch with and always respectful of any questions. The experience was great, the location of the apartment is perfect, close to good restaurants, a nice park for walking and biking. The studio is pleasant and easily accessible by public transport. I recommend it to everyone on Airbnb.
We had a good stay at Rafael's. He is very easy to communicate with as his co-host. They provided us with everything we needed to enjoy our stay. I would recommend staying at Rafael's.

Overall, this is a great place to stay! The hardest part was figuring out where to park. It's easier to find a spot on weekends, but I don't know where we would have parked if it was a weekday. Once we were settled though, my husband and I loved the apartment! We were able to cook there and it was a good size for two people. There is a big park right across the street that was nice to walk in, and if you want to, you could walk to downtown and save the hassle of driving. Rafael was also a great host and was very quick about responding to questions we had! He also left some snacks out for us and made staying there easy. I would highly recommend it if you're looking for an affordable place to spend the night and explore the city during the day.

The location was great and everything was just as described—if not better. Raphael was a great communicator and very helpful in making adjustments. I highly recommend his place for the location, value, and great hospitality!
Rafael is an excellent host and the apartment is in a very communicative area with restaurants, parks for picnics, shops, and more. Excellent location and hospitality. I highly recommend him.

Rafael is a great host. His place is comfortable for two people, maybe three at max. It's a 20-minute drive from tourist areas and local restaurants. Parking is challenging, but we parked two nights on the nearest street and didn't get into trouble. I would recommend Rafael's place!!!

Rafael made the entire process very easy. Communication was excellent. This location is fantastic. We were fortunate to find a parking spot right in front of the building, which turned out to be a great deal.
Rafael is great! He's thorough, helpful, gracious, and has a great apartment! Couldn't be more ideally located, right across from the park and near all the restaurants you read about online.
The host cancelled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Very friendly and available host. Perfect apartment to recommend
Simple... Easy to access... In front of the most beautiful park in Montreal... Thank you
Very cozy place to live. Close to everything.

This place was central and walkable to pretty much everything. Great value for money & perfect size for just me, but the futon couch was great for when my friend stayed over one of the nights. It's right across from Parc Fontaine & a nice walk to Mont-Royal. Rafael was very prompt with all communication including detailed instructions for self check in. Would recommend to any of my friends & would definitely stay there again if possible.

Rafael was an excellent host. Though we did not meet him, he was excellent at communicating with us and made check-in very easy. The apartment is nice and comfortable, and it's in a great location - a few minutes walk to Avenue du Mont Royal and right across from the park. We would happily stay here again!
Good value! Great location!

Hello,

The bed was very comfortable and your apartment was warm, it's a shame the bathroom wasn't a little cleaner. Thank you anyway!
The place was as advertised. It provided the bare necessities without any bells and whistles. Rafael was amazing at communicating!
Zhen is the greatest host! You will feel welcome, secure, and taken care of.

Zhen and his family are incredibly welcoming from start to finish, their home is truly in a great location, right next to a bus stop and a 10-minute walk from the Snowdon metro station! The room is very spacious as well as the bathroom and the bed is really comfortable. There are many shops nearby and it's therefore very easy to stock up or just go out for dinner. Zhen and his wife are truly adorable people who are very attentive and caring about your needs, they cook very well (website hidden by Airbnb). I must admit that I was a little sad to leave because it was so enjoyable living there!

Quiet neighbor close to buses, Metro Villa Maria at a 15-minute walk from a good walk, Very spacious house, the room is large and the bed is comfortable. The host is so very polite and gentle. I highly recommend this place!
Zhen was kind and welcoming. The room was very clean.

Great place to stay in Montreal. Safe neighborhood, walking distance to the Metro, private room and bathroom, comfortable bed, many windows and a fan provided for summer. 

Zhen and his family were very welcoming during my stay. 

Bathroom door doesn't fully close, but was no issue as the suite is separate from the floors below. 

Overall I'd recommend this suite when staying in Montreal!
It was my second time there and I'm close to calling the host Uncle Zhen, he is simply amazing! I recommend it 100%!
I couldn't have asked for a better host. Thanks to Zhen.

The house is located in a very convenient location. Zhen and his family were so kind that they always went above and beyond to make my stay comfortable. Additionally, I received excellent travel information from Maggie, Zhen's wife, who works for a tour company.

My stay was very comfortable. There was no air conditioning, and it was hot in August, but there was a good fan to provide cool sleeping. This place is in a very nice neighborhood. I went for long walks. There are lots of nice restaurants in the area. Also close to buses and metro. The room and bathroom were spacious, and the listing was accurate.

Shereen's place is the ideal spot for experiencing Montreal. The apartment is immaculate with easy access to two metro stops, the Atwater market, the canal, and a Bixi bike hub around the corner. Her recommendations are perfect for enjoying the city and nice additions like Netflix access, the gym, and on-street parking make the apartment a top-notch experience.

Shereen's place is beautiful! Sparkling clean, beautifully decorated, and the rooftop terrace was incredible. The apartment is in a great location--a quiet, peaceful street, but a quick walk to great restaurants, shops, and the metro. Checking in and out was super easy. Shereen was communicative, really friendly, and had great recommendations. Stay here, it's wonderful!
Shereen's apartment is a very nice place. It's very clean! Exactly as pictured! The rooftop pool is a plus! Shereen answers questions very quickly. We highly recommend it.

Shereen was an amazing host. The neighborhood was everything my girlfriend and I could have asked for. It's quiet and residential but also hip and lively within a short walk. This trip meant a lot to my girlfriend and me, and Shereen's place made it even better.

We would definitely love to stay there the next time we come to Montreal. We will definitely be back!

Shereen is an excellent host who provided us with everything we needed before our check-in. The location is fantastic, being close to many attractions and public transportation options. We will definitely return next time.
This is a lovely place - everything is just as it appears in the photos! The building and amenities are great - especially the rooftop pool and seating areas.

Shereen was very helpful with restaurant and entertainment recommendations, and her place was beautiful and clean, just as the photos showed. There was one surprise that the photos showed, but I didn't realize until we arrived - the large windows don't have any curtains. If you are a morning person, this is lovely, but it makes sleeping in difficult when the sun rises so early.
Shereen's place was great and just as beautiful as the pictures. She made us feel very comfortable and gave us really good suggestions on things to do and see.
Awesome place looks exactly like the pictures!

Shereen's place was really great. Overall, a 10 out of 10. The condo was as advertised in the photos, but pictures don't do the bed and shower justice.  The memory foam bed was very comfortable and the shower has some serious pressure. Easy kitchen in which to cook, and the wifi was very reliable. Only "hang ups" were with check-in (had to pull bed sheets/pillow cases out of the dryer and put them on bed/pillows myself) and parking, from time to time. While parking is, in fact, free, it's not entirely hassle-free. To Shereen's credit, though, she makes this known in her condo's listing. Parking in front of the condo is nearly always filled up. On Rues Bourget, Irene, Sainte-Antoine, and Sainte-Jacques (four main streets near the condo) you don't have to pay to park, but you're not allowed to park during certain weekly times. For example, on the north side of Rue Bourget (right in front of the building) you'll be ticketed if your car is parked between 8 and 11:30 am. Then, on the opposite side of the street, you're forced to move your car on Tuesdays from noon to 3:30 pm. Moral of the story? Come enjoy Shereen's awesome condo, just don't bring a car. You can Uber anywhere from her centrally-located spot in less than ten minutes for about ten bucks. Overall, an awesome stay and I look forward to being back.

Shereen's place was bright and clean. Close walking distance to Metro. The rooftop pool was nice, however the gym was across the street in a different building. 
If you're looking to be a little outside of the downtown core this place is perfect.
This is a fabulous place if you want to combine a busy city weekend with some relaxing time by the pool. Very cool indeed.

My accommodation is identical to the photos shown in the listing: beautiful. The neighborhood is quiet and super nice!  Regarding Shereen, she is very kind. She responds quickly to messages which is great! Before we arrived, she recommended several restaurants and places to see which was helpful.
Shereen was such an amazing and helpful host! The location was perfect and gorgeous (the pictures don't do it justice). I would totally recommend it everywhere.
Loved Shereen's place. Clean home with all the necessary basics. She is a great host and offers lots of suggestions for Montreal. Thank you!
Apartment with a remarkable design, carefully curated, very pleasant, well-equipped and very clean. Located within a few minutes' walk of the metro station, you are in the center after a few stops.
She's the sweetest person ever if you're looking for a great place to stay, you should stay at her place.

There's nothing you won't like about the design and furniture of this place. Beautiful. It's like a 10-minute walk to the nearest metro station. Also around a 15-minute walk to St. Catherine which is a main spot for tourists. The building is very nice. Shereen was so sweet, I met with her when checking in and she was willing to help with everything I had, lovely lady!

The place is great, it really is as advertised in photos. The curtains are the only thing I can think of as a slight negative. They are a bit too thin. They let a lot of light in, and you may need to get dressed in the bathroom if you have some privacy concerns. The apartment has everything you may need. Shereen responds fast if you have any questions. Overall, we were very happy.

Shereen's place is exactly(!) as pictured and was perfect in terms of design and layout. Extremely clean and spacious, with a pleasant view of the street and plenty of natural light. Shereen herself was as pleasant, responsive, and helpful as any Airbnb host with whom I've ever stayed - she gave great tips on both the surrounding neighborhood and city as a whole. Finally, I loved the gym (across the street) and rooftop lounge area - peaceful with amazing views.

Shereen's place is a nice cozy studio. It felt very homey and looked amazing, the pictures don't do it justice! Shereen is a great host. She was flexible with our check-in/check-out time. The neighborhood is nice and quiet yet very convenient with plenty of places close by. I had no issues with street parking, however, please read the posted signs. I would highly recommend staying here and would love to visit again.
Centrally located on a quiet street in one of Montreal's trendiest neighborhoods, Shereen was very accommodating and the bed was super comfortable!

Shereen was extremely helpful with giving us information for our stay. Her place was kept very clean and it's a very nice quiet atmosphere. My husband and I stayed this past weekend with our 6-month-old for our wedding anniversary and it was a perfect place to house. The washer and dryer are a bonus too.
Shereen was an excellent host, easy to communicate with and very easy check-in/check-out. The place was very clean, as described and the building had wonderful amenities. Highly recommended.

We had a great stay at Shereen's place. We loved the converted loft style and loved how the condo was decorated. Check-in was super easy and Shereen was kind enough to let us check in a couple of hours early. The building is located in a quiet residential area. Bed was comfortable. Would recommend!

I previously stayed here and had two great experiences. The perfect stylish loft was clean, comfortable, and located in a fantastic neighborhood. Shereen is a wonderful and helpful host. Highly recommend.
Very stylish apartment. Great location - close to lots of restaurants and shops. Shereen was very quick to respond and check-in was a breeze.
Great place! Nice and cozy. Very comfy bed :)

Great place in St Henri - very clean, has everything you need, close to the metro. You have access to the gym in the building which is very well equipped and convenient. You are just a few minutes walk from the metro and some great restaurants as well. Would highly recommend staying here.

Great place. 10-minute walk to Lionel-Groulx metro station. Very clean and quiet. Washer/dryer in unit works well. Host was very responsive. I texted her that the internet was down, and 2 minutes later she was on the phone with the provider, and service was restored within 10 minutes.

My stay was great. I was traveling alone and found that the apartment was spacious and had everything I needed. Shereen was incredibly responsive and thoughtful throughout my stay. I would highly recommend staying here.

We had a mini road trip and decided to stay in Montreal for 2 days. The place was very clean and tidy. It was close to the places we wanted to visit. Shereen was very responsive to answer all of our questions. We enjoyed our stay there. Thank you.

This place was absolutely GORGEOUS. Everything you could hope for in an Airbnb. The pictures are absolutely true to what it is! If anything, they undersell the spacious, luxurious nature of this loft. Shereen was the most gracious host! She accommodated our check-in time and responded within minutes of messages. The apartment is incredible - big ceilings, clean, fabulous kitchen and bathroom!  It is so open and warm (quite literally, toasty with the heating system!). She has all necessary kitchen items/utensils needed - plates, dishes, knives, pots and pans, etc. The gym was gorgeous - a room for floor work (the yoga room) equipped with weights, mats, kettlebells, etc. as well as multiple cardio machines, weight machines available in the main gym space. 

Truly, there is little you could want or need for at this place. Parking was so easy and the area is great with tons of lovely restaurants, easy access to groceries, and very accessible to downtown Montreal.

Very nice unit in a great location. 
Perfect for one person or a couple.
Shereen was quick to respond to messages and made me feel very welcome. 

Parking is free in some areas on the street, however you will have to move your car daily depending on the section of the road. 

The building was very safe, the amenities were as expected and the unit was nice and tidy.

It was a great spot, definitely recommend it!

Shereen's place was clean and stylish. It had everything I needed except parking. When the listing said "free parking on premises," I assumed that meant there was parking on the property, but apparently it means there is some free street parking on the adjacent streets. However, the signage was confusing for a non-local and I had trouble finding parking on multiple occasions (especially if I arrived later in the evening). Other than that, everything else was good. The pool was closed. The gym was across the street and looked decent but I didn't end up using it.
Great place, near the metro. Cozy and stylish!
The place was amazing, Shereen provided excellent recommendations and helped make an all-around good trip even better!

Sakina and her family were great hosts. They are always available to help. The place is really nice and comfortable. I recommend Sakina's place and will definitely stay there again on my next trip to Montreal.
Despite the location being a little out of the way, it was wonderful, cute, and clean. We had a great stay! :)

I find the residential area the people are very friendly too, but 
restoration is not far away, however there are no very good qualities, a pity.
A bit far from the city center
Sakina was an amazing host and the townhouse was awesome. Spotlessly clean and located in a fantastic area close to the heart of Montreal. I highly recommend it!

This is a cozy, comfortable basement suite in a quiet residential area of Montreal (NDG). Sakina is an attentive hostess, very responsive by text both before and during our stay. There is free parking on site behind the building, which was great. We really enjoyed exploring the neighborhood, and it is a short walk to the number 105 bus which links to the metro system. There is also a small fridge and microwave, which we did not expect but of course were very appreciated. Our party was 2 adults and 3 kids, and there was plenty of space for all of us.

We were delighted with Sakina's basement apartment. It was clean and spacious, private, with two decent-sized bedrooms and a very large living/dining/common room, and a locking door separating it from the rest of the house. We had exclusive use of the washer/dryer in our space, and on-site parking. It worked extremely well as a comfortable home base for our family of five during our five-day stay in Montreal.
Very clean. Met our needs. Excellent value.
Sakina and her family were very friendly. We definitely enjoyed our stay. The apartment was clean, cozy, and had everything we needed.
Sakina was an awesome host and her apartment was clean and an awesome price!
Sakina is very welcoming and available for my second stay, it was perfect. Thank you for everything

Sakina's place was sparkling clean, convenient for a family of four.
The location is in a quiet residential area 15 minutes away from downtown by car. 
Sakina is very welcoming and made us feel at ease, which made our holidays even more enjoyable.

Sakina's place has been by far my greatest stay. Sakina was an excellent host who provided all essentials and even had breakfast foods, including milk, stocked for us. The space was large and the beds were very comfortable. The neighborhood was quiet and close to public transportation. I would definitely stay here again.

Sakina's place was great and just what we needed. We were traveling with a single person and a couple so we needed two bedrooms and a common space, and this worked out perfectly. We had a nice couch to relax on and watch TV, along with a table and chairs for eating. Sakina even left us a variety of breakfast food, which was a nice surprise. There was a fridge and microwave as well. The apartment was very clean and quiet, and she left plenty of amenities like shampoo, extra blankets, and a hairdryer. The neighborhood is quiet and residential, and it's a short drive from the city center not far out of the way. One day Sakina asked to borrow a table in our space for a birthday party, and when we came home we found that she had returned the table with slices of cake for us! We felt very welcome and there was a good mix of communication and privacy.
I found this place to be very spacious and clean. It was easy to get to and from, and Sakina was very easy to communicate with. I would recommend it to anyone.

Sakina's basement has everything. It's very clean and very spacious. There are many things included, such as breakfast and bathroom soap etc. 

The price-quality ratio is fantastic. I recommend it.

We had an excellent stay with Sakina, who was available and attentive. The neighborhood is nice, about a 25-30 minute drive or bus ride from downtown Montreal. We recommend this accommodation to other travelers! Thanks again Sakina ;)
It's a very nice place to stay.
Everything was fine! Good place!

I booked this cozy basement for one of my friends who came to Canada for the first time, and she couldn't afford the cost to stay at a hotel due to high season. Sakina was very communicative and she arranged everything for her and her family.
Great place! It was nice having two separate rooms, and the living area was perfect for hanging out.
Nice and tidy basement accommodation suitable for family, quiet street, very accessible to highways. Friendly host SAKINA

I stayed 3 days at Sakina's basement apartment which was very spacious, clean, and had all of the comfort and essentials we needed. It was also very easy and clear to communicate with Sakina, and she was accommodating. We would definitely stay with Sakina again.
Very clean, beautiful, and spacious 2-bedroom basement. Our host Sakina provided everything we needed for breakfast. We really enjoyed our stay at her place and would recommend it to everyone!
Sakina is a very nice host, welcoming and helpful whenever needed. The place was perfect for us, and we look forward to staying again here!

It's a beautiful and cozy place to stay, very clean and Sakina is so friendly and kind. You can take transportation just around the corner to go to downtown or any of the most touristy places in Montreal, my family and I had a great experience!
Great space, very close to downtown area.  Has all the amenities you need for a great stay.
Clean, welcoming and practical apartment. Our host welcomed us warmly and met our needs. It was easy to communicate with the host.

Great little 2 bedroom apartment in the west end of Montreal. Great location with good bus service. Grocery and drug stores nearby, as well as a couple of pizza joints. I like the parking at the rear, don't like leaving my car parked at the curb in Montreal. Everything for a nice stay is provided, will definitely go back.
Very clean. Sakina is also very responsive. It is a large space that is very clean.

We had a lovely stay at Sakina's and all five of us (2 adults and 3 children) slept well. Her home was very spacious and tastefully decorated.

We appreciated that Sakina provided us with all the breakfast essentials (bread and spreads, milk, cheese, cereal, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, etc.) As parents, she made our life so much easier, especially when traveling from afar.

Sakina really went the extra mile by helping us recover our youngest daughter's forgotten stuffed animal.

We would definitely welcome an opportunity to enjoy her home again and would not hesitate to recommend her.
The space was very clean. Sakina provided us with breakfast and was prompt in replying back.

Sakina was very nice to me and my family. We were supposed to stay for a month, but upon arrival we realized there wasn't any stove for cooking, so we only stayed there for one day. It was our fault that we didn't read the comments properly that Sakina posted. She agreed to refund us the full price.
Super place, very clean

Sakina provided us with a complimentary breakfast, which was perfect for the first day. The place is very, very clean and very comfortable. Sakina answered us very quickly and helped us with what we needed. You are going to love the place!
Awesome hospitality and service with a great location
Great location and could not be cleaner. Fantastic value.
Great hospitality, clean, and spacious place to stay!

My wife and I stayed at Sakina's place for 3 nights/4 days. The place was very clean and, for a couple, very spacious. It had the essentials needed for a good stay. We liked that Sakina offered us parking behind the building (her private parking area). There were a couple of things that we didn't like, though. The first one was that Sakina's response time to our messages was not quick. In fact, she never answered the first message we sent her once we were in her property, and she was not prompt to respond to a couple of other messages. The second thing is that the place gets very noisy from around 5am to around 8am. We stayed there during weekdays and in the basement we could hear them getting prepared for their day. In all, we had a good stay, but based on previous reviews we had higher expectations. Thanks.

I would highly recommend staying with Sakina without any hesitation. Everything we wanted and more. Wonderful hostess and so helpful with directions, as this was our first trip to Montreal. Very quiet house and surroundings. 

Close to the bus stop and Metro, which meant not having to use our car.
Close to the bus stop and it was a perfect, clean space for our family! Some breakfast food was provided and water was helpful in the mornings. The sofa bed was comfortable too. We had a great time!
Wonderful hospitality. We felt like we were at home. Very neat and clean space. Good parking facilities. Breakfast was amazing.
Amazing place. Better than staying at the hotel. I will recommend this place to everyone

The listing stated that AC was unavailable, however the host provided fans for each room as it felt warm. Parking was not an issue, check-in was smooth, the only downside was that we found the linens were not washed as three of us had red spots that looked like bites on our faces and necks after the first night.

Totally satisfied with the accommodation, even better than in the pictures. Sakina was a very available and helpful host. 
I highly recommend without hesitation.
Translation: Regarding the questions asked from here, I was very grateful for the prompt and helpful responses.

Sakina is a wonderful host! She prepared the place beautifully and provided us with more than just basic necessities. The location was perfect as it was very easy to drive downtown (about 10-15 minutes) and there were many restaurants within walking distance in the quiet neighborhood. I would definitely stay here again if I ever went back to Montreal!
Very good value for money

Sakina is a (Website hidden by Airbnb) with remarkable kindness, she was very attentive, available and warm during our stay. The apartment is very welcoming, well equipped, and located in a quiet neighborhood. The quality-price ratio is excellent. I recommend it.

Beautiful basement, the dining area was comfortable and pleasant. The food was incredible. Highly recommended. A bit far from the center, but it's worth it. Sakina took care of our arrival and departure as needed, with quick responses.
Bien

Perfect for our trip. We were very comfortable. The place was stocked with everything you could think of. Very nice host. We were 3 for a weekend trip and this was ideal for all of us. We had no complaints at all.
Very spacious and clean room. Sakina provided us with breakfast food and was a great host. The neighborhood is a nice location. Would recommend.
Amazing and sparkling clean place in a very central and cozy location. Highly recommended. Great coffee and snacks for the kids too!

We stayed at Eve's room for three nights and we liked it quite a lot, even though we never met her. We had a metro ticket for one full week and we only had to walk two minutes, which is very good with heavy luggage.
Eve's house is nice, in a great location and very close to the subway station. It is perfect for a cheap weekend getaway in the city!

I had high expectations from the pictures of the place and my short conversation with Eve.  Taking that into account, the experience still highly surpassed my expectations. Eve is an amazing person who is more like a friend than a host after meeting her for a few minutes.
Pascale was amazing and very accommodating. I will definitely stay there again.
Pascal left us with a very cozy and organized house that our family enjoyed a lot. Everything seems perfect. RECOMMEND!
Pascal's Place was wonderful, a short walk from the metro making it convenient to get around! And the photos match the place exactly, I would definitely recommend this place!

Super apartment ideally located 10 minutes from the metro and 20 minutes from the Latin Quarter. The hosts are really charming and accommodating. In short, there is nothing to complain about, it was perfect

Do you want to visit Montreal as a family? Pascal's house is the ideal place. The house is perfect for small or large families. Pascal has been superb, answering all of our questions. We wouldn't hesitate to suggest this place for a family. The children have enjoyed it.

The location is central and easy to access. It's easy to get around on foot, by bus, or the subway. We visited tourist attractions like Old Port, Biodome, and La Ronde, and we were able to reach each of these places in less than half an hour. 

Thank you for your warm welcome!
Cozy apartment, bright and well decorated. Well located. Close to the Latin Quarter and a metro station. The owners are welcoming and available.
Amazing place!

Excellent welcome, we felt truly at home.
The accommodation is well-located and quiet

Pascal and his family have a gift for making people feel comfortable. The whole family has gone above and beyond to make my stay more than just pleasant, even exceeding the scope of our commercial agreement, which was also perfectly honored. Pascal's family is like what I experienced from the open, generous Québécois people... A truly wonderful experience.
Pascale is absolutely fantastic and his family is even better! Very welcoming and thoughtful; everything you could ever need. Great location, accommodating, and close to the Metro!
Good location. All the necessary amenities. Lovely hosts.

Pascal and his family are super friendly and kind. The room is exactly like in the pictures, very comfortable and clean. There is a mini fridge if you can buy some food. The location is perfect in a quiet and calm neighborhood very close to the metro station. If I come back to Montreal, I'll stay again with Pascal's family.

It was a pleasure being with such a sweet family. I had a very wonderful time in Montreal. Everything was great. They made me feel as if I was at home. Thank you very much to all of you and wishing a superb 2018!!!!

Wonderful stay, the whole family was very welcoming. Makes you want to go back home! 

Everything is nearby, the accommodation is really well-placed.
The view from the room is perfect. Jeremy was a fantastic host, highly recommend it to anyone visiting the city!

Jeremy was an excellent host, very hospitable. We only stayed two nights to see the sights, events, and nightlife they had going on in Montreal that weekend. The room is a great size for a couple with a closet and its own bathroom. The kitchen is quaint and clean. 

He even gave us a continental-style breakfast the morning after our first stay. He didn't have to, but it's just a testament to how hospitable he is. The room is literally next to the laundry room and pool as listed. The view from his balcony is great. You are right in the center of Montreal near shopping malls, restaurants. His place is right next to a Bixi bike stall for those who like a little workout in the morning.

There's a fan in the room but it never really gets hot considering the draft coming from the balcony. 

Communication-wise, Jeremy is very efficient. He responds within 5-15 minutes. Mind you, you barely see Jeremy unless you have a question or you see him doing upkeep on the place, which is nothing against him, but it shows that you kind of feel alone in the place, which is nice and is probably the idea he was going for.

All in all, I would stay here again and probably will.

An absolutely amazing apartment and host. The best ever. JEREMY has not hosted before; however, all hosts can learn from him. His apartment is amazing and you will not need a thing. Everything is provided including laundry detergent. A swimming pool is across the hall and you have no neighbors. An outdoor deck is on the same floor and one above the roof. The views of the city are actually best from the bedroom and the veranda outside the living room. JEREMY will be seeing me again.

We enjoyed Jeremy's penthouse. The bedroom was spacious, the bed was comfortable, and the towels and linens were high-end. Great views of the city! We visited in the summer and the room was a little warm, with no AC, but fans are available and with the windows open you can get a good cross breeze. Close to the metro and lots of restaurants. Jeremy is very considerate and helped me settle into the city.
Jeremy was a fantastic host, and the penthouse apartment is very nice!  Big bedroom, private bathroom, and a beautiful skyline view of Montreal. Highly recommend!

Jeremy was an amazing host. The apartment is perfect. Great location, super clean, very spacious room, comfortable bed. Big plus: the views and the swimming pool which is on the same floor. Highly recommended. We will be back again! :)

Jeremy was an amazing host, the apartment was very nice! The pool was right across the room. He even made a little breakfast basket for us in the morning. My friend and I couldn't have had a better Airbnb experience, thank you Jeremy

This is by far one of the best locations you could stay at in Montreal! 
The room is spacious enough to hold two guests plus access to the pool and sauna makes this location an excellent choice (and don't get me started on the view!).
The host—Jeremy—was extremely friendly and open-minded.
Totally worth checking out this location.
A great place, an extraordinary host, and a magnificent view of Montreal amidst tranquility!

Really nice room for two with own bathroom. Jeremy got his fruits and bagels for breakfast, that was very nice! Awesome view over the city with access to the pool and sauna. We got some good recommendations for breakfast, thanks to the host!! :)
Amazing accommodations. Everything was easy to find in the apartment. Jeremy was very helpful with anything you needed. Great host, great apartment, great location.
Okay

Great accommodations and amenities. Jeremy was super friendly and provided great information about accessing his place. The walkable location to restaurants, shops, etc. Awesome view from the room. Wish I could have stayed longer.
Jeremy was a really nice host. Great accommodations and great location. I would highly recommend it.
Great room in a superb location right in the heart of Montreal! The self-check-in and check-out process was flawless. We can only recommend it highly.
Jeremy is a wonderful host. The apartment was located in the perfect area and the apartment was great. We had a wonderful stay!

Jeremy is a wonderful host who gave us a lot of privacy. 
He let us use the kitchen and ingredients for our cooking.
The building is old, the room is being repainted and looks nice.
Excellent location, very convenient, clean, and comfortable.
Perfect. The view is amazing. It feels like you're living alone. The location is perfect, right next to St. Cath. I would definitely stay here again. 5/5

We had a wonderful stay with Jeremy, who was excellent with communication and went to great lengths to make sure our stay was special, including lovely touches like breakfast & orange juice. The location is excellent, it was great having the pool on the top floor & the views are beautiful. Highly recommended!

Jeremy has excellent communication skills. He gave us privacy while always being available to answer any questions or concerns. The room boasts a spectacular view, a comfortable bed, and a clean bathroom. Jeremy even provided some breakfast items! I highly recommend staying at his place.

This is my dream apartment: a penthouse with a beautiful city skyline, an in-building swimming pool and sauna on the same floor, a spacious bedroom with a personal full bathroom, a cozy living room, within walking distance of great restaurants and metro stations. Jeremy has been helpful, friendly, and accommodating! He provided light breakfast (bagels, orange juice, fruits). Tea and coffee are available in the kitchen whenever you like. He labeled the things you might need in the common area (trash, mugs, tea/coffee, spices, ...) . A great experience with a great host.
Jeremy was very responsive to questions and he helped in every way.  He had a great view, the location was very clean, and it was a great place.
Amazing place with an amazing view at night! Get a great view of the city center! Close to everything and parking too! Jeremy is very nice and has a lot of helpful advice!

We had a wonderful stay! Very nice, clean bedroom attached to a bathroom with shower, and well-stocked kitchen (we cooked a meal and enjoyed the complimentary fruit and bagels for breakfast). We loved the pool across the hall!! The mattress is on the firmer side which wasn't ideal for my partner (who has spinal disc pain) but it felt totally normal to me and I slept very nicely. The comforter is VERY cozy and the blackout shades were great. There is absolutely no street noise and there are restaurants, grocery stores, a mall, and a metro station in the area that we made full use of. In fact we took many recommendations from Jeremy's wonderful guide!! I would highly recommend this place!!!!

Apartment very well located with parking, which is a big advantage. Magnificent view of Montreal. And a little extra, a spacious and very clean pool. 

Jeremy is a caring host.
At a breathtaking view of the city center from the steps of Ste-Catherine, access to sauna and pool. Friendly host.

The view from Jeremy's place is just amazing! Very easy self-check in with well laid-out instructions. Located right downtown close to lots of restaurants, things to do, and the metro to get a little further away - we didn't use our car at all the 2 days we visited, so having the parking spot available was great. The floor is high up enough that street noise is not a problem. Having a private bathroom is always great. Very clean throughout and Jeremy was very accommodating. We had a great time.
The penthouse boasts stunning views and a convenient location for accessing local attractions. We're grateful for the heated, off-street parking.
It's a perfect stay, close to everything, big and comfy bed, pool + sauna on same floor, nice view from the room and a good host, 100% recommend
Perfect location and price, best place to rent in all of Montreal.
