Great location - <10 minute walk to a metro station, 1 block from a grocery store, with numerous restaurants and cafes nearby. The penthouse view is stunning, and the space has everything you need. Even though it's a shared space, Jeremy makes it feel very welcoming. The rules and boundaries of the space are clearly communicated, so you know what is acceptable and what is not, which I found helped me feel less like a guest.
The host cancelled this reservation 83 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Adding a sofa, TV, and microwave to the space would definitely improve it. The host provided food, which was a kind gesture, but we rarely used any of their items since we already have our own.
This apartment is located in a fantastic neighborhood. You'll have easy access to everything from this location. The hosts are incredibly responsive, and the view from the apartment is breathtaking.
We were hosted by Steven, an associate of Jeremy's, who was very attentive and responsive.
Great location, spacious apartment with great views and a pool across the hallway. I would stay here again.
Really great downtown location, close to many bars and restaurants and the metro. Easy check-in and check-out, I would definitely stay here again.
Great location and very communicative host. Note that there is no air conditioning, although fans are provided in the rooms.

This penthouse apartment is well represented by the photos and descriptions. Our host, Steve, was very responsive. The location is central to the Old Montreal area with lots of restaurants and activities within walking distance. Having parking included is a definite plus!

Catherine's place is bright and very comfortable, in a quiet street in a fantastic neighborhood with easy access to transit - her restaurant, cafe, and bar recommendations were great! Catherine is helpful and clear - it was easy to get hold of her immediately when I had questions. Thanks Catherine!

Cozy apartment, warm and welcoming, we all felt right at home very quickly! The neighborhood is top-notch.  Shops, restaurants, and trendy bistros are all within easy reach. Catherine was particularly helpful and responsive, and the exchanges were perfectly pleasant. Her advice was appreciated. A great address in Montreal!
Great place for families. Quiet street, ample space, nice kitchen. Lots of helpful tips on restaurants and the area.

Catherine was an excellent host who responded quickly to all of our questions. Her place is charming and located in a fantastic area with everything you need. Her local recommendations were spot-on - the best croissant I've ever had!
Great host. Helpful and always responds quickly. The place is clean and cozy. I will definitely revisit when I get the chance.

The home is as advertised - spacious and convenient to get to. The beds are comfortable, bedding & towels were clean and the tub in the master bedroom was nice! 

Communication with Rina and her brother Joss was easy, and they were very attentive to making sure we had what we needed for a great stay. Joss lives upstairs in a different unit, so he was close by when we had questions (of which we had only one, regarding the TV). 

We'd definitely stay again!

We loved staying here! The location is amazing, the house is child/baby friendly, everything was neat, the host was always in touch to check up on us, there are stores nearby, the subway station is 2 blocks away, there's a 24-hour bar one block away, it was great! I will definitely stay there again :)
Great place!
Well-located apartment for visiting Montreal, spacious.
This is a great place to stay, it's exactly as pictured. It is cozy, clean, quiet and well-equipped, we'll definitely stay there again... Rina and her brother Joss were great hosts
That's a wonderful place to stay with my family

If you are taking a trip to Montreal, you absolutely have to stay here at this apartment. It's not only that it's a fantastic apartment and near the Metro; it's also quiet and very roomy, perfect for a solo traveler, couple, or group. What makes it truly special is the host, Therese, who is absolutely outstanding. She met me for check-in after 3am because of traffic. She made sure I had everything I needed. She even made authentic Pho and another Vietnamese traditional soup. She showed me the sights of the city and told me about the ones she thought I should see without her when she had errands. I told her that I am learning French because I am going to grad school in France next year, and she took the time to give me some pointers. All in all, Therese made the trip to Montreal so much more enjoyable and exceeded expectations.
The apartment was comfortable, clean, and located very close to public transportation. Therese was friendly and accommodating. I would definitely stay at Therese's again.

Therese was a wonderful host! The apartment was very clean and spacious, and it was great to have breakfast foods available to fuel up before we headed out to explore Montreal. We only had issues with the wifi being down and there not being air conditioning. Therese was very communicative and gave us some great suggestions for things to do around the city. The location so close to the Metro made getting around the city very easy!
Great place and great host, would come back if I go to Montreal again.
You will not find a cleaner place than Therese's! She was very friendly and accommodating. She suggested places for us to tour in Montreal when our plans got rained out and she has NETFLIX!

Therese is a wonderful host. She is very attentive and responsive. Her apartment is sparkling clean, and the king-size bed is high quality and dreamy. 

She is right next door for early or late evening help, and is extremely willing to be of assistance.

Her neighborhood is the most ethnically diverse in Montreal. North African cafes are just down the street. Public bikes are available for rent two blocks away at the Metro station. This is a great place to get a glimpse of how real people live their lives in Montreal. Two thumbs up!

Therese was absolutely fantastic! Her place was cozy and cute, exactly what we were looking for. It was a little bit farther away from the main attractions of Montreal than I thought it would be, but the train station is close by and about a 20-minute Uber ride away. The fact that this place had a parking spot for us was so helpful. Therese provided us with great suggestions of things to do and was so flexible with check-in and check-out. Would definitely recommend this place for your stay. Thanks!
The place is as advertised, cozy and clean. The host is excellent and thoughtful! Very close to a major subway line - commuting was very easy.

Great apartment, good value, clean. Very close to attractions like the Bio-dome, Botanical Garden, and Insectarium... Metro stop two minutes away. Also, a hidden St-Viateur bagel bakery is located in the corner market.
Therese was a very gracious host. Check-in and check-out were seamless. The parking spot was crucial. The apartment was clean and comfortable.

Therese is very welcoming and cheerful, organized and readily available to answer any questions. She doesn't hesitate to ask if everything is going well during the stay. 

The accommodation is very pleasant and comfortable, clean and completely corresponds to the description, everything is provided. A supermarket right next door. There is nothing to complain about. 

I highly recommend without hesitation.

Therese's apartment was immaculate and was perfect for a couple. The apartment is only two short blocks from the Metro, which made it extremely easy to get around the city. Therese is an extremely helpful and communicative host. I highly recommend both her and her apartment.

Therese is a wonderful host! The apartment is spacious and has lovely floors. The train station is very nearby, and Jean Talon has many small restaurants within walking distance. I was also relieved to have a parking spot and a fenced backyard for storing my bike.

Peggy and I enjoyed our stay in Montreal to the max in part because of the kindness and warm hospitality of Therese. She readily answered all the questions a typical tourist would ask, such as "Where can I access the Metro?  Where is the nearest grocery store that has great produce?" Over and beyond expectations, Therese got our stay off to a great start with breakfast treats. Therese's apartment has excellent location—just a 5-minute walk to the Metro which then gives one access to almost all the tourist destinations. One does not have to remember complicated bus routes in order to get around in Montreal—the Metro is fast, efficient, and inexpensive. We had no need for a car at any time while we were in Montreal. So, I would say to prospective guests, treat yourself to a marvelous stay in Petite-Patrie with Therese.
It was exactly like the pictures. Very convenient and close to the metro. The parking was very useful. Therese was an awesome host and very helpful!
Comfortable and private accommodation. Close to the metro. The lady is very welcoming, helpful, and friendly. It's a whole apartment (private).

The pictures of the place are very accurate. One of the great things about this place is that it comes with an actual parking spot, vs on the street (can be difficult to figure out 3 different parking signs on one post). The place was very clean and Therese was able to get us the keys when we arrived. However, the only negative thing I have to say is that the walls are very thin and any noise outside can be heard very clearly inside (only a downside if you're a light sleeper). Therese was a great host and checked in to ensure we had everything we needed. The overall feel of the home was like being a guest in someone else's house, rather than a hotel.

We booked Therese's apartment for our trip to Montreal and we were happy that we did. The location worked great for us, Therese was more than perfect communicating with us every time very quickly, and we had a good time there. 

The apartment is as described, a nice modern touch, perfect for a couple, clean, and the fact that there's a reserved parking spot is a very appreciated bonus, saving us big city parking headaches.

You can leave your car there and walk a few minutes to the city's transit, very easy to get to all your favorite spots. And if you don't have a list, Therese will help you with all kinds of ideas. 

A thank you note from both of us to you, Therese.
Laura and Mitch

The apartment was perfect for one person or a couple. It was bright and clean with a great king-sized bed! Also, it was easy to get to when driving, although it's best to avoid rush hour, but this applies anywhere in Montreal. The subway is just a block away, making it easy to get downtown and back.

This was one of the best Airbnb experiences I've had (and I use it a fair bit!). The spot was well-located, barely a 5-minute walk to St. Michel subway station, which makes it easy to get anywhere in the city. The apartment was incredibly comfortable, with a wonderful big comfy bed, really nice living room/sofa to lounge in and watch Netflix, a nice spacious kitchen, etc. But the best part was the host - Therese was one of the nicest hosts I've met, super-quick with responses and information. We were there over a holiday and she gave lots of information about what was open and what wasn't, even loaned us items for some elaborate cooking we decided to do. Anyway I could go on, but the point is that this was among the best Airbnb experiences I've had - highly recommended! Therese was an amazing host and you will not be disappointed with this place!
What a beautiful apartment! We loved our little romantic getaway, it was the perfect nest of love :-)

I must admit, there is nothing negative I can say about my experience with Therese and her Airbnb spot. Coming from someone who is somewhat picky about these things, my stay was amazing, from the cleanliness of the place to everything being a walk away to the quick and clear responses and follow-ups from Therese throughout the day to make sure everything was going well and if I needed anything. Parking is super; you have your own spot right in front of the building on private property. You have all the essentials and much more. I have already told Therese how satisfied I was, and the next time I need a getaway to Montreal, her place is most likely the place I would stay without question. I could continue writing nothing but positive things, but if you've read this far, just book Therese's place and enjoy!

Therese's place was amazing, and her communication was prompt and so informative. From the moment I booked to the moment I walked through the front door, Therese was so welcoming and made sure I had everything I needed. 

The kitchen was huge and spacious and was stocked with food. In fact, the whole house was actually bigger than I anticipated, which was a pleasant surprise. Best of all: the comfiest bed ever. 

Super pro: the parking spot. Parking in Montreal can be a nightmare. Not here! If you have a car, this is a huge perk and really made coming and going so easy. Location-wise, if you have a car, the house is conveniently situated and not too far from many sights. 

10000% recommend anyone to stay here. It's a gem :)

We loved this place. It was perfect. Therese thought of every last detail to make our stay great. My only negative point was that we only had 1 fork. But we made do. It was nicely decorated and comfortable. It truly felt like home. We can’t wait to stay again.

It was a short weekend/stay, but my boyfriend and I were pleased with how clean the place was. It was just perfect and the parking spot is an added bonus :)

Thank you for everything!
A very positive experience and even on Christmas Day!

Great location, spacious apartment. Therese was great at communicating. 

The apartment matched the description. The kitchen could use a couple more items to make it useful, such as a can opener (we borrowed one from them when asked), and a pot for cooking.

It's best to call ahead to ensure parking is available upon arrival.

Convenient location. Comfortable bed.
Everything was great, especially having reserved parking.
Well-located apartment, close to the metro and shops. Thérèse is incredibly kind and goes above and beyond to meet your requests

Large one-bedroom apartment and large living room, big kitchen, just a two-minute walk from Saint Michael Metro, the place was quite nice and warm, Therese and her family live right next door and they're super nice, I enjoyed my stay there

Therese's apartment was wonderful. There was plenty of space, amenities, and a great location. The parking space was a lifesaver! The apartment itself was clean, easy to access, and very close to the Metro. We had a fantastic experience!
Translation: I would definitely stay there again, the apartment was absolutely perfect!

We had a good time while staying at your place, thank you. 

Duy Thien & Thu Ha

Cozy, clean, and comfortable! The three C's of an excellent Airbnb.  It was just unfortunate that I didn't get the chance to meet the host in person but she was quite reachable at most times. 10/10 would recommend to a friend!
Everything was great! Therese responded so quickly and she gave us so many good tips about things we should do in Montreal!
Therese is very friendly and the apartment is perfect. I recommend it!

Communication could have been better, but there's great value overall due to the location and price. The unit was clean and exactly as pictured. The subway is a short 3-minute walk away. A surprise bonus was the smart TV where I could cast movies from my phone to the TV.

Theresa's home was excellent. Her apartment (third floor) has a separate entrance, is bright and includes many amenities, such as a washer and dryer, which would be great for extended stays. Theresa answered our questions promptly. We recommend Theresa's home.

Excellent, clear, quiet and comfortable accommodation with very attentive and preventative hosts. The setting is even more pleasant than in the pictures. Beautiful amenities and space. 

Excellent value for money. Highly recommended.

Therese and her family were wonderful hosts. The apartment is nicely decorated and furnished, and it's ultra clean. Despite the heat outside, the apartment was nice and cool inside. And the kitchen has everything you need for a great stay. I would highly recommend this place without any hesitation.

Therese's place is very well located, close to Jean Talon Market, the metro and good restaurants. Therese was quick to respond to questions. The apartment is very clean and the bed is super comfortable. Parking is available on-site which is a plus! You will need to walk up a few flights of stairs to go to the apartment but that is quite typical in Montreal. Would definitely recommend your next stay with Therese!
Therese and her family are very kind and helpful. There are few amenities in the space, but if you're okay with commuting into the city by metro or bus, it's a perfect place.

Therese's place is great; it's clean and the parking space was helpful. 
The metro was needed to get into Old Montreal, but it was very close. The simple apartment was just what we needed when staying two nights. 
I highly recommend this place for anyone who wants value in being in the city without feeling rushed. If we are ever back in Montreal, Therese's place is our first choice for sure!

Our stay in Therese's apartment was wonderful! The parking space attached to the home made arrival and check-in easy, and the air conditioning unit in the bedroom was a godsend during the heatwave. The apartment was clean, nicely decorated (with touches like flowers and trays of glassware ready for use), and perfectly sized for the two of us. We also loved the location - a short walk to both the metro and a nearby grocery store. The one issue we encountered was around checkout. When we asked near the beginning of the visit what time we should expect to check out, Therese's answer was an hour earlier than the time listed on the website - which was fine with us, and we planned accordingly. However, on the night before our departure, she sent us a message at 11:30pm asking if we would be able to leave between 8-10am and if we would be able to move the car around the same time. In the end, we left and moved the car only an hour before our planned departure time. Overall, we had a fantastic experience at this Airbnb, but the muddled information about checkout added an extra layer of complication to the end of our stay.

Therese's place is very clean and she is very responsive with all communication. Her place is very convenient for walking to the metro, and there is a wonderful patisserie right across from D'Iberville station for breakfast on your way into the city.
Very comfortable, close to transportation and well maintained! Full kitchen and AC in the bedroom are definite pluses, would definitely recommend!
What a nice host! Super clean space and always willing to help. Highly recommend staying here!
Had a great time!

We had a fantastic stay at Therese’s place! Fantastic communication beforehand with check-in, tips for during our stay once we arrived, and an easy check-out! The place is very clean and even seemed to be bigger than expected for an apartment in the city! We were also very happy about the private parking space so we didn’t have to worry about our car at all during our trip. Like everyone else has mentioned, this is a short five-minute walk to the metro and will get you anywhere you need to be in the city. Highly recommend staying with Therese!

Wonderful, clean apartment! The space was perfect for my little family and me. The dedicated parking space was so appreciated as there was no street parking at all. The Netflix and wifi were perfect, and we also used the clothes washer and dryer. The host did not intrude at all and her family who also live in the building were so nice!

Thérèse's apartment offers incredible value for your money! It is incredibly well situated. There is a grocery store around the corner, the Métro is within walking distance, and the highway is close by.  There are also many local restaurants nearby. It is quiet, with friendly but unobtrusive neighbors. 

My wife and I really liked the apartment's layout; it provides privacy between guests if needed. It was clean and nicely decorated. The bed is a comfortable king size. We loved the lounging area with a large, comfortable couch and high-definition TV with Netflix. We were able to prepare and cook meals in the large kitchen. Thérèse was responsive to our messages, referred us to places to go, and was kind enough to offer complementary bottles of water.

I highly recommend Thérèse's place! Thank you, Thérèse!
Therese is an excellent host. The apartment is super clean, located near the metro station in a quiet neighborhood. We will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Montreal.
The private parking and nearby metro made navigating the city by foot very easy.
Her place was so beautiful and cozy. Would stay anytime.
The apartment was super clean, the bed was comfortable. The private parking was convenient for me.

Therese's place was fantastic! We were greeted by her aunt and uncle who were so friendly and welcoming! The place was clean, spacious and well lit. Location was great for public transit (<5 minute walk to the metro). The bed was really comfortable, plus my boyfriend loved having the king size bed since he is very tall. Just a tip if you are using the parking space, there is a window to another apartment unit right behind the parking spot so don't back in!

Location and neighborhood not great. Smaller than expected and with very small investments could be a lot more inviting. There are a lot of random posters and personal items around the place when it seems like a full-time vacation rental. The host was good and the place was comfortable, but it wasn't near all the things it said it was, and I didn't feel great walking around the neighborhood. I paid less for a much cleaner place in the heart of downtown, but it would be a good place to stay if they were charging less. As is, I wouldn't recommend.

One of the best Airbnb experiences I've ever had. It's a cute little apartment perfect for a couple and close enough to the St. Mitchell metro, which gives you access to the entire city. Access to Netflix was a plus! Therese's list of places to see came very handy. I give the place 5 stars!
Very handy for the metro, and a parking space is very much appreciated!
Nothing to say about the housing! Top

The private apartment was perfect for us. The parking space was a great bonus, but even if you don't drive, the subway is just around the corner, along with lots of markets and restaurants.

Everything was sparkling clean and as described / shown in the pictures. The building and area were very quiet at night. Although it's not in the heart of downtown, it took no more than 15 minutes to get anywhere we wanted to go. Having the smart TV with Netflix was better than cable. The bed was super comfortable as was the living room.

Check-in and checkout was easy and convenient.
Therese is fantastic. The stay was great and we were very pleased.
Very good housing, clean and convenient. The staircase is a bit cluttered. The neighborhood is decent, though someone did urinate on our car parked outside.
Great place and location for seeing the sights of Montreal. Excellent selection of restaurants in the area.

Therese's place was just perfect for our stay, the apartment was cozy and sparkling clean, very well located with the Metro a short walk away, and having a private parking space was super. Therese was quick to respond to our questions, overall a great Airbnb experience

Therese was very communicative during our stay - we arrived a bit later than anticipated, but it was no problem. The apartment was super cozy and clean, and it was a great home base for our short weekend stay!
A spotless and nicely furnished apartment in a quiet area. Pleasant host
The apartment was clean and cute. I would definitely recommend it. The communication from the host was prompt and excellent.
Very well-located, convenient parking with comfortable and cozy space
Therese's place was spotlessly clean. The parking spot was really handy too! It was a pleasure to return there each evening.
Great location with a parking spot. It's centrally located, making it convenient for getting around.
The apartment is not dedicated to the concept, it's inhabited. It's obvious and I didn't appreciate it; not comfortable in the dwelling. The dwelling itself was clean.
A beautiful place and homey
Very nice location close to the metro. Everything was very clean and we slept very well. Thank you, Therese!

Therese's apartment is a 5-10 minute walk to the subway station. The apartment is impeccably clean, the bed is super comfortable. We watched Netflix on a large-screen TV. Therese lives in the apartment next door and is available, and responded to our emails promptly before our arrival. I really recommend this apartment and would use it again!

Therese's apartment is extremely clean and comfortable. Just a couple of minutes walk from the metro which connects you to anywhere in the city. The neighborhood is quiet, check-in was super easy and it was great to have the free parking space right next to the building. Definitely recommend!
Clean and nice place.

This place was just what we needed in Montreal. A super nice apartment, the cleanest I have ever seen. All the amenities you would ever need. It's in a super quiet and small building so you don't need to worry about noise. A quick 10-minute walk to the subway so Montreal is at your fingertips. The parking spot was a huge bonus and made our life stress-free since we had to drive into Montreal. Therese and her family were also super nice and very responsive. We will definitely stay here again when I go to Montreal.
I would like to buy another book!

I truly enjoyed my stay. I strongly recommend Therese's place to anyone looking for a full house in this area. Very clean, cozy atmosphere and quiet. It also comes with a private parking space which made it very convenient during our stay.

Therese's place was great! Very clean and had everything we needed for our short stay. The parking spot and smart TV with Netflix were awesome too! The grocery store "Esposito" was close by, and the "St. Michel" metro station was less than a 5-minute walk away, allowing us to travel all around Montreal quickly and cheaply. Each room had its own thermostat too, which was helpful while staying here in the cold winter months. This apartment was on the third floor, so just something to be aware of if anyone has mobility issues! Overall, an awesome experience and would return here again in the future! Thank you, Therese!

Therese's home is an excellent place to stay if you are driving to Montreal or renting a car. The parking spot made our stay hassle-free and the drive to Downtown and Old Montreal was quick. Therese was very accommodating when we were running late on our check-in time and even offered us to check out an hour later on New Year's Day.
Great space, comfortable bed. Parking is great.
Amazing place to stay. It was super clean, awesome location, big screen TV with an Airbnb account to use, and we had everything we needed to cook etc.

Not very comfortable living arrangements, the place wasn't what I expected it to be, parking was a nightmare, and the owner lives next door and the building is noisy. Theresa was a good communicator during arrival and checkout and she accommodated a different check-in time for us.

Fast communication with host, easy check-in and check-out. The place was comfortable to stay in, very clean and organized. The location is in the east end of Montreal but close to the highway or subway station.

Tristan was an excellent host and created a wonderful space for visitors. Prior to arriving, Tristan was very prompt in responding to my messages and extremely communicative in arranging arrival plans, keys/parking/etc. Tristan greeted us and directed us to the private parking for the apartment, in the rain!!! He was very sweet upon meeting us and walked through the apartment with us as well, making sure we had everything we needed for our stay. During our stay, I had a few questions, he was always available to answer via text and even came up to the apartment. 

The space itself is immaculate. Brand new. Amazing shower, comfortable beds, fresh linens, ample closet space, plenty of towels, kitchen supplies, everything stocked. Simple, yet very thoughtful. Everything you need. 

Thank you Tristan!

Very nice place! Clean, well-maintained, and Tristan is a really great host! My daughter and I really enjoyed our stay. The neighborhood is great! It's really convenient, everything is accessible within less than 3 minutes walk. I recommend Tristan's place!
Charming apartment, ideally located near the shops on Beaubien Street. As described and pictured, I will be back with pleasure!
Great place. Family-friendly neighborhood with easy access to the rest of Montreal. Tristan and Karen were great hosts that made us feel welcome. Would definitely recommend.

Super nice apartment, clean, bright, functional in a pleasant setting (residential neighborhood near Molson Park).

Close to the city by bus and subway.

Host is super available and very accommodating.

In short, I highly recommend it!
Excellent house. Very friendly neighborhood. Tristan was very helpful and kind.
It is located in a very beautiful community with nice restaurants and glossary stores nearby. We loved staying here.

Tristan proved to be an excellent host, he was readily available to give us helpful advice for our stay in Montreal. 

The newly renovated apartment is very comfortable with new bedding and a newly renovated bathroom as well. The neighborhood is warm and perfect for discovering a unique Montreal.

Cozy and comfortable, in a quiet street, within minutes of a park and a metro station, with shops and restaurants nearby, this accommodation is a good base for exploring Montreal. Note the availability of Tristan.

Tristan was amazing and quick with responses whenever we had any questions or requests. The suite was absolutely gorgeous, perfectly minimal and filled with natural light but very homey as well. The neighborhood is nice and quiet, with lots of lovely food options and grocery stores if you want to take advantage of the kitchen. All of my guests loved it as well, and we all agree that we would love to stay at Tristan's again!

I stayed in Tristan's apartment for 1 month and it was really nice. The apartment was clean, welcoming and bright. It had everything you need for your daily life and the bed was really comfortable. It is located on a calm street, close to public transportation, grocery stores and restaurants. Tristan as a host was perfect, he was really respectful and it felt like my home during the time. I would definitely come back.

Well located with parking in the back alley. 
Minimalist decor, which I liked.
2 big bedrooms. Very clean. No TV, but WiFi available.
If you plan on cooking or making breakfast, you will need to get everything. The basic hardware is there for simple meals.
A nice bakery and convenience store are at the corner.
Parc Molson is very nice with a cinema showing classic movies. 
I will definitely rent again.

Pleasant housing: spacious and quiet in a charming little street.
Ideal for a family who wants to explore all the charms of Montreal (Jean Talon Market, Little Italy, downtown...).

Quiet residential area close to cafes and a few restaurants. The place was spacious for two people, very clean and stylish. Our stay there was super comfortable. The host was really welcoming and friendly! Would definitely recommend.

First and foremost, it was a pleasure dealing with the host, Karen, who went out of her way to make our stay comfortable. She provided many helpful tips on restaurants and transit, providing us with a print copy of nearby Metro stations. The unit was ample size for the two of us but would comfortably accommodate four guests. The bed was very comfortable. This unit is definitely as advertised, and we second all the great reviews for this location. We would definitely stay here again and hope to return soon. Thanks, Karen!
Great place in a quiet neighborhood. Check-in was easy and Karen was helpful with tips on getting around. Private parking was right out back, very convenient.
Had a great stay. Perfect location. Would definitely recommend this place.
Clean accommodation, excellent shower and bedding, dishwasher a bit noisy :) Host very friendly and accommodating
Nice apartment, very well located with shops and restaurants nearby. Our host Tristan was really accommodating and friendly.
Great flat, hosts, neighborhood and location. Clean and quick to respond. Wouldn't hesitate to stay there again. Thanks
Clean, spacious apartment near shops and restaurants. Nice, very responsive host. Nice private parking at the back.
Great Location
A clean, welcoming space with basic necessities, including parking, accessible subway stations although not directly nearby, and a very quiet neighborhood.
Very nice apartment. Parking behind the house available. Restaurants and grocery stores within five minutes walk. Metro and bus within ten minutes. Highly recommended.
Great place! Very clean and cute.
Near the Molson Park and Beaubien Street, this apartment is well located. Multiple cafes and bistros within a 5-minute walk.
Great apartment! Absolutely no complaints during our stay :) would stay there again. Thanks Tristan!

Pros:
-- Located in a pleasant area close to many restaurants and cafes
-- Approximately a 25-minute walk to the main subway/metro station
-- Extremely clean place
-- Easy check-in/check-out

Cons:
-- No air conditioning, provided a fan (but only one fan for two bedrooms)
-- No TV
-- Internet went out a few times during our stay
-- Walls thin; can hear neighbors walking around upstairs at all times
-- Bathroom door sticks and is quite difficult to open/close 

Overall, a nice basic place without the bells and whistles.

We really enjoyed our time at Tristan's place! It is situated on a nice residential street but is a very close walk to coffee shops, the cinema, grocery stores as well as other bars and restaurants. The space itself was clean and had some nice minimalist touches that we liked. We really liked to come back in the afternoon to chat and have coffee in the common areas.

Fantastic apartment in a great neighborhood. It's bigger than it looks in the pictures! It's close to little shops and restaurants, but even better is that it's near a really accessible thoroughfare that makes it really easy to use public transit to get to different parts of the city. Tristan and Karen are super communicative and make the whole process super easy and comfortable.

Very good reception. Bright and spacious apartment. 
I highly recommend this apartment

Spacious apartment, clean and well-equipped. 
Comfortable bedding and modern bathroom. A bit far (15-20 min) from the metro but close to buses. 
Pleasant and lively neighborhood. Many restaurants and grocery stores nearby. Private parking space very convenient. 
Tristant is responsive and helpful, excellent communication with him.  
The neighborhood is quiet but you can't fully enjoy it because the acoustic insulation inside the apartment is really bad. It's difficult to close your eyes as the noise from the floorboards of the neighbor above is present throughout the apartment, a shame because everything else is top-notch!
Pleasant apartment in a very quiet and well-located neighborhood. Excellent welcome

A flat in a very nice neighborhood with all the necessary shops nearby, a metro station located 15 minutes walk (blue line - Iberville stop) allowing access to the heart of Montreal without any hassle. Tristan is a very responsive host who lives with his family in the apartment below, so there's an extra layer of security if needed. If I am ever back in Montreal, I will definitely contact Tristan again as he deserves his Superhost status!
Great comfy place!

Very pleasant accommodation
Ideal for 2 couples

This is a very cute apartment great for groups! My friends and I enjoyed using this place as a home base during our trip to Montreal. One thing you should consider (if using a car in the winter) is asking if parking will be available before you arrive. Since parking was listed as part of the listing, I assumed we would have parking during our stay. Yet, the parking spot was not cleared when we got to the Airbnb. We were eventually allowed to park in the neighbor's spot. I recommend just asking before you arrive if off-street parking will be available during your trip.
Perfect

The apartment is very functional: there's everything you need to cook, the kitchen is very large, the bathroom perfectly clean, the bed cozy and the little living room, although a bit dark, pleasant. There's even a small courtyard behind with a small table and two chairs. Super nice for being outdoors and quiet. 

Drolet Street is very pretty, flowery, calm, there's a convenience store right at the corner of the street, convenient. And above all, as soon as you walk 3/4 minutes, you reach Duluth Street, Saint Laurent Boulevard and St Denis where life resumes, in bars, restaurants, terraces...

The Plateau neighborhood is lively, but be prepared to meet lots of French people everywhere you go :)

In any case, don't hesitate to book here, your stay will be ideal and Sarah and Aristide are adorable, available and accommodating.

It was a really beautiful space, you could tell the hosts put a lot of thought into decorating and furnishing the place because you had everything you could possibly need (including cooking spices, tea and coffee). It was clean, quiet and very well located. Sarah and Aristide were lovely to meet. I was really happy with the accommodation.
It's exactly as pictured. I was SUPER comfortable during my stay and it has so much character. It's the perfect little place to stay when you come to Montreal.

Sharah & Aristide are very nice people. They provide a lot in this space. Fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with shampoo and body wash, umbrellas in case of rain, fans and spare sheets and pillows in the bedroom. This place is great for the value. You're so close to many great restaurants and boutiques. I would gladly stay again!
A very cute rustic home :) we really enjoyed our stay!
Great place with a lot of character, amazing location, and a super comfortable bed! Loved our stay here, and the hosts were very helpful and flexible. Highly recommended!
Great location, half underground, so nice and cool in the summer time. Super clean and very cool.

Great place in a great location. Sarah was very responsive and helpful with any questions I had both leading up to my stay and during my stay. Also, the location is perfect - walking distance to many restaurants and bars and also well connected via metro. The place itself is clean, spacious and quite large. Definitely recommend.

Sarah and Aristide's self-contained apartment was wonderful. Clean, cozy, with access to a beautiful garden and within easy walking distance from a host of beautiful buildings, hundreds of murals, and super independent restaurants, bars, and coffee houses. After 13 hours of travel, it was wonderful to sink into a bath in this rustic building on a quiet street. I heartily recommend this place for a happy, relaxed stay, as well as Sarah and Aristide as warm, welcoming hosts.

Sarah and Aristide were great hosts, and the room was especially cozy and quiet. A very cool location, highly recommend staying in Le Plateau if you haven't been to that part of town, a 10-20 minute walk or an 8 minute drive to Main Streets such as St Laurent and St. Catherine.

We loved our stay at Sarah's apartment! It is close to several types of public transportation and within walking distance of many restaurants and shops. The apartment itself was very clean and full of useful accommodations. Sarah was very thoughtful and quick in her communications. We would stay here again and recommend it to anyone!

Great location and value. Close to lots of good shopping, the metro, Schwartz's, and Mount Royal. We were able to walk everywhere (longer walks but quite doable) as this place is well located to many popular sites and great food! The space is very clean, comfortable, and stocked with nice "extras" like fresh coffee and tea. Sarah and Aristide were lovely hosts, very open and accommodating, ready to answer all questions and help out with anything in the apartment. Overall, we had a great time and would book here again because of the great hosts and lovely, comfortable, home-like space.

After a disastrous experience in a dilapidated student residence in the "McGill ghetto", we were delighted to spend two nights in Sarah and Aristide's charming apartment on Plateau, a complete contrast! The area, just steps from St-Louis Square and St-Denis and St-Laurent streets, is a quiet and charming neighborhood where it's nice to live, with more children than cars... The houses all have a certain charm, in their early 20th century urban style. Sarah and Aristide's apartment is located under their residence - so any questions can be immediately addressed with them - on the ground floor of their house. Everything is charming, from brick walls to parquet floors (and sloping!) to cozy and functional furniture. We easily accommodate three people in the apartment thanks to the convertible sofa bed in the small living room. And the apartment also allows cooking and dining. A very good choice!

I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a fun getaway in Montreal. It is conveniently located in the middle of a hip neighborhood filled with great restaurants and coffee shops. The hosts were very welcoming and accommodating, and the apartment was neat, clean, and overall attended to my everyday needs.

Charming location with excellent positioning. 
The accommodation is decent. Cozy and clean. Aristide and Sarah are welcoming.
Very pleasant

Excellent place to stay. The space was clean and spacious enough for 2-3 people. The metro is a very short walk away, and a bike rental (bixi) station is just at the end of the street. Very quiet neighborhood. I would have zero hesitations staying here again!

Excellent housing well equipped and in a great location
I recommend this housing

Cute space, cozy and just the right size for two. Our visit coincided with an unprecedented Montréal heat wave, but the apartment was always cool and pleasant to return to. With the windows open, there's some playground, household, and neighborhood noise during the day, but perfectly quiet at night. Easy and charming walk to great restaurants in the neighborhood.
Highly recommended, charming spot. Great location just a short walk from the Metro and a great restaurant/bar, Else's, among others. Easy check-in and check-out and great communication.

Lovely little apartment, very very clean and quiet. 
Sarah and Aristide are very friendly and helpful. 
I definitely recommend this sweet apartment.

Comfortable, clean & well-maintained apartment in a quiet residential area, not far from great restaurants. Sarah & Aristide responded quickly to text messages.  The apartment is a ~30 minute walk to Old Town Montreal, McGill University and the fine arts museum; and a ~60 minute walk to a large open-air farmers market in Little Italy area of town.

Super accommodation! 
Very well located: close to the Sherbrooke metro station. Mont Royal is a 10-15 minute walk away. 
Easy communication with Sarah and Aristide!! Immediate email response with answers to all our questions. 
The accommodation is very pleasant, top equipment and impeccable cleanliness! 
I recommend it!

Very pleasant accommodation. I adore the varnish with this golden color, I find it very warm! Very quiet accommodation: very little traffic on the street and we are a bit set back. As in all buildings of this type, we easily hear footsteps above, but fortunately, this doesn't last long. I haven't had the opportunity to enjoy the backyard. However, I particularly appreciated the cozy nest, the spacious kitchen, the bathtub for relaxation, and the comfortable towels. I also had the luck of finding a free parking spot right in front of the apartment. This allowed me to leave the car all weekend and go into the city center thanks to the metro (the Sherbrooke station is 600m away). In short, very good experience. I recommend!

What a wonderful place to stay while traveling in Montreal. 
It is perfect for one person, suitable for two. Also so very close to all that you could want to see in Montreal. Tons of nice cafes on St. Denis for anyone looking to work, and a veryyy comfortable bed. Pleasure to communicate with and very prompt response. Thank you Sarah & Aristide!

This is a wonderfully compact, reasonably priced apartment ideally located for visiting Montreal. The street is quiet but within walking distance of great restaurants, parks, and the metro. After a full day of walking, I appreciated the comfortable queen bed with dual reading lights. Sarah and Aristide are responsive hosts, and thoughtfully stocked the kitchen with fresh coffee. If you're arriving by car, make sure to get precise information regarding free street parking - the signage system in Montreal is unique, and parking tickets costly!

We had a lovely stay at Sarah's place. The neighborhood is absolutely charming and pretty walkable to everything we wanted to do and see (we put on about 10 miles/day) but in the lovely fall weather and cute streets of the neighborhood and city, we didn't mind walking at all!

Sarah was so friendly and quick to reply to all of our messages - offering suggestions on best places to thrift shop, and tips on finding a free parking spot for the weekend. Definitely appreciated!

The flat itself was very clean and pretty big - had everything my fiancé and I needed; with a very comfortable bed I may add! The only small bump in our stay is that we believe Sarah and Aristide have a small child/children who we heard running around every morning at 7:30/8AM. We love kids, and have a few nieces and nephews ourselves, so we totally understand that they have a LOT of energy in the morning - but a heads up for people who like sleeping in late - this wasn't a huge issue for us as we are fairly early risers, but just worth noting. 

Overall - great first time to Montreal! Would love to come back someday!

Aristide was very welcoming and attentive. The information provided about our arrival was precise and helpful. The places were clean and warm. Some board games are available for visitors, we enjoyed the rather original memory game! The apartment is perfectly located.
Great location, friendly hosts
Excellent communication, clean and comfortable accommodation, highly recommended.

The hosts were very helpful, especially in accommodating our needs for our toddler. They were easy to communicate with, and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable. We would definitely stay here again!

Great price for the location and amenities. Awesome little place to stay, we walked nearly everywhere for what we wanted to do in Montreal. Previous reviews were accurate about the noise; you can definitely hear the kids upstairs in the AM, but we were out and about the majority of our stay.

Sarah and Aristide's apartment was super cute and even larger than it appears in the pictures. The bed was super comfy, everything was spotless and there was coffee and tea for the morning. Communication was great and the directions for all the available parking were concise and easy to follow. I loved the neighborhood and the apartment is close to all sorts of cool restaurants, cafes and bars. Would love to stay here again!

Excellent location and a very nice space for two people. The place was clean throughout and the bed was very comfortable. Coffee and tea were available which we enjoyed very much. If it is dark out when you arrive, watch for the stairs into the home as they begin quickly. We loved our stay and sincerely hope to be back!

This is a great, garden-level apartment in the Plateau-Mont-Royal neighborhood. If you enjoy exploring cities by foot, this is perfectly situated near Mile End, Mont-Royal, Boulevard St Laurent, Rue Saint-Denis and so much more. It's also a quick walk to the Sherbrooke metro station and you are surrounded by bus routes, making the entire city very accessible. The neighborhood is fairly quiet, safe and very charming. Highly recommend if you prefer to stay in a neighborhood vs the bustle of downtown.
The space was clean and comfortable, exactly what we hoped for! Thanks for a great night
Great place to stay while in Montreal! Apartment is cozy, clean, and in an excellent location.

Sarah and Aristide's place was a fantastic home base for our Montreal visit: very clean and cozy (even in a particularly frigid January), great neighborhood, and easy access to the rest of the city via transit. S+A were extremely responsive and accommodating despite being out of town while we were there.
It is definitely cute and quirky. The floor is very uneven -- we kept jamming our toes. The drain in the bath does not work very well. In winter months, it is cold and drafty.
Real authentic cozy Montreal Plateau apartment. Was exactly what we were looking for, great location and easy access. Would come back again!

The apartment was in the perfect location for walking to Rue Saint-Laurent and was clean and very cozy. Sarah and Aristide left very detailed instructions for everything. The only minor issue we had was with parking, but with a quick trip around the block we found a spot. We will definitely book again if we are ever in Montreal!
Great apartment, very clean with lots of nice touches. Communication was really easy and the hosts were great. One of the best Airbnb experiences I've ever had.

Apartment well-maintained in a quiet but lively neighborhood and on a pretty street with colorful houses :) 

Sarah and Aristide were responsive and very accommodating, especially regarding the end of stay. 

Excellent address.
Beautiful flat in an excellent location, within walking distance to all of our favorite dinner and brunch spots. Would stay there again!

Everything is exactly as described/pictured and Sarah and Aristide were very communicative and prompt with messages. The bed is super comfy and the kitchen/bathroom had everything we needed. Perfect location too: a charming, quiet street with lots of cool bars and restaurants nearby. A+!
Nice little place with a great location. Very accommodating hosts.

Sarah and Aristide's place was lovely - cute, clean and cozy. They had a great stay and the location was great, they could walk everywhere from there. Would recommend and hope to be able to stay again in the future!
Very pleasant and quiet accommodation on the plateau, with the bus and metro just outside. I highly recommend it.

Very good place. Spacious, comfortable and clean, just as described in the photos. Located right in Plateau with all its bars and restaurants, there's a subway station nearby for going to downtown Montreal. I didn't meet the hosts but communication was smooth. Highly recommended!

Sarah & Aristide were incredibly helpful from the start. We received a note upon arrival outlining what to expect at the apartment, along with guidelines on where to park - Montreal street signs can be tricky. The apartment itself was very clean, cozy, and full of character. The interior brick walls were a nice touch, the floors were slightly uneven in certain areas - we got used to it fairly quickly and it definitely added to the rustic feel of the apartment. It is also in a great location - close to various cafes, shops, and in the middle of two main streets. The kitchen was stocked with essentials for cooking - as well as coffee and tea which is always a plus. Internet was easy to connect to and very fast - there was also a small, yet loud, stereo system available for use in the living room. We really enjoyed our stay here and would definitely recommend it!
Sarah and Aristide were kind and gracious hosts. They were very caring to ensure we had a pleasant stay. Thank you for everything!

Sarah and Aristide's place is a great location! It was about a 10-minute walk to the Metro and lots of places around for eating and shopping. I loved that it didn't have a TV, but offered WiFi to check in with our family in the US. We hope to be back in Montreal very soon.

I had a great stay at Sarah and Aristide's place. The apartment was super clean and really nicely decorated, with lovely creaky wooden floors that made me feel as if I was in a log cabin. The place was perfect for my brief stay in Montreal - comfy bed, nice big kitchen space with a dining table, and on a quiet street though centrally located (nearest metro station is less than a ten minute walk).

Communication was always quick. Wifi is great. Check-in and out all very smooth.

All in all I highly recommend the apartment! Thanks again Sarah and Aristide.

The apartment was conveniently located within walking distance to numerous shops and a short drive to various locations in Montreal. The only minor inconvenience was that any light footsteps from above were easily audible in the apartment below, but this did not significantly affect our overall experience.

The place was great and only a few minutes' walk to the metro. We arrived a little earlier than expected and they kindly let us drop off our luggage so we didn’t need to carry them around :) Lots of thoughtful planning by the host! Definitely recommend it!

Sarah & Aristide's home was a great getaway in the middle of a great area of Montreal. There is plenty to do nearby and it is roughly a 10-minute walk to Laurent. The space itself was clean, good for 2-3 people, might be a little cramped for more than that. Street parking was available but is limited due to residential permits being required for a majority of the spots, so be mindful of the spaces. As hosts, they were very responsive and accommodating to my needs.
Very beautiful furnished dwelling with taste. Magnificent and very quiet neighborhood. A very nice stopover
Really cool, clean, quiet place, all while being close to everything!

Great location with easy access to the metro. Very comfortable and cozy. Sarah and Aristide were very helpful and quick to respond to any questions we had. Allowed us to store our bags after checkout which was very helpful. Highly recommend a stay here when visiting Montreal.
Super location for this typical Montreal apartment. You have everything at your disposal. Pleasant stay.

Very well-decorated and cozy apartment. We feel like we're at home here. 
Recommending it.

Sarah and Aristide's place was great. The location is perfect in a very cool area full of bars and restaurants, but also very tranquil, with buses nearby and a metro station very close by. 

The apartment was super clean and equipped with everything you need.

The interaction with the hosts was great too: they were always very responsive when we texted them.

We definitely recommend this place for your stay in Montreal!

Very charming apartment with a lot of character. It is ideally located to visit Montreal. Thank you Sarah and Aristide for allowing us to leave our luggage in the apartment until our departure for the airport. We were able to continue our sightseeing. I highly recommend it.
Magnificent apartment, perfect location, superb garden. I highly recommend

Our hosts were very quick to respond to our concerns and made us feel very welcome. We had a brief issue with the hot water but otherwise the space was really wonderful. It's an old space on the ground floor so we knew coming in we’d be able to hear the occupants from upstairs so it didn't bother us. Very walkable to downtown and the surrounding area was close to great food shops. We definitely have no regrets about staying there and I would definitely recommend this space to any friends interested in visiting Montreal.
Fantastic apartment and great communication with Sarah and Aristide. Really loved the location, walking distance to everything!
Super clean, comfortable, exactly as described. Great neighborhood. Lovely hosts! Highly recommend!

My partner and I had a wonderful time staying at Sarah and Aristide's place. The apartment was cute and very clean, with everything we needed for our four-night stay. The neighborhood is charming, and the location was perfect--close to both Mount Royale and La Fontaine parks, and to too much good beer and coffee for us to exhaust in one trip. Exactly what we were hoping for!
Sarah & Aristide were always available and responded to my messages quickly; they allowed me to stay past checkout time so I did not have to wait so long at the airport.

Cute and cozy spot on the plateau. Recommend for an easy and affordable stay for those looking to explore the city. Likely best suited for couples and solo travelers. No issues and overall nice place.
I wholeheartedly recommend it.

It was a great place to stay! Clean, cozy, and definitely worth it. So close to the parks, downtown, and a subway station, making getting around the city very easy. I would highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Montreal in the future.
Sarah & Aristide's place was perfect! It is in a cute neighborhood close to lots of restaurants and nightlife, and easily accessible to various places in the city. Would definitely stay again!

Sarah & Aristide have a wonderful apartment (and are very nicely decorated!). Walking distance from St-Laurent, St-Denis and downtown, the location is a dream. They were very communicative throughout my stay and went above and beyond to make it an excellent experience. I would highly recommend this spot to other guests.
This is such a wonderful location. You couldn't ask for a better place! Thank you for a lovely stay and we will definitely be back in the future!

This place is great and so convenient! It's really close to some great shops and restaurants as well as a main metro station. The flat itself was super clean, tidy, and cute; we absolutely loved our stay there!

Sweet apartment with great decor, combined with the older wooden floors. Quick responses to all questions. Close to everything needed; the metro stop for things further away was a short walk. We really enjoyed our stay!
Excellent place for a couple seeking relaxation and tranquility amidst the heart of Mount Royal Plateau.

This 1-bedroom spot is great, with a lot going on in the area and easy walking to and from. The house had many amenities and the owner's attention to detail is fantastic. Communication, though not used very often, was excellent.

The apartment is very comfortable and has a pleasing rustic vibe. The location of the apartment is PERFECT. Around the corner there is a bicycle rental station if you prefer cycling. There is a busy street with plenty of great restaurants. Nearby there are also a variety of very good bars nestled in side streets. Lastly, within a quarter mile, there is a boulevard with vibrant nightlife and restaurants. I can't imagine staying anywhere else during my next visit to Montreal
We loved our stay at this adorable and well-located flat. It had a very warm and friendly home-away-from-home feeling.
This place is clean and simple. We loved the location near restaurants, cafes, and public transportation, both buses and the metro.
Absolutely ideal location!
Beautiful private small apartment, with unique local architecture. Centrally located.

Beautiful cozy character apartment. Everything looks as is, super clean and great layout. The location is awesome, close to great locations and the metro, yet not busy at the same time which is nice for relaxing. Sarah & Aristide communicated with me as needed. If I had any questions they were prompt to respond. Overall, I would recommend their place. Great host and hospitable.

We greatly enjoyed our stay in Montreal at this lovely apartment. The location was perfect and met all of our expectations. I particularly liked the garden gate which gave us access to a beautiful little alleyway so typical of the plateau. My biggest concern was parking, but thanks to the precise explanations, we easily found one right outside the apartment for the duration of our stay. I also found Aristide very friendly who took the time to find out if I enjoyed my stay and even offered me to leave a bit later than planned if I wanted to. For all these reasons, thank you so much!

Sarah and Aristide's place is ideal for a couple visiting Montreal. It is cute, cozy, and centrally located in a great neighborhood. Parking can be somewhat difficult, but Sarah and Aristide were very helpful in orienting us and helping us find where to go.

What a place! It was close to downtown and smack dab in the middle of what became our favorite neighborhood in Montreal. It's close to all sorts of shops, restaurants, and Mount Royal. The only tricky thing is parking, but Sarah helped us out; we had a trailer with a couple scooters on it and we were able to get parking for both nights so it all worked out wonderfully. We would definitely stay here again.
This B&B is very well located in the center of Le Plateau. However, you may be able to hear a lot of noise from children playing above.
We had a wonderful stay! Short but sweet :)
My parents had a wonderful time in Montreal. Sarah and Aristide were very helpful with their arrival and during their stay!
Super apartment very well located. Owners available, helpful and attentive.

Excellent stay at Sarah and Aristide's place. The apartment is warm, spotless, and perfectly located to enjoy Montreal; the metro is a 5-minute walk away, situated on a very quiet street. The neighborhood is fantastic, with shops and restaurants nearby, an excellent bakery just 3 minutes away. We highly recommend their accommodation.

Sarah and Aristide's apartment was perfect for a short stay in Montréal, located in a quiet neighborhood close to some of the city's best parts. Mont Royal is also within reasonable distance for a nice afternoon walk. 

The apartment itself is very cozy with its wooden floors and low front door. It is super clean and has everything you need and then some.

Amazing place to stay. Prime location - calm neighborhood (but not at all boring), close to everything, with some of the nicest restaurants around (Café Névé was my favorite!). The apartment was charming and very comfortable. All in all, five stars! A great value, especially for short vacations in Montreal.

A perfectly situated spot that allowed us to explore the entire city. The school nearby can be a bit noisy, but we mostly spent time outside the apartment. Adorable, with all sorts of cooking equipment available and very comfortable. We are so happy with our stay!
Great place to stay in Montreal! Love the neighborhood - on a quiet street but close to tons of great restaurants and bars. Really cute cottage feel with lots of quirky details.
Sarah is welcoming and offers a cozy space next to bike share and metro stations. Her place is also near wonderful parks and bike lanes.
We had a good stay in this accommodation. The neighborhood is pleasant.
Great location and value. We enjoyed our stay.
You really can't get a better location. The place is cool and affordable. I would totally stay again
Great cozy little apartment in a really cool neighborhood. A quick walk to so many neat coffee shops, cafes, and restaurants

The apartment is exactly as described in the post. The hosts took an extra step and helped us find parking when we arrived that evening. They were available but not at all intrusive. The apartment was clean and cozy. The bed was very comfortable and the shower had good pressure. The best part was the location. A quiet street in the middle of a wonderful neighborhood. There were plenty of restaurants and areas to explore within walking distance. It was very safe. Just one block down there was even a playground for children, and in the opposite direction an elementary school. We hope to stay here again next time we are in Montreal.
The hosts are very responsive. The place is clean, beautiful, and cozy. The location was great and check-in was very easy. Would definitely recommend Sarah & Aristide's place!

We had a great stay at Sarah and Aristide's. The apartment is very well equipped. It is cozy, comfortable and very well located. Check-in was very easy, it was easy to communicate with the hosts. The internet is very fast. We had a very good time. I highly recommend it. 
Hoda
Cozy apartment in a great location. Paul (20 months) enjoyed the toys and books available to him... Highly recommend!
Good location
Great place - as advertised, easy check-in, clean, and a great location.
This is a great location. Quite rustic, but it has everything you need!

The apartment is charming and cozy, located in a perfect neighborhood. Many shops are within walking distance, including shopping on Mont Royal Avenue and access to the metro. We loved our stay in Le Plateau and can't wait to return.

Perfect

This is one of the best places we have ever stayed! The studio was really comfortable and perfectly located - we were close to all the sites and good places to eat, but the street was still quiet and comfortable and private. The hosts were really great to spend time with too - I felt like we were meeting as old friends after a few minutes of conversation and they were really accommodating. We loved staying here!!

Great find! Very affordable place, super close to Montreal's gay nightlife. This is as close as you can get. A one-minute walk from the action. The space is comfortable and good for one to four people.

Marina's place was wonderful. We had the most pleasant stay. The studio apartment was very comfortable and clean, the patio was just lovely and perfect for breakfasts, and it couldn't be more ideally located. I highly recommend it!
Like others have before me, I recommend it. Very well-placed, excellent reception and assistance, and very pleasant and comfortable
Marina was lovely and her place was great for a relaxing stay close to the subway.
Comfortable apartment, great location. Kind and accommodating hosts

Very well received and very available.

It was really nice at Marina's place. She and her husband were really friendly and we felt really welcome. We arrived earlier and could check in earlier, thank you so much for that! Communication with Marina was easy. I would recommend this flat to everyone. The area is really nice as well. Thank you so much for the great stay!
Warm and friendly host, pleasant accommodation, quiet and well-located with all amenities on site.

Very welcoming and friendly hosts. The apartment matched the description perfectly. Very clean and pleasant. Two steps from the metro and right in the center. 
I recommend without any hesitation.

Pleasant apartment, well-designed and equipped, located right next to the Beaudry metro station, therefore close to Sainte Catherine street and its lively atmosphere. Don't be fooled by the folding bed: it is very comfortable! 

Marina and Jean-Philippe are proactive and attentive to ensure a smooth stay.

I highly recommend!

I stayed at Marina's apartment for a conference in Montreal. The apartment was very clean and although I arrived late in the evening, check-in was an easy process. They left instructions inside the house about all of the amenities. The location is great, walking distance to the Palais de Congrès and close to many restaurants. The hosts were very friendly.
nan

The studio was amazing. Very clean, comfortable, and centrally located. Check-in and check-out was a breeze. Marina and her husband were welcoming, warm, and gracious. Couldn't have asked for a better place to stay during my trip to Montreal.

My stay at Marina's was perfect. The location is ideal, the apartment is clean, well-arranged and perfectly suited for a couple or a single person. I highly recommend this place and will definitely be returning on my next trip!
A warm welcome and full of advice for starting in Montreal! The apartment is functional and has a lot of charm.

Marina's accommodation is perfect! It's located on a quiet little street, just 30 seconds from the metro. The apartment itself is clean, bright and very well equipped. The bed is comfortable, which is nice after walking all day! The garden is an extra bonus, also very peaceful (and bonus: you can see the squirrels!).
A very clean and comfortable place, centrally located with a very responsive host. Highly recommended.

Very nice and welcoming couple, quick to respond (fast response)
Apartment conforms to the photos and description
It is quiet, well-equipped and comfortable, 
Located in a good lively neighborhood with very convenient access, just 200m from the metro and easy to reach from the airport via line 747.
I recommend it to everyone :)
Super!!! Very charming app, excellent localization and easy communication. I highly recommend it :)

Cozy apartment with everything you need and close to public transportation. 

Hosts are very welcoming.

We had a great week there!

Apartment located near the metro, ideal for exploring the city, quiet corner with no noise disturbances at night. 

A bit cramped when placing the mattress on the floor, but this remains easily manageable.

Marina's welcome was very pleasant and she is available if needed.

A well-described accommodation. Very well located! A very well-equipped, clean and charming studio in a unique and friendly neighborhood.

A very warm welcome from Marina and Jean-Philippe

We recommend this address!
Amazing location right on the metro. Small spot suitable for a quick stay for 1 or 2 people, with easy access to anywhere in the city.

We stayed at Marina's place for 2 nights. 
The apartment was exactly as described and pictured. The place was clean, the amenities were great and the location was perfect. The value for the location was outstanding. Marina and her husband were extremely helpful, and went out of their way to ensure we could check in promptly when we arrived which was earlier than they expected us. I would absolutely book here again without hesitation. Amazing!!! Thank you !!!
Pleasant studio, well-located and with a garden! In winter it's not very usable except if you want to make snowmen.
Quiet location, close to shops and the metro, very good welcome, I recommend.
Marina and her husband were great hosts. The apartment was very cozy and close to the subway. I loved my stay in Montreal!
Great, very convenient, clean, the landlord is nice~ I had a great time living there.
Pleasant studio for a weekend in Montreal. Very well equipped and ideally located in the city. A real pleasure!

We had a few very pleasant days! The accommodation is really very well located and very comfortable! 
Marina is a very responsive and welcoming host. I recommend this accommodation for any stay in Montreal

Ideally located at the end of the street, there is the green metro line stop Beaudry and nearby shops. The accommodation corresponds to the photos, the click-click sound is pleasant for sleeping. Marina is very nice and available. We recommend it 100%.
Excellent location. Easy access and communication is super fast. I recommend it.

I couldn't speak more highly of this space. Marina's place is literally a few minutes walk from downtown, a second's walk to the local nightlife, and is a beautiful space! We were greeted by Marina upon arrival, and she was super helpful.
Great studio in a very good location! I recommend!
We had a fantastic stay, the accommodation is very well located. Marina is very pleasant. I highly recommend it.

This is a really cute studio apartment in a great location. The metro station is a quick walk from the building, making the city's other neighborhoods super accessible. Also, it was spotless on the inside, with information available in a packet about the area in both French and English.
Really clean and affordable space. Kitchen you can cook in and helpful host. I would stay again!
Super stay. Well-equipped apartment ideally located in Montreal.

Marina's apartment is very well located in the Village of Montreal and just two steps from a metro station. The apartment is cute and very functional. The garden is a real plus when it's nice weather. Marina has been very accommodating and responsive at both arrival and departure. I highly recommend this accommodation.
Top housing. Top neighborhood. Definitely a favorite for our next visit!
Beautiful apartment in a great location

Great place in the village!
Marina was nice enough to let me check in early. Beautiful, clean spot.

Walkable distance to Sky Nightclub and Unity, supermarket, and many more.

Marina's place is in a fantastic location, one block from the metro and within walking distance to many bars and restaurants. It is very clean and comfortable, with a large backyard. I would definitely stay with her again if I return to Montreal!

Marina's place is amazing. The best part about staying there is definitely the location. It's so close to Sainte-Catherine street where there are lots of places to eat and lots going on. It's also super close to both the green and orange metro lines. Despite being so close to such a bustling area, it is also so quiet and secluded. Marina's place was also very clean and provided everything you need. Check in and check out were very easy, and Marina was quick to respond to messages. We would definitely stay again!
Excellent localization to discover the center on foot. With the arrival of warm spring, I was able to enjoy the shaded garden and eat outside... a real pleasure! Thank you.
Great location and really clear communication.
We had wonderful days at Marina's apartment! We felt like home! The space is ideal for a couple, comfortable and very close to the metro station. Marina was always available! Thank you, Marina!
Had a wonderful time here. Very central location, and very close to the Metro. Marina was a wonderful host!

Marina's apartment is ideally located in a dynamic neighborhood where it's very pleasant to stroll around. The apartment is very practical and everything is at your disposal for a comfortable stay. Communication with Marina is very easy, and Marina is very responsive and pleasant. See you soon!
Very well-located housing, close to a metro station, in a quiet street and an lively neighborhood. It is very clean and spacious for two people.
Housing located two steps from the center and all amenities, very quiet and equipped with everything necessary.

Marina's accommodation is really great. Spacious, close to the metro. Plus, Marina is very responsive to messages she receives. She also tries to arrange people whenever possible. I recommend it without any hesitation. Mickael

This location was the best and convenient. It was only steps away from the metro station and steps away from St Catherine which had so many different cafes and restaurants to choose from. The evening is always so lively. Marina's place was very very clean and tidy. Marina was very fast at responding to any concerns I had. Marina was very flexible with my stay when I told her about my late check in and late check out. I would definitely recommend this place and I would definitely come back and stay at Marina's place again.

Perfect stay. The Airbnb is incredibly well-placed for discovering Montreal in a way we'd never experienced before. Parking was easy. Once we arrived, everything was within walking distance. We would love to stay with Marina again!
Super apartment location with a warm interior courtyard and minimal noise
Marina is such a wonderful host, communication is easy, the location is perfect, check-in is easy, and the garden is amazing.

Amazing location right next door to St Catherine, great connection with public transportation (metro and buses). The flat was close to the main attractions. Very clean. Excellent communication and support from Marina. Would definitely stay here again.

Fantastic location; convenient and easy access to restaurants, cafes, and bars in the Village. A grocery store and bodega are nearby when you want to use the kitchen in the apartment. Close to the Metro and other transit options. The apartment itself is located on a quiet side street; a great haven in the midst of a fun urban area. I will book again for future visits to Montreal.

Marina's place is a PERFECT location for staying in Montreal. It's great because you get to stay in a classic Montreal building and you're a block away from Saint-Catherine St. The metro is a really short walk and it really helps to get around the city. The place itself was spotless when I walked in, and really comfortable for 1 or 2 people. The bed was comfy, I slept well every night. The shower is great with good water pressure, same with the sink. The front door takes some getting used to, but once you get the hang of it you'll be ok. I would definitely stay there again. Great location, price, and clean.
The apartment is on a quiet one-way street with a serene backyard, even though it's close to dynamic Montreal activities.

Marina's place is in a PERFECT location less than a block from St. Catherine Street. It is easy walking distance to all the sights and districts in the city and close to the subway. It's a large, comfortable flat with a big bathroom and huge patio. Easy check-in. Responsive host. It was a bit tricky with the window configuration to get cool, fresh air on Montreal's warmest summer days/nights. All in all, an exceptional value. I would absolutely return.

Marina is a perfect, friendly host who wants you to feel at home in her apartment. 
This place downtown Montreal is a nice place to visit the city.
This is the perfect place for your stay in Montreal! Close to the metro and so many attractions nearby! Marina is a wonderful host and is so easy to communicate with!

We had an excellent stay at Marina's accommodation. We missed nothing, it was very clean and pleasant with its little garden. We really felt like we were home. 

It is ideally located near Sainte-Catherine street, the village, and the metro but far enough away in a perpendicular street to be completely quiet.
For a future stay in Montreal, we will definitely return to Marina without hesitation.

Ideal location. Located 50 meters from the metro and close to the city center. We did everything on foot during our stay.

Clean and fully equipped for a comfortable stay.
Charmingly outdated, typical, a bit gloomy in the fall. Good value for money. Close to all amenities in the city. We will definitely return to Marina during our next trip to Montreal.
Great location - perfect space for 2!

Everything you need is available at the apartment. The apartment was very comfortable and clean, and the host provided detailed instructions on how everything worked. If you're ever in Montreal, stay at her place.
Great place for a getaway in Montreal! Close to restaurants, cafes, and attractions.
Great place! Cozy, perfect for a couple's getaway! Close to many attractions! Would definitely come back again!
Great host and apartment!
Great place in a great location. The apartment was very clean and we had everything we needed. Very easy check-in and check-out.
Fantastic place to stay if you're looking for a place downtown!
Perfect place for me while attending a conference at the Montreal Palais des Congrès (ca 20 min walk)
