My stay in Marina's apartment went perfectly well. 

The apartment was clean, very well-equipped, and the self-check-in feature is a big plus!

Finally, Marina is very responsive and helpful.
The whole room is very clean, the location is very convenient, the landlord is super nice and very enthusiastic.

The location is phenomenal. It's located a block from nightlife and dining, and a mile from Old Port. Marina responded very quickly and was flexible with an early check-in. The studio was very cold in Montreal, and the heat worked very quickly and quietly.
Studio clean and practical, easy communication. Thank you Marina
Bien

For our first three days in Canada, we had booked Marina's apartment. We couldn't have fallen into a better situation! It was a small, cozy apartment, very warm, fully equipped and perfectly located on a quiet street just a hundred meters from the main street of the Village neighborhood, a beautiful and lively area.

During our stay, Marina was an excellent host, very attentive and extremely responsive. We had some plumbing problems one evening. Marina immediately called a plumber to come fix it the next morning and even offered us a small local gift as a way to apologize for the inconvenience.

In summary, a perfect stay that seemed too short!
Awesome location, close to everything. Even walkable. Nice apartment with a huge TV. Definitely recommend this!
Well-located apartment. Ideal for enjoying Montreal

Incredibly sweet studio in a very convenient location; everything was ready and clean, even the shower curtain; little trick to locking the front door; bed actually comfier than advertised. Would absolutely stay again.

Very well-located apartment, very cute. 
I recommend it! 😊
super hotel

Marina's apartment is in a great location near the metro, shops, and cafes, etc. It was very clean and a really comfortable space, and I would definitely recommend it for the value as a place to stay in the village.

100% description accuracy. Didn't get to meet the host but the room and the apartment were very comfy and nice. It's like one block away from the train station so you can go anywhere very easily and also very close to Mount Royal park La Fountaine. Just in front of my room was a coffee shop, ice cream shops, restaurants, bars, and shops. Stayed here the last days of my trip so I was resting most of the time but again, super comfortable place. Would definitely recommend Craig's place!
The host cancelled this reservation 59 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Located just five minutes' walk from a major bus artery, and only a 5-minute ride to the Blue Line (Metro), Paschale and Julien's home is the perfect base camp for families looking to explore Montreal and return to a quiet neighborhood at night.

While located within a 20-minute drive of all major attractions, we parked the van for three solid days and explored the city via public transit and on foot. Within a 7-minute walk of the home is a Provigo (mid-range grocery chain), two large parks with wading pools, tennis courts, basketball and baseball spaces, and even publicly available piano to play. Near one park is a fantastic breakfast place and a row of shops on Rue Beaubien including artisanal cheese and meat shops. So you needn't travel far to live like a native and entertain the children.

The home itself easily sleeps 7 (we were 5, including 3 children aged 7 to 12) and provides adequate cooking, dining, and sitting space. Clean, bright, and cozy, we felt right at home. 

Situated on the main/basement floors of a 3-story walk-up, the main floor features three bedrooms and an office we repurposed as a fourth bedroom, using the trundle bed from one of the children's bedrooms. No air conditioning, but the windows and fans proved more than adequate for the mild weather this week (no highs above 28C).

The bathrooms are nice, especially the newly remodeled basement bath with walk-in shower and attractive vanity. The basement also provides another bedroom and a sitting area with couch and futon facing a large TV; a comfortable space that could easily sleep two.

We are sorry our trip had to end. We would gladly stay here again. So glad we found this spot and hosts!

Karim provided clear and detailed instructions before our visit. Although we never needed to meet in person or speak on the phone, he was very friendly and helpful, and eager to ensure our stay was as comfortable as possible.  

Using the squash court was a bonus.

Tidy and comfortable apartment with all the essentials and good shower pressure. The futon bed was comfortable. The dedicated secure undercover parking was great. Short walking distance of downtown and major city attractions. Karim was very responsive and a pleasure to communicate with. Would happily stay in the apartment again if ever back in Montreal.
The place was very clean and cozy. A 5-minute walk from St. Catherine Street. They were very communicative and responsive with me. I would definitely recommend it to other guests visiting Montreal!
The place was very clean and the location was amazing. The only challenge was that the pool was closed for renovations during our stay.

The host was very accommodating for our last-minute late check-in. The parking garage was kind of tight, definitely would be a squeeze for a mid-sized car. But aside from that, the apartment was much more spacious than expected! Very cute decor and extremely convenient location!
Great location. Walkable to almost everything.

We had a great stay! The place was just as pictured, very comfortable & clean. I didn't get a chance to meet Karim but he provided detailed information on how to check in, park and check out. The place is at a very convenient location - close to restaurants, bars, shopping and the metro. Would definitely recommend and come back.

The area is great with many restaurants nearby. Mt. Royal is within walking distance, and it's not a difficult hike to the top! The apartment was clean and comfortable. The pool was unavailable due to renovations during our stay.
As described, a great clean apartment near attractions.

Karim was an excellent host who provided accurate directions and instructions. The flat is located perfectly within walking distance (or a short metro ride) of all downtown action. We love to walk everywhere as Montreal is a walkable city, but we had no issues with Uber or taxis. We did not take advantage of the pool due to limited time, but it is amazing along with the rooftop patio. There were no issues with noisy neighbors and the building is relatively quiet.

Karim's apartment is awesome! It fits 5 of us comfortably. Karim offered some great local recommendations and was really helpful and responsive. The location is within walking distance from a lot of cool restaurants and bars. There's a lot of shopping on Sainte Catherine which is right down the street. It's also a cheap taxi ride away from the waterfront and Mount Royal. Would definitely recommend this place!

The apartment is almost exactly as described. It's not fancy, but you will have everything you need. The beds are all futons, even in the bedroom. It's well stocked, very clean and comfortable. Parking situation is wonderful. Location is wonderful. Karim was very responsive and helpful.
Exactly as described and even better. Excellent communication. The pool and Netflix TV were fantastic. Thanks!
Everything was good, but it was a bit noisy in the mornings and parking was quite tight and questionable otherwise.
The apartment is nice but the cleaning leaves a lot to be desired...  Drapes with stains, dust scattered everywhere... Disappointing for the price of the night we expected something cleaner.

Karim's place was sizable, but also very basic. It felt like it was only for Airbnb guests, so it was quite bare. It lacked small details like a full-length mirror and paper towels. We also ran out of toilet paper (we were two women who stayed for five days, and there were only two very small rolls when we arrived). As for the location, it was very close to the metro. The parking spot was convenient. We ended up not using our car at all (walking/taking the metro).  As a side note, if you are sensitive to cigarette smell be aware that the hallways have a strong odor. The apartment itself had none, but there were many cigarette butts on the patio. Unfortunately we did not get a chance to check out the pool. Overall, we were satisfied with our stay.
Everything was perfect. Karim explained the check-in process effectively, and we enjoyed our stay. There was no hassle and the location was everything we wanted and more.
Three well
Thank you so much for hosting us in your apartment. Karim explained all the steps we needed to take very clearly, and we had a great time staying with him!
Great place and great location

The location is great - you can find all kinds of restaurants, dry cleaners, supermarkets, and is very close to the Metro (on the same block). It's very convenient to find meals (Japanese, Korean, Indian, Chinese, Spanish, steakhouse, Vietnamese) as it's close to the University and college, making transportation and restaurant access very easy.

Just as listed, I wouldn't say it was dirty but wasn't the cleanest place ever.
The terrace and building amenities were amazing! Enjoyed my stay. 
It was worth it for the price. Thanks, Karim!

Great location - very near to metro station, which can be used to access most attractions in Montreal. The parking space is a bonus. Karim sent a detailed and easy-to-follow check-in procedure. He even helped set up the sofa bed with pillows and blankets before our arrival. Thank you!
This was the perfect location for my first visit to Montreal. Everything was as described and access was super easy.
The place is great but the parking is kind of challenging

Karim's place is located in a very vibrant neighborhood with many great restaurants nearby. It is also within walking distance of the Montreal Museum of Fine Arts. He provides guidebooks at his place which proved to be very helpful. Karim gives detailed instructions so it is easy to locate the apartment. Overall, it was a good experience.

Karim was very flexible and always quick to respond to any inquiries. 
The bathroom could have been a little cleaner, but overall it was a great stay!
Karim provided accurate information for easy check-in and check-out. The apartment was clean, comfortable, and stocked with essentials for our stay. Centrally located, we enjoyed our stay.

Quaint apartment, close to transit and quite accessible. Parking spot is enclosed; corners are a little tight but easily navigated. Pictures accurately represent the look of everything. Karim is excellent at responding and explaining the check-in process. Had a wonderful night in Montreal!
Karim's place is as advertised. Good communication, great location and thankful for the parking spot!

Karim went out of his way on his weekend to make sure we were happy! He always texted back within minutes and was very flexible. We showed up three hours earlier than check-in, and Karim made it work so we could park our car in the free parking zone, and drop off our bags. I would highly recommend his condo! Comfortable, clean and great location! Thanks again for a great weekend in Montreal!
Great central location in downtown Montreal. Drove in but didn't really need to use my car at all. Subway stop is around the corner and restaurants are all around!

That was awesome, the apartment was very clean, everything was nice, thank you Karim.

If I come back to Montreal, I won't hesitate to contact Karim again.
Great location downtown near Mont Royal and Ste. Catherine, awesome amenities, great price, and Karim was accurate and responsive!

Karim's place was exactly what we needed-- a quiet haven in the heart of Montreal. The apartment had what was needed for our group of five. Not fancy but definitely serviceable and (again) the location was wonderful! The rooftop access, pool, and parking made it even better. A short walk to so many great city spots! We had a wonderful weekend there! Thank you, Karim!

Location is great. It was about a 3-minute walk to St. Catherine's, where there are plenty of places to eat and shop. Very comfortable place to stay! Karim was awesome in communicating with us and responded very quickly.
Right next to the subway! Great place to stay if you want to see as much of the city as possible
Great location, easy chef
Great location. Very nice apartment. We will definitely come back to it if we visit Montreal again.
Very gracious and helpful host!
Everything was as it appeared in the photos and description of Karim's apartment. Stylish and comfortable, the location is unbeatable with parking being a major advantage.
I can't believe there really was a squash court and sauna in this building! How amazing. Karim's place was just as advertised and he was so quick to respond to our messages. Thanks, Karim!
Pretty nice! Great location!  Since I stayed here during the Christmas holidays, one thing to note is that the temperature was quite cold, not warm at all. Overall, it's pretty awesome!

My boyfriend and I enjoyed Karim's place very much. Super close to the green line Guy-Concordia metro station to get around the city. We kept our car parked in Karim's parking space. The parking is tight, but doable. We did a 3-day unlimited Metro pass that was only $18 CAD, which was perfect for getting us anywhere we needed to be from Karim's. Karim was very quick to respond and helped us out with a last minute booking after our previous booking got canceled on us. Highly recommend and would definitely stay at his place again!
Well-located, clean, good communication, interior parking *****

This apartment enjoys central location with decent indoor parking. However, it is poorly maintained and lacks some kitchen amenities. The accumulation of dirt and dust over the year is evident on furniture and baseboards, with stains on walls and doors. The worst part is being charged a cleaning fee only to be handed a dirty apartment that was not properly cleaned after the previous night's guest. From a stinky towel and dirty bathroom to dirty sinks, countertops, and stovetop. I would not stay here again.

The condo is located in downtown Montreal, which is conveniently located near public transportation like the metro, shops, cafes, express food options, etc. The check-in and check-out procedures are simple.

Great communication with Karim. 8th floor apt centrally located so you can walk everywhere. Metro just a block away.
Indoor parking was a plus as was the small pool and sauna. The apartment was nice and quiet and clean. Futon mattresses were rather hard and anyone with chemical sensitivity would notice the spray air freshener odor
Karim's place is awesome. Great location, easy check-in/check-out, very spacious, and access to an indoor pool which was very unexpected. Thank you again!

Simple arrival, quick response
Well-situated apartment, complete
Nothing to say!!!

We were very happy with our stay. The room was exactly or better than advertised, and the amenities in the building were great (though the squash court seems to actually be a racquetball court). The location is fantastic - about a 10 minute walk from nightlife at Crescent street - and included parking is a huge plus. While we did not meet Karim in person, he was very responsive to our messages and the Argentinian steakhouse suggested in the listing was fantastic.

Karim's place is great! Everything is as described and the location is great, close to the subway and St. Catherine Street. Karim is also super quick to respond. The only issue we had was that there wasn't enough toilet paper and we had to go buy more. There were also 4 of us but we only had 2 towels. Overall it was an amazing stay and we would definitely stay here again.
Awesome location, I had a great weekend at Karim's place!
We stayed in Montreal for the long weekend. Our stay was amazing. Karim was quick with his responses and everything was as described.

Karim is an excellent host and very responsive to messaging. His directions for check-in, etc., were very clear and helpful.

The place has everything you need. However, the on-site parking has a max 5'7" clearance, so don't count on free parking if you have a truck, SUV, or minivan. 

The building is easy to find and conveniently located within the city.

We really had a great weekend in Montreal staying at this place. The pool and sauna were extra enjoyable parts of our stay, parking was tight but manageable. The unit was nice and clean. Definitely a great place to stay downtown, just a few blocks away from restaurants, stores, and public transportation.
Highly recommend
It is a place located in an interesting neighborhood of Montreal.

Everything was great and absolutely satisfactory. Quick, responsive communication, a super clean and nice apartment with lots of amenities and a top location within walking distance to everything we needed. Anytime again :)
Perfect!
Really good place, but be careful with the underground parking.

The apartment is in a perfect location, just 3 minutes walk from Saint Catherine's Street, which is a really nice street and location. However, the apartment is very old, it's not clean at all, and there's a really bad smell throughout the entire building. I had to ask the owner to come back and clean the apartment again because I couldn't stay there. I sent her pictures of the floor and stains. They came back to clean, but the stains and dust were still there. I had to clean them myself. She refused to reimburse me for the cleaning fee. 
I wouldn't recommend this apartment to anyone.
Real cool

The place is close to the main strip of bars and restaurants. We enjoyed our stay and the parking was also great. The place's cleanliness could be better, but for the price and the location and the free parking we thought it was fine.
Karim is an excellent host and his place is clean, spacious and located in the perfect spot in downtown Montreal! 5 stars all the way!

This apartment is located so that you can walk to the old port area or the McGill area. It's also very near the metro stop if you want it. Having indoor parking is a huge plus. Karim is very quick to answer any questions and was very kind to let us check in early. If you are looking for a nice space, but no frills and basic, this is a great place.
Clean apartment, easy and secure access (underground parking), I recommend!

The apartment is in the heart of downtown Montreal, making it an ideal location. The fact that a parking spot is included is a big bonus. The apartment appeared as advertised, however, it was extremely filthy. I was able to inform the host and show him, so hopefully he will address this issue and rectify it with the cleaning company he has hired. The most problematic issue was arriving in 30+ degree weather with no AC installed as advertised (which was a main criteria in selecting this place). It was quite unbearable.

While Karim was very prompt and polite in his exchanges leading up to our check-in, once this issue had to be addressed I was very unimpressed with how it was handled. After several exchanges trying to address this legitimate concern, which disrupted most of our evening, arrangements were finally made to come and install the AC that night. In the end, it only made a slight difference given that it's an older window unit. If you plan to use the kitchen, be aware that some essential items are missing; including the proper items for washing and drying dishes. Otherwise, the bed and pull-out couches are very comfortable for sleeping, and the highlight for us that mostly compensated for the other disappointments was the amazing rooftop patio and pool on the top floor. If this host is able to address the few issues mentioned, this place has a lot of potential.
This place is perfect for a short trip to Montreal! Communication with Karim was great. The apartment is spacious and we had elevator access to and from our parking, making it easy. Thanks Karim!

Stayed one night for a short trip to Montreal. Communication with Karim was very prompt. Parking inclusion is a great bonus. Check-in instructions were very clear. Apartment building is on an older side but no complaints overall. 

Thanks Karim!
Karim was a super communicative, great host.
Location was great. Very affordable. There were a few cleanliness issues.

Karim's place is spacious, clean, with an excellent location and good amenities. Although the building is old, the apartment itself is great. Check-in and check-out are convenient, and communication with Karim is also very easy.
Good place for the money

Karim's place was nice and cozy. A good deal for the price considering it included parking and the location was close to everything. Only thing was that the AC wasn't very cold, however we bring a portable fan whenever we rent with Airbnb and that certainly helped. Other than that it was good. Thanks Karim!

We've stayed at several Airbnbs. All have exceeded expectations, however this one hasn't quite lived up to them. For the most part, it was clean and tidy but had dust and grime in places that made you wonder if the rest was clean. There were only two pillows on the bed and they had pillowcases matching the bedding. Normally, I would want to sleep on pretty pillowcases or have my clients mess them up. I think a pillowcase would be a better choice. The unit is located right in the heart of lots of restaurants and shops. We had great off-street parking. And, the owner was very helpful with getting the TV to work. Turns out the batteries were dead.
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊

Great place to stay, stayed here in July 2018 from the USA, right in downtown, walkable to restaurants and more. Pool was not working but that wasn't Karim's fault. Parking is easy and free in a covered garage. Will definitely stay here again when I come back
Near downtown, you can park.

Well-located housing with easy access. Clear and simple check-in procedure. Please note the maximum parking height (1.77m). Superb indoor pool at penthouse level.  Negative points: worn apartment and not clean, very soft bed, insufficient air conditioning.

Good location
Correct price
Closed pool (construction work) when we were there...
Very dirty balcony (cigarette butts everywhere on the floor)
Good communication with Karim
Very poor wifi...
Had a great stay, the place was exactly what I expected

This has an excellent location - a block from Guy Concordia metro and St Catherine's. Karin sent detailed check-in/check-out instructions so that went smoothly. The parking spot was extremely convenient to have (and rare in downtown). The room itself is nothing fancy, but the price reflects that and the pictures show exactly what to expect. I would stay at Karim’s again.
Karim's place was very nice, and a great location too. Would definitely recommend!

In trying to be fair, I’ll break it up into two parts:

**PROs:** Off-street parking was wonderful at this location. It's close to numerous restaurants and within walking distance of the Metro subway.

**CONs:** The floors, walls, and baseboards were extremely dirty, leaving us with a (website hidden by Airbnb) unclean feeling. The furnishings were very minimal, and the bed was very (website hidden by Airbnb) uncomfortable. We could not find washcloths or kitchen towels.

Overall, I cannot recommend this location and we would not stay again until the owner corrected the noted deficiencies.

Karim is a wonderful host. We were able to check in a little early, which was a huge help. The Netflix was a nice addition. There was no toaster, which was a minor disappointment. The location is excellent and the gym is well-equipped.

I would rent this again, it was such a smooth experience. The only negative thing was the parking spot, which might be the tightest corners in a parking garage. I managed alright but couldn't see myself driving a van down there. You can see scrapes where the cars hit the corners.
Karim's place is centrally located. Just a short walk to the Bell Centre with many restaurants nearby. Free parking is a plus, but it really needs a good cleaning.
Everything was as described and expected. The location is excellent, right next to a metro station and free parking is available. The apartment is spacious and the host is very helpful.
Amazing! Loved the pool and sauna on the roof!

The price and location of this place are really amazing! We were in Montreal for a wedding and it was about a 10-minute walk to the venue and 5 minutes to the metro stop. I think the place needs a thorough cleaning, there's lots of dust and it's missing some essential kitchen appliances and utensils (no toaster, only one decent knife). Overall, I was happy with the stay and we used the pool and sauna which was lovely. The free parking was a great bonus but very tight for a large SUV.
Spacious apartment!
The only redeeming quality of this place is its location. It was the dirtiest and most poorly equipped Airbnb unit I have ever stayed in.

Pro: great location, easy to find, great price, parking is a plus. Secure!
Con: The bathroom was not cleaned. There were hair and dust over the air vent and the walls. Behind the door was super dirty. The base of the toilet was filthy with urine stains. The bathtub was not cleaned, had soap gum etc.
The kitchen area was not cleaned and the oven was dirty, the refrigerator was not cleaned as well.
The bed was cheap and was horrible, the first night my back hurt so much that I slept on the futon in the living room. 
The floor was dirty and the apartment needed to be deep cleaned. To top it off the upstairs neighbors partied nonstop the time we were there. I know you’re not responsible for the hallway but the smell of curry in the hallway doesn’t help.
I read the previous reviews and I was skeptical because there's a lot of people that love to complain so I decided to see for myself. Mistake, Mistake, Mistake
Great basic place in a great location! Thanks Karim!
Not clean enough

Karim made check-in very easy, with super informative and helpful details. The apartment is super close to the metro. Lots of great Korean food is nearby. WiFi had a good signal. Parking space was a great convenience. Unfortunately, the blue chip provided to enter the building didn't work during our entire stay, the apartment was pretty dirty and super outdated. On our last night, the hot water wasn't working. On the day of departure, it still wasn't working.
good location, good price, would recommend for those visiting for a short trip and looking for value
Very well located, you can walk to the city center by leaving your car in the private and free parking lot.
Very perfect place
Great location! Place was not fancy but got the job done.

Great location, conveniently located near downtown and shops. The parking spot is a bonus. Amenities meet expectations. The host was quick to respond to all inquiries and provided detailed check-in instructions that made the process very easy.
great spot to chill and feel at home.
Perfect
The place was great! Very neat and the directions were very clear.

ATTENTION!!!! ATTENTION!!!! Do not live in this place. This is the worst place you can imagine. Everything is old and dirty. Obviously the host doesn’t care about this place any more. I booked for 9 days, and tried to alter down my check out date. The host won't do it because no one would like to book this place. All the listings are old and dirty. The room is dark. The worst thing is the strong smell in the hallway and the bed. It’s definitely a horrible place to stay. And the host is not reasonable at all. I hope guests can read this and choose wisely. I had to book another place and paying for this one as well. HORRIBLE!!! HORRIBLE!!!!

Karim's place had an excellent location and exactly what we were looking for. The only issue was with the on-site parking. The clearance is 70 inches, so if you have a vehicle that is higher than that, you will need to find parking elsewhere. Overall, check-in was easy and the place was very clean!
Allain is a great host, he was very accessible and helped us with parking. He is very friendly and his place is super cool! I would totally recommend his place!
Good budget option. Close to the metro. Alain was responsive and helped with parking.
The host cancelled this reservation 129 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Marc was an excellent host! He had a bottle of wine waiting, which was fantastic! The location was great! The place was awesome! I would highly recommend Marc's place

You can stay anywhere in Montreal, maybe near the river, maybe downtown, BUT if you want to have the best time of your life, stay here. The neighborhood is fantastic (ask Virginie for croissant recommendations, she's a connoisseur). Bixi stations one block away with fun and fantastic places to enjoy right nearby.

Virginie is a fantastic host who will make you forget about going back home. 

This is my go-to place in Montreal from now on.
I had a great stay at Virginie's spacious flat in the Laurier neighborhood. She was a friendly, welcoming, and helpful host, highly recommended!
A quiet location in the southwest, balcony with a view of the green valley and a nearby picturesque church bar. Very uncomplicated, spacious, open and friendly host. I would like to stay there again.
Virginie has a beautiful home in the cutest neighborhood in Montreal. It's so close to some awesome streets with cool restaurants and shops. Her ideal apartment alone is worth the trip to the city!
Thank you so much, the room is amazing and the neighborhood is quiet. Virginie is very accommodating and made my stay enjoyable. Best regards:)

Perfect room for my weekend on the plateau. Two steps from Mont Royal street with plenty of restaurants, bars, and grocery stores... But the accommodation remains very quiet. 
The cleanliness is impeccable, it's a pleasure to stay at Virginie's.
I stayed at Alain's place only for one night, arriving late and leaving early the next morning. The place was quite good for the night I spent there.

Beautiful place. It will be necessary to put a WiFi repeater because it doesn't work very well in the room. Alain is very nice, too bad, I only stayed for 4 nights. I didn't have time to establish a connection with him.

Check-in was easy. Alain greeted me at the door. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The Metro was about a 5-10 minute walk, but I just drove into the city. Please remember, you are not staying at a high-end hotel. The accommodations are basic, but he is not charging a lot for them. For the price, it's a great deal.
Good value
Good price-to-value ratio. Simple and good
Alain is a very accommodating and extremely friendly host, everything went very well :)
Alain was very accommodating with the check-in and check-out process. Thank you for your flexibility
It's great for the value... I felt safe and he adapted to my schedule. Highly recommended when staying in Montreal.
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊

I had an excellent stay with Alain: very attentive and very human.

The apartment is well located: a mere 20 minutes from the Maguire station by bus and subway. A big thank you to him for his hospitality! Great value for money!
Alain is a very nice host who is always willing to help. The location is a bit far from downtown, though, and could also benefit from some deep cleaning.
Alain's home was clean and quiet. The room has a large smart TV and mini fridge :).
The host cancelled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Super! 

David has done us a great service! 
Thank you!!!
Excellent location, close to the metro, restaurants, and markets. The host is a very nice person. You will love this place! Very comfortable, clean, and elegant.

This is the perfect spot in terms of location, amenities, and having a great time in Montreal. My family came and loved Montreal in part because this place was a wonderful place to relax between doing all the touristy things. It's right next to the Rosemont metro and a walk away from everything. The condo was spacious, clean, and Francis even met with me a day before since my family was arriving earlier the next day to hand over the keys. I would definitely recommend this place and absolutely have my family stay here if they visit again :)

Great place. I said place, I meant 'palace'! It's a sweet two-bedroom condo in a very accessible part of Montreal, very clean and comfortable. Francis really came through for myself and my friends by taking us in last minute when our other AirBNB host fell through. Not only did Francis come through for us, but he was a great host and answered all our questions promptly. Would highly recommend!
Amazing host, great communication, amazing location and super clean, very modern. 5 stars all the way!

The apartment matched the description. It was clean and located in the Plateau area, within walking distance of many restaurants, bars, and shops. The owner was always very supportive and readily available.

The apartment is bright, very clean, spacious, fully equipped, and well-located. The hosts were always reachable, friendly, and helpful. I highly recommend booking this apartment and hope to do so again myself in the future.

The apartment was fantastic! Some places (Fairmount Bagels) were within a short 10-minute walk. Other places we had to drive around. But with free street parking during the weekend, getting around was hassle-free. Close to grocery stores and metro stations (5-minute walk).

AJ and his brother Chris were fantastic hosts, easy to communicate with, and the place was exactly as described, very modern, clean, and comfortable with every detail thought of. Amazing location near Mile End and Plateau. We truly enjoyed our stay - a pleasure all around!

AJ was an excellent host! Communication was quick and the amazing place matched the description perfectly. We booked the place at the last minute, and AJ's attention to detail ensured our group had a comfortable stay. Highly recommend!

The place matched the advertisement perfectly and exceeded our expectations. The location was incredibly convenient, with numerous shops and restaurants within easy walking distance. Christopher was extremely helpful and readily available during our entire stay to provide local advice and assistance whenever we needed it.
The property was as advertised, clean, close to the metro and grocery store. AJ and his family were very helpful and responsive. I will stay here again when I am in Montreal.
Great apartment and great hosts! My parents thoroughly enjoyed their stay.

This apartment was perfect for our family of four - two adults and two teenagers. The air conditioning kept us cool on hot summer days, the balcony was lovely for coffee in the mornings, and the space was immaculate. The kitchen is amazingly well-stocked with just the things we needed to make basic meals, good coffee, and possibly a cake or two! The location ended up being perfect for our 25-minute walks to Jean Talon and 15-minute walks to Mont Royal. It is not in the center of activities in the Plateau so it was quiet and the balcony faced treetops from the second story. The closest bakery or café is a 5-10 minute walk.
The condo is a bright and airy space in a great location. My family of four stayed and had everything we needed. We'll definitely stay again! Thanks, AJ

The condo exceeded our expectations. It was well-designed, nicely furnished, and fully equipped for our 6-day stay. We had 2 guests over for dinner to join the 3 of us staying there, and it was well suited to the event.  Lots of utensils and small appliances to meet every need—toaster, toaster oven, microwave, coffee maker, etc. Modern appliances and a large washer and dryer. AJ and his brother were very responsive to our questions and needs. We felt right at home.

AJ apartment is really good. Location is one of the best spots in Montreal, close to groceries, restaurants and transportation. The apartment was very clean and comfortable exactly as it is in the photos. Communication was perfect too! I'm sure I will come back! 1000% recommended!

Thank you so much AJ.

Ahmed was very friendly and accommodating. His house is very nice and not too far from downtown Montreal. It's about a 25-minute walk followed by a short trip on the metro, which is right there. Everything worked out perfectly.
Very clean room. Ahmed was hospitable and nice. Overall a great experience.
Super host, very welcoming and available, if you want to spend a moment in Montreal I recommend his place.
Friendly, cheerful, someone you can chat with! The ad matches the offer. I highly recommend it.

Anass was flexible with check-in and check-out times. He welcomed us in person and gave us some information about the building. He left us some fruit and tea in the kitchen, which was very nice. When we entered the apartment, the first thing we noticed was the smell. We knew he had a dog because of the odor. The apartment was dusty and the bathtub was really dirty.
The host cancelled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Allens' place was awesome! We got the whole apartment to ourselves. The view was amazing and the pool was nice after a hot day. Allen was super nice. He gave us suggestions on where to eat and was very understanding when our check-in time was delayed by an hour because we got caught at the border. I recommend this place for both families or groups of friends!
Allen's place is well-located, close to all the restaurants and nightlife in downtown Montreal. I recommend his place, and once the carpet is replaced with hardwood floors, it will be perfect.

Very friendly and welcoming host. The apartment is cute with a great balcony for beers and/or BBQ. The view is especially nice, and the location is practical. There is a dog smell, but we were forewarned about it, and it can easily be masked with some incense.
Allen is a good host. Excellent location. Everything was as expected. Quiet place. Pleasant terrace.

Allen was a great host, he patiently waited for us when we arrived very late (after midnight) and he was always quick to respond to any questions we had. His apartment was conveniently located within walking distance to many sites, restaurants, and bars, as well as public transportation. The apartment was clean with a comfortable bed and had a balcony with an awesome view of the city. We recommend it and will stay there again if we go back to Montreal
Great central location. Street parking is available, with a conveniently located parking garage nearby.

We stayed in Allen's apartment for two nights and were blown away by how nice the stay was. The view from the large windows and balcony was amazing, a beautiful glimpse of the city from the 19th floor. Everything was clean, with very unique decorations. Although the apartment is a little small, the three of us did not have any space problems. Allen was able to give us some recommendations for places to go in the area, and was very kind each time we interacted with him. Although the apartment smelled a little like dog, it was not overwhelming or off-putting in any way. The location of the apartment itself is great, literally steps away from delicious restaurants. If you are looking for a great place to stay in Montreal, look no further!

Allen provided us with parking information for the weekend, including the names of places where we could find the type of restaurants we desired, directions to several grocery stores, and contact information in case we needed his assistance.
Allen was very accommodating when we arrived much later than expected. The space had an amazing view of the city for a great price. Awesome host... highly recommend!
Great location! Communication was easy.

We had a fantastic stay here. The location is amazing, half a block from a metro station and a street with lots of restaurants, bars, and shops. It's a lively area yet nice and quiet in the apartment.

The place itself was spotless when we arrived, and the bed was very comfortable.

Self-check-in was easily done with keys in a lockbox, and the host was easily available by phone/text throughout our stay. We're only sorry we didn't get to meet him.

Highly recommended!

Abe's place was perfect for my trip. You couldn't get more central of a location and check-in/checkout was a breeze. The place is perfect for one person or a couple traveling who wants to be in the middle of the village. Abe is also fantastic with his response time. Any question I had, I usually got a response in less than an hour.
Abe is easy to work with and offers many great amenities. The location is exceptional. Clean. Comfortable.
Our stay with Abe was excellent! Great communication throughout with the host made our stay very pleasant.  Really accessible place in a very lively neighborhood!

This apartment is in a fantastic location, just 100 feet from Saint Catherine Street and the subway. 

The apartment itself is simple.

Excellent value for a nice place to stay and enjoy Montreal.

Abe's place was great! The apartment was located right next to the train station and gay village. Tons of restaurants and nightlife. The apartment was comfortable and all we needed to rest at night. Abe was an amazing host too! Very responsive and accommodating! Would love to stay there again.

Abe's great at communication throughout our trip and always tried to help us. He found us parking around his apartment so that we could leave our car there for an extended period of time. The place is located right by a metro stop and super close to Rue St Catherine and downtown Montreal. Everything is pretty much within walking distance. We will definitely stay again next time!

Great location. Great restaurants and a fun pedestrian street just steps away. There's also a metro station nearby. Abe was quick to answer all our questions. He was friendly and helpful. The apartment was very clean, and we had a great stay.

This apartment is perfectly located in the Village near Metro Beudry; you'll be right in the heart of everything if you're hanging out in the Village, but if you need to go anywhere else, the Metro is literally a 1-minute walk and taxis are readily available. Check-in/check-out was a breeze because the keys will be waiting for you in a lock box. There is no TV, so you'll need to bring your own entertainment when you're not out sightseeing, dining, or at the clubs.
Location! Very close to the metro, gay nightlife, and clean with good value for money.
Very close to the metro in the heart of the gay village. Simple apartment with easy access. Bed is very comfortable.

Had a lovely communication with the hosts was very nice. The beds (one is a futon) were super comfortable. The sheets were lovely, which contributed to a great sleep. The location in relation to the Metro couldn't have been better. The apartment was nice and clean. Check-in was super easy. Good wifi connection. The water pressure in the shower was just wonderful. You can't go wrong by staying here.
This place was perfect for my needs. Close to shops and restaurants. Very walkable location and right next to transit. The place was clean and well-kept.
Abe's Airbnb is in an excellent location for a quick trip to Montreal! It's also very clean and there is easy check-in and communication during your stay.
Entry into the premises was very easy. The apartment is very well located, about 50 meters from the metro station. The kitchen is very well equipped and there are some basic supplies.
It was amazing, perfect location, the communication was very appropriate and the place was clean.
Great place and amazing location. Highly recommend and would definitely stay again.

Abe is a perfect host - responsive, accommodating, and helpful. The space couldn't be in a better location for exploring Montreal, especially for gay travelers as it is right in the heart of the Gay Village. Clean, spacious, and quiet, this was a wonderful experience and so affordable. We will definitely be back!
Abe's place was great! The location is exceptional; it's very close to the metro, very clean and comfortable.

Abe's place is in an amazing location with great public transit access, delicious local food and shops, and nightlife. The apartment was well-equipped for a comfortable stay, but we didn't spend much time at the Airbnb. The rooms could be made quite dark for a good night's rest. The apartment was very clean. I will definitely try to stay here again.
Everything was very good :)
Location is great, very close to the metro

A great place in Montreal. Everything was fine, and the best thing is: it's very close to the metro. 
Highly recommended.
Excellent Airbnb, located just 2 minutes from the metro! Perfect for a weekend getaway.
"I would definitely stay here again. Just let me know if you need the second bed as there are no extra blankets or sheets left for the second bed, and it needs to be made up."
Great apartment located in an even better location. Couldn't have asked for a better place to stay while visiting Montreal!
Amazing location! Very walkable and right next to a metro station. Check-in was easy and the place had everything we needed. Highly recommended.

We had such a great time at this place. The neighborhood is very safe. The apartment is close to the metro, which is just amazing. I'd love to come back in the future. The hosts are very nice and are able to help you further.

Abe's place is perfectly located in the gay village. It's easily the best-located Airbnb in the area. The only downside to this location is that it's on the ground floor, which means reduced privacy. Totally worth it, I would stay here again!
Good stay in Montreal. Nice apartment though a bit noisy but well located.

Perfect location to visit the village! Clean, convenient, centrally located with responsive hosts. Small and cozy, my only negative is that it's on the ground floor and not super private if you open the curtains. Also a bit noisy in the building at times.
Great space for a quick stay in Montreal, the location is great! The host was quick to respond to all my questions.

Very nice apartment, very well located. Very good host service, always asking if everything is going well. Location in the heart of the village but still quiet at night. 
I highly recommend choosing this apartment

Abe's place was super clean. The location is great. Literally just steps away from the metro and many restaurants and shops. However, being a ground unit located right near the front door, there is little privacy. The apartment also does not have AC, however there are two large fans which definitely helped. Overall, I would recommend it and I would stay here again

The location is absolutely fantastic if you want to be right in the heart of the gay village; even its proximity to the liveliness doesn't imply noise. The queen-size bed is comfortable and the shower had great water pressure. But if you like your Airbnb to be something to come home to, keep looking. And though the photos might suggest there's a patio, there isn't.
Perfect location and dazzlingly rapid responses. Abe is amazing.

This is a wonderfully located apartment. Right in the heart of the village. And at the door of the Berry metro station. No need to take any transport. However, the apartment remains calm and protected. You will find nearby restaurants, cafes, bars, clubs, shops etc... everything is within walking distance. One can live in the neighborhood without even leaving it! 
The street is magnificent because the buildings are typical of MTL. 
Abe is a quality host. 
You continue down the street and you find yourself right in the heart of the entertainment district, shopping center etc... 
Go for it!
Great place, within walking distance of public transportation, restaurants, and entertainment. Safe, clean, and very comfortable.
Abe was a wonderful host. The place was clean and located in a great spot. He responded quickly and was very accommodating to our specific needs.

Abe's apartment is in a central location (gay village), is extremely clean and spacious. He was easy to communicate with. I had a great time staying there, a perfect spot for one or two people. I would definitely stay again.
Super place. Well-equipped, nicely appointed, and friendly host. Close to the metro, great communication. Good value.

The place was clean and ready for use when I checked in. Everything was complete from the bathroom, kitchen, and some extra items in the fridge like water and ice cream. Very thoughtful of the owner. I will definitely go back to this place in the future. Easy communication with the owner and very informative. Thank you so much Mr. Abe. God bless!
Great location, easy to find, good value. Couldn't be better situated in the village.
This is a simple clean apartment located in the heart of Montreal's lively Gay Village. Communication with Abe and Daniel was straightforward. Importantly, the bed was comfortable.

Great location if you want to be in the heart of The Village. Metro stop right outside the front door. (Unfortunately, there are a number of homeless people.) Still felt very safe. The building is OK, a bit older and run down, but you can't beat the location and convenience as well as the cleanliness. Not crazy about being on the first floor and there was a young child running around a lot above us that you could hear very clearly. 

The apartment was very spacious. And very reasonably priced. Great value. Had an awesome time in a great city.
Great location near the Beaudry Metro station in the heart of the village.
Perfect place for solo or couples. Well-located. The places are clean and well-equipped. A bit noisy.

Amazing apartment that is clean, comfortable, well-suited, and easy check-in. The location is perfect; you can walk to everything. It's a super great deal, especially for the price. I was thrilled with the smart TV and the washer and dryer inside the unit. The host is super responsive and goes the extra mile (km) to make sure guests are settled. I can't wait to stay here again on my next trip.

Excellent option! Definitely the best apartment to stay in Montreal. It has an excellent location. The apartment is very spacious and very clean. But definitely what I have to highlight is the location!! You can walk to everything within just a few minutes, and the area is extremely safe. Of course, I'll be staying in the same apartment when I return.

Charming place! My partner and I traveled to Montreal for business and we loved the location. Right near delicious restaurants, bars, and public transportation. I would highly recommend it. Looking forward to the next visit!

Location, location, location! This place is right in the heart of the gay village. Super convenient, clean, spacious, and close to all the bars, restaurants, and the subway station. I highly recommend this place!
Really enjoyed our stay at Abe's! The closest metro station was closed, but it's in a great location and is a nice cozy space. We really enjoyed our trip to Montreal!

Well-located, with a super bakery "my morning" at 5 minutes. Attention, the Beaudry metro station is closed for work, what a shame as it's only 30 meters away! Abe was hyper responsive to our requests. Thank you!  Slightly noisy due to neighbors above (kids) but not annoying with the time difference!
I had a great stay here. Excellent location and the apartment had everything I needed. Check-in was easy too.
Abe is very available for any questions. The apartment is well-located in Montreal and right next to everything. We will be back! Thank you again for everything.

Abe and Leslie's place is very cozy, clean, and convenient in terms of location. It is very close to everything you will need, whether it be food, transportation, entertainment, or anything else. The location is also safe. They also respond quickly to messages. I would love to stay again at their place in the future.
Very nice, clean and well-located apartment, close to many markets and restaurants. My husband and I really enjoyed the accommodation and hope to return soon. Great hospitality.
I highly recommend it being close to everything

It was the ideal apartment for my friend and me during spring break. It's ideally located (although it will be even more ideal when they finish repairing the metro stop that's right next to it), clean, and plenty spacious for the both of us. We never had problems with things like hot water or the A/C. It's in a part of town where we felt safe walking home very late at night, and the check-in/check-out system is ideal for a flexible travel schedule.
Beautiful apartment, location couldn't be better. Great communication and nice hosts. Recommended!

Well-located apartment with a crazy charm! Cleanliness and comfort assured! 

Sarah (and Antoine) were discreet but always available during our stay! 

I highly recommend it!

Top notch location on a quiet one-way street with available parking (if you're lucky, be careful reading the signs). Spent a lot of time on one of the two balconies. Easy access to bike paths and all the treasures of Mile End. Clean, comfortable, and good hosts. Would definitely stay again!
Charming and conveniently located within a 15-minute walk of the metro station. The neighborhood is pleasant, lively, and close to shops. Excellent service.
We loved staying here! It was easy to reach and communicate with Sarah/Antoine. We felt at home here and would feel lucky to stay here again.

The location is FANTASTIC! It is across the street from Kem Coba, Fairmount Bagel, and very close to many other great restaurants and bars. It's also a nice walk to Mont Royal and a few blocks from parks and the subway. I couldn't have asked for a better location. The apartment itself felt very homey! I would stay here again!

The apartment is really comfortable and cozy, and it has everything you need. My boyfriend and I felt right at home. There are two little balconies, which is nice. The neighborhood is cool with lots of restaurants, shops, and cafes, but also quite noisy at night. Also, the parking situation on the plateau can be a bit frustrating. Apart from that, we would absolutely stay there again!
Beautiful place in an easily accessible area. Communication was quick and straightforward!
Great place in the perfect location!
Super cool apartment in a fantastic location! Would definitely stay here again.
Fantastic location! Cute and cozy place.

Sarah's place is in the PERFECT location. I used to live in Montreal and am envious of the great space. We felt comfortable using everything and Antoine made check-in very easy. What a wonderful experience!
The location is ideal, the apartment is very welcoming and both balconies are awesome! Communication was very easy.

We absolutely loved the apartment and it was the perfect home base for a fantastic trip to Montreal. It was very spacious, had beautiful decorations, and was in a perfect location. We would absolutely stay here again.

Superb apartment in a great location. In the morning, Fairmont bagels and the local coffee shop are just two steps away. The neighborhood offers amazing restaurants nearby. The street is a bike-friendly street with Bixi stations right next door. We loved it!

This apartment is beautiful, large, and located in an incredible spot. The patio door was new and locked us out on the patio which could have been a disaster but Antoine was amazing and came within 10 minutes to help us out! We were only here for a short time but this apartment is definitely suitable for longer stays as well!

Next time I am in Montreal, I will be staying here if it is available!
This place was great! I'd recommend it to all my friends!
Very nice and charming cadre. We really enjoyed our first night in Montreal.
A wonderful stay in Montreal. The neighborhood is quiet but in a perfect location with plenty of delicious restaurants nearby.
This place is really amazing - very interesting decor, very clean, and an amazing location in Montreal

Very nice place in a great location on the plateau with lots of great bars and restaurants nearby. We arrived on a very cold winter day and the unit was quite chilly despite the small heater. Bring some warm socks and extra blankets!
Great cozy stylish place, nice neighborhood close to everything you need. Would definitely stay again!
Great location and great communication. Perfect place to spend a week or two in Montreal
Everything about this stay was great. Most of all was the style and atmosphere of the apartment, it was unique and charming
Sarah's place may be the most charming in Mile End. It felt like staying in a French New Wave film! Great location, great host, great place. Looking forward to staying there again.

The perfect location. Everything you might want to do, eat or drink. The space is inviting, comfortable and clean! Any questions we had were handled immediately. We would definitely come back and stay here again.
Great stay! Beautifully decorated apartment
Wonderful apartment full of light and style!

This is a lovely little apartment full of books, plants, and interesting art. It is the perfect location in the Mile End neighborhood. The street has a lot of bike traffic but is otherwise pretty quiet.
My friend and I had a great time in Montreal at Sarah and Antoine's place! It's well-located! We were close to great coffee shops and bakeries!

Sarah's place is a great choice for your Montreal stay. It is a quiet, safe and private home, in a great location. The streets around Sarah's house are perfect for wandering, exploring, eating and drinking. We loved the area. The home is green and spacious and has lovely natural light. Antoine managed our reservation and he was very responsive and helpful. He kindly allowed us to check in early as we arrived early from the airport. He went to the effort of having the apartment cleaned earlier than planned and for that we are very grateful. Thank you Sarah and Antoine. I highly recommend this apartment.

The location is amazing. Perfectly central in Mile End. This literally made our trip. Also conveniently located to many areas in the city— easy to take an Uber from there and explore. The apartment is clean! Communication was seamless and super flexible. Great stay.
The place is absolutely charming. In the middle of Mile End. There are a lot of books.
Very cute apartment in a great location just two steps from the best bagels in the city! Thanks!!

Sarah's place is in a perfect location to enjoy Montreal. It's within walking distance of countless boutiques, across the street from delicious ice cream, and near so many affordable and delicious restaurants. My wife and I particularly enjoyed shopping for records at Phonopolis, then playing them on the turntable at Sarah's apartment while we relaxed on the balcony.
Sarah's apartment is charming in the wonderful Mile End, close to everything! The balconies really enhance the stay
This place is great! I will definitely stay again.
Sarah's apartment is beautiful, clean, artistically decorated, and well-lit. The location is also excellent.
Pleasant and well-centered in the Mile End
Loved our stay in this quirky apartment. Awesome location in Mile. So responsive and helpful with information and details about the stay. Highly recommend!

Sarah's apartment is located in a great area. There are several delicious restaurants located within a 30-second walk (Wilensky's, Fairmont Bagel, Fabrege, etc.) and several bars. The street is located a 1-minute walk from St. Laurent and public transit, making it easily accessible.

The apartment is clean, tidy, eclectic.

The apartment is very small. The bedroom is tiny but the terrace is a nice touch, there is a terrace off the kitchen as well, which offers a private spot to enjoy morning coffee or an evening glass of wine. 

The downside is the tiny bathroom, which is functional but very small.
During a heat wave, we recommend that a window AC unit be available. It was so hot and muggy in the apartment which made our stay less enjoyable.

Thank you to Sarah and Antoine's employee/helper for quickly setting up the mattress for the 3rd guest. Thank you for the bottle of wine as well, that was a very thoughtful gesture.

The location is great, the apartment is clean, tidy and artfully eclectic, which is something we appreciated.

Thank you!
Lovely place in a great location!
Sarah's home was a true Montreal gem! It was the perfect place for a quiet retreat while still being within walking distance of amazing venues and activities.
Very cute apartment, charming, bright, artistic in the heart of Montreal, very practical and perfect for discovering Montreal.

This is an amazing place to stay. The host was super helpful and made check-in easy. 10/10 would definitely come back. I loved the space but this place kinda scary at nighttime. Idk maybe it's cursed, bring a nightlight as hosts don't provide one.
Sarah's place was a great location for anyone looking to explore and enjoy the Mile End neighborhood. Antoine was also very responsive and easy to communicate with.

This is a really beautiful little gem with an authentic Montreal feel located in the heart of the Mile End. The apartment was full of plants which added a charming touch. It was easy to communicate with Sarah and I would definitely stay here again if I needed!
Great visit

I stayed one night and it was great.
The biggest plus is the location of the apartment, a superb neighborhood with everything nearby.
Amazing little place!

Wonderful, quirky apartment. This is our favorite kind of Airbnb place, where you feel like you're really living in someone else's place. Cozy and interesting books, music, layout. Wonderful balconies (if only it had been warm enough outside to enjoy them.) Great location, right in the heart of Mile End.
We absolutely adored Sarah's apartment! My boyfriend calls it the perfect oasis for creative souls. Thank you so much for your hospitality, we really loved the decor and the neighborhood!
Cozy and convenient place in a great neighborhood

Ali's apartment is very functional, clean and well-located in Montreal. The rooftop terrace is very much appreciated at any time of the day. Communication has been very easy and responsive. We highly recommend Ali.

Our stay at Ali's place was exceptional. It was my first time using Airbnb, but Ali and the check-in host were both very accommodating and great at answering questions. The apartment is within walking distance of nearly everything in Montreal, but there are plenty of things to do near his home as well. We got a parking ticket at 8:30 AM when the street meter said we could park the car between 9PM-9AM, so if you're unsure about parking it might be safest to leave the car in a garage.

Ali was an excellent host, the apartment was very clean and comfortable. The location was great and we found that most sights were within walking distance. We were able to find paid parking on the street out front with no issues. Definitely recommend!
Nice place, excellent location close to the Green Line metro station.
Great location, helpful host

Convenient location, just a short walk into downtown. The rooftop was also a nice place to sit and enjoy the view! We were able to find parking in a small lot across the street at the College de Montreal in the L'ermitage building. Great place to stay if visiting Montreal.
Great location and great apartment. Would stay there again.

Stay away from this place 
And the site offered to reimburse us for our town day's stay at Holiday Inn and still has not
Loved Ali's place! We were greeted at the door, it was very clean, and it's a wonderful location.

Ali's flat is perfectly located in the heart of Montréal, close to the metro station, restaurants, and bars... The place was really clean when we arrived and the penthouse offers a great view at night. We couldn't have met Ali but everything was arranged to make our check-in flexible and easy! I really recommend this place. Thanks, Ali

We stayed at Ali's place for two nights to explore the city. The location is great, and communication with the host and management company was excellent. We arrived later than expected but that was thankfully no problem. The key exchange felt somewhat rushed though, and we never got an answer as to where to best park our car in the neighborhood during the day. Free parking is available o/n just on the street (9pm-9am). The apartment itself is well equipped and designed, it was clean and had everything we needed. It doesn't feel as much like home as we would have liked, but the building has a great rooftop with lots of sun. I recommend this place.

Super value for money! 
The apartment is nice, clean, and well-located! 
I recommend it.

The apartment was located in one of the best areas of Montreal. A short walk to the subway station, restaurants, bars, and nightlife. 

The only issue was finding parking in the area, but this is typical for any apartment downtown. I highly recommend it.
Location as described! Friendly welcome, calm atmosphere. I had a good time!
Would definitely stay here again
Great place with an even better rooftop! Highly recommend and will definitely be back next time I'm in Montreal.

This apartment is well located, next to a couple of convenience stores and a short walking distance from the shopping area and metro. Nice bonus: rooftop deck with view on the city skyline. Parking on the street, which may or may not be easy to find depending on the day and time of day.

Four people can sleep, with one double bed in the bedroom and a very comfortable IKEA sectional that converts into a queen-size bed in the living room. There was no coffee maker which should be taken into consideration when planning your trip -- We needed to go out to get our coffee in the morning. Communication through Airbnb was very pleasant, and we felt well served as we prepared for our arrival and at check-in.
Excellent! Everything is very very good!

Well-located housing, that is the only positive point. 
There is a very bad smell in the bathroom with very noisy ventilation.
Very little toilet paper and overall equipment at minimum.
The worst thing is that there is no window on the sliding track, it's placed next to its location and therefore cold air enters the room which should be overheated.
We had to patch the hole with bath towels and cushions from the sofa.
After contacting the rental agency and reporting the problem, which was almost blamed on us, I received this email response from my interlocutor.

Thank you for this message. 
After checking with the owner, it's like that all the time... I can understand that it brings in the cold but I don't have a better solution to offer. 

I can only advise you to try blocking with towels (there are others in the closet), and increase the heating if the cold passes too much.
I am sorry that I can only give you this "solution".

At your disposal if needed.
Have a good day,
Sacha

This is a great place for a business trip (or any other type of travel)! The apartment is a great alternative to a hotel, super clean and in a great location. The service was also great, check-in and check-out were extremely easy. Will definitely be back next time I'm here :).

I would definitely recommend staying here! My friend and I spent the weekend and it was a lovely little apartment, very close to downtown. Nice amenities and decor; quick response times from the host. We had an amazing time, thanks Ali!
Ali's place was perfect for our family. Very clean, secure, close to the metro and a variety of restaurants and shops.
We had a lovely stay at Ali's place, parking was a bit of a hassle but otherwise everything was fine.
Perfect location for accessing Montreal, the apartment has a nice, open layout except for the bathroom. It's reasonably clean, with a nice-to-have Roku TV.
Not super far from downtown but not the closest one
Super apartment well located with everything you need! If I had to go back to Montreal, I would move back into this apartment!

Ali's place is great for a few friends looking for somewhere to stay in the heart of Montreal. 

The inside was a clean apartment and a home base with all the essentials. Make some memories on the patio rooftop, make some plans for the night in the dining room, set off on an adventure, and tag along back to the second floor for a comfy night back. Lastly, Ali is good about keeping in touch, like when my flight was delayed and we needed to reschedule our arrival. 

Thanks again, Ali.
Great place. Prime downtown location. Perfect for those doing business at Concordia University or Montreal General Hospital! The place shows its age a bit, but is clean.
Great apartment!

Ali's place was very conveniently located downtown. There was just a slight issue with parking nearby, but they were super helpful in trying to help out. The apartment was clean, had bathroom supplies and lived up to the pictures. Would 100% recommend it to anyone staying in Montreal who prefers being minutes away from all the local sights!
Great place, awesome location.
The host cancelled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 46 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

It is a terrible place, it was extremely dirty, there was no internet connection, the place was hot and humid and there was no fan. The shower sprays water everywhere and after showering you get the whole bathroom wet. The location is convenient, however the price-quality ratio is totally unfair.

Ali is an amazing host and very helpful! I had such an amazing stay and the location is PERFECT!!! It's in the center of everything. Everything is within walking distance, and the neighborhood is lively. I definitely recommend it!

Ali was an excellent host and very communicative. Most importantly, he was very patient when our estimated arrival time was later than expected (we were driving from New York to Montreal). The space is accurately described, but during extremely hot summer days and nights, it gets very little ventilation (windows are small and face a courtyard). While it says there's no AC, fans should be provided. We requested two fans and were only told we could be reimbursed for one fan. We had two people staying in the back room and one person in the living room - being limited to one fan was not sufficient to provide circulation. Also, the showerhead was broken and not fixed during our stay. We did not use the shower on the first day or two to avoid spraying water all over the bathroom (it got the toilet paper wet) - not taking a shower on top of a hot apartment was not ideal. Finally, the washer had very dirty/gross sheets in it - if we are paying for a cleaning fee, we shouldn't have to see that.
Excellent address, very well located. We had a wonderful stay and fully enjoyed the rooftop and the view of Montreal. Excellent communication with Ali. Highly recommend.
Great location, fair price.

I stayed in Ali's apartment for 5 days. Ali was very available and responsive. Check-in and check-out were simple.

The apartment matched the photos. 

However, the mattress on the bed is not very comfortable (that's putting it mildly). There's also a problem with the bed slats that sag, but Ali promised he would fix this point after my departure.

The bedroom isn't separated from the rest of the apartment by a door. As a result, if you are sensitive to noise, you will hear the refrigerator turning on regularly.

Speaking of noise, the entrance door is very poorly insulated; however, all apartments in the building were designed this way...

The apartment and the building itself aren't brand new, but a bit like everywhere else in Montreal. During my stay, painters were working on the common areas.

Highlights of the apartment:

- Location (bus stops, subway station, shops, Mont Royal Park)
- Rooftop with beautiful views, especially at night
- Clean and functional bathroom
- Washer and dryer
- TV with Netflix

In summary, I was quite satisfied with my stay despite the points mentioned above.

Ali was an excellent host. He communicated very clearly about the check-in process and was very responsive to our needs. His apartment offers great value for the price. I highly recommend this for anyone on a budget.
It is a pretty good apartment.

Thank you Ali for being a great host! This was our first experience using Airbnb and everything exceeded our expectations. Ali made us comfortable right from the beginning of our booking and made sure we were happy after check-in. The location of his apartment is perfect, easy to walk around downtown Montreal, and close to everything. Thanks again Ali

We were very excited for our first trip to Montreal, but got really disappointed with the apartment. It was not clean; there was dirt under the bed and couches, and in corners. The bed and couch were broken, the pillows smelled bad, so we left after the first night. Ali was responsive and answered our messages right away, however the apartment was not in a condition that we could stay in. The location is good, but parking is difficult.
The rooftop is spectacular and a real treat. The apartment is in a great location, about a 5-minute walk to the metro station downhill. It's well-furnished and clean, though it lacks natural light.
Excellent reception, very responsive team. We had a wonderful stay, the accommodation is perfectly located and spotless.
Well-placed apartment matching the description.

This place is fine if you're on a tight budget and just need somewhere to sleep. However, the beds are pretty dirty. We felt like we got what we paid for considering how cheap this place was, but we wouldn't stay again. The location was good; short Uber rides away from everything. Safe area and building.
Love the location, the apartment is amazingly quiet and the building is too. Easy check-in and a large space that was very comfortable! I will definitely be returning
Recommended
We had a great stay at Ali's place. The location was perfect

Ali's place is great! Super close to public transport, shops, etc. A convenience store next door too. Ali was super quick with responses. The apartment was very clean, looked exactly like the photos. The view from the rooftop is amazing. Definitely recommend it to anyone traveling to Montreal.

Great place to stay for 4 or less people. A quick walk to downtown. Such a great location and a cozy place to stay! It's worth the read if you're looking for a roof over your head and a nice place to stay!

The apartment was clean, but slightly smaller than I expected. There were also some issues with toilet leakage, which was fixed later, but it's not typically expected during a stay. Otherwise, the apartment is good.
Pleasant apartment. However, the boots in winter when there is snow make the entrance very dirty.
Amazing location and super clean! We had minor issues with check-in, but I'm sure this was a one-time issue and did not impact the overall quality of our stay!

Great location near Guy-Concordia, and definitely worth it if you need a place to sleep at the end of the day. Plus, Luckey Homes has been very responsive, organized, and easy to deal with in terms of logistics such as check-in.
Great place in a very central location. It made getting around the city very easy.
We have the next-to-last day and appreciate your understanding as our circumstances changed. Anthony was an excellent host, and the location and apartment were excellent.

Very clean recently refurbished apartment on the ground floor of a 3-story block. Everything is as listed, and it was obvious this was a new house as some of the utensils were still in their wrappers. Combination code on the front door for access.

Location great for Little Italy (best bagels and ice cream shops nearby). Parking on the street for residents only or at parking meters during the day (9-9), but the street was very quiet with lots of spaces. 

The apartment has 3 double beds and a small bathroom with a good, powerful shower in the bath. Washer and dryer. Anthony also put an inflatable double air mattress that can fit in the living room. 

There is one AC unit in the kitchen/living room area. 

Yes, it has wifi. We had plenty of room for three teenagers and two parents.
Very beautiful and cozy home. The location is great (close to a lot of restaurants and shops). Overall, I had an amazing stay

The perfect place to stay! Very nice and quiet neighborhood with lots of restaurants and shops nearby. If you're looking to explore the downtown core of Montreal, it was only a short (and cheap) drive away!
Great location, quiet street and cozy atmosphere.

I was traveling with my husband, twins, and toddler, and we spent 9 nights at Anthony's Mile End apartment. Check-in was very smooth, with the excitement of getting the kids packed and on and off the plane I'd forgotten to contact Anthony about check-in. But, upon landing I saw he'd already messaged me all the information my family would need to get into our rental. The location was easy to get to, and we were able to settle right in. At the time we stayed, small touches like dish detergent, hand soap, laundry detergent, paper towels, and strong wifi went a long way and were appreciated. There are tons of places to eat in the area, and we utilized nearby public transit daily. This place worked well for my family and made our trip possible with lots of happy memories.
Very clean and comfortable, had everything we needed and the location was great. Would definitely stay here again
Awesome location near many food options and only a few minutes away by car from all the other areas. Clean and renovated apartment.
Our stay at Anthony's was great.
The apartment is very clean and spacious, the bedding is very comfortable. Located in Mile End, it is two steps away from all amenities. I recommend!

This space was just PERFECT for our group. The apartment was on a quiet street with loads of parking spaces (pay). The space was very clean/updated, well furnished, with all of the fittings we needed for our short stay. There is even a washer/dryer, which came in very handy. The neighborhood was just where we wanted to be. Completely walkable and full of lovely shops and cafes. Beds were comfy and clean with tonnes of pillows :) Check-in and communication with Anthony was easy. I have nothing bad to say here... lovely place. We will be back.
Everything was exactly as described, and the place is super clean. Street parking is easy to find and the location is fantastic. Highly recommend!
The apartment is super well-located in the heart of Mile End, very well-equipped and quiet. Anthony was very accommodating!
We had a really nice stay at this place, the neighborhood is charming and you can walk to the many restaurants, bars, cafes, and everything you might need.
Perfect place to stay

Great place and great location. Close to shops and great restaurants, but not on a main street which allowed for peaceful nights. Anthony was a great host and quickly answered all my questions and provided lots of suggestions for things to do in the area. Definitely worth checking this place out when visiting the area.
Great spot, as advertised - ground level in the best neighborhood. Ideal for seniors or people with mobility issues.

When we arrived, we encountered an issue with some of the radiators not working. As it was the first cold day of the year, the bedrooms were a little chilly.
