We messaged Anthony and he got back to us right away. He brought over some space heaters for the rooms and had an electrician come fix the issue as soon as morning! Anthony is a very responsive host who goes the extra mile to ensure your stay is as pleasant as possible. He even brought us some fresh Montreal bagels to apologize for the inconvenience!

Staying at Anthony's apartment in Montreal was a pleasure. It was spacious, had ample parking, and felt very safe. As a host, Anthony was perfect, with nearly immediate responses to questions and concerns. The accommodations were exactly as described in his listing, and all 7 of us were comfortable with the arrangements. It was also an incredibly convenient location, with easy access to a variety of different things to do (restaurants, museums, Old Montreal, bars, and nightclubs). I would definitely recommend staying here to anyone who asked, and would gladly stay again myself. Five stars!

Glad to say that my first Airbnb experience was a great one. I'll definitely do it again another time. Anthony was a great host who replies very quickly and well.

We recommend this apartment to everyone interested. You won't be disappointed.
Anthony was a helpful host who always responded quickly to our questions.
Very beautiful place in a quiet neighborhood
Everything was perfect! Location, cleanliness, especially the peace and quiet, we heard nothing!
Had a great time! Very convenient location, and nice home.

Anthony was a wonderful host! He allowed us to check in a couple hours early and walked us through the parking situation. He was very pleasant and responsive. The place itself was very cool and well kept. We did have some hot water issues, but since we only stayed for one night, Anthony didn't have the chance to fix them in the time we were there, and he did assure us he would do so before his next guest arrived. Overall, fantastic place to stay!
We were not lucky, no hot water, no dishwasher and dirty sheets

Anthony is a great communicator and we were able to check in easily and get anything addressed quickly. The house is in a great location, an older house but remodeled retaining elements of both. It was clean for the most part. We were a group of 7 and fit comfortably, but keep in mind one of the walls between two bedrooms are French doors so there is a bit less privacy due to that, so you’ll have to be comfortable with that. Very convenient to St. Viateur bagels :) so a great place to see Montreal and really convenient place to park a car if you bring one.

Hello

Very nice accommodation with 3 large comfortable bedrooms just a stone's throw from Boulevard Saint Laurent. The owner is very responsive to your requests, don't hesitate ;) all the comfort on site, a perfect stay for us!
Anthony was so responsive and helpful and nice! The place was as described and in a great location!
Great little place in Montreal! So cute and stylish, my friends and I loved staying here for spring break.

Mile End is a phenomenal neighborhood. Jeans Jeans Jeans is one block away, and it's an amazing experience to buy jeans there. The overall vibe of Mile End is great, and the accommodations fit perfectly for our trip and our family (including picky/cool teens).
The place was in the most convenient spot I've stayed in Montreal. The unit was huge! Great space for the 6 of us who stayed over!
The place has some potential.

The space was a little smaller than expected, especially a space that advertises it can accommodate eight.  

Since the bedrooms were so close to the common area/kitchen and/or bathroom, we all had to agree upon a time to sleep and wake so as not to disturb one another. If eight guests slept here, they would probably be sleeping in the living room which is very close to the kitchen and bathroom and will surely wake anyone sleeping in it.

There was a TV but it didn't have any channels, so it seemed a little redundant to have. 

Overall, the space accommodated our needs, which were to sleep, shower, and eat, but if we had wanted to spend any time in the space, much more than we did, I would be on top of one another.  

On a positive note, the bed I slept in was very comfortable and didn't move when shifted in my sleep, so my partner wasn't disturbed. 

Cafes were very close by with great coffee. 

Parking over the weekend was not an issue. Review parking for weekday stays. 

Check-in was seamless.
Thank you very much! Very beautiful home, well located.
Great location. Not my favorite Airbnb, but it was fine, and check-in/check-out was very easy.
Great location, very clean and it had all the amenities our family needed. Anthony was very responsive to messages. Highly recommend this place.
Great location, but a bit rundown.

Wow! What a fantastic stay... first of all, this rental is in an ideal neighborhood - you have Mile End at your fingertips and the rest of the Plateau is not far away. I loved just exploring the side streets. This place was a great value and definitely worth staying a bit further from downtown. I would definitely stay here again.

Our stay at Anthony’s place was comfortable and convenient for our family vacation (4 adults, 1 teen). Beds were clean and comfortable. The walls are a bit thin.

We ate breakfast in the unit quite a bit and found that all the necessary supplies were present for cooking. The dishwasher was not in service.

The unit is a good value and has all necessary items for a nice stay. Anthony was good about getting back to us. Recommend overall.

Exactly as listed. Beautiful space in a great neighborhood, one block away from St Laurent's amazing bars and restaurants. We slept 5 adults and two kids comfortably and really enjoyed the space. Anthony was a great host, the place was clean and his communication was fantastic. Highly recommend.
Anthony's apartment was very clean. The location is perfect, close to shops, restaurants, bars, and a short drive into Old Montreal.
Easily the best host I've had. Responses were immediate, and Anthony was kind and accommodating. Loved the apartment -- exactly what we were looking for. 100% would recommend
Fantastic place in an amazing location. I would absolutely stay there again.

Staying at Anthony's place was absolutely perfect - clean, cozy, and had everything you need. The location is ideal if you don't desire to be in the center of everything, but still close enough (walking distance to tons of amazing restaurants and shops). Additionally, Anthony was very accommodating to allow me to check in a little earlier. When I return to Montreal, I know where I am staying and where I would recommend others stay!

Hello, we stayed for three nights, there were four adults and three children. The accommodation was too small. A lot of appliances did not work, dishwasher, washing machine and dryer. There was very little tableware to prepare meals. I do not recommend it for families. The host did not greet us and left no information about Montreal or the accommodation.
Anthony is a very welcoming host and his place is in a great location in Mile End. Thanks!

Really nice apartment, perfect location, and perfect for renting for a friend's trip! 
We didn't meet but Anthony was easy to reach and the instructions were clear to find and enter the apartment. 
Very nice stay in Montreal!
Near Saint Laurent, there is a boulevard with many bars and restaurants. The Mile End neighborhood of the city was great, and it's just a 7-minute drive to Old Montreal.

Anthony's apartment is a great place to stay during your visit to Montreal. There are many places to eat nearby. The neighborhood felt safe and looked clean. Check-in was very easy. Anthony was also very helpful with finding good places to eat, and he responded to our messages very quickly. We loved that the house was stocked with coffee for us to make every morning! We would definitely recommend this place!

Antony was very attentive to any issues we had and tried to remedy them as best he could. He was very prompt in answering our messages and queries, The living areas and kitchen were very clean and spacious, we liked the large table and the sofa was very comfortable.  The beds were comfortable and the sheets were clean. We were disappointed by the condition of the outdoor terrace and the bathroom. The apartment, being on the ground floor, was quite dark and the window looked out on a blank wall. There is no terrestrial (Canadian) TV.
Great location, clean place. Would go back. Host was very helpful.

A beautiful place, close to everything, with free parking available on weekends that makes things much easier. The host was very kind and helpful, always available whenever I needed something during my stay!
Easy check-in. Excellent location. Everything matched expectations. No surprises! Thanks. I would definitely stay again.
Super FDS
We enjoyed our stay at Anthony's place. Mile End is a fascinating neighborhood. We appreciated the proximity to Bixi Bikes, as well as all the great shops and restaurants.

Great location, large and comfortable place for 5 people with an easy check-in, parking, and communication with the host! Amazing restaurants and stores nearby. Great neighborhood overall, very satisfying experience!

We had a fantastic overnight stay at this place! Check-in was super easy and the beds were comfy.  As another reviewer mentioned, parking is right across the street and free on weekends, but I'm guessing it costs money during the week. Definitely would book here again!
Great place, excellent location, easy check-in/check-out, Anthony is very communicative and obliging.

Our stay was amazing and that was because we had such beautiful accommodations as our home base. The place was charming, clean, the beds were so comfortable, and close to all the amenities. For those with vehicles, parking was easy and free on weekends. Anthony was quick to answer any questions, and provide tips to make our stay more hospitable. I would love to stay at this location again.
Anthony was a great host, but the photos do not accurately represent the condo. It is quite small and a little older than we expected. However, it was still a fun experience overall.
Super good!
Anthony's place was just as expected and in a great location. He was easy to communicate with and nice, making him a great host.
Nice place. It's a little smaller than I expected, but everything else is amazing. 10/10.
Perfect location, close to all the fun things in Montreal. Parking was easy and the beds were comfortable. Some renovations would make it even more attractive. Surprisingly quiet, not a busy street.
This was my second visit to this location, the location is great, Anthony is great and communication is clear and easy. I will be returning
It's very comfortable! We missed nothing at all.
Very nice place in a great location. Definitely considering rebooking for my next trip.

Very nice apartment that matches the description and very well located in the city center, BUT it is on a street with only bars and restaurants, so... 

We were very disappointed by the state of the apartment, cleanliness was really very relative. Things will probably work out and then it will be a very nice place.

The apartment provided everything we needed, and five of us enjoyed a very comfortable stay. The location was excellent and convenient for accessing all our needs. Fernando and Sarah were readily available to answer our questions and responded promptly. A great experience!

Location was amazing! Right downtown, close to restaurants and entertainment. The condo was very clean and very accurate in terms of the description of the place. The hosts were great; very accommodating. Definitely a place I will be booking again for my next trip to Montreal.
Great stay. Great location.

Fernando and Sarah answered my questions within minutes. She met me for check-in and showed me around. The pictures don't do Airbnb justice; it's much bigger and nicer in person! I was very impressed with the cleanliness and spaciousness. 

There were two balconies, two bathrooms, big comfortable beds, and extra linens if needed. They were very accommodating with everything, including check-in and checkout, which made everything so much easier! 

I would definitely come back and stay there again!!!!!
Thank you for the great Airbnb!!!!
Great apartment, would live there permanently if I could! The space is beautiful! Great location, and the hosts were very generous and friendly.

The best place in Montreal without a doubt!!! 

Excellent location, hospitality from the hosts and impeccable cleanliness plus all amenities offered.
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We had a spectacular time. The location was perfect. We walked everywhere and were always in the midst of the action and pulse of the downtown area. It was clean and quiet. It had everything we needed. The accommodations made our special sibling reunion even more special. I found the hosts Fernando and Sarah to be very warm people who were readily available to answer questions or help in any way.

I loved that it was a short walk to everything. The place was large because we had 10 people here, and everyone was relaxing comfortably. The host was very responsive and answered questions when needed.

Wonderful home with great location. Spacious and private for 10! The hosts were respectful and always available. It was a very relaxed stay. Highly recommended if you want to be in the city center :) Parking was easy to find. We parked and bargained for the weekend at a lot by the end of crescent to the left for $35/night with ins and outs for an extended full-size SUV.

This place is amazing, would absolutely recommend it! First, the apartment is beautiful and spacious. It has everything you could need and more; it's much larger than the pictures show. We had 7 people sleep comfortably here for a weekend. Also, the location is amazing!!!! You cannot find a better location than this apartment, right near shops, bars, restaurants, and more. We walked everywhere and rarely took a cab since everything was so close! Will absolutely be coming back to stay here.
Great place. Great location. Would book again if I came back to Canada.

Really awesome place to stay. Great for groups - lots of space, private, location in the heart of entertainment and restaurants, and equipped with everything you'll need. Recommend 100% for anyone traveling in a group and needing the space.
Loved the condo and location :)

This apartment is everything you could want in Montreal. The location is perfect, it can fit a larger group, and Fernando and Sarah are excellent hosts. The apt is spacious and clean, and is a walk away from tons of cool spots. If you are looking for a centrally located place with hosts that make you feel at home, we would entirely recommend this place!
Fantastic property and location, and such lovely, welcoming hosts! We would absolutely come stay here again, it was perfect for a large group of people!

Fernando's place was lovely. The place is large, furnished nicely, and tidy. Great for large groups and very accommodating. When we needed extra paper towels, etc., Fernando came to the rescue. Definitely recommend. Also great location! Close to everything.
Incredible space in a great location. Super clean and great host.

Such a great location. We were very welcomed and our host was great at responding to our questions right away. The apartment provided ample space for the 8 of us and was steps away from great restaurants and nightlife. We will come back for sure and have already recommended this spot to other friends as well. You will not regret staying here!

Very spacious apartment, exactly as described. Great location, I would not want to stay anywhere else in Montreal. At night, you may hear some noise from the karaoke club from below and from the people on the street outside. Nevertheless, a great place and Fernando was very helpful!
Such fantastic hosts :) We had a lovely time for a bachelorette party and absolutely loved the space - would definitely stay here again!

This apartment is absolutely beautiful and in a great location if you want to experience some nightlife. There are a good number of restaurants, bars, and shopping stores around this area and many are open late. Fernando was very kind and my friends and I really enjoyed our stay. We had all the amenities one would want if they were at home. Totally recommend and will definitely love to stay again!

This is the coolest apartment. The two balconies made it unique, and the location is a short walk to so many great spots – especially the Mexican restaurant downstairs! 

Fernando and Sarah are the sweetest hosts.

Fernando's place is great! The location is right in the heart of Montreal and everything is very easy to walk to. The apartment is clean and comfortably fits many people - the outdoor space is a great added perk. If you go, try the restaurant Fernando runs below the apartment - the food and drinks are great!
Everything about the apartment was great! Perfect location, nice kitchen, loved the outdoor patios, and very clean.
Such a great place! Amazing location and the place was super clean and spacious. The host was great and responded very quickly to all our messages. Highly recommend this place!
Great location
The place was fantastic and perfectly located for anyone who wants to be in the center of nightlife.
Fernando's apartment was an excellent location!  Perfect location and very comfortable. We enjoyed the great restaurants and bars nearby.

Fernando and Sarah were fantastic hosts! They were very accommodating and quick to respond to questions. The property was also very spacious and located right in the heart of Montreal. I can't wait to go back!

Literally the perfect location. The center of all the fun Montreal has to offer. You can walk to amazing restaurants, pubs, clubs, and shops. It has everything you could want. The balcony overlooking Crescent is awesome for late-night parties. Amazingly clean and spacious place.

This is a great place to stay if you are looking for a central location, a beautiful view, and a stylishly decorated place. It had everything we could have thought of and more. I highly recommend Hernan's space.

Hernan and Sarah have a cute, spacious apartment in a really fun, walkable area. I would highly recommend this place for three or four couples due to the current sleeping arrangements. They have great outdoor spaces and super easy check-in and check-out processes. We loved our time here!
Amazing place, great location and awesome hospitality

The location was unbelievable. Easy parking right down the street for the weekend ($16/day for 3 full days). The size of the place matched the listing: 3 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms/showers. We had 9 people and fit comfortably between the 3 queens, pull-out queen, and futon. Most of all, Hernan and Sarah were amazing - very quick to respond when we had questions or needed local advice. We really appreciated their quick communication and hospitality!
We stayed here for a bachelor party weekend, and it was perfect. Highly recommended.

The Airbnb layout was very nice. Great location close to good restaurants, along with just blocks from St Catherine Street which has tons of places to go shopping. The host was quick to give us great recommendations and was very helpful. Check-in was very easy too. Highly recommend this Airbnb!!
Amazing location and awesome space for a large group of people!
A spacious apartment in a great central location!
In town with a large group. Great location, easy access to everything. Plenty of amenities. Beautiful house. Would definitely stay again if given the opportunity.

The apartment was much bigger than expected, very stylish and great for a group of 11 girls doing a bachelorette party. The location is fantastic as well, with lots of restaurants and bars nearby. The unit was also well equipped with all the basic needs. The only thing that could use some improvement was host communication. Other than that, definitely recommend.

The place was absolutely amazing. A large space, we had 10 ladies and there were no issues with the common area and we had lots of space to get ready. The apartment is right in the middle of Crescent Street and the terrace had amazing views. We ordered catering from the burrito place the hosts own which were absolutely beyond expectations. We would not hesitate to come back!
Great location
Great views from the front balcony. Right in the heart of the city. The apartment had everything we needed and more. Fantastic stay
Hernan will greet you and is very responsive, and the restaurant below is very accommodating.

Hernan's place was very comfortable for our group of 7 friends to spend a weekend in Montreal. It's well decorated and centrally located right next to the art museum and many bars and restaurants. Just be aware that the apartment is right above a karaoke bar and on a street with a lot of nightlife, so it's pretty loud on weekend evenings. You also need to bring luggage up and down a few flights of fire escape stairs. If you don’t mind that, it's a great place to stay and good value in the area!
Great house and even better location!
Great location!!!
Simply the best location you could ask for! Would go there again for sure.
Our group had a great weekend, thank you for your hospitality.

Great location, and beautiful apartment. Lots of space even for large groups. Lots of stores, restaurants, and bars nearby. Cool view from the balcony into the picturesque street below. Herman was very informative and responsive. Would stay again in the future. Thank you!

This place has an unbeatable location. Six of us went up for a night to go to the Canadiens/Bruins game, and everything was within walking distance from the rink to the bars to the entertainment. Communication was great and check-in/check-out was very easy. There is no parking on site, but there is a parking garage about 1 block down the street for around $30 Canadian per day. My only problem with the place is that the 13 guest claim is a stretch. This wasn't a problem for us as we only had 6, but future travelers should be aware of this. There are 3 bedrooms, each with a queen bed, a futon, and a couch. By my count (if you put 2 in each bed and the futon and 1 on the couch) that is enough room for 9. There were some floor mattresses stuffed into the closets, so I guess you could find a spot on the floor for those to get to 13 but that wouldn't be very comfortable. Also, there were only sheets/pillows provided for the 3 bedrooms so make sure to bring your own sleeping bags/pillows. Two of my friends had to use their luggage as pillows and their coats as blankets. This being said, I would definitely rent here again. Location, location, location.
It was an amazing get-together. Highly recommend this huge Airbnb!
Awesome location.

We love Montreal and this was such an amazing location. We visited on an incredibly cold weekend and were able to find great places to eat and amazing coffee on the same block. The Montreal Museum of Fine Arts is literally next door.  The apartment was comfortable and spacious.  We were 2 families and had lots of space. Our host was lovely and helpful. Thanks! I would recommend this beautiful apartment to anyone who is easy-going and looking to be in the heart of the city! 
Paula from Adelaide, Australia

This place exceeded all my expectations in every possible way. It was by far the most attractive place available when we were looking, and the location was so perfect. Everything we wanted to do or needed to go was right at our doorstep. 

We stayed here for my 30th birthday, and it was an absolute blast. There was more than enough space for everyone in our group of six. All the beds were comfortable, and there was lots of space to hang out in the home, too. 

Hernan was very welcoming and made us feel at home right away. He was very responsive to every request and question we had, and so accommodating. We were able to have early check-in and check out which made our whole trip more enjoyable. 

We fell in love with Montreal on this trip. If we come back with a large group, I would definitely check to see if this place would be available to us again.  I would strongly recommend this place!!
Amazing place in the heart of Montreal!
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Thank you, Pablo, for the accommodation in such a central location.
Great place as usual, Pablo!

Pablo's place is exactly what I needed. It's always clean. The location is excellent, just a few minutes away from Marche Jean Tallon or the metro station. You might even be lucky enough to try Pablo's famous banana bread.
Just the right spot for an overnight stay during a business trip.
Thank you for receiving me with short notice. I appreciate your flexibility.
Very beautiful, clean and convenient apartment, great place to stay!

We had two months in Montreal while visiting McGill and this location was perfect. A short walk to McGill but also to the Plateau and even downtown. The apartment was very comfortable and well-provided for and was pleasantly quiet. Access to shopping, cafes, and restaurants within the building was fabulous - particularly in the snow! - and the gym membership was the icing on the cake: pool, sauna, spas, weights, etc., all just an elevator trip away. Finally, Vanessa was immediately responsive to questions and queries. All up, I would recommend this wholeheartedly! Thanks, Vanessa, for a very memorable stay.

Clean apartment, exactly as in the photos and even better, very clean and well-equipped, Sandrine's accommodation is very well maintained, close to a lively street with restaurants and grocery stores, but also an easy-to-access metro station or bus stops. 

Our stay was super, thank you to Sandrine even if we couldn't meet her in person, her friends were great!

Wonderful apartment - clean, spacious, cozy, and amazing value. Great price for the place! The two patios were beautiful and the shower was 10/10. We were greeted in a friendly and welcoming manner which kicked off an amazing stay in Montreal. Would definitely recommend!

Superb stay at Sandrine's place, the apartment is superb and incredibly clean (website hidden by Airbnb), the neighborhood is quiet and there are lots of nice little (website hidden by Airbnb) I highly recommend!

Perfect little apartment for coming home to after a day of sightseeing and activities. The balcony was absolutely fantastic.  A very cute "up-and-coming" neighborhood. Sandrine was very helpful with suggestions of local things to do and see.

I haven't had a chance to stay due to private reasons, but I've spoken with the host constantly throughout the process, which has made me certain that she is an amazing woman. This makes me confident that there will be no problems with the apartment.

Amel and Jhonny were so nice with us. They were so patient while we got lost before getting into their place. They provided healthy breakfast, and they're constantly checking about how everything was with the kitchen and all the amenities. About cleanliness, Amel was dedicated to cleaning the bathrooms and bedsheets. They are family people, so we always felt like home.
Great stay! Amel is a very nice person and was helpful!

The Olympic Stadium and Botanical Garden are close to each other.
Parking was difficult.
It took one hour to find a parking spot.
The room is spacious and I like it.
Being on the third floor made carrying luggage difficult.
Nice apartment, comfortable stay for 3 people
She is so kind and very helpful to us. And she can speak English fluently.
It was a pleasant three-day stay. The bedding and towels were clean and comfortable. I would recommend this room to anyone needing spacious and convenient accommodations. Cheers

My friend and I really enjoyed staying in this great apartment, Camèlia and Ophelie really made our time in Montreal special!

Their apartment is in a great location (2 minutes to the next metro station).
Nice airy apartment near downtown and the metro. Amenities are all provided as described and Camelia is a wonderful host!
Nice, cozy and clean space. Convenient location and helpful host.

This place was great for my large group, lots of free parking outside was very helpful and is not easy to find in Montreal. Stewie was a great host, very easy to communicate with, check-in/checkout was a breeze, and very fast to answer any questions we had. We would highly recommend it to anyone else coming to Montreal with a large group; he was generous enough to give us a late checkout, and it was a short drive to downtown. All in all, exactly as advertised.

What a great stay!
We were amazingly accommodated!
Simon was fast at answering any questions we had. Very helpful. Check-in and check-out was easy due to the convenience of the lockbox. Centrally located & highly recommended. Thanks!

What a great host and the place was great for our big group; it had a full kitchen which is good so we were able to cook and eat in, the proximity to downtown was great I would highly recommend this to anyone coming to visit Montreal one of my best experiences in an Airbnb

Simon was great to accommodate such a large group of us so last minute after our original accommodation plans fell through. He was very understanding and thorough with details and ensured a smooth check-in and check-out process. The apartment was awesome and very clean, it had everything we needed. We would definitely stay here again next time we're in Montreal!

Great place to stay! Check-in and check-out was quick and easy. We had some issues with the place, but the host was quick to fix any problems we had! Would definitely stay here again. Great experience!

The house was extremely clean when we got there and Simon was very quick with his responses. He made check-in quite easy and the space was just what we needed. The location of the house is perfect. It is outside of downtown Montreal so it is nice and quiet when you want to relax, but only a short drive to go sightseeing. I would absolutely stay at this place again.

To be honest, I wasn't really happy about this stay at all. We were jerked around from the start about available properties and then told we weren't allowed to stay there, told we had to move properties three weeks before our stay, and were told that the second location was downtown when it very, very clearly was not. We were charged for part of a second day stay despite no information on the listing about a minimum stay and also charged extra because of the 'holiday weekend' when Memorial Day is not celebrated in Canada. I would not recommend the property I stayed in or liaising with Stewie to anyone I know. Perhaps if we had been able to stay in our initial, actually downtown property, we would have had a better experience, but frankly I wish we had stayed in a downtown hotel instead.
Thanks for being so attentive to me and my family! The two apartments were very stylish, clean, and comfortable. Our family (with a wide age range) really enjoyed their weekend stay here.
Simon was a fantastic host! He was attentive, responded quickly, and checked in with us upon arrival to ensure we were comfortable. We enjoyed our stay in Montreal. Thanks, Simon!

Couldn't have asked for more. The place was great, the hosts were accommodating, everything was in order. They even came to check on us and gave us places to check out. Great hosts. We had an amazing time and would 100,000% rent again!
Suitable for a large group. We were missing sheets but we managed. Recommended for a short stay.

Simon was an outstanding host in every way. The living space was clean, organized, and it was very easy to check in. Additionally, whenever there were any questions, Simon responded immediately. I would recommend Simon's place to anyone looking to stay in a great place while visiting Montreal.

The place was good, just a little smaller than we thought, but we enjoyed our stay there. It was very clean and nicely decorated. 

Just finding parking on the street was very difficult. Communication was a bit mixed up... sometimes it was Simon, sometimes it was Stewie. So we were a little confused.

Excellent accommodation option in Montreal. The space is extremely spacious, easily accommodating 10-12 people. They were very attentive to everything. I would definitely consider staying there again.

I would give Simon a 10/10 recommendation as an Airbnb host! He responded promptly and was available for any assistance we needed. His location is right outside downtown Montreal, maybe a 15-minute Uber ride to where most of the restaurants and bars are. The interior of the apartment was decorated very nicely and fit our group comfortably. We had a great New Year's trip thanks to Stewie.
The host cancelled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Sarah's apartment is particularly pleasant. Every object has been chosen with care and clearly with an eye for design. We stayed there as a family and we were all very quickly made to feel at ease. After a tiring day in Montreal, it was a real pleasure to settle down there in the evening. And Sarah and her mother were very helpful and welcoming.
Beautifully designed apartment! Sarah was very easy to communicate with and it was easy to make arrangements for arrival and departure. I would definitely recommend this place.

We were surprised to find this listing is actually a two-bedroom! The bed in the second bedroom is slightly shorter than usual, but an average woman can comfortably fit. This apartment was super upscale and beautifully decorated, very spacious. I thought it was truly incredible value for the price, and completely exceeded my expectations. Only downside was that it was hot in summer, but the airflow was good and fans were provided so we were comfortable. We came for a family wedding and saw other people's Airbnbs - this one was the best and we paid less than others.

This apartment is so lovely — well-designed and decorated. You can tell the hosts put a lot of care into making it sophisticated and cozy. I love the natural light. The open and well-equipped kitchen is perfect for making a meal. The neighborhood is peaceful and quiet, and there's a great yoga studio around the corner. A little hot without an AC unit, but the fans are fine. I would stay here again. It's a great place.

Sarah's place was great for me, my sister, and my niece to stay at. Lots of toys and amenities were available for a toddler. The neighborhood was wonderful for kids, quiet with lots of restaurants available. Overall, a great experience!
The apartment is comfortable, very pleasant and beautiful. A big thank you to Laurence for her kindness.

Laurence's place is super cute in photos, but even better in person! It's super spacious, with two porches, a *huge* bedroom, tons of natural light, Netflix (!), and total private access. The washer/dryer in unit came in handy too when I needed to clean up a shirt for a night out. My boyfriend and I completely fell in love with the apartment, and because it's a bit out of the downtown area, gave us a chance to see another part of Montreal -- a city we've come to love together as New Yorkers. It really only took about 10 minutes via Uber to get anywhere we needed or wanted to go, so don't let the location deter you!
We had a fantastic stay at Laurence's place. The apartment was super comfortable and it had everything we needed to cook. Very close to the metro and the grocery store. Highly recommend!
Laurence was an exceptional host! He was so kind and helpful. The apartment is adorable and decorated with great taste. I highly recommend it!
The place was fantastic, would stay there again in a heartbeat. Close to the metro, and super cozy. Thanks again!

Laurence's place was an amazing little hideaway during our visit to Montreal. The neighborhood was fun, close to public transportation, parking was available behind the building, there were two decks, a very cute and cozy space filled with amenities and lots of natural light. We would gladly stay there again!

This place is so much bigger than the pictures do it justice and the bed is super comfy. It's easy to walk to the metro to get into town, but there are also a few shops, restaurants, and bars nearby that you can pop into. Great place to stay.
Apartment very well located and very clean
A beautiful Montreal apartment with lots of sunshine and spacious rooms. The subway was nearby, and the neighborhood had a lot of character. We had a wonderful stay and would definitely return!
This was one of the best Airbnb's I have stayed in. It made me want to live in Montreal.
Good place, I enjoyed my stay there. Just be careful with the stairs in winter!
We had a great time!
Great little spot in an awesome location. Definitely would stay here again.

The apartment is perfect! Ideally located, it exactly matches the Airbnb description!!! 

We will definitely come back again...

It's a beautiful place in a great location. Since I opened the door, it felt like home. When I got there, I had a problem connecting to Wi-Fi and Martin came right away (on Saturday night) to help me resolve it. 

The apartment is very clean and comfortable. They take care of all the details. I feel like I have a home in Montreal.
Great place to stay! Highly recommend booking with Martin!

The location is great. The apartment is magnificent and very welcoming. It perfectly matches the description. Ideal for a getaway to discover Montreal. Martin and Eric are extremely available if needed. Nothing else to say except thank you.

We had a fantastic stay! The apartment is very spacious, clean, and has cool decor. It's in a great location, close to restaurants, Mont Royal Park, and other points of interest! We would definitely stay here again!
Very pleasant accommodation close to the metro station. Martin was very available as we booked last minute. I recommend
Awesome location!
Housing located on the Montreal Plateau, very functional and decorated tastefully. Everything is within walking distance or by bus.
Super accommodation, very functional, beautifully decorated and in a great location! I recommend it!

Great location, near tons of restaurants, cafes, and bakeries. We walked everywhere. The apartment was perfect and had everything we needed. It's on a quiet side street, so there's no street noise. Loved the whimsical decor. Check-in was super easy and Martin and Eric are communicative but totally unobtrusive. We got lucky and found parking right on the street. Loved it!

My daughter and I had just 36 hours in Montreal and were very pleased to be so centrally located in this fun, well-decorated apartment.  We loved the proximity to so many great nearby restaurants.  Also we were very close to Fitz and Follwell, the bike shop where we took a fantastic bike tour of several nearby parks and neighborhoods. 
We also utilized the subway system to go downtown. The metro station is just a few blocks away and very easy, affordable and efficient to use.  
We loved eating the delicious (St Viateur) famous bagels, the (Romas) Portuguese chicken, the (Swartz's) smoked meats, the (Pizzadelic) pizza and crepes. All within walking distance. 
I highly recommend this as a great way to experience Montreal.

Very good first Airbnb experience! I really enjoyed arriving at the apartment with a little light on. It gave me a feeling of well-being, cocooning and I felt like home... we had wonderful sleep. The location is ideal: quiet yet close to everything. Thank you so much
We've enjoyed our stay at the Numbers. The location was superb, communication was good, and the apartment was clean and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this place.

Pleasant and convenient apartment. The two bedrooms adjoin with a French door/slider, making them not ideal for those seeking two completely private bedrooms.  The apartment is well-equipped and comfortable. It's close to the Metro, shopping, and restaurants. The host was accommodating and helpful.
The location was very close to excellent transportation links. The interior design was personal and beautiful. We were extremely satisfied and would recommend the apartment. Thank you!
It was perfect.

Excellent stylish place in the neighborhood we needed to be near to family. Responsive host! He even helped us extend our checkout time when our flight time changed. Near to many shops and restaurants. Would stay again!

I honestly had a great stay at Martin's place. He was quick to respond to any of my questions and provided great detail about how to check-in. The apartment was very trendy. I would recommend this place.
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊

Great location, walkable to lots of bars and restaurants. We loved Colonel Moutarde and Le Quartier General (BYO). Also an easy walk to Mont Royal. We didn't use public transit because it was so cold, but could easily walk to a stop. Felt very safe at all hours, and enjoyed hanging out in the cozy living room - should have played some board games!

Great spot to stay in the plateau. Short walk to metro Mont Royal, few minutes to get to Schwartz's, Moishes, Bagel Etc., La Banquis, and Parc Mont Royal. Love home, super cozy and well equipped. Can't wait to stay there again.
Ideally located and beautifully decorated! Pleasant, clean, comfortable! We had a fantastic stay.
This is a terrific apartment in a great location. We would definitely stay here again.
Central location with simple access, easy communication, proximity to many of Montreal's best restaurants, and a deft design touch. Well worth it if you are visiting Montreal.

Not only was this place gorgeous inside, it was clean, filled with everything I would need during my stay, and it was in a great location in town. Walk out the door to the right then left at Mont Royale (yes?), and there's a market, restaurants, shopping, you name it. I definitely will be staying here again when I come back!

Martin and Eric were fantastic hosts and their apartment was in a great location, close to the metro and countless bars and restaurants. It had everything we needed for our week-long stay and Eric and Martin were very quick to address a small heating issue (a faulty thermostat). We would love to stay again.

Martin's apartment is exceptional, the decoration is tasteful and well-chosen. Absolutely charming.

Well-located.

Martin kindly allowed us to leave our luggage beyond check-out time as our flight was late that evening. 

I highly recommend this place.

Our family of four really enjoyed their stay. It's a great location and a very comfortable space with nice touches. It would be better if the shower could be updated since it's basically a bathtub surrounded by a shower curtain. I really appreciated the few beers in the fridge!
Lovely place, and great location! Would definitely recommend it. Such a neat neighborhood to stay in. Thanks again!

Martin's apartment was great! Amazing location in the heart of Le Plateau, within walking distance of trendy bars, restaurants, shops, cafes, and supermarkets. We even walked to Old Montreal which took us about 35 minutes. The apartment itself was bigger than it looked in the pictures, very well decorated and clean. We got lucky and were able to snag one of the free parking spaces on the street, which was a bonus. Overall, one of my favorite Airbnb experiences in Montreal. Highly recommend!

This place was awesome! Right next to Avenue du Mont-Royal which has a bunch of places to eat, buses, and trains to get just about anywhere. A bike shop is two blocks away and we biked to Vieux Montréal. The apartment was clean, looks exactly as depicted, definitely a cool, hip space. Great location too for getting everything you need. Thank you both!! See you later!
Pleasant apartment, well-equipped and very clean. Easy communication with Eric. We recommend this apartment.
There are many restaurants and bars nearby, very convenient, and you can feel the daily life of the plains area. The landlord is also very good, very enthusiastic, in short, I highly recommend it.

Martin's place was an awesome place to stay while visiting Montreal! The plateau is a beautiful area. There are an abundance of restaurants, bars, and cafes within a ten-minute walk. Getting to the mountain is only 10-15 minutes as well. The bike share system in Montreal worked great to head down to the river. The apartment itself was spacious and worked wonderfully. The bed was ridiculously comfy. There is a full kitchen and a nice living room area to hang out. Martin was quick to respond to our messages as well. Overall, it was a great experience.
Martin's place was beautiful and exactly as described. The location was awesome and it was easy to get to the metro to get to other parts of the city as well. I would definitely stay here again.
This is a great Airbnb located half a block from Mont Royal. There are many restaurants nearby, and the Metro is also very close.

Well-located apartment ideal for living the life of the Plateau. 
Pierrot Claire
I've been fortunate to be hosted by Martin. The place is amazing and has such a great character. The location is very convenient, and Martin has been very responsive every time I had a question.

This was the perfect place to stay on our trip to Montreal. There's so much food and sights within walking distance! The place itself was clean, trendy, and just as pictured. We felt totally safe and would definitely stay again.

The apartment, located in the heart of the plateau, is absolutely fantastic, meticulously decorated, perfectly equipped, it's an ideal stopover for a Montreal stay. Martin was responsive and available, making our trip easy, I highly recommend!

This is a cute, clean, quirkily appointed apartment on the first floor in a great neighborhood. Lots of ceiling fans keep the heat down and nights comfortable for sleeping. Shared courtyard with very friendly neighbors. Fabulous having a washer and dryer right in the unit. Walk to everything.

We like this nice apartment, it is stylish and well-equipped with daily needs. The location is wonderful; there are many restaurants, coffee shops, and small shops around, and it is close to the subway. We enjoyed our stay very much and will definitely recommend it.

The apartment is in a great location, a quiet neighborhood, and within walking distance of many stores and the metro. The main bedroom is very comfortable. The second bedroom has a single bed with a trundle bed underneath, which is best suited for kids. Keyless entry is a nice touch; no more losing keys! There's no parking on-site (you can easily drop off your luggage without any problems) and guests may want to take advantage of the permitted spaces Martin has available. We parked in a garage and paid twice as much, but it was very convenient. All in all, a great place to stay in Montreal!

Martin's place was perfect for our family of four. The space was clean, comfortable, and just as pictured! The proximity to Mount Royal was incredible! We were able to walk from Martin's place to the mountain. The location is perfect! There are several shops and restaurants less than a block from the apartment. We would definitely stay here again!
Great place; stylish and clean and located in a great neighborhood.

My family and I loved staying at this flat in the heart of a thriving neighborhood. There were so many things to do that we wished we had stayed longer. We ended up booking two stacked units from Martin which was perfect for our situation. The decor was fun and inviting and felt like home to us. We loved the antique touches and plants scattered throughout. Checking in and communication was super fast and the apartment had all the necessities for a cozy stay. Thanks!
The neighborhood where the house is located is really great and accessible to great coffee shops, restaurants, and parks. The host is really caring. Highly recommended!
The apartment is great—clean and cozy. The neighborhood is lively and fun.
Great location on the plateau. Close proximity to numerous bars and restaurants in a trendy neighborhood. Cute place, clean.
Overall good stay at Martins' place. Would recommend.
Great place near the action in Montreal. Host is terrific and very helpful. The place was very clean, great amenities, and stylish. Would definitely go back!
Very nice place close to lots of dining and entertainment

We had a fantastic time staying here. We had everything we needed and didn't have any problems trying to find things or figuring out how things worked. The place is also in a great location, a 5-minute walk from lots of restaurants and nice shops. Check-in was also super easy. And if we had any questions, our hosts were super quick to reply.  

Definitely recommend staying here!

We chose the Quartier du Mont Royal for its proximity to the park and the apartment of one of our friends. We therefore knew what to expect. Air conditioning was very much appreciated as it had been very hot during the two days we were there. Parking at $12 per day, really not far (as parking on the streets was impossible).
You can rent this beautiful apartment without hesitation, it is very well-furnished and located
A great comfortable place in a fantastic central location - would definitely stay again!

Ideal location to discover Montreal! Typical Montreal accommodation. 

Only downside: the accommodation is not well-suited for a family with young children, particularly the bathroom.
Nice place, great location. Parking is a bit hard to find.
Wow! Just perfect! The value for money is incredible!  Super location, quiet but central, perfect decor and complete equipment!
Very nice apartment! As described. Great location. Had a great time there
Pleasant stay at Martin's apartment. Very well-located apartment

This was a great apartment for our long weekend in Montreal. The hosts were very communicative and answered all of our questions. They were also very kind in letting us arrange to store our bags before and after check-in and check-out. 

The apartment is as stylish as it appears, and very convenient to the Plateau neighborhood. We walked all around the neighborhoods from Old Montreal to Little Italy, and when it was too far to walk, subways and buses were right there. 

The only slight negative would be that, since it is a street-level apartment with the bedrooms facing the street, noise at night may get a little loud if people are hanging out on the street.
Enjoyed my stay very much, super stylish and comfortable space. Loved the neighborhood. Would recommend!
Wonderful stay in a very comfortable apartment, thank you.

Absolutely amazing place—super close to restaurants, shops, food markets, etc. (I walked everywhere, never got an Uber.) The place is really well-kept, very tidy, and has great interior design. I would give it a 5/5 recommendation!
Super nice place, very beautiful accommodation

Martin's place is very comfortable and well-furnished. It's in a great area of Montreal, close to many restaurants, cafes, and similar establishments. It's also within walking distance to the Metro station, so getting to other areas of the city is quick. The only downside to the apartment is that it can be noisy at times. 

The building is old and has wooden floors, and the apartment directly above seems to be another rental. We were woken up on the first morning by a group of people stomping around at 6 AM and then dragging their bags down the iron staircase directly outside the bedroom window, and then last night woken up well after midnight by another group arriving.

Overall, the apartment was great, but could be annoying depending on the other tenants.
We enjoyed the location and the clean apartment. Perfect for a young family.

Apartment in a quiet and pleasant neighborhood with shops and transportation nearby. 

Only criticism: the shower is a bit outdated. 

Otherwise, the apartment is very clean, I recommend it.
Very nice apartment, very well equipped with a great decor! Ideal location on the plateau. Hosts are very responsive via email. Perfect stay!
Great location & communication.

Martin's Place was centrally located in a very cute area of Montreal. Parking was a bit tricky, but luckily we managed without paying for a lot. Overall, the apartment was extremely cute and we had a great time staying there! We would definitely recommend it.
We had a great time staying here. The place has a great location, close to the metro station. We would definitely stay here again.

Beautiful and stylish apartment in a very cool neighborhood. 
Stay here, you'll love it!!

Well-located apartment, extremely clean, good taste, but bathroom with limited comfort (shower without bathtub not very easy to use) and interconnecting door between two bedrooms not sufficiently soundproof.

Martin's place is very stylish and it feels like a true Montreal apartment. It's a good size for 3-4 guests, with a large kitchen and a good sized TV room. It was in walking distance to some good shopping, cafes and restaurants. The bed was also very comfortable.
Great location for a great price!

Nice apartment in a great neighborhood in Montreal. The space was clean and tidy, the beds were comfortable, and we appreciated the extra blankets. The entry system was simple and easy to use. We traveled with a two-year-old, so we appreciated the trundle bed so he could be close to the ground.
Martin is great! The apartment is in an amazing location, stylish and has everything you will need for a great experience in Montreal!
Pleasant apartment, well decorated and in the center of Montreal! Perfect for visiting and walking around. The metro is not far away (less than 10 minutes) Great apartment!
Great spot in a great location

Martin was extremely accommodating. This was my first trip to Montreal and I definitely would love to come back. The location was great and close to public transportation and Mike's place. The apartment was very clean and spacious. I highly recommend staying here!
Great and clean place!

Amazing location, literally steps away from nice cafes and shops. Finding parking can be a little hectic, but there's some free parking on the street. The apartment is lovely, overall a great place to stay for 3 or 4 people!
Apartment very warm with a typical decor in an pleasant neighborhood of Montreal

What a fantastic location! If you're looking to have fun in Montreal with amazing food and entertainment options, this might be the place for you. With a penchant for mid-century pieces and quirky styling, this is a vintage lover's treasure trove. Gracious hosts, organized check-in and out, and excellent communication at all times.
Great place. Clean, quiet and comfortable. Highly recommended. Really enjoyed it.
Clean and well-located apartment!
I haven't had the opportunity to meet Clement who was renting his room to me, but communication was good and the apartment was very clean and beautiful.
The place is as you can see in the pictures
This place is spacious and comfortable, we enjoyed our stay. Parking can be tricky, just watch out for the street signs to avoid a ticket.
The location was good and it was spacious.
Nice flat close to transportation to downtown Montreal in 20 minutes. Good value for money.
This place feels very cozy, although when I arrived the beds weren't made. However, the host was very nice and the place was ready within 30 minutes.  I would definitely recommend it.

Cedric's place is pretty good, the rooms are nice, and we got everything we need for our home away from home. However, the floor sounds a bit when walking but it is not a big deal. Overall, this is a good place to stay, I will book again if I come back to Montreal next time.
It was a great place for a few of us girls exploring Montreal for the weekend. It was cozy and had a nice kitchen for cooking. It's also close to buses. We would definitely stay there again.

Cédric and Christina's place had a lot of space for three of us, as well as a balcony where we could spend some time in the evening. Unfortunately, and for the first time ever, we had a really bad experience staying at the apartment. We were unable to use the front door key from the outside and found it thus impossible to leave the place. Communication with the hosts was nearly impossible for the whole time, 20 hours later they also rejected to come by because no-one had been available. Fortunately Airbnb helped us out with the case and we were able to leave, find another place to stay and still enjoy the couple of days in Montreal. My friends and I would not recommend staying at Cédric's place.
I suppose 'old' and 'in process of repair' is the charm of Montreal in general. This apartment certainly fits that description.

We had a terrible experience here.  This was our first ever Airbnb stay after seven previous stays and the place was so dirty that we were able to get a refund through Airbnb support. 
Some of the furniture was so old it wasn't usable anymore. This is a rundown dorm room, not a nice place to stay. 
The host had a strict refund policy (of course), but she did refund us. She charged us cleaning fees though, which was very ironic!

Nice apartment with just a couple flights of stairs, we were very comfortable and had no complaints.  Very nice and quiet neighborhood with a balcony in the back. I would recommend this place to anyone willing to walk a few minutes to the subway.
The host cancelled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Wonderful place, wonderful location, really nice people, but the internet had problems. There seemed to be a lot of interference.

Functional apartment in a very pleasant and ideal location within walking distance of the metro (less than 10 minutes) and close to Jean Talon market. Ray welcomed us warmly and was very helpful and understanding.
Ray is a nice host. The location of the apartment is great. Amenities are somewhat basic but adequate for any short stay. Overall, it was a pleasant stay.

My accommodation was well-described and my mother and I had a pleasant stay. 
Ray has been available and responsive.

We recommend him
superbe location

Ray is a great guest, he's kind and gentle. The apartment had everything I needed for my stay. The neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful, and it's very easy to take the subway and buses to go downtown Montreal, the Plateau, and the Old Port. I definitely recommend this place.

Pleasant apartment suitable for singles or couples without children. 
Neighborhood is good, but may be bothered by certain noises. Ray is attentive and communicative.

I stayed in Ray's apartment for 30 days and had a great stay in Montreal. There are many nearby facilities such as markets, restaurants, hospitals, drugstores, and others. It is also close to two subway stations, within 5-10 minutes walking distance. Highly recommend this place to all my friends.

Ray and his sons provided perfect hosts. They were always present to meet our expectations, accommodate us, and help us. The accommodation was occupied by my father for two months and he greatly appreciated his stay. Thank you, Ray!
Spacious and bright apartment ideal for a couple

Clement and Pascaline were extremely gracious, warm and welcoming hosts. Luna, their cat, is also very affectionate! The apartment was immaculate and beautiful and the location proved to be perfect. The roof deck was a fantastic bonus. Highly recommended!
I always love staying here! Tony is an outstanding host who goes above and beyond to ensure my stay is 5 stars. Thank you again! 😊

Tony was very friendly and welcoming! He was flexible with the check-in time and received us at the door. He took the time to show us the apartment and made sure we communicated anything we needed. He left juices and snacks and told us to feel free to eat them. The apartment was very comfortable and clean. The apartment is in a very nice and quiet neighborhood called LaSalle, 13 minutes away from the airport by car, close to Concordia University. I will definitely go back and stay again.

We spent the Thanksgiving long weekend at Tony's place and felt like home. Tony was very accommodating with the check-in, the place was very clean and the fridge stocked with all necessary ingredients to have a nice breakfast. The apartment had all the essentials you need and it's very practical and quiet if you have your car. Thank you so much Tony for being a great host!
The place was as advertised. Everything worked out well.
Great place to stay
Tony allowed us to stay even with such short notice, as our Airbnb was canceled the day we were arriving in Montreal due to problems. We made no complaints at all and I would definitely recommend it.

Great compact accommodation for my family of four. We needed a place to stay overnight before catching a plane from Montreal Airport and accommodation in the city was so expensive. Tony was so fast with answering questions and advising us places to eat which was very welcome. He also provided us with bread, drinks and breakfast provisions which was so good as we arrived late in the afternoon and left very early the next morning. This small touch was so appreciated. We comfortably fit myself, husband and 2 older daughters in the space and although we were only there for a brief time we enjoyed it. Thanks Tony.
Tony was a fantastic host, and this is an excellent place to stay when visiting Montreal. As a runner, I loved how easily accessible many bike paths were. You could run for miles on them.

Great place. Good location, friendly host, some extra amenities we weren't expecting (Netflix, premium channels...), and some munchies for late snacks and breakfast. Tony was very accommodating with the check-in time. Thanks for a great stay!
Tony was a great host. Very nice place for the price. Netflix was a nice touch.

Tony and Emilia are excellent hosts who make you feel like family. I highly recommend staying here! They have Netflix available and Tony even left some bread, milk, eggs, and juice for breakfast. A nice touch!
Apartment very nice thank you

Tony was amazing! The place was very clean. Tony was very helpful and professional. He had fruit and juice in the fridge and told us to help ourselves. He was very quick at responding back. Definitely coming back.

Tony's place is exactly as advertised. Great value for a solo traveler or couple. The neighborhood is quiet and has some nice surrounding walking trails with a good view of the water. Tony even filled the fridge with some breakfast food, which was a very nice touch!
Great place!
Nice place, easy to find, fully equipped kitchen. Great value.
The large apartment was spotlessly clean. Easy parking. Tony and Mike are great people. Many thanks. Very easy parking on the street. Close to the river and biking trail. Awesome!
Tony's place was perfect for four of us, very comfortable, clean, and Tony provided an unexpected breakfast! We will definitely be back again
I rented an apartment from Tony for a colleague and everything was very good, as described.
The communication/check-in and check-out was very easy. Tony is a pleasant person and a great host.
Great place. Perfect for our short stay in the Montreal area. He left us bacon, eggs, bread and bottles of water!

I was happily impressed by Tony's Place. From start-to-finish it was a positive experience with a comfortable living room featuring a large flat screen TV, two sofas, and coffee table. The bedroom boasted a comfortable queen-size bed, nice linen, and comfortable pillows, plus plenty of closet space and cupboards if needed.  The kitchen was very clean and I appreciated the availability of eggs, butter, milk, water, bread, and more that were available for me. There was even a washer and dryer available! The bathroom was bright and airy, and overall, I had a very restful time and would happily return to Tony's Place and recommend the apartment to others.
It's a really clean place.
Great spot, great location and super easy to communicate.
Heat, attention and warm welcome. Thank you!
Very nice place. It was very clean and easy to settle into. We had no complaints this weekend, the metro wasn't a far walk and there are a couple of food options within walking distance.
Good

The house is a spacious and beautiful basement typical of a Montreal neighborhood undergoing revitalization, from which it is easy to reach the city center. The furnishings are modern and functional, with some refinement like an hydromassage tub. However, the kitchen lacks sufficient equipment for more than two people, missing a coffee machine, so it's for those who don't intend to cook at home. The TV can only be used as a screen for computers; there are no visible channels, and there is no radio. Communication and services may become difficult because the host does not live nearby (as happened to us).
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊
Located in a very trendy neighborhood. Not really suitable for families due to nearby clubs. The host was friendly and helpful. Recommend.
Steve is a kind and welcoming person who took great care of us upon our arrival. The neighborhood is fantastic!
Super apartment, very clean and functional.

Steve's place is very centrally located, comfortable, nice and clean. Steve and David are great hosts. We will definitely return to their place whenever we travel back to Montreal. Thank you, Steve and Dave!

Great location right in the heart of the action (it gets loud at night, but that's just the city!). Walking distance to everything, nice hosts with good recommendations for places to eat nearby, simple but meets your basic needs.
Host very helpful. Can be contacted if the property is booked as he has others. Nice clean apartment
Spacious place in a cool location at a great price. Walkable to many popular sights.

The stay was great! He popped up a few times which was unexpected. Also, there was a WiFi appointment during my stay which was a little inconvenient. However, he's very laid-back and nice. Otherwise, the location is awesome! I would definitely recommend it.
Steve is an excellent host, he is very welcoming and gave us great advice on things to do, restaurants, and bars. I recommend this accommodation which is very well located.

This apartment is in a fantastic neighborhood! We loved the location and access to amazing restaurants and cafes! The apartment is quiet, clean, and minimalist. It suited us perfectly. Steve is an excellent host. He offered great suggestions nearby and was very easy to communicate with. 

We would definitely choose to stay here again!

The department is very well located. The neighborhood is relaxing!!!! 

We were two people who wanted to have a bit of independence each, and that worked out really well. 

We used the living room as a second bedroom and the kitchen as a living room!!!!

Everything worked well and we didn't need to contact Steve at all.
I would go back and recommend it.

The department is very nice, the kitchen is comfortable for cooking and eating there. There were coffee sugar cups, paper wrap. The heating is central, so you can't turn it on when you want to. Ideal location, nothing better!
Perfect for all levels! Recommended

Steve's Apartment #8 on the second floor was perfect for my baby daughter, husband, and me for our 5-night stay in Montreal. Just in front of the door, the 55 bus stops, which is perfect for getting around. Also, the area itself, Plateau Mont Royal, is very trendy and hip. You can reach grocery stores, liquor stores, bars, Schwartz's, restaurants, and cafes within walking distance of less than 5 minutes. Steve is very helpful and goes above and beyond to ensure a comfortable stay. The apartment itself is quite basic but well-equipped. We would highly recommend staying here and would definitely come back again.
Comfortable apartment with the ideal location for having fun in Montreal. Everything you will need is within a 15-minute walk. Steve is responsive to any questions and knows Montreal well.

Location, Location, Location! You are in the hip part of the Plateau Mont Royal. Everything you need is less than a block away: great restaurants, a fantastic grocery store with lots of international food and vegan options, an ice cream place, and a great crepe spot. Don't miss the Jerk store, just next door to the apartment. Steve's place has really fast internet, but the coffee shop downstairs has the best coffee, so it quickly became my office :). Oh, important detail, Steve has a really nice A/C unit in the bedroom. The place was really clean. Steve helped me get a parking spot on the next block, so I didn't have to deal with parking my car on the street. And he showed me the cool spot in the neighborhood!

We had a great stay at Steve's place. The location was perfect and quiet. The AC was much appreciated during warm days and nights. The apartment was spacious and clean. Communication with Steve was easy and fast. I would definitely stay there again.

We liked the location. Steve was super responsive and overall a great host. There was an electricity breakdown at 11pm on the night of our check-in, and he sent someone to fix it. He also provided a parking space next door for an additional fee. The bathroom was supplied with toiletries: soap, shampoo, body gels, toilet paper. 

If you are *allergic* to pet fur, this might be important to you: we found some on furniture legs in the 2nd bedroom. We spent most of the time outside exploring Montreal and it only caused a reaction when we were playing on the floor with a kid, but still it isn’t something I would expect from an apartment where pets aren’t allowed. 

I hope the points above are easy to fix and recommend Steve as a great host to anyone who wants to spend some quality time in Montreal.

We had a really good stay at Steve's place. The location is top-notch, the apartment is quiet and has everything you need. Steve is a great host - easy to work with, responsive and very accommodating.

Solid place to stay with easy access to all the action, but not so close that you deal with all the riffraff. Steve is an excellent communicator, he's very responsive and helpful. Had a minor issue with the air conditioning not working, but he had someone come fix it within 10 minutes (it was a settings issue, not a mechanical malfunction). Thanks again, Steve!

3rd floor apartment, great location. Good restaurants, coffee shops & bakeries nearby. Hardwood floors, no carpet...a plus in my book. Owner very responsive. Parking is available but somewhat expensive at $20 CAD/night. We were there during a very hot spell and electricity went out in the apartment at 1 AM. No electricity meant no AC. I messaged Steve and he responded immediately with a call to me. He determined what needed to be done. Electricity was restored by noon the next day.

This place is right in the heart of a charming neighborhood with real character—lots of small restaurants and bars, and sandwiched between two amazing parks. Coffee on the deck in the morning was relaxing. The apartment makes you feel like you're a regular local.
Steve is an excellent host, responsive and accommodating! The apartment is very well located between Plateau and Mount Royal, I recommend

Ish was such a great host! He was very good at communicating with me before I arrived, explaining exactly where to go and how to reach the apartment. The location is very close to the metro and bus stations as well as many of the main areas to visit while in Montreal. It was very easy to navigate on foot from the apartment to Old Port, Place Jacques Cartier, Saint Catherine St, and the metro station. I would definitely stay here again!
Great place - very clean and neat. A bit farther from the city center than I expected, but still very easy to get around.

We had a great time staying at Ish's place and would definitely recommend it. The location was amazing and we were able to walk to tons of restaurants and bars. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed.
I will highly recommend the apartment. Ish is a wonderful person who helps with anything we need and tries to make our stay better. The apartment is located in an excellent location.

The apartment is perfect for a stay in Montreal. It is very well located! 

Everything was perfect! Thank you so much!

Great location for everything downtown. Chinatown, St. Catharines, Notre-Dame church etc. Everything is within walking distance. Very clean, WiFi and Netflix available. Very safe neighborhood - right next to a police station. Definitely would stay here again. 

If you are driving, there's not much parking downtown so be aware of that.

The apartment was very welcoming and cozy. It was very close to restaurants, bars, and coffee shops.  It was only about a 15-minute walk to Old Montreal, and a shopping mall nearby. Awesome stay, clean place, five stars

Very good stay! Apartment close to restaurants and everything you need for a good stay in Montreal. It is very easy to communicate with the host if you have any questions. The negative points are the lack of free parking nearby, and curtains that aren't opaque enough for morning sunlight (in my opinion). (But this is just my opinion). I would definitely go back there!

We stayed in this studio for two weeks and had a pleasant stay. It is super well-located, close to the Chinatown neighborhood, the Desjardins complex, and the metro.  It's within a 15-20 minute walk of the Old Port area.
Excellent communication and location. Exactly as expected.

Apartment as described. High-speed internet, well-located and easy access. 
The bed is a bit too soft and there's a lack of cooking accessories. 
I didn't get the chance to meet Ish.

Great apartment with very good public transport connection. 
Ish is a kind host who replied quickly to our questions. He was even flexible with the check-out, which was really great for us!
The apartment is quiet and clean. 
We would stay there again and recommend it.
Close proximity to Chinatown and the main metro station (Berri UQAM). Coffee shops and restaurants are located nearby, and Old Montreal is just a few more minutes away from Chinatown.

In a prime and super convenient location! We didn't have enough toilet paper for the 3 nights we stayed there, and the kitchen doesn't have any baking sheets or anything to put in the oven if you plan on using it. Other than that, prime location! Cozy and warm.

Ish's place is great! Located very close to the convention center and Chinatown, I was able to walk home for quick breaks. The bed was also very comfortable, so it was easy to fall asleep at night. This place was everything I needed.

Ish's place was pretty awesome! The listing is very accurate - a cute bachelor suite with a spacious bathroom, and lots of natural light. Ish was also very accommodating, and we definitely appreciated that! The best thing about the apartment was the location - minutes to EVERYTHING! It's nestled between four very different neighborhoods of downtown, gay village, old Montreal, and St-Denis/St-Laurent strips. We couldn't have asked for a better spot. IGA is a couple of blocks away too, as well as a number of major bus routes, so it was super easy to get around!! I would totally book this place again, SO worth it. (internet was super slow, but no biggie since we spent most of our time out and about).
The place was great, exactly as described. The place was very stylish and in an excellent location.
The place was perfect for me; it was a short walk to the restaurants and shopping centers. Excellent location.
Great location. Close to metro stations, bus stops, and restaurants. The place was very clean and cozy. I would definitely recommend staying here while visiting Montreal!

This apartment is very comfortable, clean, and very well located. The description is really accurate; you are minutes on foot to anywhere downtown. Ish is very communicative and responds nearly instantly. This was especially useful in my case as I had trouble with the access card. Make extra caution not to place the card near a magnetic field (magnet, phone...) or you will not be able to get in ;-) Ish however was very helpful and solved this for me very quickly. Also, a new door access system will be put in place in the upcoming weeks in the building so this issue will probably disappear with it. To summarize, I stayed there for 3 weeks for work and I would highly recommend it! Great place for the price range!
Excellent reception and excellent communication. The apartment is clean and well-designed and close to the Place des Arts.

Cannot say enough good things about this host and flat in Old Montreal. They got back to us immediately if we had any concerns and the place was exactly as described, if not better. The location is great, right in the heart of all the action and walking distance to whatever you need. I would highly recommend staying here
Convenient location. Quiet and secure. View includes an apartment building across the street. Soft bed. Clean, spacious bathroom. Large, functional kitchen. Good value for the price.

This place is perfect for anyone wanting to chill and explore Montreal; it's in the perfect location, safe, clean, and within walking distance of so much to do and see. You won't need taxis or buses. The place itself was super clean and had a cozy home vibe. I will definitely be coming back next year and would recommend anyone to stay here!

The place was clean and in a great location. It was within walking distance of everything you needed, and Ish provided details beforehand on where everything was, which was helpful. One downside, which the host could not control, was the door to get into the building was broken. You would have to wait for someone to show up to get in. Also, the bed wasn't the most comfortable, but otherwise it was a great stay and I would stay again.
Great location with easy check-in, clean and a great host! Will definitely stay here again.

This past weekend, August 24-26, was my first time staying at an Airbnb. Based on the information provided and the reviews, it was a good stay, but could be improved (3.7 out of 5 stars). The place was clean. The location was good; about 10-20 minutes walk from most things. Check-in was easy, although in my opinion, it could be improved in ways that I won't address. There are toiletries and the daily basic home stuff you could use. There is NO onsite parking, but there are some lots for about $15/night that took me some time to find; an exact address of a parking lot would have been very helpful after a long 7-hour drive. The biggest concern for my boyfriend and I was the bed. The bed was too soft and sunk in (in the middle of the bed) for our liking. It made our sleep very uncomfortable to the point we kept trying to move to the side to get the flat surface, but would eventually end up back in the middle sunk in. I understand that it could have been due to the use over time. I think that it could easily be fixed by investing in a new mattress. Another thing that I noticed was all the bedding stuff and towels smelled like Febreze that was in the bathroom. I'm not sure if the detergent used to wash has the same smell, but that was what I noticed. Overall, it was a good first stay. Thank you, Ish!

Ish was an amazing host. Everything was spotless. He left towels, a few dishes, bathroom essentials, TV (with Netflix available) all for the guest to use. It was close to shopping centers (supermarket, cinema, SAQ, metro...etc). The pictures do not lie, exactly what is photographed is what you will enjoy.
