If all these suit your desires for a trip in Montreal, Ish’s apartment is the one for you.
Ish's place was perfect for our long weekend in Montreal - great place and fantastic location!
This apartment is as it appears in the photos. The location is excellent for tourists.

I had a great experience at Ish's place. It was very clean and spacious with a very functional kitchen. The location is great too as it is within walking distance to the old town, downtown, gay village, and Metro stations. There are also plenty of cafes and restaurants within walking distance. I had a great time.
Okay, stay
Great location, secure building, fast communication with host, lots to do near the residence and great value. Highly recommend. Thanks
Very nice apartment, very convenient and very easy arrival and departure
Location is great
Ish's apartment is very well-located and convenient. However: the bedding is too soft.
Excellent location

Beautiful apartment, excellent location, safe and beautiful, everything is working well, it's very close to everything, 100% recommended.

All the instructions we were given were good.
We asked for a hairdryer and Ish responded very quickly. The bed was uncomfortable and the overall cleanliness of the place was not great.
Ish was very helpful in ensuring my stay was very comfortable. The unit is spacious and located in a great spot.

Great location, near public transportation/restaurants, and what even appears to be a police station next door, felt very safe.  A good place for a few days. However, as some people have said, the bed is uncomfortable and sinks quite a lot in the middle. It would be good for a single person, but as a couple, it felt like we were falling towards each other and made it difficult to sleep with our backs twisted. I understand beds sink over time, but it should probably be replaced. The shower curtain is a very thin material and it looks like it can tear easily so be careful when pulling it back. The floors are wood and tile, so if you visit in the winter be careful with your shoes and be mindful of the winter salt/melting snow. Also, for those not used to city living, there are two doors when entering the building, the first door must close before the second door can unlock. If the first door is held open or hasn't shut, the second won't open at all.
Would recommend!
Very nice place to stay, easy access. Would recommend.
Ish is a kind and responsible host, with clean rooms and excellent guest recommendations!
Excellent location and very cozy apartment!
Ideal location in the heart of Montreal, practical and sociable.

Location! Location! Location! It's super convenient to take public transportation to basically anywhere in Montreal. It's in a quiet neighborhood. A supermarket is 10 steps from the apartment. There's street parking available. Just ask some locals if you have trouble reading the signs. We requested late check-in and Ian was able to accommodate our request. The place is a basement apartment with all the basic necessities plus some extras. Nice and clean.
I really enjoyed my stay; it was clean and nice.
Very good apartment, amazing living room, go for it! Close your eyes and you'll love it.
Great place to stay

The accommodation matched the description perfectly and the caretaker was very nice, but there are two things to be aware of: it was very humid when we were there, while it wasn't outside, and you absolutely should NOT use the washing machine and dryer that the owner kindly provides for his clients if you don't want to find your belongings full of holes. In my case, two new t-shirts ended up in the trash, which is really frustrating

Ian was very communicative and the place matched the photos exactly. It's perfect if you need a place to crash sleep in Montreal. It's close to a metro station *and* a grocery store. The neighborhood was quiet (we stayed early September).

Location is great, steps from the supermarket, buses, and metro.
My wife and I enjoyed our stay at this property and we had no issues.
Buses and metro trains take you anywhere in Greater Montreal, even to Laval.
Great place. Exceeded expectations. Cool location. No hassle. I will definitely return to Ian's place.

Apparently located near restaurants, public transportation, and a 15-minute walk from the city center. The Wi-Fi speed was somewhat slow, there was no ironing board available, and the shower did not function properly.
Peaceful and tranquil location. Conveniently located near public transport and amenities.
Excellent location. Excellent service
Ian's place was a really great place to stay while we were in Montreal. Very close to downtown via the Snowdon subway station around the corner. Highly recommended

Absolutely perfect location. It's on a busy corner with shops, restaurants, grocery stores, and the metro, but yet it's a quiet apartment that was spotless. Ian was very responsive to my questions and a small problem with the TV was handled very quickly.

This basement apartment is perfect for a couple. Great location, walking distance to shops, restaurants and the metro. Very modern and clean. Check-in was very easy and the girls were helpful. 

The TV only has one cable channel, so you probably want to bring Apple TV or something and there are only 2 very thin pillows.

Parking is on the street!

Overall a great place to stay and will use it again :O) Thank you!
The bed isn't very comfortable. The shower needs fixing. But otherwise, I loved it. Ian was so nice, the metro is right around the corner (late-night snacks). It's worth the price!

Super secluded in a charming Montreal neighborhood. I really loved Ian's welcoming hospitality, he is very responsive to messages, and I really appreciated the tranquility of the place and the property. I highly recommend it 100% and hope to return there eventually.

Thanks Ian :-)

This was a nice place. It looked newly renovated and was very spacious and comfortable. There were amenities nearby. We drove and found that there were parking spaces on the street nearby. We didn't make much use of the subway, but one was close by. Overall, the cost was well worth it.
Ian's place is nice, clean, and close to everything. He is a great host, I would highly recommend it!
Belle place is located near the city center
Nice clean place close to shops and transportation.

Interior design was beautiful. I love how everything inside the place was arranged. Food, grocery stores, and transit were all within walking distance. REMEMBER: The place is behind the building in the basement which was difficult for us to find. I highly recommend everyone to consider staying at this beautiful home. Definitely coming back here in the future!

The apartment is very well located. 
Comfortable. Modern.
Its strong point is the proximity of two shops and the metro station. 
Tip: Avoid taking the car as even if there is parking on the adjacent street, it's not free. 
Improvement point: The humidity level could be improved. We left the bathroom ventilation open all along. 
Apartment we recommend

Clean apartment with a large bathtub and well-equipped. Very close to shops and the metro.

However, access via a rear courtyard is not very welcoming, note that the apartment is on the ground floor: there's little light, which wasn't a problem for us as we were mainly using it for sleeping, for TV you need the system with the smartphone. 

We really liked this apartment which met our needs, excellent value for money.

Ran out of hot water during shower

Parking was a bit difficult 

Late check-in not available

Very uncomfortable/regrettable stay. This is actually half of a basement on the ground level. While the interior of the spaces matches the photos, what was not shown is the path you have to walk through to get to your basement apartment entrance. After spending 10-15 minutes searching for parking every night, you walk into a dark alley (about 10 meters), with smelly garbage dumped on both sides of the alley. At the end of the alley, turn left and you walk into two cars semi-blocking the entrance to the basement units. There are woods and other dumps and garbage in the vicinity. There are spider webs that you will walk right into your face. You will have to squeeze through two vehicles without dirtying your clothes before you get to Ft dr #1. Unlock dr #1, you walk into an unfinished hallway with woods piling in front of dr #2, which open into the basement apartment. Imagine if you are dressed in nice clothes walking through the above 3-4 times a day from the apartment to your car. The place is very uncomfortable due to the following facts: 1. There is no bedboard, so you cannot sit up and read in bed. 2. The humidity in the unit is extremely high. There is a dehumidifier put away in a small closet room, but we were not informed until we found it on the second night. When I say extremely high, I mean you cannot even sit in the room without sweating. We used the dehumidifier (did not help much), and every 10 hours or so, we need to empty a tank of water from the dehumidifier tank before it overflows. 3. The outdoor temperature at night after 9 pm during our stays (Aug 29-Sept 4) is < 20°C. But the inside temperature is at 28°C. With the humidity and heat, we did not sleep for more than 4 hours per night. 4. On the fourth night, we found a fan (dusty and semi-working) in the closet room. It did little help after we had to wash off the dust on the fan. 5. We informed Ian that we are very uncomfortable and his reply was to buy a fan valued up to $40 and he would refund us. My message to Ian: Hi Ian, we are three nights into our stay and each night has been very uncomfortable. Even last night at 3 am it was 28.5°C. Too warm, humid and hard to breathe. As we're not even able to open a window. Outside was under 20°C Is there anything you can do to make the stay more tolerable? In addition to the comfort issues, I also wanted to note a few things that are broken: The dryer handle, The coffee machine ---------- Ian reply: Hello, maybe you can buy a fan up to $40 that I would refund you? I have photos and videos to support my claim. Message me on F/b if anyone wants to see.

Ian's place is great. It has everything you could need, including a washing machine and tumble dryer. It's located very conveniently to the nearby station Snowdon that takes you straight to downtown or Old Montreal. There's also a McDonalds nearby if you fancy breakfast! A nice touch was that the TV has a Chromecast for those nights when you feel like watching silly videos on YouTube. This Airbnb definitely made my trip worth it.

Enjoyed our weekend in Montreal. Very clean and spacious room. Great communication with owner and helpers. Good and quiet location. Metro is 5 min walk which was a key. NO parking but we got lucky with street parking and had no issues. Recommend and will come back to this place
It's a great little apartment, but it was a bit smaller than I thought, otherwise it was a great stay. The owner was helpful and communicated well. I would definitely recommend it.

Apartment very well located two steps from shops, restaurants, metro station and tourist sites. 

Perfect for a night or two. Apartment in half basement so slightly damp and dark
Apartment suitable for a few days but not for the long term due to its lack of natural light as windows are at ground level. Comfortable bedding.
Cozy space tucked away near the Snowdon Metro Station
Clean and cozy apartment. The pictures perfectly reflect reality! Located 2 minutes from the metro station and close to a supermarket, making it very well-situated.
Nice apartment and great value.
Very clean, modern, excellent downtown location. Within walking distance to everything we needed. Would definitely stay again.

Jose is an awesome host. We had some nice social time with her chatting, and she even shared an evening meal with us unexpectedly. She is there to meet your every need and has a great space to stay in. It's clean, spacious, the bed is very comfortable, and it's very welcoming. There are many shops, restaurants, and coffee shops within a 2-minute walk, and the river is just two minutes away in the other direction. We loved exploring Pointe Claire, Dorval, and Lachine, which are very close to her, and there's a beautiful and safe cycling route all the way into Montreal. Thank you, Jose, for being such a caring and interesting host. We would definitely recommend staying at your place!

Jose is super nice and interesting :) His roommate Marlene is very friendly. Her cat is cute and fluffy! Our room is spacious and clean and full of artistic decorations. It's a lovely town with lots of water around. 5-star experience!

The place was spotless and very spacious. We felt perfectly at home even though the thought of staying in another person's home sometimes makes me feel uncomfortable. In the morning we were recommended a delightful coffee shop down the road with beautiful art. The area is beautiful for walking by the river and has delightful shops. The host was absolutely lovely, and I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone.
You will love everything about Jose's place and surroundings.

This is a keeper. Great location, being quiet and also close to the Pointe-Claire tourist street with coffee shops and bakeries. The hospitality is awesome with a beautiful and clean room with a king-size bed. We will come back and I highly recommend Jose's place.
A nice, clean place with a great location and the best of the kindest people.

Ideally located in the charming village of Pointe-Claire, this property boasts picturesque houses dating back centuries, a rarity in North America that deserves mention. On the upper floor of a likely well-aged house, overlooking a river street, there's a spacious, bright room with a dressing area and a bathroom (website hidden by Airbnb) featuring a large Italian shower. Noteworthy is a king-size bed - incredibly comfortable - where you could easily spend your day! The host is a delightful Dutch lady who has been living in Canada since 1956, very friendly. She lives with a shy, fluffy cat and another person whose room is on the same floor as ours but was away for the holidays.

Overall, complete satisfaction!

Jose's place is awesome! I was staying in town after writing an exam in Pointe-Claire. I was greeted right away at the door and whisked inside to join her and her friend for an awesome meal. Very lucky that they decided to share their meal and some great conversation with me. I went to bed early and got up and left on the morning of a big storm in Montreal, so unfortunately I did not get to say goodbye. Hoping to stay again when I next write an exam in Pointe-Claire.

Cheers,
Wonderful hostess and location. Lovely, clean and comfortable bedroom. Highly recommend it.

This is the second time I've stayed at Jose's place, and it was even better this time! Marlene is a total sweetheart and awesome cook who let us try some of her amazing food. It was definitely like coming home again. Pointe Claire village is as charming as always, with lovely shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance of the house. I will definitely stay again.
Tranquil stay and large comfortable room. The representative of the host was friendly and accommodating, as I had to leave very early in the morning and did not cause any problems.
We were very well received, the room is large and pleasant and the surroundings are very pretty.

Jose was a wonderful host...warm, friendly and just a lovely person. The space was just as pictured and exactly as described. It was a very large, nicely decorated room with a super comfortable king-size bed. Beautiful new bathroom, just outside the room, and lots of space to hang your clothes etc. in the alcove of the room itself. There was a small fridge, tea and a kettle as well as a welcome bowl of fresh fruit. The location was terrific...half an hour drive from downtown Montreal, about a 1-minute walk to downtown Pointe Claire and a 1-minute walk to the water. This was an oasis of peace and quiet.

Jose was so lovely. She made me tea and we shared a lemon loaf while chatting. Her roommate was equally friendly and very interesting. The room looked like a hotel room, and the shower was really nice. This is such a convenient location in Pointe-Claire.

This place was so cute! I loved the room and the king-sized bed! There was a little nook in the room with a mini fridge which was perfect for me because I brought a lot of my own food. The place was easy to find and very close to adorable shops and a scenic lake! We loved our stay!

I stayed only one short night at Jose's place and everything is simply perfect, the warm welcome from Jose who makes you feel at home, the room is spacious and very clean with all the amenities, the bed is big and lets you sleep like a baby. I highly recommend this place :-)

Jose's place was perfect! It is in a great location in the Pointe Claire village. The room is large, clean and the bed is extremely comfortable. We were staying in Pointe Claire to visit family and we loved staying at Jose's - it was so welcoming. Jose is extremely warm and pleasant. We enjoyed chatting with her and meeting her sweet cat. We had a very positive experience and we will definitely stay here again!

That was our second time at Jose's place. Again, it was awesome. The king bed is so comfortable and the area is charming. Above all, Jose is a superb host. My wife and I will be back when we need to stay in Montreal.
Jose's place was exactly as advertised. She was very friendly and welcoming, and the room was perfect. I will definitely stay again if I find myself in the area.

The room was a great size - plenty of space and I appreciated the small fridge and the ample closet space. As someone who grew up in the neighborhood, I am very familiar with the location and enjoyed the time when I was not visiting family to meander about and enjoy the local cafes and shops. I highly recommend the location. Jose was a great host and very welcoming.
Great place and a super hostess!!!

Great place to stay - just a block away from the Village where there are lots of lovely shops. Jose is an amicable and cordial host, always very helpful offering me tea and snacks. I will definitely stay there during my next visit to Montreal. The room had a comfy king-size bed and there is lots of room. It is truly a good deal. Thank you.

The host was kind and welcoming. The location was fantastic, just steps away from the waterfront and a beautiful park in one direction, and 30 seconds away from the bustling main street in the other. Beautiful weather brought the streets alive as people went out to explore all the lovely shops and cafes.
Wonderful host, lovely clean, bright, and comfortable room. The location in the village is perfect. There are terrific restaurants and beautiful walks. We will definitely stay there again.

Jose was very nice! Her place was nicely renovated upstairs and the bathroom was gorgeous. The bed was one of the most comfortable beds I've slept on! 

A quiet little town with many small bars and restaurants within walking distance. 

Highly recommended! Will definitely be back!

The space is exactly as advertised; a private home with modern amenities (TV, small fridge, coffee maker, air conditioner). The bed is divine! Jose and her roommate were very warm and welcoming. The location is perfect; only a block from the lakefront, coffee shops, boutiques and markets. Public transit runs along Lakeshore. There is a sweet cat on the premises who doesn't come upstairs. The guest washroom is shared with one person but this was never an issue. Excellent value! I highly recommend Jose's house for those looking for peace, comfort and convenience.
Jose's home was wonderful! I fear sharing this great place as I would like it available every time I pass through and visit.

Reviews were accurate. If you're in the Montreal area and looking for a fantastic place to stay, look no further than Jose's place. Five-star bed and bathroom. Jose is an excellent host and a wealth of information about the area.

Jose's place was great, the room was comfortable, squeaky clean and quiet. The shared bathroom was modern and very nice. Jose was accommodating, quick to respond and very nice as well. It was like a home away from home.
Excellent in every way.
Spacious beautiful room. Josée is very welcoming, helpful and cheerful.

We discovered the old Pointe Claire...what a nice surprise! 
The large, comfortable room is simply perfect!  A real winner!
And José is charming! We couldn't ask for more!

Jose's place is amazing and Jose is a lovely host with so much knowledge to share. The shower is one of the nicest showers I've ever used and the bed is extremely comfortable. The neighborhood has a great village feel with a sailing club, swimming pool and large park along with restaurants and shops. All in all, a great experience.

Jose and Usha were wonderful hosts. They were very welcoming and accommodating. The location is absolutely perfect for a visit to Pointe-Claire. It's situated close to everything within walking distance. The space is great and well set up. We highly recommend visiting.

Céline & Mike

What a surprise to find this place! Pointe Claire is a charming little town with so much character & friendliness, and only minutes from downtown Montreal. Jose is so warm and welcoming, and her home is clean and comfortable. I really liked the big bedroom and big shower. I hope to stay here again on my return visit.

Jose's house is in a nice little town with history dating back to American Indians, a block from bars and restaurants, two blocks from the river. We actually had pretty much all of the upstairs for ourselves - very private. The room and a private bathroom are freshly renovated and everything is sparkling clean. Jose is a great host with stories to tell. We will definitely stay there every time we are in the area.

Jose, thank you for your hospitality.

This is a wonderful place right by the water. Jose was a truly professional host. The suite upstairs is like a luxury hotel room. She knew I was there to get some work done so she left me to myself yet still was very friendly when we crossed paths. Tip for those doing a similar work holiday: half a block one way is the serene water, half a block another way (on St. Anne's) is a great yoga studio with drop-in classes, and half a block another way is a pool with lane swimming for $5. Great stay and fantastic host!
Thanks for everything, Jose.

Jose's place is very nice. Clean, cozy, and comfortable. The room was big enough, with a big bed, clean and big bathroom. You feel like you are at home and Jose's hospitality is excellent. If you are in Montreal and you want a great, quiet place to stay, you must book at Jose's.
It was an absolute delight staying at Jose's house and she was a fantastic host. I would definitely stay there again!

Jose is a fantastic host, thoughtful and respectful. His house is charming and eclectic, and the proximity of Pointe-Claire village and the lake truly made my stay feel like a holiday. Highly recommend.

I enjoyed the hospitality at Jose's place very much. Pointe-Claire is a suburb of Montreal but has an entirely different, laid-back feel than staying in the city center. It is well connected by bus (journey takes 45 minutes to an hour) and saves the hassle of finding parking in the city. Jose was very welcoming. We enjoyed the upgraded features in the upstairs of her home (beautiful shower, classy lighting in the bedroom, all amenities for preparing tea/coffee in the dressing room, and air conditioning!) and we enjoyed the helpful local tips from Jose herself -- a great experience.

We had a most wonderful stay with Jose! The location of her home is right in the heart of the enchanted Pointe-Claire village: the sprawling lakefront is 2 minutes down her street, and all the charming amenities of the main street are 2 minutes up from her home. Jose is the epitome of hospitable, welcoming, and helpful. She's a pleasure to interact with and her home was a pleasure to stay in. We look forward to our next stay with you, Jose!

The house is cute and comfortable. The rooms are bright and the view of the neighborhood is quaint. The king-size bed feels like a cloud, I haven’t been that comfy in I don’t know how long. The extra bedroom is also cute and looks like it would be perfect for traveling with a child (even without AC). The windows in the home are usually open, letting in a very nice breeze off of the lake. The bathroom is aesthetically pleasing and very clean. The host (Jose) is very helpful and kind and informative. She has newspaper clips and brochures of things that are in the area and gave us tips on things to do. Her home is right at the shore and a windmill from 1709, so the walks always seem to have an amazing view, especially accompanied by some ice cream from a little shop around the corner from her place. The town seems to have a very safe feel, to the point that you could be comfortable sending your children out to play without worry. I would recommend this home and host to anyone. Definitely an experience I am glad I took the time for.
Second time...and always perfect, Jose is a warm and generous host! The room is very comfortable! Nice coffee shops nearby... don't hesitate! Great place!
Very clean and nice. Thanks!
Excellent hospitality and a quiet neighborhood.
Nice stay with José, highly recommended!

The room and bathroom are beautiful.
The place is very nice, the lake is 2 minutes from the house.
Jose is a very friendly, generous and responsive host.
Highly recommendable place.
Thank you so much, Jose.
Jose is a great host in a wonderful space. It's quiet, clean, spacious, and the area is beautiful too.
Travellers staying at this Heritage Home will discover more than the listing suggests. Jose is an excellent host, helpful and genuine. A rare find!
Our stay at Jose's house was lovely. She is seconds away from the water and a beautiful little town with great cafes. The bed and room were cozy and large. We would definitely book again!

Accommodations near Trudeau Airport. Very friendly hosts who make you feel right at home immediately. The rooms are high-quality and cozy, the garden invites you to linger. The surroundings are very attractive due to the many green spaces and the lake. Top tip!

Again it was a pleasure... Jose's place is so comfortable and warm! 
And she is a great, funny and generous lady!!
Nothing to say, a little disappointed.
Jose is a wonderful hostess, friendly and welcoming. Her place is very homey, with lots of nice touches. And a wonderful location, too!

A wonderful, spacious room with a large TV, desk, mini fridge and beautiful, spotless bathroom with a large shower. A comparable suite in a hotel would cost 3 to 4 times more. Jose is a friendly, generous host and we would definitely return to her lovely home.
A cozy lovely spot right in the village close to restaurants and shops. Jose is very warm and welcoming. We really enjoyed our stay much more than a hotel.
Spacious, great value, lovely hostess, and perfect for all our needs. We would definitely stay here again in the future.

Excellent location within walking distance of the lake and many shops in the village of Pointe Claire. And, only 15 minutes from YUL airport. Accommodations were very clean and comfortable, and spacious. Jose is a very kind and welcoming host. It was an incredible value, and I highly recommend it to anyone visiting in the area.

Jose is a very engaging host, curious and open and very respectful. His house is charming and is wonderfully located in a part of Pointe-Claire that feels like the countryside. I've experienced a few Airbnb's in the area and his is unique!
Welcoming host. Very clean. Great location! It's a great place to stay! We'll be back!
Feel like you're taken care of like by a close family member.
Nice place and great time at Jose's house, we will definitely come back again.

Jose is so very welcoming and everything is nice and perfectly clean! The place is cute and cozy and unique. I definitely recommend it! It's very close to the airport and the water, making it a wonderful option for travelers ✈️ and for a vacation on the lake!
Just PERFECT!!
Large bedroom on the upper floor, all comfort near the lake and near the center of the village. Very quiet.
Exceptional host. Very clean room and bathroom. No regrets.
Jose is a wonderful host. She is very kind and friendly. She is also private and respectful of your personal space. The location was perfect, and the place was very clean.
Super place. Host attentive and very kind. Room impeccable. Everything was perfect. Thank you so much, Jose

My husband and I felt totally at home here. Jose was most welcoming without being intrusive, and her home is comfortable, clean and cozy. The location is on a quiet street but just a hop and a skip from restaurants and stores. The modern private bathroom is also a plus!  :)
Stay at Jose's place, everything went very well. Thanks for the hospitality.
Jose is very friendly and easygoing. She provided some insights about local cuisine.
Very neat and tidy apartment, perfectly located near Old Montreal and Palais des Congrès. Ideal for business travelers seeking a home away from home.

John's suite exceeded my expectations, being centrally located for nightlife, steps from the old port, with a brilliant location. 

The apartment itself was fantastic and everything was sparkling clean, offering a nice, comfortable space with a really nice bed. The amenities were an added bonus, with no issues whatsoever. I would definitely stay again.

Wonderfully located near Old Montreal, steps from the Metro, the condo is modern, clean, and nicely maintained. Check-in was very convenient and the host was very responsive. We would definitely return.

John's home is in a perfect location! A short walk to the Port and St Catherine's Street. It was very clean and John was accommodating and quick to respond to any requests. Definitely recommend his place!

The location is perfect, as is the building I stayed in. It's within walking distance of everything. The metro and buses are nearby. Old Montreal is great. The host communicates very well. Book with confidence.

John's place is located in a fantastic spot right by the old port. The apartment is clean and in a brand new building. Check-in and check-out were very easy. I would definitely recommend staying here.

John's apartment was in a perfect location for exploring this beautiful city. Modern and spacious, it was close to major attractions as well as shops and public transportation. John was easily contactable regarding check-in and check-out. This apartment is perfect for the solo traveler.

If you're looking for a stay in the heart of downtown Montreal, I recommend John's condo which is very well located. Perfect for one person or a couple. John responds quickly to messages sent. The place is clean and decorated nicely! 

Sylvie
Comfortable, quiet, convenient, excellent hosts when I managed to navigate to the wrong apartment block (my fault entirely). Definitely would recommend.

I had a great time staying at John's apartment. It's very clean and perfectly located in Montreal's old town, close to many restaurants and tourist attractions. Also John was super responsive and answered my messages and questions immediately.
John's place is really nice and clean; very well located, near walking distance to main tourist attractions. Also, near the metro station Place D'Arms. I am sure I would recommend John's place.

We were very happy with John's place as it is in an ideal location. It is walking distance to the metro and to Old Montreal, which is great for anyone visiting the city. The check-in was simple and seamless. The apartment itself had everything that was needed and I liked the fact that there were several toiletries available for use in case you forgot anything (shampoo, conditioner etc.). However, the apartment faces another building so there is not much of a view if you are looking for that. That being said, location cannot be beat and for the most part we only came back to the apartment for sleep. All in all this was a great experience and we appreciate John's timely responses whenever we had a question. Thank you for your hospitality!

The condo is in an excellent location for exploring both old and new Montreal. The place itself was very clean and quiet, and John provided easy instructions for guests to follow and was very responsive to any questions. Highly recommend!

This was my first Airbnb and I am very pleased with my stay. John is quick to respond to messages and the apartment is stylish, clean, well-equipped, spacious and in a great location. Great experience & value, thank you!
The location couldn't be better. The condo is sparklingly clean. There is paid indoor parking across the street. John was very easy to communicate with. Great value for the price.
Awesome spot. Highly recommended!
Great location. Very clean. Secure building. Be sure to park across the street for the best rates.

This property was absolutely perfect. It was in an amazing location, impeccably clean, well-stocked with towels, toiletries, kitchen equipment, and had a washer/dryer. John was incredibly prompt with communication and opened the unit within an hour of my inquiring if it was available! I can't find fault with anything about my stay. I even used the hotel gym which was free with the property. I would highly recommend this property for single or couple travelers. It offers everything you need and in a really beautiful place.
Superb. Best we've experienced out of six or seven rentals. Convenient and well-managed.
Great host, great location, would stay there again.
John's place was clean, very hospitable, and a great location for McGill University.
Excellent!
Clean, cozy, with building access to a nice gym.
Great location and host, highly recommended
Great location in Old Montreal. Clean and basic accommodations and amenities. Good value for the area.

John’s apartment is very clean and modern with many amenities. It is conveniently located very close to Place-d'Armes subway station and Old Montreal. Check-in/check-out was easy, and John was very prompt and responsive with a few questions I had. It was a very enjoyable stay!

Wonderful stay in Montreal. The apartment is located just 2 steps from Old Montreal. Perfect for discovering the city. Host very accommodating and really friendly. 

Don't hesitate, it's a safe address ;)
A nice little place to stay conveniently located near the convention center and surrounding area.
Great unit and host! Highly recommend it

The apartment is very pretty. It is right next to Montreal's convention center, which comes in handy when you visit for a conference. It is also in the Old Montreal, which, tourist-wise, I think is the best place to walk around. What I enjoyed the most was the amenities, such as an iron, shampoo & conditioner, and cooking supplies. John has been very responsive and easy to communicate with. I enjoyed my stay very much!

This place is everything you could need in a Montreal Airbnb. It's stylish and cozy, centrally located (near buses and subways), in a safe and secure building with all the amenities you need. I will always choose this place!
John's place was elegant and had everything we needed. We felt so lucky to be in a beautiful apartment in such a convenient location for our vacation. John was communicative and accommodating.
John is a great host, very responsive. The apartment was as expected with no complaints. Everything is good.
This is a wonderful stay, location, and value! I would highly recommend and stay again.
Spacious one-bedroom unit on a high floor. Large windows and nice natural light in the bedroom. The kitchen is dimly lit. Excellent location near RESO, the metro, and Vieux Montreal.
Great hosts! Would stay with them again!!

I had a very good stay. The accommodation is well-located, and the hosts are wonderful. 
I recommend it to you.

Warm and welcoming atmosphere. Our hosts go above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and welcome! Several small touches are very much appreciated (coffee and dining area for lunch). I highly recommend this host!
Super host. Andréanne is dedicated to making your stay enjoyable.
Very friendly hosts! Privacy in the basement and near the metro. I would go back without hesitation!

We had a great stay at Adréanne & David's place. They are both amazing people, very welcoming and caring. They always asked if we had anything we needed and answered all our questions. Apart from that everything was very clean and you kinda have the entire basement to yourself which is great!

At Andréane's place, there is nothing missing. A spacious, furnished apartment located right next to the metro and one of Montreal's main tourist attractions (biodome, botanical garden, planetarium). We have had many good experiences with Airbnb, but this time, it's impossible to find anything better!
Excellent welcome. Hosts eager to give all advice for the best possible stay. Comfortable accommodation. Highly recommend!

We were very impressed with our overnight stay here and would definitely stay again on a subsequent trip to Montreal. This family went out of their way to accommodate our needs. The location was perfect for us... walking distance from the Olympic Stadium!

My daughter and I had a fantastic weekend attending the Gymnastics World Championships. The home was so close to the Olympic Stadium, it made coming and going to the events there stress-free. We could walk everywhere. Our hosts were open, accommodating and responsive. We had fun exploring the Hochelaga-Maisonneuve neighborhood, enjoying Thanksgiving poutine at Gerry's Delicatessen, delicious baking and coffee from the counter at Marché Maisonneuve and a pub dinner at Le Blind Pig.
The same welcome as if we were going to see long-time friends. A very pleasant stay in a charming house. We recommend it to everyone!!! Thank you again!!
Peaceful and private. A pleasant stay.

Metro station very close by. 
Bathroom with large Italian shower.
The fact that the accommodation is semi-buried is not bothersome (feeling of cocoon).
Small courtyard-garden in peace, very pleasant as soon as there is sunshine.
Andreanne is excellent at communication and has the best possible setup for both short-term and long-term stays. I would definitely stay here again.

I enjoyed my first Airbnb experience staying at Andreanne's home. The private entrance, bathroom, sitting area, and bedroom that could lock made me feel secure and like I had my own space. The house is so close to the metro station that I used transit for my whole four-day visit and that saved a lot of money. She was generous and had a reloadable transit card, travel guides, milk and coffee available. Everything was clean and welcoming. Being so close to the Olympic Stadium and all of its activities made it easy to check out the attractions and there is a Cineplex movie theatre right there too. Nice when travelling with children. She was always responsive to my questions and texted back quickly. I would recommend without a doubt for anyone who wants an easy, enjoyable experience.
Excellent place to stay for a weekend in Montreal! Being close to the metro is an undeniable advantage, as is the independent entrance.  Furthermore, Andréanne and her boyfriend are very kind.

If you are attending an event at the Olympic Stadium or visiting Montreal in general, this is the place to stay! Andréanne and her husband were incredibly welcoming and made me feel completely at home in their home. Their space was extremely clean and was full of helpful amenities.

I would highly recommend staying with Andreanne and her family. I have stayed at a few Airbnbs before, but this one was by far the best. They deserve a 10-star review. Next time I travel to Montreal, I'm staying here 100%

Andréanne is an excellent communicator and went out of her way to accommodate us. We arrived late and she organized our check-in very well. The space is beautiful, better than the pictures and has everything you would need. It feels kind of like a little apartment in the basement, and it does have a separate entrance to the basement, making things even more private. I liked this because I felt I could go in and out at night without bothering Andréanne and her family. The neighborhood had plenty of parking and was quiet but a short drive to everything.
The location is great and the room with kitchenette is very practical! The price is a bit expensive for this neighborhood, but the hospitality is very warm.

Simply, an amazing stay!! Andréanne and her partner are super nice and very pleasant hosts! The room is true to the photos, very clean. The house is 5 minutes walk from the metro and in 10 minutes you're in the city center. We feel safe. Around the house there are several restaurants and cafes. If you're thinking of staying in Montreal, don't hesitate and go stay with Andréanne!

We had a wonderful stay with Andréanne and David! They were very responsive in welcoming us and extremely hospitable! 

The accommodation was very clean, well-equipped, and beautifully decorated, all within walking distance of public transportation and the botanical garden!

Thank you so much! If we were to do it again, we would definitely repeat the experience without hesitation!
Wonderful people, great hospitality, awesome room and space to stay.
Clean, quiet and well-located near the Olympic Park. Everything you need for a short stay in Montreal.

Andreanne's place was great for us. It was perfectly located for our needs, clean, comfortable, and affordable. Our trip was enhanced through our experience of getting to know our hosts a bit and their efforts in making our stay comfortable, convenient, and enjoyable. We would not hesitate to rebook.

The apartment is perfectly situated in the heart of Plateau Mt-Royal: the Mt-Royal metro station, groceries, and restaurants are just a few steps away. The host was responsive to our needs, providing a phone so we could make calls using our Magic Jack via the internet as no landline is available. We rented for one month and Martin was an excellent host.

This is a very quaint, comfortable 1-bedroom apartment on the main floor of a typical Montreal row house. It is located in a great area of the city - Le Plateau - where you are surrounded by quiet streets for strolling, trendy bars, cafés and restaurants, and unique shopping that Montreal is known for. We drove to Montreal and overnight street parking was readily available, once you figured out the signage and what sections of the street were non-permit. The neighbours were also very helpful to point out when we got it wrong, saving us a potential ticket!! Martin was nice to deal with. Although we didn't get to meet in person, communication with him was easy - phone, text, email and through AirBNB. Check-in and out was easy, and we felt very safe and secure. The apartment has an alarm system and we were introduced on paper to the upstairs neighbour, who we then met in person over the course of the weekend. The apartment is clean and the beds are comfortable. The bedroom is large (king size bed) and is off the front side of the house, but the street is fairly quiet, so street noise wasn't an issue. There is no central air conditioning, but a fan in the bedroom and portable A/C unit in the living room. We were there on a very hot, sticky weekend, and didn't find the apartment overly hot, nor did we need the A/C. Although well equipped, we didn't do any cooking in the kitchen, apart from making tea. But we did prepare a nice snack of wine, cheese, crackers, meat, grapes… which we enjoyed sitting out on the quiet and sunny back deck area. Having this outside space was very nice. The apartment is also equipped with a washer/dryer - so handy for longer stays. Decent shower/tub with good water pressure - there is no exhaust fan though, so the room does steam up, making it a bit hard to towel dry. The only real quirk for us... the toilet is in a small "closet" at the front of the house - literally just room for the toilet - while the shower/tub/sink is in a separate room at the back of the house. So you have to walk through the dining/living room & kitchen to wash your hands after using the toilet. Looking back at the photos, we can see this now, but it is not obvious and was a bit of a surprise for us. Overall though, we were very happy with the apartment. Great price, great location, great weekend!

The place is super cozy. Very clean and spacious. Close to the metro station, shared bikes stations, supermarkets, and lots of restaurants. Everything you need is within easy reach. The BBQ station is a lot of fun, especially considering the great selection of amazing sausage at the European market on St.Laurent which is just 10 minutes away by bike. Martin (the host) was very welcoming and helpful. There was a problem with Wi-Fi, he quickly arranged the fix. Great overall experience!

Martin is an extra host, very welcoming and available. We lived there for two exceptional months, where we immediately felt very good because he emanates great serenity and is very warm. It's ideally located in the heart of Plateau, right next to the metro, many beautiful parks, and a multitude of good shops. We especially loved enjoying the terrace and barbecue! In short, we would recommend this accommodation without hesitation to all our loved ones and thank Martin and Sarah for their hospitality!

Martin is an amazing host. He is very communicative and available. Check-in was easy and the place is truly a zen house. I used to live in Montreal so the new location was best for those wanting to live the local life, but his place is truly next to everything. From wonderful brunch places less than 2 blocks away to fresh daily croissants to bars to restaurants to the metro... I could go on.

When we arrived, Martin had left us personal notes about the place, with his phone number, a map of the city, trash day during the week and other useful information. We were able to find parking on the street without using parking permits, but he had left us parking permits in case we needed them at a very affordable fee. The place was spotless and I felt it was bigger than the pictures showed. There was lots of storage for your clothes as the closets were empty and ready to use. I will definitely come back to this place next time I come back to Montreal for sure. Martin is very friendly and available, and his place is wonderful. Some mentioned that the toilet is a separate room from the shower and sink, which is true, but it didn't bother me. I didn't use the BBQ, but it's a brand new big one, better than the one shown in the pictures.

Martin's place is the best place to live the local life while staying in a stress-free very quiet place next to absolutely everything. If you're into road noise, construction driving you crazy and high rises, go downtown. If you want the true Montreal experience, stay at the zenhouse. 

Thanks Martin for the wonderful hospitality and great stay!

My family loved the apartment and the location. It is steps away from everything we needed yet quiet enough to relax and unwind. Martin was a great host and responded to all of our messages in a timely manner. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks for a great stay, Martin.
Great location, spacious and comfortable flat. Martin was very easy to communicate with. Perfectly as described in the ad.
Very spacious, thoughtful amenities, great location! Definitely recommend!
A very beautiful and well-located functional dwelling
The place is in a great location, clean and set up with everything you need. Martin was quick to respond to messages. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Clean, stylish apartment. The small backyard area was nice to sit out during our downtime.

I had an excellent stay at Martin's place, the space was super clean and gorgeous (exactly like in the photos), very spacious and close to everything like shops, restaurants, cafes, bakeries, grocery stores, parks, cultural events... the list goes on! Communication with Martin was easy and quick. Overall a fantastic experience :)

Martins' place was perfect for our 4-day stay. The location is superb; we were able to walk out the front door and find great restaurants, cocktail bars, and cafes within a 5-minute walk. We found that we walked everywhere from his place, even to Old Port.

The beds were both so comfortable that we fell asleep straight away. The townhouse was clean and beautiful. There is even a private terrace with a BBQ which would be lovely in the summer.

The kitchen was well equipped for any type of cooking, unless you can't stop yourself from eating out. 

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend his place.
Fantastic place! The location is great, it was clean and worked perfectly for what we were looking for. Would definitely recommend!
Great location, great place, great host. Would definitely stay again.

My wife and I decided to stay at Martin's for our third trip back to Montreal. Very well located. Pretty close to main streets, shopping, and cafés. Very spacious for the price. All in all, we enjoyed our stay and would recommend it to someone looking for a spacious, affordable and stylish Airbnb near fun attractions in Montreal.
Excellent stay at Martin's place! Everything was clean, spacious and the beds were very comfortable! It was ideally located on the Plateau, we had a fantastic week!
Excellent address, excellent location, I highly recommend!
You will love this place. Charming, comfortable, close to shops, restaurants, a supermarket, and the Metro

Very nice apartment, nothing to complain about, quality and cleanliness were top notch! It's very well located near the metro and shops of all kinds! Martin is responsive as soon as we send him a message, that's perfect! We will definitely come back with pleasure!

We spent a wonderful week in Martin's apartment with my boyfriend and me. The location of the apartment is ideal, in the Plateau neighborhood where we can find everything nearby, young and dynamic with the metro station at 500m, two stations from Berry UQAM (the main metro station).  The apartment is decorated tastefully, bright, clean and I could go on... We feel like home (sometimes a little too much to the point of not wanting to move). Unfortunately, we didn't get to see Martin but he was always very responsive whenever I had a question, it was perfect. You can go there with your eyes closed.  Have a good trip everyone.
Absolutely nothing to complain about! Spacious, clean apartment decorated with taste, cozy and beautifully located.

A quiet and clean place where you feel like home (even an squirrel comes to the terrace to fill its little belly...), Martin is very friendly with his touch of attention, he is very pleasant, don't hesitate to contact him...
Well and practical

The room was great, really big and very clean! The location was really good. Walking distance to the metro, downtown, Parc Mont Royal, and lots of cafes, restaurants, and bars, etc. The bathroom and kitchen were not so good but do have everything you need. I wouldn't recommend it if you like to stay in and cook, but you don't need to because there are loads of great restaurants within a short walk. Otherwise, I would recommend it because the location is great.
Awesome! Great location
Very clean, comfortable and spacious.  Conveniently located and would definitely stay there again. Check-in was smooth and completely hassle-free!
Space was accurate and close enough to walk everywhere.

There is a small distance between the downtown and the street. It's right next to the university, so on weekends evenings there might be some noise from students drinking and partying... but overall it's quiet and clean neighborhood. If you walk a little bit towards the downtown area, you will find some good brunch places too.
The apartment was nice and located centrally.  Good if you're looking for a cheap place to stay for a night or two.
The place is very convenient, close to everything and McGill University, the room is spacious and clean.
Located in a central area, accessible by public transportation, near many tourist attractions :) super quiet, you have your own space.

The landlord is friendly and the apartment is well located near McGill University with a nice view. The room I had was spacious, square, bright, and comfortable. In essence, the description and photo match. The main problem is the miserable hygiene! Everywhere in the apartment, starting from the entrance, it's dirty, untidy, torn boxes are scattered around, food remnants in the kitchen everywhere, no cleanliness in the bathroom, dirty laundry, used underwear on the floor, my room was filthy and I couldn't shake off the feeling that my bedding and towels weren't freshly washed, even if it might have had insects like roaches or mites in bed, which is difficult to prove. Montreal is beautiful but I will not stay at this accommodation again!

A room that completely matches the description and a correct mattress. 

However, a bathroom that hasn't been cleaned in six months, a pair of underpants left trailing on the floor for two days, and a pile of trash cans on the balcony are surprising!

The low prices brought us here and we don't regret it, but don't expect too much...

Great place! It's just as described - my room was big and comfortable, I could control my own heat which was great, and the location is excellent. The hosts were communicative even if I didn’t see them, sending emails checking to see how things were and to give me info on the house, and even a credit for a local electric car taxi company! You won't have access to a common space and remember that you have to share the bathroom with a few people, but with those in mind this is a great stay and I recommend it!

Beautiful room in one of Montreal's most charming neighborhoods! Many places are nearby or reachable by walking, bus, or metro. 
Shampoo, soap, and towels are included :) 
I would definitely stay here again!
Nice and welcoming host. The room is quite spacious and comfortable. However, it's necessary to use public transportation to reach the main tourist attractions.
The accommodation and attention provided is as described in the email. The room I stayed in was very spacious and comfortable, located in a great spot.
Great place to stay if you want easy access to downtown Montreal. The stay was exceptional considering the great price!

Absolutely great. Excellent location. I really enjoyed my stay here and I can say they are great in organization. Unfortunately haven't met the host, but communication was excellent; they provided all the information I needed. Highly recommend this place.
Great location!
Very nice and affordable place to live near downtown McGill.
The room is exactly as the photos show. The location is very good, it's central and public transportation is nearby.
Good!!!:D
Nice host
Great place
Very quiet and cozy place! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

He was a good host. He welcomed us at the gate because we couldn't open the door. The room was quite big but a little cold. It would have been nicer if we could see the photos of other areas as well. Overall it was good though. Thanks again!
good place
Clean room with ample space. Accessible and close to many activities.
Great place - Nice guys!
We had a great stay!
We had a great experience here! They also gave us great tips about things to do in the area.

We had a few awesome days in Montreal. The apartment was in a very good location, and the room was very spacious. 
Would recommend

I had a fantastic stay! The place is super easy to find and right next door, walking distance to everything in the city. My room felt very cozy. The natural light from the big window was great and the heating worked perfectly. Communication with Shakil was excellent and he promptly helped with all my concerns. Would definitely recommend!! :)
The host was very attentive and the room was very clean. We really enjoyed our stay :)
The room was much larger and the bed was more comfortable than expected. The hosts were very friendly and open to conversation. A lot of information was provided beforehand, which was nice!

McGill Ghetto is an excellent place to be in Montreal. Communication was very easy and the room completely satisfied all my expectations. Also, the neighborhood is pretty nice, not far from a park or other spots where I have eaten delicious food.

I definitely recommend this place to other guests. 

Thank you so much! Andrea
I really enjoyed my stay here.  A nice big comfortable room in a really cool neighborhood in Montreal - love it! The host was great - very friendly and helpful. A great value and highly recommended!
Good place for single male university-aged travelers. Very close to everything and the university.

Simple hostel-style accommodation, nice people running the place who gave great travel tips that were very helpful. Some noise from other guests and hosts so it's not totally peaceful but as long as you're using it as a base to explore the city and not as a home for any period of time it will suit your needs perfectly.

The room is clean, spacious, and organized. The house is located in a fantastic spot, incredibly quiet and within walking distance of Old Town and Mount Royal. The host is extremely helpful and kind. I highly recommend this place for staying and enjoying the beautiful city of Montreal.

We only stayed for one night, so we couldn't meet the hosts or experience the "vibe" of the place. 

The room is as depicted in the photos. Clean and spacious. However, it is worth keeping in mind that the other areas of the house, namely, the bathroom and kitchen are shared with many other people. Thus, it is hard to keep them clean. 

They have a cat, which we were not aware of, but he is really nice and friendly. 

The location was very good; it provides free parking right in front of the place, which made it easier for us.
Really intended housing for young tenants. Very well located in the city center. Good atmosphere

Wonderful hosts at a great location! The place is situated between downtown and McGill within walking distance of various beautiful quirky places in Montreal that the hosts will be more than happy to recommend! Would stay here again in the future. Hosts were kind and fun to hang out with (I even got to try their cooking)!
We loved the great location, the friendly hosts, and easy communication! We would definitely stay there again!
Great location - close to campus, Mount Royal, and cafes for working. I have some great tips for exploring the area. Plus, there's the coolest resident cat you'll ever meet - Frank.
Translation:  **The lives of many people depend on your work.**
My room was extremely spacious and clean. Thank you!

This space was right in downtown Montreal and offered amazing value!  A nice, large, bright room with a comfortable bed. Perfect for trips where you need to get some work done as well. 

Everyone was friendly and gave me tips on the area. I will definitely be passing through again.
Great location

Great location in downtown Montreal, good for a one-night stay. There are other guests in the house. It's not a bad thing, but I didn't know there were other guests until I got there. However, it was a great time.
Great location and clean space! Amazing value
Very good, price-performance ratio acceptable and very available.

Great location. Quick walk to Contemporary Art Museum, Convention Center, Eva B's, tons of restaurants and bars around the corner. Bargain for the price. Roommates are very friendly and social. Can get a little loud on weekends but housemates are very courteous if asked to keep quiet.
Great place for the price. Location is perfect for downtown. The check-in process is simple and straightforward.
Not very responsive and not attuned to guest needs
This room is exactly like the picture. The people living in the house were friendly. The location is amazing, a 15-20 minute walk to restaurants, bars, and nightclubs.

The place was fine and lived up to its advertisement. You get what you pay for; the room is nice at a low price. The bathrooms were okay, the shower handle fell off so it was difficult to use and it wasn't working one morning. The cat is cute. 

The hosts were nice but loud late at night when I was trying to sleep, and the kitchen was always full of dirty dishes. I would not stay here again.
Great value for money and a perfect crash pad after a long day's work. Lots of cafes and bars nearby, and downtown is just a short walk away. The hosts were friendly, and their cat Frank was a gem!

Great location and smooth check-in and check-out. Would recommend since the space was large for two people. 

All nights there were lots of talking outside, which made it difficult to sleep, but otherwise everyone was very nice.

It's a good place to spend one night for a cheap price. The room is nice and not far from the university, Mont Royal, and downtown. The hosts are also very kind but they talked until late at night when I was trying to sleep. Except for that, it's okay.  I recommend this house to you.
Excellent place, excellent hosts
Good location, recommended!
Amazing location!!!
House in student ghetto
Airbnb very convenient for a pleasant stay in Montreal.

They allowed me to check in early with my luggage. They were very kind and helpful. 
The location was very convenient.

Accurate description of the room we rented. The rented room is fairly clean, but the shared bathroom is dirty. The bathtub is slippery due to lack of proper cleaning. The shower knob broke and fell each time I took a shower. The location is good, and parking is good. Oh! One of the four nights we stayed was pretty loud around midnight and lasted for a couple of hours. My partner got out of bed and walked to the kitchen just so they knew we were already in. Unfortunately, the noise level went down for a bit and then back up again.
Excellent communication and beautiful room in a nice area.
disappointed

These guys are very nice and friendly hosts, and they have a very cute cat to welcome you.

The location is the biggest plus as it's just a 5-10 minute walk to Eaton Centre and other places downtown.

Some things that were mentioned by previous guests but weren't fixed by the host include:
* The kitchen sink had unwashed dishes from days, making it look unsanitary to stand in the kitchen with a full sink of dirty dishes.
* The shower nozzle even dislocates and comes off easily. 

I would give 10 stars for the location if I could. 

Be careful of the street parking signs, guys, as I got a $62 parking ticket for parking at the exact same spot the host asked me to park (the free parking spot) in front of the house.
The room was clean and spacious, the bathroom was so dirty, I love cats but I did not like seeing a container with poop in front of my room.
It has a very good location. The cleaning of hallways could be improved.
The host was very nice, friendly, and helpful. It was a pretty good location. It was an okay stay, but it would have been better if the common areas were better maintained.
Sweet place to be

I am trying to be honest here! I checked in late and the access to the place was good, the AC was broken and not working at all as described in the listing, they have a cat, the kitchen and bathroom were horrible everywhere with women's hair. 

There are too many people living in this place and I couldn't get a shower until 11:00 AM, which is past checkout time, so I left without showering.

The location is great, the rooms are very spacious and the atmosphere is youthful and pleasant. I think it's a great decision the detailed way they provide information about everything you might need during your stay, so you don't have to ask for it personally! Plus, they make themselves available to guests daily through this medium as a demonstration of hospitality. I highly recommend it!!

Very beautiful large room in a lovely apartment with a great atmosphere. Host is excellent: good communication and understanding of traveler's constraints. We highly recommend and will keep the address for next time
No air conditioning, but a great location near downtown Montreal and Saint Laurent, making it easy to get out.
It was suitable for a single-night stay.
Stylish room in a convenient location within the heart of Montreal.
The size of the room and the living space is satisfying, but in summer it's too hot because there's no air conditioner.
Great place to stay with excellent access to the McGill campus. Thanks!

Great place to stay overnight, it was a very short stay for us as we arrived in the afternoon to depart early the following morning.

However, the host is very pleasant and nice, and the place itself is great!
Clear indications, room as described.

The place is in a fantastic location and it feels like living in a student flat share/hostel with a chill vibe, with all its pros and cons. The room was immaculate: spotless, clean, and nicely furnished.
Very nice and big room, very well situated
If you want to stay overnight and only sleep there, that's fine. The location is good, providing access to downtown.

Single room in a house; shared common areas with other residential rooms. 
Good location for tourism.
Cleanliness is correct.
I recommend!

The accommodation was as advertised, clean and tidy. The only details were some exterior noise, which is understandable given the student area. The other detail was that the shower handle was loose and wobbly, almost falling on my foot. Just be careful with that.
McGill Ghetto NEVER disappoints. Best value in Montreal!
The location was fantastic! Very close to McGill University and a 10-15 minute walk to downtown Montreal. It was very convenient for a conference at McGill University and near many restaurants.
A large room in a well-located apartment in the heart of Montreal. Simple and functional. Address to recommend
Good overall, perfect location with a very large room. However, common areas are not perfectly clean.
Best location in Montreal! Loved the style of the room!

The place is inexpensive and in a very good location for me. Very easy access to the metro. Most places including downtown, Mount Royal, and Old Montreal are within walking distance. However, the place wasn't as clean as I expected. For students, it might be a good place to stay.
Very great stay! Had all the amenities we needed, the host was very nice, and there was even a cute cat named Frank :)
The cat was so cute. The guesthouse heater is okay and it feels cozier than I expected. Although the bathroom is shared, it was clean enough to be alright.
Very convenient!
Super Dad Everything
Clean place

Nice, cheap place to stay close to downtown. Quiet and clean. There's a cat that you can smell. I don't mind but if you're allergic or sensitive to cat smell you might not enjoy it. The fridge was a little gross too. The host was nice. For a short stay, it wasn't a bad spot especially for the price.
I had to cancel last minute and they were very honorable and attentive, checking in on me and respecting the cancellation policy :) Two thumbs up!
Just perfect! 10/10, that's all there is to say!

The location of this Airbnb was great, as it was very close to downtown. 

However, we had a strange check-in experience with another guest in the room assigned to us. In that confusion, we ended up in a different room that hadn't been cleaned. There was garbage and dirty glasses. The walls in the house were also extremely thin; we were woken up every morning by people talking loudly outside our door and even a loud barking dog on the first night (though there was no mention that animals would be present apart from the cat, who is very cute and friendly).

The shower also wasn't working; the handle had been broken off so we weren't able to take a shower (but we didn't have clean towels anyway). The front door also didn't lock. 

Overall, it was a mixed bag. The location was good but we didn't really enjoy our stay.

Very good value for the price! 

Large and comfortable room. 

Very flexible and accommodating.
It's an incredible place to stay, I enjoyed my time there with great hospitality.

A very nice place with a spacious room and an easy check-in option when the host isn't there. I went for a job interview that lasted all day, so I only used the apartment to sleep for two nights. Although there was hair on the toilet and in the shower, the place was cleanish, the bed was very comfortable, and the room was very well decorated. The only complaint I have is that both nights I fell asleep early, around 10pm, and on both nights I was woken up by loud voices (mainly female) around midnight, then realized there was also a dog running around. When it happened the second night, I went out to ask the hosts to please be quiet, and they immediately became quiet. If I didn't have to get up early, I wouldn't really care, but both mornings I had to wake up super early so it was a bit of a shame to have broken sleep. Otherwise, I would recommend this place to stay if they improve what I suggested.
The place was great and everything was as advertised. Would definitely stay again anytime
The room was beautiful, very spacious and clean. The people who live there were very kind.
Frank - the cat is very friendly and affectionate.
Central location
Nice big room close to McGill -- can't beat the price for the setup and location!
Great place, comfortable bed, no complaints.
A very nice place to stay
Great place to stay close to McGill and downtown area -- it's a big open room with a window and a nice living space, so you really can't beat the value!
Good location, well-situated!
Clean and very well-located apartment. Good stay

Nice and clean place close to town. Our main issue was that we did not get any keys for our room which felt quite unsafe since there are 4 other rooms in the apartment where unknown people lived. It was unpleasant to not be able to lock the door while sleeping or being out of the house. Also, we asked for the keys both via text and by calling the emergency number. We got the information that there were no keys for the room we were staying in. After checking out though, the host contacted me to ask where I put the keys. This is not a major problem but it is very unprofessional to not provide keys to guests and then later request them for the non-exciting keys.

The flat was lovely and very open. We were there during the hottest days of the year, and Carole had some fans set up - combined with the big windows throughout the apartment, it was perfect. There is a very cute porch outside with a cafe table and chairs - ideal for coffee in the morning. It's a pleasant 30 minute walk to the mountain/park in the center of the city, and just 10 minutes from several really great restaurants.
Lovely place, great location, extremely kind host. I would recommend this place without hesitation.

Very warm welcome, a wonderful encounter! We can exchange ideas on art and the surrounding environment, what a joy. The apartment is simply brilliant (very comfortable and inspiring at the same time thanks to its clever blend of old and contemporary design). A big thank you and bravo to our host!
It's a gorgeous space in a central location. Exactly as described and a great base to explore Montreal.

Very welcoming and friendly host. 
Pleasant neighborhood. Close to shops and La Fontaine park.

Carole has been very responsive to my request. I needed housing quickly and she responded a few minutes later. 

The apartment, ideally located, is very comfortable, clean, and modern. There is everything you need nearby for a pleasant stay: restaurants, shops, bars. For those visiting Canada by car, as was our case, there's a car rental place right next to the apartment, which allowed us to return the car before staying in Montreal. 

Don't hesitate to contact for an ideal stay in Montreal!
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.

Great stay in a clean, nice hip apartment in the plateau. Carole was a great host. There were many restaurants, coffee shops, and supermarkets nearby, as well as the park. I definitely recommend that place.

We had a great stay at Carole's place.  It is walkable to cafes, restaurants, and shopping in the Plateau neighborhood.

She was very accommodating and the apartment was clean, hip, and good value. It's a walk-up with several stairs, so be aware if you have mobility issues.
Great apartment, great host!
Very well decorated, pleasant to live in and perfectly located in Montreal.

Super nice accommodation with excellent bedding and spaciousness, located just 2 minutes walk from Parc La Fontaine (immense and magnificent), 5 minutes from the bus lines, 15 minutes from the metro, close to a bakery, supermarket, 24/7... The neighborhood is very quiet and hyper cool. We were 2 adults and 2 children (7 and 11 years old), it was perfect.

The apartment is in a great location - it's close to shops and restaurants, and there's also a grocery store nearby. The community felt very safe even at night. It was very easy to get around; we either walked or rode the bixi bikes everywhere. The apartment was clean, check-in was efficient, and Carole was very friendly. We had everything we needed and would definitely stay there again. We enjoyed sipping our morning coffee and people watching from the balcony:-)
Loved our stay. The place was clean and very convenient. Would definitely stay again!

Carole's condo is very well located on Mount Royal plateau. It's spacious, its street art/industrial decor was a big plus for us. There are two convenience stores nearby that are very useful. For larger shopping trips, you'll need to walk 500 meters down Mont Royal Avenue. You'll find everything there!
Carole took good care of it.
Very beautiful apartment well decorated and very clean. Carole is very accommodating.
The host cancelled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Comfortable apartment
Very well located to explore Montreal

Perfect apartment for visiting Montreal, very well located on the Plateau (bike and bus at the doorstep of the apartment) super neighborhood and decorated apartment with taste, spacious and well equipped... Perfect stay! We'll do it again!

Carole is welcoming, she's a super host who gave us good tips for sightseeing. 
The apartment was as we imagined, bright and furnished with simplicity and good taste in a very well-served neighborhood. 
A week in a big city seemed too long to us, so we rented a car and went to the Laurentians, absolutely beautiful and worth visiting because they're not far from Montreal.

Anita

Loved our stay here! It was very clean and the beds were all comfortable to sleep in. The balcony was our favorite spot to hang out while we were at home. Carole was so helpful on a couple of occasions when we needed her to be there to accept our lost luggage that was delivered. We didn’t really see her but she was there to help us any time we asked. Such a great space! We will definitely stay again. Bixi bikes are right outside the door and the metro is a short walk away.

A top-notch welcome, Carole is very friendly and helpful, her list of good addresses is very practical. The accommodation is convenient and beautifully decorated, we felt like home! It also appears larger in reality than in the photos. The accommodation is well located and we were able to get where we wanted thanks to the bus and metro. We had a wonderful stay and would definitely return with pleasure!

Superb apartment in a great location, with a fantastic decor and a spacious balcony. The neighborhood is quiet yet close to everything at the same time. Our hosts were responsive and super friendly. The only downside was the wifi which we had a lot of trouble connecting to, and once connected, the speed was slow. I recommend

A truly delightful moment,
The apartment is exactly as described. Beautifully furnished, very bright and very functional. Comfortable and well-equipped (and decorated!), it gives you the feeling of being a true Montrealer! The weather allowed us to have our breakfasts on the terrace, in the company of squirrels. Carole and her partner are absolutely charming hosts, available and attentive to your well-being. A must on Mount Royal plateau!
Carole's home was convenient and pleasant!  More than just the bare necessities, we were comfortable and our needs were met.

The perfect place to stay in Montreal, with a lovely apartment in a fantastic neighborhood of Montreal. 

We've stayed at Carol's place twice and will definitely return.

Pleasant and consistent with the description. 

We were well received by discreet and charming hosts.

A brand new apartment in downtown Montreal. Very stylish and very well presented. It was perfect for our 3-night stay. You can't beat the location and views. All communication with Johnny, check-in and check-out went very smoothly. Highly recommend.
Nice and clean place in a central location close to everything. Such a nice and helpful host. Highly recommended
This is a great apartment with a great view in a building with excellent facilities in a good part of town - everything you need! Very good communication with Johnny throughout.
Very clean and stylish place. Great location and close to grocery, Starbucks, and shopping street. Highly recommended.
nan
Easy communication, easy unit as described in the ad, a good stay!

Very comfortable and well-located. 
Thank you.

This is not a 3-bedroom condo. It's false advertising. The owner added a flimsy, cheap, small inflatable mattress (that might be okay for a toddler) which doesn't count as a bed. If it did, he could leave five more of these mattresses in his closet and call it a 7-bed rental! The owner refused to help us. He stopped responding to my calls and ignored my messages.  

I would only recommend renting this if you are max four people.

Johnny's place was AMAZING. The pictures don't even do it justice! My friends and I stayed here for one night and wished we could have stayed longer. We will definitely be back again! Minutes from nightlife on St. Catherine Street and Crescent Street. Absolutely perfect.
This place is worth the stay just for the view!

Jonny and Philip are amazing. 
They responded to me so quickly. 
Johnny's place is amazing, It's a world-class building in downtown. 
Clean and secured. 
I really recommend it for anyone who wants to visit Montreal, either for work or vacation. 
Definitely I will book it if I come back to Montreal again.

Dion is an excellent host, the place is super clean, and I will definitely return to stay on my next trip to Montreal.

Thanks again,
Karim
Dion's property is very clean, quiet, and safe. I recommend it for those who need such a place. Thanks, Dion!
Excellent value, the place is clean and the photos accurately depict it, Dion is very friendly and helpful. I decided to extend my stay at his place. Highly recommended!
Beautiful place, spacious room, very comfortable bed, friendly people. However, I was expecting to meet Dion, but it didn't happen, what a shame!
Cleanliness, quality and comfort. Quiet zone, perfect for relaxing.

Not awful, but you can find MUCH nicer places in Montreal for the same price. I found the place to be super noisy and it smelled like mothballs.
