Also, someone threw a brick through one of the windows in the middle of the night, so I woke up at 3 am to the sound of breaking glass and people yelling... I'm assuming this doesn't happen every night, but it might not be the safest neighborhood.

Dion is such a great host - flexible, kind and always happy to help! Thank you for your hospitality and for making our stay memorable! We will definitely be coming back.

Ana & Jacqueline

This place offers everything it claims. It's more like a hostel where you rent your private bedroom and many people share the common areas like the kitchen and bathrooms. The subway is about a 10-minute walk, but it can be harsh during the winter.
Excellent stay, contacted Dion last minute after finding that my flights were cancelled at the MTL airport, got an answer 5 min later. Thank you so much for your help
This place was a surprise. It was surprisingly spacious, comfortable, and the availability of parking was unbeatable.
I have previously booked at Dion's place and I like it because the rooms are comfortable and the location is convenient for me. I also had a pleasant stay there last weekend.

I spent 9 days in Dion's house. It was great! The rooms were exactly as they appeared in the pictures. Amenities were fully supplied. The bathrooms were clean. You may need to walk a bit if you are traveling by Metro though.

It's more of a guesthouse/hostel than a proper home. 

Pros: Very affordable, good value, the bedrooms and common areas were clean, quiet, and the bed was very comfortable. The host is also quick to respond. 

Cons: The bedroom is quite bright at night (curtains are not thick enough to block street lights and the door is made of glass). The men's bathroom was quite dirty. I used the women's one which was clean. They are individual bathrooms, so I didn't understand why they were separated by sex.
Isa and Jo are the perfect hosts! They have excellent advice, are calm and attentive. Their apartment is charming and ideally located. A must-stay!
Very nice apartment in an ideal location. Hosts very accommodating and welcoming.

Magnificent apartment beautifully decorated, very welcoming and well located. 

Very welcoming hosts
Thank you so much.
It was a great time to stay

Isabelle and Jonathan are friendly and accommodating hosts. Their beautiful and clean rooms come with thoughtful touches like schedule guides, guidebooks/brochures, and a list of neighborhood restaurants/cafe recommendations. We had a great time staying there.

Very nice apartment, centrally located (metro station just a few minutes' walk away), friendly hosts. 

The room was tidy, clean, and had enough space for a short stay in the city.

Isabelle and Jonathan have a wonderful place in the heart of the Plateau. The room was clean and comfortable with thoughtful touches like local maps and an information sheet upon check-in. Would definitely stay again—wonderful hosts in a wonderful city!

We had a wonderful time staying at Isabella's house. Isabella has a very nice and well-decorated home. It is also very conveniently located. There are many great attractions in the neighborhood! A clean and spacious room. We will definitely be back next year!

Well-located condo, near the Metro, shops and good restaurants. Immaculate cleanliness. The room, but especially the warm welcome from Isabelle and Jonathan, who are good advice and very friendly, made my stay very pleasant. I would go back there as soon as the opportunity arises :)

Isabelle and Jonathan are very welcoming. They have good advice on the city and good addresses in the surrounding area of their apartment. The location is perfect, within a few minutes' walk of the metro and in a lively neighborhood, a short distance from Mount Royal. The apartment is very pleasant and the bedroom very comfortable. A very successful weekend for us, we recommend them highly.

Isabelle and Jonathan were fantastic hosts! They had great communication from day one, and made us feel right at home. The location is on a residential/quiet street, but right in the heart of everything - a 5-minute walk to the metro, bars, restaurants, etc. Their space is lovely, and they have a really beautiful home. I would highly recommend them to anyone visiting Montreal!

Pleasant apartment, well-located to discover Montreal. Immaculate cleanliness. Isabelle is a very friendly host (full of tips on nearby cafes, bars and restaurants) the communication for entry and exit was very easy. I highly recommend without hesitation!
Very comfortable, very clean and meeting our expectations.
We had an amazing time at Isabelle's and Jonathan's lovely home. It was gorgeous and pristine, and in a great location. Highly recommend.

Isabelle's department is in one of the best areas of Montreal, close to many restaurants, bars and iconic landmarks like Mount Royal. 
Isabelle is an excellent host, she will give you plenty of recommendations for places to visit and places to eat for all tastes. The apartment is very clean and stylish. Without a doubt, if I were to return to Montreal, I would stay here again.
We had a very good stay at Isabelle and Jo's! They were very welcoming and available, their apartment is ideally located, I recommend it :)

My stay at Isabelle and Jonathan's apartment was fantastic — incredibly clean and comfortable, quiet (despite being right off of a main thoroughfare), and central to anything you'd need on the Plateau. Great communication, easy check-in and -out, and lovely people who gave many food/drink/activity recommendations and went out of their way to meet my needs. Highly recommend!

Isabelle and Jonathan were incredible hosts. In addition to having a house with an excellent location, close to restaurants and bars, and a 5-minute walk to the nearest subway station. The house is beautiful, very comfortable, and we even parked our rented car in front of the house without paying a cent. They weren't there at the time of arrival but we were able to easily coordinate entry into the house.

I came for a long stay. The apartment is ideal, right in the heart of Plateau, quiet, everything is done to feel good and Isabelle and her friend's welcome is top-notch! Thank you both. I highly recommend it and I will definitely come back!

Isabelle and John are great! The house is very clean, the room is nicely decorated, and the bed is really comfortable. We are very happy that we chose this place. They welcomed us with certain recommendations for places to visit as well as good tips for restaurants in the area. We would definitely repeat our stay if we came back to Montreal!
A beautiful, clean, and private space in the heart of the Plateau.

My partner and I had an excellent stay at Isabelle's apartment. The location is wonderful and the place was very clean and comfortable. There were lots of nice little touches throughout as well. One of the best experiences we've had on Airbnb!

The apartment was really nice, particularly clean and well-located (restaurants, bars, and metro nearby). Key collection was done via a key box which made our arrival easy (same for departure). We had a very good stay and highly recommend this Airbnb (comfortable bed, spacious room, tea available). Isabelle also sells maple syrup (homemade) at a lower cost. Jonathan and she are discreet and very friendly. They even share their best addresses in a small booklet written specifically for their guests.

Super host and super peaceful location to stop for a few days and discover Montreal. Isabelle gives good tips and it is very pleasant to exchange with her about Canada. Great deal regarding the maple syrup from her dad :) We recommend it with closed eyes.

We appreciated our stay at Isabelle's!
Comfortable room in a lovely apartment, perfectly located to discover the city.
Thank you for your hospitality and advice!

We had a truly wonderful stay. We were very well received by Isabelle and Jonathan, who are delightful hosts. The apartment itself is in a great location, very clean and beautifully decorated. The room was just as comfortable, and we highly recommend this room and would be happy to return!

Very beautiful apartment ideally located! 
Isabelle and Jonathan are adorable and offered us a unique welcome!
The room is beautifully decorated and very comfortable :-) we recommend this room!

The location of this apartment cannot be beat. It is in one of the prettiest/coolest neighborhoods with tons of shopping and restaurants a short walk away. Isabelle and Jonathan were very kind and provided maps and helpful tips for where to go. They were also very responsive when I called with questions. The only thing I would caution is that they wake up early, so you want to be quiet at night (but it's ok to stay out late). I would definitely stay here again!

Extremely clean and tidy place with warmth of thoughtful touch in every corner. The hosts are very helpful with any need we have with their welcoming packet. 
The property itself has one of the quietest rooms I've ever slept in. However, there are several fantastic music venues/nightclubs, cafes, and restaurants within a 5-minute walk. 
Highly highly recommend!
Isabelle is a good host. She gave me a lot of suggestions for Montreal. Especially, the Japanese restaurant was very delicious; my wife loves it so much.

We spent a couple of nights at Isabelle's place and we loved it! We loved the house and every single detail of it, perfectly clean and well located. We didn't have much chance to speak with Isabelle but it was enough to understand how nice she is. Definitely recommended!

Very cozy room, well located and the owners are really friendly! 
I can't find anything wrong with this Airbnb. Wifi is good, they have a nice shower, the bed is cozy, there wasn't any noise at night... Those are the things that were important to us.

A very pleasant stay, with attentive and kind hosts. The accommodation is very well located. 
We recommend this accommodation without reservation!!!
Amazing hosts, very easygoing, would definitely recommend it to anyone! :)

Isabelle's place is magical. It feels like a home that people care deeply about. There are all kinds of nice little touches (pieces of art, plants, jars of beans, etc.) everywhere, without the place feeling cluttered. It inspires me to make my own home nicer. Oh, and Isabelle is a gracious host. Highly recommend.

Isabelle and Jonathan are very nice! They provided us with useful addresses for visiting Montreal. The accommodation is very well located. The room is spotless and decorated tastefully! We highly recommend it without hesitation ;)

Isabelle and Jonathan's place is located in the beautiful French neighborhood of Montreal and was the perfect spot to spend a few nights. They gave me a list of great local cafes, bakeries, and bars to check out, as well as where to get classic poutine and smoked meat. Their home is very stylish and clean – I would definitely stay again!
It doesn't get better.

Our stay was great - location is perfect and the place is super clean and organized. 
100% recommended!

Isabelle's place offered the perfect accommodation while I was conducting business in the city. The plateau location is the perfect combination of a lively, fun neighborhood during the day, and a quiet place to rest at night. Both Jonathan and Isabelle were extremely welcoming hosts, and everything exceeded my expectations.

We have been very happy staying at Isabelle and Jo's accommodation, the house is very comfortable and welcoming, they took care of all the details, excellent cleanliness, they were very attentive and gave us some directions to move around there. We recommend it 100%.

Isabelle and Jonathan were very welcoming, nothing to complain about! The directions given were very precise. The apartment was decorated tastefully and we found it impeccably clean. The suggestions for nearby good addresses are a real plus that is highly appreciated. 

We recommend!
Very nice and well-located flat. Convenient to Montreal's downtown attractions. Isabelle and Jonathan were very kind and helpful with lots of tips about our visit
Fantastic little place, perfectly walkable to a number of great spots in the area. The living space was very comfortable and communication with the host was quick and easy. They were very kind hosts!

The apartment is really nice, clean, and well-located. It's close to bars and trendy streets, as well as Metro lines and tourist areas. You might even feel like a Montrealer. I really enjoyed my stay.
Great place in a great area! Would recommend

Superb location at the home of wonderful hosts. We loved the possibility of arriving earlier, the impeccable cleanliness of this charming little apartment, Isabelle's availability for rich exchanges, her open-mindedness, adventurous spirit, the provision of the kitchen, and the exceptional location of the apartment in a super neighborhood.  We would have stayed longer, to be honest! Thank you so much!

Wonderful couple, great house with ample space and a prime location. The house matched the photos exactly, and we greatly enjoyed our stay there. Isabelle was incredibly helpful and went above and beyond to accommodate our travel needs. Thank you both so much!
A wonderful stay! With good advice and a tastefully decorated apartment!
Amazing house in a fantastic location with wonderful hosts!
Excellent place, lovely couple and they were very friendly.
Excellent!!
A very homey experience! It truly feels like you are staying at a friend's house in this listing. We felt right at home and enjoyed our time here.
Perfect for a couple visiting family in Outremont.

My husband and I stayed a total of 16 nights in Andrée's 4-room cozy and well-furnished apartment. We literally had a home away from home — breakfast on the balcony, cooking our own dinners and even having guests, helping ourselves to Andrée's amazing collection of spices, getting to know the staff at nearby Young's grocery, curling up in front of the TV, sleeping in late in the quiet, comfortable bedroom, and even trick-or-treating on Halloween since this is a residential neighborhood. Andrée's den/office was so practical that my husband actually worked too much most days, but then I could get out and shop and visit Outremont's many beautiful parks with our daughter and new baby grandson. We pushed the stroller up to the top of Mont Royal a couple times too. I loved the proximity of Mile End and Plateau. We walked there easily (coming back by Uber). To go downtown we used the metro, a 10-minute walk away. Now whenever we visit our daughter who lives in Outremont, we'll hope Andrée's very affordable place is available!

Apartment style, fully equipped for a long stay, well located in the Outremont neighborhood, bus stops within 5 minutes, metro within 10-15 minutes. I thank Andrée again for her hospitality and availability. I recommend.

Andrée is a very welcoming, hospitable, and accommodating person. My wife and I spent 4 days in her apartment and had a good time. The apartment is clean, sunny, and well-equipped. A place that I recommend to everyone. You won't be disappointed!
The host cancelled this reservation 67 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

I had the pleasure of staying at Andrée's place for a week and I highly recommend it. Andrée was such an excellent, attentive host. Once I arrived, she took the time to show me her house and provide tips on places and events. The kitchen is stocked with pots, pans, and dishes so I had everything I needed to cook my meals. She also made sure everything was fine during my stay. I needed an iron board and iron for a business meeting and she gladly made them available. I really enjoyed staying in a traditional French residential neighborhood with several options of groceries, restaurants, and shops. The apartment is well located, close to the Outremont blue line station that takes you downtown in thirty minutes. It is also relatively easy to come from/go to the airport (about $30 Uber trip). The apartment has paid laundry (four loonies) in the building basement so it was a perk not to leave the building. Unfortunately, I came during the winter so the days were cloudy, snowy, and gray so I didn’t have the chance to see the greenery Montréal is famous for. The city wasn't quiet, though. Montréal en Lumière was taking place on Avenue Sainte Catherine during the weekend so I was able to check out a famous city festival. I’ll definitely be back in the summer.

Andrée is a wonderful host and the apartment is spacious, clean, friendly and very practical. We spent 6 days there. The metro and shops are nearby. I recommend this apartment without reservation! Looking forward to going back :)
This is a great place to stay, very nice, clean, and conveniently located near major attractions such as the gay village and Museum of Fine Arts. Andrée was very kind and helpful.
Location very well situated to discover Montreal. Apartment very sunny and pleasant.

Super apartment close to the metro and easy to access, very clean and spacious apartment, comfortable bed, the terrace facing calm is very pleasant, Andrée gave us a great welcome and we had several attentions towards us. Top stay!
Well-located apartment near the metro and Mount Royal. Andrée is very accommodating and a perfect host. Everything was as expected and we had no unpleasant surprises. Good work

I had a great stay at Andree's place. The flat is spacious and well laid out. I had a presentation to write and found that the balcony surrounded by pine tree branches was a perfect place for that (though Andree also has a nice office).  The neighborhood is great: quiet tree-lined streets with brownstone houses (some villas around Outremont park are particularly beautiful), and excellent cafes and restaurants within walking distance. The metro is just under 10 minutes walk, and so is Dax cafe for a morning espresso with pastry. I went to a conference at the HEC Montreal, and it was 20 minutes door-to-door. Andree herself is lovely and welcoming.  I've been to quite a lot of Airbnbs, and this is one of the best.

Very beautiful neighborhood, close to a metro station and the very pretty Bernard Street. Two lovely terraces, ideal for relaxation in the evening. Excellent communication before and during the stay. Thank you, Andrée!

Friendly and convivial welcome by Andrée. Her apartment is spacious, bright and very well equipped with a pleasant terrace where you can enjoy your breakfast and meals in peace. The small grocery stores are within walking distance and public transport is also very close by. 

Andrée's apartment is undoubtedly an excellent address for a stay in Montreal. Thank you again Andrée for your warm welcome.
Lovely place with everything you need and a charming balcony. Andree let us in and took her time to explain where everything was. Highly recommended.
Translation:  "Wonderful stay at Andrée's place. Very warm and friendly. I highly recommend her apartment!"

The worst part of the experience was visiting Montreal after a drive of over seven hours from the states. The host complained about our late arrival and was unhappy about our early departure. I had asked about late arrivals before booking, but she still invited me to book this place. After the late arrival happened, I apologized repeatedly, but she continued complaining to us and even blamed us for our early departure... She said this ruined her weekend plans.  I mean, if you have plans for the weekend, why invite us to book your room? Why even list availability on Airbnb? We were not staying at your place for free; we paid to stay, but we did not feel welcomed at all. It felt like we had done something wrong just by staying at her place. Also, be aware of flying spiders. 2 stars for the cozy bed
You will enjoy your stay at Andrée's. The hospitality, the cleanliness of the place, and the host's attentiveness are all factors that will make you feel comfortable.

Andrée was an incredible hostess. She showed me around her home personally and made sure to explain where everything was. 
The unit is in great shape, but the building is fairly old. The water pressure wasn't the best in the bathroom and the unit isn't exactly downtown. 
Those are the only things about the unit that weren't great, because everything else was perfect! It's a very rustic place that's very well kept. I felt very comfortable there, and there was a sweet, homey feel to it. I would definitely recommend staying there if you're willing to walk or commute to downtown. 
Otherwise, the area itself has many great things to offer! Andrée is also a great hostess. She answered any questions I had almost instantly.

Amazing welcome, amazing equipment, amazing location, amazing everything! 
Thank you again!
Beautiful housing located in a beautiful residential neighborhood. Superb welcome!
Andrée is very welcoming and her apartment is warm and comfortable. I had a wonderful stay.
Great Value!

We had an impeccable welcome from René. Everything was up to our expectations. We highly recommend this accommodation where you can stay comfortably. We received excellent personalized service from the owner and we highly recommend this address.
What a great place! Perfect for a large group or family. Very stylish and well laid out, and Naomi and Rene are phenomenal and thoughtful hosts. Highly recommend it!

This exquisite five-star three-story condo apartment was ideally located nearby the national tennis center (Uniprix Stadium), where our tennis team lodged for four days during their tennis camp. This condo unit is ideal for large families or sports teams, or those wanting to have spacious living space. Thank you, Rene, for your warm hospitality.

Thanks to René and Naima, I rented their place for a small photoshoot and everything was awesome, clean and well representative of the picture.

I would definitely recommend their house for a weekend, long stay or small commercial production.

This space is absolutely great for a friend's getaway! Rene's place is beautifully decorated, spacious and very clean. They were extremely accommodating when three of our friends had a late flight. They let them stay past check-out until they had to leave for their flight which was really nice! I would highly recommend this place!

Rene met me there upon arrival. He was very detailed yet brief in his tour of the place. He suggested a couple restaurants in the area and gave me great tips on ski mountains as well. Naomi was extremely helpful throughout the duration of the trip too. She got back to me instantly any time I reached out to her. The place was absolutely perfect for our bachelor party extravaganza in Montreal. It was even nicer than the pictures. I would recommend this place 100 times over!
Easy going and flexible. We had to move quickly and our hosts were quick to give us access. The place is beautiful and is exactly as advertised.
Great House!

All of our guests really enjoyed the place. It was beautiful and very clean. It was also very well-located. I highly recommend it! The only downside was that the bunk beds were slightly uncomfortable. Overall, it was an amazing experience!
The place was amazing and exceeded our expectations! Our host was so helpful, generous and kind :)

Renee and Naima have a lovely house! It was exactly what I had hoped it would be in a great location. They were easy to communicate with and the house has everything you could possibly need for a vacation in Canada. I highly recommend staying at their place!
Rene's home was amazing. It is close to the metro and a quick Uber ride downtown. The place was spacious, modern and stylish. Highly recommend for large groups.

This place is awesome. We stayed here with a large group and there was plenty of room for all of us. The place was super clean and very comfortable. Also, a 2-minute walk to the metro. Bike sharing station across the street from the apartment. Would definitely stay here again.

Rene's townhome is perfect for large groups. It is spacious, clean, and well-appointed with great comforting touches in a modern and functional space. The hosts were quick to respond to our questions and provided helpful tips/suggestions to help make our stay even better. We would recommend this place and these hosts for any group visiting Montreal!

We absolutely loved our time here! The layout is incredible and couldn't be better for groups and celebrations - everything was sparkling clean, stylish and the ROOFTOP DECK IS THE BEST!!

Perfect accommodations and always timely responses... it doesn’t get any better! :)

Had an amazing stay! René was very accommodating, quick to answer, and overall a great host. The place is great for a big group, near some nice shops, and a quick Uber ride away from any part of the city. Definitely would recommend if staying in Montreal.
Love the place!!! The host were absolutely unbelievable and very responsive. We are coming back!

R & N were such gracious hosts! Their home was modern, stylish, and very cozy. We made great use of the outdoor patio area on the third floor. Very spacious and great for large groups - we slept 12 without a problem. Thanks again to you both for a weekend we will never forget!

Rene's place was perfect for our group of six. There were plenty of places to sleep, a really clean and spacious apartment, and it was located in a nice neighborhood with a short walk to the metro. Highly recommended!

René and Naima are wonderful hosts! René met us at check-in and gave us a tour of the house. We felt so comfortable and relaxed here. I asked René about things to do in Montreal, and he asked Naima to email a list. So helpful! The neighborhood is so welcoming. We went to 5 restaurants within walking distance, and the staff were helpful and warm to these non-French-speaking visitors! We enjoyed our stay so much; we hope to return soon to explore more of Montreal and this awesome neighborhood! On our trip to Canada, this was the best place we stayed! Merci!

Very nice house in a great location—as long as you don't mind riding the metro...which by the way is extremely efficient, safe, and clean. We liked being in a real neighborhood. Stores and restaurants nearby had everything we needed. Naima and Rene were very responsive hosts.
This place was wonderful for myself and six friends. We loved the access to the metro and the house was amazing. Naomi was awesome and we loved our time.
Pleasant accommodation with a nice decoration and well-equipped. Parking is available nearby.

A wonderful experience from start to finish. René personally welcomed us in a very warm manner. The accommodation is modern, very clean, decorated with taste. The metro is 5 minutes away on foot. All amenities are close by the accommodation. 

You can go to René with your eyes closed, you will not regret it!

I can't get over how amazing our stay here was.  A group of girl friends and I came for a weekend trip and we were blown away by this space. It was so clean and stylish, with everything we could have needed. We were within walking distance to the metro station and nearby restaurants. The beds were so comfortable. Honestly, we didn't want to go home.

We had a wonderful 3-night stay in this stylish townhouse. Communication with the hosts before and during our stay was perfect and prompt! We ran late due to traffic and they patiently waited for us and were very nice and welcoming! The house was perfectly clean and beautifully decorated. Very large for being in the city! Awesome modern bathrooms. The location is perfect - near the subway station and lots of fun spots! The rooftop patio is awesome and they have a foosball table, TVs, and offered some great suggestions of things to check out! Lots of towels, comfy beds and couch, the home is literally perfect! The kitchen is really well-furnished! Keypad to the front door is super convenient - no risk of losing keys! We had a wonderful time and most likely will be back on a future visit to Montreal!

Wow! Wow! Wow!....I think this says it all. Beautiful apartment with all amenities included. Located in a nice and quiet area. Walking distance to convenience stores, restaurants in the area, and the metro (super convenient, easy to commute and cheap). The hosts were excellent in receiving us and explaining every detail, even giving us suggestions for places to visit. Definitely will use this Airbnb for my next visit to Montreal and will recommend it as well.

The house is as shown in the photos, it's brand new and perfectly clean with a very nice decor. 

Despite our late arrival after 10pm, we were perfectly welcomed by Rene and Naïma!

The relaxed atmosphere of the residential neighborhood was a welcome change after a day in the city.

The terrace is also great, so we will definitely come back again!
Perfectly equipped and clean apartment. Perfect for a family stay with children. Decorated tastefully. Highly recommended without any hesitation.
My friends and I had a great stay at René's place. It was everything the pictures showed and more.

We were a group of 9 and had a great time!  Probably more ideal for 8 or so people, but was doable with the 9 of us. The location is far from downtown, but there are easy ways to get there. We would definitely stay here again. The hosts were fantastic with providing help and information.

Naima was an amazing host and the house was sparkling clean in a cute, family-friendly neighborhood. I loved walking down the street and seeing all the different staircases and doors. The space was modern and beautiful as in the pictures. We enjoyed our stay and highly recommend anyone to book with them. We will definitely stay there again when we visit Montreal again.

Rene and Naima's home is a modern, beautifully appointed place that we highly recommend! There's plenty of room for all our family, a magnificent kitchen (with a Nespresso coffee machine) and bathrooms, and lots of space for relaxation. A couple of minutes walk to the subway which will have you in downtown in about 12 minutes. Small cafes, convenience stores are very close by, and you can walk to numerous restaurants and pubs. Our hosts met us as planned and even reserved a parking spot out front. We highly recommend this Airbnb for your stay in the beautiful city of Montreal

Amazing modern and spacious place. Location is in a safe neighborhood, takes about 20 minutes to downtown. There is a small game room and lounge on the third floor. The patio deck is amazing, great for hanging out with friends. The kitchen has everything you need and it has a huge island and dining table. Bathrooms are modern and clean. Great for big groups.

Clean modern space! We loved drinking coffee on the rooftop terrace in the morning. Perfect place for our group of 7 people. Close to the metro, shops, restaurants, and also was nice to have a Costco close by so we could load up on drinks and snacks. We would definitely stay again!
Beautiful place. Very clean and very modern-chic. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone. Also, the hosts are super pleasant and helpful.
Great place, 5-minute walk from the metro. Very fun for a large group.
Great space in a fantastic location. Eight ladies had plenty of room, and the rooftop terrace was a perfect spot for cocktails. Very clean and it had everything you needed for a weekend in Montreal.
Beautiful home - amazing hospitality!! If you're looking for a place to book in Montreal, look no further!!

Myself and 5 other ladies stayed at Rene's for a girls weekend. Rene's property is in a nice safe neighborhood with easy access to stores, transit & restaurants. It's a bit of a distance from downtown area, but not too far in an Uber.

The condo itself is beautiful! Very clean, the kitchen was fully equipped and perfect for entertaining our group. I would highly recommend Rene's condo!

René and Naima are outstanding hosts! They were very hospitable and we had excellent communication with them because they responded very quickly. They met us upon our arrival and gave us tips on where to go. The house is beautiful and exceeded our expectations! Everything was clean, everything was neat and tidy. They also had basic supplies ready for us, and they also have a Netflix membership! Our trip was indeed too short and we hope we can go back again!

Renee and Naima's home is beautiful and exactly as the listing suggested. Everything we could have needed was provided. Communication was responded to promptly and pleasantly. We had a great stay and hope to return again.

René and Naima's place exceeded our expectations. It accommodated 9 girls for our trip to Montreal. Every room was clean and well decorated. There were more than enough towels and beds for every girl. René and Naima were also very sweet and made check-in super easy, especially since we arrived after midnight. They recommended a few places for us to check out and responded quickly to our questions. They even let us know that they had found one of our girls' keys and made the time to send it back. This place deserves more than 5 stars and I highly recommend! Thank you René and Naima!

The apartment is perfectly located in a very lively neighborhood and is close to the metro, which allows you to reach the city center very quickly. The decor is very nice and the equipment is perfect! Rene and Naima are very attentive hosts who do everything they can to ensure that your stay goes well. We had a wonderful family week and we will definitely return to them with great pleasure on our next trip to Montreal. I can only recommend this place for visiting this city.

This home is super comfortable for a large group and we were beyond comfortable. The kitchen is well stocked with coffee, pots, pans, a toaster, blender, etc. The house is a 5 minute walk from the Metro which is also perfect. Parking is a bit tricky, but even with street construction we made it work for our 3 vehicles. Beds are super comfy too!!

The host went above and beyond. This home has been recently updated, and you will notice the small details. The bathrooms had heated floors!!! René made excellent recommendations in the surrounding neighborhood and further afield. She provided us with a map highlighting key points. Definitely worth the stay and we'll be back.
You will love this home, it is spacious, clean, and the hosts are wonderful!
Thanks Rene for a great stay, beautifully appointed apartment, great location and very responsive and helpful host. Another great Airbnb experience
Every recommendation!

We were very well received by our host upon arrival and he ensured everything went smoothly throughout our stay. It is easy to communicate with him and he is very available.  

The condo is located in a quiet neighborhood near the Jarry Metro, making it easy to get around Montreal. The photos of the listing accurately represent the renovated property which is modern and up-to-date. Modern, fully equipped, and extremely clean, I would happily stay with René again during my next trip to the metropolis. 

*Please note that there are 8 sleeping places in the beds, so if you have more than 8 travelers, you will need to use the sofa beds.

The place was great!!! The host, however, was HORRIBLE.

This guy is currently trying to scam $1000+ dollars for damages we didn't cause after kicking us out.

This Airbnb was great. Thanks to Naima, who I primarily dealt with. Everything went smoothly and their place is amazing—really modern and as good as it looks in the pictures. There's also a great breakfast spot just around the corner, only a 3-minute walk that Naima recommended. It's definitely worth trying!

The only thing we had a small issue with was finding parking, but I believe that it was mainly because of the snow and we arrived in the evening. There are plenty of free areas to park around; just need to get a spot. 

Overall, this place was exactly what we wanted and everything was great! 

Thanks again!
Amazing place for small groups

Rene & Naima's place was perfect for our group of 4. They met us at the Airbnb upon arrival and had saved a parking spot on the street for us, which was very considerate. They provided a tour of their place and gave us some helpful tips on nearby restaurants, grocery stores, locations of the metro, etc. They were extremely kind and helpful throughout the entire experience. Always responding quickly to questions and even offering us a late checkout on our final day.

The space itself is amazing and I found the pictures did not do it justice. It truly felt much bigger in person and for 4 people it was plenty of space. It was exceptionally clean and had all amenities you would need. It is within walking distance (5-10 mins) from the metro station, pubs/breweries, restaurants, a small grocery store, and an amazing butcher shop. I would highly recommend booking their place if you are in the area!

The house was gorgeous, modern and clean with so many nice details. The shower heads were incredible, there was shampoo and conditioner, plenty of towels and pillows, comfortable beds and blankets. It was a great experience. We were a group of 8 and everyone was comfortable and loved the space. The hosts helped suggest things to do prior to the trip and even helped answer questions during and after the trip. They were very quick to respond. There were restaurants within walking distance and it was a reasonable Uber ride to many of the cities popular attractions. We hope to go back during the summer!

The location is perfect and her roommates too, but the room was not clean and everything smelled like smoke. If you know that you have an allergy to smoke, then this place is not for you. Also, I advise you not to use the balcony table to avoid surprises. Finally, you may want to be very careful about the accessories in the bathroom as they are very old and could break easily.
Emeline was a wonderful host. We did not meet but everything worked perfectly. Her place is in a perfect location for exploring Montreal.
Apartment very well located
Cozy apartment! Clean and comfortable. Fully functional kitchen. Just missing a few chairs in the kitchen. Otherwise, it's been a pleasant stay!
Very very good appearance! I recommend it 100%!
Great place. Clean and beautiful, very modern. It felt like a hotel.

Definitely my favorite hosts in Montreal. The room is basic but comfortable and I slept like a baby. Dan and his son Eliah have been fantastic hosts, the house is super clean. Interesting and passionate hosts if you have interests in 3D animation. Thanks Dan!

My stay at the Pierce Hotel was perfect. The apartment was clean, fully furnished with all amenities required for a pleasant stay. Good communication, I will return to this place for my next seminary in Montreal.
This Airbnb was as advertised. Everything was very clean, and the host responded quickly to any inquiries we had during our stay in Montreal. I would definitely stay here again on my next trip!
Translation: 10/10 just like the pictures! Very clean, very stylish, quick responses! Would definitely go again
It was a really good location. Pictures don't do the space justice and the host was quick with responses and provided everything you needed.
I highly recommend this very classy, well-located and intimate and secure place.
I recommend this location!

Getting this place again at the end of February was really happy! Super clean and loved the decor. Only issue I had was the cleaning person forgot the bigger towels in the washing machine and I was drying myself up after the shower with the smaller ones. I only found them inside the washing machine on my last day... I only stayed there for 3 nights but it was still pretty disappointing. Still giving them a 5. Just be careful, if you can't find any towels to shower with, they're most likely in the washing machine.
Very good!
It's an amazing place located right in downtown, close to all the restaurants, transportation, and entertainment options!
This was probably one of the best Airbnbs I've ever stayed at. Amazing unit, nicely styled. 100% accurate to the photos and very nice touches to the place. Would definitely stay again!

Identical to pictures! Don't be alarmed by the exterior of the building; it's not aesthetically pleasing, but the apartment itself is perfect! 
Modern and clean. Comfortable bed with a relatively well-stocked kitchen. I highly recommend it
Great location, very clean. Would stay here again.

This was a clean, well-maintained, stylish unit located in the heart of Montreal. Great restaurants within blocks, high-end shopping around the corner, close to the Art Museum. Great value. Cozy with all the amenities to make a long or short stay comfortable. Highly recommended!

Conventional location, well-designed and decorated space. Really felt comfortable with a lot of the trappings of a boutique hotel but the convenience of home. Would return again. Self-check-in was flawless.

A fantastic stay! A spacious, well-equipped flat with all the necessary amenities. Very secure and clean. Communication was clear with several follow-up emails regarding self-check-in. Exceeded expectations and would definitely stay again.
The best mattress I've ever tried!
Cute place. Great, convenient location. Hosts were very communicative. Would definitely recommend.

Great place to stay. Clean, very stylish and well thought out. Comfortable and large king-size bed. It was steps away (~90m) from Guy-Concordia (green) subway line, which was extremely convenient. We bought a $13.50 bus-subway pass valid for the entire weekend at the airport and took the 747 bus to/from the airport. We were able to go to Atwater market, Bota Bota spa, walked around beautiful Old Port, Chinatown, downtown Montreal, Le Banquise for poutine and back to the airport with this $13.50 pass. Just be careful not to lose it; it's a paper pass. We also went to Adonis (8 min walk from the place) for extra food to go along with the microgreens we bought at the market. We will definitely be back.

The place is downtown Montreal, and close to everything. It is as shown on the website, clean and well furnished. The information was clear and accurate.

The host was very communicative and answered our questions when needed. 

We enjoyed our stay in this lovely place.

Thank you
Great place to stay. Very close to many of the bars and other attractions in Montreal. I would recommend parking at Concordia University. It's underground and a block away.
Great place for a quick weekend getaway, right in the heart of the city and close to all the action.
Great value, exactly as advertised.

Our stay with Carlito was good overall. The apartment is affordable and well-located. The neighborhood is quiet. A minor drawback for the kitchen, which is very poorly equipped, making it quite difficult to cook. 

Good stay overall! 😊
Beautiful apartment in a nice neighborhood. Clean
Great area in the University section of Montreal, walkable to everything.

Carl's place is in an older, unrenovated high-rise, but the apartment is tidy and spacious as the photos show, and Carl is constantly adding improvements. The bed is new and the sheets are fresh. My husband and I wanted to stay near McGill University and this was a great budget option. The metro was only a 5-minute walk away, and the Plateau is a few miles walk each way. The kitchen has a toaster and electric kettle. If you want to cook hot meals, you would have to bring all the basics, like cooking oil and salt and pepper, but...

I really liked how close the apartment was to cute coffee shops, and it's right next door to an excellent little vegetarian restaurant and a small used bookshop. Check-in was super easy and flexible to meet my needs. Carl was always ready to help when I had any questions, and his hospitality is among the best I have received from an Airbnb host. Thanks, Carl!

I was so grateful to be able to book Carl's apartment on the day I arrived in Montreal after my previous plan fell apart.  Carl responded very quickly and made it possible for me to get to the apartment with no delay. The building is older, but the apartment itself is warm and cozy.  The bed was comfortable, and the living room very pleasant.  I did not really cook during my stay there, but I could have, as there was everything needed. Carl provided me with breakfast essentials (tea, instant coffee, and even Nutella), which was so nice. The location is perfect, especially if you want to visit McGill University. You can walk to so many places, the location is central. I will stay there again if the place is available when I come back to Montreal.
Great host, the location is a 7-minute walk to the grocery store. There are many bars nearby, all within walking distance of the strip and everything you might need.
This place is for people who need a place to sleep and get going.  A pretty decent location, the complimentary parking spot was helpful.

Great host and very responsive. The apartment is in a fairly central location in Montreal near plenty of restaurants, cafes, and other shops. Quite accessible by public transport. Carl was responsive regarding any issues we had. Spacious and sunny living room.  The apartment is ideal if you want to cook for yourself. Highly recommended.

Carl's place is located in the residential area of McGill. It's a good location, especially considering the price. The place itself isn't fancy, but it gets the job done. Our only real complaint is that the unit is quite cold and the heating didn't work properly - which made our winter stay somewhat difficult. However overall, Carl was an excellent host who made check-in and check-out very easy, and we would recommend this place to anyone traveling on a budget, as long as they don't mind that the place is a little worn down.
Great host and available for any accommodations you might need! Definitely staying again!
The location of the apartment is absolutely ideal. The apartment itself is perfect, meeting exactly our travel needs. Carl is incredibly friendly and always available.
Communicates quickly! Easy check-in and check-out. Loved the decor of the place. Very kind host. Great location.
Great location, cozy!

The location is amazing! It's close to everything and very easy to get to and from. The unit itself is charming and perfect for a weekend getaway exploring the area. Carl was incredibly helpful and responsive, getting back to us within minutes and going above and beyond to ensure we had a good trip. We would definitely stay here again.

We really enjoyed staying at **here** for a week! The place is newly renovated with great furniture. The location is very convenient. A one-minute walk to McGill campus and a five-minute walk to Av Du Parc.  I would like to visit this place again if I have a chance!
Provided the wrong WiFi network/password on the page, eventually found on the back of the router and that's why Chromecast wouldn't work! Everything else was great!!!!
Close to everything. Montreal was very walkable overall. Friendly host. Check-in process was also easy. Only complaint was leftover hair on linens.
We had a great stay at Carl's place. It's a wonderful location, quiet building, plus a pool and parking. Very clean apartment. Responses were quick and helpful.
Great location, right near the metro station/McGill/downtown. Carl is a great host, very responsive, super informative and provides great restaurant recommendations. Highly recommend staying here!
Carl's place has a great location and was really nice and clean inside. Carl was quick to reply if we had any questions as well.

The place was the same in the picture, it's hard to find a parking spot around the area, it took us 30-45 minutes before we found one because it's downtown Montreal. There were some garbage cans on the porch but we didn't mind because we weren't using them. It turned us off when the host asked for an additional $50 cleaning fee because the cleaning service told him that we left the space "really messy." A few cups of Tim Hortons were left on the table because the bins were too small, which created the mess, and it wasn't worth $50 to pick them up. Disappointed with our stay.

Convenient location, clean, great value, and great hosts! If you care about water pressure and temperature like I do, you will love this place. Better water pressure than my own house and so quick to get hot water!!! Carl and his co-host were very attentive and were ready to make our stay as comfortable as possible. The apartment is in a university area so it’s lively and there are many great eateries nearby. Subway and buses are very close too, but if you like walking you can walk to Old Montreal in 20 minutes while enjoying the scenic old streets and getting good coffee and sweets on your way. The wifi signal was a bit weak but the hosts were aware of it and tried to fix the issue. Overall I recommend this place to everyone!
Perfect real-time exchange on the website... Carl kept our luggage for us on the last day, a big plus when you have your flight at the beginning of the evening. Perfect location to visit Montreal
It's just as the pictures show! And he is very helpful!
I recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Montreal!
Carl was very helpful and friendly, the apartment was as expected. Thank you!

Excellent location and friendly host who is accommodating. It is very close to everything, but the place desperately needs some deep cleaning because the first thing that greets a guest is a stale food smell that won't go away. The kitchen in general, including utensils, was downright dirty. Not bad, but not a five-star residence.
Tarek's place is very well located and close to everything you want to see in Montreal. Tarek was very responsive and had great restaurant recommendations. We would definitely stay here again!
Great place for a weekend in Montreal! Very close to McGill and other cool neighborhoods, walkable to great restaurants and sights. Tarek was a fantastic host and had great recommendations!
Carl is very kind and quick to respond! The home was very clean!  Getting the key from a dark alleyway was nerve-wracking. Otherwise, the host was very kind!
Great place for a weekend getaway in Montreal. Within walking distance to many shops/restaurants/clubs. Had an easy check-in.
Great location, super friendly host, everything was as expected. Would stay here again 100%

This was my first experience with living at an Airbnb instead of a hotel. Carl's place is conveniently located right next to McGill University. Carl was always very responsive when needed. I would recommend this to those considering a stay in Montreal.
It was fine, really, and affordable with a good location. It could use a deep clean and some extra bedding if it sleeps five.
Great spot close to the center of MTL. Perfect for a weekend getaway.

Great place in a great location! The apartment itself is quite old but Carl makes the best of it: new furniture, very clean and comfy bed. Also Carl was very helpful with everything and very responsive.
Great communication, Carl really tried to accommodate our needs. Great location

We liked staying at the property; good location close to downtown and McGill U, clean apartment, quiet, comfortable bed. We used the kitchen to make breakfast and dinner for our family. A swimming pool with a sauna was available (unfortunately we did not have time to enjoy it), quite spacious balcony.
Wonderful host who is quick to help with everything. Great location near McGill - quiet and enjoyable.

Carl's place was in a fantastic location, within walking distance of downtown and trendy bars/restaurants. Carl made the check-in process super easy. The air conditioning was a life saver with the humidity at night.

Carl was very responsive and answered quickly. 
The apartment itself was nice and clean, and located in a good neighborhood with shops and markets nearby.
A great place to stay!

Recommended for the location, so close to downtown and Mont Royal Park. The apartment has all you need for a comfortable stay. While the decor isn't quite as sparkly as in the photos and there are some minor issues like dripping taps, overall we had everything we needed and Carl is an excellent host who is very quick to respond to messages and was very helpful in arranging parking for us.
Had a great time (stayed only 2 nights) in Montreal. The apartment is located in the student district, spacious, with a large TV and a small kitchen. I would recommend it for short stays!

The location of this place is great (very central) and Carl was a good host: communication went well and we very much appreciated his flexibility around check-in and check-out times. But we were sorely disappointed with the apartment itself. Why? Because while the pictures correspond to what we were looking for, the actual place did not: the state of renovation is far from being as good as suggested by the description and pictures (ex: there was a big hole in the bathroom door, by the doorknob, that was filled with kitchen paper, and that is just one example); the place could use a deep clean and we were greeted by a hospital smell that we could not get rid of during our stay. If you are seduced by the idea of using the pool, beware: we love swimming and were planning to use it but did not because its cleanliness was very questionable (there were for example what seemed to be dead spiders at the bottom of it). This place is for people who want a place to sleep and be on their way.
Great location, but be prepared for student housing. Good Wi-Fi. Nice furniture. However, the bathroom and kitchen are very old. The host is very responsive.
Extremely well-located location. Suitable for both short and long trips. We really enjoyed the accommodation and reception with Carl's help.
This was in a perfect location, the apartment was a little less upscale than the photos made it appear, but it was perfect for us and our stay!

I do not recommend this place at all. The pictures are so misleading. It looks luxurious, but it is nothing but a sham. I wish I could add in my own pictures, the actual reality of what this place looks like, for example, an improperly installed bathroom door knob stuffed with toilet paper and with visible screws. Filth on the walls, on the fan. A flimsy piece of plastic/cardboard in the top part of the window where the AC unit is installed. It felt so unsafe that we did not leave any valuables every time we left the Airbnb. 2 towels for 5 people for 3 days and 2 nights (that includes the hand towel, and there's no mat for coming out of the shower, so basically that leaves no towels for showers; we used our own towels we had brought for swimming) and when I asked for more towels, that did not happen. I was completely ignored on that request. But we ended up using our own towels because we saw a beautiful pool in the pictures. Well, turns out the pool wasn't as expected at all. It was too cold to swim and the place looked like it needed repairs (holes in the ceiling) just bad! 
The dresser had a broken drawer bottom, when I attempted to open the closet in the bedroom, the knob came off in my hand, the closet door wasn't aligned properly and difficult to manage. The toilet didn't flush properly, the bathroom sink was leaking, and the caulking in the bathroom was coming apart and either dirty or moldy. The walls were filthy; I could see where posters had been on those walls in the past. Gross. 

This is so dishonest. This is not right. 
Awful. Awful. Awful. 
You want to rent your place, that's fine. Don't need to steal from honest people. Just sell what you have to offer, don't mislead people and on top of it bully them into giving you a five-star rating. I paid. Therefore, I have paid my right to say my honest opinion, and I don't want anyone else to get ripped off by you.

It is a clean and comfortable place to live, and the host replies to messages very quickly. 

Especially the location is very convenient for traveling to most tourist spots. My family and I had a good time staying there.

Location may be what you're seeking; be sure to inquire and make arrangements in advance for parking and key access before booking to ensure the process aligns with your expectations.  Host communication is excellent, and issues are addressed promptly.

We booked this Airbnb for a group of 4 guests. Check-in was a fast and easy process. Upon arrival, we were very satisfied with how neat and clean the furniture and apartment were. We enjoyed the location - walking distance to major sites in the city (St. Laurent, downtown Montreal, Mount-Royal Hiking Trail, and a 10-minute drive to Old Port Montreal). Carl was very helpful in providing us with suggestions on places to visit/dine, and responded quickly to calls and texts! The furniture was nice; one bedroom with a bed and couch, living room with a pull-out couch, TV, and dining table, kitchen, and patio available. The infrastructure of the apartment and building was a bit old. The apartment was located in a safe area to walk in at night. Overall, we had an amazing stay, and would recommend it for short stays.
Great location, but requires maintenance.

Perfect location for our visit to McGill for their open house! We were comfortable and enjoyed the neighborhood very much. Plug for Lola Rosa restaurant!!!! Carl's place was just what we needed! Carl was very good at communicating and kept in touch throughout our visit. Make sure you get all his texts/messages before you arrive so you are informed about parking and access to the apartment. We drove from quite a distance and couldn't download all of them before we arrived...all worked out just fine. Thanks for a great weekend in Montreal!

Carl's place is within walking distance of everything you want to visit in Montreal. It is a little smaller and less luxurious than it appears in the pictures, as it is a student residence. However, overall it was a pleasant trip if you are looking for home for one person or even more.

I had a nice stay at Carl's place! Communication was perfect, check-in was easy. The house was super clean, the bed was very comfortable. The location is also good, close to the subway and stores. The little patio is perfect if you smoke. 

I recommend this place!

This is a wonderful place to stay! Great layout, very clean, within easy walking distance to everything. Carl is a kind and responsive host, I always try to stay at one of his locations when I'm in Montreal.

A good host. 
An old apartment and smaller than I expected.
Very well located housing, close to the city center!
Excellent
It's a nice place to stay!

My friend and I had a great time staying at Carl's place! As other reviewers have said, it's a nice place with some old features but the location, responsiveness from host and parking all make up for that! The decor is new and modern and the bed was really comfortable! I would definitely stay here again (maybe in the summer when it's not so cold)! Also check-in and check-out were SO easy and convenient!

The place matched the pictures exactly. The balcony was actually very spacious. The TV also had Spotify and YouTube on it, so it was perfect because we didn't need to use our speakers to listen to music. It was very close to McGill as well as shopping and a SAQ (liquor store).

The photos are misleading - the apartment is old and fairly shabby with new Ikea furniture. Also - it's freezing (my phone said the inside temp was 12 degrees C)! We cranked the heat and I still could not sleep because I was so cold. I almost wore my coat to bed. I wish I had. For the location (close to McGill) and the price point, I'm not surprised. It's an old building that desperately needs updating. Some fairly simple repairs are neglected in favor of shoving plastic bags and toilet paper into crevices or hiding them behind paintings. If you're only worried about location and price, it's a decent place to stay (maybe not in winter though). We were just looking for a warm place to wait out a snowstorm and unfortunately we were very disappointed since we were still so cold! Check-in was a breeze and Carl was very quick to respond and easily reachable.
We stayed for two days in Montreal. Thanks to Carl! He was responsive and adapted both the check-in and check-out process. He took care that we were comfortable!
Nice
Great location. Exactly as described. Great value for the price point. Great communication with hosts. Very comfortable stay. Would stay here again or recommend it in a heartbeat.
Location is great, perfect and close to downtown areas! Would recommend to all

Good location, good pricing, a little cold at night in the winter but manageable with the extra blankets and radiator. Parking was a bit of an issue but I was assured that it was not usually like that and was accommodated for accordingly. Check-in instructions were also a little unclear but the host was able to get in contact and explain them once we had arrived.
The space was exactly as shown in the pictures! It's perfect for a couple who are going down there to explore around as it's very close to everything. Overall great stay, thanks Carl!
Great stay at Carl's place! Really cute place. Great location too :)

Very close to everything and a very comfortable apartment, but there are some cleanliness issues and be sure to bring your own towel. I also got a $54 parking ticket because I parked out front where I was told it was okay to park.

Very cozy and charming place in the heart of Little Italy. I haven't met Ollie, but he was very attentive and gave many helpful pieces of information about his place and the neighborhood. There is everything you may need during your stay, even a barbecue in the backyard for sunny days in Montreal. The rooms are clean and the decoration is really nice. There is no TV, but I didn't miss it anyway. I do recommend it for a couple visiting Montreal. Many thanks, Ollie!

This place is wonderful, super clean and cozy! We loved the style and decoration of the place and it had all the amenities we needed.

The location is perfect, near the metro, groceries, and very good restaurants. 

Olly is the best host, extremely helpful!

I would love to return!! =)

This apartment is perfectly located, easily accessible and very clean, very quiet and well-heated in the winter, it offers all the amenities and necessary elements for our comfort. Ivonne is a welcoming, available and very responsive person. We would love to do this again!
Impeccable Identification in Photos
A clean, new, beautifully designed space with delightful hosts. Stay here

Ivonne's place was clean and beautiful, and I had the place to myself, which was great. She had an alarm system so I felt safe, and it was easy to check-in. The location was great, in the middle of the Plateau. The only issue, which was quite disappointing, is that her place did not provide wifi, although it said on the website that it was part of the amenities. It was also annoying that she didn't warn me about this and that it took her a long time to tell me, and I had to text and ask her multiple times before she told me that it had been cut off. This was frustrating for me since I was apartment hunting and thus depended on wifi for this. She also stated she would reimburse me for this but has not yet done so after several weeks. I understand she was traveling at the time, but I would have appreciated better communication about this. If there hadn't been issues with the wifi or communication, I wouldn't have any more complaints about her place.

Ivonne's place is located in a central area within a small gated community in the city. The gates, keyless locks, and security alarm provide an extra layer of security. It was easy to access buses/trains and local taxis. There are also countless places to eat, grab dessert, or grab a drink in the area. The place is modern and clean. The bed is extra firm and pillows are very soft, so keep that in mind. There are two small windows in the room, but due to their high location, they cannot be opened for light/air. 

I did not get a chance to meet Ivonne because she was on vacation during my stay. However, she is fairly responsive via text. 

Also, please clarify amenities with Ivonne prior to your check-in, as there was no Wi-Fi or cable TV as listed in her apartment amenities. She also did not have the apartment cleaned until the second day I was there. She stated it was due to a call out from the cleaners' side, but she failed to leave me instructions for where I could find bedding/towels in the meantime. Luckily, I just opened the room door closest and saw extra sheets and towels. 

After all is said and done, Ivonne did offer me a small discount for the lack of initial cleanliness and lack of Wi-Fi and TV in the apartment, but her attitude was a bit nonchalant overall, which annoyed me initially.

Peaceful location
Very close to amenities
Beautiful condo

Ivonne's place is the place you are looking for, very modern, with huge air conditioning being a bonus, especially when we know how humid and hot Montreal gets in July. And also you want the perfect location which I would call it French Quarter where you want to be in the summer. There is only one downside which is the internet, with the internet it would be a 5-star place. Would I stay there again? Big yes and definitely.
The host cancelled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Tim is a fantastic and responsive host! He even gave me a welcome gift! His place is quiet, clean, and cozy. It's close to the metro station and there are many great restaurants and grocery stores nearby. Highly recommend it!

Charming location with lots of restaurants and shops. Perfect size for a couple or even a solo traveler. Near the metro station and just a few stops to Old Montreal. Tim was responsive and welcoming, and even left little notes throughout the flat. Would definitely recommend!
Thank you to Yeimy for her hospitality! Very kind and attentive host!
Great suite. Amazing location. Close to the street and thin windows, so expect noise all night long.
Not what he said. Changed location. Complained about noise and stopped replying
The host cancelled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

My stay with Serge was very pleasant. 
Serge is a gracious, warm and generous host. 
He takes care of the well-being of his tenants. 

He can guide you for anything, he is very humble and open in nature, 
We have exchanged a lot together I am delighted to have made his acquaintance as I left his apartment, I gained a friend, I highly recommend him; 
You will not regret your stay in Montreal.

Serge is an excellent host; we enjoyed our stay, I was a little confused because his ad said private room, but it's actually the whole apartment. And the location was perfect for me - just 5 minutes from my family.
Clean and peaceful. Recently renovated and secure housing. Unbeatable value for money in this Montreal neighborhood. Very welcoming and friendly host.
Great place for the price. If you're looking for something a little outside the city with parking, this is a good choice.

Serge is someone very welcoming and kind, he helped me with my first grocery runs and answered all of my questions about the city of Montreal. 
I highly recommend him, especially since the apartment is entirely yours. 
Serge has a heart on his sleeve, personally, I wouldn't hesitate for a second if I ever had to move to Montreal in the future!

Thank you Serge

Just one word: Awesome! 
Best I did until now!
I would recommend this place as a quiet, uncrowded location with a great host.
Three good hotels
It's a perfect location for a nice quiet time. It's close to transportation and shops, and he is just the perfect host.

Two-bedroom condo available for rent if you are alone or with other people. Otherwise, you will be alone in the condo. Easy access. Grocery store, pharmacy nearby, restaurants too. Quiet and peaceful location
Super friendly
Very beautiful home!!!!
I have greatly enjoyed my stay at Serge's place. He is very welcoming, available all the time, his apartment is clean, quiet, well-located and comfortable. I recommend it.

This is a 2 bedroom apartment that Serge lets you have all to yourself! We had little interaction with him but he was very nice. The only problem we had was with the internet; we were never able to figure out which one to connect to and what the right password was, but we didn't spend enough time at the apartment to really try and figure it out so it was all okay!

This experience was an eye-opener. You get what you pay for. Coming from Western Canada the communication was iffy with translation issues. This seemed to be resolved before we left. The host was made aware when we would be arriving...early evening. We arrived at the door in this unknown neighborhood, and after calling and texting many times over a 2 hour period without a reply, were starting to wonder if we had been scammed. Finally the door was buzzed open and we went to the unit. We did not meet or see our host until the 5th night. The accommodations were modern, a type of industrial Ikea look with cement ceilings and clean and simple design. The bed is a mattress on the floor which proved to be very uncomfortable, along with terrible pillows. There was no table and chairs to sit at, rather just a couch and chair. The TV/cable do not work. We asked about the tv several times during our stay via text and phone call, but were ignored without a response. The fridge freezer motor is very loud. There were no paper towels, or clean towel or dish rag available., as well as no coffee maker(if you are a coffee person that is hard in the morning) Many cupboards in the kitchen were closed off from access. There also is no garbage can other than a small one in the bathroom. The ad suggests and implies that you get the entire unit to use, but once there you really feel that it is just a place to sleep and shower. Parking is a premium to find and may require several trips around several blocks before locating a spot. This seems to be normal for Montreal and eventually you get accustomed to it. Patience is required. All in all, it was a place to sleep, but we would not return.
Nice
Great value and superior hospitality

It is quite the commute to everything we wanted to see around Old Montreal and the Gay Village, however it makes up for it because Serge's nightly price is UNREAL with how AMAZING it is. Serge is pretty much a hands-off Airbnb host (which is ideal for me personally) unless you ask him a question which he replies in minutes. Such a kind person. I would recommend this site if you are looking for affordability and don't mind a 30 minute commute from North Montreal to downtown South Montreal.
Clean and well-located apartment. In a quiet neighborhood, close to shops. Very warmly welcomed. I recommend without any hesitation
Everything you need for a family vacation. Tranquility, proximity to the bus stop. In short, I highly recommend it.
Nothing to report
The host cancelled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Nice place. Only issue was there was only one roll of toilet paper.
Serge's apartment is really very nice. We had a great weekend there.
Very friendly and polite person! :-)
It was 20 minutes away from downtown, but it was the cosiest place I've ever stayed.  Well worth the price and then some. If I come back, I'm definitely looking this place up again ❤
Welcoming and friendly
Great
Serge was very heartwarming, the apartment was clean and the location was great too. I would definitely come back
Thank you for your stay
The host cancelled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Fantastic and stylish loft space with an absolutely ideal location!
Amazing and helpful hosts who ensured the stay ran without any sort of problems!

Pleasant and spacious accommodation. 
Sandra is easily contactable.
I recommend :)
Translation: They were very welcoming and accommodating for three weeks. I highly recommend!

Sandra's loft is spacious and very well located to visit Montreal, the neighborhood is awesome: not too noisy but lively. 
We didn't meet Sandra though, which is a shame...

Without a doubt, I would stay at Sandra and Gustavo's Loft again. They have been very kind and taken care of every detail of the place, the street where the house is located is very beautiful, the loft is very well-kept, spacious, and even has a jacuzzi, 5 stars for them, thanks for their hospitality.

Very clean and quiet place.  A lovely location with a nice pool nearby that my kids absolutely adored. The owners were incredibly helpful and offered great suggestions for local food and entertainment. We will definitely stay again.
Spacious place with a pleasant appearance. Amenities were good and the host was accommodating to our needs and friendly.
Ideal for visiting Montreal! Spacious

Thank you to Sandra and Gustavo for their kindness, responsiveness, and hospitality.

The accommodation is very well located and it is pleasant to stay there.
Clean and tidy place in a great neighborhood. The biggest draw was its proximity to bustling streets with bars and restaurants, and beautiful parks.
Nice place, very spacious, older style basement. Very close to public transportation and a busy street with shops and restaurants nearby. Sandra was very helpful with any requests. Would recommend.
Sandra was very polite and cooperative, and the space was very charming and cozy.

Apartment in basement, spacious and equipped (kitchenette, fridge, dishwasher, washing machine and dryer). Bathroom with window in the shower overlooking the exterior, no curtain or anything. At utensil level, we only had one glass for two, three cups. No condiments (neither salt nor pepper), no tablets for the dishwasher, nor for the washing machine. 
Quite far from the center, it takes about twenty minutes to reach the metro, a half hour to Mount Royal. Bus stops nearby. Shops are also close by, very convenient.
After all, the price is really attractive!

Great stay in a beautiful area! Perfect for what was needed. Great restaurants and cafes steps from the apartment. Sandra and her husband were very accommodating to us, making for the perfect short-term stay in Montreal.
Thank you to Sandra for welcoming us into her home! Very good stay! Ideal apartment location and very functional
The location is great, the space is perfect.

Sandra and Gustavo's accommodation is very nice and private. 

My husband and I stayed here for a week and it was quite comfortable. 

We were there during the cold season and they went above and beyond to make us feel at home in every way.

There are many places nearby to eat, and it is well connected by buses, although the metro isn't exactly close.

There are supermarkets and everything we needed for a grand stay.

Sonders place came with hotel amenities. Little shampoos and little body washes. Everything was wiped down and the location was perfect! Right across the street from the Metro and right on the main bar drag of gay village. I would say this is not an ideal location if you need a lot of quiet sleep. I travel with earplugs so I was fine but the floor does vibrate until 0300 with the club right below. Stay here if you don't mind the noise or will be out most nights anyway, it is perfect for a weekend getaway with friends! I was visiting when 15 cm of snow fell and Sonders gave me the option of staying another night when I messaged explaining. I didn't need the extra night, but it was definitely an accommodation that made my stay stress free. They had tea and small olive oil packets available for cooking. The kitchen was stocked with every pan and cookie sheet needed. My only complaint would be the booking process. Sonders is an investment travel company. So when you book through Airbnb you aren't done there. You have to validate yourself with their systems and surveys. Save your time and just book on their website. I would stay here and try other Sonders Properties in the future. Safe travels!
My friend and I had a great stay at the village, it was the perfect location to walk to all of the places we wanted. Street parking was easy and accessible.
Okay
The apartment was so beautiful and located in a fantastic/central spot. I loved the decor and the amenities included. The hosts' response time was quick. Definitely the place to stay!

Amazing place. Great location and easy access. However, the bar directly below is extremely noisy every day of the week. The bass can be heard until 3-4 AM, making it difficult to fall asleep until the bar closes.
Had a great stay at the apartment, even though there was an issue with the keypad getting into the building. I texted the number listed and received a quick response. Excellent service
Great location for night owls, as long as there aren't early birds living above...
Noise is crazy every night, and it's recommended to bring a laptop or an HDMI Chromecast to avoid the noise. Otherwise, the TV is useless.
Super well-located, good logistics, pleasant apartment... however, be aware of the noise from nightlife. Right above a bar/disco

Overall very positive experience with this apartment. Very clean space and bathrooms. It provides everything needed for a weekend stay (kitchen supplies, towels, soap, shampoo). The location was good but very noisy at night, which may make sleeping difficult. Also, the curtains are very thin, which makes it very bright in the morning and could wake you up early.

Excellent location, very central. Nice view of St. Catherine Street. Beautifully renovated, very nice and clean. 

Music in the bar below ends at 3:00 AM, but can start early, such as 10:00 AM in the morning.

Absolutely highly recommended, meticulously clean and well stocked. Strategically located smack in the middle of the village for those so inclined. Noisy and right above the bar which is fine for those of us who like to hang out at gay bars. Couldn’t be better! We will be back.

The Sonder team was super responsive and readily available to us. The location of the apartment is really great, in one of Montreal's most vibrant neighborhoods (if you're not a party animal, I would advise against this apartment), which is very nice, clean, beautiful, and pleasant.
Great location and well-managed. Tastefully decorated.

Clean, well-appointed apartment with nice amenities. Great location. Noise level from the bar directly below the apartment was extreme and lasted until 4 am. If you choose to rent this apartment, be forewarned: it is EXTREMELY noisy.
A very nice place to stay in the heart of Montreal's unique Village.  Had a wonderful trip over New Year's and look forward to my next visit.

The apartment is big, modern, and clean! Jesus was an excellent host and even left a guidebook of Montreal and coffee to use in the Keurig.  It was super convenient for getting to the Jewish General Hospital. It was a lovely home away from home for two weeks.

Jesus's place was absolutely phenomenal to stay in; it's a nice and spacious apartment in a quiet building that isn't too far from downtown Montreal (i.e.: 20ish minute drive).

He really thought of everything as he made the sofa bed for us, left some dishes and cutlery, and had everything you'd generally need for a stay. 

I'd definitely visit him again when I go back to Montreal - my friends and I had a great time.
Simple, comfortable and great location!
Jesus is a nice host. He always replies quickly and patiently. The place is clean and is suitable for two or three people to stay there.
Everything was so beautiful, it was super clean, comfortable beds, and a very nice place.
Thank you Jesus!
