Great host, great location. Close to the metro. Extremely clean apartment in a charming neighborhood.

The apartment was spacious and clean. We didn't know the host, but the self-check-in process was very smooth. Jesus was quick with communication and promptly attended to us, bringing the two missing pillows since we were a party of 3.

The apartment was clean.

The decor did not match the photos, but nothing that significantly compromised the comfort during our stay.
If you're looking for a well-located and comfortable apartment, this one is definitely it!

Very professional! Thank you and bravo for the quality of your performance 
Djamel

Jesus's place was well suited for our needs. It provided us with a safe place to relax after our hectic days in Montreal, easy access to public transportation, it was clean and best of all it had parking!
This apartment was located in a great area, it was quiet and safe. The apartment was clean and had the basic amenities. Parking was easy and onsite as mentioned in the listing.
Awesome location right next to all the highways if you're driving. Easy access to the subway and an awesome host

My dad and I had a great experience at Jesus's. It's in a great location, very convenient to public transportation. The apartment was clean and comfortable. Check-in was easy, and Jesus was very helpful and communicative. Highly recommend!
No thank you
Absolutely fantastic location. With two metro stations a few blocks away, the entire Montreal area is at your disposal.
Good stay. Well-located. Parking included. As described.
One of the best hostels I've ever stayed at - hands down. The location is perfect for Montreal's nightlife, the kitchen, bathroom, and decor are amazing. Highly recommended!
Super place, well-maintained and excellent service!!!

This place is ideal for both sociable and introverted folks alike - the space is definitely communal-centric, but there's also a nice outdoor porch in the back and people are sweet. It's a lively space at night because it's above a bar, but I slept like a babe, no problem. The bar downstairs doesn't have much of a beer selection, but they're more known for their cocktails and mixed drinks (very good, by the way!). Definitely a place I'll go next time I'm in Montreal.
Worth every penny. A very modern space with plenty to do both inside and outside the hostel. Great for large groups of friends!
Awesome place!!

My accommodation is simply magnificent and the hosts are very pleasant. Everything is perfectly organized, properly with everything we need. The little extra, La Distillerie just below is fantastic with great cocktails. I highly recommend it!
This is a very nice setup. A lot of thought went into it. The common area, kitchen, and lounge are excellent. Very organized.

What you see on the website is exactly how you will find the space in person. Definitely a good value for money, very clean, decor and personal touches are amazing, perfect for small groups! Ask for parking instructions in advance and if there are any events in the vicinity that block the street. This will save you time upon your arrival.

Gorgeous space, very clean, great amenities, and responsive hosts with lots of recommendations for fun in the city. Great location. They seem to have thought of every detail when designing this hostel. Beds have privacy curtains, individual lights and fans, and mattresses are fairly comfortable. However, this is NOT FOR LIGHT SLEEPERS! (You know who you are.) The bar below plays loud music every night until 4 a.m. Though the space is well insulated, nothing can block out the thumping bass (including earplugs or noise canceling headphones, which is usually adequate for me in most hostels.) The hosts are thoughtful and offered to talk to the bartenders about the noise but it still kept me up every night. They did also offer to refund my money for my remaining night’s stay if I preferred to find a hotel due to the noise, but we ended up staying as we couldn’t find an affordable alternative.  I would recommend this place so long as you are not a light sleeper (my friend slept fine though says she’s a very heavy sleeper), but I will probably not stay here again for that reason. It was otherwise an enjoyable stay. It’s a beautiful space and most folks will probably sleep fine.

Brilliant little hostel with a sense of perfection and cleanliness, all equipped, the best of its price category I've ever stayed in. The bed boxes are superb. The Distillerie cocktail bar downstairs will welcome you with a drink, we had a great night down there, very lively.
This accommodation is really highly recommended! The cleanliness, decoration and finish are perfect. Definitely one of the best accommodations I've rented for a weekend getaway!

The standards for hostels have been set on another level! Amazing interior with lots of well-thought-out details (lights, music speakers, music instruments, kitchen furniture,...). Super clean, easiest check-in possible, great tips for food and drink... Would definitely recommend without a doubt!
This is THE place to stay in Montreal. Great hosts, great accommodations.
Best place to stay in Montreal, period :)

I was incredibly impressed with the accommodations. Everything was sparkling new and clean. Fantastic location. I had no trouble sleeping in the pod, except there were no windows and I overslept a bit.

One of the best options for any traveler. Beautiful place with many amenities. My only complaint is that it's a 25-minute walk to the station, and the sidewalks in Montreal are terrible. Put on a good pair of boots and you'll be fine.

A week and a half stay at the Bed and Cocktail. The place is super! The decor is really top-notch and will suit everyone, all the spaces are clean and very functional, some attention to detail and well-thought-out amenities and wellness features, but you'll have to discover it for yourself. The neighborhood is lively. Overall, a great address.
I recommend ++
Nice and cozy apartment a little bit outside the city, with good public transport.
Thank you Charlotte for your availability and help, we have enjoyed our stay. We look forward to coming back again.
Charlotte is very welcoming and responsive, the accommodation is true to the description, I recommend the address!
Very beautiful apartment at an unbeatable price. Charlotte is very welcoming and responds quickly to all requests! I highly recommend

Charlotte did an excellent job communicating and addressing all of our concerns! The place was clean and within walking distance of public transportation. Parking was a bit tricky, but our stay was wonderful nonetheless.

The apartment is spacious and very well located.
We had an excellent stay, 
And would definitely do it again without any problems.
The host cancelled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Thank you Charlotte for your hospitality.

We loved the decor of your apartment and the proximity to transportation, which allowed us to easily visit Montreal.
Lana's place was very beautiful and close to the city. We loved staying at her house and she was very helpful with any questions we had during our stay.

Though we appreciated the comfortable beds in this home, we likely wouldn't stay here again. The home doesn't have a bathtub (it's not the host's fault; it's not advertised as having a bathtub; I simply assumed it would) and for our entire weeklong stay, we either weren't given the key to the laundry room or the one washing machine in the laundry room wasn't working. For a family with two young kids, this was unfortunate. The kitchen is modestly equipped, and there are a few little broken things throughout the unit. We're grateful for Lana's hospitality, but this just wasn't the right fit for us.

This is a great space! Very clean and plenty of room to spread out. Lana is very responsive and attentive to anything that came up during our stay! The self check-in and check-out were convenient for our late arrival time. Would definitely recommend!
Lana's place was clean and as advertised. She is responsive and helpful.
Very nice space, we were 4 guys and had ample room for everything we wanted to do. The host was great, always quick to reply.

Lana's place was perfect for what my family needed for a long weekend trip. Communication with Lana was very easy and she always responded right away! Being that we didn't know exactly when we would be arriving, the self check-in was great! The place was clean and had lots of space for 4 adults to stay comfortably.

Lana's place was perfect. Exactly as described and super clean. Lana was awesome with answering questions quickly and her place felt like a home away from home. I would definitely recommend and would stay there myself again.
Translation: I'll be back for sure.
I have been living at this location for two months. Lana is a very enthusiastic and careful host. It was a great experience for our family. Thank you for everything.
Beautiful house :)

We were disappointed with our stay at Lana's place. Although Lana was quite friendly and responsive, there were many things wrong with the place which made our stay unpleasant. First, the location is very inconvenient as it is far from downtown and in a bad area without many nearby amenities. Next, the actual place itself did not look as nice as it did in the pictures. The bathroom and living room were smaller than expected. Worse of all, there were no drawers or tables in the bedroom forcing us to put our things on the floor. In the morning, we couldn't sleep as there were no blinds closing the window, only a sheer cloth. When we tried to cook, the dishes and pans were unwashed. Overall, we were very disappointed and would not stay again.
Amazing place! Thanks Lana!
Lana's place was beautiful and had everything we needed. It was clean and inviting, and my family and I wouldn't hesitate to return if the opportunity arose!

We had a great stay at Lana's place. Lana is an amazing host who is extremely responsive. 

The place was amazing and is a relatively convenient location. The place was stylish and clean. We are especially happy to have the kids' room. My daughter loves it.

Lana was a perfect host - she provided bottled water, coffee, tea, and chocolate croissants! She responded quickly to all of our needs and let us check in a few hours early. The Airbnb was extremely clean and very updated and modern. It is located about 30 minutes (driving) from Downtown Montreal and wouldn't recommend this place if you were planning to use public transit (1.5 hours). My friends and I enjoyed our stay very much and would come back here again!

Very clean home and just as described. It was a bit difficult to find at first.
I would give it a 10 star if they were available!
That's a really nice place to stay, very clean and modernly decorated. It's close to the shopping center. There are three bedrooms and a large living room for the family...

Thank you very much for the hospitality at your home! We are very happy with our choice of you. Lana is an excellent homemaker, and there is everything necessary for living comfortably in the house; we will definitely visit you again.
Translation: Faithful to the description, quiet, modern decoration and very clean.
The place is very nice, exactly as advertised. Lana was very helpful and responsive.

It's a good place like Airbnb, with a modern kitchen, excellent communication, cleanliness, water and food (cereal, coffee) provided. The space is well-organized.  The only thing is the sofa isn't very comfortable for watching TV. Overall, it's a good place. Thank you, Lana
Great experience!

This was our first experience with an Airbnb and Lana's place was perfect. I am very particular about cleanliness as well as the quality of bedding, and it was all perfect. The townhouse is newly renovated and looks fabulous, and the quality of the sheets on the beds, as well as having duvets, was very much appreciated. My husband along with my two teenage boys were very happy that everyone had their own space. Lana was great with her quick responses when I had a question. I would definitely recommend Lana's place! Thank you Lana for a fabulous stay!

Lana's townhouse was the perfect place for our family to stay while we visited family in the West Island. Don't be fooled by the outside of the building - the inside has been updated wonderfully. Access and location were easy and central to everything we needed. Perfect for our family of four. Kids had their own rooms and they loved the toys and the Foosball table! I can't imagine spending more per night to stay in a tiny hotel room for five days. We will definitely be back!
Lanas' place was great and very spacious
This was a wonderful spot close to great shopping for essentials. It was clean and beautiful. Our host was responsive and helpful. The townhouse complex was quiet with some green space.
The place was very spacious, clean, and comfortable. The host was very responsive to everything we asked and needed. We enjoyed our stay at Lana's

Lana is a very responsive and pleasant host; and provided clean bedrooms and bathrooms. The rooms were comfortable, the home was quiet and at a convenient location to grocery stores and other shops, located approximately 25 minutes outside the city. The kitchen and living rooms were very spacious and updated. My family enjoyed our stay, and would definitely book again!

Frederick was an excellent host, he was thoughtful and very keen to make sure I had everything I needed for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The apartment is a large, one-bedroom study with a fully equipped kitchen. Location is right in Old Montreal, next to the cathedral which is ideal for both tourists and business travelers. I stayed for six weeks and highly recommend it.
Great location. Very convenient to restaurants, bars, parking lot, etc. Nice renovated loft-style apartment. Frederick responded very quickly when I had a question. Thank you!
I attended a conference at the Palais Des Congres and this apartment was perfect for staying nearby. Modern, spacious and had everything I needed in a great location. Highly recommended.
Excellent

We stayed there for two days. It's a perfect place to explore Montreal. The parking is right in front of the apartment, which is the best part. (If you come by car, you can see your car from the window.) 

The place was very clean, modern and nicely located.
Extremely stylish loft and building right in the heart of Old Montreal. Tons of natural light and modern finishes. Highly recommend this place!
Well-located and affordable apartment. Professional host.

Great loft with great location in old Montreal on a quiet street at night. There were many restaurants and shops nearby. We were able to walk to most points of interest. Check-in and check-out processes were easy to follow. If you drive, there is a parking lot on the other side of the street, which is very convenient. We recommend this loft.

What a great flat and what a great location! Very sunny apartment with plenty of space. Right in the heart of Old Montreal, making it perfect for exploring all the amazing restaurants and bars in the area.
Beautiful loft apartment located near many shops and restaurants. Very clean with excellent amenities inside. Convenient parking out front. Would highly recommend.

Wow, what a place in Old Montreal. Felt like Monaco during F1, because you step outside and see sports supercars and cobblestone ground right out the front lobby. The place inside was also highly respectable and furnished to complement the great scene outdoors. Really spacious and clean.
Excellent location, very well-located and with everything you need.

Really great stay here! Beautiful giant old windows and a brick wall, brand new kitchen, really nice shower. This was the perfect place for my boyfriend and me to take a long weekend to explore Montreal. Location was perfect too!

The location is very accessible to everything. It is literally right next to the Basilica. Bella was very prompt in responding to my questions and the instructions were very easy to understand. I would highly recommend staying here again!

Just a few steps from Notre-Dame Basilica of Montreal to enjoy the lively city life in Old Montreal! Parking is convenient with surface and underground options. I would recommend parking underground at 500 Place d'Armes, Montreal, QC H2Y 2W2 where only $20 is charged per 24 hours and is safe. Also just 2 minutes away from this place.

It’s big enough to accommodate 5-6 people if you don’t mind sharing one bathroom.
Great location in the heart of Old Montreal.
Clean + great location plus nearby parking spot. And love the modern amenities.
Amazing place and an amazing host :)
A weird mildew-related smell lingers in the apartment. Otherwise, great location, price, and everything else

Very nice loft in a terrific location near the Old Port, Chinatown, and Jazz Fest. Check-in was very straightforward and overnight parking is easy (either across the street, or if that's full - as it was for us - just a couple of blocks away). Would stay here again!

Great location and awesome place. We were there during the hottest days of the year and felt the AC unit wasn't doing enough, I struggled to sleep a bit. Otherwise, it was super cool and would probably be even cooler on a non-hot Montreal day.

We were there for the jazz festival. It is a great place in an awesome location - close to most things that matter. Frederick was attentive and flexible. The only thing is that our stay coincided with a heat wave in Montreal and the A/C was not keeping the place cool whatsoever - so it was uncomfortable for 2 of the 3 nights while the hot weather persisted. Other than that, stylish apartment in a great location. We would be back if given assurance the A/C issue has been addressed.
Close to almost everything (metro, old port, basilica, science museum, place des arts...) nice and clean apartment, quick communication.
Very modern open space. It was a nice place to hang out in the mornings with the big windows. Had everything we needed! Would stay again
Great place!

Good value for money, well-located in Old Montreal. Parking right across the street. Very convenient. 
Thank you

Great location in Old Montreal. Spacious place for a few people. 

The only issue I experienced was the lack of a working water tap in the bathroom.  I notified the hosts, who were aware of the problem but I wasn't notified beforehand or offered an apology for the inconvenience which I found surprising. Otherwise, the place matched the description and the hosts were responsive.

This is a great choice if you are visiting Montreal's Old Town. It offers excellent value for the location, quality, and space provided. We experienced some issues with the Wi-Fi and TV, but Fred and Kloe responded promptly and resolved them quickly.
Very nice and clean space.
Perfect location to visit Old Montreal (just 2 steps from Notre Dame Basilica) with a very pleasant design. I recommend
A nice, clean place in the perfect location!

My husband and I stayed here last weekend and loved it. It's right in the heart of old Montreal which is perfect for midnight strolls. The place was exactly what it was advertised and it was very clean - which is the most important thing to me being a clean freak. Frederick and Kloe were very responsive and accommodating, and if we go back to Montreal I would definitely stay there again. Checking in was easy. We actually stayed in for dinner one night and the place has all the basic appliances, cutlery, etc that worked out nicely. It was also surprisingly quiet on the street side as I was nervous the roaming of the cars would keep me up all night. I imagine there are a few Airbnb units in that building so once in a while you do hear loud and inconsiderate guests yelling in the corridors. But it's not that often. If there was one thing I could change is the size of the bed as I'm used to larger beds but that is just me being picky. :)
Perfect localization.
This is a lovely apartment in a fantastic location next to the cathedral, a short walk from many of Montreal's sights.

Loved our stay at this loft! Frederick's instructions for our self check-in were seamless and made our arrival easy and enjoyable. The space is beautiful and located within an interesting building. Our sleep in the bed was comfortable and the daylight in the space was beautiful. The location is also central to everything!  Would highly recommend and stay there again on our next visit!

Frederick's place is certainly at the best spot in Old Town Montreal, literally right next to the Basilica Notre-Dame. This place is spotless and has lots of natural light. I had a great time relaxing at his place and exploring nice restaurants, bakeries, and breweries in Old Town within a 5-10 minute walk. It's a vibrant place where you can feel the fun atmosphere from the plaza and on the street. Late nights on weekends could be too noisy if you like to sleep in a really quiet room. Overall, this is a great place in Old Town Montreal. I highly recommend it.
Excellent location, three beautiful apartments

Fantastic location in Old Montreal. Very easy to find and get into. It seems like most of the building, if not all, are Airbnb units and that the host owns a few of them. I didn't have any problems with the building or room key access. The walls are very thin and I could hear the neighbors doing things like using the bathroom and opening/closing the blinds but thankfully that's the only noise we had to deal with and it wasn't a big deal.

The air mattress was easy to set up (it has a built-in pump) and there were plenty of linens to make the bed with. The bed and the air mattress were comfortable. The duvets are thin but warm. The air mattress was easy to deflate and put away.

The shower has really good flow and the water is nice and warm. The handheld unit leaks a bit of water even when it's not activated, so be careful that you have it pointed well away from the shower door or else it will leak onto the floor as a few inches of the door seal are ripped/missing.

I didn't use the kitchen at all so I can't comment on it. The only thing I did notice though is that there is no microwave, but there is one of those small toaster ovens and an actual oven if you need it.

We had an issue the first night with the heat and had a cold night and morning. There was a lot of back and forth with the host as they weren't understanding me when I was telling them that the thermostat wouldn't let me set it higher than 20, but they solved the problem by the next night (they provided me with details on how to reset the thermostat so now it can be set higher than 20) so hopefully it won't be a problem going forward for anyone else.

Overall a decent stay. It's a bare bones place but it's worth it for the location. If you're there for at least a few days pick up some extra toilet paper as they don't leave you a lot and bring some shopping bags so you can change the bathroom garbage.
Great location with great restaurants and views of Old Port Montreal. Hosts are very responsive to questions. The place itself has a lot of natural light.
Excellent location! Stylish, comfortable place with an easy rental process. Highly recommend it!
Thank you! They were very helpful and very responsive. They answered us very quickly and were very nice! :)
Great location. Clean. Definitely recommend staying here!
Great location and spacious accommodations. Highly recommend!
Superb apartment in the heart of Montreal.
The location is excellent, and communication and check-in were efficient. We had a few minor issues with the amenities that prevented us from giving this Airbnb a five-star rating.
The place was awesome and we really enjoyed our stay.
Well-lit airy space in an unbeatable Old Port location, a stone's throw from Notre Dame. I'd stay here again next time I'm in town.
Nice location, with many Chinese restaurants nearby to explore. The host is nice.
The place is beautiful and appears just as advertised in the pictures. The location was perfect and the decor was just beautiful! We will definitely be returning!
Impressively high ceilings and spacious living area.

The apartment is very stylish. I really loved the high ceilings and exposed brick. The location was great, it was close to Notre-Dame basilica, cafes, restaurants, shops and a short walk to the Old Port. We stayed with kids and being close to everything was a bonus. Frederick and Kloe were amazing hosts and very responsive. When we had a problem with the air mattress, they quickly responded and provided another one. I would definitely recommend this place.
Really great place. We had everything we needed and the place was warm and clean. Paid parking lot across the street. Starbucks and two breakfast places within a two-minute walk.
Great location, very clean and spacious. Excellent communication on very short notice

The room is in a beautiful part of town and was clean and comfortable to stay in. Lots of natural light! 

The locking mechanism for the room while I stayed was somewhat unreliable. The hosts were informed and will hopefully address the issue.

Loved staying at this place. Conveniently located in the heart of old Montreal, super clean, stylish, and extremely comfortable. Everything you need to cook or relax is available at this place. Super spacious with plenty of light. Extremely recommend this place. Easy check-in & check-out. If I ever go back to Montreal, I’ll definitely stay at this place again in a heartbeat!
Great location
This place is fantastic value for the price, and there were no major problems. However, the bathroom is not in good shape.
The host cancelled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 74 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 64 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Good location, close to transportation, and clean. Please note that the exterior stairs should not be used if it is raining.
Great place, wonderful location, and an amazing host. I would definitely go there again!

Mohamad's place was exactly as expected. Very clean, spacious, and located in a good location. My only issue was that at the time of booking, I informed him multiple times I would not be arriving until after midnight but he kept on insisting keeping the check-in time at 9 pm and to update him later if anything changes.

Eventually, closer to the date I informed him again I would not be arriving until after midnight and he told me unless I found someone to check in on my behalf I would not be able to check in until 10 am the next day. Thankfully, I had a friend in Montreal who could help me but it would’ve caused major problems for me if I didn’t. I wish he could’ve informed me of this at the time of booking as he was aware of my schedule.

Other than that, everything else went smoothly and communication was fast. I would recommend staying here.

My friends and I stayed at Mohamad's place for a weekend in December and it was a great experience. The place is very nice and clean and is in a great location downtown. He replies right away if you have any questions just text him. We had no issues with our stay.
Excellent host experience. Great communication, amenities, and cleanliness.

James' place was great for us, cheap and just enough. It's extremely close to everything and has parking! The view is fantastic. We didn't stay in the Airbnb much but the building is quiet and safe which was what we were looking for. The shower water temp jumps around a bit but pressure is good. The bedroom gets warm in the mornings, James let us know this when we arrived, and there was air conditioning and heating which was perfect. The parking is safe and secure as is the front door. For guests looking for a lockbox, we had to meet the host for the key. From there getting in and out of the building is easy. Thanks!

Quiet place with a clear view of Montreal and a private balcony. The decor is mainly from the 1980s but definitely has its charm.

James is a dedicated and responsive host, you can count on him!

Exactly as described. Great location for walking up to Mount Royal or downtown.  ~2 blocks away from Guy-Concordia metro station. 

One other note: the walls are apparently pretty thin.
James met me with keys, and went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable. He even offered me champagne!

James was a wonderful host and incredibly responsive. The place was exactly as described, and we took full advantage of the great balcony by having breakfast there every morning. It was the perfect size for the two of us. The place is also very convenient if you're planning on hiking up to Mont Royal and close enough to the shopping district on Sherbrooke if you're looking for places to shop or eat. James also has great suggestions if you're looking for anything in the area. Thanks, James! Hope we can come back again when we decide to return to Montreal!

A beautiful apartment in Montreal with a very nice balcony view.
Top welcome by James.
We recommend.

Great location, short walk to the metro, which makes getting around town very convenient. James left very clear instructions and was very easy to work with. We would definitely stay here again if we return to Montreal!
James was a gracious host and an outstanding communicator. I had a fantastic time and James made the stay even better.
Great parking! Our modest SUV fits under the low overhead pipes. Artistically appointed, and how did you fit that mirror in the door!?  Softest bed in Montreal. We'll be back!
Great location and stylish touches!
James' place was great! It was in a very good location, very comfortable, and James was very responsive. Would definitely stay again!
Fantastic location in a beautiful city. Parking, easy access to the Metro & art museum, responsive host, and many conveniences made this a great stay. Thank you, James!

James is a fantastic host, and his space reflects that! Great location with a nice view from the balcony. 

The only warning is that his neighbor is eccentric and possibly mentally unstable. She started banging on our wall excessively when we made some noise at 8:30 in the morning and then told James that we were up at 6am doing all sorts of things while we were sleeping...  
Not necessarily the place to go if you plan on making any noise in the bedroom. Otherwise, it was great with lots of instructions and information.

I rented the house for 20 days for my parents who were visiting me in Montreal. We liked the location and the view very much. The price wasn't too high. The experience was okay but not the best experience I've had with Airbnb places. Some complications occurred, and the host expected my collaboration in solving the problem. The internet didn't work for the first three days, and it took the host some time to accept that there was a problem and solve it. The host was friendly and apologized when I expressed my dissatisfaction with something but not as respectful as what I expected. For example,  when I went to pick up the keys, he was still busy cleaning the bathroom and doing the laundry, and he jokingly asked me to help him with preparing the house.
Parfait!!!
All good :) thanks
Their neighbors are being too noisy!  Upstairs...
We had a great time at Julia's place. The apartment is very clean!
Great value, Julia was friendly and communicative. The apartment was clean and comfortable. The location is far from downtown but close to a metro station.

My family and I spent one night at Julia's apartment. The place is clean, spacious, and it looks exactly as the pictures. It's perfect for four people. There's a subway station within less than ten minutes, so you can easily get to downtown and avoid traffic. Julia answered very quickly all our messages and was very accommodating with our arrival time.
Very good!

Made my trip to Montréal much more exciting. Julia is amazing with communication, check-in time was at 5 but she allowed us to come at 3 which was extremely helpful. The apartment was spotless and Julia was sweet enough to leave towels on our beds, leave us cookies and supply us with shower necessities. Highly recommend!!

This place was disappointing. Communication on how to get in was unclear. There was no toilet paper, or bedding for the "SOFA BED" (which was actually just a couch) or the cot. There is also no microwave, coffee maker. Check-in and check-out instructions were unclear.

The place was small, tidy, and comfortable. The apartment was convenient for us. The tourist attractions were not too far from the house. Overall, it was good. I didn't particularly enjoy the parking system though.
We stayed at Julia's place for a night with five people; it was very spacious and the amenities were great. The location was a little far from downtown. Julia was a very gracious and kind host!
Un unbeatable value for money apartment report
Welcoming hotel! Apartment close to shops and the metro. Clean accommodation throughout
Great place to stay when visiting Montreal. Close to the metro and shopping.
Great place! Very clean and cozy.
Julia's place is very clean and well organized. Promptly respond to any queries you may have. The location is near Walmart, Metro Plus, and Metro. I definitely plan on returning to this place.

Julia is a very responsive and available host via message. The apartment is decorated in an old-fashioned style but remains very clean and well-maintained. The neighborhood is quiet. We slept very well there and the apartment was equipped with everything we needed, so we felt almost like home. It's better to have a car to get there, however. I recommend!

Very fairly priced, incredibly clean and comfortable. ONE ISSUE out of their control...if you are a light sleeper, the noises (especially early in the morning) from the apartment upstairs may wake you.

Very close to the Metro (subway).

Julia's place is cute and very accessible. Communication with Julia was great.
The apartment is clean and has street parking. Walmart is very close. The public transit metro station is a 5-minute walk. We really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend this place.
Convenient location.
Great place to stay!

Julia's house is beautiful and comfortable; we had a small problem with the shower and she fixed it immediately, and she gave us a few gifts as a gesture of apology for the inconvenience, she helped us with everything we asked. We highly recommend her!

We had a wonderful time with our host. The house is near the metro and bus, about 6-8 minutes walking; near a supermarket. The house is nice and has full service. I love the decor. Julia answered all of our questions. We had some problems with the hot water system, but I informed her too late so we couldn't do anything. That was my mistake. If I travel to Montreal again, I will stay with Julia again.
Located close to all amenities, but the bedding smells moldy and old. Not ideal for people with allergies.
The station is nearby and there's a large convenience store within a 3-minute walk. However, insects and noise from the neighborhood are bothersome.  I tried cooking but the water pressure is bad.
Excellent metro access. The twin beds were perfect for our children. It was clean and comfortable. Parking was easy, and we enjoyed the nearby park.

The apartment is not in a central location, but I guess there might be some public transportation. I was new to Montreal so I don't have much information about the connectivity. There was a TV but no channels were working. The place was okay for a single night stay.
Julia was very friendly and responsive. The apartment was close to the metro.
A nice and quiet neighborhood, and a very spacious place with plenty of amenities! Parking is street parking. It had everything we needed and Julia was also very quick to respond, would recommend!

Excellent value for money.
Close to the metro and a shopping center.
Host very responsive to messages.
Ideal if you need a place to sleep and eat.

Julia's place had everything we needed! She responded to us quickly!

The bathroom was a little bit small, but everything else was good.

The apartment is next to Walmart, with a metro station for shopping and errands. The metro station is also nearby. Julia is always available and responds quickly; the rental price is not expensive at all. They are all equipped. It's convenient for a family of 5 people to stay for a few days or more. I recommend renting this apartment.
Julia has made her best effort to keep the apartment clean, which is a reality.
Great location, extra space, generous living room
Lovely place!
Nice stay for one night, Julia's place was nicely air-conditioned.
Beautifully decorated apartment, sparkling clean. Thank you for a wonderful stay!

A very quiet place, clean and with a washer and dryer, it's a bit old but works fine. We were able to restock the clean clothes after a few days of travel. 

Street parking is easy to find, with no restrictions. It's about a 20-minute drive from Downtown Montreal; we didn't use public transportation. 

Self check-in was convenient. 5 stars from me.
Clean accommodation in a very quiet street but close to all shops and small restaurants (accessible on foot). Parking space is very easy to find in the street. Excellent value for money
The bed linens are not clean with some hair on them. The stovetop is dirty. The bath towels are too dirty to use.
The apartment was absolutely stunning. The floor was spotless and almost everything was available, from cooking utensils to some cooking ingredients. It's a perfect apartment for families.
Charming small apartment, clean. Easy to communicate and precise.
A comfortable accommodation where any initial difficulties encountered upon arrival were resolved promptly.  Good location close to shops and public transportation lines (metro or bus).

Very nice place. The location is 25 minutes north of downtown. It's a quiet neighborhood with side street parking, which can get full in the evening. The apartment's location is very close to fast food restaurants and grocery stores like Walmart. The home was nice and tidy. It's a comfortable place to stay and I will definitely book again in the future.

The apartment was exceptionally clean. Good size apartment with 2 good size bedrooms - plenty of space for our family of 5. Everything we needed was there - plenty of towels, bedding and all the basics in the kitchen to prepare some quick meals. The air conditioning was awesome - Never thought we would need it in mid September but sure did this year. Location is a bit outside the center which didn't matter to us as we were visiting relatives in the area. Only 5 min walk to the subway though - so one could get downtown easily. Great communication with host and easy check-in.
We had a comfortable stay at Julia's place. The apartment was kept very clean.

The room was still easy to find, just the room had some outdated decor. Julia prepared apples for us to eat. We saw maple trees blazing red on the balcony early in the morning and it was a beautiful sight.
The place is cozy, but will be a little bit crowded for a family of five. It's an extremely old building. It would be better if the price was lower.

Hello,

You are very close to public transportation, particularly the metro, which is very convenient.  A short walk from shops and restaurants, it's also very practical.
Very clean and well-equipped.
I am happy with the location, close to shops, a bit secluded but that's what I was looking for. I was able to connect with Julia before and after my departure. Thank you again.
We enjoyed our stay but encountered some hot water problems.

Julia's place was very neat and clean. 
It was quite spacious and we had a very comfortable stay there.
Lovely place! Thank you Julia!

Super accommodation, close to shops and the metro station. Only downside is the noise from the neighbors above. However, I recommend it for anyone who doesn't have a car as the location is convenient and it's very easy to get around everywhere.
Everything was perfectly fine over there, thanks
Very nice and clean place. Great location. Julia was nice and quick to respond to our calls.
Translation: The accommodation was clean and the host was so kind that it was really good.

It was my first Airbnb experience. Julia made it a good experience for us and was a very responsive and patient host with all my questions. The place was very clean and close to the metro and some grocery stores.

Julia and her husband were very attentive and quick to respond to our needs. The place was sparkling clean. The location was great! I will definitely choose Julia's place if needed in the future. Thank you, Julia

This is an apartment that is a bit old but very comfortable. The apartment is located outside the city center in a very accessible neighborhood where you can find many restaurants, shops and services. There's parking everywhere on the surrounding streets. The cleanliness of the accommodation is impeccable and Julia responds quickly.
I was not expecting so many thoughtful little touches! She really went the extra mile. The coffee maker in the room was particularly heavenly.
Ideal location, good communication, very clean and very comfortable. Charlene is very kind. I recommend this rental.
Charlene's place is really cozy.  She is also so thoughtful and nice. I highly recommend this place!

Excellent value, Friendly host, nice room and close to Metro for easy movement. The use of the kitchen during my stay was a nice bonus. Downsides were breakfast was listed in the description but was not provided. Also offered an early check-in which wasn't possible after my booking was made. However, I would still recommend the room.
Very nice room in Charlene's home. Metro station and city bike rentals around the corner. Would love to stay there again!

In many ways, Charlene was an excellent host. She was very accommodating with check-in and check-out times. Also, her apartment is nice, has all the necessary basic features, and would be clean for anyone who isn't a neat freak.

For us, it wasn't a problem because we are deep sleepers, but beware that the house has rather thin walls, and you will easily hear noise from the rest of the house during the night.
Simple but cozy. Charlene was lovely. Comfy bed and coffee were a nice touch.
Comfortable room near city center and metro station.
Cozy bedroom with balcony, comfortable bed. Charlene was very welcoming.
Amazing place and great location!
Nice stay for young people in a big apartment. Charlene is a very friendly host! Thanks, xoxo
Super stay! Great encounters! The bed was super comfortable and we had a great time!
Charlene was very approachable and sweet! The place was cute and stylish for someone younger to stay in.
Charlene is very friendly. The Airbnb is very well-located within walking distance of the metro, and the room is very nice. I recommend it 100%.

Very nice place. Super clean and cozy :-)
I recommend it 

Super beautiful place, very clean and pleasant.
I highly recommend it.
Charlene's place is great for travelers, we only stayed one night but we rested well and she was really nice and welcoming!

The location is great. Parking wasn't free. The apartment was lovely and had a French style. The indoor cat was really adorable and the friendliest cat I've ever seen! Charlene was cute, friendly, and helpful! I would definitely recommend this place!

Charlene was an excellent host. She gave us all the privacy we needed and provided all the essentials for a comfortable stay. You can't ask for anything more at this price point. Charlene even went out of her way to recommend a great local live music bar for us to enjoy during our New Year's celebration. The room is located at the front of the apartment, and it's a good size. The futon bed provided requires caution not to put too much weight on one side - we learned this the hard way. We both fell off the bed while sitting on one side of it.

Charlene was a very gracious host. She was immediately friendly in her greeting and made me feel welcome. I also found that her place represented the local lifestyle in Montreal perfectly. Thank you! I would highly recommend it.
Very friendly host, perfect to start your stay in Quebec!

I loved it. I needed a room in Montreal for a few days mainly for sleep and this place exceeded my expectations. Charlene and Simon were friendly and respectful. There were many amenities I did not use, but appreciated.
Charlene provided a very warm welcome. The apartment is spacious and the bedroom is very well furnished. I haven't missed anything at all. Very well located. Thank you for the good advice.

Perfect room within a 2-minute walk of the subway station.
The apartment was clean, and Charlene was very helpful. 
Comfortable bed, clean bathroom, and fully equipped kitchen.
A lovely little apartment in a great location to access central Montreal via the subway! Great value for money :)
"Welcome stay! A location near the metro, and the room is very well taken care of with great details."

It was a lovely room where we could rest comfortably as there was no noise. The house is very close to a metro station which makes it easy to get around, plus it has a plaza just a block away with affordable restaurants. The description says there's a cat, but it's not bothersome at all because it never entered our room and we only saw it a few times.
Great location.  Considerate host. Cool common area.
Good one
It was close to the metro station and very convenient. Charlene was a nice host!
Nice place, brighter than many Montreal apartments! Clean, equipped for cooking. All needed services in the neighborhood. Very responsive and helpful host. Thanks for the great stay, Catherine!

Catherine was an excellent host! She was very easy to work with, accommodating and flexible. The place was very clean and comfortable, located in a great area of town. I would definitely stay here again.

We really enjoyed our stay at Catherine's place. The apartment is really cute and offers everything you need. The location is also great: between Little Italy & Mile End on a quiet street. The apartment has a small balcony which is great for having breakfast or a glass of wine in the evening. Catherine is super kind and welcomed us at her place and explained everything. Would definitely stay here again.

Catherine was an excellent host. We stayed in Montréal during an extreme heat wave and she went out of her way to install air conditioning and make sure we were comfortable. She is generous and warm and answered our questions about things to do outside the city, too. Her apartment is clean and spacious with good light in the front room and kitchen. It's also situated in an ideal location, very close to Little Italy and Mile End. It's very easy to walk to where you'd like to go, or bike, or take the Rosemont metro. I would definitely recommend staying at Catherine's!
Catherine's place was perfect for our short stay!

Catherine's space is great; good location, close to the metro and main roads if you need somewhere to eat, pharmacy, or laundromat. We were in town for the Osheaga music festival so we were out of the house most of the day, but while we were there it was perfect! Super hot outside but her AC unit helped keep the place cool. Would stay again!

Catherine’s apartment was a perfect place for my stay. Catherine is a very special host, super kind, warm, and she was available whenever I needed. The apartment is very clean and cozy, and it offers everything you need, plus the sunny light throughout the space. It is within a great and completely safe location, between Little Italy, Mile End, close to Plateau and just a short walk from the metro. I would definitely love to stay here again!

Combine a great address with a very friendly host. The apartment is large enough for two and is located in a very nice neighborhood close to the Beaubien and Rosemont stops (a 5-minute walk). The area has many shops, which are very pleasant! A safe address in Montreal.

Very spacious apartment, perfect for one or two people and very well equipped! It's also nice to have Catherine live there (a very friendly host) and to have a real apartment instead of just a business. The neighborhood is top with shops nearby everywhere around! Rosemont and Beaubien metro stations are very close to the apartment, too. 

I highly recommend it!
Simple, clean, easy. Perfect location. Will definitely stay here again next time I come back for work. Catherine was very easy to communicate with.

This is a beautiful and ideally located apartment in the Plateau. The serene and stylish atmosphere, the ease of being on the first floor (which was also very quiet thanks to good windows and thick walls), the family-friendly decor and proximity to some of our favorite secondhand book shops, cafes and restaurants made this a perfect place for us to enjoy Montreal. The natural light and comfortable furniture made the atmosphere so pleasant while we relaxed after an outing. Communication with the hosts was very quick, polite and helpful. I highly recommend it and I hope to return here on a future visit!

Apartment very well located on the Plateau-Mont-Royal

Very pleasant

Excellent responsiveness from the owners and Antoine

Very easy to pick up and leave the keys

We recommend
Very good address!

I really enjoyed my stay. The location was amazing and so was Omer! Great communication and the check-in was simple. He greeted me right away at 6AM in the morning and stayed to talk and educate me about the location, places to visit and recommendations. It was very helpful. His apartment was awesome. Clean, well maintained, and in the kitchen there were all the appliances you would need to cook. Omar's studio was close to major avenues and the metro station as well. The location alone was exactly what I was looking for. There were so many restaurants, coffee shops, boutiques and pubs nearby. There is also a grocery store close by to pick up a few things if you wish. All the top attractions are within walking distance as well. This area is very safe. In all, my stay was wonderful! Thank you Omar for everything! You were the best host I've ever seen.
The host cancelled this reservation 158 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
It's such a nice, comfy and clean place. Great location; close to shops, cafes, pubs, bus routes, etc. Nice host as well. Highly recommended.

Overall a good experience. If you're looking for a no-frills place to crash in Montreal (not spending much time in the apartment), this will do the job. About a 5-10 minute walk to the closest Metro station. Given the weekend (Canadian Grand Prix), the value was acceptable. It did get a bit stuffy, as it's a 3rd floor unit with no AC, but wasn't a huge issue given the gorgeous weather during our stay.
nan
Pretty good spot. No AC but with fans it's okay. Great location too. Never dealt with Omer directly as he had a friend handling us.
Outstanding host! Thank you for everything

Nice place, very close to a metro station and some good breakfast spots nearby. A short 20-minute walk plus subway ride to downtown. 

This is one of the best value/quality Airbnb experiences I've had!
My friends and I loved Mathilde's place. Stylish and cozy. Quick and easy communication. Thank you!
We highly recommend this place.
Super welcome from Mathilde and Max! Discovering Montreal from this accommodation was a real pleasure.

We arrived easily from the airport to Mathilde's place. We found the keys in a key box, which is very convenient!

The apartment is perfect! Everything matches the photos and description. The bathroom has an enormous Italian shower. The bed is 160 cm of good quality. We stayed during the heatwave and the accommodation was pleasant because it was cool (very welcome after a long day of sightseeing). To reach the "Sauvé" metro station, you need to count about ten minutes at most on foot. Then, about twenty minutes to reach the "Champs de Mars" station, and it costs $6 each way. The neighborhood is quiet and you can park for free in front of the house. Mathilde is a young mom so we can hear the children playing but it remains very acceptable. On the other hand, we hear more the bathroom drain noises from above, but that's still okay. 

We recommend this accommodation without reservation as it gave us complete satisfaction.

The accommodation perfectly matches the photos and is very well equipped. Everything was clean. Mathilde and her family live above, but I wasn't at all disturbed by the noise. The neighborhood is very quiet, with a metro station to reach downtown Montreal located within a 10-minute walk. There is also a bus that passes on the avenue.

Everything exceeded our expectations: the place was beautiful, clean and fragrant, and Mathilde is an excellent host, welcoming but not intrusive. For every need regarding my child, she has been invaluable... a truly unforgettable stay!
Excellent apartment, clean, renovated, located a few minutes walk from the metro. We will definitely return to it on our next visits
Great accommodation, really spacious and private. Nice location. Highly recommended!

Mathilde and Max helped us find the right addresses in Montreal as well as for the rest of our stay. 

Very welcoming and warm, Mathilde and her family were able to meet our expectations, we recommend them 100%. 

The studio is impeccable in terms of equipment and cleanliness. 

Thank you again & see you soon! 

Alex, Lauriane & Nathanaël

I stayed at Mathilde's studio for one month. 

For those who wish to book several weeks:  Know that my choice was quick as she was the only one in all of Montreal offering an entire studio (apartment) near a subway station and also offered a significant discount for long-term bookings. Much cheaper than many landlords elsewhere.

My impression: I really liked this studio, which was very cozy and clean. It's located in a truly quiet neighborhood and easy to park in front at any time. Recently renovated, you will feel very comfortable and at ease.  Possibility of dimming lights (bathroom, bedroom, etc), which I loved the most :) 

Communication: Mathilde responds with great kindness and promptness to your messages and questions, and ensures that you have everything you need. 

I recommend it for anyone looking for a place in Ahuntsic or near a subway station.

Super address in the very nice Mile End neighborhood. Cozy apartment perfectly suited for 4 people. The neighborhood is really cool with many nearby addresses.

Communication with Yanou was great! Don't hesitate, put your bags down!
Wonderful location and communication. Lumi's place is a fun apartment designed to encourage lots of laughter and memories!
Cool spot, super funky, super clean and super well-located!

Well-located apartment in a quiet neighborhood close to the city center. The interior space is quite adequate. 

We were very well received by Cedric and his friend who are friendly and available.

A great place for couples or solo travelers to stay in Montreal. The rooftop patio offers an amazing view of the Plateau and Mount Royal. Anything you need is within walking distance and if you're going further, there are two subway stations nearby.
Cédric and Yuu are very sweet, and the apartment is close to restaurants, shops, and nightlife as well.
Translation:  A wonderful stay at Cedric's place, he is a caring host, the apartment is clean and has a beautiful location.

Cedric was very welcoming and accommodating! I would highly recommend him if you are looking for a simple, clean place near Sherbrooke metro with a helpful host who knows the city. Nice rooftop access too
I highly recommend Cedric and Yuu's apartment! The location is excellent, the room is very comfortable, and most importantly, the hosts are very friendly and welcoming.
Great location! I would highly recommend it! The room is simple, clean, and the bed is very comfortable! Cedric and Yuu are very helpful and friendly.
Excellent location with many beautiful places to explore on Mount Royal Plateau. Cedric and Yuu are very accessible and kind. I highly recommend them!

Cedric and Yuu are very welcoming and warm, Cedric is ready to suggest places to visit (bars, restaurants, etc...). The apartment is very well located, downtown easily accessible on foot. A superb terrace offering a beautiful view of Montreal.

Cedric is a very nice guy. The room is comfortable and the apartment is nice. Clean. Quick responses from Cedric. Location is good. Less than 10 minutes walk to Sherbrooke Metro station. Less than 10 minute walk from Saint Denis street where there are nice coffee shops

Very welcoming and friendly hosts. The apartment is very pleasant, clean, rejuvenating and well located. Many shops nearby. Don't hesitate to enjoy the terrace which offers an unbeatable view of Mount Royal. 
Leased, tested and approved +++ :-)

A very nice apartment in a quiet and super pleasant neighborhood of Montreal. We loved to walk around on foot in this area. The rooftop access is a plus appreciated feature. 

Cédric is very friendly and accommodating, he was very flexible with our arrival and departure times!
Great location near public transportation. Cedric was helpful and welcoming. Also, adorable cat!
Perfect welcome! Very good host. Very good stay.

Yuu and Cédric welcomed us very well! We had a great opportunity to chat, which was really nice. The apartment is super well located, +1 for the rooftop terrace! 
I recommend it :)
Cedric is very friendly, welcoming and available to answer any questions! Apartment well located at a good value for money

Well-located apartment with access to all amenities and a rooftop terrace (360° view). Good value for money.

Yuu and Cédric are very friendly, welcoming and jovial. We discussed many topics and shared some excellent homemade fries and burgers;-)

We had such a delightful time at Cedric and Yuu's place! The location is very close to the Metro station, bus stops, and nearby restaurants. Cedric was extremely helpful and thorough with recommendations which I appreciate so much from a local. I appreciate the flexibility with check out time because we had an evening flight. We had a blast overall and can't wait to visit Montréal again.
Cedric and Yuu are very friendly. They are good advice for discovering Montreal, especially since their apartment is very well located!

We had a wonderful time with Cedric and Yuu - they are incredibly kind and friendly hosts, and they have the cutest cat! The apartment is super cozy, and we loved sitting out on the roof terrace as well as the great location.  Access to laundry and proximity to the subway were also very helpful. So many nice cafes, bars, and restaurants in the neighborhood. We would definitely stay again!
Cédric & Yuu welcomed us with a smile and we were at home like in their own house!

We recommend.

You are very friendly, we had a pleasant time with you on the beautiful terrace overlooking Montreal. 

Good location for walking around the city.
Translation:  "It was a very nice stay at Cedric and Yuu's! We were very well received, they took the time to chat with us and give us good recommendations, it was awesome! Thanks for everything!"
The place is amazing, especially the rooftop terrace. It was great to stay there.
Cedric was absolutely phenomenal! He was very helpful, easy to talk to, and a genuinely nice guy. I personally love exploring cities on foot and he gave great recommendations on what to explore.
Good

I recommend Montreal despite not being as close to the city's main tourist attractions, it is beautiful and very peaceful, so we walked everywhere after arriving by car from the airport. The host was extremely helpful and gave us many tips.
Nice place. Nice hosts. Really nice rooftop terrace. Good location.

Cédric is very responsive, gives good advice, and the apartment is clean. 
Everyone is welcoming (even Minette).
Cedric and Yuu are very friendly and kind to us. They talk a lot :) Location is very good and the room is clean! Thank you
Friendly people, comfortable furniture, I highly recommend.

Wonderful stay at Cedric and Yuu's place.  The accommodation was in a very good location and offered an unbeatable value for money. 

A big thank you to Cedric for his valuable directions upon our arrival which helped us find accommodation and our room without any hassle. 

We highly recommend!

Cedric was very welcoming and a wonderful host. The room was just as pictured and located in a beautiful neighborhood. Cedric made the check-in and the whole stay go smoothly. He also gave us some great recommendations on things to do in Montreal. I would definitely recommend staying with him.

Great price/quality. Cedric is a very friendly and social host. Some shared rooms were a bit messy but overall we had 3 good nights at the place. It is between Mount Royal, Old Montreal, and the Olympic Park area, so ideal if you want to see all of Montréal. Public transport is very easy and we recommend renting a bike for $5 a day. Both options are very close to Cedric’s place.
Great location, great host, simple, quiet and clean room with a great mattress. Bonus is the adorable cat :) great value!

Cédric, Yuu and the kitten are adorable. My stay with them was perfect. They are attentive and Cédric is very good advice for good addresses. I had the chance to share some nice moments with them. The cat is super kind. Plus the accommodation is very well located and the roof terrace offers a beautiful view of the city. 

I highly recommend this warm place, both for the kindness of the hosts and for the fun Minette will bring you upon your arrival!
Everything is great and the host is excellent

Very good stay at Cedric and Yuu's place! 
Very pleasant people who made us feel welcome!

We had a superb stay at Cedric and Yuu's place. They are incredibly kind with great conversations and awesome little tips! The apartment is ideally located, close to the metro and downtown within walking distance of everything, it's functional, very comfortable with a fantastic view! And a super cute cat, I recommend it 100%!

Cedric was really nice to chat with and offered a lot of help pointing out places of interest. His place is located in a nice and quiet neighborhood, just a 10-15 minute walk from the train station with lots of small cafes around the area. Their cat greeted us first when we arrived. Really nice to have around :)
Cedric and his girlfriend are very nice and friendly! They are pretty good hosts. I must choose their room again when I arrive in Montreal next time.

Cedric and Yuu, form a charming couple, friendly and discreet at the same time. Not to forget Minette! The room is quiet and the bedding comfortable. Access to the roof is truly exceptional with its panoramic view. Cedric knows Montreal well and gives valuable advice. The Plateau neighborhood is pleasant with its pretty houses lined up. Close to the center and the metro.
Great place to stay. It's near Sherbrooke Station and the Greyhound bus terminal. The house is very clean, the bed is comfortable, and there's a cool cat to hang out with.
Cédric is warm, very helpful and has a concern for welcoming visitors. The apartment's location is perfect; it's very close to the metro, bus station, Parc La Fontaine and excellent restaurants.

The reunion after 3 days without crossing paths with my hosts was more than warm! I felt like I was at home with Cedric and Yuu who are REALLY welcoming and very interesting.

The location in the heart of the plateau is ideal for those who want to visit the city center and its charming surroundings.
Great host and house

What an amazing place! This is the best Airbnb experience so far, I would definitely recommend it to anyone going to Montreal and wanting to stay close to everything. The host is super nice and quick in responding. He provided us with fruits and breakfast when we arrived, as well as chocolate and water.

The place is perfect. It has an amazing view. Everything is within walking distance, and our host set up the place beautifully for us, making us feel incredibly comfortable. He was also extremely accessible and kind, just like the workers in the apartments. Highly recommend!

Great location! Just minutes away from public transit and lots of shopping along Ste. Catherine. Check-in was easy, and the concierge gave us no trouble at all. The room has lots of space, and is very accommodating for large groups. Will definitely book again! Highly recommend.
The apartment was great to stay in. It was a very spacious place for my friends and me. The location was fantastic, with everything we needed nearby.

The location and floor-to-ceiling windows are the selling points of this place. Mohammed is easy to communicate with and quick to respond. It ranks better than average amongst the places I've stayed in Montreal, and it's centrally located to most downtown highlights. It offers a better price than many, but lacks some amenities. Overall, we had a good time here.
A large space with two bedrooms and two bathrooms located in the center of everything. Mohammed was very responsive. Looking forward to staying there again.
Great place, super spacious and comfy beds! Great location, everything you could need! Mohammad was very nice and responded quickly! Would definitely stay again!
Lovely place! Big open layout, comfy beds! The location was perfect. Mohammed was kind enough to let us store our luggage while we had a few hours to kill before heading to the airport!
Spacious, bright, well-furnished apartment. Top location. Highly recommended!
Beautiful apartment and fantastic location! Everything you need is right there.
Great location.
Excellent place in the heart of downtown in a nice area. Quiet. Huge 2-bedroom condo.
I will go back there without hesitation!

Great spot! Heart of downtown. Parking isn't fun or cheap, but that's expected downtown. Living room with floor-to-ceiling windows is great. It can be a bit hard to sleep in on sunny days with the light curtains, but when closed, the windows block out all the noise really well. The host is very accommodating and quick to respond!
Mohammed's place was very spacious and clean. The parking lot across the street was very helpful, and the proximity to nightlife, great restaurants, and shopping was a major bonus!
Great place, spacious, host is quick to get back to you and very polite. I would highly recommend this location.
Great host, very responsive! Great space and amazing location. Will definitely stay here again.

Mohammed’s place was amazing! I asked him many questions since it was my first time using Airbnb and he was a big help! It was a great location as well, everything was close to the apartment! I would definitely recommend staying here; he is an amazing host! 

Thank you
Super well-located housing
Such a great location and Mohammed replied very fast
Thank you for the amazing stay. I will definitely return here if I come back to Montreal.
Great location! Walking distance to all downtown areas.

We really loved the location of the apartment and how spacious it was. 
Mohammed was super helpful and quick to respond. Very easy check-in/check-out process. 
Would recommend for a group hoping to be downtown / or in the city for something at either McGill or Concordia, very short walking distance to either.

Everything was great and the location was the best, with all the places around Rue Crescent st.

Mohammed is a great communicator and ensured everything we needed was taken care of promptly.

Best location in that area and would highly recommend it to anyone. 

Thanks again!!!

The location was good. However, the interior was a bit run down; the furniture seemed low quality and the beds broke when we sat on them. There were also water issues as there was no water when we woke up in the morning. The host was kind enough to refund 50% of the amount charged.
Great place with great location

We were a group of graduate students from Southwestern Ontario visiting Montreal for the first time for a conference. From the get-go, Mohammed was a great host. He got back to us within a few minutes and was great with all of our questions. The process of checking in was a breeze and the key was waiting for us. There were lots of towels, pillows, blankets, and other essentials. The beds were comfortable, there were lots of windows which allowed for natural light, and the space was very inviting! When we booked, the amenity "breakfast included" was on the list (accidentally), and because of this mix-up, Mohammed had breakfast delivered to us. It was delicious and very kind of him! The location is prime -- it is right near everything! There is a Starbucks right next door and a convenience store a couple of doors down. It's close to shopping sites on Rue Saint Catherine, including a large Forever 21. Uber was very accessible with this location! It was our first time ever using Airbnb and we had a great experience. Thank you to Mohammed! Recommend this as a place to stay in Montreal!

This place is a fabulous find and an amazing value! Walking distance to museums, many delicious restaurants, and all types of shopping. It's great for a family with kids and has three queen-sized beds that are very comfortable. Mohammed was incredibly helpful and responded to messages very quickly. We would absolutely stay here again!
Very spacious apartment. The beds and pillows were very comfortable. Mohammed was very accommodating with his quick responses to any questions or concerns we had. Great location!

Mohammed was extremely responsive and very hospitable. He gave us an extra set of keys upon request and arranged to fix an issue with one of the beds as soon as we reported it. The location of the apartment is excellent. It's right in the heart of the Golden Mile and was close to the conference center that I needed. My only concerns were the upkeep of the furniture/kitchen. Some of it was worn or in disrepair. It seemed like people might be smoking in the unit as well (we are non-smokers so the smell was very obvious to us). However, even with these limitations, we were very comfortable and enjoyed this space.

This place was in the IDEAL location. Super cute and cozy - perfect for a weekend getaway. We loved the big windows and two bathrooms. There was also shampoo and conditioner and a hair dryer. The stove was under construction but we didn't need it. Will definitely recommend this place!
Nice place and location
A comfortable and perfectly located place in the city.

The location was amazing and super close to downtown. The bedding was super soft and the beds were very comfortable! This place has the potential to be incredible! Beautiful floor-to-ceiling windows throughout. The bedroom with one bed could use some blackout blinds as it gets very bright very early (6am!). Mohammed did provide a sleep mask and now I understand why! There are some small things that I think could be added to improve this condo! Things like adding a towel rack with hand towels in the bathrooms, fixing the drop in the floors in the bathrooms (stubbed my toe a few times at night), fixing the missing oven cover, fixing the drawer in the kitchen (as was mentioned to me after we arrived) and the broken handles on the bathroom cupboards would make a huge difference in this place! For the price, this place is definitely worth it. The location itself made for a fabulous stay. Other than a few minor details, we loved the place and would definitely stay again.

Mohammed was very responsive: buzzed us into the place immediately, shared a second set of keys upon request and quickly. The only reason the review is not five stars is that the place was a bit worn (loose fixtures, limited kitchenware). Overall, we were very pleased with the stay, location, value, and certainly the host's responsiveness.
The place was expected. It was well-furnished. Although the kitchen could be better equipped, overall it was a spacious apartment located right in the heart of downtown.

Mohammed was an excellent host. He was quick to respond and answer any questions I had during my stay! We were a group of girls celebrating a bachelorette weekend (the two bathrooms were key) and the place was in a very good location downtown. It was also spacious and comfortable. It offered great value and I would highly recommend it to anyone.

The location was absolutely fantastic! The place was very nice and clean. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is that parking was a bit hard to find at times, leading to a lot of driving around or an overnight parking lot that costs $30, which can add up. Otherwise, our stay was very pleasant, and if we are back in Montreal, we would definitely stay at the same place!

Mohammed's place was great. It was very clean and the space was huge with high ceilings and lots of big windows which provided amazing natural light throughout the day. The location was amazing and everything was within walking distance. Check-in was a breeze. I would definitely recommend this place to others and I would book again in the future.
Large, awesome spot to explore the city. Easy and great communication with the owner.

Mohammed was very responsive. The location is wonderful. The apartment is very large with huge windows that open like patio doors. The kitchen needs some attention. Missing drawer front, missing oven door front, not many plates, cups, utensils. Great location. It smelled like smoke - could be an amazing place but all the little things have to be corrected. I have stayed in many Airbnb's and this is the first one I wasn't super pleased with. Mohammed was very responsive - didn't ever meet him in person.
There were dirty dishes left in the dishwasher, the bathrooms were not cleaned well, the kitchen needed repairs and the apartment was not secure. We did not stay.
Stylish apartment in downtown Montreal. Very close to all amenities.
Very good place and very good location in a wonderful apartment. Perfect for 6 people only.
Good price for a great location!
Good host. Very prompt with communication and the apartment is very nice. Good location close to all of Montreal.

We are still talking about how great this condo was for us. The location is unbeatable - a block and a half from the Museum of Fine Arts, three blocks from the Bell Centre and the grocery store, in the middle of shopping, bars, and restaurants galore. We were two couples and the layout was perfect - bedrooms private and separate, queen beds in both, and two bathrooms which is not common in Montreal.  We loved the spacious open concept living area, the comfortable furniture, and preparing meals in the kitchen. Great gathering spot for us to sit and recount our daily exploits. The building is safe and secure, and we were made to feel welcome. Expect light and noise because you are right downtown. It did not bother us as we found the windows really block the sound. All in all, it was the perfect spot for enjoying marvelous Montreal.
A beautiful spacious apartment in a great location, needing some TLC.
Mohammed's place was great for six of us! The place had plenty of space for a group of people, and the location couldn't have been better!

A very chic and clean apartment located right in Montreal. We were particularly impressed by the little details, such as pictures and decorations that made the apartments even more livable. Regarding cleanliness, there is absolutely nothing to complain about. The communication was excellent and we received a suitable answer to all our questions within a short time frame.
Great location
Recommended place.
The location was fantastic! There was enough space for everyone in our group. We received quick responses to any questions or issues we had. We would definitely stay again for a longer trip.
Great downtown location... near everything. Just a quick Uber to Old Montreal. Large clean apartment!
Exceptional condo ideally located, lacks a bit of dishes, we still recommend it
This place is in the perfect location. Close to bars, restaurants, and shops.
Very nice stay! Clean apartment

Nice apartment with an amazing host. The apartment was very clean and modern with a great view. The place was super cute and spacious. Location was great! It was very easy to get to different tourist locations, and there were great restaurants nearby.
What can I say? Mo was an outstanding host and I had an amazing stay. The location is great, a short walk to everything. The place was large and very comfortable
Nice communication and excellent location.
Really nice apartment in a great location. Advertised for eight people, but there were only three double beds. Mohammed responded to messages very quickly and was informative.
Great value and centrally located...I will definitely rent here when I return to town.
Best central location you can ask for in Montreal!
Nicely decorated space with a spectacular view of the city
Very well-located apartment, spacious and comfortable. We felt very good there. Mohammed showed great flexibility in adapting to our arrival and departure times. I highly recommend this apartment.
It exceeded our expectations. Great location, super affordable. Would consider going back in a heartbeat.
Great location! Great space! Highly recommend it
Lovely place located in downtown, making it very convenient.
Just want to say thank you. The apartment and vacation were amazing. Mohammed is incredibly responsive.
Very kind and patient
Ideal location, great place with modern amenities. We loved the view and the spaciousness; we'd definitely return.
Very well-located apartment in the heart of Montreal. The beds and view are superb. There are some repairs underway and a few minor damages here and there, but overall it is very good
Great place! Great location!
Amazing location perfect for a weekend getaway with a large group, very spacious

We were delighted with our stay at Mohammed's apartment. We stayed one night and wished we could have stayed more. The room was extremely nice and clean, and Mohammed was very attentive to our needs. We would definitely recommend it!
Great space in the heart of downtown. Very clean and stylish

This place matches the advertising and the reviews I researched before booking were accurate. It's around the corner from Crescent Street, shopping and the Bell Centre are within easy walking distance. The building is modern, easy in and out. Mohammed was quick to respond to any questions. Would definitely book again.

Great location if you're planning on spending your time in MTL downtown! Close to everything!

The apartment was very nice and modern. My only complaint would be that the oven was broken - but I didn't plan on doing much cooking anyway. Would definitely stay here again!
Great location, great value. Would definitely book again!
awesome place to stay :)
It was a very nice place, with the best location. You can find anything you need within the unit. I definitely recommend this place.
It's a lovely place with plenty of space that comfortably fits six people. The room layout is perfect for us!
Great location. Mohammed is a great host!
Thank you Jade for letting us stay at your place. It was truly a great night. Everything was clean and pretty. I will definitely book again!
