Jade was very quick to respond to any questions we had. We were only in Montreal for one night, so we didn't cook, but it looked like the kitchen had everything one would need. It was very clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our stay!
Our stay in this accommodation was perfect! The beds were very comfortable and there was plenty of space.

Well-located apartment. It lacked a washing machine and dryer, which forced us to ask friends for help with laundry (6 people including 4 children, this results in a lot of clothes). Neighbors are directly behind the bedroom door at the back. We can hear their discussions and kitchen smells (primarily burnt/garlic/onion) permeate the apartment during every meal. We've arranged to not stay there during these moments. The owner welcomed us warmly and quickly showed us the apartment. There was even a coloring book with crayons ;) There is no reserved parking space, but we were able to find a spot within 50 meters of the stairs. The apartment is located on the upper level of the duplex. The stairs are often icy in winter and salted regularly. We'll be back for sure!
I loved it and I would definitely rebook it again!
Very nice place perfect for a small group and right in front of the metro. Netflix is an advantage not to be neglected

This apartment is beautiful, the rooms are spacious and were very clean, and the beds were very comfortable! Little things were included that were very helpful (cooking oil, hair dryer, etc). We had a tiny issue with a thermostat and Jade responded quickly and was there to help in minutes and resolved the issue immediately. We were in town for wedding dress shopping and she gave us some really great tips. It is directly across the street from a metro and bus station and cabs are always around. It was also a 5-minute walk from several restaurants and shops on St. Hubert Street, including a grocery store. We loved it and would definitely stay there again!
The place was lovely and the area was awesome.
Great place and a great location!

You could not find a better location in Montréal for super easy metro access and finding everything you need within walking distance. The apartment was spotless, the beds were very comfortable, and we loved the bright but cozy kitchen. Since we were a big group, another comfortable chair or two in the living room would have been nice, but it worked out great for us. It was very easy to find as we arrived at different times. Do note that there are external stairs to reach the second-floor apartment which might be tricky for some with mobility issues.
Very beautiful apartment
Jade's place was extremely stylish and extremely close to the metro. I would love to come back!
Very nice place, updated and modern. Great neighborhood and friendly host. Book it!

Jade was extremely accommodating. She welcomed my friends and me with open arms. I give her home a 10/10 for cleanliness, everything you needed was provided and the decoration was very unique. She's also very approachable and I always asked her many questions and she would answer right away! It was really easy communicating with her. For the location: the metro is literally right in front of the property, which is easy to get to other places. I suggest everyone who comes and visits Montreal to book this place! Jade is amazing.

Booked this place for a night with a group of 10 and it was an amazing decision! The house is very well kept with an awesome chic design. Jade was amazing at answering questions very quickly and helping us make the most of our stay. Thanks again Jade! We all had a great time!

Jade's place is super cozy, with good design and very accommodating for people traveling as a group. She was also responsive quickly and all the photos on Airbnb were actually aligned with reality. I recommend her place to anyone!
One of the best places to live in Montreal and very close to public transportation...

We were a group of nine friends getting together for a wedding and this place was an awesome home base for us. It has a large common area, and is in an interesting neighborhood close to the metro. Jade was super-accommodating and easy to communicate with -- would recommend this place to any group looking for a Montreal apartment.

Jade's place was clean and well-appointed. Her communication during our stay was always quick and very responsive. 

There was a mishap with our kitchen appliances leaking to the downstairs apartment, but Jade went out of her way to ensure it was as non-disruptive as possible. 

Overall, we had a great stay and would definitely stay again!

The apartment was honestly really nice! Exactly as described and pictured. The location is flawless, a 30-second walk to an orange line metro station which was amazing. Only problem was the parking, signs are not accurate and I did get two tickets. Overall, great stay.
Loved the piano in one of the rooms! Overall a great stay and fast response to my messages.
Super clean and well-equipped. We really loved it.
What a wonderful place for a bachelorette weekend! Jade is a fantastic host and our stay was so comfortable and lovely. We felt luxurious for a great price.
Great stay in a lively but quiet neighborhood
Jade's house is much more beautiful than we had expected. Everything is super clean and new. We spent 10 days in her house and now I start to miss it! Thanks, Jade!
It was a nice stay, but I didn't like the fact that they didn't have a washer and dryer, and a mop or broom to clean the floors.  But everything else was really nice
Nice, very calm and clean flat, comfortable beds, well-equipped. And just in front of Beaubien Metro station. Easy contact with Jade. We'll be back!
Excellent communication
Very easy to deal with Jade! The apartment is beautiful, very clean and spacious. Perfect for a large family or group of people.
The decor is great, Scandinavian style, clean and tidy.
Very very pleased with the service and place. Thank you very much for an excellent stay!!
Great space, nice appliances, comfortable beds, loved having 3 bedrooms to spread out. Perfect location near the metro, fun neighborhood to explore for markets, dining and shopping.

Jade's apartment was very clean, had all basic amenities (towels, soap, toilet paper, cups, dishes, pans, sheets/pillows, etc), cute and stylish furniture, and in a wonderful location. It comfortably fit a bachelorette party of 10. A train station is right across the street and the apartment is walking distance to some great shops/restaurants, too. Check-in and check-out were a breeze. Jade was quick to respond to all my questions!
Great place to stay! Enjoyed it very much!
Okay place.

This is a great location about a 15-minute Uber from downtown. The neighborhood is filled with stores, cafes, and good food. The place itself is better than the pictures.  It's tight for 12 people, but 10 sharing beds would be fine if you're okay with one bathroom. We had 7 and it worked great.

A great place to stay for a large group! The home is located in a fantastic residential area, very clean, has all the essential amenities, and is stylish. Everyone in our large group of 10 just loves the place. Jade is also an excellent host—very quick to respond to our queries, made check-in super smooth, and provided some local tips on her website. We will definitely choose Jade's place again when we are back in Montreal.
I highly recommend Jade's accommodation which is very well-located, pleasant, clean and modern.

The place was exactly as it was described. It was conveniently located across the street from Beaubien Station. Jade was quick to respond to any questions or concerns. Internet and Netflix were included.
Great place, would stay here again next time I'm in Montreal

We loved our stay at Jade's place! It had plenty of room for our family of five. It's right across the street from the Metro station, which was fantastic. There are no laundry facilities, but we didn't need them, so that was fine with us! We had a couple of questions while we were there and she answered almost immediately! The only downside was temporary and not at all Jade's fault. They are doing construction right next door and they start every morning promptly at 7, so if sleeping in is a priority, it might not work out for a little while.  We would definitely stay there again though!
The place was really good; I love it, definitely going back there

I stayed at Jade's condo with a few friends for the preparation of my wedding and as soon as I came in, I already felt at home, everything was sparkling clean and very cozy. Communicating with Jade was very easy, she is very responsive and helpful and accommodating. My friends and I loved the place and our stay and I would definitely recommend it (there's even Netflix ;) Thank you Jade for everything!

Wonderful Stay.

We had a two-day stay at Jade's place with my family.

The amenities were just great.
Location was perfect.

Just needs a few more privacy locks for the rooms.

I would rate it 5/5.

The condo was exactly as advertised! It was clean and nicely decorated. Jade was extremely helpful in emailing places to visit while we were visiting! We definitely look forward to staying there again when we visit!

From the bottom of our hearts, thank you Jade!
We loved this Airbnb and would definitely book again!
Beautiful, modern kitchen. A keyboard piano was a lovely surprise in one of the bedrooms. Great AC!  A few steps from the Metro made getting around easy.
Very gracious and hospitable host. Spacious and clean. Location is perfect! Highly recommended
Great place to stay with a location right in front of the metro, making it super convenient for our large group! Clean and nice decor!
The location was perfect for traveling anywhere in the city.
The apartment was very clean and stylish, the location is amazing. I would give it a 10 out of 10. Highly recommend
Would recommend

A very nicely appointed apartment. Within walking distance to many great shops and restaurants. Comfortable beds and we enjoyed the piano in the apartment. There are steep exterior steps leading up to the apartment, but this seems standard for the neighborhood.

Comfortable apartment, air-conditioned (oh my, with this heat this year!) very well located in front of a metro station and close to shops and markets.
Recommended
Would recommend to anyone! Gorgeous, clean and comfortable

Jade's place was perfect for our bachelorette party. A group of girls visiting town for a celebration. The space was stylish, and the layout worked well for us in terms of space. We had room to have drinks together before going out, lots of room for sleeping, and the air conditioning was a nice touch. We had a great time here!

Apartment three well-located at 50m from a metro station. Decoration is modern, comfortable and clean. We were a group of 11 and there was no problem sleeping, enough mattresses for everyone. The only inconvenience: no dining table and chairs, only bar and stools, which wasn't ideal for 11 people. I recommend this apartment to all those who want to visit Montreal, especially because Jade is very responsive to guests and quick to respond to any request.
Great location, extremely clean and comfortable space.
Jade was a wonderful host! Timely responses, accurate descriptions and photos of the apartment, great location!

Jade's apartment was beautiful and made for a great place to stay for our girls' weekend. The beds were comfortable, the neighborhood was quiet, and it had all the amenities we needed. The apartment is located close to public transit and parking nearby was easy to figure out with Jade's advice. We truly enjoyed our stay!
Perfect location. Couldn't have asked for a more affordable and convenient location with everything a great stay requires. The Netflix account was a nice bonus!

Very stylish apartment, with plenty of room! The neighborhood has plenty of amenities, and getting around was very simple! We even found a parking spot right out front! Communication with Sonny was very simple and clear, and we very much enjoyed our stay!

We spent two nights in this beautiful apartment. It is even more beautiful than the photos show. Everything was spotless and very stylishly furnished. The beds are very comfortable. The kitchen equipment is good. 

Jade is an extremely friendly person and very helpful. Communication with Jade is uncomplicated, friendly, and very fast. The absolute highlight of the apartment is its great location. Within a 100 meters of the metro, in close proximity to many shops and restaurants. A 15-minute walk from the Jean Talon market. I highly recommend this apartment without hesitation. The price-to-value ratio is top. Thank you Jade!

Jade was a great host. I had my bachelorette party in Montreal, and 6 of us stayed there. It was the perfect place to hang out with friends and rest between going out. Large flat screen with Netflix, plenty of beds, dishes, towels etc. We would definitely stay again.

The pictures accurately depict the place, with ample room for larger groups. It's an ideal location; everything is close by (metro, IGA, shopping). Cleanliness is top-notch. The piano was a delightful bonus! Jade was incredibly understanding as one of my guests fell ill in the morning before check-out and Jade allowed us to stay until we had to leave for the airport. I would definitely recommend this space to anyone; it's well worth it!

Clean apartment that sleeps a number of people. Responsive hosts.

On the negative side, the apartment was not well provisioned for cooking own meals (we had to request utensils to cook with) and using the dishwasher (we had to ask for washing pellets and only one tea towel had been provided - we asked for more of both). 

Access to the first floor apartment is not accurate in the description. Access is via an outside winding staircase and some of the steps are rotten. The flooring just inside the front door may also prove tricky for those who are physically disabled as it is different to the flooring in the rest of the apartment.
The place is very close to the subway and market. Parking is easy to find. The neighborhood is quiet at night. Enjoy it.
Spacious and beautiful housing

We stayed in Jade's place for a ladies weekend, and it was fantastic! The place is cozy and clean, and the neighborhood is wonderful. We were able to walk to some amazing restaurants, markets, and shops, and the metro stop was right across the street with only a 30-minute trip downtown. Jade was responsive when we had a question and check-in was easy. We'll definitely be staying here on future trips to Montreal!

Jade's place is a gem! The location is great, really close to the Beaubien station. There are lots of nice bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. The house is very beautiful, with good decoration and all the amenities you would need. We were a group of 6 and it fit perfectly, even with only one bathroom.
Good location and I will come again
A little small for nine

The apartment is well located, close to major avenues heading towards Montreal's points of interest. For those who prefer public transportation or rainy days, the Beaubien metro station (orange line) is directly across from the apartment.  On Saint-Zotique street, a IGA supermarket is open until 11pm: this is a plus for late arrivals as we were able to pick up some breakfast items. The instructions provided were very clear. Jade is very responsive to messages. The apartment offers spacious bedrooms and sufficient kitchen equipment.
The cleanliness was lacking, the Wi-Fi wasn't working and the neighbors below were extremely noisy. Would not recommend for a long stay.
Great house. Superb location with the metro station right across the street. Nice little area, especially the bar Le Vestiaire, which was great for a few drinks in the evening
Jade is one of the most gracious hosts I have worked with through Airbnb. She was beyond helpful and accommodating!
Very clean and a modern and comfortable space for you and your friends. Highly recommend!
The apartment was amazing, we had a really great time. Jade was also always very quick to respond to questions. Everything was perfect
Great moment! The location is a must for your group. My girlfriend and I are really happy!
Great location, super clean.
Very good and clean

Nice accommodation located near the metro! 
Hosts are very responsive, pleasant communication. Thank you!
Had a wonderful stay! Would definitely stay here again next time we visit.
Convenient location, clean and friendly hosts - plenty of space.
Very nice, stylish, and much bigger than it looks! Great place!
Very well located, quiet despite the proximity of the metro and shops.
Great location and everything was perfect. Jade was an amazing host and was always there to answer our questions. We would definitely stay there again.

Very nice apartment. Extremely well-located, literally one minute walk from the Beaubien metro station. Quite peaceful and very comfortable. Although 10 people can sleep, there's no space for 10 people to eat at the same time (4 chairs and a sofa). At 6 people it was perfect :)
Cozy, clean and very well-located apartment!
Clean apartment!

The place is in a fantastic location, just 30 seconds from the metro and stores nearby.  It's very beautiful and clean inside. I personally had an amazing stay and would recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay or for events like nights out.
Third time's the charm for me, still so pleasant!
Excellent and clean Airbnb
We had a quick but pleasant stay. Good hosts and responsive to questions
Jade's place was sparkling clean and amazingly designed. My friends and I loved our stay there, and we totally recommend it for gatherings with friends. You guys will definitely enjoy this place! #1
Excellent! Spacious rooms with very comfortable beds.
Absolutely wonderful place and great location. Would stay here every time
Clean and spacious in a great location.
Great stay! Fantastic location.
Guys, I highly recommend this place if you're looking for an accessible neighborhood, the host is always available to help and she knows what she's doing.
Great apartment. Nice host. Would love to stay there again.
Great place, very clean with all the channels you can imagine

This was my first time staying at an Airbnb and the place was amazing. Everything we needed was in the house and we had no trouble with anything. I would definitely come back and highly recommend staying here for anyone looking for a place out in Montreal.

Beautiful split level apartment unit. Everything was very new and clean. Large, spacious, great shower pressure. Even the second bedroom sofa bed was very comfortable. Excellent location with lots of street parking and steps to the metro station and Atwater market. Loved it. Very responsive and helpful host.

The place was brand new. However, because one host had given me a lower price than she should have on a month-long stay, there was no attempt to provide the basic things I wanted as a guest, like salt, pepper, sugar, coffee, tea, a toaster, kettle, cutlery trays, hand soap, shower curtain, bath mat, facecloths, space for my folded clothes (it was all taken up by linens while the top shelves in cupboards, which I am too short to reach, were all empty) and most importantly, NOT ONE HANGER in the entire place. In fact, the other host said that because the first host had misquoted the price, he would accept the mistake but that the place came as is. I spent over $150 on things that had already been provided in many other Airbnb lodgings I've stayed in. Did I take all of it with me when I left? You bet I did, it's my hard-earned money.

In addition, the first host told me they would give me a good review even if the place looked like I'd had a "hangover party" when I left, in return for a 5-star review or they would be kicked off Airbnb. Funny, I paid a cleaning fee and left the apartment pretty darn clean as I had washed all the towels and swept the floors (no vacuum) the day before I left. Yes, I asked to extend for another month rather than have to find another one and move but I was willing to pay the higher price rather than go through another move. They had other bookings, two that I saw during the month but I found a much better place for less so I lucked out big time! All in all, the three places at that location run by these two hosts are nicely decorated, good location, but after dealing with these hosts, I won't rent from them again.

A truly beautiful Airbnb I've visited so far, nine and well-decorated. The cleanliness of the place is impeccable. The only negative point is the noise from the neighbors upstairs. We had to endure it for a large part of the evening and early morning. 

Communication with hosts was quick and clear. Close to a subway station and street parking easy.
This is a nice and clean place to stay. It's a very good location and I highly recommend it!

Luxurious and spacious 
Right in the heart of the small Burgundy (super restaurant, Lachine Canal, Atwater Market, etc.)
You step outside and you're in action

Great place with great access to the restaurant, theaters, and activities on Notre-Dame. We will definitely be staying there again.  Really comfortable beds, and the apartment was super clean. Communication and check-in were a 10 out of 10.

The place is very stylish and modern; it's a really nice place. However, because it's very new, some things are missing (like shower curtains) and other small touches. The floors were also quite dusty in the basement, but upstairs was cleaner. Additionally, the AC wasn't working during our stay, but the host was helpful in terms of offering solutions. The location is very nice and has plenty of restaurants and stores nearby, including the Atwater market.
Nice, very clean place with plenty of space and conveniently located to the metro station.

Nice place with a good location close to public transportation (2 subway stops to the Bell Centre), Atwater Market, Lachine Canal, and venues along Notre Dame. It's a nice area of Montreal and I would definitely stay here again!
Clean, spacious, and comfortable!
Nice place
The place is super clean and well organized. I definitely would visit again if I had the chance to visit Montreal again.

Frederick's place is new and stylish. It's located in the heart of almost everything, with many restaurants just around the corner. There are two levels, and the bedrooms are on the lower level. The shower is on the upper level while the bathtub is on the lower level. We experienced a heat wave during our stay, so the air conditioners were a bonus. I had a rental car and was lucky enough to park it right outside the house in front of Frederick's place. I enjoyed my stay at Frederick's and would recommend it to everyone.

Great place in an excellent neighborhood. Walking distance to many shops and restaurants along St. Henri. Right behind Lionel Groulx. The space was very clean and had ample space for our party of four (plus a baby).
Great place! I would recommend it!
Nice place, in a quiet location, but close enough to the action. I really liked that the door had a key code to enter instead of having to worry about keys!

Frederick's listing is accurate in the photos, and the space was modern and very clean. It was helpful to have two bathrooms for a family of five, and air mattresses in addition to the beds. It is conveniently located near the metro (about a 5-minute walk), and there is a large grocery store nearby as well as the Marche Atwater. We had a very positive experience! Merci!
Amazing luxury apartment close to everything! What a stylish way to spend a long weekend in Montreal with friends! We loved it! Thank you for hosting us! We will be back!
Great location, spotless place. Highly recommend.

Frederick's Place is very beautiful and spacious. It's located in a convenient spot with restaurants, the Atwater Market for groceries and supplies, bars, and easy access to multiple locations. If you enjoy walking, you can reach Old Montreal in 25 minutes. Beautiful place and highly recommended.
Nice clean brand-new apartment.
The house is a good place to stay for a short trip.
Good place to stay for a short trip.
loved it

Optimal location! There are a ton of restaurants nearby, gas stations, Pharmaprix, Atwater Market, SAQ (wine/beer store) and SuperC, all within a 2 minute walking distance. 

The amenities were superb, although we didn't cook, it is equipped with cookware/dinnerware - you would have to purchase your own condiments which is understandable (sharing these things are not entirely foodsafe). 

Street parking in Montreal is confusing - if you don't read French, ask the locals to decipher the signs, otherwise Fred and his team were quick to respond to our inquiries.

Keyless entry also meant we didn't need to fiddle around with key pick-ups or dropoffs.  Our group thoroughly enjoyed their stay and the convenient location.

Great location! Amazing space. Super classy and modern. It was close to everything. (A 5-10 minute Uber ride to downtown, the Old Port, and Westmount...) I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to my friends :)

This place was great for our needs. We were in town for work and this location/accommodation met all our needs. We were a couple and a friend. Communication with the host and co-hosts was very easy and as was the self-check-in. The apartment is located next to everything you could possibly desire, my tip would be to go to Foiegwa and order the pasta or burger dish!
Very nice and cozy place. It's very large, and the area is near many restaurants.
Frederick's place was very pleasant and the location near the metro was extremely convenient.
The place lived up to our expectations. We will be staying here when I return to Quebec.
Great space. Excellent location. Would definitely stay here again.
The apartment is very modern and clean, and the location allows for easy access to the Metro and several nearby restaurants. A very nice place to stay!
Great place for a family of five!

Very well located. Modern. Spacious. New construction. Please, as a guest, be careful not to break anything. I've noticed that in apartment 101 where we stayed a few items were damaged which means that some people were rough on the equipment. Too bad.
Great apartment at a reasonable price. Street parking can be difficult to find unless you speak French, but it's still a great place to stay.

I had a rough experience with my last Airbnb host and was skeptical about using Airbnb again, but I am glad to say these hosts have restored my faith in Airbnb. The place was even better than we expected and we can't wait to come back as soon as we can! This is by far the most perfect experience I've had with Airbnb!

This is a great apartment located in a central area. It was very clean and comfortable for the group of four we traveled with. Frederick and Kloe were both wonderful and responded to my questions right away. Overall, we enjoyed our stay!

A wonderful place, exceeding our expectations tremendously. The decorations are special, full of French style. 
The landlord is very friendly and responsive. 
We will definitely return!
Great apartment in a fun area of Montreal. The apartment is very clean - it looks newly renovated to me. Nice neighborhood with cafes, restaurants, and bars right around the corner.

Amazing apartment and great location. The location was perfect and within walking distance of great/trendy restaurants and cafes. Prompt communication and clear instructions made it very easy to check in and out. Very clean apartment with comfortable beds and free street parking available.
Beautiful space, very friendly host and quick to respond to as well as in a great location!

Great value for a very clean and big space! I traveled with a group of 9 people to Montreal, and we were lucky to find such a great place last minute when our Airbnb reservation was cancelled. Raymond was the co-host of this Airbnb and the person I communicated with. He was extremely helpful and quick with responses whenever I had a question about our stay. The apartment was very clean and tidy, the beds were comfortable, and the location was amazing (we could walk to many restaurants and shops). Just make sure you are following the signs for on-street parking in front of the apartment so you don't get a ticket. Overall, we had a great experience and would go back again!

A truly exceptional place to stay in Montreal. The apartment is perfectly located and close to shops. Raymond is a very attentive and caring host. There were no communication issues. The apartment is brand new and spotless, we had nothing to complain about. After having a bad experience with another host in Montreal, this apartment and host was a real surprise and we finally managed to enjoy our stay thanks to Raymond. I would like to thank you once again for your hospitality, for moving to help us, and for all the attention you have shown us. This has been truly appreciated by my whole family and myself. Thank you and good luck! :)

My accommodation is really very well-located. It's a 10-minute walk from the Mont Royal metro station. 
Shlo is a conscientious and very responsive person to any questions or remarks you may have for her.

Very cozy apartment with a fantastic location. It was a very affordable and preferable option compared to a hotel due to its location in a really cool neighborhood within walking distance of great restaurants. It was within a 45-minute walk of anywhere we wanted to go/see elsewhere in the city, too. The only real issue we encountered was sharing a bathroom with 14 people, but that was anticipated. Overall, it was a great place.
Disappointing experience. The apartment needed some repairs and the host was unreachable when there was an issue. I would not recommend

We loved our stay in this magnificent ground floor apartment and can't recommend it enough. It's in the best location in Montreal (Plateau/Mile-end)! The bedding and towels were nice and clean, as was the kitchen and bathroom. The home was large and it's stocked with all the necessary amenities, kitchen essentials, laundry detergent for the brand new washer/dryer. They even had a Keurig machine and supplied the pods! And they had hotel-style toiletries (shampoo, soap, lotion…) which was a treat. We really enjoyed the nice comfy sitting area with the large smart TV with access to Netflix. We loved the shops on Chic Laurier and the area restaurants including the famous bagel shop on Fairmount. Parking was super easy as we were able to fit 4 cars comfortably in the back and had access to the back entrance! Communication was amazing, and Raymond was always there if assistance was needed. I will recommend this place to any friends who visit Montreal and hope to visit again in the future!

Our weekend stay at this apartment was amazing. It had a great location relative to all of our activities (close enough to walk to downtown, to restaurants, to the clubs, etc.). Very clean and tidy apartment that was roomy enough for 8 guys to sleep in comfortably for the weekend. One bathroom was not an issue for our group, as it was a large bathroom for the apartment. Back and forth communication was very fast and extremely helpful, and Raymond even helped us unlock the apartment when we locked ourselves out one afternoon. Overall, amazing time at a fantastic apartment! Couldn't have picked a better place for our weekend stay.
The host is very receptive and helpful.
Fantastic location and a fantastic space. Would stay again! Thank you!
Great hospitality
Shlo ensured our group's stay ran smoothly throughout the entire trip. We had an amazing time, and I highly recommend this place due to its location.

Perfect place for large groups looking to enjoy the best parts of Montreal. The host was prompt in his communication and addressed our concerns about check-in right away. The parking spot behind the property was very convenient as well.

We enjoyed our stay here very much. Raymond was very accommodating and quick with responses. The place was clean and just a quick Uber ride from downtown. I would highly recommend his place for anyone staying in Montreal!

I had a pleasant stay at Raymond's place. It is reasonably priced, the location is great, and Raymond was attentive to our needs. The common space was a bit cramped for our group of 10 but we managed. We were disappointed with some things. First, the bathroom door doesn't close properly (it swings open right after you try to shut it). Second, the WiFi is so slow that it was essentially unusable. Overall, I think the place is definitely worth the stay for its value.

As advertised, Raymond was a fantastic host and communicator. He was incredibly responsive and flexible, especially when we wanted to check in early.  The location is good, right in the heart of Plateau with lots of restaurants and coffee shops nearby. The living room in the apartment is kind of small so not ideal for large groups to hang out.
Great host and good place. Totally recommend if you are in Montreal.
Great place, amazing for the group.
Great place! Very clean and in a great location

This place is awesome and exactly as advertised!!! It's a quick walk down to Mile End and Mont Royal. Plenty of places to visit, eat, and great nightlife.

This was one of the few places I found in Montreal with AC that accepts large groups. Would definitely stay again!

Great location and spacious apartment. Good responsiveness from Raymond. 
Good trip :)
Good Value, Good Location
Quick responses, great area.

I booked the place last minute but everything went smoothly. I had a few questions but he responded to me quickly. Nice and clean space. Great communication :) 

Thank you, my family had a nice time in Montreal.

excellent location. good value nice hostage 

**Please note:** The phrase "nice hostage" is problematic and potentially offensive. It's important to be mindful of the language we use, especially when dealing with sensitive topics like human rights or safety.  If you can provide more context about what this text refers to, I might be able to offer a more appropriate translation.

This was my first time renting an Airbnb. We booked another location and the host cancelled on us an hour before we arrived. Within that last hour I was frantically trying to find another place to stay. My boys and I just drove 14 hours to Montreal.

Raymond is a lifesaver! The place was just as described, clean and cozy, with a washer/dryer. Parking was key! Walking distance to nightlife, stores, restaurants, grocery stores, short drive to Old Montreal. 

The most important aspect of this stay was communication!!!!! A++++

Raymond kept in touch frequently to make sure our stay was pleasant!!!

Again, thank you Raymond!

The location of the house is great, having off-street parking spot in the back was so helpful, and Raymond was super responsive and flexible. However, the apartment itself did not live up to our expectations. We felt that the Airbnb photos were very misleading. Future renters should know that the apartment is really quite small - for a group of more than 4 or so it would be very cramped. The photos were obviously taken with a wide-angle lens and lots of extra lighting. It's not a brand-new building and it's somewhat worn in some places, and one of the bedrooms has a plastic sliding door that doesn't close all the way, another doesn't have a secondary exit (window/door) for fire escape. There was a pile of garbage by the back door, including a discarded computer, broken furniture, and broken glass. One of our party found a bug and a hair on her mattress, though the house was otherwise clean. The walls to the apartment next door were thin and neighbors were playing music until after midnight.

Essentially, for flexible travelers okay with basic accommodations in a fantastic location, this would be a great place. For those looking for a little more comfort, you should probably look elsewhere.
Great location. Very clean apartment. Plenty of room. Easy communication with host. We all had a fantastic trip!
Good place. Five rooms and for the price and location it's pretty good.
I absolutely loved this apartment and would highly recommend it. The place was clean, spacious and well-equipped. Thank you very much!
fantastic service loved my stay
Great place to stay, close to downtown and hosts are great, we had a minor issue and their response to fix it was incredibly quick.

Pretty great space for the price we paid. Check-in was easy, just use the keypad. Rooms were a bit small but all 9 of us fit comfortably in the space. The living room area was able to host us all. However, the outside of the apartment was littered with trash and covered in ice, so it's not the safest / most visually appealing Airbnb. The area was perfect and close to shops, restaurants, and bars!
The location is prime and the host was very communicative & helpful. The only thing was that the wifi was flaky and would constantly turn on and off.

Shlo/Joseph's place is a great spot! There are plenty of kitchen appliances, extra bedding and towels, and space for people to sleep! The whole place was very clean and cozy. They were always communicating with me throughout the whole trip. My only issue was that the bedroom behind the kitchen was cold (due to a draft from the window area) and you could only be comfortable in there if under the covers. Otherwise, my group and I had a great weekend. :)
Great place, great host!
Super apartment clean and very well located (metro nearby and close to Mount Royal). We are happy with our stay.

Pictures make rooms appear larger than they are. I would not suggest a group of more than 8 people staying here. We arrived to the house to find that the parking spots were completely covered in snow and ice, which we had to shovel ourselves with one plastic shovel. One of our three cars was damaged in the process because of the icy snow. On top of that, we were almost locked out one night because the back door's lock was broken (not our fault) and the front door's lock was extremely loose and then broke because of it. The Wi-Fi was terrible and I noticed several reviews about it; this is upsetting because none of us had service the entire time unless we connected to a nearby cafe. Clearly there has been little maintenance done on this apartment, and clearly nobody ensures that it is in pristine condition before guests from another country stay in it.
The host cancelled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great location and very flexible, our flight was delayed both ways and we were able to stay a little longer.
Thank you, Nat. My wife and I had a fantastic weekend. Very clean, convenient, and safe location, with plenty of street parking.  Would definitely recommend staying here.
It was super clean, and was an ideal location for me. I had a great view of Montreal from the balcony. I will repeat when I visit next time.
This location is outstanding.

Perfect Location. 
Perfect Getaway Place. 

We walked, we shopped, we swam, we relaxed. Everything was amazing!
Thumbs up all around!!
Great place to stay in the heart of Montreal. I would come back anytime.
Beautiful and clean apartment. It has the perfect location and all the main attractions are within walking distance. I highly recommend Nat's apartment!
Great location. Great apartment.

Nats place was great. The location is good. It's a 30-minute walk to the Bell Centre. Mount Royal is very close by as well. The place also features a nice concrete balcony area. The place was clean and had everything we needed.

We're not sure if we actually met the owner of the place, but we met with Michael who was nice and showed us around. The building is nice and revamped, however it seems to be smack in the middle of the biggest hill ever. Don't put your suitcase down if it has wheels lol

Parking costs $20.00 per night, but you do at least get to park underground. 

The place had a very strong smell of chemicals but was clean. Once we started putting our food into the fridge, we realized that the fridge was broken so we contacted Michael and he suggested we could stay in another apartment within the same building. The other place was much nicer and had pretty much everything we needed, except for a first aid kit. There wasn't one in the entire building either. 

The shower pressure was really intense. It was nice but also annoying as it would soak the entire floor even with the shower curtain closed. 

Overall, it was a decent stay!

Great place - as described in pictures. Convenient downtown location. Bus and train stops are nearby. The host is very helpful and easy to communicate with. I would recommend everyone to try this place. It's super comfy and the building is amazing with a great pool, laundry facilities, and a common lounge with 24-hour coffee.
Excellent housing, comfortable, well equipped, well located, good value for money.
Very good apartment. Well located, clean, comfortable and with all the amenities you need for your stay. We enjoyed it very much.
Great location and give it a try
Cute apartment with an amazing host! Would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Montreal. Also, we were allowed to check out late which was great!!!
Highly recommended! The host was very helpful with all of our needs! Very well situated! 5-star vacation!

Great host 
Great location 
Super stay

The location is perfectly located next to Lionel Groulx subway station, but it's also very quiet.

The room was very large and clean. It's perfect for staying a moment in Montreal.
I had such a wonderful time I stayed longer! Thank you so much for welcoming me to your home and for all the great chats :)
Everything was new. Elie and his family were so warm and wonderful. I would definitely recommend the place.
Great place for family. Easy access to Highway
It is a wonderful place to stay. Great location, easy access to buses and the subway. Received excellent hospitality.

Overall our stay was pleasant and Elie was available for all questions. The location is great, close to buses, metros, trains, gas stations, and various restaurants and grocery stores. Walking takes 5 minutes to all of these. We enjoyed the park for the kids which is a 3-minute walk.

Parking and laundries are shared with the unit next door, so availability depends on that. The apartment is noisy due to neighbors, airport traffic, and is located right next to train tracks. Just for your consideration. In the humid summer, you would need an AC, and this apartment does not offer one.

This is a great apartment located in the heart of the city, close to many shops, restaurants, and other amenities. It's a short walk from a public park. The apartment itself is in excellent condition, though it could benefit from a few more mirrors.
The apartment is very spacious, comfortably fitting all seven of us. It's about a 30-minute drive from the city with traffic, but aside from that, the space was clean and had everything we needed.

We had a really nice time staying at Elie's place. He was an excellent host and very accommodating. I will let you know that it was super hot that weekend and there is no AC. We brought fans based on the suggestion of another review and that worked out really well!
Very nice, simple and spacious place. 10 minute drive to the nearest metro.
The house is clean.
Good communication, honest and attentive person.
Overall okay, there's enough space. The kitchen could use some improvement in terms of equipment and cleaning. The bathroom requires maintenance.
nan
Great place

Sindy's room was shared with her, so we had a double bed in her room, and since there were two of us, it wasn't obvious as we didn't want to disturb anyone, so we didn't talk too loudly. The address wasn't the same as the one on the listing, which caused us some trouble, as well as the parking being free in the listing, but it was actually on the street between 9pm and 9am, so we had to look for a spot outside. We were able to enjoy the pool and sauna, and Sindy had lent us towels, shampoo, and soap. She didn't have any lunch either, except for a box of cereal that was on the fridge, but we left before 9am because of the parking, so we couldn't stay long. For the price and privacy, I will choose a hotel next time in Montreal.

Excellent housing ideally located in the city center, near everything. The apartment is super clean and spacious. 
I highly recommend it!

The apartment is within walking distance of almost everything in Montreal, even in winter we had no problem walking to places like Old Montreal, Mont Royal, and Saint Laurent. I recommend parking in the garage around the corner during the winter months, it's about $20 a night. The apartment was clean and well-equipped with basic kitchen and bathroom supplies that made our stay easy. We comfortably fit 3 people in the apartment! Our hosts were great communicators and provided a ton of tips on what to do in Montreal! I would definitely stay here again!

Steph & Camilla's place was super cute and close to main streets. It was super close to grocery stores, public transportation, liquor stores, and Starbucks. A great spot! Definitely recommend it if you're staying in Montreal for a couple of days.

Came to Montreal for Easter weekend and enjoyed staying at this place so much! Since it's located close to the university, the area is full of places to relax. Walking distance from downtown, old town, and all other attractions. The apartment had all the basic kitchen and bathroom supplies as well as fresh bedding and a lot of extra towels. The hosts were in touch throughout our stay and very flexible and accommodating about check-in and check-out times. I would definitely come back again!
Steph and Camilla offer amazing communication and a great, clean, comfortable place to stay
Amazing stay! Very kind hosts.

Excellent location, quiet neighborhood just two steps from the center. Metro station a few minutes away and shops nearby. The apartment is bright, warm and very well equipped. Hosts are very responsive and meet all expectations, we will definitely return!
Great communication and very accommodating. The location is very ideal. My boyfriend and I had a great time.

This place is in a fantastic location! Close to public transportation and within walking distance of downtown and Mount Royal. It was the perfect size apartment. Everything was clean and ready for us. I would definitely want to stay here again next time.

Zentru (Hidden by Airbnb) is located in Lage, with a nice and clean setup.  It's just a bit rundown in terms of construction. Communication with Steph and Camilla was seamless and friendly. Parking spaces and parking garages are easily found nearby.

Steph & Camilla's place was a true gem. It had a really convenient location for travelers like myself who want to be close to the bustling city center yet have quiet and peaceful nights. The stylish studio apartment had all the amenities you could ever need, and Steph very generously lent me the laundry card for the washing machines which are located in the basement. It was a very pleasant stay and I would recommend this place to solo travelers/couples!

We spent two nights in Steph & Camilla's apartment in Montreal. It is conveniently located and close to everything. We arrived by train earlier than check-in time, however, S&C were most accommodating and the apartment was ready for us when we got there, which we really appreciated as dragging bags around is no fun. The space was great. Cosy and comfortable with basic supplies plus a coffee machine! We found some olive oil and balsamic vinegar, which we mixed together in a little bowl to dip some crunchy bread, and had with olives and a glass of wine on the sunny balcony... pure joy after being on the road for several weeks... Thank you both for a great stay... we would definitely recommend this place.

Steph & Camilla's place has a perfect location close to transit, Mont Royal, and Old Montreal. A grocery store is located two minutes away by foot, making it very convenient.

The place was as expected clean and comfortable with all the basic kitchen supplies plus a coffee maker. 

Steph and Camilla were an excellent host. They had great communication, were accommodating with check-in time, and always kept in touch before and during my stay to check if I had any questions and if everything was okay. 

If I have to come back to Montreal, I will definitely stay here again.
If you want to know all about the center of Montreal, stay at Steph & Camilla's. A very good location. THANK YOU!!!

Great location for exploring the city. Less than five minutes walk to the metro station. The building has a bit of an unfinished look, but the interior of the apartment is nicer. No AC - this is standard in Montreal, but summer nights can be uncomfortable. Overall a good stay.

Beautiful home - exactly as it looks in the pictures, great location - close to downtown, and Steph & Camilla responded to me very quickly and had the best intentions while I was staying in their lovely home.
Wonderful hosts who I wouldn't hesitate to stay with again! Their place is in a fantastic location, just a couple of blocks from the metro station, which was incredibly helpful.
Fantastic location and amazing apartment, very clean & everything you need is a short walk away!
We had a great time staying at Steph & Camilla's place, and it was exactly what we wanted for our vacation!

Terrific little place for someone traveling for work. Hosts communicate promptly and professionally. The interior is well kept. Wifi is strong. If (like me) you like to cook your own meals while you travel, you will find all the amenities you need. Also, terrific restaurants nearby, and a bike sharing station is literally next door.
Great location. Clean. Has a balcony!
We had easy access to the entire city and enjoyed our stay. Steph & Camilla's place was great for a weekend stay in Montreal.
Great location with some street parking not too far away. The building and apartments are older, but very clean. A good value!
Had a great time! Good location. Apartment matched the description.

Unshat is bei Steph and Camilla very much liked, even if we unfortunately couldn't meet them personally. Everything was very clean. Equipment for cooking was all there. Wifi was excellent. 

At the beginning of the street are rental bikes, bus stop 2 minutes around the corner, directly next to the supermarket. The metro is also easily reachable on foot (4-5 minutes).

The elevator is a bit old, but that has nothing to do with the cool apartment. :)
We would definitely come back again.
A&T

Steph & Camilla's place is in a great, walkable area of Montreal. The apartment is clean and cozy. Communication was excellent - Steph always replied to my messages and questions right away...and even assisted me in finding a free parking space just outside the apartment building when I arrived. I would definitely recommend this place if you're wanting to stay in Montreal for a few nights!
Clean and well-located to discover Montreal. Very convenient for walking to any place and close to the subway as well. Steph was always available when seeking places or suggestions.

Steph & Camilla's place was quaint and accommodating for what we were looking for. The price was right and the location was perfect. We were able to walk almost everywhere we wanted to go. The hosts were very good about contacting us to make sure we were able to check in smoothly. The only drawback was that we visited during a heat wave and the place, like many in Montreal, did not have air conditioning. The building itself was also older and in need of a little maintenance. Overall we enjoyed our stay! Thank you!

Well lit, very clean, adorable apartment. It is simply the PERFECT location. Walkable to Mont-Royal (for hiking, park-sitting/picnics, tam-tams on Sundays), the "city-like" feel of St. Catherine and St Laurent (lots of cool places to see, shopping, and nightlife!). I love walking and even walked to Old Port (Ferris wheel, ziplining, ropes course, and lots of shopping and sightseeing) from the room! I felt very safe in the room! The balcony was a lovely aspect of the apartment.
Close to central Montreal, great for walking places, particularly up Mont Royal. Apartment was as described.
Great location.

Our stay at Steph and Camilla's was perfect. The space is cute and quiet. Although it's located in a big apartment building, we never heard any of our neighbors. My friend slept on the sofa bed and found it very comfortable! We had great weather during our trip so we walked everywhere - mile end, Old Montreal, Plateau Mont Royal were all easily accessible by foot. Alex was also in touch with us to check in and responded immediately to our questions. I would recommend staying at Steph and Camilla's to anyone visiting Montreal.

Steph and Alex were incredibly accommodating. They greeted me and offered to help me with my luggage down the stairs upon check out (due to a small issue with the elevator). Also, I was traveling alone and felt very safe in this area and in this apartment.

The location is walkable to most popular spots and the rest of the sites are easily bikeable. 

I really enjoyed my visit and this place was perfect for my quick trip. I would be happy to stay here again.
Really adorable place in a great location. We had a great time!

Nice place, very homey. Good location, right near McGill. Parking is tricky in this busy neighborhood. The apartment was as described. Quite nice but slightly worn at the heels. It was rather warm when we were there and we did use the fan they provided. But overall, we were happy with the accommodations.
Great location, communicative and helpful hosts :)
Looking for a comfortable place in the heart of this city, this is your place. The apartment has all the amenities I needed to enjoy a long weekend in Montreal.
Steph & Camilla's apartment was clean, comfortable, and perfectly located. The hosts were very communicative and helpful as well. Highly recommended for anyone visiting Montreal!

We had a great time in Montreal. Steph and Camilla's apartment was well equipped and clean. The location in the city center was ideal for exploring the city. Rental bikes were right outside the house, and a supermarket was around the corner. Only the house is a bit old. Finding a parking space was a bit difficult because all free spaces were occupied, but a multi-storey car park was close to the apartment, as Steph and Camilla told us. 

Steph and Camilla were very helpful and it was easy to communicate with them.

A cute and stylish place for the money, and in a great location. There were a few infrastructure problems during my stay, but Steph & Camilla were very nice and responsive about it. The bathroom and the building itself could use some upgrades. Overall a good value and nice stay. Thanks!
Good budget option with some nice extras. Communication was quick and easy and the hosts allowed us to check in early.
Great little place in an amazing location. Has a very classic feel to the building. Easy check-in and excellent communication. Would definitely stay here again!

We had a great stay at Steph & Camilla's Airbnb! Communication was super easy, early check-in was possible, the location is great and the apartment offered everything we needed for a great time in Montreal! Definitely would come back!
It was a nice apartment, slightly smaller than pictured and the overall building was somewhat sketchy and problematic. The hosts answered all questions promptly.

We had such a great stay! The apartment was just as expected. Friendly neighbors too, which is always a plus. Amazing location. We drove from NYC and the parking was easily accessible, not expensive (about $17 for 24 hours) and right around the corner — thank you so much to the hosts for sending a detailed map of how to find the garage!!! AMAZING location of the apartment too. Definitely go to Pullman's right around the corner if you stay here!!!

Honestly, if you haven't booked this place already, do it now!!! Wow! We were blown away by the hospitality and cleanliness of their place. They were accommodating with our check-in and out times to work with our flights. The apartment was easily accessible AND spotless. I mean seriously spotless. Not a single hair and speck on the floor. No dust. It was the cleanest Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in. The location was perfect. Montreal is a super friendly and walkable city. I was communicated with within minutes every time I messaged. The bed is comfortable and the living room welcoming. The balcony was a great touch to enjoy coffee in the morning. It's also super simple to get up to. It’s the 8th floor and there is an elevator for your bags! Walking distance of a mile or so to pretty much everything you have to see. I’m already planning my trip back in the spring! Thank you again!!!!!!
Everything about the apartment was wonderful. We had a great stay!
Good values in a great neighborhood! Steph and Camilla were very helpful when I had a slight issue.

Good economic choice in the neighborhood. Quiet location and very responsive and helpful hosts. As is to be expected in the area, the apartment is dated, however it was also very clean and well-maintained.

I am very pleased with the apartment. Very quiet and easy to find. Great location in the center of Montreal near Mont Royal, spacious apartment with complete amenities and great communication as well. Highly recommended! Thank you, Steph and Camilla!
Well located. As described.
The place is in a fantastic location! It's central to so many things. The hosts were wonderful. I would just warn others that the space is a little more outdated than the pictures online suggest.
Great place to stay, short walking distance to both the metro and shopping locations nearby. Steph & Camilla were great to deal with. Would recommend staying here

Great value, clean nice apartment, exactly as I expected. Checked in late and Steph and Camilla were able to handle that with a lockbox, no problem. They left chocolates at check-in which was a nice touch. Exactly what I expected, would definitely stay again.
Great apartment! Steph & Camilla were wonderful hosts - accommodating and quick to respond. The apartment is in a great location. Highly recommend!

The apartment is in a fantastic location! It's only a 15-minute walk to everything we wanted to see. We are so grateful for the early check-in. Steph and Camilla were also incredibly responsive and kind.
I would highly recommend staying here 100%. Steph & Camilla are very responsive and gracious hosts. The place was warm and cozy, a lovely retreat after the freezing Montreal winter weather.
We had an excellent stay at Steph & Camilla's place! The location was perfect, they were great at communicating, and the apartment had many thoughtful touches!
Easy check-in and check-out. Great location. Easy communication with hosts. Just as pictured.
Great place in the heart of Montreal!
Everything was perfect, thank you again! See you soon.
The location was convenient and the communication was fast. The apartment was clean but due to its age, expect the water flow in the bathroom to be slow.
Great location and stay!!
We had a great time, the location was very convenient!

Mario's loft was the perfect home-away-from-home for my first time in Montreal. It was well-kept, clean, and inviting with beautiful windows and thoughtful finishing touches throughout the space. Mario and his wife thought of everything and were always speedy to respond during my stay.

A few highlights: great neighborhood with everything you could need within walking distance, quiet neighbors, fast wifi, jacuzzi tub with rainfall shower, stylish and modern, plush linens, fully equipped kitchen 

Would definitely come back again!
The place was beautiful, the neighbors were nice. The host came and gave us a quick visit. Only minor issues; the toilet chain keeps falling. Overall great experience.
Incredible and very spacious loft, it was awesome! Nothing to say

Great loft, lots of space and conveniently located near where I needed to be. There are some decent bars/restaurants nearby within walking distance. The only downside was that the TV had an antenna, so there weren't many channels.
The accommodation is superb. It's spacious and very well equipped, everything is clean and Mario is a friendly and understanding host.

Mario's place is amazing. Very nicely decorated, not too much. Everything is super clean, which is the most important thing for me, but the place is fully equipped for everything that you need. They don't have a laundry room but I didn't need that. Super great location, close to the metro (even though I drove there), close to good restaurants and bars. 

I had an amazing experience and would recommend Mario's place.

I had the pleasure of staying here for 12 nights straight. The loft is incredible and beautifully styled. You're literally one minute away from everything you need, so the location could not be better. The loft is very spacious and looks even better in person! I would highly recommend booking this place for your stay. Communication with Mario was awesome and he was a fantastic host. I look forward to staying here again in the future! Thanks, Mario!
My accommodation is very well located and it's also a beautiful home.
Translation: Unsure
Very stylish place. Lots of space. Comfortable bed. Kitchen is a bit understocked for cooking, but there are plenty of restaurants and bars nearby that may not be an issue.
Great place

As native Montrealers, we appreciated that the loft had touches that were “very Montreal”; the outside of the building is more industrial, so it’s a fun surprise to walk into the impeccably designed loft. The space was previously a dance studio and we liked that they left the old mambo logo on the door and windows. 

The space is airy and vast. It feels great to be in, has big windows and lots of light. Parking was a breeze, the kitchen was well-equipped, the bathroom modern and clean, and the upstairs bedroom in the loft was cozy. You’re walking distance to some of Montreal’s best (St Viateur Bagels, Cafe Olympico, and tons of decent local bars). We came as a family and loved it. I think it works well for both families and people looking to go out and party. Mario was very helpful and getting the keys was easy too.

Wow, what a spot! This is an immaculate studio apartment in the Mile End area within walking distance to all its streets right out the door. I enjoyed the high-tech TV that allowed me to screen cast my phone (it also has Chromecast, but no actual television programming). The bed was wonderfully comfortable. I was only there for one night, and Tony arranged for someone to meet me to deliver the keys, who was hospitable. 

Parking is in a gravel parking lot, and when parked in front of the kindergarten, I felt like it was a safer spot. In the morning there are many people who use the lot, so you're not the only one. 

The kitchen is stocked with only the essentials, which was all I needed. My only wish is that their jet-bathtub in the bathroom was fully functional. Otherwise this is an excellent and very comfortable location.
Great stay, the place was clean and tidy. Close to shops, restaurants, and bars. The host was easy to communicate with. Would definitely book again!

Mario has a great place. It's well-done and located in a great area of town with lots of restaurants and places to go out. The only negative is noise at night due to the location on a busy road, but otherwise it's all great. And Mario is very communicative!

The location and the facility were absolutely amazing! Practically located, parking right next door, quiet for a very busy part of town, I can say nothing wrong about the place. And the host was impeccable!
The place is okay. It feels public. Not personal. Good location. Could be better furnished and decorated for this price.
First trip to Montreal, amazing place to stay close to everything and a very fun neighborhood. A place you won't forget.

Mario's loft is beautiful in person, with a great location, ample space, plenty of natural light. The loft was incredibly clean and all the amenities I needed were readily available. I would definitely stay again on my next trip to Montreal.

I absolutely fell in love again with Montreal, with an old friend, and with Mario's place. I was so sad to leave!  There really weren't any complaints--beautiful wooden floors and floor-to-ceiling windows—great location in Mile End. It's a good 20-minute walk to Old Montreal, but I've been there done that, and if you want to go it's a $10 cab ride. Mario's place was perfect! The bed was super comfy, the shower and tub were huge, the lighting in the place was gorgeous. Big kitchen, huge living room and TV area. OH! And I loved the floor-length mirror off of the living room, which is fun to use for whatever self-reflective purposes you find helpful. :)
It would be nice to have more than just a giant comforter for the bed; it's hot and we just need a sheet.
Amazing apartment with plenty of space for a group of people. Everything was clean and in order. Additionally, the location is very close to almost everything you would need.

The apartment is spacious, clean, and the location is perfect!
We booked at the last minute and I am satisfied with the place. 
It lacks a few kitchen utensils (1 butter knife) and the kitchen sink was blocked.  Mario is available and easy to reach, and he tried to fix the sink, but unfortunately he couldn't fix it before our departure. 
He accepted that we were leaving at 2 pm and this without any extra charge, which is very appreciated.
Overall a good choice!

Wow, where do I even begin? The place, the neighborhood, the care, the space, the tastes, the quick response, the coffee shops around, the smile when I wake up and go to sleep in this apartment - I definitely will come back, I definitely give 5 stars, and 5 more stars!!!! Wow!
Sinks do not work outside of that they are pretty easy to get along with!
Good overall, but the kitchen sink was broken.
Huge space, good location, great stay

I see there was another review about the kitchen sink being broken. Wish I had seen that before I booked... I was advised when I arrived that the sink wasn't working. There is a bucket under the sink which leaked all over the floor on my first day. The host told me there was nothing he could do about this and asked me to clean it myself.  I then tried to use the dishwasher to clean my dishes. It leaked a pool of water all over the floor. When I messaged the host for help, they brought me a mop and were angry that I used the dishwasher, stating that I was ruining someone's boutique below their place. I cleaned the mess myself and had to do dishes in the bathtub for the rest of my weekend. The fridge also doesn't close all the way so I had to briefly transfer things to the freezer to keep them cold and the TV was locked on someone else's Chromecast for the entire stay. Definitely a non-functional Airbnb until they repair the above issues and the host was rude/unhelpful with all of the things that weren't working.
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.

Mario's loft is breathtaking, I felt like a celebrity. It is gigantic with great furniture, lighting, and aesthetics. I’ve never stayed anywhere nicer. The place was twice as big as I expected, and we spent about an hour after we got in talking about how lucky we were to have booked this place. The windows and ceiling are gigantic. The place is fairly centrally located close to all of the hip restaurants and bars in the Mile End area, which is one of the coolest areas of Montreal. Mario was super accommodating and helpful. I arrived late at night and he was able to make arrangements for the keys.

Excellent stay with Noemi and her adorable pets (Dexter, Xena, and Finn). Very family-like atmosphere, makes you feel right at home! Noemi is always willing to help, giving suggestions for the most popular or crowded places in Montreal. Excellent location, just a few steps from the metro (5 minutes), and with many shops around where it's located. I highly recommend this place, the company and the atmosphere! So don't hesitate to book here :)
Great host. The house is near the subway station.
Walkable to many local shops in Montreal. The bed is super comfortable and the hosts are very welcoming.

Veronique's Place was great for me and my friend who I went to Montreal with. Her roommates were two guys, very helpful and friendly. We were out and about most of the time and we had a car to get around but the apartment is close to a bus stop if you need to use it. The only thing that wasn't advertised was that there is smoking in the apartment - as long as that doesn't bug you, great place! Also not far from downtown and close to bars and shops in the neighborhood.

The small room is charming and the bed is comfortable. However, the apartment is messy and may smell bad; there are no curtains at the window and everything that happens in the living room can be heard. The host is kind and the apartment has a lot of potential, with some regular cleaning it would be really good, according to me.

The room was nice. The bed was comfy. The host was friendly but wasn't there when we checked in. There were no working sinks when we were there, but we didn't spend much time at the Airbnb anyway. I don't think that information was pre-warned about though. Very friendly little three-legged kitty. Very convenient location if you want to go to La Ronde for the day. Overall, not a bad time, but definitely a few hiccups.
Sunny apartment near excellent addresses.

Basic but spotless and comfortable apartment in a trendy neighborhood with plenty of free street parking. Julie made our late check-in easy, messaged to make sure we got in OK, responded quickly to my one question, and was generally kind and pleasant. Airbnb at its best! (Too bad we didn't get to meet in person.)

This apartment is very comfortable and overlooks a very pleasant space behind with a balcony. Julie has been very friendly, understanding, and helped us during our stay. We also thank her for the aperitif. I highly recommend this place

The apartment looks exactly like the pictures: simple, clean and bright with everything one would need. Julie and her lovely family are wonderful hosts. They are so warm, accommodating and easygoing that they make you feel as if you are staying with family. There are plenty of neighborhood shops, restaurants and grocery stores in the area and public transportation is easily accessible.

Julie was an amazing host. I stayed almost 3 weeks in her apartment (2nd floor), and would definitely return next time I am in Montreal and needing a place to stay. You could tell the place had been thoroughly cleaned before we arrived (my husband, my baby, and I). The place had everything we asked for for the baby, and had all necessary amenities. She even got us a small appliance when we asked for it, and shared her kids toys with us for the baby to play with! She made sure we had enough soap and toilet paper. She was very welcoming, friendly, and kind. I had a really great experience. Thank you Julie and see you next time!

Julie's hospitality and natural charm are unrivaled, the space was everything you could ask for as well as being ridiculously clean and more spacious than the pictures show! Julie also offered many helpful tips on where to go and what to see as well as answering any questions we had in a prompt and timely manner. I'd highly recommend this spot, you will not regret it! Thanks for an amazing time again, we hope to see you soon :)
Very nice apartment about a 15-minute Uber ride from Old Montreal. Great local cafes within walking distance. Julie was a wonderful host!
The apartment is well located, with a supermarket next door. The apartment is very clean and perfect for a couple. Thanks to Julie for the welcome drinks.

Superb welcome from Julie! I booked the apartment for my parents who were visiting. The neighborhood is great (I live here!), the bus is a 1-minute walk, and the metro is a 12-minute walk. There are plenty of shops, restaurants, small cafes, microbrewery within minutes plus the Grand park of Father Marquette which is very pleasant.  The apartment is bright and very practical with access to two beautiful balconies for enjoying the sunshine. Communication was impeccable and hosts were very responsive. I recommend!

Three great places with warm and spontaneous hospitality that only Quebecers know how to practice. 

Excellent value for money. The neighborhood and proximity to transportation are very pleasant!

First Airbnb experience, we are delighted with the host's welcome, the quality of the accommodation, its location in the city, with nearby buses and metro (and the city is best explored on foot!). 

We will definitely be back!
Julie was an exceptional host and the apartment was great.  Additional touches, like the coffee, were greatly appreciated. Communication was incredibly easy.
Julie and Thomas have an amazing place with great natural light, lots of comfortable features that made it feel like home. It's in a great, safe location for exploring Montreal.

Three beautiful places that look great in the photo! The second lights give a superb ambiance! 

We are close to many restaurants and activities, so there's no problem.

Communication with the host is excellent, always available, and there's always a way to arrange things with her. Thank you very much for the stay.

I am very happy to have stayed here with this exceptional host! The place is identical to the photo! The unique lighting gives an ambiance of night life that I greatly enjoyed

We are close to many restaurants and activities. Communication is perfect, nothing to say about it! 

I recommend it to everyone! See you next time and thank you for your generosity and hospitality!
nan
Great place, cool aesthetic and super close to everything!!!!!
My stay was amazing, loved the view and the lights!
Awesome space and great location.
Awesome apartment and location.

I recommend this place to everyone! What an amazing place, just a short walk from downtown. The interior was very clean and the bar area was incredible. We had a great time and we'll definitely be back in the future.
Amazing place

Carolina was very accommodating, friendly, and helpful. There was a mistake with the keys and she kindly brought the right set of keys when we asked even though it wasn't an essential need. She gave us helpful parking tips as well. The location was excellent, there were two metro stations very close and many restaurants and shops. 

There were a few issues with the amenities of the place. There wasn't enough toilet paper there so we had to buy our own. There weren't dish towels or paper towels which should be considered part of kitchen amenities. There is a few kitchen supplies but don't expect to cook a full meal there. The biggest issue was that the window in the bedroom wouldn't close all the way and there was a small crack that let in all the cold air. 

Overall, it was a pleasant stay and we had a lovely time in Montreal.
Carolina's place is great, I was able to just put down my things and get the much-needed rest in the absolute peace and comfort her place provides. Thank you so much!

There was a very strong odor in the place.

The window in the room does not close, which made it cold and noisy in the morning.
The host cancelled this reservation 36 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The location was perfect, right downtown Montreal with a beautiful view of the skyline. Carolina is the perfect host and check-in was very smooth.

Apartment very well located just off a very commercial street with numerous restaurants nearby.  It offers beautiful unobstructed views of Montreal, including access to the city center (Old Montreal) within walking distance for those who enjoy a good walk... We had a pleasant stay and thank Carolina for her attentiveness and responsiveness whenever we needed help.

It was a good place. Great location. It was well kept and clean with bed linens, clean dishes, and everything else. The only thing that was troublesome for five adults was the shower which had pressure only 20% of the time and the rest of the time it just dripped, so we had to use the tap.
The host cancelled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
awesome place!
Super apartment in the heart of Montreal, beautiful decor and atmosphere with a pool on the ground floor
This is my first Airbnb experience, Carolina answered all of my questions and the apartment was very clean and the view from the balcony is magnificent in the evening.
Great stay in the city! Hope to come back in the future.
Three reactive and available units, ideal location (Ste Catherine street angle). Limited equipment on site but issue resolved quickly if notified :) Warm and pleasant condo for a party or weekend
Carolina's place is very convenient. The location is so close to almost everything. She's a very great host, super responsive and friendly, and the trip was everything I expected. I had a great time
Great apartment and great location! Would go again!
The location is fantastic, Carolina was helpful and the place was super clean.  Both the building and the flat show some wear and tear in certain areas.

It was very well decorated, the place was perfect, I wasn't disappointed at all on that level. It was actually the air conditioning that was disturbing because my guests and I had a terrible time sleeping as it was terribly cold, which made the stay unpleasant. We could have gotten seriously sick. Then the lights weren't working, which really disappointed me. I would have just wanted to be informed in advance but I think once there are changes to this, you could take advantage of it because the apartment is very beautiful and welcoming
The view was superb, well-located with many restaurants nearby!
Good location, nice host
Very good host, completely recommended.
Housing as advertised, very well equipped, good value for money
perfect place to live
Great experience staying here! Amazing location

Stephan was a wonderful host who was very accommodating. We highly recommend this place. Stephan was prompt in communicating with us, and we had no issues during our stay. The condo was very clean and the location was great, and he was quick to respond to any of our inquiries. Thanks for making our Montreal stay so enjoyable. We look forward to returning.
Awesome location!!
Comfortable and clean.
Simple, clean and convenient.
Fantastic place. Great location
Great location, cute apartment
It's right next to Notre Dame!

Spacious condo in a perfect location close to public transportation, shops, and restaurants.  Blocks away from Notre Dame and other interesting places to visit.  Will definitely stay here again when I'm in town!
Great apartment in Old Montreal. Really enjoyed our stay here!
exactly as expected, the location is fantastic

The few pictures on the web page do not do the apartment justice. The place is much larger than I expected from the pictures, like a big one-bedroom apartment. The location is fantastic; there's a Bixi bike share right by the entrance, a metro station across the street, and Old Montreal within walking distance.
We had a great time and would stay again if we were back in Montreal. I would highly recommend this place.
