Great host. Stephan will answer your needs immediately. Great location. Close to downtown Montreal's hub and old port.
Wonderful place, very clean and in a great location. Responds quickly to messages.
Book with Stephane!!! What an amazing apartment in an awesome spot. Check-in was seamless. Will definitely be back
The Notre Dame church was right behind us. It was clean and the communication was smooth and friendly :)
Perfect location, Room felt like a hotel room.
Clean, walkable, quiet, easy communication.
Great location!!! Stéphane was very helpful and the check-in was a breeze.

Honestly, this is a tough review to write. 

**Pros:**
1) The location was 11/10. 
2) The host was pretty responsive in terms of speed. 
3) Checking in was easy enough. 
4) The bathroom was fine and the shower/water pressure was great. 
5) Wi-Fi was fast and reliable.

**Cons:**
1) Carpeted areas of the apartment were soaked due to a flood (the host knew about this and didn't warn us during our pre-check in communications on the day of arrival), the carpet was black and moldy looking (and in some areas, he had covered it with another rug which also soaked through). 
2) The apartment smelled increasingly damp/moldy/musty over the 2.5 days we were there. It caused my roommate to sneeze throughout the night.
3) Communications with the host regarding the flooding situation became oddly defensive. I ended up having to placate him as he got very angry when I told him that the situation did not meet our expectations for the stay and to please look into the matter immediately (day 2/3).
4) Building entrance doors weren't ever locked. Anyone could walk in off the street - not sure if that's the norm in Montreal for rental/primarily AirBNB buildings, but as two women staying by ourselves, it made us uncomfortable. Not really the host's fault of course, but we should have been informed.
5) When he let himself and/or the building maintenance crew into the apartment to investigate (while we were out for the day), we returned several hours later to find that they had left the apartment unlocked. All our stuff was in the apartment, including my roommate's passport, laptop, jewelry, etc. This combined with the fact that the building has zero security at the entrance made us very uncomfortable and we felt it was very inappropriate that the host did not ensure that he locked the apartment door upon his leaving. It was sheer luck that no one thought to try to walk in and help themselves to anything.
Stéphane was extremely responsive and communicative.
The host was excellent at communication and responded very quickly. The apartment is located in a prime location and is very well maintained. I would definitely use them again.

I loved this location! So close to everything, a safe neighborhood, lots of dining options. Very walkable areas. The place was clean and convenient. Stephane was very accommodating as we had an arrival after midnight. I would stay here again if I return to this beautiful and vibrant city.

This was a perfect place and location for us during our few days in Montreal. While there were only two of us, it would have been very suitable for a small family. The location was perfect. Not right in the center of old town to be overwhelming but just a couple blocks away to be very convenient. It's right around the corner from Notre-Dame Basilica and about a block from the Metro. We used all public transportation during our stay and it was very easy to navigate the subway/bus lines. The apt has everything you need for cooking, TV works fine with several cable channels and WiFi was good. Our host was communicative and was accommodating with a request we made and we were thankful for that. Highly recommend Tommy cafe up the street for coffee and breakfast. They have a nice breakfast sandwich and avocado toast with egg and really nicely made coffee!
Great location, perfect place for a Montreal getaway. Stéphane was very helpful.
Pretty good!

What a spot!! After a simple miscommunication at check-in my girlfriend and I were inside the best value apartment space in Old Montreal! Everything was clean, accessible, and secure inside the building. Parking was easy enough. And... you cannot beat the location. Walking distance to Old Montreal, the Old Port, St Catherine's and Crescent St restaurants downtown! Highly recommend.
Great location!
Great location!
Great place and great location!
This condo is in a fantastic location, close to the metro and all of Old Montreal! It's a very safe and secure location. I will definitely return and recommend it to my friends and family.
Great apartment. Excellent location.

This location is the perfect central point within a radius that's centrally located to almost everything (even local transit). The apartment is well-furnished and very private. 

Communication from the host was spectacular and questions were answered almost instantly. 

I highly recommend this spot for trips to Old Montreal.  

Also, parking costs extra. However, the location gives you peace of mind since it's connected below the building and not remotely.

Great experience. The apartment is in an excellent location, close to downtown, St. Laurent, Chinatown, Old Port and very close to the metro so easy to get around the city. The apartment itself was very clean and accurately represented by the photos. Check-in/check-out was easy and the place had everything we needed. We would definitely stay again.

Stephane's place is in a fantastic location. It's about a 5-minute walk to Notre Dame Basilica and the metro is right across the street. Communication was great, and Stephane responded immediately to our inquiries. The place is perfect for a couple or maybe three people at most. Thanks for hosting us, Stephane.
Spacious apartment located in a highly convenient area. It's within easy walking distance of Notre Dame Cathedral and numerous excellent restaurants in Old Montreal.
Wonderful place to stay with a great location. Stephanie was very helpful
Nice place, great location, very secure. The TV volume is low so you can't hear it when the heating is on or the shower, but everything else was good.  It's a good deal for the price.
The apartment was comfortable and located in a very central position, which made it very convenient for my short stay. I would recommend this place to anyone.

The apartment itself was comfortable, and the heating worked well. There is a tiny television, but you shouldn't be watching TV anyway, right? For those who will use the indoor parking, it would be wise to park at the end of the 15-minute parking for the Embassy Suites because you will have to go up to the apartment to get the parking pass and drive around one-way streets to reach the parking garage. If you park in the 15-minute zone, you can probably just back up 10 feet to get to the garage. There is an entrance to the indoor connected Montreal across the street, and you can walk all the way to Eaton Centre in about 25 minutes or Place des Arts in about 15 minutes. Just be sure to map it out beforehand.
Love the closet space
Great Service
I recommend this plan 100%.
Awesome place in front of Palais des Congrès. Very clean place.

The apartment was clean and located in a fantastic spot. Old Montreal is a bit touristy, but it's also easy to reach other parts of Montreal from the location. Stephane was very responsive and helpful.
Great place and host!
Communication has always been very easy. The host is always there to answer our questions. The accommodation is very well located and soundproofed. I recommend it.

The places have what you need for a short trip. It is near the subway, so it is well-located. 

We really like it. A nice place.

I suggest taking photos of the entire accommodation before you leave because in my case, the host charged me for a lamp I never saw and that wasn't mentioned in the listing. Please be careful to avoid misunderstandings that could lead to financial repercussions.

The place is in the BEST location for Old Montreal! Just steps away from so many great places. The host is also awesome, ensuring you have tons of information before your arrival! Super quick responses and great communication! I can't wait to come back in the summer!!
This condo is perfectly located between the old town, the harbor and downtown. Very clean, easy to access. I really enjoyed my stay in Montreal :)

Great location, central to everything. Overall, the unit is clean and fairly spacious. The bed feels like it has been used a lot and is hard. The "second bed"/Futon feels like it's about to break at any moment. I only sat on the second bed, but overall, it was a great location and a decent unit. I would definitely stay here again for a quick weekend trip.

Many thanks to Constantin for hosting us.

The place is beautiful and very centrally located at the Plateau. 

They had all the baby stuff that we needed and even more, which was amazing.

Communication was great before and during our visit despite the fact that they were out of town.

Many thanks!

I rented this place for my family who came from Russia for my cousin's wedding. We had 13 of us stay here and it was undeniably the best experience. I live in Montreal and have been to many places and this place by far was the most unbelievably gorgeous. So well designed. The location of the penthouse is steps away from everything in old port Montreal, from stores to restaurants, clubs and bars. We had an incredible waterfront view of the old port as well. If I could give this place a 10 star rating I would! Thank you from my family, my cousin and me!!!

Penthouse was awesome!  Stayed over with a couple of friends. Location was right on Pier Central, so close to everything. The place is huge, well-designed, and stylish. The host even took me around for a night! I'd definitely stay here again.

This place was beautiful, exquisite, and it's in a perfect location. I don't think I could have picked a better place to stay during my time in Montreal. I stayed here for my brother's bachelor party and it exceeded all of my expectations with a group of 16. Our host was incredibly gracious and accommodating for all of our needs. He was also more than helpful to give recommendations and even accompanied us to get all the necessities we would need during our stay. He even came out with us on our first night and made us feel right at home. This place and the host really made my brother's bachelor party an incredible one, and I don't think I'll ever forget that.
The place is amazing and the service was great! Jonathan and Raj were very responsive and helped out with their local knowledge around the city as well!
Great place!
Beautiful place in the heart of the city
You can't go wrong booking this place. It's central to all the hottest spots for Friday and Saturday nights. Service and response were fantastic!!!!

This place is awesome, I was in Montreal for a company Christmas party with my colleagues and we had this place. Amazing hospitality and the owner ensured we had fun and his recommendations for Montreal were perfect

Two separate units with ample space for 13 people to sleep.  The two apartments offer unique/interesting décor. The location is ideal for exploring Old Montreal, and the hosts provided helpful suggestions for places to dine out.

A welcome surprise when we walked into the apartment. It felt better than the photos. Located in a very historic and walkable area. Lots of buzz & shops. Milo was an incredible host and made sure we were happy at every turn. We had to switch apartments due to a plumbing accident. Milo walked us through every step to upgrade us to another place which we equally loved. Great hospitality.
The host cancelled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Milo had excellent communication; his place was very nice. The only problem was that when we arrived, the guest ahead of us broke the shower. He gave us a very small partial refund, but we were forced to shower in a public area. The shower had no water pressure and mold everywhere. Although this might not have been his fault, we thought the issue should have been resolved during our stay since we complied with everything he needed and provided him with all the information about the shower promptly.

The shower in the unit before entering the unit. The host (Milo) notified me prior to my arrival that it would be fixed by the next day. He instructed me to bathe myself with hot water. The next day he brought two buckets to bathe with and messaged me to state that the plumber had ordered the part and it should arrive within the next few days, and the shower should be fixed by the weekend (I had booked a 2-week stay, and for one week I would be without a shower). I was not okay with this arrangement and requested a different possible solution. He then directed me to go to the roof, access the swimming pool, take a shower there, and then come back to the unit. I informed the host that this was not okay to which he replied "well there is working bath and hot water so what's the issue?".  I politely requested to be relocated if he had another unit or simply a refund of my money so I could find another unit. Milo did not agree that this was a good idea and took it upon himself to threaten me that his ad never stated that he had a shower, and if I left the unit, I would cancel my stay and there wouldn't be a refund. Long story short after many hours of attempting to politely reason with Milo, I finally contacted Airbnb support and requested their assistance. They also agreed that this was not a good condition for anyone to remain in (no shower and bathing with buckets) and assisted in obtaining my full refund. The host was NOT a nice person nor was he polite or understanding or even cared about the request or the well-being of the guest or the condition which he was leaving me in by asking me to bathe with buckets. He did not care about having misinformed his guest and only wanted the money from the booking. I've booked with many individuals using Airbnb, however, never experienced anything of this caliber. Good luck to you all who book with him
Go find a place to stay

Book this apartment!!!!

We loved this beautiful home for many reasons - location: it is steps away from the basilica, great restaurants and all the old town action. Downtown Montreal is very close, so it is easy to walk everywhere. The house was very clean, the bed was roomy and comfortable, the shower and large soaking tub were great and Milo is the best host ever!!! He even sent me an encouraging email when he found out about my illness. Above and beyond!!! Thanks, Milo, for the coffee assortment and the tea. We had an awesome time, stay here!!!

My stay with Anne-Laure went well. The spacious apartment with a nice garden was in a good location, but the cleaning wasn't done upon arrival and the neighbor above was very noisy. It's a shame we didn't get to meet the host, although we appreciated the service of a family member.
The location is quite central. It is very accessible by public transport and located right next to Chinatown.

Julia's place at Philly's was amazing. We were so grateful that they let us check in with one hour's notice as our other Airbnb was such a mess, they were lovely and helped us so much. We are so grateful they really saved our trip. We would book this place over and over again!
Great apartment, clean and well-furnished with everything you need. Great location too!
Great location. Close to Old Montreal, Chinatown, and the metro. The condo was clean, spacious, and had all the amenities you'd need. Julia & Philly were wonderful hosts.
A beautifully decorated space perfect for a nice getaway from the stress of our New York lives. I highly recommend this location to all who visit the wonderfully friendly Montreal!

It was our first time visiting Montreal & we are so glad we stayed in this place! Very close to the old town, metro, grocery store & restaurants, it's also right next to Chinatown. The place itself was spacious, clean & had everything we needed! It even had a gym! Thank you so much for hosting us!

Very accommodating! The origins parking spot is too short for my minivan and they assigned me immediately to another larger parking spot! I need a second set of keys for convenience and they provided them to me as well and waived the deposit charge! I will definitely be coming back again!!!
Clean apartment with nice features! Also very convenient location right near Chinatown and the convention center downtown.

Fantastic hospitality and great communication! This was our first time booking an Airbnb, so I did have several questions and Julia was very quick to respond and put our minds at ease. The location was fantastic as we had friends staying at a nearby hotel (except they paid triple for their stay). Julia and Philly's place was clean and spacious (comfortably slept 4 adults). Would recommend this place for anyone looking to stay in downtown Montreal. Thank you Julia and Philly!

We had a great time! The apartment was beautiful and super clean, but most importantly it had a fantastic location!! Julie was super helpful and made the check-in and check-out process very simple! Would definitely recommend this place! :)

The location is great. The apartment is clean and the layout is good. However, there is a plumbing issue in the kitchen sink. Dirty water gets stuck in the sink and causes the entire apartment to smell bad. The offensive lingering odor made us feel uncomfortable all night. If this issue is fixed, then it could be a good place to stay.

I was in Montreal for a trade show, and the location couldn't have been more convenient (across from the Palais de Congress). Checking in was a breeze, even though our flight was delayed 3 hours and we arrived late; the communication lines remained open.

The area had great restaurants with walkable locations, centrally located for either driving or walking. The surroundings were secure and clean.

The hosts were responsive and accommodating.
Thanks Julia for being a great host. Perfect condo in a perfect spot! Everything is just in walkable distance.
A very nice place to stay! Location was perfect!
Great apartment, walking distance from Old Town Montreal and right by the train station! Great communication!
Our hosts were very welcoming, the place was very clean and quiet. There is nothing negative to say.

Overall this place was great, and the hosts were quick to respond to all the requests. The location was excellent, we were about a 5-minute walk to Notre Dame Basilica. The building was clean and quiet. We had access to the gym which we used. The parking space was a bit small and uncomfortable, but we were glad to have it. The only almost catastrophic thing that happened was when we got there two beds were missing which were advertised in the original post. We contacted Julia and Philly right away, and they said they could drop one off the following day and that the two sofa beds could fit two people each, so we should have enough room. That would have been horrible and uncomfortable for all of us considering we had a 6+ foot tall guy who barely fit by himself on the sofa bed, and couldn't share the queen-size bed in the bedroom. In the end, it all worked out because one of our coworkers didn't come.
Great place to be if you want to stay downtown. The bedroom is bigger than it looks in the pictures.
Super location beautiful complex with heated rooftop pool, Julia really kind and willing to accommodate you thank you so much
Loved this place! Great location, very clean (the bedding smelled amazing) and stylish space. It had everything and more than needed for a one-night stay. Check-in was a breeze!

Three of us were here for the F1 weekend. The condo is in a great location for Old Town, St Laurent, Crescent Street, and many more places. The pool and steam room are nice additions to help clear away the morning cobwebs. Good communication and no hassles!
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊

Unfortunately, Airbnb gave us the incorrect address. We also specifically chose this Airbnb for parking, but the listing did not mention the low ceiling and that large SUVs would not fit. We had to pay to park elsewhere, and when we tried to find the address, we waited about 40 minutes before resolving the actual address with Julia. Julia was extremely attentive to our needs and came as soon as she could to guide us to the correct address matching the listing photo. Also, this property was in an ideal location to explore Old Montreal.
Great place, great value!
Don't stay here, unsafe, unclean and classic bait and switch. They'll offer you a larger unit, for a price.
Excellent location and immaculate cleanliness

The hosts were accommodating, which was much appreciated. The location was excellent, very close to the old port. I had booked it for my parents (seniors) and the location was perfect for them to get to everywhere they needed to go.

This was only our 2nd Airbnb experience and we loved the location for our family of 4 to tour both Old Montreal and downtown by foot or transit.

The condo was clean, had available parking, adequate space for a family of 4, a nice view, was walking distance to a grocery store, and we felt totally safe walking in this area at all times of the day as well. 

If we ever came back to Montreal we would look to stay here again.

The location of the condo was perfect!!  Finding the condo itself was difficult, especially parking. Thankfully Julia was quick to respond and gave us further directions. The space itself appeared to be quite different from the pictures, although it was still nice. The space was unclean in the bathroom (toilet and sink) and kitchen (lipstick found on glasses). As for the sleeping arrangements, the space comfortably fit 4 adults. However, the beds were terribly uncomfortable.

The space is awesome for a one-bedroom, but cannot comfortably fit six adults. It was a good experience for the short stay we had since we didn't spend a lot of time inside the apartment. The location is awesome, right in the heart of Old Port and close to the metro. The location was a bit confusing at first because the listing said one place but our final confirmation listed another. 

For 888 Rue Saint-François-Xavier, there is no access code to the building, it is free to enter, any floor. 

There are three levels of parking which is good and an adequate gym. 

Julia was great with communication, she also brought us more pillows and towels when requested.

Perfect location! Right in Old Montreal, just steps away from great restaurants and attractions. The accommodations were very nice and even included a washer/dryer. Parking was included, which was important for us. Would not hesitate to stay here again.

Stylish place right in Old Montreal! It's listed as sleeping six people, but the two fold-out couches we found were only the size of a twin bed.  It might be a bit tight to actually sleep two people on each couch. Other than that, great place!

The location was amazing. Parking was a little cumbersome and stressful (we had to go upstairs to get the parking pass before parking and same process to leave, fitting our large car very stressful!). The host did not respond to any of my messages during the stay. Beds were super hard and uncomfortable. The location was perfect for exploring.

Great place. Cannot beat the area. Julia and Philly offered quick communication, easy accessibility and answered all my questions. We had everything provided. The place seemed a little smaller than the photos showed, but it was still more than comfortable and roomy. And the location - amazing!!!
Excellent host, great location, amazing home

The apartment we had was not the one we reserved. On the website at booking, it shows a different apartment that should be in the same building. 

The apartment we got was very disappointing and on top of that, we felt like we were scammed.

Julia's apartment location was fantastic for exploring Montreal. It was a bit tricky leaving the car to go up to the 19th floor to get the parking pass before parking. Also, having to do the same in reverse once leaving the underground parking. We were a group of four. The main bedroom was comfortable but the two sofa beds in the lounge were only just adequate for two adults. If we had been a group of six, the sleeping arrangements wouldn't have worked.
Good for a single couple...

Great location! In the heart of old Montreal near all the major hotels. Minutes away from Saint Catherine Street, Chinatown, CoucheTard, and the Place D'Arms metro station. Great garage parking facility, tight turns for big cars/SUVs but all navigable. As with most of Montreal, a lot of one-way streets and the busy street can make your drive there a bit more fun (timely). 

The photos shown in the listing are NOT the same unit. The furniture, finishes, and decorations are similar, but the physical room is not the one as shown. Not a huge issue as the actual unit was quite spacious and the layout didn't impose. Just to note, the listing indicates for 6 guests. At most it could comfortably sleep 4 adults. Two in the queen bed and 1 in each of the two sofa beds. So just beware of that if you have a larger group. Also the sofa beds were quite firm/hard, like sleeping on a camping foam mattress.
The worst communication with the apartment owner. The apartment does not correspond to the pictures at all.

Very nice apartment in bustling Chinatown. Host was very prompt with responses. My only issue was that I believe the photos depict multiple apartments and are misleading. It is far too small for six people as advertised and realistically would be awkward for more than one couple. It would be a great place for a couple perhaps with children.
Very well-located housing in a hotel residence. No contact with the managers. Everything is done through (website hidden by Airbnb) and efficient, but a bit cold at the end.

This studio apartment is well-furnished with plenty of natural light. The space is generous with a small living room for relaxing. The location is excellent for walking everywhere, and we really benefited from the free parking in the building.
I reported the window issue on October 26th, so please ensure it is fixed the next time someone books the unit.
There was an issue with this condo but Julia upgraded us to another unit nearby before check-in. The other unit was spotless and as described.  Seamless check-in and check-out.

Excellent location and clean place. Free parking is a huge plus. The bed arrangement was slightly different from what I expected (two beds and two sofa beds), but it worked out fine. I would definitely stay here again.
Great Place, Easy Check-In, Great Location, Confirm parking availability before arrival

Ideally located!
IGA grocery store is a 3-minute walk away, with access to the metro and more. We didn't even use our car during our stay!
The parking lot is really appreciated, especially in Montreal.
Very good location. However, the place is very small.
Three near the congress palace, a beautiful weekend.
Great hosts with fast responses via text and call. The room is in a perfect location with an outstanding view.

Alexia is a really nice landlord. We love the house, so cozy and clean. The location is in downtown. You can walk to the good restaurants, churches, Chinatown and old port. Perfect place to stay while traveling. Highly recommended!
A great space in a great Montreal location. Alexia is a great and well-seasoned host, you will be pleased staying here!

I loved staying here! It was very quiet at night, even on a Friday night when there was a street festival, and yet you are right in the heart of a great neighborhood! I got in a run to Mount Royal park, I ate so much food at Saint Laurent, and there was a funky park right around the corner hosting great local bands for Fringe Fest! I'd definitely stay here again!
Alexia's place was very clean and well-located, in a very quiet area. She is very responsive and ensures your stay is pleasant. I highly recommend it!
Great place!
Comfortable, clean, & quiet space in a great location! Alexia answered all our questions & ensured we had an enjoyable stay. Very pleased!

Nice place to stay for several days! Alexia is a very kind and caring host. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed. The location is perfect - very quiet neighborhood, but close to everything.
Great place, great location, great responsiveness from the host. I would recommend the place when you're in Montreal!

If you are staying in the Plateau, I found this very central studio to be worth splurging a bit. I have stayed twice with this wonderful host and had fun activities both times right in the neighborhood. There is lots of attention to detail in her studios with pretty decor and kitchen appliances, and coffee and tea provided. It really suited my needs for both a 2 week stay and a quick overnight on a separate occasion. Really welcoming vibe from host and almost always quick replies to messages. Thank you so much Alexia!

Alexia's apartments never disappoint. We've stayed in the building four times in less than a year. The apartments are clean and have everything we need. We're looking forward to going again soon. Thanks, Alexia!

Well-located apartment very close to the Saint Laurent Boulevard.  Super welcome from Alexia, quick handover of the apartment. The place is very quiet with proximity to nice restaurants and great walks to discover the plateau.
We had a great stay. The location was fantastic and the place was very clean and comfortable. Thanks, Alexia!

Alexia's place was wonderful. Clean, just enough space, lots of toiletries (I forgot toothpaste!), and she had a handy folder with lots of information about the place and the local area. I would definitely stay here again.

Alexia is an adorable host, very responsive and very helpful. She kept my luggage at her place so I could enjoy my last day in Montreal. Communication was easy and efficient! A great host!

The apartment is however quite poorly insulated from noise (good thermal insulation though) and the fridge is noisy. You'll need earplugs for a longer stay. 

Very good location!
Very nice studio in a great neighborhood. Everything you may need and much more was provided

Alexia is an amazing host, the apartment has everything you could ask for and the location is ideal. Montreal is an amazing city and everything is easily accessible from this location. I will book again with her in the very near future! The best part was that this apartment was sparkling clean, animal and smoke free, something that was a must for me as I have allergies.

Alexia went out of her way to communicate with me and allow an early check-in. She held my bag in her own apartment at checkout so that I could hang out in the city until my later flight and even put the bag in her cabinet so that her adorable kitty Igor couldn't get hairs on it as I am allergic.

In the apartment there was coffee and tea for guests to enjoy. She has a helpful booklet of how everything works and what is nice in the neighborhood to explore. She provides hand-knitted slippers for guests to wear! The apartment is perfect for one person or a couple with plenty of towels, a hair dryer, extra blankets, a tub for soaking, and a full kitchen. There is even a balcony and if it wasn't November and freezing outside I would have taken Alexia up on having my tea out there! 

The apartment is a few blocks away from the most incredible park, Mount Royal, and even though it was chilly I went in to walk in the woods every day. The charming Plateau and Mile End neighborhoods are also right outside the door. It is a quick walk to downtown or a practically instant bus ride on the 55. I particularly enjoyed a gluten-free bakery called Boulangerie Baked2Go Allergen Free, the adorable Edmond cafe canteen, and a health food store all within a couple of blocks. Lots of vintage shops on the main drag close by, St Laurent. It was a ten-minute walk to Parc La Fontaine and the best poutine that was also able to be gluten-free at a super cute cafe La Banquise. This was my first trip to Montreal and I could not have asked for a better host or apartment. I felt like a native coming home to the charming plant-filled foyer. What a wonderful city!

I had such a great trip visiting the Manifesto exhibit at MAC, a film festival was going on and I was able to catch a French language movie,  I got a new tattoo at the nearby Minuit Dix Tattoo from an outstanding artist Charline Bataille and bought a handmade winter coat at the incredible Kanuk store down the road that had a 50% off sale. A magical first trip thanks to Alexia's charming apartment and its wonderful location!
Clean and well-located apartment! Alexia provides a very warm welcome!
Nothing to say, it was perfect!

Alexia was very helpful in every way, she was very pleasant and the apartment was warm and cozy! It was the perfect location, being within walking distance of many things but still nice and quiet. We'll be staying here again next time we visit Montreal.

We enjoyed our stay at Alexia's place. We lucked out and found parking right outside, which was a huge relief and we found a great coffee shop just around the corner. The apartment was very clean, warm and in a great location!
Good situation, very clean apartment with all the necessary equipment for a short or long stay.

The space is as much as one or two travelers need. Very good value. There are kitchen utensils (pots and pans) as well as cutlery, so you can cook your own food if you prefer. There are also many great places to eat nearby and lots of fun things to do
The host cancelled this reservation 56 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great location. Good value.

Yanick's place is perfect if you want to experience the heart of Old Montreal! The apartment is quiet and cozy, and the bed was super comfy. I appreciated the breakfast goodies, too! I've stayed at quite a few AirB&Bs in Montreal, and this is definitely one of my favorites, especially for the price.  I would love to stay here again.
Cozy and comfortable, right in the heart of Old Montreal. Very affordable for Montreal in the summer, and check-in and check-out were effortless. Would definitely stay again!

A charming, cozy, open space with a lot of character! It made our trip experience so much nicer. The beautiful original windows were so nice to sit and enjoy evening tea. 

Overall great location right by Old Port, easy communication to get keys and a message when leaving. 

Thank you again, we hope to be back soon! Cheers, Mél and Leah
Lovely apartment with a great breakfast and coffee! The location is unbeatable! Would definitely recommend
Stocked fridge, perfect location in Old Montreal.

The humble loft is a comfortable and tidy space in a great location. Easy walking to all the activities on the water, restaurants, shopping, bus lines and metro stations. The neighborhood felt safe. Yanick is an excellent host. I would be very happy to stay here again the next time I visit Montreal.
This location is at the center of history. A great deal.
Really nice place to stay for a weekend with friends
Great location. Nice host.  If you hate the scent of fabric softener, don't stay here unless the owner changes his laundry practices. Good value.

This quiet, cozy apartment is in the very best location of Old Montreal. Walk to restaurants, entertainment, the Old Port, and shopping. Very safe neighborhood, which was important since I traveled alone. The loft was well maintained and very clean. Nice shower with ample hot water, plenty of towels, air conditioned, comfy bed. I usually don't sleep well when traveling, but I had no problems here. Two sunny windows added to the charm. There is an elevator in the building so it was easy for me to get up and down with luggage. Check-in and check-out was very easy and the building is secured at night. Yanick was a great host and made sure there was coffee, fresh fruit, plenty of bottled water, and some nice breakfast items. I can't wait to come back to this charming loft!
A wonderful space truly in the heart of Old Montreal! Best location in Montreal!
Amazing location. We were traveling with a baby, so we can truly attest to the ease of our stay. Exceeded all expectations.
We enjoyed our stay, one of the reasons being the location. We loved the Old City, and the place we stayed was right in the heart of the Old City. It couldn't be a better location.

Amazing location to visit the Old Port. The place is located around lots of restaurants where you can go get food. 

It's also located near a metro station which makes it super easy to move all around the city. 

The whole place is nice and cozy.
Unbeatable location on bustling Rue Saint-Paul. Breakfast food in the fridge was a very nice touch and it was an easy check-in/check-out process.

Any incredible location close to everything in Old Montreal. This was a comfortable, well-stocked space to return to each day. There is strict timing around check-in so ensure you create travel plans to accommodate. Yanick is approachable and attentive. This is a wonderful listing.
Perfectly located in Old Montreal, I highly recommend it!

Great loft centrally located in Old Montreal. Easy access to restaurants, bars, art galleries, souvenir shops, etc. Perfect location for tourists. The place was spotless and the owner was very accommodating. Excellent value for the price.

What can I say... Location, location, location. In the middle of everything in Old Montréal. Convenient, quiet and cozy. Lots of great restaurants around. Communication with Yanick was super easy, same with key exchange. He even made sure there were things available for breakfast. That's a super host. I will not hesitate to reserve again.

An ideal location to discover the best part of Montreal (Old Montreal). The street where the Airbnb is located is just superb. Yanick is a very attentive host who left us refreshments and everything we needed for breakfast... Same goes for hygiene, we found lavender-scented shampoo and shower gel. We had an excellent stay.

You will not be disappointed! Perfect space and location! Loved that we could make lattes every morning thanks to Yanick having a frother and Nespresso machine! Bunk beds were comfortable, food in the fridge and cupboards is a nice touch. It was very clean and smelled wonderful!
Studio ideally located in the old town. Ideal for walking tours and close to public transportation. Very well equipped apartment. Yannick is very responsive by phone and attentive.
His place is sparkling clean with a great location right in the heart of Old Montreal! I would definitely recommend his place if you're looking for a place to stay in Montreal!

Yanick was great! Wonderful central location with so much to see and walk to... close to so many restaurants. Locals were welcoming! The space was perfect for my needs, breakfast included helped so much on the first few days and the space was very well done and well kept. Bunk beds were both comfortable.  I would definitely book the space for the future!
Yanick's loft was perfect for my short trip to Montreal. The space was comfortable and the location perfect for exploring the city. Highly recommend!

Located on the oldest street in the city of Montreal, in Old Montreal by the port, this cozy loft with double bunk beds is just steps away from restaurants and shops. Yanick provided basic snacks and breakfast foods, and the loft was just perfect. It’s a fabulous place to stay! A 20 minute walk from downtown Montreal, and just a few minutes from the riverwalk. Great place.

The location is nice, inside the old Montreal. It's a 9-minute walk from the nearest subway station on a hill street, which isn't easy when you're with luggage, so I suggest using a taxi, Uber or something on arrival and departure.

The place is really good, with some food in the fridge. 

We had a really great time there and I do recommend it.

Amazing in every respect! We will never forget our amazing experience staying in such a perfect location in a fabulous apartment where the host has thought of everything++++ You miss out on this opportunity & it is truly your loss!

Location, Location, Location. 
Right on Old Montreal, it's an amazing location when visiting Montreal. A 20-minute walk to St. Catherine's as well. 
The flat itself is clean and cozy, but well equipped with a kitchen, TV, decent bathroom with a bathtub.
Great location and a cozy place I loved it.
Cozy place in a great location in the old city. Breakfast options are great. Check-in and check-out were a breeze. Great value.
Yanick is very kind and helpful. The studio was cozy, very well-located, and very well-equipped. I would definitely stay there again when I go back to Montreal! Thank you, Yanick :)
A true gem. Yanick was very helpful and the place is filled with all the amenities you could possibly need. Very cozy!

Excellent little place in the perfect location in Montreal. Photos don't do it justice!

Highly recommend staying at this Airbnb
Great location with a street full of restaurants and bars. The apartment is very well-equipped, including separate laundry facilities. Excellent breakfast food is provided!

Perfectly located loft in Montreal. Had everything we needed and was a great location for New Year's Eve celebrations. The host also gave us yogurt and other breakfast items, which was very kind of them.
Amazing location and unit, and a fantastic location as well.
Quality accommodation, in accordance with the descriptions, perfect welcome and the accommodation is very well located
It is such a great location.

Perfect location in the heart of old Montreal, easy check-in process and responsive host. Unfortunately, power and Wi-Fi were out for the last few hours of my stay, possibly due to work being done on the street outside, but I know that would have been beyond the host's control. Would definitely recommend this place though.

Yanick's space is exactly as described. A few steps to the old port and amazing pubs/restaurants, and minutes away from the subway. Yanick made sure I had everything I needed; very responsive, and kept on communicating with me even after my later check-in. Sparkling clean apartment.
Yannick's place was perfectly located in the heart of Montreal!
Impeccable housing and very well located. Excellent welcome.

Christopher's place is beautiful, very bright with lots of natural light, seemed recently renovated with some retro touches. The location is perfect, such a great neighborhood with lots of cafes, restaurants and shops within walking distance. The market is wonderful, too, and so close! The patio is epic, but you do need to go up a fire escape to get to it, so if heights aren't your favorite, that's a little intense. WiFi signal isn't very strong on the ground floor, we couldn't get Netflix to work. And it was my first time interacting with a third-party for check-in and questions: check-in and -out were seamless, but a homeowner's familiarity with the neighborhood and house was missing. Still, it's a great place for a really reasonable price, I would absolutely recommend.
Perfect place in a great neighborhood. Clean, cute, narrow two-story building. I loved it.

The place is super... This will be my first choice when I return to Montreal. I loved the neighborhood and cafes, convenience store, bakery, as well as Marché Jean-Talon, the price is perfect, not too high and not too low... It's a "keeper"... Christopher is very responsive and cooperative, wow thank you! Nice terrace too. Metro 5-7 minutes walk and parking spots are very accessible in the surrounding streets.
Perfect location for this lovely house with a perfect terrace!
Great location, close to Marche Jean Talon, parks, the metro, and restaurants.  A great family-friendly neighborhood. A clean, well-laid-out apartment with a beautiful rooftop deck.

Christopher's place is one of the best Airbnbs I've ever stayed in. It is spacious, well-lit, and amazingly clean. The location is perfect, only a few blocks from the subway to downtown. We got the 3-day unlimited metro passes which work on the bus and subway, which worked out really well for us. The home is only a few blocks from the Jean Talon Farmer's Market, the largest farmer's market in North America. The kitchen in the home is full of everything you would need to cook for dinner. There is even a rooftop terrace for dining. So many great things. The one drawback is that the listing says there is air conditioning and it worked so poorly, I don't think you should count on that. It was very hot in Montreal the weekend we went and we just couldn't get the house cool with the air conditioner. Other than that, everything was great and I highly recommend this home!

The apartment is very well equipped and especially the rooftop terrace is magnificent! We have enjoyed it a lot! The Jean-Talon market is within walking distance, we also take advantage of that, it's super. The house is on a corner street so it might be a bit noisy at night, but with the windows closed, we don't hear anything, it's well isolated :)

Excellent reception, very professional from the agency staff and the departure was made easy.
The house perfectly suited our needs in a friendly neighborhood with shops and life. (very Montreal) A bakery right next door and a supermarket open until 10 PM served us well.

The apartment is very functional, comfortable, clean and pleasant. It is ideally located (pleasant neighborhood near Jean Talon market, metro...). 

The only minor drawback (and this will depend on perspectives), it is an apartment that is primarily intended for rental, so a bit impersonal (doesn't have the charm and lively character of an inhabited apartment).
Amazing location. Very clean place. The rooftop patio is awesome

Our stay was very pleasant in this quiet and comfortable house with everything we needed, in a nice neighborhood. Another positive point is that it's very close to the Jean Talon market, where we went every day, and Jarry Park.

The place lived up to the descriptions provided, and my expectations. It was clean, well appointed, and had lots of room, spaces, closets, etc. to unpack and get comfortable. Great location near Jean Talon market, and the amenities, service, and key exchange went very smoothly.

Christopher's house was perfect: super clean, perfect location (we spent our days at Café Larue, Le Pain dans les Voiles, Marché Jean-Talon and at Parc Jarry - all within 5 minute walk), communication was flawless and the rooftop terrace was a very nice plus. I would go back in a heartbeat. Highly recommended!

Christopher's place was the best choice we could have made. The house was very cute, artistic, super clean and organized, and had everything you might need. Christopher had thought of every detail, such as extra pillows of different quality, and supplies for the house needs.  The house is in a very nice and safe neighborhood with a mini store across the street and two metro stations within walking distance. It is perfect, especially for longer stays like ours. I would totally recommend it to everyone. It can really make you feel like a local in Montreal! Thank you Christopher for your hospitality!

This house in Villeray is as clean, spacious, and charming as it looks! We stayed for seven weeks and fell in love with the space and the neighborhood. Christopher is super prompt with responding to any questions and check-ins and check-outs were both smooth. The proximity to metro stations, Jean Talon Market, Little Italy, and so many amazing cafes, coffee shops, bakeries, and restaurants makes Christopher's place an ideal base for your Montreal trip.
Perfect place, perfect host
The host cancelled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

My family and I stayed at Michel's place and it was lovely. The location is very good and close to everything. The parking space was really handy. The house was spotless and had everything we needed. Communication with Michel was seamless. Overall, a very positive experience.
Michela and Mario were quick to respond to my needs. The place was pristine and perfectly located downtown, as I needed to be close to Concordia.
The location was wonderful. Better than what I expected.

The place was very clean and very comfortable to stay in. It was the perfect place to stay while visiting Montreal. Michela was very helpful and answered all questions promptly. I highly recommend staying here.

Amazing condo with amazing views! Great amenities with the gym and pool! So close to all the great venues on Crescent! Would love to stay again next time!

Oh, and the Nespresso machine was definitely a bonus!

Absolutely excellent Airbnb experience! The hosts went above and beyond to help us with our luggage storage since we arrived early for check-in. The location was perfect, and the space itself was beautiful and cozy. Brand new condo that is very tastefully decorated. Will definitely stay here again!

Great apartment downtown Montreal. Next door is Bell Centre, don't miss to see a hockey game. Public transport is one minute away, many places for breakfast or dinner and shopping as well as sightseeing within walking distance. Mario and Michaela were very friendly and helped make it a great three days in Montreal.

Imagine swimming in an indoor pool in the sky while it's snowing outside. Pretty epic. The apartment itself had all modern fixtures and conveniences, but no microwave or toaster oven. Futon couch is probably great for travelers intending to use it as an additional bed, but as a couch it leaves a bit to be desired. Also, the TV has no cable or other service (not even OTA coverage), so bring an HDMI cable to plug in your computer. Amazing location, super close to many bars and restaurants and convenient to many points of interest.
Perfect communication, excellent condition of the apartment. Highly recommended. Excellent location and parking are major pluses.

Being at Esther's place has been awesome. Esther is an outstanding person who made me feel like home. 
The place is beautiful, furnished with a lot of style... I love it!
The sheets and mattress were clean and fresh, just like the bathroom.
Probably what I liked most was the location, two minutes walking from Parc Jean Mance (where people play drums on Sunday) and to the best restaurants in Plateau! 
I'll be back!!

As usual, Esther treated outstandingly. She encouraged me to visit and discover the real Montreal with valuable tips. Summer is awesome here! I didn't wanna leave!

Thanks for everything, Esther. I'll be back soon, and for sure, I'll be back in your place!

Gonzalo

Esther's place has such a lovely atmosphere! The location is fantastic, one of the best. And she is always advising, helping, and making the experience in Montreal unforgettable. You won't regret it. I love MTL when staying at Esther's place!
Esther, thank you once again for all your help, outstanding hospitality, and never-ending concern for making my time in Montreal just perfect. I hope to return soon! Best regards
Awesome! One more time you nailed it!
Awesome!! I love MTL! Thanks Esther one more time!!
The host cancelled this reservation 141 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Good value for money at 1 hour from the city center by public transportation. The two permanent staff are very kind! Special mention for Carlos

Jian's place is a great place to experience Montreal. Despite being a little far from downtown, public transportation passes by every 10 minutes or so just around the corner. Private room with shared bathroom, nice quiet place to get away from the city and easy access. Great value for service.
The place is very nice and close to the river with nice benches to watch the sunset.
Clean and well-located accommodation, quiet and close to everything (metro, park, supermarket, etc...). The hosts are incredibly kind and attentive. We had a very pleasant 20 days. Thank you

The hosts are ready to listen to what you need and want, and they are willing to help you. Please don't hesitate to ask if you feel confused or don't know how to do something! 

Enjoy your stay at the Sunlight (this place is just like the sunlight)^^

My best Airbnb experience! 

Cozy and well-equipped apartment with tasteful decor, spotless cleanliness, quiet neighborhood with amenities nearby (restaurants, grocery store, pharmacy).

Metro station is right next to the apartment. 

Highly recommend it ☺️

Great Apartment in Montreal 
JC's place is great for all kinds of travel, offering amazing space with 2 bedrooms, a dining room, living room, and office.
The apartment is very well maintained and decorated, including all required amenities for travelers and quick responses from JC for any clarifications needed.
The place is close to the Metro, supermarket, parks, walking paths, and restaurants, as well as convenient driving with easy access to highways and roads and private parking space. 
The apartment has everything you need and is highly recommended; myself and my family thank JC for the lovely stay.
Regards,
Anas
Everything is perfect.
The apartment matched the photos. It is a well-furnished apartment and very comfortable, with all the amenities you would need for both short or long stays. I highly recommend this apartment
Very clean, just as advertised, if not better

Quiet neighborhood, loud house. You can hear TV's, music, footsteps and slamming doors from the unit below. Owners are in the building. Quick responses and occasional visits. If they can't meet you during check-in, they make an effort to catch you coming in or out of the building. 

Hosts need a bit more Airbnb experience before I can highly recommend.

Sajjad is an amazing host. He gave me great tips and he was always communicating to make sure everything was good (not every day, just the right amount of times). The place is strategically placed; it has a pool and a gym which are great, and all the services you need. You just need to take into consideration that the bed doesn't have a base (as indicated on the page) and the couches are kind of old. If you don't mind these things, then this place is an amazing place to stay. For me, it was amazing; there's a mall below the building with everything you need, and quick access to the metro station. 
I would definitely return to this place.
The host cancelled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Best Airbnb stay ever. 

Apartment apart from being amazing, it was a top experience within a minute of everything (it helps with the big snow), the host is adorable... we feel like we're in an Airbnb pub. 

And Jason, thank you for the bagels :)

Jason's condo was absolutely perfect. Prime location - super close to St-Laurent street in the Mile End, tastefully decorated, & with every amenity you could possibly need. Jason himself was very thoughtful and hospitable, promptly providing information on the apartment and making sure we felt at home. I would highly recommend staying here during your visit to Montreal!

Very beautiful experience from start to finish. Easy and quick exchanges and communication, simple and smooth check-in and check-out, superb clean apartment, sunny and tastefully decorated with a beautiful terrace offering a nice view, enough space for storing personal belongings and feeling "like home", functional and complete equipment (or if something is missing, like a hairdryer in our case), the very friendly and attentive Jason will bring it to you within hours), well-served neighborhood by public transportation and lively (which doesn't prevent enjoying a pleasant calm in the apartment), etc.

If we really had to offer a critique, maybe one could suggest installing speakers to listen to your own music? That's really all...

In short: try it as soon as possible, even if you live in Montreal and want to have a nice weekend getaway! My friend and I will definitely return to Montreal and won't look for anything else. We've already recommended the place to some friends.
The reservation was cancelled the day before arrival. This is an automated message.
The reservation was cancelled 2 days before the arrival date. This is an automated message.
The reservation was cancelled 10 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The reservation was cancelled 22 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Jason was very nice, easy to communicate with and responsive. His apartment is an amazing place to stay. Everything is new, modern & clean. The deck is absolutely stunning with a gorgeous view & a vegetable garden. We ate tomatoes from it! The kitchen is stocked with lots of things you'd need to cook. Although the place is conveniently-located just off St. Laurent, it's quiet. The bed is new & very comfortable & the shower is really nice. Just across the street is one of the best cafes in the city, Cafe Sardine, which at night turns into a restaurant (same chef as at Toronto's Guu). Walking distance to more great restaurants, grocery & organic food stores, a pharmacy & lots of shopping. If Jason's apartment is available to rent, it'd be a good idea to snap it up! There aren't many places like this to rent in Montreal & in the best neighbourhood.

This was a great apartment. Very comfortable and VERY clean. In walking distance to a lot of good restaurants and shops. There is a good coffee shop right across the street which always helps. Spoke with Jason for a little bit, he was a very nice guy/host!

A smooth and relaxing stay! I hope this apartment is available next time I'm in Montreal! The apartment was clean, bright, and modern, and the rooftop terrace was a huge bonus.

The neighborhood is my favorite in Montreal with many of the best new restaurants and brunch spots within a short walk. There are lots of boutique shops and close to a liquor store and grocery store.

The company I work for booked this Airbnb for me. I had never been to one before and didn't really know what to expect.  I was happily surprised to find the standard of a good hotel, with shampoo, shower gel, body lotion, and fresh towels readily available. 

The apartment looks modern, is very clean, and is located near lots of restaurants and bars on St. Laurent. The rooftop terrace is absolutely gorgeous with a view of Mont Royal. Key exchange was uncomplicated and Jason was very friendly and patiently answered all of my questions. I can totally recommend this Airbnb and look forward to staying there again - and now maybe also in other Airbnbs because of the positive experience.

We really loved our stay at the Fairmount flat. Walking distance to iconic food destinations like Fairmount bagel, Schwartz's Delicatessen, Wilensky, and more, about a 5-7 minute walk to the metro. We visited during extremely hot weather so we were glad to have this place to come back to and relax during the day to recharge – the AC helped a ton. The flat and kitchen are impeccably stocked with any tools and things you might need – we chose to grill some of our meals with the awesome Weber grill on the roof deck.

I was also very impressed by the cleanliness and presentation of the flat overall. Thank you, Jason!

The listing was exactly as pictured (with the exception of the balcony, which is even better than pictured, with an amazing seating area!). 
My husband and I had a great stay in our favorite neighborhood in Montreal, full of interesting stores, cafes, and restaurants. One of the best restaurants I've tried in Montreal, Hotel Herman, was just steps away.
Jason was a great host and made the check-in and check-out process clear and easy. I would highly recommend this apartment for a trip to Montreal and would try to book it again the next time I am in Montreal.
Amazing place to stay, great location. Heated tiles!!!!

We had a great stay at this property! It was clean and well maintained with lots of plants. Looks just like the pictures, but feels even cooler in person. The neighborhood is perfect if you like local clothing/design shops and great restaurants. Jason was communicative and checking in was very easy.

We enjoyed our stay at Jason's apartment during our visit to Montreal between Christmas and New Year. The apartment was exactly as described / as it looked in the photos, a really nice space with everything you would need for your stay. The apartment is in a great neighborhood with lots on your doorstep without having to venture into the city center every day. Some great recommendations in the guidebook. Jason was easy to contact before and during our stay. Would definitely recommend!

Jason and Guillaume were excellent hosts. If you are a foodie, this apartment is located in the midst of a zillion delicious restaurants. It is in the middle of shopping, coffee, food, and people. This is not the touristy area of Montreal - you'll feel like a local walking around in the Mile End/Mount Royal. Thanks for an excellent stay!

A very cool apartment in an amazing location! Jason is a great host who greeted me to check in, even though I arrived quite late. 

For those who don't know the area; this is in the prime area of Mile End. Plenty of great shops, restaurants, cafes and bars literally around the corner.

For all that, it is amazingly residential and quiet too. The roof terrace is one of the best I've seen and makes a wonderful location for your breakfast or dinner!

Thanks Jason.

This is a beautiful apartment in a fantastic neighborhood. Jason and Guillaume were very easy to communicate with, and they'd left us some good recommendations for things to do in the area. The apartment itself was so pretty and comfortable that we were tempted just to hang out there, even though the neighborhood has an abundance of great things: the best bagels and the best ice cream in Montreal, etc. Highly recommended!

Perfect location in the heart of the Mile End neighborhood. Walk to everything, such as shops, restaurants, and nightlife, but still located on a quiet street. The home was clean and comfortable with a gorgeous rooftop. Would definitely stay again.
Amazing place. Perfect

We loved the apartment. Couldn't ask for a better location. It's right next to restaurants and bars, as well as a short walk to the Metro. The place was quiet, well-maintained, and just as good (if not better) than it appears in the photos. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a private retreat in Montreal.

This place is better in real life! Excellent location, very easy check-in, cozy and spotless clean apartment! Fabulous top floor terrace. Jason has been a very good host. Responsive and punctual. Thank you for the opportunity to enjoy this little paradise!

Guillaume's home was absolutely perfect for our 10-day trip to Montreal. His home was super clean, modern, and comfortable with huge windows and fantastic views. Located in the heart of Mile End, surrounded by restaurants, cafes, and shops but tucked away enough to be quiet at night. We would definitely stay there again, thank you!
Perfect apartment in every way.

The apartment was just as pictured, very clean and modern and the roof deck was lovely. The location was great with lots of wonderful restaurants and cafes just steps away. We especially enjoyed the Sparrow and Cafe Olimpico. Navigating street parking in Mile End is rather confusing, read the signs carefully!
Jason and Guillaume's home is amazingly located and incredibly clean. They would happily welcome me back for a future visit to Montreal.

Staying at Jason's place was like taking a trip back in time to the olden era of Airbnb. It was so nice to be in someone's actual home. They are also excellent hosts. The apartment is comfortable with a good kitchen and bed.  The location is excellent. We were traveling with our cat who absolutely loved the stairs.

We had a wonderful stay at Jason's. The apartment is beautiful and modern, very clean, airy, and in the best location, right in the heart of Mile End. The bed is really comfortable and it's lovely to have the roof deck. Jason is easy to communicate with and gives great neighborhood recommendations. This is our second time staying here and we hope to stay here again.

Jason's place is more beautiful in person than it appears in the photos on the listing. We absolutely loved this apartment; it was clean and bathed in natural light. The bed was comfortable, the shower and soaker tub were great, and I loved the plants throughout the apartment. And of course, the rooftop terrace was an amazing addition to our trip. Jason was easy to communicate with before, during, and after our trip. Thank you for your hospitality!
Great! Don't hesitate to book it
Jason's place is the kind of Airbnb you would actually want to live in. It's beautiful. Smart finishes, great amenities. The area is perfect. You wouldn't change a thing.

Best Airbnb I've ever stayed at, hands down, and the only Airbnb I've ever visited where I truly wished I lived there. The place is absolutely beautiful, and the surrounding area has many amazing places to eat. If I'm ever in the area again, I'll definitely stay here, and you should too. I already miss being there

Excellent host, Unal is taking good care of you. I highly recommend him. The accommodation is quite well-placed (Fontaine Garden nearby), well equipped and matches the description. I had an excellent stay.

The location is in a quiet neighborhood located a quick 5-10 minute drive from downtown Montreal. It's also very close to Saint Laurent Boulevard and Mont Royal Street where you can find restaurants, clubs, and some shopping without having to go to the downtown core. The host is very knowledgeable of the area and extremely helpful. If you want an affordable hassle-free stay, look no further.
The place was very clean and cozy! Great location too, right outside the downtown area.
Very nice studio, very clean, very comfortable bed. The host is very kind and very accommodating. I highly recommend this apartment!

Pros:

Excellent renovated unit with everything brand new. 
The location is close to stores for food (5 minute walk) and the bus stop (1 minute walk). The metro is nearby, but about a 15-minute walk away.
The kitchen is great for cooking meals, the unit's temperature is adjustable and comfortable.
Strong wifi signal.
Plenty of closet space and good lighting.
Lots of dishes and a great nonstick pan.

Cons:

Noise late at night and early in the morning. 
Being at the bottom of the staircase means you hear everyone going up and down the stairs at all hours.
Being near the main entrance, you hear the front door constantly slamming.
The building's location is great, however traffic noise is quite loud. Not recommended for light sleepers unless you can sleep with earplugs. 
Construction noise from the building during the day.
The host was good at responding (a plus) except when I arrived for check-in and couldn't get a reply. This was especially stressful since it was my first stay on Airbnb.
The host cancelled this reservation 117 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great spot. Has everything you need. Just north of downtown Montreal
It's ideally placed and the place itself is amazing!

Nimi's place is in a great location, close to all the attractions Montreal has to offer, and the apartment is much larger than it appears from the outside, with very high ceilings and a very comfortable living area. Nimi was great in providing everything that would be needed for our stay and the parking was very much appreciated. The place was decently clean except for large parts of the apartment having dusty floors. The TV did not work as well, which was a bit disappointing, but the excellent WiFi made up for that.
Spacious apartment in a perfect location within walking distance of McGill, Mount Royal, the Jazz Fest, the Old City, trendy shops and restaurants, and great nightlife.
Great location, plenty of space and easy to find.
The house is located in a very nice neighborhood. The host was very accommodating and helped us send our clothes back as we left them in the house. Recommended for all guests. Thank you!
Beautiful place, very spacious! I enjoyed it a lot. Just don't park outside the place, or you'll get a ticket.

Nimi was quick to respond when we booked. She took us in when our previous booking cancelled on us the night before we arrived at Montreal. The apartment exceeded our expectations, with nice touches that gave a homely feel. 

Nimi even sent her son to help us settle in, who was totally helpful, even following us to show us the parking spot around the back, and helping us with the luggage. 

It's exactly as per their listing description, plus it's quite close to the city center which is a big plus. The place was also spacious with a nice area for the family to gather around for card games and TV. A convenience store is just around the corner with another larger supermarket just a few blocks down. 

We would definitely consider this again if we ever return to Montreal! Thanks Nimi, you and your son have been awesome!
Great host and location. Parking on site and the space was very spacious.
Rachelle's place is a convenient walk from YUL. It is very clean in a quiet neighborhood.
Cute little space in the backyard, everything is very clean, very close to the airport!
The host communicates quickly and is very accommodating to my needs
Very beautiful room with a bohemian interior and a glass roof, good access to the bathroom and shower. Everything is provided and amazing hospitality from Rachelle!

Rachelle is the coolest host! I slept here for a night as I had a long layover. I chose to walk to the Airbnb; I got lost for a second but it was pretty straightforward once I went through the TransCanada parking lot. This was the first private room that I stayed in while using Airbnb, Rachelle made the experience very chill and exceptional. I highly recommend this room!
Great host. Second stay within less than two weeks. Highly recommended.
Rachelle and Carl were the perfect hosts. The room was quirky and comfortable. It was the perfect spot if you need to be near the airport.
Warm and comfortable welcome, this is the ideal place to stay if you want to be close to the airport.
Great shower, safe space, quiet home

The 'Bohemian' is perfect for solo stays and the bed was comfy so I slept well.  Morning breakfast was a total pleasure....lively conversation with amiable hosts, great coffee, plus homemade pancakes can't be beat.  I left happy and totally ready for the day ahead.  Highly recommended!

Conveniently located close to the airport (a 30-minute walk), this room is located in the solarium of the house, making it suitable for a short overnight stay. For me, that was all I needed due to my overnight layover, but if you want more privacy, she has other rooms available in the house which are in very good condition, clean and ready. She's very kind, always ready to help and cares for your comfort and well-being during your stay. I highly recommend her.

The room is better than the pictures; there's more furniture now in the apartment, maybe the photos should be updated. The metro is very close, with supermarkets, restaurants, coffee shops, and services nearby. It's a safe and quiet neighborhood. 

It's perfect for someone looking to relax rather than having the Canadian experience of living with a family as Will is a student. Despite being busy, he is always open to help you and provide you a good experience.
Great value accommodation.  As long as you're okay with shared student-style kitchen and bathroom facilities, you'll have a wonderful stay!

William was a gracious host who had everything set up for me upon my arrival. The space was clean and pleasant, and the room I stayed in had a locking door, which made me feel secure leaving my belongings there when I went out (there are multiple, separate rooms in the apartment). He responded promptly to any messages I sent him and ensured that my stay was a great experience. Cheers!

The place is great for the price, there are some minor things to note. The room was spacious and large, but ventilation to the main room with the AC was subpar. You will feel very uncomfortable if there is a heat wave. Aside from that, the facilities were modern and all functional. The location is somewhat close to the subway; a 5-minute walk to Joliette station, and the 29 comes right outside the door. For the price, you can't go wrong.
Beautiful space, clean and well-located. We don't feel like we are in the intimacy of the hosts
William was extremely quick with his communication and his location was near the metro station. Air conditioning was helpful during the summer heat, and the room locks.

William is an amazing host, he was so understanding of any issues I had during my stay. The room seemed bigger than the pictures which is nice, and the common areas are quite large aside from the bathroom being on the smaller side. I would just note that there can be up to 6 other guests during your stay, alongside 2 long-term houseguests. While we had 10 people in one bathroom which was a lot, but if you're comfortable with shared spaces between a lot of people then I definitely recommend William's place especially for the price. The metro is maybe a 5 minute walk, super close!
The host cancelled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Practice for proximity to public transport. Shared housing with tenants (4 bedrooms including a dormitory). No landlord on site. Common areas include living rooms. However, it is affordable.
The host cancelled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated message.

We are very pleased with our recent experience at Veronique's place. The space aligns with the pictures and descriptions; very nicely renovated condo, with lots of space. We were traveling with our two daughters and they felt as welcome as we did. There was everything we needed, and more. We were pleasantly surprised with thoughtful little details. There were little notes around the condo to help us find our way, which was very helpful. We were also provided with a detailed list of things to do and great spots nearby.

Great location; proximity to amenities and public transportation (2 metro stations within walking distance). 

Excellent communication; Veronique was quick to answer any questions I had as we were preparing for our trip, but once we arrived everything was perfect so we did not need to reach out.

Overall, the space met and even exceeded our expectations. We will definitely be verifying availability here for our next Montreal vacation. Thank you for a wonderful week!
Exactly as described, highly recommended.

The apartment was exactly as photographed. Beautiful and clean place with great amenities. I would choose Sonder's again as a host. They provide 24/7 service and replied in a timely manner. Even made a courtesy call after a minor error was made to ensure we got the correct information. Thank you Sonder!

We absolutely adored our stay in Montreal and our accommodation! The apartment was exactly as pictured on the website, ideally located in the heart of downtown, close to shops and transportation, yet quiet! We didn't receive the entry instructions upon arrival but the agency was very responsive in arranging this inconvenience. Highly recommend!
Great space, quick access, good price, exceeded expectations. Totally worth it.

Overall, wonderful location close to attractions and public transportation. Very clean and looks even better than the photos! Had issues with the door code and door system over our 4-day stay, but customer service was easily accessible both times.

This was a prime location as it is central to local spots and is within walking distance to many essentials, such as grocery stores, cafes/coffee shops, restaurants/takeaways, and convenience stores. 

Sonders provided exemplary service from providing a functioning iron and ironing board upon our arrival, as well as offering 24-hour support when we had any questions or concerns. 

Two minor details of improvement would be to provide a full-length mirror in the apartment as taller individuals, like myself, have to kneel down in order to view themselves in the bathroom mirror. Secondly, an extra throw blanket for those cold winter nights would have made our stay even more enjoyable. 

Overall, staying with Sonder was a pure delight.
Great location with easy access to both the Old Port and shops near St. Catherine's. There are plenty of excellent restaurants within a short block or two.  Clean and stylish condo.

This trip was absolutely magnificent and it clicked so well with Touria! I felt like home with a friend :-), and on top of that everything was impeccable. The apartment is quiet, 3 minutes from shops and bus lines. Unbeatable quality-price ratio, I highly recommend it. A big thank you to Touria :-)

I highly recommend Touria's accommodation. It is very well located in Montreal (the charming Masson Street with restaurants, bars, and shops a minute away), it is clean and very pleasant. Moreover, it is particularly quiet. There is a large "walk-in" closet in the room, and the bed is very comfortable. Touria will be happy to guide you through Montreal with kindness and proximity. A real pleasure to stay at her place!

My stay with Touria was wonderful. She warmly welcomed me and quickly made me feel at ease. Absolute comfort. All the rooms were clean and well-ventilated. My room was spacious and pretty with a large walk-in closet. The bed was comfortable, so all my nights were pleasant. I rested well throughout my entire stay. Touria is a top-class host. She speaks with such sweetness and elegance. She's so pleasant and very welcoming. It was a real pleasure to stay with Touria. I will definitely return if the opportunity arises and I highly recommend her to everyone.

Arielle
Very nice place with amazing location and good restaurants

Touria and her husband live in a quiet neighborhood with trees and lots of friendly cats. There are lots of restaurants nearby, and once you figure out the bus route to the Metro, you can do anything you want.

It is a very quiet location. With bus transportation nearby, getting downtown was much easier than I expected. 
I'm sure I will choose it for my next visit.
It is a wonderful and comfortable home, full of good energy!!!

Great place to stay in Montreal if you want to be close to downtown but avoid the hustle and bustle. Beautiful view of the river from the top floor of the building. A very quaint, clean and quiet apartment with a lot of charm. Would definitely stay there again.
Great apartment, very beautiful view, near downtown, bus station in front, quiet, hospitable host, everything was cleaned.
great in every way

Alexandra's accommodation has an excellent location, you can walk to various points of interest and it is also close to the metro and bus stops. 
The accommodation is very clean, corresponds to what is shown in the photos and Alexandra is a super host, always friendly and willing to help and make your stay the best experience, I would definitely stay there again!
Excellent little house in a great location, Alex was really helpful and friendly.
Alexandra is a very nice host and the space is as pictured.
Very good. Recommend.
