Alex was a wonderful host; she was responsive, friendly, and eager to help in any way possible. She went above and beyond, and made us feel very safe and comfortable in her home.

I highly recommend this accommodation; it's exactly as shown in the photos, very clean and comfortable, with all the services you need. Alex is an excellent host who helped us with everything we asked, gave us several recommendations for our first time, and everything is very well-installed.

The area where they live is a beautiful one, with two parks nearby, which are very nice. Everything is excellent; I'm sure I would stay there again if I return to Montreal

Alex's place is in a fabulous location. Tons of shops and restaurants are right nearby. The subway is only a 7-minute walk away. The place was very clean and tidy, looking exactly like the pictures. Alex was very friendly and offered us tips about some great places to check out. It does get quite hot in the apartment since there's no air conditioning. The room gets direct sun for most of the day and the curtains are quite sheer. There was a table fan in the bedroom that helped a bit, but we didn't sleep well. The bed was smaller than I expected. It looked like a queen in the photos but it was a double, so it's a bit snug for 2 people if you're used to stretching out when sleeping.  It sits on a large piece of wood on the frame instead of a box spring, so it creaks loudly anytime someone moves. We also found the pillows to be very thin. Overall though, for the price, it was a good deal. If you're looking for a budget place to stay, I would recommend staying here as you can't beat the location!
Alexandra is a lovely host, and the apartment was clean, in a great location, and had everything I needed.
Alexandra's apartment is really well-located, very pleasant and very clean! Alexandra has been very accommodating and available throughout our stay! I highly recommend it!

My accommodation is well located near lively streets, yet it is in a very quiet residential street. The host is very pleasant and responsive even though we saw them infrequently due to differing schedules. Additionally, the accommodation is clean and comfortable.
Great location!

To those visiting Montreal, Alex's place offers proximity to Mont-Royal with its *best view of the city*. It is a 30-minute walk to Old Montreal and a 15-minute walk to the best poutine place (La Banquise).

If you are coming by car, make sure you know exactly where to park or you will be dinged with a parking ticket.

Thank you for the warm welcome, we had a nice weekend in a charming neighborhood, not too far from the city center.

The apartment is clean and pleasant!
Great location, close to walking distance to everything I wanted to see. The room was as described. Friendly and helpful host. Recommended stay. Everything you need for a budget traveler
Good value, clean.  A bit stuffy, so the room would benefit from a larger fan, but it was a pleasant stay.

Alexandra's place is located in a great spot, within 10 minutes walk from Sherbrooke subway station if you are traveling by public transport. It's very walkable to local restaurants, cafes and shops. There is also a nice fruit market within 5 to 10 minutes walking distance. If you are coming in the summer, it's important to know that there is no air conditioning in the apartment but there is a fan in the bedroom. The place is very neat and tidy with a kitchen you can use to prepare meals. When I went, Alexandra was not in town so I had the whole place to myself. I needed some help and although there was a bit of a delay, Alexandra answered all my questions.
Clean and quiet. Great location
Very nice apartment in a great location, easy and quick communication with the host. I would definitely go back!
My family and I had a really great time here! The stay was very pleasant and all of our needs were met. The place itself was everything we expected, and we would definitely stay here again!

Writing this review for my mother: 

My husband, 1-year-old daughter, and my parents went on an impromptu trip to Montreal for 5 days and we stayed at Victor's Airbnb. His place is a second-floor apartment with an outdoor staircase (typical in Montreal) and is pretty cool. His apartment is all brand new and renovated; we instantly felt like home. It's centrally located, and the train station is within a couple of blocks and possibly a 5-10 minute walk (longer for us because we had my parents and a stroller in tow lol). The parking signs in Montreal are pretty confusing, but we had a lot of help from the neighbors who explained it to us. We had no problem finding parking literally across the street from the apartment.

What was also great was the lockbox! We didn't have to wait for him to enter or to leave him the key. Communication was effortless and he always answered our questions in a timely manner. The apartment had everything we needed to literally feel comfortable. 

Overall, we would definitely come back and stay at his Airbnb and highly recommend it!
Great location and Victor was very responsive. Check-in was seamless. We didn't have enough towels, but otherwise we had everything we needed.
Great stay!
Ideally located apartment, close to restaurants and supermarkets. We mainly walked everywhere. Quiet, situated on a very quiet street. The apartment is immaculate. Excellent experience.
Great times

Beautiful apartment in Montreal. After our arrival, Victor provided us with some items missing in the apartment: towel, soap, salt, etc. Just to take into account: the apartment is extremely clean, but it misses basic elements to maintain the kitchen clean (scourer, for instance). The stairs are difficult to climb, and regarding the location, you need more than 30 minutes by foot to reach Place des Arts.
Perfect location. We had a great time exploring, eating and drinking through Montreal neighborhoods.
Translation: Very nice place, I'll be back next time.

Victor's apartment is in a fantastic location. Just one block off St Denis, it's central yet relaxed and peaceful. There's a fabulous Japanese restaurant with outstanding ramen at the foot of the road, a bakery with every imaginable pastry less than two blocks away, two Zagat-listed bistros within a 5 minute walk, and an organic grocery store just steps from your front door on St. Denis. The metro is close, but you can also walk to McGill University, up Mont Royal for amazing views, and over to Mile End for funky food and fashion. The apartment itself is super clean and comfortable.
Clean and comfortable room

The host was very accommodating and extremely sweet. She took great care of us. The room that we stayed in looked amazing and was clean until we looked behind the bed. There was a lot of dust or sawdust – not sure which and unfortunately my nephew got allergies as he is allergic to dust. The home needs some TLC. The bathroom was also not in a great shape; there was a hole where the toilet paper roll was, but it was fixed the very next day, which was great. The unfortunate part is that we didn't realize it was a shared bathroom with other guests, which was quite annoying as we are quite picky people. It is mentioned under house rules that it is a shared bathroom. I wish this was written upfront on the summary page. Also, whenever we wanted to go back to the house, we had to call the host as we did not have the keys. The host was very accommodating but we felt bad going late. Once again, the host was amazing, very patient and nice, but some things in the house were lacking.
Price-wise, it's not that great...
Feel like home

The room was okay, but there was too much chaos. The host advised privacy, but there was constant interference. The air conditioning in the room was leaking, and the host advised us to keep checking so we had to stay up all night to see for a water leak. I was uncomfortable and the value we paid was not even 1% worth what we got. I would not recommend it if you are looking for something clean and private or suitable for a ghetto place. The host was good and responsive, but the place did not live up to expectations.
You will be very lucky
Nice house, public transportation just around the corner, about 25 minutes to downtown.

The house has all the facilities, convenient location, just that there are two bedrooms in the basement, one of which is very small. The rest are good. The landlord is very thoughtful, and we had opened the air conditioner before arriving so that we were comfortable as soon as we entered the room.
Great place, good location. I would definitely recommend it to others and stay again
Recommended
This place is so great. Perfect for any length of stay in the city. Very comfortable, and incredibly hospitable. Highly recommended!
A small, well-located studio with no Wi-Fi but close to many amenities. Good value for money.
Great spot in the city and super easy to check-in.
I would stay here again! Check-in was super easy, and I was comfortable the whole time. It's not fancy, but it actually works!
Great location; basic equipment, ideal for two nights. Only one towel for two people, though. Overall very good experience
A great location and value. Simple, calm and comfortable space to recharge in with great coffee, nearby transportation and shopping.
Not flashy but a great place for a short stay. Convenient with keypad entry, and the AC keeps it cool at night. Very clean.

Very straightforward listing. Nothing fancy, but an absolutely perfect location for exploring downtown Montreal. I recommend this place for travelers who don't have a lot of time but want to get around to tons of things while in town.
Excellent, despite the heat I had a great night!

It's a small space, but perfect for sleeping at night. Check-in was very easy and the location is convenient. The AC unit made the space comfortable. Great value. 

The only downsides are that there is no Wi-Fi (which made it difficult to find directions and order Ubers) and it's on the fourth floor with no elevator. I would definitely stay here again.
If you're looking for a simple, inexpensive space with just the essentials for a couple of nights, this place will be perfect for you!
Very close to all the restaurants and main street, we walked very close. The place is quiet and the rooms smell good.

A one-night stay is sufficient, the apartment is small but still correct for a last night in Montreal to be ready for your return flight. The only downside: the apartment isn't very warm, and the small desk that is pictured on the listing isn't in the apartment... Otherwise, the host responds immediately to your messages and it's pleasant!

Studio very well-located near the metro! 
Mattresses very soft, air conditioning in the room quite pleasant even if it's very noisy.
Shame we didn't meet our host!
Good place for a place to just rest up.
No WiFi available, but this place is right downtown and meant for you to spend the day exploring. Great location with the Metro right down the street
Our stay was good, though the studio apartment was small. The location was easy to get to and the building was quiet and safe in the evenings.
Thank you again! This was a great hidden gem. Very close to the art museums and easy to get around. I would recommend it. The privacy was an added bonus, not often seen at this price point.
Really good location and price. Perfect for crashing overnight or getting ready to go out. Close to the metro, and with a $15 weekend pass, the savings are unreal.

Mike's place is clean, very quiet, and a short distance from many Montreal sites. We walked to the Museum of Fine Arts and the stadium is only 2 blocks away!  We had a marvelous time in Montreal and truly appreciated the value we got from staying at Mike's...
Great affordable place conveniently located near anything you might need! Great for a couple of night's stay!
Good place for a couple of nights in Montreal - it was exactly as described, and we found it a comfortable space.
Great value for the center of Montreal!
Perfect room with an ideal location and price for those seeking a place to crash during their adventures in Montreal. Quiet and charming, it's also very clean.
Studio located at the foot of the metro and a shopping center. Responsive owner. This is good for a night stay.
Thanks Mike for letting us stay. You're completely right about it being so small.  It's good for just sleeping, if that's all you need.

The greatest thing about Mike's place is its location. His description accurately reflects that it's simply a place to rest while you're in town, as it is extremely small but it is clean and the bed is comfortable.
Perfect location, small but cozy apartment. Very communicative host. Could have been cleaner but was okay.
Good value for Montreal! It's a nice place to rest your head after a long day in the city. Mike was very accommodating and quick to respond to questions.

That's correct. 
Quality relationship priority.
Small studio with a good place to spend the night after exploring the city. As mentioned in other reviews, there is no Wi-Fi available on site and the bathroom door did not close properly.
Simple accommodation, well-located and good value for money, it was perfect for a night. Communication with Mike is very easy.
Nice place, pretty small so it's good if you're looking for a quick place to sleep during your downtown adventures.
Mike's place is exactly as described. Mike was very kind and accommodating. Definitely recommend!
Really nice small space.
Perfect location for people wanting to spend time in downtown Montreal! Check-in was extremely easy and the host was very helpful!
Not a good room, it's a bit depressing and dirty. The sink was clogged, the toilet wouldn't flush. Overall, it was very uncomfortable.

Great little apartment located close to the Metro Atwater (close to downtown), the apartment is great for couples, close to some cute restaurants and bars. Very quiet neighborhood, I would definitely recommend this place, everything was clean and perfect + the bed is super comfortable!

Mike's quick response for a last-minute reservation. 
The apartment is perfect for a short stay in Montreal, very close to the metro and with a comfortable and clean bed.
Mike's place is the perfect jumping-off point to downtown Montreal. It was sparsely furnished, as clearly stated in his description—great value for the price.

Maggy was just amazing to deal with!!! She is so professional and nothing is too much trouble... We had to find a condo on short notice with a dog. She accommodated us quickly and helped ease a very stressful situation! We cannot say enough about Maggie and how positive and kind she is. We will definitely rent from her again!

Our heartfelt thanks for everything!
Warmly, Marie & Fred
And wee Baxter xo
It was a very nice suite, everything matched the description and the people were very nice!  I also think it was the best location to stay. Thanks, Maggy.

Very beautiful home, as advertised, with a nice view of the city, access to a gym, pool and sauna.  2 steps from Mount Royal and close to downtown.
Clean, bright.
Only one small regret: the host's lack of response to messages (which pushed me to cancel then rebook after receiving their reply). No regrets about rebooking, in fact. 
I recommend this home without hesitation.
Great place to stay, the view is absolutely stunning! I love how bright and well-lit the place is. Definitely recommend it at this price point!

The apartment is exactly as described. Bright, very clean, tidy, and has everything one needs along with all amenities including a comfortable bed. The location is perfect. The metro station, restaurants, cafes, groceries, and downtown are just a few minutes away. Happy experience, I will definitely come back!
Nice place

Carole's place is the perfect spot for a Montreal getaway. It's in a great location where you can walk everywhere and the concierge were all so friendly! It has stellar views of the city from the room plus from the rooftop terrace and pool, which was a real treat. The apartment was also very clean and it doesn't look like anyone lives there so felt more like a hotel rather than being in someone else's living space which was nice

This apartment is lovely and spacious for a studio, and a steal for the location as well! I was in town for an event at McGill and it was super convenient to stay at Carole's place. Everything worked perfectly, and the doormen/women were helpful and kind. There were also at least 2 convenience stores close by, in case you forgot any toiletries like I did. Carole was also very responsive when I had small questions and flexible with the check-in time. Would highly recommend!

Great value! 
Clean and great location. 
We were unable to get the WiFi working. 
Would like an additional mirror. 
Definitely would stay again
And parking turned out to be free
This place was bright and charming and in a very convenient location to downtown. Loved it and would definitely stay here again!
Nice place with an amazing view! In a great location!!
Nice place, nice building. Close to McGill and St. Catherine Street. Only an unpleasant detail: the concierge did not have the key ready for my check-in (10-15 minute delay).
The host cancelled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great location with friendly doormen/women. The views from all the windows in the apartment are fantastic. The place is close to Mount Royal, a short walk from McGill's main campus.
Carole's place is clean, spacious, and comfortable. It's very close to McGill and the downtown core with lots of shops and restaurants nearby. Excellent value in the heart of the city!
Very clean place in a great location. Carole was very quick to answer our questions.
Great place, great location. Easy access to anywhere downtown from here. The staff in the building is very friendly.
Very nice

Grand studio very clean and well-arranged with a lot of class and taste. Better than a hotel! Little attentions from the owner. Parking space available at the bottom of the building and caretaker (24/7). Covered pool on top of the building and terrace: what more could you ask for? Perfect!
The location is great, there's free parking available, the lobby has service staff, the room has a good view and is bright.

Very beautiful stay. The studio is well-located, very luminous, clean and offers several possible amenities (parking, gym, pool). 
I highly recommend it!
Great location, I'd love to come back again
Place was everything we were expecting and more, would definitely stay here again!

The location is very central, just a few steps from the main shopping street. There's a porter on the ground floor who is very friendly and is available around the clock. The apartment is ideal for a couple and there's also a free gym, sauna, and swimming pool on the roof!!!
Awesome place, close to everything, clean, quiet and friendly staff. Parking was great too.

Carol's place exceeded my expectations. The place looked even better than the photos and was incredibly comfortable and spacious. I wouldn't hesitate to book this space if I were you. P.S. Great views of Parc Du Mont Royal from the upstairs pool.

Everything was great, the apartment is gorgeous, super clean and very comfortable. Very close to the center and the concierge's service impeccable, but I missed responses from the host regarding check-in and luggage storage during the day until my arrival. There was no smooth communication although she did indicate how to get the keys to the apartment.
The location is excellent and the space is a perfect match to the photos. We only stayed one night, but we would definitely return.

We had a great time in Montreal and Carole's place was very clean, everything was well organized and ready for our arrival. The gym and swimming pool with a view was a nice touch! Perfect location too.
Lovely apartment, very well-furnished
A+

We had a great stay at Carole's apartment. 
Good 
- Great central location to downtown MTL
- Clean
- Comfy bed
- Carole is very responsive

Could be better
- There was no soap or toilet paper when we arrived. I notified Carole and she was reachable right away. Luckily she had extra supplies in a nearby unit so I was able to restock our place. 
- The place was a bit cold because the heating unit was off. We had to leave it on the whole time to keep the place some what warm.
- The apartment overall was a bit dated

Overall we enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend it to anyone else. We didn't stay long at the apartment and just needed a place to sleep so the dated look and temperature of the apartment wasn't a big deal.

Great value!

The building is an amazing area for food and shopping. The balcony has a nice street view, and the space inside is adorable. 

I would definitely book with Carole again for another trip.
Very nice apartment, ideally located, not far from Sainte Catherine street and very well equipped. We had a lovely time there.
Great location! The WiFi did not work for us, but it wasn't a major inconvenience. We had a great view of the city and parking was very convenient. It was also very clean.

If you're looking for a typically Montreal place, cozy and well-located, don't hesitate. Pascale is incredibly kind and available. We appreciated her little attentions. The accommodation is functional, very well equipped and clean. Her decor inspired by her many travels makes us feel good immediately. Moreover, the accommodation is located in a very pleasant neighborhood, quiet and dynamic at the same time.  A 2-minute walk away, you'll find a large park as well as all the necessary amenities. You can easily stroll around.

This was a great experience for us.
Very pleasant and well-located accommodation. Pascale is very responsive and has helped us choose good restaurants and shops nearby. Thank you

Karim was a great host and the place looked just like the pictures. Although a few things were initially missing when we first checked in, Karim had everything brought to us within an hour and was extremely welcoming and kind. I would definitely recommend this spot to anyone wanting to be right in the heart of downtown Montreal!
The location was amazing and the check-in process was easy and flexible.
Very beautiful place, very clean and the host is very professional, thank you again
Great location, awesome place, perfect for our stay.

Karim was extremely accommodating and the place was so modern and spacious, not to mention it had an incredible location. Just a 200 feet from Sherbrooke and a 5-minute walk to Saint-Catherine. Shopping, bars, and restaurants are everywhere. Amazing stay!
Really nice space in a great location in downtown Montreal

We had a great stay here! The view was incredible, the space was clean and modern, and the location was absolutely perfect as a home base for our stay. It is within walking distance of so much, and also very close to metro stops. Would absolutely recommend to others.
Karim was excellent to work with. He was always communicative. The location was perfect, being close to all the downtown hotspots. The unit was presented clean and spacious.
Great location, great host, I definitely recommend it to you guys
Awesome pad! Would love to come back here!
We were two friends in the apartment. It was spacious and very well located. The extra perks were the rooftop and the pool. I recommend!

Fantastic location, beautiful view!
Clean and big room!
Great stay! Awesome location

We stayed for a short 3 days, it was a lovely place. We were able to walk everywhere and at night the area was quite. The rooftop patio was excellent! The host was very responsive and it was easy to check in. Coffee on the balcony in the mornings was a nice way to start the day. Only thing was maybe a roll of paper towels or napkins would have been great. 
Carrie from Boston.

The night we arrived, there was a fire in the neighborhood and it made getting onto the street where the Airbnb is located an extremely stressful process. Obtaining the keys/check-in/parking required several steps which added to the stress we were already experiencing (I imagine that the check-in process would not have been so stressful under normal circumstances but the check-in process could have been simpler - just something to be aware of). 

Having said that, the apartment itself is lovely (very spacious and clean) and the hosts were extremely helpful and responsive once we were checked in. They were flexible and made our stay comfortable. The space is located near metros and is walkable to major downtown areas and attractions.
Excellent location. However, the atmosphere is very impersonal and the host did not respond to our emails during our stay for problem resolution.
Perfectly located with ample space, the check-in process is quite complex and requires a smartphone and internet connection to complete.
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

We had a bad experience. Arriving in Montreal, we found the key not in the designated location. Upon calling the host, we were told that our unit was unavailable due to flooding. Despite booking months in advance, we only received an email hours before our expected arrival (which was not useful due to being out of range). We were then told that no other unit was available and that they "were having a bad day, too". We had to scramble to find a last-minute hotel.
My dad loved it! Thanks!

We really loved our stay at Nikki's place. We communicated very easily with our host whenever we had questions. The place was spick and span upon our arrival, and Nikki had left us some towels for bathing which we really appreciated. The Airbnb's location is very well situated; it's close to St-Laurent and St-Catherine streets, which are cool if you love to shop. Unfortunately, there was no available street parking during our stay, but we parked our car at Excentris Public Parking, which is a 5-minute walk from the Airbnb. We wouldn't hesitate to come back to Nikki's place if we had the chance!
Beautiful place and great location!
Exactly as pictured. Nikki was a great host and the location was amazing.

Almost immediately after sending my request, Nikki accepted it and was available to answer my questions. When I entered the apartment, I was impressed by its cleanliness. Plus, it smelled good. The balcony offers a beautiful view of a typical Montreal street. It is located at the beginning of Plateau, just above the Quartier des spectacles, Quartier Latin, and downtown.  It's two blocks from Prince-Arthur Street, Saint-Laurent Boulevard, and Saint-Louis Square. The apartment also has a beautiful hardwood floor. Everything went smoothly. I encourage anyone wanting to spend time in Montreal to choose Nikki's accommodation. It's better than staying at a hotel, that's for sure!

Nikki's place is a short walk from anywhere you want to be in Montreal. I didn't need to drive or Uber anywhere the whole time I was there. The place itself is completely new, clean, and modern. Nikki was very quick to respond to any of my inquiries (and hooked me up with an awesome poutine spot :) Would highly recommend to anyone visiting this wonderful, unique city!
Perfect spot. You won't be disappointed!

We loved our stay! This lovely pied-à-terre was wonderful. The place was spotless, and Nikki was extremely communicative and helpful. The location is wonderful - perfectly situated near Mont Royal Park, and the restaurants, bars, and shops of the Plateau.

Nikki's place was fantastic. It was super close to coffee shops and restaurants, with shops within walking distance. You can walk or bike if you prefer to go to Old Montreal from Nikki's place. The studio was super neat, clean, and had everything you needed. I would recommend it to anyone.

The space is exactly like the pictures, and it's very clean, cozy, and quaint. It's in a great location—walkable to Mount Royal as well as local bars, shops, and restaurants. Nikki is a great host and took the time to put together a list of restaurant recommendations for us! I would highly recommend this place for a weekend visit in Montreal!

The location couldn't be more perfect. The apartment was very clean and had all the amenities needed. Nikki was always responsive and accommodating. This is a great location with tons of restaurants in the Plateau and within walking distance to all the major attractions.
Wonderful space. Newly renovated and kept in pristine condition. Central location providing easy access to many of Montreal's must-see attractions, activities, dining, and nightlife.
Very clean, stylish, and new. Great location.
Beautiful apartment near restaurants, bars, and public transportation. It was sparkling clean and the bed was incredibly comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.
Very clean - great location - highly recommend
Great
Very cute pad, close to downtown and the park. Especially liked the patio off the back and Nikki couldn't have been a better host.

Nikki is an excellent host, very responsive and this apartment has everything you would need for a stay in Montreal. The location is about a 20 minute walk to downtown and about the same distance to explore Mile End. The building is brand new, clean, and safe, and check-in is very easy. Overall, the experience was very positive and we loved our stay!
Great location

Place has literally everything you need, down to a hairdryer! Absolutely beautiful apartment. It looks exactly like the pictures, it was clean and neat and just a great spot! Cool little balcony! Everything was within walking distance and it was so convenient!!!
Clean stylish place to stay! Walking distance to tons of restaurants and bars. Parking was a bit further than expected, but overall a great stay!

I had a lovely stay at Nikki's place for a solo adventure to Montreal for 3 nights. It was incredibly clean and looked brand new. There is a lovely terrace in the back that is very quiet and overall the building and apartment were super quiet. The location is perfect—not far from everything you need in the Plateau but on a pretty quiet residential street. Nikki was very easy to communicate with and gave me updates as needed. I'd highly recommend this place.
Great clean place and the location was perfect.
This place is so clean and in a perfect location for everything you would want to explore in Montreal. Nikki is so nice and helpful!

The location is amazing for club lovers; I personally found the flat itself quite stylish and easy to walk to the old town from. 

I highly recommend staying here

Nikki's place is an amazing spot to stay in Montreal — centrally located in Le Plateau with great coffee shops, bars, restaurants and breweries nearby. Especially great is the proximity to Mont-Royal if you enjoy running outdoors. The apartment is very charming with a cute small back porch. We arrived to find it very clean, and the AC worked great (necessary in the 90+ degrees we had this August). There is also Netflix connected on the TV. The only (small) downside is that the shower pressure isn’t great.
This was a great apartment for visiting Montreal. It's in a cool neighborhood and easy to get around town from here. Nikki was very responsive and a helpful host.

A very cute and comfortable spot right by all of Montreal's hip areas. A 10-minute walk from Mont Royal, Chinatown, about a 20-minute walk from downtown. Super super clean and convenient. The only problem was that the internet went out at one point and this issue wasn't resolved for the rest of the stay. It wasn't a huge problem since there are plenty of cafes in the neighborhood, but it wasn't ideal. It didn't ruin the trip though!

Nikki is a fantastic host and the place is spectacular! It's not large but it's stylish, clean, and cozy, a bachelor suite right next to St Laurent with lots of shops, restaurants, and bars. Communicating with Nikki was always easy - very quick responses. A great little gem worth every penny!
"There's nothing to redo if it's perfect."
Wonderful location. Clean, lovely accommodations.
Fantastic unit and location. Works very well for business travel.
Lovely apartment, modernly furnished, well equipped and clean. Perfect for 1-2 people. Would stay here again if I ever return to Montreal.
Lovely stay. Really clean. Well located. Perfect for a few days in Montreal.

Nikki's place offers outstanding value in a fantastic location. The neighborhood is centrally located, making it incredibly easy to get around without a car. The apartment was spotless and the communication was excellent. Thank you so much!

I stayed at this apartment while attending a work conference in town. It was fantastic! I would definitely stay here again and recommend it. Easy self check-in, excellent communication, incredibly clean, and located in a great spot on a quiet street.

Nikki's place is very stylish, comfortable, and clean. We loved the location, so close to Boulevard St. Laurent, and we were lucky to find free on-street parking right outside (but read the signs carefully!). Thank you, Nikki!

This was a wonderful home for us during our two days in MTL visiting family. The beautiful building, spotless interior, and excellent location made it perfect for us. We would definitely stay here again when we return to Montreal.

This place is exactly as it seems and even more stylish. It's very chic and located in a fantastic neighborhood. It's close to downtown but such a cool area to hang out in. Even the bed is comfortable (a slat bed). 

The kitchen has everything you would want to cook with, as a bonus. Though Montreal restaurants are so good, you might never get to use them.
Excellent property in a vibrant area of the city, close to the center. I loved the restaurants and cafes nearby.

The apartment was very nice, clean, simple, and organized. Easy to get in and out of the building. Not too loud or busy with other people. Great location near bars, restaurants, and activities. Overall, it was a good place and I would recommend it to others.
Very nice place
Really nice place in a great neighborhood. Would definitely stay again.
I recommend this well-maintained and pleasant location.

This space is a perfect Airbnb to visit some of the coolest parts of Montreal. 

Great value, super clean, and super easy to check in.

Easy recommendation.
Great stay and perfect location.
Translation: very good

This was the best Airbnb we've stayed in! Everything was clean and in great condition. We were so impressed with the quality of the apartment. When we booked, we wondered if the size of the space would be an issue, but the finishes are beautiful and the apartment is very well laid out, cozy, and highly functional. 

The thing that really impressed us the most was how well equipped the kitchen was. As a couple who tends to cook a lot, this was greatly appreciated. We've noticed that a lot of Airbnb hosts say they have a well-equipped kitchen, but they just have a few plates, glasses, and cutlery. This place has everything you would need: non-stick pans, nice knives, cutting boards, can opener, baking sheets, strainer, salad bowl, French press, toaster...everything. There was also oil, vinegar, coffee, etc. The kitchen also has a nice layout with great counter space and a bar to eat at.

The location is great. We were within walking distance to grocery stores, shops, pubs, and cafes. It was a nice neighborhood, quiet and safe. We also had no trouble walking from there to many of the attractions we wanted to see, including Old Montreal. However, the Metro is close by (Sherbrooke station) and can quickly get you anywhere you need to go.

Nikki and Jean-Louis were great hosts. We would definitely stay here again.
Excellent hospitality from the hosts, they made us feel very welcome.  The location is amazing and we highly recommend this place to any traveler!

Wow, wow, wow! Nikki's place is just great! Super location close to shops, restaurants, and cafes! The apartment is recently renovated and looks just perfect! The host and co-hosts are super accommodating and kind! Thanks for everything!

My boyfriend and I stayed at Nikki's place during our stay in Montreal. This place is in a great location, right next to shopping, the Metro, endless restaurants. Nikki's place is very nicely decorated and included all the necessities for preparing food at the apartment. His place was also very clean and easily accessible. There were also nice tips left for you if you're not familiar with the area. We were very happy that we found this place and hope to return in the future. Thanks Nikki!
Perfect location to be in the heart of it all!
Amazing location! Very convenient.
A beautiful location just 10 minutes from the metro and close to buses, ideal for a stay in Montreal.

Nikki was an excellent host. He responded quickly to any questions we had and was accommodating. The place was very clean and well-kept. The kitchen was well-stocked, and the bed was very comfortable - perfect after a long day exploring the city. The location was perfect; it's within walking distance of everything you could need! We loved it so much that we extended our stay!
Really brilliant apartment and really good value!

This is a great place. It's super clean, everything is new and tidy. I spent almost three weeks here, and what's great about the place is that everything's there: from umbrella to ironing board, and from whisk to knife set. Everything you reasonably might expect to need---it's there. Couldn't have been happier with it!
Highly recommended!
Great place, well decorated, clean and in a prime location. My only criticism is that there was no lockbox and we had to coordinate times with the owner to pick up/drop off the keys.

Nice spot, good location. However, perhaps this was just an unfortunate anomaly, but the apartment hadn't been cleaned between the last guest(s) and myself, so I had to do that myself - not a great way to start a trip. Also, I had an issue with getting into the apartment as the host was unable to meet me. Essentially, I had to wait in the lobby for a stranger to let me in.
The accommodation is very well located but Ikram would benefit from tidying up a bit to leave space for travelers to settle in: fridge, bathroom etc.

Cute little condo south of Griffintown, 3 minutes from the Lachine Canal. However, this location means a bit of a hike to the nearest metro station for the 'happening' parts of Griffintown restaurants, shops, and nightlife. Unfortunately, the area is currently undergoing extensive construction. Ikram was a good host with excellent communication, quick to respond to requests or questions - unfortunately we had a few hiccups with arrival and towels, etc., but we managed to sort them out in the end.

Loved the location and shops nearby! Great bike ride to Old Montreal and the hospitality was great! Ikram replied very quickly and we were able to really enjoy ourselves. I think my only negative was the lack of towels, paper towels, and toilet paper in the condo.
Great location and excellent communication during my stay. Thank you!
Excellent recommended 100%
The condo was very nice and clean. Amazing view! Ikram was answering my texts and calls very quickly... communication was very clear. I will definitely be coming back!
Ideal location, steps from the city center and near bridges. Our dog loved the dog park right across the street, very convenient.
Great location, very good value for the price. I appreciated the easy check-in and the view from the apartment was amazing.
Better than the pictures. Nice quiet building. It's a bit of a trek to downtown, but we enjoyed the close walk to the canal.

Ikram's place was quiet, clean and comfortable. It was a 20-minute walk to the metro and had a lovely view of Montreal. Ikram responded very quickly to any questions or concerns we had. It was our first time visiting Montreal and this place made us feel at ease.
Great place.

Nice, kind, and super helpful host

He answers very quickly 

His place was super clean 

Thank you so much
It's a nice place to stay
Had a great stay! Everything was close to where I wanted to visit downtown.
Would stay again
Great location. Great condo. Perfect for a solo traveler. Would recommend staying here.

Great find
Good value
Cozy vibe
Zouggari's place was exactly as advertised, very fresh and new! We will be back!
Great location, great place.  A few minor things could be improved, but overall quite pleased.
Translation: Yay!
Very hospitable place. Very quick replies

Excellent location!!! Jeanne Mance Park is a 10-minute walk away. Don't miss the Tam Tams on Sunday if you get the chance. Mano communicated with us promptly and was very accommodating. Highly recommend.
Ground floor apartment with a private inner courtyard. The apartment is ideally located in Montreal. Perfect living space for a couple and 3 children. Everything is nearby!!! Thanks, Mano

Beware that the apartment is small! There is no A/C and only one window in the main bedroom. It was kept very clean but did not have toilet paper upon arrival. Irina told us she would reimburse us if we purchased it ourselves. The location is great in the Plateau and walkable to Mile End, with plenty of restaurants and shops.

The stay was wonderful. Cute small newly renovated apartment. It was super convenient to downtown. The apartment was also in a great location as it was walking distance to many shops and restaurants. Irina was super flexible with check-in. Highly recommend if you're looking for a quiet spot. Perfect for a couple.
Surroundings are very good. The flat has only one window which made it uncomfortable because of the very hot period in Montreal.
Great location and perfect for a couple! Would definitely recommend to others. Thanks Irina!
The location is excellent!!!

Irina's place is very chic and modern. It is located in the heart of the plateau close to restaurants, parks, and bike stations. It should be noted that it is not air-conditioned and can be uncomfortable in warm weather.
Superb apartment, well-equipped, well-located, perfect for a stay in Montreal.
It was a fantastic place for a weekend getaway! I highly recommend it for a small group and would definitely stay there again.
Great clean and stylish spot, close to a couple excellent breakfast cafes
Perfect stay of 7 weeks. Wonderful apartment, perfect location, Irina is very responsive.
Irina's place was in a great location and just as expected. Would stay again.
As described! You won't have any negative surprises.
Go and close your eyes!  Small, certain! But there's everything! Very well placed!

The housing location was truly perfect, however there were some missing information. On the other hand, there were no tools or cleaning products in the apartment, such as a shovel, broom, or vacuum cleaner. The common areas are dirty and in very poor condition. 

The apartment is well-equipped and clean.

Fantastic location in a cozy & secure space. Compact studio unit has everything you need, recommended for solo travelers or couples. Photos are accurate and although the building is older, the actual studio apartment has everything renovated and as of December 2018 appears brand new. Super clean too!

Everything was great, the host was very responsive. Very clean unit and common areas!! Very stylish!! Well-equipped!! Everyone enjoyed their stay. The amenities are great, very comfortable apartment! Close to everything. We would definitely recommend staying at this place.
Enjoyed my stay. Would recommend

This location is ideal, wonderful and close to everything you need. It was also very clean and comfortable with all the amenities (including utensils and dishes) you could need. Irina is a great host (and the check-in was easy). Highly recommend!

What a wonderful location! Perfect distance from the Metro and so much to see, smell, and taste. Stumbling upon a jazz trio less than a block away on a Monday night is as good as it gets. The place is wonderful – stylish, equipped, clean – for any couple looking for a taste of Montreal.
Very clean, very efficient and good sleep as the bedroom is located on the quiet back lane, not on the front street.

How can we evaluate Anas' stay since there has been no stay?  Unbookable hotel with bookings days in advance. No response to emails, SMS or calls because it is a fake number for the Airbnb announcement. Once on site, and without any new information, the apartment doesn't exist, or at least the host doesn't exist in the concierge records. This is how day J went, after hours of travel, that I had the pleasant surprise of having no accommodation with the only solution: the hotel. In short, the host and the lodging must be banned.

We had a great time there. Communication was super easy and quick, and the place looked exactly as it did in the photos. The apartment had everything we needed, and the neighborhood was very conveniently located.

Exactly what was advertised. Very clean and check-in and out was a breeze. Hamza is a fantastic host, responding right away and attentive to guests' needs. If you love the Plateau of Montreal this is the place for you. Really cool decor, including the old records on the wall. We actually made an Apple Music playlist of the tunes you will find there for fun: (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Hamza's home was beautiful! By far the best Airbnb I've stayed at. It looks exactly like the pictures. The apartment is located right off the main drag where all the shops and restaurants are. It's a super nice area with plenty to do. Would definitely come back and stay here again!

Our stay at Hamza's flat was short-lived, but more than anything we could have asked for. It was summer so it was hot - the area was air conditioned and cool throughout but still had natural light. There were a lot of thoughtful touches like coffee and snacks as well as restaurant recommendations and flexibility with our flight schedules. Hamza was extremely professional and very friendly. Thanks for an awesome stay!
A stylish apartment in an incredibly vibrant location. Great value for money. Sparkling clean and excellent communication with the host.
A nice place, perfectly located, easy communication with Hamza.

Our family of four had a great stay at Hamza's apartment. It was even more spacious than it looks in the photos! 

Check-in was quick and easy, and we had everything we needed when we arrived. The kitchen was well stocked with pots, utensils, and dishes and there was even cooking oil, salt, and pepper. We especially appreciated that there was plenty of coffee and sugar. Our kids loved that there was a basket of snacks. 

The bed was super comfortable, and our kids happily slept on the twin inflatable mattresses provided. They were the nice tall ones that would be comfortable for adults, too. 

The location was fantastic! It is close to many great shops, restaurants, and bakeries and a quick walk to the metro. Even though it is on a fairly busy street, we heard almost no noise in the apartment. The private terrace was amazing as well. 

Hamza was readily available through chat and quickly responded to every question we had. We would gladly stay at Hamza's apartment again!

Hamza's place exceeded our expectations and we couldn't have asked for a better place to stay in Montreal! Communicating with Hamza was stress-free before and during our stay and I would highly recommend this Airbnb!
Beautiful apartment in a cool location!
Hamza's place is great and very well-equipped. We felt right at home and the location is excellent.

We just returned from a wonderful two-night stay at Hamza's apartment. The apartment was exactly as advertised, very clean, and in a great location. There are plenty of shops, bars, and restaurants right outside your door. The metro station is just a few blocks away, which can get you to the historic part of town in under 15 minutes.  The apartment was surprisingly quiet even though the bedroom overlooks a busy street that had an end-of-summer street festival going on. We (and our three-month-old baby) had no issues with street noise at any point during the stay. Hamza is very responsive to questions/requests and even proactively checked in with us after the first night. Overall, we were very happy with our stay and would stay here again next time we are in Montreal.
Hamza's place was very modern, clean, and well-located. Additionally, Hamza is extremely responsive and accommodating.

Loft very well located in the Plateau neighborhood, close to a lot of activities. 
The layout and cleanliness are top-notch and it's very pleasant!
I recommend :)
Nice and cozy apartment in the best location.
Stylish space, perfect location, awesome communication

A complete must-stay, one of the greatest Airbnb's I've ever stayed at. 
Super clean, nicely decorated, huge space, host is also fantastic and incredibly responsive.
Great place, super clean and in a great location. Host was amazing and replied very quickly to any questions. Would definitely stay here again!
Hamza's stylish pad won't disappoint! Great design and thoughtful touches, perfectly located on Mont Royal, with tons of great venues to eat, drink, and play.
One of the best Airbnb's I've ever stayed in ❤️

Thank you for being such a gracious host, Hamza. I could not have asked for a better host for our weekend getaway. 

The place was fantastic. It is clean, modern, spacious and inviting. Plenty of clean linens and extra blankets. The patio and its large double sliding doors open up the space to the outdoors. Access to the place is simple and off a main street. Parking can be tough to find at times if you do drive, but I find that true for Montreal generally speaking.

The location was convenient, about a 10-minute Uber ride to downtown. About a 5-minute walk to the closest metro station. Close to some popular restaurants, most of which are about a 15-20 minute walk.

Hamza was an excellent host. He checked in with us to make sure things were going well. He was always helpful, responded quickly to inquiries and questions. Ensured that our stay was enjoyable and that was his top priority. I had peace of mind while we were at this place.

I would definitely stay here again when visiting Montreal in the future!

Wonderful apartment, conveniently and centrally located for those looking to explore the city. The apartment was very clean and inviting, just as advertised. For those visiting during summer, the central air is a big plus. The main bedroom is located on a main street which may be loud for those looking for a quieter spot, but I had no issues with this at all coming from another city. Thanks to Hamza for the wonderful stay!
Hamza's place is great and stylish, just as described. Hamza is an excellent host who is very accommodating with requests and responds quickly. I highly recommend staying here.

Excellent stay in this apartment which is truly even better than the photos! We were with our 2-year-old daughter and everything was perfect. Location, cleanliness, equipment, welcome: nothing to complain about!

Check-in and check-out simple and efficient, which saves time when traveling!

Hamza did everything to have the apartment ready for our arrival which was very practical for us. He was also very responsive to answer our questions. 

In short, we recommend it!

Very beautiful condo in the heart of Plateau. Close to all shops and cafes. The room is well soundproofed. The condo is spacious and minimalist. Plenty of towels and pillows available. Little attentions upon arrival (water bottles and snacks). 10/10
Great hospitality, beautiful and stylish apartment. Perfect location for discovering Montreal

We had a wonderful stay. The apartment is located in an ideal neighborhood for visiting and enjoying Montreal. It's a 2-minute walk from a metro station, making it very easy to get around. Hamza was present and communicated with us. I highly recommend this accommodation :). Thank you!

"The bed was very comfortable." — My husband.
My husband spent several days at the apartment — and really enjoyed the neighborhood. He said there was a coffee shop right there, practically in the same building. He said the apartment was very comfortable, especially the mattress in the bedroom. He even researched it so we can buy it for our home.
He noted the place had a “weird” layout, with industrial-like flood lights and back door he hesitated to open, because he was afraid to trigger some alarm. He was happy the place was comfortably warm in the cold weather. Overall he enjoyed his stay.

Ideally located in a very nice neighborhood.
Several supermarkets nearby.
Excellent welcome with thoughtful touches.
Immaculate cleanliness.

In short, a great address.

My fiancé and I came to Montreal for a weekend getaway, and I usually visit twice a year to see family and try out new restaurants.  We stumbled upon Hamza's home after our original host cancelled our reservation, and, to be quite honest, we're glad it was cancelled because Hamza's home was absolutely stellar. It was so much more than we expected: spacious, clean, and equipped with all the necessary amenities that anyone would need. We can't wait to come again, and we're certainly going to be staying at Hamza's! We've found our home away from home. Thanks so much for being an amazing and attentive host!
Fantastic location and clean!

The location is fantastic – the neighborhood has lots of character, and everything is within walking distance, including some of the best food, music venues, shops, etc. It’s also conveniently located near the metro.

The apartment was clean, well-equipped, and spacious for a one-bedroom. It has a long and thin open layout with the kitchen separated from the living room/bedroom by a hallway. Polished concrete floors are stylish but slightly cold on the feet – maybe worth packing slippers. Some fun touches like the blackboard wall and popcorn machine.

I didn’t meet Hamza, but check-in went smoothly and communication was good. Thanks for a great stay!
Excellent Airbnb! Great apartment, wonderful communication
Super apartment very modern, very clean and quiet in addition to WiFi, TV and Netflix

I had a wonderful experience at Hamza's. The apartment is in the heart of Avenue Mont-Royal with many coffee shops, food spots, and shops just steps away. This place was everything I could have wanted - modern, spacious, great lighting, close to the metro, and filled with Montreal flavor. I would definitely stay at Hamza's place and highly recommend his home.

The place was great, very modern, super hip and clean. The location was perfect, very close to the train station, with lots of restaurants and bars. Hamza as a host was very responsive to all of our questions and concerns. I would highly recommend staying here.

Hamza made my stay incredibly comfortable and was always supportive of any changes that came up. This is a wonderful apartment located right in the center of the plateau, clean, easily accessible, and wonderfully connected to transportation and the rest of the city. It's a little gem in the winter.

"A super address!  Little appreciated attentions (coffee tea water...) The apartment is very clean and spacious and well located near the metro and very commercial streets. The apartment is very quiet as it overlooks an inner courtyard with a large terrace Photos of the ad are faithful."
Really nice place, great location, the host always answers our requests and I'm coming back!
A very beautiful apartment in a great location ideal for vacations on the plateau. Very close to the metro!
Accurate, clean, very well located. Smells, occasionally, in the kitchen, a bit like pizza from the downstairs restaurant
On really appreciated it! Fantastic location and very well situated.

Extremely clean location, very well equipped and cozy like the hosts who welcomed us after a delay of at least one hour! The neighborhood is very quiet and family-friendly. Washing machine and dryer are rare in a rental of this price point. Their responses to our questions were quick and clear. Completely satisfied with our rental with Johanne and Jules. Top notch!

I rented the apartment to house my parents who were coming to visit me. 
The apartment is ideal for a couple, very clean, very well furnished and equipped for long stays and very well heated. The location is also excellent! Close to the Jarry or Jean Talon metro station and amenities (grocery stores, Marché Jean Talon). In a very quiet neighborhood while being in the heart of the island and attractions.
My parents are delighted and feel free to rent: Johanne and Jules are wonderful hosts who will remind you why Airbnb is great at its core: meeting people and having a good exchange. They are warm, welcoming and available. No communication issues to report. Go for it with your eyes closed!

My stay at Johanne's was very pleasant. Her apartment was charming and clean, and her hospitality was warm.  Located in a great neighborhood, the apartment is close to everything but still very quiet despite that. We highly recommend it!
Highly recommended! Konrad is very friendly, the department is clean, very close to the subway and bus, and very well located!! They will be great in that apartment!
Friendly and sociable person

Konrad was incredibly flexible with our arrival and hospitable throughout our stay. We especially enjoyed the location, the tips for what to do in Montreal and feeling at home while staying here. Thank you for being an excellent host/friend/artist, Konrad!
Konrad is a very friendly host. His life is also full and interesting. A very pleasant stay, I recommend!

Abdou was the perfect host and our room in his apartment was very clean and had space for our luggage. His apartment is lovely and we were happy to share it with him for the weekend. Recommended for anyone going to Montreal.

Amazing host and loved the special touches he put in, like snacks he provided, notes he left with travel tips and recommendations. 

The bed was a bit small, likely a kid's bed, but otherwise a great stay.
A Good Experience!

Abdoul's place is perfectly located and is near all the main attractions in Montreal. It is a short walk from the subway station and there are many shops nearby. The neighborhood is peaceful, and the house is beautiful. 

Abdoul is an amazing host and a joyful person. He shared many tips for traveling around the city. He is happy to answer any questions. 

Thumbs up for Abdoul and his beautiful and cozy house.

Warm regards,
Sephali

Abdou's house was clean, cozy, and very welcoming. The interior was very stylish and the location was super convenient for our needs. As a host, Abdou did a phenomenal job ensuring that we felt comfortable and took time out of his busy schedule to show us around the city. My girlfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would love to return in the future.
Abdou has a very comfortable, clean residence close to an amazing coffee/bakery/metro station... free parking in Montreal... he offered us the best tea we've ever had!
Great host! Very detail-oriented.

My stay with Abdou was PERFECT.

His apartment is very clean, well-equipped and well-located. 
Furthermore, Abdou is a caring host who doesn't hesitate to share (good tips and interesting conversations, among other things).

Thank you, Abdou!

Seb's place is conveniently located just a few minutes from downtown Montréal -- if proximity is important to you, this could be your place. The floors creak at every step, the towels were stained, and the bathroom was dirty. I have to mention that we checked in late in the evening, so it could have been that they didn't have enough time to prepare for guests, I'm not sure. As for Seb himself, he was very kind and made sure we were properly accommodated.

Seb's place is very comfortable and clean. The bedroom is big and bright and the breakfast is delicious! If you don't mind being a bit further away from downtown, I really recommend it!! There is also a supermarket nearby, a mall, and lots of stores and restaurants within walking distance.
Nice room in a nice neighborhood.
Well-located apartment with several services nearby, all depending on the trip you want to take. The Mount Royal Plateau is quite close by. Host very friendly and helpful with good advice.

Great stay at Seb's! Pleasant room (AC was a big plus during the heat wave), good location and the hosts were very nice and accommodating. Only minor issue was the parking, as someone had parked in our spot (which we were able to reclaim after a few hours), we had to park somewhere else and the city very strict on parking. Overall we had a great time there
Easy check-in, comfy bed!
Excellent place to stay in a quiet neighborhood. 15 minutes from the metro and about 15 more to reach downtown. Seb was very nice and gave us good advice on what to see and do during our stay 😊
Very nice. Very friendly host.
Very comfortable bed, the room was clean and spacious, it seemed as if no one was ever home, so it felt like we had the whole house to ourselves.
Solid, simple, and affordable accommodation with parking.
Seb was a great host. Very responsive. The apartment is in a great location for a fantastic value.
Host was very prompt and helpful. Nice place. Had a wonderful stay.
Seb's place was very easy to find and was very clean. It was much more affordable than hotels, and the restroom was also clean. We did not experience any difficulties during our stay.
Clean, bright, a 10'x8' air-conditioned room, within a reasonable walking distance of the Metro and bus 161, which is only 50 meters away. Good value for the money.
Very comfortable room in a great location close to all amenities. Seb was very welcoming, I recommend
Great Value!

My husband and I drove our car from home, so we needed a parking space. Seb's place included enough parking for our car. We stayed two nights and thanks to his quick and accurate responses, we didn't have any problems. This place was a few minutes from the grocery store and you can easily get to Notre Dame by bus.
Truly cozy with an easy and safe feeling. Not a lot of extras, but in a neighborhood with subway access, bars, and markets. A pleasant stay!
Check-in and check-out are very convenient, with a great location close to public transportation and local shops.

Great value - location accessible by bus and relatively close to the Metro. 
Seb and Leo are super approachable and friendly.

The apartment was kind of messy. Not clean. There was too much stuff in the house. The floor was too noisy (shaking). One of the pillows was like rock solid. The bed was also not comfortable. The mattress was curved, sloppy on the sides and deep in between. The kitchen was stuffed with all the food in the (website hidden by Airbnb) issues with parking. Thank you for hosting :)
Rapport Quality/Price, there is nothing better.
Great and easy to communicate with. Even accommodated my change in travel quickly.
I was very well received by Seb!

Superb apartment very well furnished and decorated. 
Spacious and pleasant garden at the back.
Ideal location with many excellent restaurants nearby.
Super host
Perfect in every way
Beautiful space. Eric was easy to communicate with. Right next to a train station. Parking included.

Berish and his team were very accommodating to our group. The rooftop is amazing with a great view and very nice furniture. I heard there was a hot tub going in right after our stay. This place is classy! Very nice entryway and felt very safe and secure in our accommodations!

Berish and his team were very friendly. I would recommend this space to anyone!

Berish and his team are dedicated to ensuring that their guests' every need is taken care of, and very quickly, the units are incredibly well-appointed, spacious, and comfortable. The finishes are top notch, from the linens and towels down to the smallest details, not a single detail is overlooked. The view from the rooftop patio is something to experience on a busy weekend in the city. The units are exactly as stated and photographed. This was our second unit in the building on this trip as we needed an extension. Berish and his team immediately addressed our needs for an extension—as they always did with immediate responses—and worked tirelessly to make the transition to another fantastic unit an absolute breeze. Enjoy the rooftop patio with full sun exposure and relaxing large hot tub overlooking the downtown skyline; you will not be disappointed in your choice of any of these units. This building is situated right in the center of a fantastic, vibrant neighborhood with no shortage of phenomenal restaurants, walk-up cafes, and patios for days. We could not have had a better location choice or a better stay. Very satisfied customer. These are true Super Hosts. Thank you to Berish and his amazing team for making our 15-day work trip into a mini vacation and showing us what Montreal has to offer when booking with a true Super host!
Three beautiful homes
A nice duplex apartment located in the Orthodox Jewish community quarter on Parc Avenue.
Great unit! Fantastic hot tub! Stunning views of Mount Royal. Highly recommend.
Awesome place, I recommend it to anyone who can make it fit their budget!
Great
Berish and his team were very helpful and always responded immediately. Location was great and the roof deck with hot tub really made the place.

Very comfortable beds and a fantastic rooftop hot tub. The location was perfect. The host was very helpful with parking and area tips. You can definitely hear your neighbors when there's some noise, but that was never a big issue. I would definitely stay here again.
Magnificent place!
Amazing!
Great place!
Loved our stay here! Beautiful deck, large rooms, and sparkling clean!

This place is amazing. James and Brian were wonderful and very helpful. The upper deck with the jacuzzi is a great area to hang out and enjoy the evenings. James was very helpful with his suggestions, as we were vegetarians and he was spot on with the places we should try for food. Overall, a great stay.
This is an amazing spot for the price. The patio is great and the amenities are very nice. There are a few minor issues, but nothing major. I would definitely stay here again.
It was more beautiful than any picture on the ad. A must-see for any tourist in town! :)
Very nice place! The rooftop is perfect with the view.
We had a wonderful time.  I wasn't expecting a reception desk, a welcoming greeting upon arrival, and quick responses to any requests. The place was stylish and clean.
Great hosts!

Nice clean place. We had the third floor suite which was two floors. One full bath on the first floor and two bedrooms shared a second full bath on the second floor. The hot tub on the roof was great. Location was okay. If we were to stay again in Montreal, we would probably choose a place closer to downtown/Old Montreal area. Also, the place does not have an elevator which was a slight hassle for luggage. Overall, it was a great place, good value for a small group. We would definitely recommend it.

Very nice apartment, very well decorated in modern style. We had plenty of comfortable space in the living room to stroll and chat with friends. The rooftop spa is really appreciated and the terrace is a must-have. A small point to note: please bring some specialized kitchen items if you want to cook during your stay as the kitchen is small and only has a basic set of dishes and a few utensils. Also, the accommodation has a connecting door to another apartment, and soundproofing is missing. But for a group that doesn't aspire to absolute tranquility, it's perfect and never bothered us. The neighborhood is very lively, the metro is however 20 minutes walk away and less accessible. The hosts are very kind, attentive and we would definitely go back without hesitation. Thank you for this stay.
Great space in a great neighborhood. Berish and others were very responsive when we had a couple of issues. Highly recommended.

Amazing place - sparkling clean!
Great host - very prompt with responses and provided a lot of local knowledge about places to visit during the stay.
Amazing place
Very Nice Place

This condo exceeded our expectations. We were 6 girls staying for 2 nights. It was very clean and very comfortable. All 3 bedrooms had king-size beds which made it very comfortable for all of us. I will definitely come and stay here the next time we are in Montreal. There was someone always at the front desk willing to help us. In fact, 2 of you helped us with our bags. Thank you very much.

The apartment was perfect...great location, beautifully appointed including a hot tub on the rooftop deck which we used in November!  The beds are really comfortable and both bathrooms are shiny and new. Checkin was easy with a reception area to drop our bags on arrival and departure.  James was always available and super accommodating.  Best fruit store in Montreal is right across the street and the St. Viateur bakery with warm Montreal bagels is half a block away. So many good restaurants in the Mile End, you won't need to travel far for an amazing meal.

Great place to stay! Very clean and modern. Great location for exploring the surrounding neighborhoods—many hot spots were within walking distance. Comfortable beds and nice linens. The rooftop hot tub was such a treat!
Clean, great spot! Lots of things to do in the area, with many eclectic restaurants and a few cafes on the same street. The hot tub is an amazing amenity! We'll definitely be returning guests.

I was in room 303. It's on the third floor and the building doesn't have elevators. It wasn't a big deal to me because I'm still young, but just keep that in mind if you are staying with someone who has trouble with stairs. This place seemed recently refurbished and looked great, however there were a lot of scuff marks on the white walls which again isn't a huge deal for me, it's just something they should fix. In general the whole place was great except for two things. The couch in my living room had a lot of stains on it and I am not a fan of that. The other thing is with the hot tub. The host told me the hot tub guy comes 4 times a week, but there was no evidence he showed up during our stay. The chlorine float had nothing in it and the hot tub didn't smell good the whole time we were there. All in all this place is good apart from those two things that can be easily fixed.
Amazing apartment, really nice area, nice restaurants and grocery stores within walking distance.

Berish and Brian were amazing hosts for our trip to Canada. Before arriving, any questions I had were answered and recommendations were provided. Communication was fast and the location was perfect. The size of the unit was much bigger than I expected; it fit 6 people quite comfortably. I would definitely recommend this Airbnb to anyone visiting Montreal. The building does not have an elevator as of now, so if stairs are an issue just make sure to let the host know.
Great place. Well worth it.

One of the best Airbnb's we've stayed at. We loved this place. Our hosts truly went out of their way to communicate, accommodate and provide anything we needed from start to finish. Free local parking too! We highly recommend this place.
Exactly as gorgeous as advertised! Great view and great location! Definitely a must-try!

Nader's home is lovely, everything you would want in a city apartment with a large bath, outdoor area and comfy bed! 

Nader was constantly communicating with us and introduced us to his friends. He gave us tips on places we could check out in Montreal, all of which were well worth it!

Definitely recommend this lovely Airbnb!

Nader and his partner were extremely helpful with check-in/check-out times and for local tips. The apartment is perfect for a city break. We cycled into town every day so found the location great. It's near the old Olympic park which was great to walk around. I really can't thank them enough for our stay.

Such a cozy little space to make Montreal feel like a second home! Wonderful layout and decorations, I felt like we had entered a bohemian oasis in the heart of the city. Quiet street with rather simple street parking (outside of two weekly restrictions), we had no problem finding a spot to park on the block. First floor location made it easy to unpack and the apartment came with heating and AC unit. The bathroom was just the right size with a shower and bathtub. Super comfortable living room and kitchen access made our staycation away from home so delightful. Wonderful backyard space with table and grill to enjoy the warm nights. Access to wifi, Netflix and laundry were great perks. Would recommend and stay again!
Nader has a lovely home, very neat and welcoming. He was very accommodating and kind, and he will definitely want to stay there again! Thank you again, Nader!

Nader has an eclectic condo in the Rosemont area of MTL! This host was very hospitable and went the extra mile to ensure that I not only had a great Airbnb experience; but also offered helpful resources to explore and enjoy the city.
My experience at Satya's apartment was wonderful. I felt like my own home. Everything was clean, beautiful, and comfortable. My recommendation is 100% effective.
Great place. She was super friendly. Easy to find. Good location. Nice room with a little balcony.

The room lets in a lot of light and air, which was a relief from the heat and humidity outside during my stay. The apartment is rustic, cozy, and full of art. It reminds me of my grandma's old home, in a good way. The neighborhood is low-key and cool, and a short walk away from a lot of fantastic establishments (try out Falafel Yoni). I only had two brief interactions with Satya, and she was cordial and helpful in both.
It is on the third floor for elderly individuals who may wish to reside there. Very quiet neighborhood.

We enjoyed our stay at the apartment. We didn't get to meet our host, but she was available via messages. The apartment is located in a great area with great eateries and convenient transportation. It's not downtown, but it was much better for us. There were amazing vegetarian options nearby, and the bakeries were sublime.
Satya's place is so cute! There is a little porch connected to the room that we used every morning. She was very nice and accommodating, and my sister and I enjoyed our stay. Thank you!
The host cancelled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

I stayed at Julia's house for two nights during my time in Montreal. She was incredibly hospitable, we had everything we needed. The room was very reasonably priced and included an ensuite bathroom. A charming, quiet neighborhood with a bus stop right next to the metro station.
Very friendly and accommodating host, definitely recommend!
Beautiful home, close to transportation and shops.

Julia was very responsive to messages and kindly allowed us to check in early. She cleared plenty of space for us in her fridge and granted us use of her washer and dryer, which was a huge help. Her neighborhood is residential, but a few blocks away the area becomes more industrial, with several power plants and smokestacks. The street was very quiet, although we were awoken by a construction crew doing early-morning repairs to the sidewalk. Overall, we had a very nice stay and would stay here again. Thanks, Julia!

You get what you pay for. Thinking this was a great deal and not TOO far from the green line via bus, my husband and I booked the bedroom with ensuite bath. The interaction with the host was awkward from the start. My husband and I both heaved our luggage onto the tiny porch while looking for the key in the mailbox. I couldn't see that Julia was inside washing dishes with only the screen door opened. My husband went inside to get the layout while I guarded the luggage. No help from her at all or introduction. Later when we went to the back deck to eat, she repeated 3 times make sure to close the screen door...and seemed befuddled that we would choose to eat al fresco instead of in the stifling living room. The next morning we awoke to banging, drilling, and lots of other noises. Apparently Julia had hired a handyman to do some construction in the house but didn't bother to tell us. Thanks! He was pleasant; just doing his job. We called Julia to see how long he would be there- no response. We opened our windows and the ones in the living room because it was sooooo hot in there and closed them before we left. The next day we did the same but left them opened because the other tenant was enjoying the air as well. The next morning, Julia removed the cranks so the windows could not be opened. Shortly after that we cancelled the rest of our reservation, but not only because of that issue. She was not accommodating AT ALL!!! It was a chore to ask her for toilet paper, especially after she had erected a door between the kitchen and where she stayed. Also she was dressed inappropriately most of the time in a shorter nightgown ( often with no bra) in front of my husband. She even came into the kitchen wearing just a bathrobe when my husband was cooking, reached across him to turn the vent of the stove on instead of going around. I don't know how she got her rating or her supposed hospitality, but she must have left it in Vancouver!!!!

Julia was an excellent host. We had to check in late at night but she was kind and welcoming. The price was very reasonable and the room was clean and tidy. It seemed buses ran even at late night around 1-2 am near her place. We had a car so we didn't feel difficult to travel around, but if you are taking public transit it will be tough. Also, although the place is located in a quiet neighborhood, there were still construction going on in the morning so you might feel a little irritated. Overall, it was a great place!
Good person, kind and considerate! The place is clean and easy to access, bus stop around the corner.

Julia was very welcoming and explained us very well how to get to City Center and where to go. 
The room and bathroom were tidy and well-equipped. 
The house was in a quiet area and you will find everything you need.

Julia is just an amazing host!!! Beautiful and caring, she took care of me and helped me with my concerns!

Her place is wonderfully located, walking distance to food, grocery stores, and pharmacies! In a quiet, cute neighborhood.

Very clean and comfortable, I'm glad I found this place.

The 187 bus will drop you off in front of the house almost, and it's 10 minutes away from the green metro line!!! Magnificent for long stays

Julia knows where to go for transportation passes and can help you find just about anything you're looking for! She was a wonderful host, and I would definitely stay with her again if I were in the area.
This place felt like home to me. That's how good it was.
good place to save a little. note it is in point de trembles, the most eastern part of the suburbia near malls, definitely need a car

It was lovely, cozy and welcoming. 
The place was clean and in great shape.

It is very close to the bus station.

Julia, the host, is very nice and kind. She makes you feel comfortable and right at home.

She is very helpful and tries her best to assist in any way possible to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. 

I will make sure to reserve the same room next time I am in Montreal.

Thanks Julia.

The location is a bit far from downtown, but with a car it's not an issue. The neighborhood is quiet and safe, and affordable. The house is small, but it's okay for the price I paid. Thanks, Julia, for letting us stay at your place.
