Everything was fine, thank you, Julia
Excellent value for the price, well-located close to public transportation for reaching downtown and shops.
Julia is an open-minded, friendly, and very helpful person. The room was clean and everything was as expected.

Ask Julia if she's taken care of the mold issue before booking. Don't expect the breakfast she provides to involve any fruit, bread, or protein sources. There are other guests sharing the tiny house who may or may not communicate with you. There is no dining room table at which to eat food nor is there a desk for using laptops. The beautiful backyard has no lawn furniture and there is junk stacked back there which is unfortunate because the green space could be the best feature of the house.

Magali was an awesome host. She gave great tips on restaurants and events happening all around the city. She really went above and beyond even tailoring additional information for the event we were in town for (Formula One Race). The check-in was super easy and she was quick to respond during our visit. She also gave accurate and thorough information about the space and its amenities. 

The space was comfortable and exactly what we needed since we were spending most of our days out in the city. Her garden in the back is very charming, and so is the space. It feels like spending time in a friend's home. We will absolutely be back next time we are in Montreal. 

The location also can not be beaten. Everything you need is within walking distance, and the train is a half block away making it a great starting point for visiting everywhere in Montreal. The area is very hip, reminding us a lot of our neighborhood in Brooklyn. Bars, great food, and cafes.

We spent a lovely stay in Magali's housing. The flat is quite big, and has a little cute patio where we can have a seat under the sun. Magali gave us a lot of useful information about the things to know around the flat, but also more global information about Montreal; it was very helpful for us. We really recommend this flat, which is very well located, just a few subway stations from downtown.

An amazing host, and a nice and cozy bedroom. The location is the best you can get in Montreal. Le Plateau is a fantastic neighborhood with parks and plenty of small cafes and restaurants on Mont-Royal Avenue. Also, the metro is less than 1 minute away, and in 10 minutes you're downtown. Great Airbnb experience! I will definitely come back.

A green and sunny backyard steps away from lively Mont-Royal Avenue, cafes, restaurants, bookstores, and public transportation... That was awesome! Magali is the best host ever: very helpful and she's offering incredible tips about the area. Great value, highly recommended!

This place is awesome. The host responded quickly to all of my questions and provided helpful tips and advice on local activities.  The roommates were great, and the overall stay was very interesting. I would definitely recommend this stay without hesitation.

We enjoyed our stay at Magali's place. It's conveniently located right next to the metro and there are so many nearby restaurants and bars. Magali was awesome at keeping in touch and letting us know about things to do in the area. We will definitely visit again :)

The host, Vinay, is great. Spacious apartment with all needed amenities. I had a group of 7 friends staying at the apartment and it accommodated everyone comfortably. The location was great and a quick Uber ride to wherever you need to go. It already mentions this in the listing but there's no AC. Keep that in mind for the warmer days as they do heat up the apartment.

Other than that, had a good time in the apartment

We booked this place after a last-minute cancellation by two other hosts, and it was not actually available. We have no idea what this is actually like. The host needs to do a better job of keeping his schedule accurate.

My friends and I had a great stay at Vinay's place. It's very spacious and has great natural light. The apartment is two blocks from the Museum of Fine Arts and within walking distance of the Old City. I would definitely recommend staying here
Excellent location, host very reliable. Fully equipped kitchen with even flutes for champagne
The host cancelled this reservation 132 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Robert's apartment was very spacious and easily accommodates four people. My experience was very clean and tastefully minimalist.

The location is unrivaled - a five-minute walk from Old Montreal, and truly in the heart of the city.

I highly recommend it to anyone exploring the area for the first time.

Our stay was perfect! No other words. 
The apartment is as described, sunny, well-equipped, very quiet although super close to the main busy areas! We will definitely come back and book again!
We had a great stay at Robert's place, the location was fantastic and the apartment was super clean and spacious. We would definitely stay here again. Highly recommended!

Robert's place was great and he was very quick with responses! Also, the location was great—I would not hesitate to stay here again. The place was so close to public transportation and an IGA to stock up on food. It was clean and spacious. The internet was a bit slow at times, but we could stream Netflix (there was some buffering required).

There are a few things that I think could be improved. We were two couples staying at the apartment, but we were only supplied with one set of keys and we were told we couldn't have another set. This was very inconvenient for two different couples who wanted to do different things. Also, there was an issue with the oven—we used it to make a frozen pizza, but whoever installed it had left the paper instructions (which were on top of the broiler coil as this is an electric stove) and some other debris in it, like a hard piece of plastic and metal (which were underneath the oven coil at the bottom in the far back corner). We did not see these before we turned the oven on due to their specific locations, so a small fire broke out in the oven. There was no fire extinguisher, so we had to throw water on it. No damage occurred, but it was scary and annoying that no one took these flammable materials out of the oven. Plus there was an awful burning plastic smell after due to the plastic starting on fire. We were lucky the paper instructions did not ignite.
Great place, in a great location. Would definitely recommend.

Robert's place was in a great location to explore Montreal and enjoy the comedy festival. The home was extremely clean and very spacious. Beds were a little low but comfortable, and we had no issues sleeping. Air conditioning worked fine. Having the 1 1/2 bathrooms made getting ready much quicker. Having the washer/dryer was also nice though we did not use them.

The highlights, as I said, were that it was clean and the location. We were able to walk to most all locations. We did take the metro which was nearby (Champs de Mar 1 block away). Street parking was not clear where we could park nearby, so we parked at Complexe Desjardins nearby for the duration of our stay.

I would stay here again when we visit Montreal.

Robert's place is well located in Montreal, it takes less than 5 minutes to the next Metro station and less than 10 minutes to Old Town. Berri UQAM area, Chinatown, and the Quartier de Spectacles are also within walking distance. 

The place is very spacious and clean, and provided a perfect home base for a family of four during our stay.
Wonderful location for a city tour. Stylish furnishings. Washer/dryer on site. Bring your own coffee pot or plan on using individual K-Cup pods on-site.
Great location! Basic amenities in a well-maintained condo.
Great location near Old Montreal and the metro, but the apartment could be cleaner. Please check your towels upon check-in. WiFi is very slow.
Superb apartment in the heart of Montreal! Highly recommend!
Great place to stay with the subway right across the street which made things extremely convenient.

Robert's place was just right for our visit. The location was ideal for traveling by subway and the airport bus was just a couple of blocks away. We would love to visit again, as Montreal was a wonderful city with lots of places to explore.

Robert's Place was clean and spacious and located in a great spot, within walking distance of Old Montreal and an easy walk to the subway station. We had a wonderful time in Montreal and would definitely stay there again.

The unit was spotless and airy. The well-appointed apartment featured comfortable furniture and high-end appliances in the kitchen, including a Nespresso coffee maker. The large main bathroom had a separate tub and shower, along with a decent half bath. There was ample space for two couples or a small family. It was very close to the Metro station and within walking distance of coffee shops, grocery stores, and many restaurants.  It was also conveniently located near Old Montreal and all its amenities. Excellent communication with both the owner and unit manager. Highly recommend this unit for anyone seeking a home away from home while visiting Montréal.
Three beautiful homes, very well located
Roberts Place is in a great location, however, it could have been cleaner. With a bit more effort, this place could receive a much better review from me.

Very nice, clean, centrally located apartment. Lucky Homes did an excellent job with everything and Robert's communication was good. Highly recommend if you want a spot that is close to everything and has some old-building charm.

Good apartment, well located. Basically furnished. Quiet despite being very centrally located. Easy access to the metro. Lucky Homes was easy to contact and they responded quickly when we had an issue with Wi-Fi (the issue was quickly resolved).
Great spot!

Robert and his team were amazing! They ensured we were prepared at every step of the way. The location is ideal for all tourist attractions and for using the subway. It was exactly as described. I would not change a single thing.
I would never stay anywhere else again! Momo!!!!

We had a wonderful time in Montreal. Robert's flat is in a great part of town and we enjoyed the neighborhood. The apartment was spacious, quiet, and the kitchen had necessities for cooking. 

On the downside, we found the beds and pillows very uncomfortable and the wifi did not work well.
Nice place. Very clean. Good communication before arrival.

Robert's place was very clean and the location to the metro was perfect (less than 5 minute walk). The apartment had lots of light and was very comfortable. The second bathroom was nice to have. Checking in and out was very easy. We were contacted regarding check-in a couple of days before arrival and again a day before departure. We would definitely like to stay there again. I would recommend staying here.
Great place, super clean and tidy. Highly recommend it.
The space is very organized, clean and modern. We are happy with the accommodation regarding its location and the beautiful panoramic view! The apartment is incredible!
Great location.
Very clean condo, close to downtown, Chinatown, and a subway station near the subway hub.
Wifi is not so great and bed mattresses aren't that great, but the location and price are amazing
Convenient and well-located, it lacks accessories, such as toilet paper, which had to be purchased. Otherwise, it was okay.
Lots of open space and great value.

The location was excellent, and the apartment is located on a quiet side street, which is nice when you're staying in downtown Montreal. The price was fair for the location and quality of the home.  The mattresses were incredibly uncomfortable, and the beds were so loud that I would be woken up any time my husband rolled over during the night. Robert was very quick to respond to any of our questions and concerns, which was a great benefit especially when our check-in time was changed (delayed flights) and he was extremely accommodating with changing the check-in time to suit our needs.
Good location and nice space
We had a pleasant stay. The accommodation was spacious, clean and well-located. Good communication. The decor could use a modern update.
Spacious and well-located residence. Competitive price. Well-organized reception. However, cleanliness left much to be desired during our stay.

Loved staying in Robert's apartment! Very fair price for the place, which is located in a great spot. Most popular attractions in Montreal are within walking distance, and the place is in close proximity to a grocery store. Having Netflix, along with other apps, available on the TV was a pleasant surprise. The WiFi also worked very well. The only thing to be wary of if traveling by car and looking for somewhere to park it for your stay, street parking is not available, so research parking garages ahead (there are some available within walking distance). I’d recommend doing a parking garage especially if you are staying during the winter season.

Super central location and spacious apartment. Very neat and clean. The kitchen and dishes were slightly sticky in places. Robert was always reachable and check-in went smoothly. Only problem: Anyone driving to the place should be prepared for massive parking issues. Sometimes you have to search for up to an hour, as you can't park in front of the house and generally need to pay for parking almost everywhere throughout the day.

The location of Roberts' apartment was perfect and within walking distance to many areas in Montreal. Check-in was easy and the place was clean upon arrival. WiFi, TV, and all mentioned amenities worked perfectly. I would definitely stay again!
Alina maintained communication throughout my trip to ensure everything was going smoothly. The space is pleasant, and the location in Montreal is excellent.

Basic apartment, very dirty kitchen, there were flies in the trash can flying everywhere in my kitchen. The floors were dirty. Regarding parking, it is present but not private. Otherwise, practical for sleeping and location.
It was so so.
Alina is very welcoming and very helpful, the apartment is in a great location and very convenient! Excellent communication and lots of kindness, very accommodating... I recommend her.
Great location!
Everything is as described! Alina was quick to respond to all of my inquiries, check-in and -out was simple, and there were no unpleasant surprises. Thank you again Alina!
Very kind host, communicated effectively and provided amenities such as wine, coffee, and snacks. Would recommend.
The apartment is clean and cozy. The location is great! Alina responds promptly. There's parking behind the building.

Alina's place is close to public transportation and many of Montréal's Centre Ville attractions, with a relaxing walk through Parc La Fontaine beginning any adventure. Her home is cozy, quiet, and welcoming, especially for those traveling with a young child (toys!). Parking is competitive and challenging, if you're bringing a car, but would be par for the course to any city dweller. Our stay was wonderful and we'll be back to the city soon, I'm sure. See you later!
Perfect location, close to everything. Very cute building & apartment! Easy and clear check-in.
Great space right next to the park, easy access to downtown and very helpful and quick communication!
Alina's home was clean and the check-in process was very easy. We were lucky enough to book this Airbnb on the day of our arrival in Montreal and Alina was quick to respond to our inquiries.
Great communication with host! Had so much fun! Thanks for the memories!!! ❤️

William is by far the best host I've encountered. He is a very kind man and is willing to do anything to make your stay the best it can be. His apartment was very clean, basically brand new. Amazing place and location. Would definitely stay here again next time!

This place is at a great location in Montreal. Close to Chinatown and Old Montreal.

The host is also excellent. He responds back quickly to your emails. When I contacted him that the toilet was broken, he came the very next morning to fix it while we were traveling through Montreal.

Though minimalistic, this apartment suited our needs for this trip. The AC unit is in the living room and even though there is a good fan in the bedroom, if you like to be cold when you sleep you may be uncomfortable. The apartment is on a quiet street very close to Chinatown and about 10 minutes from Old Montreal.
Great location, clean, quick responses to questions and any needed help. I recommend.

The room's greatest advantage is its location. It's very close to Place des Festivals and Notre Dame. It is very spacious and very clean. It has a full kitchen (full-size fridge, stove, microwave, coffee maker, etc.). Check-in was not a problem. William was a very good host, very responsive to questions and issues. Open air parking is available nearby, costing $17 CAD per day (until 6 am the next day, after that you have to pay another full day).

On the negative side, the room can get hot in the summer and the provided A/C was VERY noisy (one of those portable units and it was situated in the living room, so had to put it at full blast and keep the door open to cool the bedroom). The room definitely did not feel like home, with very poor/cheap decoration and furnishings. The bed was comfortable, however. Overall, it was a budget option. Would look for something more "homey" next time.

Super clean, 1 bedroom with a pull-out couch in the living room. The host left toiletries and coffee for us to use. Internet was fast. 

Location is unbeatable! So close to Old Montreal...but you have to walk through an amazing-smelling Chinatown to get there...even though we were full from supper at Gibby's, walking back to the apartment through Chinatown made my mouth water!  

Highly recommend this place...the host came early and saved us a street parking spot where we were able to leave the car, for free, all weekend. 

Will definitely stay here again when next in Montreal.

Zhan and William are easy to connect with, helpful, and respond very quickly. The apartment was sparkling clean, quiet, and very comfortable, especially the Tempur-Pedic mattress. I haven't slept so well in years. The location was perfect with plenty of food, drink, activities, and entertainment right outside the door. I recommend parking your car in a 24-hour garage and forgetting about it for the duration of your stay as it is rewarding to explore the city by foot or by rented bicycle.
Basic apartment in a great location.
Location, location, location! The perfect spot to kickstart your Montreal adventure. Wander any direction and you'll stumble upon amazing sights. I highly recommend it for everyone.

Excellent location within walking distance of many neighborhoods. Clean and comfortable, but fairly basic accommodations. The host's communication with me was excellent. Good value. Would definitely return

Great location and super clean apartment. Check-in instructions were crystal clear! I forgot the key card inside the apartment, Zhan came back and opened it for me in 30 minutes. Quick responses and easy to connect with.
Great condo in a great location. Hosts were always quick to respond and very helpful. Very happy with this rental.
It was a great home! It was clean and had a very good location, making it easy to get anywhere in the city.

The impeccably clean and tidy department is basic but has everything you need.  It's conveniently located, so you can walk to everywhere. Communication was excellent; they were always very attentive. I would definitely go back.

This is a perfect place to stay. It's clean and open, there's parking and easy check-in. If you head down the street on foot, you can reach amazing shopping and restaurants in one direction, Chinatown district in the other, and nightlife everywhere! William will respond to any message within seconds!

We had a great stay at Zhan's place. It was conveniently located within walking distance to the mall and many other shops/restaurants. Zhan was quick to respond to any inquiries and had great communication throughout our stay. Would definitely recommend this condo if you are looking for a central, clean location that is accessible by walking, metro or a quick Uber ride to many different areas of Montreal (Old Port, Downtown, Mall etc). The apartment was tidy and had everything we needed for a pleasant stay!

This place was in an amazing location, conveniently located to everything! Loved that we had a parking space. The Airbnb itself was very clean and spacious! Amenities such as soap, shampoo, towels, coffee makers, and wifi were all available. Will definitely come again. Only thing was Netflix wasn't working and the TV was hard to navigate but no biggie!

This is the 3rd time I've stayed in this building, this time in this apartment but, as I think any other apartments managed by Zhan/William, the experience was more than positive. The place is super clean, spacious, in a modern building with a garage with super easy accessibility, wifi works great. All perfect to me!
Amazing place, very helpful hosts. The apartment was extremely clean, and the location is perfect. The area is quiet and so are the neighbors. Would absolutely stay there again.
Awesome space!

Great location, within walking distance of downtown core and 1 block from Guy Concordia Metro. The condo was clean and well-presented. Matt was easy to communicate with and quick to respond.

Best value for your money.
Very nice and clean, just as in the photos. Also includes Netflix!
Great location with easy access to the metro, getting you everywhere!

Matt was an excellent host, we had some questions after arrival and he responded promptly via text and the Airbnb messenger. He was unable to meet us at check-in but his friend helped us park the car and even carried our luggage up to the apartment! Parking on site is easy and a welcome amenity in a busy city. We didn't spend much time in the apartment outside of sleeping and getting ready in the morning, but it is just as pictured, clean, bright, and spacious enough for our family and needs. The air conditioning was a welcome relief during a hot August and the beds were comfortable and cozy. I would definitely recommend staying here and when we return next summer, we would consider staying here again if still available.
Rapid and easy

Matt's place is cozy. There are two queen beds with comfy comforters and more than enough pillows. He left us 4 clean towels. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need. There's also a balcony with two chairs. There are 2 convenience stores right across the street if you need snacks/beer/wine...super close to the heart of downtown. Matt responds very quickly too. Ubers are very easy to get in the area.
Thanks

Great place! Very clean and spacious. Awesome location. There was some construction happening at the building, but it wasn't an issue. The mattress wasn't the most comfortable thing ever, but I really liked the apartment! Lots of light, full kitchen, and a nice TV!

We recently spent a long weekend in Montreal. We had a wonderful time and part of that was because Matt's apartment gave us a place to come "home" to at the end of each busy day. The apartment is exactly like the pictures. There were no bad surprises. It is very difficult to find a place in Montreal that has two distinct beds.... not a couch rollout or a blow up mattress. This has two identical queen beds, one in the bedroom and one in the large living room. Everything was very comfortable and very clean! Matt was a great host. Check in couldn’t have been easier and he responded within minutes to everything we asked. I will be staying there again. Matt, thank you so much! We had a wonderful time.
Great place to stay. Well decorated, comfortable, and excellent communication with the host
We had a great stay at Matt's place. His apartment is near the metro station. The two beds are very comfortable.

Matt was a wonderful host. From the moment I booked the Airbnb he was very informative and within the first couple of days of me booking he had already sent the instructions on how to get into the Airbnb followed by some rules. When arrived at the Airbnb it was exactly how it looked in the pictures. Matt was very helpful when we had a problem turning on the shower; I sent him a message and he was at the Airbnb within 5 minutes to help us out! The place was very clean and the beds were very comfortable. The location of the Airbnb was perfect, just one block away from all food stores and pharmacies and a one-minute walk to the metro. Overall, Matt was a great host and I would definitely recommend his place if you are looking to stay a few days in Montreal. Thanks again, Matt!

We were two professionals who stayed at the apartment for 5 nights to attend a conference. The apartment was very conveniently located for our needs (near Concordia University, grocery store, tons of restaurants, and public transportation). It was a safe neighborhood. The apartment itself was okay but spartan (as pictured so true to photos). Two real beds were a great feature. There was nowhere else to sit other than an uncomfortable folded couch and dining table chairs. Missing some very basic things for any Airbnb place: NO maps, tourist information or instructions on how to use the TV and get into Netflix. Only a towel rack was in the shower and NO washcloths or hand towels were provided. We got two large towels each and had to get paper towels from the kitchen to put in the bathroom to dry our hands. The beds were comfortable but don't have top sheets, only a duvet cover. We had to assume and hope that they launder the duvet covers after each guest. It was, on the surface, somewhat clean, although the shower curtain had black mold and there was hair in the drain. There was no stopper for the bathtub. Items in the kitchen (spatula, fridge, and pan) had remnants of food. The hallway outside of the apartment smelled of fried food the entire week. Really bad smell, which isn't the fault of the host, but may be an issue for some. It was nice to have access to a gym on the top floor. Do not stay here if you are counting on using the garage parking. You need a card to get in and out of the garage, which means you need to park on the street (in a very busy area) on arrival and then departure in order to collect/deposit the card in the apartment. Finally, if you are a solo traveler or if concerned about safety, be aware that the keys (only one key was left--we had to ask for a second) are left in the unlocked apartment for you to let yourself in after using a code to enter the building. This and the parking system are not in the description but should be disclosed before paying so people can make more informed choices. Neither of us would stay here again.
Very cozy and very good location.
Matt's apartment is very good and comfortable, very clean and close to a supermarket and an underground station. Definitely recommend.
Clean, spacious area in a great location!
Very beautiful loft and very clean! The location is great

I adored staying here on a brief visit to Montreal. The location was perfect - right in the heart of old town cafes and attractions, but on a quiet residential street. I loved the scenic courtyard and the beautiful interior of the space. I hope to return!
Good location.
Fantastic location! Very quaint accommodations, everything was just as advertised. Thank you Samuel and Byron!
Great place, great host, highly recommended if you're in Montreal!

Amazing location steps away from beautiful old Montreal. The apartment was lovely and very quiet. Also, bonus points for the air conditioning which made our stay during a heat wave very comfortable. Overall, a wonderful spot!
Thanks! The place was in a great location and the air conditioning was perfect during the heat wave.
awesome place
Very cute loft! Only about 9 minutes drive from downtown. We had a great time staying here!
Excellent location, clean and comfortable. Sam was great to communicate with at all times. We would return to the loft next time we are in Montreal.
The place is very nice with a lot of light and within walking distance of tourist streets and the port.
Great place to stay, and an easy host to deal with. Would stay here again!

It's central to Old Montreal. 
Needs more mirrors because it's hard for three girls to get ready with one mirror.
An iron would also be great to have.
Bright and spacious loft with post and beam construction. Very close to all old port historic sights and a short walk to the metro.

I would highly recommend staying at Samuel's loft for anyone traveling to Montreal! The loft is in the perfect central location, and we couldn't have asked for a more attentive host or a more comfortable place to stay.
Great location, very cute space
Very clean. Great location and great host. I would stay here again, next visit to Montreal.
Great stay. Clear communication, and the location is unbeatable.

This is a lovely apartment, perfect for a family of four, provided the children are pre-teens. The sofa bed may be a little small for teenagers.

The location is perfect, with quick walking access to Vieux Montreal and the Old Port. It's also within walking distance from a subway station.

Samuel was gracious enough to let us drop off our luggage at the apartment before 3 pm, explaining that the place would not be cleaned at that time. We dropped off our luggage and went exploring.
When we returned after a walk through Vieux Montreal just after 3 pm, the apartment had been thoroughly cleaned and was ready for us.

Can't beat the location, and the cleanliness. Highly recommended, we liked it so much that we plan to return and also recommend it to our friends and family.

The apartment was charming, clean, and comfortable. The location can't be beat. Samuel was quick to respond to all inquiries. FYI, street parking looks like it's reserved for residents only, but there is an affordable indoor parking garage one block away. I would stay here again and highly recommend it!
Good location. Quiet. Clean
Amazing loft in Old Montreal. Great location.

Amazing location and really cool space! The courtyard was so cute and we loved the shared outdoor space on the roof of the units. It felt very homey and a comfortable spot to come home to after a long day of exploring in Montreal.
Great location and charming space.

Very nice stay - clean apartment with basic amenities. We met John upon arrival who was very helpful in checking us in and very quick to communicate. Located right in Old Montreal with easy access to restaurants and shops nearby.

The host was excellent and quick to respond to any questions. The loft was very clean and had everything we needed (from toiletries to a fully equipped kitchen). Accurate description of being right in the heart of Old Port - steps away from everything. 

Also traveling with someone who had multiple food allergies and there was a large IGA within walking distance, where we got our groceries. We brought our own pans, plates etc. and had no issues cooking at the loft. 

Overall a great experience and would not hesitate to stay here again :)

Great place for a quick weekend getaway. We stayed for three nights. Indoor parking was just down the road and cheaper than we thought. Close to The subway. Old Port area was nice to explore. It has everything you need to make you feel at home.

We met John at check-in who was very nice and offered some local places to check out. The place was super clean, very warm (-10F that night), and the location can't be beaten. This place was great overall.

The loft is so cute and vintage style home. It's so clean and provides much of the amenities you need. It's in downtown, Old Montreal area so it's close to everything you want to see. Samuel and John are amazing hosts. I would come back again.

My second stay at this location, I simply love it! It's close to all amenities and activities. A fantastic choice for both business and leisure travelers. The apartment is entirely renovated and sparkling clean. The host is very available for any issues or questions; they know the city well. Great value, great place, I will definitely book again when I return to Montreal. Thanks again!

John's place is in the perfect location. Just a short walk to all of the restaurants, bars, the Ferris wheel, and ice skating. The space was stylish and felt very homely. Definitely would stay there again.
Such an amazing location and helpful with sights to see and a list of amazing restaurants. Made our vacation better than I could have hoped for!
Perfect location and very cozy home base for a winter visit! Great communication from our host (John) with everything we needed to know for our stay.
Great space! Location
Amazing location and amazing customer service. Beautiful light in the loft and very clean. Will be coming back in the summer.
Great environment!
Lovely loft in a great location!

Stayed at Carloine's place for 5 nights with 4 friends. We had a fantastic time. The condo is spacious and clean - a good deal for the price. Getting in and out of the place was easy with Carlonie's instructions, bonus: wifi was fast. It's also in a great area, a few steps to anything you need.

We very much enjoyed staying at Caroline's place. Our three daughters found the room with two bunk beds and one double very comfortable (although we had to hang a blanket on the window at night because there were no blinds and the street light bothered them).

The flat has everything you need and is quite comfortable. However, the second bedroom where we stayed had some minor issues. Absolutely nothing on the windows - two full walls facing the street and no door to the living room. When it was -29c at night we could not get the room any warmer than 12c. However, these really didn't bother us much and Caroline will probably have fixed all of this by next time.

The kitchen and family room were perfect.

The neighborhood is the best in Montreal. Fantastic bakery three blocks away. St-Viateur bagel just a block away. Excellent grocery store half a block away and open until midnight. Skating at Parc La Fontaine just a 15 minute walk. Metro station is a 10 minute walk away. Lots of shops and restaurants in the neighborhood. We had no problems finding parking on the street during the entire eight days we stayed.

Caroline was an excellent and very responsive host.
Highly recommend.

Caroline's place was fantastic. It was spacious for us, a family of 2 adults and 3 little kids. It was clear that Caroline has a sense of style as the apartment was nicely done. It had plenty of sunlight, on a quiet street, but also very close to shops, great restaurants, and very walkable to just about everything. We enjoyed our stay very much and would come back. Caroline was easy to deal with and very considerate. She left us a pile of fresh towels, and got us milk, juices and bread.

Caroline, the host, was out of town when we arrived as she had informed us ahead of time. So she made sure we knew how to get in (extremely simple) and had provided us with names of contacts next door. But Caroline was also easily accessible by phone or messaging and responded immediately.

The apartment is just as described. It is spacious, airy, full of natural light and comes with all that one would need for cooking, etc. She even left us some great goodies in the refrigerator.

Location is wonderful - a couple blocks from the Metro, groceries, restaurants, etc.  It was a perfect place from which to explore all of Montreal. The apartment was relaxing, clean and had a wonderful vibe.

We are so grateful to Caroline for sharing it with us (my husband, myself, and my 21-year-old daughter). It would be a great place for two couples or a family with small children too.

Thanks so much!!!

We really enjoyed our stay in Montreal and at this apartment. The host left a well-equipped home and tourist information for us. Her friend helped us with any issues that arose. The neighborhood was great! Down the street from a grocery store and restaurants, and a short walk from the Metro.

Excellent stay in Caroline's apartment. The apartment is consistent with the photos and description. 
A 5-10 minute walk from Mont Royal metro, in the heart of the plateau and close to bars/restaurants/shops. 
In a quiet residential street on the first floor of a typical house with a few steps to climb. 
Check-in and check-out was easy. Well decorated and perfectly clean. 
Large living room very pleasant, three bedrooms with comfortable beds, a bathroom and a shower adjacent to the master bedroom. Small terrace with a few chairs. 
Very pleasant air conditioning during hot weather!
We did not meet Caroline in person but communication was very easy and pleasant. Thank you for everything, Caroline :)
Great location. Nice space.
Great place and kind host!

Very comfortable spot with access to all amenities! 

Great hosts!! 

Definitely recommend.
Beautiful little apartment! Not a far walk to the metro and a lot of cute restaurants and shops nearby.

Stephane and Sabrina are wonderful hosts. It is easy to chat with them because they show empathy and open-mindedness. Welcoming, generous and very likeable, we appreciated their advice and good addresses. 

Their room is large enough; they welcomed us with our four suitcases. The bed is very comfortable and we slept very well. The whole apartment is very clean. The kitchen is large and many utensils are at your disposal. A Metro supermarket is located within a 10-minute walk of the apartment. Close to bus and metro lines, it is simple and quick to get around the city. The internet is fast enough and powerful for the entire household.

And finally, the two little pluses of the stay are their two cats, Poupoune and Jacob who are really adorable and very cuddly. 

A beautiful address that we highly recommend!

Sophie's place was a real gem: a charming ground floor apartment on the Le Plateau in a small street off vibrant Mont-Royal Avenue. Excellent location, couldn't have asked for anything better!!! A stone's throw from the Metro station, bookstores, restaurants, cafes, bars and grocery stores. Also an easy walk to the mountain and the Mile-End. Sophie is an excellent host. She was a great communicator, and made sure everything was perfect. Check in and checkout were seamless. The apartment is stylishly decorated with a lot of personal and artistic touches that make you feel right at home. A beautiful private patio and garden make for wonderful dinners or gatherings outside. Books, music, board games are also at your disposal. Perfect apartment if you are travelling with Kids, or just among a group of friends. The bathroom has all amenities at your disposal. The kitchen is fully loaded with all the basics (and even more). I cooked many meals there during my stay. A little keyboard made for some fun jam sessions. Thank you Sophie for making my trip to Montreal very memorable. Hope to return to this beautiful place.

This is a fantastic home that clearly shows care and reflects the personal style of Sophie and Axel. Our stay was comfortable and having a backyard was great with little kids. We would certainly recommend it for your next family trip to Montreal. The location was convenient. We loved the 'home away from home' feel of the property.
Charming apartment with excellent location (bars, restaurants, and shops within a short walk, close to the subway and Bixi station). Very nice hosts.

Sophie's apartment is absolutely gorgeous, in a perfect location. We also really appreciated how accommodating she was, as we weren't able to leave Toronto until after work, and didn't get in until 11. Just a couple of things to keep in mind if you're booking Sophie's place however:

- the description currently states that there are queen beds in each of the bedrooms, and a pull-out in the common area, but this isn't the case. There is a large bed in one bedroom, a small bunk bed in the other room, and no couch. We were two couples, which made the sleeping arrangements quite awkward.
- the apartment has a very lived-in feel, with lots of stuff everywhere. This makes it feel very homey, but if you're used to Airbnbs that are more sparse, and don't feel like you're in someone else's space, then Sophie's place is not for you. For instance, the bunk beds were in a children's room that was tidy, but filled with toys, etc., which along with the bunk beds didn't feel appropriate for two adults to sleep in. It had also been a long time since I had stayed in an Airbnb without a lockbox for the key, or a keypad, so arranging for the check-in felt more complicated than usual. 
I would definitely recommend staying here due to the location and beauty of the building, but I think these are important things to consider if you're thinking of staying here, especially if you're more than two adults.

They were really kind, helpful hosts. The house was very clean with all the amenities you need and a warm, homelike atmosphere. We felt right at home. The house is located within a short walk of the subway which takes you to downtown in 10-15 minutes. Luna and Abdullah, thank you for your great hospitality.
Luna and Alborz are amazing hosts who ensured we had everything we needed and their place is lovely. It's also very conveniently located near the metro. I highly recommend it!
Luna and her husband are wonderful hosts, they are very kind, their apartment is so cute and quiet. It's in a good location and close to public transportation.

Everything is awesome!!

They are super nice, kind, hospitable, and always smile. I love that. 

The place is clean, with a good location. You must relax and have an amazing trip!
This place was even better than I expected! The hosts were so kind and welcoming and helped whenever possible. Such a lovely place, I had a great time!

Luna and Abdullah are the best hosts we met during our travels throughout Canada. They are amazing, incredibly kind and helpful with everything. The place is also beautiful and well-located. We highly recommend it! 100%! 😊
Very hospitable hosts and a nice apartment with a balcony. Not in the center of town, but you can easily reach it by metro. The bed was not the most comfortable with a thin mattress.
Luna and her husband are great hosts! Very friendly and generous with suggestions on finding the hidden gems in Montreal. Their apartment is close to the Metro and has a beautiful patio.

Luna and Abdul were wonderful hosts. They were really welcoming and ready to help with any suggestion or indication. It was really nice to meet them, they made us feel immediately at home and we strongly recommend their house, beautiful and in a great position, to visit Montreal!

Luna and Alborz were such lovely and thoughtful hosts. They went out of their way to make sure I was comfortable and that my trip was the best it could be. It was wonderful to get to know them and I would highly recommend their place!

Luna and Alborz were incredibly hospitable. Very kind, great hospitality. The house is just 5 minutes away from the station. Quick access to downtown Montreal and 15 minutes away from Little Italy (good food there). The house was perfect, clean, well-equipped. Recommended!!!
They were absolutely lovely hosts, very accommodating and welcoming. The place was lovely and well-located, close to the metro and buses!

Luna and her husband are very very nice and ready to help you when you need them! There's also a list of good restaurants in the room, and we tried several times and it was delicious! The room is clean and nice.

Luna's place is well located, just a 10-minute walk to restaurants and shops in Mile End and very close to the subway. I was blown away by their hospitality and always asked how my day was and offered me tea and snacks :) The building also felt very safe at night. Definitely stay here!
Luna and Abdul are adorable and available to always help us with our travels.
Fantastic place! Luna and her husband were very good hosts for us! Even on the first night, they cooked dinner for us! Thank you so much for everything.

Three good-value apartments: the accommodation is 5 minutes from the metro station Rosemont, less than 10 minutes from the lively Mile End neighborhood, in a quiet residence. The hosts are very welcoming and do everything they can to ensure our stay goes smoothly. The only small downside is the quality of the sofa bed, but for the price it's perfectly acceptable.

Luna and her husband were amazing hosts. We had no trouble communicating before checking in, and the place was as described in the advertisement. We had a great time both talking to them as our hosts and enjoying our time as travelers in Montreal.
Super friendly hosts, excellent location, and very comfortable place - highly recommended!
Excellent stay at Luna and her husband. Everything went very well. They are so kind that one would like to find them in all hosts. Thank you for everything.
Extremely friendly and welcoming hosts, well located and super clean. We would always come back.

Luna and her husband are a really nice and welcoming couple. We spent two days visiting Montreal and enjoyed their good spirits when we came home at night. They are very helpful if you need any directions or tips around the city. If you like fresh air, their flat is still within walking distance of the city center.

It's a great place where you can stay, so comfortable, warm, clean, with beautiful decoration inside, it's near all the city attractions, so safe!

Luna and her husband are amazing hosts, so kind and nice! The hospitality is great and they give you maps of the city, subway recommendations, and places to eat and visit.

Highly recommended! The apartment is a quick walk to Rosemont station and close to the grocery store. Luna and Abdul were outstanding hosts, they were both extremely kind, hospitable, and helpful with suggestions on what to see in the city. I only wish my stay with them had been longer! The apartment and room are very clean and the area is nice as well. Thank you again! :)

Luna's place is awesome, great location, clean and with a cool vibe, we would definitely recommend this place. 

Thanks
Great place to stay for a few days and enjoy the Mile End neighborhood of Montreal

Luna and her husband's place has a homey and cozy feel. I enjoyed having chocolate and tea as well as conversations with them. Their place is conveniently a 5-minute walk to the Rosemont subway station, so it was easy to focus on exploring the city. The subway system in Montreal is extremely well-managed, a train comes every 3 minutes. Highly recommend for people visiting Montreal for a couple of days!
Everything is incredible at Luna, the situation, the accommodation and her terrace, the hospitality and kindness of the hosts.
Amazing hosts, clean, tidy and great location. Helpful and taking care of every detail, highly recommended.

The best Airbnb I ever went!

Luna and her husband are the sweetest people and they have sweet attentions for their guests! The bedroom is absolutely clean, same for the bathroom and the rest of the apartment. The place is very cute because Luna loves to keep many plants so it creates a peaceful atmosphere. I hope you will have the chance to taste some Iranian food that the couple cooks because it is delicious!! If you have the chance to talk with them, you will realize how great their culture (they know many French poets and authors) is and it was pleasant to talk with them. Luna knows some words in French and speaks English, as her husband. I also enjoyed this place because it was calm and the situation was interesting: on Saint Denis street (where you can find restaurants, libraries, shops), you are 5 min by walk from the metro station and like 20-30 minutes by walk to Mont Royal Park.

Luna and her husband are really kind and friendly super hosts. They welcomed me and helped me to spend a comfortable stay. 
Great hospitality. The room is perfect, I love the beautiful furniture and nice location. 
Highly recommend it.

Luna and her husband are very hospitable and informative. I enjoy having tea and chatting with them. The location is very close to the Rosemount station, only a 5-minute walk. And they even invite me for dinner, their traditional food is very tasty. I had a great time during my stay. It's a good place that I would like to stay again.

A very comfortable and pleasant space, centrally located and quiet, though it smells of cigarette smoke but is bearable. 
I highly recommend it.
Very beautiful place, however very disappointed with the cleanliness of the house.

Three very good sleeps. Small garden for coffee. There is space in the house. However, in periods of extreme heat it gets hot in the bedrooms. Florence is very responsive, there is maple syrup (Website hidden by Airbnb) true parking place. Quiet neighborhood. 25 minutes from the city center by car. Satisfied I recommend.

Wendy provides outstanding hospitality at a very reasonable price. The place is very clean. She is busy with many projects and tasks, yet she makes time for friendly conversation and is a very caring person. 

The only issue is that she does not offer air conditioning. Although, I had a "Hi Tech" fan. So if you need A/C, that is a miss. 

All the rest is stated as a great experience and I would stay there again and again.
Diego was a wonderful host who made us feel comfortable and welcome in his home. The bus stop is a block away, making it very easy to reach downtown.
The host is very friendly and easy to contact in case of any problems. Also, very open to scheduling changes.
Amazing hospitality, the host went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and provided a relaxing stay.
We canceled our reservation after one night. We recommend more attention to the cleanliness of ears, bedding and household linens, as well as the kitchen & fridge.

Diego is a very warm and approachable person. A compact and neat apartment in a safe neighborhood, and we had a pleasant stay. The kitchen has almost everything you need if you are cooking. There's a beach not too far away, and the bus stop is within a few blocks that terminates at the Metro station where you can link downtown/ anywhere within 20-25 minutes. I would recommend Diego's place anytime and any day!!!
The host cancelled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
We booked at the last minute but Joe was a perfect host and he gave us nice advice about his fantastic neighborhood!

We booked at the last minute and took a bit of Joe by chance. The apartment was not very tidy, but he did everything to give us a clean room quickly. It's a nice apartment well located, close to the metro and lots of shops, the room is nice within a young co-living space. 
I think it's more suitable for younger people less delicate than our habits as a quinquagénaire. 
Thank you in any case to Joe for his responsiveness and welcome.

Joe's place is located on a street with plenty to do and is a reasonable walking distance or a quick drive from whatever you want to do. There are also many shops and places to eat nearby! Paid parking on the street, but there are reasonable covered parking lots that are a 20-minute walk or less away. Joe is an excellent host and would definitely recommend him!

A really lovely apartment on a main street, spacious bedroom with a window onto the street, comfortable mattress, everything clean and tidy—really nice for a short stay! Great location in the city too, very close to Mont Royal station and within walking distance. The hosts were friendly, clear, and communicative. Only thing to be mindful of as a potential guest is many steep exterior steps.
Clean, modern, parking available, and close to the metro. Arnaud's place offers good value.
This is a very clean apartment. It has a full kitchen and some games for kids to play. It's close to Old Montreal, and having a parking space is a plus.
Arnaud's place was fantastic - extremely clean and perfect for our stay. Added bonus: the bed is more comfortable than any other Airbnb I've stayed in. Thank you, Arnaud, for being such a great host!

Clean apartment, modern decor, well-equipped, good exchange with the host friendly agreement for a last-minute change 
Meeting expectations

I loved staying here. The apartment was beautiful; it was super clean, and the off-street parking space was lovely. The apartment is close to many restaurants and a subway station. It was easy to find, and check in was straightforward and convenient. Consider staying here if you're visiting Montreal; I would definitely return!
Upon arrival, parking was easy to find. Arnaud made good use of the space to create a welcoming atmosphere. It was a pleasure to stay there for a few days in Montreal!

We were impressed with the style of this apartment, really cool. The host put a lot of thought into the amenities provided as well. There are high chairs, playpens, games, dishes, etc. to make things feel like home.
Space was wonderful and very convenient. I will check to see if it is available when I travel back to the area!
I love the platform
Clean and stylish. Communication was timely. A quality place to stay
Easy check-in and check-out. Very clean. Close to public transit. Off-street parking is a huge plus. A great place to stay in Montreal!
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Really cool collocations, special mention for the cats :)

At this price point, it would be a shame not to take advantage of Morgane's and her roommates' super welcoming atmosphere! It's spacious, clean, cool, and quiet! 

I was really happy to spend some time there! 

If you're looking for a peaceful and well-located spot to put your bags down, this is it!

P.S. The cat is a real living plush toy!
Great hospitality, lovely host, cute cat

The apartment, though slightly dark, is very clean and pleasant. We hardly saw our hosts. This didn't particularly bother us, but it might not suit everyone.  Pleasant location and good spot, recommendable.
Very good value for money.
Winnita and her husband Daniel were very attentive. The apartment was about a 20-minute drive to downtown Montreal. It was super clean and stylish! They would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

Everything looks exactly like the pictures. My check-in time was at 4, but when I got there early she was happy to give me the key early. The only problem I had with the place was the AC. There isn't any AC, but it was indicated in the listing so I guess that's fine. WiFi speed was good.
Amazingly clean and cute place in a quiet area. The host was very reachable and thoughtful. Would go back there.
Good place and nice hospitality
Our family enjoyed your place. It was a very clean and cozy house. The location was good. The host was nice and considerate.
We had a comfortable stay. The house was warm and well-located. Dan and Winnita were great, very prompt and excellent communicators. Go for it, guys! Highly recommended.

One of the best Airbnbs I've ever booked.

Winnita and Dan were proactive in making me feel welcome and the place itself had the perfect combination of value, location, charm, and more than enough space. It also had a semi-constant breeze that permeates the place because of its location. 

The place itself felt "lived in" and had the touches of someone who had an eye for furniture and design that gives off comfort. I felt at ease in the place immediately.

The only thing missing were in-house laundry and air conditioning, but it was easy to get around it as there is a nearby laundromat and there is a constant breeze. Otherwise, great place 10/10.
Spacious and clean. Would stay here again!

Everything was awesome and much better than I expected. 

Our host was very kind and responsible. 

I'll definitely choose this place for next time.
Winnita and Dan were super organized and responsive. The apartment was bright and clean, as advertised. We were very pleased and would definitely stay there again!

Winnita’s and Dan’s place was amazing! They were super kind and left notes with suggestions of places to eat and other useful information about the city. My grandma really liked that the place was super clean. The parking spot was really useful, but the garden got in the way of carrying heavy suitcases such as mine (that would be the only downside, but other than that the place was amazing!).

Pleasant apartment well located within 5 minutes of the metro. We had the opportunity to meet Dan, the owner, who is very friendly and always ready to help. He has planned to install a washing machine which is an excellent idea!
A good place to stay

This place was great and clean as expected. Nice design touches and comfortable to stay in. With a good parking space at the back of the apartment. The hosts left helpful notes with suggestions about the area. Will definitely stay there again.

A perfect stay! Clean and very well-equipped, we feel right at home. The hosts are very responsive to any need and the local addresses are super cool. An exceptional deal for a really interesting price, just 15 minutes from downtown Montreal. I'll definitely go back there with pleasure and recommend it without hesitation.
Beautifully decorated house with all the basic amenities available. Winnita & Dan were excellent hosts
Great spot!
Loved Winnita's place. The place was very clean and conveniently located away from traffic. Would stay there again!

Our stay at Winnita & Dan's place was amazing! The apartment is super cozy and clean, and everything you could need is easy to find and make yourself at home. Winnita was super accommodating with check-in and check-out and gave the clearest directions for checking in and enjoying our stay. Be sure to check out their recommendations for places to go in the kitchen; they are all great! She's a great communicator and quickly answered any questions or requests we had. Thank you so much for an easy and comfortable weekend! ❤️

My children and I (25/17) had a really great time at Winnitas place. The flat was clean and decorated with a special touch of the 60s, the beds were cozy. We felt very comfortable there. 

Winnita was very caring during our stay. She sent us tons of insider recommendations which we enjoyed a lot (especially the beaver tails and the bagels :-))

The flat is very close to the metro station and you can reach the center very fast. I would recommend the flat highly.
Very nice apartment with stylish characteristics in a quiet area. Highly recommended.

Winnita's place has a vintage charm. The decor is thoughtfully and tastefully planned. 

It is easily able to hold a party of 5. 

We enjoyed our stay and appreciated the free parking and food suggestions given by the host.

Spacious apartment with vintage decor.

Located outside the city center, but 5 minutes from the metro station and close to a nice park.

The parking space behind the apartment is very convenient as it's difficult and expensive to find parking in Montreal.
Good, affordable, quiet, lots of space for three people, good parking at the back of the property
The place is very clean and tidy. You have everything you need and it is close to town. Winnita is very helpful.
The room is clean and stylish, fully equipped.

Clean and tidy, the location is okay, it would be even more convenient if some kitchen supplies like spices and coffee were provided.  Additionally, please refrain from reminding guests to check out before their scheduled time to avoid any feeling of being rushed to leave.

This is a great place to stay, very close to the metro, supermarket, and food places. Winnita's recommendations were excellent but we did not have enough time to try them all. The house was super clean and comfortable with great beds and plenty of room. Winnita was in touch to make sure everything was okay and really deserves the title of Superhost. She is one of the best I have encountered. Highly recommended!
It was so good!! I only stayed for a day, but it was so nice that I was sad to leave. There's also a market nearby, so I recommend it!
This is a very nice place to stay if you're visiting Montreal. It's easy to get anywhere you want to go. Check-in is also very easy. Highly recommended.
We absolutely adored Winnita's accommodation. It was incredibly clean and the decoration was perfect! We will definitely return.

Perfect!! Super comfortable

Kind host!!
Very accommodating and quick to respond. Clean and lovely hosts. Thank you
Clean, good location, good parking, but needs more comfortable mattresses, pillows, and an TV.
Pleasant and well-located housing. Ideal for visiting Montreal well.
Very nice apartment, pleasant and quiet, located a few subway stops from downtown Montreal. We highly recommend it!
This place is very stylish and comfortable. The neighbor seems very nice and it's easy to get to other parts of the city.
Winnita and Dan's apartment was perfect! The location, cleanliness, parking, comfortable beds, and great vintage decor were all fantastic! We definitely recommend this place and would come back!
We had a great stay at Winnita's. Great space, quiet location, and very clean!

Winnita and Dan's apartment exceeded our expectations in every way! Not only was the place spotless, but it also had all kinds of unique little touches and personalized recommendations based on the neighborhood. The apartment was beautiful and spacious, and the beds were very comfortable. Check-in was extremely easy and Winnita was quick to respond to all of my messages. We will definitely be staying again on our next visit to town!

I like the stylish apartment with fully stocked cupboards, closets, and even a couple of board games. Everything was clean and organized. Especially enjoyed the view of the park.

Out of the hosts' control but... we all had terrible sleep because the people upstairs were so noisy. They were stomping around the creaky floors and constantly dropping things on the floor until very late at night. Also, they are early risers and made more noise leaving the house.
The apartment was quite large and very clean. We loved exploring a new part of Montreal. We had dinner on Wellington and went down to Rapids Park on the river.

We were totally satisfied with our stay. Communication with Winnita was fantastic. Parking was a breeze (not always the case in Montréal these days!). The home is stylishly decorated and comfortable. We would definitely return.
Clean, quiet, comfortable, great value.
Very beautiful apartment, well equipped and close to everything (grocery store, convenience store, and metro station).
The place is bigger than the pictures show. The rooms are huge, the beds are incredibly comfortable, and the kitchen gives us a vintage vibe. In short: Wow!
Apartment top-notch, very clean maintained by hosts super helpful, proactive and available if needed. Quiet neighborhood well served...
Nice place, easy and convenient booking.
Nice place!
Apartment near the metro, bright, well-equipped and clean.
Very well located (metro station, shops, buses, and all amenities available in the accommodation. Very clean and comfortable.
Great place!
Very good. Located near the Monk metro station. Ideal for discovering Montreal

The house is excellent, great location, everything is clean and organized, one of the best home experiences we've had. My family had problems arriving in Canada and Mrs. Audrey immediately helped us. 

We will be eternally grateful for everything.

Super recommend it!

Christopher has a beautiful apartment in a great area of Montreal. I rented it for my parents who were visiting and they loved it! Christopher was very easy to communicate with and the keyless electronic lock was easy to use (even for older people). The apartment was very clean and all of the basic amenities were provided, even the added touch of drinks in the fridge and maps of Montreal. The apartment is close to a lot of great restaurants, bars and parks, and not far from downtown festivals. I would highly recommend this apartment and will definitely book it again for out-of-town visitors!

Christopher was an incredible host who saved us street parking and stayed to give us a tour of the room. He was friendly and easy to talk to, he had thought of everything down to a laundry pod and chocolates on the bedside table. He allowed us to check out late and was very responsive via messaging. It was an amazing experience and when I come back, I will definitely be staying here again.
Super location! Very clean and excellent service!

I unfortunately never got to meet Christopher in person, but he was so helpful and easy to get ahold of anytime I needed help. If you don't mind a small bathroom and kitchen, then I would totally recommend this place!
Great little spot with a wonderful location. It's not a large space, but it had everything I needed and Christopher was an excellent host. I would definitely stay here again!
The most beautiful Airbnb I have ever visited. It is very functional despite its small size. Perfect for a weekend getaway with your partner.

We had a wonderful two-night stay at Christopher's place. The room was perfect, very clean, and had everything we needed. Christopher was very responsive and helpful with any questions we had. The self-check-in process was very easy. I would definitely stay again and recommend it to others as well!

The location is excellent, exactly as in the photos. Everything is neat and very clean. Christopher was an excellent host who welcomed us at check-in and went above and beyond to help us. He allowed us to store our luggage before check-in and gave us several tips about the neighborhood. The location is great, in a very cool neighborhood close to the metro station. I recommend!
Absolutely loved this space! Tons of amenities and walking distance to St. Denis and other major streets. Great helpful hosts and a breeze check-in.
This apartment was fantastic! Christopher went above and beyond with special touches and the location was perfect. He also had great local knowledge, including recommendations for places to eat.

Stop looking for other Airbnbs. You've found the BEST Airbnb in Montreal. 

And here's why:

- We asked if they could find us a microwave for our unit and THEY DID IT WITH 24 HOURS NOTICE.
- Perfect location, walking distance to Old Port
- Parking was pretty easy to find actually
- Quiet street and building, safe neighborhood
- Smartest use of small space.
- Immaculately clean

We could go on. Sometimes Airbnbs fall short of already short expectations, but this one restored our faith in humanity itself. 

Thanks to Christopher and the HAWK team.
Nice place, very convenient, I think I will come back here.

Perfect Placement
Immaculate Apartment
Rapid Communication
Irreproachable Organization 

Bravo!!

Great room right in the heart of the city, we were a bit nervous about how we would get in with the codes and everything, but it went great and some people were even there to help us out with everything. Parking was a bit complicated, but it is free and once you are parked you can walk almost anywhere in the city

Christopher's studio is well-located, close to the Sherbrooke metro station and functional. 
We appreciated the little touches (drinks in the fridge, shower gel and shampoo available) and especially the air conditioning! 
Christopher was very responsive during our discussions. He indicated how to get from the airport and gave us restaurant recommendations open upon our arrival. 
I recommend it.

Best Airbnb ever! Don't look further and just book this one. It came with a kitchenette, mini fridge with free drinks and snacks (!), TV with Netflix subscription, local tips, a warm bath and a comfortable bed. Better than a hotel room! It was extremely efficiently designed so I didn't think it was too small even though they call it a 'pod'. Thanks Christopher!
The apartment is small but very cozy. It is well located near the subway station. It is equipped with a stove and a freezer, and for women there is a hairdryer and the shower is very good!!!

Thank you so much Christopher, your place made our trip perfect. Clean, accessible, comfortable and cozy. We were looking for a place to sleep, we didn't need much space since we had a lot of things to do. The pod was a great place to stay for us. We will come back :)

From start to finish everything was perfect, Christopher is very responsive and we didn't miss anything, everything was available in the pod. And I thank Christopher again for all these thoughtful gestures he showed us. Best Airbnb, we will definitely come back!
Cozy and compact, very bright and clean. Perfect for singles or couples. Excellent location!

The POD is a cute little home away from home! The location is amazing — it's close to a subway station, grocery store, and bistro. The place was well-decorated and has great amenities. You really can't beat the value for the price. Christopher and Charles are great and super helpful hosts! I'd love to come back again soon.
Recommended great stay

My friend and I stayed for 2 nights in Christopher's pod and felt very welcome by Christopher, who was very kind, understanding, accommodating, and patient. We were amazed by how many thoughtful touches there were in the place, such as chocolates on the nightstand, feminine hygiene products, good quality shower products, and drinks in the mini fridge. We were also impressed by how much can fit in such an adorably small space. Everything was modern, stylish, comfortable, and peaceful. The location of the house was also beautiful at all times of the day and we never felt unsafe. We wouldn't hesitate to return!

Really nice, clean and well-located flat. Super comfy bed, decent bathroom and basic kitchen. Complementary snacks and washing/drying tokens were a great touch, and friendly and timely communication made for a great stay!
Excellent value and location in a beautiful neighborhood!
A wonderful place to stay in Montreal! Great location, very clean and safe and Christopher was a wonderful host.
Central location, small and cozy.  We could have done without the bug crawling out of the bedsheets on our first night.

Great location, near subway station, restaurants, and grocery store. Everything is very clean and convenient. The small space is very comfortable for two people. Christopher is an excellent host, always available and ready to solve any problems you may encounter.
This place is small but cozy. It's the perfect spot for a couple or solo traveler. The space was spotless and had nice touches like tokens for the washing machine and dryer, and snacks in the fridge.

Clean. Simple. Convenient. Those are the words I would use to describe this place. The place was very clean, the check-in process was very simple, and the place was convenient as there are many great places to dine in and pick up groceries/food around the area. The subway was also a 5-10 minute walk away. Great stay!

Very comfortable, clean and convenient. The space is small (as photos show) but had everything I needed with kitchenette, bathroom and some storage space (limited hangers though). Nice neighborhood and host provided very clear instructions and very prompt replies. I think they did a really great job with this space.
Very nice location, clean, detailed amenities, and Netflix service. It was a bit small for two people, but still everything was great!

We really enjoyed our stay at Christopher's. The studio was clean and cozy. It had everything we needed and was close to the metro station. 

We would recommend this studio to everyone who wants to stay in Montreal.
The place was way better than we had expected it to be. Due to its very smart and space-saving design, the studio is very comfortable. If given the opportunity, I would stay there on my next visit!

Great location and ample space if your plans involve only sleeping and relaxing, as it's a small space as advertised. Perfect for a couple and the location was amazing! Easy access to and from the apartment and very prompt responses from Christopher when needed
Easy check-in and check-out. The pod was very clean and the local recommendations were great! I would definitely stay here again in a heartbeat!

Stay at this place for 3 nights. Great place! Great location, close to the metro station, really convenient. Check-in and check-out is pretty easy. The pod provides almost everything we need and it's clean and tidy. Definitely come back when I visit Montreal again!

The POD was perfect for my short stay in Montreal with my boyfriend. It was cozy and clean with an easy check-in and check-out process. Simple yet thoughtful amenities that were provided were a plus (chargers, umbrella, etc.) Christopher was an excellent host who responded quickly to our question about street parking and messaged to check in and ensure we were good with everything. The location was also great as the POD is within walking distance of several main streets, the park, and a metro station.

Christopher was an amazing host! We were able to communicate without delay or problem. Check-in instructions were clear and the location was easy to find. The location is close enough to everything but also far enough to get a peaceful night's rest. Everything was within a short walking distance, including downtown, which was about a 30 minute walk. The closest restaurant and bar were within 5 minutes. The studio was clean and the bed was quite comfortable. We will definitely be coming back and booking in the future!
Great place. Comfortable, clean, I had everything I needed to prepare simple meals, close to the metro. Thank you!

Clean and well-located apartment, close to a metro station.
Small but well-equipped and functional apartment.
Plenty of information about Montreal is provided.
Small welcome gifts upon arrival. 
Very responsive to requests.
I will definitely return to this place.

Excellent stay in the perfectly clean, modern and quiet apartment. I will definitely be back! It deserves its super host title!  It would be nice to have a microwave in the small kitchen. 

Thank you so much!
Christopher's place was so cozy! It was perfect for a long weekend getaway - great location and easy walking distance to various attractions.

First time using Airbnb and glad it was at Christopher's place. Self check-in was really convenient, and there was a little booklet of information about the neighborhood and surrounding area and snacks. The space was super clean and cozy. Nice location and super close to the subway, which made getting around the city so easy!

Really great Airbnb experience! I tended to forget how small the unit was because it was set up so efficiently that it seemed larger than it was. The service was really friendly and quick, and the thoughtful touches like laundry tokens, toiletries, and recommendations for places to go were really appreciated. There was a little trouble finding parking but I was warned about that, and the place was within walking distance to tons of bars and restaurants so I only had to worry about finding parking once. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to enjoy Montreal!

This apartment is in a fantastic location, we could walk just about anywhere. It has everything you need and is very comfortable. I would definitely recommend staying here if you're visiting Montreal!
Very clean and stylish, likely one of the nicest 1-bedroom Airbnbs.
Very spacious living area, clean and nicely furnished. Would definitely return to this place again. Sonder is a great host, responded quickly to our questions.
I would recommend staying for only two nights.
Good
Everything is as described. We feel very good there
The host cancelled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Do not hesitate to book this apartment! It was even more beautiful in person. Perfect location for the metro and walking distance to any other downtown sights/restaurants! The building was easy to find and felt very safe and secure. The living room was so comfortable for relaxing on cold evenings. Note: the pillows were a bit firm, so if you like something softer, bring your own (the only possible negative I have on the whole place!)
Clean, centrally located, and a warm place to stay
Nice apartment for a couple looking for short-term accommodation in Montreal.

Philippe is an amazing host, the best we could ever wish for. He made our stay in Montréal unforgettable. He is very friendly and helpful person, anytime we asked him something he did his best to help us and he gave us great advice about the city as well. His place is very clean and full of special atmosphere and I am sure you will feel at home just like you are at home. We had there everything we needed and even more. A big advantage is also the location, close to downtown, with great restaurants, bars and with the bus connection directly in front. We definitely recommend Philippe’s place to everyone and we hope to return one day as well.

The place looks even better than in the photos - spacious and spotless, in a great, quirky location close to supermarkets and boutiques. It can feel a little further out from downtown, but it's not too long a walk, and there is a bus that stops right outside the apartment. It's very close to Mont Royal and many parks, so it's set in a beautiful location.

Philippe is an excellent host, quick to answer questions and very hospitable. I would recommend it to anyone who doesn't want to stay in a loud, downtown area but wants to get a feel for the gorgeous Montreal!
Superb apartment in an excellent location! Immaculate cleanliness. Philippe was absolutely delightful! No complaints at all

Literally feels like home!

Philippe is an incredible host who ensures you are always comfortable and you have everything you need - from hangers to detergent, to providing great tips on what to do in Montreal for free!

I have felt at home here. Photos will not do any justice, the decor, cleanliness and amenities available are fantastic!

Would highly recommend!!

Philippe was a friendly and responsive host from start to finish. The apartment and bedroom were clean, stylish, and comfortable. The kitchen is modern and coffee is always available. The washing machine/dryer and parking spot were great additions! A great location in Montreal and quick trips to everything. A great stay!
Philippe's home was clean and centrally located. We checked in late at night and he was very accommodating, even having a parking spot available for us. Thank you Philippe for a great stay!
An incredible host with an incredible place! I honestly don't know what I would have done without Philippe. He truly went above and beyond - he made me feel right at home. 11/10 would recommend.

Philippe is a great host and the place is very accessible to downtown's main attractions. 

I would love to stay at his place again.
Great place, excessive
Pleasant room in a large apartment right next to the Saint Joseph oratory, with friendly welcome from Raphael. Recommended!
We had a great time! Raphael is a very nice host!
Excellent experience. Highly recommend.
Amazing location
You get what you pay for and the location is amazing! A really pretty neighborhood, right by the subway.
Raphael is warm and his space is great.
Raphael is an awesome host who made my stay in Montreal much easier! The place is close to UdeM and HEC, and also offers many options for food, supermarkets, and tourist attractions.
Amazing location and stylish place, Raphael responded quickly to everything; he's a really nice guy.
