Great location and amazing value. Could be a bit cleaner, and the internet was somewhat intermittent.
Nice place, close to the subway and Université du Montréal (UDeM)
An apartment near everything (bank, pharmacy, restaurants, grocery store, University of Montreal)
Comfortable room and the owner's hospitality. Great place to stay!
Everything was perfect!

Excellent reception by Raphael who was very attentive. I had a pleasant time in this friendly shared accommodation and found everything I needed there. Only a small downside, the kitchen not always very clean...
Great guy, really easygoing, would highly recommend

Raphael charges $25 for a cleaning fee. So at least I expected a clean apartment. The bathroom and kitchen were very dirty. I didn't use either. I wanted to boil some water for tea, but there wasn't any kettle or pot. The bedroom has no lock and is right next to the main door. So, you can hear people coming and going. The bedroom was hot like a sauna, even with the window open. I ended up not sleeping, didn't even shower. 
I arrived around 9pm and left at 8am the next morning. He justified by saying it's only $17/night but with the cleaning, service etc., it ended up costing $48.02 for one night. I didn't use any of the amenities due to the uncleanliness. 
I didn't meet him; I only spoke on the phone. He seemed nice and was communicating throughout the night and asked me to take pictures of whatever wasn't clean because he needed evidence for the cleaning company, which I did and sent it to him. He said he would meet me in the morning to check out the place and refund me the cleaning fee but didn't show up or responded to my messages. The location is good and check-in was easy.

Room in a shared apartment very well located as it is close to the metro, numerous shops, restaurants, the university and St-Joseph oratory. Raphael is a very attentive host with whom communication is smooth. Thank you again for his perfect welcome and efforts to make my stay pleasant, I have absolutely missed nothing. I recommend without hesitation!

Raphael's room was superb; absolutely a great deal considering the area. The room was very well-kept, and check-in was a breeze. Perfect for any traveler or couple looking for a good place to rest while exploring Montreal. The metro and St. Joseph's Oratory are steps away, and CDN is a lovely neighborhood to roam. Raphael was quick to respond and check in on us, and was a great host. Highly recommend.

Awesome location, this room was in a very convenient spot to allow you to explore Montreal. The room itself is okay, the place isn't too clean, we actually had to go buy our own toilet paper because there wasn't any and if you're ok with other people staying in the same place as you, then you'll be fine here. Really good host, communicative. The only downside of this place was the cleanliness and how it was unclear about other people also living there. Even so, it was quiet and everyone was respectful of each others space. If you are looking for a place to sleep and semi-shower, this place works great!
The host cancelled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

The owner did not show up on check-in day and was unreachable. We had to find alternative sleeping arrangements for the first night. The owner responded to us the second day, only to tell us that he "thought" he sent us the code for the lockbox. When we finally got in, the place was dirty. We had to request that he come clean immediately. Later on, we realized the bathtub was clogged and the oven wasn't working properly. The owner finally fixed everything but it took some time. We made a verbal agreement for a refund, but it has been 15 days and no sight of the money and the owner does not answer when we call him. We are currently involving Airbnb to resolve this situation.

Philippe is incredibly helpful, the apartment is very close to the subway and the place is quiet and comfortable. 

We had an amazing experience.

This place is highly recommended for travelers who wish to have an authentic Montreal experience, devoid of noisy tourist traps. The apartment has a living room and patio that overlook Av. Wilderton; the airy bedrooms are facing an alley, so guests have privacy and quiet, while still enjoying plenty of sunshine; the queen-sized bed was very comfortable. The inclusive tree-lined neighborhood (with its synagogues, yeshivas, and churches) is charming, quiet, and safe; it is a 20-minute leisurely walk (or 10min ride on the 161 Bus) to Outremont station where one can find trendy cafes, restaurants, and a Mamie Clafoutis boulangerie; Côte des Neiges, with its many Asian restaurants, is also close by. Eating in is very doable; ingredients can be purchased at the Metro Wilderton supermarket (that is just a 2-minute walk away), and prepared in the well-appointed kitchen. Guests with cars will find free street parking in the surrounding streets.

Juliana and Rogerio are fantastic hosts. They are not only friendly, helpful and responsive, but also keep their home spotless, while being eco-conscious. If late check-out is required, Juliana and Rogerio will do their best to accommodate. I would not hesitate staying with Juliana and Rogerio again.

Juliana's place is a gem nestled near the Outremont area. You are about a 10-minute walk in either direction from two amazing neighborhoods and Metro stations, making it a great base to explore the city.  The room is quite big and has all the basic amenities. The apartment is minimalistic, stylish, and comfortable. Communication with Juliana is great, and Rogerio (the other host) was friendly and enjoyable to stay with. Overall, highly recommended!
Thanks very much, Juliana!

Located in the heart of Outremont, this place is a gem for anyone traveling to Montreal. With walkable distance to the metro, cafes, shops, this is a great starting point for getting to know Montreal in an intimate way. Juliana was very responsive with any questions I had and the cohost Rogerio was informative, friendly and very hospitable. The place was clean, well furnished and stylish with a minimalist touch. Highly recommended!

Juliana and her roommates were wonderful hosts. I needed to find a place for my parents from out of town to stay for two nights before better arrangements could be made, and their place was perfect. Cozy, intimate, close to groceries, bus stops and numerous other essentials. They were very understanding of the possible delays with airlines, we were late by almost two hours and we still managed to exchange keys. 
Many thanks to the hosts!
Everything was very good! The apartment was exactly what I needed.
The host cancelled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Amanda is a great host and the house is as shown in the pictures.
The house is fully equipped with all the basic accessories you need for daily life, and on top of that, it's kid-friendly. We have many parks nearby, and the Lachine Canal is just a 2-minute walk away to enjoy your evening.

One can definitely stay there with family.
Very spacious and well-equipped.

Amanda's place is a great location for seeing Montreal, just a short walk from the metro station. It can get super hot at night, so be sure to leave the windows open a crack and keep the fans on. The place was very clean and has everything you need.

Great location in St Henri - walking distance to coffee shops, metro station, restaurants, Atwater Market, grocery stores, and laundromats. Excellent value for money compared to other places in the area.
Well-located housing near the Lachine Canal and Bixi bikes. Free parking easily accessible in front of the apartment. However, the cleanliness of the apartment could be improved.

Spacious enough for a family of four, with a well-equipped kitchen for preparing meals and a relaxing environment. Clean and excellent location (within walking distance to trendy restaurants, the canal, grocery stores, and the Metro). Would highly recommend!
It was very good

Great little place in a nice quiet neighborhood. Quick walk to the Metro station, Atwater Market, and great restaurants (Arthur's is amazing!). There's also a handy Bixi station nearby; biking along the canal was great!

Amanda was prompt in responding and helped with any questions we had. Definitely recommend staying here!
Ideal location for our stay. The accommodation is well-suited for families with children. Our interactions with Amanda were efficient and pleasant. We recommend it!

Cozy apartment, bright, well located next to a metro station (4 stops from downtown) - and a little bonus, vestibule after the entrance door, as this prevents cold from entering - important in Canada for those who get cold easily.

Pleasant accommodation, well located and very quiet at night. The bedding is comfortable.
We did not have any parking problems on the street.
However, the second bedroom did not have a curtain by the window for morning sunlight. 
And the main room is a bit small to eat four people, especially since there were no chairs, just for breakfast.

The place was clean and quiet. Really well located. Close to the canal for a nice walk with your dog. There is a fenced-in area at the back that is really accessible and nice for your dog to walk around. Comfy beds and everything we could need was provided. Thanks!
The apartment is clean, comfortable, and offers many useful amenities. We had a wonderful stay at Amanda's place.

Amanda could not have been more gracious and accommodating. The apartment was exactly what we needed and made for easy access to various parts of the city. St. Henri is a charming and fun neighborhood in its own right, with lots of great food. Overall excellent stay!
The place was clean and the location was good. Easy check-in instructions and active communication were very helpful and I enjoyed my stay!

Thank you, Amanda, for the stay! 😊

My parents were happy with the accommodation and your availability to respond to messages was perfect. 
Dylan
Great, clean apartment. Exactly as advertised and Amanda was very nice and communicated everything very quickly.

Quiet and well-located housing, neighbors above are present occasionally and there is some noise. Otherwise, the apartment is functional and well-equipped. Amanda is very responsive to messages and questions. I recommend it!

Very well located apartment in Mount Royal.
Really very cheap. 
However, the apartment is not very clean, but it remains correct for a night. Do not hesitate to ask for clean sheets.
perfect location for exploring the city

Marine was an unbelievably amazing host. During probably the busiest weekend in Montreal due to the Osheaga music festival, another AirBnB host canceled last minute, leaving my friends and me without a place to stay. With the help of AirBnB and Marine, she accommodated a large group of my friends to stay last minute. She responded immediately and was in touch throughout the entire re-booking process. She and her boyfriend Damien bought us a bottle of wine to welcome us into their home, provided us multiple pairs of keys and checked up on us whenever we needed. Best of all, the place is in a super cool and spacious loft with really fun and interesting decor. I 100% recommend anyone considering visiting Montreal to stay with Marine. I know if I'm coming back to Osheaga next year, I certainly will.

- Wensen
Good location, clean, professional, very open to accommodating specific needs and requests.
Great location
Marine is a really supportive host who tries to solve and address any inquiry as soon as possible.

Great location and nice space. The host became abusive via text message when we did not leave the door locked inside of unlocked and shouted at me in the middle of a coffee shop. Avoiding the host's shouting ruined my day.

Ran into a slight problem at check-in, not due to our wonderful host's fault, but with their quick responses everything was easily worked out. Marine's place is decorated with all of her own work which makes it just that much better! It's a great place to stay for any purpose in Montreal. Only a few blocks from the Metro and in the great area of Old Port!
Very stylish place located very close to many activities, sights, and places to eat. Highly recommend to anyone staying in Montreal.
Great and affordable loft space near the heart of Old Montreal. A must-stay if you're considering a trip to Montreal

Pros: Great location, very spacious
Cons: 
- They had an air mattress as a bed. If I had known this I would not have booked this location. We only had one real queen-size bed and one single bed that sleeps only 3 people. The air mattress provided was subpar and deflated, so two out of five guests had to sleep on a deflated mattress. The Airbnb was not fit for a 5-person stay. I don't know how the listing is for 7 people.
- Checked in at 3:30 PM, but the sheets and towels were not ready. The host indicated that the sheets and towels were still being dried. I agreed that it was okay, but when I got there, the sheets and towels in the dryer were still wet and I needed to dry them a few more cycles before they were ready for use. Check-in was listed at 3 PM, the apartment should have been ready by then, so I don't see how it is acceptable that the apartment wasn't ready by 3:30 PM.
- The host offered a solution to us and suggested giving us a discount for our stay; however, I haven't heard back from them since writing this review.

I hope they fix these issues, as the apartment space and location have a lot of potential to be a great Airbnb for future guests. 

Thanks,
Jet
Great location! Nice loft-style apartment in the old port.

Great stay. The location is ideal, being within walking distance of local attractions in Old Montreal. The apartment is very stylish and you can expect what you see from the photos. Marine and Damien were great hosts!

Marine's place is perfectly located on a quiet street in the coolest part of Montreal. Amazing restaurants are everywhere and all within walking distance! Marine was so hospitable and arranged everything for our convenience. In the apartment itself was bright and private, and it had absolutely everything we needed. It made us smile to see that Marine even went out and did a little grocery shopping for us and provided eggs and bacon and a few other snacks! Thank you, Marine! Montreal is now one of my favorite places!

It's too bad. She didn't give food for breakfast. And when I checked in, they didn't finish making the bed and never finished it. We made the bed ourselves and finished drying towels. There is no pocket wifi, just wifi in the unit. I saw there are 4 beds, but there are only 2 beds. There is no hairdryer. The only good thing is that it's near the subway station. That's all.

Marine and Damien were fantastic hosts! Four slept comfortably in this cozy, well-decorated flat in Old Port. We were greeted by Damien upon arrival and were reassured all questions would be answered at any time (and were answered promptly). Friendly hosts and location were notable highlights! Would recommend this Airbnb to friends and family visiting Montreal.

I had to sleep on the floor because the house says it's for 6 people but definitely is for 4. The air bed didn't work, I could only sleep the two nights and I ended up with a neck injury at the end of my stay. If you have more than six people, I don't recommend this place. Upon our arrival, the bathroom was filthy...and used, not really clean! And if you are in a rush and leave some dirty dishes, they will charge $200 USD. Be careful
Stylish place with great location. No TV or couch, but that's okay. Would recommend.
If you're interested in exploring Old Montreal, this is the place to be. Very comfortable, great for cooking too.

**Pro:** Good location, good communication and basic necessities/cookware were available. The marine was almost always available if we needed help and gave some recommendations for places to go (Website hidden by Airbnb).

**Con:** The furniture and cabinets were all rundown, falling apart or peeling. The cleaner didn't do a good job and there were lots of random specks of black stuff on the ground and hair on the sink.  I found a few bugs (not bedbugs) on one of the mattresses. We had two comforters for four beds so my mom was really cold even with several of the small fleece blankets provided. There was no toilet paper, and we had to drive around the city to find a supermarket that was still open after 10 pm (this after a grueling 12-hour drive, so you'll have to forgive me for being nitpicky), but the marine reimbursed us for it. She also gave us a small reimbursement for all the trouble. Half of my family didn't stay because they had an one-year-old and it wasn't safe for her to be there (she kept trying to eat the black stuff off the ground). So we had to pay for a hotel room as it was too late to book any new Airbnb at 10 pm. Check out was a bit difficult as we couldn't find a time to meet and I couldn't drive to her place to drop off the keys, in the end she allowed us to leave it in the house (Website hidden by Airbnb).

**All in all, I would recommend this place to a small group of friends who just want a place to stay and didn't really care much about the above things (and I don't mean that negatively; some people just want to come and sightsee and party in Montreal, and this would be great for them). Maybe also for small families of 4 with kids older than 5. Or two pairs of couples.** Marine was nice to try to accommodate my family of six, but this was just not a good fit.

Marine was a wonderful host! We had an easy check-in and check-out and she was easily reachable whenever we had a question or needed suggestions for places to go. The apartment was clean, spacious and was perfect for our group of five.
Marion was a wonderful host and the apartment was very nice. The location is also excellent, with many restaurants within walking distance and the subway just a five-minute walk away!
The apartment was clean and functional! Marion gave us some tips on local life and her blueberry jam is fabulous!

Super secluded in a typical Montreal neighborhood, close to everything (metro, shops...). I loved the ambiance of the Petite Italie and especially Jean Talon market. Marion's apartment has all the necessary comfort for a great stay in Montreal. The two small balconies are very pleasant when it's hot. I totally recommend this accommodation by Marion.
I really enjoyed my stay at this apartment and would definitely recommend it to everyone! Zero hassle, very stylish and clean, and an amazing (literally couldn't ask for anything better) location!
A clean, airy and sunny space with a cute balcony in front and a great location! Thanks for having us!
The apartment is located in a very trendy area of Plateau with lots of great restaurants and bars.  You'd better double-check the parking regulations carefully if you don't want to get a ticket!
Very nice place and fantastic location!

Very beautiful, bright, and welcoming apartment. Roger welcomed us when we got there and gave us our keys. He also offered a quick rundown of events and other activities going on around the city which was very helpful. The apartment was super close to transit which was very convenient and the cafe/diner right at the corner was delicious with great coffee. Parking was very limited and had to be paid for at a rate of $9 for 3 hours at a time, but Roger advised that we could download an app and top up our parking from anywhere. There were no public paid parking lots or garages nearby so plan ahead for where you will park if you bring a vehicle. I would also suggest bringing a fan or two as it was hard to get airflow through the apartment to help with the heat at night. The kitchen was well stocked with utensils, pots, and pans. The apartment was well staged, clean and adorable! Overall we had a great stay and would definitely recommend!

The moment we buzzed in, Roger greeted us with a big “Welcome home!” And that's exactly what this place felt like! It's clean but not so clean that you worry about making any mess. My kids and I felt completely comfortable lounging after a busy day exploring the city. It's got everything you need onsite for a great holiday getaway. The area is fabulous, and we really enjoyed exploring all of the local shops and making the most of our meals.  The evenings were spent sitting on the front balcony watching people walk by. Roger was amazing. We never really needed anything but I knew he was only a text away. This apartment has a lot of character! It's a gem.
Peaceful quiet neighborhood (when there's no local construction), close to restaurants and parks. The apartment is spacious and comfortable.
Lovely spot! Super clean and the bedsheets were very comfortable.

Expect a clean, modern, beautifully decorated & fully stocked condo. However, be prepared to pay double the listed price. 

Excellent communication for any needs you may have. 

Overall, highly recommended!

The place was exactly as advertised - beautiful, stylish, and comfortable. We really enjoyed our stay in a great location! Also, great, quick communication with the host. Definitely recommend for anyone visiting Montreal.
Memorable experience, everything was absolutely perfect! You won't want to go home anymore!

Hidden one block over from the famous Mont Royal Avenue in Laurier Est, a close walking distance to Mont Royal and other trendy areas. Hides this beautiful gem. 

For a one-bedroom apartment, this place has a luxurious airy feel with large rooms and a superb outdoor area for lounging or eating. 

Thanh thoughtfully considered all aspects of what someone may want or need in an Airbnb and this place also has that homey touch added in. 

I will definitely be recommending Thanh's apartments in Montreal to any friends who may visit.

The apartment is located in a lovely quiet residential area. It's about 10-15 minutes from the Metro, but there are many great restaurants nearby, as well as cafes, shops, grocery stores, and parks. It is the perfect place to enjoy the hip and charming Plateau neighborhood. The spacious first floor apartment is beautifully decorated in a minimal contemporary style. Everything seems to be newly renovated, and it was very clean. The modern kitchen is stylish yet functional with new appliances and nice touches like a bonsai tree on the counter, and a Berkey water filter. There is a large deck off the kitchen that was the perfect spot for breakfast or a glass of wine in the evening. We checked in and out very easily, and the host was responsive if we had questions. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend it to anyone looking for an authentic Montreal experience.

Wow, now I know exactly how I want to live one day. The apartment looked even better in real life and I just had an amazing time here. Every little detail is on point and the neighborhood, as you surely know, is amazing.

The communication is unbeatable, and I was just happy to have booked here; if it's free, I will definitely book this room again. Thank you, Thanh, for the communication, and Elizabeth for checking me in and showing me the apartment :-)

My stay at Good Living's was an absolute delight! The space was clean and comfortable (especially the bed and soft sheets), the outdoor space was cozy too, and I would definitely stay here again! Thank you for your hospitality.
Perfectly simple and elegant. Small touches that make a difference. Immaculate cleanliness. Simple, minimalist, and practical.
Just as excellent the second time. Would definitely go back.

I booked this based on the location, the reasonable rate, and the onsite parking offered in the listing. The location is great, and the apartment is very nice, but the listing was inaccurate. The host contacted me the night before (!?) we were to arrive with the wrong dates, stating I should book more time, that I would also have to pay extra (over $100 more than the stated price) because my husband was coming, yes, there is onsite parking, but for an additional fee of $25 per day. 

To sum it up, stay true to your original listing, roll your costs into the overall rate, and if you have a contact who meets us on site, give us a map for street parking. Make sure it tells guests they must move their car at 8am (!) on a weekday or face towing, and that street parking is impossible. Also, if you are going to take pictures of our driver's licenses, there better be a good reason other than "that's what we do." I have stayed at many Airbnbs, and this was the only one that went sideways.

Really nice location with local coffee shops and restaurants. Very clean and spacious apartment, much better and more beautifully renovated than expected. This was my second experience with Good Living's apartments, and her service is always top notch. Will be back soon!

I absolutely loved this home! It was even better than I imagined it to be and served as a real refuge. I ended up spending more time there than I anticipated because I enjoyed how nice and cozy it was. Very clean and nice touches throughout, even interesting books and magazines to read. The design and lighting really make it special. Le Plateau is a wonderful neighborhood, and the location is fantastic. To be so close to excellent restaurants, parks, and boutique shops, and just about a 15-minute walk to the metro... it felt like getting to live a charmed quality of life. I'm looking forward to visiting again!

My boyfriend and I stayed here for New Year's Eve and it made our night unforgettable! We loved every inch of the space; beautiful decor, clean, spacious and fully furnished. It truly felt like a home.
Absolutely stunning apartment, everything was super clean and just an easy experience
Very clean, well decorated, 3 minutes walk from the metro station. The host is kind and very helpful. For a great time in Montreal, you should visit Jean-Pierre and Rebecca!

Awesome place! Clean and impeccable! Close to everything you need to make a great stay in Montreal! You got a lot of space; the unit has been fully renovated with a high touch on details! The host are highly friendly and would respond to you very quickly!! This is my stop for all my future stays in Montreal!! 

Great thanks to my hosts!! Can’t wait to go back!!

Our stay was amazing. The place was clean and comfortable, and we were given a map with useful places in the area around which made it easier for us to find everything. Jean-Pierre and Catherine were very sweet and friendly.

Look no further for your home away from home. Comfortable bed with an amazing space for cooking and getting away from the hustle and bustle. Perfect vacation spot. Super close to the subway and plenty of hints at home for the best spots in Montreal. Would definitely book again. TV, Full Kitchen, Beautiful dining space, you can't go wrong here. Even the street parking is fabulous.

Thank you, Jean-Pierre, for your hospitality. Your place exceeded my expectations and I would highly recommend you to anyone. It was so clean, classy, and super stylish. I loved it! I look forward to staying again.
Great place, great host!!!

Jean-Pierre and Rebecca are absolutely wonderful hosts, and the suite is stellar. It was sparkling clean with more amenities than we needed. There's plenty of natural light and it's beautifully decorated. Incredible value, very convenient access to the Metro and would recommend to anyone visiting Montreal!

Great place! Fully furnished with everything you'd need for a comfortable stay. Located next to the metro station and numerous convenience stores, as well as eateries. Excellent communication. Would definitely stay again.
They are super accommodating and the place is really nice! Right next to the subway.

Very pleasant stay at Jean-Pierre's, a host full of little attentions. Very generous, the place was perfectly clean and very well equipped. 
We even had corn on the evening of our arrival, it doesn't seem like much, but these small gestures touch us.

Thank you again to them.
Spotlessly clean, excellent kitchen, comfortable bed

Pierre-Edouard was a wonderful host and his apartment was perfect for our stay. Clean, stylish, and in a great neighborhood! Pierre-Edouard and Yasmeen were quick to respond to any questions and made sure our stay was nice and comfortable. There are also many nice restaurants and bars nearby too!

Everything was perfect

Inviting and comfortable decor
Complete equipment
Quiet in the city center
A magical terrace
A nice neighborhood
I felt like moving into this apartment where it is good to live.
The apartment was beautiful, modern, and stylish. It was very clean and had everything we needed. The walkable distance to the subway was perfect for our busy visit to Montreal.
Apartment as per the photos and even better. Very easy communication and excellent location. A sure value!
Quiet, clean, very nice apartment with everything you need. Communication and check-in were very easy.

Pierre-Edouard's Apartment is clean, stylish and perfect for anyone exploring Montreal. Check-in was easy and the apartment is a short walk from a grocery store, cafes, restaurants and the metro! We highly recommend it!
Cindy was a great friendly host and the room was pretty clean. I would totally recommend this place!
The hosts are very nice and friendly. The apartment is really clean and modern. I would definitely recommend it!
Perfect stay!
very clean, kind host, cute dog, great location.

This was probably my best Airbnb experience to date. Cindy and Jeff are outstanding hosts and should already be called Superhosts. From the early check-in to letting me stay a bit late because of my flight delay, I left with two friends with whom I will definitely keep in touch. The exchange of culture, their indescribable hospitality and the feeling of home are only a few things that I have cherished from that trip. Thank you Airbnb for making this experience possible.
Cindy is awesome! She was so accommodating from check-in to checkout and the apartment is very nice and clean. A quick drive into downtown.
The host cancelled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

We were extremely lucky to find this spot one day before Osheaga as our other arrangement cancelled on us last minute. We had a wonderful stay. The loft was spacious, stylish, clean, and the air conditioning was powerful and cooled the entire loft very well. The kitchen was great, with a nice open living space with an island and chairs. The hosts were fantastic communicators. The location in Old Montreal couldn't be better; it was 2 minutes to a 24-hour convenience store, 2 minutes from the subway (which is the best subway system any of us have used). Less than 20 meters from Parc Jean-Drapeau via subway. 24-hour parking was cheap, easy to access, and very close. The rooftop patio was great. Good value. Montreal is probably the nicest major city in Canada. We highly recommend staying here; we would all stay again. Driving home, I'm already thinking about when I can come back to Montreal!

Great location, close to everything in the Old Port. Restaurants, bars, and tourist attractions are within walking distance. Easily accessible by bus and subway as well. The host, Marine, is very helpful and responsive.
Great loft in a prime location. Very close to all tourist attractions.
Great location, close to lots of coffee shops and great food! Marine was very prompt in answering our questions. Would definitely stay again!
Perfect location in Old Montreal, with lots of restaurants nearby. Very stylish apartment exactly as shown in the photos. Marine and Damien were fantastic hosts, I definitely recommend it. Thanks!

Marine and Damien were exceptionally warm and attentive hosts, responsive to messages, communicative throughout our stay, and graciously accommodating of our last-minute reservation.

In addition to its fabulous location for sightseeing and dining, the youthful vibrancy of the apartment fostered a casual sense of comfort, while the cleanliness was to a standard that even my mother would approve of. 

Overall, it was a delightfully easy and enjoyable stay.
Beautiful condo!
Lovely apartment in beautiful Old Montreal. The host was very attentive and ensured that all of our needs were met. We had a wonderful experience!
Great location.

Really enjoyed our stay. Great location and Marine was prompt, welcoming and available. 

Thanks for being a great host.
Great loft in a great location. Loved the rooftop. Marine was very prompt in getting back to us when we arrived and answering any questions we had about the apartment.

Marine's place is located in the center of Old Montreal and close to transportation, making it the perfect spot for exploring all the famous tourist attractions in the city. It's stylish, clean, and well-equipped too, so we highly recommend it!

It's great to have pet-friendly accommodations in the heart of Montreal! The location was outstanding! The loft is very cool. 
Excellent communication and assistance from the hosts.
Excellent location, very responsive, would recommend and go back for future travels
Apartment perfectly located! We really enjoyed our stay at Marine's place. Communication was easy and the host was very attentive. I highly recommend without hesitation.
Awesome place, perfect for a stay in Montreal Old Port. Lovely host! I highly recommend. Cheers
You will have a very good stay here. I recommend
Marine's space was very cozy and perfect for our weekend getaway in Montreal. It is centrally located with coffee shops literally steps away.
The place was everything we were looking for. Great location and clean. Marine was excellent with timely responses. Would absolutely stay again!
Gilles and his place were AWESOME!!! Would definitely recommend!!!

The place exceeded all expectations! It's a fantastic, stylish, modern, and incredibly clean space. Everything was tip-top as if the apartment were brand new. The access to public transportation (Jarry metro station) was also extremely convenient. The neighborhood itself is very quiet at night and vibrant with life and full of little shops/cafes during the day. I would definitely book this place over any hotel room in the city!
Excellent host. Everything was just perfect!
Super clean and nicely furnished! Definitely felt at home!
Had a great stay here in Little Italy. Very close to the metro (orange line) and convenient. It was a great value and a beautifully designed apartment for a couple. Would stay here again!

Modern apartment, clean, very well equipped, and located in a very quiet residential street. The description is entirely consistent with reality. Convenient, comfortable, and without any (bad) surprises.
Awesome place!
Super stay! I highly recommend it without hesitation!
A safe haven of peace and comfort. Very comfortable with all the desired amenities. Really interesting neighborhood!
Very clean and everything you need

Perfect and clean accommodation just two steps from the metro
I will definitely come back without hesitation

The place is amazing, very clean, pretty well equipped, very comfy, Jarry stations are very close even if it's snowing the distance isn't a big deal and Montreal is a small city so you can be anywhere and go back home pretty quick, I recommend this place a lot!
Great Place! Love the neighborhood! Very clean place!
Clean, quick response from host (via text message or email), everything is in order.
Everything was very good!

This spot was a GREAT find and even better value. The building is easily one of the nicest on the block. Furnishings seem brand new and are sparkling clean. The space itself is exactly what is advertised: a studio. It served its purpose perfectly for the two of us. Having an in-unit washer and dryer were definitely a plus :)
Nice studio space. Ideal location near the university, near the metro. Will visit again

Nice apartment, great Irina! I loved it so much that when I had to extend my stay, I had no doubt. I would recommend this place and Irina to anyone traveling to Montreal! She answers immediately and even anticipates possible needs!
It is a very nice flat, with everything necessary and very near to the subway station. Irina is a wonderful person. I loved staying there.
Great experience!

Arthur was an excellent host: smooth communication and a neat studio! The Airbnb was great, clean, convenient with excellent WiFi and the best location you could expect in Montreal, just 30 seconds from the nearest metro station, and a 10-minute walk to Old Port and Mount Royal. The host responded quickly and made everything run smoothly.

Wedad is a great host and she was so welcoming. 
The place is absolutely worth the money with free healthy breakfast, parking space, and wifi speed had no issue. 
Wedad provided me the best free parking spot right in front of the subway station so that I enjoyed exploring the city by subway with an unlimited weekend pass. 
And she was so flexible and didn't mind me taking a shower late at night which was nice as I came back home after late evening events.

Wedad is a charming hostess and very welcoming. Her place borders a riverfront park with walking trails, making it very quiet. It is convenient to public transit. The basement bedroom is comfortable for two people, but the stairs are steep so not recommended for people with mobility issues. Breakfast is simple and satisfying.
Wedad is just incredibly brilliant, she's a host who knows how to receive people; she's very warm and welcoming!

It's a great place to stay! It's down a steep set of stairs, so not the best for those with mobility issues. But it's a clean, bright, cool, spacious quiet area in a beautiful home! The hostess is a wonderful lady! She even gave us breakfast! It's a wonderful area close to buses and it's really easy to get around! It's a wonderful neighborhood!
A charming house overlooking a park along a river, with shops and public transport nearby, offering calm assurance. We highly recommend Wedad for her hospitality and kindness, always available.

Wedad is a great host. Parking and breakfast are very nice amenities that she offers, which are hard to find in a city like Montreal. Street parking can be tricky (you may end up getting a ticket if you don't move the car at the right time). So we felt relieved at her place. If you want to avoid the hustle and bustle of downtown Montreal but still stay in Montreal, then this place is perfect for you. My wife and I did not speak any French, but we had no problems during our conversations with Wehdad. We loved her house especially the sitting area in the living room and the porch overlooking the garden. We had no problems with the stairs in the basement. In fact, the basement was much cooler and quite cozy down there.
Excellent welcome, we felt right at home immediately and the pool access was amazing, especially with this heatwave of the weekend.

Positive: Beautiful pool, garden and terrace
Neutral: The room is as described in the basement, therefore only moderately ventilated through a small window. Luggage storage in the room not possible, therefore only suitable for a very short stay
Wedad is a communicative host, but house rules should be clarified!

My stay at Wedads' pace was great. I enjoyed the pool and her warm hospitality. I didn't have a car, so it took me an hour to get to the city center, but it was okay for me. It is a great place with a lovely host.

Friendly owner! The room was clean, breakfast was great, and everything I needed was available.  The apartment was also right next to a bus stop and the metro, making it very convenient to get anywhere. I highly recommend this apartment!

Wedad is an exceptional host. Her place is clean and breakfast is great! Wedad's place is close to the walking trail along the river, and she is also very close to public transportation so you can get around the city easily. Wedad is a super conversationalist and knowledgeable about the city and its surroundings. We have stayed there a few times and have always enjoyed it.

First and foremost, Superhosts are those who go above and beyond to make a guest's stay pleasant and comfortable. Wedad did just that for me, and I felt like I was actually at home for 11 days. Beyond that, the space is clean and comfortable with enough privacy for anyone who needs it. The amenities are unbeatable because everything I would need in my own home was offered to me.

Some of the perks include the porch and terrace, a pergola, and the heated pool beside it, plus the well-kept yard right next to a green belt that contains gorgeous trails by the river for walking, sitting, or cycling. Also, Wedad is very personable and easy to have a conversation with if that's your thing. The value for the money was excellent!

Wedad is a fantastic hostess. She is very warm-hearted and her spacious and tidy house is filled with her warmth and girlish joy.  She has great depth and substance as well. Her house is in a quiet place with lots of nature around, and at the same time close to the bus stops that take you to the center. I stayed two weeks with her and am thankful for that time and I highly recommend staying with Wedad.
The place is great and clean

We had a great time at Mike's place. The location was amazing since the building is just steps away from Cote Saint Catherine street, close to Berri subway station, and in the middle of everything. The only downside was expensive overnight parking fees in the neighborhood. Mike was always available and very responsive and accommodating to our needs. He even had provided plastic ponchos which came really handy in the rain showers. My family and I enjoyed our stay and appreciate Mike's hospitality.
Mike was really nice, very responsive, and we felt very welcomed at his place. It's a simple apartment, but in a great location, and we appreciated all the little touches that made us feel welcome.
Clean and in a great location. Mike's response time was also very quick.
Mike is a fantastic host, ready and willing to accommodate whatever your needs may be. Thank you for your hospitality, Mike
Great place to stay, really felt like home, very clean and smells good! The host was very friendly and communication was great.
Very clean and very accommodating. Thank you so much!
Nohora Place was clean and comfortable, close to everything, but parking was an issue the first night and got better after we found a parking spot on the side street.
An excellent person, approachable, attentive, kind... was much better than I expected!
Lovely loft, cozy and well decorated. Very beautiful bathroom. Well equipped. Thank you!
A cozy and cute room. Happy to have stayed overnight.

The host was very accommodating and quick to respond to any inquiries. The unit had absolutely everything needed for our stay. It is spacious and very modern. An indoor parking spot is also available on site, which was very convenient for us. The location of the building couldn't have been better. Everything you may possibly need is within walking distance. Provigo grocery store, convenience store, as well as a Starbucks are right across the street! We will definitely come back!!
Beautiful home, well-located. Amelie is always easy to contact and attentive.
Amazing spot!
This is a very good house for a group or a family.

Everything went very well. Reality matches the description.

The place is cute, clean and the neighborhood is very nice. 
We recommend this accommodation.
Great place for families visiting Montreal

Very clean, stylish apartment with a central location. Quick response from the host. Could use more bathroom necessities but overall it was a great place to stay. The host provided useful tips on getting around town and must-see places to explore in Montreal. Excellent host, excellent place to stay!
Great host with amazing facilities, hoping to live there again next time in Montreal.

Amazing location and apartment. Mendel is very reachable as well. We had an issue around 9pm and night and they made sure they sent someone to service and fix it in no time. Nothing to complain about. Amazing place, great amenities, clean towels (more than needed), dishes, cutlery, dishwasher everything is given. No need to worry even if you forget a towel or two.
Amal's place is one of the best places I have lived so far. It's clean and Amal is a good host, too.
It's a very beautiful apartment in the heart of Montreal! My sisters and I loved spending the night there! And we will definitely come back without hesitation :)
nice place, good location, good price.
Very smooth process, really nice place, bigger than expected

Overall, the place was very nice for my family. My father said the main bedroom had a very comfortable bed. We used a spare mattress in the living room for our kids.  It's really a great place just to sleep; however, the kitchen and dining area are not great spaces or equipped for cooking meals - but the good thing is that it's located close to many restaurants and stores. Amal was a great host and tried to be very accommodating. There were some issues with what was advertised on Airbnb in error. I would say that you definitely need to pay for underground parking as parking is atrocious near the building.

The apartment is very well located: two steps from the CHUM and two steps from Latin Quarter. The bed is comfortable and although we are in the city center, everything appears calm and we sleep well. 

Although a bit expensive, as parking is not given away, I recommend this place.
A good place to stay. Good location and very clean
Great host, great place

Great location, we could walk to Old Montreal and the shopping on St. Catherine. Lots of restaurants. Amal gave great detailed instructions. The place was spacious and very comfortable, and clean. I would most definitely return.

The apartment was much nicer inside than outside. However, the neighbors were strange about us talking "too loudly." Overall, it was a great time, and the host was flexible with check-in and check-out.
The apartment is stylish, comfortable, easy to find and access. Amal was very helpful as well.
Very nice apartment, well located and Amal is very responsive and meets the needs of her travelers
Magnificent place and very clean

Amal was a wonderful host and was incredibly responsive. We couldn't find the keys when we arrived at his apartment, and he was so cooperative and responsive. He helped us get the keys in no time. I would have loved if there were more cooking utensils since I was traveling with my 2-year-old daughter, but that night it wouldn't be too important since Amal's apartment is in a great location very close to many restaurants. His apartment is cutely decorated. Thanks, Amal!
We rented the apartment from Amal last minute. The apartment was super clean and tidy. We will definitely rebook this apartment when we return to Montreal! Thank you, Amal
Recommend to anyone, an awesome place in all aspects, we had a flawless experience
Very beautiful apartment perfectly located. Perfect for a stay in Montreal.
Great base to explore Montreal, fully equipped spacious apartment
Volai cob

Amal Place was what we were looking for. Convenient locations, stylish apartments, and parking garage were a plus as well. It was close to everything in downtown Montreal. My only concern was the lack of cooking utensils, as we were cooking Christmas dinner, but with all the amenities around that was a minor detail. Amal was very responsive to all of our concerns. We will definitely recommend and stay again at Amal's place.

Amal must be the most responsive host we've ever had. We never met in person but he provided timely support nonetheless. The location is very good, especially if you are new to Montreal; it's walkable everywhere. One thing to note is that the unit is advertised as 1.5 bathrooms. I understood this to mean one full bathroom and one half bathroom. This was not the case; the unit only has one larger than normal full bathroom. Perhaps there's a difference in American vs. Canadian understanding of 1.5 bathrooms! There's indoor parking FYI for an additional cost, but it's worth it especially in winter. Thanks for being a good host, Amal!
"Superb location.  Enormous room and especially, very comfortable memory foam mattress!"

Absolutely as advertised, we had a wonderful stay at 5 and Amal is very responsive! Incredibly well-located, just two steps from Chinatown and the old harbor, with grocery stores, convenience stores, and Rue Sainte Catherine!
Great stay, great host.
The apartment is so beautiful and the location is excellent. Amal answered all my questions immediately and he helped me a lot.

The apartment was clean. We had coffee, tea and other amenities available. The TV is smart. Well located, within 5 minutes walk of the Champs-de-Mars metro station. It was truly a nice place overall, we really enjoyed our visit. I recommend!
The room was very clean.
Great apartment in downtown Montreal. Close to Saint-Catherine, so convenient for activities.

Very clean! The bed in the main bedroom was super comfortable! There was plenty of space for the five of us. The host was very friendly and reliable. Would definitely stay here again :)

Overall: A+
A visitor
Very nice place and people.
Very nice place, thank you
Amal is a great host, very responsive! The apartment was clean and comfortable, accurate to the description. Good location, near downtown.

Very nice apartment and clean throughout. It is perfect for a family or 4-5 friends at most. The apartment is located in the city center, close to everything and easily accessible by metro or bus. There was a small problem with the Android TV box but nothing serious. I really enjoyed my stay and I would go back if the opportunity arises. Amal is very responsive and can be present if you need help at any time. I had some minor disagreements with Amal at the beginning for a special request, but believe me that if you are reasonable with him, he will be just as reasonable with you. I missed absolutely nothing and he was available to us so we could enjoy a pleasant stay.
Daria and King are a nice and helpful host with great communication skills.
Awesome. Fantastic place. Amazing atmosphere.

We had a great stay at this hostel. The hospitality of our hosts was excellent. When there was a parade on the street, they called us to park our car somewhere else so it wouldn't be towed away. After running back to the hostel, they also gave us some bottled water on our way, which was really nice. 

The metro is within walking distance, so you can reach downtown very quickly.
Nice place to stay
A good place to just sleep

We had a wonderful stay in this lovely house. Welcoming, comfortable, tastefully decorated, clean, it is ideally located near the commercial avenues Mt Royal and Laurier and Lafontaine Park.  Conforming to the listing, the house is very well equipped and perfectly suited for young children (high chair, bikes, strollers, bath toys, garden, board games, books etc.). The garden is a real joy. In short, our children were truly delighted and so were we. 

Caroline and Thierry are warm, available and proactive hosts, a kind welcome awaited us upon our arrival. They sincerely contributed to making our stay very pleasant. Thank you again to this friendly family. We come to Montreal regularly and have now found our address!

This house is amazing!!! It's a beautiful and large space, very clean and organized, exactly as in the photos. The location is right downtown, walking distance to all the restaurants, bakeries, shops and the metro. The backyard patio is ideal for relaxing. 

Caroline and her husband are very welcoming and communicative. They helped us with directions and advice on things to do in the area. Perfect hosts!!!

This was our first experience using Airbnb and we were thoroughly satisfied. Caroline welcomed us with an extremely clean house that accurately matched her description on the website. Questions we had prior to arriving were answered quickly by email. She also gave us nice recommendations for restaurants in the area. The Plateau is a wonderful place to stay when in Montreal as you will never go hungry and will always have something fun to do and in walking distance. I would highly recommend staying at their beautifully renovated house and when we return to the area I will be contacting Caroline once again. You also may find a nice surprise in the refrigerator waiting for you. Thank you again for sharing your house with our family. 
The Brooks'

This is probably one of the nicest houses you'll stay in. It was spotless, and quite large. The house has everything you could possibly need and is located in a great neighborhood. I would stay there again in a heartbeat.

Thank you so much Caroline for the note, muffins & fruit, it was so thoughtful.

Location, location, location.  5+ stars. If you are traveling with children do not hesitate to book this house. It is equipped with everything you might need and forgot to pack. The location is fantastic. You can walk to cafes and restaurants easily. There is also a very nice park a short stroll away. Even though it was very close to all the attractions of Le Plateau, the house was very quiet.

The interior of the house is nicely furnished and exceptionally clean.  The bedrooms are set up such that the smaller children's rooms are directly across the hall from the master bedroom. There is also a screened-in sitting/play area off of the master that provided some extra space. The backyard has a perfect little playset and a romantic lighted table and chairs. We picked up takeout for lunch and had a nice quiet break in the afternoon before heading out again to explore further.  We were able to secure parking on the street either directly in front of the house or at most a couple of spots away.

The hosts provided us with some great tips for shopping and dining. They even secured us a reservation at the fantastic restaurant Le Quartier General around the corner. 

This home is a great base for your stay in Montreal. It really is a perfect spot.

Excellent stay overall. The hosts were very accommodating and communicative. The place was just as good or better than the photos, very clean and comfortable. The location is excellent, close to many restaurants, shops, and transit. Highly recommended!
Caroline was an amazing host. She was incredibly responsive and very accommodating. The house is amazing and in a great location for a weekend in Montreal! Couldn't recommend this place more highly.

We loved staying here and I can't recommend this place enough!

Located in the best area of Montreal, this place is absolutely huge and has everything one requires for a comfortable and peaceful stay. It is on a residential street so it is nice and quiet, but very close to lots of great shopping, restaurants, parks and beautiful buildings. A short 5-10 minute walk to the Metro.  Being just two of us, it was way more space than we needed...but no complaints about that!

It was wonderful to have a place like this to retire to in the evening after long days of walking around the city. Clean and modern, bright and airy, yet very homey. Very comfortable bed in the master suite with lots of natural light all throughout the entire place.  Beautiful modern bathroom with a lovely tub. I wish I had more time so I could have used it, but the shower was fantastic. Also a cute little powder room on the main level was very convenient. The design and aesthetic were consistently beautiful throughout the entire space, which really added to the peaceful serene ambiance. Absolutely beautiful and well equipped kitchen, looking out over a nice outdoor space with yard and deck. 

Although we did not meet Caroline she was extremely helpful and easy to get in touch with. Checking in and out was incredibly easy, there was lots of information left for us, as well as a bottle of wine, which was immensely appreciated when we arrived.

The only complaint I have is that I was not able to stay there longer, we did not want to leave!  I will definitely keep this place on my list for future trips, it really is the perfect place to stay in Montreal!

The house was perfect, just as described! Very clean and welcoming, the owners had left some homemade snacks for us. 

For a family, this property is ideal - 2 children's bedrooms decorated in a very creative way. My 2-year-old daughter was ecstatic, there were no shortage of toys! 

We had a few last minute requests and Caroline and Thierry were very flexible. 

The location is perfect - a haven of peace right in the heart of Plateau. Everything is accessible on foot. 

Truly, an ideal rental, thank you so much!

We rented the house of Caroline and Thierry to organize our photo shoot. 
We couldn't have found better! 
They were more than collaborative, very open to all our requests and particularly welcoming. 

Thank you again to the two of you!
The reservation was cancelled 35 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

This was an excellent experience - we were delighted with the house, the yard, and the location. We found a friendly note to welcome us and a bottle of sparkling wine, too!

The house was just as pictured, very comfortable, with plenty of space, and in an excellent neighborhood for restaurants, shopping, and getting to the metro easily. 

This was our first Airbnb experience and we will definitely do this again!

My group of four friends enjoyed our stay at this beautifully designed home. In the very convenient area of Plateau-Mont Royal, with plenty of shops, restaurants, and the Metro station about 10 minutes walk away. The home is spacious and comfortable. Everything was as presented in the listing and photos; if anything, it was even more impressive in person. The kitchen, as promised, was a great place to cook in.

Caroline was very accessible and welcoming via email before and during our stay, although we did not need to take advantage of her offers to help with reservations or information. Her kind note and complimentary bottle of rose were most appreciated.

We were thrilled with the hospitality we received. Such a wonderful experience began months before our arrival. This residence is in one of the best locations in Montreal if you are looking for a true local feel. Tons of space for a family with very comfortable furnishings, great style, and lots of attention to detail. Close to so many restaurants, shops, and parks. For first-time visitors to Montreal, the advice Thierry and Caroline provided was invaluable. Great home base to relax and explore the city.

This was our second stay at Caroline and Thierry's home in Montreal. It was exactly perfect for our family. The location is very convenient for walking around the neighborhood. There are many cafes and restaurants in close proximity. The house is well equipped should you choose to eat in. The back garden is a nice spot to relax and enjoy a break from the action. Our children loved having a "playground" in the backyard.

We loved our Le Plateau house, the perfect size and location for our family of four. Our two kids (ages 8 and 6) loved having the swing set out back, the bunk bed in one room and the trundle bed in the other, plus the toys and books, even in French! We liked having the piano to play on, too.

The kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms, and laundry room are all well equipped (as befitting a European-style kitchen, the coffee maker is a French press), and the giant windows facing out back from upstairs and downstairs are fantastic. We appreciated having the gas grill to use out on the deck and the private backyard (though our kids were likely a bit noisy for the backyards all next to one another!).

The location could not be better! The house is on a quiet residential side street in the hip neighborhood of Le Plateau--it felt like French Brooklyn. It's a very short walk to the Mont-Royal metro stop and on the way home from the metro it's easy to stop at the supermarket en route back to the house to pick up whatever you need for dinner. There are also tons of low-key options when it comes to eating out, especially with kids. There are two Second Cup locations within blocks from the house--like a French Canadian Starbucks and our go-to coffee break spot. Also, there are two playgrounds nearby, and one is next to a public pool.

Having the metro nearby was excellent as nearly everything we did was no more than four or five stops away. We drove up via New York State and we were a little nervous about city street parking, but in the summer at least it was always easy to find parking on days you had to move the car for street cleaning. (It is definitely easier than in New York City!)

We so appreciate being able to use this family house as our home for a week and would come back again!

They have been so kind, lovely, and nice hosts, thank you again for these months where we felt like home at Airbnb. The condo is just perfect, clean, and new, and it's located right by the bus station (just down the building). We are happy to have been hosted in such good conditions! Thank you, we hope we'll see you again sometime!
Ann's place was great and she was very responsive. Would recommend!
It's in a fantastic location for the Mile End area and was exactly as advertised. We enjoyed our stay
Great space, great location. Located on the second floor, with typical Montreal stairs to access the apartment.

Three renovated apartments with all amenities and conveniences. Very well located, facing the metro and all shops. 
Very bright with two balconies.
Anh was very responsive and made our trip much easier thanks to his precise and quick responses. We will definitely return to Montreal and it will be at Anh's place!
It was a nice location and very easy to get there. Thank you very much.
Clean and very well-located apartment. Communication was easy with the host.

This is a very clean and accommodating space. It's nice to be on the top floor because the wood floors squeak. There was only occasional noise from neighbors, which wasn't really bothersome. The sofa bed in the living room is better than a standard pullout sofa but not as good as a decent futon. It's better for kids than for the heavier body of an adult. The location is at the north end of a great stretch of street with lots of restaurants and bakeries. It's nice to be close to a subway. The kitchen has basic supplies, like cutlery and dishes, salt and pepper. There's a great little grocery store a block south. This place provided us great value for our money.

Great location. 
Clean and thoughtful host/place.
Prepare yourself for Montreal stairs.
Ann's apartment was perfect for a weekend getaway, with ample space to stay as long as you wanted without feeling cramped. It was very clean and bright. A short walk to restaurants and shops.
Great place with everything you need. Easy access to downtown via the metro.

If you're seeking a cozy and inviting home, this is the spot (though you'll need to contend with the fact that this old building features wooden floors).  We'd definitely return to Montreal and stay here again.

A very pleasant stay in Montreal.

Once again, we appreciated Anh's apartment. Everything was perfect as it was the last time.
I recommend it

Good address for my Montreal stay.
Pleasant apartment and very well located; 15 minutes walk from Little Italy and 1 hour from the Old Port.
I took beautiful walks.

Clean and comfortable apartment in a great neighborhood. Great value. Would stay again without hesitation.

Great little spot. The pull-out was confusing at first but Anh was very quick to respond with where the instructions were. There is space for 2-3 cars for free parking on weekends in front, but you have to look between the signs OR there is free parking by the VW dealership a few minutes away. The balcony door locks automatically so be sure not to get locked out. Other than that, great spot. Quite clean. There are two flights of steep stairs to get up, but they're not too bad. Great communication and had everything we needed for our two nights for 4 guests.
We had a nice stay, good location and clean apartment
Lovely stay. Lovely host.
Thank you Monaam!
Thank you very much Mr. Monaam, a polite, pleasant and kind person.
Everything is okay, but I didn't use the kitchen or washing machine. Thank Mona for my late arrival.

Thank you Monaam! It was a very comfortable stay!

This was a great place! I hope to stay here again on my next trip. It was a perfect place to stay in Montreal and very close to the metro, and with free parking for my car which is very important so I don't have to worry about it.

We had a wonderful stay with Noémie and Nicolas, they made us feel at home in their spacious apartment, we shared some pleasant moments with them. The neighborhood is pleasant with small shops nearby as well as the metro just 7 minutes away on foot. You will appreciate Noémie and Nicolas' availability and hospitality.
Great location, sparkling clean and responsive and gracious hosts. The apartment is equipped with everything you might need plus a large assortment of clean fluffy towels. Highly recommend.

We stayed one week in Anna-Isabelle's place. The place has been recently renovated in a very modern and practical style, and all amenities are new and tastefully done. It is a bit noisy as you hear the neighbors and the street, so it's best to sleep in the back bedrooms if you are sensitive to that. The location is great, 5 minutes from the metro station and an "épicerie" (small supermarket) and lots of great restaurants around. A small outdoor market with organic products on Sundays at the metro station. We had a few questions about the place and it was very easy to communicate with the host via (Hidden by Airbnb).

Nicely decorated and newly renovated apartment in the heart of Mile End, within walking distance of Mont Royal Park, trendy shopping district, and Laurier metro station. Very practical with complete kitchenware and comfortable with cozy bed linens. Easy communication with owner. Made our 2-week stay in Montreal wonderful.

We had a lovely time! We booked the space for our team for a business trip and were happy they were able to accommodate us.  The place is as advertised, great location, super comfortable and had a warm touch, responded quickly to messages and were very friendly. Highly recommend for personal as well as business travel.

The apartment is stylish, comfortable, and immaculately clean. The location makes it the perfect launching point for restaurants and shops in Mile End. It was also a quick trip to all other areas of Montreal that we were visiting. We thoroughly enjoyed our experience and would definitely stay here again.
Great experience
Cozy, clean and comfortable; great location, great communication.

A great apartment in Montreal! This is an awesome location with great value for the neighborhood. The apartment is well-equipped and clean/functional. Be aware that the soundproofing isn't amazing, but it's a pretty quiet neighborhood. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
This place was amazing! The location was perfect, and the keypad on the door made things super convenient when our group split up.
Great place! Good location! Don't hesitate to book!

Clean and quiet accommodation. Well-located (close to shops, the metro, and Mount Royal). 

We recommend this address for a stay in Montreal.

Beautiful apartment!

Great location, very clean and easy check-in/check-out!
Location is good. Parking is expensive and it's an apartment hotel.

Great location, thoughtful host, well-equipped kitchen, really good value. Would definitely book again!
Nice location and host!
The apartment is super nice and comfortable, everything is super clean and the host is always very kind.
Meryem was very welcoming and always available to answer any questions. As a first-time Airbnb user, she was a wonderful welcome! The space was clean and the environment was lovely!
My friends and I had a wonderful time, even going out of their way to leave coffee waiting for us upon our arrival.  I would definitely stay there again in the future.
Top accommodation in a great location, Meryem welcomed us very warmly and was always available to help us. Thank you so much, I highly recommend!

Easy to access for those aged 20 or 40. 
Beautiful scenery, climate-controlled. 
Meryem answers our questions promptly.
Meryem's apartment is as described, very clean and spacious. Meryem is extremely responsive, answering our questions quickly and accommodating to arrival, departure, or luggage drop-off times.

Meryem was very accommodating and responsive to our messages. She was very helpful working around our busy schedule to make sure that we could check-in and check-out within our timeframe. We were only in the BnB a short time but it was just what we needed! Thanks Meryem :)
Thank you very much for the apartment. If it is available when I go back to move in, I will re-rent it, for sure!

Really nice apartment.
Everything was clean.
It gets a little noisy due to the street next door.
Stayed for the night and loved it! Very cozy and lovely host. Also very close to public transportation to get to the metro or downtown.
Kind host, comfortable bedding, nice kitchen! Better than the photos.
It really felt like home away from home... Meryem was very prompt in her responses and had a great stay at her place... Would like to stay again if we visit Montreal

Meryem was extremely helpful and kind. On top of quick responses, she drove down impromptu late at night to help us find a parking lot because we didn't know how to read the French parking signs, and patiently explained to us how to read the parking signs despite English not being her primary language. She also always made sure we could find parking every subsequent night. The place is very nice as pictured and definitely good value for money!
Good stay at Meryem's. We didn't meet her but she answered all our questions quickly.

Meryem was incredibly kind and responsive. She is an excellent hostess!

Parking is available right in front of the house, except Monday through Thursday. The host accommodated early check-in and responded promptly. Please bring your own paper towels. It's very close to the Botanical Gardens.
It's an older house, and you get basic amenities with this rental. But considering the price, I think it's okay. It's located on a main street with decent traffic.
We did not like the neighborhood, apartment overlooking a noisy and sinister boulevard.
Excellent stay, Meryem is pleasant and communicates effectively. The apartment is in accordance with the description and is worth its price!
Perfect spot for a stay. Very clean, and a real bed for all travelers ;)
Apartment suitable for families with young children. Warm apartment.

Super location, host very welcoming and always responsive to messages and ready to help. Only downside, quite far from the city center but very close to the Olympic Stadium. Otherwise, we highly recommend it for your future trips to Montreal.
Functional apartment perfect for a family vacation! Unbeatable value for money. Practical for visits by car or walking as buses are less frequent than the metro. Otherwise, everything is top-notch!

Excellent welcome! 
Great location and well situated

We booked Meriem’s place last minute and Meriem was very kind to accept our booking request. And Meriem showed us the place to park even though it was late at night. Thank you Meriem very much for your great hospitality. The place was great and close to everything.
Great place, nice location near bars, restaurants and supermarket!! Meriem is very helpful and quick at communicating!
Well-located, efficient for a short stay.

Warm home, quick responses from the host, has basic kitchen supplies, has toiletries. Basically, it has everything you need to temporarily stay in her apartment. You just need to bring groceries (depends on you if you want to cook or just eat out). There's a grocery store nearby. There was a parking area near the apartment and Meriem said it was because it was the weekends. Enjoy your stay there!
Meriem is very welcoming and available. The location is very convenient and the apartment has what is important for a stay.

This was a lovely Airbnb! Exactly as expected, very clean and with all the amenities you need. Check-in and check-out was very simple and easy, and Meriem was always very quick to respond to any queries. Would definitely stay again!
The place was nice and clean. Parking in front of the house was mostly full, so we had to park in the small lot near the house and move the car in the morning.
Meriem is a welcoming host. The apartment is very close to many cool shops, cafes, and grocery stores. It's a good deal for the price!

Simple, clean, beautiful, beautiful communication with Meriem.

Also well-located!
Very good night in this accommodation, the place is comfortable and pleasant.
Spacious apartment, well-equipped and clean. Very pleasant welcome from Myriem. Excellent stay
The place was great and close to downtown Montreal! Meriem was also very responsive and extremely sweet - would absolutely recommend!
Excellent location, easy to get to, a very cozy and pleasant apartment... I loved it, plus Meriem is very kind and attentive if you need anything.
Great host and perfect size space for what we needed!
The department is spacious, welcoming, and equipped with everything necessary.
Super apartment, very well located and close to everything I highly recommend
Everything was great. Very responsive and willing to help when needed.
Great for groups and families visiting the city. Close to markets and some bars. $10-15 Uber to Downtown. Highly recommended
It was great staying at Meriem's! We had everything we needed and it was close to a great neighborhood of food and restaurants!
Translation: Very nice weekend in this pleasant apartment that allowed us to enjoy it well!

Meriem is an amazing host. My large party ended up having some damage issues because of an unruly guest and she has been so understanding. She is very kind and has an amazing space that is perfect for many guests. The apartment was wonderful and is a great price for the space and location.
easy-going hostesses
I stayed one night at Meriem's place with my friends. The apartment is pleasant and Meriem very available and makes sure everything goes well. I recommend!
Very clean and as advertised. Meriem was very responsive to messages and communication was perfect. Recommended!

Spacious and clean. Located in a quiet neighborhood within walking distance of Mount Royal and public transportation, and within walking distance to St. Laurent bars/restaurants. The check-in and check-out process was smooth.

Theotime was an excellent host! Communication was very easy and he was very accommodating to our slightly late arrival time due to border traffic. The location of the apartment is also prime. It is centrally located between downtown activities and some of my favorite neighborhoods, such as Little Italy and Mile End. I would especially recommend this place to any small group of friends visiting Montreal for both nightlife and beautiful sights.

Chris is a charming and attentive host. His place is very comfortable and homey, and very well located. You can tell that he puts time and effort into making the most out of the living experience in the apartment. Would definitely recommend.

I had a really great stay at Chris's place, the room was clean and comfortable. The location is in a nice area where you can find anything you need within walking distance and have easy and fast access to downtown.  Chris was also very friendly and helpful, I recommend this place without hesitation.
Chris was a wonderful, warm, and friendly host. We enjoyed our short stay in Montreal at his place.
