It's a beautiful place to live in a beautiful city, the hosts were very helpful and supportive, the reply was quick, they guided me on a city tour and breakfast was amazing. I would love to stay there again.

Marie-Jose and Jacques were superb hosts! Marie-Jose responded to all my inquiries very promptly prior to my stay. I loved that they were so flexible and accommodating with the check-in and check-out times as this greatly helped with our travel plans. 

Their place is conveniently located in LaSalle close to the waterfront. The home has a contemporary design yet preserves its historic feel. We didn’t have a chance to enjoy their backyard but it truly looked like an oasis with beautiful flowers and a lush garden. 

The room was spacious and had lots of natural light. It was nice to have the bathroom in the bedroom which truly made it feel like our own private suite. Loved the little touches in the room like the phone chargers. 

The highlight of our stay was hands down Marie-Jose’s breakfast! There were homemade muffins on the table, freshly brewed coffee and a selection of teas, a chia yogurt concoction (amazing!), delicious cheese and apple crepes, and home cultivated honey. My mouth is still watering from the breakfast. 

Marie-Jose and Jacques made us feel right at home and part of the family yet we had our space to come and go as we pleased. I honestly can’t wait to book with them again for our next stay in Montreal. Thank you, thank you, thank you Marie-Jose et Jacques - See you soon!

Discover the Stirling ambiance. In three words: comfort, hospitality and conviviality. Hosts of great generosity in a majestic decor, worthy of the finest homes in Montreal. I LOVED my stay with Marie-José. Go experience it yourself, guaranteed love at first sight!!!

Thank you so much, Marie-José! My dad and I had a wonderful night. The room was so nice and clean. Marie-José welcomed us when we arrived and showed us around the house. I will definitely recommend this place and will be back for sure. Thank you

In Summary: everything was perfect! Really nice, clean and comfortable room with your own bathroom, super nice and friendly hosts and great breakfast. Getting into the city by car within 20 minutes and to the airport within 10-15 minutes.

More facts: You can use the living room if you want to watch TV, the two cats are really sweet, the host has great recommendations for activities in and around Montreal. The room has many lovely details like a phone charger, cookies, a small fridge, and a folder with restaurant recommendations (the ones we tried were all excellent) and tourist information about Montreal.

I can fully recommend it!

Staying here was such a treat! From the fresh-smelling linens, homemade cookies waiting for me in my room, to the thoughtful healthy breakfast which included honey from their garden hives. This Airbnb feels more like staying in a boutique hotel within a gorgeous home. Can't wait to return to Montreal to stay here again.

A beautiful room in an elegant old house, very comfortable and well-equipped with a very nice shower. Very good value for how nice it is. I didn't meet the hosts (only their daughter), but they were friendly and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended for a good location close to the airport.
The best
Very good welcome. Excellent stay. Thank you!

Marie-José was such a gracious host! She offered such a warm welcome and incredible hospitality. She helped me find the nearest train station, made a delicious over-the-top breakfast, and extended such kindness throughout the entire time. The house was absolutely lovely, even more cozy than the pictures! I would highly recommend Marie-José and Jacques' place to anyone staying near Montreal! 11 out of 10!
Fantastic experience, one of my favorite hosts.

This place was very well furnished. The decor was very beautiful. The hosts were amazing people, very warm and friendly. They provided a lot of advice on Montreal foods and attractions. I would totally recommend this place to anyone looking to have an amazing visit in Montreal! If I ever go back, this is the place to be.

We loved staying in this 5-star hotel quality room and ensuite. We were only there for one night but the hosts were very friendly, helpful and flexible. The whole house is stunning and very convenient for the airport. Highly recommended!

Yaw and Anyele were the best hosts. They always responded promptly to messages, and answered all questions. The room is super cute and the little chalkboard with my name on it made it even more special. I really enjoyed my stay and I had the best night's sleep. You can't beat the price if you're looking for somewhere quiet but still close enough to all the action. I highly recommend this Airbnb. Thanks again Yaw and Anyele! :)

Yes! The living room in Yaw and Anyele's house is as beautiful in real life as it is in the photograph. Among other surprises that this amiable couple from Ghana have to offer is a full line of personal care products free of charge! This includes a toothbrush, toothpaste, and mouthwash. The cottage is a little small, but there are 2 bathrooms and the kids are well-behaved. The Pierrefonds location is not ideal, but the place is located only a 5 minute walk away from St. Jean's Boul. and the 470 bus. Yaw and Anyele are a glowing example of West Island hospitality. I strongly recommend their place. Rating: 4 1/2 STARS (OUT OF 5). (Website hidden by Airbnb) Ralph Cohen. Montreal, Quebec.

Nice room, very clean. The hosts are very nice; you can't find nicer hosts than this couple. They have such a friendly atmosphere. I'll be back in 48 hours.

If you like a clean and nice place like me, just choose Yaw & Anyele rental, you will not be disappointed. I really loved this rental that I wanted to extend and extend my stay. 
The house is big, the bathrooms are clean and well-furnished, the living room nice with its big dining table, the rooms are clean and well-furnished. I was finding myself in a 5-star hotel (*). Finish, the neighborhoods are safe and quiet too.

Good value for money!

They were very accommodating with scheduling and incredibly thoughtful. The place was immaculately kept. Some of the nicest people I've ever met.
We enjoyed our stay at Yaw & Anyele’s place. The room was bright and clean. We felt welcomed.
I've been here four times so you guys can figure out why I booked four times because it's just amazing!!!
Great place

I stayed with Yaw and Anyele for one night before a conference I was attending in the West Island. I arrived around 11:30 pm and Anyele welcomed me graciously. The room was well-furnished and quiet, comfortable.
Best Airbnb you can find in Montreal, honestly I would stay there longer, but it was sold out, and I can imagine why. Thanks a lot Yaw and Anyele

The hostess was extremely nice and very helpful, as I had to change my stay twice and they accommodated me anyway. The space was very clean and exceeded my expectations. The value for the place is very good and I would recommend it and hopefully be back again myself. Thank you!
Superb location, clean and well-situated. A warm place with attentive owners. I will definitely go back without hesitation

Three beautiful spacious and quiet places. I recommend it
super place I highly recommend it

Great communication and clean place!

We are as picky as one can be and don't settle for five-star reviews that easily. Coming from Manhattan, we were expecting fantastic service, which is exactly what we got. Perfect location, service, and everything else was excellent in every way. Thanks to everyone. Highly recommend this place
Modern well-located apartment in Old Montreal. Ideal for a family of 6.
Five stars

This place was bigger than expected for a large group, and it was a very easy and hassle-free stay. The view from the apartment was amazing from the balcony, and it was a really nice place to experience Montreal from. The location is great, and we walked everywhere. Would recommend!
Basic amenities were missing, such as shower soap and shampoo.
Mike's place was great -- spacious and warm, in a wonderful location!
Great space, good location!
Patricia and her friend Rebecca were extremely friendly and always responded very quickly. The place was clean and beautiful, and exactly what I was looking for. Would definitely recommend

Patricia's place is just breathtaking. You come in and the natural light just fills the entire space. Everything was just perfect, the place was stylish, clean and had everything one would need for a wonderful stay. I would totally recommend her place to anyone who enjoys beautiful lofts not too far from the downtown area. Thank you so much Patricia!
The host cancelled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Very well-located apartment in a lively neighborhood, well served and close to the Jean Talon market, which is very appreciated. 
The accommodation is welcoming and comfortable, bright and quiet.
Beautiful terrace with a view.
Only downside: the spartan bedding!
Great place to stay
Very clean and trendy place. The loft was very cozy. It was a quick walk to Little Italy, the Jean-Talon metro station, and Jean Talon Market. Would definitely recommend.
Very beautiful condo and very clean near all the restaurants and Jean-Talon market.

What a wonderful location and apartment! It was so great to be here and surrounded by the beautiful high ceilings and furnishings. A super relaxing respite in the city, and very close to other cool spots.

Lovely, comfortable apartment with easy communication and check-in, conveniently close to restaurants and pubs. The bed (a foam mattress on the floor) was surprisingly one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept on (and I am picky about back and neck support). I also liked waking up to the industrial view from the loft bedroom.
Perfect stay. Clean, bright, easily accessible and very well located.
Great place to stay. No complaints whatsoever.

Truly a beautiful and sunny space! Patricia's home was exactly what we were looking for. Check-in and check-out were simple using the lockbox, we were able to book on short notice and they responded right away. 

The upstairs bedroom was significantly warmer than the rest of the loft but overall we had a great stay. We would recommend staying in the spring or summer to take advantage of the private terrace.
Amazing location and a great home. I would recommend it to anyone visiting Montreal.

Nice place, great location literally minutes away from everything you want to see in Montreal. Amal took good care of communication and made me feel right at home - thank you! I would definitely stay again 😊
Amal was a wonderful host. His place was quite large for a downtown apartment. He was also very helpful and quick to answer any of our questions.

Good location, right downtown and surrounded by good restaurants. The sofa was quite uncomfortable with large holes in it, and the building is a bit rundown.  Aside from that, we had a great stay. Amal was wonderful and very helpful, always willing to assist with anything we needed.
I recommend
I wholeheartedly recommend it.
Super responsive, clean, comfortable, and very well located!
Excellent value for money. Precise and clean.
A place I would recommend!

I had a beautiful experience for a first time. 
And being impressed is not an easy thing.
Located in the heart of Montreal, this condo has everything you need, including a vending machine at the reception!
Three cheers! Well-located, adequate equipment, easy to communicate! I recommend
Very nice place
Wonderful place, great location near everything. The apartment has everything you need. Amal was a great host, with quick responses to all of our inquiries.
Decent accommodation near Chinatown for anyone looking to sleep and explore the city
Great host. Quick communication and a wonderful, clean place in an amazing location!
Well-located apartment, decent condition without any issues
Very nice Airbnb, well-located and clean. The host was available and easily reachable.
Great place to stay
Easy access to the apartment and a faithful description of the service received. I recommend it!
Very clean, beautiful responsiveness from the host and very quiet. Comfortable bed.
Excellent place to stay with a very responsive and accommodating host.
A clean and organized space

The place was okay. When we got there, it smelled so strongly of air freshener that we considered leaving because we both had headaches. We ended up having to open the patio door in the middle of winter to air out the place.

There was an out-of-order light over the kitchen table. The main couch almost broke the first time I sat on it and was extremely uncomfortable. The building is a bit run down.

Overall, the stay wasn't terrible but for the price, I could have stayed at a much nicer place.
The place is clean and tidy! The sofa bed is unstable... The place is smaller than I anticipated!

At Amal everything is clear and precise
You sleep with silence and the bedding is good
Very well located and very beautiful
Place is nice. Check-in was super easy and Amal was quick to respond. Would stay there again
The landlord is nice
Very impressed with the cleanliness of the place. Walked in and it immediately smelled clean!
Okay!
Wow excellent
Nice apartment, very nice host, totally recommend!
Clean apartment, well-equipped and well-located. Thank you to Anaïs for her hospitality. We won't hesitate to return if the opportunity arises.

Chrystel is a wonderful host! She was very responsive and got back to us very quickly whenever we had any questions. The apartment was very beautiful, just as advertised. The location was also excellent because it's right next to the Bell Centre! Thank you, Chrystel!
I

Chrystel is by far one of the best hosts I've had on Airbnb. Always there to help and super fast too. The apartment is very modern and perfect for Montreal nightlife. Close to everything, it's a great place for all the tourists. Thanks again, Chrystel!
Amazing place to stay, definitely recommend. Awesome amenities in the building and location is perfect! Room is really clean and the view is breathtaking.
Great location. Nice building.
Excellent place and location close to everything!
A good place near to everything.
I would highly recommend this place to everyone - very clean and warm
Great place to stay

+ It is a great location and Eddy responds very quickly. 
- However, I think there is a cockroach infestation that Eddy will likely need to address, and the room was a bit too cold due to air leakage.
Great location, very helpful host
Eddy was very helpful during our stay and his apartment is in a great location!
Perfect location! You don't need a car for this rental, the metro is right next door! Great restaurants nearby!

Thank you to Mike!

Beautiful apartment, stunning views and would absolutely stay here again!

Large, bright and beautiful space!
Definitely recommend.
Great place!!!
Excellent location with easy access and close to a corner store and cafes!
Awesome!
Really great placement

Amazing location - great space, very clean and well-kept - easy to get to and check-in. We parked on the street with no problem, but paid parking nearby if you don't get lucky. Mike was very responsive and helpful. Only bummer was smoke (pot or tobacco or incense, not sure which) from a neighbor that seemed to seep into the apartment - it wasn't unbearable or constant, but annoying. We briefly opened windows, but it was very cold outside so we couldn't do that for long. I would, however, stay there again!
Great place
Mike's place is in an excellent location, within walking distance of everything you need. The place is slightly smaller than it appears in the photos.

I stayed at this apartment for 13 days. The location was amazing, a 3-minute walk to the metro and within a minute's walk to local coffee shops and convenience stores. The apartment was bright and spacious. Mike was great and responded to any queries promptly and efficiently. As I was there for an extended period of time, I would have liked more cooking utensils, but this is perfect for a short-term stay. Thanks again, Mike!
Great place

Really nice place, good location!! 
5/5
Very nice place and location
A very nice guy, so generous, gentle. And a clean, comfortable, quiet place with all the services... 100% recommended...
The location was good for where I wanted to stay. However, the kitchen and bathroom were very dirty, and Wi-Fi was only available in the living room.
Stayed here for a month and it was great

Very spacious and clean apartment. It is very well located in a quiet area close to many shops. A 10-minute bike ride from the city center. The owner is very friendly, and the neighborhood cats are good company.

Charming and pleasant apartment to live in. It is ideally located in Montreal with or without a car! You can park without too much trouble, or explore the Mile End or Plateau on foot. Alphee's hospitality is truly very friendly. We enjoyed his aromatic herbs from his little garden. With our two children, we felt like home. I highly recommend this accommodation without hesitation.

We cannot say enough good things about Alphee's beautiful apartment. Bright, clean, modern and well located near many great restaurants, markets and parks. The apartment is equipped with fabulous touches such as a huge jetted tub, a high quality music system, an espresso machine, and excellent AC - a rarity in Montreal! The back garden is a lush oasis to relax in and enjoy an al fresco meal. The surrounding neighbors are friendly yet give plenty of privacy.

Alphee was very responsive, nice, and easy to communicate with. She made our entire family, including our children, feel welcomed into her lovely home. We would stay there again without hesitation. Thank you so much for your hospitality, Alphee!

Our stay was wonderful and very welcoming, thanks to this lovely house. It truly felt like a home. Our 2 young girls loved playing with all the toys. Everything in the home was as described and the location was superb! 

Thank you, Alphee!

Alpheus is very available, good communication, his apartment is great, super well-placed and quiet, all shops are nearby, it was the best. We loved it. 

Thank you Alpheus.

My family visits Montreal every year, and I can honestly say that Alphee's home is the best we have stayed in Montreal partly due to the fact that we truly felt at home. I came to find that we share similar interests (such as our love for plants!) and a healthy, balanced lifestyle. Thank you so much for sharing your beautiful space with us. We can only hope to stay in your home again when we visit next year and finally meet you and your sweet daughter!
Great place - great location!

Charlene's apartment was exactly what we were advertised: well organized, easy to use, clean, with all appliances and maps of the area. It is located in the old town, close to restaurants, museums and cinemas. Charlene was easy to communicate with. Perfect place to stay.

Charlene's residence was magnificent: very clean and all amenities were provided. The apartment is well located (close to the metro and old harbor) and in a very charming neighborhood. We would love to stay longer!

Thank you for your promptness! In fact, I rented this apartment on an urgent basis in the morning. Being with my little cat, I had to absolutely arrive before 3 pm. They didn't hesitate to welcome me directly. The cleaning was done perfectly despite the lack of time. I thank them for their professionalism :)

The apartment is really great, close to Lafontaine Park. We feel very good there.
Pleasant apartment in a good location. Olivier is a responsive and attentive host.

Very beautiful apartment, well maintained! The decor is absolutely amazing! Communication has always been A1! Although the metro isn't right next door, we haven't had any trouble with transportation. The only thing that could be improved is the WiFi connection. Not the fastest, which prevented us from having a relaxing Netflix night, but we enjoyed ourselves otherwise :-) We highly recommend it!!!!

I spent three nights in this apartment and liked it very much. 

The location is near a big park, and it took me about 15 minutes to walk to the nearest metro station. A supermarket can be reached by a short 3-minute walk.

Entrance to the apartment is from a street level door, and the apartment is one floor up, reached by a staircase inside the building.

The apartment itself felt a bit like home. The wooden floors are creaky and a little worn in places, but not a problem at all, at least for me. There are also a few minor drops of paint on the floors, but again, not really a problem. The furniture is generally comfortable and the bedroom mattress is relatively firm. I really appreciated the light-blocking curtains and blinds in the bedroom. I was not bothered by traffic noise from the street during my stay, and found the place quiet. What I also really appreciated about this apartment is how clean it was: Absolutely spotless! Also, communication with my host was flawless! Needed a hairdryer and got a reply immediately. And the hairdryer was delivered very soon after. And I got the same fast response and delivery when I couldn't find a can opener.

All in all, I was very glad to stay in this apartment and impressed by my host's swift and positive replies to my requests. 

I would be happy to stay in this apartment again the next time I visit Montreal.

My accommodation was very good and very clean as advertised. The clients I relocated for a filming project were satisfied with the location. As for me, the communication with the host was exemplary and he was very accommodating. Thank you, Antoine!

Available and impeccable accommodation.
Well-located location.
Clean
Pleasant and welcoming hosts. Comfortable bed and firm mattress, good water pressure, well-located. Thank you again for hosting us!

We had a wonderful time in Olivier's apartment. The location is perfect, walking distance to all the great restaurants, cafés, and bars in Le Plateau. Supermarket 5 min walk. The apartment is cute, warm, clean - I would stay there again! I had a few questions before my arrival and during my stay and he replied immediately. Such a great find!!! Thank you.
Olivier's place is very quiet and it is easy to find free parking. The only thing I wish it had was a washer/dryer.

We stayed at Olivier's apartment to celebrate NYE in Montreal for about 5 days and it was perfect for my husband and me. We are from SoCal so we never get the cold temperatures that Montreal has, so it was really nice that Olivier provided the apartment with what it needed to stay cozy. The location was great too, pretty close to Schwartz's which we ate at like three times. Communication was great and Olivier was always quick to respond. Thanks for letting us celebrate 2019 at your Plateau place.

I was stuck at Olivier's place for 15 days: from February 16th to March 1st. This stay was a disaster, getting worse each day. Olivier's apartment is not at all suitable for winter. As soon as the temperatures dropped, there was no heating: 16 degrees inside while it needed -20 outside!!! To summarize my adventures, besides these 15 days spent in the cold (which is already unbearable): A trap on the ceiling was open to the exterior, the curtains in the bedroom fell down, the shower leaked, and the TV didn't work... In short, a stay of the most catastrophic kind. I had asked to leave sooner, but Olivier did not want to, despite the circumstances, reimburse me. A very bad experience, I do not recommend him!
Great location and fully equipped! Perfectly clean! Overall great stay!

This is a beautiful large residence with 3 bedrooms featuring comfortable beds, good appliances, and Nacima is concerned about making our stay pleasant. During our visit, we found it somewhat difficult to cook with the limited number of accessories available, which could easily be remedied.
The apartment matched the description. I would go back there.

Carlos and Lucien are excellent hosts, kind and respectful who went above and beyond to ensure we had a pleasant stay. My wife and I came to live in Montreal and they were very helpful for us. The apartment is clean, spacious, and well-lit. The same goes for the room, where we felt very comfortable considering it was a 16-night stay. The common areas are beautiful and comfortable. The accommodation is located near a metro station, and other tourist attractions such as the botanical garden, Olympic park, and Montreal Tower. Highly recommended.

Staying in Carlo's apartment was an unforgettable experience. It is beautiful, very comfortable, and conveniently located. We loved everything about it. Carlo is amazing host, welcoming and very helpful. So, this is a great place. Economical and excellent for the savvy traveler. The internet was very fast and the overview from the terrace was great. Thank you!!

A very clean and beautiful place with exceptional views! However, I thought it was a whole apartment, the title misled me a little.  

The only other point is that I found it a bit complicated to get there for the first time! 

Despite all of this, I believe it's a good quality place and very clean! A great place!

"My friend and I spent one week at Carlos's apartment. It exceeded our expectations. The hospitality of Carlos and his partner was wonderful. The apartment was super clean, spacious with amazing views, especially during sunrise or sunset. I was looking for a 5-star hotel to relax for at least two nights. But I was blessed to spend a week relaxing in this 5-star luxurious apartment for a lower price."

Thank you, Carlos and Lucien.

Thank you for everything :)

Everything was perfect: the warmth of the hospitality, the friendliness, the room, and the cleanliness. 
I highly recommend this rental!
Great place, beautiful, feel very welcome
Great guy who's very helpful!

I wish I had spent a little more money and gone to a motel because this was an absolute nightmare of a house. There was dirt literally everywhere and it looked like the common areas, bathroom, and room hadn't been swept in ages. The bathroom had grime and hair on the sink, floor, and in the bathtub. The room was supposed to be two queen beds but instead was one twin and one queen and was super cramped and uncomfortable. The room was also supposed to have a "view" according to the listing but all we saw were the neighbors' backyard as well as a huge pile of random trash. The soap dispenser in the bathroom had soap so diluted with water that we ended up using hand sanitizer to clean our hands. The listing also said it was close to downtown but it ended up being a 45-1 hour trip to downtown one way (bus and then train), and it was super inaccessible. Overall I’m really disappointed because the listing looked lovely and instead it ended up being super gross and really uncomfortable for all of us. Additionally there were a ton of people there and the lock on the door for our room was super broken down and could easily have been opened. I’m also pretty sure that mold/dust in the house is the reason my friend got sick the first night we were there. 

I have stayed in cheaper places that have been nicer than this and it was so awful to have this trip ruined for us. Our friend group was meeting for the first time in over 8 months and it was such a let down as the host seemed really nice and down to earth. We definitely learned our lesson to do more research and to plan further in advance to book a better place for New Years in the future.
It was really nice staying with Bee. The location is perfect and the room is very sweet.
Staying at Bee's was great and she is a lovely host!

The location was exceptional! 

We bought a three-day metro pass and didn't need it once we arrived at her place because everything we wanted was within walking distance, from museums to parks to restaurants to shopping. The bed was comfortable, the room was cozy, and there were pastries in the room when we arrived.

Bee's place was purely amazing! It was well-located and exactly as it was shown in the pictures. Bee is really welcoming, and her place is beautiful! I highly recommend it! 

We will definitely book it again when we return to Montreal soon!

Bee is a very friendly host and had some great recommendations for coffee/eateries/bars. The bed is king size and very comfortable. Her place is in a very central location close to cool neighborhoods and walking distance to downtown. And her price is very reasonable! When I go back to Montreal, I'll definitely try to stay at her place again. Thanks for a lovely stay!
Spacious beautiful room with everything you need.
Bee has a great eye for decor and design, and a great location. She is responsive and flexible; I had bad winter weather flight delays, and it was no problem to arrange my check-in. Thanks, Bee!
Very cute place, great value

Bee's place is in a great location.
The area is lovely.
Bee is kind and available if needed.
Lovely space. Bee was a gracious host and the room was exactly as pictured
Really loved Alex's penthouse!! Everything was just great..
Unique in every way, it has nothing negative to say; it's very beautiful. I loved it
Great location and a fantastic space. Stylish and super clean with ultra convenient parking. Highly recommended!
LOVED IT!!!!
great place
Great place in a perfect location in Montreal, good walking distance to most destinations. Great place to stay with nice balconies!

Alex's place is right in the heart of Montreal city, with endless things to do nearby and easy transportation via metro, although most things are within walking distance. There is an IGA right around the corner which was convenient for grocery shopping and beer. The place was very clean, a comfy bed with balconies on both rooms. Alex's place also had a Wii-U which was fun to play in the morning when it was raining out. Alex was also a great host who answered any of our questions right away and gave us great local tips. We had a great time, thank you Alex.
Super AirB&B! I highly recommend it!

Very nice apartment located in the city center. Very clean, quiet and spacious. Parking access is a bit narrow for a SUV but very convenient given the location! Alex is available and responds very quickly!
The host cancelled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

This place is an excellent value with easy access to the entire city.  

The three bedrooms are top-notch, ensuring everyone gets a fair share of space. The Roku streaming service is a welcome addition. 

Located in a middle ground between Olympic Village and downtown.

We had a nice stay at Melanie's Airbnb. The place was clean and well decorated. The electronic keypad for the door is very convenient as you can check in and out whenever you please. The place is fully equipped with everything you need if you want to cook or do laundry. My only complaint is that it takes roughly an hour to walk to downtown, or it will take 40 minutes by public transport. It's roughly a 12-minute drive by taxi or Uber to Old Port. We ended up taking an Uber every day. I wouldn't say the Airbnb is in the "heart" of Montreal. It's also a $45 cab ride to the airport. All that to say, for three bedrooms, it's a great deal.

Marco and Melanie were fantastic! They communicated quickly throughout the entire process and the place was amazing! I would definitely recommend them. It's less than a 10-minute Uber ride to downtown and has three bedrooms!

We had a great stay at Marco & Melanie’s place. The space was clean, nicely decorated, well stocked, and it fit 6 people very comfortably. Getting to downtown Montreal was very accessible from this location (10 min uber, 40 min metro). We also enjoyed exploring the neighborhood of Hochelaga and there were some fun spots in walking distance. Melanie was quick to respond with any questions we had. Thank you again :)
Perfect place to stay, recommended
We were only in town for a short time, but the apartment was fantastic, clean, and comfortable for the night. The beds were also very comfortable, and our hosts were excellent communicators.
Clean apartment, especially very comfortable (3 bedrooms) located right near the city center!
Great
It was difficult to get there, I finally decided to cancel the reservation, the weather is inclement, very cold and the host is not friendly to allow us entry into the apartment

Close proximity to everything. Easy check-in. The apartment is clean and of good size - 3 bedrooms but no living room. I appreciated that they provided coffee, milk/cream, and soap, shampoo, and revitalizer. If you are sensitive to cigarette odor, this apartment is not for you.
Awesome place

The place was a 10-minute drive from downtown Montreal. Finding the place and checking in was easy. Melanie was very quick to respond to all of our messages. The beds were quite comfortable, too. Thank you, Melanie, for hosting us!
A good value for travelers visiting Montreal. The neighborhood seems nice.
Lei is a good host and responds very quickly

Decent place within a 8-minute walk of Monk Station. Good value for money. Just be aware of the tenants living in the other rooms. They have their own rules and can be quite rude unexpectedly. Other than that, everything else is good!
very good room and location
The room is small but well-organized, clean, and has everything necessary for a stay available. The kitchen and laundry are well-equipped. Good location, close and easy to reach the metro station.

A very cozy & comfortable stay. The place is even nicer than the pictures show. It's quite spacious and the host is very accommodating. The only thing to mention is that the walls are pretty thin so voices and noises travel easily. Other than that, it was a fantastic time. I would definitely recommend!

Thank you, Philippe, for your warm welcome. We were very comfortable in your spacious apartment. We would have stayed for several more days!!! The street is quiet, we slept well. The neighborhood is interesting, all the services are nearby!
Everything was perfect. The house was so close to downtown, and the neighborhood was pretty enough for us. You can find everything you need. We are so grateful. I strongly recommend this house!
Excellent stay in a charming apartment, well-located (with easy parking), well-furnished and equipped, very comfortable and clean. Philippe is a courteous and professional host. We loved it!
Great place to stay with lots of space
The host cancelled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great location and spaciousness in Old Montreal. The host was responsive and check-in was a breeze.  Will definitely stay here again next time I'm in Montreal.
Fantastic location, great property, great service
Beautiful place and perfect location! Would definitely stay again
Amazing place, amazing location. Will definitely stay here again. Kevin was a great host.

Pros: amazing location, super comfortable beds, very clean, thoughtful Nespresso machine and all the kitchen supplies you need, great space to hang out in, easy check-in, friendly staff. Perfect location in Old Montreal with tons of great places to eat and hang out nearby. 

Cons: We booked room 402 but were checked into 304, ultimately it was fine but we had specifically planned some events/gatherings based on the room that was pictured (i.e., a big table for a nice dinner, lots of couches and chairs for movie night), so we had to adjust a bit. 

There was also a door in one of the bedrooms that led right into a hallway where people were often loud when checking out early in the morning or kids playing in the hall. The windows downstairs were also drafty, which isn't ideal for a Montreal winter. 

All manageable, but just little things we had to work around.
Correct for the price
Fair price, would recommend.
Nice room
Wonderful value for money, highly recommended, don't have to think twice.
Student-style room, a bit outdated.
Super host! Very patient! He waited for us
Great place and wonderful host. We would love to stay at your lovely place again. Thank you for being such a great host.
Petit but cozy
Clean place, great value
Wonderful host and space!
A really good place to stay! Nice location for getting anywhere by bus or metro. The host is easy to communicate with. I recommend it
Super clean, great value
Great stay for the night! Great for people on a budget!
Apartment is very spacious and comfortable
Clean and well-located, would recommend.
Good value for the price. Perfect for a layover. Easy check-in and check-out.

I haven't met Alain-Pierre but I had a fantastic stay in his small apartment. He was very kind and responsive to my questions, the little attentions in the apartment were greatly appreciated! The apartment was clean, easy to access, I didn't have any difficulty parking on the street. Super value for money! 
I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this host!
Translation: Very good stay in the apartment.
Apartment quiet and consistent with the description. Host available and very kind. Thank you!
Quiet studio far from downtown with basic amenities
Profitability
Housing and hospitality were very pleasant. We had an excellent stay!
Everything was perfect!!

Gabe's place is the best value I have found yet! It's large, beautiful and not too far from the hustle and bustle but still comfortably secluded. Everything was in tip top shape, he was kind and courteous and made sure the place was perfectly serviced in quick fashion!
We had a comfortable stay at Gabriel's place.  Although the place is older, everything else was great! It was quite spacious and had all the necessary amenities to make us feel right at home.
Older house style with modern conveniences. Awesome stay and very comfortable beds. Every kid was quite happy with their own space.

Being a large family of six people, we just found a wonderful place: Gabriel's!

The children would have loved to spend more time there, and so would we! All the amenities were there: a well-equipped kitchen, comfortable beds, and a living room adequately furnished for our family. 

Very attentive and responsive, our host was exemplary. The instructions for our arrival and use of services were very precise and clear. Thank you for everything!
A great place to stay at a great price with all the amenities included. I would recommend this house for a short stay in Montreal. Gabriel was an amazing host and helped us with every problem we had.

Gabe was super helpful and quick to respond when we had trouble getting into the location, and we really appreciated that. Heads up - the upstairs neighbors have very young children, so there was a bit of noise early in the morning. Our stay was fantastic, and everything was clean. The space was beautiful, well-decorated, and had everything we needed. Thank you, Gabe!
Great location, excellent value. Very clean and spacious, would definitely recommend and look to re-book again when I visit Montreal.
The reception and the stay were more than perfect!
Beautiful place, all new appliances were a huge plus. Upstairs neighbors were very loud in the evening. This old building does not dampen sound at all.

Our hosts were geniuses and very attentive! The welcome was superb and the apartment too. Thank you again for this beautiful stay! 

Vincent
Comfy and clean place to stay.

My family and I stayed here for 4 nights. The place was perfectly sized, clean, with fresh linens and enough towels. My kids loved it and I am still thinking about how comfortable the "cloud-like" king-sized bed was. The distance to the city was just right. Once we got our bearings and didn't need Uber anymore, navigation back was easy. 10/10 would stay here again.

You can stay with Gabriel with complete confidence. He is a responsive and pleasant host who responds quickly and tries to find solutions. The entrance to the place is perfect, and the accommodation is very warm and very clean. Highly recommended!
A very warm and dignified accommodation worthy of a 5-star hotel, thanks to its cleanliness, accessibility of amenities, and design.

Modern, clean and stylish place with great hosts. Michele and Klara are like sunshine in the winter of Montreal. I totally enjoyed my stay at their place and hope to return when I visit Montreal next time.

Excellent. The description indicates they will be welcoming hosts, and the photos show a beautiful, clean space. Warm and charming, it's located right next to the metro and university, which was exactly what I needed.  I would definitely recommend and return. Thank you!
Michele is very welcoming, I had a very good time "as if I was at home".
The place was very clean and neat. I've never stayed at an Airbnb that clean. Check-in and check-out were very easy. Great experience.
It's the best place for vacations for friends and family

Highly recommend. The home is very clean and well depicted in the Airbnb posting. It is in a quiet neighborhood with lots of parking. The hosts were very quick to respond to any request we had. The nearby Park-nature Du Bois-de-l'ile-Bizard was a great spot for a hike.
At Maria's place is a beautiful, clean house. She and her husband made sure I had everything I needed.

A beautiful house...very clean with all the amenities. Everything has been thoughtfully considered. Maria is an amazing host who continuously checked in on our comfort throughout our stay. A wonderful place to stay any time of year

Kyle's place was amazing. My friends and I had a great time in downtown Montreal. The condo was surrounded by wonderful bars and restaurants. The location is perfect and the view is spectacular. I definitely recommend Kyle's place!

Nice apartment in downtown. A lot to do in the area! The host was very helpful with any doubts we had and his place has an unbeatable location, it's near the metro, bus and fun places! I really recommend this place if you visit Montreal, you will get everything you need to enjoy your stay!
This will be my home in Montreal. Outstanding experience. I highly recommend this place. Great location and the host were super friendly and accommodating
Great host, great location, and comfortable apartment.

Nice location. Nice rooms. The host was efficient to communicate with. We used the two bedrooms and my older daughter slept on the living room hide-a-bed which is better suited for sitting than sleeping on it. If you want more places to sleep, I suggest bringing an air mattress.

The check-in process was less than ideal. I was told to go to someone's apartment (not the host) to pick up the keys. When we arrived at the Airbnb location, we had a very difficult time finding parking despite the host telling us that there is plenty of free parking available. The building itself was under heavy construction (wires hanging down from the ceiling in the lobby, clutter in the hallways, etc...). The unit's floors were dirty including in the bathroom, the bedsheets were stained, we found hair in bedding, the heat was very high with no way to control the temperature, and one of the kitchen cabinet doors came off entirely when opened. The mattresses could barely even be called mattresses as they were extremely uncomfortable with minimal support. The pillows were as flat as possible (either very poor quality or extremely old). Needless to say, we did not enjoy our stay despite the host's "Superhost" status. We will not stay with this host again.
Being in this apartment was an incredible experience, it has everything you need, don't hesitate to book here, it is a very safe and comfortable place, the host is very kind, I recommend it
Nice room, best location in Montreal!

Loise is a good host and very helpful.
The room was perfect and clean. 
The kitchen and bathroom were as described. 
I can't really complain. 
It's a nice place to stay in, close to everything you need.

An unbeatable location right in the heart of Montreal, literally it's just for sleeping, there isn't much interior space, Louis was incredible and waited for us to receive us on the first day, I'll definitely return
Ideal location, responsive host, but the cleanliness and the accommodation itself are not recommended.
Great place in downtown Montreal. Loise is very responsive, it was easy to plan check-in and check-out. The place is clean and the location is super convenient. Thanks!
The place matched the description, communication was excellent. The location is fantastic. I will definitely rent here again!
Very good, quite clean and convenient!

The location of the place is excellent, close to the metro, bank, groceries, park, river, and nature. If you just stop by or spend longer time here, you never regret it! You're going to enjoy it! Francesca was precise, very kind, gentle, and extremely helpful! I recommend this place to everyone who just stops by or spends more days in Montreal.

Everything was fine with this place. The roommates were friendly. The place was very convenient. The room was nice. Sun-facing. Good to wake up with the sunshine. It had a balcony attached, which was nice but due to snow, I was unable to enjoy it much. The room was clean but a bit small; I really liked the size of it. Compact and nice. Overall, it was nice.
We spent a lot of time at Layla's place; her apartment was lovely and cozy, and very close to Saint-Viateur bagel factory. We really enjoyed having breakfast there the next morning.
Adorable, quirky little apartment. Great location. Layal was very quick to respond to any needs and accommodated us when we wanted to stay an extra day. Thank you Layal!
A lovely cozy home. The host is amazing with details and communication.

Layal's place was so lovely. It's a cozy and welcoming space in an ideal location, being that it's just across the street from some of the best bagels I've ever tasted. Layal is so kind and accommodating, offering ample suggestions and providing all the necessities for a comfortable and relaxing stay.
Great place
Great location! I would go back anytime!
We had a great time. The space was great for 4 people and was very close to the Bell Centre and Old Montreal - lots to see and do!
We loved our stay at Moss's place. Great location. Simple access. The bedrooms were bigger than I expected and the place was well decorated.

The photos did not match the place we stayed, and when I asked about it the response was that that didn't make sense; the photos should have matched and that he would get to the bottom of it and get back to me, but never did.

Thanks Moss and Yan for a clean and comfortable stay at your Airbnb. Your stylish home is sure to be the desired reservation for many other young adults in the future. Some things to note could be the somewhat unstable toilet and shower door that does not close fully. Please also note that despite the wonderfully new TV, there was no audio output. Overall, a great stay and would be happy to return. The location is also very convenient and close to a bank, grocery store, and parking lot. Great small home for groups of 4, clean and modern, and reasonably priced.

Our one-week stay was very good in the shared accommodation. The hosts are responsive and accommodating. The apartment is very sociable and well-equipped. The location is ideal for visiting the city. 

I highly recommend it without hesitation! :)

Ultra well-placed colocation, yet well-organized. The accommodation is top-notch in terms of the shared living space. The apartment is very functional, with a bright and spacious bedroom. I had a key set and was completely free to make trips back and forth. On the last day, I even managed to leave my luggage later than planned. Highly recommended!

Ayca was a gracious and generous host, she offers airport pickup for a small fee which was most convenient. 

The room is spacious with a large queen-sized bed, plenty of closet space, and lovely lighting.

You have your own bathroom (!) and overall the house meets the description very well.

She is an amazing woman, their daughter is lovely, they have a calm and cute (non-shedding) white dog. The house is kept very clean and Ayca even offered me breakfast on both days.

Overall, it was a wonderful experience. Almost more like traveling to a good friend's home with warm hospitality and kindness. We became great friends and will be sure to keep in touch. 

As a single woman I was very pleased with the safety of the neighborhood; not to mention the West Island area is beautiful and there is a bus connection to downtown as well. 

Highly recommend!
The host cancelled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great place!
Pleasant location close to everything, quite cozy.
Good host

Reservation made at the last minute. Erzen was very responsive in answering us and very understanding. His reception was perfect! 

The apartment was very clean. We recommend it!

Thank you!
Parfait as a place
A very nice apartment. Exactly as described. The options for shows to watch on the TV were excellent!
I recommend
Bien

The location was not good. The hallways had a strong smell of urine throughout, and the entire building felt sketchy. I called the host 15 times before she finally messaged me on Airbnb. There were strange people walking the streets at night. Other than that, it was loud in the morning from people in the building, but quiet at night. Someone tried to get into the apartment using a code at 10 am, which made me feel unsafe.
Parfait for working retirees
It was in a good location and clean.

A warm, intimate place with all the necessary comfort and perfect cleanliness. 

Ideally located and the bonus: Robert is extremely attentive and very accommodating. 

I highly recommend without any hesitation.
Thanks Robert, great stay!

I highly recommend this for your first experience, I absolutely adored it! They put us at ease and they respond very quickly. The accommodation is clean, there's nothing to complain about. The location is quiet. 
They take excellent care of their travelers upon arrival during the stay until the end, I found this adorable.  The people are very serious and super kind, I recommend it 100%.  There's a beautiful view from the balcony, I absolutely adored it.
Thank you so much for everything!
Very great place and host
I highly recommend this place to everyone. It's a very beautiful apartment in a great location. I loved every moment there. I will definitely be back.
Great stay. 10 out of 10!

Nice clean place in a good location for downtown Montreal. Very relaxing place and nicely decorated. Underground parking is very narrow if you plan on driving/renting a spot. Shower head makes showering difficult but I mostly enjoyed and used the soaker tub which was very nice. Hot tub is great as well. BTW - no microwave if that matters!
Comfortable apartment in a very good location for activities in the city center!

This place is even more spectacular in person. The host is prompt with his responses. He's a fingertip away and always pleasant to communicate with. Great location and very comfortable living space.  Had a latte before departing which was a great touch to the already amazing place . Amazing service all together. I will definitely book again!
Thank you, Phil, for your availability; it was a fantastic stay, perfectly located in the city center. Everything was perfect.
Beautiful apartment in a great location within the city. Very zen! Phil was very accommodating and responded to questions promptly.
I had a great time staying here, beautiful place in a good location and Phil was a great host answering all my questions, for sure coming back to stay here:)
Exceptional location, tranquility and cleanliness. I highly recommend it!

Phil's space was very nice. Clean, comfortable, with thoughtful touches, etc. If you are planning on booking a parking spot, be prepared for difficulty getting to your spot. Make sure you don't drive a truck! Very tight parking; it required a three-point turn at every corner. It was also one way, so cars were coming in and out. Other than that, the stay was good and would stay again. Great location, with many different things to do around the area.

"It's absolutely worth it! The place was beautiful, clean, and very convenient. Loved all the small touches - you'll see what I mean when you book the place. We live in Montreal and wanted a little getaway for the weekend, and that's exactly what we got."
Phil was amazing. I didn't need anything; everything was there. The apartment is beautiful, and the views are great too. I definitely will be coming back.
Superb accommodation!

Second time staying at one of Phil's apartments, loved every single minute of it. His response time was 10 minutes or less. The location was perfect, the view and all the natural sunlight were wonderful & the aesthetic of the apartment was nothing short of beautiful. I can safely say that I will always try to book one of Phil's places before any others when staying in Montreal from now on. 
10/10
Very zen and on-trend location. Easy communication, clear instructions. Good value for money.
Very clean and chic!
Great place will be back!
Great spot! Can't go wrong!
Very well located and beautiful condo!

This apartment was absolutely amazing and in a great location. It was beautiful. The soaking tub was perfect. And the floor-to-ceiling windows were wonderful to overlook the city on a nice snowy day. We woke up every morning and made coffee using their espresso machine. After a long walk, we would sit in the soaking tub with a glass of wine. And they had very comfortable linen robes available. I would 100% stay here and recommend this apartment to everyone.

This is a very lovely and calming space. We really enjoyed the amazing deep soaking tub and a beautiful view of St-Patrick's Church from the kitchen window. The location of the loft is perfect for touring and dining. The kitchen is not fully equipped for cooking, but there’s so much to explore just walking distance from the loft. My partner and I had a great stay :)
We greatly enjoyed our stay in Montreal. The apartment is centrally located and easy to get around the city. The apartment was as described: modern and clean.
A charming apartment
This place is dope!

Absolutely stunning place, even more beautiful in person! Phil was an excellent host, very hands-on with great communication! The location is great, I would highly recommend his place and I would definitely come back!
Fantastic apartment. So homey, beautifully decorated and cozy! Communal hot tub on the 3rd floor! Would definitely stay here again!

The place was not only beautiful and in a great central location, it was also spotless! The owners answered all my questions very quickly and with great detail; they seemed to be available for their customers at all times of the day. In the living room, there was a booklet with information regarding restaurants, places to visit and attractions nearby. The jacuzzi was one of the best amenities of the building: it was a great relaxing and quiet spot. I have nothing to add or to suggest, as the Oasis was truly the perfect romantic cozy getaway. Thank you so much!!!!
An amazing host! Extremely fast response time. Very helpful and pleasant to deal with. Highly recommend staying here!
I highly recommend it! Easy communication with the host and very well-located.
We are thrilled. The place was beautiful. Excellent location and friendly, professional service.

Great, very quiet and clean place. 
It has all the equipment you need!

I stayed at Wilner's apartment for 2 weeks in January. The weather was very cold outside, but the heater worked very well. I felt nice and warm. The room and the bed were comfortable. I liked the privacy. I like the place; also the washer and dryer are great for washing clothes. Wilner and his wife are very hospitable.
The host cancelled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Landed in Montreal at -20 C, it was really comfortable to arrive at such cozy, warm and clean apartment. In addition the roommates have been really nice since the beginning and Max is always available for anything you could need. It is located in a cool part of the city and well connected by bus with the city center.
This place is very well located, right next to the metro. The host was great at responding to emails. Good value for its lowest price listing in Montreal.

Amazing host and very comfortable place. Only complaint is about the building maintenance: the ramp to the parking lot does not seem to be heated, which makes it difficult to get through on snowy days.
Good location and good apartment/condo building is dirty and dark and you hear the people above you all day and night

Clean apartment, spacious and very well located. Close to the metro and highway. A super hotel that is attentive and very involved! I highly recommend this apartment! In fact, I have already booked for other periods and will stay with this owner as needed.

We had an amazing time at Claire's place. It is a very beautiful and well-situated in the city. A very clean and spacious home. We also appreciated the link for things to do in the city that Claire provided. Responses to questions were quick at all times, great service. We had an amazing time and will be back again in the future!
This is really an ideal apartment for travel
Superb place

This place is wonderful! We had everything we needed and the host answered all our questions. The checkin process was very simple. I asked the host for restaurant recommendations and he gave me a bunch in the area. Everything we needed was in walking distance. St Catherine Street is only a block away and it is full of bars, restaurants, shops and so much more! Having such a big place in downtown is rare. It was perfect for our large group. The host is very accommodating with check-in and check-out. The place is super clean and beautiful. I would definitely stay here again! If you are reading this review, I would definitely recommend that you book this place!!
Great location and thoughtful host :)
Great location. Great host. Perfect place to stay if you're going to MTL for a night out and just need a relaxing place to end your night!
The place is well-situated and Heather was a fantastic host. I would recommend this place to anyone!
Great loft! Beautifully styled, pictures are very accurate. Location is perfect. Nathalie and staff were very accommodating and wonderful hosts.

This place was amazing, as advertised. The pictures don't do this place justice, when you walk in you're immediately blown away by the old yet modern feel. Nathalie and her team capped the experience with some bottles of wine and nice fruit pairings. Will stay in this place every time I come to Montreal for the Formula 1 race.
It was great

The department is very nice, just like the photos. It's ideal for a large family, the kitchen is super equipped (besides having two), it's very comfortable to have two washers and dryers, Nathalie was an incredible host who takes care of every detail and was very understanding with our arrival and departure time.

Melanie and her roommate, Alex, were friendly, thoughtful, and kind hosts. Just wonderful. Both took time to help orient us to the apartment, neighborhood, and city, and were available in case we had any additional questions. They were also generous and flexible with our schedules and graciously shared the apartment's amenities such as the washer/dryer and dishwasher. We can't thank Melanie & Alex enough for the experience of having our own, quiet and homey, pied-à-terre while visiting Montréal. We felt like welcome guests rather than clients.

Melanie's apartment is charming and has an excellent view of the city and the Plateau from the relaxing rooftop garden, which is a delicious bit of private luxury before or after a day out in the city. It's close to streets that conveniently connect to nearby East & West neighborhoods via rue Mont-Royale and rue Sherbrooke. (A Bixi bike station off Mont-Royale is likewise convenient.) Yet it's in a small neighborhood that also has restaurants, grocers, shopping and nightlife in it's own right, and is conveniently near green areas, such as Parc La Fontaine, Place Laurier, the Olympic Park, and the parks on Île St. Hélèn via la Pont Jacques Cartier, which one can walk or bike across. (The view of the St. Lawrence & the city from this bridge is worth it alone.)

In short, Melanie's apartment is wonderful and in a perfect location to experience the best of Montréal. 

I hope you also get to experience the good life from this perspective! 

Thank you again, Melanie and Alex! Wishing you both the best!

Sarah Katherine & Marte

Melanie was very welcoming throughout the trip and told us about some of her favorite places to go. She let us drop off our bags and explore the city while she got the place ready for us. The description of the place is very accurate and the entire place feels homey.  The neighborhood is peaceful and there are a ton of restaurants, shops, bars, and places to buy alcohol. The metro subway station is also very close by. The private roof terrace is absolutely amazing and I can definitely say that we spent most of our time outside on it. I miss this place already!

The condo is one of the nicest places we could imagine staying for a weekend. It is spacious, beautifully furnished and has a magnificent terrace for breakfast or a drink in the late afternoon. The location is very convenient with many bakeries, grocery stores, bus stations, etc., close by. 

Although we inquired on very short notice, Melanie was open to host us. She is a very kind, easy-going person who gave us many good tips on where to go out for brunch, etc. Melanie's roommate is also a very nice person but we only saw her briefly once.
Melanie was great. The listing was accurate and the place was very nice. On a hot summer night, the room can get quite hot, so be advised and stay close to the fan!
The place is beautiful and located in a great part of town. The bed was comfortable, the apartment was clean and welcoming. I would definitely recommend it to everyone!

Very positive experience! 
We greatly enjoyed being close to all amenities and having access to the beautiful terrace. 
The apartment was clean and Melanie very welcoming.
Great place to stay! The location is amazing and Melanie's apartment is really cool! The rooftop terrace was our favorite part :)

We were late getting into Montreal but Melanie was very accommodating. She answered all of our questions promptly. Her apartment was clean and exactly as listed. Melanie even surprised us with some baked treats. Overall, we had a great experience and Melanie was a great host.
The host cancelled this reservation 40 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

If I return to Montreal with another couple, Melanie's place would be perfect! Her apartment is a big 2 bedroom place with a dynamite rooftop patio. Who would say no to coffee and the sunrise on top of a building? It is close to a busy street with restaurants, bars, shops, and the subway and the bed was veeery comfortable. Thank you, Melanie!

We had a really fantastic stay at Melanie's apartment. The apartment is big and comfortable. There is everything you may need in the kitchen (and even more!) and this rooftop terrace (with a view of Mont Royal Park and Downtown Montreal) is just exclusive. After a 20km walk during the day, you'll loooove having a Belle Gueule beer on the terrace :-p

Concerning the neighborhood, Le Plateau is a trendy and hipster place, calm and typical with many restaurants, but be careful it may be a bit far from Downtown (the metro Mont Royal is a 5-minute walk from Melanie's apt).

Moreover, we actually reserved the room at the very last minute and arrived very late, but Melanie was very accessible on the Airbnb app and we didn't have any difficulties getting the keys. Take it easy and enjoy your stay at Melanie's apt!
Melanie was a wonderful host. She provided us with everything we needed and ensured our stay was comfortable.
Melanie was very easy to communicate with. The apartment was spacious, comfortable, and located in a trendy spot. Street parking was easy to find, which was a bonus! We really enjoyed Montreal.
The apartment was clean and spacious with an open floor plan. There was plenty of room and natural light. Melanie was very accommodating and kind. Thank you again!
Cozy and comfortable apartment. The rooftop terrace is super nice!

Great area of Montreal with lots to see and do, easy transportation, the three-day metro/bus pass is a must for short stays. 

Melanie was responsive to our questions. The condo isn't air conditioned but is nice and airy and we had a comfortable stay through four of the hottest days of summer so far.

Melanie's apartment is located in a great section of the Plateau and easily walkable to a lot of shopping, stores, restaurants, and the metro. The roof deck is phenomenal, and in my opinion, is what sets this listing apart. You will certainly want to spend your evenings out there, and if you like to cook, plan to have some dinners up there too! We also didn't have any issue finding parking around the corner, which was a plus. Two recommendations - Le Pegase is around the corner and is BYOB, and Les Co'Pains d'Abord has phenomenal croissants in the morning for breakfast.

One caveat, as others mentioned, is that the apartment is not air conditioned. This is not that big of a deal during the day, but the bedroom does not have a portable AC unit either, and that made sleeping quite difficult all three nights. The only way that we could sleep was with the windows wide open, but that let all the light and noise from busy Ave Papineau into the room, and it was still pretty hot at that. The second bedroom is dark but has no windows to open and thus was too hot. We also only had one fan, which did not serve to cool down the room enough. I imagine that this is not an issue in the fall and spring, which are probably the best times to rent this apartment since you will still be able to use the roof deck but will also be able to keep the windows closed at night. Also please note that when we were there it was swelteringly hot, with nights in the upper 70s and high humidity. I imagine that cool summer nights may not be too bad either. We did know about the lack of AC when we rented the apartment, so it wasn't like Melanie was not honest, but if you don't like humidity or light/noise when you sleep, you may want to wait until the fall or spring to book this place.
A very beautiful address and a very cute apartment

We didn't get to meet Melanie, but her apartment was awesome and in a great location. The rooftop was a great addition even though we didn't really spend any time up there.

We were mostly out of the apartment during daytime hours, but I slept more in those few days than I have in weeks.  I would definitely book this apartment again!
Excellent location, and the apartment is very nice. We didn't see anyone at the entrance or exit, which is a shame...
This place was great! Quiet at night. Located right next to a main thoroughfare with shops, restaurants, bars, and the Doggy Cafe! Would stay here again.
It was very good, really cozy and comfortable. Good attention from Melanie and very nice answers

We enjoyed our stay with Melanie. She was super responsive and really the sweetest, very helpful and offered a lot of great suggestions. It's incredibly close to all amenities while still being incredibly quiet and comfortable. A quick (10-minute) walk to the metro made traveling around the city a breeze! Very much worth the value. We loved it. 

The only thing I would say to be aware of is parking. As the listing says, it's completely restricted from 4-6pm for rush hour. But there's also another restriction of 60-minute stays between 9am and 4pm. There was parking available on a side street, so we didn't end up leaving our car there as we noticed the parking authority out and we didn't really want a ticket.
Transit is so easy to access, Melanie was a great hostess and Montreal is a beautiful place to be. 10/10 would stay there again.

Mel was great! The place was perfect for two people. There's lots of street parking, but you can't park between 4-6pm due to rush hour. Parking on side streets is not an issue. Melanie was informative and helpful with any questions we had. The busy street wasn't a concern noise wise. There are many steps up to the condo, which wasn't an issue for us but could be for others. HDMI only for TV use. Full internet access. Overall a great experience. Thanks a lot Mel!

The location is terrific - central to so many wonderful places to eat and walk! The apartment was very comfortable - there were 2 of us (and our dog!) but the apartment easily sleeps 4. I felt very much at home and perfectly comfortable. Thank you, Melanie!

We didn't get to meet her in person, but she was very friendly and helpful. She went out of her way to ensure we could comfortably complete our visit and not be rushed during checkout. A great place to stay in a good location with a great host.

This is a very convenient location for exploring the Mont Royal or Plateau area. The beds are comfortable - but I might bring my own pillow if I return! There is a lovely dining table with four chairs to eat at, and the kitchen was equipped well enough to make basic meals. For the price, this was a very nice place to spend a long weekend.

Great location, close to everything, but some amenities and essentials were not provided, and the extra guest fee did not cover the additional essentials needed for more people. The host was slow to respond to questions about the house.
Original apartment in a great location.

Melanie's place is a really charming place to stay in the plateau/Mont Royal area. All the amenities you need for your home away from home are available - beds are comfy and clean. It can get a bit hot during hot days but windows offer good cross breeze. The rooftop patio is very cool as well. Those who might not like stairs too much may have a hard time, but the location and features were great!

Lots of restaurants, shops and boulangeries are nearby. Mont Royal metro station is <10 min walk away, or a few mins by bus. 

Melanie was amazing - she offered lots of helpful info and advice for our stay and trip. She was very communicative and quick to respond to any of our inquiries. Thanks for a lovely stay, Melanie! If ever we are in Montreal again and you're still an Airbnb host, we will certainly look you up! Merci beaucoup!

The accommodation is very well located. We easily found the street, which is two steps away from Mount Royal Avenue. The neighborhood lacks neither bars nor restaurants. There are several supermarkets nearby. 

The apartment is well equipped. There's space to spread out! The balconies are really nice for enjoying an aperitif (if the weather permits!) 
The rooftop is awesome! 
Just a small point of improvement, the sofa was unfortunately very dirty...  It would be ideal to change it or put covers on to cover the cushions.

Melanie has been very available and accommodating, especially on the last day! Thank you for your kindness!!!
We recommend this accommodation to discover Montreal :)

Melanie's home was clean, well-equipped, and comfortable. The rooftop terrace was an added bonus. There were several modes of transportation very close by, along with great bakeries and shops within walking distance. I would definitely stay again.
Melanie's place was perfect for our weekend in Montreal. The location off of Mont-Royal was ideal and the rooftop patio was superb!
It was great. Nice place. Close to lots of restaurants and bars. Rooftop patio is icing on the cake
Awesome place in MTL everything you'd need and more (Roof Top Balcony is EPIC !!)

Melanie's home is what you'd expect from reading the description and seeing the online photos.  Melanie was quick to respond to my messages and allowed a quick drop off for my bags before venturing on a walking tour. The home was clean but the bathroom may have benefited from a deep clean around the shower and floor. Melanie's home is what you'd expect from reading the description and seeing the online photos. I just didn’t realize (my own lack of research) that the home is quite far from many of the attractions I had planned to visit, but my friend and I walked each way a couple times and then took a quick 15-minute subway ride as well.  I would recommend Melanie's home to anyone, but for myself, I’d prefer to stay closer to downtown only for convenience. Thanks, Melanie!
All went well.

Had a great time at Melanie's. Stayed with another couple and the apartment was big enough with two rooms. The rooftop deck is nice, just be sure to hold open the latch until it fully locks open. If you close it, it automatically locks. We were locked out on the rooftop for a little bit until the couple we stayed with came back to let us in :) Great location with many options of restaurants, bars and shops!

Great space, comfortable beds
Getting in and out is simple. The neighborhood is fun and walkable, and it's about $16 Uber to get downtown. We had a fantastic stay!

A beautiful apartment in a very good location and very comfortable. The rooftop terrace is also very pleasant. 

Overall, it's a very good residence.

Melanie's apartment was absolutely fantastic. Spacious, open, with a washer and dryer, and the rooftop patio was incredible. Beautiful views of the city and the perfect place to drink wine with friends. Would come back here in a heartbeat.
First time using Airbnb and I hope all future experiences are as pleasant as this one. Melanie always responded promptly and was always very helpful.  I would definitely stay again.
Translation: Very well-located apartment with a suitable size for 4 people. The host is very available via message. Highly recommended

What a great place to stay, very close to everything. The beds were comfortable and the space was spacious, with a cool terrace on top. The place was clean and all the instructions for the house were clear. Melanie responded quickly to my emails, which was great. I will definitely go back and stay there again. Thanks, Melanie

Melanie was a perfect host, she let us arrive at the time we wanted and accepted my cat! Everything was clean and beautiful. The apartment is well located, near an Intermarché open 24/7, really convenient! I definitly recommend this Airbnb, and the kindness of Melanie!
A lovely apartment in a very cool area of Montreal! We didn't get to meet Melanie, but she was great at responding quickly and was very helpful! We would definitely recommend this place.
Melanie is an excellent host and her place is exactly as described. The location and rooftop were absolutely amazing! I would definitely stay here again!
We really enjoyed our stay, thanks, Melanie!

Melanie's place is easy to find, just minutes away from everything you need. The rooftop is really great, with a spectacular view! It was clean and communication was quick. I would definitely recommend this place.
The place was nice, the area was good. The only problem was the bathroom that needed a deep clean :/

Great location, nice exposed brick walls and rooftop terrace, relatively quiet (on a main street, so expect some traffic noise in the room, but not too bad. The place was generally clean with a few exceptions in the kitchen.

Melanie's place was the perfect location for my trip to Montreal. It was a cozy and spacious two-bedroom apartment that felt like home after the first step inside. 
The space was really clean and fresh, I appreciated all the little touches that made a difference ( throw pillows on the beds, extra towels and amenities. ) 
Melanie was also readily available by text message with any of my questions about where to go, which was so kind and helpful!! 
Thanks so much for everything :) 
We will stay here again if we ever make the trip to Montreal in the future.

I can't say enough about the apartment, excellent location, space, and comfort. It's within walking distance to plenty of great restaurants, and we liked the neighborhood as well. Melanie was great at contacting us and made checking in a breeze, I would definitely come back if I am ever in Montreal again.

Melanie was an excellent host. She made check-in and check-out so easy! She was also very quick to respond to my messages.

The space is great for a weekend visit. The apartment was clean, with the exception of the bathroom, which could have used a nice scrub with CLR mold and mildew remover. The shower is also very tiny; it was a little claustrophobic. 

The bedrooms were comfortable and clean. Although the bedroom facing the street has sheer curtains, so if you like to sleep in, bring an eye mask to block the light.

The kitchen had all the essentials and was clean.

The apartment is actually a 25-minute walk from the metro. A little inconvenient when the weather is bad. But it's a quick Uber ride.

The location is great. There are plenty of restaurants nearby. The liquor store and 24-hour grocery were two minutes away. There was also a dollar store right there, so if you forgot your toothbrush or any small item, it's no hassle to get them. 

If you want to be close to nightlife and attractions, it is a little far removed.

Overall, very happy with the apartment and would love to stay there again in the summer to take advantage of the rooftop terrace.
This apartment is a lovely base for exploring Montreal! Spacious, nicely decorated (I loved the romantic touch!), and very well located, right in the heart of the vibrant Plateau. Highly recommended!

Melanie's place was BEAUTIFUL! I cannot describe to you the type of vintage vibe I got from her condo. It was really cozy and made you feel right at home. There were shops just down the street that were convenient to go to. She would get back to me about any questions I had right away. She was overall one of the best hosts I've had. I highly recommend her place for anyone who wants that Paris cozy home feeling.

My sister and I had a wonderful time at Melanie's lovely, clean walk-up apartment in Montreal. The neighborhood was perfect. I was also able to bring my dog! The two bedrooms were very comfortable as was the living space.

Close to buses or a short walk to the Metro. Close to Mont Royal, with a 24-hour grocery store, banks, cafes, and restaurants, etc.

Well-maintained place; lots of nice touches, coffee, sugar, spices of all sorts, sauces, etc. Bedrooms were the best part of this apartment; two private bedrooms. It would be great in summer to go out onto the rooftop, although the staircase is quite steep to reach it. The hostess responds to inquiries and questions, etc.

The apartment was clean and bright (and warm) when we arrived, with two comfy beds. The metro station was about a 15-20 minute walk away, taking you straight into the city, but the buses were also great, as the apartment is right on an interchange. I would recommend the apartment as a good base.
Perfect place for a couple. Great neighborhood with restaurants, exercise places, and a park—all very close to downtown activities.
Melanie's place was amazing. It was cozy and clean. Great location, close to downtown. There are a lot of great restaurants nearby.
