Daniel's place is as charming as he is (which is very). The location is top-notch; the house is in the middle of Mont-Royal, steps from the metro! Lots of restaurants and bars and stuff! I had a great stay here and hope you do too!

Great place, the apartment is very nice and clean, located in one of the best areas of Montréal. It's really close to the metro. Daniel is a perfect host and has a lot to share if you want to learn more about the city. Now I know the perfect place to stay in Montreal.

Daniel is a fantastic host, warm and who knows how to make you feel at ease! The apartment is magnificent, clean, well-equipped, and ideally located. The "cozy" bedroom lives up to its name: it's well heated, so even in winter it feels nice :)
The best Airbnb stay I've had. Excellent location, very clean and safe. Highly recommend! Daniel is a very kind person. Thank you for everything

10/10 Airbnb Experience

Great Location (Stone Throw Away From Subway)
Great Host
Great Environment

Couldn't have hoped for a better stay during my brief visit to Montreal. The apartment is bright and airy, the room is cozy, Daniel is a great host and the location speaks for itself. Hopefully I'll be coming back!

Daniel is a wonderful host! He is kind, readily available, helpful, and a pleasure to chat with. The house is beautiful and very comfortable, located in a central area and just one block away from the metro station.

I loved my cute little room at Daniel's place. It is at the back of the building, so very quiet. Yet he's in the heart of the action on the Plateau and right across the street from the Metro. The place is immaculately clean and his two cats are darlings. Daniel is a real gentleman and made me feel right at home in his home. I look forward to my next stay.

Daniel is a fantastic host. Upon arriving he was available to spend some time with me (coffee, walk, ...) without being pushy at all. It was a very warm and nice welcome. He is very helpful and kind. Every encounter was a pleasure. The (small) room at the back was just perfect for my needs, and I appreciated the cozy, feeling-at-home kind of atmosphere in the rest of the house.

The location, room, house, and host would be my first choice if I were to pass by MTL again!

Daniel was a fantastic host. Quick to communicate and always willing to help where he could, going beyond just being your host. 

The apartment was exactly as advertised and well kept. Couldn't ask for a better place or location for the value you get here. 

Thanks Daniel!
Great stay!
This place is beautiful and is very quiet despite being on a busy main road, across the street from a Metro station. Loved the company of the cats

At Daniel's everything is excellent, "A home away from Home", Daniel knows all the happenings in the city, he looks also carefully for the details to make sure you'll have the best and memorable stay... The room is cozy, comfortable, quiet, clean and in very good condition... The apartment is in a cool spot, right next to the Metro... It was an extremely pleasant experience... Thank you so much Dani... Really the ideal spot in Montreal :) ...
Daniel is a great host and bilingual expert of Montreal. He responded very quickly to all messages. The location is perfect for experiencing Montreal. My best recommendations.

A magnificent apartment two steps from the Mont-Royal metro station, a perfect room for my needs (periods of rest during the day, evenings and mornings to prepare calmly before going on sightseeing), an extra neighborhood where it is pleasant to stroll, proximity to the charming Parc de la Fontaine, very pleasant and enjoyable welcome by Daniel, with a very successful alchemy between exchanges and autonomy... In short, having been hosted by Daniel counts a lot in the excellent memory I keep of my stay in Montreal.

There aren't enough words to describe how great Daniel is, or how wonderful his place is. The room was everything I could have needed and wanted, and his place overall is warm, welcoming, and exactly as described. I especially loved sitting on the plant-filled terrace chatting with Daniel and the other guests. The location could have been any more convenient, fewer than 200 steps to the metro from his front door, but also dangerously close to Pâtisserie au Kouign Amann! There are also loads of other great places within a short walking distance as well. Daniel is a consummate host, taking me on a walking tour upon my arrival, suggesting endless options for places to go and things to do (his guidebook here conveniently matched up with a lot of what I wanted to do...trust his insight!), and always being up for a great conversation - always welcomed to a solo traveler. I've already suggested his place to many friends, and I can't wait to return myself!

Daniel's place is perfect - the room is exactly as described, small but really comfortable, with a nice big window for fresh air overlooking a quiet back street. And the place is spotless.

The neighborhood is great; I loved it. It's busy enough that you have everything you need at your doorstep (including a Metro station, 3 stops from the old town), but at the same time has a great small 'hood feel to it. I really enjoyed walking around and discovering the alleyways, staircases, and murals - be sure to make time to explore this area.

Daniel was easy to communicate with and he is very pleasant to chat with and interact with.

I highly recommend it.

The room is comfortable and pretty. 
Very close to the metro station and downtown.
The host is nice and considerate!
A good choice to live here. :)
Wonderful host and great location - you can't go wrong at Daniel's place. Highly recommended!

Daniel's apartment is exactly as described and pictured. Daniel was also an excellent host who made sure I felt comfortable and available for advice or a good chat. 

The area was perfect, very close to the metro and just a short walk from Mont Royal.

I highly recommend his place for your stay in Montreal!

This place is, in a word, AMAZING! Daniel's apartment is a great bang for the buck, located as it is in one of the hippest and liveliest neighborhoods in downtown. It's just a stone's throw from the metro, which gets you just about anywhere you'd want to go. There are cafés, shops, and restaurants galore. The apartment itself has all the charm you would expect of a 110-year-old building, and I spent many delighted mornings having coffee and breakfast on the pleasant outdoor patio. The best part is Daniel, who is without question the most friendly, pleasant, kind, and helpful host I have ever encountered on Airbnb. I felt completely at home in his apartment and greatly enjoyed his company, as well as that of the other guests. I would stay here again anytime; it was exactly the experience that I had been hoping to have in Montreal and I commend this lovely spot to any travelers looking to forge a connection with the city. Daniel is truly a gem!
Nice little room in a perfect location in Montreal. Daniel is a pleasant and available host

Daniel's place is wonderful, surrounded by bakeries and within walking distance of many attractions. It was a leisurely walk up to Mont Royal Park and the metro station is just a stone's throw away. The room and home were also true to the pictures. I highly recommend staying at Daniel's!

Daniel, put simply, is a consummate host. This is my first Airbnb experience and he has set the bar high. From the get-go, he was proactive in communicating with his guests. For example, by giving me directions to his place and informing me that the roads were closed due to a festival before I arrived, so that I could plan an alternative route to his place. He even greeted me at the door and gave me a quick tour around Montreal as it was my first time visiting Quebec. Bilingual and affable, Daniel ensures that his guests are comfortably well-settled, especially for English speakers who may have difficulties navigating around Montreal. His apartment is clean and his two cats, Paco and Baboo, are absolutely adorable. Depending on your preferences, Daniel can be a guide and friend, or simply a host if you wish it to be. It is his versatile approach to hosting that impresses me the most.

Location-wise, his place is steps away from the Mont-Royal métro and in the heart of the French Ghetto. Good food is found everywhere. La Banquise and Fameux for Poutine, L'Avenue for brunch, Yokato Yokabai for ramen, pâtisserie kouign aman and plenty more. For bibliophiles, there is a ton of francophone bookshops nearby.

In short, I had a pleasant stay and got to experience a (very) local taste of Montreal. Thank you very much, Daniel!
Landlord Daniel is willing to share useful information about the city. It's a pleasant experience to communicate with the landlord.  Exceptional value for money, highly recommend!

My accommodation is clean and quiet in the heart of the Plateau (Mont Royal metro just across the street). 
The owner is very welcoming and attentive. It was a pleasant stay. I highly recommend it!

Daniel is a truly fantastic host. He was very helpful, kind, and thoughtful in his communication and thoughts on what to do in Montreal. His place is clean, elegant, bright, and even better than advertised. The location is perfect—right near Mont Royal subway stop and close to ample street parking in Le Plateau. The rooms are well-lit and clean and the apartment has a friendly, airy vibe. The room was outfitted with lamps, a towel, and good bedding. If you are staying in Montreal, I cannot recommend this place enough.
Daniel's house is excellent. It's perfectly located with the transportation system and steps away from Mount Royal. Daniel is a fantastic host. The house is clean and impeccable.
Daniel's place is very lovely, cozy, and in a great location. Daniel is very attentive and responsive to his guests' needs. If I return to Montreal, I will definitely stay with him again.
Great host and excellent location! Highly recommend this place.

The perfect location: surrounded by restaurants, cafes, bars, shops and a subway station! And yet: you will always get a perfect night's sleep in this amazingly quiet place. Bonus: Daniel is such a sincere & down-to-earth host! :)

I spent 3 weeks at Daniel's place. The location is really convenient, everything is within walking distance and close by, including the metro, restaurants, and shops. The house is clean, nice, and welcoming, with a small bedroom that feels good inside. The bed is also comfortable.

The only downside for me was the internet wifi in the bedroom, which was terrible. As an avid internet user, this was very annoying. However, there's no problem with the wifi in the living room.

Daniel is a very kind and nice person who makes you feel comfortable in his house.

Excellent stay at Daniel's where I stayed for two weeks. The accommodation was ideally located (close to the metro and many shops).

Daniel will warmly welcome you and won't hesitate to help if you have any practical questions about life in Montreal.

Daniel is wonderful! A kind, generous, creative, and intuitive person. He will make you feel welcome and give you any tips you need for your trip, as well as be intuitive to your needs if you want to stay private. 

The superhost title is so well deserved. 

His home quickly becomes your home - it is beautifully laid out, clean, tidy, and a great place to spend time in, or arrive back to after a day of sightseeing/work.

It is right by the subway, only a 2/3 minute walk away. Near restaurants, bars, shops, swimming pool, and park! Everything. 

I cannot recommend Daniel's Airbnb more highly. 

Stay here! You won't be disappointed.

I honestly don't think you will find a better place and host in Montreal. Great location, affordable, clean, well-appointed and Daniel is a superb host who will make you feel at home. A special place.

Daniel's place has an excellent location! It's easy to get around Montreal for all your needs. He is a fantastic host, always available to help and chat! I highly recommend staying at his place if you are visiting!

Daniel's apartment is located in a great neighborhood, really close to the subway, bus stop, supermarket, and other services. 
I actually felt like I was home at Daniel's apartment. Daniel is an amazing landlord, always available to help and make your stay comfortable!
I would strongly recommend anyone visiting MTL staying at Daniel's place.
Thank you, Daniel :)

Daniel is really kind and welcoming, and he's also specialized in baking cakes! The house feels like home, and the kitchen is wonderful; I love the oven a lot:D, and cats are adorable.  ~~I highly recommend it!~~

I can affirm without a doubt that staying at Daniel's was the best I have ever had. 
The house is perfect. Extremely clean, spacious and well-furnished; I found everything I needed and more. Public transportation is right around the corner: two minutes walk to reach the metro station and bus stop.
Always within walking distance are numerous supermarkets, restaurants and shops of all kinds.
Daniel is an excellent host and a wonderful person. Thanks to him, you feel immediately at ease; his kindness is incredible. He really takes care of his guests and he's always available to help, give advice or simply chat about anything. I am truly happy to have met him.
Furthermore, he is an excellent cook! I had the chance to taste his cakes: delicious!
Finally, I also want to talk about Paco and Babou (his two cats): I've never met such sweet and adorable cats. 
To conclude, Daniel and his house deserve more than 5 stars!

Daniel's home is located in a beautiful area of Montreal. The apartment itself is beautiful and cozy, also very clean and the kitchen is very well equipped. I had a great time talking to Daniel and his flatmate. Both were always very welcoming and had some nice suggestions about what to do and what to see. I really enjoyed my time there and would recommend it to anyone!
Catherine's home was clean, conveniently located, and well-appointed. Being right across from the market and in Little Italy is a huge advantage. We had a wonderful stay!

Catherine's experience is superb! The photos don't do it justice; we really loved our stay - she has real style about her. 

I can't wait to go back <3
The host cancelled this reservation 52 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

The place was perfect, we spent there 5 days and had the feeling to be home. Well equipped with all you can find to cook or to clean, the apartment is well located for exploring Montreal. Catherine is a great host, easily reachable. We did not meet her but she made things easy for us with clear instructions. Absolutely recommended.

The apartment was great (my partner exclaimed on our first day there that it was like the love child of Salvador Dali and Frida Kahlo) and being right across from the Jean Talon Market is a huge perk. We were able to go shopping at the market and then cook rather than eating out for every meal. Everything was clean and bright and colorful, and we had no problems finding the apartment or getting around the city; it's just two blocks from the metro station. Catherine was very helpful and we really enjoyed our stay, it made me want to move to Montreal!

The accommodation was as described. The location near the Jean Talon market is a real plus. Everything was clean and functional...

Lovely apartment. No contact with the host but a descriptive note about the place was quite sufficient.

I didn't get to meet Catherine, but she gave me the proper instructions on how to get into the apartment easily. I really enjoyed my stay and felt like I had plenty of space. The apartment was equipped with all the essential needs for a week-long stay. Before I arrived, she had a family of 4 staying for an extended period of time. There was a little hiccup with the cleaning person getting around to the apartment before my stay. Nevertheless, Catherine apologized and rectified the situation by having them come as soon as possible and refunding me for two nights. It was an understandable situation given the last guests' long stay and leaving on the day I arrived. I definitely would stay again and love the decor! The neighborhood is a great location near the Jean Talon Market and Metro station, within walking distance.

The apartment was cute and cozy, and the location was amazing. We were a short walk to the metro, Jean Talon market, and Little Italy. If you are okay with long walks, we even walked to Mile End neighborhood one night. Buses are easy to get from the apartment. The kitchen had all the utensils needed to cook some meals (which we especially enjoyed since Milano market was nearby and we kept buying groceries just because everything there was so tempting!). Didn't meet Catherine, but getting the keys was easy. A great place to stay!

We did not meet Catherine but the communication was very good (before and during) our stay. The arrival went very smoothly. The photos are faithful to reality although they do not do justice to the accommodation. Very well-arranged, with all the necessary kitchen equipment (especially an espresso machine !!!! A bliss !!!). Vibrant colors and decorations "Frida Kahlo" :). Super comfortable bedding! The location is GENIAL: two steps from Jean Talon market, a mere 5 minutes walk from the Jean Talon metro station, which has a Metro supermarket. Supermarché Provigo is about 15 minutes away on foot. A quiet street and not too busy, yet next to all necessities. I highly recommend it!

Our experience at Catherine's place was really good. We spent a month there, and the apartment is just perfect for a long or short stay. The pictures don't do justice to the size of the place. We loved the neighborhood; there's a huge market right next to her place and also lots of amazing restaurants. It's a privileged area I believe, because it's far enough from the center for things to be cheaper but you still have lots of options to eat. The location is just a little bit far from tourist attractions, around 20-30 minutes by subway to each one, but her place is right next to the subway station, which is awesome!

Catherine's apartment is very vibrantly decorated, with each room a different bright color and bold decorations. Our favorite thing about the apartment was the nice big kitchen, which was equipped with good cookware and a nice little espresso machine. There were many negative aspects to our stay. When we first arrived, there was no information about internet or other details, so we had to search for an internet cafe in order to contact Catherine. We then had to wait quite some time before getting an answer -- an overall frustrating experience. We stayed in the flat for a month in the winter and had to go up precarious steps each day. It was our responsibility to shovel the steps and remove the ice, but no shovel was provided. Another major issue was the broken window in the bedroom. It was covered with plastic, which kept the heat in very well, but it didn't block any of the noise coming from the street, which was a problem on some nights. Another thing to keep in mind is that only one set of keys was provided. This was quite inconvenient for us because we were two people. In general, whenever we had an issue, we were told to solve it ourselves. We managed to figure things out in the end, and the location close to the metro and nice restaurants made up for many of our frustrations.

We really enjoyed our stay. Catherine's place was warm and inviting, tidy, clean and well-maintained, and we appreciated that she had made room for us to keep our stuff. We also appreciated the well-supplied kitchen, so we could cook with the nice pots and pans, and use the espresso machine. The neighborhood is also great. You're right next to Jean-Talon Market, which is the ideal place to get fresh groceries.
Nice place!
Pleasant accommodation with ease of access to transportation, shops, markets, restaurants. Nice neighborhood. Highly recommended.
The host cancelled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Catherine gave great directions from the airport!
The house was in a great location with great heating!
It has everything you need for any length of stay. 
Kitchen cupboard doors won't stay shut (bluetac must have been used in pictures to keep them shut lol) and there are no handles on drawers and doors. My personal feeling about the bed placement... I would like to be able to get around it. Need better TV reception. 
Overall, the house needs some repairs; not quite suitable (in my opinion) to rent out as is.
The host cancelled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

My stay in Montreal at Catherine's apartment was very pleasant.
Her apartment is very well located, just 2 steps from the Jean Talon metro station.

I especially enjoyed the decorative touch with Frida Kahlo, which is present in all the rooms of the apartment.

Hello,

We had fifteen wonderful days in Montreal, and Pascale's house is a real gem!

It's perfect for family stays. It's spacious, very comfortable, charming, and functional.  Plus, it's ideally located in the heart of Little Italy, with easy access to public transportation (the metro), shops (Traditions, Jean Coutu, St Hubert Street...), and cozy little restaurants (Les Empoteuses). To top it off, Pascale was a wonderful host with her explanations, flexibility, and kindness. All this allowed us to experience the true essence of Quebec life within the house. 

In one word: go for it!

We didn't hesitate to contact Pascale and Alex, and we weren't disappointed at all. The house was clean, well-organized, and welcoming, very well located in a pleasant and warm neighborhood. With our children, we truly enjoyed this accommodation and we promise to return. Based on our experience, it was a chance to taste the Montreal life from the Petite Patrie neighborhood. The alley where they were able to play safely and leave their drawings, the garden, and the ambiance of the neighborhood particularly marked our children who didn't want to leave. The hospitality of Pascale and Alex, their availability and simplicity added to our pleasure of staying with them. There are no questions to ask when contacting them. It was great. Thank you to the whole family.

Sympathetic location, ideal for small family... Etienne, the host, is pleasant (we communicated by phone and in writing), he answered my questions promptly.

The Villeray neighborhood is an undeniably charming place, with the Jean-Talon market (especially in the summer) at its heart.

Etienne's apartment is exactly as described in the listing, no unpleasant surprises. We communicated via messages and everything went very smoothly, plus Etienne left us a small welcome gesture and a recommendation for visiting the Talon market in the neighborhood. Very good stay, apartment close to the metro, quiet and ideal for 4. I recommend!

I spent two days in Etienne's apartment which was very well located, next to the subway and several small cafes, the apartment is large and bright, and especially the bed is incredibly comfortable! Communication with Etienne was very simple, he is super nice. Everything was perfect, I recommend it!
Very nice apartment in a quiet street. Close to the Jean Talon Market which we adore and a wonderful patisserie we discovered at the corner of Jarry. Communication with Etienne was very easy
We had an amazing stay! The space was clean, welcoming, and located in a great area near many restaurants, cafes, bars, grocery stores, and very conveniently near the Metro!

This place was in a very nice quiet area of the city that isn't far from local restaurants and culture. Beds were comfortable and space was bright and clean - pleasantly surprised with the bed in the kids room for an adult to sleep in, so my friend and I had 2 separate rooms to sleep in. Recommended!

Peaceful and clean apartment.
Close to the metro and shops. 
I recommend
Etienne's place is really warm, cozy, bright, and located very close to a bunch of nice places (bakery, brewery, restaurants, parks). It was really an enjoyable place!

Etienne is a wonderful host. His home is nice and comfortable, offering excellent value for the price. He provided us with helpful suggestions about things to do and see in the city. I highly recommend his apartment for spending a good time in Montreal.
Capacity for up to 2 people. Clean and functional but in a beautiful location - not ideal for visiting during extreme heat.

Patrick is a wonderful host and his condo is absolutely perfect for anyone traveling to Montreal and looking to be near restaurants and shops. We walked to downtown Eaton Center from his place easily and there was much to see and eat as well, within walking distance. I would highly recommend it.

Patrick's condo is absolutely gorgeous! It was perfect and exactly as described. The location was wonderful. The only issue we had was getting the key, but we were able to drive to pick it up. Thank you for letting us stay.
The place was very nice and clean in a new building, about a 10-minute walk from the downtown core. Patrick's friend Vivian was very helpful and courteous. I would definitely stay here again.

The condo was very nice, clean, and it was nice to have access to some movies etc. for nighttime entertainment. Although Patrick wasn't there, Viviane, his friend, coordinated key drop-offs and was very nice and helpful. The location was nice, within about 6-8 minutes of the Berri UQAM metro station, and a 10-30 minute walk from many things to do in the city. There was some construction near the apartment (normal for spring/summer in Montreal) but it was very well insulated from the sound. Would recommend to anyone who needs a place to stay, underground parking was also a big plus.
Patrick's condo was exactly as described and the whole place was amazingly quiet given its location, right downtown Montreal. Patrick was also very accommodating with us and we enjoyed our stay!
The apartment was well-located, modern, comfortable, and clean.

We really enjoyed our stay at Patrick's place - it was easy to communicate with him and the place itself was really clean. The building is new so all the amenities are nicely done and it feels safe. You're close to St. Catherine's as well as St. Laurent, it only takes about 5 minutes to walk to the metro... the only small issue being that you are also close to a few sketchier bars where there are some sketchier people. The bed was not comfortable but we would otherwise highly recommend Patrick for anyone thinking of a future visit!

Patrick's condo is located in a great spot, right around the corner from Saint Catherine Street. The area is convenient with shops, restaurants, bars, and a supermarket. The condo has all the amenities for a long stay. Communication with Patrick was quick and easy. I would recommend staying at Patrick's condo for anyone visiting Montreal.
Check-in was quick and easy. The apartment was in a great location, clean and quiet! Great communication and I would definitely stay again.
The place is perfectly located. The apartment was clean and welcoming. I really enjoyed my stay!

We enjoyed a lot staying at Patrick's apartment! Easy to find (next to the airport bus station), very good location, well-equipped, clean and comfortable! Communication was easy and quick with Patrick and, as he was gone on vacation, his nice friends were there and flexible enough to coordinate our arrival/departure for the keys. We definitely recommend Patrick's condo for a perfect stay in Montreal.

Patrick's place was perfect, just like the pictures. No issues getting the keys at all - one of Patrick's friends met us out front when we arrived, showed us around the apartment. 

It was freshly cleaned and all the basics were supplied, and the kitchen was fully decked out too (we didn't do any cooking but would have been set if we had).

The location was pretty amazing - we were walking distance from almost everything, including restaurants, shopping, festivals, and more!

I would definitely recommend Patrick's place for your next Montreal stay; I know we'll be staying again for sure :)
Enjoyed the stay and Patrick was very accommodating. Recommended.
Great condo well-positioned to explore Montreal. Secure parking is a bonus.

I had a wonderful experience staying at Patrick's home, it's right in the center of downtown. I was fortunate enough to witness the Francofolies festival which was only two blocks away. The metro and buses are within a 10-minute walk. Patrick's home itself was clean and comfortable. I was almost an hour late arriving but Patrick's rep waited patiently and was really nice and helpful with directions.
Patrick's place was exactly as described, great location in Old Montreal. The various hosts were friendly and helpful, and made for a really good experience. Thank you again
The host cancelled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

The listing description was very accurate. Patrick was very nice and he answered all of our questions. The neighborhood was very quiet and very accessible. My experience was great and I would recommend it to anyone.

Patrick's condo is in a superb location and it looks gorgerous! Thank God I had a chance to live there for 2 days. BIXI is literally at the front door so we had a chance to ride it. It is very safe and close to everything. I had a chance to watch a movie through Patrick's Netflix account! Thanks, Patrick!

Patrick is an excellent host. Even though we didn't meet him, he was always there to help and quick to reply to any of our queries. His friend Bruce helped us check-in which was very smooth. Patrick's apartment is very central and we literally walked to most of Montreal's prime attractions. The apartment is fully equipped for a perfect stay in a gorgeous city like Montreal. Highly recommend it.

Patrick's condo was awesome and in a great location, close to a major metro station which made touring the city super convenient. He was very hospitable and quickly answered any questions we had. Thank you again, Patrick!

Patrick's place was just perfect - ideally located in the city center, near public transportation and convenient to many local attractions. He couldn't meet me for check-in but made alternate arrangements that worked out perfectly. He was even kind enough to allow me a late checkout on Sunday. 

He provided some brochures and maps of the area, and his Airbnb guidebook was really helpful for neighborhood convenience stores and best things to visit in Montreal.

It's a nice modern apartment in a convenient location, walkable to all tourist spots in central Montreal. You have everything you need in the apartment. One thing to bear in mind is that this is clearly the host's home for some or most of the time, and you will find his clothes in the closet, his food in the fridge etc. Check-in and check-out was fine.

The apartment is located in an excellent spot. It's a short walk to Old Montreal, the subway station, and Chinatown. We have never met the host, but her sister was very nice. Very flexible with check-in and check-out times. Parking is also included.

We had a wonderful time in Montreal. Patrick's hospitality is truly top-notch. He checked in on us after our first night to see how everything went and if we needed anything. We would highly recommend him to anyone looking to spend some time in Montreal. Extremely convenient location. 

Thank you, Patrick!!!
The host cancelled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Patrick's house is very nice! Clean, in a really good location. Patrick is so gentle! It's a perfect time!
Patrick's place is close to restaurants, shops, and nightlife. Patrick responds quickly to messages and provides helpful local tips.

We loved staying at Alexandre's place; she made us feel so welcome that we instantly extended our stay by a couple of nights.

The apartment is bright, modern, very clean and well-equipped. We were traveling with an 11-month-old, and this was also her favorite stop!

The location is great, right on the doorstep of a metro station and the famous Jean Talon market.

I would not hesitate to recommend it if you are visiting Montreal.
Very true to pictures... Incredibly convenient location... Pretty good price for being rented during the world cup.

We absolutely adored our stay with Alexandre and Bénédicte. We truly felt like we were at home. Bénédicte was there upon our arrival and showed us everything. The apartment is spacious, pleasant, clean and very well located in the city. Alexandre and Bénédicte are very available hosts with whom it's easy to exchange. Thank you both, not forgetting Clémence, adorable.

We were profusely welcomed upon our arrival at Alexandre's beautiful flat. It is precisely as depicted in the picture and extravagantly comfortable. Of particular note is the outdoor space at the back which is shaded and lovely in what could be perceived as a back alley, but, courtesy of some plantings and an overhanging tree, is transformed into an idyllic outdoor deck. As mentioned, indoors is equally calm and comfortable. The neighborhood is an up-and-coming part of the city with lots of restaurants, a grocery store, and shops nearby. Also easily accessible to downtown Montreal, especially once the metro is back in operation.

We had a pleasant stay in the heart of a typical Montreal neighborhood. The apartment is very spacious and well-equipped, close to public transportation, cherry on top: the terrace at the back for good moments of relaxation at the end of the day after exploring the city.  A short walk from there, St-Hubert Street is worth a visit.

First Airbnb experience was very positive. The exchanges with Bénédicte were very cordial. The apartment is super! First of all, it's super clean and modern, with everything you need to cook, a nice touch is that they provide laundry detergent and dishwasher tablets. We were able to park easily and for free on the street, the metro is really close by, I highly recommend this place.
Excellent accommodation - clean and very comfortable. The hosts were fantastic and welcoming.
We had an excellent time! They unfortunately were away the weekend we stayed, however they left a lovely note and instructions on what we should do. I would recommend anyone to stay with them.
Absolutely amazing. The apartment meets all of my requirements perfectly. Everything I need is right around the corner in this neighborhood.

Spacious and well-equipped apartment near the metro with a pleasant terrace at the back.  Although we didn't meet the owners, everything was very well organized to facilitate our stay (a convenient key drop-off system and clear instructions in the apartment). The owners are very attentive (regular email contact). We highly recommend it!

The three of us enjoyed our stay here. The apartment looked exactly as pictured and was super convenient to the metro. The neighborhood was quiet and safe, and we were able to walk to cute cafes nearby for breakfast. We would recommend it!

We had a phenomenal time at Alexandre's place. Not only were the pictures accurate, the hosts went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable. The location was beyond perfect and the apartment was just amazing! I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again - this is probably my best Airbnb experience so far. Thank you Alexandre for hosting us in your beautiful home!

Thank you to Bénédicte and Alexandre for their quick responses to our SMS messages regarding some questions we had during our stay. 

We thank them for the flexible schedule as well. 

The apartment is superb and very well-equipped and furnished. 

We had two fantastic days. 

It's ideally located just 100m from a metro station that takes you to the city center in 10 minutes. 
Parking is possible nearby. 

Ideal for visiting the city either by metro or car. 

Thank you for your stay. 

Best regards, 
Hugo, Christine and Xavier

I can say super host!!!! Excellent location!!! Very cozy and clean apartment!!!!! Alexandre and Benedicte are very very friendly couple. The apartment is very clean with an interesting design and very convenient for travelers and visitors. And moreover, the terrace is one of the best places to have breakfast or dinner. We've spent a wonderful month in Montreal!!!!! Strongly recommend it.

We are a family with two children, we spent two weeks in this beautiful, very clean and well-located apartment right across from the metro station. It is very well equipped and furnished, perfect for a family. The neighborhood is quiet with several parks nearby. 

We had a wonderful stay in total comfort. The owners left a detailed guide with all the necessary explanations. Moreover, they were available at any time to answer our questions. We would definitely go back there with great pleasure.

Maria's apartment in Plateau was perfect for our stay in Montreal! The apartment is very spacious, well decorated, and stocked with everything you could need during your stay. Maria met us on time and showed us everything we needed to know about the place. It also features a beautiful balcony and backyard. The location is perfect for exploring Montreal and close to grocery stores, trendy restaurants, bars and shopping. I would recommend this apartment to anyone.
The apartment is very pleasant and there is a superb terrace! Maria has been very welcoming and attentive to every detail.
I had a very good time staying at Maria's place. The area was very convenient, and her recommendations on cafes and restaurants were excellent.
Excellent rapport with Maria. Very flexible. Excellent location. Thank you!
Lovely place in a wonderful location!

Maria's apartment is located near the best boutiques and restaurants on the plateau. It is therefore easy to get around on foot. Communication with Maria is clear and prompt. She provides detailed instructions. She also accommodated our dog during our stay. The back yard is a nice addition. Additionally, there is a small grassy park nearby.
All good. Thanks, Maria
Beautiful place. Very clean. Easy to communicate with Maria. I loved my stay and was so sorry to leave. No doubt I will try this place again when I come back to Montreal. Maria is a fantastic host.
Lovely, light flat in a perfect location - enjoy!

What a great place to stay! Lovely outdoor space, clean, spacious. Maria was very easy to communicate with and was such a lovely host. The area is brilliant. Full of interesting cafes and lovely shops. Very near the tube but a lovely walk into town too.
Very neat apartment and the host is very welcoming. Well-placed and quiet, it allows you to visit Montreal without any problems. It's wonderful to find a place like this on Mount Royal. I recommend!
Great location! Maria was so helpful with any questions we had. The apartment was comfortable and well-equipped. We had a great time.
Great location! The apartment was clean and comfortable. Maria was very helpful!
Loved this place. Super cute and convenient from the hip spots! Maria was very communicative, too.

A clean, comfortable apartment on a quiet street in the heart of the action.

When I arrived, Maria was there saving me a parking spot right in front of my door! Maria is amazing, full of life and energy.

I didn't meet Maria but she was quick to communicate via text. Overall the place was clean but lacked some comforts such as extra pillows and blankets. A small table and chairs would have been nice on the balcony for outdoor dining. I would suggest bringing tea/coffee to get your day started. A list of local cafes in the neighborhood would have been helpful as well as the nearest SAQ, grocery store, and Metro station. 

I discovered a fabulous cafe a block away called Neve's. A wonderful way to start your day. As a rule, Montrealers are super friendly and helpful. The Plateau is a great place to discover. Maria's Place is well-situated.

I stayed a half month in Maria's apartment for a mission in Montreal. 

Very well located, close to the Hôtel-de-Ville and Rachel, in a quiet street but an animated neighborhood, within a 7/8 minute walk of the metro, 10 minutes walking from Mount Royal, 5 minutes walking from shops, bakeries etc. 

The neighborhood is very nice with cute cafes within 2 minutes walking distance (Névé, Santropol, Réplika), super restaurants (l'Express, le Pied de Cochon, le Filet, etc.), there's even a tuxedo rental place within 15 minutes walking distance in case of evening dress for visitors (Maison Waxman), I wouldn't have wanted to live anywhere else.

The apartment itself: totally authentic, in line with Maria, a host full of life, very reactive and concerned about the well-being of her tenants. Photos faithful.
No problems raised during my stay, Maria even instantly increased the internet speed at my request. The apartment is cross-ventilated, which makes it very pleasant. Being present in winter I didn't enjoy the terrace but an outdoor point remains precious! 

I would recommend them closed eyes if you are staying long term in Montreal.
perfect location

Maria's place was lovely. It is in an old building as she states, so stairs are steep and narrow and not a lot of room when you open the door but when you get to the top it is worth it! We were there for the Grand Prix, so easy access to the metro to get to the track. A bit further away from all the other action going on in Old Montréal. We managed to get tickets for the Aura at the Basilica and highly recommend it!

A charming two-bedroom apartment with a kitchen and a small patio, full of character, tastefully furnished, impeccably clean and imbued with a perfect sense of hospitality (including Maria's presence to help us settle in).  Furthermore, the apartment is located in a very lively and pleasant neighborhood (Le Plateau, near the metro, within walking distance of the historic center, interesting but very densely populated). There are many charming little restaurants and bars nearby.  IN SHORT: VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Montreal.

Maria is a wonderful hostess who pays attention to every single detail. She is one of the friendliest and most honest hosts I have ever met. The place has a wonderful atmosphere. I slept so peacefully. The neighborhood is wonderful. I love walking to the cafes, restaurants, and Parc La Fontaine. I highly recommend Maria's place in the strongest terms. Thank you, Maria, for being such an attentive host.

This is the most interesting part of Montreal, and Maria's place is the perfect base. It's comfortable, light, private, has everything you need - including organic toiletries - and is ideal especially if you're traveling solo. Maria's plants are all thriving too; you can tell this is someone's home and even though she's not there, she treats you like a real guest. This year she added ceiling fans, so even as a repeat guest, it exceeded my expectations! Great communication and would stay every time I return to Mtl.

My stay at Maria's place was absolutely fantastic. Check-in was easy and Maria was always available to answer any questions. I could not have asked for a better host. The apartment is spacious, incredibly clean, very well decorated, and has all the amenities you could want. The neighborhood is full of cafes, restaurants, shops. Thank you, Maria!

Good sized apartment. Older building - like most of Montreal. Simple, but complete kitchen. Steep stairs entering, but we didn't mind. Wonderful location in the middle of Plateau Mont-Royal neighborhood. Lots of great stuff within walking distance. Communication with Maria was excellent.

Excellent contact with Denis and Kosta, always available for help, advice on the city.

The apartment is spacious, functional, clean, quiet, located between two subway stations (Plamondon and Côte des Neiges), a 10-minute walk to all shops and restaurants, and a 20-minute ride to downtown Montreal by subway.

We have very fond memories of our stay with Denis.

Denis is an excellent host who is always willing to go the extra mile to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. The apartment is clean, spacious, and extremely comfortable. It is situated in a peaceful neighborhood. I highly recommend anyone looking for a "home away from home" experience and if you are staying long in Montreal, this is definitely better than staying in a hotel. It is within walking distance of the Metro (subway), eateries, and supermarkets.
Denis Kash's house is a very nice place to stay in Montreal. Next time I will choose it again without hesitation.

The host lives nearby and was eager to be helpful. Our son enjoyed playing in the backyard. The apartment had everything we needed for enjoying our stay. Plenty of linens, cookware, and cable channels. Nice neighborhood, conveniently located near the bus, Metro, and parks. Parking was on the street, but was never too crowded to find a convenient space. We heartily recommend this apartment and host.
Amazing host, looks out for you. Spacious and clean apartment. Won't hesitate to book this place again.

Very clean place and excellent host. A bus that runs downtown is nearby and the subway is a few blocks away. Enjoy your stay. There's one queen bed, one single bed, and two couches in the living room.

Denis was out of town but his father-in-law Kostas made us feel very welcome, even offering to drive us downtown on our first night! The apartment itself was comfortable and located in a nice, diverse neighborhood with easy access to buses (a 5 minute walk away) and the metro (a 10-15 minute walk away). Street parking was easy, we usually found a spot right in front of the house. Would stay again, thanks!
The apartment was exactly as described. The neighborhood was quiet, good transportation links and the landlord and his family were very friendly and helpful. We felt very welcome!!!
We enjoyed our stay very much. The apartment is clean, very spacious, and located in a nice and quiet area with good access to the metro.  The host was also very friendly and helpful.

The apartment was clean and the neighborhood was quiet. The metro station was an easy walk, and there are grocery stores nearby as well. Communication with Denis was prompt and smooth. I would definitely stay here again.
Very welcoming. Had a great time.

Had a wonderful time at Denis' place. Very clean, spacious, with everything for a hassle-free stay, great host and in a great location in the city. I would definitely stay here again when I am in the city again

The family was very accommodating to our arrival time and very generous with their suggestions. We were pleased to find the property in a nice residential area and really liked that the apartment had a terrace. We had everything we needed!

My family really enjoyed staying at Denis's house! His father was very friendly and showed us all of the house and neighborhood, explaining everything and giving tips about the city! The whole neighborhood is very kind, we even made dog friends there. 

Furthermore, the house was clean and cozy, very close to Walmart and other stores! Highly recommended!
We had a good time at Denis's apartment, the location is very good, the beds are comfortable, and the kitchen has everything you need to prepare breakfast. The apartment was clean.

I had a good stay in Montreal. I was by myself so the apartment felt very spacious. Walking distance to many shops and restaurants.

Only downside for my trip was the bed was firmer than I like, so I didn't sleep well but I know different people have different bed firmness preferences.

This was our first time in Canada, and instead of renting Denis's place for vacation we rented it to be our home for the first month as new residents in Canada. We enjoyed every minute in the apartment and the area is close to everything. The apartment has everything you need in order to be your house and the hosts are extraordinary. Thank you so much for having us, and allowing us to call your apartment "Our Home". This space will not be sufficient to describe how my family and I felt during our stay.

This upstairs apartment is located in an older, very quiet, and well-established part of Montreal. It's on a lovely tree-lined street and is very close (within a few blocks) to grocery stores and restaurants. The apartment itself is spotless, very spacious, and well-lit by natural light. When you look out the living room and kitchen windows, you see lots of trees. There is a nice back deck just off the kitchen if you want to have a barbecue. The TV has over 1000 channels. The owner warmly welcomed us to the apartment and showed us all the amenities and supplies in the place, and I must say that they went to great lengths to anticipate every need we could possibly have. They were available in person, by phone, and email whenever we had a question. A very relaxing place to stay!

This home was very very pleasant to stay in. We were met by Kosta, Denis Dad who lives downstairs. VERY VERY friendly gentleman who made us feel so welcome and so at home. As soon as we arrived (we were very exhausted) but he showed us everything, and told us if we needed anything he is more than happy to be of help. 

The home is in a prime location right by a main boulevard - so really you are just a few steps away to access public transit or tons of restaurants, markets etc. Neighborhood was very quiet, lots of families so very very safe. 

The home was very comfortable, TV had plenty of options, kitchen and dining area were pleasant and beds were very comfortable. 

When we left Kosta even washed our car! So nice of him!

We had a short stay but would definitely come back.

My parents stayed with Denis and his family for a week, they greatly enjoyed their stay and were particularly touched by the kindness of the family.

Even though Denis and his family were going through a difficult time, they always showed themselves accessible, warm and attentive to my parents' needs. Denis and his family also proved very flexible in terms of accommodations with my parents. The accommodation is spacious, clean, and very well located (close to transportation and several amenities on Côte-des-Neiges). I would highly recommend this accommodation to anyone.

We were not typical visitors. I grew up in Montreal and I was returning in order to spend time with a sick elderly relative. We chose the location as it is within walking distance of the hospital. I was grateful that we were able to be close by.

Kosta met us at the door. He was most welcoming. He gave us a thorough tour of the apartment. It certainly fit all of our needs. We didn't need a description of Montreal and all that is available there. I know he hoped to be more involved, however our situation was different and we were anxious to get to St. Mary's hospital.

A big thank you to Kostas who welcomed us with open arms in his beautiful apartment! Everything was perfectly matching the presentation, very spacious and well equipped. We had a wonderful stay in Montreal and our host has always been available to give us good advice and addresses! Thank you again and maybe we'll see you soon! Sophie, Christophe & Christine

Comfortable, clean place near public transportation (the 165 bus comes very frequently, making access to the city and the nearest metro station very easy).  Great communication with the host, who was available and ready to help with whatever we needed.

The space is the upper floor of a duplex located on a quiet street in central Montreal. Kosta (the owner's father who lives on the lower floor) was very helpful with both check-in and whenever we had a question. The apartment is very comfortable and well-equipped - it feels like a real home. The main bed is quite good (a bit firm) and there are plenty of towels. Strong wifi. We were only there for a couple of days, but our stay was very pleasant.

A very warm welcome. Kosta and his wife are very kind and hospitable. The apartment is spacious and the neighborhood very quiet. We had a wonderful stay and I would recommend this great address to everyone.

Great place! This apartment is located in a peaceful and beautiful block, and it's very close to the subway. The landlord was very friendly. 

The interior matches the descriptions, which are spacious and clean.

Loved staying here! Loved the privacy, space and cleanliness. Everything was spotless, the sheets and towels were so fresh, the neighborhood was lovely, safe and quiet. We were 20 minutes from downtown with plenty of transportation options, just had a fantastic time, highly recommend this place, thank you Kosta!

We are delighted to have met Denis and his family, who are equally welcoming and friendly. Their dedication to the well-being of their guests is pleasant and makes for a comfortable stay. The apartment is well proportioned and especially well located in a quiet neighborhood, as well as close to shops and main modes of transportation. We particularly enjoyed our stay and recommend it highly. We look forward to another visit to Montreal.

The place was very clean and had easy access to public transit. Kostas was nice and helpful. The apartment is on the second floor and has a flight of stairs, which was the only challenge we faced since we traveled with a young child, but it's easy enough to block to prevent falls. Overall, a great stay.
Spacious, equipped apartment, quiet and clean. I recommend it.

Loved the stay. Comfortably fit my whole family. This apartment is in a vibrant local community part of Montreal full of shops, restaurants, parks and even a famous landmark. Public transport is close. 

We recommend it!

My family and I had a fantastic time staying here. It's an ideal location with a lot of restaurants, pubs, shopping, public transit, etc. The host is a great guy and offered us suggestions for what to do around Montreal. 

The place was very clean, fully stocked kitchen, and has a large balcony with a nice view.

Great apartment, great area, great host. Highly recommended.

This place was amazing!
The pictures do not do justice to the actual size of the apartment. Very spacious with lots of amenities. A 5-minute walk to the subway (metro) which gives access to the whole city. Very quiet and very safe neighborhood as well. Definitely coming back on a future visit to Montreal

We really loved Kosta and Denis' place! We were a family of 4 with a 4 and 7 year old and we felt right at home in the apartment. The apartment was clean and spacious. There were ceiling fans in most rooms which helped us not need the air conditioner at all during our stay. The terrace overlooks a beautifully landscaped (by Kosta) backyard.  Kosta and his wife were very friendly with us and helpful with any questions we had. 

The best features for us with the kids were the laundry, Netflix, Wi-Fi and its closeness to Parc Kent, which has a playground and a lovely splash pad. 

We would definitely return here!
The place was great and Kostas was a great host. Will definitely visit again! Thank you!

The space is large, immaculate, quiet, and well-suited for our family of four (with two teenagers). Communication was easy and prompt since we had to arrange for a late arrival. Greg greeted us at the door and kindly helped us unload our car, which was very appreciated. We were shown everything in the apartment. Street parking was easy to find. Thank you again for a pleasant stay.

Great for someone who still wants to feel at home but be close to the downtown area. Lots of public transport to get into the heart of the city, but just removed enough to still have a residential vibe. Everything you need to be at home was there. Hosts were very accommodating about check-in and check-out. We had a great time and no complaints!

This house is really great, we enjoyed our stay here. It's easy to walk to the supermarket, bus station, and subway. This is our first time visiting Montreal and we have no regrets about our stay here. Thank you, Kosta and Denis.

This house matches the description. The hosts were available to answer questions but left us to our own devices. The location was excellent, easily walkable to the metro and bus stops. I would highly recommend this place to other travelers.
Location is great, and the host is very enthusiastic, everything is ideal!

Our stay in Montreal was unforgettable and this accommodation played a significant role: the hosts were both friendly, efficient and discreet, the apartment spacious, pleasant and fully equipped. We hope to be able to repeat the experience one day and keep this address preciously.

Kosta was an amazing host: responsive, thoughtful, accommodating, and friendly. If you are considering this Airbnb, please note that the pictures do not do Kosta's place justice — the entire second-floor apartment is much more spacious than the pictures let on. Thank you for allowing us to have a great weekend in Montreal, Kosta!

We stayed for a long weekend and everything was really nice. The host was welcoming and helpful. Great location! The apartment was tidy and clean, and the photos were real. We're definitely coming for a BBQ sometime in the summer.
Very nice host. Convenient location. Great for family to stay. Definitely coming back
Kostas was very welcoming, he lives downstairs so it's very convenient for a late arrival. The apartment is spotless and well-heated. Perfect and functional equipment. Thank you!
Amazing place to stay in Montreal! Best location with thoughtful kindness from Kosta. It's a must-stay place in Montreal, and I would say if you ever see a vacancy in his dates just book it.
Clean and comfortable house close to downtown Montreal. Loved having coffee on the balcony overlooking the beautiful flowers. Our host was very nice and responsive. We had a great stay in Montreal.
Fantastic! And clean
Nice, convenient and furnished apartment! We had a great time living there for 7 days! We are very grateful for your kind drive to the hospital. We strongly recommend you.
Everything was awesome, Kosta is a great host

The space was larger and cleaner than photos suggest, and everyone in the family was happy with it. The host was kind and all necessary items were provided. While a bit of a distance from downtown, transportation options were good, and there are nearby markets. Our kids loved the playground nearby. It's truly a great place to stay as a family.

We had a very pleasant stay at Kostas' place. We felt like we were home. The duplex on Carlton Street is spacious, comfortable and functional with a large terrace overlooking the garden. The neighborhood is quiet. We greatly appreciated Kostas and his family's kindness and all the attention they gave us. We had everything we needed in the apartment: a fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning (it gets hot in Montreal during the summer), an excellent TV, Wi-Fi, a large bedroom, and a terrace where we enjoyed our meals. All shops and services are nearby. The metro station (Plamondon) is eight minutes walk away. An excellent address, quiet and in the heart of Côte-des-Neiges neighborhood. We will definitely come back. Thank you a thousand times, Kostas!
Great place for a family, nice kitchen, quiet neighborhood, helpful host.

We loved it!! It was spacious and had tons of spices and kitchen tools available. There was plenty of balcony space with a grill. He was there waiting for us when we checked in to politely greet us. Kosta was great and we can't wait to come back!

Kostas was a wonderful host. His place is conveniently located near the metro and allows easy exploration of Montreal. It's great for families, with a nearby playground featuring a water feature. Highly recommended for anyone wanting to experience Montreal like a local.
Very good stay, the host was very pleasant and friendly. We had an excellent time.
The place is as described, clean and spacious. The hosts are really helpful and nice.

We were four people on vacation in Montreal, and Kosta received us with remarkable attentiveness and availability. The apartment is very well-equipped, spacious, and close to all public transportation.

Thank you again, Kosta.
The best host we've ever stayed with! Quality in every aspect! Super attentive and excellent location! Highly recommended!

Marie was very accommodating of our arrival and departure. 

We felt more than welcome when she pre-approved our stay which excited us even more. 

The place was spotless upon our arrival and it was as cozy as a house of our own (as the title suggests). 

There was heating which kept us warm in Montreal's bitter winter.

I might add that Marie prepares you for arrival with maps and some great restaurant recommendations that were all very useful to us. 

We would definitely visit this place again because the location was close to downtown and Marie made us feel very comfortable. I would recommend this house to anyone visiting Montreal with friends or family.

My friends and I had a great time staying at Marie's home! She was very accommodating and helpful. When we could not figure out how to connect to the Wifi, I sent her a text message and within minutes I received a response and everything was fixed. Also, the house was very cute and accurate according to the pictures. I would most definitely recommend getting in contact with Marie when looking for a place to stay in Montreal. I hope to be back again next summer.
Very good welcome, clean and comfortable room. In a nice neighborhood. Véronique is a pleasant and open person. I recommend!
The host was very nice. She gave us our private space. She is flexible with check-in and check-out times. The location is also close to the biodome, Olympic Stadium, and the park. Nice place!

Amazing time in Montreal thanks to Veronique... Super friendly girl with a great pad close to Rue Mont Royal... Great with directions tips and advice, we actually walked it to the centre every day so haven't used metro and buses. Good room, comfy bed and good towels... Looking forward to coming back in Autumn
Veronique was very warm and welcoming. The room description was accurate. The building was quiet and the neighborhood was great. There were plenty of shops and eateries on the street.
Thanks so much Veronique for your hospitality. I quickly felt welcome at your place by your kindness and generosity. I slept like an angel in a comfortable bed in your nice and clean apartment.
The room was clean and comfortable, exactly as advertised. The neighborhood was cool. Veronique was very flexible, responsive, and easy to communicate with.
Véronique was an amazing host, thank you for the welcome! I recommend her if you need a short break in Montreal.

Veronique was a very flexible and nice host. Her flat is well equipped, clean, and the location is ideal, quiet, and village-like. You can find everything on the street she lives on. I would definitely recommend anyone to be hosted at her place.
Accurate as described. Great location.

We spent 3 nights at Veronique's apartment in the Old Rosemont neighborhood and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We drove to Montreal from NYC and there was plenty of street parking nearby. We went for the World Cup and it was an easy walk to Olympic Stadium, and downtown Montreal was quickly accessible by car. Veronique was very responsive leading up to our trip and had towels, sheets, and information on Montreal ready for us. We appreciated how easy going and flexible she was as we arrived late on a Friday evening! Wifi was speedy and there are plenty of cafes and restaurants right down the street from the apartment. Great host!

I spent four days in Montreal for the Women's World Cup. The apartment is in a nice neighborhood where you can walk to restaurants, shops, and public transportation. The room was clean and very comfortable with reliable Wi-Fi. Veronique is a friendly and helpful host.

Yes. Very good. 
Very free, enjoyable and pleasant

Véronique is a very good host. She is very friendly and doesn't hesitate to share some of her Canadian culture. The apartment is well-equipped with a cute bedroom and the Masson street is a nice one. It is located within 10 minutes by bus from the Beri - Uqam station which connects to all parts of Montreal.
Everything went smoothly at Veronique's place. I highly recommend it. Great host and great location!

Veronique is a very nice and easy-going host who makes you feel like home. The flat is also very nice. 

The neighborhood is not super lively, but by the end of my stay I discovered some very good places nearby where I enjoyed talking to local people. I would definitely go back.

Veronique was a very gracious host. She gave good suggestions on where to go in Montreal and helped us find restaurants. Her house is cute, clean, and though not directly downtown, on a street close to many very good restaurants, amenities, and public transportation. Getting downtown was not challenging and we enjoyed the walk (transit was easy as well).
Veronique was very kind! She left us the apartment for us as she was leaving for the weekend :) Super apartment

Veronique is awesome!
She was welcoming and very helpful. Made us feel right at home. The place was charming and the neighborhood has everything you need. Definitely recommend her place.
Veronique was a lovely hostess and the room was very comfortable. My daughter and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Véronique welcomed us last minute with complete trust; she allowed us to enter even though she was at work. Thank you, Véronique!

Veronique is a wonderful host, very helpful and accommodating. Her apartment is lovely, and the neighborhood has everything you need right on the street. It's easy to get into the center of Montreal. I had a fantastic stay.

I had a wonderful stay at Veronique's apartment. She was an excellent host. Very nice, easygoing, and helpful! The apartment was clean and charming. In its lovely neighborhood there are good restaurants, cafes, and boulangeries just within walking distance. Also, the view through the window in my room showing beautiful skies and trees always made me wow. Highly recommended!

Veronique is a wonderful host—cheerful, friendly, and helpful—and her place is as it looks: light, peaceful. Only a couple of blocks from restaurants and cafes; a bus stop right outside. Ample and shady parking is available on nearby streets.
Veronique was a friendly host and located in a good spot in Rosemont. The apartment is right next to a bus stop and many local restaurants. Veronique was a very nice and friendly host!

Véronique is an incredible host. It is very easy to communicate with her, she's very kind and always ready to help. 

The bed is very comfortable and the neighborhood is very nice... it was also very easy to find a parking spot in the area.

We cannot recommend this place enough!

Veronique was a wonderful host, she guided us and provided information throughout the entire process, the apartment is exactly as shown in the photos, and her cat Phil is very playful, my wife loved having him around.
Charming small apartment, lively and Véronique is very welcoming
Veronique was very welcoming and nice to me, and her cat is super sweet!

A quiet place, in a lovely neighborhood full of things to do... 20 minutes by bus to the nearby train station, close to the city center. It was truly a nice place to stay. And the cat is an excellent little companion.

Veronique is a nice person who tries to make the stay enjoyable and we had some nice chats sometimes. She maintains the place organized and clean, and in respect we tried to do our part too. 

The cat Phil (I hope that's how I write his name) is nice and wants cuddles all the time. 

The place has a good space, especially a really great balcony outside the kitchen. It's also located on a street with pharmacies, markets, bakeries, restaurants, bars, some stores, an awesome fruit/vegetable market, and a butcher shop.

Although it is a little far away, it's easy to get downtown, and as a bonus the Olympic sports center is nearby.

Well-located apartment with buses taking us to the metro (20-30 minutes from the city center) - a 1-hour walk from the city center.
The street is perfect for restaurants and supermarkets!

Veronique is very welcoming and her cat is very cute!
My residence is well-situated, close to transportation and you can shop nearby on foot. Several parks are located nearby so you can enjoy the summer.

Veronique's place was exactly as described. Very easy to access by public transit and you find all facilities nearby. Veronique hosted my dad for almost 2 months and he loved the place. Communication was easy with Veronique and she was very helpful! We highly recommend Veronique's place for a stay in Montreal!

Véronique opens the door to her apartment in Montreal with much kindness and sympathy. Phil the cat is an adorable companion seeking cuddles. The photos are exactly as they appear, the apartment is charming, the bed comfortable, and the place is quiet. Bus 47 stops almost right in front, and buses 27 and 67 pass by nearby. A supermarket is a 5-minute walk away, Masson Promenade with shops and restaurants within walking distance.  A 15-20 minute walk takes you to the park for life with the beautiful botanical garden. Be prepared for some travel time to reach downtown, but Montreal is so vast that you can't have everything. I am delighted with this stay! Thank you Véronique.

It was really good staying! 
Veronique is very kind and her reply is fast.
Her house was clean, bright, and near a bus stop, making it very comfortable.
There are some grocery stores, pharmacies, cafes, and my favorite noodle restaurant ("Juste Nouilles") around the place, so it was also convenient!!
Clean and quiet apartment. Friendly and available host.
Everything was great
Friendly welcome. Véronique's cat is very welcoming.
Super room, clean, well-furnished. Close to some buses so easy to get around. Véronique makes you feel at ease and we feel like home. Plus, her cat is adorable.
Perfect stay, apartment as described and enjoyed with the previous comments! Nothing to add, thank you Veronique. Phil, we'll miss you! Exceptional cat!

Veronique's home was beautiful and cozy. Her home is not far from the botanical garden and Olympic Park, making walking easy. The ride into town was 15 minutes by car and 40 minutes by bike, making commuting easy. Overall, great location and her cat Phil was so cute and cuddly.
Clean and cozy apartment in a great location! Adorable cat to keep you company. Had a lovely experience :)
Comfy bed, on a bus route, very friendly cat! Veronique was very accommodating for my short stay.
The room is very nice and the apartment is well-furnished, we feel like home and Phil is a good host, always very welcoming.

Phill (the cat) is wonderful and kind!!

Apartment's location is good.

Veronique was great and very hospitable. The nice lady and her cat were adorable. 

Great location and clean.

Véronique is a very welcoming host, she gave me plenty of advice and ideas for discovering the region. I felt at home in the Airbnb. The room and bed are comfortable, her cat Phil is adorable! I had a great stay...
The apartment is very nice and comfortable! The location is very convenient, near shops and public transportation. Veronique was very helpful and friendly. I would definitely recommend it.
Great location and space at a great price! Veronique was an excellent host. Her cat is very cute and friendly. I enjoyed my stay and would definitely return!

Veronique's place is down a lovely street with pretty much everything you need. There are a couple of pharmacies, a few grocery stores, and plenty of places to eat. There's a little place that does amazing pastries and coffee on the corner near where the bus stop is (opposite the noodle place) that I really recommend! It's right near two bus routes, both of which take you to metros so transportation is really good.

In terms of the actual house, it has everything you would need. It's not fancy, but the bed is comfy, there's plenty of storage, and the shower is nice and hot! There is only one plug location in the room, so I would take a cord or something if there are two of you, but aside from that, Veronique has everything you need. Phil the cat is delightful (he's so big!!!) and gives you a lovely welcome. 

Thank you!

We stayed at Veronique's home for about one month and had a nice time there. 

Our room was comfortable and clean with enough space for our large luggage.  There were all the necessary amenities in the kitchen that you could make your own meals if you liked.

There were two balconies which, in winter, are freezing out there to enjoy fresh air but surely in summer it would be wonderful. 

The location is perfect, near several restaurants, pharmacies, grocery stores and shops, which helps you eat or buy what you want. It's close enough to bus stops that take you to metro stations.

If you like to talk, you can have nice chats with Veronique, and if you want your own privacy, she is very respectful. 

Finally, we enjoyed playing with Mr. Phil during our stay as he is so cute and friendly.
Very good

It was my first day in Canada and my first Airbnb with a host. Veronique was friendly and super kind, and her cat too;) She suggested me to wear her winter sport pants if I wanted due to the amazing temperature of Canada. For four days at her place, I felt such a warm atmosphere and enjoyed a lot in Montreal because of that. The room was the same as the photo and it had shower amenities and a hair dryer as well. Everything was fine.

We spent around 10 days there and felt very comfortable. The kitchen was fully equipped and we could cook and prepare our meals in the cold winter of Montreal. The room was very nice and the bed super comfortable. Sometimes it was difficult to wake up in the mornings. Véronique works during the day but her lovely cat Phil was the guardian of the house all day. He loves to be cuddled. You should like cats if you want to spend time at the apartment.
A very comfortable stay, excellent location for everything you want to do

We didn't get to meet Nico, but his roommates were very nice! It was easy to pick up the keys, and when leaving we just left the key in the house on our way out. The place was clean, and the bed was awesome! We got to control the heat in our own room which was really nice, since it was freezing outside! We ended up taking a lot of Uber rides, but we did take the Metro once, and it was convenient to get to; about a 5-minute walk.

Thank you so much Nicolas. You are such a great host. Your place was perfectly located, super super clean and the bed was incredible.

I highly recommend this place!
Nico and his roommates were very hospitable! The room was great and very clean. The house was in a perfect location. Overall, a great experience!

Well, I didn't meet Nico, but his roommate Moran was very kind, nice, and handsome! lol The room and bed were clean. It was well located. And there's a free bike rental shop near the station which is just a 7-minute walk from here.

Stayed here in my first few days of moving to Montreal. The apartment was very well located and the room was perfectly clean; the bed was extremely comfortable and just what I needed to nurse jet lag. Nico's housemate, Morgan, was around to answer my questions and was helpful. Morgan's mom who was visiting, was also sweet, and so very pleasant to be around. 

I didn't meet Nico until I returned two weeks later to pick up my two large suitcases, which Nico and his housemates had kindly allowed me to store in the apartment. While I needed only the basics: good sleep, hot water for coffee, hot shower, central location -- from my quick chat with Nico, I get the sense that he's the kind of host I would like to have when in a new city. He genuinely cared about his guests, and had time in his day to have a quick chat.
Highly recommend it, great location and great host
Nico's place was perfect for my short stay in Montreal! His roommate was helpful, and the apartment is located in a neighborhood with many cool shops, restaurants, and nightlife spots.
Great host and extremely attentive and quick to respond to any questions and concerns. Great location too!

Nico's place is perfect for a Montreal getaway. The bed is REALLY comfortable. Very clean place and perfectly located right close to restaurants, bars and lots of places. The good thing is that it is close but not so close to bother at night when trying to sleep. Nico was an excellent host and provided us with all we needed. He received us even when we arrived late at night and gave us a tour of the house. Highly recommended.
Good place if you're looking for a place to stay overnight in Montreal. Great location, close to many restaurants and Mount Royal. Public transportation for buses and subways is nearby.
Very good host, very kind and helpful, very good location and especially very clean, very good stay, I highly recommend!

The apartment is very cute and located in a great spot on the plateau. The hosts were very easy to deal with and readily available. The place was pretty clean, however there was only one roll of TP and the toilet lid was broken. But otherwise it was great. I recommend it.
The team was very welcoming. It was easy to get there and find the place, and it was exactly as described! I really enjoyed my stay.

The apartment looked exactly as pictured. The furniture was new and the apartment was very clean. It was a bit stuffy, but when I asked Flatbook, they brought over a fan. There is a TV, but no cable service (you can hook up a laptop and use your own streaming service). My only complaint about Flatbook was that communicating with them was a bit strange and different from my other experiences with Airbnb (I've always reserved with private homeowners). Though they were certainly responsive, the responses always came from a different employee and there seemed to be uneven communication between them, so I had to repeat my question/request and the backstory each time.

This was our first time staying at Flatbook. We found the team to be very efficient, considerate, and professional.  We were a bit late in arriving due to traffic but were still met at the door by smiling faces and a chocolate cake (to celebrate our wedding anniversary).   We very much appreciated the thoughtful gesture.

We were escorted to the flat and were pleased by the cleanliness and functionality of the space. It was exactly what we had hoped for, as well as being centrally located, near transit (metro), shops, and restaurants.  It suited our purposes wonderfully. We were also very pleasantly surprised to find the use of laundry facilities, including soap, had been included in the rental.

The only negative comments concern 1) the fact that this building has a lot of stairs to contend with. So anyone with mobility issues would need to take this into consideration.  And 2) the television is not hooked up to any local channel. Whenever we travel, my wife and I usually like to listen to local news and weather. We managed to get some local information via WIFI by connecting the HDMI cable they provide to our laptop. Flatbook may wish to add a section to their information kit listing local television/radio stations.

Overall, it was a great experience and we will definitely recommend this to friends and family.
No complaints! Everything ran smoothly with check-in and check-out. Excellent location, everything was as described

The listing description was accurate! The area was great, with tons of options for restaurants and shopping and right near the metro!

Great host!
