The apartment is really very pleasant to live in, cozy, with a pretty inner courtyard, the metro at 5 minutes walk. Véronique was very friendly during our email exchanges. We highly recommend the house-studio, it was a beautiful stay :)
The shower head is amazing. I also like the beach-themed decoration. Tonton is super nice.

I stayed here for just one night and even though it was short and sweet, I still enjoyed my stay. The house is absolutely stunning. I spoke no French but the family still managed to communicate with me. They made me feel so welcome and comfortable.

We had car trouble and got to the house very late, but the daughter of the house (I unfortunately did not catch her name) was kind enough to stay up and let us in. We only stayed one night and left in the morning, but the room was comfortable as expected!

We were welcomed and given a key to come and go as we please. The place was pleasant, quiet, and comfortable. The temperature was well kept, we had a private restroom, and a sofa lounging area to use outside of our unit. A very nice home with a swimming pool in the back!

We didn't expect the location to be quite so far out of downtown, but that's on me. It helps to have a car to make the trips rather than taking a bus or train. 

Very comfortable room and bed and a very friendly and accommodating family home.

Speaking French is a big plus, but Jamal speaks very good English and he helped us a lot.

We did enjoy our stay.

Louis's family is awesome!!! Everyone is so nice, the house is clean and new. I love everything. 

Thanks for your perfect hospitality!!!

My friend and I rented the apartment for a weekend and we really enjoyed it. The location is great, close to downtown, but in a quiet neighborhood. The place is very clean and decorated with good taste, it shows that Ildiko enjoys taking care of it. The kitchen is spacious and has everything needed to cook. A large window and a wide patio door make for lots of sunshine. The bed is big enough for two and very comfortable. Ildiko provided clean sheets and towels. There was also more than enough closet space for us. Ildiko and her apartment definitely made our weekend in Montreal very enjoyable and hassle-free. Looking forward to visiting again.
Hello, everything was as described, the accommodation was well-placed near the center, nothing special to say. Perfect as a "base camp"

The apartment is super comfortable and very practical, perfect for visiting the city of Montreal. Very close to the subway and bus stop, and located a short walk from downtown (Berri-UQAM metro station), I highly recommend this place. Even though Ildiko was outside the city during our stay, we were perfectly well received. Our host, Glen, was courteous, polite and always available to answer all of our questions via text, email or phone. He was also very flexible with check-in and check-out times. He had prepared the apartment for us adequately with everything we needed to be comfortable. In addition, the value for money of the apartment is excellent as it's a very affordable rate. Thank you Ildiko and Glen!!!
Very nice and warm place, near downtown, with a large supermarket nearby, we can find everything we need in the apartment.  Really good experience.

There is much to say about this rental, what I don't understand is that the previous comments do not mention it despite the very good welcome from the Glèn, a friend of the host. The most important thing, cleanliness, despite appearances, the accommodation is dirty. Not just dirt from previous rentals but older. In addition, there is a strongly unpleasant odor that we were unable to get rid of from the kitchen. There is no mosquito net in the kitchen so as soon as you open the window, flies and mosquitoes come in. The mosquito net in the bedroom is pierced in several places and very difficult to close. The curtains in the kitchen or bedroom are either torn or dirty. There are no storage options provided in the room for storing our belongings, since all the chests of drawers are already filled with clothes belonging to the owner, which we find unusual. Despite its attractive price, we advise against renting this accommodation.

Ildiko was a wonderful host! She wasn't able to accommodate us herself, but she made the proper arrangements to ensure everything went as smoothly as possible. The place was very clean and the location couldn't have been better; it was exactly what we were looking for. I would definitely consider booking with Ildiko again when I am in the area.
Check-in was very easy, the place was nice & clean, and exactly as it was described in the listing. The neighborhood is great, and all the necessary amenities were very close by.

The accommodation matches the description and photos. Two metro stations are accessible within a 10-15 minute walk. The only downside is that the neighborhood is residential, with supermarkets and convenience stores located 15-20 minutes away by foot from the apartment. However, the neighborhood is very pleasant to stroll in during summer. A convenience store is located just 2 minutes from the apartment but this isn't enough for a proper meal.

Everything was in order and as explained in the listing and during one-on-one conversations with Françoise. Perfect, cute, and clean apartment with everything we needed for our one-week stay near the stadium!

We had an excellent stay and the apartment was perfect. The kitchen was well-stocked, making it very easy to cook meals. Everything was just as advertised. Free parking was always available on the street. The neighborhood was quiet and away from the bustle of the city, yet everything was just a few metro stops away. We went to the Round of 16 World Cup match, so the proximity to the stadium was great. I'd definitely recommend the apartment to everyone, it couldn't have gone smoother. Thanks, Françoise!
The host cancelled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 42 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Eric made check-in easy! Overall this is a great property. Highlights:

- Nice bed / folds up into wall for extra space
- Quiet building
- Internet is fast when I tested (10 mbps up and down). Wireless and wired internet available.
- Interesting view overlooking Place des Festivals
- TV and cable were convenient for watching hockey. TV accepts HDMI input.
- Dishwasher!
- Braun coffee maker
- Only two flights of stairs to great rooftop patio
- The unit receives a lot of AM sun which is nice, but bring a sleeping mask if you sleep late.
- The building's ground level retail includes a useful convenience store
- Great location!
It was one of the best places I've stayed through Airbnb and Eric gave me plenty of good city advice.
Please provide the text you would like me to translate into English. 😊
Stay in the heart of the jazz festival! Modern and well-equipped apartment. Very good welcome from Eric.

We first communicated with Eric by email and we immediately felt that we were dealing with someone serious and very kind. All our emails received quick responses. 

He made sure our arrival went perfectly and it did! :D

Eric came to visit us after a few weeks to see if everything was going well. We had the impression that an old friend was visiting us.

The apartment itself was exactly as described and met our expectations. All the equipment we could wish for is available and brand new. 

Very well located in the heart of the entertainment district, we did everything on foot (right next to shops on Rue Sainte Catherine, 20 minutes from Mount Royal, 25 minutes from Plateau...) and the metro is right at the doorstep.

The only "downside" would be that nights were sometimes disturbed by noisy activities in the neighborhood. But it didn't spoil our stay at all.

Amazing view of Place des Arts. 

This apartment was perfect for us. Not just a great location (just in front of Place des Arts Subway station, a block away from a grocery store) but it has a great view of Place des Arts. I really enjoyed watching the Festival Mode & Design from the apartment's window.

Very well equipped: dishwasher, hairdryer, plenty of tableware, you can easily cook anything you want. It has air conditioning, which was perfect for those hot summer days. Washer and dryer inside the apartment.

It was a very clean apartment. You feel like in a hotel room, with plenty of sets of white sheets and many clean towels, if you want to change them. 

I had to check in earlier, so I had the chance to meet the cleaning lady, who was really attentive. 

If I am back to Montreal I would rent it again, no doubt.

This is hands down the best Airbnb I've ever stayed in! Eric was the perfect host, communication was excellent! The apartment was amazing, spotless, fast wifi and the perfect location in Montreal.  

We were a 10 minute walk away from Old Town and right on the main shopping street! There are so many places nearby, like grocery stores & coffee shops, and also right next to a tube station if needed. 

Absolutely no negatives!

Translation:  "Good stay at Eric's studio. He was very helpful in answering my questions and facilitating my arrival and departure. The studio is great, very well equipped. It corresponds well to the description and photos."

We never actually met Eric as he was working abroad, we did however speak on the phone, he was very pleasant and helpful. Eric's brother-in-law dealt with our entry into the apartment and everything went smoothly. 
The accommodation was exactly as described and could not have been better, it was perfect for transport, both buses and metro, also easy to walk to most tourist areas. I would certainly recommend Eric as a host to anyone visiting Montreal, I know he has more than 1 apartment and I would imagine they are all of the same high standard.
Hello, I stayed one week in Montreal at Eric's apartment which is very functional and well located in the Entertainment District. I highly recommend it.

Eric was in touch with us before arrival and he met us upon arrival. We arrived early in the day, dropped our bags at the apartment, and began exploring Montreal. The location is perfect for public transportation and exploring on foot.  We stayed for a week, enjoyed the "backstage pass" from the rooftop terrace, and slept well. Eric recommended a great sushi place just a few doors down! The hot water, AC, and washer dryer were all welcome.
The location made it easy to tour, shop, eat, return for a rest, and begin again.
We would stay here again and recommend it highly.

Eric was excellent. He was always in contact with us and made sure we arrived safely. As soon as we arrived, we spoke to him by phone and he gave us some information about the apartment. We asked him about restaurants and grocery stores in the area and he was a great help. Very nice host.

Eric was an excellent host! He was very helpful when we asked him about the city and the space. He always responded to any questions we had promptly, and he was so kind, going out of his way to make sure we had a great time in Montreal and at his apartment.  As for the space, it was perfect! It is located across the street from the metro, within walking distance of St. Catherine st, and there is also a grocery store, a top-rated cafe, and a top-rated creperie on the street within 1-2 blocks of the apartment. The space was clean and beautiful. We loved staying here!

We loved our stay at this lovely apartment! The place was clean and exactly as pictured, and Eric was a great host! The location is right by the festivals in downtown Montreal (we were there for the first week of Just For Laughs), and close to shopping as well as Old Port. Would highly recommend!

We were very well received by Eric, the apartment was very clean, cute and well-equipped (hair dryer, kitchen equipment, bath towels...) and right in the city center, which was very convenient (the metro station is just downstairs). The host was always available by phone! We were able to enjoy our stay as we wanted!
The host verified that we could comfortably enter the apartment we found very comfortable and clean.

Eric's apartment was in a fantastic location. He was very accommodating and always reachable when we needed him. The description and photos in the advertisement accurately represented what to expect. Overall, a great experience with a very kind host.

The apartment is very conveniently located. Almost everything you would want to do in Montreal is within an easy walk. The apartment has a nice view of the fountains at the Metropolitan Art Centre. The shopping district of St Catherine street is a couple of blocks away. It's close to McGill and so lots of cafes and Bistros in the area to hop in and sip a latte. The apartment is well furnished. There is a washer dryer in the bathroom. 
The kitchen is well equipped but the cookware is limited to a large pot to boil pasta. So you may have to buy a cheap pan if you plan to cook at the apartment. Adequate crockery and cutlery is available. There are provision and departmental stores just around the corner. There is a cafe on the ground floor of the building. 
Eric made the check-in process super simple and organized. It was like we were walking into an apartment we had lived in for months. Truly enjoyed our stay and would definitely consider staying at the same place in the future.

Great studio in a central and vibrant location! The Metro is a 2-minute walk away (if that), making it so easy to get most places. The space itself is perfectly suited for a solo or couple traveling, and was very clean when we arrived. Eric was an excellent host who was clear and helpful when we had questions. Highly recommend!

I stayed for about 3 weeks at Eric's while in MTL for business. The location is central and steps from the metro, which worked well for getting to the office and back this winter :)

Eric was very communicative before my arrival and once I arrived.
The location is great. In the heart of downtown, in the entertainment district and near Montreal's Old Port. Everything is within walking distance or accessible by public transportation.
Excellent stay.  Location is truly central, close to all services: bars, grocery stores and public facilities nearby. It was possible to reach the city center without using public transportation.
Eric's place was perfect for me. Great location and it had everything I needed. Everything went very smoothly. Thank you, Eric!

The location was perfect and the condo was comfortable, a great location, well worth it, and clean. Eric was great at communicating quickly with us and I would recommend Eric's Airbnb condo to anyone. I hope to return and stay if you would have me.

I stayed at Eric's apartment for 2 weeks while working on research for my dissertation. I could not have asked for a more gracious, accommodating, and kind host. The apartment is spotless, comfortable, and in a prime location: a 15-20 minute walk from any major site in the city. The roof desk with great views of Mont Royal is an added plus! Eric responded almost immediately to all of my messages making check in and check out seamless. I cannot recommend Eric more highly!
Eric was amazing! As soon as I arrived, he contacted me to give me recommendations of the area. The place was very clean and comfortable. Great location, near Place des Arts.

Great value apartment. Public transportation connections to all neighborhoods are very easy, or walkable if you're energetic. There are several local supermarkets and some excellent dining options within walking distance. Our trip was a very pleasant experience.

Awesome location! Steps away from the train and one of the public BIXI bike docks. Close to a bunch of restaurants and bars, lots of nightlife in the area. My girlfriend and I spent a week here and it worked out perfect for a simple smaller place. Would recommend.
Nice, quiet, well-furnished studio, well-equipped kitchen, very convenient location, friendly and responsive host, and a wonderful stay

The space is very clean, well-located, very close to the metro station, with excellent infrastructure, quiet, and easy communication. Even during rainy days, it's easy to move around and find anything you need. 

The apartment has everything you need; I strongly recommend Eric's apartment.

I would have given this property 5 stars, except for the noise factor due to the Jazz Fest. So like 11 out of the 12 months of the year 5 stars. I was in Montreal for school/work, so I needed to spend time studying, which proved to be difficult as the music from the festival lasted until 1:00 am each and every day.

Also, the AC broke, but since I was there during the longest heat wave Montreal has ever experienced, a broken AC was almost inevitable. The city's entire cooling system must have been and still is under extreme stress. The day I left Montreal, the temperature in the apartment was 83 degrees. 

I had to leave Montreal very early due to a serious medical emergency at home. My father is gravely ill, had a cardiac arrest and is still a patient in the ICU. So it's been stressful. Eric was VERY helpful during this difficult situation and helped me check out immediately. 

The apartment itself was great and clean. Loved the location. 

Thank you

My stay at the apartment was good. The location was perfect for walking to the office and grocery store, as well as right next door to all the festivals going on that week! The place was clean and comfortable. The main AC wasn't working at the time, but a small portable unit was brought in and it kept the place comfortable. It's a great little downtown location and the rooftop patio is a cool bonus!

The apartment is in a great location, close to many restaurants and festivals. Eric is a very attentive host who responded quickly to any questions or concerns we had. The place is clean and comfortable. The rooftop patio is wonderful for enjoying the views in the evening! I would definitely stay here again if I returned to Montreal

We had a great time staying at Eric's. It is in a great location and is the perfect size for two people. The rooftop patio is a giant plus and has a nice view of La Croix du Mont Royal. Eric responded promptly to any questions, and check-in and check-out were a breeze. We would love to stay here again.

Excellent apartment. It has everything you need. The metro and buses are just across the street. Excellent location. It has a terrace with a beautiful view to enjoy. And Eric is communicative and always willing to help. Recommend!
The apartment is perfect and the location is one of the best in Montreal. Eric was very friendly and communicating with him was very effective.
We had an excellent stay in this clean, well-equipped studio located right in the heart of Montreal. The metro is just across the street if you want to get away from the city center.
Nice studio. Great downtown location! Thanks Eric!

Staying here was an amazing experience! Marie-Andree gave us a great orientation when we first arrived and I was really happy that we had everything we needed from the start - fresh towels, bedding, kitchen supplies, mini toiletries in the bathroom - and the place was spotless! It was like staying at a nice hotel. Great location close to some nice bars and restaurants, and Marie-Andree was lovely and responsive until the very end. Very happy to have been the first guests here - hope many more get to enjoy the space :)

We miss Montreal already. We had such a great time there. The flat is divine. Marie-Andree and Stephane were really welcoming (and great at helping us out before and during our stay with all our questions) and the location -- The Plateau -- is superb. Lots of cute restaurants and cafes on Rue Laurier, a minute away, and more shopping and bars on Rue Mont Royal, a 10-minute walk. We couldn't have hoped for more. Thanks to Marie-Andree and Stephane for being so kind and putting so much thought into your flat. We hope to see you again soon!

We had a fantastic stay in this beautiful apartment on the Plateau. The location is unbeatable, only steps away from the charming, tree-lined rue Laurier, which is chock full of great cafés, restaurants, bakeries & grocery stores. The apartment was spotless and had everything we could need, including a great & calm back balcony spot for a nice BBQ and glass of wine (or two) at the end of the day. Thanks Marie-Andrée & Stéphane, we will definitely return again.

Marie-Andrée was a super welcoming and available host! The ease of communication was greatly appreciated. The apartment, in turn, was impeccable, charming and met all our expectations. It is located in a lovely neighborhood near many shops and cafes. We only regret that we didn't have enough time to enjoy the surroundings and the BBQ which was at our disposal! My friends and I are grateful for your hospitality. See you soon! :)

This apartment was truly charming and perfect for our recent 3 night stay in Montreal. My teen daughter, her two friends and I all loved it. It was spotlessly clean, decorated in a very welcoming, comfortable way, and had everything we needed for our stay. The kitchen is so pleasant with large windows and high ceilings, perfect to enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning. The back patio was equally inviting and we enjoyed eating breakfast and dinner there. The pictures accurately show the apartment but can't quite do it full justice. The neighborhood also won us over - it is a beautiful residential street - lots of trees, easy parking (but pay attention to certain sections requiring a residential sticker), and very safe. Rue Laurier is a 2 minute walk and full of cafes, restaurants, a grocery store, and cute shops. The metro is about 10 minutes away by foot but a nice walk along Laurier and past the park. We took advantage of the Bixi bikes at the corner of the block (2 minutes away) and loved exploring the city by bike - made very easy with the bike lanes and attention to cyclists all throughout the city. Marie-Andree and Stephane could not have been nicer in welcoming us to Montreal and to the apartment. They were quick to respond to emails before our arrival and waiting to meet us when we arrived - even an hour late after a long delay at the US/Canadian border. We had to get right back out the door for an event and they were very helpful with metro directions. It is very nice having them living right downstairs - very convenient if there were any questions. The next day I texted asking if it was a good time to ask for advice on some sightseeing. They were out to lunch but sent Marie-Andree's brother over to answer my questions and provide great recommendations. There was fresh fruit, milk, butter and condiments in the refrigerator, and delicious coffee - very thoughtful and particularly helpful as we didn't have to go to the store right away and were able to enjoy our first morning with the food we brought and what they left for us. All in all, we loved staying here, highly recommend it and hope to come back to Montreal and stay here again. Our only complaint was that we couldn't stay another day or two! Thank you Marie-Andree and Stephane!
We booked the place at the last minute with no problems, and the apartment was ready when we arrived. It was very clean and exactly as it looked in the pictures. It was great.

A wonderful stay by fabulous hosts! The apartment was immaculately clean, just as pictured. In a great location... charming neighborhood, steps from shops, cafes, etc. I will surely be back and have already recommended trips to stay here to my friends.

Excellent performance, the owner is available and accommodating. He has offered assistance multiple times.

Our stay was very pleasant.
We had a wonderful stay with Marie-andrée and Stéphane. The apartment is superb, clean and well located! Stéphane was truly welcoming. We highly recommend them 100%!

Beautiful one-bedroom apartment with den in one of the best neighborhoods in Montreal (Petit Laurier in Plateau Mont-Royal). Hosts were quick to reply in communications and the listing was exactly as per the photos. Three beds (one bedroom and two sofa beds) were comfortable and the experience was hotel-like with extra blankets and pillows, toiletries and a beautiful patio at the back.

We got to stay in this beautiful apartment over the weekend and had absolutely nothing to complain about! The place was just as described, and Marie and Stéphane were great hosts. Whenever we get a chance to come back to Montreal, this will be our go-to place for accommodation! Merci beaucoup!

Two adults and one child visited Montreal in summer for two days. We enjoyed the city and the nice apartment. It was near downtown (a 15-minute walk to the next subway station, and with the subway a 10-minute ride). Rue Manquette was very charming and close by we could use the restaurants, supermarket... everything we needed. We met only Stephane, he was a very good host and he was very friendly. Marie and Stephane answered every question via SMS...thank you very much. They helped us whenever. The apartment was cozy and adequate for the price. Maybe the balcony was a little bit too small for us. 

We recommend Marie and Stephane as good hosts. Thanks for everything.

A wonderful couple who made us feel welcome. Great communication via email prior to our visit (we were coming from the US and would not have the ability to make phone calls or access email once we crossed the border). Beautiful space with deck access. Fully equipped kitchen, though there were so many great restaurants two blocks away that we never cooked!

Marie and Stephane were such wonderful hosts. They were very accommodating, warm, communicative and responsive. We traveled with two teens who also thought the apartment was perfect - comfortable, very clean and ideally located. A short walk to several great restaurants, boutiques and about ten mins to the metro. Pleasant walk to hip shopping strips and cafes. We loved exploring Montreal and will definitely be back. Thanks to our hosts who played a part in making this visit quite memorable...

The neighborhood is very charming and pleasant; it's on a lovely private street, and the apartment itself is very tidy and clean. I didn't meet the host, but they were quick to answer any questions via the messaging app on the Airbnb app.

Our only complaint was that the pull-out couch wasn't very easy to unfold into a bed. Also, the lock for the door is hard to close and secure before leaving. 

Other than that, the place is nice and good for four people (once you unfold the bed, of course).

Bon stay in Montreal!
The apartment is comfortable and functional.
Everything we needed was there!
Typical neighborhood and very pleasant!
Marie André and Stéphane were present as soon as we needed them!
Only small downside: it lacks a fan (very hot in July)

The apartment was just as beautiful as advertised. The location was fantastic, the neighborhood was gorgeous, and the people were lovely. We were greeted promptly and warmly, and had a wonderful time. Thank you for having us!

Can't say enough wonderful things about this little gem. Great location, very clean and comfortable, and a nice bed :) We have a little one and it was perfect for the three of us. Marie and Stephane were gracious and available if we needed anything. Five stars!

Stéphane greeted us upon our arrival and gave us a brief tour of the apartment. He was incredibly friendly and provided restaurant recommendations when we asked. The place looks exactly as it does in the pictures. It is very clean and bright. The bathroom is tiny but modern with everything you need. The beds were comfortable, and the rooms cozy. 

I would definitely stay there again whenever I return to Montreal.

The apartment was very clean and well-furnished, fully meeting our needs. The location was convenient, and the neighborhood was pleasant, quiet, and safe, with many amenities.

We would have no hesitation in returning.

Superb apartment in a very pleasant neighborhood. Marie-Andrée and Stéphane were very accommodating and welcoming. The rooms were a bit warm but I visited Montreal during an unusual heat wave, so it wasn't due to the hosts... who also added that they plan on adding a fan in the future.
In short, I recommend!
We were warmly welcomed by Marie-Andrée. The apartment is very nice and functional with good quality bedding. The neighborhood is very pleasant, quiet, with a park nearby.

Absolutely beautiful apartment in a lovely neighborhood! 
Very friendly, easygoing hosts.
Would definitely stay here again.

We had a very good stay in this apartment which was consistent with the description and photos, located in a quiet neighborhood yet close to all amenities (restaurants, metro, etc...).

Marie-Andrée and Stéphane were very discreet hosts while also being very available when we needed them.

Marie-Andrée and Stephanie were very friendly! They welcomed us well, and their apartment is really great, the photos are accurate! 
I highly recommend it!

Pleasant apartment typical of Montreal. Located on the Plateau, 5 minutes from the bus and 10 minutes from Laurier metro station in a quiet street with numerous shops and restaurants nearby.  Corresponds exactly to the website description with a small bathroom (especially the sink), but very functional. Beautiful sunny balcony in the afternoon. An address to remember; we'll definitely be back soon!

Stéphane and Marie-Andrée warmly welcomed us for our last-minute trip to Montreal. They were super responsive and we had nothing missing. The apartment was very well located and clean... even better than in the photos.

The only thing is that we would have preferred to stay longer!

We stayed here just before the holidays and had a great experience. Everything was as described and although we didn't get much of a chance to chat with Stephane, he was very friendly and inviting. The location is great. Lots of restaurants and bakeries nearby as well as a grocery store. The place was very clean and although the bathroom is small, it was totally functional and the shower had great pressure! Overall, we would stay here again and definitely recommend it to others.
The apartment and the neighborhood were wonderful; everything we needed was inside, and there was a good selection of restaurants and shops nearby, including a grocery store.

Our stay at Marie-Andrée and Stéphane's apartment was perfect. The place was clean and simple, yet with just enough to make it convenient and give it character. The street is quiet and the neighborhood charming. It's a great location if you want to be close to the Plateau, Mile-End, and Parc Lafontaine but slightly off the main streets. There are several great restaurants and shops within an easy walk and conveniently located near the metro. I would definitely stay again.
The host cancelled this reservation 92 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Thank you! Everything was great. We loved the space - it was very comfortable and charming. Thanks also for the two fans to help keep us cool.

We had a pleasant stay at Marie-André and Stéphane's place. The apartment is very nice. Everything is close to the accommodation (supermarket, metro, restaurant, park) which is very convenient! The neighborhood is great! We really enjoyed it!  
We highly recommend this apartment.

Super neighborhood, typical apartment, warm welcome... What more could we ask for on our arrival in Canada! The apartment is super, everything at your disposal, the barbecue is particularly appreciated, lots of charm and a very nice welcome! We recommend it!!

The apartment is very well located, just 10 minutes from the Laurier station and close to all shops. The street is quiet. The accommodation for 4 people is spacious and practical with a lot of charm. In terms of value for money, it's top-notch, I highly recommend this accommodation, thank you to the owners.

Marie-Andrée and Stéphane emailed us to let us know our apartment was no longer available for the booked dates, but they offered us another for the same price to compensate for the inconvenience. Although we did not stay in the apartment pictured, I will still review our experience. Our arrival time ended up being a bit later than originally planned, however it didn't end up being an issue and Stéphane was very flexible with meeting times. We met Stéphane at the apartment upon arrival and he gave us a tour and the keys. The apartment was absolutely gorgeous and it was in a great location. Free parking on the street. The only negative was that it was very warm inside, and because of the large windows, sunny days and lack of air conditioning made it harder to cool down the apartment; however they did have multiple fans throughout the apartment. They were readily available to answer any questions and were easy to contact. I would definitely recommend staying in one of Marie-Andrée and Stéphane's apartments! I would stay there again.
Our hosts were fantastic, the place was spacious, clean and well-kept. Definitely hoping to stay there again!

The hosts were easy to communicate with and were happy to provide suggestions. Our only complaint was that some essential amenities were not available, such as toilet paper, paper towels, laundry detergent, and soap. Our stay would have been great if these items had been provided.
Great equipped apartment. It looks exactly as it is in the pictures. Great location. The apartment is perfect for a couple. Everything is reachable within walking distance. Lovely neighborhood.
Beautiful spot with lots of character in a nice area. Quaint and comfortable. All amenities available: shampoo, conditioner, toiletries, towels, etc. A definite 10/10!

Communication before arrival was great. We let Marie-Andree and Stephane know that we would be arriving later than originally planned; they would be out, so left a key inside. Easy.  We found the neighborhood beautiful, and the location good. Parking was easy. Stephane recommended a great sushi restaurant (Tri Express) on the corner. The apartment itself was, for the most part, comfortable. The bedroom, the bed. Plenty of closet space, hangers, surface space to put stuff. Cute kitchen. Cute shared deck with grill (we didn't use it, however). Fans were a welcome thing as it was warm and humid during much of our stay.  What wasn't expected was the uncomfortable sofa bed: you could feel the bars of the frame whether sitting or sleeping, and the noise late at night from the very heavy-footed upstairs neighbors. If you are a light sleeper you may also find this disruptive. Also, the apartment was very clean, except for the floors which seemed not to have been washed in a while which we noticed from walking barefoot. I don't like ending on a negative note, so I'll close by saying the hosts were friendly and responsive.

This is a fantastic apartment in a great location. It's a quick 15-minute walk to the metro, and there are lots of great restaurants and stores nearby. The apartment is in an older building with lots of historical details, including gorgeous hardwood floors. The bathroom, while small, is well appointed, and the kitchen is excellent. We really enjoyed the outdoor deck area for breakfast.  The host family lives right downstairs and was a joy to deal with. Truly one of our best rental experiences. Highly recommended!

Clean and spacious accommodation for 2, a bit shady. Comfortable bedding. A bit noisy due to a lot of work going on in the neighborhood at the moment. Furniture a bit dated, dishes scattered and a broken barbecue, shame... but overall comfortable.

Great experience! Good location, a bit of a walk from the metro but close to bike share and bus. Near cute restaurants, a beautiful park, walking distance to bars. The apartment was clean and VERY well equipped. Only issue was the futon in the living room is pretty uncomfortable (especially for two adults), but would still very much recommend. Easy street parking. We never met the hosts but communication was easy. :)
Very well-located apartment in a quiet area. The host is very friendly. Please note that parking is available at the bottom of the building (please inquire with the host beforehand).
The apartment is very nice, spacious and clean, in a very pleasant neighborhood, close to shops, restaurants and the Laurier Park. Stéphane is a very welcoming host. We had a perfect stay!

Really great space! Awesome kitchen and balcony with BBQ. Great location, close to the metro and cute neighbor with restaurants and a grocery store. Perfect stay and the hosts were very accommodating! Thanks!
Pleasant apartment as advertised. A bit small for four but we adapt for vacation. The owner is very nice and accommodating. Thanks, Stéphane.

A great flat in a nice, walkable neighborhood with good restaurants and all the conveniences, including a bike share at the end of the street. Our hosts were responsive and available to show us the flat's features. We had a brief but comfortable stay and we would not hesitate to rent the flat again.

Marie and Stéphane's accommodation is very comfortable, clean, and well-equipped. It is ideally located in a very quiet neighborhood, yet close to shops and the animation of Mont Royal street. It is very easy to get around on foot to discover Montreal as buses and the metro are nearby (the Laurier station is 10 minutes walk away). Stéphane welcomed me upon my arrival and showed me the accommodation and its amenities. Marie and Stéphane live on the ground floor, so they are easily reachable if needed. I had a wonderful stay and recommend this accommodation.
Great location and neighborhood! Response rate is fast and efficient.
Excellent bed, very quiet and exceptionally located.

Upon our arrival, Stéphane was absent but had agreed upon a location for us to pick up the key. He joined us later and made sure we were missing nothing. He was very welcoming and communication was easy at every stage of the reservation. 

The location is very idyllic with beautiful streets lined with trees and charming alleys. There are several shops and a grocery store nearby, and it's pleasant to stroll around the neighborhood as a family.  It's also close to the Laurier Park where there are facilities for young children. 

There is a bit of a lack of space in the kitchen to eat for four people, but the place is very warm and welcoming. We have two children under 4 years old and everything was well-adapted: we didn't need to make the place "kid-proof." There are also young children living nearby, which kept them company. The other tenants of the building are very calm and quiet, no issues on that side. We were able to park right on the street and made our trips by metro. 

In short, it was a wonderful experience and I highly recommend Marie-Andrée and Stéphane's accommodation!
Thank you for a wonderful stay at your place. We loved the apartment and the location was fantastic. The hosts were easy to communicate with and responded promptly to our requests.
Great house in a superb location. I was on a business trip for a long week and the house really felt like home. Thank you again for letting me stay.
Thanks for having us! We loved your place for our trip to Montreal.

The apartment was very comfortable and quiet. Located on a beautiful street, just around the corner from many great shops and restaurants. The hosts were very welcoming. They were always available to answer questions and provide recommendations. This was the perfect spot for a Montreal getaway.

This was our first long-term stay and it couldn't have been a better experience. The apartment, the neighborhood, and the hospitality of our hosts were all far above and beyond. We would not hesitate to suggest this apartment to anyone else. A++++.

I stayed in this place for 2 months (!) and it was the perfect home away from home. The best location in Montreal, great neighborhood with the trendiest cafes and restaurants. Good transportation and close to many cultural places. The apartment is quiet and green, well-designed and full of light. It was a wonderful experience I would recommend to anyone.

This is a beautiful space in an excellent neighborhood. The hosts were extremely quick to respond and very accommodating to requests. Within a few hours they let me check in early due to a change in travel plans. The hosts gave excellent tips and are located beside a major street with quaint coffee shops, restaurants, and boutiques. There was no A/C so it got very hot (despite the use of fans) but there are blinds that can be closed to help keep the space cooler. Thanks so much for having us!

Marie and Stéphane are great hosts. They made us feel like we were in our own home. The location of the place is great; it's close to parks like La Fontaine and Sir Wilfred, where my 2-year-old son loved to play. The Laurier metro station is a 15-minute walk away. Many bus stops are within a 2-5 minute walk. We loved our stay here. This place is one of the best places to visit Montreal. Thanks for everything.
Excellent for those who want to immerse themselves in the atmosphere of the Plateau in Montreal!

Great place with an even greater host! Carlos was very thorough in making sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. The apartment is in a wonderful location. It's the 2nd house up from the water on a quiet street. Bike paths following the water are a wonderful place to run, bike and walk. The apartment has a newly renovated kitchen & bathroom. The kitchen has great quality pots & pans, a drip coffee maker and a Krups pump espresso machine for us caffeine addicts. The wall AC unit was great and will be very useful in the summer months. The non-renovated floors are a bit creaky, giving you an authentic Montreal feel.  All in all a wonderful place with a wonderful host.
Carlos is an excellent host who made every effort to ensure your comfort.

I loved the apartment; everything was clean and in its place. The neighborhood is great, with very nice neighbors and you feel safe. Carlos was a great host and he was always there to answer your questions when you needed help finding your way around. Thank you so much, Carlos...

Our accommodation on Clemenceau was exactly as described and as pictured in the photographs. The apartment was very, very clean, and incredibly quiet. The pictures do not do the kitchen and bathroom justice; they were both beautifully renovated. The kitchen was well equipped; we had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.  The location was excellent for anyone who enjoys cycling or walking; only steps from the riverfront trail and bird sanctuary. There is a public swimming pool within walking distance that is very cool.   Although the apartment is not located in the heart of Montreal, there is a bus stop a few minutes away with a short ride to the Metro (subway) to take you downtown. Getting to the heart of Montreal is easy by car. There was ample street parking.  Our host, Carlos, was downstairs and was very accommodating. We would recommend this accommodation.

The house is exactly as advertised, in my opinion this is a unique house. The house combines historic charm with wood floors and antique cupboards, etc., and upgraded kitchen and bathroom, which are absolutely wonderful. 

The location of the house is also great; it's right next to the St. Lawrence River, which is a perk. 

Ample parking is available on the street. 

I had a great stay and would recommend it to friends and family.

Thank you so much to Carlos for making our Montreal experience so great. My kids love his place, and it's right across the street from a beautiful park. We rented bikes and enjoyed the sunshine. 

The apartment is bright, has an eclectic mix of antique-style furniture and very comfy beds. It's spacious and well-stocked. The kitchen and bathroom are recently upgraded and brand new.

Carlos was quick to respond to all my messages and very helpful.  We didn't really need much during our stay as almost everything was ready and available. 

It was a pleasure to stay in his place, and I would definitely come back. I would definitely recommend!

Very nice apartment, it corresponds to the description. The location is perfect in a quiet neighborhood, right on Saint Laurent and close to Downtown Montreal. 

The host took good care of our stay. This accommodation is definitely recommended!

Carlos's apartment was one of my best Airbnb experiences ever. There are two spacious bedrooms with comfy beds and one queen-size sofa bed, which was better than described. It's very, very clean and well maintained. The kitchen and bathroom are very nice and clean. The plus is the surrounding area is very nice during the summer time. Carlos was very responsive and helpful. He even brought us an iron in the evening upon asking. We had a great time staying at his place. Thank you so much.
Prompt response and very courteous.

Perfect location by the lake. 20 minutes to the old town and the same distance to Sherbrooke. Nice decor in the kitchen and bathroom. Carlos provided a lot of useful information. Good choice for staying here.

This is a beautiful and spacious apartment with brand new kitchen and bathroom. If you have a car, it's the perfect location as it's close to a beautiful river, a mall, a supermarket, and the subway station. It's a very quiet and family-oriented area. You leave your car at the subway station and in 15 minutes you are downtown Montreal. We loved the convenience.

My husband and I stayed here for about a week while kayaking in the Lachine Rapids. It was an amazing stay. The apartment was spacious and clean. The location was beyond perfect. After a day of surfing we could simply take out and walk across the street to the house. This is probably one of the best Airbnb listings in Montreal. Carlos was responsive, accommodating and super nice.

This is the perfect place to stay in Montreal. Lovely, well-appointed apartment, very clean & comfortable in a quiet neighborhood by the river. Carlos is the perfect host - he ensured everything was OK when we arrived and let us know he was readily available if we needed anything. Flexible check-in/out made this a completely stress-free experience for our family.

This House is very nice on a good location. 15 minutes driving to downtown. It is very clean. Carlos is very kind and quick to answer my questions. He had prepared everything for living. I had a pleasant time in this house. I hope to reserve again for my next trip to Montreal and also recommend it to my friends

Carlos was a caring and welcoming host. He was available in person, over the phone, or via email if we needed anything. The apartment was a gem. It was a wonderful blend of old and new. The kitchen and bathroom were modern; both were very well-equipped. The heated flooring was great. We loved the view of the river and park from the front balcony and living room window.  The apartment is away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Montreal and is in a very quiet and peaceful neighborhood. We were impressed by how clean the apartment was. It was spotlessly clean; everything, everywhere. My family loved the apartment and we would highly recommend it and Carlos.

Very pleasant stay at Carlos' place. The apartment is charming, comfortable, and very well equipped. We appreciated the tranquility of the location and the proximity to the river, which is magnificent in this spot. Friendly host. Highly recommended!
Loved the place, it was neat and clean. Nice view of the river. Awesome weather. Calm place to spend your holidays.

Perfect quiet place, very sweet apartment and a super host.

If you get the chance, please book!

We stayed for 2 nights with 3 people.

Everything was perfect!

Carlos was an excellent host. He was very helpful, and I felt very much at ease because he lived in the apartment below and checked in via text throughout the stay to make sure everything was okay. The apartment was very spacious and had all the amenities one could need.

Carlos was an excellent and welcoming host. The apartment is exactly as described. Everything is there, it's perfect. Well-equipped and clean. The neighborhood is fantastic, quiet, and public transport and Bixi are nearby. Located right on the bike path with a view of the river. We easily found parking in front. For those who enjoy kayaking, it's possible to do so nearby.
The location of this place is fantastic, one of the best I've been to. It's very clean and it felt great. I would recommend it to everyone.

The host, Carlos, had his beautifully appointed place ready for us and invited us to leave our suitcases even though we arrived early. He had suggestions for food, activities and shopping. The neighborhood is clean, beautiful and accessible for walking, running and biking. We wish we could have had a longer stay!

We had a terrific 2-night stay in Carlos' apartment. There's a terrific park across the street that follows the river, and it's near Metro stations to help transport you around the city without driving. With all the construction going on, it was great to take buses and the Metro (on a day pass). Carlos' place is well-equipped with everything you'll need, and communication with him was excellent. A great "home away from home"!

Carlos was an absolutely fantastic host! 
I spent two weeks in his amazing apartment with a friend and it couldn't have gone better!
He was incredibly helpful for any kind of problem and especially very kind to us.
He recommended where to buy most of the things we needed for our stay, and how to navigate the city, which was super easy from his apartment.
The house is in a very quiet residential neighborhood, but with a 30-minute bus and metro ride you can reach the city center where everything is. 
I highly recommend him!

Carlos is an attentive and responsive host. He contacted us before our stay to provide all the necessary instructions for our arrival. 

His apartment is located in a very pleasant residential area, just 100 meters from a beautiful promenade along the Saint Laurent River.

The apartment is charming, well-arranged, and beautifully decorated; the kitchen is magnificent and fully equipped. The AC in the kitchen is powerful enough to cool the entire dwelling.

We did not meet Carlos but he was available at all times during our short stay. 

A nice discovery, thank you Carlos.

The host was very friendly and helpful. The kitchen and bathroom were beautifully renovated, very clean and spotless with lots of linens and towels. The only issue we had was the futon and sofa bed which were uncomfortable to sleep on. We were in this apartment during hot days and the A/C in the kitchen was not enough. The host also provided 2 more portable AC units, although they were noisy but helped a lot.

Carlos is an extremely friendly and helpful host who gave us lots of information and helped us with a baggage delay problem. The flat is very clean and fully furnished with everything you need. 

The neighborhood is quiet and safe, with enough bars and shops to have everything within easy reach. Montreal's downtown area is about a 15-minute drive (we didn't take public transportation but there was a tube station very close to the apartment).

Highly recommended!
Carlos greeted us at the door and was very welcoming, informative, and helpful. The apartment was very clean, well-equipped, comfortable, and well-positioned for sightseeing we planned to do.

The apartment was exactly as advertised. Our family thoroughly enjoyed our stay, particularly the neighborhood, which is beautiful with the water and parks so close by. Carlos was welcoming and very helpful throughout our stay.

The place was fantastic and Carlos was a very hospitable host! The place was clean, spacious and had everything we needed for our stay. A great location near many amenities and parks. If we ever come back to Montreal, we would definitely rebook this space. Highly recommended!
Carlos was very accommodating and responsive. The apartment had everything we needed for our week in Montreal!

Carlos was a wonderful host, and the apartment was fantastic. Clean, comfortable, spacious, and in the perfect location right on the river. We had an amazing time and would highly recommend this place to anyone traveling to the area!

Carlos' apartment was very clean and so quiet an environment. 
All you need for a short or long stay there is at the apartment.
And lastly, Carlos is the best host I have ever met.
We had an amazing stay, the host was very helpful and knowledgeable! The whole area was well kept and clean in all aspects!

I hadn't had a chance to meet Carlos but, he was very attentive! The place is amazing! I stayed here with my family. The place is warm at night and the outside of the house is breathtaking! My family loves it! I would love to stay here again!

Carlos was a wonderful host! He paid attention to detail, and was easily accessible. Everything was ready to go for our arrival, and he even left toiletries for our stay. 

He left a thoughtful gift for our honeymoon stay and made us feel like we were at home.
The host cancelled this reservation 78 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Carlos is the nicest host you can find! He responds immediately and is very helpful. 
The apartment is spacious, with two bedrooms and like two dining rooms (or one but just huge).
The kitchen is fully equipped and even more... the heated floors are awesome!
The apartment is located in a peaceful, calm area. Very close to water and parks. A 2-minute walk to the bus stop. However, consider having a car if you want to go downtown every day. 
We enjoyed our stay there. Thank you, Carlos!

Carlos is a wonderful host who communicates very well. His condo is clean, has a fully stocked kitchen, and is located in a wonderful residential area with easy access to a public park and river. My kids loved walking and riding bikes at the park. The condo is also close to downtown Montreal with easy access to the city center. We really enjoyed our stay and we would definitely visit again.

In our 3-week journey through Canada, this apartment was the best we stayed at. Highly recommended! Carlos is a very sympathetic and helpful host.

The apartment is top-equipped with everything needed; all clean and cozy. Location is beautiful, close to the river and park. To town: car, bike, or metro, all possible.
Great stay. All amenities, prompt response, nice quiet street. Highly recommended!
Carlos is awesome and very sweet. Highly recommend.

A clean cozy apartment and Carlos is an ideal host - responsive, cordial and helpful.  He helped us by providing Metro cards for our use which was most appreciated - the apartment is a few bus stops from a Metro station so the cards enabled us to use public transport and the underground. The apartment is warm, comfortable and 200 yards from the river.

The place is great and exactly as described. Nice green space basically across the street and close to most amenities. Taking public transit downtown was a breeze. Carlos was extremely quick responding to inquiries. Would not hesitate to stay here again. Thanks Carlos!

We spent 2 nights at Carlos' nice apartment and took full advantage of all the unusual highlights that the neighborhood offers: jogging along the Lachine rapids, cycling to Montreal downtown using the Bixi bikes, dancing at the public dance floor at the St. Lawrence river. Carlos is very welcoming and made our stay comfortable. The apartment is exactly as described, very clean and convenient. For a special Montreal experience by bike, this is the ideal place to stay.
Clean apartment, very well located near the river and public transportation. The host is very kind.

Excellent stay in Montreal largely thanks to Carlos's apartment. Several points to highlight: 1) well-located, right on the Saint Lawrence River with plenty of activities in the greenery, complementing a both relaxing and picturesque landscape;  2) very pleasant decor and fully equipped kitchen with everything you need in the bathroom like at home; 3) USB charging port appreciated by French visitors (especially those without a power adapter); 4) AC available in each room, essential during the heatwave; 5) easy access to public transportation via bus 58 and then metro nearby; 6) parking is also easily accessible on the street where the apartment is located and lastly, the host's responsiveness and availability. We highly recommend it!
Great apartment in a beautiful location right on the river. The place is great, well-appointed, and Carlos is a gracious host. Highly recommended!
Exceptionally clean, comfortable, well-stocked kitchen. Carlos is an excellent communicator. Highly recommended!

We had a great time staying at Carlos’s place - the property is just as advertised and shown in the photos. 
It is very close to the riverside where you can walk or cycle. The included bikes are great and we used them to cycle into the old town one day - it took around 45 minutes but it was a very leisurely cycle. There is also public transport nearby, and I would definitely recommend leaving the car at the house. 
All in all, I would not hesitate in recommending this property to anyone.
Located near downtown in a quiet community. Steps away from St. Lawrence. Approximately 1 km from Rapids Park. Spacious apartment.

Carlos' place is exactly as described. Awesome apartment with all amenities and a great location for biking, walking, and paddleboarding.  A short bike ride from the Old Port. Very very clean. We will definitely be back!
Clean, well-appointed full-sized kitchen with ample space in a peaceful neighborhood. Modern bathroom with skylight. Highly recommended.

Excellent!

Whenever we are back in Montreal, we will use Carlos's flat again.

Highly recommended!
Carlos' place is very clean and comfortable, check-in is simple and communication is quick and clear. Recommend!
This was our first Airbnb experience and it exceeded expectations. The housing was nice, it's close to the metro (under 10 minutes). The host was a nice man; it looked exactly as in the pictures.

The apartment was clean, modern, comfortable and beautiful. Philippe and his wife were very friendly and gave us all the support we needed during our stay in Montreal. The price is fair, the place is close to the metro, supermarket and close to everything. I strongly recommend this apartment; it was a wonderful experience for me and my family.

Superb welcome and excellent location, as the metro is close and provides quick access to the city center! Philippe is a serious host and his accommodation is truly clean and comfortable. The photos reflect reality and we will definitely return without hesitation! Thank you, Philippe.
Superb experience! I recommend Philippe who is a very welcoming host. The accommodation is impeccable and well-located.
Philippe's place was very clean and well-furnished, just as advertised. He was very accommodating with our arrival and checkout times. Parking and transportation were easily accessible.

I really enjoyed my stay at "La maison aux raisins". It is a quiet neighborhood. The apartment is exactly as pictured and totally spotless. The hosts were very nice, and I would definitely rent again.
Super apartment! Well equipped, clean and well located. Very friendly welcome from Philippe, very accommodating with check-in and check-out times!
My accommodation is comfortable, well-furnished and very well located. I recommend it.
Philippe has an impeccable availability! Thank you for your kindness! The apartment is perfect and highly recommended! See you soon

The host was very organized and kind. We really appreciated the efficiency of acquiring the keys and being shown the easily accessible location. It was our first experience with Airbnb so we didn't know what to expect. We loved the little details added like the Grand Prix edition newspaper on the table upon our arrival (the reason for our visit). A beautiful place that I highly recommend! :)

The place is perfect. If you're looking for the vibrant life of Montreal, you'll have to jump in a taxi, take a Bixi (right next door) or hop on the metro... just 5 minutes walk away.

It's clean and close to services. Perfect.

We had an excellent stay with Philippe, he was available for the 19 days of our presence and answered all of our questions and inquiries! The accommodation matched exactly the photos and is very pleasant to live in, in a quiet neighborhood close to the metro. 
I don't regret my choice and I highly recommend it.
The place felt like home. It was very nice and clean. The pictures were accurate. Highly recommended.

Excellent experience in this apartment, very clean and well-equipped. We had two excellent nights and it was very easy to arrange for moving in. Close to the metro and amenities, it is the ideal place for a short or long stay.
Felt great. Place was very quiet and clean! Definitely recommend!

Philippe's welcome was perfect. Although I arrived quite late in the evening, Philippe was there for me. 

The accommodation exceeded my expectations. Very beautiful, clean and very well equipped. 

In short, I felt like home.
Philippe is a great host! We enjoy staying at his place and we will probably go back in the future!
Welcoming and available host, very well-equipped accommodation, perfect location for our needs, we are extremely satisfied with our stay and recommend it wholeheartedly without hesitation!
Very clean, very well decorated and very welcoming.

Excellent host (welcoming and very accommodating). 
The accommodation is in accordance with the description, even more so. Complete (appliances, kitchen, bathroom very clean and very practical).
It is located in a very quiet area We highly recommend it.

Apartment with everything you need for amenities.

Close to the Joliette metro station (9 minutes walk) and a large supermarket, Provigo (10 minutes away).

Philippe is very available to requests.

Fully equipped apartment. 
Clean 
Very flexible host
Philippe's place was beautiful just like in the photos. The apartment had everything you needed and more, and Philippe was very helpful.
This place is awesome and the metro is nearby, with parking available too. I will definitely stay here again.

The apartment was clean and equipped. Very comfortable, nice, and located in a very quiet neighborhood. The location is within walking distance to the green line metro station, taking you downtown in 15 to 20 minutes. Some city attractions like the Botanic Garden and Olympic Stadium are also within walking distance. Philippe was very kind during check-in. I definitely recommend the apartment.
The place is great. 20 minute train ride from town. Pictures don't do justice to how nice this place is. Definitely recommend.

Lovely, cute little place. Had everything we needed and more. We were going to an event at the Olympic Stadium, and it was perfect, quick walking distance. Philippe was great, and quick to respond to any questions we had. Overall, great experience!

Philippe is very welcoming, he helped us carry our luggage and explained all the features of the accommodation. 
The accommodation is very clean, very functional and fully equipped; you feel like home there.
Two chocolate muffins are even left in the kitchen upon arrival. 
Philippe is attentive and very available.
The accommodation is located 8 minutes from the Joliette metro station, it's easy to get to downtown.
In short, if you want to have a good stay in Montreal, I highly recommend this accommodation.
I highly recommend Philippe's accommodation.
This was our first Airbnb experience and certainly not our last thanks to Philippe. We absolutely loved our experience, everything exceeded our expectations and even more!

Philippe's place is amazing. It is clean, comfortable, quiet, well-appointed...I could just go on. I think this is the first location I've stayed at which has everything covered. It's in a quiet area of the city, about a 5 minute walk from the Joliette metro station. Philippe was hospitable and helpful. This will be my first choice if I need a place to stay in Montreal again.
Always a pleasure to stay at Philippe's.

We really enjoyed our stay at Philippe's apartment - La maison aux raisins. It was our first Airbnb experience so we were not sure what to expect. Philippe was great to deal with. He always responded quickly and even though French is his first language, we had no problems communicating in English.

This apartment is about a 10-minute walk from two metro stations (Pie IX and Joliette) and if you have luggage, you can take a bus to/from the metro station (the metro is down the hill from this house), the bus stop is right around the corner from the house. When we arrived, Philippe greeted us with the keys and gave us a tour of the apartment. He thoughtfully had a small snack on the table for us and showed us lots of things he set aside to help us out on our trip such as maps of the city and a booklet with information to help us find grocery stores, malls, etc.

The apartment was cozy with lots of things to make us feel welcome. The kitchen was well-equipped, although we mostly ate out enjoying the great food in Montreal. There is plenty of room in the fridge and appliances to make meals or reheat leftovers. The bathroom was very clean and modern. There is a nice-sized storage area to keep empty suitcases and bags. Everywhere we looked in the apartment, we found things set out to make our stay a good one - there was a candy jar, coffee, tea, jams, bread in the freezer, a first aid kit, sewing kit, and a laundry room. There was even local art on the walls and lots of decorations around the place to make us feel at home.

I have nothing to compare this experience to other than hotel stays but both my wife and I were very impressed with both Philippe and Marie and the apartment. If we are ever back in Montreal, I will be sure to check the availability of La maison aux raisins.
Excellent stay, as always!

Super apartment! Located in a semi-basement, it is bright but still fresh, very clean and well-equipped. From the moment we arrived, Philippe welcomed us warmly and left muffins for us in the kitchen. The neighborhood is very quiet, facing a pleasant little park. The hosts are extremely kind and have many small attentions that are greatly appreciated!
This listing did not disappoint. It was well-appointed, clean, and Philippe goes above and beyond to make your stay very comfortable. Would recommend this Airbnb without hesitation!

Philip was a wonderful host. He provided many thoughtful touches like a binder with all the info you need about the place as well as visiting Montreal. Like many of the other reviews, he provided a nice snack as a welcome. The venue is clean and stylish with all the amenities you could ever need to live comfortably. It's close to main transportation, and will get you to downtown within half an hour. I would definitely stay here again for future trips to Montreal
Very nice apartment, pleasant and clean.  It's not very bright because it's on the basement level but that didn't cause us any problems!

My husband and I spent a long weekend in Montreal for my birthday. We found Philippe's place to be a wonderful value for the money and it was a very comfortable apartment. It's a basement level unit with Philippe living right upstairs so the host is always conveniently nearby. We found that he responded to messages quickly.  We met him during check-in when he showed us the apartment and pointed out where we can find items we may need. He gave us the keys, showed us how to lock the doors and walked us through how to park. He was very pleasant. There were many thoughtful items left for us: a couple muffins for breakfast, water, juice and beer in the fridge, plenty of tea in the cupboard. The kitchen was well stocked with pots and pans, a variety of dishes, etc. The mattress was firm and while I like a softer mattress (my husband prefers one that is firm!) I found that I woke up well rested and comfortable.

We found the location of the apartment to be absolutely wonderful.  It was a short walk (about 5 mins) to the Biodome, Botanical Gardens and Pie IX metro station. The apartment is located on a wonderfully quiet residential street and we felt very safe leaving our car parked on the street. Near the apartment is a grocery store as well as 3 local parks that were beautiful to walk through. We couldn't have been happier with the location of this space.
A wonderful place with everything needed to stay for a couple of days or longer. I'll be back soon
Well-located with all the necessary equipment and more. Thank you.

This was our first Airbnb and it was wonderful! The apartment was beautiful, apparently new, and well-equipped on a quiet street. Philippe went far beyond what we could have expected in helping us. When we were having trouble finding our way from the airport, he came and picked us up at the Metro. He was available every time we needed any help planning what we would do in Montreal. 

The most fascinating place we visited turned out to be the botanical garden, unlike anything we’ve seen anywhere else, and the big chain of greenhouses with plants from around the world and information about them. They are a short walk from Philippe's house, as is the Metro. There's a bus to a different Metro station that stops even closer to his house but we didn't use it.

Overall, Montreal was a great vacation for us. The only downside was flight delays in both directions, to and from Boston. We could have gotten there much faster and easier by car, which is how we will go if we have a chance for a second trip.

This was our third trip to Montreal since our son and daughter-in-law got married, and Philippe's home will be our go-to from now on. Everything about the place made us feel like we had found a rare gem. From the high-end finishes in the kitchen and bathroom, to the linens and towels, and the yummy muffins and other thoughtful touches.  Philippe had a quick response to any question or need we had and truly made us feel welcome in his home.
A hidden gem in the Airbnb landscape! I'll be back soon

We really enjoyed Leyla's apartment! It's spacious and located right in the heart of Montreal, has a nice view and the pool and fitness room are great. The apartment was clean and everything went smoothly and without any complications! Thanks!
The place was in a very convenient location. We walked to pretty much everywhere within downtown. The place is nice and spacious – just as it is in the pictures.
The location was great and matched the advertisement perfectly. The apartment was very nice, and the photos accurately depicted what we were expecting. We had a wonderful stay.

The apartment was amazing, comfortably furnished and well located right in the city center. The Metro station "Place des Arts" and Bixi station (Montreal system for cheap biking through the city) were situated just next door. Leyla was very friendly and helped us with every information we needed.
The host cancelled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Jasmine and An-Julie made us feel very welcome and were very hospitable. Their home was even nicer than the photos showed. Everything was exactly as described.
