Yasmina was very responsive before my arrival. The information she gave me was accurate and helped me easily locate the apartment. My stay was very pleasant. They are very courteous, speak French and English.

I was very well received, I arrived late and Jasmine was a night of St. John. The neighborhood is perfect between Saint Laurent and Saint Denis, restaurants, shopping, metro, bus. The apartment and the room are very clean.

Lovely large airy apartment in a very good part of Montreal. Good transport connections. Everything nearby on Monkland, including a good coffee shop. Barbecue and back deck directly off kitchen so very pleasant. Initially not as clean as we are used to with Airbnb, but Kristin sorted this as soon as we raised it sending the cleaning company, and was in touch throughout to check that things were Ok. There is a problem with the second bedroom window, which lacks an insect screen, a necessity particularly in summer. The 2 double bedrooms are fine, but the sofa/bed is not comfortable. Subject to these points being fixed, we recommend this.

Emilie & her roommate Olivia were amazing hosts who made me feel comfortable from the very first minute I arrived. The apartment is located in a very nice area with lots of cafes and shops. A metro stop and a grocery store are close by. They both gave me really good tips on where to go and I knew I could ask them about everything I needed to know for my stay! I totally recommend their place with the beautiful backyard terrace!!

Very warm and welcoming atmosphere. Super apartment with an incredible rooftop terrace in the heart of the city.  Perfectly located (2 minutes from Mont Royal station) with a lively street full of restaurants, shops, and life. Emilie and Olivia are two young students who love to chat and always up for having fun. Pure joy!

Absolutely satisfied with my stay!! Look no further. This is the place to stay in Montreal!!! Emilie and Olivia are the friendliest, most welcoming hostesses you will find! I stayed with them for 11 days and it was the best decision I could have made. They are so kind, resourceful and well informed about every place in the city. Their pride and love for Montreal is expressed elegantly in every corner of their home. They truly make every accommodation possible and enjoyable  with impeccable taste and exceptional attention to detail. The room and bed are extremely comfortable and the closet space generous. Their spacious apartment is conveniently located near any available mode of transportation in the city within a city block's distance. It's prime location in "le plateau" places you at the heart of one of the most exciting neighborhoods in the entire city with  restaurants, cafes and entertainment all around where you can enjoy delicious food, beer and great live music. The back terrace is a true refuge for when you want to kick back, enjoy the good weather and relax after a long day going about town. If you wish to travel hassle-free, meet cool people and truly enjoy  Montreal, stay here.

Hello Alice,

Thank you for the stay, your apartment is very nice and well located.

See you soon!

Richard and his wife very warmly welcomed me by showing me all the nearby shops and interesting museums in Montreal. The apartment is well furnished with many amenities, it is located on a very quiet street but close to the metro and Saint Denis Street and it has a small pleasant garden when it's hot. 

I had an excellent stay there.

Very courteous and professional hosts who offer a superb clean, comfortable, and very well-located accommodation. 
Enjoyable stay assured!

Great experience. 
Richard and Martina have been wonderful hosts.
The apartment is even better than in the photos. The bathroom is also very nice, although it doesn't appear in the photo.
It is very well located, close to all the important places to visit.
Very clean with everything necessary for a great few days. 
Totally recommendable!!!

We had a great time staying at Richard's apartment. Great location (close to everything, but also very quiet and peaceful), well-equipped and very comfortable. The hosts live upstairs and were always helpful, respectful and very accommodating. We would definitely stay here again!
Excellent! Great apartment for two couples, neighborhood full of good restaurants and stores, near the metro station. The host was very nice with us, and gave us useful tips.

Richard and Martine, who live above us, are welcoming, discreet, and have been conciliatory about the schedules (we were able to stay later with a flight in the evening). The apartment has charm, is well-equipped, and has an outdoor courtyard. The street is very quiet yet close to a lively neighborhood with restaurants, shops, etc. Excellent address for a stay in Montreal.

We had a superb Montreal experience, largely thanks to the ideal location of the apartment (a small house in reality with a garden). We could do everything on foot and especially enjoy the unparalleled animation of the Plateau. Martine's extremely warm welcome, a very well-equipped apartment where we felt at home - we lacked nothing. This was our best Airbnb experience so far. We highly recommend it without any hesitation. Thank you so much.

We had a very pleasant stay (6 days in late August/early September 2015), in Richard's charming apartment. Ideally located in the residential Montroyal neighborhood and on a very quiet street, yet also bordering downtown and Latin Quarter, this apartment has all the advantages one could hope for: spacious, arranged with much taste and personality, equipped with all possible amenities for the kitchen and comfort, with very peaceful bedrooms, a sunny little courtyard where you can enjoy breakfast and meals feeling truly like you're on vacation. Our hosts were helpful and discreet, and if we return to Montreal, we hope to be able to stay in this wonderful apartment again.

Communication with the host was excellent. 
The listing was accurate. Great neighborhood, very convenient to the metro, bus, shopping, and plenty of variety for places to eat and drink. Next to a beautiful park in a safe neighborhood. Very comfortable mattress and bedding. The bathroom was newly remodeled and very clean and comfortable.

Pleasant accommodation well-equipped and ideally located on Mount Royal plateau. 
Essential goods available on site 
Richard and Martine are welcoming and discreet
A downside with the fifth sleeping space which is offered: the sofa bed is very worn out and uncomfortable (stained mattress)

Thank you to Richard and his wife for hosting us in Montreal; it was a lovely week. The house was clean and well-equipped with a rustic hardwood ambiance, located on a quiet street. Richard took the time to ensure our car was parked correctly on the highly regulated Montreal streets, and his wife was incredibly sweet and lent me a travel backpack for our biking excursions. The beds were wonderful, as was the bathroom and water pressure. The house is very well situated by a lovely square and close to the Metro and several shops, restaurants, and cafes. Anyone would do well to spend their vacation here.

Richard is an amazing host who made us feel welcome in his beautiful suite. He gave us a detailed tour and valuable directions & information about the neighborhood. Both bedrooms were comfortable, and the condo had everything we could think of to make us feel at home. 

Great people and place.

Before arriving, through email exchanges, Richard and his wife were attentive to our questions. 

Their welcome was very pleasant.

The apartment is very well located on the plateau and close to the metro.

It is very clean and maintained, and perfectly equipped.

We felt at home.

Richard welcomed my colleagues and me upon our arrival. The superb accommodation is located on a quiet little street in a very central neighborhood of Montreal.  The location is ideal for travelers who want to experience the city life by foot without any hassle. Attentive hosts!

Richard was an amazing host! To start off, he was very accommodating with check-in and allowed us to access the house beforehand. He also gave us some information about the neighborhood history and provided lots of tips and recommendations in Montreal. When we arrived at the house, it was beautiful and clean just like in the pictures. The house had everything we needed to feel right at home. The neighborhood is also very centrally located, close to a lot of restaurants, shops, and a grocery store. We slept four very comfortably in the house, I definitely recommend Richard's house if you are visiting Montreal!

The apartment was located in a nice central spot on a quiet street. Everything you might need for a short stay was available. We appreciated that the place was clean, tastefully furnished, and well maintained.

Parking is available on the street. Montreal experienced moderate snowfall, which made parking a little adventurous due to changes in parking rules to accommodate street clearing. It wasn't really a problem for us, but for those unfamiliar with the cryptic parking regulations of most cities, this could be a little daunting.

This place is a gem! Fantastic location: near restaurants, transportation links, bars, shops, and the lovely Parc La Fontaine. It is spotless, well-equipped, and quiet. I stayed there because I needed to be near L'UQAM and the Grande Bibliothèque for work, and I have friends in the neighborhood. It was really perfect for me, and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

This is a wonderful place to stay. It is clean and safe, plus centrally located on Le Plateau. I was within walking distance (20 min.) to McGill U and 10 mins to Le Metro. The apt is spacious and warm. St. Denis is a 1/2 block to the North with plenty of Restaurants. I loved this place and can't wait to stay again!

My friends and I had an amazing stay here! It is in the perfect location, just a minute walk from the nearest metro station, a wonderful bakery, and a 24-hour grocery store. The apartment was furnished with everything we needed and was incredibly charming. The Plateau neighborhood was very friendly and has countless restaurants and bars to offer. Parking was also free and very convenient on the street directly in front of the apartment. Richard was also kind enough to help us remove our car from the snow when it got stuck as we were leaving from our stay. Overall, I could not have asked for more hospitality, or a better place to stay in Montreal!

Richard's apartment is located in a wonderful neighborhood in Montreal, and within walking distance from at least two amazing bakeries and numerous restaurants and cafes. The apartment itself is beautiful and super comfortable. It has everything you could need for a great stay, including a fully outfitted kitchen. Richard and his wife are so kind and helpful. I would highly recommend staying here, and intend to do so as long as it is available the next time I am in Montreal.

Internet conversations provide insights into Montreal and its surroundings, along with the documentation we found on site. 
The accommodation is well-situated and easy to access public transportation.

Richard and his wife were wonderful hosts during our stay in Montreal. They were always helpful in recommending places of interest and giving directions. I was traveling with my 11-month-old daughter during our stay and Richard went above and beyond to ensure we felt right at home, even providing a portable crib and high chair. The apartment itself is equipped with anything you could possibly need and just minutes from the metro, bakeries, and grocery stores. Situated in the Plateau on a quiet street. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Richard responded promptly to our questions and provided easy access. The listing was as pictured only nicer. The kitchen was equipped with everything imaginable. For anyone with mobility issues, this is the perfect place. Everything you can ask for: comfy beds, individual room controls for heat, an updated kitchen and bath with ample hot water, and charming décor. Spotlessly clean. 

The neighborhood seemed perfectly safe. Parking is city parking so be sure to read the signs.

Richard is a quality host! 
Easy exchanges before and during our stay, sharing good tips in the surroundings, very friendly welcome!

The accommodation is perfectly located, very well equipped, clean, functional... Nothing to complain about!

In summary, a rental to recommend for visiting Montreal ideally.

We had a lovely week-long stay in the first-floor apartment. It was beautifully and thoughtfully furnished with a small garden in back and very convenient to the Metro, shopping, and restaurants. Richard greeted us on our first night and gave us useful information about local shops and restaurants. We would gladly stay here again.
Service and amenities were fantastic. The place itself is incredible and of course the location is great!

We spent a week in Richard and Martine's place in Montréal and found it everything we could have hoped for. Situated close to transportation or for walking to and about Le Plateau and surrounding areas, it is the type of lodging Montréal is famous for. If you know the city then you already know Le Carré Saint-Louis and its ideal location. And if you are new to Montreál, you will not find a greater introduction to really living like a local while still having all the tourist areas so close at hand. I have been to this city countless times for my work and for personal pursuits and would choose this apartment far above any other place I have stayed. Thanks Richard and Martine for providing such a lovely home away from home.

Perfect apartment, perfect location, perfect hosts! We stayed in Richard's stylish and cozy apartment for a week in early July, and have nothing but praise. The location in Plateau Mont-Royal is great. In a quiet street with two-story buildings, close to a nice park in a vibrant and wonderful neighborhood. Downtown is only a 30 minute walk away. With Plateau and Parc Mont-Royal within walking distance in the other direction. And a metro stop close by if you need to go further - or if you don't want to walk. Richard was very helpful with advice and tips, and made us feel very welcome. We travelled as a family of four, with two boys in their teens. The apartment worked out very well for us. On an evening with unexpected rain, we had no problem retreating to the apartment to relax there. Plateau was without doubt the right district to stay on our first visit to Montréal. Relaxed, informal and easygoing. Full of charm and character. Picturesque buildings, good restaurants, and an area where we felt totally safe. If this is what you're looking for, we're pretty sure you will be just as satisfied as we were with this apartment.

A huge thank you to Martine and Richard for this wonderful rental in the heart of Montreal. We just spent 15 days in this apartment which was our "base camp" to discover a part of this marvelous province that is Quebec.

The apartment is ideally located, on a peaceful street in Plateau overlooking the adorable Carré Saint-Louis square and close to the lively streets of downtown and Old Montreal: all the must-see attractions of Montreal are within walking distance or via Bixi! 

The apartment offers all the amenities of a very comfortable home and the bedding is excellent. We truly feel at ease here!

Martine and Richard are exceptional hosts with their hospitality, wise advice, culture and kindness.

It's without a doubt the address we will choose again when we return to Montreal and we highly recommend it without reservation!

Excellent welcome from Richard and his wife, very good restaurant recommendations, sightseeing etc...

The apartment is very quiet and comfortable, a real gem!

I highly recommend for a stay in this beautiful city of Montreal.

We had a very pleasant week in Montreal. The neighborhood is particularly nice, being close to everything. The street is very quiet.

We had a very good week. The accommodation was very well-placed near the metro, convenience store, restaurant, and not far from the city center. The neighborhood is very quiet. There is everything you need in the apartment and it's very clean. The owner is very nice.

Richard goes out of his way to welcome you to his apartment. He makes himself available so you are not isolated in a new city. He gives you helpful hints about what Montreal has to offer. He is interested in hearing about your concerns or needs. I really liked the location near the Square Saint-Louis; it is very central and there are so many places within walking distance. I appreciated the dishwasher and the tastefully decorated space. The beds were comfortable and I used the back outdoor sitting area for a good read.

Richard was an amazing host. He was accommodating when our arrival plans changed, and extremely helpful in providing us with his thoughts on the best places to see around Montreal. The space was perfect; clean, welcoming, and the location is unbeatable. Will be recommending Richard to anyone looking to visit!
The apartment is clean, close to the metro, with many shops nearby, good communication, comfortable beds, a nice and quiet neighborhood, and if needed, there's good heating.

An incredible stay if I had to summarize it in 5 nights!

One of the most beautiful Airbnb locations I've ever stayed at!

- The apartment itself:
Very well located, a 5-minute walk from the Sherbrooke metro station right in the heart of Montreal and halfway between Mount Royal and the lively streets/markets of the city!
Practical and convenient to boot.
A perfect description of the apartment, spacious and functional, very well equipped, we didn't miss anything!

The owners:
Very friendly and provided us with tips on the city (thank you for the football match Richard :) )
Extremely accommodating and flexible in response to our requests. 

I highly recommend this apartment to all future visitors of Montreal!

The neighborhood is very nice and it's located close to everything. It's in a great spot. The house is comfortable, perfectly matches the description of the ad. Both Richard and Martine were very welcoming and kind in their interactions with us. They provided information that was very useful to us.
We had an amazing stay!!! Our host was very pleasant and gave us good advice. The accommodation is very well located, close to the metro, shops... We highly recommend it!

Richard has always been attentive to our requests, he really made our arrival easier and we were happy to exchange with him. The accommodation is located in a very charming and quiet area. The metro is just a 2-minute walk away. Everything is set up for a pleasant stay.

Thank you again for the hospitality.
Spacious apartment, comfortable and fully equipped! A haven of peace located in the heart of Montreal action. It's a pleasure every time.

Richard was very welcoming and accommodating. The apartment had all the amenities. The location couldn't be better - just off one of the most charming squares in the city and dead center. Even our Montreal friends were impressed with the place.

The house is excellent and comfortable. It is very close to the metro station and has several restaurants nearby.

In terms of space, the house comfortably accommodates two couples. We did not miss any household utensils, and the heating system was able to handle the low temperatures.

Richard is a nice and helpful person. We helped with everything that needed to be done, in addition to demonstrating excellent knowledge about the city and the history of Province.

If I return to Montreal, I will definitely try to stay there again

Very well-located accommodation that is exactly what we needed. Plus Richard is very courteous and attentive to people who rent his place. He welcomed us very warmly and answered all our questions.

I recommend this apartment to everyone. We have stayed there three times and each time it's the same: perfect for us. When we have the opportunity, we will return to Patrac with great pleasure.
The place is incredible, as are the hosts. The house was well-furnished and contained everything we needed. The house is also well-located, close to downtown but far from the noise! Awesome trip!
Very nice location and a very pleasant stay in the heart of Montreal with an attentive, friendly, and helpful host. Thank you

Excellent stay at Martine and Richard's! Apartment typical of Montreal, very well located and particularly well equipped. 
Richard and Martine were very welcoming and attentive to the smooth running of our stay.

Excellent location, close to the metro station.
The street is very peaceful.
The apartment is very well suited for a tourist visit to Montreal.

Richard was an amazing host! He was very helpful and accommodating. The apartment is a great space. It was very comfortable, with a clean, awesome layout and close to everything you want to be! The street is quiet but it's exactly where you want to be from downtown & the plateau. I highly recommend staying here and hope to return this summer.

Beautiful accommodation, very well located. 
Excellent welcome from Martine & Richard.
Fantastic flat in a convenient location. Richard warmly welcomed us with lots of local history and suggestions. Montreal and Montrealers were super friendly and festive.

We really enjoyed our 9 nights stay here. Very quiet, perfect for 2 couples. Clean with plenty of room and had everything you need for a pleasant stay. We took part in the Go Bike Montreal Festival and the apartment was close to starting points. Limited street parking but we managed to park close by most days - be wary of the confusing parking signs. Host was very helpful. We definitely recommend this place!!
Martine & Richard were fantastic hosts who helped us navigate the neighborhood. We loved the city of Anne and we'll be back soon!

This is a great place for two couples to stay and still have privacy, as the bedrooms are separated. They're also quite spacious. There is only one shared closet, but we managed just fine. Richard filled us in on the history of the area and the house when he greeted us right after our arrival. The kitchen had everything we needed (except a teapot!). The bathroom is a good size. There was lots of space everywhere in the house so we weren't tripping over each other. It was great to have a private outdoor space. Everything is on the ground floor, so there were no flights of stairs to climb. We very much enjoyed our experience in our first stay at an Airbnb. We would highly recommend this unit for anyone looking for a great place to stay in a historic area of Montreal.

Richard and his wife's place was great! Three of us were attending a scientific conference downtown and wanted to have a true Montreal experience so we wanted to stay in the Plateau region. Their place is located in a beautiful neighborhood and on a quiet street. Popular Saint Denis St is just around the corner and a convenient Metro stop (Sherbrooke) is nearby. Communicating with Richard was spot on and the apartment itself surpassed expectations. I would highly recommend their place to anyone. Thank you!

This apartment is a real gem. It's in a fantastic, walkable neighborhood and close to all the amenities you could want, including public transportation. The space was exceptionally clean and very comfortable. The beds were really comfy too. Richard was an excellent host. Even though he was out of town at the time, we had no issues accessing the apartment etc. This was hands down one of the best Airbnb experiences I've had.

Perfect location, very clean, in a charming street near everything. 

Excellent communication with Richard. Very welcoming. Richard is very available and very responsive to any problems (small wifi issue quickly resolved).

Regarding parking, it is indeed possible to park on the street for free. However, it's worth noting that parking spots are very scarce and you will need to change your car position twice a week as the city cleans the sidewalks.

Location well-situated as indicated in Richard's description. Despite its proximity to downtown, it is located in a very quiet neighborhood. Martine and Richard are excellent advisors for visiting Montreal.

Richard is just absolutely perfect!! I have never met such a perfect host! It was an immense pleasure to discuss with him and live in his place!

The location is at the top of the top, right next to Saint Denis street (the pedestrian zone) and the SHERBROOKE metro station! SUPER quiet and there's even a cat and a hamster who came to visit us. :)

I recommend it 1000%!

The apartment was clean and incredibly conveniently located. There are many restaurants and cocktail bars nearby. The metro and several bus lines are less than a 10 minute walk away. Richard has also compiled an extensive list of things to do, eat, and see. Great place. I would definitely stay here again.

Placement on the floor 
Very nice apartment

The apartment was spacious and very comfortable. The location was so central and the neighborhood was beautiful. Host Richard was very accommodating, it was the best Airbnb stay we've ever had. I highly recommend it!

Recommend this address for multiple titles. 

First, because the apartment is ideally located, just a hundred meters from the Sherbrooke metro station, two steps away from typical Montreal streets like Saint Denis, Saint Laurent or the pedestrian area of Prince Arthur, all right next to the beautiful XIXth century mansions in the square Saint Louis. 

Second, because the apartment is impeccable: it offers all comfort, cleanliness and superb decoration. Noteworthy: the absence of TV, lamented by children, applauded by parents.

Finally, the owners are just like the reputation of the hospitality of Quebecers: warm, kind and welcoming.  You will benefit from a thousand and one tips and anecdotes about Montreal and Quebec when you contact them.

Here's the translation of your text into English:

**"There are some positive things to say about this stay: one feels at home in this pleasant house located in the heart of a lively and very central neighborhood, but on a quiet and peaceful street. The apartment is on the ground floor, which we found quite practical (and by contrast, makes it rather dark, its only drawback). Space, comfort, and everything you need to cook really well. All shops are nearby, as well as the metro. The owners have been very accommodating and advised us several times (on activities and places). Ideal location for two couples."**

This is a great apartment located on a quiet side street with a nice park steps away, a vibrant shopping area in the other direction and only a couple minutes walk from bus stops and a Metro station which will get you just about anywhere you want to go. The hosts live next door and will be there to assist if needed but otherwise let you enjoy your privacy. Particularly desirable for our 9 day visit was the fully equipped kitchen which allowed the option to eat out or not.
Great place, very well equipped with everything you'd want. Fantastic location, very easy to get anywhere. Came with some great recommendations of places to visit as well
Lovely apartment in a fantastic neighborhood, close to the bus and metro. Amazing host. Good kitchen space if you want to cook.

Fantastic home and location. Everything we needed was within walking distance, and the neighborhood was perfect. Richard and his wife were fantastic hosts and very helpful. Richard introduced himself the next day we checked in and provided us with lots of information about where to access things and how to get there. Thank you, Richard! It was the best Airbnb experience we've had.

We (my husband, my daughter, sixteen years old, and I) came from Germany to visit Montreal for sightseeing. 
The apartment is fantastic, the decor is very individual and beautiful, it fits perfectly with the house. It is very well equipped with everything you want. 
Richard has made the extra effort and picked out individual tips for sightseeing for us. He is very helpful and friendly. The communication was absolutely perfect. Thank you so much!
The entire neighborhood is the most beautiful area of Montreal, so sightseeing starts directly at the front door of the apartment. I liked the area and the apartment and everything very much and would definitely book the apartment again whenever I come back to Montreal. 

Claudia

Montreal is a wonderful city. Richard and Martine made our month-long stay in Montreal better. They provided great local information and historical perspective of a marvelous city. The apartment was everything we could have hoped for. We enthusiastically recommend this place and its hosts. Thank you!

Richard's place is in a fabulous location and we loved exploring the area. We hardly left the neighborhood and enjoyed all that it had to offer. The accommodation was so clean and had everything we needed. We had two younger children with us and it was wonderful to have all the cooking and laundry needs available. Richard was extremely helpful when we arrived with lots of tips and helpful suggestions on where to go and what to do. We would definitely return when we come back to this great city!

The Airbnb is perfectly located in the trendy Plateau neighborhood, which boasts amazing restaurants. The neighborhood's architecture around St. Louis Square is stunning. It felt like we were in a postcard.
Everything you think you need to have at home is available, and the people are very welcoming and easy to get along with, making you feel like you're at home.

Amazing space. Close to many options for eating, having fun, etc. Richard is very attentive and knows a lot about the city, with incredible tips! We were able to experience the true spirit of Montreal. We will definitely return if given the opportunity.
Richard is a perfect host who loves his city and neighborhood and knows how to make them love it. A highly recommended address

I recommend Richard's house. It is clean, comfortable, and close to everything in town.

Thank you, Richard...

A superb address in a very convenient location, close to everything. Richard and his wife are very welcoming.
The apartment remains very quiet and is located near the best neighborhoods of Montreal. I recommend it 200%.

Beautiful apartment in a very nice neighborhood. You can visit downtown Montreal, Old Montreal and Parc Mont-Royal on foot. The metro is also not far away. Richard gave us a lot of useful information about restaurants, shops, etc. Easy parking on the street.

This apartment is ideally located near a subway station, boasts numerous restaurants within walking distance, and features a host who expertly balances attentiveness with discretion.  A wonderful place to stay!

Excellent accommodation in Montreal with easy access thanks to a coded locker for retrieving keys. Richard and his family are very welcoming. The cleanliness of the accommodation was excellent and the ideal location without a car. We will definitely return!

Richard's place was exactly what I was looking for. On returning in the evenings after being out and about, walking in always felt like "home". A lot of care is put into this dwelling to make guests' stay comfortable, pleasant and easy. 

The location is perfect - I walked to Old Montreal every day, about 20-25 minutes - it depends on what you wish to do along the way. Parking was also very easy and Richard's explanations/instructions were precise and correct.

I would definitely stay here again for the value, aesthetics and location.

We very much enjoyed our stay at Richard's apartment. It was the perfect space for our family (two bedrooms, kitchen, and laundry in particular). We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here! Richard was a wonderful host, very friendly and helpful. The apartment is in a perfect location! It's a five-minute walk to the metro. The place was comfortable and the kitchen had everything you need. We would definitely stay here again. We especially enjoyed being able to sit in the Square St. Louis, enjoying beautiful weather and relaxing from a day of sightseeing.

We had a pleasant stay at Richard and Martine's place. The accommodation is ideally located in Montreal, a very nice neighborhood. We recommend it highly. Richard and Martine are interesting people with lots of good advice.

Richard's listing is a lovely apartment on a quiet street that is still close enough to the action that everything is walkable. Richard was an amazing host. The place was clean and had everything you needed. The close proximity to the Metro made things so much better, too. The neighborhood is awesome with lots of restaurants and shops in the area if you don't want to stray too far. You'll make a great choice staying here!

This is a lovely rental - incredibly central yet very quiet (with some footsteps and early morning activity), use of the back garden for morning coffee, a great selection of pots and pans, and a homey feel. An amazing bakery is located nearby, and we were very comfortable with our family of four. The comfy chair in the living room could use replacement soon. We would stay here again!

Richard's apartment is clean, eclectic, and easy to get to. Richard is a really nice guy and he even took the time to give us a bunch of great recommendations about what to check out in Montreal, many of which we did end up exploring. We would highly recommend staying at Richard's place and hope to return someday!

It's so convenient. It's just a very short walk to the Metro, and it's so easy to get around. There are lots of great places to shop and eat within easy walking distance too. We hiked Mount Royale on our last morning - fantastic.
We were very happy, it's a very nice place to walk around Montreal.
A unique location in the midst of all amenities. The apartment is clean and can accommodate two couples or a couple with children. A remarkable host who is attentive to our requests. Truly top stay.

Ideally located, in a quiet setting, Richard and Martine's apartment is decorated and equipped with taste and high-quality materials. Not to mention their exceptional welcome and insightful advice that add depth to this stay in Montreal.

Super secluded in a perfect neighborhood, close to the metro, with plenty of restaurants and bars.

The apartment is fully equipped with all the necessary amenities for a wonderful stay.

Go for it!

Three comfortable apartments in a quiet street near the St Louis square, the metro and the bus station. The bedding is extremely comfortable and the kitchen is hyper-equipped. Richard was very helpful and gave us good advice during our trip to Quebec. I recommend his accommodation for 3 people.

Hello Richard and Martine! 

Your accommodations were ideal and the location of your apartment was the perfect starting point for our adventures. We loved our visit to your beautiful city!
Great place! Location, location, location! Great!!!

Absolutely great location, five minutes to the subway with a local bakery, repair shop, and bar, etc. Lovely apartment, very cozy with bedrooms at opposite ends which was nice for privacy. A truly authentic Montreal neighborhood. Highly recommend.

This is a lovely apartment with an excellent location for exploring Montreal. Very close to the Orange Line and within walking distance to many outstanding restaurants. The hosts were fantastic and made every aspect of our stay outstanding. I highly recommend Richard's Place.

Richard's apartment is well-situated in the Plateau, very close to Sherbrooke metro station and all amenities. The place was perfectly clean and beds very comfortable. I especially appreciated Richard accommodating my earlier than expected arrival and prompt email responses.  I will be staying there again!
Beautiful house, well located. Good welcome.
Very beautiful location, strategically situated to discover Montreal. We stayed there in 2016 and we only have good words this year as well.
Very clean and well-located place. Richard is a very good host!
Nice apartment, good location and great recommendations from the host!
Excellent location, good recommendations from Richard, who was always attentive to our needs.

What a perfect place to see Montreal from! Richard and his wife went the extra mile to make our Christmas holiday perfect...complete with a real Christmas tree. The apartment was completely and thoughtfully finished so we could cook a modest Christmas meal. The apartment is centrally located for walking and metro throughout the entire city. Everything was comfy and cozy. We would stay again if we return. Many thanks.
Richard's apartment is clean and well-organized, with plenty of towels, toilet paper, sheets, and space to live. They also answer questions quickly and thoroughly, and the location is convenient.
The host was very welcoming and kind to us. In terms of location, it is hard to find anything better. I highly recommend it!
Very good, nothing to say. Apartment is clean, modern and well decorated. Quiet.  A 2-minute walk from Old Montreal.
The host cancelled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

We enjoyed the condo very much. It was very clean and comfortable, and the location was perfect. Parking on site was a bonus. Jonathan was an excellent host and check-in and check-out were super easy. Highly recommend!
Great place to stay in Old Montreal, very clean and close to everything Montreal has to offer. I will definitely come back. Thanks, Jonathan

Great time in Montreal and the place was ideal for Old Port and beyond. We enjoyed easy walks to the restaurants in the Old Port neighborhood and everything in the place was fine, clean and what we expected. I would and probably will use this listing again. Worked out great. Our host even left us a nice bottle of champagne to welcome us. Meeting Jonathan to get the key went smoothly and with no hitch. The underground parking was key for us, as we did not want to deal with parking or driving in the city. A good find!

We had a very enjoyable stay at Jonathan's condo, conveniently located minutes from the historic Vieux Montreal and within walking distance to Rue St Paul, local bistros and galleries, Scandinave spa, the Basilique, and many other sights. Parking was a great amenity, we could leave the car at the condo and not worry about looking for street parking. The condo is well equipped and very comfy, we will certainly visit again!
The place is furnished very nicely and homey. Highly recommended for travelers visiting Montreal!

We booked this apartment for our son and his friend for a mini getaway during the holidays. They loved the place! Plenty of room, very clean, great location. We felt that it was a great value and would stay here again.

Jonathan's place was clean and located within walking distance of everything in the old port area. Jonathan was an attentive host and even provided us with champagne, bread, and fruits in the apartment. I would definitely stay here again!
Great place to stay in Old Montreal
Great location if you want to do things in the Old Montreal area. Very clean and nice place. Awesome host
Great spot. Perfect location. The underground parking was a plus and Jonathan was an amazing host. Would definitely stay here again.

Jonathan was an unbelievable host!!! He welcomed us personally, which doesn't happen often. He had champagne, fruit, and an amazing French bread. His place was even better than the pictures. He was prompt in his response, very accommodating and went above and beyond to make my boyfriend and I feel at home. We would definitely come back! Thank you Jonathan.
Everything was great! If I'm going to be back in Montreal, I will definitely stay here.

Perfect location! We walked for hours in the neighborhoods around Old Montreal. 

The condo is beautiful and clean, everything is there... dishes, towels, fondue set.. Jonathan even thought to leave us essentials in the bathroom (toothpaste, shower gel, shampoo, etc.) Really, he welcomed us even better than a hotel. We loved our stay! 

If we return to Montreal, it will definitely be here.
Place is great, you get assigned parking. It's very close to everything. We happened to be there during Igloofest, it was 2 blocks away. Had a great time. Johnatan was very welcoming and helpful.

Jonathan was a wonderful host who gave us a warm welcome. His indoor garage provided peace of mind, especially regarding the location as finding parking can be difficult. It's conveniently located near major attractions. 

I highly recommend this home for its affordability and accessibility.
Super stay at Jonathan's! Everything was exactly as in the pictures. Super clean, all amenities and even more! Very well located, we would definitely come back without hesitation!

My girlfriend and I spent a night in Montreal at Jonathan's Airbnb and it was great! In my opinion, the apartment is in the best location for a visitor to be in. It's close to Old Montreal and there are beautiful views. The apartment was as described and an enjoyable space - everything you need is on site.

Jonathan was amazing!
My boyfriend and I stayed here for 2 nights and had an amazing time!
When we first got there he met us at the front of the residence and showed us how everything was going to work (what keys to use and where the apartment was as well as how parking would work). Parking was an amazing benefit of this place. The parking is underground in the same building and very secure (did not worry about the car what so ever). The location of the place is right by the port and a very close walk to all the nice attractions (depending on the attraction it was 5-20mins walk). Jonathan welcomed us with a bottle of champagne and a loaf of fresh French bread (which we ended up using to make one of our dinners, we made sandwiches). The condo is exactly like the pictures show (the wifi was easy to connect to, there is cable on the tv or we connected our tablet with a HDMI cable). The condo was very clean and well furnished. Also was provided with traveling amenities in the washroom and also the kitchen (coffee, milk, bread, spices, and kitchen is fully equipped with utensils and cups). Would 100% recommend this place!

Great location in Old Montreal! Jonathan was awesome, creature comforts were all there. We loved this place and would definitely rent here again. The place was stocked with a few essential travel items in case you forgot. And a welcome treat of fresh bread! Can't beat that. Highly recommend staying here.

Jonathan's place was exactly as pictured. He was so helpful with parking our car, getting us settled, and showing us how to get around the apartment. There was champagne and champagne flutes waiting for us upon arrival as well as a loaf of French bread. It was amazingly clean, but he offered to send over a cleaning service midway through our stay. Truly would recommend staying here if you're visiting Montreal. The experience was better than I could have imagined. Thanks so much, Jonathan!
Well-located, clean, spacious and very well equipped housing.

My husband and I highly recommend Jonathan's condo. It has a fantastic location, and the indoor parking was wonderful. We didn't use our car during our visit; we were able to walk or get to the metro easily. There is a grocery store within a 10-minute walk, and many great restaurants are nearby. Jonathan is an excellent host; he met us upon arrival and showed us around. There was milk, eggs, and bread in the fridge, and he even dropped off coffee for the coffee maker. This is a fantastic spot for a couple. We would definitely stay here again.
Nice spot in the old port. Champagne and bread were a nice touch. Jonathan also thinks of all the amenities you may have forgotten. Quick, efficient key changeover + explanation. Overall great host.
Very nice and modern. All comforts are provided, and Jonathan was very helpful. It's on the ground floor, but shades provide plenty of privacy, and windows shield from noise.

I recommend this apartment for both short visits to Montreal and longer stays. It is very clean and quiet. The photos accurately reflect the actual appearance of the apartment. There are several restaurants nearby.
The apartment is very well located, we really enjoyed our stay, the bed is very comfortable.
The condo was clean, comfortable, and bright.
We had a great stay! Very clean and in a great location - walking distance to everything in Old Montreal. Jonathan was very prompt with his responses, both at check-in and check-out.
Great place

The apartment is well-equipped and accurately depicted in the photos. Underground parking is a plus. It's in a great location for exploring Old Montreal. I had a few minor communication issues with the host, such as having to call and wait around the morning of for checkout instructions, but overall had a very good stay.

Spent four nights at Jonathan's place in Old Montreal. The place was just as expected and the included parking was great. Jonathan even had a few essentials available that we had forgotten - shampoo, conditioner etc. The location was great, we were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go, including the Bell Centre (half hour) and old Montreal. If we come back to Montreal again we would definitely want to stay here again. Thanks to Jonathan for making our first Airbnb experience a positive one!

We had a great stay from beginning to end. Jonathan was easy to get in touch with and always responded promptly to any queries. Once we arrived, he gave us many helpful suggestions and recommendations on things to do and places to visit during our trip. The location was excellent and very central. We highly recommend it to anyone visiting Montreal.

Jonathan is an awesome host, prompt in email replies and very thoughtful in wanting to make his guests feel welcome and provided for. From the champagne and fresh bread, to headache remedies and bathroom toiletries, Jonathan made our stay just like home. Perfect location to visit Old Port and underground parking is icing on the cake.
The place was great! Jonathan was an amazing host and extremely easy to communicate with! We will definitely be staying here again on our next trip for sure!
Excellent experience!
The apartment corresponded exactly to the description. Very beautiful neighborhood. Easy and quick communication with the host.

The time we spent in the apartment was welcoming and it was identical to the pictures shown on Airbnb. The place is well connected and is near subway and bus stations.

Jonathan is a great host, the attention he gave us was excellent. Also, the day we arrived he left a welcome/warming pack with champagne and delicious bread.

I had a sore throat and asked him for advice, he kindly explained where to go to get attention without spending too much money.

We totally recommend you to stay in Jonathan's place.

Which is a nice apartment near several tourist places.

Thanks Jon. Greetings from Mexico.

Great place! Jonathan is a very great tenant; he has excellent communication and a clean place. 

Thank you
Amazing location! The place had everything we needed. It was a great base for exploring the city. Thanks!!
Great location!

My girlfriend and I stayed at Jonathan's place for a few nights in May. We found it to be the perfect location for us. Being on the edge of Old Montréal, we were able to walk to many attractions. Having the underground parking was great as parking is very limited in the area. 

The apartment itself was very clean and many necessities were provided.

Jonathan's place was absolutely perfect! The unit was very clean and comfortable, and it was fully stocked with enough amenities for our 5-day stay. The apartment is very close to Old Montreal and within walking distance of downtown Montreal. Jonathan was an amazing host and was always reachable throughout our stay. We would definitely stay here again.
Great apartment and friendly, helpful host - can't do better than this.

This was a great location, quiet and clean. Walking distance to shops, restaurants! We enjoyed our stay at Jonathan's place and the complimentary drinks and bread were a very nice touch as well! Jonathan was a great host and very accommodating as this was our first time using Airbnb. Highly recommend!
The apartment was safe, secure, and quiet. Its location was incredible, and Jonathan was a very gracious host. I would definitely book with him again.
Jonathan's apartment is in an incredible location! It's close to everything. He is a very attentive person and has always been available! I highly recommend his apartment!

Great condo in a superb location. You can walk to many great restaurants and bars in Old Montreal. Check-in and check-out was very easy, and the condo itself is absolutely beautiful. 

I would definitely come back here again.
Translation: Well-situated near everything and very good service from the owner I recommend a stay

Jonathan's place was excellent. It was very spacious and clean. We had access to all the facilities in his home. He advised us on things to see and do as tourists. We were right next to the old town of Montreal, so within walking distance of many attractions. 

The garage was extremely good since we had rented a car and needed somewhere to park.
Great location, just a 5-minute walk from downtown Old Port. Jonathan was an excellent host and our stay was fantastic. We plan to stay here again on our next visit to Montreal.

The condo was very clean, close to everything in Old Montreal, with a few extra amenities (bread and coffee) that were very nice. Great communication, a quiet area, a comfortable bed, and a nice shower. I would definitely recommend it.
My friend and I spent the night at Jonathan's condo!  Super host, quick to respond, unbeatable location, really close to everything. Really good value for the price and parking included!

Apartment as in the pictures, very beautiful, modern, very well equipped and very well located on the old harbor. Close to the bus and restaurants. Our host was available at all times and very friendly. We had a pleasant stay in this accommodation.

Our first time in Montreal. The location was great, walkable to Old Town and the metro in a quiet area near the waterfront. The apartment was large for a one-bedroom and well appointed. Jonathan was a fantastic host who left us a bottle of bubbly and fresh bread to welcome us to Montreal. He was very flexible with check-in and brought over a hairdryer when we realized we didn't have one. We would not hesitate to stay here again on our next visit to this lovely city.

We love arriving to a host who is there and friendly. He was! We love places that are spotless and well-equipped. It was! We love rain shower heads and nice sheets. It had it! We love coffee makers and supplies coffee. There was! We love in-apartment washer & dryer. You guessed it! We love spacious and modern places. It is that! And perhaps in a city like Montréal with limited parking, we LLLLL (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) EEEE free secure parking on premises. Again, had it!

Did I mention that there is a Bixi bike station seconds from the front door? Well, there is. You can download the app and sign up for an account in minutes on your smartphone. We got two 3-day passes for $14 CAD!

This lovely apartment is close to everything in old Montreal, and very accessible to the metro and bus lines. We enjoyed the comfy bed, hot shower, underground parking, large TV, and the nice treat that greeted our arrival. Jonathan always communicated promptly, and met us upon arrival.  We thoroughly enjoyed our visit.
Great place to stay in Montreal. Joe was very accommodating and helpful. Location was great! Would stay here again!
The apartment is perfectly located. The Old Town (Rue Saint Paul) is conveniently walkable. It was also helpful that we had a garage where we could park our rental car.
Perfect location! The place is clean and Joe is a great host. Highly recommended for a stay in Old Montreal.

We really enjoyed the condo! It was really clean and comfortable, and had a great view of the water! We loved the bread and champagne that Jonathan left for us. Unfortunately, the wifi and television weren't working the whole three days we were there, but Jonathan tried really hard to get it sorted out. I think he was actually going to change internet providers as it had been an ongoing issue on and off.  We highly recommend this condo for anyone wanting to stay in Montreal's Old Port!!

The accommodation was truly super, clean and well-located. It is a 5-minute walk to Place Jacques Cartier and close to a bike rental station. We had a pleasant stay.

The bed was very comfortable and all the necessary amenities were present.

We found our host's hospitality impeccable and warm.

Great location, directly on the river. Short walking distance to all of the sights... great location for the fireworks, too. The condo itself was nice - leather sectional sofa, good-sized kitchen, bedroom, and bathroom. Would recommend it to anyone visiting.

My boyfriend and I visited Montreal for the first time. Jonathan was helpful before and during our stay. Communicating with him was very easy. The location was a couple of blocks from Old Montreal, which we loved.
Great Location and Great Host!

Very clean and cozy!
Thanks to him we were able to enjoy a nice time in Montreal.
If I go back to Montreal, I will definitely choose Joe's condo.

Very pleasant welcome and Joe was very accommodating. 
Apparently very comfortable and clean

My best Airbnb experience ever! Jonathan is a super host, very available and friendly, and what can I say about his apartment? It's ultra-equipped, comfortable, and well located - the perfect combination for a great stay!

Excellent place. Excellent kind host. Everything is perfect. 

If I go to Montreal again, I will definitely choose Joe's condo.

The place is in a fantastic location, very close to Old Montreal but without the crowds and noise. No surprises, very clean and very nice condo. Joe was excellent at communicating with us. We would definitely stay here again.
Very beautiful apartment located within 10 minutes of Place Jacques Cartier. You can go there with your eyes closed, nothing to say but it's that good.
Amazing place!
Great condo! Conveniently located in the Old Port; on the ground floor, which is super convenient; safe; clean, and I felt as though I was at home. Would definitely stay here again.

Joe was very quick to respond, very accommodating. The shower was warm and the water pressure was good, unlike many of the hotels we stayed at. The parking space was a plus, perfect with our small car. The location is convenient being just down the street from Bonsecours Market. Thank you Joe!
Great location, parking which is essential if you're driving.

Great apartment that looks exactly like the photos!

The location couldn't be better, an easy walk to the old town and port area, and about a 10-15 minute walk uphill to the Berri metro station for access to the Olympic stadium. There is space for life attractions and the botanical garden.

Communication with Joe was always quick, and he was also quick and helpful in replying when we sent a query while we were there.

Parking at the secure parking lot directly under the building, and you get a key fob so you can come and go as you please.

Joe asks you to contact him an hour before your arrival so he can meet you outside, which we struggled with a little; we allowed half an hour extra but got stuck in a traffic jam from 6km outside the city! ...we made it only 2 minutes late!

We were a bit disappointed after reading other reviews that there was no champagne or bread on our arrival. Maybe he's stopped providing them (although there were over 20 empty bottles under the sink!).
This was our first time using AB+B and it went great. The apartment was great, excellent location, clean, it had everything we needed and more. Joe was very nice and friendly.
Location TOP ... apartment TOP and very complete... host highly recommended

Jonathan was a pleasure to work with. He is very courteous and generously gave his time in responding to my linguistically challenged parking signage questions. He made himself available whenever needed, either in person or via phone. 

Jonathan's place was FANTASTIC, clean, comfortable, and it is conveniently located close to Old Montreal, which is where I wanted to stay. A few blocks up St. Hubert and you will have access to an IGA and SAQ to stock up on essentials. If you get to the IGA then the Berry UQAM metro station is right there.

GREAT PLACE! I will definitely recommend and repeat myself :-).
Well-located apartment, nothing to complain about! A stay, even just one night, is truly perfect! Thank you

The location is fabulous, very clean and exactly as pictured.

Joe was very friendly and gave us some great restaurant recommendations.

I was a little disappointed not to find my favorite champagne waiting for me like others did, but it was a perfect, secure place and clean to hang your hat. 

I would stay again.

Really nice condo, not far away from the old Montreal and the old Harbour.
We stayed here for 3 days and used the bixi bikes. Next bixi station is very close!
The Check-in and Check-out were uncomplicated! 
Joe was very flexible with our check-in and he was really caring and often asked if everything was alright! We recommend staying in his apartment!

Legitimate! The host was very good at staying in contact even after we arrived to make sure everything was going well. The unit looks exactly as pictured. The unit is very close to all outdoor amenities.

Jonathan has been very attentive to us, available he took news of us every day. The apartment is very well located, close to the old town, but very quiet. Perfect for a few days in Montreal. I highly recommend it.

The apartment was an amazing deal. It was sleek, stylish, comfortable, and was a short walk to the old part of the city where there were wonderful shops, historic sights, and restaurants. Joe greeted us with a bottle of champagne and a loaf of bread, and showed us how easy it was to park and access the building. He was attentive and courteous, and we would definitely stay here again.

This apartment is in a very good location close to Old Montreal. It is a large one-bedroom with lots of space to spread out, very quiet, offers free parking (huge in Montreal), a washer and dryer (although there was a mattress taking up most of the laundry room), dedicated internet, so the Wi-Fi is reliable and a very economical price. There was only hand soap and three little hotel bottles with lotion, shampoo, and conditioner in the bathroom, so bring tissues, bar soap or shower gel. Coffee was provided, but bring your own tea, creamer for coffee, etc. A great place to stay in Montreal.
Great location. Easy vehicle parking. Nice, clean, and well-appointed condo.

I highly recommend this accommodation option. The apartment is well-located, beautifully decorated, clean and comes with all the amenities. Joe, the host, is very kind and hospitable. Our stay was very good.
Great apartment, super location!

The places is much larger than it looks, in a great location in Old Montreal. It’s a quick walk to many sites. Close to good restaurants.

We have already shared this gem with friends and family and we ourselves will be staying here again in a few months. It will be our getaway spot!
It's clear, it's beautiful, the kitchen is very well equipped, the bed is super comfortable (mattress XXX), bathroom as in the pictures
Perfect location and communication. Much appreciated. Cool space.

Joe was incredibly easy to coordinate with – very responsive and flexible with check-in and check-out, which was much appreciated since we were only there for one night. The place was exactly as described and the location was the perfect jumping off point to different neighborhoods in Montreal. Would definitely stay here again!

Joe's place is a spacious, modern apartment in Old Montreal. It is a great location for sightseeing in Old Montreal and the nearby riverside parks. If you are a runner, this place is great for a run. The apartment is fully equipped with everything you will need. There is covered parking which we didn't need but this is a major plus for travelers who arrive by car. Jonathan was prompt with communication and showed us the apartment at check-in. A great place to stay.

The accommodation is exactly as described. It has everything needed for a short or long stay (for us it was 7 days). Very clean, spacious and comfortable. Joe's hospitality was excellent; he took the time to introduce us to the surroundings. He is attentive if there are any problems and it is very easy to communicate with him by email. "Old Montreal" is within a few minutes walk and offers a multitude of restaurants that are perfectly adequate at all price points. However, for food stores, you need to walk a bit, but otherwise we highly recommend it.
Lovely place, nice location. Check-in and check-out were smooth and pleasant!

Joe has a great space in Old Town Montreal that is really beautiful. The space is large, modern, and has all the necessary amenities. The shower was not the cleanest it could be, but we still really liked Joe's place.
Joe's apartment is perfect, located near the old port and casino, it's very comfortable and clean. Everything was great. Thank you, Joe!
Couldn't ask for a better host

The location is unbeatable, you can walk to many places from there, the building is very quiet and the neighbors are very respectful. The apartment has everything necessary for cooking, cleaning, personal hygiene, etc., and the decoration is great! Even Joe recommended some places to visit and shop, he's very kind and responds immediately. Overall my experience was excellent! :D
A very nice apartment, remarkably well-located and well-furnished. A friendly welcome that was able to adapt to our schedule. A very good stay.
Great space in Old Montreal! Easy check-in/check-out and excellent value.

Joe waited several hours for us as we were delayed coming from the airport. 

His apartment was larger than we expected, and although the internet wasn't working, he made every effort to get the provider to do something about it for us. It is a great location on the edge of the old town and the river. Wonderful to watch the Christmas fireworks in the old town just outside the apartment.
Great location, and welcome from our host. Private parking is a plus, especially this time of year!

Joe is a very attentive and caring host. He is very responsive. His condo is very well-located and functional. Situated near Old Montreal, you can do everything on foot. Excellent condo! We highly recommend it!
Joe was an amazing host. The place was superb, well-kept, and ideally located. I will definitely be back.
Super special place, right on the port! It was the perfect distance from Igloofest. The host was very welcoming, the place was very clean and cozy. Would definitely come back and recommend! :)

Ideal location for Igloofest! We were extremely comfortable - I haven't slept that well in ages! Joe was a wonderful host, the place clean and modern, and it was fantastic to be in a location that allowed us to walk everywhere we wanted to go. Would definitely love to stay again.

Fantastic place close to all the great areas in the city. Very walkable. It's a beautiful modern place. He did an excellent job of making sure we had everything we needed and worked with our crazy schedule. We really appreciate it!

The host was awesome! The place was great too, could use a little love in some areas (bathroom toilet paper holder and shower doors) and it was freezing cold until we had to turn up the heat. It would have been nice to walk into an already heated cozy place. But other than that it was an awesome stay, very nice place, secure building, great location, etc. !!! I would definitely recommend this place to others.

- Apartment: Very clean and very cozy apartment. Great location for Igloofest.
- Host: Had the pleasure of meeting Joe and his son. Very friendly and polite. Very responsive and fast in replying to messages. Super accommodating. Joe even offered to bring us his own blankets.

Would definitely recommend staying here!
Joe and his place are both fantastic. He's a top-notch host.
We loved the location and Joe was very prompt and helpful.
Joe's place was beautiful for our short stay in Montreal. The bed was super comfortable, the bathroom, living room and kitchen were lovely and spacious. We plan to return for the summer.

Joe's place is great and located in an even better spot. It's a short walk to Old Montreal and the Ferris wheel. The apartment was very spacious and clean. Excellent value. I would definitely stay here again.
Joe's place was exactly as pictured right in the heart of Old Montreal. Check-in was a smooth process and Joe was very accommodating.
Great location for walking and public transportation. With indoor parking as an added bonus. Immediate access to the Old Port, yet in a quiet location.
Clean, great location, speedy response - would stay again! Oh- and parking!!

This place was very clean and well-maintained with beautiful natural light. Located right near the water, nearly everything we wanted to see was within a 15-minute walking distance. The parking garage was extremely convenient and easy to use. Joe was very helpful.
Great space and location. Joe was very nice and helpful. We had a wonderful stay!

We loved our stay at Joe's Airbnb. It was spacious and bright, the bed was comfy and the apartment was really clean. It was in a great location on the river. We really enjoyed walking around the area and exploring the city. Joe was a great host and we would not hesitate to stay at his Airbnb again in the future when we return to Montreal!

This was a very short but pleasant stay. Joe has a very good ear for our needs. 

I highly recommend this accommodation.

Joe's place was amazing, it was very clean and nice plus the garage was very helpful. The bathroom was very clean and they had a nice shower and bath. We had a very good experience staying there. Definitely going back to stay here again.

Convenient location, very safe and clean. Easy check-in and check-out. We enjoyed how close we were to the old port, where there was lots to do, and also close to the metro for getting around the city. The condo was large and very cozy! We enjoyed having a safe place to keep our car during our stay and a comfortable place to come home to after a busy day! Would definitely stay here again next time we visit Montreal!
Ease of check-in and out, prompt responses, thoughtful check-ins by Joe made this trip stress-free. The home is very nice and the location is fabulous! Great place to stay in Montreal.

Joe's place is great. He's doing some remodeling so expect things to be even better. The location is an upscale neighborhood in northern Old Montreal, a stone's throw from the water. If you get a chance, book Jo's place!

Joe's place has excellent access to Old Montreal, or you can walk a bit longer (or take a short taxi) to Place d'Arts. There's a great kitchen set up but we didn't have to use it with all the wonderful access to cafes and restaurants. It is how it looks with a very comfortable bed and spacious bathroom.
It's a really wonderful place for short stays and Joe is a nice host with great views of the waterfront.
Joe's place is clean, easily accessible, and well-maintained. It includes convenient parking. Joe is incredibly accommodating. Thank you, Joe!

Great location, just a short walk to Old Montreal! Included parking which was a huge plus! The apartment was spacious and had everything we needed. Joe was very responsive and easy to get in touch with.

Great location at the edge of the old town, right by the water! The apartment was clean and large with a comfy bed. Joe met us at the apartment to give us keys and show us around. He let us check in early which was amazing as we had caught a rather early flight. He's finishing up a renovation of the bathroom, but overall it was great and Joe made sure to check in with us during our stay to see if we needed anything.

Joe's condo is very conveniently located in Old Montreal, steps away from a Bixi station and many attractions near the waterfront.  The bed is very comfortable and the interior is stylish. The parking spot was a huge plus, and Joe was friendly and prompt with his communication when we had problems. Very nice place.

You cannot ask for a better location. The neighborhood is vibrant and we walked almost everywhere. We only took public transportation for Parc Jean-Drapeau. The apartment is very nice, and Helena's instructions were clear. I would try to stay again here if I come back to Montreal. The only con was that we could not turn the AC ON and it got hot at night. 

If you are driving, we parked at Stationnement Place Du Parc (3625 Av du Parc) for $20 every 24 hours. It is a 7-minute walk from the apartment.

Amanda was a super gracious host. Her apartment was clean, spacious and had a lot of light. It is located in the great neighborhood of the plateau, close to bars, shops and restaurants. Amanda was very accommodating, helpful and I would definitely recommend her space if you plan on visiting Montreal.

Wonderful location, very big and spacious apartment that looks as pictured in the photographs. Close to parks, restaurants, bars, and on a quiet street so the spot was perfect. Amanda left breakfast, which was very thoughtful. Leone, Amanda's friend who let us into the apartment, was extremely kind. 

We had an unannounced visit from a construction worker on Sunday morning who came into the apartment, and we were not able to get in touch with the host to see whether we should let him in, which was not ideal. So communication with guests should be improved. Bathroom cleanliness could've been better.

We had an awesome stay at Maxime's, one of our best Airbnb experiences!!! Beautiful apartment, nice and clean, very good location, central, great park in front of the door and many cafes and restaurants in the neighborhood and last but not least a great host! We really felt at home because Maxime was always there for a chat and to give us recommendations. We would love to stay with him again and would recommend his place to anyone!

Maxime was the best Airbnb host! He made us feel very welcome and like we were right at home. He accommodated all of our needs and went above and beyond to ensure we had a pleasant stay. This was by far the best Airbnb experience I've ever had!
Maxime was very accommodating and easy to communicate with.

We had a wonderful stay at Maximes. First of all, the location is perfect in the heart of Plateau, right by the beautiful and lively Laurier Park with lots of great cafes, restaurants, and shops nearby. The atmosphere of the area is very relaxed and bohemian. The apartment itself is pretty and it's kept neat and clean. Maxime is a very helpful, respectful, and friendly host who offered us a lot of great advice and guidance on Montreal. He is very knowledgeable and his love for the city shines through. I would love to come back anytime and highly recommend both the apartment and host.
Great location and Maxime was super friendly. Beautiful house, fast wifi and great area...highly recommended!

Maxime and his girlfriend Jessica were really nice hosts. We chatted with them when we arrived and they advised us where we should visit. The accommodation was as stated and it was very clean and comfortable. We really enjoyed our two nights in Montreal. Thank you so much!
The host cancelled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Sylvain's apartment is very well-located and quite pleasant, 
Sylvain was not in Montreal but he was present by phone and available for my arrival, which I found very nice.

Our stay at Karl's place could not have been any better. Great host, great place.

Karl responded to us immediately and made booking his place super simple and quick. 

He greeted us when we arrived and was an ideal host - with a smile despite us being 3 hours delayed. He gave us all the info and touched base to make sure everything was ok.

His place looked exactly like it did in the pictures - it's spacious, clean, has great light and loads of character. Everything you need.

We loved Montreal and staying at Karl's place made it all the better. Great location close to the metro station and supermarket. 

Would definitely recommend.

Thanks Karl

Karl was an excellent host for our first Airbnb stay. He met us at the apartment to give us our key. The place was very clean and welcoming, and he even left out some snacks for us. He gave us his number if we had any questions and was very prompt to answer and very helpful! The location was perfect, just a couple minutes away from the metro and right by bus stops. We really enjoyed our stay in his beautiful apartment and recommend it to anyone!

My girlfriend and I moved to Montreal from Toronto and needed a place to stay while we searched for an apartment. Karl's apartment was our top choice, and for good reason!

Karl was personally very accommodating. We had to push our arrival date back a day, and Karl was flexible in this matter.

Upon arrival we were blown away with how beautiful the apartment was. The kitchen was fully stocked (Karl left us some food and a couple beers) and had a great gas stove.

My girlfriend and I would definitely recommend staying at Karl's place when you visit Montreal.

Karl is a friendly and considerate host who ensures open communication, answers all our questions, and even leaves us a few beers. The apartment is fairly basic but more than suffices as an excellent base to explore the city, being very close to both a metro station and a selection of shops & cafes (I highly recommend Cacao 70, specializing in all things chocolate!). I would definitely recommend Karl's place!

Karl was an excellent host, he was very accommodating, and communication was almost instantaneous. The apartment was also wonderful, it had a very rustic and cozy vibe, and once we opened a bottle of wine, we had a hard time leaving the place. Excellent location and apartment, would return in a heartbeat.
Karl was an excellent host. Our stay was short and last-minute, but he was very accommodating. The place was clean and a good size for two people. Excellent location. Street parking was available.
Karl was a wonderful host and extremely accommodating due to the last-minute nature of our trip. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Karl's and would definitely do so again!

Karl was an excellent host and his place was wonderful. He was quick to respond to texts and emails; he made picking up and dropping off the keys a breeze; and he made himself available to help out if we had any problems. It was blisteringly cold in Montreal, but Karl's apartment was warm and cozy with an excellent vinyl collection and an N64 (MarioKart included!).

The only downsides were that free parking can be hard to find and the wifi was a little weak. I lucked out and, after circling the block a few times, was able to find parking just in front of the apartment, and I didn't really need the internet much anyway.

Great experience! Karl is an extraordinary host who goes above and beyond to ensure his guests have everything they need! He's very helpful, friendly, and informative. Great location: clean, bright, and warm. Definitely recommend it! Thanks again!

Karl is a fantastic host who always replies promptly and is nearby to answer any questions. His place is centrally located and an easy walk to restaurants and two metro stations. Despite the snow and cold outside, the space stayed warm and cozy. I would highly recommend Karl to anyone looking to stay in Montreal.

Karl was a most gracious host...he was flexible and understanding. His apartment was charming and well-prepared for our arrival...Karl was also very helpful with questions and inquiries...the apartment is in a great and convenient location...Thank you, Karl!

Karl's apartment is well located near the Atwater Station of the Metro - easy for getting into the city center. I know the area itself has lots to offer, but my stay was too short and I was too busy to explore it properly. The apartment itself is very spacious, charming, and has all the amenities you may require. Karl is really friendly, very accommodating and prompt to reply to all questions. Overall, a good value for your stay in Montreal!

Fantastic experience! 

Karl was so nice, accommodating, and very quick to answer any questions we had. We got in a little later than expected, and he helped us find a parking spot where we could stay for the entire weekend. Being so close to the metro made getting around really easy; we parked the car and didn't look back. There were bikes, locks, and helmets to use, which were a plus, but we didn't end up using them.

The place is great. We loved the record player, and the kitchen was perfect, small and stocked. The greenery around the apartment was a nice touch too. 

This was our first time using Airbnb and Karl certainly raised the bar high.

Merci beaucoup!

I absolutely adored my stay at Karl's place! A friend welcomed us upon arrival and everything was fantastic! The neighborhood is amazing, close to a metro station, grocery stores, cafes, about 30 minutes walk from the Spectacles district! 

The apartment was spacious enough for two people.
Great location and nice apartment, perfect for a long weekend in Montreal. Communication with Karl was easy and speedy, he was accommodating to our arrival and departure times.

My partner and I stayed in Karl's place for an extended period (6 weeks) when we first moved to Montréal, and found it to be a really good option. The neighborhood is well-located, close to downtown but also the Lachine Canal and Atwater Market. It also has two metro stations (Atwater and Georges-Vanier, on the orange and green lines respectively) within walking distance, and a bixi stand within a 2 minute walk of the apartment. The apartment itself is full of character and charm and is well-equipped with almost anything you could require during your stay in Montreal (a great record collection, to start with!). We found it to be very comfortable. The experience of dealing with Karl has been really great - he is very helpful and flexible (he let us extend our stay a few extra days) and always responsive to my messages / emails. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Karl's place to anyone looking for a place to stay during a visit to Montréal.
The reservation was cancelled 30 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Karl was an excellent host. He provided some good recommendations for neighborhood shops and restaurants. The location is quite good—I was in Montreal for a conference at a downtown hotel, and it was a 15-minute walk away, or a very short metro ride. It's also a short walk to the bus to and from the airport, which made arrival and departure very convenient. Flexible arrival and departure times were helpful, and the apartment is spacious and quite comfortable. Thanks for a good stay!

This was my first Airbnb experience for myself. It was very good. Although due to some timing issues we didn't get to meet our host in person, the apartment was great and the experience was awesome. I would recommend Karls place to anyone in need of a place to stay in Montreal. The location is quite close to downtown without it being loud or noisy.
