It's very close to the Metro, which makes it easy to explore other parts of Montreal. There are many taxis nearby because of the proximity to hotels. We would definitely book again.
Loved it!
Beautiful condo in Old Montreal. Excellent communication from the host, location and cleanliness. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a great place to stay!

Claude's place was stunning. The corner apartment lets in a fantastic amount of light, and the place is spacious and welcoming. Claude was a wonderful host—very responsive and lovely to communicate with. I only wish my trip had been a bit longer so I could have spent more time appreciating the fantastic historic neighborhood. Unfortunately, I was only on a quick work trip, but the apartment suited me perfectly nonetheless.
Excellent geographical situation. Condo in perfect condition and well soundproofed. Host very responsive to messages. Beautiful stay!
Claude's location was great and the space was wonderful. We would definitely stay here again.
Awesome place. Best possible location

Wow, can't recommend this place enough! What a beautiful space, and in such a great part of the city.  The apartment is perfect, with great amenities, and Claude was quick to respond to any of my questions. I fell in love with the city and will be back!
Claude is a great host.

This place was amazing! It was exactly as listed on the site and VERY clean!. It’s located in an amazing central location. We walked everywhere, did not even need to take one cab / Uber. We walked to the Old Port, Chinatown, St Catharine’s Street for shopping, downtown Montreal, etc. We arrived late from Toronto and self check-in was super easy with no issues. Claude was amazing with his communication and responsiveness to all our questions prior to and while we were there. We highly recommend this place and we will be coming back soon!

Good place, comfy bed and sofa, located in old Montreal, perfect for traveling around the area. A little difficult to find parking, especially since Montreal is mostly one-way streets. The maximum height of the bed can't be adjusted higher. There were a few bugs at night (uncontrollable).

This condo was in a fantastic location in the Old Port. I walked everywhere all weekend and visited some amazing places. His recommendations were spot-on. Highly recommend! Be prepared to pay $45 per day for parking fees.
The best of the best! Extremely clean and ideally located, I highly recommend this accommodation!!! Claude is also very attentive and friendly!!!
Great location. Nice space.
Very well-located apartment, quiet with all the comfort and very pleasant

Fantastic host with exceptional communication. We found it easy to follow all the detailed information provided to us. The place was cozy and clean, with everything we needed. We would definitely stay here again!

Claude's apartment, in terms of location, is ideal for visiting Montreal (just 2 steps from Notre-Dame Basilica!).
Claude is both discreet and very responsive in communication!
We fully enjoyed our stay!

This apartment is right in the middle of Old Montreal. Great shops and restaurants within walking distance, which was great. The apartment was clean and just as advertised—luxury! Claude was very responsive when we had questions and there is everything you need in this apartment. Highly recommend!
Claude's place is amazing! Treat yourself to amazing views while staying in beautiful old Montreal. Thanks, Claude! Bon voyage, everyone!
Wonderful place with a great view. Excellent host as well.
Claude's place is bathed in light, situated in a prime location with ample space. The high-quality mattress and overall excellent experience make this a highly recommended stay.
Excellent location for walking to Bell Centre, Old Montreal restaurants, walking along Le Fleuve, and don't miss the hike from Le Fleuve to Mount Royal!
Claude's place is amazing in terms of location, cleanliness, and his hospitality. He responds quickly and is very accommodating. The location is central and perfect for two people!

Luxury apartment with a beautiful view, located in a prime spot near the historic center. 

It is very clean and offers easy communication.
Excellent place to stay! Incredible views, central location, and comfortable pad. The host was friendly and communicative as well. Highly recommended!

Claude's flat was in a fantastic location. Steps from the Basilica and other points of interest. Great views of the city. The building is nice and clean and the apartment is very modern. Perfect for couples. Claude left coffee, cream, and sugar for us as well as a big extra blanket. Highly recommend this!

This is very easy, the place is PERFECT!!!! The cleanliness, the area, the view, ohhhh the view. The building is quiet with very friendly people. The value is beyond worth it and I would highly recommend it for anybody. Thanks Claude
Clean, comfortable, great location. Highly recommend.

Claude was an excellent host and the condo was everything we expected. The room was spacious for the two of us and had all the amenities we needed (we had breakfast and lunches there). The location was great, with lots to see and do in the area. I would highly recommend this condo.
I had a great time at Claude's apartment. It was very clean, communication with my host was smooth, and the location is great. Couldn't have asked for anything more!
Thank you for the wonderful welcome and this cozy nest! Perfect stay. :)

Claude's home was beautiful and the perfect place to explore Montreal for the first time. It was extremely clean and had all the amenities we needed for our stay. My brother and I would definitely stay here again. Thanks, Claude!
Everything as advertised. Sparkling clean, great location, parking on premises for a fee. Highly recommended!
Good location.
Clean, stylish, and accessible location near popular attractions in Montreal. Thanks!
Five stars!
Thank you, Claude! You have a repeat customer from Manitoba!
Absolutely nothing to say, everything was perfect ☆☆☆☆☆
Very beautiful view. The decoration is nice and it's close to the metro.
Wonderful place, great view, and amazing host!

We arrived late at night with two little kids and completely exhausted.  To find a welcoming letter in the mailbox was warm and detailed, and we greatly appreciated it. Andrea did an excellent job explaining the neighborhood and the perks of the house.
We had a great time at Andrea's place. The apartment is well-located near Metro Fabre and a supermarket. The neighborhood is really peaceful and charming.
We had a fantastic time at Andrea's place. It is conveniently located near a supermarket and the metro. She also wrote a detailed letter.
Amazing host!

While the host can work on dusting the place (and washbasin block) before a guest arrives, the place is good as it is located close to shops and accessible by public transport.
I would also recommend guests to carry their own kettle or microwave or a vessel if they are traveling with infants and want hot water.

Andrea's place is cozy and funky at the same time. It's an apartment in a standard two-story older Montreal building with the usual issues that come with age. We felt right at home here, much better than a sterile hotel! The location is perfect; one block from a busy street that we never heard any noise from. It's a quiet neighborhood with little traffic on the street out front. A metro station and large grocery store and drugstore are a two-minute walk, so you can get any necessities and easily get anywhere in Montreal. You don't need a car to navigate the city from here. Andrea communicated clearly and accurately described her apartment and neighborhood. Most enjoyable, thanks!
The host cancelled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Very pleasant room, comfortable and clean in a quiet neighborhood close to the metro and Olympic Park. I recommend!
Attentive and accommodating, Aurélien is an ideal host. The apartment was very well-located for our needs and the bedroom was the most comfortable.

Aurelien's room was perfect for me and my partner. The bed is comfortable and the room is spacious enough to make you feel relaxed and comfortable. The apartment is just next to the subway in an interesting neighborhood; near the Biodome, Olympic Park, and Botanic garden.

Dear Aurélien,

I would like to thank you for all your attention.

Your place is great and very close to Viaux Metrô Station which made my life much easier.

Hope I could come back to Montreal someday and have the chance to book your room again.

Best regards, 
Ketlin
Everything is perfect, clean and quiet accommodation. Great location, close to the metro. Highly recommended.

The room is just perfect and we especially highlight the great cleanliness of the apartment.  It's extremely well-located right next to the Olympic Park and a metro station. Aurelien is very attentive. We highly recommend it.
Quiet and comfortable room, I will definitely come back!

Excellent value for the price. 

The room is large and very quiet, very close to the metro with free parking on the adjacent street. 

I definitely recommend this room. 
I didn't see Aurélien for too long, but he seemed very friendly. 

Thank you again!

We had a great time at Auréliens place. He's a very nice and caring host. When we were late on our arrival due to traffic jam in Montreal he was flexible with the "check-in". 
The room is even more spacious and beautiful than I expected from the pictures. Comfy bed, whole apartment very beautiful and clean, nice neighborhood. Thanks for this great experience. Would definitely stay again with you! :)
We had a good experience staying in Aurélien's room. The description was accurate, the room was clean and cozy.

Aurelien was a gracious host, very welcoming and professional. The room was very clean and spacious, as was the bathroom and kitchen. The area is a bit far from downtown, but not much of an issue if you use the metro.
Phenomenally priced and beautiful apartment in the heart of Montreal. Would stay again

Aurélien was super nice and accommodating during our stay. His house is really nice inside and is really close to the metro and Olympic stadium, which was great. The room was very cozy and I had a great sleep. Overall my stay was excellent. Great price too! You should stay here :)
The room is lovely and the location is great. Right next to a subway stop, movie theatre, biodome, and planetarium.
I needed a place close to the arena and this place worked out perfectly. The place was clean and close to the metro.
Aurelien is a good host. He was busy but he managed to free himself to come give us the keys :-) The room is really very cozy and we feel like home! Everything was really very clean.
Aurélien's place is amazing and we had a great stay there. Aurélien was very helpful and I highly recommend his place.

Aurelien made me feel like I had the entire place to myself! 
It was a great location across from the Olympic stadium.

We had a nice vacation in Montreal, Aurélien was a nice host who suggested some places to eat. If you love pizza, you definitely have to go to Pizzeria dei Compari as he told us. He had the room ready by the time we arrived, and we had everything we needed. The house is located near some of the places we had on our agenda to visit, like the Olympic Park, Biodome, and Botanical Gardens. If you come by car, there's enough free parking around, and if you plan to use public transport, there's a subway station within 5 minutes walking distance.

If we go back to Montreal, we will probably stay at his house.

I was really happy that Aurelien was very flexible with my arrival time. I checked in really late because my bus from Toronto got delayed and he would find a way to check me in. Unfortunately, due to conflicting schedules we never met but I had no problems at all. The stay was nice... In a very quiet neighborhood despite being quite a distance from downtown. There is a lovely local market nearby which was also very nice. Thanks Aurelien!

The room is everything as described in the listing. A very convenient location which is a couple minutes walk from the Viau Metro station and is next to the Olympic Stadium. I got a C$18 metro pass and I could go almost everywhere in Montreal. One tip is if you arrive late, you better get something to eat at the airport before coming, since there is NOTHING open after 9pm... well, later I found there is a diner about 20min walking which open till 3am, but definitely nothing for personal cares like soap or shampoo. I had to take the Metro back to UQAM (7 stations) to get MacDonald, but still couldn't find those cleaning products…

Use (Hidden by Airbnb) Map wisely…

Aurelien is nice but I only met him twice in the 6 days stay... Once when I arrived and the next was the night before leaving, when I was doing laundry… 

The only thing I didn't feel comfortable is there's no lock on my room door... As coming to a new place and I don't know the people inside the apartment, I felt not quite secure…

The place is really nice, the neighborhood was really quiet, the location is really convenient to most of the places, like movie theaters and corner stores, etc. I had a great time staying there for the couple of nights I was there. Thanks!

Staying at Aurelien's was great. It was super close to the Viau metro station, and had a spectacular view of the Olympic Stadium. The room I stayed in was lovely, spacious, and clean. Highly recommended. We also speak French.
He was an excellent host. I have no complaints whatsoever. The neighborhood was quiet, and his apartment was maybe one block from the metro. Very convenient and very clean.
Lovely space, was very kind and generous. Would definitely choose this quiet location again

Aurélien is a great host, very friendly and helpful! 

The location is excellent, very close to the subway station, and the description and photos are very accurate. The place was very clean and the room was spacious. 

It was an excellent experience to stay at Aurélien's place, and I definitely recommend this to everyone.

Everything was as advertised. The room was clean and comfortable with plenty of space. The bathroom/shower was also nice. This place is in a nice quiet neighborhood but easy access to downtown if you are driving. Also, it's walking distance to the Olympic Park with the Biodome and botanical garden. Fantastic value for the price.

A perfect welcome from Aurélien, who was available, discreet, and concerned that we had a good stay. The room is beautiful, clean, spacious, and quiet. Everything we needed after good days filled with sightseeing of the city. The apartment is a few stops on the metro from downtown, which is very convenient. Thank you to Aurélien and we would definitely come back if we were to return to Montreal!
Very nice stay! Aurelien was an amazing host who made me feel like I was at home and a local in Montreal.
Awesome location near subway, planetarium, and biodome... Clean and simple setup
Very nice room. Aurélien did a great job organizing my entry since I arrived late and he was working.

Super room in a nice apartment. Very close to the metro, which allows you to get around quickly. Aurelien is an awesome host who will advise you perfectly despite being quite absent. A room for rent without hesitation.
We had a very good stay. Aurelien was there to greet us. The room was clean and comfortable, and the location was ideal for exploring the biodome area.

Aurélien was there to meet me when I arrived, and we had a chat about what there is to do in Montreal when you have a few days to spare. Whenever I had a question during my stay, he would get back in touch with me very quickly.

The room is very spacious and the bed so comfy you'll need an alarm to wake up! The bathroom and kitchen are well-equipped.

Aurélien's place is in a quiet neighborhood 3 minutes away from Viau metro station, taking you downtown in around 15 minutes. It's also next door to the Olympic stadium.

I had a great stay at Aurélien's, and I recommend it for solo travelers or couples who want to explore Montreal for one day, one week, or more.

Aurelien's apartment is located in a somewhat remote neighborhood of Montreal, but it is well connected by the metro which takes 20 minutes to reach the center. The room is spacious and overlooks a quiet courtyard at the back. I only saw Aurelien once when he welcomed me, but he was available during my stay.

Aurelien was very helpful and kind. The room was very spacious (I was able to store several suitcases in it). His apartment was quiet and located a short distance from Viau station. The bedroom and common areas were spotless. Additionally, Aurelien was discreet.

The room is spacious, comfortable and very pretty. The apartment is in a quiet neighborhood, ideally located just 2 steps from the metro, making it easy to reach the city center. We unfortunately were unable to meet Aurelien but he did everything to make our stay easier.

Everything is exactly as advertised; nothing is missing. Aurélien has been very discreet (probably more than us), friendly and good advice. The proximity to the metro is a real advantage for easily exploring Montreal.

We just spent the night at Aurélien's.
He was very welcoming.
The room is very nice and the bed is very comfortable.
The surroundings are quiet and we were able to park quite close to the apartment.
We recommend it without hesitation.
Thank you for your hospitality.

Aurélien responded to my messages very quickly and was cordial and helpful. His place was very clean, comfortable, and convenient to the metro (literally a very short walk to Metro Viau). Aurélien was helpful and greeted me upon arrival, which made him a great host. I would recommend him. It was quiet, which was exactly what I needed for a night. Thanks
Like he was there if I needed anything
Aurelien is present on site and available. Friendly welcome followed by absolute tranquility. Perfect location if you have a meeting at the Planetarium right next door early in the morning.
Clean and spacious room located near the Metro Dome and a short walk from the train station.
Fantastic room. Great location, easy to get to. Easy communication, very private. A+++
Aurelien was very accessible for organizing our stay. The room was very good.
The room was truly very beautiful. I greatly enjoyed my stay.

Aurelien was very hospitable and the room was clean and perfect for our overnight stay in Montreal. It was within walking distance of the Biodome and a lovely neighborhood. 

Definitely recommend!
Super.

This place was very private and cozy. Downtown, Old Montreal, and the Casino are only 20 minutes away. It is right next to the Olympic Stadium and there are many restaurants nearby. Aubrelin was an excellent host!

Clean and quiet apartment. Very close to the metro. Also very close to the Olympic Park. 

I spent very little time in the apartment, but it met exactly my needs.
Thank you, I had a wonderful stay! The place was clean, the price was fair, and the location was perfect. Highly recommend it.
Great
Three well
A really tidy and comfortable place with a large room. It's very close to the metro station. Aurélien messaged me several times to ensure everything was okay. I really enjoyed my stay there.
Great room at a great price. Aurelien made me feel welcome while still respecting my privacy. I would highly recommend this listing to a friend.
Enjoyed staying at this place! Aurelien has been a great host. Aside from some strange odors in the bathroom and the blanket, everything else was really clean!

Aurélien's place is at a convenient location, a 5-minute walk from the biodome and botanical gardens - must-see spots in Montreal. It is a 2-minute walk from the metro station which made our travel around the city much easier. Aurélien guided us in finding free street parking and was prompt in replying to all of our texts.
It was a cheap price but it's really a clean, comfortable place to stay! Highly recommend!

He was incredibly helpful. He had an emergency come up, so he couldn't be there, so his friend let me in at the last minute. I had the place all to myself, it was in a convenient location and spacious.
It's a very quiet and lovely place for my 3-day stay in Montreal. It is a little bit far from downtown, but it is still convenient to reach by Metro, and very close to the Metro station "Viau".
Beautiful place right next to the Olympic Stadium!

This is a great place if you want to live the charm of Montreal in a cozy neighborhood. Aureilen is a great host and really cool guy to talk with. 
The place is spotless, quiet and you get a welcome message when you come in, what else can you ask for :)
Very accommodating and easy going. Pleasant stay. Recommended for solo travelers on a budget!

Easy check-in, was able to park my car nearby. The room and place were clean and quiet, perfect for getting a good night's sleep after being out in the city all day.

So close to the metro, you can get to Berri-Uqam in a short amount of stops. Aurélien was very welcoming too. Overall it was a pleasant stay for my first Airbnb rental, and I would recommend this one highly.
Amazing experience! Great place - very clean and neat. Close to the metro. Aurelien is very helpful and nice!
A wonderful stay, the owner is discreet and very pleasant. Quiet neighborhood a pleasure
Very well received by Aurélien! For a short impromptu stay it was perfect :)

This Airbnb was great. It was so close to the metro - maybe a minute and a half walk - and right on the edge of the Olympic Park. My only issue was that I recently had hip surgery, and to get into the Airbnb you have to go up two flights of very steep stairs. So for me, that wasn't always easy - but it was clean, practical, and quiet. I hardly knew if my host was around which is how I like it. He was very courteous of my privacy. In addition, he made check-in easy as my flight to Montreal had been delayed, and he was able to accommodate.
Great place in a good location (close to downtown). The room was very clean. The room had enough space for two people.
Aurélien was outstanding. He was very accommodating. His place was clean and quiet and met every expectation. I would definitely stay there again.
clean, close to a metro and friendly host!
Set in a quiet residential neighborhood near the Olympic Stadium. Also practical, being near Viau Station.
Perfect location for Olympic Park, Maurice Richard Arena, and Viau metro station.
Comfortable and pleasant bedroom
Nice place near Olympic Park, free parking 100m away. Responsible host. Recommend.
Translation:  Very close to the subway station, a mere 5-minute walk from there. Quiet surroundings make it easy to fall asleep.
Excellent stay, accurate description of reality. Thank you for everything!
Nice place - very clean. Nice view of the Olympic Stadium - Aurelien keeps messaging me to make sure I'm okay. He really cares! Quick response time when you message him.
Quiet and very well-located with the Viau metro station a 2-minute walk away. Very quiet and view of the Olympic Stadium from the kitchen

Aurélien is a wonderful host! Easy to contact and very helpful. The apartment is on a very quiet street and a 5-minute walk from the metro. Very clean place with a large kitchen and closet. Note that it is up two flights of stairs.
The room is large, pleasant with ample storage and very clean. The apartment is located next to the biodome and a short walk from the metro in a quiet neighborhood.
Apartment as described, good value for quality and a friendly, discreet host.

Aurelien is a super host. The room is very large. We stayed for 7 nights and everything was perfect. Very close to the Olympic Park and Viau metro station (less than 5 minutes walk)! It's also top for going into downtown! Really nothing to complain about!

The bedroom and apartment are comfortable and quiet. It's close to the metro, buses, and city bikes.

Aurélien is a wonderful host; although we didn't get to see each other much, he was very responsive and gave us some great recommendations!

I absolutely recommend this place! 
Superb apartment, clean, close to everything and the Olympic stadium too!!!
Great host, always attentive and the place has a very good location. I definitely recommend it...

Excellent value for money, the room was extremely quiet which allowed me to sleep like a baby throughout my entire stay. 

The bed is comfortable and the room is well-furnished. 

Good location too, the accommodation is located very close to a metro station and allows you to reach the city center very quickly.

In summary, I am very satisfied with the room offered by Aurélien.
Aurélien was so kind to accept my request at the last minute, he was always communicative and the house and bedroom were nice and clean.
Three welcoming!

Very pleasant stay. The perfect location for the Olympic stadiums. Nice price. Spacious room. Warm. 

However, the bathroom needs to be cleaned more frequently. It has a slightly unpleasant odor.

The house is clean and tidy, a three-minute walk from the subway station, making travel very convenient. There's also a small supermarket nearby, making life extremely convenient. I will definitely stay at this house again next time I visit.
Very well located accommodation, close to the metro and Olympic Stadium. Comfortable room with good value for money.
Looking for a great place in Montreal that is affordable, clean, and well-laid out? Look no further. Great host. Would visit again.
Had a great two nights here. No complaints of any kind. The bed was clean and comfortable, which is always the main thing. Thank you again.
Great host, amazing location, and comfy bed. Definitely recommend!
A quiet, clean space very close to the metro!
Nice, clean and quiet place
Good location and welcoming host

Aurelien welcomed us very warmly. He waited for us and gave us good recommendations upon our arrival that night.

The apartment was clean and suitable for two people who stayed there for a few days in Montreal.

It was a great experience. The access to the apartment was simple and convenient, allowing us to be flexible with our time. The place is very nice, functional with all one might need for a comfortable stay. Free parking on the street. There are restaurants, cafes, and shops nearby as well as Jean Talon market with fresh produce and a great selection of cheeses. 

Communication with the host was easy, constructive, and positive. I have already recommended it to a friend and I would definitely stay there again.

The apartment was clean and well-located (near the Jean Talon market), we found parking on the street and were close to public transportation. The apartment was equipped with everything we needed for a pleasant stay. Communication with Genevieve was good and efficient.
Nice, cozy and centrally located condo. Exactly like the picture. Genevieve was responsive and everything went smoothly.

This place is a must-stay. The place makes you feel welcome. Beautiful apartment. Bed was incredibly comfortable. Stay in this place if you're into art. I would stay here again without hesitation. Unfortunately, we didn't get to stay here much because my girlfriend and I were out and about. Host was on point! Highly recommend

We had a wonderful stay at Geneviève's beautiful condo. The kitchen was fully stocked and the dishwasher was a nice bonus since we cooked a couple meals, and the bathroom was perfect (loved the rainfall shower head!). We hit the snooze button a few times because their bed was super comfortable. And once we woke up we enjoyed an espresso from their machine on the patio deck. One night we connected our computer to their tv via HDMI and enjoyed a movie.  The wifi was also strong allowing us to use it outside on the patio or front porch. We loved the neighbourhood too because it's close to Jean Talon Market and practically every street has a bike path so we biked everywhere (you can rent scooters and ebikes at Dyad to get around faster). There are a bunch of parks nearby, and Little Italy, Rue St. Denis, Mont Royal and Mile X are a short bike ride or walk away. We also found parking on the street right in front of the house without issue. Geneviève was a great host too. She was very responsive. The key exchange was easy since she left the key in a lockbox (much safer than the usual mailbox method). And she wrote down a bunch of amazing restaurant suggestions that we tried... They were amazing! 

Don't hesitate - a fantastic stay awaits you!

We had a fantastic time at Geneviève's place! The accommodation was well-located, close to the metro and shops, and also tastefully decorated. We had everything we needed readily available. We didn't get the chance to meet her but the instructions left were clear and we didn't need anything else. In short, I recommend it! :)

I can't say enough about how easy it was to book this place.  It was easy to find, the flatbook was incredibly accommodating and responsive. The place looked exactly as in the pictures. It was clean, with everything you need for a weekend trip.

The host was punctual and very friendly. The flat was immaculately clean and matched the description. The neighborhood was incredibly quiet despite being very close to excellent shops, restaurants, parks, and downtown.

The location and apartment were perfect! We loved the cleanliness and coziness of the entire place. Shane contacted us directly the morning after arrival, he was professional and helpful and provided all the information we needed. We do wish that our unit had air conditioning as we felt very hot and muggy throughout the night.
Great overall experience!

Flatbook hospitality team did a great job with frequent emails and follow-ups to make sure we were greeted at the home. We were running late, so they shared the key code for the main door. The home was nicely maintained, fresh linens on the beds and towels and toiletries were provided. There were 3 queen beds and a twin day bed which was more than enough for our party of 6. The living room was small, but that was fine since we were out most of the day. The place is in a great location, walking distance to the main walking streets and restaurants (St. Laurent Blvd, St. Denis, etc.).

The area does remain rather active late into the night, so there's street noise coming in (people talking/shouting, police cars, etc.) to the unit if you leave the windows open at night. There's no central air (we were there in the summer), but fans were provided in every room. It was still fairly hot inside with the windows open.

Overall the stay was pleasant, location is great. Parking is not provided, you have to go to the closest main street (Sherbook St) to find parking for the day/night.

Comfortable, modern, clean, well-equipped place to stay for our family of four. Great location with lots of restaurants, shops, etc., within easy walking distance. All fixtures and appliances are new and in excellent condition. Would absolutely stay here again.

Note that the apartment is on the second floor, accessed by an exterior metal curved staircase.

Great place for our group of four. Excellent location, close to restaurants, gas stations, bakeries, and all the good stuff you can find in Montreal. The apartment is as advertised, attractive, comfortable, clean, well-equipped, with nice linens and towels. Flatbook people are very helpful. We would definitely book it again.
Great place. Enough space for everyone. However, the front steps were a bit precarious (steep and not entirely stable).

This apartment was perfect for our party of four. There were four small bedrooms, each with a comfy bed (three queen beds and one twin), and the living room area was perfect for a rest after a long day exploring the city. Boulevard Saint-Laurent is just a block over and has a ton of nice cafes, restaurants, and bars, and the Vieux-Port is a 20-30 minute walk from the apartment. The area seemed to get pretty crowded with a teenage party crowd on the Friday and Saturday nights we were there, which made the two front bedrooms a little noisy as their windows face the street.

The Flatbook team was very responsive and organized. They got in touch with me right away to exchange details and to make sure all was arranged before our arrival. The apartment was clean, and the Flatbook guidebook that was provided was a nice resource. Overall, a great stay. Thank you!

The apartment matched the description. Flatbook provided us with ample supplies such as shampoo, extra Kleenex, etc. Everything was clean and pleasant, just as you would expect from a hotel. We were satisfied with our experience and would stay here again.

Recommended address! Super charming neighborhood, commercial, walkable or bikeable! Very clean, functional apartment, very quiet and friendly. Exterior access staircase a bit steep. The Flatbook team takes good care of you. Excellent first experience with Airbnb!

We booked a flatbook apartment a month before our trip to Montreal. We chose that specific apartment because it has four separate bedrooms for the four of us and because of the proximity to McGill university. The problem was that there was no hot water in the shower!!! In the Canadian weather of -2 to 10 degrees, it did not make any sense to us. We asked for it to be repaired, but although they tried, it didn't change at all. We were offered to move to a different apartment, but the apartments offered were not as close to the university and had only three bedrooms. We do want to mention that in all other aspects, the apartment was great and flatbook also helped us get a large taxi to go to the airport. But ultimately, we had a week of cold showers which made for a really bad experience overall. When we book an apartment, it's a basic expectation.

This apartment was great. It was just as advertised, very clean, and for the most part well-equipped. Its location was absolutely perfect. It is right in the heart of the plateau and an easy walk to Parc Mont Royale, Ave. St. Denis, Ave. St. Laurent, and even to McGill University. A truly central location.

The heat in the main room did not work when we arrived in the evening but Flatbook was very responsive and it was fixed by mid-day the next day. 

This is a great apartment for a group who needs several bedrooms. The key code entry was also wonderful as we did not need to share a key. People could come and go.
Great place! Fantastic location. This space was perfect for our family who needed space. The steps are steep (and icy in winter) so be careful.

The Flatbook team was excellent in accommodating us. The place was very clean and well-equipped with the necessities for a weekend stay. There were issues with the heating at the beginning which was quickly resolved, and any request was answered and satisfied by the Flatbook team. Very close to downtown life and attractions. Amazing and comforting for the six of us who stayed here.
Everything was great with the booking! Nice and tidy place and no surprises.
The place was well-kept and ready on time. The only issues were no cable TV, the water in the shower wouldn't get hot, and parking could sometimes be difficult on the street.

Overall positive experience, however there were some complications after checkout. Just make sure to inspect the apartment and take photos of anything that may not look right, and be sure to leave the apartment spotless at checkout.

I traveled to Montreal and stayed at Flatbook with 5 friends. It was PERFECT! Best location. Super comfortable. When I return to Montreal, I would definitely stay here again! The Flatbook team was very helpful. Thank you!
Great location and a nice place - perfect for a weekend in Montreal!

I was in Montreal with my lab group for a biomaterials conference. The flat is cute and in a safe neighborhood near McGill and the convention center. It was fantastic! Everything was new and very clean. I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

Great location! Very helpful host. The apartment was clean and tidy. The only minor drawback was that the living room had no direct sunlight, but it was still cozy to hang out in.

Overall, a great place to stay for 3-4 people.

The apartment is a real treat and quite comfortable! When we arrived, it was spotless and tidy, and there were even some little extras like popsicles in the freezer. The location is fantastic! Easy and quick access to many restaurants on Rue St. Denis. We stayed between Old Montreal and the commercial area. Excellent stay. Highly recommend!
The apartment seemed small for the price, but it worked out just fine for our close-knit family of six.
Everything went as expected.

Check-in was very easy with keypad entry. The room was as described. There were a few things that weren't perfect: lamps with no good location to plug them in, and a dining chair that looked whole but had obviously been broken before. None of it was enough to be a real problem.

We had hot water in the shower, AC, a washing machine that worked (and detergent packets), four cute little bedrooms, and a kitchen. The kitchen had enough pots and pans to cook a feast, a blender, a toaster, and a coffee maker. It was so convenient and easy with the kids. I loved that there wasn't a lot of stuff in it.

It was easy to walk to the train, restaurants, and shops. We found free street parking.

If we were to go back, I would be happy to go back to this place.
The apartment had great location, amazing decor, and was very clean. Amazing experience... I would stay here if I came back.
The location is good. There are many restaurants nearby.
Great space for a family of five. Clean and very comfortable. Within three blocks of the subway, but we walked everywhere, including Old Montreal, Chinatown, Notre Dame Basilica, and Mile End.
This was a very nice spot to stay if you're looking to be near downtown. Quiet street but very close to many restaurants and activities.
Lovely apartment in an excellent location close to great restaurants, bars, and shops!

I had experienced an issue with the AC, and the team was prompt to send someone over to provide us with fans and help resolve our concerns. The apartment was as described and the location was great for busy restaurant-filled streets! The sheets were comfy, and overall we enjoyed our stay. Thank you Sonder!

The apartment was very nice and in an awesome location. It was clean and comfortable. The only downside was that the air conditioning was broken, so the nights were a little hot. There were ample fans though, and the neighborhood was safe enough for us to sleep with the windows open. Amazing bars and restaurants were easily walkable, and the city bike station was only a block or so away.

This place is right in the middle of an amazing area. Alot of food and clubs are literally 10 steps around the corner. Easily walkable to everything and the bikes. If you're driving, parking is right outside perfectly available every day and night. There are a lot of fans. The air-conditioning wasn't working at that time but it's okay. Great 4 rooms for 4 people. Great area, it was worth every penny.

The apartment is well-located and very clean. It is similar in presentation to an apartment hotel. The bedrooms are comfortable, and the bathroom has a large shower. The only point of improvement for us remains the brightness of the living room which remains dim even during the day.

The location of this place was great, being within walking distance of attractions, food, and entertainment. However, there was no heads-up about the lack of air conditioning situation from the time of booking (when it indicated A/C) until check-in, and we noticed how hot it was. The fans provided were okay, despite the few days we stayed being especially hot, and often times, it was hotter inside than out, making the 6 of us quite uncomfortable at night even when we shut off all the lights except the lamp to cool down. Overall, it was a good place to stay for groups with the amount of bedrooms and is accessible to many places by foot.

The flat is located in a very lively area (but the street is quiet) and offers easy access to all areas. It has some nice shops and places to eat nearby, and we could park on the street. The flat is very hot as mentioned in other reviews, and the fans did not really help. There is little natural light in the flat, and it's not possible for air to circulate. Only two bedrooms have windows that open.
I recommend this apartment, good experience
Great location and easy check-in. Sonder was very responsive to questions weeks before.
The location is excellent, and the check-in/check-out process was very smooth and easy! It's worth noting that two of the four bedrooms do not have windows.
As advertised, the cleanliness and hospitality exceeded expectations.
Our stay at our Sonder was very pleasant. Check-in was easy and communication with the team was very prompt and informative. Location was perfect!

The apartment has everything a traveler needs. The location is excellent, and the rooms are comfortable and clean. The apartment is on the second floor, and occasionally there is some noise from the residents of the third floor, but it's not anything that would significantly disrupt our stay.

My accommodation is very well located and functional. 

There's a bit of noise on Thursday to Saturday nights due to the party at Prince-Arthur's side.

Excellent communication with Sonder.
Great location. The area is bohemian with lots of students, just around the corner from a great pedestrian street. There are endless fantastic restaurants within walking distance.
Very well located, good literature and clean, only drawbacks: lack of lighting and chairs for 6 people
Great location, very good communication.

Good place with average value but had difficulty communicating with the host because it's run by a company, not a private host.  Late check-out, even by an hour, was difficult to arrange and didn't happen.

Great place, better than expected and good location. Not pictured is a decent-sized entryway. However, I did not like having to sign up for another online rental website called "Sonder" in order to book this place through Airbnb.

**Advantages:**  Clean and practical apartment for a short stay. Minimalist decor, Ikea-style but efficient and well heated. Comfortable bedding. Central location, very pleasant, quiet and close to shops and the metro.

**Disadvantages:** Lack of natural light (photos on the site somewhat misleading about brightness). Entrance door not very secure and definitely needs improvement.
Really great neighborhood. The beds are also really comfortable. Slept like a baby!
Great location, comfortable living area with spacious rooms, no AC but they provide enough fans, overall it gets the job done! Would stay again
It is a nice apartment with a good atmosphere in a great neighborhood full of lively restaurants and bars. Recommends!

The apartment is very dark and the environment is noisy (street and building). 

There is a TV but no connection to an internet box so it doesn't work (just an HDMI cable hanging down).

No contact with the host, it's rather a company managing several apartments, just a code to access the apartment.

Great location. This is not really bohemian, but it's very functional for a larger group that each gets a bedroom. It was terrific for six of us. The refrigerator made a large noise, but hopefully they will fix it. All in all, a wonderful place to stay in a fantastic neighborhood.
Very good!
Great spot.

Our host was very helpful in accommodating our group for the weekend. We were able to cook, clean, and do our laundry with ease. The best part about the property is the location - walking distance from restaurants, grocery stores, and nightlife. Would gladly stay at this property again.
Nice place near St-Laurent Street.

Three beautiful apartments, their images reflect reality. We would feel like we were in a VIP apartment. 

Annie is an excellent host, available and knows how to put her guests in optimal accommodation conditions. We haven't missed anything. Plus the apartment is located in the heart of a lively area at night. I highly recommend her apartment. You will not be disappointed.

Annie has been very responsive and helpful. Her apartment is very nice and I love the place where it is located. It's a very creative and changing area, with everything we needed. Organic vegetarian food is around the corner, along with grocery stores and fresh fruit and vegetable shops, a few nice cheap restaurants and bars. Early opening breakfast dinners. Bookstores and bakeries are also nearby. Bike rental stations are very close as well as the metro and bus station. Perfect location for us.

Annie was great to us! The place was super clean. She was very accommodating and it had everything we could have needed. Annie was very easy to work with regarding check-in and check-out times. The apartment is very close to good food and the metro station. Thank you for making our time in Montreal that much more enjoyable!

This apartment was really nice and huge, and Simplissimo was great. 
Everything was ready when I arrived. No hassle, everything was easy. Also the air-conditioning was turned on, the internet speed was fast, and everything needed was there. Great location close to St. Catherine's with all the shops. I would really recommend this place and Simplissimo too.

Cheers

Simplissimmo was helpful and accommodating throughout my stay, and the apartment was excellent. The space was clean, comfortable, and in a great location. The closest metro stop was only a short walk away, so it was easy to make use of Montreal's wonderful public transit system. Simplissimmo made my stay in Montreal simple, comfortable, and relaxing. I can't recommend this apartment enough.

The apartment was wonderful, clean, and had everything we needed. The listing description was completely accurate. The location was excellent. It was less than a 5 minute walk to all of the sites/attractions in Old Montreal and was near great restaurants and bars. The instructions for checking in/getting keys were very clear. We are very happy that we stayed here!
Great place. Exactly as pictured. Amazing location!

Unfortunately, this is my first bad Airbnb experience. I would not go through this "host" again as it turned out to be a large corporate housing company posing as the owner of the unit. They ran multiple units throughout the city. This is not the welcoming Airbnb model and felt as such. When we tried to reach the "host," we received no replies via Airbnb or the numbers provided until 24 hours after we attempted contact. We had a snowstorm that delayed our arrival, and when we tried to communicate this to the host, we never even heard back from her, which made for a very stressful experience while on the road. The unit itself was very simple and clean but felt more like a cold abandoned studio apartment than a welcoming and warm stay, especially considering the price we expected much more.

Great location! Enjoyed being able to get on the subway or grab a BIXI bike right out the front door. Has a wonderful French bakery around the corner and easy to walk to numerous restaurants. Wonderful stay and arranging key pickup/drop-off was incredibly simple.

Great location and comfortable bed. The fireplace doesn't work, so a bit disappointed. For a long stay, bring your own laundry detergent as there isn't enough provided for more than two loads unless you call to pay for additional supplies.

The location was great, the value was great, I just wish check-in was smoother. It's a company that manages multiple Airbnbs so your apartment might look a little different than the one in the pictures but same layout. Communication was good; there is a phone number you can call and through email we got quick responses. I would stay here again.

The hosts are awesome and have a great space for couples or two people. It's a nice art studio, simple and it's near everything. We didn't have to take a cab or Uber anywhere. We walked through "The Village" which is where this is located and we had tons of cafes, bars, restaurants, and shopping options. It's close to everything that a 20-minute walk would take you to downtown Montreal and the Old Port as well.

This was a great place to stay. We kept our car parked in front of it for three days and no one complained. I would definitely stay there again.

Anastasia was an excellent host, very easy to communicate with when making the reservation and flexible to meet up with us on our own schedule. The listing was exactly as described, and we love the neighborhood (Plateau). The bed is a futon which I didn't notice initially, but it was comfortable either way. We would definitely like to stay here again. Thank you so much!

The studio is on a quiet street in a vibrant neighborhood, with great cafes and restaurants nearby. Anastasia's brother let us in. Everything was as described. It was really lovely, cozy, sparkling clean, and spacious. We would definitely stay here again!

We had a very nice experience here and would definitely return. Valentin was warm and welcoming. The place was very clean and well-decorated. The neighborhood is very close to many spots in Montreal! Overall, we are very happy with our stay! Thank you!
The host cancelled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

This is a bright, beautiful studio space in a great location. Close to restaurants, shops, cafes, and the mountain.  The kitchen is well-stocked if you plan on eating in. It's clean and artistically decorated. The host was welcoming and flexible with check-in and check-out. I love this apartment and would stay there again.

Anastasia was very kind and welcoming. Her studio is well decorated as shown in the photos. An excellent base for a couple who want to discover Montreal. Close to the metro, you can explore nearby restaurants or take a few stops to visit the rest of the city. I recommend it.

The studio is located in a great location, a quiet neighborhood. A short walk to the metro station, shops, and restaurants. Everything was as described. The hosts were warm and welcoming. I would definitely stay here again!
Anna is a wonderful host. The property is fully equipped and in a great location. We just felt a little uncomfortable on the sofa bed at night.

Ana was a good host. The apartment was clean. 
The bed was too small, but there was an air mattress as an alternative. 
It would be nice if there were some curtains to darken the room at night.
This was a beautiful, bright space in a great location!

Anastasia was accommodating when it came to our arrival -- we were later than expected, and had experienced cellphone issues when entering Canada, and she was willing to delay her plans for the evening until we arrived soundly. The place was minimal in the best of ways: clean, bright, well-equipped (except for not featuring an actual bed with mattress-- although that should come as no surprise, assuming you actually *read* the listing details), and we found the shower to be more than satisfactory.
Ana was a wonderful host! Everything was as shown in the pictures/description. The apartment is perfectly located, allowing us to explore the city on foot without any transportation worries!

Parfait little pied-à-terre very well located in the heart of Montreal. 

The studio is spacious, bright and tastefully furnished with a futon that comfortably fits one person, probably a bit too small for a couple. 

The place was ideal for a weekend of creative meetings and projects... the kind of awesome place where I'd see myself living full-time. Bonus points for the excellent Led Zeppelin album on the library: )

Although very lively, the neighborhood is surprisingly quiet considering its central location (two steps from Mont-Royal/St-Denis). The place is sufficiently soundproofed to allow a comfortable night's sleep, but the large windows in front will likely wake you up early once the sun rises. 

Ana is a charming, welcoming and easy-to-reach host who offers an amazing place where I wouldn't hesitate to return for future trips to Montreal!

I'm glad I stayed at this apartment during my vacation in Montreal. Anastasia was a very gracious host. She gave me plenty of tips about where to go and what to do, and she was very good about responding to my questions. The neighborhood is a very unique one, close to bars and restaurants and full of life. Anastasia was also very accommodating with my rather early check-out time.
Everything was very pleasant, with great communication and a nice apartment in the middle of the plateau. The bed was a bit small, but the place was very nice and clean. I would definitely come back!

Great location. The apartment is really nice and clean.
5-minute walk to all services, metro, and 10 minutes from Parc du Mont Royal.
Anastasia was very helpful and available even with a late arrival on Friday night.
Highly recommend this place!


(Website hidden by Airbnb)

Ana's space was great! A perfect location and size. It can be a little noisy at times as it's on street level and the bed is a futon, so it's good if you're planning on spending most of your time exploring.
Anastasia and Nikolai were very communicative, generous, and welcoming hosts. The studio is clean and modern, cozy yet spacious.

Ana and Nicolai were so easy to communicate with! It was a pleasure to stay with them. Love the layout, and it's in a prime location. Would definitely stay with them again. Note: the bed is a futon. Enjoy!
Warm and welcoming. Loved the place

The studio is as described, bright, spacious and airy. The quiet street and the metro nearby make it an ideal location to visit Montreal. Numerous restaurants and shops facilitate your quick integration. Ana has been available and accommodating, especially with international flight schedules that are sometimes unpredictable... An excellent place from all points of view.
Great place, central, and Anastasia is super accommodating.
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Great location is awesome and bagels at Bagel Etc., which is nearby, are phenomenal.
Great place but the bed was a bit uncomfortable

My second time at Anastasia's location, and what a nice stay it was again! 

Ana is a very nice and accommodating host and a very sweet person.

The studio is very well located, clean, charming, and, if you don't mind sleeping on a futon (I don't, it's actually comfortable enough), it is a very nice place to stay if you want to spend time in Montreal.

The studio was amazing! It was super clean during our stay, had everything we needed, and was in a fantastic location. Just a stones throw away from Rue Saint-Denis and cool coffee shops, bars, and restaurants.

I really like the place, the location and interior were absolutely perfect, and the host was also incredibly nice. I would really recommend the place, definitely worth it, and I would definitely like to go back!
Very nice location and you are able to walk everywhere on foot!

A very cute apartment located on street level in the heart of Plateau Mont Royal. The place was very clean and is a nice place to stay during a quick trip. The bathroom is great and everything is very close. 

Note that the bed is a futon, so it's better for one person than two! Also the kitchen is not equipped with items for cooking, so it's better if you are planning on eating out (which you should in Montreal).
Drop dead gorgeous space! Very restful and inspiring, too! I feel so fortunate to have spent a wonderful long weekend at the Art Studio! Highly recommend and would love to visit again!
Translation: I am really looking for a place to stay for business trips, especially with the time difference.

Great spot, right in the heart of the Plateau, a charming neighborhood that feels like Paris. Plus, you're only a block away from the Metro stop, with easy access to all of Montreal's major attractions.

Ana's place was clean, central, and nicely furnished.

My accommodation is perfect for discovering Montreal. I was there on business trips, the proximity of public transport and restaurants was good, but it's quite bright (even at night) and because it's right next to the street, it was a little noisy. It wasn't unbearable, but if you have light sleep, it's better to bring a sleep mask and earplugs. 

Anastasia was very available and flexible, and responded quickly to my questions via text messages. An ideal host! The accommodation is very modern and I really enjoyed my stay.

Anastasia's place was absolutely perfect for our trip to Montreal. The location in the Plateau could not have been better--just a block and a half from St. Denis and a short walk from Av. Mount-Royal. The studio is so thoughtfully set up and designed, and Ana's style is super fun and inspiring.  The futon bed was perfectly comfortable. And on a warm night the breeze from the window above the bed was great. I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
A+ Location. Definitely staying here in the future

We loved Anastasia's stylish apartment in the gorgeous Plateau area and would have happily stayed there forever. Anastasia was extremely accommodating and very helpful throughout our stay. Thank you so much!

The apartment was beautiful and in a great location! Anastasia was very friendly and answered all of my questions promptly. I really enjoyed my stay.

Just a heads up that, as other reviewers mentioned, the bed/futon is quite hard, although Anastasia has put a mattress pad down. It's fine for a short stay but you may want to consider bringing memory foam if you're staying longer.

Studio perfectly located, quiet: in the heart of Mount Royal Plateau, which we loved and two minutes from the metro that takes you to Vieux Port.

The studio is comfortable, only a small drawback: the complete absence of blinds in front of the large bay windows very bright... nice during the day but sunrise guaranteed!
Anastasia's place is in a superb location, close to the Metro and with many restaurants and cafes nearby. She is very responsive and accommodating as a host.

Really cool little studio apartment in a fantastic location for accessing the Plateau and Mile End. Only a block away from the Metro. We found the futon to be very comfortable, but travelers looking for a proper bed might not. Would definitely stay here again.

This place was cute and definitely an art studio. It's in a great part of the city! Anastasia said it might get a little loud at night due to the location, but we had no problems. Anastasia was very thorough with checkout procedures and helpful with any questions we had about the area. We thought the bed was very comfortable and had everything we needed. There is a nice radio that we used every day and kitchen items for cooking. Would recommend!
Anastasia's studio was bright and cozy. It is in an awesome location and close to lots of great bars and restaurants. I would stay here again next time I'm in Montreal. Thank you! :)
It's basically okay.
Full of character and centrally located, Ana was extremely responsive, which was particularly important as my flight was delayed. Thank you!

Delightful apartment! The area it's located in overlooks the Plateau and, if desired, you can always stay in the neighborhood to eat or drink something. Anastasia, the reference person, was precise and available. If you have a car, you are practically 10 minutes away from anywhere indicated on a Lonely Planet guide to Montreal. I highly recommend it to everyone.
Great stay! The decor and level of cleanliness make it feel like a boutique hotel. Communication and coordination were very easy. Will definitely stay again :)
Great place! Loved it! Will stay again!

Wonderful little studio in a very convenient area - super close to the metro and lots of stores and restaurants nearby. The cleanliness, natural light, and decor make for a relaxing and inspiring atmosphere. It's street level so you often hear people or cars coming by, and there's light from the street lamps at night, but none of that stopped me from having the best sleep I've had in ages (that bed is really comfy!). Anastasia is a great host - very friendly and communicative, and I'd love to stay here again!

Very cool open-plan apartment in a trendy neighborhood, with a comfy bed and within walking distance of restaurants and bars. The subway is a couple of blocks away. Check-in was super easy, I'd definitely stay here again.
Awesome apartment in a fantastic location. The apartment is exactly as it appears in the photos. We felt right at home!  We wish we had stayed longer.

I really enjoyed my stay. The loft is beautiful and located in a great area. Anastasia was an excellent host and was very communicative and understanding when I had issues with my phone. I would definitely stay here again.
Amazing place to stay! Extremely clean and the neighborhood is really nice, couldn't have picked a better place to stay.

Anastasia's place was stylish and located in the perfect neighborhood for exploring Montreal. We were able to walk everywhere on foot, and there were Metro stations right nearby as well. We would definitely recommend this place for any travelers looking to discover the city while living in an authentic local neighborhood! Thanks again!
Great place in a great location.
Great place to stay in Montreal.

Beautiful apartment well located near everything, beautifully decorated and bright. Parking is more or less obvious. Kitchen equipped with basic appliances. We found it perfect for our short stay in Montreal!

Fantastic location in the heart of the Plateau. A clean, bright, and comfortable studio with a futon bed. Easy access and excellent communication from a charming host. There is some noise from evening traffic on Fridays and Saturdays due to the great location.
Magnificent little apartment, well-equipped and very clean.  Truly in a great location. Communication with Anastasia was very easy. I will definitely go back!

The location is great... the apartment is comfortable and clean... I would definitely recommend staying here and would definitely stay here again! Anastasia is a wonderful host and was very quick to respond to messages.

My stay at Anastasia's place was absolutely wonderful. I enjoyed the spacious studio which is very centrally located - a short walk to Mount Royal and a block from the very frequent Montreal subway. Anastasia was very responsive and helpful throughout, and I would definitely recommend friends to stay at her place as well.

I had a lovely time at Anastasia's ultra-hip, yet comfortable apartment in the Plateau, one of Montreal's best neighborhoods. The space is beautiful with lots of natural light and is very spacious. So close to the Metro (a 3-minute walk) it was perfect for my short stay. Big beautiful windows let in lots of light, so bring a sleep mask if you're used to sleeping in total darkness. One of the best designed places I've stayed thus far - a pleasure to spend time in. Anastasia was very responsive and easily reachable. Want to feel like a real Montrealer? Stay at Anastasia's!
Anastasia's place was very fun and hip! It's in a great location and you can walk to almost anything. My friend and I had a great weekend stay.

I had a great stay at Anastasia's lovely, bright, and open apartment. It's new, uber-clean, and tastefully decorated. The front windows are all opaque, so they may not be the best place for anyone who needs to sleep with blackout blinds (I personally really liked the light :) ). Would definitely recommend.
The studio was clean and in a fantastic location for exploring the restaurants and shops on the plateau. We had a wonderful stay and would definitely stay here again.

Anastasia's apartment is both clean and comfortable, and it's also conveniently located near many excellent shops and restaurants. It's just a short walk from the metro station as well. Anastasia was easy to reach via text and responded quickly. She loved staying there.

The flat is very tastefully decorated, and is in an excellent location. Anastasia is flexible and communicates very, very clearly, promptly and fully. This made getting in and out very stress-free. Thank you and I would highly recommend your place in the future.

This studio was exactly what I needed for a long weekend in Montreal. The space is clean and stylish while still being warm and hospitable. The large frosted street-level windows were lovely light and definitely added a cool factor.  I can see how large street-level windows might not be for everyone - but I really liked them. The proximity to the metro was very convenient, but not always necessary as there is so much to see and do within close walking distance of the apartment. 

Anastasia was very responsive and a great host.

Excellent location for quick access to the metro and enjoying the cultural life of Plateau. I was amazed by the spacious and stylish design of this apartment. Perfect for a couple or solo traveler who needs a base. Only downside, the large windows that let in light from night lights and daytime light. In my case it didn't cause any problems but I know many travelers would have had their sleep disrupted by this detail.
Super apartment located in the heart of a vibrant neighborhood. The welcome and communication with Anastasia was perfect. Great choice!
Anatasia was fantastic and quick to respond to any questions I had!

Loved staying in Anastasia's studio! It was super cozy and perfect for a solo traveler like me. There was a small convenience store right at the corner and tons of shops and restaurants that are a short walking distance away. Communication was easy and I didn’t have any issues with parking on the street for the two days I was there! Would definitely recommend!

Anastasia's place looked like the photos: clean, stylish, and homely. It is located right in the middle of one of Montreal's best neighborhoods. Anastasia was very quick to respond to any questions and was extremely helpful. I would definitely book her place again!
Cool place! Stylish art studio, good size for 1-2 people. Host very easy to reach and accommodating, would stay again!

Anastasia's place is an incredibly stylish and unique getaway located within walking distance of several great bars, restaurants, cafes, and stores. The space is open and welcoming with large opaque windows and plenty of natural light. Anastasia is easy to reach and responds very quickly if you have any questions or need recommendations. While it gets freezing outside, the place stays nice and warm throughout each room, which was a big plus for us, non-Montreal natives. There are plenty of kitchen supplies and utensils, but they can be hard to find as the home has a very "lived-in" feel and layout. Also, there is no TV, which wasn't an issue, but it should be mentioned (luckily there was a speaker with an aux to play some music). The shower can be a little tricky to get the right temperature and the shower door doesn't close fully (I wasn't kidding when I said the space is "open"). But, all of these minor details aside, this space is unlike any other Airbnb or hotel you could find and it is absolutely worth staying in.
Cute, quiet space close to amenities and the metro.
Anastasia was very sweet and kind! Her place was very clean and it was at a very convenient location!
Great location, close to many amenities and very clean! It was a great place to stay for the weekend.

Anastasia's studio is ideally located on the plateau, a 3-minute walk from Mont-Royal metro station and all shops. The decor is stylish and very nice. It is very clean, well equipped, very bright (don't forget your mask to sleep as there are no curtains or blinds), very pleasant, ideal for 1 or 2 people. Anastasia is a very pleasant host, very responsive and very accommodating. She always finds a solution. I will definitely return to it during my next stay in Montreal and I highly recommend it.
Very cute place to stay in Montreal

Anastasia's studio was an absolute pleasure to stay in. The neighborhood was an excellent central location in Le Plateau, with tons of retail shops, cafes, bars and restaurants to explore. The apartment was immaculate, and the bed much more comfortable than expected!

Anastasia was extremely communicative, providing quick and clear instructions for entry and check-out. I will be sure to see if this studio is available if I ever find myself back in Montreal!

Anastasia's studio was perfect for our stay in Montreal. Only a short walk from the Mont-Royal subway stop, which takes you right downtown, the studio is conveniently located in the Plateau, with short walks to some of the city's best neighborhoods and streets, like Mile End, Laurier-Est and Boul St Laurent. Anastasia was quick to communicate with us, and we appreciated her flexible check-out times which worked so well with our flights. Just a note to future guests that the bed is a futon with a mattress pad, which we weren't expecting. It was a little small for my boyfriend and I and one side had a bit of a bump where the futon folded down which wasn't particularly comfortable to sleep on. That, and the fact that there were no coverings on the large windows (as indicated in the photos) would make it a little difficult for a sensitive sleeper, so I would recommend bringing a sleeping mask if the light at night bothers you as this is an open concept space and everything (aside from the bathroom, which was great) is in one space. That was the one thing that was a little misleading about the studio, but otherwise, it was a great space to chill out in after adventuring around the city all day. Thanks for having us Anastasia!
Great location - Easy check-in/check-out - Good communication
Fantastic place in a great location! Easy access to the metro and just about everything else in Montreal.
Beautiful little space - charming decor and really clean. Everything was at your doorstep. It also felt very safe, but for lighter sleepers it might be advisable to bring earplugs and a dark mask.

Anastasia's place is the perfect getaway for a quick trip to Montreal. It shines with warmth and intimate details that really make the place feel like home. She was an extremely communicative host, check-in and check-out were seamless. 

Thank you, Anastasia.

A fantastic little studio in a very convenient location. A lovely relaxing space to chill and work. 
Light sleepers will benefit from earplugs and an eye mask.

Anastasia's Studio is truly very beautiful and well-located on the Plateau, close to all amenities. It was really very easy to communicate with Anastasia, she was always present if needed. I highly recommend this apartment!
Everything was perfect! Loved the space.

Anastasia's apartment is lovely! It's very stylish and in an ideal location - close to many restaurants and cafes. The only complaint we had was the bed - the bed is a futon and not a mattress, so it wasn't very comfortable to sleep on.

The apartment was really stylish, incredibly convenient, and located in a really fun area. It would be a great place to stay for one or two people maximum. I had a wonderful time there and definitely recommend it!

Anastasia's place was exactly as pictured! I really enjoyed the openness of it, and its very convenient location. She was a super great host, incredibly easy check-in, and I would definitely want to stay again.

The apartment is great and in an amazing location. The only "problem" was that the bed was a futon, so it wasn't as comfortable. However, if you like to sleep in very dark rooms, this might not be the place for you as it doesn't have curtains. That didn't bother me at all. Anastasia was very nice, accommodating, and responsive. I would definitely stay there again.
The host cancelled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
The host cancelled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

A nice, street-level studio apartment that is well-maintained and in a great location to walk to St. Denis, parks, and more! Nice, double-lock entryway right on the street. 

Note: This home is *genuine* Airbnb! Some Airbnb properties are permanent investments--the owner rents their property full time. This is not the case here-- Anastasia's home is clearly a part-time art studio and home, which makes it personal. The home is astonishingly clean and well maintained! But tourists who expect a sterile, empty hotel-room experience should look elsewhere. Also note that window treatments do not allow you to "black-out" the space, so if you need total dark to sleep you should look elsewhere. 

Otherwise, come and enjoy a classy, stylish little home! Great, instant communication from the host. Wonderful Indian restaurant and playground one block south. Easy walk to Chocolates de Chloe, Fruiterie  Plateau, Mamie Clafoutis, Park La Fontaine, and other Montreal favorites. Go get hibiscus ice cream at Cremerie Meu Meu! Very close to Mont-Royal metro stop for a quick ride to Old Port, Museums, etc.
Easy communication with Anastasia to get into the apartment, and the neighborhood is nice.
Functional apartment in a very well-located super neighborhood. Ideal for discovering the city
Nice, simple and clean place, with a great location and access to local sights and public transit.

I stayed at Anastasia's lovely art studio for two nights while visiting friends. The location is BRILLIANT: so close to the metro, and so many great places to eat and drink. The apartment, as expected, is a studio space on the ground floor with frosted glass rather than curtains. Everything is beautifully done but, as other reviewers suggest, an eye mask is definitely recommended!
Unique studio in the heart of a cool neighborhood. Anastasia was a great communicator/host and I truly enjoyed my stay. Would book again.

Anastasia's place was the absolute best choice we could have made for a place to stay in Montreal! It was spotless, beautifully decorated, and had everything we needed and more! The neighborhood was walkable, and close to transit. Check-in and check-out was so easy and Anastasia was great with communication! We truly enjoyed our stay and would definitely choose to stay here next time!
Anastasia is a very good host. Communication was easy.

Super location in one of Montreal's most beautiful neighborhoods. The loft is equipped with basic amenities but very stylish. The futon bed is best for one person. I would go back if I was on vacation, but not for business travel. The street can be quite noisy at times due to tourists walking by.

Great flat in a great location (very close to Subway station Mont Royal). Anastasia was nice, precise and very helpful. The only (very small) negative point was that there are no curtains on the big windows, so bring your sleeping mask. Other than that, perfect! Would recommend 100% to anyone visiting Montreal.

This is a very "hip" studio in a very trendy part of town. It is spacious and very clean. Like other reviewers, the street noise (voices, cars, late night revellers) are very loud, so it might not be the place for you if you aren’t a sound sleeper.  The big windows also let in lots of light, so a sleep mask or an early start might be necessary. We also had a difficult time finding parking (came in on a Friday). The street signs were confusing (in French), but once we found one it was free and good for the whole weekend!! It’s a very lovely spot, but depending on your needs and lifestyle (e.g., you're an old insomniac like me), it might not be a great fit.
We recommend this studio for its location and new condition. Anastasia is truly very available and responsive. We had a fantastic stay in this studio.

Anastasia has a beautiful apartment! It is very comfortable, clean, and perfectly located. Moreover, she was very attentive and responded quickly to my questions and requests. I highly recommend this apartment without any doubt!

A very stylish place located in a great neighborhood with great restaurants and shops, all within walking distance from Mont Royal, the old center, and Mile End, another lively neighborhood. Anastasia was very responsive and helpful. If one thing I would say the bed wasn't the most comfortable bed I slept on. Other than that, it was a great place to stay for a long weekend in Montreal.

I really enjoyed staying at Anastasia's place. The place was just as pictured and the location is also great for commuting. The place was perfect for me while I could rest and enjoy the city of Montreal. However, it wouldn't be ideal if you are a light sleeper.
There is some noise nearby that is not conducive to rest.
Great location in Montreal, very intimate yet centrally located within the surrounding neighborhoods teeming with life. The stylish interior design also creates a relaxing atmosphere.

Anastasia's place could not be in a more perfect location - only about 2 blocks to the metro, in the heart of the plateau's best restaurants. Parking in the area is really tough (outside of Sat & Sun where there is limited street parking in front of the apartment). The apartment was clean and bright and spacious for a studio. Thanks for the great stay! We would stay again next time we are in town!
Anastasia was very gracious in letting me arrive early. I really love this neighborhood and this studio is a great base to explore from.

This was a great place to stay in Montreal, and loved the location as it was easily accessible to the Metro (which takes you to the airport and downtown), close walking distance to St. Denis/awesome coffee shops and shopping, and a very sweet place. Looks exactly as listed in the pictures. I am a light sleeper, but in general had no issues with sleeping as some previous reviews have suggested (there is a fan to help with background noise). Would definitely recommend!
Terrific location and a really nice space. Easy check-in/check-out so you can focus on enjoying Montreal!
Great apartment, great location, very clean. Easy to find and good value, would recommend
This is my second time at Anastasia's place and it was exactly as I remembered it! Highly recommended to anyone who is looking for a comfortable place to stay near Mont-Royal
Absolutely perfect location!

Clean modern work studio in a great location. The bed is also a folding sofa, but fine. There aren't really any places to lounge other than on the bed, but the space itself is quite comfortable. As others have mentioned, the space can't be made totally dark, but we didn't find that to be an issue. Very convenient location, near Metro.
Staying at Anastasia's place makes it different. Great host and great location, 100% recommended to every person visiting Montreal!

Anastasia's space worked out very well for my two-night stay. The location is central and the interior was artfully done. I would definitely stay again. She let me keep my bags at the space after checkout, which really helped! Definitely recommend.
Wonderful stay in this very nice apartment on Mount Royal Plateau. I recommend it.

This space was very clean and in a good part of the city. There were very minimal amenities - no tea, coffee, dishes in any of the cupboards (all were left in the dishwasher). We also found it got quite cold and the heating takes a while to kick in. The space is beautiful, check-in was easy, and Anastasia was a good communicator. This place really is a studio and not really designed well to accommodate sleepers. The bed is a somewhat comfortable futon and there is a tonne of light at night through the wall of windows facing a semi-busy street.
