This condo is very well located and comfortable for a single traveler. I appreciated having the space and amenities of a condo. The appointments are sparse - just a few minimal items in the kitchen, which were enough to get by. As others have mentioned, this host is not consistently accessible within the app, but was really responsive via phone. Unlike others, I had absolutely no trouble with the WiFi - that worked great
Trip was canceled by host. Learned upon arrival in Montreal.

Great host, Karim went above and beyond to make my stay comfortable.  Even if it meant delivering a blowdryer and body wash at 11pm at night and picking us up in the freezing rain and arranging for parking for my car.   

I would recommend staying here, great location and easy access to downtown!
Nice location and stylish place with a good view. Several amenities like hot shower and sink are broken.

I spent six weeks in Marie-Helene's apartment and it was perfect! It was very well located, a short distance from Mont-Royal Avenue, with a supermarket less than 5 minutes walk away. Frontenac metro was 15 minutes away, and Mont-Royal metro was about 20 minutes away (faster if you took the bus that leaves from Mont-Royal avenue). The apartment itself was exactly as shown in the photos and was very clean and well-equipped, it had everything I needed. Marie-Helene was quick to respond to any problems or questions. The next time I need somewhere to stay in Montréal, I won't hesitate to contact Marie-Helene.

Once again, Marie was excellent. She provided everything I needed and went above and beyond to ensure I was comfortable. This was my second time staying at her place and I wouldn't hesitate to stay again. Thank you, Marie.

We had a great stay in Marie Helene's flat. The flat is well located close to Plateau Mont-Royal, with plenty of shops and many restaurants nearby, and a 2 minute walk to the bus stop (or a 30 minute walk to the Metro station). The flat itself is well-equipped with everything you could need for an extended stay, and tastefully decorated. Marie Helene was very friendly and helpful, and provided us with useful books on the city. We would definitely stay here again next time we visit Montreal.

We had a very nice time at Marie-Hélène's apartment. The location is perfect as it is situated in the middle of the Plateau Mont-Royal and not more than 20 minutes from the city center and all the important sights of Montreal! The apartment is clean, modern and tastefully decorated. Fancy restaurants and shops are located just nearby the very frequented Avenue du Mont Royal. 
We totally would go again!

I had a wonderful time staying here! The location is wonderful, it's close to shops and transportation, and I found it easy to get around while living there. The apartment is lovely too, all modern and new with everything you need. Unfortunately, I didn't get to meet Marie-Hélène, but she was only a text or call away if I needed anything, and her brother who lives upstairs introduced himself and was available if anything was needed. 

Overall, if this is your first visit to Montreal or if you come here often, this place highly recommended.

The apartment is great, very well located, completely renovated and equipped. 

It's just a little over one square block from Av Mont-Royal, the central avenue of Plateau. There's a supermarket and bus stop nearby with good metro connection.

The apartment has everything. Fully equipped kitchen even for those who like to cook. 
There is no dryer but really you don't need it because clothes dry very quickly on the line.
I didn't meet Marie-Helene, just her brother. They have always been attentive and responded to what I needed. They left me quite at ease throughout the entire period.

Totally recommend!!!

I spent four months with Marie-Hélène. Everything went very well, the apartment was exactly as described, decorated tastefully and quietly. The neighborhood is very pleasant with many shops and grocery stores, La Fontaine Park, good restaurants... However, the apartment is about 20-25 minutes walk from the Mont-Royal metro station. I recommend taking bus number 97 to get there. Marie-Hélène and her brother (who lives above) were very welcoming and helpful.

I highly recommend this apartment and would definitely stay there again!

Super location, very cozy, well equipped and with a charming little back balcony.

Well located in the Plateau, many shops nearby, many buses to reach the metro/downtown. 

Marie is very welcoming and responsive. We recommend this Airbnb to anyone who wants to discover Montreal while staying in a quiet place!

I was very well received. 
The description of the accommodation is perfectly accurate.
Amazing stay, thank you so much to Marie-Helene for everything, amazing apartment! See you soon :)

We enjoyed a month at Marie's apartment. It was just as described, very clean and arranged with much attention on details and good taste. We found the necessary in the kitchen. 
The area is very nice and quiet but also close to a lot of things to do (park, pool, shopping, bars, restaurants, and grocery stores).

We stayed there six weeks and found that the location of the apartment was perfect with a variety of coffee shops, restaurants, and bars nearby. Baldwin Park is great for picnics.

The apartment is the same as in the pictures and did not disappoint.

Marie-Hélène's apartment is very pleasant, perfectly located on the Plateau, spacious and well-equipped. The surroundings of the neighborhood are quiet, but just two steps from the apartment we find ourselves on Avenue du Mont-Royal, one of the most "buzzing" streets in the city. 

We can easily feel at home in the apartment and I will definitely return here for my next stay in Montreal!

We stayed in the apartment for 6 months in a very quiet and family-friendly neighborhood, just 3 minutes walk from the supermarket and the bus stop. The metro station is easily accessible on foot (a 15/20 minute walk or a 5 minute bus ride) if you enjoy walking a bit. For sports enthusiasts, the gym on the plateau is less than 10 minutes walk ;)

I thoroughly enjoyed my month staying at the apartment. It was so quiet, cozy, and secure. I was surprised to find a nearly new front-load washer. It made it very convenient as I didn't travel with a lot of extra clothes. The apartment is well located close to many stores and restaurants. The apartment is supplied with lots of dishes and utensils to cook your own meals. There's plenty of room to have guests stay on the pull-out couch. Several bus lines easily connect to Metro in a matter of minutes. I would recommend that if you don't have a car, pay for a one-month Opus card. I would stay in the apartment again! Many thanks!
Highly functional, clean apartment in an ideal location.
Quiet and well-equipped accommodation near shops, restaurants and public transport. Excellent reception.
Impeccable housing in a great location. Quiet and friendly neighborhood. Wonderful Montreal experience

The apartment was very nice and well equipped, ideal for a longer stay. Also, the neighborhood on the plateau is great - friendly people and lots of nice shops, boutiques, and cafes/restaurants on Avenue du Mont-Royal. 

We also appreciated the many parks around, the Bixi stations, and the comfortable connections nearby with STM.
Apartment in a quiet neighborhood, close to shops and transportation.

Thank you, Xavier! I arrived very late that night after a contract and the place was exactly as you had described. The neighborhood is very quiet but not far from the city center's lively area. I loved the big trees on the street, full of birds, the bike path. The next morning I really appreciated the neighborhood, there were plenty of cafes to choose from and I finally took the time to go discover the colorful Jean-Talon Market a few blocks away from Xavier's apartment. Thank you again and looking forward to it, Airbnb is so great when you realize that it's so simple to be hosted by welcoming people rather than in the noisy city center :-)

A wonderful stay. The hosts were welcoming, friendly and available. The room was large and there is a nice backyard to enjoy the sunshine. The neighborhood is pleasant and quiet close to shops, everything you need for a great stay!

Xavier's place was amazing... 5 Stars!!!

Both he and Robert were amazing hosts, very friendly and a lot of fun to talk too.

The house is beautiful and in a great location. It was so convenient, with many great coffee shops and restaurants all within walking distance. The train station is also close by, so very easy to get around the city.

I will definitely be coming back to stay there again when I return to Montreal :) 

Their home has been one of my favorite places I've stayed at so far!

I would highly recommend Xavier's place to all travelers.

I spent close to a month in this beautiful apartment, where I enjoyed all of its bright and quiet spaces. The neighborhood is tree-lined and largely residential, but bordered by main streets that are full of hang out spots and whatever food one might need. The apartment is within walking distance from many nice parts and parks of Montreal, and accessible by public transportation if one wants to go a bit further. 

Xavier and Robert were really lovely and hospitable, and it was a pleasure to share the apartment with them and their beautiful dog Juliette.

Xavier's place is on a quiet side street but close to many interesting sights: Little Italy, the Jean Talon market, lots of small restaurants and cafes, easy access to the orange metro line. 

The room is bright and spacious, decorated in retro style with many little touches (as is the rest of the apartment). There's a really nice semi-closed patio on the back. Excellent value overall! If you like dogs, even better, Juliette is an angel and will let you rub her belly.

Xavier was a great host, he welcomed me warmly and was very helpful in giving me advice on settling down in Montreal. He was respectful and discreet, but didn't hesitate to share a beer and a chat with me. Highly recommended!

I was first welcomed by the host, the beautiful and peaceful Juliette, then I was able to meet Xavier and Robert who both allowed me to have excellent moments in their company.

The house is very spacious with a courtyard at the back perfect for "chilling" and working in the sun.

Thank you for these 10 days
Sincerely

Spacious place to stay and work, I especially enjoyed the patio and backyard - there are so many tables ;) Xavier and Robert are both very friendly and helpful. They are open to share the space and willing to give local tips. La Petite Patrie is a safe, quiet, and convenient neighborhood with access to buses and metro, groceries, cafes and restaurants. I hope to stay at Xavier’s the next time I’m in the city.
Well-located apartment. Spacious and comfortable room.

I had a very pleasant stay of 2.5 weeks at Xavier's place. The apartment is clean, bright, full of charm, typical of Montreal, very quiet and surrounded by trees. The room is very spacious and well decorated, peaceful and the bed comfortable. A large veranda overlooks the garden. The apartment is located near the Beaubien metro station, St Hubert street and Jean Talon market, close to many shops and restaurants. 

Xavier and Robert are welcoming, warm and respectful hosts with whom I had interesting conversations. I will definitely go back there with joy and recommend this accommodation without reservation to my friends.

I stayed at the house of Xavier and Robert for one month. 
They were very friendly and hospitable from the start. The house is very large and has a great garden. It's located in a very nice neighborhood with easy access to the metro, buses, grocery stores, cafes, parks, and cinemas...

The room is very large, well-lit, and comfortable. 

Thank you for your hospitality, Robert and Xavier. See you next time.

Xavier is a thoughtful and friendly host. The rooms and shared spaces are clean, and the house is in a great location in town. I felt comfortable and welcomed throughout my entire stay. Don't hesitate to book with Xavier!
At Xavier's place was nice and peaceful. I loved the neighborhood, close to the supermarket, the metro station, and the Jean Talon market.

I had a short but excellent stay at Xavier's place. Its unique décor is conducive to relaxation, and it's located in a very pleasant and peaceful area. 

It was great interacting with Xavier, who is full of creative talents, and Juliette was also affable.
Very beautiful place and clean, Adam was very welcoming I really enjoyed my weekend

I stayed for six weeks while I did an apartment search. I was very value-conscious when making the booking, and the value was just excellent. Adam was very eager to please. The location is wonderful: a quick walk to blue and orange subway (Metro) lines, and right by two very useful bus routes, the 51 and the 165. Also, many stores, restaurants, cafes, etc. in both directions from the building. If value is important, you could hardly do better.
The host cancelled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated message.
Really clean throughout, nice little kitchen. Definitely my first choice next time I visit. No complaints. Two thumbs up

The apartment is exactly as you can see in the pictures and has everything you need in kitchen appliances and linen matters. The flat could use some repairs (like the floor and the sofa) but it's comfortable and has everything you need to stay for a while (except for a broom or a mop that I'll add). 

But everything was good and Adam was always reachable, helpful and nice :)
Adam was very communicative and the place had everything you would need for a comfortable stay!
Great place to stay. Adam was an amazing host. The place was very spacious and clean. Close to stores, restaurants, and downtown Montreal

The apartment is extremely clean. The location is great, near the metro and bus station. 5 minutes to the supermarket and pharmacy. Adam is a very helpful host. We enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it to our friends.
Adam was a gracious host. Great place to stay. Very clean.

I had a comfortable stay at Adam's apartment. It was very clean, and conveniently located near Côte-des-Neiges and the Université de Montréal. Adam was very friendly and flexible with the check-in/check-out.
Three nice, well-located, clean, equipped apartments, excellent stay at Adam's place. We will definitely be back, we highly recommend it.
We had a great time at Adams, we love the location, check-in and check-out was easy, the place was clean and comfortable, and communication was good too.
Apartment is pretty good/okay. Location is excellent.
Good place to stay would recommend

Adam's apartment reflects the photos accurately. The kitchen is small but well-stocked for cooking, and the bed is comfortable. The air conditioning is a window unit, but it cools most of the apartment well. There is a working elevator just across the hall from Adam's apartment. It is within walking distance to l'Oratoire and grocery/restaurants. Would definitely recommend as the value is great for the price and Adam was a very accommodating host.
The place is as advertised. Great place to stay at. Adam is an excellent host. Never had any issues. Would recommend staying

Adam was a wonderful host. He met me at the apartment for check-in and explained the building and where everything was located. I had to contact him during my stay with a few questions about the area and he responded within minutes.

The apartment was as advertised and also had a new sectional which was a nice touch. There was plenty of street parking and the apartment was located in a nice quiet area, that was a close walking distance to stores and restaurants.

Adam responded very quickly when we needed a place to stay last minute. He met us within a few hours to show us the apartment and give us the keys. The apartment was exactly as described. It was very close to a bus stop (right outside the front door) and about a 10-minute walk to the Snowdon metro station.

Adam's place is even better than what you see when you book. He has all the necessary things you require for your trip and even more, like pasta, olive oil, varieties of tea, sugar, ear buds and even hand soap and body soap.  

The place is very clean, the bathroom is sparkling clean, the linen is washed and smells fresh, the living room is very comfortable to watch TV and just have a relaxing evening.
The kitchen has everything you need to prepare a meal or just put stuff in the oven, the fridge worked very well. The A/c was a blessing as it gets quite warm in summer.

Adam is very quick at communication and always answered the phone when I called him or messaged him. He gave us a very good restaurant recommendation for our anniversary dinner 'Rayan' which specializes in seafood, has very fresh stuff and is decently priced.

Our check-in and checkout was seamless and we had absolutely no problem finding the nearest supermarket, tourist sites, easily accessible public transport, close to old Montreal and downtown. Very close to St. Joseph's oratory. Safe neighborhood at all times of the day. 

Adam is an extremely good host, I would recommend his place anytime to anyone without hesitation.  

Thank you Adam for letting us reserve your place. We hope to book it again when we next visit Montreal.  
Kind regards,
Very clean. Easy to arrive at. Well equipped. Peaceful and welcoming for a family. Very good value for the price.
Excellent stay, we loved the apartment, excellent location and very comfortable
Great place to relax. Perfect location to explore Montreal. Forgot something at Adam's place and he was super helpful and sent it back to us. Trustworthy and reliable host.
It was an amazing stay at Adam's place.

Adam was responsive and flexible. He provided top-notch service. I'll definitely stay here next time I visit Montreal. The location is excellent for exploring local attractions and public transportation (there's a stop right outside the door).

Adam was an excellent host, he went above and beyond to make my parents feel comfortable. They stayed for 3 weeks in his apartment which was very consistent with the listing. The location is ideal by bus and metro just a few meters away. I highly recommend this place for its great value. Thank you Adam.
It was an amazing experience at Adam's place! He accommodated our stay spectacularly, was very flexible, and a very nice host in general. Highly recommend it!
The host cancelled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated message.

Eric's apartment was an excellent choice for our stay in Montreal. What a great location! The neighborhood is close to the excitement of the theater district, restaurants, bars, and museums, but quiet enough to relax at home away from the bustle of the busy downtown. The apartment itself is in excellent condition. We had everything we needed for our stay. All the appliances are new and in good repair, and the furnishings are comfortable and stylish. 

Eric is a wonderful host. He was there to greet us and make sure we got settled in okay. He even checked-in part way through our stay to ask how we were doing, which was very thoughtful. Eric also left us great information about the attractions and amenities around the neighborhood—another thoughtful, personal touch.

If you're looking to stay in a great part of Montreal and have a fantastic host, I happily recommend Eric and his apartment. We already miss "our Montreal apartment."

Eric's apartment was bright, clean, and beautiful. The location was even better, right downtown within walking distance of everything we needed. Highly recommended, Eric is very friendly and was accommodating to our arrival/departure schedule.

Thanks Eric!!
Justine

A warm and casual welcome. Valuable information about nearby shops and restaurants to enjoy Montreal from day one on wheels!!!

The apartment is new and very well located between two subway stations and less than 100m from a bus stop (747) that connects the airport to the city.

Everything is perfect!!!

Eric's 1-bedroom/1-bathroom condo was in excellent condition - brand new with all the appliances, supplies, and furniture you'd need. The location was great, with easy access to the metro and bus lines.

Eric was very easy to communicate with. He was also very responsive to my questions, and left a binder with very helpful information about the neighborhood and nearby restaurants, shops, even ATMs and delivery menus. He was also very flexible with check-in & check-out times, which we really appreciated.

We had a fantastic stay at Eric's condo in Montreal. I would definitely recommend his place, and would gladly stay there again when we return to Montreal. 

Thanks for everything, Eric! It was such a pleasure to meet you.

Eric was super nice and friendly. He was extremely helpful and flexible with check-in and check-out times. The apartment is in a great location, clean and beautiful. Eric left a binder with lots of tips and information about the city. I will definitely go back to his place :)

My friend and I enjoyed a very pleasant stay at Eric's condo. The accommodations were immaculately clean and everything we needed was provided to enhance our visit to Montreal. Long-term parking was easy in a nearby garage, so I could park and then explore the city. My friend took the #747 bus from the airport which dropped her off right on Eric's corner. I slept comfortably in the very comfortable bed. My friend chose the couch which folded down into a bed, rather than those pull-out sofa mattresses which can be uncomfortable. The neighborhood seemed to be in transition, but we felt safe and had no difficulties. The location was convenient to Old Montreal, downtown, the entertainment district, and museum area, either walking or by the metro. All in all, an excellent choice.

Erick's apartment is the perfect place from which to explore the city of Montreal. It has a Walkscore of 99, a Transit score of 100 and a rider's score of 100, all from (Website hidden by Airbnb) What a location!

You can walk to the old port, the Place des Arts for festivals, Rue St Denis for hundreds of restaurants and bars, etc. 

The main Metro interchange station, Berri UQAM is a few blocks away, which is key to moving around town; check it out on the Montreal Metro map to see what I mean. 

If biking is your thing there is a Bixi (Montreal's public bike rental scheme) stand one block away, $5 for 24 hours.

The building is part of a block that is being gentrified with new, modern apartment buildings. The police station was literally our next-door neighbor and the apartment is facing the police station parking lot, so it must be one of the safest places in downtown Montreal. 

Everything inside the apartment was in as-new condition; the kitchen was very well equipped and Erick was kind enough to leave a full supply of basic items such as dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, toilet paper, etc... so we didn't need to buy anything other than food in the first few days. 

I was there with my wife and two young daughters and the apartment was functional and airy enough that we didn't feel crowded. The sofa bed was perfect for our two daughters to sleep in. 

You really can't go wrong renting this apartment; it's a no-brainer if you find it available.

We spent 9 nights with family and everything went very well. The apartment is new and very clean, and especially located right in the heart of the city.
We didn't miss anything during our stay. We feel at home!!

Good place to stay, stayed with 5 girls and we felt very comfortable. The place was very clean, safe, and easy to communicate with Sandro; as she responded fairly quickly. Also, it was spacious so you do not feel crammed, flexible check out time, which was nice so you do not feel pressure to leave. I would recommend staying here!
Great space close to the subway. Very convenient location, walkable to downtown. Communication with Sandro was very easy and quick, would highly recommend this home.
Great location within walking distance of most Montreal attractions

Alex is an amazing host. Very pleasant, welcoming, and great at communicating. The place was just perfect for me and my friends. We felt like home the entire time. We definitely would like to stay here again. And the location is ideal for anyone who likes the Plateau area and everything it has to offer.

An excellent space, well-maintained and atmospheric, perfect for anyone staying in Montreal. The location is close to public transportation and restaurants and is extremely affordable. The host also provides exceptional service! A must-stay Airbnb.

The suite is in a prime location, situated in the heart of the plateau. The apartment was clean and spacious, and was one of the best places I've stayed at. Furthermore, Alexandre provided helpful tips on cool restaurants in the neighborhood, and was an overall excellent host.
Amazing location, not far from Mount Royal or local bars/restaurants. Very clean and easy to find. Additionally, very nice and comfortable furniture.

A clean apartment located in a noisy neighborhood. The metro is down the street, and a supermarket is around the corner. Alex and his wife were very nice, checking in and contacting them was really easy, thank you for having us.

The location is great, being close to the subway, with many small restaurants and bars, and two supermarkets. Alex was an excellent host and very understanding when we encountered flight delay issues before leaving the apartment. We would definitely stay again.

Alexandre's place is perfectly located in Le Plateau, with endless shops, restaurants, and food stores nearby. There is air conditioning for those hot summer days, and ample natural light in the living/dining room. The place is clean, and the Wi-Fi is fast. I would stay here again
Fantastic spot close to so many cool things! We loved the apartment and the neighborhood!

Alex and Kate are amazing hosts. Very flexible and accommodating with arrival time (sorry again, we are still learning to travel with toddlers). The place is perfectly located, very close to the best restaurants in town and well-equipped (coffee and towels are very pleasant). We highly recommend Alex and Kate's apartment for a weekend in Montreal.
Great location and Alexandre was easy to communicate with. The unit was clean and as described. Thank you for letting us stay!
The place was amazingly located in a cute neighborhood with pharmacies and grocery stores very close by. Alex was great about answering any questions we had, would definitely recommend!

Alexandre's accommodation is exceptionally well located. Everything is close to the Airbnb: bank, grocery store, metro, quality restaurants, bars, clubs, etc. Alexandre is a very friendly, relaxed and amiable host. Upon entering the Airbnb, I was surprised by its beauty, as it seemed even better than in the photos. I definitely give 5/5 stars to this Airbnb.
Awesome place to stay! Location is by far the best!!!

Fantastic location and exactly what we needed for a weekend exploring Montreal. Close to shops, amenities, a short 5 minute walk to the Mont-Royal metro. Alexandre's was also quick to respond. Check-in was flawless.

We were very comfortable here and we wished we were staying for more than just a weekend! The location is amazing, the apartment was a nice cool temperature (appreciated in all this humidity!), and it offered plenty of space.
Very good Airbnb
This apartment is perfectly located, extremely clean, and Alex was incredibly hospitable. The apartment is exactly as it appears in the pictures and I would definitely stay here again.

Alex was an amazing host! He responded quickly and accommodated our early arrival. The location was amazing, and it was so close to Mount Royal Metro. It was a great and safe neighborhood. Thank you Alex for a wonderful stay.
Alex was very willing to work with us on late arrival arrangements and provided great information about parking. The apartment was super clean, cute, and located in an awesome spot!

This is a great one-bedroom with an open floor plan for common areas. The host was very communicative and got back to me almost immediately when I contacted him. The apartment is on the street level, so I didn't have to lug my bags up a flight of stairs. There was also a privacy finish on the windows and draperies, so that I didn't feel like I was on display to passersby (which there were not many because it is a residential street). Around the corner on the commercial street are many cool shops and eating spots. A couple of blocks to some fantastic restaurants and stores on St. Laurent in one direction and a few more blocks the other way on St. Denis. The Metro was within walking distance and made getting to and from the airport really easy (and inexpensive). Many thanks, Alexandre!
Very nice, cheerful place. Well located a few blocks from the metro and around the corner from many restaurants and stores.

The place is so convenient to shops, restaurants, and bars. Really trendy area. Lots to explore. 

Kate and Alex are amazing hosts. Very responsive and friendly. 

We will likely come back for another stay since we haven’t gotten a chance to explore the entire area. Nice change from downtown

Alexandre and Kate were fantastic hosts. This is my second time using Airbnb, and another great experience. He met us at the place (we arrived a touch late) and explained the best spot for legal parking. The apartment was very cozy and immaculately clean. Since it was on the first floor (website hidden by Airbnb), it made unloading easy. Their unit was almost too warm, which is great considering the temp in Montreal! He even texted my girlfriend to see how our trip was going. Great guy. Our trip was amazing and I think it started with meeting Alexandre and staying in the Plateau. A fantastic experience!

Zoë's place is absolutely gorgeous! It's immaculately clean, light, and airy with trendy decor. The kitchen was perfect for preparing meals and the back porch provided a peaceful spot to snuggle up with tea and a good book. It's in a safe, gorgeous neighborhood with easy access to a bunch of shops, restaurants, and the metro. This was my first stay in Montreal and it was the perfect home base for exploring such an awesome city. Zoë was the most gracious host! She suggested a bunch of must-see/must-do things and even sweet enough to leave a hand-drawn map to guide me on my adventures. I will definitely be returning ASAP!

Zoe is a very sweet host. She prepared all the items we needed and even some fashion items that we never experienced in other AirBnB condos, even in Paris condos. It's been a great living experience over the last two days. And the condo location is very convenient. I would definitely recommend it for others who want to have an awesome family trip. Thanks, Zoe! The Fairmount Bagel taste is good! :)

Zoe's apartment was immaculate and the photos accurately represented it. I really appreciated this because I had just come from another Airbnb which was messy & super-lived in! Getting the keys was easy, and the neighborhood was okay. It's a safe, pretty, residential neighborhood, not at all touristy, which was great -- but there aren't a ton of restaurants & services right nearby, so some might prefer to stay in a neighborhood with more cafes, etc. But the spaciousness & cleanliness of Zoe's very cute apartment were great. 

A couple of things to note: There is a long flight of stairs to the apartment (you enter the front door and then come to the flight of stairs once inside). This would be difficult for anyone with mobility issues, anyone dealing with a young child -- stroller, etc. -- or an elderly person with a cane or walker. 

And although the kitchen had brand-new stove, electric kettle, French press coffee pot, good selection of knives, it would have been wonderful to have a microwave. When you're in a city for only a night or two or three, it's really nice to be able to heat up take-out quickly, without having to bother with the oven. 

The TV had Netflix on it and I watched a movie one night, which was great, and the shower was wonderful. 

But overall, a great place to stay.
Zoe's place is just as amazing as everyone else says! Comfy beds, beautiful views, and a great pizza place right around the corner (Pendelli's Pizza). Book it today!

Zoe's apartment is adorable, thoughtfully furnished with a modern design. It was clean, and quite big, bigger than we expected--and with a dishwasher, washer/dryer in the basement, etc. It is walking distance to the French restaurants of Outremont, with their terrace seating, and lovely parks/a yummy ice cream parlor/several cafes (we loved Cafe Prague). A little longer walk (but definitely walkable, and we did it with a five-year-old in tow) is Mile End, with a hipster vibe, even more restaurants/bars/and the awesome Drawn and Quarterly bookshop.

Zoe was responsive and kind. Definitely recommended.

Zoe's place is beautiful. I would love it if she could decorate our home flat! The neighborhood is great, especially with kids: you are two short blocks from the pool and splash zone at Kennedy Park. You are a bit far to walk from the main resto and bar areas, but there is Bixi at Outremont metro next door so everything is an easy ride (especially Mile End). I would stay again.
All perfect! As described. Highly recommended.

Zoe was a fantastic host. She was extremely responsive and communicative, as well as very accommodating to our arrival and departure times. We had a fantastic stay at her place. 

The neighborhood is safe and beautiful with easy transportation anywhere in the city. Metro Outremont is a 5-minute walk away, and this apartment is off the main street, but only a 2-minute walk from major bus stops. It's also within walking/biking distance to Bernard Street, and to Mile End, where there are many restaurants, bars, and coffee shops.

For future users, Zoe has recently renovated the dining and kitchen space, and it's so much more modern, open, and beautiful than the old photos still up. Our 2.5-year-old son loved playing in this newly renovated space. 

We would definitely come back! We hope you love this apartment as much as we did!

Zoe was prepared well in advance for my arrival, and it was easy to figure out the logistics of entering the apartment. The apartment was very clean and beautifully decorated. The neighborhood is quiet, charming, and easily accessible - very close to a subway station.

The neighborhood was quiet and beautiful - lots of trees and very scenic overall, but still had a little pocket of good restaurants! The ride to downtown Montreal was not very far, so the location overall was convenient. 

Zoe was extremely communicative throughout the process, from pre-arrival to  during our stay. Her apartment is absolutely beautiful and SO spacious. The light is also gorgeous.

Spacious apartment, bright and well-located (close to metro and bus...) in a very pleasant neighborhood. 
The apartment is also very well-arranged and decorated.
Zoé is a very available host who answers our questions very quickly and warmly.
Don't hesitate if you want to stay in this beautiful city of Montreal.

Zoe's apartment was fantastic for my husband and two little girls. We very much enjoyed having a place that was so comfortable, spacious, and well-designed away from home. The kitchen and bathroom have been renovated since the pictures in the profile were taken and both were done very well. Zoe's apartment is in a great location, near Bernard St., Miles End, and a short ride downtown. When we come back to Montreal, we would definitely stay here again.

Zoe's place is stunning, much bigger than we expected and very comfortable with a new bathroom (great shower!) and a balcony as well. Outremont is a great little neighborhood, the apartment is close to the metro, lots of good restaurants and bakeries nearby. I joked I should probably move to Montreal and rent from her permanently! Zoe was very helpful before our arrival, and is easy to get a hold of. I would certainly stay here again.

This is our second stay at Zoe's. 
Just like the first time, everything has been absolutely fantastic! The apartment is beautiful and very well located. Zoe is a warm and available host. 
Don't hesitate to book if you are coming to Montreal.

Adorable apartment, very pleasant to live in, located in a peaceful neighborhood yet with all necessary shops nearby. Parking is very easy.

Zoé is a charming, accommodating, available person with great taste. Thank you again.

Fantastic! Jewish Quarter, safe, quiet, convenient, away from the hustle and bustle of tourist areas; the room is very spacious, clean and tidy; the decor is exquisite and tasteful; the bed is comfortable. Worth it!

LeCube was amazing! It was, in fact, a cube. But for anyone who doesn't need a kitchen - this is perfect. I rented a room with a balcony and it was fantastic. The room was beautifully set up, immaculate, the bed was comfy and best of all - the shower was really, really nice. haha. I will definitely rent from them again, when I am back in town.

Where to even begin. Staying at leqube was by far one of the best and most memorable experiences we've had using Airbnb and through traveling in general.

The first thing that captivated us and the reason we chose to stay here was their design, style, and layout of the property. Sophisticated yet minimal, clean, simple, modern, cool, and easy. 

The people behind leqube really went out their way to think of what a guest could need during their stay, everything was excellent and better than described in the listing.

The whole check-in and check-out experience was fast, seamless, and simple and didn't require any interaction with the host; however, they are available to help at a moment's notice if you might need it. The room comes with everything listed, and yes, the Apple TV and Netflix combo is a cool and modern feature to have. Almost forgot to mention they have a rooftop lounge with ping pong and hot tub.

Apart from the overall amazing trip we had in Montreal, one of the reasons that made it so magical and made this particular city so memorable in our minds was having a place like leqube to call our home away from home for the weekend.

Counting down the days to our next trip to Montreal and our next stay at leqube.
An exceptional location! A memorable address for its location, tranquility and urban terrace. Impeccable

The Cube is a great experience. It's within walking distance of everything, very cozy and quiet. It's a nice modern space. Check-in and check-out are simple, and the support staff were instantly responsive.
LeQube is a really nice hotel apartment.

We had a wonderful stay here! The neighborhood felt safe, and there were many things to do that were within walking distance of the apartment, which was very convenient. The space was functional and provided all the essentials.

We loved our stay at leQube. The staff were friendly, super helpful and communicative. The room was clean, fresh and comfortable. We loved the Nespresso machine in the lobby, as well as the tea. There is a fridge in the lobby where you can leave food if you label it. The location is within walking distance of many restaurants and shops but a bit of a walk to the Metro if you want to head elsewhere. That said the streets were so beautiful in the surrounding area we enjoyed the walk and ended up finding new restaurants and shops to explore along the way. We would definitely come back!
Cozy and safe environment, easy access. Will definitely stay again.
LeQube offers a charming, clean, and centrally located accommodation option. Excellent communication was the cherry on top. Thank you!
LeQube was the perfect place for our weekend getaway in Montreal. Super easy self check-in, well-appointed rooms, and free snacks in the morning. Would definitely stay again!

Everything was amazing. The place is so beautiful and clean! I love the decor, and the jacuzzi on the roof is pretty cool! I could definitely live there all the time. And, the location is really great.
Cozy, clean and conveniently located near the plateau's bustle.

Beautiful room and top terrace!
Excellent location (restaurants and bars nearby)

My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights and loved it. Great location near plenty of great restaurants, stores, and parks - but very quiet at night. Gave us an opportunity to experience a side of Montreal we likely would not have experienced had we stayed at a hotel downtown.

My friends and I booked three units at LeQube and were all blown away! The place is amazingly decorated, in a great location close to restaurants, shops, bars, etc. The rooms were clean and modern and very well done and the self check-in/check-out was a breeze.  Beyond that, the little things really put this place over the top, from magazines, books, fresh fruit, coffee, and (Website hidden by Airbnb) yoga mats, which the girls used to do yoga on the rooftop each morning. We will definitely seek out more LeQube locations for our future travels. Trust me, book this place!

Translation: Very good stay in Montreal! Great location, quiet neighborhood close to all amenities (2 metro stations nearby, restaurants and bars...). Trendy decor and responsive hosts. Highly recommend!

LeQube is a fantastic option for light travelers! Great location - right along a residential street and steps from Duluth Ave and all its boutiques and brasseries. Easy walk to St Laurent and St Denis streets. Modest sized rooms, but very well maintained - Cozy and clean space. If the parking spot is available (slightly extra cost) I highly recommend - street parking can be a little tricky on St Hubert with the restrictions...and if your French is a little shaky :) Overall a great value and option in a great city!

LeQuebe is very stylish, clean, and located in a prime location in Montreal. Although there was not a lot of staff present, the access code entry and checkup emails made me feel safe and cared for. I would highly recommend it for someone looking for hotel quality without the high cost!
Great room!
We loved our stay in this stylish space. Walking distance to lots of great restaurants and bars.

LeQube is in an excellent location and easily accessible. Our room was clean, communication with the host was clear and the storage area for luggage before and after checkout was secure. The lobby area is very convenient and stylish—it offers tea and coffee too. We would absolutely stay again and highly recommend LeQube to future guests.

I stayed at LeQube with a friend from January 12-14. The communication from the host prior to my stay was excellent! I had no issues with self-check-in. I loved the Welcome Booklet that was provided upon booking and came in handy the first day when choosing a restaurant to eat at.
LeQube is located in a lovely neighborhood, and I always felt safe leaving the apartment.
The room decor was charming. I enjoyed the shower.
I was initially surprised by the size of the apartment. It was slightly smaller than I expected, but I understand that this is common in Montreal, and the overall value for the money is amazing.

LeQube was one of my favorite Airbnbs yet. The room was spotless, chic, and had a ton of space available to keep our luggage out of sight while we were there. This place also has a rooftop hot tub with a view of the city. 

If you're trying to get out the door quickly, they even offer some hot coffee/tea, croissants, and juice, such a nice touch. Most places were within walking distance. And at the very most, you're going to have a 15-minute walk to the main part of the city. Response time was incredibly quick. Although parking isn't offered for every guest, it's easy to find in the area, and we never parked more than a 1-2 minute walk from LeQube. We will definitely be staying here the next time we are in Montreal.
LeQube is a great option for couples or solo travelers. The apartment had everything needed for a short stay in Montreal. Check-in was smooth and communication was timely.
Bon voyage!
Another great stay at LeQube. I highly recommend it.
Love the space. Close to St. Denis with lots of access to restaurants and bars. Only downside is finding a parking spot nearby.
The place was great in a nice neighborhood. I will be staying here again in the future.
My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay. It is quite small but perfect for a romantic getaway. The location is great and the whole décor was beautiful.
It's a very cozy and stylish place. It was perfect for us, thank you!
Beautiful and stylish space in a central location :) Would definitely recommend!
Such a cute and stylish space. Somewhat small but it was adequate and relaxing to stay in! The host welcomed us nicely and the process was quick and easy. We'd love to come back again!
I can't speak highly enough about how great LeQube runs as a business.  I wasn't disappointed and will definitely be coming back!

I had an awesome stay at LeQube. Checking in and checking out was incredibly easy - they even provide luggage storage to accommodate any early arrivals and/or late departures. The hosts are incredibly responsive! The room and bathroom were both clean and comfortable. During our stay, the hot tub was undergoing repairs. So I was slightly disappointed I could not make use of this facility during this trip. That being said, I still had a great time and if I'm ever back in Montreal, I'd definitely come back to stay at LeQube!
Very clean and modern. Very small, but perfect for two people!
Great location, and very clean space.

Wonderful place in a perfect location. The rooms are beautiful and stylish. The common space is lovely. We especially loved the rooftop dipping pool. Communication was excellent. I would highly recommend staying here!
Great place with lots of restaurants within walking distance! The lighting in the apartment at night was the only downside. Otherwise, it was perfect for what we needed!
Great place. Very tiny but great.

Our original booking had an issue and host Fred provided us with an alternative location that was larger than our original stay and cost nothing extra! He was great enough to call ahead of time to advise on the different location, which was approximately 2-3 minutes away from the original stay. The location we stayed at was immaculate! Gorgeous and super comfortable. Absolutely amazing stay!! This stay was a romantic birthday getaway. I am looking forward to booking again!!!

A well-located building in a lovely area, close to everything. Cosy rooms, I had everything I needed for a short-term stay. I was looking for a furnished apartment and I was so happy to find this offer. I would definitely come back again. Thank you.

This was my second time staying at one of Franca's apartments. I stayed for one month and everything was fine. The location is great and just near to restaurants, coffee shops, and bars. The subway station is just a 5-minute walk from the building. Franca is a kind lady and whenever I had some problems, she answered my calls very quickly.

The place is very clean and in a great location, the 24 bus will take you straight to downtown Montreal.

The wifi was unreliable but the issue seemed to be resolved with a new router towards the end of my stay.

Franca was a very accommodating host.

Clean apartment, well-located, comfortable and sufficiently equipped. However, please bring European adapters if you are coming from Europe. Franca was a wonderful host who was attentive, responsive, and kind. My stay was very pleasant. I recommend!

Jiji and Alex's place is spacious and very well-situated in Mile End, with super easy access to public transportation, downtown, and shops and restaurants nearby. Although Jiji was away upon our arrival, she arranged for an easy check-in. She was kind enough to provide us with everything we needed for breakfast. We had a short but comfortable stay at Jiji and Alex's place over the weekend.

This place was perfect for my weekend visit to Montreal! It hit all the items on my checklist - location, cleanliness, comfort, affordability. The apt. is warm & inviting, beds comfortable, all amenities were provided. It is within walking distance of nearly everything one would want to do - plenty of restaurants, nightlife, parks, shops. And although Jiji & Alex were out of town, they arranged for someone to meet my friend and me as soon as we arrived and get us settled in. There were even bagels & schmear waiting on the counter- so thoughtful! They left the numbers of local contacts should we need immediate assistance and Jiji kept in touch via email throughout the visit. She responded quickly and with detail - giving suggestions on what we should do in the area based on our list of interests. Jiji and Alex truly have a gift for hospitality - I highly recommend staying here should you venture to Montreal!

Although Jiji and Alex were away during our stay, they provided a seamless and gracious backup plan for our arrival. Their mom and sister were super helpful in orienting us to the place. We loved the location in vibrant and interesting Mile End and were delighted with the kitchen arrangement and comfy bedrooms. A grocery store right downstairs made it especially convenient. This was a great size for two couples, with reliable internet, a great espresso machine, and everything we needed for a weekend stay.

Jihane and Alexandre were wonderful hosts who provided us with all the information we needed to navigate the city. The location was excellent, being close to both the bus stop and the metro station. The apartment was comfortable, clean, and cozy! Thank you again for everything, Christine

We were very well received by Jihane and Alexandre. It is worth highlighting their attentiveness and valuable advice. We came with two children and it went very well. The apartment is very well located in terms of transportation and shops and activities. Thank you so much!
Wonderful place in a perfect location!
Warm welcome and a fantastic stay. Close to shops and many restaurants, the place remains calm. I recommend it! Thanks again :)

Great place in an awesome neighborhood. I couldn't have wished for a nicer place to stay, it is close to a lot of nice shops and restaurants and is nicely decorated and clean. If you want to experience Montreal I absolutely recommend staying here!

The apartment was close to restaurants and some shops. It was a bit of a distance to downtown and the subway. Communication with our host was excellent. They were very accommodating for our uncertain arrival time. The apartment was spacious and very comfortable.

We couldn't have asked for a better stay on our long weekend in this great city! Jiji and Alex's place is exactly as described, and the perfect location in the heart of the Mile End. Restaurants and shops out the door, not to mention the grocery store underneath. Communication was great and they were readily available if anything was needed. The space was perfect size for 2 couples, clean and well stocked with any essentials needed. Great find in a good area!

Having stayed in many Airbnbs over the last two years, Jihane was the most responsive, easy to contact, and friendliest host I've interacted with. The apartment is close to so many amenities. A couple things to be aware of for the summer, there is a lot of noise from the street with the windows open and the bedrooms get a lot of light. If you are sensitive to those things, bring earplugs and a sleep mask. The beds are comfortable and the kitchen has everything you need.
Jihane had this experience -- she was a great communicator, friendly, and accommodating. I felt so welcome in her place!
Everything was as advertised. Great place and fantastic location.

Benjamin was very hospitable. He met my girlfriend and me when we arrived, and he was easy to communicate with while finding parking. He provided great suggestions for things to do and see in the city. This place is very cozy, centrally located, and the perfect spot for a great stay in Montreal! Thanks!

Benjamin was a lovely host. This was my first time using instant booking and I have to admit I was a little nervous initially because I didn't get a reply until the third day after initial message. But it turns out it was a minor miscommunication, and communication onwards was pretty good. The fiancé and I stayed for 3 days/2 nights and enjoyed ourselves. The apartment was easily commutable from the airport, conveniently located for shopping and food, modern and well-stocked with supplies. We had arrived earlier than our check-in time and Benjamin met up with us to take our bags until it was time to check in, very nice gesture and saved us from lugging our bags in the snow! I would definitely stay here again. Thanks again, Benjamin!!!

Ben was excellent. He was patient even when I was late and responded quickly to all texts.

The unit was amazing. It was very clean, spacious, and had little amenities like coffee readily available.
Our host Benjamin was perfect, fulfilling everything we had agreed upon, from the check-in and check-out times to detailed explanations about the apartment.

Great experience overall! Benjamin was super nice and helpful with everything. He made great suggestions on places to check out in the area which was nice. The place was super cozy and awesome, the listening is very accurate and I would recommend anyone looking to check out downtown Montreal to stay here!

We use Airbnb often, but our stay at Benjamin's apartment is one of our best experiences. The unit is clean, beautiful and well equipped. The bed is very comfortable. The shower is fantastic. It is in a very nice building in a convenient part of downtown Montreal. Benjamin is the perfect host, very accommodating.

This is a perfect location, right near the Bell Centre! Ben was waiting for us upon arrival and showed us to the unit. The unit had everything we needed and our stay couldn't have been better. Thank you for everything!

I stayed at this lovely studio with my best friend for 6 days! We absolutely loved it! It was very clean and had a nice kitchenette, saving us a LOT of money because we were able to cook some delicious meals and eat out less. On another yummy note, there are a bunch of coffee shops, pubs, bars, and outlet stores all within a couple's blocks of this studio's location on Rue Crescent. We enjoyed getting a morning crepe or croissant from Paris Crepe right down at the end of the block once or twice! It's also a cheap cab ride away for Rue Saint Laurent if you're looking to take part in Montréal's vibrant nightlife. My friend and I both like to walk so we walked to both Old Montreal and Mount Royal on two separate days. However, if you're less keen on walking a couple of miles for some good and fun exercise and get to know the city a bit, the metro station is just a block or two away. It's super easy to get around the city via public transportation especially from this apartment! I'd recommend this listing to anyone who's looking for a good central location to explore Montréal!  It's amazing!
Very nice apartment, very comfortable and well-located, very clean, matching the photos. Benjamin was very welcoming and friendly.
Benjamin's home was beautiful and he was very accommodating! A convenient location and refreshing apartment made for a lovely experience.

Ben was an excellent host. He was very easy to communicate with from the beginning of my stay, and answered all my questions promptly. Ben welcomed me at the property, walked through the place, and recommended several places to visit in Montreal.

The property is very clean and well maintained. It's located in downtown and served as a great access point for all the places I visited. A great experience and I would not hesitate to book again with Ben.

The listing was accurate, the host was kind and accommodating, the space was clean & modern. The location of this property is central to the downtown core and near all required amenities (Starbucks, pharmacy, metro, restaurants, shopping, nightlife, pub). Highly recommend.

Outstanding experience! The apartment is very well located, close to nice restaurants, Starbucks, shops, pubs, and public transportation. The apartment is great, very well equipped, beautiful space, nice kitchen, beautiful bathroom with a rain shower. We highly recommend this apartment to everyone!

We had an excellent visit at Benjamin's studio apartment! Benjamin was very friendly and easy to deal with and met us as soon as we arrived to the studio. The studio was exactly as pictured, beautiful, clean and in a great location. I would recommend this to anyone visiting Montreal!

Our first Airbnb experience was fantastic. This apartment is everything you see in the pictures: simple, modern, and functional!

The location is awesome too. Close to so many restaurants and shops. All forms of transportation are at your doorstep as well. (PS check out the Burger Bar! Best burger ever!)

Benjamin was accommodating with flexible check-in and check-out times, which were super convenient. He's also a really nice person and made the experience very comfortable. 

Highly recommend this accommodation!

I spent two weeks in Benjamin's loft style condo. It was in a perfect location to all the shopping, many restaurants, Old Montreal and Mount Royal. It is located between two metro stops on the green line and close to a metro stop on the orange line. We had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Cooking utensils, a few condiment basics and coffee/maker. Everything in the loft was clean and well organized. Washer/dryer and iron/ironing board came in handy. I would not hesitate to stay here again and would highly recommend it to anyone coming to Montreal. Benjamin was quick to respond and very accommodating. Thanks for a wonderful stay in Montreal!

Benjamin was a phenomenal host! He was very flexible with our schedule to meet us upon arrival as well as check out. His place was pristine! Exactly as pictured and a great location. 10/10 would absolutely stay here again.

Benjamin is an amazing host, very flexible with our schedule, always attentive and considerate, being very helpful on our first time using Airbnb and making our stay in Montreal very pleasant and enjoyable. The condo is just what we wanted for our trip, great location, close to 2 metro stations and walking distance to many restaurants and shops. In summary, an outstanding experience, totally recommended!!

Awesome place in an awesome city. The apartment was immaculate. The building is brand new. It was a spacious studio that was very comfortable for my fiancé and I. It came stocked with most of the normal living amenities, from laundry detergent and trash bags to paper towels and olive oil. There was even a little coffee maker that I used every morning. Although there's an outstanding coffee spot, Cafe Myriade, just a couple blocks over, I highly recommend it. Ben was great, always responsive and very out of the picture. It felt very much like a hotel experience (which is what we were looking for) at a fraction of the price.

The area felt extremely safe even late at night. It's at the intersection of a street with bars/pubs/clubs and the busiest shopping street in the city. It's central to everything. The two main subway lines are just a few blocks away. This is the ideal location for your first time in Montreal. Walking distance from Mount Royal.

Benjamin's apartment was the perfect location in relation to downtown Montreal's center. It was just far enough up the block that the noise of downtown streets didn't bother him and close enough to walk EVERYWHERE! His apartment was immaculate and well-stocked, and the bed was super comfortable. Wifi was easily accessible and the TV was very straightforward. The bathroom had everything you would need for a couple nights stay.

Benjamin was a wonderful host, he met us there exactly when he said he would, and communicated and checked up on us (text) throughout our stay making sure we didn't need anything else. He was a great host and if ever back in Montreal we will definitely stay here again.
Beautiful place and terrific host.

Benjamin welcomed us on the day of our arrival to introduce us to the studio which is consistent with the photos, moreover it is very well located in Montreal. I highly recommend Benjamin and his studio. Top equipment and impeccable cleanliness level.

Benjamin's place was perfect! The apartment was clean, well-equipped with everything we needed, and super close to great restaurants and shopping. The balcony was a nice feature as well. The gym downstairs is also very clean and was easy to access. If you are driving into Montréal, there is a parking lot a few steps away from the apartment, but it can get a bit expensive if you leave the car for more than an hour or so. Benjamin was a great host and was very flexible about check-in and check-out times. I would definitely rent from him again.

Benjamin was a fantastic host! He was very flexible with our schedule and meeting times. The apartment was exactly as shown in the pictures, which is great. It was very clean, comfortable, and everything we needed. It's located right next to Ste Catherine St., which is great for walking and exploring Montreal. We really enjoyed our stay here and would recommend it to everyone.

Translation:

**Fantastic apartment! Highly recommend without reservation.**  It's perfectly located (right in the heart of Montreal: you can get anywhere on foot or by bike), it's beautifully decorated with great taste and is very clean (which is a major plus). It's actually bigger than it looks in the photos, an ideal size for two people. Everything is brand new and the apartment has all the amenities that will make your stay easier (whether in the kitchen, bathroom, or internet connection). The apartment greatly contributed to making our stay enjoyable. I also thank him for his great availability upon arrival and during our stay. Finally, the apartment offers unbeatable value for money. Don't hesitate to book it: it's like a hotel but even better!

Benjamin's place was exactly as described through Airbnb and in his pictures. Benjamin gave us great tips of things to see in the city, which was very walkable if you are up for a nice stroll. Even the rainy weather couldn't prevent us from having a great stay. I would highly recommend staying here and would do so again when I make it back to Montreal. Thanks Benjamin!

Modern and new apartment on the 9th floor! Everything was very clean and it is excellently located. 
Benjamin arrived quite late to check us in, but he was very nice!

Excellent apartment, right in the middle of downtown and within easy reach of so many different neighborhoods and districts. The balcony was especially great for a stay during the summer.

Communication with Benjamin was excellent and he made everything very easy.

Would recommend hosting this apartment.

I would definitely stay here again and recommend Benjamin's place. He was very accommodating when we needed to store our luggage for a few extra hours because the second place we were checking into couldn't get us in earlier. It was such a relief to be able to store our stuff and then enjoy the day without lugging our suitcases. He went above and beyond by being so accommodating with both our check-in time and check-out times. He was always prompt with returning any messages as well. Overall, an amazing experience for our first Airbnb.
We had an excellent two-night stay; the condo was very modern, clean, and centrally located.

Benjamin's place is simply excellent. A helpful and accommodating host, very easy to communicate with. The studio is lovely, very comfortable and clean. It is well situated close to plenty of shops, bars, restaurants and cafes around Saint Catherine Street. I wish we had been able to spend more time here and I would definitely recommend it to any future guests.

We absolutely loved our stay in this studio. Everything is brand new and very clean. We didn't meet Benjamin, Carole was the one who showed us around the studio. We had a great welcome. The building is a minute walk from St-Catherine Street and 5 minutes from Lucien-Lallier metro station. The kitchen is fully equipped so it's easy to cook. Crescent street may seem noisy, but once the patio door is closed, we hear nothing. I highly recommend this Airbnb!

The studio is superb. Very clean, tidy, well-decorated and has almost everything one needs. It is also incredibly well located and even though it is on crescent street which is full of bars, you are on the 9th floor and you don't hear much, especially with the double glazing. The place is very spacious. The host was very welcoming, helpful and available when needed. I would definitely stay there again if I had to visit.

This brand new apartment was perfect for our week of exploring Montreal. It is conveniently located, well-equipped with everything you need, and communication with Benjamin's friend Carole was excellent. Highly recommendable!

My accommodation was perfect, matching the photos and description of the listing. 
It is located in an ideal spot in the city center and very well soundproofed.
Communication with Benjamin went very smoothly.
Great location, amazing space! Benjamin was very helpful and easy to reach if we needed! I would love to rent again next time I'm in Montreal!

The host tried to contact us but our cell phone was not working when we arrived. After we waited at the address, he did show up, so it all worked out OK. 

The neighborhood seems quite safe and is ideally located near many restaurants and shops. We were able to walk to the major attractions in central Montreal.
We had a great stay at Benjamin's apartment. The apartment is modern, clean, well-furnished, and great location for a trip to Montreal.

Very responsive - met us on arrival - the apartment was very clean and tidy, just as pictured. 
The apt is in a great location - easy walking distance to many attractions and close to the metro.
Parking was a bit tricky - but we managed.
Thanks, Benjamin

Super brand new condo, steps from St Catherine Street with tons of shopping, restaurants, and music. Also steps to the bus, metro VIA, and airport transit.

Benjamin was prompt and accommodating.

Highly recommended.

If I could give this place and Benjamin six stars I would!  Benjamin was an excellent host and was quite flexible with check-in and check-out times which helped me out tremendously. The place was top notch, clean and is in a fantastic location. I would definitely stay here again!
The description is perfect, the central area with a lot of movement, and the apartment has everything you might need.

Benjamin's apartment was very accurate to the pictures he posted. It was very clean and organized. He gave us good recommendations of things to do/eat while in Montreal. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks for everything, Benjamin!

Loved it! Very clean and the location could not have been better. Super close to the metro and all the downtown spots. Benjamin was friendly and helpful. Stayed here with my boyfriend and he loved it as well! The place was just perfect for the two of us. It had plenty of space with all of the modern amenities. Loved that there was a washer and dryer. Thank you, Benjamin, for the excellent accommodations!

Great location, the apartment is in top condition, everything is new. 

Benjamin was very easy to communicate with and very accommodating with check-in and check-out times. 

The photos are very accurate and the building is great too. Elevator, great washer, dryer and amenities were a big bonus.

Location is absolutely perfect for downtown living. 

It's very easy to get around, as everything is within walking distance. 

Great restaurants and grocery stores are also nearby.

When my boyfriend and I arrived in Montreal, Benjamin made it easy and convenient to pick up the keys. There was NOTHING inconvenient about staying at Benjamin's condo. It is in a clean, modern building steps away from St. Catherine's. There are many thoughtful things around the condo that we were grateful to find; including an umbrella large enough to cover two people. 

I was pleasantly surprised by the overall experience that the condo provided us... but the biggest surprise was when my boyfriend proposed to me on the balcony!! The fact that he chose that spot to pop the question should speak for itself.
Very central location in Montreal -- Benjamin takes great care of the place (it is very clean!) and is super-responsive. Full kitchen and very comfortable bed. I highly recommend it.

Benjamin's place was perfect! Very comfortable, modern, and clean. And the location was perfect. He was a fantastic host too! Very responsive, helpful, and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again.

Ben's place was a great hub for our trip to Montreal. His condo is perfectly located very close to many shops, restaurants, and bars. The Bell Centre is just a few blocks away and public transportation was easy to use from our condo. Ben was waiting for us outside as we arrived and is very responsive when we contacted him at the airport. The condo has all the amenities of a nice hotel, and you will feel at home here while visiting Montreal. Highly recommend staying here while visiting this beautiful city. Thanks Ben!

Benjamin's studio is new, modern, clean and located in central downtown, close to shopping and public transportation. A perfect place to stay for couples or single people new to the area. Thank you, Benjamin!

We spent 4 wintry days in Montreal and the comfort of Benjamin's place made it that much more magical. We truly felt at home and couldn't have asked for more from his accommodations and from him. Even after we had checked in, he was still available to answer questions about the city and things we could do! We'll definitely be back!
The stay was great! Prompt communication and the location was central to all major attractions in Montreal. Highly recommended!

If you want to be in the heart of the city, this is the spot. One minute walk to St. Catherine St. and a 5-minute walk to Bell Centre. Everything was perfect! Benjamin met us promptly, showed us the condo and answered any questions I had immediately. We will be back!! Thank you Benjamin!

Nice place and very helpful hosts. We were very comfortable and our hosts were easy to contact with questions. They gave us an overview of the area when we arrived so that we'd know where to go for groceries, buses, and trains. We had a great stay!

We are a family of 4 people and we have traveled with our two children aged 9 and 14 years old. We had a very warm welcome despite the delay we experienced at the airport and a capricious GPS...

Guy and his wife were extremely friendly throughout our stay and readily available if needed.

They managed to make us feel at ease immediately. The apartment is completely in line with the descriptions and photos of the listing. It is clean, quiet, comfortable and close to all amenities. We highly recommend it; we will definitely return without hesitation!

A big thank you to Guy and his wife

"Wonderful stay with Guy for my family. The hotel is very accessible and accommodating, responding quickly and offering personalized little touches. The quiet neighborhood is very close to Lafontaine Park and an ideal location for visiting the plateau and downtown. Spacious and very clean apartment: excellent value for money. There's nothing else to say except that Guy and his family are very friendly and I highly recommend this place to my friends and family for a future stay!"

Our host was extremely friendly and very helpful. Easy to get in touch with and readily available for any questions. The apartment was very clean and we were provided with some amenities. It was close to all main attractions, including parks, bakeries, grocery stores, and shopping centers. Overall a good experience and would definitely come back again.

An excellent place with very friendly and helpful hosts, they were always attentive to our needs and when we arrived they gave us an overview of the area. The apartment is bigger than shown in the pictures and very clean and comfortable. The location is excellent. We highly recommend it. If we travel to Montreal again we'll surely call Guy. We had a great stay!

We had a pleasant stay in this apartment.
Guy was very available and very helpful. 
We will definitely return.

Guy's place was great to stay at. He was easy to communicate with and the place was just as described. The only little hiccup was that we were told after arriving that we needed to check out by noon even though on the listing it says 6pm. This was not an issue for us because we were going to check out early anyways but it would have been nice to know in advance and not after we got there.

We were warmly received by Guy upon our arrival, and he is available during our stay if we need him. The apartment is well-located, close to important sites and neighborhoods worth visiting. It is well-equipped, and the beds are comfortable. If I had to point out a negative aspect, it would be the kitchen which could use a little refresh. 

Our stay was pleasant and we recommend this accommodation.

My brother and I stayed at Guys's place for 4 nights. Guy was very easy to communicate with. Check-in was easy, and Guy's wife met us at the door. Guy and his wife live upstairs, so it's very easy if assistance is needed. The apartment was as described on the website. It was very clean and well-equipped. Two queen-size beds were very comfortable. The bedrooms are at the back and very quiet. The location is perfect. In the Plateau and close to public transit and buses. We both enjoyed this apartment immensely and highly recommend it for two couples or traveling companions. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks, Guy!

We were very well received by Guy and his family. We enjoyed a spacious, pleasant, clean, well-equipped and well-located accommodation for three days. Without any hesitation, we would recommend this accommodation to our loved ones.

I loved this location and the home was beautiful and spacious. The neighborhood was quiet. The only downside was the construction in the area caused transit detours that made public transportation difficult. However, for its proximity to everything, I would stay here again and again!
Great time in Montreal, Guy is helpful host. Beautiful and spacious place. The apartment has everything close to all the places in Plateau Mont-Royal.

My three friends and I had a great experience staying at Guy's apartment. Guy was very hospitable in pointing out things we might need during our stay, providing maps and information, etc., and was flexible with our check-in and checkout times. He was very accessible if we needed to ask him anything, as he lives right upstairs. The apartment was very spacious and just as represented in the pictures. We cooked a few times and had everything we needed in the kitchen. We especially loved the neighborhood, which is very calm, quiet, and family-friendly; there's a primary school just across the street. It was a bit further than we expected to get to the heart of downtown, but we felt like it was worth it for how great the place was; it was sort of a nice retreat from the busy city center Overall, it was a great experience and I would definitely recommend staying here to anyone interested in visiting the city!
We enjoyed our stay in this flat and would highly recommend it to other travelers.
He was very nice. The apartment was very clean! Great guy

Guy is a very sociable and friendly person. The accommodation is very well located for everything. There's a small convenience store 2 minutes from the accommodation! It's a 30-minute drive to Old Montreal and Old Port, and a 30-minute drive to Mount Royal plateau. Many small restaurants are located near the accommodation and offer great value for money! Our favorite little spots: Chez ma grosse truie chérie, the bistro on Rue de la Rivière (reservations required) for the poutine! The accommodation is well served by bus lines, especially designed to make 3 dollars 25! Or buy a pass for your stay; it covers both buses and the metro.
Clean, comfortable and Guy and his wife were incredibly responsive.
